Kayenat aur insan ki haqeeqat ke bare mein yeh chaar bunyadi batein bayan karne ke baad kalaam ka rukh un logon ki taraf murta hai jinhon ne kufr ki rah ikhtiyar ki, aur inhen tareekh ke isi manzar ki taraf tawajjuh dilayi jati hai jo poori insani tareekh mein musalsal jari raha hai. Ye paigham asal mein un logon ke liye ek tanbeeh hai jo haqeeqat se moo mod kar ghalat rasta ikhtiyar karte hain. Aise logon ko hamesha se anjaam-e-bad ka samna karna pada hai.
Kayenat ek kalami mafhoom hai jis ki taweel mukhtalif tareeqon aur nazariyat ke tehat ki gayi hai. Kayenat ki mahiyat par falasafiyon ne un bohat sare nazariyat mein se jis nazariye par sab se kam ikhtilaf kiya hai, is ke mutabiq Kayenat ka mafhoom yeh hai ke yeh zamani-makani wujood rakhti hai. Is tasawwur ke mutabiq, Kayenat waqt aur jagah ke dayre mein qayam hai. Ye nazariya kayenati uljhanon ko suljhane mein madadgar sabit hua hai.
Kayenat ki ibteda ke hawale se bhi kaseer ta'dad mein nazariyat wazeh hue. Kisi ne daawa kiya ke Kayenat ne khud ko az khud takhleeq kiya, to kisi ne kaha ke Khuda, yaani Aqil Musabbab, hi iska khaliq hai. Jabkay tamam mazahib bhi Khuda ko hi Kayenat ka khaliq mante hain. Ye mukhtalif nazariyat insani soch aur aqeede ki gehraiyon ko darshate hain. Har nazariya Kayenat ke wujood aur uske raaz ko apni tarah se samjhane ki koshish karta hai.
Kayenati Tasawwuf ko ek aisa shoba-e-falsafah (dimagh-e-insani-o-nafsiyati) kaha ja sakta hai jo Mazhab-e-Islam ki taleemat ko insani khwahishat aur takhayyulat ke mutabiq dhaal kar Islam ko Islam se nafrat karne wale azhan ke liye qabil-e-qubool banaye. Aur zahir hai ke yeh tasawwur ghair-Muslim afraad ke liye mushkil ho sakta hai. Iska maqsad Islam ko mukhtalif zehni dharon tak us tarah pahunchana hai ke woh use asani se qabool kar saken. Yeh aik gehra aur mushkil falahsafa hai jiski samajh har kisi ke bas ki baat nahi.

Jab ke Aaimma-e-Salasa ka yeh mazhab hai ke shohar jab zabaan se Talaq de ga to Talaq waqay hogi. Qazi sahib ne bohat israar kiya ke abhi apne paas rehne dijiye, aap 'ameen' (amaanatdaar) mashoor hain aur behtar tareeqay se is ki hifazat kar sakte hain. Magar aap ne Qazi se e'tizar karte hue tamam maal-o-asbaab ki fehrist paish kar di aur sath hi fori amal daramad ki darkhwast ki. Qazi ka kehna hai ke jaan lo ke ummat is par mujtama hai ke Nabi Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Shaitan se jismani aur zabani aur hawaas ke aitbaar se bhi bachaye gaye hain. To is hadees mein ham-nasheen qareen ke fitnah aur waswasa aur uskay ighwa ke mutaliq tahzir di gayi hai. Microsoft Windows ko duniya ka sab se ziyada istemaal honay wala operating system maana jata hai. Taham, Linux is ki ijarah dari ki raah mein sab se barri rukawat saabit hota raha hai. Is ki sab se barri wajah Linux ka open source aur muft hona hai jis ka matlab hai ke koi bhi isay baghair kisi qeemat ke istemaal kar sakta hai aur us mein tabdeeliyan bhi la sakta hai.
Roman Urdu mein is qisam ke mukhtalif mazameen par mushtamil nuskhe (texts) zubaan ki waseeat aur adabi gehrai ko zahir karte hain. Is terha ke maloomati mawad ki processing se na sirf lisani tehqeeq ko farogh milta hai balkay digital library mein izafa bhi hota hai.
Michael Hart kitaab ke debachay mein hi wazahat karta hai ke yeh kitaab mutasir kun shakhsiyaat ki hai, nah ke intahai azeem tareekhi shakhsiyaat ki. Is kitaab mein musannif ne sirf unhi afraad ko shaamil kiya hai jin ke kisi aik ya bohat se karnamon ki wajah se logon ki aik barri tadaad mutasir hui hai. Un ki yeh kitaab duniya bhar mein qabil-e-behas rahi aur kai logon ne is ki fehrist par ikhtilafat ka izhar kiya.

Martial Law bhi tanazeaat ke dauran aur kisi dosri civil hukoomat ki ghair mojoodgi mein aik ghair mustahkam abadi ke liye aman o amaan faraham karta hai, jahan fauji adalaton mein muqadmaat aaid kiye gaye hain. Fauji hukoomat ke is form ki misalein Germany aur Japan mein doosri aalmi jung ke baad taameer-e-nau ke dauran dekhi ja sakti hain. Martial Law aksar awami azadiyon aur bunyadi haqooq par pabandiyan bhi lagata hai.

Is ke alawa, Mario RPGs aur sports games mein bhi shamil raha hai, jo uski har dil azizi ki wajah hai.
Maria Duval ka naam duniya ki mashhoor tareen farzi rohani shakhsiyaat mein hota hai. Woh ab tak lakhoon logon ko bewaqoof bana kar un se karorron dollar lout chuki hai. Un ka tareeqa-e-waardaat intahai saada hai: woh ghareeb, nadaar, beemar aur umardarz logon ko haath se likhay khat bhejati hain. Aisay fraud ke khilaaf kayi mumalik mein qanooni karwaiyan bhi ki gayi hain taake awam ko is qisam ke dhokebazi se bachaya ja sake.
Maazi mein Banu ki har bastii buland bala hisaar mein mehfooz hoti thi jo difai aghraaz ke liye zaruri bhi tha. Magar nuqsaan yeh hua ke har bastii ki apni masjid aur apna qibla hua karta tha, aur sirf is masjid se mutaliqa bastii ke baaligh Musalman afraad hi namaz ada kar sakte the. Is tarah ki alag-thalag zindagi ne muasharti rabton aur bade ijtimai ijtamaat ko kam kiya.
Maazi mein jo sancha mein ne banaya tha, kya usay hi istemal nahi kiya ja sakta? Bilkul, kiya ja sakta hai! Saarifeen usay apne safhaat par lagayen aur is mein se fehrist ka code nikaal dein, taake agar koi mawaad is mein dala jaye to woh unhein sahih tarteeb mein nazar aaye. Is tarah waqt ki bachat hogi aur aik yaksan andaaz barqarar rahega.
Maazi mein World Cup ke semi-final marhalay se aage barhne mein nakaam rehne wali New Zealand aur Janubi Africa ki temein is baar bhi is marhalay se aage na barh sakein. Aur World Cup ka final match, teamon ke lehaaz se 2019 ke final ka re-play saabit hua. Yeh un dono teamon ke liye aik aur dil shikast lamha tha, jo aksar World Cup ke aakhri marhalay mein kamyabi se door rehti hain.
Maazi mein maal-e-rehan (girvi rakhi hui cheez) ka qarz dainay wala maalik ho jata tha agar maqrooz (qarz lene wala) ne waqt par qarz ada nahi kiya. Islam ne is baat ki to ijazat di ke agar maqrooz qarz ada nahi kare to baaz suraton mein maal ko farokht karke apna qarz wusool kar le aur baqi paisa wapas kar de. Yeh usool insaaf par mabni hai taake qarz dainay walay ka haq bhi mahfooz rahe aur maqrooz par bhi zulm na ho.
Malakand ka muhasra July se August tak Bartanwi Hind ke Shumali Maghribi Sarhadi Soobay (NWFP) ke ilaqay Malakand mein Bartanwi afwaj ke aik fauji camp ko us waqt muqami Pashtoon jungjuon ki janib se muhasray ka saamna karna pada jab Durand Line ki wajah se bohat se Pashtoonon ki zameen ka masla peda hua tha. Durand Line ki hadd bandi ne Pashtoon qabail ke darmiyan aik siyasi aur samaji taqseem paida kar di thi.
Malakand ka muhasra Winston Churchill ki zindagi ki pehli asli larai thi. Is waqea ko is ne Roznama Daily Telegraph ke mukhtalif shumaron mein silsila waar bayan kiya, jis par unhein fi mazmoon pound sterling mila karte the. Un mazameen ko baad mein jama karke aik kitaab 'Malakand ki Jang' (The Story of the Malakand Field Force) ke naam se shaya kiya gaya. Yeh unki ibtidai fouji aur sahafati zindagi ka aik ahem hissa tha, jis ne unhein mustaqbil mein bari zimmedariyon ke liye tayar kiya.
Maana jata hai ke Hazrat Mohammad (Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam) apne sir ko hamesha dhaank kar rakhte the. Is sunnat ki amal pairai mein Musalman topi ya amaama (pagri) pehante hain, jo unki taleemat ki roshni mein hai. Topi aur amaama Islami tehzeeb aur mazhabi shanaakht ka hissa ban chuke hain.
Mahireen ka kehna hai ke samandar hamari zameen ka dil aur phephray hain. Yeh zameen par istemal honay wala chalees feesad taaza pani aur pachas feesad oxygen paida karte hain, jis se hum saans lete hain. Is munasbat se samandaron ka mahol insaan aur uski baqa ke liye intahai ahem hain. Bad qismati se, aloodgi aur global warming samandari mahol ke liye sangin khatraat paida kar rahe hain.
Mahireen ke mutabiq agar Gwadar bandargah ke zariye duniya ke mumalik mein tijarati lain-dain shuru ho jaye aur mukhtalif mumalik apni apni sikka-e-raaij-ul-waqt (currencies) mein lain-dain tijarat shuru karein ge, to Pakistan mein dollar ki qeemat kaafi had tak kam ho jaegi aur uske ilawa Balochistan ko bhi iqtisadi faida hoga. Gwadar ko CPEC (China-Pakistan Economic Corridor) ke tehat aik ahem tijarati hub banaya ja raha hai, jis se regional taraqqi ki tawaqqo hai.
Mahireen ke nazdeek khawateen mein is amal ke tasleem kiye jane ki wajoohaat yeh hain ke is se samaji tor par behtar rutba milta hai, shadi mein aasani hoti hai, bakarat ki hifazat, jinsi khwahish mein kami, mard ki jinsi taskeen, aur mazhabi idaron ka dabao bhi is ki wajoohaat mein shamil hain. Halan-ke, jadeed tehzeebi aur tibbi mahireen aisay rasoomat ko insani haqooq ki khilaf warzi aur sehat ke liye muzir qaraar dete hain.
Mutahidda Majlis-e-Amal ka ittehaad bator Hizb-e-Ikhtilaaf samne aaya, jis ka maqsad Parvez Musharraf ki America-nawaz policy ki mukhalifat karna tha. Yeh ittehaad deeni jamaaton ka tha jis mein Jamiat Ulema-e-Islam (F), Tehreek-e-Jafria Pakistan, Jamiat Ahl-e-Hadees, aur Jamaat-e-Islami Pakistan shamil theen. Is ittehaad ne aik arsay tak Pakistani siyasat mein ahem kirdar ada kiya, khasusan 2002 ke intikhabat mein.
Mutadid siyasi leaders, jin mein Hussain Shaheed Suhrawardy, Khan Abdul Qayyum Khan, Maulana Bhashani aur Sheikh Mujibur Rahman shamil the, hirasat mein le liye gaye. Taham, yeh baat dilchasp hai ke Sheikh Mujibur Rahman ko EBDO ke tehat na ahal nahi qarar diya gaya balkay unhein bad anwanyon ke jurm mein girftar kiya gaya. Yeh waqiya us waqt ki Pakistani siyasat mein siasi mukhalifeen ko dabane ki koshishon ki nishandahi karta hai.
Maslan, aik shakhs ke sardi ke mausam mein khoon nikal aaya to Imam Abu Hanifa (Rehmattullah Alaih) ke nazdeek is ka wuzu toot gaya aur Imam Shafi (Rehmattullah Alaih) ke nazdeek nahi toota. Woh apni tan-aasani ki wajah se us waqt Imam Shafi (Rehmattullah Alaih) ki raaye ko ikhtiyar karta tha. Fiqhi masail mein aisay ikhtilafat Islami tareekh mein aam rahe hain, jo mukhtalif mazahib ke mahireen ki gehrai ko darshate hain.
Maslan, hamein maloom hai ke wirasat ki taqseem aur yatimon ke haqooq ke mutaliq hidayat jung-e-Uhud ke baad nazil hui theen, jabkay Musalmanon ke bohat se aadmi shaheed ho gaye the aur Madine ki choti si bastii mein is haadsay ki wajah se bohat se gharon mein yeh sawal peda ho gaya tha. In ayat ka nuzool us waqt ke muasharti aur iqtisadi masail ka hal faraham karta tha, taake kamzor tabqay ka tahaffuz kiya ja sake.
Majmoi tor par is kitaab ke baray mein musannif ka kehna hai ke un chaar darichon par mabni yeh kitaab sara sar ghair sanjeeda koshish hai, jis ke kisi hissay par sanjeedgi se ghusse hona is ke sath bohat bara mazaq hoga. Is ke bawajood agar dil-azari ka shubha ho (to musannif maazrat chahain ge). Yeh musannif ka khas andaaz hai jo tanzeeh aur mazaq ke zariye gehre masail ko pesh karta hai.
Muhasra-e-Vienna se murad Usmani Turkon ki janib se Austria ke dar-ul-hukumat Vienna ke woh do muhasray hain jo 1529 aur 1683 mein kiye gaye, lekin Turk shehar ko hasil karne mein nakaam rahe. Aur na sirf poora Wasti Europe Turk Muslim afwaj ke zair-e-nigeen na aa saka, balkay Muhasra-e-Vienna ki wajah se Usmani saltanat ki wusat ki hadd muqarrar ho gayi. Yeh muhasray Europe ki tareekh mein Usmani saltanat ki pesh qadmi aur uske ikhtitam ki nishandahi karte hain.
Muhasra-e-Vienna ke tamam asbab dakhli the, kyunkay Austria ke zair-e-hukumat Hungary ka tamam ilaqa Shah Leopold I ke mutassibana rawaiyye se khaif tha. Aur ahal-e-Hungary ne is ke khilaaf baghawat bhi ki thi aur aik sardar ne Austria se azadi ka elaan karke khud ko Hungary ka badshah qarar de diya tha. Is andaruni kashmakash ne Austria ki hukumat ko kamzor kiya aur Usmani afwaj ko aik mauqa faraham kiya.
Mehal-e-waqoo ke lehaaz se Dera Ghazi Khan mulk ke charon sobon ke wast mein waqay hai. Is ke maghrib mein Koh-e-Sulaiman ka buland bala silsila hai, shumal mein Thal aur mashriq mein Daryaye Sindh thaten maar raha hai. Rohani hawalay se maghrib mein Hazrat Sakhi Sarwar ka mazaar hai aur shumal mein bhi kai buzurgon ke mazarat hain. Yeh ilaqa apni qadeem saqafat, qabaili reet riwaj aur sufi buzurgon ki dharon ki wajah se mashoor hai.
Muhammad Asad ne apni Islami zindagi ke kai saal Arab duniya, Hindustan, Pakistan aur Tunisia mein guzaare. Aur aakhri ayyam mein unka qayam Spain ke is ilaqay mein raha jo Andalus aur Arab duniya ka Rohani saqafati hissa tha, balkay aaj bhi is ki fizayen baqi Spain se mukhtalif aur pur sakoon hain. Woh apni mashhoor tafseer 'The Message of The Qur'an' ke liye jaane jaate hain, jis ne unhein aalmi shohrat bakhshi.
Mehmed I ki Umar inteqal ke waqt mehez 40 saal thi aur unhon ne sirf 8 saal hukumat ki. Taham, un ka daur is liye ahem hai ke Jung-e-Ankara mein apne waalid ki shikast aur saltanat ke tukre ho jane ke baad unhon ne usay az sar-e-nau pairon par khara kiya. Unhein Usmani saltanat ka doosra baani samjha jata hai, jinhon ne saltanat ko ikai mein jora.
Muhammad Ayyub bin Muhammad Yusuf bin Sulaiman Umar, jo Qari Ayyub Burmi ke naam se maroof hain, Masjid-e-Nabwi ke Muawin Imam the. Woh 1990 mein imamat ke liye muqarrar hue aur 1997 tak imamat ke faraiz anjam diye. Phir kuch salon ka inqita raha aur dobarah Ramadan 2015 se mansab-e-Imamat par bahal hue. Woh apni dilkash tilawat aur khubsurat aawaz ke liye jaane jaate the, jis ne lakhoon afraad ko mutasir kiya.
Muhammad Hameed Shahid falsafa-e-tasawwuf mein apne inhimak ko maaddi zindagi ke masaaib aur mushkilaat se faraar ka bahana hargiz nahi banate. Chunancha, isi kitaab mein unhi afsanoon ke pehlu-ba-pehlu hamaray muasharti aur ikhlaqi zawaal par dil ko pighla dene wali kahaniyan bhi mojood hain. Professor Fatah Muhammad Malik bhi unki tareef karte hain. Unki tehreerein aksar samajhi tanqeed aur rohani ilm ka sarmaya hoti hain, jo qareen ko fikar-o-nazar ki nai raahein dikhati hain.
Muhammad Khan abhi chaar saal ke hi the ke un ke sir se walid ka saya-e-atfat uth gaya. Lekin un ki walida ne ghair taleem yafta hotay hue bhi un ki taleem par na sirf yeh ke khusoosi nazar rakhi balkay unhein khoob se khoob tar pohanchanay mein koi kasar nahi chori. Walida ki is qurbani aur honsla afzai ne unki shakhsiyat aur mustaqbil ki bunyaad rakhi.
Muhammad Ali Jinnah ke nuqaat ko agarchay Congress ne tasleem nahi kiya, lekin mubasireen ki raaye mein unhon ne Musalmanan-e-Hind ki tarjamani karte hue un ke mafadaat aur haqooq ke haqayiq ko mudallal andaaz mein pesh karke Bartanwi hukumat ko yeh baat bawar karwane ki koshish ki ke Congress akeli subah-e-Hind ke Musalmanon ki numaindagi nahi karti. Yeh nazariya, do qaumi nazariye ki bunyaad bana, jisne Pakistan ke qiyam ki raah hamwar ki.
Muhammad Ali Pasha Usmani fauj ka Albanwi nazaad commander tha, jisay Misar se Napoleon ki afwaj ko bedakhal karne ki zimmedari saunp kar Misar bheja gaya. Lekin Fransiyon ke nikale jaane ke baad is ne Iqtidaar hasil karke 1805 mein Usmani Sultan Mahmud II par zor diya ke woh usay Misar ka vali tasleem kare. Usne Misar mein aik naye hukmaran khandan ki bunyaad rakhi aur Misar ko aik jadeed riyasat mein tabdeel kiya.
Muhammad Musa Shafiq ka inteqal phansi ki wajah se hua. Hukumat-e-waqt ke khilaaf bolna aur un ke khilaaf ehtijaj karna jahan Muhammad Musa Shafiq ke liye jaan lewa saabit hua, wahan un ke saathi bhi hukumat ka sath na dene ki padaash mein girftar kar liye gaye. Aur Kamiyoonist hukumat ne un par shadeed karwai ki. Unki shahadat ne mulk mein siasi azadi ki tehreek ko mazeed hawa di aur hukumat ke zulm ko ujagar kiya.
Nabi Akram (S.A.W.) ki wafaat par janasheen ya naib ki muqarari waqai koi masla tha ya aisa mehez bana kar pesh kiya gaya? Is baat ka jawab is mazmoon mein talaash karne ki koshish ki jaegi, lekin is se qabal un waqeat ka mukammal idraak zaruri mehsoos hota hai jo is masle se mutaliq hain. Khilafat ka yeh masla Islami ummat mein mukhtalif firqon ki bunyaad bana aur tareekhi behson ka markaz raha.

Aur aaj ke safarnamon mein jo dilchasp andaaz, usloob ki nudrat, kahani pan aur takhayyul ka istemal dekha jata hai, uski bunyaad isi safarnamay mein mili hai. Mukhtalif Pakistani TV channels par mazhabi qisam ke programme karne ki wajah se jahan Aamir Liaquat Hussain ke bohat se chahne walay hain, wahan un ke naqideen bhi mojood hain. Is liye social media par aksar un ki jaali digriyon walay scandals aur deegar mazhabi ikhtilafat ki bina par inhein tanqeed ka nishana banaya jata hai. Unki shohrat aur tanqeed ka yeh silsila un ke media career ka aik ahem hissa raha, jisne unhein aik mutanaza shakhsiyat banaya.
Madras, UP aur Bombay ke sobon ke Governor General apni Council mein intizami members ke ilawa kam az kam 4 aur ziyada se ziyada 8 arakeen naamzad karein ge. Bengal aur Shumali Maghribi Soobay ke Lieutenant Governor bhi apni Councilon mein ziyada se ziyada 6 aur kam se kam 2 arakeen naamzad karein ge. Madrassa mein Maulana Amin Ahsan Islahi ne aath saal mein mukammal nisaab ki taleem mukammal ki. Is arsay mein aap ne Arabi zabaan, Quran, Hadees, Fiqah aur Uloom-e-Kalam ki tehseel ki. Urdu, Farsi, Angrezi aur bilkhusoos Arabi mein dastaras hasil ki, jis se aindah ke tahqeeq-o-tadabbur ki rahein khud ba khud khul gayeen. Unki zindagani Islami ilm aur tafseer-e-Quran ke liye waqf thi, jinhon ne 'Tadabbur-e-Quran' jaisi azeem tehreerain tarkeeb dein.
Madhya Pradesh Reyasti AIDS Control Society ki taraf se riyasat Madhya Pradesh mein AIDS muhim mein purzor madad di ja rahi hai. Khaas tor par walidain se bachon mein honay walay HIV infection ki rok-tham, mutasirah bachon ke liye ilaaj faraham karna, nojawanon mein infection ki rok-tham aur mutasirah bachon ki behtar dekh bhal is muhim ke ahdaf hain. Is muhim ka maqsad HIV/AIDS ke baray mein shaoor bedaar karna aur is bimari ke shikar afraad ko sahayata faraham karna hai.
Mazkoora bala tamam tar hawala jaat mehez is wajah se pesh kiye gaye hain ke yeh Urdu lughaat aur aaini dastawizaat mein paye jatay hain. Aur isi wajah se is mazmoon mein kisi khaas dafa ko ikhtiyar kiya gaya hai, lekin jaisa ke wajah-e-tasmia mein bhi bayan hua ke (in ka istemal aik khaas maqsad ke liye hai). Is tarah ki tehqeeqat se kisi bhi mauzoo ki bunyadi samajh aur tareekhi pas manzar wazeh hota hai.
Mazkoora do bandon mein rida, qaba aur mughni Arabi alfaaz hain, magar un ko Fiza Sahib ne nihayat khubsurti se bandha hai. Balkay un Arabi alfaaz ki azafat Farsi ki taraf karke aik khush kun naghmagi paida kar di hai. Mughni-e-Haram aur Tayyoor-e-Khush Nawa jaisi tarakeeb Fiza ki shairi ki shan hain. Yeh Farsi aur Arabi zabaanon ke Urdu shairi mein husn-e-istemal ki aik behtareen misaal hai, jo zabaan ko mazeed purkashish banata hai.
Mazhabi taleem dainay wala muallim, ustad, faqeeh aur maulvi ka laqab 'Akhund' madaris ya deeni idaron mein parhanay wala ustad hota hai. Sindh mein khaas tor par 'Akhund' us ustad ko kaha jata hai jo Quran aur dosre deeni umoor ki taleem de. Akhund ke liye bhi parhaizgaar, naik aur ba-ilm hona zaruri hai. Akhundat ka nizaam Sindh mein taareekhi tor par taleem aur rohani hidayat ka bunyadi silsila raha hai.
Muraqba aur ibadat mein farq par baat karne se pehlay yeh baat qabil-e-tavajjo hai ke ibadat se murad kis mazhab se hai. Agar yahan muraqba se murad tamam mazahab se hai, to phir is mauzoo par alag alag har mazhab ki ibadat se muraqabe ka mawazna lazim aata hai. Muraqba aik aisi rohani mashq hai jo mukhtalif mazahib aur falsafon mein payi jati hai, jis ka maqsad andaruni sukoon aur khudi ko pehchan'na hai.
Muraqba ki gehri halaton mein ab har fard-e-wahid ka wasta aik hum-gehra ehsas dilane wale wujood (yaani khudi) se pada. Aur yeh akhaz kiya gaya ke yeh jo silsila-e-kaayenaat mein tawanai ka amal-dakhal nazar aata hai, is ki koi haqeeqat nahi balkay aik aala (rohani haqeeqat hai). Is tarah, muraqba afraad ko apni zaati khudi aur kainat ke baray mein gehre mushahidat tak rasai deta hai.
Marhoom Jamshed Gulzar Kiani aur sabiq Saddar General (R) Pervez Musharraf ke darmiyan ikhtilafat us waqt shiddat ikhtiyar kar gaye jab unhon ne is saal June mein aik TV programme mein Kargil operation aur Lal Masjid operation ke baray mein inkishafaat kiye the. Aur (Jamshed Kiani) ka kehna tha ke waqt ke Army Chief ne is mamle mein kuch ghaltiyan ki theen. In inkishafaat ne awami halqon mein aik nai behas chher di aur mulk ki tareekh ke in ahem waqiaat par mazeed sawalaat uthaye gaye.
Marhoom ne Mashriqi Pakistan ke alehadgi ke baad Bihariyon ki abadkari, patang baazi par pabandi, Pakistani hukmaranon ke ghair mulki dauron aur unke akhrajaat, faujiyon ko onay ponay damon araazi allot karne, petrol ki qeematon mein izafah aur Saddar Pervez Musharraf ke bator Army Chief sadaarti intikhab samait kayi ahem mauzooat par apni raaye ka izhar kiya tha. Unki tanqeed mulki affairs aur siyasat mein hukmaranon ki kargardagi par gehrai se nazar dalti thi.
Mirza Ibn-e-Hanif (Paidaish December 1913, Wafaat July 2004) Pakistan se talluq rakhne walay Urdu ke mumtaz adeeb, maahir-e-asaar-e-qadima, muhaqqiq aur muarrikh the. Woh apni kutub jaise 'Misar Ka Qadeem Adab', 'Saat Daryaon Ki Sarzameen', 'Duniya Ka Qadeem Tareen Adab' aur 'Janubi Punjab Ke Asaar-e-Qadima' ki wajah se shohrat rakhte hain. Unka kaam qadeem tehzeebon aur ilmi virse par mushtamil tha, jisne Pakistan mein asaariat ke ilm ko farogh diya.
Mirza Muhammad Hadi Ruswa ki zindagi ki durust tafseelat dastiyab nahi hain aur un ke hum-asron ki taraf se di gayeen maloomat mein tazad mojood hain. Albatta, Ruswa ne khud tazkira kiya hai ke un ke aaba-o-ajdaad Faris (Iran) se Hindustan mein aaye aur un ke pardada Saltanat-e-Awadh mein ahem uhdon par faiz the. Ruswa apni mashhoor kitaab 'Umrao Jan Ada' ke liye jaane jaate hain, jo Urdu adab ka aik shahkar samjha jata hai.
Mursal lughat mein 'Irsal' se makhuz hai, jis ke maani azad chhorne ke hain. Aur Khafi (chupa hua) jali (zahiri) ka zid hai. Chunkay is qisam ka irsal ghair zahir hota hai aur kaafi justojoo aur talaash ke baad is ki samajh aa jati hai, is liye usay yeh naam diya gaya. Yeh terminology aksar balaghat aur shairi mein istemal hoti hai jahan chupi hui batain gehri maani rakhti hain.
Mareekh tak jaane walay robot-jati khalayi jahazon ko jaraseem se pak hona zaruri hai, taake khalayi jahaaz ke oopar mojood kisi bhi qism ke tukham (spores) se nimta ja sake. Aur un ko mazeed bareek beeni se jaraseem se pak kiya jaye, agar is baat ka imkaan ho ke woh un makhsoos ilakon ko mutasir kar sakte hain jahan zindagi ke asaar milne ki tawaqqo ho. Is ka maqsad Mareekh par mojood mumkinna micro-organisms ko zameen ke micro-organisms se alag rakhna hai taake saheeh tahqeeq ho sake.
Mareekh par tilon jaisay khad-o-khaal ko nuqoosh ki shakal-o-soorat, mehal-e-waqoo, jis zameen se is ka talluq hai aur kon sa musannif is ki tashreeh kar raha hai, ki munasbat se bator bahao ke nuqoosh, Mareekhi bahao ke nuqoosh, gosha daar dhool, teh band ya bhari hui dahari daar chataanain ho sakti hain. Yeh Mareekh ki satah par mojood geomorphological features ke mutaliq tehqeeq ka hissa hai, jo is sayyare ki tareekh ko samajhne mein madadgar hai.
American Airlines Flight 77 aik munazzam safri parwaz thi jisko Al-Qaeda se mansoob paanch admion ne Saneha Gyarah September ke hamlon ke silsilay mein aghwa kiya aur Pentagon se takra diya, jis ke nateejay mein woh khud, jahaaz par mojood deegar unsaath amla aur musafir aur imarat ke andar (kayi afraad bhi halaak hue). Yeh waqiya America ki tareekh mein aik siyah din ke tor par yaad kiya jata hai aur isne aalmi siyasat par gehre asraat murattab kiye.
Muzdalifa se Mina rawangi se pehlay yaad rakhna chahiye ke aapko Mina ja kar shaitan ko kankariyan marni hain. Is ka intizam yahan Muzdalifa se karna hai. Kam az kam sattar kankariyan aik theli mein rakh lein, jab Zil-Hajj ki subah ka ujala aasman par phelne lagta hai to Mina ki taraf rawana ho jayein. Yeh Hajj ka aik ahem rukun hai, jo Musalmanon ke aqeeday mein burai ko radd karne ki alamat hai.
Mazeed, Ibn Khaldun ka kehna hai ke aik muarrikh ke liye yeh janna zaruri hai ke tareekh mein agarchay us zamane ke makhsoos logon ka zikr hota hai, mutayyan waqiaat aur barre barre hawadis ki tafseelat hi bayan ki jati hain, taham is asar ke tamam halaat, geographia aur juziyyat (ko bhi ghaur se dekhna chahiye). Ibn Khaldun ko tareekh nigari mein aik jadeed aur tehqeeqi andaaz ikhtiyar karne wala samjha jata hai, jinhon ne samajhi aur iqtisadi pehluon ko bhi shamil kiya.
Mazeed, is film ke karobar par asarandaz honay wala aik aur amal yeh hai ke is film ke numaish ke liye pesh kiye jane ke aik mah ke baad hi is film ke aala darjay ke ghair daftari aur be-zabita tor par jari shuda nuskhay naqal farokht ke liye (market mein aa gaye the). Film piracy aaj bhi industry ke liye aik bara masla hai, jo na sirf kamai ko mutasir karta hai balkay funkaron ki mehnat ko bhi nuqsan pohnchata hai.
Mazeed wazahat ke liye hum farz karte hain ke is khala-baz ka aik jurwa bhai bhi hai aur is safar ki shuruaat mein dono ki Umar bees saal hai. To jab khala-baz apne safar se wapas zameen par aayega, to is ki Umar baais saal hogi jabkay is ke bhai ki Umar tees saal (ya is se ziyada) ho chuki hogi. Yeh Einstein ke nazariya-e-azafi (theory of relativity) ka aik mashhoor tajarbati tasawwur hai, jise 'Twin Paradox' ke naam se jana jata hai.
Mazeed yeh ke Website par khabar aur report ke chapte hi, woh sirf Facebook aur Twitter jaise maqbool-e-aam samaji media ki zeenat hi nahi banti balkay rozana lakhoon shaiqeen tak rasai ke challenge ko bhi kamyab karke dikhaya hai, jisay adaad-o-shumar ke pemanay par bakhoobi parakha ja sakta hai. Yeh jadeed digital media ki qudrat aur uski tez raftari ko zahir karta hai, jahan khabrein fauran phelti hain.
Musafir us waqt tak musafir hai jab tak apni bastii mein pohanch na jaye ya abadi mein pure pandrah din thehrne ki niyat na kare. Aur yeh us waqt hai jab teen din ki raah chal chuka ho. Aur agar teen manzil pohanchne se peshtar woh apne watan wapsi ka irada kar le (to bhi musafir hi rahega). Yeh fiqhi masail mein musafir ki tareef aur uske ahkam se mutaliq hai, jahan namaz aur roze mein riayat di jati hai.
Musafiron ki barhti hui tadaad se nimatnay ke liye Islamabad se bahar Fateh Jang ke ilaqa mein Islamabad International Airport (pehle Gandhara Bain ul-Aqwami Hawai Adda ke naam se mashoor) bhi zer-e-taameer tha, jo mukammal tayyar hone ke baad Pakistan mein sab se bara hawai adda ban gaya hai. Is hawai adday ki salahiyat million musafiron ko saholat faraham kar sakti hai. Yeh hawai adda ab mukammal tor par fa'aal hai aur mulk ke liye bain-ul-aqwami safar ki aik ahem sheryaan hai.
Masawi Quwwat-e-Khareed Sharah-e-Tabadla (Purchasing Power Parity) ke baray mein aasan alfaaz mein yeh samajh lein ke, misaal ke tor par agar Pakistani rupiye ki sharah-e-tabadla dollar ke sath 280 rupay fi dollar hai, magar Pakistan mein 100 rupay mein utni ashya kharidi ja sakti hain jitni aik Amrici dollar mein, to sharah-e-tabadla (PPP) ka hisab mukhtalif hoga. PPP mulkon ki iqtisadi taqat ka behtar andaza lagane mein madad karta hai, kyunke yeh sirf currency ki qeemat nahi, balkay quwwat-e-khareed ko bhi dekhta hai.
Mustaqil abadi, mutayyan kardah sarhad, hukumat, doosri riyaston ke sath taluqaat ki khasiyat: khud-mukhtar riyasat ka umumi tasawwur yahi hai ke yeh apne taeen nizam-e-hukumat aur mamlaat chalane mein azad ho, aur kisi bairooni taqat ya riyasat ka is khitta-e-arz ki faisla saazi par koi asar o rasookh na ho. Yeh siyasi science mein aik mukammal aur khud-mukhtar riyasat ki bunyadi tareef hai.
Masjid-ul-Haram, Makkah Mukarramah, Islam ka sab se muqaddas tareen maqam hai jahan Khana Kaaba waqay hai, jis ki taraf rukh karke Musalman din mein paanch martaba namaz ada karte hain. Masjid-e-Nabwi, Madinah Munawwara, jahan Hazrat Mohammad (S.A.W.) ka roza-e-mubarak waqay hai. Masjid Quba, Madinah mein Islam ki pehli masjid hai. Aur Bait-ul-Muqaddas mein Masjid-e-Aqsa bhi Musalmanon ke liye teesra muqaddas tareen maqam hai.
Masjid-ul-Haram ki pehli chaar deewari Hazrat Umar Farooq (R.A.) ne 638 AD mein banai thi, jabkay Abbasid Caliph Mehdi ke daur mein 777 AD mein masjid ki tareekh ki us waqt ki sab se barri tauzee hui thi. Jis ke gird Usmani Turkon ne safaid gumbadon walay baraamde banaye the jo ikkisween sadi tak mojood the. Masjid-ul-Haram ki tosee ka silsila aaj tak jari hai, taake Hajj aur Umrah karne walon ke liye mazeed sahuliyat faraham ki ja sakein.
Masjid Saleh Muhammad Kamboh se agar daen janib murr jayein, to Imam Bargah Syed Akbar Ali Shah aata hai. Is ke sath hi aage mashhoor Lal Khoh ki imarat hai, jo aik bohat qadeemi imarat hai jis ki taameer-e-nau mein Mistri Javed Chinioti ne Ziauddin Butt ki maali muawnat se ki. Yeh qadeem imaratein Lahore ki tareekhi aur saqafati virse ka ahem hissa hain, jo shahar ki shaan hain.
Masjid mein janaze ki namaz parhna makrooh hai, lekin sath sath ulama yeh bhi farmate hain ke agar kahin (bairooni tor par) teen minute ke liye rasta band ho raha ho, to janaza masjid ke andar parho, rastay mein nahi. Is se pata chalta hai ke Islam ko (awami) rastay mein rukawat paida karna pasand nahi. Yeh Islami taleemat mein logon ko takleef na dene aur aasani faraham karne ke usool ko ujagar karta hai.
Masjid ke andar Rasool Allah (S.A.W.) ki yeh Hadees marqoom hai. Ke masjid ki aik mehrab ke oopar aur ayat-e-tasees masjid ke neechay Turki zabaan mein qataa-e-tareekh kunda hai, jis mein Imam-ul-Muslimeen Shah Jahan Sultan Mahmud Khan ke ijz aur gunahgari ka izhar karke khidmat-e-taameer (ki ehmiyat ko bayan kiya gaya hai). Yeh masjid ki naqash nigari aur tareekhi ahamiyat ko darshata hai, jahan deewaron par Islami fann-e-khattati ki misalein milti hain.

Un ke mutaliq Nabi Akram (Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam) se daryaft kiya gaya to aap ne farmaya: 'Jante ho (ke Ma'az kon the)?' Yeh Hadees Nabi Akram (S.A.W.) ke Sahaba ki fazilat aur unki Allah Ta'ala se wafaadari ko bayan karti hai.

Muslim ulama zina ki tareef ke baray mein mukhtalif sathon ka nazariya pesh karte hain. Aur is lehaaz se koi bhi aisa fail ke jis mein jinsi taskeen hasil hoti ho, woh zina mein shumaar ho jata hai. Un af'aal mein bosa (kiss), mukhalif jins ko choona, jins-e-dahan (oral sex), hatta ke (galat iraday se dekhna) bhi shamil ho sakta hai. Fiqh mein iski tafseelat aur ahkam mukhtalif mazahib mein thode farq ke sath bayan kiye gaye hain.
Muslim muhaqqiqeen mein zina ki saza Rajam (sangsar karna) ke baray mein yeh afkaar bhi milte hain ke Shariat (yaani Quran aur Sunnat) mein Quran ka darja awwal hai aur agar koi baat un mein mutasadam ho, to Quran ko tarjeeh di jati hai. Musalmanon ka imaan hai aur Quran mein Allah (Ta'ala ne is mamle mein insaaf ka hukm diya hai). Rajam ki saza par Islami ulema ke darmiyan mukhtalif aaraa pai jati hain, aur is par gehre fiqhi aur qanooni mubahis hotay rehte hain.
Musalmanon ka jaah o jalal aur izzat o hurmat Islami taleemat par amal paira hone ki wajah se thi. Lekin jab Musalmanon ne mazhab se rogardani ikhtiyar ki aur aish o ishrat mein pad kar apne faraiz se chasham poshi karne lage, to un ki tamam shaan o shaukat aur azmat o bartari khaak mein mil gayi. Yeh Islami tareekh ka aik sabaq hai ke ummat ki kamyabi deeni usoolon par istiqamat se wabasta hai.
Musalmanan-e-Hind-o-Pak ke daur-e-zawaal ki ahem tareen shakhsiyaat (ka zikr). Bar-e-Sagheer Pak-o-Hind mein jab Musalmanon ka zawaal shuru hua, to bohat se logon ne sanjeedgi ke sath zawaal ke asbaab par ghaur karna shuru kiya. Un logon mein Ahd-e-Mughlia ke mashhoor aalim aur musannif bhi shamil the. In afraad ne apni tehreeron aur afkaar ke zariye ummat ko bedaar karne ki koshish ki, taake mustaqbil mein behtari ki raah mil sake.
Musalmanon mein paida ho jane walay kuch khud sakhta tafaruqaat, deen mein ikhtiraaat aur bidat ke liye na sirf yeh ke ahadees balkay khud Quran se taweelat gharne ki koshish karte hain. Is silsilay mein woh Quran ki Surah Al-An'am ki ayat 101 ka hawala dete hain, jis ka (asli mafhoom ghalat tor par paish karte hain). Aisay amal Islami taleemat ko bigadne aur ummat mein fitna paida karne ka sabab bante hain, is liye sahih ilmi tehqeeq zaruri hai.
Musalmanon ka aqeeda hai ke Janab Nabi Kareem (Sallallahu Alaihi Wa Aalihi Wasallam) ruy-e-zameen ki har qaum aur har insani tabqay ki taraf Rasool bana kar bheje gaye hain. Aur aap ki layi hui kitaab, Quran Majeed, tamam aasmani kutub ke ahkam mansookh karne wali aur aindah ke liye (insaniyat ke liye mukammal hidayat hai). Yeh aqeeda Islam ki alamgir sifat ko ujagar karta hai, jo kisi khaas qaum ya zamane tak mehdood nahi.
Musalmanon ka yeh aqeeda hai ke Quran Majeed Allah Ta'ala ki aakhri Wahi aur kitaab hai, jo ke mo'jizon ka mo'jiza hai. Aur yeh insaanon ke liye aik rehmat nazil ki gayi hai. Isi liye, aayiye hum is aqeede ko sahih ya ghalat saabit karne ke liye tehqeeq karein. Quran ka yeh dawa hai ke is jaisi kitaab koi nahi bana sakta, aur yeh dawa aaj bhi qaim hai.
Maseeh se murad Urdu mein aam tor par Hazrat Isa (A.S.) ki li jati hai. Aur chunkay tareekhi dastawizaat mein darj Hazrat Isa (A.S.) ke mo'jizaat mein mardon ko zindah kar dena aur nabinaon ko benayi ataa karna bhi shamil hain, isi bachane ya nai zindagi ataa karne ke tasawwur se Urdu mein (kayi muhaawarat aur istilaahat raaij hain). Isi wajah se 'Maseeha' ka lafz kisi ko mushkil se nikalne ya shafa dene walay ke liye istemal hota hai.

Mashhoor zaaton ke log aksar dehi ilaqon mein rehte hain aur kheti baari ke peshe se munsalik hain. Un qoumon ke sath sath mukhtalif peshon se mutaliq log bhi yahan aakar abad ho gaye the. Un peshawar logon mein lohar, tarkhan, kumhar, mochi aur jolaha waghera ziyada ahem the. Yeh dehi muashre ki bunyadi iqtisadi saakht ko darshata hai, jahan har pesha aik doosre se wabasta hota tha.
Mashhoor zamana Durand Line Darra Khyber ke buland paharon se guzarti hui apna taweel fasla tai karti hai. Yeh mashhoor darra jo tareekhi ahmiyat ka hamil hai, Silsila Koh-e-Sulaiman mein Peshawar se 18 kilometer (taqreeban 11 mile) ke faslay par Qila Jamrud se shuru hota hai aur Torkham Pak-Afghan sarhad par khatam hoti hai. Yeh sarhad Afghanistan aur Pakistan ke darmiyan aik mutanaza masla rahi hai, jis ne qabaili rabton par gehre asraat murattab kiye.
Musannif apne muashray ki misaal pesh karte hue likhte hain ke pure ikhlaqi nizam se waqif log apni zimmedari ka bharpoor ehsas karte hain. Chunkay yeh jawab talab kar sakte hain, is liye jawab dene ke mukallaf bhi hain. Musannif apni daleel mein aik talkh misaal dete hue likhte hain (ke jis tarah insaan ko apne aamal ka jawab dena hota hai). Yeh nazariya insani muashre mein fard ki zimmedari aur ahtesab ke tasawwur ko wazeh karta hai.
Musannif ne un X-ray reports ke hawalay se debachay 'Banwan Darwaza' mein likha hai: 'Daricha awwal mein aap ko Pakistan aur is ke chand aaza-e-raeesa ki X-ray reportein milein gi, maslan Islami Jamhuria Pakistan, Martial Law, Iqtidaar, Jamhuriyat aur Aaeen waghera. Har X-ray report tashweeshnak nahi.' Yeh tashbeehi andaaz musannif ke mulki halaat aur siyasi dhanchay ka gehra mutalaa karne ki salahiyat ko darshata hai.
Musannif ke mutabiq sach ki ahmiyat yeh hai ke har shakhs sach ka talib hota hai aur jhoot ko sakht napasand karta hai. Is ki misaal woh yun dete hain ke agar kisi bohat barre darogh go ya jhootay shakhs se bhi darogh goi ki jaye, to woh is par shadeed ghusse ka izhar karega. Yeh insani fitrat ka hissa hai ke sachai ko pasand kiya jata hai aur jhoot se nafrat ki jati hai.
Mazameen aur andaaz-e-bayan se saaf mehsoos hota hai ke yeh Surat us zamane mein nazil hui hai jab Nabi (S.A.W.) ki dawat ka muqabla takzeeb, istehza aur jhootay ilzamaat se to barre zor o shor ke sath ho raha tha, magar abhi zulm o tashaddud ki chakkie chalni shuru nahi hui thi. Muawiya ne unhein kaha ke apna joota mujhe dein, main pehan loon. Woh kehne lage: 'Ahal-e-Yemen ko khabar na pohanche ke raiyat (ka ameer piyada chal raha hai).' Yeh sahaba-e-karam ke darmiyan adab aur inkisari ki misaal hai, jo awami behtari aur misali hukumat ki alamat thi.
Muawiya bin Sufyan ko hukm diya ke unhein thehrayen. Woh un ke sath piyada rawana hue jabkay woh oont par sawar the. Muawiya ne unhein kaha ke apna joota mujhe dein, main pehan loon. Woh kehne lage: 'Tumhare pehanne ke baad main usay nahi pehan sakta.' Unhon ne sath baithne (se bhi inkar kar diya). Yeh waqiya adab, ehteram aur apne martabe ke lehaz se mukhalif ki izzat karne ki aik ahem misaal hai.
Muhtarizeen hazraat ka mauqqaf yeh hai ke Wazir-e-Azam Nawaz Sharif Sahib ki mudakhlat ki wajah se Supreme Court ke Shariat Bench mein is qanoon par behas nahi ho saki. Aur itamam-e-hujjat mukammal kiye baghair is ko qanoon ka darja de kar uska nifaz kar diya gaya. Aisay ilzamaat adlia ki azadi aur hukumat ke ikhtiyarat ke darmiyan kashmakash ko zahir karte hain.
Muhtarizeen hazraat ki tanqeed yeh hai ke yeh Sahabi (R.A.) nabina the, magar uskay bawajood is aurat ke ghar tak phir akelay kaise pohanch gaye? Phir akelay andheray mein is anjaan ghar mein is aurat ko andheray mein cheezon ko tatoltay hue dhoondtay phirtay hain, aur is pure waqt mein kisi (ne unhein nahi dekha ya un par shubha nahi kiya). Yeh tanqeed Islami tareekh ke waqiaat ki taabir aur unki saheeh tashreeh ke mutaliq ikhtilafat ko darshati hai.
Muhtarizeen hazraat ki taraf se yeh waqea bator daleel pesh kiya jata hai ke jab Hazrat Abu Huraira (R.A.) ki walida ne Nabi Akram (S.A.W.) ki shaan mein gustakhana kalmaat kahe, to is par Hazrat Abu Huraira (R.A.) ne unhein qatal nahi kiya aur na hi Nabi Akram (S.A.W.) ne uska pata chalne par unhein (saza di ya unse kinara kashi ikhtiyar ki). Yeh waqiya Islam mein sabr, maaf karne aur hidayat ki dawat dene ki ehmiyat ko ujagar karta hai, khasosan qareebi rishton mein.
Muhtarizeen hazraat ke nazdeek Abu Rafi' ka jurm bhi sirf yeh nahi tha ke is ne Nabi Akram (S.A.W.) ki hajo ki thi, balkay uska jurm is se barh kar tha. Aur yeh Musalmanon ke khilaaf amli sazishon mein mulawwis tha, jis se amalan Musalmanon ko jani nuqsan pohnchane ka khatrah tha. Is wajah se us ke khilaaf karwai ko sirf shakhsi badla nahi, balkay Islami riyasat ke tahaffuz ke liye zaruri samjha gaya.
Maazrat ke baray mein Mahavir kehte hain: 'Main sab jandaar (maqhlooq) se maazrat chahta hoon. Duniya ke tamam jandaar se mera dostana rawaiya hai, mera kisi se bair nahi hai. Main sachche dil se deen mein mustahkam hua hoon. Sab jandaar se, main saare juraim ki maazrat khuwa hoon.' Yeh Jain dharm ke bunyadi usool 'Ahimsa' (ghair-tashaddud) ko darshata hai, jahan har zindagi ka ehteram kiya jata hai.
Ma'arfat ke liye Sama'a (sunkar rohani kaifiyat hasil karna) arwah ki ghiza hai. Kyunkay yeh aik aisa wasf hai jo tamam aamal se bareek hai, aur is bareeki ki wajah se raqeeq tabiyat se hi is ka idrak hota hai. Aur chunkay yeh apne ahal logon ke liye lateef aur saaf shaffaf hai, is liye (yeh rohani tarbiyat ka ahem zariya hai). Sama'a, Sufi tariqon mein aik markazi amal hai, jo zikr aur ibadat ke zariye qalb ko Allah se jorne ka sabab banta hai.
Maloom nahi ke Dr. Jahangir Khan Sahib ne kis bina par Qila Attock ki taameer ke baray mein yeh raaye qaim ki, warna Akbarnama ke tafseeli bayan ke baad to yeh raaye mehez gup shup ban kar reh jati hai. Aur phir Dr. Barq Sahib ne bhi tehqeeq ke (zariye is mamle ko wazeh kiya hai). Tareekhi dastawezaat aur kitabon ki bunyaad par hi kisi maqam ki asal tareekh samjhi ja sakti hai, aur is tarah ki ghalat fehmiyan door hoti hain.
Ma'amari (architecture) aur uska Angrezi mutabaadil dono hi aisay alfaaz hain jo ke khasse wasee mafhoom mein istemal kiye jatay hain. Yaani un alfaaz se murad imarat saazi ke amal ya inzimam ki bhi li jati hai, imarat ki saakht ki bhi li jati hai, aur taameer imarat ke peshe ki bhi (murad li jati hai). Ma'amari aik fann, science aur engineering ka majmooa hai, jo insani zaruriyat aur jamaliyat ko yakja karta hai.
Mayaari zabaan aur Fasih zabaan us mayaari lehje ya lisani no'o ko kaha jata hai jisay umuman musanifeen apni tasaneef aur literature mein, aur muqarareen apni taqriron mein istemal karte hain. Unhon ne kayi bain-ul-aqwami stage par bhi apni fankari ka muzahira kiya hai.

Duniya ke taqriban har chhotay mulk mein wahan ki kaghazi currency wahein ki hukoomat jari karti hai taakay hakoomati aamdani mein izaafa ho. Magar hairat ki baat hai ke duniya ki sab se barri kaghazi currency, yani Amrici Dollar, Amrici hukoomat jari nahi karti balkay yeh aik niji idaray (Federal Reserve) ke zariye jari hota hai.

 volt ki battery ko charge karne ke liye kam az kam  volt ki zaroorat padti hai. Magar is (kam) volt par charging mein bohat waqt lagta hai. Bohat taiz charging bhi battery ko nuqsaan pohanchati hai. Agar aik battery do ghantay current day kar discharge ho jati hai to usay charge karna hifazati aur munasib tareeqay se zaroori hai.

Darakht aisay nabataat hain jin ka umuman aik bara tana ho jo oopar ja kar shaakhon mein taqseem ho jaye. Un shaakhon par pattay, phool aur phal hotay hain. Kuch mahireen darakht ke liye aik kam se kam oonchai bhi zaroori samajte hain jo  se  meter tak hai. Darakht zameen ke zair-e-zameen pani tak rasai haasil kar saktay hain.

Arianist Paadri Arius (Iskandariya, Misar mein mazhabi dars-o-tadrees) ka Khuda ka beta, Yesu Maseeh aur Khuda (Baap) ke rishte se mutaliq nazariya tha. Arius ka Maseeh ka tasawwur bator Khuda ka beta hamesha se mojood hi nahi tha aur yeh baad mein bana diya gaya, aur is wajah se us waqt ki Christian duniya mein shadeed ikhtilafat peda hue.
Yeh safha aisay safhaat ki janib ishara karta hai ke jin ke fil haal koi shakli khaka mojood nahi hai. Agar aap is mauzoo se mutaliq shakal ya tasweer ka ilm rakhtay hain to aap mazkoorah mazmoon par jaakar is mein woh mutaliqa shakal ka izaafa kar saktay hain.

1985 mein Greenland ne European Community se alehdagi ikhtiyar ki, jabkay Denmark badastoor rukun raha. Yeh community baad azan 1993 mein tabdeel ho kar European Union bani. Greenland, Denmark ke zariye, abhi bhi European Union se chand marasim barqarar rakhay hue hai. Taham, European Union ke qawaneen Greenland ke andruni mamlaat par lagoo nahin hotay. Is alehdagi ka bunyadi sabab Greenland ki apni maahigiri ki palisiyon par khudmukhtari ki khwahish thi. Bawajood alehdagi ke, chand shobon mein taawun jari hai.
City College ke baad Salk ne New York University mein tibb ki taleem ke liye dakhla liya. Fees nisbatan kam thi aur taleem behtar thi, jabkay Yahudion ke khilaaf nafrat bhi nahin thi. Jabkay aas paas ke deegar tibbi taleemi idaron mein Yahudion ke liye makhsoos kote hotay thay. Yahan usay behtar taleemi mahol muyassar aaya. Yeh mahol un ki scientific tehqeeq ke liye nihayat mufeed sabit hua. Is faislay ne un ki mustaqbil ki bunyaden mazboot keen.

Dilip Kumar ki shadi Asma se Hyderabad mein bhi hui thi, lekin woh baad mein chand saal ke andar andar talaq par khatam ho gayi. Is ke bhai Nasir Khan bhi ek mashhoor adakar thay. Saira Banu ke sath un ki shadi Bollywood ki aik misali jodi ban gayi. Unhon ne apni shakhsi zindagi ko saabit qadmi se guzara.
Spain mein Tehreek Minhaj-ul-Quran ko Minhaj-ul-Quran International (Spain) ke naam se jana jata hai. Aur is ke matehat mukhtalif tanzeemat mukhtalif shobon mein kaam kar rahi hain, jin mein Minhaj Welfare Foundation, Minhaj Women League, Minhaj Youth League, Minhaj Cricket Club aur kayi doosri anjumanein shamil hain. Yeh tanzeemat Spain mein Musalmanon ki roohani, samaji aur tehzeebi taraqqi ke liye koshish kar rahi hain. Un ka maqsad Islami aqdar ko farogh dena hai.
Chunancha, yeh sifarishat bhi tajaveez hain, sarkari hukm nama nahin. Aur is tawaqqo ke sath paish ki ja rahi hain ke un se imla ki miyar bandi ke liye ehsaas-o-shaoor ki bedari ka amal tezz tar hoga aur aagahi ki fiza paida karne mein madad milegi. In tajaveez ka maqsad Urdu zubaan ke imla mein yaksaniyat lana hai. Taake taleemi aur adabi maqasid ke liye behtari ho.
Un ki zindagi mein pehla halchal is waqt machhta hai jab un ka ek bachpan ka dost inhen kattar mazhabi ban kar milne aata hai. Aur is ke kuch dinon ke baad hi, un ke chacha apni beti ke maslay ki wajah se America se Pakistan un ke haan rehne ke liye aa jatay hain. Yeh waqiyat un ki zindagi mein nai tabdeeliyan aur zehni kashmakash paida karte hain. Is se unhen apni qadron aur nazriyaat par ghaur karne ka mauqa milta hai.
1806 aur 1807 mein Bartania ki janib se Río de la Plata par honay walay do hamlon ko muqami razakar fouj ne nakaam bana diya. Taham, May 1810 ko muqami afraad ne Buenos Aires se Haspanwi Naib-ul-Saltanat (Viceroy) ko nikal bahar kiya aur ek aburi hukumat qaim karne ka aaghaz kiya. Yeh waqiyat Argentina ki azadi ki tehreek ke liye bunyadi sabit hue. Aur is se ilaqay mein khudmukhtari ki chahat mein izafa hua.
Aakhir mein un kuffar ko dardnak saza ki khabar de di gayi hai jo Quran ko sun kar Khuda ke aagay jhukne ke bajaye ulti takzeeb karte hain. Aur un logon ko be-hisaab ajar ka muzda suna diya gaya hai jo imaan la kar naik amal karte hain. Yeh Ayat Quran ki insaaf pasandi aur qayamat ke din ki jawabdehi ko wazeh karti hai. Iman aur amal-e-saleh par jannat ki basharat di gayi hai.
Bar-e-Sagheer mein aam tor par Hindu khawateen mukhtalif tehwaron mein yeh singhar apnati hain. Lekin samaji ikhtilaat ki wajah se Bar-e-Sagheer ki doosri aqwam, yani musalman aur Sikh gharanon ki khawateen bhi yeh tareeqay apnati rahi hain. Takhat-e-Delhi ke ilawa Riyasat Awadh ke Muslim nawabon ke daur mein bhi yeh riwaj aam tha. Yeh tehzeebi tabadlay Bar-e-Sagheer ki mushtarqa wirasat ko darshate hain. Mukhtalif mazhabon ke log ek doosray ke rehan sehan se mutassir hotay rahay hain.
Islami Tehreek-e-Uzbekistan (IMU) Uzbekistan ke jangjuon par mushtamil ek group hai jo pehlay Janoobi Waziristan ka ek taaqatwar group hua karta tha. 2007 mein Pak Fauj ki madad se Maulvi Nazeer ne un ka yahan se safaya kar diya tha, lekin ab yeh Waziristan aur Mohmand Agency ki sarhad patti par maujood hain. Yeh group Pak-Afghan sarhad par aman-o-amaan ke liye khatra bana hua hai. Pak Fauj in ke khilaaf musalsal karwaiyan jari rakhe hue hai.
Pandey ne taa-umer aman, adam-tashaddud aur firqa warana hum-ahangi ke nazariye ko farogh diya. Pooray Janoobi Asia mein is ki tashheer ki aur Janoobi Asiaayi mumalik ke darmiyan baahami dosti ko qaim karne ke liye kaam kiya. Hindustan aur Pakistan ke darmiyan baahami rishton mein talkhi ko kam karne ki koshish ki. Un ka maqsad ilaqayi aman aur taraqqi ko farogh dena tha. Pandey sahib ko un ki pur aman koshishon ke liye yaad kiya jata hai.
Aur doosri taraf is ki shakhsiyat roohani o ikhlaqi kamaal ki bulandiyon ko bhi pa le, to is amal ka naam tazkiya-e-nafs hai. Jis ke husool ke baghair ibadat be-maani o be-lazzat hai. Yeh neki ke farogh, zuhd o taqwa aur Maarifat-e-Rabbani ke liye pehla zeena aur sab se ahem amal hai. Tazkiya-e-nafs insaan ko apni zaat ki gehraiyon mein utarnay mein madad deta hai. Aur is se usay Allah ki qurbat hasil hoti hai.
Is mein biwi ke tahaffuz ke liye ek nayi dafa shamil hai, jis ke tehat biwi kisi faislay ke sadir honay ki mukhalfat is bunyad par kar sakti hai ke shadi ki tahleel (dissolution) se usay shadeed maali tangi se dochar hona paray ga, aur yeh deegar halaat ke ba-shamool mad-e-nazr rakha jayega. Yeh qanooni dafa khawateen ko talaq ke baad maliyati istehkam faraham karti hai. Is se adalati faislay aurat ke huqooq ko tehfuz dete hain.
Agar ek kehkashan bohat bari aur doosri bohat chhoti ho, to tasadum ya inzimam (merger) ke baad chhoti kehkashan bazahir khatam ho jati hai aur bari kehkashan ki shakal bhi taqriban waisi hi rehti hai. Taham, agar dono kehkashayen ek doosray se tasadum ke baad alag ho jayen, to umooman un ki shakal mukammal tor par badal jati hai. Kehkashanon ke yeh tasadum nayi sitara saazi ko bhi janam dete hain. Yeh nizam ka ek qudrati amal hai jo kainaat ko mustaqil tabdeel karta rehta hai.
Afaq Numa, un ki shayari ka pehla majmooa, athara saal ki umar mein shaya hua. Aur un ke likhay hue khakon ka majmooa, Chehra Numa, bees saal ki umar mein shaya hua. Ghazal, naat, drama, tanqeed, tehqeeq, column-nigari, novel-nigari aur jadeed nazm mein unhon ne hamesha zindah rehne wala muqam hasil kiya. Un ki adabi khidmaat ne Urdu adab ko bohat faiz pohanchaya. Woh apne zamane ke ek buland paya adeeb thay.

Safarnama nami tasneef, jo aap ne bator-e-sayyah tehreer ki, aap ki tamam tasaneef aur takhleeqi karnamon mein mumtaz shumar hoti hai. Ab agar aik insaan (mard ya aurat) ki aamdani is khat se neechay hai to woh baja tor par ghareeb kehlanay ka haqdaar hai. Yahan yeh baat ghaur talab hai ke is khat-e-ghurbat ka maqam waqt ke paimanay par to tabdeel hota hi hai, jaghon, mumalik aur aqwam ke aitbar se bhi tabdeel hota hai. Baal mamoli janwaron ki khaal par ugte hain. Woh baal jo insaan ke ilawa doosre mamoli janwaron ke jism par ugte hain unhein 'fur' kaha jaata hai. Bhed ke jism par ugne walay balon ko 'Oon' (Wool) kaha jaata hai. Kisi bhi jism par agar baal maujood na hon to usay be-baal ya ganjha kaha jaata hai.
Fur aur Oon janwaron ko sardi se bachane mein madad dete hain aur insaan inhein libas aur deegar ashya banane ke liye istemal karte hain. Baal janwaron ki hifazat aur inki khoobsurti mein aham kirdar ada karte hain.

Quran ko samajhna ziyada mushkil nahi. Quran mein taqreeban saat hazaar aath so alfaaz istemaal hue hain. Un mein se kayi alfaaz aur kuch jumlay mutadid martaba ayaat mein aaye hain. Taqreeban tamam alfaaz aur jumlay muqarara qawaid ke tehat hi banay hue hain, is liye Qurani zabaan ko samajhna asaan hai. Is ki zabaan ki sadgi aur qawaid ki wazahat isay har ummat ke liye qabil-e-feham banati hai. Tafseer aur Hadith ke zariye isay mazeed gehrai se samjha ja sakta hai. Quran hidayat ka mukammal zariya hai.

Izalat us Shook / Tehqeeq o Tasheel Maulana Atiq Ahmad Bastavi Munaziratul Hind ul Kubra sabhi kutub ka yakja archive link bhi dastiyab hai, November Gregoreen saal ka gyarhwaan mahina hai. Purani Romi taqweem mein yeh nawaan mahina hota tha chunancha ise November kaha jata tha. Shumali Nisf Kurrah mein is mahine mein khizaan ka mausam hota hai, May Gregoreen saal ka paanchwan mahina hai. Shumali Nisf Kurrah mein is mahine mein bahaar ka mausam hota hai. Is ka naam qadeem Yunan ki devi Maia ke naam par rakha gaya jo Yunan aur Rome mein zameen aur aurat ki zarkhezi ki devi ya Khuda samjhi jati thi. Is mahine ka naam qadeem Rome ke darwazon aur raston ke dewta Janus ya Janos ke naam par rakha gaya, woh dewta darwazon aur raston ki nighebani karta tha. Isi se mushtaq ek aur lafz ka matlab bhi darban hota hai, February Gregoreen saal ka doosra mahina hai. Shumali Nisf Kurrah mein is mahine mein sardi ka mausam hota hai jabke Junubi Nisf Kurrah mein garmiyon ka. February qadeem zamana mein saal ka aakhri mahina hota tha aur is mein saal ke baqi bach jane wale din rakhe gaye isi liye is mein kam din hain. Is mahina ka naam qadeem zamana Rome mein pakizgi par rakha gaya kyunki is saal ke aakhri mahina mein bahaar shuru hone se pehle ek mela lagta tha jis mein pakizgi aur safai hasil karne ke liye mukhtalif rusoomat ada ki jati theen. March Gregoreen saal ka teesra mahina hai, Shumali Nisf Kurrah mein is mahine mein sardi ka mausam khatam hota hai aur bahaar ka aaghaz hota hai jabke Junubi Nisf Kurrah mein khizaan ka aaghaz hai. Qadeem Rome mein yeh saal ka pehla mahina hota tha. Is ka naam qadeem Rome ke jang ke dewta Mars ke naam par rakha gaya tha. Mars ko jang ka dewta khayal kiya jata tha aur yeh bhi khayal kiya jata tha ke woh apne beton ke sath mil kar kheti badi ki nighebani karta hai you Mars dewta ke mahine mein hi kheti badi aur jang ka aaghaz hua karta tha. Ghaliban 153 qabl Maseeh tak March ka mahina hi Roman Calendar ka pehla mahina tasleem kiya jata raha. Aur youn March ke pehle pandrah dinon ke darmiyan mukhtalif mazhabi tehwar mana kar naye saal ko khush amadeed kaha jata raha. August Gregoreen saal ka aathwan mahina hai, Shumali Nisf Kurrah mein is mahine mein garmiyon ka mausam hota hai. Qadeem zamane mein yeh saal ka chhata mahina tha, magar is ka naam Julian taqweem ki ibteda ke waqt 450 qabl Maseeh mein August rakha gaya jo asal mein Rome ke pehle badshah Augustus ke naam par tha.

Pakistan ki qaumi zuban Urdu hai, jabke ziyada tar daftari kaam Angrezi mein kiye jate hain. Pakistan ke khawas bhi bunyadi taur par Angrezi ka istemal karte hain. Pakistan mein tamam tar aala taleem bhi Angrezi mein hi di jati hai. Is ke bawajood Urdu Pakistan ki awami o qaumi zuban hai. Urdu ke ilawa Pakistan mein kayi aur zubanain boli jati hain, in mein Punjabi, Saraiki, Sindhi, Gujarati, Balochi, Brahui, Pahari, Pashto aur Hindko zubanain qabil-e-zikr hain. Pakistan mein mukhtalif qaumon se taalluq rakhne wale log abad hain, in mein ziyada numayan Punjabi, Saraiki, Sindhi, Pathan, Balochi aur Muhajir qaum hain, lekin waqt ke sath sath in ke mabain farq kam hota ja raha hai. Deegar insani bunyadi zaruriyat ki napaydi aur inhitat ke sath sath sehat-e-aama ka shoba bhi Pakistan mein intehai tanazzul ka shikar hai. Pakistan mein rehne wale naqis ghiza aur safayi suthrayi ki adam dastiyabi o ghalazat se janam lene wale amraz ka shikar ho jate hain. Achcha aur munasib ilaaj darmiyani se le kar aala tabqe ke liye makhsus hai. Sarkari shafakhane duniya bhar ki tehzeeb yafta aqwaam mein apna ek miyar rakhte hain magar Pakistan mein in ki halat abtar hai. Gehra sabz rang jis par hilal aur paanch konon wala sitara bana hua hai. Jhande mein shamil sabz rang Musalmanon ki, safed rang ki patti Pakistan mein abad mukhtalif mazhabi aqaliyaton ki numaindagi karti hai. Qaumi parcham gyarah August 1947 ko Liaqat Ali Khan ne dastoor saz assembly mein pesh kiya. Yeh nara mashhoor shayar Asghar Saudai ne 1944 mein lagaya jo Tehreek-e-Pakistan ke dauran bohat jald zuban zad-o-aam ho gaya. In ka taalluq Sialkot se hai, riyasti nishan darj zeil nishanat par mushtamil hai. Chand aur sitara jo riwayati taur par Islam se riyasat ki aqeedat aur mohabbat ka izhar karte hain. Chokor shield jis mein mulk ki char ahem sanaton ki alamat kunda hai. Shield ke ird gird phool aur pattiyan bani hui hain jo watan-e-azeez ke bharpoor saqafati mahol ki akasi karti hain. Alamat ke charon taraf bani Pakistan Hazrat Quaid-e-Azam Mohammad Ali Jinnah ka qaul Ittihad, Iman, Nazm tehreer hai. Pakistan ki ziyada tar abadi mulk ki wasti ilaqon mein hai, mulk ke junoob mein ziyada abad maqamat aksar Daryae Sindh ke aas paas par waqe hai jin mein sab se ziyada abadi wala ilaqah Karachi hai jo mulk ka sab se bada shehar hai. Pakistan aapsi mohabbat aur ittihad ka ek aala misal hai kyunki yahan pe mukhtalif ilaqon aur mukhtalif saqafaton se taalluq rakhne wale log muttahid rehte hain. Jahan pe hamari bohat se zubanain boli jati hain jin mein se ek hamari qaumi zuban Urdu hai. Is ke ilawa char subai zubanain aur bohat se aur zubanain boli jati hain. Pakistan mein kayi zubanain boli, likhi aur samjhi jati hain. Ek andaze ke mutabiq Pakistan mein taqriban 65 se ziyada zubanain boli jati hain. Angrezi Pakistan ki sarkari zuban hai, tamam muahide aur sarkari kaam Angrezi zuban mein hi tay kiye jate hain, jabke Urdu Pakistan ki qaumi zuban hai. Pakistan ki subai zubanon mein Punjabi suba Punjab, Pashto suba Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Sindhi suba Sindh, Balochi suba Balochistan aur Shina suba Gilgit Baltistan mein tasleem shuda zubanain hain. Pakistan mein raij doosri zubanon aur lehjon mein, Aair, Saraiki zuban, Badeshi, Bagri, Balti, Bateri, Bhaya, Brahui, Burushaski, Chilisso, Dameli, Dehwari, Dhatki, Domaki, Farsi, Dari, Goar Bati, Ghera, Goriya, Gowro, Gujarati, Gojri, Gurgula, Hazara-gi, Hindko, Jadgali, Jandavra, Kabootra, Kachhi, Kalam, Kalasha, Kalkoti, Kamweeri, Kashmiri, Kati, Khetrani, Khowar, Indus Kohistani, Koli, Lehenda Lasi, Lowarki, Marwari, Memoni, Odh, Ormuri, Potohari, Phalola, Sansi, Savi, Shina, Torwali, Ushojo, Wagri, Wakhi, Waneci aur Yadgha shamil hain. In zubanon mein baaz ko aalmi taur par khatre mein shumar kiya jata hai kyunki in zubanon ko bolne walon ki tadaad nisbatan nihayat qaleel reh gayi hai. Wajood ke khatrat mein ghiri yeh zubanain ziyada tar Hind-Faris shakh aur Hind-European zubanon ke khandan se taalluq rakhti hain. Pakistan ke zila Chitral ko duniya ka kaseer-ul-lisani khitta hone ka e'zaaz hasil hai is zila mein kul chaudah zubanain boli jati hain. 2017 ki mardum shumari ke mutabiq, do bade shehar hain, jin ki abadi das million se ziyada hai aur 100 shehar hain jin ki abadi 100,000 ya is se ziyada hai. In 100 shehron mein se 58 mulk ke sab se ziyada abadi wale soobe Punjab mein, 22 Sindh mein, 11 Khyber Pakhtunkhwa mein, chhe Balochistan mein, do Azad Kashmir mein aur ek Islamabad Federal Dar-ul-Hukumat ilaqa mein waqe hai. Gilgit Baltistan ne abhi tak 2017 ki mardum shumari ke koi nataij awami taur par jari nahin kiye hain. 1998 ki mardum shumari ke mutabiq Gilgit Baltistan ka sab se bada shehar Gilgit tha, jis ki abadi 56,701 thi. Pakistan ki bohat qadeem aur rangarang tehzeeb hai, Pakistan ka ilaqa maazi mein Dravid, Arya, Hun, Irani, Yunani, Arab, Turk aur Mangol logon ki riyasaton mein shamil raha hai. In tamam tehzeebon ne Pakistan ki maujooda tehzeeb par bohat gehra asar chhoda hai. Is ke sath sath mukhtalif subon mein libas, khane, zuban aur tamaddun ka farq paya jata hai. Is mein is ilaqon ki tareekh alaihadgi ke sath sath mausam aur aab-o-hawa ka bhi bohat asar hai. Lekin ek Islami tehzeeb ka hissa hone ki wajah se is mein kafi tehzeebi ham-ahangi bhi maujood hai. Pakistan mein bohat mukhtalif qism ki mausiqui milti hai, classical mausiqui, neem-classical mausiqui, lok mausiqui aur is ke sath sath jadeed popular music, in sab ke Pakistan mein buland paya musiqar maujood hain. Pakistan duniya bhar mein Qawwali ka markaz samjha jata hai, Pakistani tehzeeb mein maghribi anasir badhte ja rahe hain. Yeh umra aur rusa mein aur bade shehron mein ziyada numayan hai kyunki maghribi ashya, media aur tehzeeb tak in ki ziyada rasai hai. Is ke sath sath ek badhti hui tehreek hai jo maghribi asarat ko kam dekhna chahti hai. Kuch jaghon mein is tehreek ka ziyada jhukao Islam aur kuch mein riwayaat ki taraf hai. Pakistanion ki badi tadaad America, Bartania, Australia, Canada aur Mashriq-e-Wusta mein muqeem hai. In beroon mulk Pakistanion ka Pakistan par aur Pakistan ki bain-ul-aqwami tasveer par bohat gehra asar padta hai. In logon ne maazi mein Pakistan mein bohat sarmaya kari bhi ki hai. Pakistan ka sab se pasandida khel cricket hai, Pakistan ki cricket team duniya ki achi teamon mein shumar hoti hai. Cricket ke sath sath Pakistan mein hockey bhi bohat shauq se kheli jati hai. Hockey Pakistan ka qaumi khel bhi hai, Chaugan Pakistan ke shumali ilaqa jaat ke logon ka khel hai aur is khel ki paidaish bhi yahin hui aur aaj tak in ilaqon mein bohat shauq se kheli jati hai. Pakistan mein sab se aam libas shalwar qameez hai jis ko qaumi libas ka darja hasil hai, shalwar qameez ko Pakistan ke charon subon Balochistan, Punjab, Sindh aur Khyber Pakhtunkhwa samet qabaili ilaqa jaat, Gilgit Baltistan aur Azad Kashmir mein pehna jata hai. Taham phir har sube aur ilaqe mein shalwar qameez pehanne ka tarz thoda mukhtalif bhi hota hai har koi apne muqami andaaz mein pehanta hai. Shalwar qameez ke ilawa aur bhi bohat se libas Pakistan mein pehne jate hain jin mein suit aur necktie bhi aam hai jin ka istemal school, college, jamiyaat, daftaro, waghera mein hota hai. Dehi ilaqon mein shehron ke ba nisbat suit aur tie ka istemal kam hota hai. Sherwani ka istemal khas kar taqareeb aur khushiyon ke mawaqe par kiya jata hai. Pakistani khawateen mein bhi shalwar qameez ka istemal hota hai taham khawateen shalwar qameez ke ilawa Anarkali, Lehenga, Ghagra, waghera bhi pehenti hain. Pakistan mein bohat se zarye ablagh maujood hain, print media aur electronic media dono mein tezi se taraqqi hui hai. Is se pehle PTV mulk ka wahid channel network hota tha aur hukumat-e-Pakistan is network ko chala rahi thi. 2002 ke baad electronic media ne taraqqi ki aur pe dar pe naye niji channel aate rahe. Is waqt Pakistan mein 50 se bhi ziyada sirf niji channels maujood hain jin ki nashriyat 24 ghante jari rehti hain. Is waqt Pakistan mein news, entertainment, health, education, ilaqai aur bohat se channels maujood hain. Pakistan mein ziyada tar channels ke nashriyat Urdu mein hote hain taham mulk ke ilaqai zubanon ke bhi TV channels maujood hain. PTV World Pakistan ka pehla Angrezi channel hai, Urdu film industry Lollywood ki sadar maqamat Lahore, Karachi aur Peshawar mein waqe hain. Lollywood ne ab tak bohat se filmain release ki hain aur kar raha hai. Pakistan mein sab se aam Urdu drama serials hain jo mukhtalif channels par chalaye jate hain. Pakistan ke fan-e-tameerat un mukhtalif imarat ki taraf ishara karte hain jo mukhtalif adwar mein maujooda Pakistan ke ilaqon mein banaye gaye hain. Wadi-e-Sindh ki tehzeeb ke shuru hone ke sath hi jo 3500 qabal Maseeh tha, maujooda Pakistan ke ilaqe mein shehri saqafat ka irtiqa hua jis mein badi imaratain thin jin mein se kuch aaj bhi maujood hain. Is ke baad Gandhara tarz ka Budh tarz-e-tameer aaya jis mein qadeem Yunan ke ajza bhi shamil the. Is ke baqaya jaat Gandhara ke sadar maqam Taxila mein dikhai dete hain. In ke ilawa Pakistan mein Mughal aur Angrezi tarz-e-tameer ki misalen bhi maujood hain jo nihayat hi ahem hain. Azadi ke baad ka fan-e-tameer bhi ek munfarid maqam rakhta hai. Azadi ke baad Pakistan ne apni nayi hasil ki gayi azadi aur shanakht ko fan-e-tameer ke zariye se zahir karne ki koshish ki. Pakistan khud ko jadeed imarton mein zahir karta hai maslan Faisal Masjid jo wafaqi dar-ul-hukumat Islamabad mein waqe hai is masjid ko 1960 mein tameer kiya gaya. Is ke sath sath doosri imaratain bhi qabil-e-zikr hain jaise Minar-e-Pakistan, safed marble se bana Mazar-e-Quaid-e-Azam. Yeh imaratain nayi riyasat ki khud-ehtemadi ko zahir karti hain. Mulki dar-ul-khalifa Islamabad mein maujood Qaumi Yadgar tehzeeb, azadi aur jadeed fan-e-tameer ka ek haseen imtizaj hai. Pakistan mein is waqt chhe jaghain aisi hain jinhen Aalmi Virsa hone ka aezaz hasil hai, in ki fehrist mundarja zeil hai. Pakistan apne nazaron, logon aur tehzeebon ke hawale se ek wasee mulk hai aur isi wajah se saal 2012 mein yahan das lakh sayyah aaye. Pakistan ki sayyahat ki sanat 1970 ke asr-e-douran urooj par thi jab yahan ek bohat badi tadaad mein sayyah aate the. In sayyahon ke liye sab se ziyada qabil-e-dilchaspi jaghain Khyber Pass, Peshawar, Karachi, Lahore, Swat aur Rawalpindi thin. Is mulk ki hamil kashish jaghon mein Mohenjo-Daro, Taxila aur Harappa jaisi tehzeebon ke khandhar se le kar Koh Himalaya ke pahadi maqamat tak hain. Pakistan 7000 meter se ziyada buland kayi chotiyon ka maskan hai. Pakistan ke shumali ilaqa jaat mein kayi purane qile hain, purane zamane ki fan-e-tameer, Hunza aur Chitral ki wadiyan jo ek chhoti si ghair Muslim samaji giroh Kalash ka maskan hai jo khud ko Sikandar-e-Azam ki aulaad se batate hain. Pakistan ke saqafati markaz o sadar maqam Lahore mein Mughal fan-e-tameer ki bohat si misalen maujood hain jaise Badshahi Masjid, Shalimar Bagh, Maqbara-e-Jahangir aur Qila Lahore shamil hain jo sayyahon ki dilchaspi ka markaz hain. Aalmi maashi bohran se pehle Pakistan mein salana taqriban paanch lakh sayyah aate the. Taham saal 2008 se Pakistan mein andarooni ghair yaqeeni surat-e-haal ki wajah se yeh tadaad kafi kam ho gayi hai. October 2006 mein Kashmir ke zalzale ke baad risala The Guardian ne Pakistan ke paanch maqbool tareen sayyahati maqamat ke naam se ek mazmoon shaya kiya taake Pakistan ki sayyahat ki sanat ki madad kar sake. Yeh paanch maqamat Taxila, Lahore, Shahrah-e-Karakoram, Karimabad aur Jheel Saif-ul-Muluk the. Aalmi maashi forum ke safar aur sayyahat ke muqabale ki report ne Pakistan ko maqbool tareen 25 feesad sayyahati maqamat ka aezaz aalmi virsa ke maqamat ke taur par muqarrar kiya. Sayyahati maqamat ki pahunch junoob mein mangrove janglaat se Wadi-e-Sindh ki tehzeeb ke Mohenjo-Daro aur Harappa jaise 5000 saal purane shehron tak hai. Pakistani khane junubi Asia ke mukhtalif ilaqai khanon ka haseen imtizaj hain. Pakistani khanon mein shumali Hindustani, wasat Ashiyai aur Mashriq-e-Wusta ke khane shamil hain lekin yahan ke khanon mein gosht ka istemal ziyada hai. Pakistan mein ashya-e-khoor-o-nosh ke naam bohat aasan hain, Pakistan mein ek ilaqe ke khane doosre ilaqe ke khanon se qadre mukhtalif hote hain jis se is mulk ki saqafati aur lisani tanawwu jhalakti hai. Punjab aur Sindh ke khane masaledar hote hain jo junubi Asia ke khanon ki khasiyat hai. Is ke ilawa doosre ilaqon ke khane maslan Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Balochistan, qabaili ilaqa jaat, Gilgit Baltistan aur Kashmir ke khane bhi apni apni khasusiyat ke hamil hote hain aur in par bhi mukhtalif ilaqai rang ghalib hote hain. Pakistan mein khele jane wale beshtar khelon ka aaghaz Bartania mein hua aur Britanvion ne unhen Hindustan mein mutaarif karwaya. Hockey Pakistan ka qaumi khel hai, is ne 1960, 1968 aur 1984 mein khele gaye Olympic khelon mein teen sone ke tamghe hasil kiye hain. Pakistan ne Hockey ka Aalmi Cup bhi char baar jeeta hai jo ek record hai. Pakistan ne Hockey ka Aalmi Cup 1971, 1978, 1982 aur 1994 mein jeeta hai. Taham, cricket Pakistan ka sab se ziyada mashhoor khel hai. Pakistan cricket ke team, jinhen Shaheen kaha jata hai, ne 1992 mein cricket ka Aalmi Cup jeeta tha. 1999 mein Shaheen doosre number par rahe, aur 1987 aur 1996 mein Aalmi Cup ke muqable juzvi taur par Pakistan mein hue. Pakistan T20 qism ke khel ke pehle muqable mein doosre number par rahe jo saal 2007 mein Junubi Africa mein khela gaya tha. Aur saal 2009 mein isi qism ke khel mein pehle number par rahe aur Aalmi Cup jeeta jo Bartania mein khela gaya tha. Saal 2009 ke March ke mahine mein dehsatgardun ne Sri Lanka ke cricket team par hamla kar diya jo Pakistan ke daure par Lahore mein maujood thi aur isi ke sath Pakistan mein aalmi cricket aarzi taur par band ho gayi. Taham chhe saalon ke taweel intizar ke baad May 2015 mein aalmi cricket Pakistan mein is waqt bahal hui jab Zimbabwe ki cricket team Pakistan ke daure par aayi. Tamam muqable sakht hifazati hisaar mein Lahore mein hue aur tamam muqablon ke liye ticket sare book ho chuke the aur kursiyan sari bhari hui thin. Yeh ek tareekhi kamyabi thi, is ne doosri teamon ke aane ke liye bhi rah hamwar kar li. Warzishi khelon mein Abdul Khaliq ne saal 1954 aur saal 1958 ke Asian khelon mein hissa liya. Is ne 35 sone ke tamghe aur 15 aalmi chandi aur pital ke tamghe Pakistan ke liye hasil kiye. Squash mein Pakistan ke shehar Peshawar se taalluq rakhne wale khiladi Jahangir Khan hain jin ko aalmi miyar ka khiladi aur khelon ki tareekh mein azeem khiladi mana jata hai aur sath hi Jansher Khan hain jinhon ne aalmi squash ke muqablon mein kayi baar Pakistan ka naam roshan kiya hai. 
Lisaniyat ek aisa mazmoon hai jis mein insani zubanon ka mutala kiya jata hai. Zubanon ki maujooda surat ka mutala kiya jata hai, zubanon mein waqt ke sath sath hone wali tabdeeliyon ka mutala kiya jata hai. Mukhtalif zubanon ki aapas mein mushabehat ke bare mein mutala kiya jata hai. Is ke sath sath is cheez ka bhi mutala kiya jata hai ke zubanon ka is duniya ki deegar cheezon ke sath kya taalluq hai. 
Tareekh jamia insani ke infradi o ijtamai aamaal o afaal aur kirdar ki aaina dar hoti hai. Tareekh insani zindagi ke mukhtalif shobon mein guzashta naslon ke besh baha tajrubat aainda naslon tak pahunchati hai, taake tamaddun insani ka karwan rawan dawan rahe. Is ka sab se bada faida yehi hai ke is ke tawassut se afrad o aqwam mazi ke dariche se apne karde aur na karde aamaal o afaal par tanqeedi nazar daal kar apne haal mustaqbil ko apne mancha o marzi ke mutabiq dhaal saken. Tareekh daan mukhtalif jaghon se apni maloomat hasil karte hain jin mein purane nuskhe, shahadatein aur purani cheezon ki tehqeeq shamil hai. Albata mukhtalif adwar mein mukhtalif zarye maloomat ko ahmiyat di gayi. Tareekh ka lafz Arabi zuban se aaya hai aur apni asas mein Arkh se makhuz hai jis ke maani din likhne ke hote hain. Tasawwur-e-tareekh itna hi qadeem hai ke jitna tasawwur-e-zaman o makan, aghaz-e-tamaddun se ab tak tareekh ne kayi roop dhare hain. Qisse kahaniyon se shuru ho kar aaj tareekh is maqam par pahunch chuki hai ke use tamam uloom insani ki rawan dawan kaha ja sakta hai. Kyunke ijtemaa-e-insani ke shobe mein koi waqea pesh aata hai woh kisi na kisi tarah kal ki ya tareekh-e-guzashta se marboot hota hai, is liye yeh kaha jaye ke tareekh sab kuch hai aur sab kuch tareekh hai to beja na hoga. Anatol Qarash ke khayal mein tareekh guzashta hadsat o ittefaqat ke tehreeri bayan se ibarat hai. E.H. Carr ki raaye mein tehqeeq shuda waqeat ke ek silsile par mushtamil hai. Karl Becker ke nazdeek aqwal o afaal ka ilm hai. Seely ki raaye mein tareekh guzashta siyasat aur guzashta siyasat maujooda tareekh hai. Atkhawi ka kehna hai ke yeh ek aisa ilm hai jis ka mauzu insaan zaman o makan hai, jis mein woh zindagi basar karta hai. Ibn-e-Khaldun ka kehna hai yeh ek aisa ilm hai jo kisi khas ahad-e-millat ke halaat waqeat ko mawzu-e-behas deta hai. Zaheer-ud-Din Marghashi ke nazdeek yeh ek aisa ilm hai jo agle waqton ke bare mein ittelaat par mushtamil hai. Doctor Muhammad Mukri ka qaul hai ke tareekh aisa ilm hai jis mein kisi qaum ya fard ya cheez ke guzashta halaat waqeat par behas karta hai. Aqae Majeed Yaktai ka kehna hai ke aasar o quroon ke un ahwaal o hawadis ki aaina dar hai, jo mazi se aagahi o mustaqbil ke liye tanbeeh ka baais bante hain. Haqeeqat yeh hai ke tareekh ka nazariyat mein kitna hi ikhtilaf ho, magar is had tak sab muttafiq hain ke yeh ek aisa ilm hai jo ahd-e-guzashta ke waqeat aur us zaman o makan ke bare mein jis mein waqeat wuqoo پذیر hue hain, aainda naslon ko maloomat baham pahunchata hai. Yehi wajah hai tareekh itni qadeem hai ke jitni tehreer. Yeh aur baat hai tareekh ki ibteda asateer ya devmalayi kahaniyon se shuru hui. Go tareekh aur asateer mein farq hai, tareekh ke kirdar haqeeqi aur zaman aur makan muta'ayyan o mushakhas hote hain. Jab ke asateer mein kirdar mafoq-ul-fitrat masakh shuda ya mahaz takhayyul ki paidaish aur zaman o makan ghair muta'ayyan aur namushakhas hote hain. Professor Herbert Spencer aur Grant Allen ka kehna hai ke ibteda mein insaan sirf apne aslaaf ka shaoor rakhta tha, woh aslaaf ke haqeeqi aur farzi karnamon se waqif tha aur un ko yaad karta rehta tha. Imtedad-e-zamana ke sath un aslaaf ki haqeeqi shakhsiyatein riwayaton ke ambar tale dab gayeen. Rafta rafta haqeeqat par khurafat ki itni teh jam gayeen ke log aslaaf ki haqeeqi shakhsiyaton ko bhool gaye aur afsanvi shakhsiyaton ko devta samajh kar un ki puja karne lage. Baharhal aslaaf ki azmaton ke afsano ne devta ka roop dhar liya ho ya mazahir-e-qudrat ki fa'ali aur sahib irada shakhsiyaton ka tasawwur devtaon ke paikar mein dhal gaya ho, yeh haqeeqat hai ke devtaon ki takhleeq insani zehn ki marhoon minnat hai, agarche yeh takhleeq ka amal kayi madarij se guzra hai. Ibn-e-Khaldun ka kehna hai ke morakh ke liye zaruri hai ke woh mahaz naqqal na ho balki tareekh se mutalliqah tamam uloom ko janta ho. Use achi tarah maloom hona chahiye ke hukmrani o siyasat ke qawaid kya hain. Maujoodat ki tabiyat kis dhab ki hai? Mukhtalif qaumon ka mizaj kya hai. Zaman o makan ki buqalamuni se ahwaal o awa'id ke goshe kyun kar mutasir hote hain. Mukhtalif mazahib mein farq kya aur hudood-e-ikhtilafat kya hain aur kahan in ke dande milte hain. Is tarah yeh bhi janna haal kya hai aur is mein aur mazi aur kya kya cheezain milti julti hain aur kin nuqaat par ikhtilafat hain. Taake jo maujood hain un ki munasibaton aur mushabehaton se mazi ke dhundlakon ki tashreeh ki jaye. Jo log in nazakaton ko samajh nahin sakte hain, woh is haqeeqat ko nahin jante hain ke tareekh ka har waqea ek munfarid waqea nahin hota hai, balki apne andar kayi pehlu rakhta hai aur kayi simton se us ki haqaniyat par roshni pad sakti hai, woh haolnak ghaltiyon mein ulajh kar reh jate hain aur aise latayel qisse tareekh ke bab mein pesh karte hain, jo qatai muhmil aur mazhak khez hote hain. Mazeed Ibn-e-Khaldun ka kehna hai ke ek morakh ke liye yeh janna zaruri hai ke tareekh mein agarche us zamane ke makhsus logon ka zikr hota hai, muta'ayyan waqeat aur bade bade hawadis ki tafseelat hi bayan ki jati hain, taham us asr ke tamam halaat, jughrafiya aur juziyat is nauiyat ki ho sakti hain ke jin se un ki tauzeeh ho sake. Is liye ek muhaqqiq ko un halaat ko nazarandaz nahin karna chahiye aur qadam unhi ki roshni mein badhana chahiye, warna lagzish ka sakht andesha hai. Ibn-e-Khaldun mazeed Masoudi ke hawale se likhta hai ke qaumain mukhtalif siyasi karwatein badalti hain aur ek halat par qaim nahin rehti hain, un ke mizaj, aqaid aur rasmiyat un tabdeeliyon se itne mutasir hote hain ke goya ek nayi qaum mariz-e-wajood mein aagayi. Is liye ek morakh ko is baat ka bhi khayal rakhna padega ke kisi khas hukoomat ki tabdeeli se qaum mein kya kya taghayyurat ronuma hote hain aur urf o istilah ke kaun kaun se qanoon taghayyur o tabaddul ki nazar ho chuke hote hain. Tareekhi waqeat pesh karne mein in taqazon ko malhooz nahin rakha jaye aur in usoolon ki roshni mein chhan been nahin ki jaye, to imkan hai ke ghaltiyon mein ulajh kar ghair sahih aur ghair maqool afsano ko pesh kiya jayega. Kyunke insani fitrat ki yeh aam kamzori hai, woh ghair mamooli baton ko manne mein badi dilchaspi aur lagao ka izhar karta hai aur woh is se laparwah aur be khatar un qisson ko bayan karta hai ke haqeeqat kya hai. Bahar kaif jhoote qisse aur ajeeb mazhak dastanein is waqt tareekh ke awraq ki zeenat banti hain ke morakh apni zimmedariyon ko mahsoos nahin karta hai aur woh is haqeeqat par ghaur nahin karta hai ke jo baat bayan ki gayi hai us ke taqaze bhi hain ya nahin aur woh us ki takzeeb karte hain ya tasdeeq. Mazeed Ibn-e-Khaldun ka kehna hai ke in asbab ke ilawa jo bayan kiye gaye hain kuch aur awamil bhi hain, jin ko waza aur ghadant mein barah-e-rast dakhl hai. Maslan ek bada sabab ja'al waza ka yeh ho sakta hai ke morakh pehle se ek asabiyat rakhta ho aur kisi khas giroh se wabasta ho, us ki koshish halaat waqeat ke silsile mein hamesha yehi rahegi ke kis tarah tareekh se us ki raye ki taeed ho sake aur doosron ki tardeed, us ki nazar waqeat o halaat ke mutalliq be laag aur munsifana nahin ho sakti hai. Ek sabab yeh bhi ho sakta hai ke naqil ko yeh na maloom ho ke khabar ke peeche kaun sa maqsad pinhan hai aur khabar ko jaisa ke us ke gumaan mein hai mahaz attkal se bayan kar de. Teesra ahem sabab yeh hai ke tatbiq ahwaal ki salahiyat na ho aur naqil yeh na jaan sakta ho ke waqeat ki teh mein tazia aur banawat ki karkardagiyon ka kitna hissa hai. Panchwan sabab umra o salateen ke qurb ki khwahish, is rah mein kizb o ikhtira ko dakhl ka aksar mauqa mila hai. Tareekh ek bohat wasee mauzu hai, is liye us ki kayi tarah se qism bandi ki gayi hai. 
Urdu, bar-e-saghir Pak o Hind ki miyari zubanon mein se ek hai. Yeh Pakistan ki qaumi aur rabta aamma ki zuban hai, jabke Bharat ki chhe riyaston ki daftari zuban ka darja rakhti hai. Aain-e-Hind ke mutabiq ise 22 daftari shanakht shuda zubanon mein shamil kiya ja chuka hai. 2001 ki mardum shumari ke mutabiq Urdu ko ba-taur madari zuban Bharat mein 5.01 feesad log bolte hain aur is lehaaz se hi Bharat ki chathi badi zuban hai jabke Pakistan mein ise ba-taur madari zuban 7.59 feesad log istemal karte hain, yeh Pakistan ki paanchwein badi zuban hai. Urdu tareekhi taur par Hindustan ki Muslim abadi se judi hai. Zaban-e-Urdu ko pehchan o taraqqi us waqt mili jab Bartanvi daur mein Angrez hukmaranon ne use Farsi ki bajaye Angrezi ke sath shumali Hindustan ke ilaqon aur Jammu o Kashmir mein use 1846 aur Punjab mein 1849 mein ba-taur daftari zuban nafiz kiya. Is ke ilawa Khaliji, European, Ashiyayi aur Amrici ilaqon mein Urdu bolne walon ki ek badi tadaad abad hai jo bunyadi taur par junubi Asia se koch karne wale ahl-e-Urdu hain. 1999 ke adad o shumar ke mutabiq Urdu zuban ke majmooi mutakallimeen ki tadaad das crore saath lakh ke lag bhag thi. Is lehaaz se yeh duniya ki nauwein badi zuban hai. Urdu zuban ko kayi Hindustani riyaston mein sarkari haisiyat bhi hasil hai. Nepal mein, Urdu ek registered ilaqai boli hai aur Junubi Africa mein yeh aain mein ek mahfooz zuban hai. Yeh Afghanistan aur Bangladesh mein aqliyati zuban ke taur par bhi boli jati hai, jis ki koi sarkari haisiyat nahin hai. 1837 mein, Urdu Bartanvi East India Company ki sarkari zuban ban gayi, Company ke daur mein poore shumali Hindustan mein Farsi ki jagah li gayi. Farsi us waqt tak mukhtalif Hind-Islami saltanaton ki darbari zuban ke taur par kaam karti thi. European noabadiyati daur mein mazhabi, samaji aur siyasi awamil paida hue jinhon ne Urdu aur Hindi ke darmiyan farq kiya, jis ki wajah se Hindi-Urdu tanaza shuru hua. Atharwein sadi mein Urdu ek adabi zuban ban gayi aur us ki do miyari shaklen Delhi aur Lucknow mein wajood mein aayeen. 1947 mein taqseem-e-Hind ke baad se Pakistani shehar Karachi mein ek teesra miyar paida hua hai. Dakani, ek purani Urdu ki shakal hai jo Dakan mein istemal hoti thi, solahwein sadi tak Dakan saltanaton ki darbari zuban ban gayi. Urdu ka baaz auqat Hindi ke sath muwazna kiya jata hai. Urdu aur Hindi mein bunyadi farq yeh hai ke Urdu Nastaliq rasm-ul-khat mein likhi jati hai aur Arabi o Farsi alfaz istemal karti hai. Jabke Hindi zuban Devanagari rasm-ul-khat mein likhi jati hai aur Sanskrit alfaz ziyada istemal karti hai. Kuch mahireen-e-lisaniyat Urdu aur Hindi ko ek hi zuban ki do miyari suraten gardante hain. Lekin haqeeqat yeh hai ke Hindi, Urdu zuban se nikli hai. Isi tarah agar Urdu aur Hindi zuban ko ek samjha jaye to yeh duniya ki chauthi badi zuban hai. Urdu zuban duniya ki nayi zubanon mein se hone ke bawajood apne paas miyari aur wasee zakhira adab rakhti hai. Khas kar junubi Ashiyayi zubanon mein Urdu apni shayari ke hawale se jani jati hai. Urdu ka naam sab se pehle shayar Ghulam Hamdani Mushafi ne 1780 ke aas paas Hindustani zuban ke liye istemal kiya tha. Halanke us ne khud bhi apni shayari mein zuban ki tareef ke liye Hindvi istilah istemal ki thi. Urdu ka matlab Turk zuban mein fauj hai, atharwein sadi ke akhir mein, ise ke naam se jana jata tha. Is ka matlab buland camp ki zuban hai, pehle ise Hindvi, Hindi, Hindustani aur Rekhta ke naam se jana jata tha. Urdu Hindi zuban ki tarah Farsi, Arabi, Turk zuban ki ek qism hai. Yeh Shoorseni zuban ki zeli qism ke taur par Apbhransh se quruun-e-wusta ke darmiyan wajood mein aayi. Urdu zuban ki ibteda ke bare mein ek khayal yeh bhi hai ke yeh Haryanvi zuban se shuru hui. Terhween sadi se unneeswein sadi ke akhir tak Urdu zuban ko ba yak waqt Hindi, Hindustani aur Hindvi kaha jata tha. Agarche lafz Urdu bizat-e-khud Turk zuban ke lafz Ordu ya Orda se nikla hai, isi se Angrezi lafz ka zahoor hua, taham Turk zuban se Urdu mein kam hi alfaz aaye hain. Arab aur Turk alfaz Urdu mein pahunch kar Farsi qism ke ban gaye hain, jaise ة ko aksar auqat h mein badal diya jata hai. Maslan Arabi taaye marboota ko h ya t mein badal diya jata hai. Bhale aaj ke daur mein Urdu ko ek mustaqil zuban ki shanakht hasil hai lekin azeem Urdu qalamkar unneeswein sadi ki kuch ibtedai dahaiyon tak Urdu zuban ko Hindi ya Hindvi ki shakal mein zahir karte rahe hain. Urdu zuban ko Hindustan ke Musalmanon ke sath mansoob kiya jata hai aur isi hawale se kayi nazariyat bhi qaim kiye gaye hain. Mumtaz muhaqqiq Hafiz Mahmood Shirani ke nazdeek yeh zuban Mahmood Ghaznavi ke hamla Hindustan ke adwar mein Punjab mein paida hui, jab Farsi bolne wale sipahi Punjab mein bas gaye, nez un ke nazdeek yeh Farsi mutakallimeen Delhi fateh karne se qabl do sau saal tak wahin abad rahe, yun Punjabi aur Farsi zubanon ke ikhtilaat ne Urdu ko janam diya, phir ek aadh sadi baad jab is nayi zuban ka aadha gundha khameer Delhi pahuncha tab wahan us ne mukammal zuban ki surat ikhtiyar ki, is hawale se unhon ne Punjabi aur Urdu zuban mein kayi mumassaltain bhi pesh ki hain. Shirani ke isi nazariye ko Punjab mein Urdu nami maqale mein likha gaya, jis ne Urdu zuban danon mein kafi shohrat payi aur isi ko dekh kar bohat se muhaqqiqeen ne Urdu ke aaghaz ko Musalmanon ki amad se jodna shuru kar diya, is tarah Dakkan mein Urdu, Gujarat mein Urdu, Sindh mein Urdu, Bengal mein Urdu hatta ke Balochistan mein Urdu ke nazariyat bhi samne aane lage. Hafiz Shirani ke nazariye ki mukhalifat karne walon mein Masood Hussain Khan aur Sabzwari jaise muhaqqiqeen shamil hain, jinhon ne un ke nazariye ko ghalat sabit kiya. Bartanvi Raj mein Farsi ki bajaye Hindustani ko Farsi rasm-ul-khat mein likha jata tha aur Hindu Muslim dono is par amal karte the.
