Lafz Urdu ko shayar Ghulam Hamdani Mushafi ne 1780 ke aas paas sab se pehle istemal kiya tha. Unhon ne khud apni shayari mein zuban ki tareef ke liye Hindvi lafz bhi istemal kiya. Terhween se atharwein sadi tak Urdu ko aam taur par Hindi hi ke naam se pukara jata raha. Isi tarah is zuban ke kayi doosre naam bhi the, jaise Hind. 
Arthashastra aur Ashoka ke kutbe Maurya daur ke ahwaal o waqaye ke awwaleen maakhaz hain. Asariyat ki ro se yeh siyah qalaee dar shumali bartanon ki tehzeeb ka zamana tha. Maurya saltanat ki bunyadein apne ahd ki taraqqi yafta maeeshat aur hunar mand samaj par ustawar thin. Garcha is ahd mein saman-e-tijarat ki kharidari ka sara nizam hukumat ke mutayyana usool o zawabit ke तहत hi anjam pata tha lekin muashre mein banking ka suragh nahin milta aur sharah-e-sood bandhe hue samaji chalan ke mutabiq hi li aur di jati thi. Insani ghulami ki shahadatain badi tadaad mein milti hain jin se saaf zahir hai ke Maurya muashre mein ghulamon ka chalan aam tha. Isi ahd mein shumali Hindustan mein ek qism ka nihayat miyari faulad tayyar kiya gaya jise Wootz faulad kehte hain. Yeh faulad Cheen aur Arab tak jata tha. Teesri sadi q.m. se chauthi sadi Eesvi tak ka zamana Sangam ahd kehlata hai. Yeh Tamil adab ke farogh ka zamana hai aur isi ahd mein teen Tamil shahi khandan Cheera, Chola aur Pandya ne junubi Hind ke mukhtalif ilaqon par hukmrani ki. Yeh teeno shahi khandan Tamil Akam ke Tajvaran-e-Salasa kehte hain. Sangam ahd ke adibon ne apni takhleeqat mein is daur ke waqaye o tawarik, siyasiyat aur jangon aur Tamil qaum ki tehzeeb o saqafat ko badi wazahat aur tafseel se bayan kiya hai. In adibon ka taalluq kisi muqtadir khandan se nahin tha, balki samaj ke mamooli gharon mein in ka janam hua aur awaam-un-nas ke darmiyan mein parwarish payi. In ke masail ka ba-chashm-e-khud mushahida kiya aur in ke dard o karb ko mahsoos kiya. Go ke in adibon ko shahana sarparasti hasil thi, lekin unhon ne rajon maharajaon ki qasidah nigari ki bajaye samaj ke aam tabaqat ki zindagi aur in ke rozmarra masail ko apni tawajjo ka markaz banaya. Sanskrit musannifeen ke bar-aks jo bil-umoom Brahman hua karte the, Sangam adab ke takhleeq karon ka taalluq mukhtalif samaji tabaqon se tha, woh mutanawwi pas manzar ke hamil aur beshtar ghair Brahman the. In ka dharm mukhtalif aur peshe juda juda the, in mein kashtkar bhi the, dastkar bhi the, dukandar, tajir aur purohit bhi the. In mein auraten bhi thin aur shahzade bhi the. Taqriban 300 q.m. se 200 Eesvi tak Pattuppattu, Ettuttogai aur Patinenkilkkanakku likhe jate rahe. Pattuppattu ausat lambayi ki das nazmon ka majmua hai aur Sangam adab ka hissa samjha jata hai. Ettuttogai mein aath muntakhab majmua-e-kalaam ko yakja kiya gaya hai aur Patinenkilkkanakku atharah mukhtasar nazmon ka majmua hai. Nez Tamil zuban ke grammar ki qadeem tareen kitab Tolkāppiyam bhi takhleeq ki gayi. Alawa barin Sangam ahd mein Tamil adab ke paanch azeem razmiye Aimperum Kāppiyankaḷ bhi takhleeq kiye gaye. Silappatikaram ko Ilango Adigal ne likha jo ek ghair mazhabi razmiya hai. Is razmiye ka markazi kirdar Kannagi nami ek khatoon hai jis ke sath Pandya darbar mein na insafi hoti hai aur woh apne shauhar se alahda ho jati hai. Is zulm par Kannagi ka jazba-e-intiqam bedar hota hai aur saltanat se badla lene ki thaan leti hai. Sittalai Sattanar ne Manimekalai tasneef ki jo darasal Silappatikaram hi ka tasalsul hai. Is mein Kovalan ki beti Madhavi ki kahani nazm ki gayi hai jo Bodh Bhikshuni ban jati hai. Teesri sadi eesvi se chhati sadi eesvi ka darmiyāni arsa Hindustan ka kīlāsīki daur kahlāta hai. Yeh ahad Mauriya saltanat ke zawal se shuru ho kar Gupta saltanat ke zawal tak jaari raha. Is daur ko mazeed mukhtalif zeli adwaar mein taqseem kiya gaya hai. Yahi woh daur hai jis mein Shung aur Satavahana saltanatoṅ ko urooj hasil hua. Chauthi sadi eesvi se chhati sadi eesvi tak Gupta saltanat qaim rahi. Gupta saltanat ka yeh daur Hindu mat ki tareekh ka ahad-e-zarrīñ samjha jata hai. Kīlāsīki ahad ki is poori muddat mein mazkora saltanatoṅ ke ilawa Hindustan ke mukhtalif khittoṅ par digar mutaddid saltanatain bhi hukmraan raheen aur unhoṅ ne poori khudmukhtari se apni riyasat ka nazm-o-nasq sambhala. Ilawa bareeṅ teesri sadi q.m se teesri sadi eesvi tak junubi Hindustan mein Sangam adab bhi nikharta aur taraqqi ki manzileṅ tay karta raha. Is poore arse mein yaani pehli sadi eesvi se 1000 eesvi tak Hindustani ki maeeshat duniya ki kul daulat ka ek tihai se ek chauthai hissa rahi, is lihaaz se us waqt Hindustan ki maeeshat duniya ki sab se badi maeeshat thi. Shung Magadh se uthe aur bar-e-sagheer Hind ke mashriqi aur wastī ilaqoṅ tak apni saltanat qaim kar li. In ka ahad-e-saltanat taqreeban 187 q.m se 78 q.m tak raha. Pushyamitra Shung ne Mauriya saltanat ke aakhri badshah ko takht-o-taaj se be dakhal kar ke is saltanat ki buniyad rakhi. Is ka dar-us-saltanat Patliputra tha lekin aage chal kar baaz Shung badshahoṅ maslan Bhagabhadra wagaira ne Vidisha mein bhi apna darbar kiya jo us waqt Besnagar kahlata tha aur mashriqi Malwa mein waqe tha. Pushyamitra Shung ne 36 baras hukumat ki, baad azaaṅ is ka beta Agnimitra is ka janasheen hua. Kul das Shung badshah guzre hain lekin Agnimitra ki wafaat ke baad saltanat ka shīrāza tezi se bikharne laga. Is ahad ke kutbaat aur sikkoṅ se maloom hota hai ke shumali aur wastī Hindustan mein chhoti chhoti mutaddid saltanatain aur bhi maujood theen jo Shung ki baladasti se mukammal azad aur khudmukhtar theen. Shung saltanat apne daur-e-hukmrani mein berooni aur andaruni donoṅ taqatoṅ se nabard azma rahi. Chunanche Kalinga ki Mahameghavahana saltanat, Deccan ki Satavahana saltanat, Hind-Yunaniyoṅ aur ghaliban Panchala aur Mathura ki Mitra saltanat se in ki kayi jangeṅ huin. Funoon-e-latīfa aur falsafa ki mukhtalif shakleṅ aur taleem-o-taallum ke digar wasail bhi is ahad mein parwan chadhe jin mein khapreloṅ par shabih sazi, pattharoṅ ke deo haikal mujassame aur tameerati yadgarain Bharhut aur Sanchi ke maroof stoop wagaira khusoosiyat se qabil-e-zikr hain. Shung badshahoṅ ne funoon-e-latīfa aur taleem ke farogh ke liye shahi wazeefa bhi jaari kiya aur is riwayat ko qaim karne mein in ka bada hissa raha. Umoor-e-saltanat mein jis rasm-ul-khat ko istemal kiya jata tha, woh Brahmi rasm-ul-khat ki ek shakal thi jis mein Sanskrit likhi jati. Shung saltanat ne aise waqt mein Hindustani saqafat ke farogh mein murabiyana kirdar nibhaya jab Hindu afkar mein baaz aham tareen taghayyurat ronuma ho rahe the. Is ne saltanat ko phalné phoolné aur iqtidaar hasil karne mein khasi madad ki. Satavahana salateen aslan Daccani the, isi bina par woh Andhra salateen bhi kehlate hain. Andhra Pradesh ka muqam Amravati un ka dar-us-saltanat tha lekin mukhtalif adwaar mein un ka paya-e-takht tabdeel hota raha, kabhi Janapada un ka mustaqir raha, kabhi Pratishthana (Paithan), Maharashtra un ka sadar muqam bana. Pehli sadi q.m mein un ki saltanat ki buniyad padi aur rafta rafta unhoṅ ne Hindustan ke bade hisse par apna iqtidaar qaim kar liya. Pehle yeh Mauriya saltanat ke baaj guzaar the lekin us ke zawal ke baad apni khudmukhtari ka elaan kar diya aur Deccan ke nisf balaai hissa par ek sire se doosre sire tak qabiz ho gaye. Satavahana salateen Hindummat aur Buddhamat ke bade sarparast aur murabbi guzre hain. Un ki isi sarparasti ka natija hai ke aaj Ellora se Amravati tak Buddhamat ki mutaddid yadgarain paai jati hain. Satavahana un awaleen Hindustani riyasatoṅ mein se hai jinhoṅ ne apne sikkoṅ par salateen ki shabih banai. Neez in salateen ne Sindh-o-Ganga ke maidan aur junubi Hindustan mein ek tehzeebi pul ka kaam kiya jis ki madad se shumali Hind ke afkar-o-tasawwurat junoob tak pahunche. Ilawa bareeṅ Satavahana ne in donoṅ khittoṅ mein tijarati rawabit ke istehkam mein bhi khasa aham aur faal kirdar nibhaya. Satavahana ko apne iqtidaar ke istehkam ki khatir Shung aur Magadh ki us waqt ki Kanva saltanat se marka aaraai bhi karna padi. Aage chal kar yahi saltanat Hindustan par berooni hamloṅ ke samne mazboot faseel sabit hui aur Hindustan ke bade hisse ko khariji anasir maslan Shakoṅ, Yunanioṅ aur Pahlavoṅ ke hathon mein jane se mehfooz rakha. Bilkhusoos Maghribi Kshatrapoṅ se in ki kashmakash taweel arse tak jaari rahi. Aur bilakhir Satavahana salateen Gautamiputra Satakarni aur Yajna Sri Satakarni jaise berooni hamla aawaroṅ ko shikast dene mein kamyab rahe. Teesri sadi eesvi mein Satavahana saltanat ka shīrāza bikhar gaya aur woh mutaddid chhoti chhoti riyasatoṅ mein taqseem ho gai. Kujula Kadphises Kushan saltanat ka pehla farmaanrawa tha, taqreeban pehli sadi eesvi ke wasat tak us ne apni saltanat ke raqbe ko maujooda Afghanistan se bahar bar-e-sagheer Hind ke shimal maghrib tak phaila diya tha. Kushanioṅ ke mutaliq yeh gumaan hai ke woh Tokharian zaban bolne wale aur Yuezhi ittihad ke paanch arkaan mein se ek the. Kujula Kadphises ke pote Kanishka Azam ke daur-e-hukumat tak Afghanistan ke beshtar hisse par Kushan qabiz ho chuke the. Phir saltanat ki futuhaat ka dairah shumali Hindustan ke khitte Saketa aur Varanasi ke qareeb waqe Sarnath tak wasee ho gaya. Shehanshah Kanishka Buddhamat ka bada murabbi tha, lekin jab Kushan junoob ki taraf badhe to in ke devi devataoṅ ki mooratiyoṅ mein nayi Hindu aksariyat ka akas numaya hone laga. Is ke ba-wisf Buddhamat ke istehkam mein Kushanioṅ ke ghair mamooli kirdar ko faramosh nahi kiya ja sakta. Hindustan se wast Asia tak aur Cheen ki sarzameen par Buddhamat ka istehkam inhi Kushanioṅ ki kawishoṅ ka samar hai. Moarikh Vincent Smith Kanishka ke mutaliq likhta hai Buddhamat ki tareekh mein Kanishka ne Ashoka Saani ka kirdar ada kiya.
Murabba ke ilaqa mein phaila hamwar maidan dohri dhalanen rakhta hai. Ek dhalan daryaye Sindh ke bahao ke saath saath tul-al-bad ki haisiyat se aur doosri dhalan daryaye Sindh ke donon kinaron se amoodi zawiya par. Darya ke sailaabi paniyon mein mitti shamil hoti aur woh sailaabi pani ke saath waadi mein phailate rehte hain. Kyunke un ki aabi guzar gaah sailaab ke mauqa par pani ki nakasi ke sat amal se pani mein shamil mitti ko phailate jate hain. Is musalsal amal se zameen ki satah darya ke bahao ki simt ek halki dhalwan ikhtiyar karti rehti hai aur darya apne kinaron ke saath ek wus’ee-o-areez dhalwan pushta banate rehte hain. Shumali maghribi Hindustan ke maidan aur Ganga ki waadi mein pehle samandar tha. Yahan pahar namoodar hue to naye darya bhi purane daryaon ke saath mil kar peechhe hatte hue samandar se nayi zaminein hasil keen. Yeh samandari ilaqa daryai mitti ke ek azeem zakheera se pur hokar maidan ki shakl ikhtiyar karli. Yeh daryai mitti kayi ki teh ki shakl mein isi maidan mein maujood hai. Jab barfen pighaltin hain aur barishen hoti hai to daryaon mein tughyani aajati hai aur sailaab ki wajah se pani ka ikhraj barh jata hai. Is tarah daryaon ka paat zyada chaura hojata hai. Pani raftaar mein izafa aur mitti ki miqdar zyada hojati hai. Sailaabi pani yeh tamam nasheb mein phail kar wahan apni mitti phailata hai. Is se wahan ki satah buland hoti jati hai. Aur darya naye raaste ikhtiyar karke wahan par bhi zameen ki satah buland ka amal shuru kar deta hai. Chunancha saalon se darya mitti teh phaila kar satah kar raha hai. Daryaye Sindh mein shamil mitti ki kaseer miqdar zyada tar raasta mein baith jati hai aur chunancha tughyani ke baad raasta mein mitti phir jane se us ka raasta badal jata hai aur darya apni guzargah aur raftaar ko un ke mutabiq dhaal leta hai. Jahan zameen naram milti hai jo aasani se pani mein shamil hojati wahan batadreej phail kar sust raftari se behta hai. Woh darya neem dairah banaleeta hai to raasta durust rakhne ke liye us ke barabar neem dairah bhi banata hai. Sailaab ke pani ko woh apne pehluon se bahar phenk deta hai. Is tarah se daryaye jaise jaise samandar ke nazdeek hota jata hai us mein pani ka ikhraj kam hota jata hai.
Sailaabi kaifiyat Daryaye Sindh ke sailaab ki tabah kariyion ko rokne ke liye us ke pushton ki taameer kein gayin. Aam halaat mein jitni zyada se zyada ausat miqdar pani ki Sukkur Barrage par maujood hoti hai. Sailaab ke zamane mein dugni hojati hai. Aise halaat mein pani ki zyada miqdar ka dabao baharhaal asar dikhayega. Mein Sukkur ke oopar band mein donon taraf shigaf parr gaye aur sailaab ne aas paas ke ilaqon ko gher kar wahi qadeem drama pesh kiya. Sukkur aur Shikarpur ke shumal mein pani ka ek samandar dakhil ho gaya aur chaure ilaqay par maghrib ki taraf pesh qadmi karta raha. Us ke baad junoob ki taraf murr gaya aur is tarah ka safar tay karke Manjhar Jheel mein dakhil ho gaya. Sukkur ke Begari band ki taameer se pehle yeh sailaab ka makhsoos ilaqa tha. Yeh sailaabi pani raasta ka nisf hissa Saro Dhund se aage waadi ka nasheebi raasta ikhtiyar karta hai. Yeh woh maqam hai jahan daryaye Sindh ke paniyon mein pahariyon se beh kar aane wala pani milta hai. Shumala ki taraf qadeem zamane mein jo sailaab daryaye Sindh ke dayen kinare se shuru hote the woh bhi qareeb qareeb aisa raasta ikhtiyar karte the. Yeh Kashmore se thora neeche ki taraf shuru hote the. Yeh aam taur par ke maghrib mein behte the aur taqreeban isi jagah se jahan daryai aur pahari pani ka mail hota hai yeh sailaab guzarte the. Mohil ke nazdeek sailaab apna raasta qadre tabdeel karleta tha aur jaisa ke oopar bayan kiya gaya hai isi raaste se Bagodero aur Dostali ke darmiyan mein ja milta tha. Woh nasheb jo sailaab ka aakhri nisf kehlata tha kuch arsa pehle nasheb Sindh ke naam se mashhoor tha. Shumali maghribi Sindh ke yeh donon sailaab shumal aur maghrib mein waqay pahariyon se beh kar aane wale pani ke rele ki wajah se aur bhi wusat ikhtiyar karlete the. Shadeed baarishain bhi Sindh mein pani ke kaseer tareen ikhraj mein shamil hojati thin. ke intehai tughyani ne Rohri ke oopar Qasimpur ke bayen pushte mein shigaf dal diya tha aur Nara waadi ke baalai hissa ke tamam ilaqe mein sailaab ka pani phail gaya tha. Pehle waqton mein yeh ilaqa bhi kasrat-e-aab ke zamane mein kinare se behne wale pani se bhar jata tha. Tamam Rohri Division jo daryaye Sindh aur Registan ke darmiyan mein waqay hain. Yeh woh ilaqa hai jo maazi mein musalsal sailaab ki zard mein raha hai. Maazi mein yeh haqeeqat ilaqa ki tabayee shakl se aaj bhi bakhoobi ayan hai. Maazi ke in sailaabi hadsaat mein sab se ahem aur sab se derpa woh sailaab tha jo daryaye Sindh ko Bhawalpur mein Ghouspur ke maqam par ek aise nasheb mein muntaqil kar diya jis mein pani behta raha. Sailabon ko control karne aur us ka zakheera karne ke liye Kashmore ke maqam par ek dam banaya gaya. Is se sailaab ke rok tham mein madad mili. Aaj ke Sindh mein ziraati zaminein bahut kam hain. Kyunke pani baarish darya ke sailaab par munhasir hota. Barishen Sindh mein kam hoti theen aur sailaab daryai ilaqon aur us ki shakhon ki nashebi mein guzar chuka hota to ziraat ki jati thi. Agarcheh darya Sindh ek bare darakht ki tarah apne shakhain har taraf phailaye hue tha aur woh apni shakhon ke zariye zaminon ko sairab karta tha. Magar phir bhi bahut ilaqay daryai pani ki pahunch se door theen. Sailaab mein darya ke kinaron se nikalne wala pani ek wusat chadar ki bajaye apni sailaabi shakhon mein se guzarta hai aur un kinaron se bahar nikal kar mazeed chhoti chhoti shakhon mein phail jata tha. Un ke bal khate hue raaste aaj bhi un qudrati aabi guzargahain ki nishadehi karte hain. Sukkur shehar ki buland imaraton mein jagah jagah minaar nazar aate hain aur darya paar Rohri waqay hai. Yahan darmiyan mein Bukkur ka jazeera hai. Jo hamesha askari ahmiyat hamil raha hai. Ek doosra jazeera jo Hinduon ke mandir ki wajah se shohrat rakhta hai Sadhu Bela hai. Yahan se daryaye mein se nahrain nikalti hain. Sukkur Barrage waqayi mutasir kun hai. Lekin is se zyada mutasir kun yahan daryaye Sindh ka choone ki chattanon se bani hui ek tang ghati se guzarta hai jis ki chaurayi mehaz aadha hai. Sindh ka qadeem dar-ul-hukumat Aror maujooda darya ke mashriq mein waqay hai. Is shigaf mein dakhil hone se pehla darya taqreeban phail jata hai. Musaddaqa shahadat ke mutabiq saal se ya is se bhi taweel zamana se daryaye Sindh ne Bukkur ke choolak ke raaste ko barqarar rakha hua hai. Arzi mutalia mein yeh baat aayi hai daryaye Sindh mukhtalif zamanon Sukkur ke shumal aur maghrib mein Rohri ke junoob aur mashriq mein behta raha hai. Jahan se ab Sindh Dhoro aur Sindh Wah guzarte hain. Qadeem waadi Sindh ke shehar Mohenjo-Daro, Loham Jodaro, Janhoon Jodaro, Kot Asur aur Diji Ji Tikri ka wujood sabit karta hai ke waadi Sindh ki in bastiyon ke zamane mein daryaye Sindh ka bara chashma zaroori nahi ek hi dhaare ki shakl mein behta ho.
Waadi Sindh ki tehzeeb Sukkur Barrage se darya kuch aage barhta hai to darya ke mashriqi kinare par Khairpur ki riyasat thi. Jo ab Pakistan ka hissa hai. Khairpur ke samne darya ke paar Larkana ka shehar abad hai. Is se chand ke fasle par duniya ki ek azeem unshan tehzeeb ke asaar hain. Vincent Smith ka khayal tha yahan kansa ka daur kabhi aaya hi nahi. Kyunke Mauryan ahad se pehle ke koi asaar daryaft hi nahi hue the. Magar in asaar ke daryaft hone ke baad sare nazariye ek dam badal gaye. Mahireen asaar-e-qadeema ne is shandaar daryaft ka elaan ka elaan kiya jis ka qadeem adab mein koi zikr hi nahi tha. Jis khas khandhar do shehron ke the. Har shehar qabal maseeh ke darmiyan mein apne urooj ke zamane mein ek murabba the. Is mein junoobi shehar Sindh Mohenjo-Daro aur baalai shehar Harappa Punjab mein Ravi ke kinare abad the. In shehron ke makan kayi manzila thos pukhta eenton bane the. In mein rehaishi sahuliyat maslan pani ki nakasi ghusal khane aur bait-ul-khala the. Abadi ka naqsha lajawab tha. Imaraton ke mustateel silsile the. Jin mein wusat sarakain aur umda chhoti galiyan theen. Duniya mein kahin aur shehri abadi aisa intezam nahi mila jo is qadar pecheeda aur nafees ho. Itne qadeem zamane mein ise ek mansoobay ke tehat qaim kiya gaya tha. Misr ke shehar us ke hukmaranon lay koh-e-paikar maqbaron aur azeem mabdon ke muqablay mein fan-e-taameer ke lehaaz se heech the. Sumeria, Akkade, Babel ke azeem shehar baghair kisi mansoobay ke bante chale gaye. In tamam shehron ki sarakain Rome, London, Paris aur baad ke Hindustani shehron ki tarah be tartibi ka namoona theen. Jab ke is ke muqablay waadi Sindh ke shehar hairat angez shehri mansooba bandi ka mazhar the. Zawiya-e-qaima banati seedhi sarakain, pani ki nakasi ka aala nizam jis ka shaoor sadi eesawi tak Europe mein paida nahi hua tha.
Ahad-e-Qadeem Sikandar se pehle Dara ne yahan daryaye Sindh ke bare mein apne Yunani sipa salar Skalakus ko daryaye Kabul ke raaste rawana kiya tha. Pehla Yunani musannif Ktesias hai jis ne Iraniyon ki maloomat ko jo Sindh ke bare mein theen tafseeli bayan pesh kiya tha. Is mein aksar be sar-o-pa baaten hain. Baad ke daur mein yaani Sikandar ke muarrakheen Aristotle, Ptolemy, Sooter aur Nearchus ne Sindh par jo kuch likha hai woh bhi baqi nahi raha. Hum tak jo tehreerain pahunchin hain woh hawale hain jo Yunani aur Roomi hawale hain. Yeh kafi behtar hain magar in mein geografiyayi maloomat na hone ke barabar hain. Strabo ne bhi Sindh ke bare san eesawi ke ibtedayi saalon mein likha hai. Megasthenes jis ne Sikandar ke hamla ke saal baad Hindustan ka safar kiya tha aur Chandragupta ke darbar mein taweel arsa tak raha tha. Us ka bayan hai ke daryaye Sindh ne ek bahut bara jazeera banaliya hai. Jo Prasiana kehlata tha. Doosra chhota jazeera Patala ke naam se mashhoor hai. Is jazeera ke mahal-e-wuqoo ke mutalliq Kritikos bayan karta hai ke Musicanus ko zer karne ke baad Sikandar ne un ke dar-ul-hukumat mein fauj taynat kardi thi. Us ke baad Prastha qabile ke mulk mein us ne pesh qadmi ki Porticanus un ka raja tha. Pliny ne is jazeera ko Prasiana ke naam se zikr kiya hai. Pliny ne daryaye Sindh ki bahut shakhon ka zikr kiya hai. In mein se ek Arbita pahar ki taraf jati hai. Sikandar ke saathiyon Arrian aur doosre logon ne is shakh ka zikr nahi kiya hai. Arrian ke mutabiq delta se pehle Patala ka shehar tha aur donon shakhain Sindh ke naam se pukari jati theen. Sikandar ne yahan ki qilabandi ko mustahkam kiya aur yeh ilaqa ka be-aab-o-bayan tha. Is zamane mein delta ki samandari hudood kya theen humein is bare mein maloomat nahi hain. Lekin is waqt darya ke bayen shakh Ganjo Takkar (Hyderabad) ke mashriq mein behti thi aur is ilaqa mein Makli ka pahari silsila hai. Jis ko daryai mitti ki patti chatani zameen se juda karti hai. Jo aam taur par Karachi aur Ras Mouze Cape tak chali gayi hai. Yahi woh maghribi raasta hai jis se daryaye Sindh guzar kar samandar tak pahunchta tha. Makli ki pahariyan ya Pir Patho pahariyan us ka junoobi sara hain. Kalota yahan shumal mashriq mein waqay hoga jo yaani Mirpur Bathoro se kis qadar junoob mein hai. Is waqt delta ki hudood Makli ki pahari aur Pir Patho se aage nahi barhi thi aur samandar ki maujooda hudood Abhan Shah ki pahari thi aur Makli ki pahariyon ka junoobi rukh tha aur bayen taraf keecharr bhara hua tha. Is jagah jo daryai mitti ka maidan hai woh baraye naam samandar se buland hai aur ho sakta hai saal ki paidaawar ho. Yahan se maghrib tak yaani Gharo wahi maidan phaila hua hai. Yahan jagah jagah mitti ke teele aur reit ki pahariyan ubhri hui hain. Jis ki ausat bulandi samandar se se zyada bulandi nahi hai. yunani'ion ne Indo-Scythia ke naqshe par bahut se shehron ke naam bataye hain magar un ki shanakht mumkin nahi. Ptolemy ke mutabiq daryaye Sindh apni shakhon jo bara jazeera bana raha hai woh Prasiana hai. Cheeni sayyah Xuanzang ne apne safarnama mein Sindh ke jin maqamat aur maloomat darj ki hain woh bahut had tak qayas araiyion par mabni hain. Un ke naam aur mahal-e-wuqoo durust nahi hain jis se pecheedagiyan paida ho gayi hain. Sadi Eesa mein Muhammad bin Qasim ne Sindh par hamla kiya. Jis ne Sindh ki qismat ka faisla kar diya. Un ka dar-ul-hukumat Mansura tha jis ke khandhar Shahdadpur se ke fasle par mile hain. Balazuri ka bayan hai Aror pahari par abad hai aur use woh Bukkur ke saath bhi bayan karta hai. Chach Nama bhi yehi kehta hai ke Bukkur ka qila Mehran ke kinare Aror ke bilkul bil muqabil tha. Istakhri ne Bukkur ka zikr nahi kiya hai.
Arzi Tabdiliyan Arzi tehqeeqat ke mutabiq ahad mein Sindh samait shumali Hindustan ka bishtar ilaqa Tethys Samandar ke neeche tha. Jis ki lahrain is Koh-e-Himalaya se le kar Koh-e-Vindhya tak ke saahil se takrati theen. Kisi zamane mein Koh-e-Himalaya mein khaufnak zalzale barpa hone se zameen oopar aagayi aur samandar peechhe hat kar bahut door chala gaya. Is tarah yahan zameen namoodar hui. Tez hawaain aur toofanon ki badolat yahan reit phail gayi. Barsaton yeh zameen jamti gayi aur garmi ki wajah se zameen pukhta ho gayi. Ek taraf barsat aur doosri daryaon ki laayi hui mitti ki wajah se zameen kaasht ke qabil ho gayi. Is ilaqa ko daryaye Sindh ne raunaq bakhshi hai. Is darya ne isi zameen ko paal poos kar bara kiya. Aaj bhi zindagiyon ka madar is darya par hai. Jis ke baghair yeh ilaqa sehra ban jata. Rann of Kutch aur Thar samandar ke neeche. Karachi aur Hyderabad ke bishtar nashebi ilaqay samandar tale aur kuch ilaqon mein darya behta tha. In mein Shahbandar, Sajawal, Jherruk ilaqa to haal hi mein pani se namoodar hua hai. Shahbandar, Thatta aur Jherruk ki pahariyan, Koti ki taraf Surjano, Hyderabad ki Ganjo Takkar aur Rani Kot ki pahariyan bhi nahi theen. Agar in mein kuch ubhar aayin theen to yeh samandar mein ek jazeere ki manind theen jin ke charon taraf pani tha. Is liye Sindh ka maghribi pahari ilaqa pehle abad hua tha. Yeh qadeem hajri ahad ya purana behtar wala zamana tha aur us waqt bishtar ilaqon mein barf jami hui thi. Jahan kahin barf nahi thi wahan logon ki abadi thi. Yeh qadeem log jinhein ghar banana nahi aata tha aksar gharon mein rehte the. Yeh log kheti bari bhi nahi jante the. Yeh log jungli anaaj, phal aur jadi bootiyan khate the ya shikar par un ka guzara tha. Sir John Marshall ka kehna hai ke naye hajri zamane ke asaar Sindh mein Lakki ki pahariyan, Kirthar ka pahari silsila aur Rohri ke pahari ilaqa mein mile hain. Lagta hai Thatta se samandar peechhe hat jane ki yeh maidan zaahir hue hain. Is wajah se naye hajri zamane mein log yahan rehne lage. Is zamane mein na sirf Sehwan ka ilaqa abad tha balki Sindh ke mashriq mein maujood pahariyan yaani Thatta, Jherruk ki Bodhi pahariyan aur Enterpur se Rohri tak ki pahariyan abad theen. mein darya ne apna raasta tabdeel karke maujooda raasta ikhtiyar kiya. Is se Phelile ke raaste behna band ho gaya. Lekin jab darya ne yahan rukh tabdeel kiya to yeh maidan namoodar hua. Pir Patho se junoob mashriq mein lambe aur aadha chaure tukre mein pahariyon ka ek majmooa hai. In mein oonchi pahari jo Ibn Shah ke naam se mashhoor hai sirf buland hai. Yeh Sindh ke junoob ki yeh aakhri chattan hai aur is mein khurdure reit ke patthar maujood hain. Saal se zyada arsa guzra hai ke daryaye Sindh Pir Patho aur Ibn Shah pahariyon ke darmiyan mein se beh raha tha aur us ka delta Ibn Shah se chand ke fasle par shuru hota hai. Kalhoras ne Sindh mein kayi shehar basaye magar woh darya ki nazar ho gaye. Mein Hyderabad ka shehar abad kiya gaya. Is waqt tak darya ne apni nayi guzargah mein Ganjo Takkar ke maghrib mein mustaqil taur par behna shuru kar diya. Jab ke Hyderabad se chand ke fasle par darya ki ek aur shakh Hyderabad ke mashriqi simt se guzarti thi aur yeh Phelile ke naam se mashhoor hai. Sadi mein is delte ki baalai nok shayad maujooda Hyderabad se taqreeban junoob mashriq mein bayen shakh jo Rain Nadi ke naam se mashhoor thi. Woh Guni Canal ke raaste Badin se hoti hui Rann of Kutch ke maghribi sire se samandar mein girti thi. Mashhoor nahrain Kalri, Baghar, Paniari aur Satu maazi mein mukhtalif auqat mein daryaye Sindh ki woh shakhain theen. Jis ne daryaye Sindh ka zaayed pani samandar mein pahunchta tha. ke baad daryaye Sindh ke bahao mein koi bari tabdeeli nahi hui. Agarcheh muqami taur par darya dayen ya bayen chaar paanch hatta raha hai. Jis se thode fasle tak ilaqay mutasir hote rahe hain. Albattah akhir nisf zamane mein jo tabdeeliyan waqay huin woh insani koshishon ka natija theen. Arab geografiya daanon ka kehna hai ke Debal bandargah aur ek samandari khari ke kinare abad tha. Yahan daryaye Sindh ki sab se bari shakh girti hai. Al-Masoodi ke bayan ke mutabiq daryaye Sindh do shakhon mein munqasim hokar samandar mein girta tha aur donon shakhain ek doosre se bahut fasla par waqay theen. Ek dahana shehar Loharani ke paas aur doosri Kutch ki sarhad ke qareeb. Jahan yeh Sindh Sagar ke naam se mashhoor thi. Al-Biruni ne likhta hai ke saahil-e-Hind Makran ke markazi shehar Teez se shuru hota hai. Is shehar aur Debal ke darmiyan mein Khaleej Turan (Sonmiani) waqay hai. Khaleej ke baad chhota dahana aata hai is ke baad bara dahana aata hai. In se guzar kar Buwaraj aata hai aur Rann of Kutch ke samandari qazzaqon se guzar kar Somnath aata hai. Yahan saaf zaahir hai ke daryaye Sindh ki daryaye Sindh ki maghribi yaani dahini shakh chhoti aur mashriqi doosri shakh ki nisbat bari thi. Is ka kehna hai ke yeh Mansura ke qareeb do hisson mein taqseem hojata hai aur samandar mein do raaston se dakhil hota hai. Ek shehar Lohani ke qareeb aur doosre maqam par mazeed mashriq ki taraf Kutch ke sooba mein Sindh Sagar ke nazdeek. Sadi ke wast mein daryaye Sindh ki gharbi shakh do hisson mein munqasim thi jo ek doosre se kafi fasle par theen. Is ka dayan hissa Makli pahariyon ke shumal mein maujooda Kalri Canal ke raaste behta hoga aur Baghar Canal ki guzargah ko ikhtiyar kiye hue tha. Aage chal kar donon hisse mutahid hokar ek hi shakh ban jate the. In donon ke darmiyan mein jazeera gaya tha jo taqreeban ek murabba ke raqba par mushtamil tha aur us mein pahariyon ka ek poora silsila maujood tha. Yahan Taluka Abad ka qila, Samoui aur us ke baad Thatta taameer hue hain. Daryaye Sindh ki Kalri shakh saal tak aabi nizam ka juzv bani rahi aur tak daryaye Sindh ka pani isi raasta se guzarta tha us ke baad Baghar ne ahmiyat hasil karli. Sadi ke wast mein daryaye Sindh ke bahao mein tabdeeli ke natije mein Kalri shakh hamesha ke liye madoom ho gayi. Us ke fauran baad Baghar shakh jis se daryai pani ka bara hissa guzarta tha reit aur keecharr se bhar kar payab ho gayi aur chashme ki ziyadati ke saath junoobi bahao ikhtiyar kar liya aur bahut si aisi shakhain jo Baghar ke bayen kinare par nikalti theen unhein katta hua behta tha. Yeh wazeh nahi aabi soorat haal mein yeh tabdeeli kaise waqay hui. Shayad is ka sabab ka zalzala tha jis ne Kutch ke ilaqe mein bari tabahi machayi thi. Us ke nawahi ilaqe mein bahut si tabdeeliyan paida ho gayi theen. Kori Creek jo Pran aur Hakra ke girne ki jagah thi aur bahut arsa se pani se mehroom thi. Lekin zalzala ne use kafi gehra aur chaura kar diya tha aur Rann of Kutch ka maghribi hissa aisi haisiyat ikhtiyar kargaya ke us mein pehle ki nisbat samandari pani zyada miqdar mein pahunchne laga. Daryaye Sindh jab samandar mein girta hai to yeh kayi shakhon mein taqseem hojata hai aur samandar mein phail kar girta hai. Asal mein Delta woh amal hai jis mein darya samandar se zameen hasil karta hai aur darya ki shakhain is amal nishadehi karti hain. Darya ne apni mitti ko phailane ke amal se saahil samandar ki zameen oonchi kardi aur samandar ko peechhe dhakhel diya hai. Chunancha Sindh ka poora maidan hi is amal se wujood mein aaya hai. Sindh darya delta ki namood us waqt shuru karta hai ke jab samandar ka pani darya ke pani ke bahao ki raftaar sust ko deta hai aur jis ki wajah se darya saahili ilaqe mein woh do shakhon mein taqseem hojata hai. Khayal rahe yeh sust raftari ka asar lambi shakhon se zyada nahi ho sakta hai. Maidani ilaqon ki tarah daryaye Sindh delta ke ilaqa mein bhi apni guzargahon ko buland karne ka amal jari rakhta hai. Yaani yeh apni mitti ko aakhri marhale mein kinaron par phailata rehta hai aur yeh amal khaasi tezi se jari rehta hai. Yeh amal sirf sailaab ke zamane mein nahi aam mausam mein bhi jari rehta hai. Is liye delta ki takhleeqi pesh qadmi ke mutalliq yeh samajhna ghalat hoga ke darya ke dahana ke samne jitna samandar hai woh har maqam par thora thora aage barh raha hai. Sahi soorat haal yeh hai ke markazi dahana ke samne zameen tezi se pesh qadmi kar rahi hai. Jab ke shakhon mein yeh pesh qadmi na hone ke barabar hai. Is ke ilawa jitna saahili hissa hai aur yaqeenan bishtar wahi hissa hai. Woh apni jagah qaim hai ya muqami taur par zameen ke andar thora bahut ghus jata hai. Is ke baad darya apni mitti ko ugalne ke liye doosra dahana istemal karne lagta hai. Dahane ki is tabdeeli se pesh qadmi ka mahal badal jata hai. Daryai deltaon ke takhleeqi amal ko dilchaspi aur tawajjo se dekha jata hai. Daryaye Sindh mein sailaab ke zamane mein zyada se zyada ikhraj saalana lakh fi second hai. Sailaabi zamane mein is pani ke andar mili hui mitti ka pani mein tanasub hai. Ek andaze ke mutabiq daryaye Sindh tughyani ke ayam mein taqreeban mitti samandar tak le jata hai. Yeh miqdar murabba zameen ke liye kafi hoti hai. Bashartikeh woh gaz gehri ho. Lekin behra-e-Arab ka rad-e-amal jo monsoon ke zamane delta ki takhleeq mein bari had tak etedal paida kar deta hai. Saal ke jaize se maloom hua hai ke is arsa mein darya ne tak barh sakta hai lekin darya ki shakhon ke izafa se woh izafa na hone ke barabar kaha ja sakta hai. Is baat ki shahadat maujood hai ke nisbatan thode zamane mein zameen ne samandar ke khaase hisse par qabza jamaliya hai. Misal ke taur par hum jante hain ke ke darmiyane hissa mein daryaye Sindh ke dahane par murabba ka naya ilaqa zameen mein shamil hua hai aur is izafa ka markazi hissa woh markazi jagah hai jo samandar ke muqabil hai. Yahan abhi darya ki woh shakhain samandar mein girti hain jin se darya ke pani ki bishtar miqdar kharij hoti hai. Gharo aur Kori Creek ke darmiyan yeh nayi zameen delta ke saahili nisf daire se numayan taur par aage nikli hui hai. Samandar ki lahrain jo musalsal zameen se takrati rehti hain woh yaqeenan darya ki naram mitti ko sakht aur mazboot banane mein madadgar sabit hoti hain. Yahan sawal yeh paida hota hai ke Sindh ka maidan majmooi taur par daryaye Sindh ke amal se kis raftaar se buland hota raha hai. Daryaye Sindh ke maidan ka raqba Mithankot mein daryaon ke sangam se akhir tak bashumool delta kam az kam murabba hai. Sindh ka delta daryaye Nile se bahut chhota hai. Daryaye Sindh ke pani mein mili mitti daryaye Nile ki mitti se gunah zyada hai. Is tarah daryaye Nile ka sailaabi ikhraj Sindh ke muqablay mein tihai zyada hai. Lehazaa Sindh ka maidan jo darya ki mitti se bana hai dugna hai. Sindh ka delta har sadi mein inch buland hota raha hai. Mohenjo-Daro ki khudayi ke dauran mein is bare mein bahut mufeed maloomat hasil huin aur ab qayas kiya jata hai ke maidan ka wastii hissa jis mein guzashta saalon se daryaye Sindh ne apna bahao jari rakha hua hai taqreeban buland hua hai. Yaani har sadi mein ausatan inch buland hua hai. Yeh bhi andaza lagaya gaya hai ke darya se mulhaqa ilaqa mein jahan taqreeban saal se musalsal beh raha hai yeh saala bulandi taqreeban hai. Darya se zyada fasla par yeh ausat batadreej kam hota jayega. Samandar mein door tak ke fasle par bhi daryaye Sindh ka pani surkhi mayel bhoore pani ki wajah se behra-e-Arab ke sabzi mayel neelgoon pani ka rang badla nazar aata hai. Pani ke neeche saahili reit ki deewaron ke fauran baad ek khayi jise Swatch kaha jata hai woh darya ki guzargah ko taqreeban bar-e-aazmi teh ke ikhtitam tak jati hai. Us ke donon taraf uthla samandar hai jo us ki ibteda mein sirf gehra hai aur batadreej gehra hota chala jata hai. Swatch ka painda taqreeban neeche hai. Ho sakta hai yeh kisi zalzale ke natije mein paida hua ho. Lekin is se mulhaqa Himalayayi ilaqon mein bhi zalzale aate rehte hain. Wahan koi aisa asar dekhne mein nahi aaya. Is saahil par yeh Swatch ek munfarid haisiyat rakhti hai. Daryaye Sindh jo duniya ke azeem paharon ko kaat kar hai us ne samandar ki teh mein ek bari gehri ghati khod dali hai. Daryaye Sindh jo Tibet mein Sangi Kabab se shuru hota hai aur Tibet ki buland-o-chhat Karakoram ke paharon se hote hue doosre darya aur nalon ka pani leta hua behra-e-Arab pahunchta hai. Yeh zindagiyon ka saman bhi paida karta hai aur apne raah mein aane walon par maut bhi bakhshta hai. Is ne na sirf shehron ko balki tehzeebon ko bhi malyamet kar diya. Yeh wajah hai ise kahin samandar, kahin devta, kahin Udherolal aur kahin yeh daryaon ka baap kehlata hai. Is ne apne seene mein sadiyon ke safar mein bahut se raaz pinhan rakhe hue hain. Yahan tak jab samandar ke paas pahunchta hai to bhi is ki sarkashi khatam nahi hoti hai. Yeh apni laayi mitti se samandar se zameen chheen kar samandar ko peechhe dhakhel deta hai aur samandar mein apna raasta banata hua bilakhir us mein samajaata hai. Daryaye Sindh ka safar jo is ne Tibet ke Sangi Kabab se shuru kiya aur ka safar tay karke behra-e-Arab ke paniyon mein apna ikhtitam kiya sadiyon se jari hai aur sadiyon tak jari rahega aur yeh apna kaam achi tarah jari rakha hua hai, logon ki zindagiyon ki baqa ka baais ban raha hai.
Afghanistan, sarkari taur par Islami Imarat-e-Afghanistan (Dari/Pashto Afghanistan) wast Asia aur junoobi Asia mein waqay ek zameen band mulk hai. Is ke junoob aur mashriq mein Pakistan, maghrib mein Iran, shumal mashriq mein Cheen, shumal mein Kirghizistan, Turkmenistan, Uzbekistan aur Tajikistan hain. Ird gird ke tamam mumalik se Afghanistan ke tareekhi, mazhabi aur saqafati talluq bahut gehra hai. Is ke bishtar log feesad Musalman hain aur mulk ka sarkari mazhab Islam hai. Yeh mulk bil tarteeb Iraniyon, yunani'ion, Arabon, Turkon, Mangolon, Angrezon, Roosion aur America ke qabze mein raha hai. Magar is ke log berooni qabza ke khilaf hamesha muzahamat karte rahe hain. Ek mulk ke taur par sadi ke wast mein Ahmed Shah Abdali ke daur mein yeh ubhra. Agarcheh baad mein Durrani Saltanat ke kafi hisse ird gird ke mumalik ke hisse ban gaye. mein Shah Amanullah Khan ki qiyadat mein, Angrezon ke saath bain-ul-aqwami tarz par kiye gaye kharija policy ke moaahiday ko mustarad kar diya. Jis ke baad Afghanistan sahi maanon mein ek azad mulk ban gaya. Magar Angrezon ke daur mein is ke bishtar ilaqay haqeeqat mein azad hi the aur Bartaniya kabhi is par mukammal qabza nahi rakh saka. September ke waqay ko bunyad bana kar America ne Taliban par jang musallat kardi aur Taliban hukoomat (Imarat-e-Islamia Afghanistan) ko gira diya lekin saal baad America ko taweel tabah kun jang ke baad Afghanistan se nikalna pada. Bazahir America ki kathputli hukoomat (Islami Jamhooria Afghanistan ke naam se) August tak qaim rahi lekin Kabul par Taliban ke qabze ke saath hi is hukoomat ke iqtidaar ka suraj ghuroob ho gaya. Afghanistan pichle saal se musalsal jang ki si halat mein hai jis ne is ko tabah kar diya hai aur is ki kayi naslon ko be ghar kar diya hai. Yeh tabahi kabhi ghairon ke hathon hui aur kabhi khana janggi se yeh soorat haal paida hui. Afghanistan mein saal pehle bhi insani abadi maujood thi aur is ki zaraat bhi duniya ki avvalin zaraat mein shamil hoti hai. San qabl Maseeh mein Aryaoon ne Afghanistan ko taraj kiya. Phir Iraniyon ne un se chheen liya. Is ke baad yeh arsa tak Saltanat-e-Faris ka hissa raha. Qabl Maseeh mein is ke kayi hisse Iraniyon se Sikandar-e-Azam ne chheen liye jis mein Balkh bhi shamil hai magar yunani'ion ka yeh qabza zyada der na raha. Sikandar-e-Azam ke mukhtasar qabze ke baad, Seleucid Saltanat ki janasheen riyasat ne qabl Maseeh tak is ilaqay par hukoomat ki yahan tak ke unhon ne is ka zyada tar hissa Mauryan Saltanat ko ek ittehad ke moaahiday ke hisse ke taur par de diya. Mauryon ne Hindu Kush ke junoob ke ilaqay par control kiya yahan tak ke taqreeban qabl Maseeh mein un ka takhta ult diya gaya. Un ka zawal Ashoka ki hukmarani ke khatam hone ke saal baad shuru hua, jis ke natije mein Yunani-Bachtariyon ne ise apni saltanat ka hissa bana liya magar is ka bishtar hissa jald hi toot gaya aur yeh Hind-Yunani badshahiyat ka hissa ban gaya. Sadi qabl Maseeh ke awakhir mein un ko Hind-Scythion ne shikast di aur nikal bahar kiya. Shahrah-e-Resham sadi qabl Maseeh ke dauran namoodar hui aur Afghanistan ne is ke zariye hone wali Cheen, Hindustan, Faris aur shumal mein maujooda Uzbekistan ke shehron Bukhara, Samarkand aur Khiva ke raaste tijarat ke saath taraqqi ki. Is ke markazi maqam par ashiya aur khayalat ka tabadla hua, jaise Cheeni resham, Farsi chandi aur Roman sona, jabke maujooda Afghanistan ka kitta khas taur par Badakhshan ke ilaqay se lal Badakhshan ki kaankani aur tijarat kar raha tha. Sadi qabl Maseeh ke dauran, Parthian Saltanat ne is ilaqay ko apne zer-e-tasallut kar liya lekin baad mein Hind-Parthian muqami hukmaranon ne apni khud mukhtar hukoomat qaim karli. Sadi eesawi ke wast se akhir tak Afghanistan mein markooz wusat Kushan Saltanat Budh mat ki saqafat ki azeem sarparast ban gayi, jis se poore khitte mein Budh mat ko farogh mila. Sadi eesawi mein Sasanion ne Kushanon ka takhta ult diya tha, phir bhi Hind-Sasani ilaqay ke kuch hisson par hukoomat karte rahe. Un ke baad Kidarion ka qabza ho gaya aur baad mein un ki jagah Hephthalites ne le li. Sadi mein un ki jagah Turk Shahi ne le li. mein Safarion ke is ilaqay ko fateh karne se pehle Kabul ki Budh Turk Shahi ki jagah ek Hindu khandan ne le li, is Hindu khandan ko Hindu Shahi kaha jata tha. Mulk ke bishtar shumal mashriqi aur junoobi ilaqon par Budh saqafat ka ghalba raha. Eesawi tak yeh ilaqa waqtan fawaqtan yunani'ion, Scythion, Hunon, Mangolon, Sasanion aur Iraniyon ke paas raha. Jis ke baad is ilaqay ko Musalmanon ne fateh kar liya. Musalmanon ki is fateh ko tareekh mein Arabon ki fateh samjha jata hai jo ghalat hai kyunke Musalmanon mein kayi aqwam ke log shamil the. Islam se pehle yahan ke log Budh mat aur kuch qabayli mazahib ke pairaukar the. Islami Daur Ahmed Shah Durrani (Abdali) Tak mein Musalmanon ne is ilaqay ko fateh kiya magar yahan ke hukmaran ilaqayi logon hi ko banaya. Pehle yeh hukmarani Khorasani Arabon ke paas rahi. Hazrat Usman Razi Allah Ta'ala Anho ke daur-e-khilafat mein, Eesawi mein, Islami faujen Herat aur Zaranj mein Islam laayin aur Islam mashriq ki taraf phailna shuru hua. Muqami bashindon ne Islam qabool kar liya jabke kuch ilaqon ne baghawat ki. Zunbil aur Kabul Shahi ko pehli baar Eesawi mein Zaranj ke Saffari Musalmanon ne fateh kiya. Baad mein, Samanion ne Hindu Kush ke junoob mein apna Islami asar-o-rasookh barhaya. Ghaznavion ne Sadi mein iqtidaar hasil kiya. Sadi tak, Ghazni ke Mahmud ne baqiya Hindu hukmaranon ko shikast di aur Kafiristan ko chhorr kar wusat ilaqe ko moassar tareeqay se Islami banaya. Mahmud ne Ghazni ko ek ahem shehar banaya aur muarrikh Al-Biruni aur shair Firdousi jaise danishwaron ki sarparasti ki. Ghaznavi khandan ko mein Ghaurion ne khatam kar diya, jin ki taameerati kamyabiyon mein Jam ka Minaar shamil tha. Ghaurion ne mein Khwarazm Shahi khandan ki fateh pehle ek sadi se bhi kam arse mein Afghanistan ko control kiya. mein Mahmud Ghaznavi ne un se iqtidaar chheen liya. Ghaurion ne mein Ghaznavion ko shikast di. Aur unhein Ghazni ke ilaqay tak mehdood kar diya. Yeh sab Musalman the magar mein Changiz Khani Mangolon ne Afghanistan ko taraj kar diya. Herat, Ghazni aur Balkh mukammal taur par tabah ho gaye. Mangol baad mein khud Musalman ho gaye hatta ke Taimur ne Sadi mein ek azeem saltanat qaim kar li. Isi ki aulad se Shehanshah Babar ne Kabul ko Sadi ke shuru mein pehli dafa apna dar-ul-hukumat qarar diya. Sadi se Sadi tak Afghanistan kayi hisson mein taqseem raha. Shumali hissa par Uzbek, maghribi hisse (Herat samait) par Irani Safavion aur mashriqi hissa par Mughal aur Pashtoon qabiz rahe. mein Pashtoonon ne Mirwais Khan Hotak ki qiyadat mein Safavion ke khilaf jang lari aur se tak Afghanistan balki Irani shehar Isfahan par bhi qabza kar liya. mein Irani badshah Nader Shah ne unhein wapas dhakela aur un ke qabze se tamam ilaqay chhuraye hatta ke mein Kandahar aur Ghazni par bhi qabza kar liya. Jo tak jari raha. Pashtoonon aur Farsi bolne walon ki yeh kashmakash aaj bhi jari hai halanke donon Musalman hain.
Durrani Saltanat Ahmed Shah Durrani ko baja taur par Afghanistan ka bani kaha ja sakta hai. Ahmed Shah Durrani ko Ahmed Shah Abdali ke naam se bhi yaad kiya jata hai. June 1747 mein Nader Shah qatal ho gaya jis ke baad Loya Jirga ne Abdali qabile ke Ahmed Shah Durrani ko sarbarah chun liya. Pehle Kandahar mein apni hukoomat qaim karne ke baad Ahmed Shah Durrani ne tamam tar quwat Afghanistan ko ek mulk banane par sarf ki. Durrani Saltanat mein maujooda Iran, Afghanistan, Pakistan aur Bharat ke kuch ilaqay shamil the. Is ki saltanat mein Iran ke shehar Mashhad se le kar Kashmir aur maujooda Bharat ke shehar Delhi tak ke ilaqay shamil the. Ahmed Shah Durrani ka ek ahem kaarnama January 1761 mein Panipat ki teesri jang mein Marhaton ko shikast dena tha. Lekin is jang ke baad Sikhs ne Punjab mein asar barhana shuru kiya aur ahista ahista Punjab ke kayi ilaqon par qabza kar liya. Lekin is waqt tak Afghanistan ko ek mazboot mulk ki haisiyat hasil ho gayi thi. 1772 tak Ahmed Shah Durrani aur us ke baad us ki aulad ki hukoomat rahi. Is ki aulad mein Ayub Shah ko 1823 mein qatal kar diya gaya. Baad mein Kabul ki hukoomat Muhammad Shah aur phir 1826 mein Dost Muhammad Khan ke paas chali gayi. Amir Dost Muhammad Khan, jis ne Kabul ki hukoomat 1826 mein sambhal li thi, ne Russia aur Iran se talluqat barhana shuru kiye kyunke Sikhs ne Punjab par qabza kar liya tha aur Angrezon ne apni riwayati chalaki ka saboot dete hue Sikhs aur Delhi ke Shah Shuja ke saath mil kar Afghanistan mein apna asar barhana shuru kiya halanke donon Angrezon ke bazahir dushman the. Shah Shuja ko Angrezon ne Kabul ke takht ke sabz bagh dikhaye. Is zamane mein Russia aur Bartanvi Hind mein kayi hazar meel ka fasla tha aur wast-e-Asia ke shehron Merv, Khiva, Bukhara aur Tashkent ko maghrib mein zyada log nahi jante the magar Angrez yeh jante the ke Roosi un par qabza karna chahte hain. Un ko rokne aur Afghanistan mein apna asar barhane ke liye Angrezon ki makarana jad-o-jehad ko Azeem Chalbazi ke naam se yaad kiya jata hai. Is silsile mein Angrezon ne do jangen lareen. Pehli jang (1839-1842) ke dauran mein us waqt hui jab Iraniyon ne Herat ke logon ke saath mil kar Angrezon aur Roosion ko Afghanistan se be dakhal karne ke liye apni afwaj poore mulk mein rawana kein. Angrezon ne Kabul par qabza karke Dost Muhammad Khan ko arrest kar liya. Afghaniyon ne Bartanvi fauj ke ek hisse ko mukammal taur par qatal kar diya jo solah hazar afraad par mushtamil tha. Sirf ek shakhs zinda bacha. Angrez muddaton apne zakham chaat te rahe. Isi wajah se majbooran Angrezon ne Dost Muhammad Khan ko reha kar diya. Baad mein Dost Muhammad Khan ne Herat ko bhi fateh kar liya. Doosri jang (1878-1880) us waqt hui jab Amir Sher Ali ne Bartanvi safartukaron ko Kabul mein rehne ki ijazat na di. Is jang ke baad Angrezon ke eema par 1880 mein Amir Abdul Rahman ne Afghanistan ka iqtidaar hasil kiya magar amalan Kabul ke khariji mamlaat Angrezon ke hath mein chale gaye.
Daryaa-e-Sindh Janubi Asia ka sab se bara darya jo duniya ke bare daryaaon mein se ek hai. Is ki lambai 2000 hazar meel ya 3200 kilometer hai. Is ka majmooi nakaasi aab ka ilaqa 450,000 murabba meel ya 1,165,000 murabba kilometer hai. Jis mein se yeh pahari ilaqa (Karakoram, Himalaya aur Hindu Kush) mein 175,000 murabba meel ya 453,000 murabba kilometer behta hai aur baqi Pakistan ke maidano mein behta hai. Cheeni ilaqay Tibet mein Himalaya ka ek ziili pahari silsila Kailash hai. Kailash ke beechon beech Kailash naam ka ek pahar bhi hai jis ke kinare par jheel Mansarovar hai. Jise daryaa-e-Sindh ka manba mana jata hai. Is jheel mein se daryaa-e-Sindh samet bar-e-sageer mein behne wale 4 aham darya nikalte hain. Satlaj haathi ke munh se nikal kar maghribi simt mein behta hai. Ganga mor ki chonch se nikal kar janubi simt mein behta hai. Brahmaputra ghode ke munh se nikal kar mashriqi simt mein behta hai. Aur daryaa-e-Sindh sher ke munh se nikal kar shumali simt mein behta hai. Ek zamane tak daryaa-e-Sindh ki tehqeeq jheel Mansarovar tak hi samjhi jaati rahi. Hatta ke 1811 mein William Moorcroft ne us ilaqa mein ja kar bataya ke Sindh ka nuqta aaghaz jheel Mansarovar nahi balkay jheel mein junoob se aa kar milne wali nadiyaan hain. Isi nazariye par mazeed tehqeeq karte hue Sven Hedin 1907 mein jheel se 40 kilometer upar Sangi Kebab ya Singge Kebab ke ilaqay mein ja pahuncha. Jahan behne wali nadi Gartang ya Gartang hi jheel Mansarovar ko pani muhayya karti hai. Is liye Gartang nadi daryaa-e-Sindh ka nuqta aaghaz hai. Sangi Kebab ka matlab hai sher ke munh wala. Isi munasibat se daryaa-e-Sindh ko sher darya kaha jata hai. Gartang nadi shumal maghribi simt se aakar jheel Mansarovar mein milti hai. Yahan se darya Ladakh ki simt apna safar shuru karta hai. Darya ke shumal mein Karakoram aur junoob mein Himalaya ke silaslay hain. Wadi Nubra ke maqam par Siachen Glacier ke paniyon se banne wala darya Nubra is mein aa kar milta hai. Yahan tak darya ki lambai taqreeban 450 kilometer hai. Phir daryaa-e-Sindh Pakistani ilaqay Baltistan mein dakhil hojata hai. Daryaa-e-Sindh Pakistan mein dakhil hote hi sab se pehle daryaa-e-Shyok is mein aa kar milta hai phir 30 kilometer mazeed aage ja kar Skardu shahar ke qareeb daryaa-e-Shigar is mein aa girta hai. Mazeed aage ja kar Hindu Kush ke saaye mein daryaa-e-Gilgit is mein milta hai aur phir Nanga Parbat se aane wala Astore darya milta hai. Oonche pahadiyon se jese hi daryaa-e-Sindh nasheebi ilaqa mein dakhil hota hai. Tarbela ke maqam par ek bohat bari deewar bana kar ise dam mein tabdeel kar diya gaya hai. Yeh hai Tarbela Dam. Thoda sa aage ja kar Jarnaili Sadak ke paas Attock ke maqam par daryaa-e-Kabul is mein aa milta hai. Daryaa-e-Sindh ka safar Pothohari pahari ilaqay se chalta hua Kala Bagh tak jata hai. Kala Bagh woh maqam hai jahan se daryaa-e-Sindh ka pahari safar khatam hokar maidani safar shuru hota hai. Kala Bagh ke hi maqam par daryaa-e-Swaan Sindh mein milta hai. Thoda sa aage maghribi simt se aane wala Kurram darya is mein shamil hota hai. Mazeed aage ja kar Koh-e-Sulaiman se aane wala Gomal darya daryaa-e-Sindh mein shamil hota hai. Muzaffargarh se thoda aage ja kar Panjnad ka maqam aata hai jahan Punjab ke paanchon darya Jhelum, Chenab, Ravi, Satlaj, Beas aapas mein mil kar daryaa-e-Sindh mein sama jaate hain. Guddu se Sindh janubi simt mein behta hai. Sukkur shahar ke beech se aur Larkana aur Mohenjo-daro ke mashriq se guzarta hua Sehwan ki pahadiyon tak aata hai. Hyderabad ke pehlu se guzar kar Thatta ke mashriq se guzar kar Keti Bandar mein chhoti chhoti bohat saari shakho mein taqseem ho kar Bahira Arab mein shamil hojata hai. Is darya ko yeh aezaz bhi hasil hai ke is ke naam par Sindh aur Hindustan ya ka naam India pukara gaya hai. Khyber Pakhtunkhwa mein is darya ko Abaseen yaani daryaaon ka baap kehte hain jo zila Swabi ke tehsil Chota Lahore ke ek gaon Hund se guzra hai. Isi darya ke kinare Aryon ne apni muqaddas kitab Rigveda likhi thi. Rigveda mein is darya ki tareef mein bohat saare ashloq hain. Yeh bar-e-sageer ka wahid darya hai jis ki Hindu pooja karte hain aur yeh Odeyro Lal aur Jhuley Lal bhi kehlata hai. Is darya ke kinare duniya ki ek qadeem tareen tehzeebon mein se ek munfarid tehzeeb ne janam liya tha. Qadeem zamane mein is darya ko uboor karne baad hi wasat Asia se bar-e-sageer mein dakhil ho sakte thay. Yeh darya apni tund khooi aur khud sari ki wajah se bhi ise sher darya bhi kaha jata hai. Yeh darya jo Kailash ke qareeb se nikalta hai aur atharah sau meel ka safar tay karke Bahira Arab mein girta hai. Hinduon aur Budhhon ka Koh Kailash Koh Meru Brahma ka nagar hai aur jin devtaon Agni, Vayu aur Indra ko woh poojte hain un ka asal maskan yahin hai. Is ilaqa ko jheelon ki wadi bhi kaha jata hai. Kyun ke yahan do bari jheelein waqe hain. Jin mein Manasarovar ko muqaddas aur Rakshastal ko manhoos khayal kiya jata hai. Tibtion ka kehna tha ke is jheel se daryaa-e-Sindh aur teen aur darya Brahmaputra, Karnali (Ganga ka ek bara muawin darya) aur Satlaj bhi nikalte hain. Hinduon aur Budhhon ka bhi yehi kehna tha aur un ki mazhabi tasweeron mein is jheel mein in charon daryaaon ko char janwaron ke munh se nikalte dikhaya gaya tha. Mashriq mein se Brahmaputra ghode ke munh se, Karnali ko junoob mein mor ke munh se, Satlaj maghribi janib se haathi ke munh se aur daryaa-e-Sindh shumal mein Babbar Sher ya Singge Kebab se nikal raha hai. Is liye yeh darya Tibet mein Singge Kebab yaani Sher Darya kehlata hai. European geography daan tibtion ki is riwayat ko shak ki nigah se dekhte thay ke jheel Mansarovar char bare daryaaon ka manba hai. Un ka khayal tha ke daryaa-e-Sindh ka manba Kailash ke pahari ilaqay mein hai. Chunanche jab 1858 mein jab bar-e-sageer ke shumal maghrib ke ilaqay mein railway line tayar ki jarahi thi to is ke liye jo naqsha tayar hua us mein daryaa-e-Sindh ko Koh Kailash se nikalte hue dikhaya gaya tha. Baharhal unnisween sadi ki ibteda tak is ka manba makhfi raha aur sathe murtafa ke pecheeda aur vasee ilaqay ki wadiyon aur chotiyon ki nishandahi mehaz andaze se hoti rahi. Unnisween sadi ke aakhir tak kai Europeans ne jheel Mansarovar ka safar kiya aur daryaa-e-Sindh ke manba ko talash karne ki koshish ki. Un ki nakami ki sab se bari wajah yeh thi ke Tibbati ahkam kisi European ko is jheel ka survey nahi karne dete thay. Phir bhi bohat se Europeans bhes badal kar wahan pahunch gaye aur unnisween sadi ke ikhtetam tak Satlaj (Haathi Darya) aur Karnali (Mor Darya) ke manba talash kar liye gaye. Yeh pandrah meel door junoob maghrib ki taraf Shaitani ya Rakshas Jheel se nikalte hain jo ek jhooti si nadi ke zariye Mansarovar Jheel se munsalik hai. Magar Ghoda Darya aur Sher Babbar Darya (Brahmaputra aur Sindh) ke manba ka ab tak pata nahi chala tha aur unhein un ke durust manba ka abhi tak pata nahi tha. Yeh aezaz ek Swedish sayyah Sven Hedin ko mila. Woh is se pehle Mansarovar se saat meel mashriq ki janib Brahmaputra ki ibtedai nadi daryaft kar chuka tha. Woh Singge Kebab yaani Sher Darya ke dehane ki talash mein 1907 mein dobara Mansarovar Jheel pahuncha aur woh is nateeje par pahuncha ke daryaa-e-Sindh ka manba jheel ke kahin shumal ki janib hai aur Brahmaputra Rakshtal se nikalta hai. Is liye Hedin shumal maghrib ki taraf jana chahta tha. Use Tibbati afsar ne bohat israar par ijazat di. Baalakhir Hedin chand charwaho ki madad se Singge Kebab pahuncha. Woh pehla sufaid aadmi tha jis ne Sindh aur Brahmaputra ke manba ke maqam tak pahunch saka. Lekin haqeeqat yeh hai is darya ke kai munh hain aur is mein se kis ko daryaa-e-Sindh ka manba mana jaaye. Lekin chunkay riwayat Singge Kebab ke haq mein is liye use daryaa-e-Sindh ka manba tasleem kiya jata hai. Agarche Singge Kebab jheel Mansarovar se sirf tees meel door hai. Lekin Tibbati ahkam ko yaqeen tha ke daryaa-e-Sindh jheel Mansarovar se nikalta hai. Kyun ke ek bara taqatwar darya ko isi muqaddas jheel se nikalna chahiye. Agarche yeh charon darya is jheel se nahi nikalte hain magar is jheel se zyada fasle par nahi nikalte hain. Is tarah yeh riwayat bohat zyada ghalat bhi nahi thin aur hum yeh keh sakte hain ke yeh darya ek hi maqam se phoot kar mukhtalif simto mein rukh karte hain. Tibet mein daryaa-e-Sindh wahan se apne sath mukhtalif nadi naloon ka pani leta hua aage barhta hai jahan bhoore teele aur barf se dhakay sufaid pahar aasmanon ko chhu rahe hain aur darmiyan mein daryaa-e-Sindh neele aur uthale phailao ke sath behta hai. Is ka ek dhara jo janubi sarchashma hai aur Kailash ke nasheeb ke kinare se hoti hui Gartang aur Gyatima ke samne se guzarti hai aur doosri yaani shumali shakh jo Kailash silsile ke shumal mein se nikalti hai aur behti hui janubi shakh ke sath mil kar aur Gilgit ke qareeb se guzarti hai. Yahan daryaa-e-Sindh ka pehla muawin darya Gartang milta hai. Gartang darya Sindh ke barabar hi hai aur ek khuli wadi jagah behta hua aata hai. Jis ke kinare maghribi Tibet ke suba Gartang ka darul hukoomat Gartang waqe hai. Jab ke daryaa-e-Sindh apne manba ki wajah se pahadon mein chakkar lagane par majboor hai. Yahan donon darya mil kar Gartang aur Sindh mein irtisal ke baad daryaa-e-Sindh das hazar feet ki bulandi par behta hai aur safar karta hua rawan dawan hojata hai. Yahan is pas manzar mein pahadon ki sufaid chotiya sar nikale khadi hui hain. Yahan darya Sindh ka rukh aahista aahista shumal maghrib ki taraf se Ladakh ka rukh karta hai. Yahan Tashi Gang jo Tibet ka aakhri gaon hai. Yahan pehle pathrele rasta par duaiya jhande aur maqbare bane hue thay. Be tarashida pathar aur lakdi ke shahteeron ke bane makanat daryaa-e-Sindh ke sath bani ek khanqah ke pas manzar mein dab jate hain aur dekhne walon ko sirf yeh khanqah hi nazar aati hai. Is ki raah mein aise gaon kam hain jo sara saal abad rehte hain. Yeh ek doosre se paanch meel se pachees meel ke fasle par waqe hain. Yeh ghair tarashe pathron aur lakdiyon ki madad se bane hue yeh dehat umooman daryaa-e-Sindh ki muawin nadiyon ke kinare zameen ke chhote chhote qabil-e-kasht tukron par abad hain. Singge Kebab (Daryaa-e-Sindh) chal kar sathe murtafa Tibet ke maghrib mein waqe buland o bala wadiyon mein safar karta hua shumal maghrib phir maghrib ka rukh karta hai aur is naqshe mein dekhein to is ki shakal wahan daranti ka tarah ya hilal ki shakal banata hai. Lehaza is darya ka ibtedai safar maghribi Tibet mein hota hai. Daryaa-e-Sindh maghribi Tibet ko charagahin muhayya karta hua Kashmir ka rukh karta hai. Yeh maidano se shuru hokar chattano se guzar kar darya Sindh ke kinare kinare upar ki simt jaraha hota hai. Jis ke ek taraf buland o bala pahadon ki deewarein aur doosri simt mein daryaa-e-Sindh ki taraf jaati hui umoodi khayian aur phisalte hue barf ke tode aur mitti ki chattain yaani mustaqil khatra mandla raha hota hai. Karoron saal pehle yahan thain thain marta samandar tha. Yahan samandari janwaron aur nabatat ke fossils zameen upar aur neeche donon taraf paaye gaye. Jo nishandahi karte hain ke yahan ki zameen kai martaba zer-e-aab hui aur buland hui. Maujooda pahari silsile koi ek hazar million saal pehle wujood mein aaye. Arziati tabdiliyon ke natije mein wasat Asia ki sathe murtafa junoob ki janib bar-e-sageer ki taraf dhakelna shuru hui. Ek thos gehri jarhon wali chattan jo shayad duniya ki sab se qadeem chattan thi bar-e-sageer ke neeche dabi rahi. Lakhon saal tak shumal ki janib ek naqabil-e-muzahemat quwat is mein musalsal rukawat par dabao dalti rahi aur aahista aahista un ke darmiyan mein zameen ki satah buland hona shuru hui aur is tarah Karakoram aur Himalaya ke silsile wujood mein aaye aur samandar bar-e-sageer ke shumal mein darya ke pahunchne ka rasta banate hue mashriq o maghrib ki taraf beh gaya. Junoob ki simt mein dabao musalsal jari raha aur taqreeban paanch lakh saal pehle silsila Himalaya aur Karakoram ke darmiyan mein Kailash ka pahari silsila ubharna shuru hua. Jis ne pehlo se nikalne wale aabi raston ko rok kar junoob aur mashriq ki janib Ganga aur Brahmaputra aur shumal o maghrib ki taraf Sindh aur Satlaj do alag alag daryai nizamoon ko janam diya. Sindh aur Ganga ke manba sirf saath meel ke fasle par hain aur donon darya mukhalif simto mein behte hue do mukhtalif samandaron mein girte hain jin se darmiyan mein bar-e-sageer ki sarzameen ko musallas ban jati hai. Yeh saboot hai ke yahan kabhi samandar tha. Wasat Asia ki satah ab bhi ubhar rahi hai aur woh pahar jinhon ne daryaa-e-Sindh ko gher rakha hai ab bhi aahista aahista buland ho rahe hain aur junoob ki taraf khisak rahe hain. Yehi wajah hai yahan zalzale aksar aur land sliding hoti rehti hai. Yahan daryaa-e-Sindh ki wadi mein salana teen inch se bhi kam barish hoti hai. Yahan pahar banjar aur kuch khule maidan rait se bhare hain aur hawa khushk aur gard alooda hai. Barf bari chhote daane chanon ki tarah hoti hai. Satah ki chattain tooti phooti aur dara dene wali hain. Zameen ki satah raitli hai ya dheelon ki surat mein hai jis ki mitti mein sangreze hain. Kattao ke amal mein daryaa-e-Sindh aur muawin nadiyon ne aise nishanat chhore hain jin se andaza hota hai ke woh kisi waqt buland satah par behte thay. Un ki guzar gahen pani se gol hui chatanon aur patharon par mushtamil hain. Yeh purane glacier ki baqiyat bhi ho sakti hai ya garmiyon ke pani ke tez railo mein yeh pathar ludhak ludhak kar gol ho gaye hain. Sardiyon aur garmiyon ke darja hararat ke bohat zyada farq ne zameen ki satah ko kamzor kar diya hai. Jis ki wajah se zameen ke tukron, garon aur chatano ka phisalna aam baat hai. Buland o bala ghattiyon mein glacier daryaa-e-Sindh aur is ke muawin daryaaon mein glacier ke bare bare tukre shamil kar dete hain. Baaz auqat koi glacier aage aakar darya ko mahino ke liye rok leta hai aur jab darya ka pani use todta hai to yeh samandari toofan ki tarah uchhalta chalta hai aur raste mein aane wali har cheez, dehaton faslon aur darakhton ko maliamet kar deta hai. Tang aur pathreeli deewaron ke darmiyan mein daryaa-e-Sindh zyada tar dhalaan wali chatano mein phansa hua behta hai. Yahan ke manazir purhaibat aur purshukoh hain. Azeem ush shan ghattiyon ka is qadar lamba silsila kurra arz par kahin aur nahi paya jata hai. Tang rasta par ek simt mein buland o bala umoodi chatanein aur ek taraf umoodi gehrai mein jhag udata behta hua darya. Yahan door door tak koi jhar jhankaar nazar nahi aata hai. Is ke azeem ush shan pahar umoodi chatano ke silsile, pathreeli chatanein aur tang ghatiyaan, ki buland o bala chatano se guzarne walon ko darya is waqar aur azmat ke sath behta nazar aata hai jis mein sadiyon se koi tabdeeli nahi aayi hai. Ladakh ki sarhad ke qareeb pahar daryaa-e-Sindh ke qareeb aa jate hain aur shumal ka rukh karte hue is ki dhalaan mein tezi se izafa shuru hojata hai. Darya in umoodi chatano ke darmiyan mein behta hua Himalaya aur Karakoram ke darmiyan mein se guzarta hai. Yahan azeem ush shan silsila Himalaya aur silsila Karakoram qareeb aa jate hain. Is ke is 350 meel ke safar mein is mein beshumar naale aur nadiyaan girte hain, naqsha mein is ki shakal aisi hoti hai ke daryaa-e-Sindh ki neeli lakeer mein beshumar dhaage shamil ho rahe hain. Jahan pehlu mein chalne wale pahar aahista aahista darre ki shakal ikhtiyar kar lete hain aur Sindh ki wadiyon aur is ki nadiyon ke sath shumal maghrib ki taraf jane wale karwanon ke shahrahin thin. In shahraahon mein kuch shumal mein wasat Asia aur Hindustan ki janib jati hain. Tajir khachcharon par safar karte thay aur un ka saman yaakon aur gadhon par bandha hota tha. Yahan daryaa-e-Sindh par koi pul nahi thay aur tund o tez lehron mein insan aur janwar tair kar ya chal kar paar karte thay. Gehre pani ki surat mein yaak aur tattoo qudrati tairak hain tair kar aur insan un ki dum pakad kar darya ko paar karte thay. Bakriyaan tair nahi sakti hain albattah bheedein lehron ke mutabiq tirche rukh se darya ko paar kar leti thin. Sardiyon mein is wadi mein barf bari hone se darya jam jata hai. Lekin barf ke neeche pani rawan balkay tezi se beh raha hota hai. Is liye jame hue darya ko ehtiyat se paar kiya jata hai. Tang ghattiyon se barf ke tode dandnate hue aate hain aur nokeeli chatano se takra kar un ke bare bare barf ke tukre udate hue door ja kar girte hain. Jin mein aksar pathar ke chhote aur bare tukre phanse hote hain. Garmiyon mein jab pahadon par barf aur glacier pighalna shuru hote hain to darya ke behte hue pani mein izafa ke sath is ke shor barh jata hai. Wahan nangi chatanein suraj ki garmi ko jazb kar ke bhatti ban jati hain. Lekin jahan dhoop nahi pahunchti hai wahan shadeed thandi rehti hai aur bohat si nadiyaan sirf chand ghanton ke liye pighalti hain. Wahan koi bhi shakhs jo nange sar dhoop mein ho aur is ke pair saaye mein woh ba yak waqt heatstroke aur frostbite ka shikar ho sakta hai. Yahan har mausam mein wadiyon ke kuch hissa mein tez hawaein chalti hain. Jo rait ke girdab ko upar uthati hain. Yahan kahin kahin darya aur muawin nadiyon mein khet aur darakht milte hain. Daryaa-e-Sindh ke kinare pahar taqreeban har das meel ke fasle par ek tang ghati ki surat mein phat jati hain. Jahan garmiyon mein pani ke dhare mein sailabi mitti ka reela pahadon se pighli barf apne sath bahakar laate hain. Yahan chhote chhote gaon hain. Jin ke samne seedhiyon ki tarah bane dhalaan kheton mein kisan hawa ke sath udne wali mitti ki kami poora karne ke liye tokriyaan bhar kar bari mehnat se daal rahe hote hain. Unhein apni in mukhtasar si zameeno ko qaim karne ke liye musalsal mehnat karni padti hai. Yahan janwaron ka fazla jalane ke liye aur insani fazla khad mein istemal hota hai. Is wadi mein kheton ke ilawa jo dehatiyon ne sakht mehnat se bana rakhe hain aur kisi qisam ki nabatat dekhne mein nahi aati hai. Darya ke sath sath pagdandiyan jati hui nazar aati thin. Jo aam taur par darya se bohat buland hoti thin. Lekin baaz maqamat par is ke sath chalti thin aur baaz maqamat par bal khati hui is se door nikal jati thin. Kyun ke yahan ki dhalaanein is qadar khatarnak hain ke is par bakriyaan bhi nahi chal sakti hain. Sainkron salon se shumali Hindustan Koh Hindu Kush se Brahmaputra jane ke liye pahadon mein guzarne wale tajir aur mazhabi zaireen isi raste ko istemal karte rahe hain. Daryaa-e-Sindh ke sath sath dehat aur Budhho ki khanqahain un guzarne walon ko qiyam gahen aur tijarati marakiz ka kaam bhi karti thin. Yeh khanqahain dushwar guzar chatano ya daryaa-e-Sindh ke andar teelon par waqe thin. Yahan mukhtalif ilaqon se aane wale raste daryaa-e-Sindh ke sath chalne wale raston se mil jate thay. Is tarah wasat Asia aur junoob se aane walon ko rasta muhayya karte thay. Yeh pagdandiyan aur raste mukhtalif ilaqon aur aqwam se taalluq rakhne wale tajir aur mazhabi zaireen ki guzar gahen thin. Jin ki wajah se in raston par waqe qasbon aur dehaton mein raunaq thi. Yeh raste Karakoram aur Himalaya ke upar jin darron se guzarne hain un mein chand ek bohat hi khatarnak hain aur saal mein bohat kam arse ke liye khulte hain. Lekin mushkilat ke bawajood yeh darre kabhi band nahi hote thay. Shummal mein Karakoram daryaa-e-Sindh ko wasat Asia se juda karta hai. In pahadon mein bazaahir koi rasta nahi tha. Lekin yahan se kasturi, resham aur doosri tijarati ashiya aati thin. Yahan koi aisa darra nahi hai aur jo kam dushwar ho aur raste bhi aksar mukhtalif jangon aur dushmaniyon ki wajah se band rehte thay. Is liye aksar qaflon ko zyada dushwar raste istemal karne padte thay. Is ke ilawa kai aise raste hain jo istemal hote rahe magar woh pichhle do sau saal mein glacier ki zad mein aakar naqabil-e-istemal ho gaye hain. Shummal ki janib jane wala sab se aham rasta Karakoram Route Ladakh se bal khata hua pahadon ke silsile par charh jata hai aur phir neeche aakar daryaa-e-Shyok ke ek kham ko paar karne ke liye khatarnak dhalaan ki surat mein neeche utarta hai aur phir ek doosre pahari silsile par charh jata aur phir neeche aakar daryaa-e-Shyok ki ek muawin nadi ko paar karta hua wasat Asia mein dakhil hota hai. Yahan gyarah darre hain aur jo atharah hazar feet tak buland hain. Bar-e-sageer aur China ke darmiyan mein Darra Karakoram unnis hazar feet buland hai aur use sirf garmiyon mein paar kiya ja sakta. Yahan chand mah ke liye barf pighalti hai aur neeche se kaali rait aur kankaron ka ek raigistan nikal aata hai. Yeh bohat be raham rasta hai. Is rasta par kisi qisam ki nabatat nahi ugti hai. Yahan char buland darre hain, magar un ke zariye jo fasla tay karna hota hai woh Karakoram ke rasta se zyada hai istemal karte thay lehaza balai Sindh ki wadi se shumal ko jane ke liye Karakoram Route hamesha aham rasta raha tha. Janubi aur daryaa-e-Sindh ke baayen janib jane wali deewar Himalaya Karakoram ki nisbat zyada door hai aur is mein qadar asan darre maujood hain. In mein sab se aham Darra Zoji La hai jahan Kashmir ke rasta bar-e-sageer tak rasai ho sakti hai. Is ki oonchai gyarah hazar feet buland hai aur saal ke aath mahine khula rehta hai. Ladakh ke paas daryaa-e-Sindh ke basiyon ki zindagi bohat sakht hai. Yahan ki ausat oonchai das hazar feet se zyada hai. Bulandi ki is lateef hawa se hum aahang hone ke liye Ladakhi bashindon ke phepharon ki kaar kargi aam logon se zyada hai. Yahan rehne wale ya to rewadon ki dekh bhal karte thay ya makai ke chhote chhote khet ki parwakht karte aur guzarne wale tajiron se ashiya ka tabadla karte thay. Kuch naujawan zahrani ka pesha bhi apna rakha tha. Jo tajiron ko aur musafiron ko loota karte thay. Ladakh ka darul hukoomat Leh hazaron saal se tijarati jaal ka markaz raha hai. Yeh shahar daryaa-e-Sindh ke shumali kinare par gyarah hazar feet bulandi par abad hai. Yeh shahar banjar pahadon ke neeche sailabi mitti ke bare se taas jo char meel tak phaila hua hai ke kinare abad hai. Leh ke sath daryaa-e-Sindh aur qadeem tijarati aur mazhabi rawabit ka aisa taalluq hai ke aksar use chhota Tibet kaha jata hai. Yeh ilaqa pathreela aur banjar aur shadeed toofano, chatano ke phisalne aur glacier ke tootne se sailaabon jaisi qudrati aafat ka shikar rehta hai. Yeh sakht mehnat se hasil ki gai apni zameeno par zarai paidawar ke ilawa Ladakh ki maeeshat ka inhasar daryaa-e-Sindh aur is se munsalik tijarati raston par tha. Darra Karakoram aur Zoji La jo Sindh se bal-tarteeb shumal aur junoob ki janib wale raste hain Leh ke qareeb waqe hain. Leh ke bazaron mein tang aur andheri dukano ke samne wasat Asia se aane wale pashm aur namdon ke dher lage hote thay. Dukano ke peeche andhere kamron mein sona chandi aur kinari chamak raha hota tha. Turkestan se aane wale chhote chhote tattoo tez chalne wale, sust gaam hilali seengon wale yaak paas guzar rahe hote thay. Sufaid rangat wale Yarqandi, pashm ke dheele dhale libaas pehne Tibbati neeche ki janib latakti moonchon wale Mangol, saaf suthre libason mein Hindustani kandhon se kandhe ragadte hue chaudi chaudi seedhiyon wali galiyon mein aa ja rahe hote thay aur mili juli zubano mein baat cheet kar rahe hote thay. Jab ke Leh ke bashinde karam gustarana nigahon se is hujoom ka jaiza lete rehte thay ke in ajnabiyon ki wajah se is buland o bala pahadon mein waqe is shahar mein un ko rozgar ke mawqe mil rahe hain. Kabhi kabhar ek doosre ko dhakke dete hue hujoom mein jahan ikhtelaf mamooli baat samjhi jati hai ek shakhs numayan nazar aata hai jis ne un jaisa libaas pehen rakha ho ek maghribi bashinda aan pahunchta tha. Unnisween sadi mein European bashinde Leh mein ek do hafta thehrte aur apni muhimmo ke liye quli, yaak aur camping ka saman khareedte aur aage barh jate thay. Woh sab daryaa-e-Sindh ki wadi aur us ke biyaban ke sehar mein mubtala rehte thay. Un mein sayyah, surveyor aur jasus bhi hote thay. Kuch un mein shohrat hasil karne aate thay. In logon par buland o bala wadi ka sehar taari rehta tha aur unhon ne bohat kam apni muhim ke bare mein duniya ko bataya hai. Magar kuch logon ne safar ke rongte khade hone wale waqeat, jazbat o khayalat bayan kiye hain. Ird gird ki taqaton ne pahari darron aur tijarati raston jo daryaa-e-Sindh aur us ki muawin nadiyon aur naloon ke sath sath chalte thay yahan ki wadiyon aur zameeno par qabza karna tha. Yeh khaufnak mushkilat mein ghire hue log do hazar saal se woh apne humsaya mulkon ki aisi jarhiyat ka shikar rahe hain jin mein un ka koi mafad wabasta nahi raha hai aur yeh jangein hamesha un ke nuqsan par khatam hoti thin. Dogra Maharaja Gulab Singh ne un par apni baladasti qaim karli. Bartanvi bar-e-sageer se rukhsat ho gaye ke baad Kashmir ka Raja Musalmanon ki aksariyat ke bawajood is ka faisla nahi kar saka. Is par Kashmir aur Gilgit mein azadi ki tehreek buland hui aur mujahideen barhte hue Gilgit aur Baltistan ko azad karke Ladakh ke qareeb pahunch gaye. Is par Bharat ne apni faujein Kashmir mein utar din aur Maharaja Kashmir se ilhaq ki darkhawast par dastakhat karwa liye aur 1947 bar-e-sageer ki taqseem ke sath hi Leh par Hindustan ka qabza ho gaya aur maghrib mein is ke humsaya Baltistan ab Pakistan ka hissa hai. Sindh ke sath sath mashriq se maghrib ki taraf jane wala sadiyon purana rasta band ho chuka hai. Daryaa-e-Sindh ki wadi mein Leh ke fauran baad daryaa-e-Sindh fire bandi line ko uboor karta hua Pakistan ke ilaqa Baltistan mein dakhil hojata hai. Pakistani ilaqay mein dakhil hone se pehle Kargil ka ilaqa hai. Yahan bhi darya banjar aur umoodi khayiyon mein neeche ki taraf tezi se safar karta hai. Tang ghattiyaan kahin kahin chhoti chhoti wadiyon mein tabdeel hojati hain. Jin mein thodi bohat kheti bari nazar aati hai. Batadreej donon taraf pahar buland hote hue darya ke qareeb aa jate hain. Karakoram ke junoob mein Ladakh ka dhalaani aur tang pahari silsila darya ke daayen kinare par sath chalta hai. Jis ke paar daryaa-e-Shyok Sindh ke mutawazi behta hua dedh sau meel ke baad Ladakh ka pahari silsila khatam hojata hai to daryaa-e-Sindh mein aan milta hai. Bees meel ke baad Skardu ke qareeb Karakoram ki bulandiyon se aane wala ek aur muawin darya Shigar bhi daryaa-e-Sindh mein shamil hojata hai. Shyok, Shigar aur beeson chhote chhote darya apni wadiyon mein rehne wale bashindon ke liye baqa ka saman muhayya karne ke sath sath unhein khatrat se bhi dochar karte rehte hain. Pahari dhalaanon mein se aksar glacier khatarnak janam lete hain. Jo tabahi barpa karte rehte hain aur woh zindagi aur amlaak ke liye almanak hadsaat ka sabab bante hain. Pahadon mein koi bhi dhalaan khai achanak gare aur chatano ki ek bari aur khaufnak miqdar ko neeche dhakel deti hai. Jo phisalte hue apne raste ki har shay ko maliamet kar deti hai. Kyun ke in pahadon par koi jhar jhankaar ya ghaas waghera nahi hai jo in ki mitti ko pakad sake aur barf ke pighalne ke sath mitti ke yeh azeem tode baghair kisi intibah ke naram hokar neeche ki janib phisalte hain. Kabhi kabhi yahan zalzale bhi aate hain magar tabah kun toofan yahan barpa hona mamool hain. Daryaa-e-Sindh ki buland o bala ghattiyon mein waqe glacier jo qutbi ke ilaqon ke baad sab se bare glacier shumar hote hain. Jo yahan ke daryaaon mein barf ke bare tukre shamil karte rehte hain. Baaz auqat koi glacier wadi ke farsh se pighal ke aage aata hai aur apne raste mein aane wale darya ko mahino ke liye rok leta hai. Baalakhir jab darya ka pani use todta hai to Khuda ki panah, yeh samandar ki azeem toofani lehar ki manind garajta hua chalta hai aur raste mein aane wali har rukawat dehaton, faslon aur darakhton ko maliamet safah-e-hasti se mita deta hai. Daryaa-e-Shyok tahat bohat khatarnak hai. Is ke balai hissa mein ek tang ghati mein do bare glacier waqe hain. Yeh glacier darya ke aage bar bar band bandh kar use rok dete hain. Jis ke natije mein sainkron feet chaudi aur kai meel lambi jheel ban jati hai. Jab yeh band toot ta hai to neeche ki janib waqe wadi barf ke todon se at jati hai jo makano se kahin zyada bare hote hain aur salon mein ja kar pighalte hain. Yahan ke baasi apne dehat pahadon ke pehluon mein bulandi par banate hain. Taake barf ke roke gaye pani ke in buland railo ki zad mein na aasakein. Jo chand salon baad ek martaba phir un ki wadiyon ko bahakar le jate hain. Yahan aka duka lakdi ki kashti bhi nazar aati hain. Jo purane tarz ki chapte pende aur oonche kinaron wali kashti hoti hain. Lekin darya par safar karne ka riwayati tareeqa safar karne ka jo ab sadak ki tameer ke baad matrook ho chuka hai. Is mein bakri ki bohat si khalon ko hawa bhar kar ek sath bandh diya jata tha aur un ki tangein upar rakhi jati thin. Danddon ko bandh kar ek choobi jaal upar bandh diya jata tha. Is par bohat se aadmi hathon mein lambe lambe dandde le kar upar baith jate thay. Is par Skardu jane wali sabziyan aur phal laad diye jate thay. Bakriyon ki khaal mein se hawa nikalti rehti thi. Is liye tango ke zariye musalsal un mein hawa bhari jati thi. Darya ka bahao bohat tez hota tha aur danddon aur chapuon ke madad se use bar bar rokna padta tha. Safar ke ikhtetam par is mein se hawa nikal kar use khushki ke raste wapas laate thay. Lakdiyon ki kashtiyon ko bhi wapsi ke liye raitile kinare par kheencha kar le jana padta tha. Sadkein tameer ke baad ab yeh saare khatrat khatam ho chuke hain. Skardu ke maqam par wadi Sindh ek baizvi pyale ki manind hai jo sathe samandar se saade saat hazar feet buland bees meel lambi aur aath meel chaudi hai. Is ke charon taraf arghawani, surkh, bhoore aur badami rang ke pathrele pahar jo satrah hazar feet buland hain ghera dale hue khade hain. Wadi mein peele rang ki rait bichi hui hai. Jis mein sardiyon mein sabz aur garmiyon mein dhundlai hui chandi jaisa matiyale rang ka darya Sindh kisi saamp ki tarah bal khata hua sust kharami ke sath hawa ki wajah se lehron ki surat mein bikhri hui rait mein behta hua darya apne raste mein khadi tanha aur azeem chattan ke paas guzarta hai. Jis par Qila Skandar khada hua hai. Lakhon salon se darya chatano mein apna rasta banate hue aur unhein kaat ta hua gehrai mein ja pahunchta hai. Mukhtalif bulandiyon par behte hue darya ne is wadi ke kinare par khadi chatano mein jo kaat chhaant ki hai woh aaj bhi mukhtalif bulandiyon par kahin se aage jhuki hui aur kahin chabootre ki surat mein phaili hui sathon ki surat mein dekhi ja sakti hai. Door peeche khushk aur pathrele pahar apni nokeeli ubhri hui chotiyon ke sath aage peeche qatarein bandhe aasman mein dhans rahe hain. Yahan hawa is qadar saaf o shaffaf hai ke aankhein dhoka khati hain. Jo cheez bohat nazdeek dikhai deti hai doorbeen se dekhein to bazaahir chand sau gaz door darya ki doosri simt ugi hui jhariyaan kam az kam teen meel door bare bare darakht nazar aate hain. Doosre kinare par pani se khelta hua bacha, darya mein kashti utarta jawan aadmi nazar aata hai. Har jagah aise manzar ko pesh karti hai jo nazar ko jakad leta hai. Duniya mein kahin bhi is qadar beshumar aur mukhtalif pahar ek jagah par ikhatte nazar nahi aate hain. Kahin itni zyada pahariyaan badalte manazir, kahin bhi is qadar khoobsurat fiza aur shandar rang nazar nahi aate hain. Yahan halke khakastari, bhoora khakastari, neelgoon khakastari aur peela khakastari rang ke pahadon ke manazir nazar aa rahe hote hain. Jin par kahin kahin sufaid dhariyaan nazar aarahi hoti hain. Daryaa-e-Sindh ke gird phaili hui sufaid rait sitaron ki tarah jhilmila rahi hoti hai. Yahan raat ka manzar bhi qabil-e-deed hota hai. Agar darya ke kinare khade hokar atraf mein nazar dalen to gehri tareeki mein makano ki roshniyan is tarah nazar aati hain ke jese sitare zameen par utar aaye hain. Garmiyon mein jab ke maidani ilaqon mein shadeed garmi hoti hai to yahan ki banjar dhalaanon par koi saya nahi hota hai aur chatanein dhoop mein bhatti ki tarah dehak rahi hoti hain aur din ki takleef deh garmi raat ko kaat khane wali sardi mein badal jati hai. Yahan bashindon ka qadeem mazhab Budh mat tha jis ke nuqoosh chatano par milte hain. Baad mein yeh log Musalman ho gaye. Azadi ke baad logon ne baghawat kardi aur Pakistan se inzimam aur madad ki darkhawast ki. Pakistan ne darkhawast qabool karke fazai raste se asleha saaz o saman ki tarseel ka intizam kiya. Agarche is dauran mein Bharat ne Baltistan ke mashriqi hissa par dobara qabza kar liya aur fire bandi ki wajah se use khali nahi karaya ja saka. Azadi ke baad is shahar ne bare paimane par taraqqi ki hai. Jis mein sar-e-fehrist mawselati nizam ko behtar karne ki koshish ki gain. Skardu se Gilgit tak sadak to dar kinare rasta tak nahi tha. K2 aur Karakoram ki doosri chotiyon aur maqamat ki trekking ke liye jane wale koh pema aur teams isi shahar se hi jati hain. Ab qasba na raha aur is ilaqa ka doosra bara shahar ban chuka hai. Skardu ke neeche ba nisbat Ladakh ke raste mein zyada khaufnak aur kadak wadiyan hain. Yahan se daryaa-e-Sindh azeem ush shan ghattiyon mein se ho kar guzarta hai aur meelon tak jhag udate pani aur aasman ke darmiyan mein umoodi chatano ke ilawa kuch aur nazar nahi aata hai. Yahan darya ke kinare chatano ke sath ek paidal rasta umoodi chatano mein makdi ke jalon ki tarah phaili hui ghulam gardishon se guzarta tha. Jis mein ja baja upar aur neeche jane ke liye lakdi ki seedhiyan lagai gain thin. Kahin is mein lakdi ki khootiyan lagi hui thin jinhein pakad pakad log safar karte thay. In raston par bulandi par jo rasse ke pul ek pahar se doosre pahar tak Baid-e-Majnun rasse jin ke darmiyan mein Baid-e-Majnun ki jhoomti hui bareek rasiyan bandhi jati hain un jhoomti hui rasiyon par darya paar karna hota tha. Neeche tezi se behte darya ko dekh kar sar chakrane lagta tha. Ab yahan sadak tameer ho chuki hai jo ek pul ke zariye Shahrah-e-Resham se mil rahi hai. Is sadak par hum Karakoram ki deewaron ke sath sadak ke doosri janib daryaa-e-Sindh poore talatum se beh raha hai aur darya ke paar Himalaya ki umoodi dhalaanein hain. Jin par kahin kahin sabza nazar aata hai. Is sadak ka shumar duniya ke khatarnak raston mein kiya jata hai. Yahan har waqt land sliding ka khatra rehta hai aur rasta khula rakhne ke liye raat din kaam karna padta hai. Is sadak ki tameer ek bara insani karnama aur ajaybat-e-alam mein se ek hai. Agarche yeh road kafi chaudi hai magar ise koi achhi sadak nahi keh sakte hain. Is ke bawajood yeh sadak tameer ka shahkar kehlati hai. Jab yeh banna shuru hui to yeh nahi dekha jata tha ke ek mah mein yeh sadak kitni meel bani balkay yeh dekha jata tha ke kitni feet bani hai. Yeh aham sadak banne se pehle yahan kisi qisam ka rasta nahi tha balkay darya ke sath khadi chatanein thin. Ibteda mein jab yeh sadak banai gai to itni chaudi thi ke is par ba mushkil ek jeep chal sakti thi ya khachchar ya maweshi ya sirf paidal ke liye thi. Magar baad mein ise chauda kar diya gaya jis par do gadiyan ba yak waqt chal sakti hain. Is par jo muallaq pul tameer kiye gaye hain woh agarche bohat mazboot hain lekin jab un par gadi guzarti hai to pul khaufnak awaz mein chirchirate hain. Jis se kamzor logon ka dil dehal jata hai. Magar is sadak ki badolat Skardu ka rabta poore saal Pakistan ke doosre ilaqon se rehta hai. Yahan kuch oonche neeche khet nazar aate hain jin sath kuch kache makanat hain. Warna ajeeb wahshnak safar hai. Jis mein pahadon ka jah o jalal aur darya ka josh o talatum numayan hai. Yeh sadak darya ke sath chalti hai sirf chand jagahon par door ho jati hai. Is tarah baaz jagahon par chand feet neeche beh raha hota hai aur baaz jagahon par yeh darya se sainkron feet buland hojati hai. Is ki charhai bhi baaz jagahon par is ka zawiya paintalees degree se zyada zawiya hojata hai. Yeh sadak jab Shahrah-e-Resham se milti hai to samne Koh Hindu Kush ka pahari silsila aur Pamir ki buland sathe murtafa aajaati hai.
