Shumak ki janib janib Karakoram ki deewar ke sath do buland pahar Deo Haramush aur Rakaposhi khade hain. Junoob mashriq mein Himalaya mein Nanga Parbat aasman se baten kar raha hai. Yeh sadak Skardu se daryaa-e-Gilgit jahan daryaa-e-Sindh se Janglot ke qareeb milta hai wahan par is Shahrah-e-Resham mein mil jati hai jo China se Gilgit hoti hui Islamabad jarahi hai.
Isi asar ka faida uthate hue angrezon ne Afghanistan ke saath sarhadon ke taayyun ka muahida bhi kiya. Ameer Abdur Rahman ke bete Ameer Habeebullah Khan baad mein Afghanistan ke badshah hue. Un ke daur mein Afghanistan mein maghribi madarse khule aur angrezon ka asar mazeed barh gaya. Agarche bazahir angrezon ne Afghanistan ko ek azad mulk ke taur par tasleem kiya hua tha. 1907 mein Ameer Habeebullah Khan ne angrezon ki daawat par bartanwi Hind ka daurah bhi kiya. Isi maghrib dosti aur asar ki wajah se Ameer Habeebullah Khan ko us ke rishtedaron ne 20 February 1919 ko qatal kar diya. Us ke qatal ke baad us ka beta Amanullah Khan badshah ban gaya aur angrezon ke khilaaf jang chher di. Magar 19 August 1919 ko us ke aur angrezon ke darmiyan Rawalpindi mein ek muahida hua jis mein angrezon ne Afghanistan par apna control khatam kiya aur yun Afghanistan mein un ka asar taqreeban khatam ho gaya. 19 August 1919 ko isi wajah se Afghanistan ke Yom-e-Azadi ke taur par manaya jata hai. Amanullah Khan (Daur-e-iqtidaar 1919-1929) ne Afghanistan ka iqtidaar sanbhalne ke baad islahat kee aur maghribi duniya se taluqaat qaim kiye. Islahat mein buniyadi taaleem ka lazmi qarar dena aur maghribi tarz ki deegar islahat shamil theen. Us ne 1921 mein Afghanistan mein hawai fauj bhi banayi jis ke jahaz Roos se aaye lekin afwaj ki tarbiyat Turki aur France se karwai gayi. 1927 mein Amanullah Khan ne Europe aur Turkey ka daurah bhi kiya jis mein us ne maghribi maddi taraqqi ka jaiza liya aur Afghanistan mein waisi taraqqi ki khwahish ki magar jab us ne Kamal Ataturk ki tarz par parda par pabandi lagane ki koshish ki to qabail mein baghawat phoot pari aur Afghan us ke sakht khilaf ho gaye. Shinwari qabail ne November 1928 mein Jalalabad se baghawat shuru ki aur doosre logon ko saath mila kar Kabul ki taraf barhne lage. Shumali se Tajik Kabul ki taraf barhne lage. Amanullah Khan pehle Kandahar bhaga aur fauj tayyar karne ki koshish ki magar nakaam hua jis ke baad woh Bharat farar ho gaya. Wahan se pehle Italia aur baad mein Switzerland mein panah li jahan 1960 mein wafat paayi. Is baghawat ke dauran January 1929 mein Habeebullah Kalakani urf Bachha Saqqa ne Kabul par qabza kiya aur Habeebullah Shah Ghazi ke naam se hukoomat qaim ki magar October 1929 mein General Nader Khan ki fauj ne Kabul ko gher liya jis par Bachha Saqqa farar ho kar apne gaon chala gaya. General Nader Khan ko angrezon ki mukammal himayat hasil thi jinhon ne use hathyar aur paisa diya tha. Is ke ilawa angrezon ne General Nader Khan ko ek hazar afraad ki fauj bhi tayyar kar ke di thi jo Waziristani qabailiyon par mushtamil thi. Nader Khan ne Quran ko zamin bana kar Bachha Saqqa ko panah aur maafi di magar jab woh Kabul aaya to use qatal karwa diya. Nader Khan (Daur-e-iqtidaar 1929-1933) jo Amanullah Khan ka rishtedar tha us ne Nader Shah ke naam se 1929 mein Afghanistan ka takht sanbhala. Magar 1933 mein Kabul ke ek talib-e-ilm ne use qatal kar diya jis ke baad us ke unnis sala beta Zahir Shah badshah ban gaya. Zahir Shah (Daur-e-iqtidaar 1933-1973) ne chalees saal tak Afghanistan par hukoomat ki. Woh Afghanistan ka aakhri badshah tha. Us ne kayi wazir e azam badle jin ki madad se us ne hukoomat ki. Jin mein se ek Sardar Muhammad Dawood Khan (Al-maroof Sardar Dawood) tha jo us ka qareebi rishtedar tha. Sardar Dawood ne Roos aur Bharat se taluqaat barhaye. Use Pakistan se nafrat thi. Pakistan se taluqaat ki kharabi ki wajah se Afghanistan ko iqtisadi mushkilat hui to Sardar Dawood ko 1963 mein isteefa dena pada. Magar Sardar Dawood (Daur-e-sadarat 1973-1978) ne das saal baad 17 July 1973 ko ek fouji baghawat mein Afghanistan par qabza kar liya. Is baghawat ko Roos (Soviet Union) ki madad hasil thi. Zahir Shah farar ho kar Italia chala gaya. 27 April 1978 ko Sardar Dawood ko ek aur baghawat mein qatal kar diya gaya. Aur Noor Muhammad Tarah Kai sadar ban gaya. Is baghawat ko bhi Roos ki madad se mumkin banaya gaya. Is hukoomat ne communism ko raij karne ki koshish ki aur Roos ki har maidan mein madad li jin mein sadkon ki taameer se le kar fouji madad tak sab kuch shamil tha. Roos ki yeh kamyabi America ko kabhi pasand nahin aayi chunancha CIA ne Islami quwaton ko mazboot karna shuru kiya. Jis se mulk mein fasadaat phoot pade. Natijatan 1979 mein Roos ne Afghanistan ki hukoomat ki daawat par Afghanistan mein apni fauj utar di aur amalan Afghanistan par isi tarah Roos ka qabza ho gaya jis tarah san 2002 se 2021 tak America ka qabza tha. Roos ki communist party ne Kamal Ataturk ki tarz par ghair Islami nazariyaat ki tarveej ki maslan parda par pabandi lagane ki koshish ki. Yeh tabdeeliyaan Afghani muashre se bilkul mutabiqat nahin rakhti theen. Afghanistan mein halaat jab bahut kharab ho gaye to Afghani communist hukoomat ki daawat par Roos ne apni fauj Afghanistan mein utar di. 25 December, 1979 ko Roosi fauj Kabul mein dakhil ho gayi. Afghanistan mein mujahideen ne in ke khilaf jang shuru kar di. America ne in mujahideen ko khoob madad faraham ki magar America ka maqsad Islam ki khidmat nahin balkeh Roos ke khilaf ek quwat ko mazboot karna tha. America ko Pakistan ko bhi saath milana pada. Pakistan ki mazhabi jamaaton ko bhi America ne Roos ke khilaf istemal kiya. Afghan mujahideen Islam se mukhlis the magar America unhain apne maqsad ke liye istemal karta raha. Magar jab America ko in ki zaroorat na rahi to wohi mujahideen Amreeki aur Pakistani zaban mein dehat gard kehlanay lage. Amreeki CIA, Pakistan, America aur Saudi Arab ne is dauran mein apna apna kirdar ada kiya jis mein in mumalik ke kuch mafaadaat mushtarak the aur kuch zaati. Is jihad ka natija yeh nikla ke Roos ko 1989 mein mukammal taur par Afghanistan se nikalna pada balkeh baaz danishwaron ke khayal mein Roos ke tootne ki ek badi wajah yahi thi. Is silsile mein Roos, Afghanistan aur Pakistan ke darmiyan 1988 mein Geneva muahida hua tha. Roos ne Afghanistan se fauj nikalne ke baad bhi us waqt ki Najibullah hukoomat ki madad jari rakhi magar 18 April, 1992 ko mujahideen ke ek giroh ne General Abdul Rasheed Dostum aur Ahmed Shah Massoud ki qayadat mein Kabul par qabza kar liya aur Afghanistan ko Islami riyasat banane ka elaan kar diya. Magar America ne asleha ki madad se mujahideen ke mukhtalif girohon ke darmiyan iqtidaar ke husool ke liye khana janggi shuru kara di. Is waqt ek Islami Jehadi Council banayi gayi jis ki qayadat pehle Sibghatullah Mujaddedi aur baad mein Burhanuddin Rabbani ne ki magar mujahideen ki aapas ki ladai mein izafa hota chala gaya. Bairuni taqaton ne Pashto aur Farsi bolne walon ki baahami munafirat ka khoob faida uthaya. Is waqt ki hukoomat mein Pashtoonon ki numaindagi na hone ke barabar thi jis se in mein shadeed ehsas-e-mehroomi paida hua. Pakistan aur Afghanistan ke kuch ulama ne madrason ke talaba ko munazzam karna shuru kiya jin ko baad mein Taliban kaha jaane laga. Pakistani fauj ke General Naseerullah Babar talaba ko istemal karne ke khayal ke baani the. 1996 mein Taliban ke rehnuma Mullah Muhammad Omar ne Kabul par qabza kiya. Unhon ne Afghanistan ko Islami Imarat qarar diya aur Taliban ne unhain Ameer-ul-Momineen tasleem kar liya. Taliban ne 2000 tak Afghanistan ke 95 feesad ilaake par qabza kar ke ek Islami hukoomat qaim ki. Is zamane mein Afghanistan mein nisbatan aman qaim raha aur post ki kaasht bhi na hui. Taliban ko bajuz Pakistan, Saudi Arab aur Mutahidda Arab Emirates ke kisi ne tasleem na kiya aur maghribi duniya ne Shumali Ittihad ki madad jari rakhi jo Afghanistan ke shumali mein kuch ikhtiyar rakhte the. Is ki wajah yeh thi ke ek khalis Islami hukoomat maghribi duniya aur Bharat ko hargiz qabool na thi. Yaad rahe ke Taliban se pehle Bharat ko Afghanistan mein khasa amal dakhal tha. Taliban ke daur mein Pakistan ka asar Afghanistan mein barh gaya aur 50 saal mein pehli dafa Pakistan aur Afghanistan ki sarhad par ek tarah se dostana aman qaim raha. Magar Pakistan ne Taliban ke khilaf America ki madad kar ke na sirf Taliban ka aetimad khoya balkeh ek Pakistan dushman aur Bharat dost hukoomat Afghanistan mein qaim ho gayi. Taliban ke daur mein kuch aise logon ne Afghanistan mein apne adde banaye jo pehle America ke manzoor-e-nazar the magar jab America ko in ki zaroorat na rahi to woh yakayak America ki nazar mein dehshat gardon mein tabdeel ho gaye. In mein Osama bin Laden aur us ke hawari shamil the. Jo Afghanistan mein Roos ke khilaf jihad mein sargaram the. 11 September 2001 ke Alami Tijarti Markaz World Trade Center ke hadse ka ilzam Osama bin Laden aur Al-Qaeda par lagaya gaya. In logon ko Taliban ne panah de rakhi thi aur Afghani riwayaat ke mutabiq unhain dushman ke hawale nahin kiya ja sakta tha. Is bahane 7 October, 2001 ko America ne Afghanistan par Pakistan ki madad se hamla kar diya aur Afghanistan par qabza kar liya. America ne baad mein Iraq par bhi qabza kiya jis se socha ja sakta hai ke ek to us ne Iraq par hamle se pehle Afghanistan mein aisi hukoomat ko khatam kiya jahan se mumkinah madad Iraq ko jihad ke naam par mil sakti thi. Doosre Afghanistan aur Iraq par qabza kar ke aur Pakistan ko dabao mein rakh kar America ne Iran aur kisi had tak Islam ke markaz Saudi Arab ko ghere mein le liya. Khaleej-e-Faris mein itni ziyadah Amreeki bahri taqat qaim ho gayi jis ki tareekh mein misaal nahin milti. Amreeki eima par Germany ke shahar Bonn mein ek Afghani hukoomat ka qiyam amal mein aaya jis ke sarbarah Hamid Karzai the. 9 October, 2004 ko Hamid Karzai ko Afghanistan ka sadar chun liya gaya. Hamid Karzai aur baad mein Ashraf Ghani ki kathputli hukoomat mein Afghanistan mein Amreeki aur ittehadi fauj maujood rahe jo Afghanistan ke asal hakim the. Bharat ka asar-o-rasookh Afghanistan mein bahut ziyada ho chuka tha. Yahan tak ke Bharat aur America Pakistan ke soobe Baluchistan jaise ilaqon mein purtashaddud karwaiyon aur dehshat gardi ko khoob farogh de rahe the. Unnis saal tak jang mein nakami ke baad America ne Taliban se 29 February 2020 ko Doha mein aman muahida kar liya jis ke mutabiq tamam ghair mulki afwaj ne chaudah mah mein Afghanistan se inkhila karna tha aur Taliban ne ghair mulki afwaj par hamle band karne the. Doha muahide ke chaudah mah baad kaafi had tak ghair mulki afwaj inkhila kar chuki thi. Yakam May 2021 ko Taliban ne kathputli Afghan hukoomat ke khilaf ek musallah karwai shuru ki aur bamushkil saade teen mah mein beshtar Afghan ilaqon ko fateh kar liya aur 15 August 2021 ko Taliban ne baghair kisi muzahamat ke Kabul dobara fateh kar ke Islami Imarat Afghanistan ko bahal kar diya. 30 August ko baqiya ghair mulki afwaj bhi inkhila kar gayin. 17 August ko baqiya Afghan fauj aur hukoomati ohdedaron ne sooba Panjshir mein Amrullah Saleh aur Ahmed Shah Massoud ke bete Hamid Shah ki qayadat mein ek hukoomat qaim ki aur Taliban ke khilaf musallah karwaiyon ka aghaz kiya aur 6 September tak shikast kha gaye jis ke baad Taliban ne Panjshir ka mukammal control hasil kar liya. 7 October 2021 ko Taliban ke tarjuman Zabihullah Mujahid ne ek press conference karte hue 33 arkan par mushtamil uburi hukoomat ka elaan kiya aur Mullah Muhammad Hasan Akhund Afghanistan ke uburi wazir-e-azam muqarrar kiye gaye. Afghanistan charon taraf se khushki se ghira hua mulk hai jis ka koi sahil-e-samandar nahin. Is ki samandari tijarat isi liye Pakistan ke zariye hoti hai. Ziyada ilaqah pahadi hai jo ziyada tar Koh-e-Hindukush par mushtamil hai. Afghanistan mein pani ki shadeed kami hai agarche char darya hain jin ke naam Darya-e-Amu, Darya-e-Kabul, Darya-e-Helmand aur Harirud hain. Uncha tareen maqam Noshaq hai jo 24,557 feet buland hai aur Tirich Mir ke baad Koh-e-Hindukush ka doosra uncha pahad hai. Satah samandar se sab se kam buland ilaqah (past tareen maqam) Darya-e-Amu hai jo sirf 846 feet buland hai. Afghanistan ki geographical sarhad 5529 kilometer lambi hai jis mein sab se ziyada ilaqah (2,640 kilometer) Pakistan ke saath lagta hai. 12% ilaqah zaraat ke qabil hai magar sirf 0.22% ilaqah zair-e-kasht hai. Chunke ziyada ilaqah pahadi hai is liye zalzale kasrat se aate hain. Afghanistan ke ilaqe mein sona, chandi, koyla, tanba, kaansi, chromite, zist, gandhak, loha, qeemti patthar aur namak paaye jate hain. Tail ke bhi wasee zakhair hain. Yeh tamam qudrati wasail musalsal jang ki wajah se kabhi istemal nahin ho sake. Afghanistan ka mausam shadeed hai yani garmiyon mein shadeed garmi aur sardiyon mein shadeed sardi hoti hai magar sardiyan ziyada shadeed hain. Kabul mein do se teen mah barf padi rehti hai. Jalalabad aur is se neeche ka mausam nisbatan garam hai. Ziyada barishen garmiyon mein hoti hain jab barresagheer mein monsoon hota hai. Afghanistan duniya ke ghareeb tareen mumalik mein shamil hai. Is ki buniyadi wajah Roos aur America ki kashmakash aur is ilaqe mein in ke mazmoom maqaasid hain. Afghanistan musalsal jang ka shikar raha hai aur use maeeshi taraqqi ki mohlat hi nahin mili. Afghanistan ki khaasi abadi Iran aur Pakistan ko hijrat kar gayi thi jin mein se kuch ab wapis aana shuru hue hain magar hijrat ne in ki maeeshat ko tabah kar diya hai aur nayi pod ko padhne likhne aur koi hunar seekhne ke mawaqe bhi kam hi mile hain. Afghanistan mein jin logon ne hijrat nahin bhi ki unhain jang ne masroof rakha. Majburan asleha ki tijarat, jang batour silsila-e-rozgar aur afeem-o-post ki tijarat hi in ka muqaddar bani. Ek badi tadaad smuggling se bhi wabasta hui. Bahut mamooli tadaad post ke ilawa doosri ajnaas bhi kaasht karti hai. Asian Development Bank ke mutabiq 2001 ke baad maeeshat ne khaasi taraqqi ki hai magar is silsile mein koi qabil-e-aetimad adaad-o-shumar nahin milte. Albattah Afghanistan se bahar rehne wale Afghaniyon ne ab kuch sarmaya kari shuru ki hai maslan 2005 mein Dubai ke ek Afghani khandan ne dhai crore dollar se Coca-Cola ka ek plant Afghanistan mein lagaya hai. Afghanistan ko abhi ghair mulki imdad par inhesar karna padta hai aur 2006 mein zar-e-mubadala ke bairuni zakhair sirf pachas crore Amreeki dollar ke lagbhag the. Ifraat-e-zar Afghanistan ka ek buniyadi masla raha hai aur Afghani rupaiya ki qeemat bhi musalsal girti rahi hai magar ab halaat kuch behtar hain. 2003 ke baad 14 naye bank bhi khule hain jin mein kayi ghair mulki bank bhi shamil hain. Kabul ki taraqqi ke liye bhi nau arab America dollar muhayya kiye gaye hain. Afghanistan kayi bainul-aqwami idaron ka rukn hai aur haal hi mein SAARC ka rukn bhi bana hai. Ek aham pesh raft qudrati gas ki daryaft hai jis ka istemal aur farokht bade paimane par shuru hone ki umeed hai. Afghanistan mein soobe ko Wilayat kehte hain maslan Wilayat Badakhshan. Afghanistan ko kul chounteess wilayaat mein taqseem kiya gaya hai. Afghanistan mein 64% logon ki Pashto aur 14% logon ki Dari madari zuban hai aur baaqi 20% log Uzbek, Turkmen, Nuristani, Balochi wagherah bolte hain. Nuristani aur Balochi samet tees ke qareeb ilaqayi zubanen hain jo char feesad ke qareeb log bolte hain. Jang aur hijrat ki wajah se Afghani ab Urdu bhi bakhubi samajhte hain. Yeh ek aisa mulk hai jis mein do ya ziyada zubanen janna ek aam baat hai. Pashto bolne wale logon ke ilaqe ziyada tar Pakistani sarhad se qareeb hain. Yani mulk ke junoob mashriq aur junoob mein hain. Afghanistan ke 99% log Musalman hain jin mein Sunni Musalmanon ki aksariyat hai. Ek lakh ke qareeb Hindu aur Sikh bhi hain jo Kabul, Kandahar aur Jalalabad se taalluq rakhte hain.
Iran, sabiq naam Fars, Maghribi Asia ka ek mulk hai, jo Mashriq-e-Wusta mein waaqe hai. Iran ki sarhaden shumaal mein Armenia, Azerbaijan aur Turkmenistan, mashriq mein Pakistan aur Afghanistan aur maghrib mein Turkey aur Iraq (Kurdistan ilaqa) se milti hain. Mazeed bar'aan Khaleej-e-Fars aur Khaleej-e-Oman waaqe hain. Qadeem maazi ke saath Iran ki vasee sarzameen ek jame'a saqafat aur tehzeeb ki waris hai jis ne hazaron saalon ke dauran vasee paimane par lisani, mazhabi, boliyon, rasam-o-rawaj wagherah ko numayan lachak aur rawadari ke saath jagah di hai. Taake Iran nasli tanavvu ke lihaaz se duniya ke 10 sarfehrist mumalik mein shamil hai aur us ki pachas zubanen aur boliyan aur aath sarkari nasli giroh hain, in mein se har ek nasli giroh, apni saqafati alamaton mein farq ke ilawa. Doosre Irani nasli girohon ke saath, bahut si mumasilaten hain. Sooba Yazd ke ilawa jahan ki taqriban tamam abadi yaksan hai, mulk ke tamam soobe is saqafati aur nasli tanavvu mein bara-e-rast mulawwis hain. Iran ke aath sarkari nasli giroh bil-tarteeb Fars, Azerbaijani, Kurd, Lor, Gilak aur Mazani, Baloch, Arab aur Turkmen hain. Iran geographical aetibaar se bahut aham hai qudrati gas, tail aur qeemti maadniyat is ke daaman mein poshida hain. Raqba ke aetibaar se duniya mein 17veen number par shumar kiya jata hai. Iran duniya ki qadeem tareen tehzeebon mein se ek hai. Mulk ki tareekh hazaron saalon par muheet hai jo Madain Saltanat 678 q.m. se le kar Safawi aur Pahlavi Saltanat tak phaili hui hai. Yeh mulk apne tehzeeb-o-tamaddun ke aetibaar se Asia mein teesre aur duniya mein gyarahwein darje par qaabiz hai. Europe aur Asia ke wasat mein hone ke baaes is ki tareekhi ahmiyat hai. Iran Aqwam-e-Mutahidda, Ghair Wabasta Mumalik ki Tehreek, Islami Taawun Tanzeem aur Tail Baramad Karne Wale Mumalik ki Tanzeem ka baani rukn hai. Tail ke azeem zakhair ki badaulat bainul-aqwami siyasat mein mulk aham tareen kirdar ada karta hai. Lafz Iran ka matlab Aryaon ki sarzameen hai. Riyasat Iran 1648195 murabba kilometer par phaila hua hai. Iran ki kul abadi 85 million hai. Abadi ke lihaaz se Iran duniya mein satarhwin number par hai. Iran Mashriq-e-Wusta mein waaqe hai. Is ke shumaal mein Armenia, Azerbaijan, Turkmenistan aur Bahira-e-Qazvin, mashriq mein Afghanistan aur Pakistan, junoob mein Khaleej-e-Fars aur Khaleej-e-Oman jabkeh maghrib mein Iraq aur Turkey waaqe hain. Mulk ka wasti-o-mashriqi ilaqah vasee be-aab-o-giyah sehraon par mushtamil hai jin mein kahin kahin nakhlestan hain. Maghrib mein Turkey aur Iraq ke saath sarhadon par pahadi silsile hain. Shumaal mein bhi Bahira-e-Qazvin ke ird gird zer-khez patti ke saath saath Koh-e-Alborz waaqe hai. 8 April ki tareekh Iran mein nuclear technology ke qaumi din se munasibat rakhti hai. Aaj ka din muqami technology ki bunyad par Uranium ki afzoodgi ki sargarmian shuru kiye jaane se munasibat rakhta hai. Is badi saansi kamyabi ke elaan ke baad Iran ke Saqafati Inqilab ki Aala Council ki manzuri aur Iran ke jawan danishwaron ki qabil-e-iftikhar koshishon ki qadardani ke maqsad se 8 April ki tareekh ko Iran mein nuclear technology ke qaumi din se mausoom kiya gaya. nuclear technology ka itlaaq, atom ke shigaf aur unhain jodnay ki tawanai ke zariye qudrati Uranium ko afzooda Uranium mein tabdeel karne ki tawanai par hota hai. Pur-aman istemal ke liye muqami nuclear technology, saansi aur sanati aetibaar se qabil-e-zikr ahmiyat ki hamil hai aur yeh is bina par hai ke nuclear technology ka istemal sirf tawanai ki farahmi tak mehdood nahin hai balkeh ise Irani mahireen ki janib se tibbi aur tehqeeqi umoor mein bhi istemal kiya ja raha hai. Iran sanh 1958 mein IAEA ka rukn bana aur sanh 1968 mein is ne nuclear hathiyaron ki paidawar aur phailao par pabandi ke muahide NPT par dastakhat kiye. Haaliya barson mein nuclear shobe mein Iran ki taraqqi-o-pesh raft aham kamyabiyon ke hamrah rahi hai. Is waqt Iran tees se zaid radio dawaon ki paidawar ke saath nuclear aur tibbi tehqeeqi marakiz mein khas beemaron ke istemal ke liye 90 se 95 feesad tak dawaen bana raha hai. Is silsile mein Iran ki ek aur kamyabi Tehran ke tibbi tehqeeqi reactor ke indhan ki farahmi ke liye Uranium ko 20 feesad tak afzooda banana hai. Tehran ka yeh atomi reactor cancer ki beemari mein mubtala beemaron ke liye dawaen tayyar karne mein sargaram amal hai jise 20 feesad afzooda Uranium ke indhan ki zaroorat hai jo do saal qabl tak bairoon-e-mulk se daramad kiya jata tha magar maghrib ne Iran ke khilaf pabandiyon aur Iran mein Uranium ki afzoodgi ki mukhalifat ke bahane 20 feesad afzooda Uranium ka indhan dene se inkar kar diya jis ke baad Iran ke atomi tawanai ke idare ne indhan ki is zaroorat ko poora karne ke liye Qom ke Fordow atomi reactor mein nuclear indhan ki recycling ke mansoobe par amal karte hue jis ki sari sargarmian Atomi Tawanai ki bainul-aqwami agency ki nigrani mein jari hain, Uranium ki 20 feesad afzoodgi ke amal mein kamyabi hasil ki. nuclear shobe mein Iran ki ek aur kamyabi, fuse yani pighlane wali machine tayyar karna hai aur is waqt Iran is hawale se technology rakhne wale duniya ke paanch mulkon mein shamil hai aur Iran Mashriq-e-Wusta ka wahid mulk hai ke is silsile mein jis ki sargarmian IAEA ki nigrani mein jari hain. Tawaqqa ki jati hai ke aainda das se pandrah saalon mein nuclear duniya, tawanai ki paidawar mein nuclear shigaf se use pighlane ke marhale mein dakhil ho jaye gi. nuclear technology ke shobe mein Iran is waqt is manzil par pahunch gaya hai ke duniya ke digar mulkon ke saath mushtarika nuclear mansoobon minjumla Uranium ki afzoodgi aur atomi fuse ke mansoobon par amal daramad karne ki tawanai rakhta hai aur is ne yeh technology IAEA ki zer-e-nigrani hi hasil ki hai magar phir bhi America aur ginti ke chand digar mumalik ke jin se Iran ki taraqqi-o-peshraft bardasht nahin ho pa rahi hai. Tehran ki taraqqi ki rah mein mukhtalif tarah ki rukawaten khadi kar rahe hain. Iran ke khilaf pabandiyan. Iran ka boycott. Nafsiyati jang. Siyasi dabao. Fouji hamle ki dhamki. Yehantak ke nuclear danishwaron ka qatal neez computer virus ke zariye rukhna andazi ki koshish aise hathkande hain jo Irani qaum ke dushmanon ne istemal kiye hain taake Iran mein pur-aman nuclear program aur is silsile mein hasil hone wali taraqqi-o-peshraft mein rukawat paida ki ja sake. Taham maghrib ki in tamam tar khilaf warziyon ke bawajood nuclear technology is waqt Irani qaum ki ek aham tareen qabil-e-iftikhar saansi taraqqi mein tabdeel ho chuki hai. Piranshahr shahar 8000 saal ki tareekh ke saath Iran ka sab se qadeem tehzeeb hai. Iran ko intezami taur par ikatees sobon ya istan mein taqseem kiya gaya hai. Maujooda aain 1979 ke inqilab ke baad manzoor kiya gaya jis ke mutabiq Iran ko ek Islami Jamhooriya aur Islami taleemat ko tamam siyasi, samaji aur maeeshi taluqaat ki bunyad qarar diya gaya. Majmooi ikhtiyaraat Rehber-e-Moazzam (Supreme Leader) ke paas hote hain. Aaj kal Ayatollah Ali Khamenei Rehber-e-Moazzam hain. Rehber-e-Moazzam ka intekhab mahireen ki ek majlis (Majlis-e-Khabragaane Rehberi) karti hai jis mein poore Iran se 86 ulama muntakhab kiye jate hain. Rehber-e-Moazzam musallah afwaj ka Commander-in-Chief hota hai. Hukoomat ka sarbarah sadar hota hai jise poore mulk se baligh raye dehi ki bunyad par muntakhab kiya jata hai. Aain ke teht koi fard do se ziyada martaba sadar nahin ban sakta. Qanoon saazi ke ikhtiyaraat Majlis ke paas hain jo 290 muntakhab arakeen par mushtamil aur 4 saal ke liye ilaqon aur mazhabi biradriyon ki numaindagi karti hai. Maseehion, Zaratoshtion aur Yahudiyon ke apne numainde Majlis mein shamil hain. Majlis ke manzoor shudah qawaneen manzuri ke liye Shoora-e-Nigehban ke paas bheje jate hain. Shoora-e-Nigehban is lehaaz se Majlis ke manzoor kardah qawaneen ka jaiza leti hai ke woh Aain aur Islami qawaneen ke mutabiq hain. Is mein Rehber-e-Moazzam ki janib se namzad kardah 6 mazhabi rehnuma aur adliya ke namzad kardah 6 qanooni mahireen shamil hote hain jin ki manzuri Majlis deti hai. Shoora-e-Nigehban ko Majlis, muqami councils, sadarat aur Majlis-e-Khabragaan ke ummeedwaron ko veto kar dene ka ikhtiyar bhi hota hai. Qanoon saazi ke hawale se Majlis aur Shoora-e-Nigehban ke darmiyan paida hone wale tanazaat ke hal ke liye 1988 mein Majma'a Tashkhees Maslehat-e-Nizam (Expediency Council) qaim ki gayi. August 1989 se yeh qaumi policy aur aaini umoor par Rehber-e-Moazzam ka mushir idara ban gayi. Is ke sarbarah sabiq sadar Ali Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani hain aur is mein hukoomat ke teenon shobon ke sarbarah aur Shoora-e-Nigehban ke mazhabi arkan shamil hain. Rehber-e-Moazzam teen saal ke liye arkan namzad karta hai. Majlis ke bade girohon ko umuman Islah Pasand aur Qadamat Parast ke taur par bayan kiya jata hai. Is waqt Majlis mein Abadgaran ka ittihad ghalib hai. Yeh qadamat parast hain. 1997 mein sadar Khatami ke muntakhab hone ke baad Iran ke ziyada tar mumalik se taluqaat behtar hue. 1998 mein Bartaniya aur Iran ke taluqaat is yaqeen dehani par bahal hue ke Irani hukoomat ka Salman Rushdie ki zindagi ko khatre mein dalne ka koi iradah nahin. 1999 mein Bartaniya aur Iran ne safaradaron ka tabadala kiya. Iran aur America ke taluqaat 1980 mein toote aur aaj tak bahal nahin hue. July 2001 mein America ne Iran aur Libya par pabandiyon ke qanoon mein mazeed 5 saal ke liye tauosee kar di. January 2002 mein sadar Bush ne Iran ko Badi ke mehwar ka hissa qarar diya. Is waqt Iran maghribi taqaton ki janib se nuclear program, mabini dehshat gardi, Mashriq-e-Wusta ke aman ko kharab karne ke khwahishmand girohon ki mabini sarparasti aur digar ilzamaat ka nishana bana hua hai. Islami Jamhooriya Iran ne maghrib ki resha dawaniyon Amreeki sazishon aur Alami samraji taqaton ki taraf se millat-e-Iran ke khilaf musalsal dhamkiyon ke baad har satah par khud kafil hone ka faisla kiya aur atomi technology, nano technology, cloning aur medical ke saath saath aerospace neez difai shobon mein be-panah taraqqi ki hai jis ke bare mein ikhtisar ke saath kuch matalib qaraeen ki maloomat afzai ke liye zeel mein darj kiye ja rahe hain. 1980 ki dahai mein Iran Iraq jang ke baad se donon mumalik ke taluqaat kabhi mamool par nahin aa sake taham Iraq ke tanaze par Iran ne ghair janibdar hone ka elaan kar diya agarche is ne fouji karwai par tanqeed ki lekin is ne elaan kiya ke woh tanaze se bahar rahega. Is ka kehna hai ke woh ek mustahkam aur mutahid Iraq ke liye kaam karna chahta hai. Iran ka Iraq ki uburi hukoomat ke saath bara-e-rast do tarfa muahida hai. Iran bijli ki farahmi ke silsile mein Iraq ki madad kar raha hai. 30 November 2004 ko Iraq mein salamati, aam intakhabat ke barwaqt inakad aur bairuni anasir ki mudakhilat rokne par ghaur ke liye Iran mein ek conference munaqid hui jis ki mezbani Irani wizarat-e-dakhila ne ki. Is conference mein Iraq, Saudi Arab, Kuwait, Turkey, Jordan aur Misr ke wuzra-e-dakhila aur security hukam ne shirkat ki. Iran Afghan khana janggi se bhi mutasir ho raha hai aur wahan istehkam ke farogh ka khwahan nazar aa raha hai. Iran ne Afghanistan ki taameer-e-nau ke liye 5 saalon mein 560 million dollars dene ka waada kiya hai. Donon mulkon ne munshiyat ke khilaf ek doosre se bharpoor taawun kiya hai. Iran mein lakhon Afghan muhajireen rihaish pazeer hain jin ki watan wapsi ke liye iqdamaat kiye ja rahe hain. 1979 mein Inqilab-e-Islami ke baad se Iran ka mauqaf yeh raha hai ke Israel ka wajood ghair qanooni hai. Iran ab bhi Israel ki purjosh mukhalifat par qaim hai. Woh Mashriq-e-Wusta mein aman qaim karne ke iqdamaat par bhi aitrazaat karta rehta hai aur mabina taur par Palestine aur Lebanon ke un Israel mukhalif girohon ki madad karta rehta hai. 2002 mein Irani wizarat-e-kharijah ne elaan kiya ke agar Israel aur Palestine ko koi muahida qabil-e-qabool ho to Iran aise do tarfa muahide ko radd nahin karega. Iran ek mutanavve mulk hai jahan bahut se nasli giroh paaye jate hain, in mein Farsi bolne wale sab se ziyada hain. Beeswein sadi ke akhir mein Iran ki abadi tezi se barhi, 1956 mein Iran ki abadi sirf 19 million thi jo 2009 tak 79 million tak ja pahunchi. Taham haaliya chand saalon mein Iran ki sharah-e-paidaiysh mein numaya kami aayi hai 2012 mein liye gaye andaze ke mutabiq Iran ki sharah-e-paidaiysh 1.29 feesad rahi.
Sarhad kisi hukoomat ya riyasat wagherah ke zameeni kinare ya had ko kaha jata hai. Maazi mein sarhad kisi hukoomat ya riyasat ka mukammal taur par tay shudah khat nahin tha balkeh yeh ek ghair janibdar khitta hua karta tha jise gashti jagah kaha jata tha. Gashti jagah par do muttasil mumalik ke fouji gasht kiya karte the. Gashti jagah ka tasavvur ab ek mukammal taur par tay shudah aur nishan zadah sarhad mein tabdeel ho chuka hai. Hawai addo aur bandargahon ko bhi sarhad tasavvur kiya jata hai. Ziyada tar mumalik mein ek marawwajah nizam ke teht sarhad par logon, janwaron aur doosri cheezon ki aamad-o-raft ko qaboo mein rakha jata hai. Bainul-aqwami qanoon ke mutabiq har mulk ko apne taur par sarhadi sharait naafiz karne ka haq hasil hai. Kisi bhi mulk ke sarhad ko paar karne ke liye us mulk ke sarhadi sharait poore karne hote hain. Agar koi shakhs yeh sharait poore nahin karta, use sarhad paar karne ki ijazat nahin di jati. Guzarnama aur visa bhi kayi mumalik ke sarhadat ko paar karne ke liye zaroori dastawizaat hain. Agar koi shakhs kisi ghair mulk ke sarhadat ke andar reh kar qiyam ya kaam karna chahta hai to is ke liye use khusoosi hijrati dastawizaat ya ijazat name ki zaroorat hoti hai. Ajnaas ko sarhad ke aar paar le jane par mahsool dena padta hai. Ajnaas ya doosri cheezen jaise insan aur janwar wagherah ka sarhad ke aar paar khufiya taur par le jane ko smuggling kaha jata hai jo ghair qanooni hai. Iran duniya ke chand mumalik mein se ek hai jahan panah guzeenon ki ek bahut badi tadaad maujood hai jo ziyada tar Afghanistan aur Iraq mein jari jangon ke baaes Iran aaye hain. Irani Aain ke mutabiq hukoomat-e-waqt par zimmedari hai ke woh shahriyon ko buniyadi sahooliyat faraham kare jin mein jaan-o-maal ka tehfuz, tibbi sahooliyat, mazoor afraad ki dekh bhal, wagherah shamil hain aur in cheezon par kharcha budget ke zariye hasil kardah revenue (saalana amadni) se kiya jata hai. Mulk ke aksar bashinde Farsi zuban bolte hain jo aksariyati zuban hone ke saath saath Iran ki sarkari zuban bhi hai. Iran mein boli jane wali zubanen aksar Hind-Irani zubanen hain. Aqallati zubanon ki baat ki jaye to Iran ke shumaal maghrib mein Azerbaijani, shumaal mein Turkmen aur mashriq mein Pakistani sarhadon ke qareeb ilaqe mein Balochi zuban boli jati hai. Iran mein 53 feesad afraad ki Farsi, 16 feesad ki Azerbaijani, 10 feesad ki Kurdi, 7 feesad ki Gilaki aur Mazandarani, 7 feesad ki Lori, 2 feesad ki Arabi dan 2 feesad ki Balochi madari zuban hai. Taham in tamam madari zubanon ka istemal sirf batour ilaqai zuban kiya jata hai baaqi mulk mein Farsi hi istemal hoti hai. Tareekhi taur par Zoroastrianism Iran ka qadeem mazhab tha khas kar Hakhmanish Saltanat, Saltanat-e-Ashkaniyan aur Sasani Saltanat ke adwar mein Zoroastrianism hi Iran ka sab se bada mazhab tha. 651 ke lagbhag Musalmanon ne Iran ko fateh kiya aur yahan se aatish parast Sasani Saltanat ka saqoot ho gaya, Muslim fateh ke baad dheere dheere Islam phailta gaya. Iran mein log 15veen sadi tak Sunni Islam ke pairaukar the, taham 1501 mein Safavi Saltanat qaim ho gayi jis ne 16veen sadi mein muqami Sunni Muslim abadi ko dabao ke zariye Ithna Ashariya Ahle Tashayyu Muslim mein tabdeel kiya. Aaj Ithna Ashariya Shia Islam Iran ka sarkari mazhab hai. Iran ki 90 feesad abadi Shia Islam ke pairaukar hai, 8 feesad Sunni Islam aur baaqi ke 2 feesad ghair Muslim hain. Iran intehai mutaharrik zalzale ki patti par waaqe hai jis ki wajah se yahan aaye din zalzale aate rehte hain. 1991 se ab tak mulk mein ek hazar zalzale ke jhatke record kiye ja chuke hain jin se sarkari adaad-o-shumar ke mutabiq 17 hazar 600 janen zaya huwin. 2003 mein junoob mashriqi Iran mein shadeed zalzale ne tabahi macha di. Is ki shiddat Richter scale par 6.3 thi aur is ne qadeem qasbah Bam ko safah-e-hasti se mita diya. Is zalzale mein 30 hazar afraad janbaq hue.
Saudi Arab (Rasmi naam Al-Mamlaka Al-Arabia Al-Saudia) Maghribi Asia ka ek mulk hai. Yeh Jazeera Numa Arab ke bade hisse par muheet hai, jo use Asia ka paanchwan sab se bada, Arab duniya ka doosra sab se bada aur Maghribi Asia aur Mashriq-e-Wusta ka sab se bada mulk banata hai. Is ki sarhad maghrib mein Bahira-e-Ahmar se milti hai. Shumaal mein Jordan, Iraq aur Kuwait; mashriq mein Khaleej-e-Fars, Qatar aur Mutahidda Arab Emirates; junoob mashriq mein Oman; aur junoob mein Yemen. Bahrain mashriqi sahil se door ek jazira numa mulk hai. Shumaal maghrib mein Khaleej-e-Aqaba Saudi Arab ko Misr aur Israel se alag karti hai. Saudi Arab wahid mulk hai jis ke paas Bahira-e-Ahmar aur Khaleej-e-Fars donon ke saath sahil hai aur is ka ziyada tar ilaqah khushk sahra, nashebi, maidan aur pahadon par mushtamil hai. Is ka darul hukoomat aur sab se bada shahar Riyadh hai. Yeh mulk Makkah aur Madinah ka ghar hai, jo Islam ke do muqaddas tareen shahar hain. Qabl az Islam ka Jazeera Numa Arab, woh ilaqah jis par maujooda Saudi Arab mushtamil hai, kayi qadeem saqafaton aur tehzeebon ka maqam tha. Saudi Arab mein qabl az tareekh insani sargarmyon ke kuch ibtedai nishanaat paaye jate hain. Deen-e-Islam chhatti sadi Isawi (571) mein ubhar kar saamne aaya aur Jazeera Numa Arab ke saath saath Asia aur Africa ke bade hisse par phail gaya. Chhatti sadi ke awail mein, Allah ke bheje hue aakhri Rasool, Muhammad (SAW) ne Jazeera Numa Arab ki abadi ko ikattha kiya aur ek wahid Islami mazhabi hukoomat qaim ki. Sanh 632 mein un ke wisal ke baad un ke pairaukaron ne bees saal ke andar andar, maghrib mein Jazeera Numa Iberia se le kar mashriq mein wasti aur junoobi Asia ke kuch hisson tak, ek wasee ilaqe ko fateh karte hue, tezi se Jazeera Numa Arab se bahar Islam ki roshni ko phaila diya aur Khilafat-e-Rashida (632–661) ke ilawa Umayyad (661–750), Abbasi (750–1517) aur Fatimi (909–1171) Khilafat ke saath saath Asia, Africa aur Europe mein mutaddid digar khandanoun ki bunyad rakhi. Jadeed daur ke Saudi Arab ka ilaqah pehle buniyadi taur par char alag alag tareekhi ilaqon par mushtamil tha Hijaz, Najd aur mashriqi Arab ke kuch hisse (Al-Ahsa) aur junoobi Arab (Asir). Mamlakat-e-Saudi Arab ki bunyad Shah Abdulaziz (Maghrib mein Ibn Saud ke naam se mashhoor) ne 1932 mein rakhi thi. Unhon ne sanh 1902 mein apne khandan ke aabai ilaqe Riyadh par qabze ke saath futuhat ke silsile ke zariye charon khitton ko ek riyasat mein mutahid kiya. Saudi Arab is ke baad se ek mutlaq-ul-anan badshahat raha hai, jahan siyasi faisle badshah, wuzra ki council aur mulk ke riwayati ashrafiya ke darmiyan mushawarat ki bunyad par kiye jate hain. Sunni Islam ke andar intehai qadamat pasand Wahhabi mazhabi tehreek ko sanh 2000 ki dahai tak Saudi saqafat ki ek aham khasusiyat ke taur par bayan kiya gaya tha. Sanh 2016 mein, Saudi Arab ki hukoomat ne intehai qadamat pasand Wahhabi mazhabi ashrafiya ke asar-o-rasookh ko kam karne aur ikhlaqi police ki sargarmyon ko mehdood karne ke iqdamaat kiye, samaji taraqqi ko barhane aur bahal karne aur mazeed mazboot aur moassar muashara banane ki koshish mein Saudi Vision 2030 ke iqtisadi program ka aghaz kiya. Apne buniyadi qanoon mein, Saudi Arab khud ko ek khud mukhtar Arab Islami riyasat ke taur par bayan karta hai jis mein Islam ko sarkari mazhab, Arabi ko sarkari zuban aur Riyadh darul hukoomat kaha jata hai. Petroleum sanh 1938 mein daryaft hua aur is ke baad mashriqi soobe mein kayi digar daryaften huwin. Saudi Arab is ke baad se duniya ka doosra sab se bada tail paida karne wala mulk (America ke baad) aur duniya ka sab se bada tail baramad kuninda ban gaya hai. Yahan duniya ke doosre sab se bade tail ke zakhair aur chauthay bade gas ke zakhair maujood hain. Mamlakat ko World Bank ki aala amadni wali maeeshat ke taur par darja bandi kiya gaya hai aur yeh wahid Arab mulk hai jo G20 badi maeeshaton ka hissa hai. Riyasat ko mukhtalif wajoohat ki bina par tanqeed ka nishana banaya jata hai, jin mein Yemeni khana janggi mein is ka kirdar, Islami dehshat gardi ki mabina sarparasti aur is ka insani haqooq ka kharab record, bashumool saza-e-maut ka zaroorat se ziyada aur aksar ma wara-e-adliyat shamil hai. Saudi Arab ko ilaqai aur darmiyani taaqat samjha jata hai. Saudi maeeshat Mashriq-e-Wusta mein sab se badi hai. Umumi GDP ke lehaaz se duniya ki atharween sab se badi maeeshat aur fi kas paidawar ke lehaaz se duniya ki satarween badi maeeshat hai. Ek bohat hi aala insani taraqqi ke ashariyah walay mulk ke tor par, yeh muft aala taleem, tax free aamdani aur muft afaqi nizam-e-sehhat pesh karta hai. Saudi Arab duniya ki teesri badi tarkeen-e-watan ki abadi ka markaz hai. Is ki abadi duniya ki sab se naujawan abadi mein se ek bhi hai, is ki 32.2 million ki abadi ka taqriban 50 feesad 25 saal se kam umar ka hai. Khaleej Ta'awun Council ka rukn honay ke ilawa Saudi Arab Tanzeem-e-Aqwaam Mutahida, Tanzeem-e-Ta'awun-e-Islami, Arab League, Arab Tanzeem bara-e-Hawai Naqal-o-Hamal aur Tail Baramad Karne Walay Mumalik ki Tanzeem, OPEC ka ek fa'al aur baani rukn hai. Shimal maghrib mein is ki sarhad Urdun, shimal mein Iraq aur shimal mashriq mein Kuwait, Qatar, aur Bahrain aur mashriq mein Muttahida Arab Amarat, junub mashriq mein Saltanat Oman, junub mein Yemen se mili hui hai jabkay Khaleej-e-Faris is ke shimal mashriq aur Behira-e-Qulzum is ke maghrib mein waqay hai. Yeh Haramain Shareefain ki sarzamin kehlaty hai kyunkay yahan Islam ke do muqaddas tareen maqamat Makkah Mukarrama aur Madina Munawwara maujood hain. Saudi riyasat ka zahoor taqreeban 1750ء mein Arab ke wasat se shuru hua, jab ek muqami rehnuma Muhammad bin Saud maroof Islami shakhsiyat aur Muhammad bin Abdul Wahab ke sath mil kar ek nayi siyasi quwwat ke tor par ubhray. Agli dedh sau saal mein Aal Saud ki qismat ka sitara talu-o-ghuroob hota raha, jis ke dauran mein jazeera numa Arab par tasallut ke liye un ke Misr, Saltanat Usmania aur deegar Arab khandanoun se tasadum hue. Baad azan Saudi riyasat ka baqaida qiyam Shah Abdul Aziz Al Saud ke hathon amal mein aaya. 1902ء mein, Abd al-Aziz ne hareer Aal Rashid se Riyaz shahar chheen liya aur use Aal Saud ka dar ul hukumat qarar diya. Apni futuhaat ka silsila jari rakhtay hue unhon ne 1913ء se 1926ء ke dauran mein Al-Ahsa, Qatif, Najd ke baqi ilaqon aur Hijaz (jis mein Makkah Mukarrama aur Madina Munawwara ke shahar shamil the) par bhi qabza kar liya. 8 January 1926ء ko, Abdul Aziz ibn Saud Hijaz ke badshah qarar paye. 29 January 1927ء ko, unhon ne Shah Najd ka khitab hasil kiya. 20 May 1927ء ko, Muahida Jeddah ke mutabiq Bartania ne tamam maqbuza ilaqon (jo is waqt Mamlakat Hijaz-o-Najd kehlatay the) par Abdul Aziz ibn Saud ki hukumat ko tasleem kar liya. 1932ء mein, Bartania ki razamandi hasil honay par Mamlakat Hijaz-o-Najd ka naam tabdeel kar ke Mamlakat Saudi Arab rakh diya gaya. March 1938ء mein, tel ki daryaft ne mulk ko maeshi tor par zabardast istehkam bakhsha aur mamlakat mein khushhali ka daur daura ho gaya. Haliya naam Saudi taqreeban 1727ء mein maujood Saudia ke wasat, Riyaz mein Aal Saud ki hukumat bananay se shuru hua. Jab ek muqami rehnuma Muhammad bin Saud maroof Islami shakhsiyat aur Wahabiyat ya Salafi tehreek ke baani Muhammad bin Abd al-Wahhab ke sath mil kar ek nayi siyasi quwwat ke tor par ubhray. Is waqt yeh ilaqah Saltanat Usmania ke control mein tha. 1805, 1806ء mein Aal Saud ne Makkah Madina ko bhi apne control mein le liya. 1818ء mein Saltanat Usmania ki faujon ne un se sara ilaqah wapas le liya. 1824ء mein Saud family ne Najd ke ilaqay par dobara qabza kar liya. Isi dauran ek nayi taaqat Aal Rashid samnay aayi. Nayi taaqat Aal Rashid-o-Aal Saud mein aapas ki jangain jari rahien. Aur Aal Rashid ne Aal Saud ko 1892 mein hatmi shikast de kar ilaqah chhor kar Kuwait mein jalawatani par majboor kar diya. Hijaz yani Makkah Madina mein Usmania hukumat ke hukam par dakhil hui Misri faujain 1840 mein ilaqay se nikal gayien. Aur Shareef Makkah ne control sambhal liya. Turkey ne bara-e-naam hukmarani ke sath Aal Saud-o-Aal Rashid-o-Shareef Makkah family samait kayi qabail ko andaruni khud mukhtari di hui thi. 1902 mein Aal Saud ke Shah Abdul Aziz Kuwait se jalawatani se wapas aaye aur Saudi Ikhwan tehreek, Wahabi tehreek aur deegar ki madad ke sath 1906 mein Aal Rashid ko shikast de kar ilaqay se nikal diya aur Usmania Saltanat ne unhain tasleem kar liya. Is ke baad markazi ilaqah se hat kar Khaleej-e-Faris ke sath ke ilaqah Al-Ahsa par qabza kar liya. Abd al-Aziz jinhen Ibn Saud bhi kaha jata tha, ne Arab baghawat se doori rakhi. Aur Aal Rashid ke sath muqablay par focus rakha. Phir 1920 mein Aseer ilaqah par qabza kiya. 1921 mein Aal Rashid ko mukammal dais nikala de diya. Shareef Makkah Hussain bin Ali ne Angrez McMahon ke sath Usmania Saltanat ke khilaf saz baaz kar ke Muttahida Arab riyasat bananay ki sazish ki. Is mein Lawrence of Arabia ka bhi role raha. 1914 mein Jang-e-Azeem Awwal shuru ho chuki thi. Jis mein Saltanat Usmania, German Saltanat aur Austro-Hungary Saltanat ek taraf the aur Roose, France aur Bartania waghera doosri taraf. 1916 mein Saltanat Usmania ko kamzor karne ke liye tamam Arab ilaqay, Shaam, Yemen, Urdun aur maujuda Saudia par mushtamil Muttahida Arab riyasat ke qiyam aur Saltanat Usmania se azadi ka khwab dikhaya gaya. Britanwi faujon ki madad se Arab baghi faujon ne Makkah, Madina, Urdun aur phir Damascus fateh kar liya. 2016 se 2018 ke dauran Damascus mein Shaam ki Arab Kingdom qayem kar ke Shareef Makkah ka beta Faisal badshah bana diya gaya. Lekin phir Sykes muahidhay ke mutabiq Arab ilaqay siway Saudia ke, France aur Bartania ne aapas mein taqseem kar liye. Hijaz (Makkah aur Madina) ko Shareef Makkah ke hawalay kiya gaya. Aal Saud aur Shareef Makkah, donon Britanwi rabtay mein aur imdad lenay walay the. Shareef Makkah ko Hijaz ka badshah tasleem kiya gaya. Lekin baad mein, 1924 mein use Bartania ki taraf se chhor diya gaya. 1925 mein Abd al-Aziz ne Hijaz par qabza kar ke khud ko Shah Hijaz declare kiya. Phir Shah Najd banay. Phir 1932 mein donon badshahatoun (Najd aur Hijaz) ko zam kar ke Saudi Arab ka naam diya gaya. Hijaz ki fateh ke baad, Saudi Ikhwan Britanwi maqbuza Urdun, Iraq aur Kuwait ki taraf barhna chahtay the taake apna maslak wahan bhi naafiz karein lekin Abd al-Aziz Urdun aur Iraq waghera Britanwi qabze mein honay ki wajah se Bartania se ladayi mol nahin lena chahtay the. Is par ikhtilafat hue to Ikhwan ne baghawat kar di lekin woh sakhti se kuchal di gayi. Aur phir Saudi hukumat istehkam hasil karti chali gayi. Lawrence ne Pehli Jang-e-Azeem shuru honay ke baad khud ko ba-taur razakar pesh kiya use Misr mein post kiya gaya. Wahan se woh Iraq aur Saudi Arab missions par jata raha aur oopar zikar karda Usmani Saltanat ke khilaf Arab baghawat aur Muttahida Arab riyasat (bashumool Shaam, Urdun, Yemen, Najd aur Hijaz) ki sazish mein shamil hua aur doosray Angrez afsaron ke sath Bartania ke rabta afsar ki haisiyat se kaam kiya. Woh Shareef Makkah ke betay Faisal jo baad mein Shah-e-Shaam bana, ke sath nazdeeki markon mein shamil raha aur Damascus ki fateh mein ham rakab raha. Is ke role ko sahafai Thomas ne sansani khezi ke sath pesh kiya. Saudi Arab alam-e-Islam ki sab se badi mamlakat samjhi jati hai. Is mamlakat ke baani yun to Shah Abdul Aziz bin Abd al-Rahman Aal Saud hain jo 15 January 1877ء ko paida hue the magar is saltanat ke qiyam ki jad-o-jehad ka aaghaz 18ween sadi mein hua tha jab 1725ء mein Aal Saud ke sarbarah Ameer Saud bin Muhammad bin Muqrin ki wafat hui. Is zamanay mein Najd mein chhoti chhoti riyasatain theen aur har riyasat ka alag alag hukmaran hota tha. Ameer Saud bin Muhammad ke char sahibzadoy the jinhon ne is azam ka izhar kiya ke woh Najd mein Saudi saltanat qaim karengay. Ameer Saud bin Muhammad ke sab se bade sahibzaday ka naam Muhammad bin Saud tha. Woh Dar'iya ke hukmaran banay aur unhon ne Sheikh Muhammad bin Abd al-Wahhab ki madad se Dar'iya mein apni hukumat qaim ki aur ahista ahista use mustahkam karna shuru kiya. Muhammad bin Saud aur Sheikh Muhammad Abd al-Wahhab ke darmiyan 1745ء mein ek tarikhi mulaqat hui jis mein donon ne ahad kiya ke agar kisi waqt Muhammad bin Saud Najd-o-Hijaz mein apni hukumat qaim karne mein kamyab hue to wahan Sheikh Muhammad bin Abd al-Wahhab ke aqaid ko ra'ij karengay. 1765ء mein Shahzada Muhammad aur 1791ء mein Sheikh Muhammad bin Abd al-Wahhab ki wafat ho gayi. Is waqt tak jazeera numa Arab ke beshtar ilaqay par Aal Saud ki hukmarani qaim ho chuki thi. Shahzada Muhammad ke baad Imam Abd al-Aziz ilaqay ke hukmaran banay magar 1803ء mein unhain qatl kar diya gaya. Imam Abd al-Aziz ke baad un ke bete Saud hukmaran banay jo 1814ء mein wafat pa gayay. Saud ke bete Abdullah ek bade alam-e-deen bhi the. Un ke daur-e-hukmarani mein un ke ilaqay ka ek bada hissa un ke hath se nikal gaya aur Dar'iya Saltanat Usmania ke zer-e-nigin aa gaya. Imam Abdullah qaidi bana liye gayay aur unhain Istanbul le ja kar sazay-e-maut de di gayi. Magar jald hi un ke bhai Mishari bin Saud apni hukumat wapas lenay mein kamyab ho gayay magar woh zyada arsay tak hukmarani na kar sakay aur un ka ilaqah dobara Saltanat Usmania ke qabze mein chala gaya. Is ke baad un ka bhatija Shahzada Turki bin Abdullah Riyaz par qabza karne mein kamyab hua, jis par woh 1824ء se 1835ء tak bar sar-e-iqtidar rahay. Agli kayi dahaiyon tak Aal Saud ki qismat ka sitara talu-o-ghuroob hota raha aur jazeera numa Arab par tasallut ke liye Misr Saltanat Usmania aur deegar Arab qabail mein tasadum hotay rahay. Aal Saud ke ek hukmaran Imam Abd al-Rahman the, jo 1889ء mein bai'at lenay mein kamyab hue. Imam Abd al-Rahman ke bete Shahzada Abd al-Aziz ek muhim-ju shakhsiyat the aur 1900ء mein unhon ne apne walid ki zindagi mein hi un ki khoyi hui saltanat wapas lenay aur use wus'at denay ki koshishain shuru kar din. 1902ء mein unhon ne Riyaz shahar par qabza kiya aur use Aal Saud ka dar ul hukumat qarar diya. Apni futuhaat ka silsila jari rakhtay hue unhon ne Al-Ahsa'i, Qatif aur Najd ke mutaddid ilaqon par qabza kar liya. Saltanat Usmania ke aakhri daur mein Hijaz par (jis mein Makkah Mukarrama aur Madina Munawwara ke ilaqay shamil the) Shareef Makkah Hussain ki hukmarani thi, jinhon ne 5 June 1916ء ko Turkey ke khilaf baghawat ka elaan kar diya. Hussain ko na sirf Arabon ke mukhtalif qabail ki balkay Bartania ki ta'eed bhi hasil thi. 7 June 1916 ko Shareef Makkah Hussain ne Hijaz ki azadi ka elaan kiya. 21 June ko Makkah par un ka qabza mukammal hua aur 29 October ko unhon ne puray Arab ka hukmaran honay ka ba-zabta elaan kar diya. Sath hi unhon ne tamam Arabon ko da'wat di ke woh Turkoun ke khilaf jang ka elaan karein. 15 December 1916ء ko hukumat Bartania ne Hussain ko Shah Hijaz tasleem karne ka elaan kar diya. Isi dauran Ameer Abd al-Aziz Ibn Abd al-Rahman Aal Saud ne Mashriqi Arab ka ek bada hissa masakhkhar kar liya aur 26 December 1915ء ko Bartania ke sath dosti ka ek mua'ahida bhi kar liya. 5 September 1924ء ko unhon ne Hijaz ko bhi fateh kar liya. Awam ne Ameer Abd al-Aziz ka sath diya aur Shareef Makkah Shah Hussain ne hukumat se dastbardar ho kar apne bete Ali ko Shah Hijaz bana diya. Magar Ameer Abd al-Aziz ki barhti hui pesh qadmi ke ba'is unhain bhi apna takht chhorna pada. 13 October 1924 ko Shah Abd al-Aziz ne Makkah Muazzamah par bhi qabza kar liya. 5 December 1925ء ko unhon ne Madina ka iqtadar hasil kar liya. 19 November 1925ء ko Shareef Makkah Ali ne iqtadar se mukammal dastbardari ka elaan kiya aur yun Jeddah par bhi Aal Saud ka qabza ho gaya. Aath January 1926ء ko Shah Hijaz Abd al-Aziz Ibn Abd al-Rahman Aal Saud ne ek khususi taqreeb mein Mamlakat Najd-o-Hijaz ke mukammal ikhtiyarat sambhalnay ka elaan kar diya. 20 May 1927ء ko Bartania ne tamam maqbuza ilaqon par jo is waqt Mamlakat Hijaz-o-Najd kehlatay the Abd al-Aziz Ibn Saud ki hukmarani ko tasleem kar liya. 23 September 1932ء ko Shah Abd al-Aziz Ibn Saud ne Mamlakat Hijaz-o-Najd ka naam tabdeel kar ke Al-Mamlaka Al-Arabia Al-Saudia rakhne ka elaan kar diya. Shah Abd al-Aziz bin Abd al-Rahman Aal Saud ne jald hi apni mamlakat ko Islami rang mein dhal diya. Doosri janib un ki khush qismati se Saudi Arab mein tel ke zakha'ir ki nishan dehi hui. Sanah 1933ء mein Shah Abd al-Aziz ne California Petroleum Company ke sath tel nikalnay ka mua'ahida kiya. Ibtidai chand baras jad-o-jehad mein basar hue magar 1938ء mein jab California Petroleum Company ke maahirain nakaam ho kar mulk loutnay hi walay the ke achanak ek kuwen se khazana ubal pada aur itna tel nikla jis par woh maahirain khud bhi dang reh gayay. Yeh waqiah na sirf Saudi hukmaranon aur California company ke liye hairan kun tha balkay pooray jazeera numa Arab ke liye ek moajza tha. Tel ki daryaft ne Saudi Arab ko maeshi tor par zabardast istehkam bakhsha aur mamlakat mein khushhali ka daur daura ho gaya. 9 November 1953ء ko Shah Abd al-Aziz bin Abd al-Rahman Aal Saud wafat pa gayay. Saudi Arab ki hukumat ka buniyadi idara Aal Saud ki badshahat hai. 1992ء mein ikhtiyar kiye gayay buniyadi qawaneen ke mutabiq Saudi Arab par pehle badshah Abd al-Aziz Ibn Saud ki aulaad hukmarani karegi aur Quran Pak mulk ka ain aur shari'at hukumat ki bunyad hai. Mulk mein koi tasleem shuda siyasi jama'at hai na intikhabat hotay hain albatta 2005ء mein muqami intikhabat ka in'iqad hua. Badshah ke ikhtiyarat shar'i qawaneen aur Saudi riwayaat ke andar mahdood hain. Ilawa azeen use Saudi Shahi Khandan, Ulama aur Saudi muasharay ke deegar ahem anasir ka ittifaq bhi chahiye. Saudi Arab duniya bhar mein masajid aur Quran schoolon ke qiyam ke zariye Islam ki tarwij karti hai. Shahi Khandan ke ahem arkan ulama ki manzoori se Shahi Khandan mein kisi ek shakhs ko badshah muntakhib kartay hain. Qanoon saazi wuzara ki council amal mein lati hai jo lazmi tor par Shari'at Islami se mutabiqat rakhti ho. Adalat Shar'i nizam ki paband hain jin ke qaziyon ka taqarrur Aala Adalati Council ki sifarish par badshah amal mein lata hai. Saudi Arab ko intizami lehaaz se terah ilaqon ya subon mein taqseem kiya gaya hai, jin ko Arabi zuban mein manaatiq (Arabi wahid mintaqa) kehtay hain. Mamlakat Saudi Arab Jazeera Numay Arab ke 80 feesad raqbe par mushtamil hai. Muttahida Arab Amarat, Oman aur Yemen ke sath munsalik mulk ki sarhadon ka bada hissa ghair muta'ayyan hai is liye mulk ka ain durust raqba ab bhi namaloom hai. Saudi hukumat ke andazon ke mutabiq mamlakat ka raqba 22 lakh 17 hazar 949 murabba kilometer (8 lakh 56 hazar 356 murabba meel) hai. Deegar andazon ke mutabiq mulk ka raqba 19 lakh 60 hazar 582 murabba kilometer (7 lakh 56 hazar 934 murabba meel) aur 22 lakh 40 hazar murabba kilometer (8 lakh 64 hazar 869 murabba meel) ke darmiyan mein hai taham donon suraton mein Saudi Arab raqbay ke lehaaz se duniya ke 15 bade mulkon mein shumar hota hai. Mamlakat jughrafiya mukhtalif nau'iyat ka hai. Maghribi sahili ilaqay (Al-Tihamah) se zameen satah samandar se buland hona shuru hoti hai aur ek taweel pahari silsilay (Jabal Al-Hijaz) tak ja milti hai jis ke baad satah murtafa hain. Junub maghribi Aseer khitte mein paharon ki bulandi 3 hazar meter (9 hazar 840 foot) tak hai aur yeh mulk ke sab se zyada sarsabz aur khushgawar mausam ka hamil ilaqah hai. Yahan Ta'if aur Abha jaise tafreehi maqamat qaim hain. Khaleej-e-Faris ke sath sath qaim mashriqi ilaqah buniyadi tor par pathreela aur reetila hai. Maroof ilaqah Rub' al Khali mulk ke junubi khitte mein hai aur sehrai ilaqay ke ba'is idhar abadi taqreeban na honay ke barabar hai. Mamlakat ka taqreeban tamam hissa sehrai-o-neem sehrai ilaqay par mushtamil hai aur sirf 2 feesad raqba qabil-e-kasht hai. Badi abadiyan sirf mashriqi aur maghribi sahilon aur Hofuf aur Buraydah jaise nakhlstanon mein maujood hain. Saudi Arab mein saal bhar behnay wala koi darya ya jheel maujood nahin. Saudi Arab ka mausam majmui tor par shadeed garam aur khushk hai. Yeh duniya ke un chand ilaqon mein se ek hai jahan garmiyon mein darja hararat ka 50 degree centigrade (120 degree Fahrenheit) se bhi oopar jana mamool ki baat hai. Mausam sarma mein buland pahari ilaqon mein kabhi kabhar barf pad jati hai taham mustaqil buniyadon par barf bari nahin hoti. Mausam sarma ka ausat darja hararat 8 se 20 degree centigrade (47 se 68 degree Fahrenheit) hai. Mausam garma mein ausat darja hararat 27 se 43 degree centigrade (81 se 109 degree Fahrenheit) hota hai. Wasat sehrai ilaqon mein garmiyon mein bhi raat ke waqt mausam sard ho jata hai. Saudi Arab mein barish bohat kam hoti hai taham kabhi kabhar mausla dhar barish se wadiyon mein zabardast sailab aa jatay hain. Dar ul hukumat Riyadh mein salana barish 100 milli meter (4 inch) hai jo January se May ke darmiyan mein hoti hai. Jeddah mein November aur January ke darmiyan mein 54 milli meter (2.1 inch) barish hoti hai. 2005ء ke mutabiq Saudi Arab ki abadi 26.4 million hai jis mein 5.6 million ghair mulki abadi bhi shamil hai. 1960ء ki dahai tak mamlakat ki abadi ki aksariyat khana badosh ya neem khana badosh thi lekin maeeshat aur shahron mein tezi se taraqqi ki badoulat ab mulk ki 95 feesad abadi mustahkam hai. Sharah paidaish 29.56 fi ek hazar afraad hai jabkay sharah amwat sirf 2.62 fi ek hazar afraad hai. Chand shahron aur nakhlstanon mein abadi ki kasafat ek hazar afraad fi murabba kilometer se bhi zyada hai. Taqreeban 80 feesad Saudi bashinday nasli tor par Arab hain. Mazeed bar'an chand junubi aur mashriq Afriqi nasal se bhi talluq rakhtay hain jo chand sau saal qabl awwalan ghulam bana kar yahan laye gayay the. Saudi Arab mein duniya bhar ke 70 lakh tarkeen-e-watan bhi muqeem hain jin mein Bharat ke 14 lakh, Bangladesh ke 10 lakh, Pakistan ke 9 lakh, Philippines ke 8 lakh aur Misr ke 7 lakh 50 hazar bashinday shamil hain. Qareebi mumalik ke Arab bashindon ki badi ta'aad mein mamlakat mein bar sar-e-rozgar hai. Saudi Arab mein maghribi mumalik se talluq rakhne walay ek lakh bashinday bhi qiyam pazeer hain. 1932ء mein Mamlakat Saudi Arab ke qiyam ke waqt har bashinde ki taleem tak rasayi nahin thi aur shahri ilaqon mein masajid se mulhaq madaris mein taleem ki mahdood aur infradi koshishain ho rahi theen. In madaris mein Islami aur deeni taleem sikhayi jati thi taham guzashta sadi ke ikhtitam tak Saudi Arab ek qaumi taleemi nizam ka hamil hai jis mein tamam shahriyon ko school se qabl se le kar jamia ki satah tak muft tarbiyat faraham ki jati hai. Jadeed Saudi taleemi nizam jadeed aur riwayati tajurba-o-shubah jaat mein mayari taleem faraham karta hai. Islam ki taleem Saudi nizam-e-taleem ka buniyadi khasa hai. Saudi Arab ka mazhabi taleemi nisab duniya bhar ke madaris aur schoolon mein bhi padhaya jata hai. Saudi Arab mein baqaida buniyadi taleem ka aaghaz 1930ء ki dahai mein hua. 1945ء mein Shah Aziz Al Saud ne mamlakat mein schoolon ke qiyam ke liye ek jami program ka aaghaz kiya. 6 saal baad 1951ء mein mamlakat ke 226 schoolon mein 29 hazar 887 talib ilm zer-e-taleem the. 1954ء mein Wizarat-e-Taleem ka qiyam amal mein aaya jis ke pehle wazeer Shahzada Mahroz bin Aziz banay. Saudi Arab ki pehli jamia Shah Saud University 1957ء mein Riyadh mein qaim hui.
Saudi Arab ka mausam majmui tor par shadeed garam aur khushk hai. Yeh duniya ke un chand ilaqon mein se ek hai jahan garmiyon mein darja hararat ka 50 degree centigrade (120 degree Fahrenheit) se bhi oopar jana mamool ki baat hai. Mausam sarma mein buland pahari ilaqon mein kabhi kabhar barf pad jati hai taham mustaqil buniyadon par barf bari nahin hoti. Mausam sarma ka ausat darja hararat 8 se 20 degree centigrade (47 se 68 degree Fahrenheit) hai. Mausam garma mein ausat darja hararat 27 se 43 degree centigrade (81 se 109 degree Fahrenheit) hota hai. Wasat sehrai ilaqon mein garmiyon mein bhi raat ke waqt mausam sard ho jata hai. Saudi Arab mein barish bohat kam hoti hai taham kabhi kabhar mausla dhar barish se wadiyon mein zabardast sailab aa jatay hain. Dar ul hukumat Riyadh mein salana barish 100 milli meter (4 inch) hai jo January se May ke darmiyan mein hoti hai. Jeddah mein November aur January ke darmiyan mein 54 milli meter (2.1 inch) barish hoti hai.
2005ء ke mutabiq Saudi Arab ki abadi 26.4 million hai jis mein 5.6 million ghair mulki abadi bhi shamil hai. 1960ء ki dahai tak mamlakat ki abadi ki aksariyat khana badosh ya neem khana badosh thi lekin maeeshat aur shahron mein tezi se taraqqi ki badoulat ab mulk ki 95 feesad abadi mustahkam hai. Sharah paidaish 29.56 fi ek hazar afraad hai jabkay sharah amwat sirf 2.62 fi ek hazar afraad hai. Chand shahron aur nakhlstanon mein abadi ki kasafat ek hazar afraad fi murabba kilometer se bhi zyada hai. Taqreeban 80 feesad Saudi bashinday nasli tor par Arab hain. Mazeed bar'an chand junubi aur mashriq Afriqi nasal se bhi talluq rakhtay hain jo chand sau saal qabl awwalan ghulam bana kar yahan laye gayay the. Saudi Arab mein duniya bhar ke 70 lakh tarkeen-e-watan bhi muqeem hain jin mein Bharat ke 14 lakh, Bangladesh ke 10 lakh, Pakistan ke 9 lakh, Philippines ke 8 lakh aur Misr ke 7 lakh 50 hazar bashinday shamil hain. Qareebi mumalik ke Arab bashindon ki badi ta'aad mein mamlakat mein bar sar-e-rozgar hai. Saudi Arab mein maghribi mumalik se talluq rakhne walay ek lakh bashinday bhi qiyam pazeer hain.
1932ء mein Mamlakat Saudi Arab ke qiyam ke waqt har bashinde ki taleem tak rasayi nahin thi aur shahri ilaqon mein masajid se mulhaq madaris mein taleem ki mahdood aur infradi koshishain ho rahi theen. In madaris mein Islami aur deeni taleem sikhayi jati thi taham guzashta sadi ke ikhtitam tak Saudi Arab ek qaumi taleemi nizam ka hamil hai jis mein tamam shahriyon ko school se qabl se le kar jamia ki satah tak muft tarbiyat faraham ki jati hai. Jadeed Saudi taleemi nizam jadeed aur riwayati tajurba-o-shubah jaat mein mayari taleem faraham karta hai. Islam ki taleem Saudi nizam-e-taleem ka buniyadi khasa hai. Saudi Arab ka mazhabi taleemi nisab duniya bhar ke madaris aur schoolon mein bhi padhaya jata hai. Saudi Arab mein baqaida buniyadi taleem ka aaghaz 1930ء ki dahai mein hua. 1945ء mein Shah Aziz Al Saud ne mamlakat mein schoolon ke qiyam ke liye ek jami program ka aaghaz kiya. 6 saal baad 1951ء mein mamlakat ke 226 schoolon mein 29 hazar 887 talib ilm zer-e-taleem the. 1954ء mein Wizarat-e-Taleem ka qiyam amal mein aaya jis ke pehle wazeer Shahzada Mahroz bin Aziz banay. Saudi Arab ki pehli jamia Shah Saud University 1957ء mein Riyadh mein qaim hui. Aaj Saudi Arab ka qaumi sarkari taleemi nizam 8 jam'at, 24 hazar se za'id schoolon aur hazaron collegeon aur deegar taleemi-o-tarbiyati idaron par mushtamil hai. Is nizam ke tehat har talib ilm ko muft taleem, kutub aur sehhat ki sahooliyat faraham ki jati hain. Mamlakat ke sarkari mizaniya ka 24 feesad se za'id taleem ke liye makhsus hai. Saudi Arab mein talib ilmon ko scholarship program ke tehat biroon-e-mulk bhi bheja jata hai jin mein Amreeka, Canada, Bartania, Australia, Japan, Malaysia Germany aur deegar mumalik shamil hain.
Mulk bhar mein ek behtareen naqal-o-hamal ka nizam qaim hai. Saudi Arab hukumat maazi mein zilahi nizam ke istemal ki hausla afzai karti rahi hai kyunkay wahan petrol ki qeemat baqi duniya ke muqablay mein sab se kam rahi hai. February 2018ء mein elaan kiya gaya ke, Saudi Arab ki char ahem motorways par raftar mein behtari laye jayegi aur use 140 kilometer fi ghanta ki raftar se pahuncha diya jayega. Is mansoobay mein Makkah Madina, Sha'iz-Dammam aur aakhir mein Riyadh Ta'if motorways shamil hain. Mulk mein ek taraqqi yafta behri naqal-o-hamal ka nizam hai jo buniyadi tor par petrochemical ki naqal-o-hamal ki sahoolat ke liye tayyar kiya gaya hai. Saudi Port Authority in behri karwaiyon ki nigrani karti hai, yeh idara mulk mein bandargahon ke intizam ka zimmedar hai. Shahrahon-o-hawai safar par zyada inhasar karne ke natijay mein, Saudi Arab mein rail naqal-o-hamal mein doosray zara'i ki tarah sarmayakari nahin hui. Albatta, ab mulk ke railway ke buniyadi dhanchay mein tau'see ki mansoobabandi ki gayi hai.
Saudi Arab ka sab se maqbool khel football hai. Saudi Arab garmai Olympics, volleyball, basketball aur deegar khelon mein aalmi satah ke tournaments mein shirkat karta hai. Qaumi football musalsal 4 martaba World Cup aur 6 martaba Asian Cup ke liye qualify karne ke ba'is aalmi satah par jani jati hai. Saudi Arab teen martaba Asian Champion reh chuka hai aur do martaba final mein shikast kha gaya. Saudi Arab ke chand maroof football khiladiyon mein Majed Abdullah, Sami Al Jaber aur Yasser Al Qahtani shamil hain.
Islam Saudi Arab ka sarkari mazhab hai aur is ka qanoon tamam shahriyon ke Musalman honay ko zaroori qarar deta hai. Islam ke siwa deegar mazahib ke pairukaron ko khullay aam ibadat se mana hai. Saudi Arab shehriyat hasil karne ke liye kisi bhi ghair Muslim ko Islam qabool karna zaroori hai. Saudi Arab ke nafiz-e-shari'at aur is ke insani haqooq se mutalliq qawaneen par tanqeed bhi ki jati hai.
Saudi saqafat ki buniyad mazhab Islam hai. Islam ke do muqaddas tareen maqamat Makkah Mukarrama aur Madina Munawwara Saudi Arab mein maujood hain. Har roz duniya bhar ke Musalman 5 martaba Makkah Mukarrama mein qaim Khan-e-Kaaba ki janib rukh kar ke namaz padhtay hain. Saudi Arab mein hafta war ta'teel jumma ko hoti hai. Quran Majeed Saudi Arab ka ain aur Shari'at Islami adalati nizam ki buniyad hai.
Saudi Arab ke maroof tareen lok rasam qaumi raqs Arzi hai. Talwaron ke sath kiya janay wala yeh raqs qadeem Badwi riwayaat ka hissa hai. Hijaz ki Al-Sahba lok mausiqui ki jarain qurun-e-wusta ke Arab Andalus se ja milti hain.
Saudi Arab ka libas bashindon ke zameen, maazi aur Islam se talluq ka akkas hai. Riwayati tor par mard takhnay tak ki lambai ki ooni ya sooti qameez pehantay hain jo Thob kehlaty hai jis ke sath sar par Shamagh ya Ghutrah ka istemal kiya jata hai. Aurton ka libas qabaili motiyon, sikkoun, dhati dhagon aur deegar ashya se muzayyan hota hai. Saudi khawateen ghar se bahar Abaya aur Niqab ka istemal karti hain.
Islam mein sharab noshi aur soor ke gosht ke istemal ki sakhti se mumani'at hai aur is par Saudi Arab mein sakhti se amaldaramad kiya jata hai. Saudi roti khubz ka taqreeban tamam khanon mein istemal kiya jata hai. Bhuni hui bhed, murghi, falafel, shawarma aur foul bhi deegar mash'hoor khanon mein shamil hain. Riwayati qahwah khanay har jagah maujood hain taham ab in ki jagah bade cafes le rahay hain. Baghair doodh ki siyah Arabi chaye ka istemal har jagah kiya jata hai.
Saudi Arab mein theatre aur cinema par pabandi ayid hai taham Dhahran aur Ras Tanura mein qaim niji abadiyon mein theatre qaim hain taham yeh filmon ki numayish ki bajaye muqami mausiqui aur funoon pesh karne ke hawalay se mash'hoor hain. Haal hi mein bachchon aur aurton ke liye Arabi cartoon pesh karne ke liye cinemas ke qiyam ka mansoobah banaya gaya hai.
Hawai jahaz ek aisa gaadi ya jahaz hota hai ke jo kurra-e-hawa mein parwaz kar sakta ho. Aksar sarookhi naqilaat, hawai jahaz ke zumray mein shumar nahin kiye jatay kyunkay yeh hawa ke saharay par inhasar nahin kartay. Woh tamam insani naqal-o-harakat ke jo hawai jahaz ko qabil-e-parwaz rakhnay mein ikhtiyar ki jati hai use tayarani kaha jata hai aur woh shakhsiyat jo hawai jahaz ko mahv-e-parwaz karta/karti hai yani usko udata/udati hai use hawa baaz kaha jata hai; jabkay aisay hawai jahaz ya hawai naqilaat bhi takhleeq kiye gayay hain jo tayyar ke baghair parwaz kar saktay hain un ke liye bila insan hawai naqil ki istilah istemal ki jati hai. Hawai jahazon ki do badi aqsam hain hawa se halkay (hawa sukun) aur hawa se bhari (hawa muharrik). Hawa sukun aisay jahaz hain jo hawa mein tairnay ke liye markaz-e-uchal istemal kartay hain jis tarah behri jahaz pani mein tairnay ke liye kartay hain. In jahazon mein aam tor par bade tailay nasb hotay hain jo helium, hydrogen ya garam hawa se bharay hotay hain. Jis ki wajah se jahaz ki kasafat kam ho jati hai aur woh fiza mein tairnay lagta hai. Hawa muharrik jahazon mein aisay machine nasb hotay hain jo gas ya hawa ko neechay ki taraf zor se dhakeltay hain jis ki wajah se radd-e-amal hota hai aur jahaz oopar ki taraf harkat karta hai. Oopar ki taraf harkat paida karne ke do tareeqay hain hawai uthao aur quwwati uthao. Hawai uthao mein jahaz apne paron ke zariye hawa ko neechay ki taraf dhakelta hai aur khud oopar ki taraf harkat karta hai. Jabkay quwwati uthao mein jahaz apne engine ke zariye hawa ko ba-zor neechay ki taraf dhakelta hai. Ma'een pardar hawai jahazon ke par ek hi jagah par mustaqil hotay hain yani woh harkat nahin kartay. Jaisa ke musafir bardar fizai tayyaray aur jangi tayyaray waghera. Aisay jahaz jin ke bazoo harkat ke qabil hotay hain. Aisay jahaz apni mutaharrak paron ke zariye udaan kartay hain. Masalan helicopter.
Hindustan jis ka talaffuz (Hindustan ya Hindustaan) se hota hai, is ki mukhtasir shakl Hind (Hind) hai, jo Hindustan ke liye Farsi mein bhi mustamal hai, bade paimanay par bar-e-sagheer Hind; jise baad mein is ke bashindon ne Hindi-Urdu (Hindustani) mein istemal kiya. Bar-e-sagheer ke deegar namon mein Jambu Dwip, Bharat aur India shamil hain. Taqseem-e-Hind ke baad; yeh Jamhooria Hind ke tarikhi naam ke tor par istemal hota raha. Hindustan ka ek sanavi maani shumali Hindustan mein Hind Ganga maidan ke liye jughrafiyai istilah ke tor par hai. Hindustan Farsi lafz Hindu se maakhuz hai, jo Sanskrit ke Sindhu ke mushabih hai. ke mutabiq aawaz ki S se H mein tabdeeli 850-600 qabl Maseeh ke darmiyan waqay hui. Lehaza, Rigvedic Sapt Sindhu (saat daryaoon ki zameen) Avesta mein Hapt Hindu ban gaya. Kaha jata hai ke yeh pandrahwan domain hai, jise Ahura Mazda ne banaya hai, ba-zahiran ghair mamooli garmi ki sarzamin. 515 qabl Maseeh mein Dara Awwal ne Wadi Sindhu ko shamil kiya jis mein Sindhu (aaj kal ka Sindh) bhi shamil tha, jise Farsi mein Hindu kaha jata hai. Khashayarsha Awwal ke zamanay mein Hindu ki istilah Sindh ke mashriq ki zameenon ko bhi shamil hoti thi. mein ghaliban pehli sadi Eeswi se -stan (jaaye, jagah) ka izafa kiya gaya, jo kisi mulk ya khitte ki nishan dehi karta hai, maujooda lafz Hindustan ki tashkeel deta hai. Isi tarah 262 Eeswi mein Shahpur Awwal ke naqsh-e-Rustam nawishta mein Sindh ko Hindustan kaha gaya hai. Muarrikh bayan kartay hain ke zerain Sindh taas se, Hindustan ki istilah ahista ahista kam-o-besh pooray bar-e-sagheer mein phail gayi. Greco-Roman naam India aur Cheeni naam Shen-tu ne bhi isi tarah ke irtiqaa ki pairvi ki. Arabi istilah Hind; jo Farsi Hindu se maakhuz hai, Arabon ne Makran ke sahil se Indonesia ke jazeera numa tak Hindustani khitte ke liye istemal kiya tha. Lekin aakhir kaar is ki shanakht bhi bar-e-sagheer Pak-o-Hind se hui. Hindustan aksar jadeed daur Jamhooria Hind ke liye istemal hota hai. Istilah mein shamil na'aray aam tor par khelon ke programs aur deegar awami programs mein sunaye jatay hain, jin mein teamain ya idaray shamil hotay hain, jo Hindustan ki jadeed qaumi riyasat ki numaindagi kartay hain. Marketing mein Hindustan naam; aam tor par ishtehaari muhimmon mein qaumi asal ke isharay ke tor par bhi istemal hota hai aur yeh bohat se company ke namon mein bhi mustamal hai. Pakistan ke baani Muhammad Ali Jinnah aur un ki jama'at Muslim League ne Hindu aksariyati abadi ke hawalay se jadeed daur ki Jamhooria Hind ko Hindustan kehnay par israr kiya. Hindustan mein Hindustani bolnay walon ke darmiyan ek istemal mein mazhabi nisbat se qata nazar; 'Hindustani' istilah se murad Indian (Hindustan ka bashinda) hai. Ghair Hindustani bolnay walon masalan Bengali bolnay walon mein Hindustani ka istemal; un logon ki wazahat ke liye kiya jata hai, jo oopri Ganga se hain, mazhabi wabastagi se qata nazar; balkay ek jughrafiyai istilah ke tor par. Hindustani ko baaz auqat junubi Asia mein laagoo honay wali nasli istilah ke tor par istemal kiya jata hai (misal ke tor par, junubi Asia mein jarain rakhnay wala Mauritian ya Surinam ka aadmi apni nasal ko yeh keh kar bayan kar sakta hai ke woh Hindustani hai). Misal ke tor par 'Hindustanen ek Walandeezi lafz hai, jo Netherlands aur Surinam mein junub Asiai nasl ke logon ki wazahat ke liye istemal hota hai. Hindustani zuban Hindustan ki zuban hai aur bar-e-sagheer Pak-o-Hind ki zuban-e-rabita-e-aamma hai. Hindustani aur Delhi ke ilaqon ki purani Hindi boli se maakhuz hai. Is ki adabi mayari shaklain jadeed mayari Hindi aur jadeed mayari Urdu mukhtalif rasm ul khat istemal karti hain. Khud Hindi register ne apna naam mukhtasir shakl Hind (India) se akhaz kiya hai. Ibtidai Farsi ulama ko Hindustan ki had tak mahdood ilm tha. Islam ki aamad aur Islami futuhaat ke baad; Hindustan ke maani ne is ki Arabi shakl Hind ke sath ta'amul kiya, jo Farsi se bhi maakhuz tha aur taqreeban is ka mutaradif ban gaya. Arabon ne, samandari tijarat mein masroof, maghribi Balochistan mein Tees se le kar Indonesia ke jazeera numa tak ki tamam zameenon ko Hind ke tasawwur mein shamil kiya, khaas tor par jab is ki wasee shakl mein Al-Hind ke tor par istemal hota. Hindustan lafz ne is wasee maani ko hasil nahin kiya. Andre Wink ke mutabiq, is ne woh imtiaz bhi hasil nahin kiya, jo mit gaya, Sindh (taqreeban jo ab maghribi Pakistan hai) aur Hind (darya-e-Sindh ke mashriq ki zameenon) ke darmiyan; doosray zara'i batatay hain ke Sindh aur Hind ko ibtidai zamanay se mutaradif istemal kiya jata tha. Aur yeh ke Hindustan mein Islami hukumat ki aamad ke baad; pooray bar-e-sagheer ke liye Hind aur Sindh mutaradifat ke tor par istemal kiye gayay. 10ween sadi ke matan Hudood al-Alam ne Hindustan ko taqreeban bar-e-sagheer Pak-o-Hind ke tor par bayan kiya hai, jis ki maghribi had darya-e-Sindh se banti hai, junubi had behira-e-azeem tak jati hai aur mashriqi had Kamarupa, maujooda Assam mein hai. Agli das sadiyon tak, Hind aur Hindustan donon bar-e-sagheer mein bilkul isi maani ke sath istemal hotay rahay, is ke sath un ki sifat Hindawi, Hindustani aur Hindi istemal hoti rahi. Darhaqeeqat 1220 Eeswi mein muarrikh Hasan Nizami Nishapuri ne Hind ko Peshawar se Bahr-e-Hind ke sahilon tak aur doosri simt mein Sistan se Cheen ki pahariyon tak bataya. 11ween sadi mein shuru honay wali Turk-Farsi futuhaat ke sath Hindustan ka ek tang maani bhi shakl ikhtiyar kar gaya. Fatehheen bar-e-sagheer ke baqi hisson ko nazar andaaz kartay hue apne zer-e-tasallut zameenon ko Hindustan kehnay ke zimmedar the. 11ween sadi ke awail mein Punjab mein Saltanat Ghaznavia ki ek satellite riyasat jis ka dar ul hukumat Lahore tha, ko Hindustan kaha jata tha. Delhi Saltanat ke qiyam ke baad, shumali Hindustan, khaas tor par Ganga ke maidani ilaqon aur Punjab ko Hindustan kaha janay laga. Scholar Bartinder Nath Mukherjee ka kehna hai ke Hindustan ka yeh tang maani wasee maani ke sath sath maujood tha aur baaz musannifeen ne in donon ko ba-yak waqt istemal kiya hai. Mughlia Saltanat (1526ء–1857ء) ne apni sarzamin ko 'Hindustan' kaha. 'Mughlia' istilah khud kabhi zameen ke liye istemal nahin hui. Jaisay jaisay saltanat phaili, isi tarah 'Hindustan' bhi phaila. Is ke sath sath 'Hindustan' ke maani pooray bar-e-sagheer Hind ke tor par Babar Nama aur Ain-e-Akbari mein bhi paye jatay hain. Aakhri Gurkha'i badshah Prithvi Narayan Shah ne khud Saltanat Nepal ka asal Hindustan ke tor par elaan kiya; kyunkay shumali Hindustan par Islami Mughal hukmaranon ki hukumat thi. Khud elaan un ke daur hukumat mein Hindu samaji zabta ko naafiz karne aur apne mulk ko Hinduon ke liye qabil-e-riyaish qarar denay ke liye kiya gaya tha. Is ne shumali Hindustan ko Mughlan (Mughlon ka mulk) bhi kaha aur is khitta ko Musalman ghair mulkiyon ki darandazi qarar diya. Yeh dohari maani Europeans ki aamad ke sath barqarar rahay. Ne 1792 mein Memoir of a Map of Hindustan ke unwaan se ek atlas tayyar kiya, jo darhaqeeqat bar-e-sagheer Pak-o-Hind ka naqsha tha. Is tarah Rennell ne teen tasawwur, India, Hindustan aur Mughal Saltanat ko aapas mein mila diya. J. Bernoulli, jin ke liye Hindustan ka matlab Mughlia Saltanat tha, ne apne French tarjumah ko La Carte générale de l'Inde (Hindustan ka umumi naqsha) kaha. Bartanwi hisab ka yeh 'Hindustan' Angrezon ke zer-e-iqtidar ilaqon (jise kabhi kabhi 'India' bhi kaha jata hai) aur muqami hukmaranon ke zer-e-intizam ilaqon mein taqseem kiya gaya tha. Taham Bartanwi ahkam aur musannifeen ka khayal tha ke Hindustani 'Hindustan' ka istemal sirf shumali Hindustan ke liye kartay hain. 1886ء mein sha'ay honay wali ek Anglo-Indian Dictionary mein kaha gaya hai jabkay Hindustan ka matlab India hai, muqami zuban mein yeh Bihar aur Bengal ko chhor kar darya-e-Narmada ke shimal mein waqay ilaqay ki numaindagi karne ke liye istemal kiya gaya tha. Tehreek-e-Azadi ke dauran, Hindustaniyon ne apni sarzamin ko teenon namon se pukara 'India', 'Hindustan' aur 'Bharat'. Muhammad Iqbal ki nazm Tarana-e-Hindi Tehreek-e-Azadi Hind ke karkunon mein ek maqbool hubb al-watani ka tarana tha. Saare jahan se achcha Hindustan hamara All-India Muslim League ki 1940 ki Qaraardad Lahore (jise Qaraardad Pakistan bhi kaha jata hai) ne Bartanwi Hind ke shimal-o-maghrib aur shimal-o-mashriq mein Muslim aksariyati ilaqon ke liye khud mukhtari ka mutalba kiya, jise maqbooliyat mein 'Pakistan' kaha janay laga. Bol chaal aur baqiya Hindustan ko 'Hindustan' kaha janay laga. Bartanwi ahkam ne bhi in donon istilahaat ko muntakhib kar liya aur unhain sarkari tor par istemal karna shuru kar diya. Taham 'Hindustan' ke Hinduon ki sarzamin ke muzmir maani ki wajah se yeh naam Hindustani leaders ki manzoori par poora nahin utra. Un ka israr tha ke naye Dominion of India ko 'Hindustan' nahin balkay 'India' kaha jana chahiye. Ghaliban isi wajah se 'Hindustan' naam ko Hindustan ki Dastoor Saaz Assembly ki sarkari manzoori nahin mili, jabkay 'Bharat' ko sarkari naam ke tor par apnaya gaya. Taham yeh tasleem kiya gaya ke 'Hindustan' ghair sarkari tor par istemal hota rahega. Bhartiya Armed Forces naam ka salami version, Jai Hind ko jang ki pukar ke tor par istemal karti hai.
Azerbaijan (Azerbaijani Azərbaycan) jis ko sarkari tor par Jamhuria Azerbaijan kaha jata hai, Eurasia ke junubi Qafqaz ka sab se bada aur sab se zyada abadi rakhnay wala mulk hai. Mashriqi Europe aur Maghribi Asia ke darmiyan waqay is mulk ke mashriq mein Behira-e-Qazvin, shimal mein Russia, maghrib mein Armenia aur Turkey, shimal maghrib mein Georgia aur junub mein Iran waqay hai. Azerbaijan ke junub maghrib mein waqay Nagorno-Karabakh aur saat mazeed azla Nagorno-Karabakh ki 1994 ki jang ke baad se Armenia ke qabze mein hain. Aqwaam-e-Mutahida ki Salamati Council ki char qaraardadoun ne Armenia se kaha hai ke woh Azerbaijan ki sarhad se apni faujain hata le. Mulki raqbay mein tees murabba kilometer ke lag bhag ke chand jaza'ir bhi hain jo Behira-e-Qazvin mein waqay hain. Azerbaijan ek secular aur unitary jamhuria hai. Yeh mulk Azad Riyaston ki Daulat-e-Mushtarika, GUAM aur Keemiyai Hathyaroun par Pabandi ki Tanzeem ka baani rukn hai. Mulk ka mustaqil numainda European Union mein maujood hai, use European Commission ke khususi elchi honay aur Aqwaam-e-Mutahida ka rukn honay, OSCE, European Council aur NATO ke qiyam-e-amn ke program yani PfP program mein bhi numaindagi hasil hai. Jamhuria Azerbaijan ki riyasat tarikhi tor par is ilaqay se talluq rakhti hai jise Qafqazi Albania ke naam se jana jata hai. Is ilaqay ko Arran bhi kaha jata hai. Qafqaz 1740 se Roosi qabzay tak mukhtalif khawanin ke qabzay mein tha aur 19ween sadi ke wasat se le kar 1917 tak junubi Qafqaz Roosi subah jaat mein munqasim tha. Azerbaijan ke maujooda ilaqay mein qadeem tareen insani aasaar pathar ke zamanay tak ke miltay hain. Yeh aasaar mukhtalif gharon mein mahfooz hain. Sharab ki surahiyan jo khushk ho chuki hain, shahar-e-khamoshan aur maqabir mein mili hain. Yeh sharab tambay ke daur mein banayi jati thi. Junubi Qafqaz ko Akamanids ne 550 qabl maseeh mein fateh kiya tha aur is se Zoroastrian mazhab ko farogh mila. Chauthi sadi qabl maseeh mein Sikandar-e-Azam ki aamad ke baad yahan deegar mulhaqa ilaqon mein ek mamlakat qaim hui. Arab Umawi Khalifa ne Sasanion aur Byzantinion ko shikast de kar Qafqazi Albania ko fateh kar liya. Abbasiyon ke zawaal ke baad yeh ilaqah Salarion, Sajidi, Shadadi, Rawadi aur Bayidiyon ke qabzay mein raha. 11ween sadi Eeswi ki ibtida mein wasat Asia se aanay walay Turk Oghuz qabeelon ne batadreej is ilaqay par qabza jamaya. In badshahaton mein se pehli badshahat Ghaznavion ki thi jinhon ne 1030 mein is ilaqah par qabza jamaya. Muqami tor par baad mein aanay walay Saljuqion par Atabak ne fateh payi. Saljuqion ke daur mein muqami shu'ara jaisa ke Nizami Ganjavi aur Khaqani Shirvani ne Farsi adab ko baam-e-urooj tak pahunchaya. Yeh sab aaj kal ke Azerbaijan mein hua. Is ke baad Ildarimiz ne mukhtasar qiyam kiya aur un ke baad Ameer Taimur aaye. Jis ki madad Noshirwan ne ki. Ameer Taimur ki maut ke baad yeh ilaqah do mukhalif riyasaton mein bat gaya. Un ke naam Qara Qoyunlu aur Aq Qoyunlu the. Aq Qoyunlu ki maut ke baad Sultan Uzun Hasan ne Azerbaijan ki poori riyasat par hukmarani ki. Is ke baad yeh ilaqah Shirvanshahon ke paas aaya jinhon ne 861 se 1539 tak ba-taur khud mukhtar muqami hukmaran ke apni haisiyat barqarar rakhi. Shirvanion ke baad Safavion ki baari aayi aur unhon ne Shia mazhab us waqt ki Sunni abadi par zabardasti laagoo kiya. Is zimn mein unhon ne Sunni Usmanioun se jangein bhi kiyein. Kuch arsa baad Safavion ke zawaal ke baad kayi khanoun ne muqami tor par apni hukumatain qaim kar lien aur un ki bahmi ladaiyon ka aaghaz ho gaya. Turkmenchay ke mua'ahiday ke baad kayi ilaqon par Roosi qabza ho gaya. Pehli Jang-e-Azeem mein jab Roose ke zawaal ka waqt aaya to Azerbaijan, Armenia aur Georgia ne mil kar ek alag muttahida riyasat qaim ki jo mukhtasar arsa tak qaim rahi. May 1918 mein yeh riyasat khatam hui aur Azerbaijan ne apni azadi ka elaan kiya aur apna naam Awami Jamhuria Azerbaijan rakha. Is riyasat ko duniya mein pehli Musalman parlimani riyasat honay ka darja hasil hai. Do saal baad Roosiyon ne is par phir se qabza kar liya. March 1922 mein Georgia aur Armenia ke sath ek nayi Transcaucasian SFSR banayi jo Roosi Federation ke matehat thi. 1936 mein yeh bhi apne anjam ko pahunchi aur Azerbaijan ba-taur Soviet Socialist Republic ke Soviet Union mein shamoiliyat ikhtiyar ki. 1940 ki dahai mein Azerbaijan Soviet Socialist Republic ne Jang-e-Azeem Doum ke Mashriqi Mahaz ko tel ki supply ka fareeza sar anjam diya. Adolf Hitler ne Operation Edelweiss shuru kiya taake Qafqazi tel ke kunwoun par qabza kiya ja sakay. Lekin is mein shikast hui. Communist Party ke General Secretary Mikhail Gorbachev ki siyasi policyon ke natijay mein pooray Soviet Union mein bil'umoom aur Nagorno-Karabakh mein bilkhusus bechaini phail gayi. Ayaz Mutalibov ne Azerbaijan ke sadr ke ohday ka halaf liya aur 18 October 1991 ko Azerbaijan ki azadi ka elaan kiya gaya. Azadi ke ibtidai saal Nagorno-Karabakh ki Armenia se honay wali jang ke ba'is dhundla gayay. Jang ke ikhtitam par Azerbaijan ko apne kul raqbay ka 14 se 16 feesad hissa Armenia ko dena pada jis mein Nagorno-Karabakh bhi shamil hai. Us waqt ke sadr ne apni shikast ko qabool kiya aur un ke baad Azerbaijan Communist Party ke sabqa pehle secretary Heydar Aliyev ne aglay sadr ka halaf uthaya. Is daur mein agarche kuch taraqqi hui lekin phir bhi tel se honay wali aamdani ka bada hissa ashraf ki zer-e-istemal raha. Heydar Aliyev ki doosri muddat-e-iqtidar mein un ki maqbooliyat mein kami hui. Ek wajah un ki taraf se intikhabat mein honay wali dhankhad bhi hai. Heydar Aliyev ki wafat ke baad un ke bete ko bhi tanqeed ka samna karna pada jo wazeer-e-azam reh chuke the. Azerbaijan ne 12 November 1995 ko naye ain ki manzoori di jis mein is ke riyasti nishan, jhanday, sarkari nishan aur qaumi taranay ki manzoori di. Azerbaijan ki hukumat mein taaqat ko teen mukhtalif hisson mein taqseem kiya gaya hai jin mein muqannina, adliya aur ashrafiya shamil hain. Qanoon saazi ki ijazat sirf yak-e-aiwani Qaumi Assembly ko hai. Parliament ke intikhabat har paanch saal ke baad November ke pehle itwar ko hotay hain. Ainni Adalat ki madad se intikhabat ke shaffaf honay ke baray mein tasalli ki ja sakti hai. Qaumi Assembly ki taraf se manzoor honay walay qawaneen un ke sha'ay honay ki tarikh se naafiz samjhay jatay hain. Sadr ko paanch saal ki muddat ke liye barah-e-raast muntakhib kiya jata hai. Sadr ke paas cabinet ki tashkeel denay ki taaqat hoti hai. Cabinet mein Wazeer-e-Azam, us ke na'ibin aur wuzara par mushtamil hoti hai. Sadr ke paas Qaumi Assembly tahleel karne ka ikhtiyar nahin hota lekin woh Qaumi Assembly ke faislon ko veto kar sakta hai. Sadr ki taraf se honay walay veto ko khatam karne ke liye Qaumi Assembly ko 95 vote ki adadi aksariyat darkar hoti hai. Adliya Ainni Adalat, Supreme Court aur Economic Adalaton par mushtamil hai.
