Sadr un adalaton ke jajjoun ka taqarrur karta hai. Salamati Council sadr ke matehat ek idara hai aur sadr use ain ke tehat chalata hai. Ise 10 April 1997 mein qaim kiya gaya. Intizami mehkama sadr se hat kar kaam karta hai. Mukhtasar muddat ke dauran Awami Jamhuria Azerbaijan ne 6 mulkon ke sath diplamatic ta'alluqat qaim kiye aur Germany aur Finland mein apne diplomat bhejay. Bain al-aqwami tor par Azerbaijan ki azadi ko Russia ke zawaal ke ek saal baad tasleem kiya gaya. Bahrain aakhri mulk tha jis ne 6 November 1996 ko Azerbaijan ko tasleem kiya. Do tarafah diplamatic ta'alluqat jin mein diplomatoun ka tabadla bhi shamil hai, sab se pehle Turkey, America aur Iran ke sath qaim hue. Ab tak Azerbaijan ke diplamatic ta'alluqat 158 mumalik ke sath hain aur yeh 38 bain al-aqwami tanzeemon ka rukn bhi hai. Ise Ghair Janibdar Mumalik ki Tanzeem aur World Trade Organization mein mubassir ka darja mila hua hai. 9 May 2006 mein Azerbaijan ko General Assembly ke tehat banayi janay wali Insani Huqooq ki Council ka rukn banaya gaya. Is ki muddat 19 June 2006 se shuru hui. Kharija policy ki tarjeehat mein sab se pehle apni sarhadi hudood ki bahali jin mein Nagorno-Karabakh aur saat deegar azla shamil hain, hamsaya mumalik ke sath do tarafah tijarati ta'alluqat, khitte mein salamati aur sukoon ki zamanat, Europe mein shamoiliyat aur bain al-bara'azim salamati aur ta'awun, bain al-khati maeshi, energy aur zara'i naqal-o-hamal shamil hain. Azerbaijan dehashtgardi ke khilaf banne walay bain al-aqwami ittehad ka hissa hai. Is ke ilawa Kosovo, Afghanistan aur Iraq mein aman bahali ki koshishon mein bhi hissa le raha hai. Azerbaijan NATO ke program Aman Mu'ahide ka bhi sargarm rukn hai. 9 November 1991 mein jari honay walay Sadarati Farman ke mutabiq maujooda qaumi afwaj ki tashkeel ki gayi hai. Azerbaijan ki afwaj ke char hissay hain Barri Fauj, Hawai Fauj, Behri Fauj aur Fazai Difa'i Fauj. Is ke ilawa National Guard, Dakhili Guard, Sarhadi Guard aur Sahili Guard yani Coast Guard bhi maujood hain. Sadr ko afwaj ke Supreme Commander ki haisiyat hasil hai. 2007 ke awail mein Azerbaijan ki faujon mein 95000 mard shamil the. Azerbaijan Europe ke riwayati hathyaroun ke mua'ahiday ka paband hai. 13 January 1993 ko Azerbaijan ne Keemiyai Hathyaroun ki Rok Tham ke mua'ahiday par bhi dastkhat kiye the. Azerbaijan NATO ka bhi rukn hai. Is ke ilawa Azerbaijan ne NPT par bhi dastkhat kiye hue hain. Azerbaijan ki musallah afwaj ne dehashtgardi ke khilaf jari jang mein aman bahali ke dastoun ka kirdar bhi ada kiya hai. 2007 mein is ke difa'i ikhrajat 871 million dollar yani 870 crore 10 lakh dollar tak pahunch gayay hain. Intizami umoor ke liye Azerbaijan ko 76 azla mein taqseem kiya gaya hai. In mein 65 dehati, 11 shehri aur 1 khud mukhtar ilaqah shamil hai. Sadr in ilaqon ke liye governor ka taqarrur karta hai. In ke apne muqami sarbarah bhi muntakhib hotay hain jin ke paas muqami satah ke ikhtiyarat hotay hain. Kaleedi ohdon par bhi taqarrur-o-tanazzuli sadr ke ikhtiyar mein hoti hai. Armenia ke zer-e-qabza ilaqon ke governor mulk badri ki halat mein apne fara'iz sar anjam de rahay hain. Azerbaijan ke kul sarhadain 2648 kilometer taweel hain jin mein se Armenia ke sath 1007, Iran ke sath 756, Georgia ke sath 480, Russia ke sath 390 aur Turkey ke sath 15 kilometer ki sarhad shamil hai. Is ki sahili hudood 800 kilometer par phaili hui hain jin mein Behira-e-Caspian ki 456 kilometer ki sarhad bhi shamil hai. Riyasat ki kul lambayi shamalan junuban 400 kilometer aur chaurayi sharqan gharban 500 kilometer hai. Is mein teen pahari silsilay Qafqaz Kabeer, Qafqaz Sagheer aur Talish Pahari Silsilay hain. Yeh pahari silsilay kul mulki raqbay ka taqriban 40 feesad bantay hain. Sab se buland maqam Bazarduzu hai jo 4466 meter buland hai. Is ki sab se nasheebi jagah Behira-e-Caspian mein hai jo satah samandar se 28 meter neechay hai. Duniya mein mitti ke aatish fishanon ka taqreeban nisf hissa Azerbaijan mein paya jata hai. Pani ke ahem zakha'ir mein satah par paye janay walay zakha'ir hain. Taham kul 8350 daryaoon mein se sirf 24 aisay hain jo 100 kilometer se zyada tawalat rakhtay hain. Sab se badi jheel Sarysu hai jo taqriban 67 murabba kilometer par mushtamil hai aur sab se lamba darya Kur hai jo 1515 kilometer taweel hai. Azerbaijan ke mausam ki tashkeel mein Scandinavia ke anti-cyclone ke sard hissay, Siberia ke mo'tadil darja hararat, wasati Asia ke anti-cyclone shamil hain. Landscape ke tanawwu ke hawalay se mulk mein mukhtalif jagahon se hawa ke mukhtalif dabao dakhil hotay hain. Qafqaz Azeem mulk ko sard hawaon ke barah-e-raast dakhle se bachata hai. Is wajah se aksar paharon ke daman aur maidanon mein neem istoai mausam milta hai. In ilaqon mein suraj se aanay wali tabkari bhi bohat zyada hoti hai. Maujooda daur ke 11 mausami khitton mein se 9 Azerbaijan mein miltay hain. Kam se kam aur zyada se zyada darja hararat bil tarteeb manfi 33 degree aur 46 degree centigrade record kiye gayay hain. Kuch ilaqon mein zyada se zyada barish 1600 se 1800 milli meter aur kuch ilaqon mein kam az kam barish 200 se 350 milli meter hoti hai. Aab rasani ke hawalay se Azerbaijan ausat se kam darjay par aata hai aur is mein fi murabba kilometer pani 100000 murabba meter hai. Tamam bade pani ke zakha'ir Kur par banay gayay hain. Nabatat ke tanawwu ke aitbar se Azerbaijan mein Nakhchivan, jahan 60 feesad aur kurra-e-arz ke maidan, jahan 40 feesad anwa'a ke pauday ugte hain, Davachi-Quba jo Qafqaz Azeem ke mashriq mein hai, mein 38 feesad, Qafqaz Sagheer ke darmiyan mein 29 feesad, Gobustan mein 26.6 feesad, Lenkoran mein 27 feesad aur Absheron mein 22 feesad aqsaam payi jati hain. Aam nabatat ki kul 400 mukhtalif aqsaam payi jati hain. Azadi ke baad Azerbaijan ne IMF, World Bank, European Bank bara-e-Ta'ameer-o-Taraqqi, Islami Taraqqiyati Bank aur Asiai Taraqqiyati Bank ki rukniyat hasil ki. Banking ka nizam do sathon par hai jin mein National aur Commerce ke bank shamil hain jo ghair banking sarmayadari nizam ke sath mil kar kaam kartay hain. 1992 mein State Bank ki bajaye National Bank qaim kiya gaya tha. National Bank Azerbaijan ke qaumi bank ka kaam karta hai aur currency ka ijra aur deegar umoor is ki nigrani mein tay hotay hain. Tijarati bankon mein se do bade bank International Bank aur United Universal Joint Stock Bank hukumat ki milkiyat hain. Do tiha'i Azerbaijan tel aur qudrati gas ke hawalay se ahem hai. Qafqaz Sagheer ke aksar hisson mein sona, chandi, loha, tamba, titanium, chromium, manganese, cobalt, molybdenum, mukhtalif ores aur antimony miltay hain. 2007 ke awail mein Azerbaijan mein kul 4755.1 hectare zameen qabil-e-kasht hai aur lakdi ke 13 crore 60 lakh mukab meter zakha'ir maujood hain. Azerbaijan ki samandari tijarat ke idaray ke paas kul 54 jahaz hain. Daramad honay wali aksar ashya ke kuch hissay ab Azerbaijan mein hi tayyar hotay hain. 2002 mein Azerbaijan mein mobile phone ke istemal mein intehayi izafa hua. Awami payphones bhi har jagah miltay hain aur in par exchange ya dukanon se khareeday gayay token istemal hotay hain. Yeh payphone token la mahdood muddat ke local phone karne ke liye istemal hotay hain. 2005 mein 1091400 landline phone the aur 408000 internet ke sarifeen. Is ke ilawa do GSM aur char CDMA network bhi kaam kar rahay hain. Aam rail ki patri ko 2005 mein 2957 kilometer tak phailaya gaya aur barqi trainon ke route ko 127 kilometer tak barhaya gaya. 2006 mein kul hawai addoun ki ta'aad 36 thi aur is ke ilawa ek heliport bhi maujood hai. 2007 mein honay walay aqliyati mardum shumari se pata chala hai ke Azeris ki ta'aad 95.8 feesad, Roosi 2.8 feesad, Armenian 1.5 feesad, Talysh 1 feesad, Avar 0.6 feesad, Tatar 0.4 feesad, Turk 0.5 feesad, Ukrainian 0.4 feesad, Kurd 0.2 feesad, Georgian 0.2 feesad, Sakhrs 0.2 feesad, Tat 0.13 feesad, Yahoodi 0.1 feesad, Udi 0.05 feesad aur deegar 0.12 feesad the. April 2006 mein kul abadi ka 51 feesad hissa yani 4380000 afraad shehri aur 49 feesad yani 4060000 afraad dehati ilaqon mein rehtay hain. Mulki abadi ka kul 51 feesad hissa khawateen par mushtamil hai. Abadi mein izafa ki sharah 2006 mein 0.66 feesad salana rahi. Is ki ek ahem wajah logon ki biroon-e-mulk hijrat shamil hai. Sarkari zara'i ke mutabiq 93.4 feesad se 96 feesad abadi Musalman hai jin mein 85 feesad Shia aur 15 feesad Sunni hain. Eesaion mein aksariyat Roosi Orthodox aur Armenian Orthodox shamil hain. Azerbaijan ki folk mein abadi, lisani garohon waghera ki numaindagi hai. Yahan Kurdi, Lezgin, Talysh, Georgian, Roosi aur Armenian zubanon ke radio station bhi kaam kartay hain. In ko hukumat ki taraf se mali imdad ke sath chalaya jata hai. Balkan mein maujood station Avar zuban mein aur Khachmaz mein Tat zuban mein bhi station kaam kartay hain. Isi tarah Baku mein kayi akhbarat Roosi, Kurdi, Lezgin aur Talysh zubanon mein chhaptay hain. Yahoodi bhi apna ek akhbar Aziz chhaptay hain. Qaumi mausiqui ke aalat mein chaudah taron walay aalat, aath peetnay walay tashe aur chhah mukhtalif aqsaam ke bansuri numa aalay shamil hain. UNESCO ki janib ne Aalmi Virsay ki Fehrist mein Gobustan Riyasti Reserve, Baku ka Aatishi Mandir, Momin Khatoon ka Mazaar aur Sheki mein Khan Mahal shamil hain.
Argentina jise sarkari tor par Jamhuria Argentina kaha jata hai. Argentina ka raqba 2,780,400 murabba kilometer (1,073,500 murabba meel) hai, jo use Brazil ke baad junubi America ka doosra sab se bada mulk aur duniya ka aathwan bada mulk banata hai aur Hispani bolnay walay mulkon mein sab se bada. Yeh mulk 23 subon aur ek khud mukhtar shahar Buenos Aires, jo mulk ka dar ul hukumat aur sab se bada shahar bhi hai, par mushtamil hai. Subon aur dar ul hukumat ke apne ain hain, lekin yeh ek wafaqi nizam ke tehat maujood hain. Is ki abadi 2022 ki mardum shumari ke mutabiq 47,327,407 hai. Currency Argentine Peso (ARS) hai. Sarkari zubanain Hispani hai aur mukhtalif khitton mein Guarani, Quechua, Qom, Mocovi, Wichí aur Welsh shareek sarkari zubanain hain. Alberto Fernandez mulk ke sadr hain. Argentina ka ilaqah Andes pahari silsilay aur Bahr-e-Oqyanus ke darmiyan waqay hai. Is ke shimal mein Paraguay aur Bolivia, Brazil aur Uruguay shimal mashriq mein jabkay Chile junub aur maghrib ki janib waqay hai. Jabkay samandari hudood junub maghrib mein junubi Bahr-e-Oqyanus aur Drake rastay se bhi milti hain. Argentina Falkland Jaza'ir, Junubi Georgia aur Junubi Sandwich Jaza'ir, Junubi Patagonia Barf ke Maidan aur Antarctica ke ek hissay par apni hakimiyat ka da'wa karta hai. Jadeed daur ke Argentina mein qadeem tareen record shuda insani maujoodgi ka ta'alluq Paleolithic daur se hai. Columbia se pehle ke zamanay mein Inca saltanat mulk ke shimal maghrib mein phail gayi. Is mulk ki jarain 16ween sadi ke dauran khitte ki Hispani nauabadiyat mein hain. Argentina Rio de la Plata ke viceroyalty ke janashin ke tor par ubhra, jo 1776 mein qaim ek Hispani biroon-e-mulk viceroyalty thi. Ek federation ke tor par mulk ki tanzeem-e-nau ke baad mulk ne nisbatan aman aur istehkam ka lutf uthaya, jis mein European immigration ki mutaddid lehren, khaas tor par Itali aur Hispani, is ki saqafat aur abadi ko mutassir karti theen. 1974 mein sadr Juan Perón ki maut ke baad, un ki bewa aur na'ib sadr, Isabel Perón, 1976 mein ma'azool honay se pehle sadarat par fa'iz hu'een. Fauji junta, jise Riyasat Ha-e-Mutahida ki himayat hasil thi, ne hazaron siyasi karkunan aur naqideen ko sataya aur qatl kiya. Baen bazoo ki gandi jang mein, riyasti dehashtgardi aur shehri be-amani ka daur jo 1983 mein Raul Alfonsín ke sadr muntakhib honay tak jari raha. Argentina ek ilaqai taaqat hai aur bain al-aqwami ma'amlaat mein ek darmiyani taaqat ke tor par apni tarikhi haisiyat ko barqarar rakhta hai. Argentina bar-e-a'zam junubi America ki badi maeeshaton mein se ek hai aur ausat hadd-e-umar aur fi kas GDP buland hai. Mustaqbil mein taraqqi ke liye Argentina ki buniyadein mazboot hain. Birooni sarmayakari aur high technology ke hawalay se baramadaat ki miqdar kul baramadaat ka bohat bada hissa banati hain. Riyasat Ha-e-Mutahida ka ek bada ghair NATO ittehadi, Argentina ek taraqqi pazeer mulk hai jis mein Chile ke baad Latin America mein doosra sab se zyada HDI (insani taraqqi ka ashariya) hai. Yeh junubi America mein doosri sab se badi maeeshat rakhta hai aur G-15 aur G-20 ka rukn hai. Argentina Aqwaam-e-Mutahida, World Bank, World Trade Organization, Mercosur, Latin American aur Caribbean Riyasaton ki Community aur Ibero-American Riyasaton ki Tanzeem ka bhi baani rukn hai. Is ke 1 January 2024 se BRICS mein shamil honay ki tawaqqo hai. Argentina Latin lafz Argentum se nikla hai jo chandi ke liye istemal kiya jata hai. 1602 mein pehli baar is lafz ka istemal hamain ek nazm mein milta hai. 1812 mein Argentina ke pehle qaumi taranay mein hamain is lafz ka istemal milta hai jo Argentina ki azadi ki jari jang ke hawalay se tha. Sarkari tor par 1826 mein buniyadi dastoor mein Jamhuria Argentina aur Argentina ki qaum ka zikr milta hai. Argentina ke maqam par sab se pehle insani aasaar hamain 11,000 qabl Maseeh mein miltay hain. Yeh aasaar mukhtalif qabail se mutalliq the. Inca badshahat ne maujooda daur ke Argentina par hamla kar ke qabza kiya tha. Junubi aur wasati ilaqon mein khana badosh abad the. Kuch qabail zyada taraqqi yafta the aur unhon ne kaashtkari bhi shuru kar di thi aur mitti ke bartan banatay the. Taham yeh qabail junubi America mein nisbatan zyada maujood the. European muhim ju yahan sanah 1516 mein aaye. Hispanion ne junubi America mein apna qabza jama liya. Un ki pehli abadi darya-e-Paraná ke kinaray abad qila tha. Buenos Aires ke maqam par un ki pehli mustaqil abadi 1536 ko qaim hui. Taham ise muqami qabail ne tabah kar diya. Is shahar ko dobara sanah 1580 mein basaya gaya. Yeh ilaqah jahan aaj ka zyada tar Argentina waqay hai, Hispani abadkaron aur un ki aulaadon, muqami qabailiyon aur Afriqi ghulamon se abad tha. Abadkaron ki kul ta'aad ka ek tiha'i Buenos Aires aur doosray bade shahron mein ikatha hua. Buenos Aires 1776 ko dar ul hukumat ka darja mila. Is ke baad se Buenos Aires ko tijarati markaz ban gaya. Sanah 1806 aur 1807 mein do baar Bartanwion ne nakaam hamlay kiye. Jang-e-Azadi ke baad ki dahai mein yeh ilaqah muhabb-e-watan yani mulk ki azadi chahnay walay aur loyalist yani Hispani badshahat ke wafadaron ke darmiyan bat gaya. 1811 ke baad maujooda daur ke Argentina ke shahar azadi pasandon ke sath rahay jabkay Paraguay par qabza ho gaya aur is ne Spain se apni azadi ka elaan sanah 1811 jabkay Argentina se 1842 mein azadi ka elaan kar diya. Bala'i Peru par mukhtalif dhadoon ka da'wa tha lekin is ne ba-taur Bolivia apni azadi ka elaan sanah 1824 mein kar diya. Uruguay darya ke mashriqi kinaray par Brazilian aur Portuguese afwaj ne hamla kiya aur woh sanah 1828 mein ba-taur Uruguay azad ho gaya. Muhabb-e-watan azadi pasandon mein maujood andaruni ikhtilafat ki wajah se un mein siyasi adam istehkam paida hua. Char saal baad hi hukumat tabdeel hui. Sanah 1813 mein assembly ne azadi ke elaan ka irada kiya lekin siyasi dabao par aisa na kar saki. Natijatan khana jangi shuru ho gayi. Sanah 1816 mein junubi America ke subajaat-e-mutahida ko andaruni aur birooni masail ka samna tha. July mein nayi congress ne azadi ka elaan kiya aur Juan Martin de Pueyrredón ko Supreme Director bana diya gaya. Fauji muhim ju'i naye Supreme Director ki zimmedari ban gayi. Unhon ne sanah 1817 mein fauj ki madad se Andes paharon ke doosri taraf Chile ke wafadaron ko shikast di. Chile ki behri fauj un ke hukam par tayyar khadi thi aur unhon ne Lima ke shahar par chadhai ki. In ladaion ka natija azadi ki surat mein nikla. Sanah 1875 mein Europe se ghair mulki sarmayakari aur immigration ki lehar ke baad zara'at ke jadeed tareeqon se Argentina ka muashara ek tarah se dobara ta'ameer hua aur qanoon ki hukmarani bahal ho gayi. 1880 se 1929 ke dauran Argentina ki khush hali aur taaqat mein izafa hua aur duniya ke das ameer tareen mulkon mein se ek ban gaya. Is mein zara'at se mutalliq baramadaat aur Bartanwi aur French sarmayakariyan ahem theen. Immigration mein izafay aur sharah-e-amwat mein kami ki wajah se abadi mein paanch guna jabkay maeeshat mein pandrah guna izafa hua. Qadamat pasandon ki taraf se ghair jamhoori hatkandoun ki madad se siyasat par ghalba jari raha. Taham sanah 1912 mein jab sadr ne pehli baar tamam mardon ko gupt rae shumari ka haq diya to surat-e-hal badal gayi. Is tarah un ke riwayati mukhalifon ko sadarati intikhab jeetnay ka mauqa mil mila. Natijatan maeeshi aur samaji inqilab barpa hua. Sanah 1930 mein fauji baghawat ki wajah se sadr ka takhta ult diya gaya aur mazeed das saal ke liye qadamat pasandon ka hukumat par qabza ho gaya. Pehli Jang-e-Azeem ke dauran mukammal jabkay doosri Jang-e-Azeem mein Argentina zyada tar waqt ghair janibdar raha. Is tarah ittehadi aqwaam ke liye Argentina ghizai rasad ka ahem zariya ban gaya. Sanah 1946 mein General Juan Perón sadr muntakhab hue. Unhon ne ek siyasi tehreek shuru ki jise Peronism kaha gaya. Un ki biwi bohat mash'hoor hu'een aur sanah 1952 mein apni wafat tak unhon ne markazi siyasi kirdar ada kiya. Sanah 1947 mein khawateen ko vote ka haq de diya gaya. Perón ke daur mein ujratain barhien aur kaam ka mahol behtar hua. Abadi ki taraf se shahron ka rukh karne ke rujhan mein izafa hua. Kaleedi san'atain aur shobay qaumiya liye gayay. Daramadaat ghataane ke liye san'atain qaim hu'een aur zar'i shobay mein taraqqi ko tarjeeh di gayi. Sanah 1948 ta 1952 ke is waqt tak mustahkam qimatain aur sharah mubadla achanak ladkhada gayien. Peso ki qadar mein 70 feesad kami hui aur ifrat-e-zar ki sharah mein 50 feesad tak izafa hua. Kharija policy mazeed tanhayi ka shikar ho gayi aur America se ta'alluqat kashida ho gayay. Isi daur mein azadi-e-izhar-e-rae par pabandi sakht hui aur qaid-o-band aur sa'ubtain aam ho gayien. Sadr ne apne khair khwah mushiroun ko alag kar diya. Chand mah baad hi sanah 1955 mein Plaza de Mayo mein honay walay bomb dhamakon aur baghawat ki wajah se sadr ko hatna pada aur sadr mulk se nikal gayay. Baad azan sadr ne Spain mein mustaqil riyaish rakh li. Un ke baad mein aanay walay sadr ne islahat ka amal jari rakha aur mulki sarmayakari ki hausla afzai ki. Taham fauj ki taraf se mudakhilat ke baad unhain ohda chhorna pada aur nayi hukumat bani. Nayi hukumat ne bhi islahat ke amal ko jari rakha aur awami mansobon mein khateer sarmaya lagaya. Gharibi ki sharah 7 feesad reh gayi aur maeeshat mein bohat tezi se taraqqi hui. Taham sakht geer policyon ki wajah se is hukumat ke khilaf bhi awam uth khaday hue. Sabqa sadr General Perón ne is surat-e-hal ko chabuk dasti se apne haq mein istemal kiya aur watan wapsi aur 1973 mein naye intikhabat ki rah hamwar kar li. Isi saal sadr muntakhab honay ke baad July 1974 mein sadr Perón ki wafat ho gayi aur un ki teesri biwi Isabel jo na'ib sadr theen, sadr ban gayien. Taham unhon ne apne khawand ke daur ke badtareen mushiron ko barqarar rakha jis ki wajah se un ki napasandagi barhti gayi. March 1976 mein honay walay baghawat ke natijay mein unhain sadarati ohday se mahroom kar diya gaya. Taham islah ka amal apne mukhalifeen ki had tak jari raha aur apne siyasi mukhalifeen ko aghwa kar ke hamesha ke liye ghayab kar dena mamool ban gaya. Operation Condor ke naam se chalnay walay mansobay ke tehat American CIA daamay darmay sukhnay is kaam mein hissa leti rahi. Is amal mein shareek fauji afsaron ki tarbiyat di School of the Americas mein ki gayi. Is nayi aamriyat ki wajah se agarche kuch istehkam pahuncha aur bohat saray awami mansobay kamyabi se pooray kiye gayay. Lekin jald hi is ka natija birooni qarzay mein intehayi tezi se izafay aur miyaar-e-zindagi mein girawat ki surat mein nikla. San'ati amal ko roknay ke natijay mein peso ki qadar gir gayi aur jaedad ka karobar baith gaya. Rishwat satani mein be panah izafa hua. Falkland mein Bartania ke hathon honay wali 1982 ki shikast se fauji hukumat nakaam hui aur 1983 mein azadana aur munsifana intikhabat hue. Raúl Alfonsín ki hukumat ne la pata afraad ki wapsi, musallah afwaj par hukumat ki baladasti aur mustahkam jamhoori idaron ke liye iqdamat uthaye. Teenon fauji hukumaton ke arakeen par muqaddama chala kar unhain umar qaid mein daal diya gaya. Taham pichli hukumat ke chhode hue birooni qarzajat ki wajah se Argentina ki hukumat mulki qarz khwahon aur bain al-aqwami maliyati fund ki sharayat ko mannay par majboor thi. Natijatan mulki qarzoun aur awami falah ke mansobon ki bajaye birooni qarzay ko utarnay ko tarjeeh di gayi. Ahem maeeshi surat-e-hal behtar na honay ki wajah se Alfonsín ki hukumat awam mein aitemad kho baithi. 1989 mein currency ke bohran ke natijay mein qimaton mein achanak 15 guna ka hosh ruba izafa hua. Alfonsín ko muqarrara muddat se paanch mah qabl hi rukhsat hona pada. Naye muntakhab sadr Carlos Menem ne niji kari shuru ki aur 1990 mein ifrat-e-zar ki ek aur bohatat ke baad unhon ne maahir maeeshat Domingo Cavallo se rabta kiya. Natijatan peso ki qadar ko dollar se jod diya gaya. Nayi maeeshi policyon ki wajah se birooni sarmayakari barhnay lagi. Niji kari ka amal tez kar diya gaya. 1990 ki dahai mein zyada tar taraqqi ka amal tez raha lekin is ke badlay hukumat ko dollar ki rail pail dikhani padi. Is se birooni qarzay mein mazeed izafa hua. Maeeshi surat-e-hal bad se badtar hoti chali gayi. In masail aur barhti hui bad'unwani se sadr ki saakh mutassir hui. Sadr Fernando de la Rúa ko tabah haal mulk ki hukumat mili. Un ke daur mein mulk 1890 ke baad ke badtareen maeeshi bohran ka shikar hua. Har taraf tod phod shuru ho gayi aur sarmayakaron ne bahar ka rukh karna shuru kar diya. Awam aur qanoon naafiz karne walay idaron ke darmiyan honay wali jhadpon ke natijay mein bil aakhir sadr ko ohda chhorna pada. Do hafton ke dauran teen sadar tabdeel hue. Aakhirkar 2 January 2002 ko qanoon saaz assembly ne uburi sadr ka taqarrur kiya. Argentina maeeshi aitbar se diwalia hua aur Amreeki dollar se mulki currency ka rishta toot gaya. Mulki currency ki sharah achanak gir gayi aur ifrat-e-zar ki sharah mein hosh ruba izafa hua. Taham ek saal tak musalsal muzahiron aur ihtajajon ke baad maeeshi surat-e-hal behtar honay lagi aur bankon se paise nikalwane par pabandi December 2002 mein utha li gayi. Intehayi be qadri ki shikar mulki currency ka fayda uthatay hue hukumat ne san'ati taraqqi par tawajjoh di aur daramadaat ko kam kartay hue baramadaat ko barhaya. Tijarati khasara khatam hua aur maeeshi behtari mein tasalsul aaya. May 2003 mein naye sadr ka intikhab hua. Un ke daur mein Argentina ne diwalia pan ka sabab banne walay qarzoun ka nizam durust kiya. Bain al-aqwami maliyati fund ke qarzay ada kiye aur mulki qarz khwahon se qarz ki adayigi ke mua'ahiday kiye hain. Is waqt se Argentina maeeshi taraqqi ke sath sath ifrat-e-zar ka bhi shikar hai. 2007 mein sadr ne apni biwi ke liye rah chhor di jo Argentina ki pehli muntakhab sadr banien. Taham un ki maeeshi policyan nakami ka shikar hu'een aur unhain apne khawand ki policyan apnanay par majboor hona pada. 15 July 2010 ko Argentina Latin America ka pehla jabkay junubi nisf kurray ka doosra mulk bana jahan hum jinson ke darmiyan shadi ko qanooni bana diya gaya. 1853 ke ain ke mutabiq Argentina mein executive, muqannina aur adliya mein ikhtiyarat ko taqseem kiya gaya hai. Siyasi dhancha wafaqi jamhuria ka hai jo intikhabat se chuni jati hai. Sadr riyasat aur hukumat ke sarbarah ka kaam karta hai. Mulk mein kaseer jam'ati siyasi nizam hai. Executive power sadr aur us ki cabinet ke paas hoti hai. Sadr aur na'ib sadr barah-e-raast 4 saal ke liye chune jatay hain aur do baar se zyada muntakhab nahin ho saktay. Cabinet ke wuzara ka taqarrur sadr karta hai aur us ki manzoori muqannina se lenay ki zaroorat nahin hoti hai. Maujooda sadr Cristina Fernández de Kirchner jabkay na'ib sadr Julio Cobos hain. Qanoon saazi ka ikhtiyar do aiwanon par mushtamil National Congress ke paas hota hai. Ek aiwan Senate hai jis mein 72 arakeen jabkay doosra aiwan Chamber of Deputies hai jis ke 257 arakeen hain. Chamber of Deputies ke arakeen ko 4 saal ke liye aam intikhabat mein chuna jata hai aur nisf arakeen ko do saal baad dobara intikhab ka samna karna padta hai. Har siyasi jama'at ke ummidwaron ki ek tiha'i ta'aad ka khawateen hona lazmi hai. Adliya executive aur muqannina se azad hoti hai. Supreme Court ke 7 arakeen hotay hain jinhen sadr Senate se mushware se muqarrar karta hai. Deegar tamam matehat adliya mein jajjoun ka taqarrur Council of Magistrates of the Nation karti hai jis mein jajjoun, ukala, Congress aur executive ke numainday shamil hotay hain. 1853 mein elaan ke bawajood 1880 tak Buenos Aires ko sarkari tor par dar ul hukumat nahin mana gaya. 1994 ki ainni tarmeem ke tehat Buenos Aires ko khud mukhtari de di gayi taham wafaqi police, bandargah aur deegar ahem sarkari tanseebat ko hukumat hi sambhalti hai. Argentina mein kul 23 subay aur ek khud mukhtar shahar hain. Buenos Aires ke subay ko 134 intizami hisson jabkay deegar subon ko 376 hisson mein taqseem kiya gaya hai. Argentina Mercosur ka mukammal rukn hai. 2003 se Argentina ne Mercosur ko qaumi satah se buland qanoon saaz ikhtiyarat denay ke haq mein muhim jari rakhi hai taham 1990 ki dahai mein Argentina America ki taraf zyada jhukao rakhta tha. Argentina Antarctic Treaty System ka baani rukn hai aur is nizam ka secretariat Buenos Aires mein hi qaim hai. Taweel arsay se Argentina ne Falkland Jazeeray, Junubi Georgia aur Junubi Sandwich Jazeeron par apna da'wa kiya hua hai. Yeh jaza'ir Bartania ke zer-e-intizam hain. Is ke ilawa Argentina Antarctica ke taqreeban das lakh murabba kilometer hissay par apna da'wa bhi karta hai taham inhi mein se kuch ilaqon par Chile aur Bartania bhi da'wa kartay hain. Sanah 1904 se bahmi razamandi se Argentina ne Antarctica mein apni scientific tajurba gah barqarar rakhi hui hai. Agarche ghair qanooni trawlers, mutanaza ilaqon mein fauji karwai ki dhamkiyan mehaz istisnai surtain hain. Ba-surat-e-deegar Argentina ki kharija policy is se hat kar hai. 1991 ki Khaleej Jang mein Latin America se Argentina wahid mulk tha jis ne Amreeki hamle ka sath diya tha. Haiti mein jamhooriyat ke farogh ke operation mein bhi Argentina ne hissa liya tha. Argentina ne duniya bhar mein qiyam-e-amn ke missions mein hissa liya hai. Argentina ne qiyam-e-amn ke liye El Salvador, Honduras, Nicaragua, Guatemala, Junubi Sahara, Angola, Kuwait, Cyprus, Croatia, Kosovo, Bosnia aur Mashriqi Timor mein apne dastay bhejay hain. Qiyam-e-amn ki inhi koshishon ki wajah se Amreeki sadr Bill Clinton ne January 1998 ko Argentina ko ahem ghair NATO ittehadi qarar diya tha. 2005 mein aakhri baar Argentina ko Aqwaam-e-Mutahida ki Salamati Council ka rukn chuna gaya tha. Aqwaam-e-Mutahida ka White Helmet nami qiyam-e-amn aur insani imdad ka mansobah 1994 mein Argentina ke mushware par shuru kiya gaya tha. Argentina ki Musallah Afwaj barri, behri aur fazai afwaj par mushtamil hain aur in mein hazir sarvice faujiyon ki kul ta'aad 70,000 hai. Sadr Musallah Afwaj ke Commander-in-Chief ka darja rakhta hai. Wizarat-e-Difa'a roz marra ke kamon ke hawalay se fauji ma'amlaat ki dekh bhaal karti hai. Wizarat-e-Dakhila ke zer-e-intizam behri hudood ki hifazat aur mulki sarhadon ki nigrani ke liye do alag Musallah Afwaj bhi maujood hain. Fauji ملازمت ke liye 18 saal kam az kam hadd-e-umar hai jabkay jabri fauji tarbiyat har shehri par lazmi nahin. Tarikhi aitbar se khitte mein Argentina ki afwaj behtareen saaz-o-samaan ke sath sar-e-fehrist hain. Taham haliya barson mein fauji ikhrajat mein kami ki gayi hai. Argentina difa'a par taqriban 3 arab dollar salana kharch karta hai. Musallah Afwaj ke dastay Haiti aur Cyprus mein qiyam-e-amn ke liye apne fara'iz sar anjam de rahay hain. Argentina kul 23 subon aur ek khud mukhtar shahar par mushtamil hai. In subon aur shahar ke apne ain hain lekin wafaqi nizam ke tehat kaam kartay hain. Antarctica ke da'wa ko chhor kar Argentina ka kul raqba 2,766,891 murabba kilometer hai jis mein 30,200 murabba kilometer aabi hai. Shamalan junuban Argentina ki lambayi 3,900 kilometer ke qareeb jabkay sharqan gharban 1,400 kilometer hai. Mulk mein char mukhtalif ilaqay hain jin mein zarkhaiz wasati maidan, nisbatan pahari, tel ki daulat se malamal junubi satah murtafa, shumali musattah maidan aur Chile ki sarhad ke qareeb maghribi Andes pahari silsilay shamil hain. Mulk ka buland tareen maqam satah samandar se 22,841 foot buland hai jo junubi aur maghribi nisf kurron mein sab se buland hai. Sab se nasheebi ilaqah satah samandar se 105 meter neechay hai. Ahem daryaoon mein Paraná, Pilcomayo, Paraguay, Bermejo, Colorado, Rio Negro, Salado aur Uruguay ahem hain. Ek sadi se bhi zyada arsay se Bahr-e-Oqyanus ka 4,665 kilometer taweel sahil mulki bashindon ki tafreeh gah ka darja rakhta hai. Umuman shimal mein neem istoai jabkay junub mein qutbi nau'iyat ka mausam hota hai. Shimal mein garmiyon ka mausam intehayi garam aur marboot rehta hai jabkay sardiyan bohat halki hoti hain. Waqtan fa waqtan qahat sali bhi aati hai. Wasati Argentina mein garmiyon ka mausam garam aur garaj chamak ke sath toofan aatay hain. Sardiyan nisbatan sard hoti hain. Junubi ilaqay mein halki garmiyan aur sardiyon mein sakht barfbari hoti hai. Junubi America ke bar-e-a'zam ke kam se kam aur zyada se zyada darja hararat Argentina mein record hue hain. 2 January 1920 ko sab se zyada darja hararat 49.1 degree jabkay 17 July 1972 ko sab se kam darja hararat manfi 39 degree shumar kiya gaya tha. Intehayi junubi ilaqon mein November se February tak din 19 ghantay taweel bhi hota hai aur May se August tak ratain taweel hoti hain. Shimal mein neem istoai nabatat milti hain. In mein sheesham ki nasal ke darakht ahem hain. Savanna ki nabatat Andes paharon ke nazdeek khushk hisson mein maujood hain. Marboot ilaqon mein aabi nabatat bhi milti hain. Wasati Argentina mein lambi ghaas ke maidan paye jatay hain. Wasati ilaqay mein ibtida mein koi darakht nahin the lekin baad mein safeda waghera jaise darakhton ko sadkon ke kinaray aur qasbon mein lagaye gayay hain. Is ilaqay mein mitti ka rang kala siyah hai. Isi wajah se yeh ilaqah pooray kurra-e-arz par zarkhaiz tareen ilaqon mein se ek hai. Taham tijarati paimanay par zara'at ki khatir deegar nabatat ko tabah kiya ja raha hai. Yahan kul 29 National Parks hain.
Darya-e-Sindh Janubi Asia ka sab se bada darya jo duniya ke bade daryaon mein se ek hai. Is ki lambai 2000 hazaar meel ya 3200 kilometer hai. Is ka majmoi nakasi aab ka ilaqah 450,000 murabba meel ya 1,165,000 murabba kilometer hai. Jis mein se yeh pahadi ilaqah (Qaraqorum, Himalaya aur Hindu Kush) mein 175,000 murabba meel ya 453,000 murabba kilometer behta hai aur baqi Pakistan ke maidano mein behta hai. Cheeni ilaqe Tibet mein Himalaya ka ek zi-pahadi silsila Kailash hai. Kailash ke beechon beech Kailash naam ka ek pahad bhi hai jis ke kinare par jheel Mansarovar hai. Jise Darya-e-Sindh ka manba mana jata hai. Is jheel mein se Darya-e-Sindh samet bar-e-saghir mein behne wale 4 ahem darya niklte hain. Sutlej hathi ke munh se nikl kar maghribi simt mein behta hai. Ganga mor ki chonch se nikl kar janubi simt mein behta hai. Brahmputra ghode ke munh se nikl kar mashriqi simt mein behta hai. Aur Darya-e-Sindh sher ke munh se nikl kar shumali simt mein behta hai. Ek zamane tak Darya-e-Sindh ki tehqeeq jheel Mansarovar tak hi samjhi jati rahi. Hatta ke 1811 mein William Moorcroft ne is ilaqe mein ja kar bataya ke Sindh ka nuqta-e-aghaz jheel Mansarovar nahi balkeh jheel mein junoob se aa kar milne wali nadiyaan hain. Isi nazriye par mazeed tehqeeq karte hue Sven Hedin 1907 mein jheel se 40 kilometer upar Sangi Kebab ya Singge Kebab ke ilaqe mein ja pahuncha. Jahan behne wali nadi Gartang ya Gartang hi jheel Mansarovar ko pani muhaiya karti hai. Is liye Gartang nadi Darya-e-Sindh ka nuqta-e-aghaz hai. Sangi Kebab ka matlab hai sher ke munh wala. Isi munasibat se Darya-e-Sindh ko sher darya kaha jata hai. Gartang nadi shumal maghribi simt se aa kar jheel Mansarovar mein milti hai. Yahan se darya Ladakh ki simt apna safar shuru karta hai. Darya ke shumal mein Qaraqorum aur junoob mein Himalaya ke silsile hain. Wadi Nubra ke maqam par Siachen Glacier ke paniyon se banne wala darya Nubra is mein aa kar milta hai. Yahan tak darya ki lambai taqriban 450 kilometer hai. Phir Darya-e-Sindh Pakistani ilaqe Baltistan mein dakhil hojata hai. Darya-e-Sindh Pakistan mein dakhil hote hi sab se pehle Darya-e-Shyok is mein aa kar milta hai phir 30 kilometer mazeed aage ja kar Skardu shahar ke qareeb Darya-e-Shigar is mein aa girta hai. Mazeed aage ja kar Hindu Kush ke saaye mein Darya-e-Gilgit is mein milta hai aur phir Nanga Parbat se aane wala Astor darya milta hai. Oonche pahadiyon se jaise hi Darya-e-Sindh nasheebi ilaqe mein dakhil hota hai. Tarbela ke maqam par ek bohat badi deewar bana kar ise dam mein tabdeel kar diya gaya hai. Yeh hai Tarbela Dam. Thoda sa aage ja kar Jarneeli Sarak ke paas Attock ke maqam par Darya-e-Kabul is mein aa milta hai. Darya-e-Sindh ka safar Pothohari pahadi ilaqe se chalta hua Kala Bagh tak jata hai. Kala Bagh woh maqam hai jahan se Darya-e-Sindh ka pahadi safar khatam hokar maidani safar shuru hota hai. Kala Bagh ke hi maqam par Darya-e-Soan Sindh mein milta hai. Thoda sa aage maghribi simt se aane wala Kurram darya is mein shamil hota hai. Mazeed aage ja kar Koh-e-Suleman se aane wala Gomal darya Darya-e-Sindh mein shamil hota hai. Muzaffargarh se thoda aage ja kar Panjnad ka maqam aata hai jahan Punjab ke paanchon darya Jhelum, Chenab, Ravi, Sutlej, Beas aapas mein mil kar Darya-e-Sindh mein sama jate hain. Guddu se Sindh janubi simt mein behta hai. Sukkur shahar ke beech se aur Larkana aur Mohenjo Daro ke mashriq se guzarta hua Sehwan ki pahadiyon tak aata hai. Hyderabad ke pehlu se guzar kar Thatta ke mashriq se guzar kar Keti Bandar mein choti choti bohat sari shakhon mein taqseem hokar Bahr-e-Arab mein shamil hojata hai. Is darya ko yeh aezaz bhi hasil hai ke is ke naam par Sindh aur Hindustan ya ka naam India pukara gaya hai. Khyber Pakhtunkhwa mein is darya ko Aba Seen yani daryaon ka baap kehte hain jo zila Swabi ke tehseel Chota Lahore ke ek gaon Hund se guzra hai. Isi darya ke kinare Aryon ne apni muqaddas kitab Rig Veda likhi thi. Rig Veda mein is darya ki tareef mein bohat sare ashloq hain. Yeh Bar-e-Saghir ka wahid darya hai jis ki Hindu puja karte hain aur yeh Odeiro Lal aur Jhoole Lal bhi kehlata hai. Is darya ke kinare duniya ki ek qadeem tareen tehzeebon mein se ek munfarid tehzeeb ne janam liya tha. Qadeem zamane mein is darya ko aboor karne baad hi Wast Asia se Bar-e-Saghir mein dakhil ho sakte the. Yeh darya apni tund khooi aur khud-sari ki wajah se bhi ise Sher Darya bhi kaha jata hai. Yeh darya jo Kailash ke qareeb se niklta hai aur atharah sau meel ka safar tay karke Bahr-e-Arab mein girta hai. Hinduon aur Budhon ka Koh-e-Kailash Koh Meru Brahma ka nagar hai aur jin devtaon Agni, Vayu aur Indra ko woh poojte hain un ka asal maskan yehi hai. Is ilaqah ko jheelon ki wadi bhi kaha jata hai. Kyun ke yahan do badi jheelein waqay hain. Jin mein Man Sarovar ko muqaddas aur Raksh Tal ko manhoos khayal kiya jata hai. Tibbatiyon ka kehna tha ke is jheel se Darya-e-Sindh aur teen aur darya Brahmaputra, Karnali (Ganga ka ek bara muawin darya) aur Sutlej bhi niklte hain. Hinduon aur Budhon ka bhi yehi kehna tha aur un ki mazhabi tasweeron mein is jheel mein in charon daryaon ko char janwaron ke munh se niklte dikhaya gaya tha. Mashriq mein se Brahmaputra ghode ke munh se, Karnali ko junoob mein mor ke munh se, Sutlej maghribi janib se hathi ke munh se aur Darya-e-Sindh shumal mein Babar Sher ya Sangi Kebab se nikl raha hai. Is liye yeh darya Tibet mein Sangi Kebab yani Sher Darya kehlata hai. European jugrafiya daan Tibbatiyon ki is riwayat ko shak ki nigah se dekhte the ke jheel Mansarovar char bade daryaon ka manba hai. Un ka khayal tha ke Darya-e-Sindh ka manba Kailash ke pahadi ilaqe mein hai. Chunanche jab 1858 mein jab Bar-e-Saghir ke shumal maghrib ke ilaqe mein railway line tayar ki ja rahi thi toh is ke liye jo naqsha tayar hua is mein Darya-e-Sindh ko Koh-e-Kailash se niklte hue dikhaya gaya tha. Behhal unneesween sadi ki ibtida tak is ka manba makhfi raha aur sathe murtafa ke pecheeda aur wasee ilaqe ki wadiyon aur chotiyon ki nishandehi mehaz andaze se hoti rahi. Unneesween sadi ke akhir tak kayi European ne jheel Mansarovar ka safar kiya aur Darya-e-Sindh ke manba ko talash karne ki koshish ki. Un ki nakami ki sab se badi wajah yeh thi ke Tibbati ahkam kisi European ko is jheel ka survey nahi karne dete the. Phir bhi bohat se European bhes badal kar wahan pahunch gaye aur unneesween sadi ke ikhtitam tak Sutlej (Hathi Darya) aur Karnali (Mor Darya) ke manba talash kar liye gaye. Yeh pandrah meel door junoob maghrib ki taraf Shaitani ya Raksh Jheel se niklte hain jo ek jhooti si nadi ke zariye Mansarovar Jheel se munsalik hai. Magar Ghoda Darya aur Sher Babar Darya (Brahmaputra aur Sindh) ke manba ka ab tak pata nahi chala tha aur unhein un ke durust manba ka abhi tak pata nahi tha. Yeh aezaz ek Swedish sayyah Sven Hedin ko mila. Woh is se pehle Mansarovar se saat meel mashriq ki janib Brahmaputra ki ibtidai nadi daryaft kar chuka tha. Woh Sangi Kebab yani Sher Darya ke dehane ki talash mein 1907 mein dobara Mansarovar Jheel pahuncha aur woh is natije par pahuncha ke Darya-e-Sindh ka manba jheel ke kahin shumal ki janib hai aur Brahmaputra Raks Tal se niklta hai. Is liye Hedin shumal maghrib ki taraf jana chahta tha. Ise Tibbati afsar ne bohat israar par ijazat di. Ba-al-akhir Hedin chand charwahon ki madad Sangi Kebab pahuncha. Woh pehla safed aadmi tha jis ne Sindh aur Brahmaputra ke manba ke maqam tak pahunch saka. Lekin haqeeqat yeh hai is darya ke kayi munh hain aur is mein se kis ko Darya-e-Sindh ka manba mana jaaye. Lekin chunke riwayat Sangi Kebab ke haq mein is liye use Darya-e-Sindh ka manba tasleem kiya jata hai. Agarche Sangi Kebab jheel Mansarovar se sirf tees meel door hai. Lekin Tibbati ahkam ko yaqeen tha ke Darya-e-Sindh jheel Mansarovar se niklta hai. Kyun ke ek bada taqatwar darya ko isi muqaddas jheel se niklna chahiye. Agarche yeh charon darya is jheel se nahi niklte hain magar is jheel se ziyada faasle par nahi niklte hain. Is tarah yeh riwayat bohat ziyada ghalat bhi nahi thi aur hum yeh keh sakte hain ke yeh darya ek hi maqam se phoot kar mukhtalif simton mein rukh karte hain. Tibet mein Darya-e-Sindh wahan se apne saath mukhtalif nadi nalon ka pani leta hua aage badhta hai jahan bhure teele aur barf se dhake safed pahad aasmano ko chhoo rahe hain aur darmiyan mein Darya-e-Sindh neele aur uthle phelao ke saath behta hai. Is ka ek dhara jo junubi sarchashmah hai aur Kailash ke nasheeb ke kinare se hoti hui Gartang aur Giyatima ke samne se guzarti hai aur doosri yani shumali shakh jo Kailash silsile ke shumal mein se niklti hai aur behti hui junubi shakh ke saath mil kar aur Gilyat ke qareeb se guzarti hai. Yahan Darya-e-Sindh ka pehla muawin darya Gartang milta hai. Gartang darya Sindh ke barabar hi hai aur ek khuli wadi jagah behta hua aata hai. Jis ke kinare maghribi Tibet ke soobah Gartang ka darul hukoomat Gartang waqay hai. Jab ke Darya-e-Sindh apne manba ki wajah se pahadon mein chakkar lagane par majboor hai. Yahan dono darya mil kar Gartang aur Sindh mein irtisal ke baad Darya-e-Sindh das hazaar feet ki bulandi par behta hai aur safar karta hua rawan dawan hojata hai. Yahan is pas manzar mein pahadon ki safed chotiyan sar nikale khadi hui hain. Yahan darya Sindh ka rukh ahista ahista shumal maghrib ki taraf se Ladakh ka rukh karta hai. Yahan Tashi Gang jo Tibet ka akhri gaon hai. Yahan pehle pathrele raste par duaiya jhande aur maqbare bane hue the. Betarashida patthar aur lakdi ke shahteeron ke bane makanat Darya-e-Sindh ke saath bani ek khanaqah ke pas manzar mein dab jate hain aur dekhne walon ko sirf yeh khanaqah hi nazar aati hai. Is ki raah mein aise gaon kam hain jo sara saal abad rehte hain. Yeh ek doosre se paanch meel se pachees meel ke faasle par waqay hain. Yeh gair tarasha pattharon aur lakdiyon ki madad se bane hue yeh dehat umooman Darya-e-Sindh ki muawin nadiyon ke kinare zameen ke chote chote qabil-e-kasht tukdon par abad hain. Sangi Kebab (Darya-e-Sindh) chal kar sateh murtafa Tibet ke maghrib mein waqay buland o bala wadiyon mein safar karta hua shumal maghrib phir maghrib ka rukh karta hai aur is naqshe mein dekhein toh is ki shakal wahan daranti ki tarah ya hilal ki shakal banata hai. Lehaza is darya ka ibtidai safar maghribi Tibet mein hota hai. Darya-e-Sindh maghribi Tibet ko charagahain muhaiya karta hua Kashmir ka rukh karta hai. Yeh maidano se shuru hokar chattanon se guzar kar darya Sindh ke kinare kinare upar ki simt ja raha hota hai. Jis ke ek taraf buland o bala pahadon ki deewarein aur doosri simt mein Darya-e-Sindh ki taraf jati hui umoodi khayian aur phisalte hue barf ke tode aur mitti ki chattanein yani mustaqil khatra mandla raha hota hai. Karoron saal pehle yahan thain thain marta samandar tha. Yahan samandari janwaron aur nabatat ke fossils zameen upar aur neeche dono taraf paaye gaye. Jo nishandehi karte hain ke yahan ki zameen kayi martaba zer-e-aab hui aur buland hui. Maujooda pahadi silsile koi ek hazaar million saal pehle wujood mein aaye. Arziiati tabdeeliyon ke natije mein Wast Asia ki sateh murtafa junoob ki janib Bar-e-Saghir ki taraf dhakelna shuru hui. Ek thos gehri jadon wali chattan jo shayad duniya ki sab se qadeem chattan thi Bar-e-Saghir ke neeche dabi rahi. Lakhon saal tak shumal ki janib ek na-qabil-e-muzahamat quwwat is mein musalsal rukawat par dabao dalti rahi aur ahista ahista un ke darmiyan mein zameen ki sateh buland hona shuru hui aur is tarah Qaraqorum aur Himalaya ke silsile wujood mein aaye aur samandar Bar-e-Saghir ke shumal mein darya ke pahunchne ka rasta banate hue mashriq o maghrib ki taraf beh gaya. Junoob ki simt mein dabao musalsal jari raha aur taqriban paanch lakh saal pehle silsila Himalaya aur Qaraqorum ke darmiyan mein Kailash ka pahadi silsila ubharna shuru hua. Jis ne pehlon se niklne wale aabi raston ko rok kar junoob aur mashriq ki janib Ganga aur Brahmaputra aur shumal o maghrib ki taraf Sindh aur Sutlej do alag alag daryai nizamoon ko janam diya. Sindh aur Ganga ke manba sirf saath meel ke faasle par hain aur dono darya mukhalif simton mein behte hue do mukhtalif samandaron mein girte hain jin se darmiyan mein Bar-e-Saghir ki sar zameen ko misalas ban jati hai. Yeh saboot hai ke yahan kabhi samandar tha. Wast Asia ki sateh ab bhi ubhar rahi hai aur woh pahad jinhon ne Darya-e-Sindh ko gher rakha hai ab bhi ahista ahista buland ho rahe hain aur junoob ki taraf khisak rahe hain. Yehi wajah hai yahan zalzale aksar aur land sliding hoti rehti hai. Yahan Darya-e-Sindh ki wadi mein saalana teen inch se bhi kam barish hoti hai. Yahan pahad banjar aur kuch khule maidan ret se bhare hain aur hawa khushk aur gard aloodah hai. Barf bari chote daane chanon ki tarah hoti hai. Sateh ki chattanein tooti phoothi aur dara dene wali hain. Zameen ki sateh reteli hai ya dheelon ki soorat mein hai jis ki mitti mein sangreze hain. Katao ke amal mein Darya-e-Sindh aur muawin nadiyon ne aise nishanat chore hain jin se andaza hota hai ke woh kisi waqt buland sateh par behte the. Un ki guzar gahein pani se gol hui chattanon aur pattharon par mushtamil hain. Yeh purane glacier ki baqiyat bhi ho sakti hai ya garmiyon ke pani ke tez reylay mein yeh patthar ludhak ludhak kar gol ho gaye hain. Sardiyon aur garmiyon ke darja hararat ke bohat ziyada farq ne zameen ki sateh ko kamzor kar diya hai. Jis ki wajah se zameen ke tukdon, gaaron aur chattanon ka phisalna aam baat hai. Buland o bala ghaatiyon mein glacier Darya-e-Sindh aur us ke muawin daryaon mein glacier ke bade bade tukre shamil kar dete hain. Baaz auqat koi glacier aage aakar darya ko mahino ke liye rok leta hai aur jab darya ka pani use todta hai toh yeh samandari toofan ki tarah uchhalta chalta hai aur raste mein aane wali har cheez, dehaton faslon aur darakhton ko maliamat kar deta hai. Tang aur pathreeli deewaron ke darmiyan mein Darya-e-Sindh ziyada tar dhalaan wali chattanon mein phansa hua behta hai. Yahan ke manazir par-haibat aur pur-shukoh hain. Azeem-ul-shan ghaatiyon ka is qadar lamba silsila kura-e-arz par kahin aur nahi paya jata hai. Tang rasta par ek simt mein buland o bala umoodi chattanein aur ek taraf umoodi gehrai mein jhaag udata behta hua darya. Yahan door door tak koi jhar jhankar nazar nahi aata hai. Is ke azeem-ul-shan pahad umoodi chattanon ke silsile, pathreeli chattanein aur tang ghaatiyan, ki buland o bala chattanon se guzrne walon ko darya is waqar aur azmat ke saath behta nazar aata hai jis mein sadiyon se koi tabdeeli nahi aayi hai. Ladakh ki sarhad ke qareeb pahad Darya-e-Sindh ke qareeb aajate hain aur shumal ka rukh karte hue us ki dhalaan mein tezi se izafa shuru hojata hai. Darya in umoodi chattanon ke darmiyan mein behta hua Himalaya aur Qaraqorum ke darmiyan mein se guzarta hai. Yahan azeem-ul-shan silsila Himalaya aur silsila Qaraqorum qareeb aajate hain. Is ke is 350 meel ke safar mein is mein beshumar naale aur nadiyaan girte hain, naqshe mein is ki shakal aisi hoti hai ke Darya-e-Sindh ki neeli lakeer mein beshumar dhage shamil ho rahe hain. Jahan pehlu mein chalne wale pahad ahista ahista darre ki shakal ikhtiyar kar lete hain aur Sindh ki wadiyon aur is ki nadiyon ke saath shumal maghrib ki taraf jane wale karwanon ke shahrahein thi. In shahraahon mein kuch shumal mein Wast Asia aur Hindustan ki janib jati hain. Tajir khachcharon par safar karte the aur un ka saaman yaakon aur gadho par bandha hota tha. Yahan Darya-e-Sindh par koi pul nahi the aur tund o tez lehron mein insaan aur janwar tair kar ya chal kar paar karte the. Gehre pani ki soorat mein yaak aur tattu qudrati tairak hain tair kar aur insaan un ki dum pakad kar darya ko paar karte the. Bakriyan tair nahi sakti hain albattah bheedein lehron ke mutabiq tirchhe rukh se darya ko paar kar leti thi. Sardiyon mein is wadi mein barf bari hone se darya jam jata hai. Lekin barf ke neeche pani rawan balkeh tezi se beh raha hota hai. Is liye jame hue darya ko ehtiyat se paar kiya jata hai. Tang ghaatiyon se barf ke tode dandanate hue aate hain aur nokili chattanon se takra kar un ke bade bade barf ke tukre udte hue door ja kar girte hain. Jin mein aksar patthar ke chote aur bade tukre phanse hote hain. Garmiyon mein jab pahadon par barf aur glacier pighalna shuru hote hain toh darya ke behte hue pani mein izafa ke saath is ke shor badh jata hai. Wahan nangi chattanein suraj ki garmi ko jazb kar ke bhatti ban jati hain. Lekin jahan dhoop nahi pahunchti hai wahan shadeed thandi rehti hai aur bohat si nadiyaan sirf chand ghanton ke liye pighalti hain. Wahan koi bhi shakhs jo nange sar dhoop mein ho aur us ke pair saaye mein woh ba-yak-waqt heat stroke aur frostbite ka shikar ho sakta hai. Yahan har mausam mein wadiyon ke kuch hisse mein tez hawain chalti hain. Jo ret ke girdab ko upar uthati hain. Yahan kahin kahin darya aur muawin nadiyon mein khet aur darakht milte hain. Darya-e-Sindh ke kinare pahad taqriban har das meel ke faasle par ek tang ghaati ki soorat mein phat jati hai. Jahan garmiyon mein pani ke dhare mein sailabi mitti ka reyla pahadon se pighli barf apne saath bahakar late hain. Yahan chote chote gaon hain. Jin ke samne seedhiyon ki tarah bane dhalaan kheton mein kisan hawa ke saath udne wali mitti ki kami poora karne ke liye tokriyan bhar kar badi mehnat se dal rahe hote hain. Unhein apni in mukhtasar si zameeno ko qaim karne ke liye musalsal mehnat karni padti hai. Yahan janwaron ka fazla jalane ke liye aur insani fazla khad mein istemal hota hai. Is wadi mein kheton ke ilawa jo dehatiyon ne sakht mehnat se bana rakhe hain aur kisi qism ki nabatat dekhne mein nahi aati hai. Darya ke saath saath pagdandiyan jati hui nazar aati thi. Jo aam taur par darya se bohat buland hoti thi. Lekin baaz maqamat par is ke saath chalti thi aur baaz maqamat par bal khati hui us se door nikl jati thi. Kyun ke yahan ki dhalaanein is qadar khatarnak hain ke is par bakriyan bhi nahi chal sakti hain. Sainkdon saalon se shumali Hindustan Koh-e-Hindu Kush se Brahmaputra jane ke liye pahadon mein guzrne wale tajir aur mazhabi zaireen isi raste ko istemal karte rahe hain. Darya-e-Sindh ke saath saath dehat aur Budhon ki khanaqahein un guzrne walon ko qiyamgahein aur tijarti marakaz ka kaam bhi karti thi. Yeh khanaqahein dushwar guzar chattanon ya Darya-e-Sindh ke andar teelon par waqay thi. Yahan mukhtalif ilaqon se aane wale raste Darya-e-Sindh ke saath chalne wale raston se mil jate the. Is tarah Wast Asia aur junoob se aane walon ko rasta muhaiya karte the. Yeh pagdandiyan aur raste mukhtalif ilaqon aur aqwam se taaluq rakhne wale tajir aur mazhabi zaireen ki guzar gahein thi. Jin ki wajah se in raston par waqay qasbon aur dehaton mein raunaq thi. Yeh raste Qaraqorum aur Himalaya ke upar jin daron se guzarte hain un mein chand ek bohat hi khatarnak hain aur saal mein bohat kam arse ke liye khulte hain. Lekin mushkilaat ke bawajood yeh darre kabhi band nahi hote the. Shumali mein Qaraqorum Darya-e-Sindh ko Wast Asia se juda karta hai. In pahadon mein ba zahir koi rasta nahi tha. Lekin yahan se kasturi, resham aur doosri tijarti ashya aati thi. Yahan koi aisa darra nahi hai aur jo kam dushwar ho aur raste bhi aksar mukhtalif jangon aur dushmaniyon ki wajah se band rehte the. Is liye aksar qafilon ko ziyada dushwar raste istemal karne padte the. Is ke ilawa kayi aise raste hain jo istemal hote rahe magar woh pichhle do sau saal mein glacier ki zad mein aakar na-qabil-e-istemal ho gaye hain. Shumali ki janib jane wala sab se ahem rasta Qaraqorum Route Ladakh se bal khata hua pahadon ke silsile par chadh jata hai aur phir neeche aakar Darya-e-Shyok ke ek kham ko paar karne ke liye khatarnak dhalaan ki soorat mein neeche utarta hai aur phir ek doosre pahadi silsile par chadh jata aur phir neeche aakar Darya-e-Shyok ki ek muawin nadi ko paar karta hua Wast Asia mein dakhil hota hai. Yahan gyarah darre hain aur jo atharah hazaar feet tak buland hain. Bar-e-Saghir aur China ke darmiyan mein Darra Qaraqorum unnees hazaar feet buland hai aur use sirf garmiyon mein paar kiya ja sakta. Yahan chand mah ke liye barf pighalti hai aur neeche se kali ret aur kankaron ka ek registaan nikl aata hai. Yeh bohat be-reham rasta hai. Is raste par kisi qism ki nabatat nahi ugti hai. Yahan char buland darre hain, magar un ke zariye jo faasla tay karna hota hai woh Qaraqorum ke raste se ziyada hai istemal karte the lehaza balai Sindh ki wadi se shumal ko jane ke liye Qaraqorum Route hamesha ahem rasta raha tha. Janubi aur Darya-e-Sindh ke bayein janib jane wali deewar Himalaya Qaraqorum ki nisbat ziyada door hai aur us mein qadar aasaan darre maujood hain. In mein sab se ahem Darra Zoji La hai jahan Kashmir ke raste Bar-e-Saghir tak rasai ho sakti hai. Is ki oonchai gyarah hazaar feet buland hai aur saal ke aath mahine khula rehta hai. Ladakh ke paas Darya-e-Sindh ke basiyon ki zindagi bohat sakht hai. Yahan ki ausat oonchai das hazaar feet se ziyada hai. Bulandi ki is lateef hawa se hum ahang hone ke liye Ladakhi bashindon ke phephdon ki kar kardagi aam logon se ziyada hai. Yahan rehne wale ya toh rewaron ki dekh bhaal karte the ya makayi ke chote chote khet ki parwakht karte aur guzrne wale tajiron se ashya ka tabadla karte the. Kuch naujawan zahrani ka pesha bhi apna rakha tha. Jo tajiron ko aur musafiron ko loota karte the. Ladakh ka darul hukoomat Leh hazaron saal se tijarti jaal ka markaz raha hai. Yeh shahar Darya-e-Sindh ke shumali kinare par gyarah hazaar feet bulandi par abad hai. Yeh shahar banjar pahadon ke neeche sailabi mitti ke bade se taas jo char meel tak phela hua hai ke kinare abad hai. Leh ke saath Darya-e-Sindh aur qadeem tijarti aur mazhabi rawaabit ka aisa taaluq hai ke aksar use Chota Tibet kaha jata hai. Yeh ilaqah pathreela aur banjar aur shadeed toofano, chattanon ke phisalne aur glacier ke tootne se sailabon jaisi qudrati afaat ka shikar rehta hai. Yeh sakht mehnat se hasil ki gayi apni zameeno par zarayi paidawar ke ilawa Ladakh ki muaishat ka inhesar Darya-e-Sindh aur is se munsalik tijarti raston par tha. Darra Qaraqorum aur Zoji La jo Sindh se ba-tartib shumal aur junoob ki janib wale raste hain Leh ke qareeb waqay hain. Leh ke bazaron mein tang aur andheri dukanon ke samne Wast Asia se aane wale pashm aur namdon ke dher lage hote the. Dukanon ke peeche andhere kamron mein sona chandi aur kinari chamak raha hota tha. Turkistan se aane wale chote chote tattu tez chalne wale, sust gaam hilali seengon wale yaak paas guzar rahe hote the. Safed rangat wale Yarkandi, pashm ke dheele dhale libas pehne Tibbati neeche ki janib latakti moonchon wale Mangol, saaf suthre libason mein Hindustani kandhon se kandhe ragadte hue chauri chauri seedhiyon wali galiyon mein aa ja rahe hote the aur mili juli zabanon mein baat cheet kar rahe hote the. Jab ke Leh ke bashinde karam gustarana nigahon se is hujoom ka jaiza lete rehte the ke in ajnabiyon ki wajah se is buland o bala pahadon mein waqay is shahar mein un ko rozgar ke mawqa mil rahe hain. Kabhi kabhar ek doosre ko dhakke dete hue hujoom mein jahan ikhtilaf mamooli baat samjhi jati hai ek shakhs numayan nazar aata hai jis ne un jaisa libas pehan rakha ho ek maghribi bashinda aan pahunchta tha. Unneesween sadi mein European bashinde Leh mein ek do hafta thehrte aur apni muhimmo ke liye quli, yaak aur camping ka saaman kharidte aur aage badh jate the. Woh sab Darya-e-Sindh ki wadi aur us ke biyabaan ke sehar mein mubtala rehte the. In mein sayyah, surveyor aur jasus bhi hote the. Kuch in mein shohrat hasil karne aate the. In logon par buland o bala wadi ka sehar taari rehta tha aur unhon ne bohat kam apni muhim ke bare mein duniya ko bataya hai. Magar kuch logon ne safar ke rongte khade hone wale waqeat, jazbat o khayalat bayan kiye hain. Ird gird ki taqaton ne pahadi daron aur tijarti raston jo Darya-e-Sindh aur us ki muawin nadiyon aur nalon ke saath saath chalte the yahan ki wadiyon aur zameeno par qabza karna tha. Yeh khofnak mushkilaat mein ghire hue log do hazaar saal se woh apne humsaya mulkon ki aisi jarahiyat ka shikar rahe hain jin mein un ka koi mafad wabasta nahi raha hai aur yeh jangein hamesha un ke nuqsan par khatam hoti thi. Dogra Maharaja Gulab Singh ne un par apni bala-dasti qaim kar li. Bartanvi Bar-e-Saghir se rukhsat ho gaye ke baad Kashmir ka raja Musalmanon ki aksariyat ke bawajood is ka faisla nahi kar saka. Is par Kashmir aur Gilgit mein azadi ki tehreek buland hui aur mujahideen badhte hue Gilgit aur Baltistan ko azad karke Ladakh ke qareeb pahunch gaye. Is par Bharat ne apni faujein Kashmir mein utaar dein aur Maharaja Kashmir se ilhaq ki darkhwast par dastakhat karwa liye aur 1947 Bar-e-Saghir ki taqseem ke saath hi Leh par Hindustan ka qabza ho gaya aur maghrib mein is ke humsaya Baltistan ab Pakistan ka hissa hai. Sindh ke saath saath mashriq se maghrib ki taraf jane wala sadiyon purana rasta band ho chuka hai. Darya-e-Sindh ki wadi mein Leh ke foran baad Darya-e-Sindh fire bandi line ko aboor karta hua Pakistan ke ilaqah Baltistan mein dakhil hojata hai. Pakistani ilaqe mein dakhil hone se pehle Kargil ka ilaqah hai. Yahan bhi darya banjar aur umoodi khayion mein neeche ki taraf tezi se safar karta hai. Tang ghaatiyan kahin kahin choti choti wadiyon mein tabdeel hojati hain. Jin mein thodi bohat kheti bari nazar aati hai. Batadreej dono taraf pahad buland hote hue darya ke qareeb aajate hain. Qaraqorum ke junoob mein Ladakh ka dhalwani aur tang pahadi silsila darya ke daayen kinare par saath chalta hai. Jis ke paar Darya-e-Shyok Sindh ke mutawazi behta hua dedh sau meel ke baad Ladakh ka pahadi silsila khatam hojata hai toh Darya-e-Sindh mein aan milta hai. Bees meel ke baad Skardu ke qareeb Qaraqorum ki bulandiyon se aane wala ek aur muawin darya Shigar bhi Darya-e-Sindh mein shamil hojata hai. Shyok, Shigar aur beeson chote chote darya apni wadiyon mein rehne wale bashindon ke liye baqa ka saaman muhaiya karne ke saath saath unhein khatraat se bhi do char karte rehte hain. Pahadi dhalaanon mein se aksar glacier khatarnak janam lete hain. Jo tabahi barpa karte rehte hain aur woh zindagi aur amlak ke liye almnak hadsat ka sabab bante hain. Pahadon mein koi bhi dhalaan khayi achanak gaare aur chattanon ki ek badi aur khofnak miqdar ko neeche dhakel deti hai. Jo phisalte hue apne raste ki har shay ko maliamat kar deti hai. Kyun ke in pahadon par koi jhar jhankar ya ghaas waghera nahi hai jo in ki mitti ko pakad sake aur barf ke pighalne ke saath mitti ke yeh azeem tode bagair kisi intibah ke naram hokar neeche ki janib phisalte hain. Kabhi kabhi yahan zalzale bhi aate hain magar tabah kun toofan yahan barpa hona mamool hain. Darya-e-Sindh ki buland o bala ghaatiyon mein waqay glacier jo qutbi ke ilaqon ke baad sab se bade glacier shumar hote hain. Jo yahan ke daryaon mein barf ke bade tukre shamil karte rehte hain. Baaz auqat koi glacier wadi ke farsh se pighal ke aage aata hai aur apne raste mein aane wale darya ko mahino ke liye rok leta hai. Ba-al-akhir jab darya ka pani use todta hai toh khuda ki panah, yeh samandar ki azeem toofani lehar ki manind garajta hua chalta hai aur raste mein aane wali har rukawat dehaton, faslon aur darakhton ko maliamat safa-e-hasti se mita deta hai. Darya-e-Shyok bohat bohat khatarnak hai. Is ke balai hisse mein ek tang ghaati mein do bade glacier waqay hain. Yeh glacier darya ke aage bar bar band bandh kar use rok dete hain. Jis ke natije mein sainkdon feet chauri aur kayi meel lambi jheel ban jati hai. Jab yeh band toot ta hai toh neeche ki janib waqay wadi barf ke todon se at jati hai jo makanon se kahin ziyada bade hote hain aur saalon mein ja kar pighalte hain. Yahan ke basi apne dehat pahadon ke pehluon mein bulandi par banate hain. Taake barf ke roke gaye pani ke un buland reylon ki zad mein na aa saken. Jo chand saalon baad ek martaba phir un ki wadiyon ko bahakar le jate hain. Yahan ikka dukka lakdi ki kashti bhi nazar aati hai. Jo purane tarz ki chapte painde aur oonche kinaron wali kashti hoti hai. Lekin darya par safar karne ka riwayati tareeqa safar karne ka jo ab sadak ki tameer ke baad matrook ho chuka hai. Is mein bakri ki bohat si khalon ko hawa bhar kar ek saath bandh diya jata tha aur un ki tangein upar rakhi jati thi. Danddon ko bandh kar ek choobi jaal upar bandh diya jata tha. Is par bohat se aadmi hathon mein lambe lambe dandde lekar upar baith jate the. Is par Skardu jane wali sabziyan aur phal laad diye jate the. Bakriyon ki khaal mein se hawa nikalti rehti thi. Is liye tango ke zariye musalsal un mein hawa bhari jati thi. Darya ka bahao bohat tez hota tha aur danddon aur chapon ke madad se use bar bar rokna padta tha. Safar ke ikhtitam par is mein se hawa nikal kar use khushki ke raste wapas late the. Lakdiyon ki kashtiyon ko bhi wapsi ke liye retile kinare par kheench kar le jana padta tha. Sadkein tameer ke baad ab yeh sare khatraat khatam ho chuke hain. Skardu ke maqam par wadi Sindh ek baizvi pyale ki manind hai jo sateh samandar se saadey saat hazaar feet buland bees meel lambi aur aath meel chauri hai. Is ke charon taraf arghawani, surkh, bhure aur badami rang ke pathrele pahad jo satrah hazaar feet buland hain ghera dale hue khade hain. Wadi mein peele rang ki ret bichhi hui hai. Jis mein sardiyon mein sabz aur garmiyon mein dhundlai hui chandi jaisa matiyale rang ka darya Sindh kisi saamp ki tarah bal khata hua sust kharami ke saath hawa ki wajah se lehron ki soorat mein bikhri hui ret mein behta hua darya apne raste mein khadi tanha aur azeem chattan ke paas guzarta hai. Jis par Qila-e-Skandar khada hua hai. Lakhon saalon se darya chattanon mein apna rasta banate hue aur unhein kaat ta hua gehrai mein ja pahunchta hai. Mukhtalif bulandiyon par behte hue darya ne is wadi ke kinare par khadi chattanon mein jo kaat chhaant ki hai woh aaj bhi mukhtalif bulandiyon par kahin se aage jhuki hui aur kahin chabootre ki soorat mein pheli hui satahon ki soorat mein dekhi ja sakti hai. Door peeche khushk aur pathrele pahad apni nokili ubhri hui chotiyon ke saath aage peeche qatarein bandhe asmaan mein dhans rahe hain. Yahan hawa is qadar saaf o shaffaf hai ke aankhein dhoka khati hain. Jo cheez bohat nazdeek dikhai deti hai door been se dekhein toh bazahir chand sau gaz door darya ki doosri simt ugi hui jhaadiyan kam az kam teen meel door bade bade darakht nazar aate hain. Doosre kinare par pani se khelta hua bachcha, darya mein kashti utarta jawan aadmi nazar aata hai. Har jagah aise manzar ko pesh karti hai jo nazar ko jakad leta hai. Duniya mein kahin bhi is qadar beshumar aur mukhtalif pahad ek jagah par ikhatte nazar nahi aate hain. Kahin itni ziyada pahadiyan badalte manazir, kahin bhi is qadar khoobsurat fiza aur shandar rang nazar nahi aate hain. Yahan halke khakistari, bhura khakistari, neelgoon khakistari aur peela khakistari rang ke pahadon ke manazir nazar aa rahe hote hain. Jin par kahin kahin safed dhariyan nazar aa rahi hoti hain. Darya-e-Sindh ke gird pheli hui safed ret sitaron ki tarah jhilmila rahi hoti hai. Yahan raat ka manzar bhi qabil-e-deed hota hai. Agar darya ke kinare khade hokar atraf mein nazar dalen toh gehri tareeki mein makanon ki roshaniyan is tarah nazar aati hain ke jaise sitare zameen par utar aaye hain. Garmiyon mein jab ke maidani ilaqon mein shadeed garmi hoti hai toh yahan ki banjar dhalaanon par koi saya nahi hota hai aur chattanein dhoop mein bhatti ki tarah dehak rahi hoti hain aur din ki takleef deh garmi raat ko kaat khane wali sardi mein badal jati hai. Yahan bashindon ka qadeem mazhab Buddhism tha jis ke nuqoosh chattanon par milte hain. Baad mein yeh log Musalman ho gaye. Azadi ke baad logon ne baghawat kar di aur Pakistan se inzamam aur madad ki darkhwast ki. Pakistan ne darkhwast qabool karke fidai raste se asleha saazo saaman ki tarseel ka intizam kiya. Agarche is dauran mein Bharat ne Baltistan ke mashriqi hisse par dobara qabza kar liya aur fire bandi ki wajah se use khali nahi karaya ja saka. Azadi ke baad is shahar ne bade paimanay par taraqqi ki hai. Jis mein sar fehrist muwasilati nizam ko behtar karne ki koshish ki gayin. Skardu se Gilgit tak sadak toh dar kinare rasta tak nahi tha. K2 aur Qaraqorum ki doosri chotiyon aur maqamat ki trekking ke liye jane wale koh pema aur teamain isi shahar se hi jati hain. Ab qasbah na raha aur is ilaqah ka doosra bada shahar ban chuka hai. Skardu ke neeche ba-nisbat Ladakh ke raste mein ziyada khofnak aur kadak wadiyan hain. Yahan se Darya-e-Sindh azeem-ul-shan ghaatiyon mein se hokar guzarta hai aur meelon tak jhaag udate pani aur asmaan ke darmiyan mein umoodi chattanon ke ilawa kuch aur nazar nahi aata hai. Yahan darya ke kinare chattanon ke saath ek paidaal rasta umoodi chattanon mein makdi ke jalon ki tarah pheli hui ghulam gardishon se guzarta tha. Jis mein ja baja upar aur neeche jane ke liye lakdi ki seedhiyan lagayi gayin thi. Kahin is mein lakdi ki khutiyan lagi hui thi jinhein pakad pakad log safar karte the. In raston par bulandi par jo rasse ke pul ek pahad se doosre pahad tak bed majnoon rasse jin ke darmiyan mein bed majnoon ki jhoomti hui bareek rasiyan bandhi jati hain un jhoomti hui rasiyon par darya paar karna hota tha. Neeche tezi se behte darya ko dekh kar sar chakarane lagta tha. Ab yahan sadak tameer ho chuki hai jo ek pul ke zariye Shahrah-e-Resham se mil rahi hai. Is sadak par hum Qaraqorum ki deewaron ke saath sadak ke doosri janib Darya-e-Sindh poore talatum se beh raha hai aur darya ke paar Himalaya ki umoodi dhalaanein hain. Jin par kahin kahin sabza nazar aata hai. Is sadak ka shumar duniya ke khatarnak raston mein kiya jata hai. Yahan har waqt land sliding ka khatra rehta hai aur rasta khula rakhne ke liye raat din kaam karna padta hai. Is sadak ki tameer ek bada insani kaarnama aur ajaybat-e-alam mein se ek hai. Agarche yeh road kafi chauri hai magar use koi achi sadak nahi keh sakte hain. Is ke bawajood yeh sadak tameer ka shahkar kehlati hai. Jab yeh banna shuru hui toh yeh nahi dekha jata tha ke ek mah mein yeh sadak kitni meel bani balkeh yeh dekha jata tha ke kitni feet bani hai. Yeh ahem sadak banne se pehle yahan kisi qism ka rasta nahi tha balkeh darya ke saath khadi chattanein thi. Ibtida mein jab yeh sadak banayi gayi toh itni chauri thi ke is par ba-mushkil ek jeep chal sakti thi ya khachchar ya maweshi ya sirf paidaal ke liye thi. Magar baad mein ise chaurha kar diya gaya jis par do gadiyan ba-yak-waqt chal sakti hain. Is par jo muallaq pul tameer kiye gaye hain woh agarche bohat mazboot hain lekin jab un par gadi guzarti hai toh pul khofnak awaz mein charcharate hain. Jis se kamzor logon ka dil dehal jata hai. Magar is sadak ki badolat Skardu ka raabta poore saal Pakistan ke doosre ilaqon se rehta hai. Yahan kuch oonche neeche khet nazar aate hain jin saath kuch kachche makanat hain. Warna ajeeb wehshatnak safar hai. Jis mein pahadon ka jah o jalal aur darya ka josh o talatum numayan hai. Yeh sadak darya ke saath chalti hai sirf chand jagahon par door ho jati hai. Is tarah baaz jagahon par chand feet neeche beh raha hota hai aur baaz jagahon par yeh darya se sainkdon feet buland hojati hai. Is ki chadhai bhi baaz jagahon par is ka zawiya pantalis degree se ziyada zawiya hojata hai. Yeh sadak jab Shahrah-e-Resham se milti hai toh samne Koh-e-Hindu Kush ka pahadi silsila aur Pamir ki buland sateh murtafa aajati hai. Shumali ki janib janib Qaraqorum ki deewar ke saath do buland pahad Deo Haramush aur Rakaposhi khade hain. Junoob mashriq mein Himalaya mein Nanga Parbat asmaan se batein kar raha hai. Yeh sadak Skardu se Darya-e-Gilgit jahan Darya-e-Sindh se Janglot ke qareeb milta hai wahan par is Shahrah-e-Resham mein mil jati hai jo China se Gilgit hoti hui Islamabad ja rahi hai. Yahan Darya-e-Gilgit Sindh mein daayen janib se aakar milta hai. In ka milap Angrezi haroof Y ki tarah hota hai aur yahan par phailte hue behte hain. Darya-e-Sindh mein Darya-e-Gilgit jis jagah mil raha hai woh aam jagah ya maqam nahi hai. Yeh maqam aisa hai jis ki misal duniya mein kahin payi nahi jati hai. Yahan duniya ke teen azeem pahadi silsile Qaraqorum, Himalaya aur Hindu Kush amne samne khade ek doosre ki nigahbani kar rahe hain. In ko Darya-e-Sindh aur Darya-e-Gilgit aapas mein milne se rok rakha hai. Darya-e-Sindh tang pahadon ke daaman mein phansa hua aur taqat ke saath beh raha hai. Is ke bahao ko nazar bhar kar dekhna bhi haibat zada kar deta hai. Janglot se Kala Bagh ka faasla 300 meel se kam hai. Lekin maghrib ki janib se aage badhte hue Koh-e-Hindu Kush aur junoob ki simt se Nanga Parbat ki azeem deewaron mein ghiri hui is wadi mein yeh darya mod katta bal khata apna rasta talash karta tang ghaati se guzarta hai. Yeh mod katta ek wadi se doosri wadi mein garajta cheekhta hua yeh do guna faasle tay karta hai. Gilgit ek qadeem ilaqah hai Isa ki paidaish se sau saal pehle yahan Buddhism phela. China se aane wale Budh zaireen jo Peshawar, Kashmir, Taxila aur doosri jagahon par ziyarton par jate the woh yahan se guzarte the. Dogra qabza se pehle yeh Daristan kehlata tha aur yahan Gilgit, Sai, Hasora, Punyal, Nagar, Hunza, Bawanji, Ashkoman, Gojal, Badakhshan, Daleel, Tankhir, Gohar, Theleja, Spals aur Astor ki choti choti riyasatein thi. Jo aapas mein lad lad kar apni taqat kho baithi thi. Maharaja Kashmir Gulab Singh ne 1851 ne mawqa se faida uthaya aur unhein ek ek karke baaj guzar bana liya ya un par qabza kar liya tha. Magar ghulami ko unhon ne qabool nahi kiya aur ghulami ka jua un ke liye sakht bhari tha. Is liye yeh ilaqah mustaqil shorish zada raha. Yahan ke qile mein mustaqil fauj rakhni padti thi. Magar yahan ke awam par ziyada sakhtiyan ki gayin toh Bartaniya ne 1877 mein ek agency qaim ki. Waqt ke saath yahan unhon ne neem fauji daste bharti kiye jise Gilgit Scouts ka naam diya gaya. Is ka kaam amn o aman qaim karna aur ird gird ke humsayon se ilaqah ka difa karna tha. Taqseem ke waqt yahan ke Hindu governor aur do Bartanvi junior officer ne Gilgit ke Musalmanon ka saath dene ka faisla kiya. Yahan ke log Pakistan mein shamil hona chahte the. Gilgit Gilgit Baltistan ka darul hukoomat hai aur ek masroof shahar hai. Kyun ke yeh Shahrah-e-Resham par waqay hai aur Cheeni tijarat isi raste se hone ki wajah se yahan ke bohat se shehri tijarat mein masroof rehte hain Cheeni saaman ki kharid o farokht ke liye China se un ka raabta aur amad o raft rehti hai. Is ke bazaar Cheeni saaman se bhare hue hain. Yeh shahar sayyahon ka khusoosi markaz hai. Is liye yahan bohat se hotel hain jin mein gair mulki nazar aate hain. In gair mulkiyon ki teamain koh pema, trekking aur mukhtalif muhim ke liye rawana hoti hain. Is se yahan ke logon ko rozgar ke zaraye bhi mayassar hain. Hum jab aage chalte hain ek aur bada darya Darya-e-Sindh mein apna pani shamil kar raha hota hai. Yeh Darya-e-Astor hai jis ka matiyala pani door tak numayan tak Darya-e-Sindh mein numayan rehta hai. Gilgit se darya ki taraf jate hue kahin kahin se Nanga Parbat dikhai deta hai. Nanga Parbat koi wahid pahad nahi hai. Buland hoti gayi pe dar pe pahadon aur umoodi chattanon par mushtamil ek ek aisa dev haikal mitti aur barf ka toda hai jis ki bulandi chhabees hazaar chha sau saath feet ke saath buland barfani chotiyon par ikhtitam pazeer hota hai. Yahan Darya-e-Nanga Parbat ke saaye mein Darya-e-Sindh beh raha hai. Nanga Parbat tak pahunchna ke kayi raste hain aur har woh shakhs jo Nanga Parbat ko qareeb se qareeb dekhne ki shadeed khwahish rakhta hai woh apne hausle ke mutabiq is ke qareeb se qareeb jane ki koshish karta hai. Yeh Nanga Parbat Darya-e-Sindh se sirf chaudah meel ke fidai faasle par hai. Yahan neeche darya ke qurb mein shadeed garmi aur Nanga Parbat ki bulandiyon par shadeed sardi hoti hai. Is ilaqe mein darya ne is qadar gehri khayian khodi hain ke yahan sirf chand ghante dhoop pahunch pati hai. Yeh azeem bulandiyon aur gharaon jaisi pasti wali sar zameen hai. Yeh ziyada tar badsoorat aur par-haibat hai is ko dekh kar dil par ajeeb asar hota hai. Yeh azeem bad-haibat aur dahshatnak sar zameen. Is wadi ki wusat mein yahan khamoshi aur tezi ke saath Darya-e-Sindh Nanga Parbat ke daaman mein ek azeem aur pur pech khayi mein mod kaat ta hua guzarta darya ba-zahiri sukoon se behta ek tang darya dikhai deta hai. Darya ke kinare shumal ke maidano ki taraf munh karein toh hamare samne ek aisa dil fareb manzar hoga jis mein tapte hue sehra se door barfeele pahad, sabza aur ret sab ba-yak-waqt numayan honge. Yeh ek ek aisa dil fareb manzar hoga jis ke sehar mein insaan kho jata hai aur apne ko kisi aur duniya mein gum pata hai. Yeh ilaqah Arab ke sehra ki tarah banjar hai aur is ki sateh par beshumar sailabon ki tabahi dastaanein pheli hui hain. Yeh umoodi chattanon aur deewaron se ghiri hui yeh chattanon aur gehri kahayion ka ek aisa gorakh dhanda hai jis mein shayad insani qadam kabhi nahi pade hain. Jahan sabza aur nabatat ke naam se mehroom pathrele malbon ka ek aisa dher aur un par chalna aisa hi ke jise chand ke pahadon mein akele tanha ghoomna phirna. Behte hue darya ke patal mein hamesha ek sailab khamoshi se bagair ruke rawan hai aur jab koi bada bhanwar paida hota hai toh apne poore ghaiz o ghazab ke saath gehri sarsarahat ke pani ko upar phenkta hai. Yahan bhi insaan abad hain aur yahan darya ki laayi hui mitti se jo pahadon ke darmiyan mein pichha deti hai toh wahan ek basti bhi abad hojati hai. In mein kuch dehat aise hain jahan sardiyon ke poore chha mah tak suraj nazar nahi aata hai aur baaz dehaton mein garmiyon mein zameen is qadar garam hojati hai ke wahan ke bashinde naql makani par majboor hojate hain. Yeh tamam dehat har waqt barf aur mitti ke phisalte todon aur khatarnak sailabon ki zad mein rehte hain. Yeh ilaqe barf aur mitti ke phisalte hue tode aur khatarnak sailabon ki zad hote the. Jahan Darya-e-Gilgit aur Astor Sindh mein milte hain. Yahan pehle bohat abadi thi aur ziraat phall phool rahi thi. 1840 mein Nanga Parbat ke daaman mein pahadi ka ek toda Darya-e-Sindh ki ghaati mein gir kar darya par band bandh diya aur ek badi tees meel lambi jheel wujood mein aagayi jo Gilgit shahar tak pahunch rahi thi. Phir achanak is jheel ka band toot gaya aur meelon tak ziraat mit gayi aur darjanon dehat safa-e-hasti se mit gaye. Yahan agarche jaani nuqsan kam hua kyun ke logon ne pehle hi ehtiyati tazabiz ikhtiyar kar lein thi. Yeh sab kuch yahan ka mamool hai. Maslan 1885 mein ek mitti ke tode ne band bandh diya tha. Jab pani ne use toda toh teen sau meel neeche Attock ke maqam par ek din mein hi pani ki sateh 09 feet buland ho gayi thi. Haal hi mein Attabad mein ek aisi jheel wujood mein aagayi. Yahan ke dehat mein rehne wale musalsal khatre mein zindagi basar kar rahe hote hain. Yahan nazar rakhne ka ek intizam qaim hai. Is ilaqah mein nau hazaar feet oonche pahad hain jo yahan is ghaatiyon ki deewar bana rahe. In ki umoodi dhalaanein shadeed garmi aur shadeed sardi ki wajah se toot phoot ka shikar hoti rahi hain aur Monsoon ke ilaqah mein dakhil hojane se yeh mazeed khatarnak ban jati hain. May se October tak junoob maghribi hawain Bahr-e-Arab se uth kar badal ki soorat mein yahan apna bojh utarti hain. Jo ghazabnak hawaon aur barf o barish mein tabdeel hojata hai. Pahadon ki sateh par behta pani naale ki soorat ikhtiyar kar leta hai aur har nala pani ka ek ghazabnak dhara ban kar pahadon ke pehlo se mitti aur chattanon ko ek aabshar ki soorat mein girata hai. Jab Monsoon badal pahunchte hain toh agar glacieron se pighalne wala pani bhi beh raha ho toh phir Darya-e-Sindh mein hazaron aabshar ban jate hain jo apna pani shamil kar rahe hote hain. Jis se Darya-e-Sindh biphra kar apne kinaron se bahar nikl aata hai aur apne upar jhuki hui buland chattanon pe yeh pani ki phuwarain barsata hai aur kinaron ko apne saath bahata hua le jata hai. Jis se kinare abad bastiyon ko darya ke saath saath upar pahadon se aaye hue pani ke reyle tabahi machate hue raah mein aane wali har cheez ko maliamat kar dete hain aur aisa har chand saal baad yeh hota hai. Is ke bawajood hazaron saalon se Darya-e-Sindh ke saath saath kisi na kisi qism ka rasta maujood raha hai agarche yeh bohat khatarnak tha. Chouthi sadi eswi mein Budh muqaddas maqamat ki ziyarat ke liye aane wale Cheeni sayyah Fahian ne likha ke yeh rasta bohat khatarnak hai. Jis mein jagah jagah khatarnak dhalaan chattanein aur umoodi pathreeli deewarein khadi nazar aati hain. In tang raston par chalne hue hazaron feet buland pahad ki simt mein mehaz ek patthar ki deewar hai. Jis ke neeche behte darya aur gehri khayion par nazar dalte hue nazar chakarati hai aur in raston par paon jamane ke liye koi bhi yaqeeni jagah nahi hai. Neeche tez o tund shor machata bal khata Darya-e-Santo Ho (Sindh) beh raha hai. Yahan logon ne in raston se guzrne ke liye in deewaron mein surakh aur baaz jagahon seedhiyan bichha rakhi thi. Jin ki taadad taqriban saat sau ke qareeb hai aur in khatin raston guzarna padta hai. Yahan hum ne seedhiyon se guzrne ke baad hum ne raso ke latakte pul ke zariye darya ko aboor kiya. Fahian ne bhi zikr kiya hai. Fahian ke is safar ke baad is khatarnak rasta ki bajaye sadiyon tak tajir ghulamon ka karobar karne ke liye shumal aur junoob simt mein jane wali Darya-e-Sindh ki muawin nadiyon ke lambe lekin is ki nisbat aasan rasta ko istemal karte rahe. In raston par jhaag udata maghrib ki simt behta Darya-e-Sindh hi ek aisi rukawat thi jise aboor karna hota tha. Is ilaqah mein Bartaniya ne ek muallaq pul tameer kiya tha. Taqseem-e-Hind ke Pakistan ke liye shumali ilaqon se zameeni raabta qaim karna ahem masla tha aur is rasta ki tameer ahmiyat ki hamil thi. Is liye yahan ek sadak ki tameer karne par sanjeedgi se socha gaya aur yahan ek sadak ki tameer ka aghaz hua aur 1968 tak ek kachi aur patli si sadak tameer ho chuki thi. Yeh sadak kachi hone ke bawajood engineering ka ek azeem inshan kaarnama samjhi jati thi. Ab yeh tang aur patli sadak ab wasee aur pakki ho chuki hai aur Shahrah-e-Resham kehlati hai. Jo Cheen ilaqe Xinjiang se shuru hoti hai aur Gilgit se hoti hui jahan is se kuch faasla Skardu se aane wali shahrah is se mil jati aur Nanga Parbat se pehle jahan Darya-e-Astor darya-e-Sindh mein milta hai ek sadak Astor se aakar milti hai. Is tarah poore Gilgit Baltistan ka raabta is sadak ke zariye poore Pakistan se qaim ho gaya hai. Is ke ilawa bhi kayi aur ahem sadkein is shahrah se milti hain, jis mein Khyber Pakhtunkhwa jane wali kayi sadkein shamil hain. Is sadak ki tameer mein badi rukawat chattanein umoodi thi. In chattanon mein bracket bana kar bahar ko nikla hua rasta tameer kiya gaya. Aksar jagahon par rasta banane ke liye chattanon ko dynamite se udana pada. Is sadak par aane wala kharch shumar se bahar hai. Yeh Gilgit se hoti hui Darra Khunjerab par Cheen se milti hai. Is tarah yeh qadeem tijarti rasta China aur Wast Asia ke saath jo khatarnak tareen tha ab mehfooz safar ka zariya ban chuka hai. Is sadak ki tameer se is ilaqah taraqqi aur sayahat o tijarat mein numayan taraqqi hui. Qadeem abadiyon ne taraqqi aur darya ke kinare kinare bohat si nayi abadiyan wujood mein aagayi hain. Yeh sadak jab Nanga Parbat se Darya-e-Sindh ke saath saath guzarti. Woh rasta khud arzi ajayab khana hai. Darya ke ek taraf sadak chal rahi hai aur doosre janib buland o bala pahad istada hain. In pahadon mein jagah jagah ghaatiyan hain. Jahan se pani ke safed dhare shor machate hue tezi se darya mein apna pani shamil karte rehte hain. Is sadak par kayi jagah qudrat ke ajeeb ajoobe hain. Jahan darya ne un pahadon ko is safai se kata hai ke unhein dekh kar lagta hai kisi ne cake ko tez churi se kata hai aur is cake mein mukhtalif rang ki teh hon. Yeh mukhtalif rangon mein safed, siyah, bhure aur khakki rang ki seedhi dhariyon ki soorat mein in pahadon mein nazar aati hain. Darya ki janib ke pahad ek deewar ki nazar aate jis kahin kahin koi rasta hai. Warna bas khadi deewar saath chal rahi hai. Jis mein kahin pahad phat jata hai aur koi pani ka chashma shor machata hua Darya-e-Sindh ke paniyon mein apna pani shamil kar raha hota hai. Thakot ke maqam par Darya-e-Sindh ko yeh Khuda Hafiz keh kar Mansehra aur Taxila mein yeh GT Road se mil kar Islamabad pahunch jati hai. Thakot se Shahrah-e-Resham Darya-e-Sindh ko paar karke Hazara ke ilaqah mein dakhil hojati hai. Magar darya ab jis ilaqah se guzarta hai woh duniya se kata hua ilaqah tha. Jis ke bare mein bohat kam maloomat thi. Yahan kahin kahin ikka dukka gaon in pahadon ki ghaatiyon mein nazar aate the aur jahan zameen hamwar hoti thi wahan ikka dukka khet bhi nazar aate the. Jahan thode bohat darakht ya sabza nazar aata tha. Warna charon taraf bhure pahad phele hue the. Neeche patal mein be-qaboo darya poori rawani aur taqat ke saath behta hua maazi ke la-mutanahi zamaanon se chala ja raha tha aur is ke ilaqah mein sadiyon se bohat kam tabdeeliyaan waqay hui thi. Aisa lagta tha use koi taqat tabdeel nahi kar sakti hai. Lekin waqt ke saath yahan is qadar tabdeeliyaan waqay hui aur ab yeh ilaqah bohat badal chuka hai. Shumali ki janib thode faasle par bayein kinare par ek chota sa gaon Tarbela waqay hai. Yeh ret aur chattanon par mushtamil wasee hawa dar ilaqah hai. Jis mein Monsoon ki barishon ne beshumar ghaatiyan, khayian aur naale khod rakhe hain. Sateh samandar se is ki bulandi ek hazaar se do hazaar feet buland hai. Jahan se shumal ki janib buland o bala pahad nazar aate hain. Mashriq ki janib yeh sateh murtafa Sindh Ganga ke maidano tak chali gayi hai jo Calcutta tak chali gayi hai aur maghrib ki janib Kabul ki wadi mein Afghanistan tak pheli hui hai. Yahan ki zameen surkhi mayil bhuri aur peele rang ki hai jis mein ja baja jangli ghaas aur jhaadi dar darakht nazar aate hain. Yeh ilaqah bara-e-rast dhoop aur hawaon ki zad mein hai. Yahan pahunch kar Darya-e-Sindh phail jata tha. Tarbela ke samne darya ke darmiyan mein ek jazira tha. Yeh jazira dono atraf se kashtiyon ke pulon se juda hua tha. Yeh pul tang aur bhari o bharkam kashtiyon ko ek qatar mein khada karke bandha kar har kashti ko bahao ke khilaf neeche wazni pattharon se bandh kar un par lakdi ke takhte rakh kar mitti aur ghaas daal di jati thi.
