Taqseem ke waqt zereen Sindh aur is ke muawin daryaon par Angrezon ka tashkeel diya hua aabpashi ka nizam do hisson bat chuka tha. Pakistan ko pani ke hawale se Bharat ki bala-dasti ka samna tha aur us ke tamam darya Bharat ke zer-e-control ilaqah se guzar kar Pakistan aate the. Bharat ka pani rokne ki wajah khushk sali ka samna tha. Is liye yeh tay kiya gaya Sindh darya par band bandh kar us ke pani ka zakheera kar liya jaye toh pani ka masla bohat had tak hal hojayega. Is band ke liye Skardu ki wadi, Bhasha par bhi ghaur kiya gaya. Akhir kar chaudah saal tak is masla ka ba-ghaur jaiza lene ke baad geologists, hydrologists aur economists is natije par pahunche ke bahao ki simt mein akhri buland pahadiyon ke foran mozoon jagah Tarbela hai. Yeh Islamabad se sirf chalis meel ke faasle par hai. Bahao ki janib zereen ilaqajat ki nisbat upar ki ghaatiyon ko bhar kar jheel banana ziyada mozoon ho sakta hai. Kyun ke is tarah kam se kam zarayi zameen zer-e-aab hogi. Is dam ki tameer ka matlab tha kura-e-arz ke is hisse ki sakht ko tabdeel karna tha. Dam ka pushta tayar karne ke liye nehar Panama ke liye khakna-e-Panama se khodi gayi mitti ki miqdar ki do tihaayi mitti ki darkar thi. Yeh pushta taqriban do meel lamba aur darya ki guzar gaah se 500 feet buland karna tha. Is ke liye 186 million mitti aur chattanein darkar thi. Jis mein se taqriban aadhi mitti surangon aur pani behne ke raston ki khodai se hasil honi thi aur baqi mandah aur jagahon se khod kar laani thi. Teen million cubic gaz concrete ki zaroorat thi. Dam ke upar Darya-e-Sindh ne pachaas meel peeche tak jahan is ki ghaati ki chaurai sau gaz se kam hai jheel ki soorat ikhtiyar karte hue gyarah million pani ka zakheera karna tha. Sailab ke mausam mein ya jab Monsoon barish ki wajah se jheel ki sateh buland hojaye ya balai ilaqah mein kisi glacier ke tootne se pani mein achanak izafa hojane ki soorat mein zeli aabi raste ke izafi pani ko dam ke neeche riwayati guzargah mein phenk denge. Tarbela Dam ek kaseer-ul-maqasid dam hai jo Mangla Band se do guna, Aswan Dam Misr se teen guna aur duniya mein mitti ki bharai ka sab se bada band hai. Is ke liye bain-ul-aqwami idaron aur dost mumalik se takneeki o mali taawun ki appeal ki gayi. 1967 mein Aalmi Bank ne is dam ki tameer ki manzoori de di. 1968 mein Tarbela Taraqqiati Fund qaim kiya gaya. Jis ke liye atiyat ke ilawa France, Italy, Bartaniya, Canada aur Aalmi Bank ne qarz bhi manzoor kiye. Isi saal teen Italaavi aur teen Franceesi companies par mushtamil ek consortium Tarbela Joint Venture ko band ki tameer ka theka diya gaya. 1969 mein consortium mein Germany aur Switzerland ki saat companies ka group bhi shamil ho gaya. November 1971 mein yeh band paya takmeel ko pahuncha aur 1977 mein is ne kaam shuru kar diya tha. Taham is ko mukammal takmeel 1984 mein hui aur is ki lagat 149 billion dollar thi. Tarbela se chal kar Darya-e-Sindh wadi Gandhara mein dakhil hota hai. Yahan Darya-e-Kabul is mein girta hai. Kisi zamane mein yeh ilaqah jangalon se dhaka daldali ilaqah tha. Jahan hathi, gainde aur sher bhi paye jate the. Yahan char lakh saal purane hathyar aur qadeem janwaron ke nafraat mile hain. Jinhein yahan ki qadeem pathreeli imarton mein dekha ja sakta hai. Khas kar wadi Soan ka ilaqah in faaslz se bhara hua hai. Darya ke mashriqi kinare par namak ki kanein hain jis mein qadeem zamane se namak musalsal nikl raha hai. Tarbela se upar darya ke daayen kinare par ek wasee ilaqah par Pathan abad hain. Yahan ka beshtar ilaqah biyabaan aur ujaad chattanon par mushtamil hai. Jis mein buland umoodi chattanon mein bal khai hui jhuki hui chotiyan hain. Yeh ilaqah rehzanon aur qazzaqon ke liye ek mozoon ilaqah hai. Yahan qabaili bashinde uqabon ki tarah in chotiyon baith kar kisi bhi fauji qafile ka rasta rok sakte hain. Unhon ne bahar se hamla awar hone wale bade bade fauji daston ko yahan be-bas kar rakha tha. Bartaniya ne 1858 ta 1881 ke dauran mein tees tazeebi karrawaiyan ki. Jin ka maqsad is ilaqah par apni bala-dasti qaim karna magar unhein kabhi mukammal kamyabi hui. Sateh murtafa Pothohar mein pahad darya se kuch door hat jate hain. In pahadon mein kayi darre waqay hain aur unhein daron mein Hindu Kush ke paar se hamla awar Bar-e-Saghir aate rahe hain. Yahan jhaag udate hue barsati naale, jhulsane wali dhoop, surkh chattanon par ja baja jadi bootiyan ugti hain. Yahan maghrib ki janib se Darya-e-Kabul milta hai aur wadi Peshawar ko janam deta hai. Yeh darya Sindh mein apna pani bhuri rangat ka pani dalta hai jo kafi door tak alag alag behte hain aur phir ek doosre mein mil jate hain. Is darya se kuch door Peshawar ka shahar hai jahan qadeem zamane se Wast Asia se tijarti qafile aate the. Yeh sailabon ki sar zameen rahi hai yahan sailab aate rahe hain. Jab balai wadi mein koi pahadi phisal darya ka rasta rokti thi aur achanak darya ka pani apna rasta banata tha toh yahan shadeed sailab aajata tha. 1841 ki garmiyon mein darya ke qareeb Sikh faujiyon ka ek dasta thehra hua tha. Achanak dopahar ke waqt pani ka zabardast reyla aaya aur paanch sau sipahiyon ko is tarah bahakar le gaya jaise kisi ne cheuntiyon ko jharoo se saaf kar diya ho. Yahan Taxila abad hai. Gautam Budh ke zamane mein Taxila ki shohrat ek ilmi markaz ki thi. Taxila mein ek azeem university aur bohat se qadeem asaar hain aur in asaron ko Gandhara ki Ghorastani Tehzeeb ka naam diya gaya hai. Yehi Sikandar ne 327 q.m. Ohind ke maqam par Darya-e-Sindh ko aboor kiya tha. Yehi rasta jis par se Wast Asia ke hamla awar Bar-e-Saghir ikhtiyar karte the. Isi rasta se Ghuri aur Turk aaye the. Mangolon ke hamlon se bach kar shehzada Jalaluddin Khwarizm Shah yehi ek buland chattan se jhalaang laga farar hua tha. Jis par Chingiz Khan ne use kharaj-e-tehseen pesh kiya tha. Jab Mughalon ko zawal naseeb hua toh Nadir Shah aur Ahmed Shah Abdali isi rasta se Bar-e-Saghir hamla awar hue. Ahmed Shah Abdali ne Darya-e-Sindh ki maghribi kinare ko apni mamlakat mein shamil kar liya. Jise Durand Line ke under is ilaqah ko Bar-e-Saghir mein dobara shamil kiya. Ahmed Shah Abdali ne Punjab ko hukmaran Ranjit Singh ko bana diya. Jis ne apne mamlakat ko wasee karte hue darya ke maghribi janib Peshawar aur Dera tak ke ilaqah par qabza karke ek azad Sikh hukoomat ki bunyad rakhi jo us ki maut ke saath hi mit ho gayi. Jab Sikhs ne Angrezon se shikast khai toh Angrezon ki hukoomat qaim ho gayi aur taqseem ke baad yeh ilaqah Pakistan ka hissa bana. Darya ke maghribi kinare ki wapsi ke liye aksar Afghanistan awaz uthata rahe hai. Magar is ilaqe ke bashindon ne isi kabhi ahmiyat di. Kyun ke woh jante hain un ka mustaqbil wadi Sindh ke bashindon ke saath wabasta hai. Yahan Darya-e-Sindh ke kinare Attock ka shahar abad hai. Peshawar ke mashriq mein balai maidano mein Darya-e-Sindh phail kar uthla behta hai. Is maqam se foran baad jahan Darya-e-Kabul ka apna garha surkhi mayil bhura pani matiyale rang ke Sindh ke pani mein dalta hai. Thoda neeche ja kar Attock ke chote shahar ke paas sateh murtafa khatam hojati hai aur Darya-e-Sindh ko ek martaba phir simat kar pathreeli pahadiyon ke silsile mein hokar tang raste mein se guzarta hai. Is jagah jahan ke dhalaan ghaati 200 gaz chauri hai. Yahan darya matiyala pani surkh bhure pani ke saath ghul kar mil kar ek tez dhare ki soorat mein behta hai. Sardiyon mein qadre sukoon ke saath aur garmiyon mein jab buland pahadiyon par glacier ke band darwaze khul jate hain toh darya ki sateh mein pachaas feet ka izafa hojata hai toh yeh kisi munh zor ghode ki tarah garajta hua chhinte udta hua, chakkar lagata hua, jhaag banata hua, sabzi mayil matiyale bhanwar paida karta hua aur pahadiyon ko kaat ta hua guzar raha hota hai. Yahan is ka safar ka manzar itna asar angez hota hai ke muqami log ise Aba Seen yani daryaon ka baap kehte hain. Pehle yahan se Darya-e-Sindh ko kashtiyon ke pul ke zariye paar kiya jata tha. Yahan bade bade kale pattharon ko takrati hui lehrein unhein tukdon mein tod deti hain. Lehron ki tezi ki wajah se kashtiyan badi tezi se tairti hui palak chhapakte hi doosre kinaron par ja lagti hain. Is ghat par kashtiyan aksar takra kar pash pash bhi hojaya karti thi. Khas kar do an do badi badi chattanon se jo daayen kinare par waqay hain. In chattanon ke naam do kafiron Kamala aur Jalala ke naam se mansoob hain. Jin ko muqami logon ki riwayat ke mutabiq Akbar ne yahan phakwaya tha. Attock se paar Darya-e-Sindh ke daayen kinare par ek chattan par Bartanvi rejimton ke nishan kanda hain jo is ilaqah mein saal ha saal jangon mein masroof rahe hain. Attock ke maqam par Akbar ke banaye hue Qila ne do sau saal tak apna tasallut qaim rakha. Lekin unneesween sadi ki ibtida mein Sikhs ne darya ki doosri janib ek doosra Qila Khairabad ke naam se tameer kiya jis ki baqiyat ab bhi ikka dukka hi nazar aati hain. Yeh dono Qila amne samne khade the. Sardiyon mein kashtiyon ka ek pul dono ko milata tha aur garmiyon mein jab darya tughyani par hota tha toh use hatana padta tha. Attock par darya ke liye pul ke liye bahao ki simt 24 kashtiyan kafi hoti thi. Magar upar ki janib kam az kam 36 kashtiyon ki zaroorat hoti thi. Yeh pul June se September ke darmiyan mein ki tughyani ko bardasht nahi kar sakta tha aur har dafa naya pul banana padta tha. 1886 mein Bartanviyon ne yahan ek mustaqil pul tameer kar diya. Yeh pani sateh se sau feet buland hai taake balai ilaqon mein koi glacier ya mitti ka toda phisalne ki soorat mein pani ke dabao se toh is pul ko nuqsan nahi pahunche. Agarche kayi dafa yeh pul doobte hue bacha hai. Tarbela Dam ki tameer se yeh yeh khatra kam chuka hai. Is pul ke upar se rail guzarti hai aur neeche se sadak guzarti hai. Is pul ke banne ke baad kashton ke ghat ki zaroorat nahi rahi. Is pul ke ek taraf Akbari Qila khada Mughalon ki dil-wala angezi ki dastaan suna raha hai aur doosri janib Sikhs ka tabah shuda Qila ke khandarat apni tabahi par nauha khwan hai. Attock aur Kala Bagh ke darmiyan mein taqriban sau meel neeche Darya-e-Sindh ek gehri khandaq ki teh mein behta hua ek aise pathrele ilaqe se guzarta hai. Yeh ilaqah aksar banjar hain lekin kayi jagahon par sarsabz nazar aata hai. Maghribi kinare par Tirah ki pahadiyan jo Afghanistan ki bulandiyon se neeche utar rahi hain aur zameen pathreeli hai. Yahan bahar mein sarson ke chote chote khet aur kayi jagahon par zameen hamwar hai. Lekin yahan sakht chattanein sar nikale bhi nazar aati hain. Mashriqi kinare par door tak pahadiyon ka silsila phela hua hai. Mahireen asaar-e-qadeema ne yahan ek qabl-az-tareekh shahar ke asaar daryaft kiye hain. Wadi Kabul ke muqable mein yahan abadi kam hai aur yahan darya ke kinare ghat aur kashtiyan bhi nazar aati thi. Yahan buland imartein, stupa ya mandaron ke khandar bhi nazar aate hain. Yahan bhi Darya-e-Sindh apne manba se hazaron meel door maidani ilaqe mein aksar biphra jata hai. Yahan Attock se neeche tang wadiyon mein darya buland aur umoodi chattanon mein phansa hua behta hai aur is ki teh mein beshumar nokili chattanein ubhri hui hoti hain aur kayi maqamat par is ki gehrai tees fadam se ziyada hoti hai. Baaz jagahon par achanak dedh do sau feet neeche ja girta hai aur aksar auqat darya pathrele raste se guzarta hai aur yahan darya mein bhanwar paida hote rehte hain. Jin ki zad mein aakar aksar saaman bardar kashtiyan ult jati thi. In tamam khatron ke bawajood sainkdon saalon se yeh darya Attock se neeche ke liye tijarti saaman ki tarseel ka yak tarfa zariya sadiyon se tha. Darya ke kinare Khushhalgarh aur us ke maghrib mein Kohat waqay hai. Yahan Angrezon ke daur se fauj ki ek badi chhaoni thi. Jahan ab Pakistani fauj taynat hai. Yahan pehle ek kashtiyon ka pul tha. Bartaniya ne yahan ek pul tameer karaya. Yahan 1907 rail aur sadak ki mustaqil amad o raft ke liye ek naya pul bana diya gaya. Yahan Darya-e-Soan is milta hai. Yahan ma qabl-e-tareekh hajri zamane ke patthar ke auzar kasrat se mile hain. Is ki chaurai se lagta hai ke yeh is wadi ka kabhi sab se bada darya tha. Mahireen-e-arziyat ka khayal hai ke Himalaya aur Qaraqorum ke upar aane ya ubharne ke dauran mein kisi ek marhale par pani ko jo maghrib ki dhakela gaya tha is pani ne niklne ke yeh rasta banaya tha. Aaj Soan ek choti si nadi hai. Barishein hon toh is ke pani ka rang khoon ki tarah surkh ho jata hai aur Darya-e-Sindh ke pani ko door tak surkh kar deta hai. Darya ke raste mein das meel neeche ki janib barishon ke pani se kati phati silsila-e-koh Namak ki kale aur bhure rang ki shumali dhalaanein khadi hain. Yeh rasta is qadar dhulaan aur silwaton se pur hai ke is mein se rasta banakar guzarna namumkin maloom hota hai. Yahan Darya-e-Sindh apni poori quwwat ke saath aage badhta hai ke is ke raste mein koi cheez ziyada der tak muzahamat nahi kar sakti hai. Yeh wohi maqam hai jahan Kala Bagh Dam banane ki tajweez hai. Agarche yeh maqam dam banne ke liye ideal jagah hai. Lekin ise is liye tameer nahi kiya ja saka ke is dam ki tameer ke liye Punjab ke ilawa doosre soobe tayar nahi hain. Yahan par dam ki tameer ke Aalmi Bank aur bain-ul-aqwami maliyati idaron ne Tarbela se bhi pehle is maqam dam ki tajweez pesh ki thi aur bar ha is tajweez ko dohraya gaya hai. Agarche kayi hukoomaton ne yahan dam ki tameer ki koshish bhi ki hai aur kuch kaam bhi hua hai. Magar Punjab ke soobe ke ilawa Khyber Pakhtunkhwa aur Sindh ne shadeed mukhalifat ki aur is ki tameer ko rokna pada. Yahan darya ke qareeb tameerani mashinary aur doosra saaman bikhra hua jo is dam ki tameer ki ibtidai koshishon ke liye laya gaya tha aur ab istemal na hone ki wajah se pada zang kha raha hai. Junoob mein Kohistan-e-Namak ki surkh aur arghawani rang ki chattanein khadi hain aur yahan se darya-e-maidanon mein dakhil hota hai. Yahan maghribi kinare par Kala Bagh aur mashriqi kinare par Mari Indus abad hain. Is se aage chand sau gaz ke baad ek meel chaurha aur ek meel ke baad is ka paat das meel tak phail jata hai. Yahan darya mein kayi jazire hain aur un mein maweshion ki charagahain aur ziraat hoti hai aur chote chote kayi gaon bhi abad hain. Sailabon mein yahan ke log log naql makani kar jate hain. Yahan narsalon door door tak jangal nazar aa rahe hote hain. Darya jab chadhta hai toh in jazire ghayab hojate hain aur jab pani ka dhare ka rukh badalta hai toh naye jazire nazar aate hain aur purani zameenein darya bard hoti rehti hain. Yahan chromium, koyale aur gypsum ki kanein bhi hain. Magar sab se ahem madaniyat namak ki chattanein hain. Baaz jagahon par yahan pahadiyan thos namak ki aur shaffaf, sakht aur surkh ragon wali hain. Yahan peele registani biyabanon jin mein kahin safed namak ki chitkabriyan bikhri hui hain. Jis mein kante dar jhaadiyan faaslon par khadi nazar aati hain. Darya ke maghribi kinare par sehra mein tez aandhiyan chalti rehti hain. Kala Bagh se tees meel neeche daayen kinare par akhri qabil-e-zikr muawin darya Kurram is mein aakar milta hai. Yeh Afghan sarhad ke azeem pahadon se nikl kar aata hai. Is raste se wehshiyon aur jangjuon ke jathe qadeem daur mein musalsal Hindustan par hamla awar hote rahe hain. Jo har martaba ajnabi naye lekin apne peshroon ki tarah zalim hote the. Angrezon amad ke baad yeh silsila ruk gaya. Darya-e-Sindh ke mashriqi kinare par Mianwali waqay hai. Yeh ek qadeem maqam hai aur is ne bohat se naam badle hain. Ek chota sa qasbah ab ek bada ahem shahar ban gaya hai. Yeh ilaqah Khyber Pakhtunkhwa aur Punjab ki saqafat ka sangam hai. Yahan agar Darya-e-Sindh ke maghribi kinare par koi shakhs dheeli dhali shalwar aur qameez pehne hue ho toh Pathan hai aur wohi shakhs jab Darya-e-Sindh ke mashriqi kinare par dhoti bandh leta hai Punjabi kehlata. Yeh sailabon ki sar zameen hai jahan bohat se qadeem asaar milte hain yehi Aryon ka muqaddas Ved likha gaya aur inhi maidano mein Aryon ki mashoor Das Rajaon ki jang hui thi. Sikandar ke salar Seleucus ko 305 q.m. mein Chandra Gupta Maurya ne ise inhi maidano mein sharmanak shikast di aur na sirf Hindi maqboozaat se balkeh Kabul, Kandahar, Herat aur Balochistan se bhi dastbardar ho gaya aur beti ki shadi Chandra Gupta se kar di. Chandra Gupta ne ise paanch sau hathiyon ka tohfa bheja. Mianwali ke qareeb yehi Jinnah aur Chashma Barrage bhi waqay hain. Kala Bagh ke neeche Darya-e-Sindh ki dono janib ret pheli hui hai. Darya-e-Sindh aur us ke akhri muawin Panjnad ke darmiyan mein ki nok maghrib ki janib hai Sagar Doaba kaha jata hai chali gayi hai. Yahan ret bhure rang ki hai aur pani khara hai. Yahan darya phail jata hai aur yeh insano janwaron aur faslon ko pani ki soorat mein zindagi ata karta hai toh wohin unhein tabah kun tughyani ki soorat mein maut aur tabahi bhi baanta hai. Yeh Kala Bagh ke baad deron ke ilaqah tak musalsal sailab ki soorat mein behta hai. Sardiyon mein yeh tang dharon ki bhool bhulaiyon ki soorat mein behta hai. Jis mein ja baja chote chote ret ke jazire sar uthaye nazar aate hain aur sailab ke zamane is ki wusat itni hojati hai ke ek kinare par khade hone wale ko doosra kinara nazar nahi aata hai aur manne par majboor hojate hain ke ise banane ke liye das hazaar nadiyaan lapakti hui neeche aakar ise pani muhaiya karti hain. Daire ke ilaqe mein retile maidan sirf ret ke rang ke nahi hain. Yeh peele, bhure aur surkhi mayil aur baaz jagahon par barf ki tarah safed hain. Is ilaqah mein jahan kabhi door tak ret ke maidan phele hue the aur har jagah janwar hi janwar nazar aate the. Ab yahan ka manzar nama bohat badal chuka hai. Waqt ke saath taraqqi ne yahan bhi tabdeeli ne qadam jama liye hain. Yahan ke chote qasbe phail kar shahar bante ja rahe hain. Yahan kabhi khargosh, lomriyan, teetar, pahadon par uriyal, charkh aur cheete bhi paye jate the. Darya mein chote ghariyal, ud bilao bhi milte the. Yahan ke sehraon mein tote, ullu, bater, talur, gidh, kala teetar, fakhta, kabootar aur bohat se parinde janwar aam the. Pehle jab daryaon mein pani aata tha aur yeh pani phail kar nasheebi ilaqon ko bhar diya tha toh un mein murghabi, saras, bagle aur doosre bohat se aabi parinde jama hojate the. Magar badhti hui abadi aur andha dhund shikar ne un ka bilkul khatama kar diya hai. Warna pehle jab kheton ko pani diya jata toh mukhtalif parinde keede makode khane ke liye jama hojate the aur mukhtalif parinde un sarsabz kheton mein nazar aate the. Lekin kheton mein sirf wohi parinde nazar aate jo jangalon mein darakhton mein rehte hain. Kyun ke jab se zahereli dawain in kheton mein keede marne ke liye dali ja rahi hain in dawaon ne keeron ke saath saath in parindon ka bhi khatama ho gaya. 1870 ki dahayi mein Bartanviyon ne mukhtalif maqamat par jahan se yeh bade darya pahadon se niklte the mushahidati station qaim kiye aur yahan ke pani ke ikhraj ka tafseeli record murattab karna shuru kiya. Sirf is qism ke kayi saalon par muheet record ki madad se hi daryaon mein hone wali mustaqil tabdeeliyon ke bare mein wusoq ke saath kisi qism ki pesh-goiyan mumkin hain. Yahan kheton ke in samandar mein registani jazire bhi milte hain. Ret ki pahadiyan bhi, buland banjar zameen bhi aur jangal se dhake hue zameen ke katte phatte tukre bhi. Sukkur Barrage se aage jahan wasee khule hue aabi khitta, Jetty Namak ke maidan ya is ke ba-muqabil Shahdadkot ka pat jo har tarah ki nabatat se mehroom hai. Darya-e-Sindh mein jab phir pur sailab ho toh woh apne pushton ke darmiyan mein bhi das meel chaurha paat liye aur apne delta ki beshtar zameen ko apni aabi chadar se dhaape hue qadeem naam Mitho Darya ka haqeeqi waris nazar aata hai. Rohri ke ilaqah mein mote ghaas ke maidan jahan had-e-nazar tak phele hue daryai jangalat aur dhund (jheel) jin ko ghane sarkandon ne dhaap rakha hai. Yahan ke mutazad manzar jin mein ek taraf sehrayi shadabi aur doosri taraf intehai biyabani hai. Jahan aaj aabpashi ke jadeed tareeqon se barish par ziraat ka dar o madar hai.
Yahan sabza ke ikhtilaf se kachi zameenein daryai pani se sairab hoti thi aur pani nahi pahunchta hai woh zameen jo itni sakht hai ke un par ghode ke sumon ki taap door tak sunayi deti hai. Is pahadi mitti se bani zameen jo qadre gehre rang ki hai. Pakki ka rang halka aur is sakht zameen par kundi ka khar dar darakht, karir ya caper ke bagair patton ki jhaadiyan aur ber milte hain jo aur yeh bara-e-naam barish par zinda hain. Naram ret ki zameen ya war ya si jis ka rang safed aur bareek zarraat par mushtamil jis ka ghubar logon ke liye pareshan kun hota hai. Is zameen par khap jis ki patli shakhain hoti hain, phog aur aak ka pauda milta hai. Is zameen ko pani mil jaye toh bohat sa sabza aur ziraat ba-kasrat hoti hai. Darya ke kinare ki zameen behtar hoti hai. Yeh namdar mitti aur ret ka murakkab hoti hai. Darya mein tughyani ke baad jo mitti ke pushte ban jate hain wahan dekhte hi dekhte un par mukhtalif darakhton aur jhaadiyon ki hariyali chha jati hai. Agar unhein barsaat aur bakriyon se bach kar unhein badhne ka mawqa mile toh kuch arsa baad chote darakhton aur jhaadiyon ka ek jangal khada hojata hai. Zarkhezi mein kachche ki zameen darya ki laayi mitti musalsal tazgi bakhshti hai. Behtareen nehri zameen bhi siwa-e-chawal ki kasht ke musalsal fasliyon se nakara hojati hai.
Woh ilaqa jo Andes pahadon ke saaye mein maujood hai, wahan ki nabatāt zyada tar ghaas phoons aur jadi bootiyon par mushtamil hai jo khushk saali ko bardasht kar sakti hai. Zameen sakht aur pathreeli hai jis ki wajah se ziraat daryaaon ke kinaroon tak hi mahdood hai. Kuchh ilaqon mein koniferus janglaat bhi paaye jaate hain. Chaure patton wale darakht bhi yahan aam milte hain. Is ke ilawa mahkama janglaat ne bhi bade paimane par deegar mumalik ke darakht yahan ugaye hain. Neem banjar ilaqe ki khardar jhaadiyan aur deegar aisi nabatāt jo pani ki kami ko bardasht kar saken bhi ba kasrat milti hain. Is ilaqe mein bade paimane par angooron ki kaasht bhi faaydemand hai. Shumali maghribi Argentina mein kiktas ki kayi iqsam paayi jaati hain. Taham 4,000 meter yani 13,000 foot se zyada bulandi par nabatāt nahin ugtein.
Kayi anwaa' neem istuvaai shumaal mein bhi milti hain. Ahem janwaron mein Jaguar, Puma aur jungli billi, bandar, magarmachh wagaira bhi milte hain. Deegar janwaron mein tapir, su'ar ki kayi iqsam, jungli kutta, racoon aur kachhuaon ki dheron iqsam shamil hain. Parindon mein hummingbird, lam dheng, toucan aur ababeel wagaira ahem hain. Wasta'i maidanon mein ant eater, armadillo, jungli billi, bhediye aur Rhea (baghair parwaaz wala parinda), baaz, uqaab, bogle, hiran aur lomdiyan bhi paayi jaati hain. Maghribi pahad kayi janwaron bashamool llama, guanaco aur vicuña ahem hain. Is ke ilawa khargosh, pahadi billi aur Andes ke gaddh ahem hain. Junubi ilaqon mein cougar yani pahadi sher, huemul, pudú yani duniya ka sabse chhota hiran aur jungli su'ar shamil hain. Is ke ilawa saahili ilaqon mein elephant seal, fur seal, samandari bachhde aur penguin bhi milte hain. Argentina ke ilaqayi samandar mein bahri hayaat ba kasrat hai. Whale, dolphin wagaira aam milti hain. Sardine, salmon aur sharqen bhi paayi jaati hain. Squid aur shahi kekda bhi milte hain. Daryaaon aur nadiyon mein trout bhi milti hai. Ajdahe jaisa ke boa, deegar saanp jaisa ke viper wagaira bhi paaye jaate hain.
Argentina ki mu'eeshat market par inhesar karti hai aur qudrati zaraye ba kasrat hain. Abadi a'la taleem yaafta hai aur ziraat ka shoba baramdaat ke liye ahem jabke sanati shobe mein tanau' paya jata hai. Mulk mein khidmaat ka shoba mulki mu'eeshat mein 59 feesad jabke rozgar mein 72 feesad naukariyan muhayya karta hai. Manufacturing bil tarteeb 21 aur 13 feesad jabke ziraat mein bil tarteeb 9 feesad aur 7 feesad hain. Ta'meeraat, kan kani aur awaami sahuliyaat baqiya hissa poora karti hain. Ziraat bashamool processed khuraak, 2010 ki baramdaat ke 54 feesad par mushtamil tha. Isi saal sanati shobe ne 35 feesad baramdaat muhayya kien. Afrat-e-zar ki buland sharah Argentina ki mu'eeshat mein kayi dahaiyon tak masla bani rahi hai. 2009 mein Transparency International ke mutabiq 179 mumalik ki fehrist mein Argentina ka number 106wan hai. Hukoomati aur private shobon mein bad'unwani (jis mein money laundering, munshiyat aur smuggling wagaira ke sath sath tax ki chori bhi ahem hai) shamil hain. Apne hamsaye Chile ke baad Argentina insani taraqqi ke a'shariyye aur fi kas aamdani ke aitbaar se Latin America mein doosre number par hai. Argentina G20 ka bhi rukun hai. Aalmi Bank ke mutabiq Argentina baala'i mutawassit aamdani wala mulk hai. Argentina ki mu'eeshat 1875 mein zirai baramdaat mein achanak izaafe ke sath aur European sarmaya kari aur tarkeen-e-watan ki aamad ke sath taraqqi karne lagi. Taham yeh urooj 1930 mein apne ikhtetaam ko pahuncha. Androoni Adam istehkam aur aalmi rujhanaat ki wajah se 1913 mein Argentina jo duniya ke das ameer tareen mumalik mein se aik tha, 2010 mein 62wain number par chala gaya. Agarche is bare zyada tehqeeq nahin ki gayee taham be panah qarzay, mu'aashi Adam istehkam, zaroorat se zyada qawaneen, azadana tijarat par pabandi aur bad'unwani ahem tareen wajuhaat mein shamil hain.
Argentina ne dheron doctor, scientist aur moajid duniya ko diye hain. In mein teen Nobel inaam yaafta bhi shamil hain. Argentina ke moahqiqeen ne zakhmoun ke ilaaj, amraz-e-qalb ke ilaaj aur kayi iqsam ke canceron ke ilaaj daryaft kiye hain. Domingo Liotta ne pehli baar masnooi insani dil banaya jis ki kamyab paiwand kari ki gayee. René Favaloro ne duniya mein pehli baar bypass surgery aur uske tareeqe mutarif karaye. Francisco De Pedro ne behtar masnooi pacemaker banaya. Bernardo Houssay Latin America ke pehle Nobel inaam yaafta fard hain. Unhon ne janwaron mein glucose par pituitary ghudood ke kirdar ka jaiza liya. César Milstein ne antibodies par vasee' tehqeeq ki. Luis Leloir ne daryaft kiya ke jandaaron mein kaise glucose ko glycogen mein badla jata hai aur kaun kaun se bunyadi ajzaa nashaste ko metabolize karne ke kaam aate hain. Leloir Institute of Biotechnology Latin America aur duniya bhar mein apni nau'iyat ke a'la tareen idaron mein se aik hai. Doctor Luis Agote ne pehli baar mahfooz tareeqe se intiqal-e-khoon mumkin banaya. Enrique Finochietto ne mukhtalif jarrahi auzaar banaye. Is ke alawa Argentina ne pehli baar kisi jandaar ke genome ka naqsha taiyar kiya jo duniya bhar mein apni nau'iyat ka pehla tha. Is ke alawa insani genome project mein bhi Argentina ka ahem kirdar raha hai. Argentina ka atomi program intehayi taraqqi yaafta hai. 1957 mein Argentina ne tehqeeqi maqasid ke liye reactor banaya. 1974 mein Latin America ka pehla tijarati paimane ka reactor Argentina ne taiyar kiya tha. Argentina ke atomi program mein berooni ma'awinat itni zyada nahin. Argentina ki technology par banaye gaye atomi reactor Peru, Algeria, Australia aur Misr mein kaam kar rahe hain. 1983 mein Argentina ne elaan kiya ke woh atomi hathiyaron mein istemal hone wali uranium taiyar karne mein kamyab ho gaye hain. Taham is ke baad Argentina ne elaan kiya ke woh atomi technology ko sirf aur sirf pur aman maqasid ke liye istemal karenge. Bain ul aqwami atomi idare mein Argentina Board of Governors mein shamil hai. Is ke ek Croatian tarek-e-watan ne fingerprint technology ki bunyad dali. Paul Pescara ne pehli baar helicopter ki kamyab aazmaishi parwaaz ki. Hungary aur Argentina se ta'alluq rakhne wale László Bíró ne pehli baar tijarati paimane par ballpoint pen banaye. Eduardo Torroja ne pehla pendular combustion engine banaya. Juan Maldacena jo Argentina aur America se ta'alluq rakhte hain, string theory ke hawale se bahut ahem hain. Is ke alawa Argentina masnooi sayyare banane ke hawale se bhi ahem samjha jata hai.
2001 ki mardum shumari ke mutabiq Argentina ki abadi 3,62,60,130 afraad par mushtamil hai. 2010 ki mardum shumari ke ibteda'i nataij ke mutabiq yeh abadi ab 4,00,91,359 afraad ho chuki hai. Kul abadi ke lehaz se Argentina Junubi America mein teesre jabke duniya bhar mein 33wain number par hai. Abadi ki gunjaaniyatt 15 afraad fi murabba kilometer hai. Tarkeen-e-watan ka mulk samjha jata hai. Zyada tar afraad European ul nasl hain jo nawaabiyati daur mein yahan aaye the. European ul nasl afraad ki ta'daad ke hawale se America ke baad Argentina mein sabse zyada afraad aan basay hain. In ki aksariyat Italy aur Spain se aayi thi. Haaliya ghair qanooni immigration zyada tar Bolivia aur Paraguay se ho rahi hai jabke Peru, Ecuador aur Romania se bhi thode bahut log aate hain.
Aain ke mutabiq har mazhab ke pairukaron ko azadi hai jabke ma'aashi hawale se hukoomat ko Roman Catholic mazhab ki madad karni hoti hai. 1994 se qabal tak sadr aur naib sadr ka Roman Catholic hona lazmi tha taham deegar sarkari uhdon par koi pabandi nahin thi. 1945 se ahem kileedi uhdon par mukhtalif mazahib ke afraad fa'iz hone lag gaye the. Aalmi Masihi database ke mutabiq Argentina mein 92.1 feesad Masihi, 3.1 feesad ghair yaqeeni, 1.9 feesad Musalman, 1.3 feesad Yahoodi, 0.9 feesad laadeen aur itne hi Budh mat aur deegar mazahib se ta'alluq rakhte the.
Mulk ki sarkari zuban ka de facto darja Hispaani ko mila hua hai. Doosri badi boli Italawee hai jise 15 lakh afraad bolte hain. 10 lakh afraad Arabi jabke char se panch lakh afraad German bolte hain.
Argentina ki abadi ka zyada tar hissa shahron mein rehta hai. Das bade shahron mein mulki abadi ka nisf hissa rehta hai. Har das mein se taqreeban ek shakhs dehaat mein rehta hai. Buenos Aires hi mein tees lakh se zyada afraad rehte hain. Greater Buenos Aires ilaqe mein ek karod tees lakh afraad rehte hain. Súbon ke darmiyan abadi ki taqseem yaksaan nahin. Pampa ke súbe mein kul mulki abadi ka 60 feesad rehta hai. Kuchh súbon mein tees tees lakh jabke deegar mein das lakh fi súbah abadi ki ausat banti hai. Zyada tar European ul nasl afraad shahron mein bas gaye the. Bahut sare chhote qasbe rail ki patdi ki ta'meer ke sath sath ta'meer hote gaye.
Azadi ke baad se Argentina ne apna azadana taleemi nizam banaya tha jis se sharah-e-taleem mein bahut izafa hua. Is waqt 97 feesad afraad khwan'da hain. 5 se 17 saal ki umar tak school lazmi hota hai. Elementary ya lower school 6 se 7 saal par muheet hota hai. Secondary ya high school mazeed 5 ya 6 saal ka hota hai. Sadr Domingo Faustino Sarmiento ko maujooda jadeed aur muft taleemi nizam ka me'maar mana jata hai. Zyada tar taleemi nizam ko tax dehindgan ki madad se chalaya jata hai. Bahut sare private primary, secondary school aur universities bhi yahan maujood hain.
Sehat-e-aama ajiron aur labor union ki madad se muhayya ki jati hai. Is ke alawa hukoomati insurance, awaami hospital aur clinic ke alawa private insurance bhi maujood hain. Argentina mein kul 1,53,000 hospitalon ke bed, 1,21,000 doctor aur 37,000 dentist hain jo taraqqi yaafta mumalik ke barabar ki sharah hain.
Armeenia ya Armenia ya Armanistan ek zameen band mulk hai jo Eurishia mein Qafqaz ke khitte mein waqe hai. Is ke maghrib mein Turkey, shumaal mein Georgia, mashriq mein Azerbaijan aur junub mein Iran ke mumalik waqe hain. Armenia Qafqaz ke ilaqe mein waqe hai. Yeh mulk Soviet Union ka sabse chhoti jamhooria tha. Armenia bunyadi taur par gyarah intizami ilaqon mein taqseem hai. Das ilaqe das súba jaat hain jabke gyarahwan darul hukoomat alag se intizami ilaqa hai. 23 August, 1990 ko, is ne azadi ka elaan kiya aur 25 December, 1991 ko sarkari taur par ek azad Soviet Union ban gaya. Armenia ek jamhooria hai. Maujooda wazir-e-azam Nikol Pashinyan hai. Armenia mein 10 súbon par mushtamil hai. Armenia mein sabse ooncha pahad Arguts hai. Jheel Sevan (is mulk ke maghrib) aur Lake Arpi (is mulk ke shumaal) mein hai. Darya Aras mulk ke junub mein hai. 301 Isvi mein Isaiyat ko mazhab ke taur par qubool karne ka pehla mulk Armenia tha. 16wain aur 19wain sadiyon ke darmiyan, Mashriqi Armenia aur Maghribi Armenia par mushtamil rawaiti Armeni'ayi watan Usmani aur Farsi saltanaton ki hukmarani mein aaya, sadiyon ke dauran in dono mein se kisi ek ne bar bar hukoomat ki. 19wain sadi tak, Mashriqi Armenia ko Roosi Saltanat ne fath kar liya tha, jabke rawaiti Armeni'ayi watan ke zyada tar Maghribi hisse Usmani hukmarani ke tehat rahe. Armenia ek taraqqi pazeer mulk hai aur insani taraqqi ke ashariya mein 85wain number par hai. Is ki mu'eeshat bunyadi taur par sanati paidawaar aur ma'adniyat nikalne par mabni hai. Agarche Armenia geographical taur par Junubi Qafqaz mein waqe hai, ise aam taur par geographical taur par European samjha jata hai. Chonke Armenia khud ko geographical taur par Europe ke sath kayi maamlaat mein hum aahang karta hai, is liye yeh mulk mutaddid European tanzeemon ka rukun hai jin mein Council of Europe, Eastern Partnership, Eurocontrol, European Regions ki Assembly aur European Bank bara'e ta'meer-e-nau aur taraqqi shamil hain. Armenia pure Eurishia mein baaz ilaqai groupon ka rukun bhi hai, bashamool Asian Development Bank, Ijtamai Salamati Mu'ahida Tanzeem, Eurasian Union aur Eurasian Development Bank. Armenia de facto khud mukhtar Artsakh ki himayat karta hai, jis ka elaan 1991 mein kiya gaya tha. Armenia Armeni'ayi Apostolic Church ko bhi tasleem karta hai, Armenia mein Isaiyat ki aksariyat hai.
Austria jise sarkari taur par Jamhooria Austria bhi kehte hain, bar-e-aazam Europe ke wast mein waqe khushki se ghada hua ek mulk hai. Is ki kul abadi 83 lakh hai. Is ke shumaal mein Germany aur Czech Republic, mashriq mein Slovakia aur Hungary, junub mein Slovenia aur Italy jabke maghrib mein Switzerland aur Liechtenstein ke mumalik waqe hain. Austria ka kul raqba 83,872 murabba kilometer hai. Austria ki sarzameen buland pahadon par mushtamil hai aur yahan Alps pahadi silsila waqe hai. Mulk ka 32 feesad raqba satah samandar se 500 meter se kam buland hai. Is ka buland tareen maqam 3,797 meter buland hai. Abadi ki aksariyat German zuban bolti hai aur ise mulk ki sarkari zuban ka darja hasil hai. Deegar muqami zubanon mein Croatian, Hungarian aur Slovene hain. Austria ki bunyadain hamein Roman daur se milti hain. Jab 15 q.m. mein Celtic saltanat par Romanon ne qabza kiya to ise ek súba bana diya. Pehli sadi Isvi mein yeh sara ilaqa aaj ke Austria ke zyada tar hisson par mushtamil tha. 788 Isvi mein yahan Masihiyat mutarif karayi gayee. Habsburg shehanshiyat ke dauran mein Austria ko Europe ki badi taqaton mein se ek shumar kiya jane laga. 1867 mein Austrian Saltanat ki jagah Austria-Hungary ne le li. Pehli Jang-e-Azeem ke ikhtetaam par 1918 mein Austro-Hungarian saltanat ka zawal hua. 1919 mein pehli Austrian Jamhooria qayam hui. 1938 mein Nazi Germany ne is par qabza kar ke apne andar shamil kar liya. Yeh qabza doosri Jang-e-Azeem ke ikhtetaam tak yani 1945 tak jari raha jis ke baad Austria par ittehadiyon ka qabza ho gaya aur unhon ne Austria ki khud mukhtar jamhoori haisiyat bahal kar di. Isi saal Austria ki parliament ne ek elaan jari kiya jis ke tehat Austria ko mustaqil taur par ghair janibdar mulk qarar de diya gaya. Aaj Austria parlimani jamhooria hai jis mein 9 wafaqi riyasaten shamil hain. Is ka darul hukoomat aur sabse bada shahr Vienna hai jis ki abadi 16 lakh se zyada hai. Austria ko duniya ke ameer tareen mumalik mein se ek mana jata hai aur fi kas aamdani 43,723 dollar salana hai. Austria mein miyar-e-zindagi bahut buland hai aur 2010 mein ise duniya bhar mein insani taraqqi ke ashaariye ke mutabiq 25wain darja diya gaya. Austria 1955 se Aqwaam-e-Muttahida ka rukun hai. 1995 mein yeh European Union ka rukun bana. 1995 mein hi Austria ne Schengen mu'ahide par dastakhat kiye aur 1999 mein Euro ko apna liya. German zuban mein Austria ko Österreich kehte hain. Yeh lafz pehli baar 966 Isvi mein istemal kiya gaya. Yeh lafz muqami zuban Bavarian mein mashriqi sarhadi ilaqe ko zahir karta hai. Lafz Austria darasal isi German lafz ko Latini banane se wujood mein aaya hai. Yeh lafz pehle pehl 12wain sadi Isvi mein istemal hua. Qadeem zamane se aabad wasti Europe ki sarzameen jo aaj Austria kehlati hai, darasal Roman daur se qabl muqami Celtic qabail ki aamaajgah thi. Celtic saltanat par baad azan Romanon ne qabza kar liya aur ise apni saltanat mein ba taur súba shamil kar liya. Roman badshahiyat ke zawal par is ilaqe par Bavari, Slaves aur Avars qabail ne hamle jari rakhe. Slavic qabail pahadon mein muntaqil ho gaye jo mashriqi aur wasti Austria mein maujood hain. 788 Isvi mein yahan Masihiyat mutarif karayi gayee. 14wain aur 15wain sadi Isvi mein Habsburg badshahoun ne Austria mein aas paas ke deegar ilaqe bhi shamil karna shuru kar diye. 1438 mein Nawab Albert Panjum of Austria ko un ke susar ki jagah badshah bana diya gaya. Baad azan Austria ne France ke sath jang chhed di. Napoleon ke haathon ba tadreej shikaston ke baad 1806 mein Roman saltanat zawal pazeer ho gayee. Do saal qabl 1804 mein Austria ki saltanat qayam hui. 1814 mein Austria ittehadiyon ke sath France par hamla aawar hua aur Napoleon ko shikast di. 1815 mein Congress of Vienna ke baad Austria ko bar-e-aazam ki char badi taqaton mein shumar kiya jane laga. Isi saal Austria ki sarbarahi mein Germany ka ilhaq hua. 1864 mein Austria aur Prussia ne mil kar Denmark se jang ki aur is se baaz ilaqe azad kara liye. Taham inhin ilaqon ki taqseem mein ikhtelaaf par 1866 mein Austria aur Prussia ki jang hui. Is jang mein shikast ke baad Austria Germany ki Confederation se nikal gaya. Sarajevo ke maqam par 1914 mein shahzada Franz Ferdinand ke qatl ko Austria ke siyasi danon aur generalon ne apne maqasid ke liye istemal kiya. Unhon ne shehanshah ko Serbia ke khilaf jang chhedne par majboor kiya. Natijatan pehli Jang-e-Azeem shuru hui aur Austria-Hungary ki saltanat khatam ho gayee. Austria-Hungary ke 10 lakh se zyada fauji is jang mein mare gaye. 21 October 1918 ko Austria ki parliament ke muntakhab shuda German numainde Vienna mein German Austria ki súba'i qaumi assembly ke taur par ikatthe hue. 30 October ko assembly ne German Austria ki riyasat aur uski hukoomat banayi. Shehanshah ne nayee hukoomat ko da'wat di ke woh Italy ke sath mu'ahide ke liye faisla karen. Taham hukoomat ne yeh zimmedari shehanshah par chhod di. 11 November ko shehanshah ne purani aur nayee hukoomat ke wuzara ki madad se elaan kiya ke shehanshah ka umoor-e-hukoomat mein amal dakhal yakser khatam ho gaya hai. 12 November ko German Austria ne khud ko Awaami Jamhooria qarar de diya. Saint Germain ke mu'ahide ke tehat 1919 mein wasti Europe ki tashkeel-e-nau ki gayee. Is ke nateejay mein nayee riyasaten baneen jabke pehle se maujood riyaston ki shakal badli gayee. 30 lakh se zyada Germanon ne khud ko Austria ki hudood se bahar deegar nayee riyaston jaisa ke Czechoslovakia, Yugoslavia, Hungary aur Italy ki aqaliyatain paya. 1918 aur 1919 ke dauran mein Austria ko German Austria kaha jata tha. Taham baad azan ittehadi taqaton ne German Austria ko Germany ka hissa ban'ne se roka aur ise Jamhooria Austria bana diya. Jang ke baad afraat-e-zar ne Austria ki currency krone ki qeemat ko ghataana shuru kar diya. 1922 ke mausam-e-khizan mein League of Nations ki zer-e-nigraani Austria ko bain ul aqwami qarz mila. Is qarzay ka maqsad mulki mu'eeshat ko diwaliya hone se bachana, currency ki qeemat ko istehkam dena aur aam mu'aashi soorat-e-hal ko behtar banana tha. Taham is qarzay ke nateejay mein Austria ek azad mulk ki bajaye League of Nations ke zer-e-intezam chala gaya. 1925 mein krone ki jagah Schilling ne le li. 10,000 krone ek Schilling ke barabar the. Baad azan is ki mustahkam halat ki wajah se ise Alpine Dollar kaha gaya. 1925 se 1929 tak mu'eeshat ne taraqqi ki lekin phir Black Friday aa gaya. Austria ki pehli Jamhooria 1933 tak chali jis ke baad Chancellor ne parliament ko bartaraf kar diya. Natijatan Italy ke Fasciston ki hami hukoomat bani. Is waqt do badi siyasi jam'aatain kaam kar rahi theen aur donon ki apni neem fauji milishiya'en theen. Is ke baad khana jangi shuru ho gayee. Baad mein Austria ki azad haisiyat khatam ho gayee. Austria ke Yahoodiyon ke khilaf qanoon bana diya gaya jis ke tehat un ke tamam asasay chheen liye gaye. 13 April 1945 mein Vienna Roos ke qabze mein chala gaya. 27 April 1945 ko chand siyasi danon ne Austria ki azadi ka elaan kar diya. Is elaan ko kamyab Roosi fauj aur Stalin ki himayat hasil thi. April ke ikhtetaam tak Maghribi aur Junubi Austria Nazi Germany ke qabze mein tha. 1 May 1945 mein 1929 ka aain bahal kar diya gaya. 1939 ta 1945 tak hone wali fauji amwaat ka andaza 2,60,000 lagaya gaya hai. Yahoodi Holocaust ke shikar afraad ki ta'daad 65,000 thi. Taqreeban 1,40,000 Yahoodi Austria chhod gaye the. 1992 mein Austria ke Chancellor ne tasleem kiya ke hazaron Austri'ai Nazi Germany ke jaraim mein shareek the. Germany hi ki tarah Austria ke mukhtalif hisson par mukhtalif ittehadi mumalik qabiz the. 15 May 1955 ko barson ki guft-o-shaneed ke baad Austria ko azadi mil gayee. 26 October 1955 ko wafaqi assembly ne aaini shiq manzoor ki jis ke tehat Austria ne apni marzi se khud ko mustaqil buniyadon par ghair janibdar qarar de diya. Isi qanoon ki doosri shiq ke tehat Austria mustaqbil mein kisi fauji ittehad ka hissa nahin banega aur na uski sarzameen par kisi doosre mulk ka fauji adda banaya jayega. Is waqt se Austria ki kharija policy banate waqt iski ghair janibdar haisiyat ko mad-e-nazar rakha jata hai. Taham Soviet Union ke zawal ke baad Austria ne apni ghair janibdarana haisiyat par nazar-e-saani ki hai aur 1991 mein Iraq par hamle ke liye apni sarzameen par se ghair mulki fauji tayyaron ko guzrane ki ijazat di hai. 1995 mein Bosnia mein Aqwaam-e-Muttahida ke aman mission ke liye bhi Austria ne hissa liya hai. Is tarah ghair janibdari ke qanoon ki wahid shiq jis par abhi tak amal jari hai ke mutabiq yahan ghair mulki fauji adde nahin bane. Austria ki musallah afwaj ki afraadi quwwat ka zyada tar inhesar lazmi fauji tarbiyat par hai. 18 saal ki umar ke har sehatmand mard par chheh maah ki fauji khidmaat lazmi hain. Is ke baad 8 saal tak unhen reserve fauji ke taur par rakha jata hai. 16 saal ki umar ke har ladke aur ladki ko fauji tarbiyat mein hissa lene ki ijazat hoti hai. Taham agar koi shakhs lazmi fauji tarbiyat na karna chahe to use is ke badle nau maah ki daftari khidmaat sar anjaam deni hoti hain. 1998 se razakar ladkiyon ko baqaeda fauj mein shamil kiya jane laga hai. Musallah afwaj darasal mushtarka afwaj hain jin mein barri fauj, hawai fauj, bain ul aqwami mission aur khusoosi daste wagaira shamil hain. Chonke Austria har taraf se khushki se ghira hua mulk hai, is liye iski bahri fauj nahin hai. 2004 mein Austri'ai afwaj mein kul 45,000 fauji the jin mein nisf ta'daad razakaron ki thi. Austria apne kul budget ka 0.9 feesad hissa apne difa' par kharch karta hai. Mulki sadr ko musallah afwaj ke alamati sarbarah ki haisiyat mili hui hai. Haqeeqat mein musallah afwaj ki sarbarahi wazir-e-difa' ke zimme hoti hai. Sard jang ke ikhtetaam ke baad Austria aur Hungary ki sarhad se fauji dastoon ko hatana bahut ahem tha. Austrian fauji daste sarhadi muhafizon ki mu'awanat karte the taki ghair qanooni taur par sarhad uboor karne walon ko roka ja sake. Taham jab 2008 mein Hungary ne European Union ke Schengen mu'ahide par dastakhat kiye to har qism ki sarhadain khatam kar di gayeen. Kuchh siyasi danon ne tajweez di ke fauji daste sarhadon ki nigrani ka kaam jari rakhen lekin Austria ke aain ke mutabiq fauj ko mahdood miqdar mein aur makhsoos halaat jaisa ke mulki difa', hangami halaat mein imdadi karrawayi wagaira ke liye hi istemal kiya ja sakta hai. Deegar kamon ke liye police maujood hai. Apni bayan karda ghair janibdarana haisiyat ke andar rehte hue Austria ne Aqwaam-e-Muttahida ke be shumar qayam-e-aman ke missionon mein shumooliyat ikhtiyar ki hai. Is waqt bhi Bosnia, Kosovo aur Golan ki pahadiyon mein Austria ke fauji daste qayam-e-aman ke liye maujood hain. Wafaqi Jamhooria ki haisiyat se Austria ko nau riyasaton mein taqseem kiya gaya hai. Yeh riyasaten aage mazeed zilon aur shahron mein munqasim hain. Zilon ko baldiyon mein taqseem kiya gaya hai. Har riyasat ko mulk ke andar rehte hue kisi had tak khud mukhtar faisle karne ki ijazat hai aur saqafat, social care, naujawanoon aur mahol ke tehffuz, shikar, ta'meeraat wagaira jaise kaam ke liye riyasat ke paas ikhtiyarat hote hain. Taham is baat par bahas chal rahi hai ke aaya ek itna chhota sa mulk das alag alag parliamenton ke qabil hai? Austria ka zyada tar hissa pahadi hai. In pahadon mein Central Eastern Alps, Northern Limestone Alps aur Southern Limestone Alps wagaira juzwi taur par Austria mein waqe hain. Austria ka taqriban chautha'i hissa hi nisbatan kam buland hai. Pure mulk ka taqriban 32 feesad hissa hi 500 meter se kam buland hai. Austria ke maghribi hisse ke pahad batadreej chhote hote hote mulk ke mashriqi hisse mein maidan ban jate hain. Austria ko panch bade hisson mein taqseem kiya ja sakta hai. Sabse bada hissa Mashriqi Alps ka hai jo mulk ke 62 feesad hisse par phaila hua hai. Bulandi aur satah murtafa ke aitbaar se deegar hisse munqasim hain. Austria ka zyada tar hisse ka mausam sard rehta hai aur is par maghribi martoob hawaon ka asar rehta hai. Nisf se zyada mulk par Alps pahad maujood hain. Deegar ilaqon mein nisbatan kam barish hoti hai. Agarche Austria ki sardiyan sard hoti hain aur darja hararat sifar se manfi 10 tak rehta hai phir bhi garmiyan nisbatan garam tar hoti hain. Garmiyon mein darja hararat 20 degree se 37 degree tak chala jata hai. Austria ko fi kas aamdani ke aitbaar se duniya ka 12wan ameer tareen mulk mana jata hai. Yahan miyar-e-zindagi bahut buland hai. 1980 ki dahai tak Austria ki zyada tar badi san'atain qaumya li gayee theen taham aaj kal unki dobara nijkari ki ja rahi hai. Yahan mazdoor tahreekain bil khusoos zoron par hain. San'aton ke baad mulki mu'eeshat ka ahem tareen sutoon siyahat hai. Tarikhai aitbaar se Austria ke tijarati rawabitt Germany ke sath bahut gehre hain. Isi wajah se German mu'eeshat mein hone wali tabdeeliyon ka asar Austria par bahut gehra hota hai. Taham European Union ka rukun ban'ne ke baad Austria ke tijarati rawabitt deegar European riyasaton se badhe hain aur Germany par inhesar kam hua hai. Mazeed bara'an European Union ke rukun ki haisiyat se berooni sarmaya karon ki dilchaspi bhi badhi hai. Maujooda barson mein GDP ki sharah badhi hai. 16 November 2010 mein Austria ne Greece ko diye jane wale qarzay ki qist rokne ka elaan kiya hai kyunki ba qaul Austria, Greece ne tax ki wasooli ke wa'ade pure nahin kiye. 1 January 1999 se Austria mein Euro ko apnaya gaya hai aur 1 January 2002 se yahan Euro ke sikke aur kaghazi note ra'ij hain. Aam taur par jab Euro ke sikke banaye jate hain to wahi saal un par likha jata hai taham Austria mein Euro ke sikke 1999 mein ban'ne lage aur 2002 mein unko istemal mein laya gaya aur sikkon par 2002 hi darj tha. Aath mukhtalif sikkon ke liye alag alag namoone taiyar kiye gaye hain. Euro se qabl Austria mein Schilling ra'ij tha. 1972 mein Austria mein pehli baar atomi tawanayi ki madad se bijli paida karne ke plant ki ta'meer shuru hui. Taham baad azan 1978 mein ek naye qanoon ki roo se Austria mein atomi tawanayi se bijli ke husool ko rok diya gaya. Is waqt nisf se zyada tawanayi aabi zaraye se paida hoti hai. Qabil-e-tajdeed zaraye jaisa ke hawa, shamsi aur hayatiyati zaraye se chalne wale power plant deegar zarooriyat poori karta hai. Qabil-e-tajdeed zaraye se kul 62.89 feesad tawanayi paida hoti hai jabke baqi zarooriyat tel aur gas se chalne wale plant pura karte hain. January 2009 mein Austria ki kul abadi 83,56,707 afraad thi. Darul hukoomat Vienna ki abadi 16 lakh se tajawuz kar chuki hai. Vienna ke baad Graz nami shahr doosra bada shahr hai. Yahan 2,50,099 afraad rehte hain. Teesra bada shahr Linz hai jahan 1,88,968 afraad rehte hain. Salzburg mein 1,50,000 jabke Innsbruck mein 1,17,346 afraad rehte hain. Deegar tamam shahron ki infradi abadi ek lakh se kam hai. Germany Austria ki sarkari zuban hai aur 88.6 feesad afraad German bolte hain. Turkey zuban 2.3 feesad, Serbian 2.2, Croatian 1.6 feesad, Hungarian 0.5 feesad, Bosnian 0.4 feesad jabke Slovenian zuban ko 0.3 feesad afraad bolte hain. Ek andaze ke mutabiq 13,000 se 40,000 Slovene aur 30,000 Croat aur Hungarian afraad baaz riyasaton mein aqaliyaton ka darja rakhte hain aur unhen khusoosi mara'aat hasil hain. Taham jin riyasaton mein unki ta'daad intehayi kam hai wahan unhen aqaliyat nahin mana jata aur qawaneen ke baraks unhen khusoosi mara'aat hasil nahin. 20wain sadi ke ikhtetaam tak 74 feesad abadi ka mazhab Roman Catholic tha. 5 feesad khud ko Protestant mante hain. Austria ke Isaiyon ko kaleesa ke liye makhsoos membership fees deni padti hai. Taqreeban 12 feesad afraad khud ko laadeen mante hain. 2001 mein deegar afraad mein 3,40,000 afraad khud ko mukhtalif Muslim girohon ke pairukaar mante hain. Unki aksariyat Turkey, Bosnia Herzegovina aur Kosovo se hai. 1,80,000 afraad Mashriqi Orthodox Church ke pairukaar hain jin ki aksariyat Serb ul nasl hai. 20,000 se zyada Yehova ke pairukaar jabke Yahoodiyon ki ta'daad 8,100 hai. Austria mein Islam sau saal se sarkari taur par ek tasleem shuda mazhab hai. Is waqt Austria mein taqreeban panch lakh Musalman aabad hain jo mulk ki kul abadi ka chheh feesad hain. Darul hukoomat Vienna mein Islam Roman Catholics ke baad doosra bada mazhab hai. Austria ki Islami baradari ke mutabiq is waqt mulk mein sath hazar Musalman bachche mazhabi taleem hasil kar rahe hain. Yeh taleem German zuban mein faraham ki jati hai. Austria mein taleem juzwi taur par riyasati aur juzwi taur par wafaqi zimmedari hai. 9 saal tak school jana lazmi hai jo umooman 15 saal ki umar mein khatam hota hai. 3 se 6 saal ke bachchon ke liye zyada tar riyasaton mein muft kindergarten maujood hote hain jo lazmi to nahin lekin bahut ahem samjhe jate hain. Har class mein zyada se zyada 30 talaba-o-talibaat hote hain. Har jam'aat ki dekh bhaal ke liye ek mudarris aur ek madadgar hote hain. Aam taur par subah 8 baje se dopahar 12 baje tak yeh dekh bhaal muft aur uske baad izafi dekh bhaal ke liye raqam ada karni hoti hai. Primary school 4 saal ke liye hota hai aur chheh saal ki umar se shuru hota hai. Yahan bhi jam'aat mein 15 se 30 tak bachche hote hain. Umooman har jam'aat ko ek hi mudarris 4 saal ke liye padhata hai. Har bachche ko infradi kaam diya jata hai aur woh ek hi tareeqe se padhte hain. Subah 8 baje se padhai shuru hoti hai aur 12 ya 1 baje tak jari rehti hai. Har ghante baad 5 ya 10 minute ka waqfa hota hai. Pehle saal se hi bachchon ko ghar ka kaam diya jata hai. Kuchh arsa pehle tak bachche ghar wapas ja kar hi khana khate the lekin chonke ab zyada aurten naukriyon ki taraf ma'il ho rahi hain to qabl aur baad az school bachchon ko khana muhayya kiya jata hai. Germany ki tarah yahan bhi sanawi taleem ke liye do tarah ke madarse hote hain. Pehli qism ke madarson mein zyada zaheen bachchon ko university ki a'la taleem ke liye taiyar kiya jata hai jabke doosri qism ke madarson mein bachchon ko vocational taleem ke liye taiyar kiya jata hai. Taham donon madarson ke ikhtetaam par imtehan hota hai jis mein kamyabi ki soorat mein university mein dakhla mil jata hai. Primary school ki tarah sanawi schoolon mein bhi 8 baje subah padhai shuru hoti hai aur dopahar tak jari rehti hai. Zyada bade talaba ke liye roz madarse ka dauraniya zyada hota hai. Har saal ke ikhtetaam par agar talib ilm ki karkardagi agar tasalli bakhsh ho to woh agli jam'aat mein chale jate hain. Agar unki karkardagi tasalli bakhsh na ho to woh garmiyon ki chhutiyon ke baad dobara imtehan dete hain. Dobara nakami ki soorat mein unhen taleemi saal dobara padhna padta hai. Talaba ke liye ek jam'aat mein ek se zyada saal guzarna ajeeb baat nahin. Do saal ki taleem ke baad unhen kisi ek taleemi dhaare ka intikhab karna hota hai. Ek dhaare mein funoon-e-lateefa jabke doosre mein science par zyada zor diya jata hai. Sanawi school paas karne wale har talib ilm ke liye university khuli hoti hai. 2001 se lazmi fees ka qanoon lagu hua hai jis ke mutabiq har taleemi saal ke liye 363.36 Euro fi talib ilm ada karne hote hain. Taham European Union ke talaba is se mustasna hain.
Iceland ka sarkari naam Jamhooria Iceland hai. Iceland ek jazira hai jo shumaal maghribi Europe ka ek mulk hai. Is ke berooni hisse shumaal mein Atlantic (Bahr-e-Oqyanus) samandar mein Europe aur Greenland ke darmiyan maujood hain. July 2008 ke mutabiq iski abadi 311396 hai. Is ka darul hukoomat aur sabse bada shahar Reykjavik hai. Wasti Atlantic plate par apne mahal-e-wuqu' ke lehaz se Iceland aatish fishani aur arziyat ke hawale se kafi bade paimane par mutaharrik hai. Is ka androoni hissa satah murtafa par mushtamil hai jo retile maidanon, pahadon aur glaciers (yakh basta darya) par mushtamil hai aur inhi glaciers (yakh basta darya) se darya nikal kar is ke zereen hisson se hote hue samandar tak jate hain. Khaleeji ro ki wajah se Iceland ka darja hararat is ke mahal-e-wuqu' ke bawajood nisbatan mo'tadil rehta hai aur is wajah se yahan rihaish karna nisbatan asan hai. Iceland mein insani abadi ke asaar 874 se milte hain jab Norwegian sardar Ingólfr Arnarson Iceland ka pehla mustaqil abadkar bana. Is ke alawa deegar logon ne yahan ke chakkar lagaye the aur qayam bhi kiya tha. Agli sadiyon ke dauran Nordic aur Gaelic logon ne Iceland ko apna mustaqarr banaya. Beeswain sadi se qabl tak Iceland ki abadi ka inhesar mahi giri aur ziraat par tha aur 1262 se 1944 tak yeh Norway ka hissa raha aur uske baad Danish (Danmarki) badshahiyat ka. Beeswain sadi mein Iceland ki mu'eeshat aur behbood ka nizam bahut tezi se parwan chadha. Aaj Iceland ek taraqqi yaafta mulk hai, fi kas GDP ke lehaz se duniya mein panjween aur insani taraqqi ke hawale se duniya mein doosre number par aata hai. Is ki mu'eeshat free market (azad mandi) economy par mushtamil hai jis mein khidmaat, finance (maliyaat), mahi giri aur mukhtalif san'atain ahem sectors hain. Siyahat bhi kafi maqbool hai. Iceland UN, NATO, EFTA, EEA aur OECD ka rukun hai lekin European Union ka rukun nahin. Agarche tareekhi hawalon se Irish monks ke ibteda'i wujood ka kuch tazkira milta hai, umoomi taur par yeh samjha jata hai ke Iceland ki daryaft aur uski abadi kari Norway ke mohim ju'on ne naveen sadi ke akhir mein ki thi. Yahan sabse pehla abadkar Norway ka Ingólfr Arnarson tha jis ne apna maweshi khana banaya. Ingólfr ke baad bahut sare muhajireen ne idhar ka rukh kiya jin ki aksariyat Norwegian aur Irish ghulamoon ki thi. 930 tak qabil-e-kasht zameen ka taqriban tamam hissa logon ne apne qabze mein kar liya tha aur Alþingi (Althing) yani muqannina aur parliament banayi gayee thi jo Iceland ki azad riyasat ka markaz tha. 1000 mein pur aman tareeqe se Masihiyat ko qubool kiya gaya. Azad riyasat ka darja 1962 mein khatam hua jab purane abadkaron ka banaya hua siyasi nizam nakami ka shikar hua kyunki yeh muqami sardaron ki badhti hui taqat ka muqabla na kar saka. Androoni muzahimaton aur Sterling daur ki civil nafarmani ki wajah se purane mu'ahide ki tausheeq ki gayee jis ke sabab Iceland Norway ki badshahiyat mein aa gaya. Chaudahwain sadi mein Iceland ki milkiyat Norway-Denmark ko muntaqil ki gayee jab Kalmar Union (Kalmari Ittehad) ke tehat Denmark aur Norway ki badshahiyaton ka inzimam hua. Aane wali sadiyon ke dauran Iceland Europe ke ghareeb tareen mulkon mein shumar hone laga. Ghair zarkhez zameen, aatish fishanoon ke phatne aur sakht mausam ke ba'is yahan zindagi bahut mushkil ho gayee kyunki unka daromadar ziraat par tha. Solahwain sadi ke dauran Norway ke badshah Christian III (Kristian) ne Lutheranism (Luthrit) ko har pehloo se tarweej deni shuru ki. Akhri Catholic bishop ka 1550 mein uske do beton samet sar qalam kar diya gaya jis ke baad pura mulk mukammal taur par Lutheran (Luthri) ban gaya. Is ke baad se ab tak Lutheranism (Luthrit) aksariyati mazhab chala aa raha hai. 1814 mein Napoleon ki jangon ke baad Norway aur Denmark Kiel ke mu'ahide ke baad do alag mulk bane taham Iceland Denmark ke qabze mein raha. Unneeswain sadi ke dauran mulk ke halaat badtareen hote chale gaye aur abadi ki aksariyat ne Junubi America ki taraf rukh kiya. Isi dauran Jón Sigurðsson ke tehat ek nayee azadi ki tahreek ne janam liya jo Europe ke romanawi aur qaum parastana nazriyat se mutassir thi. 1874 mein Denmark ne Iceland ko khud mukhtari ata kar di jo 1904 mein mazeed wasee' ki gayee. 1 December 1918 mein tayy pane wale mu'ahide ke nateejay mein Iceland ko Denmark ke badshah ke matehat ek mukammal khud mukhtar riyasat ka darja mila. Doosri Jang-e-Azeem ke dauran 9 April 1940 ko Germany ke Denmark par qabze ke ba'is Iceland aur Denmark ke ta'alluqat kasheeda ho gaye. Ek maah baad Britani faujon ne Reykjavik ki bandargah par zabardasti dera dal diya jo Iceland ki ghair janibdari ke khilaf tha. Ittehadi qabza jang ke dauran jari raha. 1941 mein yeh qabza Amreeki fauj ne sambhal liya. Is ke baad 17 June 1944 ko Iceland rasmi taur par ek azad jamhooria bana. 1946 mein qabiz afwaj ka inkhla amal mein aaya. Androon-e-mulk mukhalifat aur bagawaton ke bawajood Iceland NATO ka rukun 30 March 1949 ko bana. 5 May 1951 ko America ke sath Iceland ka difa'i mu'ahida amal mein aaya jis ke nateejay mein Amreeki afwaj wapas aaeen aur Sard Jang ke dauran mu'ahide ke mutabiq difa' ka fareeza sar anjaam deti raheen aur 2006 ke khizan tak maujood raheen. Jang ke fawran baad ke waqt mein mu'aashi taraqqi waqe hui jis mein mahi giri ko san'at ka darja diya gaya aur har qism ki tijarat ko farogh dene ki koshish ki gayee. 1970 mein Sard Jang zoron par thi. Iceland aur Britain ke bahut tanaza'ay mahi giri ki hudood ke hawale se khade hue. 1994 mein Iceland ke European mu'aashi ilaqe mein shumooliyat ke baad mu'eeshat ne bahut gehra'i aur azadi hasil ki. Iceland ko ilaqon, abadiyon, counties aur municipalities mein taqseem kiya gaya hai. Kul 8 mukhtalif ilaqon ko shumariyati hawalon se istemal kiya jata hai. Zil'i adalatoun ki hudood abhi tak purani taqseem ke mutabiq chal rahi hain. March 2003 mein aain mein tarmeem ke zariye unhen 6 mukhtalif intizami ilaqon mein taqseem kiya gaya. Iceland ko 26 magistrates mein taqseem kiya gaya hai jo mukhtalif jaghon par hukoomat ki numaindagi karte hain. In ke faraiz mein police ki dekh bhaal, tax ki wasooli, bank diwaliya hone ke mutalliq faisle aur shadiyon ko sar anjam dena shamil hai. Iceland mein 29 municipalities hain jo apne muqami umooron jaisa ke school, zaraye naql-o-hamal wagaira ko khud sambhalte hain. Reykjavik ka shahar mulk ka darul hukoomat hai aur sabse zyada abadi wala shahar bhi. Reykjavik aur uske nazdeeki shahron Kópavogur, Hafnarfjörður, Mosfellsbær, Garðabær, Seltjarnarnes aur Álftanes mil kar ek bada ilaqa banate hain jahan mulk ki taqriban do tihai abadi rehti hai. Is ke alawa deegar shahron mein Akureyri, Keflavík, Selfoss, Akranes aur Ísafjörður shamil hain. Iceland Shumali Bahr-e-Arctic mein Arctic Circle se zara sa junub mein waqe hai. Yeh Circle Iceland ke shumaal se chand ilaqon ko chhoota hua guzarta hai. Hamsaya Greenland ke baraks Iceland ko Europe ka hissa mana jata hai. Geographic aitbaar se Iceland Europe aur Junubi America, donon bar-e-aazamon ka hissa hai. Apni saqafati, mu'aashi aur lisani, kayi hawalon se Scandinavia ka hissa shumar hota hai. Yeh duniya ka 18wain bada aur Europe ka Britain ke baad doosra bada jazira hai. Iceland ka taqriban 11 feesad hissa glaciers (yakh basta daryaon) se ghira hua hai. Is ke alawa is ke 4970 kilometer taweel sahil par bahut si khaadiyan maujood hain aur aksar ahem shahar bhi inhin ke nazdeek maujood hain. Iceland ke buland ilaqe bahut sard aur na qabil-e-rihaish hain kyunki woh ret aur pahadon ka majmu'a hain. Is ke ahem shahron mein Reykjavik, Keflavík, jahan bain ul aqwami hawai adde maujood hain aur Akureyri hain. Grímsey jazira jo Iceland ke intehayi shumaal mein hai, Arctic Circle ke paar abadi rakhta hai. Insani aamad ke waqt yahan wahid mamalia janwar Arctic lomdi thi. Yeh barfani daur ke baad yahan jame hue samandar par chalti hui yahan tak pahunchi. Is ke alawa yahan ke qadeemi koi charinde ya khazande nahin hain. Iceland mein 1300 mukhtalif iqsam ke hashrat maujood hain jo baqi duniya ki nisbat bahut kam hain. Iski wajah yeh bhi ho sakti hai ke barfani daur mein Iceland taqriban sare ka sara barf se dhaka hua tha. Insani abadi kari se qabl yahan janglaat maujood the jo kul Iceland ka 25 se 40 feesad hissa the. Jyunhi abadkar pahunche, unhon ne janglaat ko kaat kar ziraat ke liye aur ghaas ke maidanon ke liye zameen banana shuru kar di. Beeswain sadi ke shuru tak yeh janglaat taqriban naapaid ho chale the. Is ke baad dobara se shajar kari ki koshish ki gayee hai. Lekin ab bhi yeh bahut kam miqdar mein hain. Nayee shajar kari ke nateejay mein bahut si nayee qismon ke darakht bhi Iceland mein nazar aate hain magar mausami na-monzooniyat ki wajah se darakhton ki parwarish kathin hai - koi bhi pauda zyada panap nahin pata. Iceland mein kul char National Parks hain jo Jökulsárgljúfur National Park, Skaftafell National Park, Snæfellsjökull National Park, aur Þingvellir National Park hain. Arziati aitbaar se kam umar zameen, Iceland arziati aitbaar se mutaharrik hisse aur Mid-Atlantic plate par waqe hai jo is ke bilkul darmiyan se guzarti hai. Is se murad yeh hai ke arziati aitbaar se Iceland bahut zyada mutaharrik hai aur yahan bahut sare aatish fishan maujood hain jin mein Hekla, Eldgjá aur Eldfell hain. Lakagígar mein 1783 se 1784 tak aatish fishan phata jis se paida hone wale dhu'en aur gard ke badalon ne Europe ke aksar aur Africa aur Asia ke kayi ilaqon ko kayi maah tak chhupaye rakha. Yahan bahut sare geysers (garam pani ka chashme) bhi paaye jate hain. Geothermal power ki kasrat hone ke sabab aur bahut sare daryaon aur aabsharoon ke ba'is yahan shahriyon ko garam aur thanda pani bahut saste damon mein har ghar mein dastiyab hai. Iceland ba zaat-e-khud basalt se bana hua hai jaisa ke jazair huye hain. Taham yahan mukhtalif qism ke aatish fishan aur lava paaye jate hain. Iceland mein duniya ka sabse kam umar jazira maujood hai jo 5 November 1963 se 5 June 1968 mein hone wali aatish fishani tahareekh se wujood mein aaya. Iceland ke saahili ilaqon ka mausam sard oceanic hai. Junubi Bahr-e-Oqyanus ki garam ro ki wajah se Iceland ka darja hararat isi khat par waqe deegar mumalik ki nisbat garam hota hai. Sardiyan mo'tadil aur tez hawaon ke sath aur garmiyan num aur thandi. Iceland mein ab tak ka sabse zyada darja hararat 30.5 degree aur sabse kam darja hararat manfi 38 degree centigrade record kiya gaya hai. Iceland mein chand ek hi ma'adniyat ya zira'ati zakhair maujood hain. Iceland ka teen chauthai hissa banjar hai. Nabatāt ka bishter hissa ghaas ke maidanon par mushtamil hai jo paltu maweshiyon ki charagah hai. Iceland ka apna aba'i wahid darakht birch Betula pubescens hai. (Betula/Ghan) Mustaqil insani abadi kari ne yahan ke mahol ko sakht nuqsan pahunchaya hai. Taqriban tamam ke tamam janglaat ko ta'meeraati aur jalane wali lakdi ke husool ke liye tabah kiya gaya. Aaj chand ek hi birch ke darakht mukhtalif jaghon par milte hain. Iceland ke janwaron mein Iceland ki bhed, maweshi aur Icelandic ghode shamil hain. Is ke alawa Iceland ke gird maujood paniyon mein machhliyon ki kayi iqsam Iceland ke mu'aashi nizam ka ahem hissa hain aur Iceland ki kul baramdaat ka nisf hissa bhi. Jungli pistaniya janwaron mein qutbi lomdi, mink, jungli aur gharelu chuhe, khargosh aur reindeer shamil hain. 1900 ke lag bhag kabhi kabhar barfani reechhon ne bhi idhar ka chakkar lagaya tha jo Greenland se glacier par behte hue idhar pahunche. Parinde khusoosan bahri parinde yahan ki jungli hayaat ka ahem juzv hain. Puffin, skua aur kittiwake, sahil ki chittanon par ghonsla banate hain. Iceland ka apna beda hai jo bain ul aqwami pabandiyon ke bawajood whale ka shikar jari rakhta hai. Iceland mein Icelandic zuban boli aur likhi jati hai. Yeh zuban Junubi German zuban hai jo purani Norse zuban se bahut nazdeek hai. Ibteda'a ke lehaz se yeh zuban Nordic hai aur Europe ki qadeem tareen zubanon mein se ek hai. Yeh wahid qadeem zuban hai jis mein runic lafz Þ shamil hai. Angrezi aur Danish zubanen yahan aam samjhi aur boli jati hain. In donon zubanon ki taleem school ke nisaab ka lazmi hissa hai. Is ke alawa Swedish, Norwegian aur German bhi aam boli aur samjhi jati hai. Iceland ki apni abadi Nordic aur Celtic ul nasl thi. Is ka saboot tahreer aur science jaisa ke khoon ke namoonon aur jiniyati tajziye se milta hai. Jiniyati tajziye se pata chalta hai ke abadkaron mein mardon ki aksariyat Nordic aur aurton ki aksariyat Celtic thi. Aaghaz se unneeswain sadi ke darmiyan tak abadi ka andaza 40,000 se 60,000 lagaya jata hai. Agarche sakht sardiyon, aatish fishani rakh aur ta'oon ke ba'is abadi mein farq padta raha tha. 1703 mein pehli mardum shumari ke nateejay mein abadi ki ta'daad 50,358 maloom hui. Laki aatish fishan ke phatne ke baad, jo 1783 se 1784 tak raha, abadi 40,000 ki intehayi kam had tak pahunchi. Halaat ke behtar hone par unneeswain sadi ke darmiyan tak aur maujooda daur mein yeh abadi tezi se badhti chali gayee hai. 1850 mein abadi 60,000 thi aur 2007 mein 3,10,000. 2004 mein 20,669 afraad jo Iceland mein reh rahe the, Iceland se bahar paida hue, lekin unke walidain Iceland ke shahri the. 10,636 afraad ke paas doosre mumalik ki shahriyat hai. Iceland mein sabse zyada Polish ke 7,000 afraad hain, 890 Dutch, 670 sabqa Yugoslavian, 647 Filipino aur 540 German hain. Jadeed parliament jise Alþingi bhi kehte hain, 1845 mein qayam ki gayee thi aur uski haisiyat Danish badshah ki mashwarati council ki si thi. Umoomi taur par ise 930 mein qayam hone wali assembly ki nayee shakal kaha jata hai aur jise 1799 mein mo'attal kiya gaya tha. Aaj kal iske kul 63 arkaan hain. Har member ka intikhab 4 saal ke liye hota hai. Iceland mein sadr ka uhda numaishi hota hai jo safarat aur mamlakat ke sarbarah ka kaam karta hai. Lekin uske paas yeh ikhtiyar bhi hota hai ke yeh parliament se manzoor hone wale kisi qanoon ko rok kar awaami raaye ke liye pesh kar sakta hai. Hukoomat ka sarbarah wazir-e-azam hota hai jo cabinet ke sath mil kar hukoomat ko chalata hai. Cabinet ka taqarrur sadr ki taraf se Alþingi ke intikhabaat ke baad hota hai. Taham umooman yeh amal siyasi partyon ke sarbarah anjam dete hain jo yeh tay karte hain ke kaun kaun si partiyan mil kar cabinet ki tashkeel karengi aur is mein nashiston ki taqseem kaise ki jayegi. Sirf is soorat mein ke partyon ke sarbarah munasib waqt mein kisi nateejay par na pahunch saken, sadr apne ikhtiyarat ka istemal karte hue cabinet tashkeel deta hai. Jamhooria ki tashkeel yani 1944 se ab tak aisa nahin hua. Lekin 1942 mein ek baar ghair parlimani hukoomat qayam ki gayee thi. Lekin yeh hukoomat ek regent ne qayam ki thi aur regent ka taqarrur Alþingi ki taraf se kiya gaya tha. Har tarah se regent ka uhda sadr ke masawi tha. Is regent ka naam Sveinn Björnsson tha. 1944 mein jamhooria ke qayam ke baad yeh uske pehle sadr bhi bane. Taqriban hamesha hi Iceland ki hukoomat do ya zyada partyon ke ishtirak se qayam ki jati hai. Sadr ke ikhtiyarat ke hawale se aaini mahireen ki raaye mukhtalif hai. Kuchh mahireen sadr ko kuchh ahem ikhtiyarat dete hain lekin kuchh mahireen ki raaye is se mukhtalif hai. Iceland mein duniya mein sabse pehli khatoon sadr ka intikhab 1980 mein amal mein aaya. Unka naam Vigdís Finnbogadóttir hai aur woh 1996 mein apni zimmedariyon se subukdosh huin. Town councilon ke intikhabaat, parliament aur sadarati intikhabaat har char saal baad mun'aqid hote hain. Yeh intikhabaat bil tarteeb 2010, 2011 aur 2008 mein agli baar mun'aqid honge. May 2007 ke parlimani intikhabaat ke baad, maujooda hukoomat daen bazoo ki Azad Party aur Social Democratic Ittehad jo wazir-e-azam Geir Haarde ke tehat hai, ki madad se banayi gayee hai. Hukoomat ko Alþingi mein wazeh bartari hasil hai aur unhen kul 63 mein se 43 nashistain mili hui hain. Iceland fi kas quwwat-e-kharid ki GDP ke hawale se duniya ka panjwan sabse zyada paidawaar rakhne wala mulk hai. Insani taraqqi ke hawale se yeh duniya ka doosra behtareen mulk hai. Qabil-e-tajdeed tawanayi ke zakhair mulki tawanayi ka 70 feesad hissa rakhta hai aur mulk ke bare kaha jata hai ke 2050 tak yeh tawanayi ke lehaz se khud mukhtar ho jayega. Apne aabi bijli ke zakhair aur arzi hararati tawanayi ke bawajood Iceland mein qudrati zakhair ka fuqdaan hai. Tareekhi taur par iski mu'eeshat ka umoomi daromadar mahi giri par raha hai aur ab bhi mulki mu'eeshat ka bada hissa mahi giri se hasil hota hai. Machhliyon ki kam hoti hui ta'daad aur bain ul aqwami market (mandi) mein iski ahem baramdaat jaisa ke aluminium aur ferrosilicon ki kam hoti hui qeemat ki wajah se mulki mu'eeshat khatre ka shikar hai. Agarche Iceland ki mu'eeshat abhi tak mahi giri par hi inhesar karti hai, sair-o-siyahat aur deegar khidmaat, technology aur deegar san'aton ki badhti hui ta'daad ke pesh nazar mahi giri ki ehmiyat kam hoti ja rahi hai. Daen aur baen bazoo ki hukoomat apni budget ki kami ki aur maujooda khasare ki policy, berooni qarzajat mein kami, mu'eeshat mein tanau' aur nijkari ki policyon ko jari rakhna chah rahi hai. Hukoomat European Union mein shumooliyat ki mukhalifat karti hai jiski sabse ahem wajah mahi giri ke zaraye Iceland ke hath se nikal jana hai. Iceland ki mu'eeshat mein tanau' paida karne ke liye pichhli dahai mein san'atkari khidmaat ki san'atain aur maujooda daur mein software ki taiyari, biotechnology aur financial services ka ahem kirdar hai. Siyahat ka sector bhi tezi se phail raha hai jis mein eco-tourism aur whale ka mushahida karna shamil hai. 2000 aur 2002 ke darmiyan taraqqi ki raftar kuchh kam rahi lekin mu'eeshat ne 2003 mein 4.3 feesad aur 2004 mein 6.2 feesad ke hisab se taraqqi ki. Sharah-e-be rozgari 1.3 feesad hai jo European Economic Area mein sabse kam sharahon mein shumar hoti hai. Mulki bijli ka ninanve feesad hissa pan bijli aur arzi hararati tawanayi se hasil hota hai. Mulk ka sabse bada arzi hararati tawanayi ka markaz Nesjavellir mein waqe hai jabke Kárahnjúkar Dam mulk ka sabse bada pan bijli ka plant hoga. Iceland ki zira'ati san'at ka bada hissa aloo, haldi, taza sabziyon (greenhouse mein), mutton (bhed), dairy masnoo'aat aur machhliyon par mushtamil hai. Iceland ki currency ko Icelandic Króna kehte hain. Iceland ke sabqa wazir-e-azam Valgerður Sverrisdóttir ne 15 January 2007 mein ek interview mein is khwahish ka izhar kiya hai ke aaya kya woh European Union mein shamil hue baghair Euro ko apna sakte hain. Unka khayal hai ke bain ul aqwami Euro market mein ek chhoti si mu'eeshat ka apni currency ikhtiyar kiye rakhna kafi mushkil ho sakta hai. Borgartún ko Reykjavik ka mu'aashi markaz hai. Is mein badi ta'daad mein companiyan aur teen investment bank maujood hain. Iceland ki stock market, The Iceland Stock Market 1985 mein qayam hui. Iceland mein aain ke tehat har fard ko mazhabi azadi hai. Yahan waise church aur riyasat ko alag nahin samjha jata. Iceland ke qaumi church ko jo ek Lutheran church hai, riyasati church ki haisiyat hasil hai. Sarkari taur par har fard ka mazhabi lagao record kiya jata hai. 2005 mein Iceland ke afraad ko darj zeel ke mazhabi girohon mein taqseem kiya gaya Baqi 2.7 feesad afraad zyada tar 20-25 Masihi firqon mein bate hue hain aur ek feesad se bhi kam abadi ghair Masihi hai. Iceland ki saqafati jadain Viking aur Norse rawaiton se aa milti hain. Iceland ka adab maqbool hai bil khusoos Sagas aur Eddas jo Iceland ki abadi kari ke dauran likhe gaye the. Iceland ke logon ke khad-o-khaal aam Nordic nau'iyat ke hain jo Norway aur Sweden ke logon se milte jhulthte hain. Masihiyat qubool karne se qabl tak yahan bahut sare Viking aitiqadaat ko mana jata tha. Aaj bhi Iceland ke kuchh log roohon ya pariyon par yaqeen rakhte hain ya kam az kam unke wujood ka inkar nahin karte. Isi tarah insani taraqqi ke paimane par Iceland ka darja bahut buland hai aur ise duniya ka chautha khush tareen mulk gardana jata hai. Aam khuraak umooman machhli, bakri aur doodh ki masnoo'aat par mushtamil hoti hai. Þorramatur ko qaumi khuraak ka darja hasil hai. Is mein kayi mukhtalif khane maujood hote hain. Isko rozana nahin khaya jata lekin umooman Þorri ke mahine mein khate hain. Rawaiti dishes mein skyr, svith, hákarl, bhed ki siri aur black pudding shamil hain. Haaliya tabdeeliyon ke bawajood Iceland ke log ba haisiyat-e-qaum, bahut sehatmand hain. Bachche aur naujawan mukhtalif khelon mein hissa lete hain. Maqbool khelon mein football, track and field, handball aur basketball shamil hain. Golf, tennis, tairaki, shatranj aur Icelandic ghodon par ghudsawari karna bhi kafi maqbool hai. Iceland mashoor TV channel Nick Jr. ke animated program LazyTown ka ghar hai. Yeh bachchon ka ek maqbool silsila war program hai jo duniya bhar ke 98 mukhtalif mumalik mein dikhaya jata hai. Iceland The Sugarcubes nami music group ka bhi watan hai jo 80 aur 90 ki dahai mein bahut mashoor raha tha. Björk uski ek mashoor rukun hain. 1996 mein parliament ne ek qanoon ki manzoori di jis se hum jins registered partnership ko qanooni qarar diya gaya hai aur unhen taqriban aam shadi ke huqooq aur fawaid milenge. 2006 mein parliament ke muttahida vote ki madad se ek aur qanoon manzoor kiya gaya ke hum jins paraston ko aam jodon ki tarah yaksaan huqooq milenge jin mein bachcha god lena, bachche ki dekh bhaal aur masnooi tareeqe se nutfe ki muntaqili shamil hai.
Jamhooria Ireland ya Jamhooria Aayrastan bar-e-aazam Europe mein Jazair-e-Bartaniya mein jazira Ireland par waqe ek mulk hai. Jazira Ireland ka taqriban 80 feesad hissa Jamhooria Ireland ke tehat hai. Dublin iska sabse bada shahar aur darul hukoomat hai. Is mulk ki majmu'i abadi taqriban 47 lakh hai, jis mein se ek tihai Dublin metropolitan ilaqe mein muqeem hai. Is ke shumaal mein Shumali Ireland waqe hai jo Mamlakat-e-Muttahida ka hissa hai. 1973 ke baad se yeh European Union ka rukun hai. Azadi se qabl Ireland ki Mamlakat-e-Muttahida ka hissa tha. 21 January 1919 us ne Britain se azadi ka elaan kiya aur December 1921 ko Anglo-Irish mu'ahide ke tehat uski khud mukhtari ka faisla kiya gaya. 18 April 1949 ko Ireland ko jamhooria ke naam diya gaya. Lekin iska ek hissa ab bhi Mamlakat-e-Muttahida ke tehat aata hai jise Shumali Ireland kaha jata hai. 1 January 1973 ko yeh European Economic Community ka hissa bana.
Urdun jise sarkari taur par Urduni Mamlakat Hashmi bhi kaha jata hai, Darya-e-Urdun ke Mashriqi kinare par waqe Maghribi Asia ka mulk hai. Is ke mashriq mein Saudi Arab aur maghrib mein Israel waqe hai. Urdun aur Israel Bahr-e-Murdar ka intizam sambhalte hain. Urdun ki wahid bandargah uske Junubi sire par Khaleej-e-Aqaba par waqe hai. Is bandargah ko Israel, Misr aur Saudi Arab bhi mushtarka taur par istemal karte hain. Urdun ka zyada tar hissa Sahra'e Arab par mushtamil hai. Taham shumaal maghribi sire par hilal numa zarkhez ilaqa maujood hai. Iska darul hukoomat Amman hai. Tareekhi aitbaar se yahan bahut sari tehzeeben aabad hoti rahi hain. Kuchh arse ke liye Urdun par Misri Fira'unon ka bhi qabza raha hai jo Palestine ke hisse par mushtamil tha. Is ke alawa yahan Maqdoni'ai, Yunani, Roman, Byzantine aur Usmani saqafaton ke asaraat bhi murattab hue. Saatwain sadi Isvi se yahan Musalmanon aur Arabon ki saqafat ke asaraat gehre hone lage hain. Hashmi badshahiyat yahan ki aaini badshahiyat hai aur yahan awaam ki numainda hukoomat bhi kaam karti hai. Hukmran-e-waqt mulk ka badshah hota hai, jo mulki afwaj ke sipah salar ka kaam bhi karta hai. Badshah apne ikhtiyarat ko wazir-e-azam aur wuzara ki council ya cabinet ke zariye istemal karta hai. Cabinet jamhoori taur par muntakhab House of Deputies aur House of Notables yani Senate ko jawab deh hoti hai. House of Deputies aur Senate mil kar qanoon sazi ka kaam karte hain. Adliya hukoomat se azad reh kar kaam karti hai. Jadeed Urdun ki zyada tar abadi shahron mein rehti hai. CIA ki World Factbook ke mutabiq Urdun ko free market economy ke hawale se ubharti hui market hai. Ilaqe ke deegar mumalik ki nisbat Urdun ne sabse zyada azad tijarat ke mu'ahide kiye hue hain. Yahan ki hukoomat Maghrib nawaaz hai aur America aur Britain se unke gehre ta'alluqat hain. 1996 mein, Urdun America ka ahem ghair NATO ittehadi ban gaya. Khitte mein Misr ke alawa Urdun wahid mulk jis ke Israel se safarti ta'alluqat hain. Is ke alawa Arab League, World Trade Organization, Arab Parliament, Aalmi Bank, Aalmi Adalat-e-Insaf aur Aqwaam-e-Muttahida wagaira ka yeh baani rukun bhi hai. Mazeed bara'an Urdun European Union aur Khaleej Ta'awun Council ke sath bhi ta'alluqat gehre kar raha hai. Urdun ka naam Darya-e-Urdun ke naam par rakha gaya hai. Mukhtalif zubanon mein Urdun ke mukhtalif matlab hain. Qadeem Arabi zuban mein Urdun ka matlab dhalaan hai jabke Aramaic zuban mein Urdun ke ma'ani woh jo utarta hai. February 2022 mein asaar-e-qadeema ke mahireen ko Urdun ke shumaal mashriqi registan mein ek aise ihate ke asaar mile hain jo patthar ke zamane ke insan ke istemal mein raha aur jise insan ki qadeem tareen ta'meeraat mein shumar kiya ja raha hai. Mahireen ka kehna hai ke yeh Mashriq-e-Wusta mein is se bhi zyada qadeem tehzeeb ki nishan dehi hai jo is se pehle qadeem tar khayal ki jati thi. Urdun mein qadeem nawadirat ki wizarat ne hal hi mein elaan kiya hai ke nau hazar saal purane, patthar se bane, intehayi buland qamat insani mujassame, mulk ke shumaal mashriqi registan ke Jabal Khashabiyah nami ilaqe mein daryaft hue hain. Urdun mein mahir-e-asaar-e-qadeema, Wael Abu Aziza ne nama nigaron ko bataya, patthar se bane yeh buland qamat insani dhanchay ab tak daryaft hone wale qadeem tareen hain. Unhon ne bataya ke nau hazar saal qabl patthar ke zamane ke shikari patthar ke is wasee' ihate ko janwaron ko gherne ke liye istemal karte the. Inhin mein ek dhancha maqbara numa bhi hai aur khayal kiya ja raha hai ke is mein qadeem rasumaat ka saman rakha gaya hoga. Is daryaft ke bare mein baat karte hue Amman mein American Center of Research mein mahir-e-asaar-e-qadeema, Pearce Paul Creasman kehte hain ke yeh asaar Urdun mein is se pehle milne wale Ain Ghazal nami aise hi dhanchon se zyada qadeem ho sakte hain. Apne waqt ki numayan tareen tehzeeb jise Al-Anbat kaha jata hai, yahan qayam thi. Iska darul hukoomat Petra nami shahar tha. Inhin logon ne jadeed Arabi rasm-ul-khat ijad kiya tha. Irani saltanat mein jazb hone se qabl sadiyon tak Petra ne azadi aur khush hali ke maze loote. Baad azan is ilaqe par Roman saltanat chha gayee. Baad azan yahan Islam ki aamad hui jo mukhtalif khulafa ke daur par mushtamil tha. In khulafa mein Khulafa-e-Rashideen, Banu Umayya aur Abbasi Khulafa shamil the. Khilafat Umar ke zamana mein Ameer Mu'awiya ko Urdun ka governor muqarrar kiya gaya tha, Abbasidon ke zawal ke baad is ilaqe par Mangol, Masihi Saleebi Jangju, Ayyubi aur Mamluk qabiz rahe. 1516 mein yeh Saltanat-e-Usmaniya ka hissa ban gaya. 1921 mein Saltanat-e-Usmaniya ke khatme aur Balfour Elaan-e-Nafaz ke baad Imarat-e-Transjordan qayam hui. Transjordan ko ek khud mukhtar riyasat ban'ne mein mazeed 25 saal lage yani 1946 tak. Palestine ka ek hissa 1950 mein Transjordan ke sath mil gaya aur Urdun ki Hashemite Mamlakat ko Amman ke sath uska darul hukoomat banaya. Urdun ek numainda hukoomat hai jo aaini badshah ki hukmarani mein hai jo musallah afwaj ka Chief Executive aur Commander-in-Chief hai. Wuzara-e-azam aur Wuzara ki Council ke zariye badshah apne ikhtiyarat ka istemal karta hai. Cabinet Senate ke sath muntakhab Ewan-e-Numaindagaan ki zimmedar hai aur hukoomat ki adali shakh azad hai. Is ki tareekh ke dauran, mutaddid tehzeeben is ilaqe mein rihaish pazeer hain jo aaj Urdun ke naam se jana jata hai. In mein se kuchh tehzeebon mein Edomites, Moabites, Akkadians, Assyrians, Jewish Israelites, Babylonians aur Persians shamil hain. Ek waqt ke liye Misr ke Fira'unon ne is sarzameen par hukoomat ki jis mein Israel ki azeem saltanat ka hissa shamil tha. Khaas taur par, Urdun ke ilaqe mein, Nabati tehzeeb ne janam liya, jiski baqiyat hum aaj Petra mein dekh sakte hain, jahan duniya ke naye 7 ajaibaat mein se ek aaj khada hai. Nabati bashindon ne Petra ko 400 qabl Maseeh aur 160 Isvi ke darmiyan qadeem Arab badshahiyat ka darul hukoomat banaya tha. Is ilaqe par buniyadi taur par saatwain sadi qabl Maseeh se le kar ab tak Muslim aur Arab saqafaton ka raaj hai jab tak Angrezon ne zarkhez hilal ko kayi mumalik mein taqseem nahin kiya. Aaj Urdun wahid Arab mulk hai jahan Falasteeni shahriyat hasil kar sakte hain. Jordanian, Bedouin aur Falasteeniyon mein farq hai. Urduni bashinde hain jo 1948 se pehle Darya-e-Urdun ke Mashriq mein rehte hain. Bedouin khandan hazaron salon se mahdood paudoon aur pani ke sath sahra ke halaat mein reh rahe hain, azadana ghoom rahe hain aur insani saakhta sarhadon par kam tawajjuh dete hain.
