Filhal, woh fauj ka buniyadi hissa hain aur hukoomat mein ahem uhdon par qabiz hain, lekin waqt guzrane ke sath sath unka siyasi asar-o-rasookh kam ho gaya hai. Phir bhi Falasteeni logon ko padha likha aur mehnati samjha jata hai aur Urdun mein unke asar-o-rasookh ne badhti hui aalmi mu'eeshat ki taleem aur taraqqi par bahut zyada asar dala hai. Woh Bedouin Urduni jinhon ne apne khana badosh tarz-e-zindagi ko bhula diya hai woh aahista aahista jadeed Arab duniya mein zam ho rahe hain. Pehli Jang-e-Azeem ke ikhtetaam par Saltanat-e-Usmani ke zawal ke baad League of Nations aur Ittehadi Afwaj ne Bahr-e-Rum ke Shumali Sahil ka naqsha az sar-e-nau banane ka faisla kiya. Natijatan French Syria aur British Palestine ka qayam amal mein aaya. Doosri Jang-e-Azeem ke ikhtetaam tak yeh ilaqa Britain ke zer-e-intezam tha. 1946 mein Britaniyon ne Aqwaam-e-Muttahida se darkhwast ki ke woh Urdun ko azad karna chahte hain. Britani darkhwast ke baad yahan ki parliament ne Shah Abdullah ko Hashmi badshahiyat ke silsile ka pehla hukmran muntakhab kar liya. Shah Abdullah Awwal 1951 tak hukmran rahe aur isi saal jab woh Masjid-e-Aqsa se nikal rahe the to ek Falasteeni Arab ne qatl kar diya. 1949 mein Urdun aur Israel ne shahar ki taqseem ka ek bandobast tasleem kar liya jis mein Mashriqi Jerusalem aur qadeem shahar ka ilaqa Urdun ke zer-e-control aa gaya. Is ke alawa Maghribi Kinara bhi Urdun ke paas hi tha. Maghribi Jerusalem aur unneeswain sadi mein ta'meer hone wale shahar ke ilaqe Riyasat-e-Israel ke zer-e-intezam aa gaye. Is taqseem ke ba'is Maghribi Jerusalem mein aabad bahut se Musalmanon ko apna ghar bar chhod kar hijrat karna padi. 1958 mein Arab Sard Jang ke dauran Iraq aur Urdun ne mil kar Iraq aur Urdun ki Arab Federation banayi jis ke hukmran Hashmi badshah the. Baad azan isi saal Hashmi badshah ko Baghdad mein qatl kar diya gaya aur Roos ki madad se deegar mumalik jaisa ke Misr, Syria aur Yemen ne Urdun ke liye mushkilaat paida karni shuru kar dien. Taham Shah Hussein ne America aur Britain se madad mangi. Amreeki aur Britani hawai jahaazon ne Urdun ki sarhadon ki fizai gasht shuru kar di jabke Britani fauji Amman pahunch gaye. 1965 mein Saudi Arab aur Urdun ne zameen ka tabadla kiya. Urdun ne mukhtasar saahili patti ke badle kafi bada sahra'i raqba Saudi Arab ko de diya. 1967 ki Chheh Roza Jang ke dauran Israel ne West Bank aur kuchh deegar ilaqon par qabza kar liya. Taham baad ke mu'ahide ke tehat muqaddas maqamaat ke hawale se Urdun ka amal dakhal badha diya gaya. 1967 ki jang ke baad Urdun mein Falasteeni fidayeen ki ta'daad badhne lagi aur jald hi unhon ne riyasat ke andar apni riyasat qayam kar li. Shah Hussein ne fauj ko in fidayeen ke khatme ka hukum diya aur June 1970 mein aam ladai shuru ho gayee. Natijatan mukhtalif Falasteeni girohon ke fidayeen ko Urdun se nikal diya gaya. 1973 mein Arab League ki muttahida afwaj ne Israel ke khilaf Yom Kippur ki jang shuru ki aur Darya-e-Urdun ke kinare ki jang bandi ki lakeer par ladai shuru ho gayee. Urdun ne Syria mein maujood Israeli afwaj par hamle ke liye brigade bhi bheja. Agarche 1990 ki Khaleej Jang ke dauran Urdun ne hissa nahin liya taham Shah Hussein par yeh ilzaam laga ke unhon ne dhake chhipe Saddam Hussein ki madad jari rakhi jis ki wajah se Kuwait se Iraq ke inkhla mein mushkilaat pesh aaeen. Is wajah se Aqwaam-e-Muttahida aur Arab mumalik ne Urdun ki mali imdaad band kar di aur 7 lakh se zyada Urduni bashinde jo Arab mumalik mein rozgar ke silsile mein muqeem the, ko Urdun wapas lotna pada. Mazeed bara'an lakhon Iraqi jaan bacha kar Urdun pahunche jis se Urdun ki mu'eeshat par dabao pada. 1991 mein Urdun ne Syria, Lebanon aur Arab Falasteeni fidayeen ke hamrah Israel ke sath aman muzakkarat mein hissa liya. In muzakkarat mein Roos aur America saalis ka kirdar ada kar rahe the. In muzakkarat mein kamyabi ke baad Israel ne izhar-e-tashakkur ke liye Shah Hussein ki tasveer wali dak ki ticket jari ki. America ne na sirf salana Urdun ko lakhon dollar ki mali imdaad dene ka wa'ada kiya balki yeh bhi ke agar ek khas miqdar mein Israel se khareede gaye kham maal se taiyar shuda masnoo'aat America baramad karne par Urdun par baramdi tax bhi nahin lagaya jayega. Shah Hussein ke cancer ka ilaaj America mein lambe arse tak jari raha. Urdun wapsi par unhon ne apne bhai Shah Hassan ki jagah apne bade bete Abdullah ko wali ahd muqarrar kar diya. Is ke alawa unhon ne kuchh siyasi qaidi bhi azad kiye. Kuchh arsa baad 1999 mein Shah Hussein intiqal kar gaye aur Shah Abdullah Doom unki jagah badshah bane. September 2000 mein Israel aur Palestine ke darmiyan jang aur doosri Intifada tehreek ke dauran Urdun ki hukoomat ne donon partyon ko madad ki pesh kash ki. Is ke baad se Urdun ne apne hamsayon ke sath aman se rehne ka ahd kiya hai. Urdun ke shahi khandan mein Israel ke liye khasa naram goshaa hai aur hukoomat Israel mukhalif muzahiron ko rokti rehti hai. Is ke alawa Urduni akhbarat wagaira se bhi Israel mukhalif mawad hazf kar diya jata hai. 1997 mein akhri baar Urdun aur Israel ke ta'alluqat is waqt kasheeda hue jab do Israeli agent Canada ke passports ki madad se Urdun mein dakhil hue aur Hamas ke ahem rahnuma Khalid Mashal ko zahar diya. Shah Hussein ne Israel ko na sirf is zahar ka taryaaq dene balki bahut sare Urduni aur Falasteeni qaidi bhi azad karne par majboor kiya. In qaidiyon mein Shaikh Yaseen bhi the jo baad azan 2004 mein Gaza ki patti par Israel ki bambari ke nateejay mein shaheed hue. 9 September 2005 ko Amman ke kayi hotelon mein be yak waqt dehshat gardon ne teen bomb dhamake kiye. In dhamakon mein 57 afraad halak aur 115 zakhmi hue. In dhamakon ki zimmedari Al-Qaeda ne qubool ki taham Al-Qaeda ki shumooliyat ke saboot nahin mile. Haal hi mein Urdun ne hazaron Falasteeniyon ki Urduni shahriyat bhi khatam kar di hai taki Israel kisi bhi tarah se in afraad ko Urdun mein hi mustaqil basne par majboor na kare. Urdun ka mashriqi hissa banjar hai aur nakhlistanon aur mausami nadiyon se sairaab hota hai. Maghrib ke buland ilaqe nahri hain aur sada bahar janglaat bhi maujood hain. Darya-e-Urdun ki azeem Wadi-e-Shaq Urdun ko Maghribi Kinare aur Israel se alag karti hai. Urdun ka buland tareen maqam Jabal Umm ad Dami hai jo 1,854 meter buland hai. Iski choti barf se dhaki rehti hai. Nisheebi tareen maqam Bahr-e-Murdar ke kinare satah samandar se 420 meter neeche hai. Urdun jis ilaqe mein waqe hai, us ilaqe ko tehzeeb ka gahwara kehte hain. Ahem shahar darul hukoomat Amman, Irbid, Jerash, Zarqa, Madaba, Karak aur Aqaba hain. Urdun ka mausam garmiyon mein neem khushk rehta hai aur ausat darja hararat 30 se 35 degree rehta hai. Sardiyan nisbatan sard tar hoti hain aur ausat darja hararat 13 degree ke aas paas rehta hai. Maghribi hisse mein sabse zyada barish hoti hai aur Amman mein November se March tak barfbari bhi hoti hai. Amman ki ausat bulandi satah samandar se 1,280 meter hai. Azeem Wadi-e-Shaq ke alawa sara mulk hi satah samandar se 300 meter se zyada buland hai. November se March tak mausam num rehta hai aur baqi pura saal mausam neem khushk rehta hai. Garam, khushk garmiyan aur thandi sardiyan jin mein kabhi kabhar barfbari ya barish bhi ho sakti hai, hoti hain. Umooman samandar se jitna door hote jayen, mausami darja hararat mein utni hi tabdeeli zyada aur barish kam hoti jati hai. Garmiyon mein hawa ka dabao nisbatan yaksaan hi rehta hai jabke sardiyon mein yeh dabao zyada tar kam hi rehta hai. Zyada tar raqbe par 24 inch se kam ki ausat barish hoti hai. Jyon jyon zameen buland hoti jati hai, barish badhti jati hai. Wadi-e-Urdun mein salana barish ki ausat 35 inch se zyada rehti hai. Bahr-e-Murdar ke qareeb ke ilaqe mein barish ki miqdar salana 5 inch se kam rehti hai. August ke mausam mein garmiyan urooj par hoti hain. January umooman sard tareen mahina hota hai. Garmiyon mein raat aur din ke darja hararat mein kafi farq ho sakta hai. Garmiyon mein din ka ausat darja hararat 32 degree rehta hai. Jabke September se March tak yani sardiyon mein darja hararat ki ausat 3.2 degree rehti hai. Shumali maghribi buland ilaqon par barfbari bhi ho sakti hai. Umooman sardiyon mein do baar barfbari hoti hai. Wizarat-e-Dakhla ne mulk mein dakhili taur par 12 súbe banaye hue hain. Har súbe ke hukmran yani governor ka taqarrur sadr karta hai. Apne súbon ki had tak governor khud mukhtar hote hain. 2004 ki mardum shumari ke mutabiq Urdun ki kul abadi 51,00,981 hai. Taham is mein kam az kam 1,90,000 afraad aise hain jinhen shumar nahin kiya gaya. Urdun mein aksariyati mazhab Islam hai jo Arab aur ghair Arab, donon hi girohon ki aksariyat ka mazhab hai. Sarkari mazhab bhi Islam hi hai aur 92 feesad abadi Musalman hai. Abadi ki aksariyat Sunni fiqh se ta'alluq rakhti hai. Islamiat ka mazmoon schoolon mein Musalman talaba-o-talibaat ko padhaya jata hai jabke ghair Muslimon ke liye lazmi nahin. Ilaqe aur duniya bhar mein, Urdun azadi-e-mazhab ka alam bardar hai. Taham mazhabi ulama ka hukoomat par koi amal dakhal nahin aur unhen hukoomati maamlaat mein mudakhilat ki ijazat nahin. Urdun mein muqami Masihi afraad bhi maujood hain. Arab aur ghair Arab, donon hi girohon mein Masihi mazhab ke pairukaar paaye jate hain. Masihi mazhab ke pairukaron ki ta'daad kul abadi ka 6 feesad hai. 1950 mein Masihi afraad mulki abadi ka 30 feesad the lekin phir Europe, Canada aur America ko muntaqili aur Musalmanon ki nisbat kam sharah-e-paidawaar ki wajah se unki ta'daad kam ho gayee hai. Deegar mazahib mein Druze aur Baha'i ahem hain. Sarkari zuban ka darja Arabi ko hasil hai. Angrezi ko agarche sarkari zuban ka darja nahin diya gaya taham mulk mein aam taur par boli jati hai. Karobari aur banking ke alawa taleem mein bhi iska istemal wasee' paimane par hota hai.
Murabba ke ilaaqe mein phaila hamwar maidan dohri dhalaanein rakhta hai. Ek dhalwan daryae Sindh ke bahao ke saath saath tul-ul-bad ki haisiyat se aur doosri dhalaan daryae Sindh ke dono kinaaron se umoodee zaawiya par. Darya ke sailaabi paaniyon mein mitti shaamil hoti aur woh sailaabi paani ke saath wadi mein phailaate rehte hain. Kyun ke un ki aabi guzar gaah sailab ke mauqe par paani ki nikaasi ke sust amal se paani mein shaamil mitti ko phailaate jaate hain. Is musalsal amal se zameen ki satah darya ke bahao ki simt ek halki dhalwaan ikhtiyar karti rehti hai aur darya apne kinaaron ke saath ek vasee-o-areez dhalwaan pushta banaate rehte hain. Shumaali maghribi Hindustan ke maidan aur Ganga ki wadi mein pehle samandar tha. Yahan pahaar namudaar hue to naye darya bhi puraane daryaaon ke saath mil kar peeche hate hue samandar se nayi zameenein haasil kien. Yeh samandari ilaaqa daryayi mitti ke ek azeem zakheera se pur hokar maidan ki shakal ikhtiyaar karli. Yeh daryayi mitti kayi ki teh ki shakal mein isi maidan mein maujood hai. Jab barfein pighaltien hain aur barishen hoti hai to daryaaon mein tughyani aajati hai aur sailab ki wajah se paani ka ikhraj barh jaata hai. Is tarah daryaaon ka paat zyada chaura hojata hai. Paani raftaar mein izafa aur mitti ki miqdar zyada hojati hai. Sailaabi paani yeh tamaam nasheb mein phail kar wahan apni mitti phailata hai. Is se wahan ki satah buland hoti jaati hai. Aur darya naye raaste ikhtiyaar karke wahan par bhi zameen ki satah buland ka amal shuru kar deta hai. Chunancha saalon se darya mitti teh phaila kar satah kar raha hai. Daryae Sindh mein shaamil mitti ki kaseer miqdar zyada tar raasta mein baith jaati hai aur chunancha tughyani ke baad raasta mein mitti phir jaane se is ka raasta badal jata hai aur darya apni guzargah aur raftaar ko in ke mutabiq dhaal leta hai. Jahan zameen naram milti hai jo aasani se paani mein shaamil hojati wahan batadreej phail kar sust raftari se behta hai. Woh darya neem dairah banaleita hai to raasta durust rakhne ke liye us ke barabar neem dairah bhi banata hai. Sailab ke paani ko woh apne pehluon se bahar phenk deta hai. Is tarah se darya jaise jaise samandar ke nazdeek hota jata hai is mein paani ka ikhraj kam hota jata hai.
IRAN, saabiq naam Faras, maghribi Asia ka ek mulk hai, jo Mashriq Wasta mein waqe hai. Iran ki sarhaden shumaal mein Armenia, Azerbaijan aur Turkmenistan, mashriq mein Pakistan aur Afghanistan aur maghrib mein Turkey aur Iraq (Kurdistan ilaaqa) se milti hain. Mazeed bar aan Khaleej-e-Fars aur Khaleej-e-Oman waqe hain. Qadeem maazi ke saath Iran ki waseeh sarzameen ek jaame' saqafat aur tehzeeb ki waaris hai jis ne hazaaron saalon ke dauraan waseeh paimaane par lisaani, mazhabi, boliyon, rasam-o-rawaaj waghera ko numayaan lachak aur rawadaari ke saath jagah di hai. Taake Iran nasli tanawwu ke lihaaz se duniya ke 10 sarfehrist mumalik mein shaamil hai aur is ki pachas zabaanen aur boliyan aur aath sarkari nasli giroh hain, in mein se har ek nasli giroh, apni saqafati alamaton mein farq ke ilawa. Doosre Irani nasli girohon ke saath, bahut si mumasilaten hain. Sooba Yazd ke alawa jahan ki taqriban tamaam abadi yaksar hai, mulk ke tamaam soobe is saqafati aur nasli tanawwu mein baraah-e-raast mulawwis hain. Iran ke aath sarkari nasli giroh bil tarteeb Fars, Azerbaijani, Kurd, Lor, Gilak aur Mazani, Baloch, Arab aur Turkmen hain. Iran geographical a'tebaar se bahut ahem hai qudrati gas, tel aur qeemati ma'daniyat is ke daaman mein posheeda hain. Raqba ke a'tebaar se duniya mein 17veen number par shumar kiya jata hai. Iran duniya ki qadeem tareen tehzeebon mein se ek hai. Mulk ki tareekh hazaaron saalon par muheet hai jo Mada'in Saltanat 678 Q.M. se le kar Safavid aur Pahlavi Saltanat tak phaili hui hai. Yeh mulk apne tehzeeb tamaddun ke a'tebaar se Asia mein teesre aur duniya mein gyarahveen darje par qabiz hai. Europe aur Asia ke wast mein hone ke ba'is is ki taarikhi ahmiyat hai. Iran Aqwam Mutahidda, Ghair Wabasta Mumalik ki Tehreek, Islami Ta'awun Tanzeem aur Tel Baramad Karne Wale Mumalik ki Tanzeem ka baani rukn hai. Tel ke azeem zakhaair ki badolat bain-ul-aqwami siyasat mein mulk ahem tareen kirdar ada karta hai. Lafz Iran ka matlab Aaryaaon ki sarzameen hai. Riyasat Iran 1648195 murabba kilometer par phaila hua hai. Iran ki kul abadi 85 million hai. Abadi ke lihaaz se Iran duniya mein satarahveen number par hai. Iran Mashriq Wusta mein waqe hai. Is ke shumaal mein Armenia, Azerbaijan, Turkmenistan aur Bahirah Caspian, mashriq mein Afghanistan aur Pakistan, junoob mein Khaleej-e-Fars aur Khaleej-e-Oman jabke maghrib mein Iraq aur Turkey waqe hain. Mulk ka wastii-o-mashriqi ilaaqa waseeh be-aab-o-giyah sehraon par mushtamil hai jin mein kahin kahin nakhlistan hain. Maghrib mein Turkey aur Iraq ke saath sarhadon par pahaari silsile hain. Shumaal mein bhi Bahirah Caspian ke urd gird zarkhez patti ke saath saath Koh Alborz waqe hain. 8 April ki tareekh Iran mein jauhari technology ke qaumi din se munasabat rakhti hai. Aaj ka din muqami technology ki bunyad par Uranium ki afzoodgi ki sargarmiyan shuru kiye jaane se munasabat rakhta hai. Is bari scientific kamyabi ke elaan ke baad Iran ke Saqafati Inqilaab ki Aala Council ki manzoori aur Iran ke jawan daanishwaron ki qaabil-e-iftekhar koshishon ki qadardani ke maqsad se 8 April ki tareekh ko Iran mein jauhari technology ke qaumi din se mausoom kiya gaya. Jauhari technology ka itlaaq, atom ke shigaaf aur unhein jorne ki tawanayi ke zariye qudrati Uranium ko afzooda Uranium mein tabdeel karne ki tawanayi par hota hai. Pur-aman istemaal ke liye muqami jauhari technology, scientific aur san'ati a'tebaar se qaabil-e-zikr ahmiyat ki haamil hai aur yeh is bina par hai ke jauhari technology ka istemaal sirf tawanayi ki farahmi tak mahdood nahi hai balkay ise Irani maahireen ki jaanib se tibbi aur tehqeeqaati umoor mein bhi istemaal kiya ja raha hai. Iran san 1958 mein IAEA ka rukn bana aur san 1968 mein is ne jauhari hathiyaron ki paidaawar aur phailao par pabandi ke moaahde NPT par dastakhat kiye. Haaliya barson mein jauhari shobe mein Iran ki taraqqi-o-pesh raft ahem kamyabiyon ke hamrah rahi hai. Is waqt Iran tees se zaaid radio dawaon ki paidaawar ke saath jauhari aur tibbi tehqeeqaati marakiz mein khaas beemaaron ke istemaal ke liye 90 se 95 feesad tak dawaen bana raha hai. Is silsile mein Iran ki ek aur kamyabi Tehran ke tibbi tehqeeqaati reactor ke eendhan ki farahmi ke liye Uranium ko 20 feesad tak afzooda banana hai. Tehran ka yeh Atomic reactor cancer ki beemari mein mubtala beemaaron ke liye dawaen tayyar karne mein sargaram amal hai jise 20 feesad afzooda Uranium ke eendhan ki zaroorat hai jo do saal qabl tak beroon mulk se daramad kiya jata tha magar maghrib ne Iran ke khilaaf pabandiyon aur Iran mein Uranium ki afzoodgi ki mukhalifat ke bahane 20 feesad afzooda Uranium ka eendhan dene se inkar kar diya jis ke baad Iran ke Atomic tawanayi ke idare ne eendhan ki is zaroorat ko poora karne ke liye Qom ke Fordow Atomic reactor mein jauhari eendhan ki recycling ke mansoobe par amal karte hue jis ki saari sargarmiyan Atomic tawanayi ki bain-ul-aqwami agency ki nigrani mein jaari hain, Uranium ki 20 feesad afzoodgi ke amal mein kamyabi haasil ki. Jauhari technology ke shobe mein Iran ki ek aur kamyabi, fuse yaani pighlane wali machine tayyar karna hai aur is waqt Iran is hawale se technology rakhne wale duniya ke paanch mulkon mein shaamil hai aur Iran Mashriq Wusta ka wahid mulk hai ke is silsile mein jis ki sargarmiyan IAEA ki nigrani mein jaari hain. Tawaqqu ki jaati hai ke aayinda das se pandrah saalon mein jauhari duniya, tawanayi ki paidaawar mein jauhari shigaaf se use pighlane ke marhale mein daakhil ho jayegi. Jauhari technology ke shobe mein Iran is waqt is manzil par pahunch gaya hai ke duniya ke deegar mulkon ke saath mushtarka jauhari mansoobon munajmila Uranium ki afzoodgi aur Atomic fuse ke mansoobon par amal daramad karne ki tawanayi rakhta hai aur us ne yeh technology IAEA ki zer-e-nigraani hi haasil ki hai magar phir bhi America aur ginti ke chand deegar mumalik ke jin se Iran ki taraqqi-o-pesh raft bardasht nahi hopa rahi hai. Tehran ki taraqqi ki raah mein mukhtalif tarah ki rukawaten khari kar rahe hain. Iran ke khilaaf pabandiyan. Iran ka boycott. Nafsiyaati jung. Siyasi dabao. Fauji hamle ki dhamki. Yahan tak ke jauhari daanishwaron ka qatal naiz computer virus ke zariye rukhna andaazi ki koshish aise hathkande hain jo Irani qaum ke dushmanon ne istemaal kiye hain taake Iran mein pur-aman jauhari program aur is silsile mein haasil ہونے wali taraqqi-o-pesh raft mein rukawat paida ki ja sake. Taham maghrib ki in tamaam tar khilaaf warziyon ke baawajood jauhari technology is waqt Irani qaum ki ek ahem tareen qaabil-e-iftekhar scientific taraqqi mein tabdeel ho chuki hai. Piraanshahr shehr 8000 saal ki tareekh ke saath Iran ka sab se qadeem tehzeeb hai. Iran ko intezami taur par ektees soobon ya astan mein taqseem kiya gaya hai. Maujooda aayeen 1979 ke Inqilaab ke baad manzoor kiya gaya jis ke mutabiq Iran ko ek Islami Jamhuria aur Islami taleemaat ko tamaam siyasi, samaaji aur ma'ashi ta'alluqat ki bunyaad qaraar diya gaya. Majmooi ikhtiyarat Rehber-e-Moazzam (Supreme Leader) ke paas hote hain. Aaj kal Ayatollah Ali Khamenei Rehber-e-Moazzam hain. Rehber-e-Moazzam ka intekhab mahireen ki ek majlis (Majlis Khibragan Rehbari) karti hai jis mein poore Iran se 86 ulama muntakhab kiye jaate hain. Rehber-e-Moazzam musallah afwaj ka Commander-in-Chief hota hai. Hukoomat ka sarbarah sadr hota hai jise poore mulk se baaligh raaye dehi ki bunyad par muntakhab kiya jata hai. Aayeen ke tehat koi fard do se zyada martaba sadr nahi ban sakta. Qanoon saazi ke ikhtiyarat Majlis ke paas hain jo 290 muntakhab arakeen par mushtamil aur 4 saal ke liye ilaaqon aur mazhabi biradriyon ki numaindagi karti hai. Masihiyon, Zoroastrian aur Yahudiyon ke apne numainde Majlis mein shaamil hain. Majlis ke manzoor shuda qawaneen manzoori ke liye Shura-e-Nigehban ke paas bheje jaate hain. Shura-e-Nigehban is lihaaz se Majlis ke manzoor karda qawaneen ka jaayza leti hai ke woh aayeen aur Islami qawaneen ke mutabiq hain. Is mein Rehber-e-Moazzam ki jaanib se naamzad karda 6 mazhabi rehnuma aur adliya ke naamzad karda 6 qanooni mahireen shaamil hote hain jin ki manzoori Majlis deti hai. Shura-e-Nigehban ko Majlis, muqami councils, sadaarat aur Majlis Khibragan ke ummedwaron ko veto kar dene ka ikhtiyar bhi hota hai. Qanoon saazi ke hawale se Majlis aur Shura-e-Nigehban ke darmiyan mein paida hone wale tanaza'aat ke hal ke liye 1988 mein Majma Tashkhees Maslehat-e-Nizam (Expediency Council) qaim ki gayi. August 1989 se yeh qaumi policy aur aayeni umoor par Rehber-e-Moazzam ka mushir idara ban gayi. Is ke sarbarah saabiq sadr Ali Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani hain aur is mein hukoomat ke teeno shobon ke sarbarah aur Shura-e-Nigehban ke mazhabi arkaan shaamil hain. Rehber-e-Moazzam teen saal ke liye arkaan naamzad karta hai. Majlis ke bare girohon ko umooman Islaah Pasand aur Qadamat Parast ke taur par bayan kiya jata hai. Is waqt Majlis mein Abadgaran ka ittehad ghalib hai. Yeh qadamat parast hain. 1997 mein Sadr Khatami ke muntakhab hone ke baad Iran ke zyada tar mumalik se ta'alluqat behtar hue. 1998 mein Britain aur Iran ke ta'alluqat is yaqeen dehani par bahal hue ke Irani hukoomat ka Salman Rushdie ki zindagi ko khatre mein daalne ka koi iraada nahi. 1999 mein Britain aur Iran ne safaartkaaron ka tabadla kiya. Iran aur America ke ta'alluqat 1980 mein toote aur aaj tak bahal nahi hue. July 2001 mein America ne Iran aur Libya par pabandiyon ke qanoon mein mazeed 5 saal ke liye tawse'a kardi. January 2002 mein Sadr Bush ne Iran ko Badi ke mahwar ka hissa qaraar diya. Is waqt Iran maghribi taaqaton ki jaanib se jauhari program, mabnii dehshatgardi, Mashriq Wusta ke aman ko kharab karne ke khwahish mand girohon ki mabnii sarparasti aur deegar ilzaamaat ka nishana bana hua hai. Islami Jamhuria Iran ne maghrib ki resha dawaniyon American saazishon aur Aalmi Samraaji taaqaton ki taraf se millat Iran ke khilaaf musalsal dhamkiyon ke baad har satah par khud kafeel hone ka faisla kiya aur Atomic technology, Nano technology, cloning aur medical ke saath saath aerospace naiz difa'i shobon mein be panah taraqqi ki hai jis ke baare mein ikhtisar ke saath kuch matalib qaari'een ki ma'loomatafzaai ke liye zail mein darj kiye ja rahe hain. 1980 ki dehayi mein Iran Iraq jung ke baad se dono mumalik ke ta'alluqat kabhi mamool par nahi aasake taham Iraq ke tanaz'e par Iran ne ghair jaanibdar hone ka elaan kar diya agarche is ne fauji karrawayi par tanqeed ki lekin us ne elaan kiya ke woh tanaz'e se bahar rahega. Is ka kehna hai ke woh ek mustahkam aur muttahid Iraq ke liye kaam karna chahta hai. Iran ka Iraq ki uboori hukoomat ke saath baraah-e-raast do tarfa moaahda hai. Iran bijli ki farahmi ke silsile mein Iraq ki madad kar raha hai. 30 November 2004 ko Iraq mein salamati, aam intakhabaat ke barwaqt in'iqad aur berooni anasir ki mudakhlat rokne par ghaur ke liye Iran mein ek conference mun'aqid hui jis ki mezbaani Irani wazarat-e-dakhla ne ki. Is conference mein Iraq, Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, Turkey, Jordan aur Egypt ke wuzara-e-dakhla aur security ahalkaaron ne shirkat ki. Iran Afghan khana jangi se bhi mutasir ho raha hai aur wahan istehkam ke farogh ka khwahan nazar aa raha hai. Iran ne Afghanistan ki ta'ameer-e-nau ke liye 5 saalon mein 560 million dollars dene ka wa'da kiya hai. Dono mulkon ne mushi'aat ke khilaaf ek doosre se bharpoor ta'awun kiya hai. Iran mein lakhon Afghan muhajireen rehaish pazeer hain jin ki watan wapsi ke liye iqdaamaat kiye ja rahe hain. 1979 mein Inqilaab-e-Islami ke baad se Iran ka mauqaf yeh raha hai ke Israel ka wujood ghair qanooni hai. Iran ab bhi Israel ki purjosh mukhalifat par qaim hai. Woh Mashriq Wusta mein aman qaim karne ke iqdaamaat par bhi aitraazat karta rehta hai aur mabni taur par Palestine aur Lebanon ke un Israel mukhalif girohon ki madad karta rehta hai. 2002 mein Irani wazarat-e-kharija ne elaan kiya ke agar Israel aur Palestine ko koi moaahda qaabil-e-qabool ho to Iran aise do tarfa moaahde ko radd nahi karega. Iran ek mutanawwe' mulk hai jahan bahut se nasli giroh paaye jaate hain, in mein Farsi bolne wale sab se zyada hain. Beesveen sadi ke awaakhir mein Iran ki abadi tezi se barhi, 1956 mein Iran ki abadi sirf 19 million thi jo 2009 tak 79 million tak ja pahunchi. Taham haaliya chand saalon mein Iran ki sharah-e-paidaish mein numayaan kami aayi hai 2012 mein liye gaye andaaze ke mutabiq Iran ki sharah-e-paidaish 1.29 feesad rahi. Sarhad kisi hukoomat ya riyasat waghera ke zameeni kinaare ya hadd ko kaha jata hai. Maazi mein sarhad kisi hukoomat ya riyasat ka mukammal taur par tay shuda khat nahi tha balkay yeh ek ghair jaanibdar khitta hua karta tha jise gashti jagah kaha jata tha. Gashti jagah par do muttasil mumalik ke fauji gasht kiya karte the. Gashti jagah ka tasawwur ab ek mukammal taur par tay shuda aur nishan zada sarhad mein tabdeel ho chuka hai. Hawai addo aur bandargahon ko bhi sarhad tasawwur kiya jata hai. Zyada tar mumalik mein ek marawwaja nizam ke tehat sarhad par logon, jaanwaron aur doosri cheezon ki aamad-o-raft ko qaabu mein rakha jata hai. Bain-ul-aqwami qanoon ke mutabiq har mulk ko apne taur par sarhadi sharaait naafiz karne ka haq haasil hai. Kisi bhi mulk ke sarhad ko paar karne ke liye us mulk ke sarhadi sharaait poore karne hote hain. Agar koi shakhs yeh sharaait poore nahi karta, use sarhad paar karne ki ijazat nahi di jaati. Guzarnama aur visa bhi kayi mumalik ke sarhadaat ko paar karne ke liye zaroori dastavezat hain. Agar koi shakhs kisi ghair mulk ke sarhadaat ke andar reh kar qiyam ya kaam karna chahta hai to is ke liye use khusoosi hijrati dastavezat ya ijazatname ki zaroorat hoti hai. Ajnaas ko sarhad ke aar paar le jaane par mahsool dena parta hai. Ajnaas ya doosri cheezen jaise insaan aur jaanwar waghera ka sarhad ke aar paar khufiya taur par le jaane ko smuggling kaha jata hai jo ghair qanooni hai. Iran duniya ke chand mumalik mein se ek hai jahan panah guzeenon ki ek bahut bari tadaad maujood hai jo zyada tar Afghanistan aur Iraq mein jaari jangon ke ba'is Iran aaye hain. Irani aayeen ke mutabiq hukoomat-e-waqt par zimmedari hai ke woh shehriyon ko buniyadi sahuliyaat faraham kare jin mein jaan-o-maal ka tehffuz, tibbi sahuliyaat, ma'zoor afraad ki dekhbhaal, waghera shaamil hain aur in cheezon par kharcha budget ke zariye haasil karda revenue (saalana aamadni) se kiya jata hai. Mulk ke aksar baashinde Farsi zabaan bolte hain jo aksariyati zabaan hone ke saath saath Iran ki sarkari zabaan bhi hai. Iran mein boli jaane wali zabaanen aksar Hind-Irani zabaanen hain. Aqliyateen zabaanon ki baat ki jaaye to Iran ke shumaal maghrib mein Azerbaijani, shumaal mein Turkmen aur mashriq mein Pakistani sarhadon ke qareeb ilaaqe mein Balochi zabaan boli jaati hai. Iran mein 53 feesad afraad ki Farsi, 16 feesad ki Azerbaijani, 10 feesad ki Kurdi, 7 feesad ki Gilaki aur Mazandarani, 7 feesad ki Lori, 2 feesad ki Arabi aur 2 feesad ki Balochi maadri zabaan hai. Taham in tamaam maadri zabaanon ka istemaal sirf batore ilaaqai zabaan kiya jata hai baaqi mulk mein Farsi hi istemaal hoti hai. Taarikhi taur par Zoroastrianism Iran ka qadeem mazhab tha khaas kar Achaemenid Saltanat, Parthian Saltanat aur Sassanian Saltanat ke adwaar mein Zoroastrianism hi Iran ka sab se bara mazhab tha. 651 eesvi ke lagbhag Musalmanon ne Iran ko fateh kiya aur yahan se aatish parast Sassanian Saltanat ka suqoot ho gaya, Muslim fateh ke baad dheere dheere Islam phailta gaya. Iran mein log 15veen sadi tak Sunni Islam ke pairaukar the, taham 1501 mein Safavid Saltanat qaim ho gayi jis ne 16veen sadi mein muqami Sunni Muslim abadi ko dabao ke zariye Ithna Ashari Ahl-e-Tashayyu' Muslim mein tabdeel kiya. Aaj Ithna Ashari Shia Islam Iran ka sarkari mazhab hai. Iran ki 90 feesad abadi Shia Islam ke pairaukar hai, 8 feesad Sunni Islam aur baaqi ke 2 feesad ghair Muslim hain. Iran intehayi mutaharrik zalzale ki patti par waqe hai jis ki wajah se yahan aaye din zalzale aate rehte hain. 1991 se ab tak mulk mein ek hazaar zalzale ke jhatke record kiye ja chuke hain jin se sarkari adad-o-shumar ke mutabiq 17 hazaar 600 jaanein zaya huien. 2003 mein junoob mashriqi Iran mein shadeed zalzale ne tabahi macha di. Is ki shiddat Richter scale par 6.3 thi aur is ne qadeem qasba Bam ko safha-e-hasti se mita diya. Is zalzale mein 30 hazaar afraad jaan ba haq hue.
Saudi Arabia (Rasmi naam Al-Mamlakah al-Arabiyah al-Saudiyah) maghribi Asia ka ek mulk hai. Yeh Jazeera-e-Arab ke bare hisse par muheet hai, jo ise Asia ka paanchwan sab se bara, Arab duniya ka doosra sab se bara aur maghribi Asia aur Mashriq Wasta ka sab se bara mulk banata hai. Is ki sarhad maghrib mein Bahirah Ahmar se milti hai. Shumaal mein Jordan, Iraq aur Kuwait; mashriq mein Khaleej-e-Fars, Qatar aur Muttahida Arab Emirates; junoob mashriq mein Oman; aur junoob mein Yemen. Bahrain mashriqi saahil se door ek jazira numa mulk hai. Shumaal maghrib mein Khaleej-e-Aqaba Saudi Arabia ko Egypt aur Israel se alag karti hai. Saudi Arabia wahid mulk hai jis ke paas Bahirah Ahmar aur Khaleej-e-Fars dono ke saath saahil hai aur is ka zyada tar ilaaqa khushk sehra, nasheebi, maidan aur pahaaron par mushtamil hai. Is ka darul hukoomat aur sab se bara shehr Riyadh hai. Yeh mulk Makkah aur Madinah ka ghar hai, jo Islam ke do muqaddas tareen shehr hain. Qabl az Islam ka Jazeera-e-Arab, woh ilaaqa jis par maujooda Saudi Arabia mushtamil hai, kayi qadeem saqafaton aur tehzeebon ka maqam tha. Saudi Arabia mein qabl az tareekh insani sargarmiyon ke kuch ibtedayi nishanaat paaye jaate hain. Deen-e-Islam chhatti sadi eesvi (577 AD) mein ubhar kar saamne aaya aur Jazeera-e-Arab ke saath saath Asia aur Africa ke bare hisse par phail gaya. Chhatti sadi ke awaail mein, Allah ke bheje hue aakhri Rasool, Muhammad (SAW) ne Jazeera-e-Arab ki abadi ko ikattha kiya aur ek wahid Islami mazhabi hukoomat qaim ki. San 632 AD mein un ke wisal ke baad un ke pairaukaaron ne bees saal ke andar andar, maghrib mein Jazeera Numa Iberia se le kar mashriq mein wastii aur junoobi Asia ke kuch hisson tak, ek waseeh ilaaqe ko fateh karte hue, tezi se Jazeera Numa Arab se bahar Islam ki roshni ko phaila diya aur Khilafat-e-Rashida (632–661) ke alawa Umayyad (661–750), Abbasi (750–1517) aur Fatimi (909–1171) Khilafat ke saath saath Asia, Africa aur Europe mein mutaddid deegar khaandanon ki bunyaad rakhi. Jadeed daur ke Saudi Arabia ka ilaaqa pehle bunyadi taur par char alag alag taarikhi ilaaqon par mushtamil tha Hijaz, Najd aur mashriqi Arab ke kuch hisse (Al-Ahsa) aur junoobi Arab (Asir). Mamlakat-e-Saudi Arabia ki bunyaad Shah Abdulaziz (maghrib mein Ibn Saud ke naam se mashhoor) ne 1932 mein rakhi thi. Unhon ne san 1902 mein apne khaandan ke abayi ilaaqe Riyadh par qabze ke saath futoohat ke silsile ke zariye charon khitton ko ek riyasat mein muttahid kiya. Saudi Arabia is ke baad se ek mutlaq-ul-anan badshahhat raha hai, jahan siyasi faisle badshah, wuzara ki council aur mulk ke riwayati ashrafiya ke darmiyan mushawarat ki bunyad par kiye jaate hain. Sunni Islam ke andar intehayi qadamat parast Wahhabi mazhabi tehreek ko san 2000 ki dehayi tak Saudi saqafat ki ek ahem khusoosiyat ke taur par bayan kiya gaya tha. San 2016 mein, Saudi Arabia ki hukoomat ne intehayi qadamat parast Wahhabi mazhabi ashrafiya ke asar-o-rasookh ko kam karne aur ikhlaqi police ki sargarmiyon ko mahdood karne ke iqdaamaat kiye, samaaji taraqqi ko barhane aur bahal karne aur mazeed mazboot aur mo'assir muashara banane ki koshish mein Saudi Vision 2030 ke iqtisaadi program ka aaghaaz kiya. Apne bunyadi qanoon mein, Saudi Arabia khud ko ek khud mukhtar Arab Islami riyasat ke taur par bayan karta hai jis mein Islam ko sarkari mazhab, Arabi ko sarkari zabaan aur Riyadh darul hukoomat kaha jata hai. Petroleum san 1938 mein daryaft hua aur is ke baad mashriqi soobe mein kayi deegar daryaftien huien. Saudi Arabia is ke baad se duniya ka doosra sab se bara tel paida karne wala mulk (America ke baad) aur duniya ka sab se bara tel baramad kuninda ban gaya hai. Yahan duniya ke doosre sab se bare tel ke zakhaair aur chauthe bare gas ke zakhaair maujood hain. Mamlakat ko World Bank ki aala aamadni wali ma'eeshat ke taur par darja bandi kiya gaya hai aur yeh wahid Arab mulk hai jo G20 bari ma'eeshaton ka hissa hai. Riyasat ko mukhtalif wajoohat ki bina par tanqeed ka nishana banaya jata hai, jin mein Yemeni khana jangi mein is ka kirdar, Islami dehshatgardi ki mabnii sarparasti aur is ka insani haqooq ka kharab record, bashumool saza-e-maut ka zaroorat se zyada aur aksar maavaraye adalat shaamil hain.
Israel ki khud mukhtaar riyasat maswaye 1967 ki chheh roza jang mein fateh kiye gaye ilaqon ke, taqriban 20770 murabba kilometer par muheet hai. Is ke kul raqbe ka do fiisad pani hai. Israel ke patle aur lambai ke rukh hone ki wajah se is ke exclusive economic zone bahr-e-room mein is ke zameeni raqbe ka do guna hai. Mashriqi Yerushalayim aur Golan ki paharion samet Israeli qawanin kul 22072 murabba kilometer par lagu hain. Israeli qabze mein maujood ilaqah bashumool juzwi khud mukhtaar filisteeni riyasat maghribi kinara mila kar 27799 murabba kilometer banta hai. Itne chhote raqbe ke bawajood Israel mein jughrafiyai tanawwu bahut zyada paya jata hai. Yahan ek taraf Negev sehra hai to doosri janib Jezreel ki zarkhez wadi hai, Galilee ke pahar hon ya Carmel aur Golan ke pahar bhi yahan hain. Bahr-e-room ke kinare wala sahil mulk ki 57 fiisad abadi ki rihaishgah hai. Wast mein mashriqi janib Jordan ki wadi-e-shaqq maujood hai jo Azeem wadi-e-shaqq ka hissa hai. Darya-e-Jordan Hermon pahar se nikal kar Bahr-e-Murdar ko jata hai. Yeh jagah duniya ka sab se nashibi muqam hai. Is ke ilawah sarzamin-e-Israel par makhtishim paye jate hain jo duniya bhar mein kisi aur jagah nahi milte. Makhtishim se murad aisi wadi jo charon taraf oonchi amoodi deewar numa chattanon se ghiri ho. Bahr-e-Room ke basin par maujood mumalik mein fi kas paudon ki anwaa ki miqdar ke hawalay se Israel sab se aage hai. Israel mein darja hararat bahut farq rehta hai. Yeh farq sardiyon mein mazeed barh jata hai. Pahari ilaqay zyada sard aur hawaon ka shikar rehte hain aur baaz auqat barf bhi parh sakti hai. Yerushalayim mein har saal kam az kam ek baar zaroor barfbari hoti hai. Tel Aviv aur Haifa jaise sahili shahron ka mausam mo'tadil rehta hai aur sardiyan thandi aur barish aam hoti hai jabke garmiyan garam tar aur taweel hoti hain. Beersheba aur shumali Negev ke ilaqay neem banjar hain aur kam barishen hoti hain. Janubi Negev aur Arava ka ilaqah sehrai hai aur taweel garmiyon ke baad nisbatan mo'tadil sardiyan aur kam barishen hoti hain. Bara-e-azam Asia ka garam tareen darja hararat 53.7 Israel mein Darya-e-Jordan ki wadi mein 1942 mein record kiya gaya. Israel mein May ta September barishen na hone ke barabar hoti hain. Mahdood aabi wasail ki wajah se Israel mein pani ko mehfooz karne ke liye nat nai technologies istemal hoti hain. Suraj se zyada se zyada fayda uthane ke liye shamsi tawanaai paida ki jati hai. Fi kas shamsi tawanaai se bijli ki paidawar mein Israel sab se aage hai aur taqriban tamam hi gharon mein pani shamsi tawanaai se garam kiya jata hai. Israel mein char mukhtalif nabatati jughrafiyai ilaqay hain. Yahan nabatat ki kul 2867 aqsam pai jati hain jin mein 253 ghair muqami hain. Israel mein kul 380 nature reserve hain. Israel mein jamhoori republic ki tarz ka parliamentary nizam hai aur haq rai dehi sab ke liye hai. Jis rukun parliament ke haq mein deegar parliamentary arkan ki aksariyat ho, use Wazir-e-Azam chuna jata hai. Umumun yeh ohda aksariyati bari party ko milta hai. Wazir-e-Azam hakoomati sarbarah hota hai aur cabinet ka sarbarah bhi. Israel ki parliament mein kul 120 arkan hote hain. Har char saal baad parliamentary intikhabat hote hain lekin siyasi adam istehkam ya adam aetimad ki tehreek ki wajah se hukoomat char saal se qabl bhi khatam ho sakti hai. Israel ke bunyadi qawanin ain ki haisiyat rakhte hain. Israel ke sadr ka ohda riyasat ke sarbarah ka hota hai aur zyada tar namayishi ikhtiyarat rakhta hai. 2014 mein Reporters Without Borders ke mutabiq Israel mein sahafatī azadi ka darja 180 mein se 96 tha jo Kuwait se ek darja neeche hai. Israel ka adalti nizam teen sat'on par mushtamil hai. Zereen satah par Magistrate ki adalaten hoti hain jo mulk bhar ke aksar shahron mein qaim hain. In ke oopar zil'i adalaten aati hain jo Magistrate adalatō ki appeal bhi sunti hain aur barah-e-raast bhi muqadmat dair kiye ja sakte hain. Yeh adalaten mulk ke chhah mein se panch azlaa mein qaim hain. Sab se oopar Supreme Court hai jo Yerushalayim mein qaim hai aur yahan bhi barah-e-raast muqadmat dair kiye ja sakte hain aur High Court ka kaam bhi karti hai. Hakoomati iqdamaat ke khilaf koi bhi muqadma dair karne ke liye shehri ya ghair mulki isi adalat se rujoo karte hain. Israel bain-al-aqwami adalat-e-insaf ke maqasid ko to manta hai lekin uski ghair janibdari par shak zahir karta hai. Israel ka qanoon Common Law, Civil Law aur Yahudi qawanin ka majmooa hai. Adalti nizam mein jury ki bajaye judge faisla karte hain. Shadi aur talaq ke muqaddamaat ka faisla Yahudi, Musalman, Druze aur Masihi qawanin ke mutabiq mutalliqah mazhabi adalaten karti hain. Israel ka adalti nizam mukammal tor par kaghzat se azad hai aur tamam tar record barqi tor par mehfooz hota hai. Israel ki riyasat chhah intezami azlaa mein taqseem hai jinhen Mahuzot kehte hain. In ke naam Centre, Haifa, Yerushalayim, Northern, Southern aur Tel Aviv ke ilaqay aur Judea aur Samaria ke ilaqay bhi hain jo Maghribi Kinare par hain. Bain-al-aqwami satah par Judea aur Samaria ke ilaqay Israel ka hissa nahi mane jate. Azlaa ko mazeed 15 sub-districts mein taqseem kiya gaya hai jinhen Nafot kehte hain. Inhen aage mazeed 50 hisson mein banta gaya hai. 1967 mein chhah roza jang ke ikhtitam par Israel ne Palestine ke Maghribi Kinare aur Mashriqi Yerushalayim, Gaza Patti aur Golan ki paharion par bhi qabza kar liya tha. Is ke alawah Israel ne Jazeera Nima Sinai par bhi qabza kar liya tha lekin 1979 ko Misr ke sath hone wale aman muahiday ke tehat Misr ke hawale kar diya. 1982 se 2000 tak Israel ne Janubi Lebanon ka kuch hissa apne qabze mein le liya hai jise pehle Security Zone kaha jata tha. Israel ki taraf se in ilaqon par qabze ke baad tahaal in ilaqon par Yahudi abadi kari aur fauji tanseebat maujood hain. Israel ne apne qawanin ko Golan ki paharion aur Mashriqi Yerushalayim par bhi nafiz kiya hua hai aur use apna hissa banaya hua hai aur yahan rehne wale afraad ko Israel mein mustaqil rihaish ka haq hasil hai aur agar woh chahen to Israel ki shehriyat bhi hasil kar sakte hain. Taham Maghribi Kinara abhi tak fauji intezam mein aata hai aur yahan ke rehaishi filisteeni, Israeli shehri nahi ban sakte. Gaza ki Patti albattah Israel ke intezam se bahar hai aur yahan kisi qism ki Israeli fauji ya civilian maujoodgi nahi, taham Israel is ilaqe ke fazai aur aabi raston ki nigrani karta hai. Aqwaam-e-Muttahida ki Security Council Golan ki paharion aur Mashriqi Yerushalayim par Israeli daawe ko mustarad karti hai aur inhen Israeli maqbooza ilaqay shumar karti hai. Isi tarah Bain-al-aqwami Adalat-e-Insaf ke mutabiq bhi chhah roza jang ke dauran mein Israel ne jo ilaqay hasil kiye the woh aaj bhi maqbooza ilaqay shumar hote hain aur is adalat ne Israeli Maghribi Kinare ki rukawaton ki qanooni haisiyat ke bare bhi apni raye di hai. Mashriqi Yerushalayim aman muzakarat mein hamesha ek mushkil marhala hota hai kyunki Israel ise apna atoot ang aur dar-ul-hukumat ka hissa shumar karta hai. Zyada tar aman muzakarat Aqwaam-e-Muttahida ki Security Council ki qardad number 242 ki bunyad par hoti hain jis ke mutabiq jang ke dauran mein jeeti gayi sarzamin ko fateh ka hissa nahi shumar kiya jata, is liye Israel ko Arab mumalik se taluqaat bahal karne ke liye in ilaqon se fauji inkhila karna hoga. Is usool ko zameen baraye aman kaha jata hai. 1950 mein Arab mumalik ne Aqwaam-e-Muttahida ke Palestine ko do riyastō mein taqseem ka faisla mustarad kiya to Jordan ne Maghribi Kinare par qabza kar liya. Is qabze ko sirf Bartaniya ne tasleem kiya aur baad azan Jordan ne is ilaqe ke huqooq PLO ke hawale kar diye. Chhah roza jang ke dauran mein 1967 mein Israel ne is par qabza kar liya tha. 1967 se 1993 tak yahan ke shehri Israeli fauji qawanin ke tehat reh rahe the. Israel aur PLO ke mabain aman muahiday ke baad filisteeni abadi aur shehar filisteeni authority ke zer-e-intezam reh rahe hain lekin Israeli fauji intezam kisi na kisi shakl mein baqi raha hai aur be-amni ke dauran mein Israel ne yahan fauji tanseebat aur faujion ki tadaad kayi baar aarzi tor par barhai hai. Intifada Doum ke dauran mein barhte hue filisteeni hamlon ke jawab mein Israel ne Maghribi Kinare par deewar tameer shuru kar di hai. Tameer mukammal hone par is deewar ka mehaz 13 fiisad hissa Israel jabke 87 fiisad hissa Maghribi Kinare mein waqe hoga. Gaza ki Patti par Misr ne 1948 se 1967 tak qabza jamaye rakha aur 1967 ke baad Israel qabiz ho gaya. 2005 ke ek tarfa mansoobe ke tehat Israel ne tamam tar fauji aur abad karon ko Maghribi Kinare se wapas bula liya. Israel ise ab maqbooza sarzamin ki bajaye ghair mulki sarzamin manta hai. Taham insani huqooq ki tanzeemen aur Aqwaam-e-Muttahida ke mukhtalif zeli daftar ise tasleem nahi karte. June 2007 mein Hamas ki taraf se hukoomat sanbhalne ke baad Israel ne Gaza ki Patti ko aane jane wale bahri, barri aur fazai raston ki nigrani sakht kar di hai aur insani hamdardi ki bunyad par chand afraad ko chhor kar baqi har qism ki amad o raft par pabandi ayad kar di hai. Gaza ki sarhad Misr se milti hai lekin Israel, European Union aur filisteeni authority ke darmiyan muahiday ke tehat sarhadon par naql o harkat azadana nahi hai. Hosni Mubarak ke daur tak Misr ne is muahiday ki pasdari ki hai aur April 2011 ko ja kar Gaza ke sath Misr ne apni sarhad kholi hai. Israel ke sifarti taluqaat 157 mumalik ke sath hain aur 100 se zyada sifarti mission bhi duniya bhar mein maujood hain. Arab League ke sirf teen arkan yani Misr, Jordan aur Mauritania ke taluqaat Israel se hain. Israel aur Misr ke aman muahiday ke bawajood Misr mein Israel ko dushman mana jata hai. Israeli qanoon ke mutabiq Lebanon, Syria, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Iran, Sudan aur Yemen ko dushman mumalik shumar kiya jata hai aur in mumalik ko jane wale Israeli shehrion ko Wazarat-e-Dakhla se ijazat leni parti hai. Mamlakat-e-Israel ko tasleem karne wale pehle do mumalik Soviet Union aur Riyasat-e-Muttahida Amreeka hain. Amreeka Mashriq-e-Wusta mein Israel ka apna aham tareen haleef manta hai aur 1967 se 2003 tak Amreeka ne Israel ko 68 arab dollar ki fauji aur 32 arab dollar imdad di hai. Israel aur filisteenion ke mabain muzakarat ke liye Amreeka hamesha aham kirdar ada karta hai taham chand masail par jaisa ke Golan ki paharian, Yerushalayim aur abadi kari ke mamle par Amreeka aur Israel ke darmiyan ikhtilaf paya jata hai. India ne 1992 mein Israel ke sath mukammal sifarti taluqaat qaim kiye aur donon ke darmiyan fauji, technology aur saqafati taluqaat mazboot ho rahe hain. 2009 ke ek survey ke mutabiq poori duniya mein India ke log sab se zyada Israel nawaz hain. India Israel ka sab se bara fauji saz o saman ka khareedar hai jabke India ke liye Soviet Union ke baad Israel doosra bara fauji muawin hai. Tijarati hawale se India Israel ka teesra bara Asiai muawin hai. India aur Israel ke darmiyan fauji aur khalayi taawun jari rehta hai. 2010 mein Asia bhar mein sab se zyada yani 41000 siyye Israel aaye. Germany aur Israel ke darmiyan taawun zyada tar scientific aur taleemi shobon mein hai aur donon mumalik muashi aur fauji aetibar se ek doosre se juray hue hain. 2007 ke muahiday ke tehat Germany ne Israel ko Marg Anboh se bachne walon ke liye 25 arab Euro ka muawaza diya. Israel ke qiyam se hi Bartaniya ne Israel se mukammal sifarti taluqaat qaim rakhe hain. Pehlvi badshahat ke waqt Israel aur Iran ke sifarti taluqaat the lekin baad mein Islami inqilab ke baad Iran ne Israel ko tasleem karne se inkar kiya hai. Agarche Turkey aur Israel ke taluqaat 1991 se pehle juzwi the lekin Turkey ne 1949 mein Israel ko tasleem kar ke is se taluqaat qaim kar liye the. Musalman aur Arab mumalik aksar Turkey par zor dete hain ke woh Israel se apne taluqaat par nazar sani kare. Donon mumalik ke darmiyan taluqaat is waqt kashida ho gaye jab Israel ne Gaza Flotilla par hamla kiya. Israel ke mutabiq is flotilla ka intezam karne wali Turk tanzeem ke taluqaat Hamas aur Al-Qaeda se the. 1995 se Israel aur Turkey ke taluqaat mein batadreej kami ke baad se Israel aur Greece ke mabain taluqaat behtar hote ja rahe hain. Donon mulkon mein 2010 mein difai muahida hua. Is ke alawah tel aur gas ki talash ke shobay mein bhi Israel Cyprus se taawun kar raha hai. Mashriq-e-Wusta mein Yunani masnooaat ki doosri bari mandi Israel hai. 2010 mein Yunani Wazir-e-Azam George Papandreou ne Israel ka daura kiya taake do tarfa taluqaat ko farogh diya ja sake. Israel aur Greece ke darmiyan tawanaai, ziraat, fauji aur sayahati shobon mein taawun jari hai. Azerbaijan un chand aksariyati Muslim mumalik mein se ek hai jis ne Israel ke sath wasee tar taluqaat qaim kiye hain. In taluqaat mein tijarati aur difai, saqafati aur taleemi shobay aham hain. Azerbaijan Israel ko kafi miqdar mein tel muhayya karta hai. 2012 mein donon mulkon ne 1.6 arab dollar ke difai saz o saman ka muahida kiya tha. 2005 mein Azerbaijan Israel ka panchwaan bara tijarati partner tha. Siyasi, mazhabi aur difai nuqta nazar se Ethiopia bara-e-azam Africa mein Israel ka sab se bara haleef hai. Ethiopia mein pani ki qillat aur hazaron Ethiopian Yahudion ki falah o behbood ke liye Israel ka taawun aham hai. 2009 mein Gaza ki jang ki wajah se Mauritania, Qatar, Bolivia aur Venezuela ne Israel se tijarati aur muashi taluqaat muattal kar diye hain. Israel ko European Union ke European Hamsayagi Policy mein shamil kiya gaya hai jis ka maqsad European Union aur hamsayah riyastō ko qareeb lana hai. Israel duniya bhar mein qudrati afaat se nipatne ke liye hangami imdad dene ki policy par karamad hai. Pichle 26 salon se 15 mumalik ko Israel ki taraf se hangami imdad di gayi hai taake qudrati afaat se nipata ja sake. 2010 mein Haiti mein zalzale ke baad Israel ne sab se pehle wahan field hospital qaim kiya tha. Is ke alawah Israel ne 200 se zyada doctor aur tibbi amle ke arkan bhi bheje the. Mission ke ikhtitam tak Israeli doctoron ne kul 1110 mareezon ka ilaj kiya aur 319 kamyab operation ke alawah 16 zuchgion aur 4 afraad ki jaan bachane ke liye bhi kaam kiya. Tabkari ke khatre ke bawajood Israel un mumalik mein se ek hai jinhon ne Japan ke zalzale aur tsunami ke baad sab se pehle tibbi imdadi karkun bheje. Israel ne zalzale aur tsunami se mutasir shahr Korihara mein ek clinic qaim kiya jis mein surgery, atfaal, maternity aur gynaecological ward qaim the. Yahan kul 2300 afraad ka ilaj hua aur kam az kam 220 afraad yaqeeni maut se bach gaye. Israel ki insani hamdardi ki koshishen 1958 mein sarkari tor par shuru huin jab MASHAV yani Israeli Wizarat-e-Kharija Umoor ki Agency Baraye Taraqqi Bain-al-aqwami Taluqaat qaim hui. Is ke tehat 140 se zyada mumalik ki imdad ki ja chuki hai jis mein qahat zada ilaqon mein khorak ki taqseem, imarton ki tameer ki tarbiyat, tibbi imdadi imarat ki tameer aur tibbi imdad ki farahmi shamil hai. Is ke alawah Israeli hukoomat ke sath mil kar kaam karne wale deegar idaron mein IsraAID, The Fast Israeli Rescue And Search Team, Israeli Flying Aid, Save A Child's Heart aur Leket Israel shamil hain. Israel taraqqi yafta mumalik mein apne budget ke tanasub ke lehaaz se fauj par sab se zyada kharcha karta hai. Israeli Difa'i Afwaj ka sarbarah Chief of General Staff hota hai jo barah-e-raast Cabinet ko jawabdeh hota hai. Israeli Defense Forces mein barri, bahri aur fazai afwaj shamil hain. Fauj ki ibtida 1948 ki Arab Israel jang se hui thi jab paramilitary idaron ko zamm kar ke nai fauj banai gayi. 18 saal ki umar mein zyada tar Israeli fauji tarbiyat ke liye fauj mein shamil hote hain. Mard fauj mein teen saal jabke aurten do saal khidmaat sar anjam deti hain. Lazmi tarbiyat ke baad har saal kayi kayi hafte reserve fauji tarbiyat ke liye zyada tar afraad razakarana tor par khidmaat pesh karte hain aur yeh silsila chalīs saal ki umar tak chalta rehta hai. Zyada tar khawateen ko reserve tarbiyat se chhoot mili hoti hai. Israel ke Arab nasl afraad maswaye Druze aur kul waqti mazhabi taleem hasil karne wale afraad ko is lazmi fauji tarbiyat se isteṣna hasil hai halanke Israeli muashare mein is par aksar bahas hoti hai. Agar kisi wajah se lazmi fauji tarbiyat ka hissa na bana ja sake to hospitals, schools aur deegar samaji khidmaat ke shobay mein khidmaat sar anjam dena parti hain. Natijatan Israeli fauj ko mustaqil tor par 176500 baqaida fauji aur 445000 reserve fauji hama waqt mayassar hote hain. Israeli qaumi fauj ka zyada tar inhisar high-tech hathiyaron par hota hai jis ki aksariyat Israel khud banata hai aur is ka kuch hissa beroon mulk se bhi kharida jata hai. Amreeka ki janib se Israel ko sab se zyada fauji imdad di jati hai. 2013 se 2018 tak Amreeka Israel ko har saal 3.15 arab dollar ki fauji imdad dega. Arrow Missile duniya ke chand hi fa'al anti-ballistic missile system mein se ek hai. Israel ka Iron Dome Air Defense nizam duniya bhar mein mashhoor hai kyunki is ki madad se Israel Gaza ki Patti se chalaye jane wale Qassam, 122 millimeter Grad aur Fajr-5 rocketō ke hamlon ko rokne mein kamyab raha hai. Yom Kippur ki jang ke baad se Israel ne jasoosi masnoi sayaron ka ek poora nizam tartib diya hai. Is tarah ke masnoi sayare chhorne wale saat mumalik mein se Israel bhi ek hai. 1984 mein Israel ne apne GDP ka 24 fiisad difa' par kharch kiya taham 2006 mein yeh sharah mehaz 7 fiisad se kuch zyada thi. Aam yaqeen kiya jata hai ke Israel ke paas na sirf aetmi balki kīmiyāī aur jarasimi hathiyar bhi maujood hain. Israel ne NPT muahiday par dastkhat nahi kiye aur apne qaumi aetmi program ke bare khamoshi ki policy ikhtiyar kiye hue hai. 1991 ki Khaleej ki jang mein Iraqi Scud missiles ke hamle ke baad lazim hai ke har ghar mein ek kamra aisa ho jahan kīmiyāī aur jarasimi hathiyaron ka asar na ho sake. 2011 mein aman survey ke mutabiq 153 puraman mumalik mein Israel mehaz 145wein number par tha. Junoobi Maghribi Asia mein Israel ko muashi aur san'ati taraqqi yafta mumalik mein se ek shumar kiya jata hai. Is ke alawah Israel ne 2010 mein Anjuman-e-Iqtisadi Taawun o Taraqqi ki tanzeem mein shamooliyat ikhtiyar ki. Aalmi Bank ke mutabiq karobar mein aasani ke hawale se Israel khitte mein teesre jabke duniya bhar mein 38wein number par hai. Amreeka ke baad Israel mein doosre number par sab se zyada start-up companies hain. Shumali Amreeka se bahar Israel ki companies sab se zyada NASDAQ mein register hain. 2010 mein muashi tor par sab se aage mumalik ki fehrist mein Israel ka number 17waan tha. Mushkilat ke waqt Israeli muishat ko sab se mustahkam mana gaya hai. Tahqeeq aur taraqqi ki sharah mein Israel pehle number par hai. Israel ke Central Bank ko karkardagi ke hawale se 2009 mein 8wein se pehle number par jagah mili hai. Hunarmand afraad ko beroon mulk bhejne ke liye Israel sab se aage hai. Central Bank ke paas 78 arab dollar ke zakhaair maujood hain. Mahdood qudrati wasail ke bawajood Israel ne ziraat aur san'at ke shobon mein qabil-e-qadr taraqqi ki hai. Guzashta chand dahaiyon se Israel khorak ke shobay mein maswaye ghalla aur maweshi, khud kafeel ho gaya hai. 2012 mein Israel ki daramdaat ka kul حجم 77.59 arab dollar tha jis mein kham mal, fauji saman, kham heere, indhan, ghalla aur deegar roz marra ki ashyaa shamil hain. Aham baramdaat mein electronics, software, computerized system, muwasilaat technology, tibbi alat, adviyat, phal, chemical, fauji technology aur heere aham hain. 2012 mein Israel ki kul baramdaat 64.74 arab dollar theen. Shamsi tawanaai mein taraqqi ke hawale se Israel pesh pesh hai. Pani ki bachat aur geothermal tawanaai ke hawale se Israel duniya mein pehle number par hai. Is ke alawah software, muwasilaat aur life sciences mein hone wali taraqqi se Israel ab Silicon Valley ka muqabla karne ke qabil ho gaya hai. Research aur taraqqi par hone wale akhrajaat ke GDP ke tanasub ke hawale se Israel duniya bhar mein pehle number par hai. Intel aur Microsoft ne Amreeka se bahar pehli baar research aur development center Israel mein qaim kiye the. Is ke alawah IBM, Google, Apple, HP, Cisco Systems aur Motorola ne bhi apne research aur development marakiz Israel mein qaim kiye hain. 1970 ki dahai se Israel ko Amreeka ki janib se fauji aur muashi imdad ke alawah qarz bhi milta aa raha hai. Ab is ki miqdar Israel ke kul berooni qarzajaat ke nisf ke barabar ho gayi hai. Taraqqi yafta duniya mein Israel ke berooni qarzajaat nisbatan kam tareen hain. Israel ke diye hue aur liye hue qarzajaat mein lag bhag 60 arab dollar ka musbat farq hai. Israel mein aam karobari hafta 5 din ka hota hai jo Itwar se Jumeraat tak hai. Agar kisi jagah hafte mein chheh din kaam hota ho to phir Jumah bhi kaam mein shumar karte hain. Yom Shabbat ke ehtiram mein agar Jumah ko kaam ho to sardiyon mein do baje aur garmiyon mein char baje kaam khatam kar diya jata hai aur Jumah ko ek tarah se nisf din kaam hota hai. Kayi baar yeh bahas ho chuki hai ke karobari hafta baqi duniya ki munasibat se tay kiya jaye ke Itwar ki chhutti ho aur deegar ayyam mein kaam ka duraniya barha diya jaye ya phir Itwar ki jagah Jumah ko kaam ho. Israel mein kul 9 universities hain jo hakoomati imdad se chalti hain. Hebrew University of Jerusalem Israel ki doosri purani university hai. Yahan Yahudiyat ke mauzoo par duniya bhar mein sab se zyada kutub jama hain. Technion ki University Israel ki sab se purani university hai aur duniya ki 100 behtareen universityon mein shamil hai. Israeli saat universities duniya ki 500 behtareen universityon ki fehrist mein shamil hain. 2002 se ab tak Israel ne 6 Nobel Prizes jeete hain. Fi kas abadi ke aetibar se Israel mein sab se zyada scientific maqalay chhupte hain. Israel ne shamsi tawanaai ka khair maqdam kiya hai aur Israeli engineers ne shamsi tawanaai se mutalliq technology mein bahut taraqqi ki hai aur Israeli companies shamsi tawanaai se mutalliq mansoobon par duniya bhar mein kaam kar rahi hain. 90 fiisad se zyada Israeli gharon mein pani garam karne ke liye shamsi tawanaai istemal hoti hai. Yeh sharah duniya bhar mein sab se zyada hai. Hakoomati adad o shumar ke mutabiq Israel is tarah apni kul tawanaai ka 8 fiisad bacha leta hai. Aabi technology mein Israel duniya ke behtareen mumalik mein se ek hai. 2011 mein Israeli aabi technology ka kul حجم 2 arab dollar tha aur salana baramdaat karoron dollar. Mulk bhar mein aabi qillat ke pesh-e-nazar aabi mansooba bandi, ziraat ko jadeed banaya jana aur qatra qatra aabpashi bhi Israel mein hi ijad huin. Khare pani ko saaf karne aur istemal shuda pani ko dobara qabil-e-istemal banane mein bhi Israel sab se aage hai. Israel mein hi duniya bhar ka sab se bara khare pani ko meetha banane ka plant nasb hai. 2013 ke akhir tak umeed hai ke Israel ki aabi zaroorat ka 85 fiisad hissa reverse osmosis se aayega. Mustaqbil qareeb mein Israel pani ko doosre mumalik ko baramad karne ke liye pur azm hai. 2000 ke awaail se hi stem cell par fi kas tahqeeqat maqala jaat ki miqdar mein Israel duniya bhar mein sab se aage hai. Riyazi, tabiyyat, kimiya, computer sciences aur muashiyat mein Israeli universities duniya ki sau behtareen jamiaat mein shamil hain. Israel mein barqi caron ki charging aur batteries ki tabdeeli ka mulk geer nizam maujood hai. Is se Israel ko tel par inhisar kam karne mein sahoolat mili hai. Israeli Khalayi Idara Israel bhar mein hone wale khalayi tahqeeqi programs ki nigrani karta hai jis mein scientific aur tijarati, donon tarah ke programs shamil hain. Israel un 9 mumalik mein shamil hai jo apne masnoi sayare banane aur use khala mein bhejne ki salahiyat rakhte hain. Israel bhar mein 18096 kilometer taweel pukhta shahrahen maujood hain aur kul gariyon ki tadaad 24 lakh hai. 1000 afraad ke tanasub se 324 gariyan dastiyab hain. Private companies ki kul 5715 busen mukhtalif routes par chalti hain. Railway ka nizam kul 949 kilometer taweel hai aur use hukoomat chalati hai. 1990 ki dahai ke wast se hone wali sarmaya kari ke baad train ke musafiron ki salana tadaad 25 lakh se barh kar ab 2008 mein sade teen crore ho chuki hai. Trainon ki madad se salana taqreeban 70 lakh ton saman bheja jata hai. Israel mein do bain-al-aqwami airport hain jin mein se Ben Gurion Bain-al-aqwami Hawai Adda sab se bara hai aur salana 1 crore 20 lakh se zyada musafir yahan se guzarte hain. Yeh Hawai Adda Tel Aviv ke qareeb waqe hai. Bahr-e-Room ke sahil par waqe Haifa ki bandargah Israel ki qadeem tareen aur sab se bari bandargah hai. Bahr-e-Ahmar par waqe Eilat ki bandargah Mashriq-e-Ba'eed ke mumalik ke sath tijarat ke liye istemal hoti hai. Ashdod ki gehre pani ki bandargah apni nau'iyat ki duniya bhar mein chand bandargahon mein se ek hai. Siyahat bil umum aur mazhabi nau'iyat ki siyahat bil khusus Israel mein bahut ahmiyat rakhti hai kyunki Israel mein mo'tadil mausam, sahil, asaar-e-qadeema aur deegar tarikhi aur mazhabi ahmiyat ke maqamat aur jughrafiya ki wajah se bahut sare sayyah aate hain. Amn o aman ki surat-e-haal ki wajah se yeh san'at barah-e-raast mutasir hoti hai lekin abhi 2013 mein 35 lakh se zyada sayyah Israel aaye. Fi kas ke aetibar se Israel mein duniya bhar mein sab se zyada ajaib ghar hain. 2014 ke awaail mein Israel mein taqriban 8146300 afraad abad hain jin mein se 6110600 afraad Yahudi hain. Israel ke Arab nasl bashinde mulki abadi ke panchwein hisse ke lag bhag hain. Guzashta dahai se Israel mein Romania, Thailand, Cheen, Africa aur Janubi Amreeka ke mumalik se bahut sare karkun Israel abad ho gaye hain jin ki aksariyat ghair qanooni tor par muqeem hai. Ek andaze ke mutabiq yeh tadaad 203000 ho sakti hai. June 2012 tak kul 60000 Africi tarkin watan Israel aaye hain. Israeli abadi ka 92 fiisad shahron mein abad hai. Israel ko Yahudi afraad ka mulk mana jata hai aur Israeli qanoon ke mutabiq tamam Yahudion aur Yahudi-al-nasl afraad ko Israeli shehriyat ka haq hasil hai. Is qanoon ki wajah se taqriban 3 lakh ghair Yahudi (Roosi Yahudi-al-nasl) afraad Israel ke shehri bane hain. 73 fiisad Israeli Israel mein hi paida hue hain. Israel ki do sarkari zabanen Hebrew aur Arabi hain. Hebrew zaban Israeli aksariyati zaban hai aur sarkari umoor isi se nimtaye jate hain jabke Arabi zaban Arabi aqalliyat istemal karti hai. Angrezi zaban school ki ibtida se sikhayi jati hai aur kafi Israeli Angrezi mein munasib dastaras rakhte hain. Tarkin watan ki wajah se sarkon par mukhtalif zabanen sunayi deti hain. 1990 se 1994 ke darmiyan Roose se aane wale tarkin watan afraad se Israel ki kul abadi mein 12 fiisad ka izafa hua hai. 10 lakh se zyada afraad Roosi bolte hain jabke Francisi bolne wale Israeli afraad 7 lakh ke lag bhag hain jin ki aksariyat Shumali Africa se aayi hai. Israel aur Filisteeni ilaqay mil kar Arz-e-Muqaddas ka bahut bara hissa banate hain jo Ibrahimi mazahib yani Yahudiyat, Masihiyat, Musalmanon aur Bahaiyon ke liye bahut ahmiyat rakhti hai. Israeli Yahudion ke liye mazhab mukhtalif haisiyat rakhta hai. Ek survey ke mutabiq 20 saal se zyada umar ke afraad ke 55 fiisad afraad khud ko riwayati Yahudi, 20 fiisad secular Yahudi jabke 17 fiisad khud ko Siyonī kehlalate hain. Israeli abadi ka 16 fiisad hissa Musalmanon par mushtamil hai. Masihi 2 fiisad hain jabke Druze derh fiisad. Yerushalayim ka shahr Yahudion, Masihiyō aur Musalmanō ke liye khasusi ahmiyat rakhta hai aur un ke mazhabi aqaaid ke liye bunyadi ahmiyat rakhta hai. Mazhabi maqamaat mein Deewar-e-Girya, Haram Qudsi Sharif, Masjid-e-Aqsa, Nazareth, Ramla ki Safed Masjid waghera aham hain. Maghribi Kinare par bhi mazhabi ahmiyat ke kayi maqamat hain jin mein Muqaddas Yusuf ka maqbara, Yesū Masih ki jaye paidaish bhi shamil hai. Bahai mazhab ka intezami markaz bhi yahan qaim hai. Bahai mazhab ki ziyarat gah hone ke bawajood yahan mehaz intezami amla rehta hai aur yahan Bahai nahi rehte. Israel mein school ka ausat duraniya sade 15 saal par muheet hai aur Aqwaam-e-Muttahida ke mutabiq sharah khwandagi 97 fiisad se zyada hai. 3 se 18 saal tak ki umar tak taleem lazmi hai. School teen marhalon par mushtamil hai jis mein primary school pehli se chhati tak, middle school haftum se nahum tak aur high school daswein se barahwein tak hota hai. Matric ka imtehan high school ke ikhtitam par hota hai aur is mein kamyabi ke liye riyazi, Hebrew zaban, Hebrew aur aam adab, Angrezi zaban, tareekh aur Bible ki taleem mein kamyab hona lazmi hota hai. Musalman, Masihi aur Druze talaba ke liye un ke mutalliqah mazhab ka mazmoon Bible ki jagah hota hai. Israel ki saqafati tanawwu is ki mutanawwe abadi se paida hoti hai Mukhtalif diaspora communities se aaye hue Yahudi apni saqafati aur mazhabi riwayat apne sath laye hain. Arab asraat bahut se saqafati shobon mein maujood hain, jaise ke Israeli fan-e-tameer, mauseeqi aur khanon mein. Israel wahid mulk hai jahan zindagi Ibrani calendar ke gird ghoomti hai. Ta'tilat Yahudi ta'tilat ke mutabiq tay ki jati hain. Sarkari aaram ka din hafta hai, jo Yahudi Shabbat hai. Israeli khanon mein muqami pakwan ke sath sath woh Yahudi khane bhi shamil hain jo muhajireen apne sath laye hain. Khas taur par 1970 ki dahai ke akhir se, Israeli fusion khanon ki taraqqi hui hai. Israeli khanon ne Mizrahi, Sephardi aur Ashkenazi tarz ke pakwanon ke anasir ko apnaya hai aur musalsal in mein tabdeeliyan kar raha hai. Is mein Levantine, Arab, Mashriq-e-Wusta aur Bahr-e-Room ke khanon jaise falafel, hummus, shakshuka, couscous aur za'atar shamil hain. Schnitzel, pizza, hamburger, French fries, chawal aur salad Israel mein aam hain. Taqreeban nisf Israeli-Yahudi abadi ghar mein kosher khana khati hai. 2015 ke mutabiq, kosher restaurant kul restauranton ka taqriban ek chauthai hissa banate hain. Ghair kosher machhli, khargosh aur shuturmurgh ke sath sath, soor ka gosht— jise Israel mein aksar safed gosht kaha jata hai— paida aur khaya jata hai, alhanke yeh Yahudiyat aur Islam donon mein mamnoo hai.
Cheen ko China ya Kathe ke naam se bhi jana jata hai, jab ke Jamhooria Cheen se murad Taiwan aur is se mulhaqa ilaqay hain. Cheen, jise riwayati Cheeni mein kehte hain, yaani markazi riyasat, asaan Cheeni mein likha jata hai. Yeh Asia ke mashriq mein waqe aik qadeem tehzeeb aur saqafti ilaqa hai. Cheen duniya ka sab se ziyada abadi wala mulk hai, jis ki abadi aik arab chalis crore se zaid hai. Cheen paanch time zones par mushtamil hai aur chaudah mumalik ke sath is ki sarhadein milti hain, jo duniya ke kisi bhi mulk ke muqablay mein sab se ziyada hain aur Russia ke sath duniya ki sab se taweel sarhad. Cheen ka raqba taqreeban 96 lakh murabba kilometer hai, jis ki bina par yeh kul zameeni raqbay ke lehaaz se duniya ka teesra sab se bada mulk hai. Cheen baees sobon, paanch khud mukhtar ilaqon, char municipalities aur do khusoosi intezami ilaqon Hong Kong aur Macau mein munqasim hai. Cheen ka qaumi dar ul hukoomat Beijing hai jabke sab se bada maliyati markaz Shanghai hai. Cheen duniya ki qadeem tareen tehzeebon mein se aik hai aur is ki tareekh che hazaar saal purani hai. Doosri Jang-e-Azeem ke baad Cheen mein khana janggi hui, jis ke nateeje mein mulk do hisson mein taqseem ho gaya aik hissay ka naam Awami Jamhooria Cheen rakha gaya, jo mainland Cheen, Hong Kong aur Macau par mushtamil hai, jabke doosra hissa Jamhooria Cheen kehlaaya, jo Taiwan aur uske mulhaqa ilaqon par mushtamil hai. Cheen ki tehzeeb ka shumar duniya ki un chand tehzeebon mein hota hai jo berooni mudakhlat se badi had tak mehfooz rahin aur isi tasalsul ke sath is ki zuban bhi qadeem zamanay se tehreeri shakal mein maujood hai. Cheen ki tareekh taraqqi aur kamyabi ki kayi sadiyon par muheet hai. Taweel arsay tak Cheen duniya ki sab se taraqqi yafta qaum aur mashriqi Asia ka tehzeebi markaz raha, jis ke asraat aaj bhi numayan hain. Cheen ki sarzameen par bohot si ijaadat hui hain, jin mein char mashhoor ijaadat – kaghaz, qutub numa, barood aur chhapakhana – shamil hain, jinhon ne duniya par gehre asraat murattab kiye.
Chong Gua. Cheen ko Mandarin Cheeni mein Chong Gua kehte hain. Chong ka matlab hai darmiyane ya markazi aur Gua ka matlab hai mulk ya ilaqa. Is ka Urdu tarjuma, markazi ilaqa kiya ja sakta hai. Taham kuch araa yeh bhi payi jati hain ke Chong Gua ka matlab markazi hissa hai. Lekin yeh istilaah Cheeni tareekh mein baqaidagi se istemal nahin hui aur mukhtalif auqat mein is ko mukhtalif samaji aur siyasi matalib diye gaye. Bahar aur khazan ke dauran yeh istilaah us riyasat ke liye istemal ki jati thi jo maghribi Zhau badshahat se mansoob thi aur jo Yellow River Hoang He ki wadi mein thi. Lekin is mein kuch ilaqay shamil na the misalan Chu ke ilaqay jo daryaye Yangshi ke kinaray waqe the aur maghrib ki taraf Oven ke ilaqay. Han badshahat ke dauran Chu, Oven aur doosre mansalika ilaqon ne khud ko Zhungguo ke sath jod liya aur yeh sab mil kar ab naye Zhungguo mulk ke atoot ang ban chuke the. Han daur ke dauran aur qabl Chong Gua ke teen mukhtalif maani mustamal the Han badshahat ke ikhtatam par honay wali taqseem ke dauran, Zhungguo ki istilaah ko shumali sobay ke khanabadoshon ne naye maani pehnaye. Yellow darya ki wadi khonay ke baad yeh maani pukhta ho gaya. Chong Gua ne tezi se harkat karke mazeed junubi ilaqon ko apne sath mila liya jis ke nateeje ke taur par yeh sara ilaqa aik siyasi ikai/wahdat ban gaya jo daryaye Yangshi aur daryaye Zhujiang par mushtamil tha. Tang badshahat ke dauran Barbarian sultanatein jaisa ke Xiang Be aur Xiang Nu bhi is mein shamil ho gayin. Maujooda Awami Cheen ne jab se Mainland ka nazm-o-nasq sambhala aur Awami Jamhooria Cheen ne Zhungguo se murad woh tamaam ilaqay liye jo unke siyasi intezam mein the. Is baat ko yaqeeni banaya gaya ke tamaam 56 lisani giroh Zhungguoren hain agarche yeh dava siyasi taur par mutanazia hai khusoosan jab Chong Gua se murad Awami Jamhooria Cheen liya jata hai.
Angrezi aur deegar zabanen umooman lafz China ki mukhtalif shaklein aur Sino ya Sin ke lahaqe istemal karti hain. Khayal kiya jata hai ke yeh lahaqe aur alfaz Oven badshahat ke naam se liye jate hain jis ne pehli bar Cheen ko aik mulk ke taur par yakja kiya. Qin ya Chin ki ibteda aik chotay se jangjoo qabeele se hui jo Shanzi ke ilaqay mein abad tha, jabke Han nasl ke Cheeniyon ki ibteda daryaye Yellow ki mashriqi shakh se hui, jis ke baais lafz China kuch jachta nahin hai. Qin ya Chin badshahat ne Cheen ki tehreeri zuban ko yakja kiya aur Cheen ke hukmaran ko badshah ki bajaye shehanshah ka khitab diya. Ghaliban Shahrah Resham ke tajiron ne apne aap ko isi naam se kehlaana pasand kiya. Lafz Cheen ya China ko in maanon mein bhi istemal kiya ja sakta hai iqtisadi hawalay se Azeem tar Cheen aik ghair janibdar aur ghair siyasi hawala hai jo bare azim Cheen, Hong Kong, Macau aur baaz auqat Taiwan ko kaha jata hai. Isi tarah Taiwan ko aksar auqat Jamhooria Cheen ka hissa bhi mana jata hai. Sinologists ya woh afraad jo Cheen aur Cheeni qaum ka mutalaa karte hain, umooman Chinese ya Cheeni ka lafz bohot mehdood hawalay se istemal karte hain jaisa ke Zhungguo ka istemal Han qaum se wabasta hai jo Cheen ke andar aur bahar Cheeniyon ki abadi ka kaseer hissa hai.
Kathy. Agarche Kathy lafz ka istemal aaj kal shayari tak mehdood ho kar reh gaya hai, lekin yeh tareekhi hawalay se kabhi yeh Cheen ka naam reh chuka hai, khusoosan shumali nisf hissay mein. Kathy ki ibteda Khetan nami lisani giroh se hui jo shumali Cheen ke aksar hissay par Liao badshahat ke taur par hukoomat kar chuka hai. Ise baad azan Jurchens nami aik aur giroh ne shumal mashriq se aur Mangolon ne shumal se hata kar khud badshahat sambhal li. Aik milti julti istilaah, Kite, modern Slovak zubanon ne bohot ziyada kasrat se Cheen ke liye istemal ki hai.
Seres. Seres ka lafz Yunanion aur Romion ki taraf se Cheen ke shumal maghribi ilaqay aur is ke bashindon ko diya gaya tha. Is ka matlab hai resham se bane, ya jahan se resham ata hai. Socha jata hai ke Seres lafz resham ke Cheeni naam se nikla hai jo Si hai. Yehi lafz Latini mein resham ki ibteda bana hai, yaani Serica.
Sinai. Sinai duniya ke intehai mashriq mein rehne wale Seres ke junubi bashindon ke liye qadeem Yunani aur Romi naam hai. Sinai ke hawalon mein Sinai ka shehr ka tazkirah paya jata hai. Sinai se bazahir yehi lagta hai ke lafz apne peshro lafz Sino aur Sin se nikla hoga jo riwayati taur par Cheen ke bashindon aur Cheen ke liye istemal hota tha.
Tareekh. Cheen ko insani tehzeeb ke awaleen marakiz mein se aik mana jata hai. Cheen ki tehzeeb ko yeh sharaf bhi hasil hai ke woh un madooday chand tehzeebon mein se aik hai jinhon ne khud se tehreeri zuban ijaad ki. Deegar tehzeebon mein Mesopotamia, daryaye Sindh ki tehzeeb, Maya tehzeeb aur qadeem Misri tehzeebain hain. Cheeni likhai abhi tak Cheenion aur Japanion ke zer-e-istemal hai aur kisi had tak Korean aur Vietnamese bhi use istemal karte hain. Cheeni likhai wahid tehreer ta hal istemal mein hai jis mein aik harf poore lafz ya jumlay ko zahir kar sakta hai.
Qabl az tareekh. Archaeology science ki aisi shakh jo aisi qadeem tehzeebon ka mutalaa kare jo abhi tak zinda hain shahadatein yeh zahir karti hain ke Cheen ke ibtedai bashinday taqreeban sawa do million yaani taqreeban saadhe baees lakh saal pehle maujood the. Agarche yeh bashinday insanon se milti julti makhlooq thi, jise Homo Erectus ka naam diya gaya tha. Zhoukoudian nami aik ghaar, jo Beijing ke qareeb waqe hai, mein Peking Man, fossil yaani mutahajjar shahadatein mili hain jo maujooda scientific techniques ki madad se pata chala hai ke teen lakh se saadhe paanch lakh saal pehle tak purani hain. Qadeem pathar se bane hue hathiyaron ki technique aur janwaron ki haddiyan, jo Homo Erectus se jodi gayin hain, ko atharwein aur unniswein sadi mein parkha gaya hai. Yeh socha jata hai ke ibtedai insan numa makhlooq Africa mein Pleistocene period mein parwan chadhay. Bees lakh saal pehle ki hijrat ne in insan numa makhlooq ko purani duniya ke kone kone tak phaila diya. Aaj kal ke insan yaani Homo sapiens ya ashraf-ul-makhlooqat ka socha jata hai ke do lakh saal qabl se le kar aik lakh adsath hazaar saal qabl tak ke arsay mein Ethiopia ke ilaqay mein irteqa pazeer hue. Aik lakh saal qabl se le kar pachas hazaar saal qabl tak maujooda insan duniya ke kone kone tak phail chuka tha. Pichle aik lakh saal ke dauran, deegar ibtedai insani abadiyan khatam ho gayin kyunke maujooda insanon ne unhein safha-e-hasti se mita diya. Cheen mein maujooda insanon ki maujoodgi ki sab se purani shahadat Liujiang se mili hai, jo sir ki haddi hai aur is ka takhmeena sadsath hazaar saal qabl ka lagaya gaya hai. Isi tarah juzwi dhancha Mina Tugawa ke ilaqay mein paya gaya hai jo atharah hazaar saal purana hai.
Badshahat. Cheeni zaraye ke mutabiq, pehli badshahat ka aaghaz Xia badshahat se hua. Is baat ko is waqt tak aik kahani samjha jata raha jab tak ke tanbe ke daur se taalluq rakhne wali jaghon yaani Erlitou jo Henan sobay mein hai, ki scientific khudai na hopai. Is waqt se ab tak archaeology ke mahireen ne shehri ilaqon, tanbe ke istemal aur maqbaron ko benaqab kiya hai jo Xia badshahat ke daur ke mumkinah suragh ho sakte hain kyunke Xia badshahat is ilaqay mein qaim thi. Tareekhi etibar se pehli mustanad badshahat Shang ke naam se thi jo daryaye Yellow ke kinaray mashriqi Cheen mein atharwein sadi qabl Maseeh se le kar barahwein sadi qabl Maseeh tak rahi. Baad azan Zhau ne maghrib ki taraf se hamla karke Shang ke daur ka ikhtitam kiya aur barahwein sadi qabl Maseeh se le kar paanchwein sadi qabl Maseeh tak unka iqtidaar raha. Zhau ki hukoomat muqami sardaron ki ladaiyon ke baais kamzor padti gayi. Bahar aur khazan ke arsay ke dauran beshumar muqami hukoomatain ban gayin jo aik doosre ke khilaf bar-e-sar-e-paikar thin. In halaat mein Zhau badshahat baraye naam hi thi. Pehli Cheeni mutahid hukoomat Qin badshahat ke daur mein 221 qabl Maseeh se shuru hui jab unhon ne hukmarani ka aaghaz kiya. Lekin yeh ziyada arsa tak na chal saki kyunke yeh log qanoon ki sakhti se pasdari karte the jis ke nateeje mein baghawat phailna shuru ho gayi. Han badshahat 206 qabl Maseeh se le kar 220 AD tak rahi. 580 AD mein Cheen ko Sui ne mutahid kiya. Tang aur Song badshahaton ke mathat Cheen ka sunehri daur raha. Saatwein sadi se chaudahwein sadi AD tak technology, adab aur art ke hawalay se Cheen batadreej duniya ki sab se ziyada taraqqi yafta aqwaam mein shumar hota raha. 1271 AD mein Mangol rehnuma Kublai Khan ne Yuan badshahat ka aaghaz kiya jo Song badshahat ke zer-e-asar bani. Zhu Yuanzhang nami kisan ne 1368 mein Mangolon ko bahar nikala aur Ming badshahat ki bunyad rakhi jo 1644 tak qaim rahi. Manchu ki banai hui Qing (last imperial dynasty of China) badshahat 1911 tak qaim rahi jise baad mein Puyi ne khatam kiya. Qing ki badshahat Cheen ki aakhri badshahat thi. Hukoomat ki tabdeeli aik khoonrez marhala sabit hota tha aur nayi hukoomat ko sabqa hukoomat se wafadari ka halaf lene ke liye bohot se tareeqay ladane padte the. Misaal ke taur par jab Manchus ne Cheen ko fateh kiya to unhon ne Han Cheenion ki shanakht ko dabane ke liye mukhtalif tareeqa car ikhtiyar kiye jin mein aik yeh bhi tha ke Han Cheenion ko Manchu jaise andaaz mein baal rakhne honge. Atharwein sadi mein Cheen ko markazi Asia ki un aqwaam par wazeh technological bartari hasil ho chuki thi jin se Cheen kayi sadiyon se jangein karta chala aa raha tha. Lekin yeh bartari Europe se kam thi. Unniswein sadi mein Cheen ne Europe ke imperialism ke khilaf mudafati andaaz apna liya, agarche Europe Central Asia ki taraf pesh qadmi karta raha. Is waqt Cheen baqiya duniya ki ahmiyat mehsoos karke bedaar ho gaya. Jaise hi Cheen ne berooni tijarat aur missionary sargarmiyon ke liye raah kholi, afeem khule aam bikne lagi. Britain ke sath honay wali do afeem jango ne badshah ke qabze ko kamzor kar diya. Is ke nateeje mein Taiping ki khana janggi hui jo 1851 se le kar 1862 tak jari rahi. Is jang ki ibteda Hong Xiuquan ne ki jo batore khas maseehiyat se mutassir tha aur woh apne aap ko Khuda ka beta aur Hazrat Maseeh ka chota bhai manta tha. Agarche imperialism wali afwaj ko is mein fateh hasil hui lekin yeh khana janggi insani tareekh ki sab se holnak jangon mein se aik thi. Is jang mein do crore se zaid halakatein huiin jo Jang-e-Azeem Awwal ki amwat se bhi ziyada hain. Baaz andazon mein teen crore afraad is jang mein luqma ajal bane. Afeem ki kasrat ne mazeed tabahi phailai jise koi na rok saka. Boxer ki baghawat jo 1900 mein hui, ne mazeed tabahi phailai. Agarche Malika Cixi ne baghiyon ki dhake chhupe andaaz mein madad jari rakhi, bazahir usne berooni afwaj ki madad ki taake is baghawat ko kuchla ja sake. Baad azan Boxers ko aath ghair mulki ittehadi afwaj ne shikast di aur 20 hazaar ton chandi batore tawaan-e-jang vasool ki.
Jamhoori Cheen. Yakam January 1912 ko Awami Jamhooria Cheen qaim hui aur Qing badshahat ka ikhtitam hua. Kuomintang Nationalist Party ke Sun Yat-sen ko sobai governor banaya gaya. Taham aik sabqa Qing General Yuan Shikai, jo inqilab ke liye namauzoon samjha gaya tha, ne Sun ko aik taraf karke khud sadarat sambhal li. Yuan ne khud ko nayi hukoomat ka badshah manwane ki koshish ki taham Cheeni saltanat par mukammal tasallut jamane se qabl qadarati maut mar gaya. Yuan Shikai ki maut ke baad siyasi lehaaz se Cheen munqasim ho chuka tha. Is waqt bain ul aqwami taur par mani gayi lekin darhaqeeqat kathputli hukoomat Beijing mein maujood thi. Mukhtalif ilaqon mein muqami sardaron ne apna qabza jama liya tha. 1920 ke ikhtitam par Kuomintang Nationalist Party ne Chiang Kai-shek ke zer-e-intezam mulk ko apne zer-e-intezam mutahid kiya aur mulk ke dar ul hukoomat ko Nanjing muntaqil kiya aur siyasi rehnumai ke nizam ko lagu karna shuru kiya. Yeh nizam Sun Yat-sen ke siyasi taraqqi ke program ki darmiyani halat thi jis ke mutabiq Cheen ko batadreej aik jadeed aur jamhoori riyasat banna tha. Darhaqeeqat is program ka maqsad one party tha jis par Kuomintang Nationalist Party ki hukoomat hoti. Sino-Japanese jang jo 1937 se 1945 jari rahi, ne Nationalists aur Communists ko mutahid hone par majboor kiya. 1945 mein Japan ki shikast ke baad Cheen bazahir fateh lekin darhaqeeqat muashi taur par khali tha. Nationalists aur Communists ke darmiyan ghair aetibari ki wajah se Cheeni Civil War yaani khana janggi phir se shuru ho gayi. 1947 mein ainni hukoomat qaim hui lekin chunke Awami Jamhooria Cheen ke kayi sobe khana janggi mein shamil the, mainland par is aeen ko kabhi raaij na kiya ja saka.
Awami Jamhooria Cheen aur Jamhoori Cheen. Khana janggi mein fateh ke baad Communist Party of China ne mainland ka ziyada tar hissa sambhal liya. Yakam October 1949 ko unhon ne Awami Jamhooria Cheen qaim ki aur ROC ko bhi apna hissa qarar diya. ROC ki markazi hukoomat ko Taiwan chhodne par majboor kiya gaya. Musallah jangon ka ikhtitam 1950 mein hua lekin donon atraf se ab bhi takneeki aetibar se jang jari thi. 1970 ki dahai ke ikhtitam par Awami Jamhooria Cheen ne apne zer-e-intezam ilaqon yaani Taiwan, Taipei, Kaohsiung aur Fujian ke dur daraz ke jazair par mukammal, kaseer al jamaati, numainda jamhooriyat ko rawaj dena shuru kiya. Aaj ROC mein tamaam shobehaye zindagi se mutaharik siyasi numaindagi horahi hai. ROC ki siyasat mein ahem mod Cheen ke sath ittihad aur Cheen ki rasmi azadi ke sath juda hai. 1978 ki mainland mein islahat ke baad unhein kuch shobehaye zindagi mein raiyat deni padin. Taham Cheeni hukoomat ke paas abhi tak siyasat par mukammal control hasil tha aur usne mulki salamati ko lahiq khatrat ko hatane ka kaam jari rakha. Misaalon mein dehshat gardi ke khilaf jang, siyasi mukhalifeen aur sahaafiyon ko jail bhejna, press par control, mazahib ki islah aur azadi ki hami tehreekat ko kuchalna shamil hai. 1989 mein Tiananmen Square mein ehtajaj karne wale talaba ko Cheeni fauj ne pandrah roza marshal law mein thikane laga diya. 1997 mein Hong Kong Britain ki taraf se Awami Jamhooria Cheen ke hawalay kiya gaya aur 1999 mein Macau ki Portugal ki taraf se wapsi hui.
Haal. Aaj Jamhooria Cheen Taiwan tak phaili hui hai jabke Awami Jamhooria Cheen ke paas Cheeni mainland ka control maujood hai. Awami Jamhooria Cheen par Communist Party ka ghalba hai jabke Jamhooria Cheen Jamhooriyat ki taraf mail ho rahi hai. Donon riyasatein abhi tak khud ko Cheen ka hukmaran kehlane ki koshish kar rahi hain. Jamhooria Cheen ke paas 1949 ke fauran baad se bain ul aqwami himayat ziyada thi lekin ab yeh himayat Awami Jamhooria Cheen ki taraf muntaqil hogayi hai. Jamhooria Cheen ke Aqwaam-e-Mutahidda mein maujood numaindon ko 1970 mein Awami Jamhoori Cheen ke numaindon se tabdeel kar diya gaya. Jamhoori Cheen ne na sirf tamaam Cheen par apne dawe ko wapas le liya hai balki apne tamaam naqshe bhi tabdeel kar diye hain jis ke mutabiq berooni Mangolia aur mainland bhi unke naqshe se nikal gaye hain aur ab usne apni shanakht Taiwan ko bana diya hai. Ab Jamhoori Cheen ka dava mainland ki riyasaton, Tibet ya Mangolia se khatam ho gaya hai aur ab Awami Jamhoori Cheen yeh dava mehfooz rakhti hai. Awami Jamhoori Cheen ne safarti aur muashi dabao ke zariye apni policy ko aik Cheen tak badha diya hai aur is se mutaddid bain ul aqwami idaron mein Jamhooria Cheen ka wujood kharij ho raha hai jaisa ke World Health Organization aur Olympic khel wagaira. Aaj, Aqwaam-e-Mutahidda ki sirf chaubees riyasatein Jamhooria Cheen se taalluqat rakhti hain.
Siyasat. Cheen mein yak jamaati nizam raaij hai. Cheen mein Communist Party ki hukoomat hai, saadhe aath crore log is ke rukn hain, yeh log barah-e-raast muntakhab nahin hote, shehri is ki rukniyat ke liye darkhwast dete hain aur phir party tai karti hai ke koi shakhs rukn banne ka ahal hai ya nahin, kaun Communist soch ka wafadar hai kaun nahin, goya aik bohot badi abadi siyasi nizam se pehle marhalay mein hi bahar ho jati hai. Cheen mein muashi azadi zaroor hai, aap karobar karke arb pati ban sakte hain magar aik khaas had ke baad aap ki company mein Communist Party ka ohde dar aa kar barajmaan ho jayega aur faisla sazi ki veto power uske paas hogi, aisa nahin hoga ke woh company ke karobar ko mutassir karega magar company behr haal uski marzi ke baghair koi bada faisla nahin kar sakegi.
Intezaami Taqseem.
