Awami Jamhooria Cheen ko 22 sobon par intezami control hai aur Taiwan ko iska taeeswan soba samajhta hai, jabke Taiwan filhal azadana taur par Jamhooria Cheen ki hukoomat hai. 22 sobon ke alawa sarzameen Cheen ki intezami taqseem mein paanch khud mukhtar ilaqay aur char baldiyat bhi shamil hain. Jabke Hong Kong aur Macau ka shumar Cheen ke khusoosi intezami ilaqon mein hota hai.
Tareekhi Siyasi Taqseemen. Oonche darjay ki siyasi taqseem ne Cheen ko aur intezamia donon ko badal kar rakh diya hai. Oonche darjay mein circuits aur sobe aate hain. Is se neeche regions yaani ilaqay, sub-regions, departments, commanderies, zile aur counties aati hain. Maujooda taqseemon mein sub-region level shehr, county level shehr, qasbe aur township shamil hain. Ziyada tar Cheeni badshahatein un ilaqon par mushtamil thin jo tareekhi aetibar se Cheen ke markaz kehlte the yaani baqaida Cheen. Mukhtalif badshahaton ne apni sarhadon ko nazdeeki riyasaton tak tausi di jaise Mangolia ke andar tak, Manchuria, Xinjiang aur Tibet. Manchu ki banai hui Qing badshahat aur usay baad aanay walon yaani Awami Jamhooria Cheen aur Jamhooria Cheen ne in riyasaton ko apne sath mila liya. Umumi taur par yeh khayal kiya jata hai ke asal Cheen wahi hai jo Deewar-e-Cheen se le kar satah murtafa Tibet ke darmiyan maujood hai. Manchuria aur Mangolia ke andar ke hissay agarche Deewar-e-Cheen ke shumal mein hain aur isko Cheen ke sobe aur Inner Mangolia ke darmiyan sarhad samjha jata hai. Tareekhi aetibar se doosri jang-e-azeem ke daur mein yeh Manchukuo ki kathputli hukoomat ki sarhad the. Xinjiang ki sarhad aaj ke Xinjiang ke qabze ko zahir karti hai. Tibet ki satah murtafa par shuru se Tibet ka hi qabza raha hai. Riwayati taur par Cheen ko shumali Cheen aur junubi Cheen mein taqseem mana jata hai, donon hisson mein Huai darya aur Qin Ling pahadon ko sarhad mana jata hai.
Geographia aur Mausam. Cheen ke ilaqay aik doosre se bohot farq hain, maghrib ki taraf satah murtafa aur pahad hain jabke mashriq ki taraf maidan hain. Nateeja tan bade darya bashamool Yangtze darya ke jo markazi darya hai, Hoang He aur Amur darya maghrib se mashriq ki taraf behte hain. Baaz auqat unka rukh junub ki taraf bhi ho jata hai jaisa ke Mekong darya aur Brahmaputra. Ziyada tar Cheeni darya bahr-e-oqyanus mein ja girte hain. Mashriq ki taraf, daryaye Yellow ke kinaray aur Mashriqi Cheen darya ke sahilon par zer-e-kheez mitti ke maidan hain. Androoni Mangolian satah murtafa jo shumal ki janib hai, charagahain maujood hain. Junubi Cheen mein pahadiyon aur kam buland pahadon ki kasrat hai. Markaz se mashriq ki taraf Cheen ke do bade daryaon yaani Hoang He aur Yangtze darya ke delta hain. Cheen ki ziyada tar zarai zameen inhi do daryaon ke kinaray waqai hai. Doosre mashhoor daryaon mein Pearl darya, Mekong, Brahmaputra aur Amur darya shamil hain. Yunnan sobay ko Mekong ka hissa mana jata hai jis mein Myanmar, Laos, Thailand, Cambodia aur Vietnam shamil hain. Maghrib ki taraf Cheen ke zer-e-kheez maidan hain aur junub mein choone ke pathar par mushtamil oonche zer-e-kheez maidan maujood hain aur Himalaya bhi isi taraf maujood hai jis mein duniya ki sab se buland choti Mount Everest hai. Shumali maghrib mein bhi oonchi satah murtafa payi jati hai jo banjar aur sahrai hai jaisa ke Taklamakan aur Sahra-e-Gobi aur yeh mazeed phail rahi hai. Kayi badshahaton ke dauran Cheen ki junubi maghribi sarhad inhi oonche pahadon aur Yunnan ki gehri wadiyon jo jadeed Cheen ko Burma, Laos aur Vietnam se alag karte hain, ko mana jata tha. Cheen ki Paleozoic ashkal mein sirf oopri hisse ke Carboniferous nizam se hat kar, saare ki saari samandari hain, jabke Mesozoic aur Tertiary zakhair se darya aur samandar ke milaap aur meethe pani ko zahir karte hain. Liaodong aur Shandong ke jazira numa ilaqon mein basalt ke satah murtafa hain. Cheen ke mausam mein bhi bohot farq paya jata hai. Shumali zone jis mein Beijing bhi shamil hai, us mein intehai shadeed sardi hoti hai aur use Arctic nauiyat ka kaha jata hai. Darmiyani ilaqa jis mein Shanghai aata hai, moatadil ilaqa hai. Junubi ilaqay jis mein Guangzhou shamil hai, istoai nauiyat ka hamil hai. Lambi khushk sali aur ziraat ke purane tareeqon ke baais bahar ke mausam mein aandhiyan aana mamool ban gaya hai. Yeh aandhiyan na sirf junubi Cheen aur Taiwan tak jati hain balki America ke maghribi sahil tak pahonch jati hain. Pani se katao aur abadi par control do aise masail hain jis par Cheen ki baqi duniya se nahin banti.
Muashara. Insani Abadi. Cheen ki kul abadi aik ashariya teen arab yaani aik arab tees crore ke lagbhag hai jo duniya ki kul abadi ka paanchwan hissa hai. Cheen mein sau se zaid lisani giroh maujood hain lekin Awami Jamhooria Cheen ki hukoomat in mein se sirf chappan ko maanti hai. Ab tak ka sab se bada lisani giroh Han hai. Yeh group bohot taraqqi yafta hai aur isko mazeed kayi chote girohon mein taqseem kiya ja sakta hai. Bohot se lisani giroh apne ird gird ke girohon mein mil gaye hain aur ab unka naam o nishan tak nahin milta. Maazi ke bohot se numayan giroh ab Han giroh ke sath mil kar Cheeni shakal ke hamil ban gaye hain, jis ke baais Han giroh ki tadad mein achanak dramatic izafa hua hai. Isi dauran Han giroh ke darmiyan maujood bohot se chote girohon ne apni shanakht ko alag se barqarar rakha hua hai aur unki apni lisani aur saqafati khusoosiyat hain lekin woh ab bhi apne aap ko Han giroh ke naam se hi mutaarif karate hain. Bohot se ghair mulki girohon ne bhi Han giroh ki bood-o-bash ikhtiyar karli hai aur unhon ne apne ko suar ki dum jaisi pony bana kar khud ko Han samajhna shuru kar diya hai kyunke Manchurion ne Han abadi par yeh shanakht lazmi qarar de di thi. Istilah Cheeni qaum yaani Zhonghua Minzu se murad woh tamaam afraad hain jo Cheeni shehriyat rakhte hain aur chahe woh kisi bhi lisani giroh se hon.
Zabanain. Cheen ki aksar zabanen Sino-Tibetan nami lisani khandan se taalluq rakhti hain aur yeh untees mukhtalif lisani girohon mein boli jati hain. Isi tarah Cheeni zuban ke apne bohot sare lehje hain. Sab se ziyada istemal hone wala lehja Mandarin jo sattar percent abadi istemal karti hai, Wu jo Shanghai aur uske mulhaqa ilaqon mein boli jati hai, Yuey jise Cantonese kehte hain, Min, Xiang, Gan aur Hakka hain. Ghair Cheeni zabanen jo aqliyatein bashamool Zhuang Thai, Mongolian, Tibetan, Uyghur Turkic, Hmong aur Korean, istemal hoti hain. Putonghua yaani mayari Mandarin ya jo aam istemal ki boli hai, ko Beijing boli kaha jata hai aur yeh Mandarin log bolte hain jo shumal aur junub maghribi ilaqon mein rehte hain. Mayari Mandarin ko rasmi taleem dene ke liye istemal kiya jata hai aur ise tamaam schools mein padhaya jata hai. Yehi zuban media, sarkari taur par aur hukoomat bhi istemal karti hai. Ghair Cheeni zabanen kuch khud mukhtar ilaqon mein co-official yaani doosri sarkari zabanon ke taur par istemal hoti hain. Cheeni zuban ya Baihua ko beesween sadi ke ibteda Mandarin zuban ka mayari tehreeri rasam ul khat mana jata hai. Ise beesween sadi se qabl hazaron saal se likhe padhe Cheeni istemal karte chale aa rahe hain. Classical Cheeni ab bhi high school course ka hissa hai aur aksar Cheenion ki degree ka bhi hissa hoti hai. Mandarin zuban ke doosre lehje umooman likhe nahin jate, maswaaye mayari Cantonese jo ghair riwayati taur par istemal hoti hai. Cheeni currency note bhi kaseer-ul-lisani hote hain jo umooman mayari Mandarin zuban jo Cheeni alfaz aur Han yu Pinyin, Zhuang jo Roman alfaz ke sath, Tibetan jo Tibeti alfaz ke sath, Uyghur jo Arabi alfaz ke sath aur Mongolian jo riwayati Mongolian alfaz ke sath likhe jate hain.
Mazahib. Saqafati Inqilab ke baad aur deegar policies ke baad, Awami Jamhooria Cheen ke mainland ke unsath percent hisse yaani saat sau sadsath percent abadi khud ko la-deen kehte hain. Taham mazahib aur rasumaat ab bhi Awami Jamhooria Cheen ke shab-o-roz mein ahem kirdar ada karte hain, khusoosan Buddhism, Confucianism aur Taoism par riwayati aeteqad shamil hain. Awami Jamhooria Cheen ki aik tihai yaani taintis percent abadi mukhtalif aeteqadat ki pairawi karti hai jise riwayati, purane Cheeni aeteqadat ya mahaz deegar aeteqadat ka naam diya jata hai. Is ke bar-aks Jamhooria Cheen Taiwan mein mazahib ke bohot se pairaukar hain kyunke yeh saqafati inqilab se mutassir nahin hua tha. Mazahib aur purani Cheeni riwayaat bhi Taiwan ki roz marra ki zindagi mein ahem kirdar ada karte hain. American CIA Central Intelligence Agency ke sarkari aadad o shumar kuch aise hain Awami Jamhooria Cheen ke bade mazahib kuch aise hain Jamhooria Cheen Taiwan ke bade mazahib kuch aise hain Mainland Cheen ke sirf che percent log Budh hain aur Mahayana Budh mat aur Zen Budh mat ki ziyada pairawi ki jati hai jab ke Taiwan mein yeh nau percent hai jo Budh mat, Taoism aur Confucianism ka murakkab hai. Das crore pairaukaron ke baais Budh mat ko Awami Jamhooria Cheen ka sab se bada mazhab mana jata hai. Budh mat ki doosri shaklein jaisa ke Theravada Budh mat aur Tibetan Budh mat ko bhi aqliyatein bade paimanay par maanti hain. Sarkari aadad o shumar se yeh baat sabit hoti hai ke yahan do crore Musalman jo ziyada tar Hui hain, dedh crore Protestant aur pachas lakh Catholic bhi yahan hain. Awami Jamhooria Cheen ko sarkari taur par secular aur la-deen mana jata hai lekin mazhab ki infiradi taur par pairawi ki ijazat hai aur hukoomati nigrani mein mazhabi jamatein bhi banai ja sakti hain. Taoism aur Budh mat aur Confucian akhlaqiyat do hazaar saal se mulk ke bade mazahib hain. Infradi satah par mazahib ko poore Cheen mein qubool kiya jata hai aur iski wajah se Budh mat aur Taoism ko guzishta kuch arsay se nayi zindagi mili hai. Kuch saalon se shehri la-deen abadi ki nayi nasl mein Taoism ke roohani khayalat jo Feng Shui ne pesh kiye the, bohot maqbool ho rahe hain aur is se Cheen ki home decoration market bhi badh rahi hai. Guzishta chand saalon se Falun Gong hukoomati pabandi ke baad se bohot shohrat hasil ki hai ke yeh mashkook mazhab se taalluq rakhta hai aur use khatam karne ki koshish bhi ki gayi hai. Falun Gong ne agarche is baat ki tardeed ki hai ke yeh koi naya mazhab hai. Falun Gong ka dava hai ke saat se das crore afraad iske pairaukar hain, ghair mulki zaraye is tadad ko ziyada batate hain lekin koi haqeeqi aadad o shumar nahin mile.
Saqafat. Cheen mein daur-e-badshahat ke dauran Confucianism ke falsafay ko sarkari sarparasti hasil rahi thi aur is par aboor hasil kiye baghair koi banda shahi mulaazmat hasil nahin kar sakta tha. Isi tarah khatati ko drama nawisi ya musawwari se ziyada ahem samjha jata tha. Cheen ki riwayatain Confucianism aur purane khayalat ka majmooa thin. Isi tarah qanoon ki lafzi tashreeh par zor diya jata tha. Is tarah aksar auqat falsafe takra jate the. Imtihanat aur haqdar ki bartari ko aaj bhi Cheen mein izzat ki nigah se dekha jata hai. Haalia barson mein Confucianism ke hamion ne jamhoori Khudaon aur insani haqooq ko aik doosre ke sath mumasil qarar diya hai. Unniswein sadi ki nisf ke baad Cheeni muashiyat aur fauji taqat mein izafa hua aur ghair Cheeni samaji aur siyasi idaron ne Cheen mein asar badhaya. In mein se kuch islahat ko to Cheeni saqafat ne bilkul hi radd kar diya aur baqiyon ne apni taqat badhne ki koshish ki taake woh Cheeni saqafat ka muqabala kar saken. Khulasa yeh ke beesween sadi ka Cheen samaji, siyasi aur muashi aetibar se aik naya tajurba hai jo shahi nizam ke zawaal ke baad Cheeni qaum ki bedari ka sabab bana. Awami Jamhooria Cheen ke pehle rehnuma purane muashare mein paida hue the aur un par Char May ki Tehreek aur islahai rehnumaon ka asar tha. Unhon ne Cheen ki saqafat ke kuch pehluon jaisa ke dehi zameen ki muzaraat, jinsiyat aur Confucius ki taleemat ko badla jabke doosron jaisa ke khandan ke dhanchay aur hukoomat ki wafadari ko qaim rakha. Chawal ko Cheeni saqafat mein bohot ahem maqam hasil hai. Na sirf yeh khorak ka ahem juzv hai balki is se bohot se Cheeni qissay kahaniyan wabasta hain. Chawal Cheen ki sab se ahem aur badi fasal hai aur ise ziyada tar daryaye Yangtze ki wadi mein junubi Cheen mein aur Yunnan Guizhou ki satah murtafa mein ugaya jata hai. Cheen mein duniya ke deegar mumalik ki nisbat sab se ziyada chawal ugaya aur khaya jata hai. Kuch tareekh daan yeh kehte hain ke chawal ki kaasht ki ibteda Cheen se hi hui.
Fan aur Adab. Cheeni kirdar ibteda se le kar ab tak bohot tabdeeliyon se guzre hain. Dasiyon hazaar saal purani dastawizat abhi tak maujood hain, purani alwai haddiyon se le kar Qing qawaneen tak. Khatati ko Cheen mein fan ki badi shakh gardana jata hai. Mazhabi dastanain jo ziyada tar Confucius, Taoist aur Budhist thin, brush aur siyahi se likhi gayin. Baad azan khatati ko tijarat bana diya gaya aur mashhoor khataton ke kaam ko aik qeemati milkiyat gardana jane laga. Print making Song badshahat ke dauran parwan chadhi. Shahi taawun se banai jane wali akademyan banai gayin jo classical cheezon ko khatati aur printing se likhne par mubahisa karti thin. Shahi khandan bhi in mubahison mein bakasrat hissa lete the. Cheeni falsafi, likhari aur shairon ko bohot ziyada izzat di jati thi aur unhon ne Cheen ki saqafat ko bachane aur tarweej dene mein bohot ahem kirdar ada kiya hai. Kuch classical scholars ne aam logon ki zindagi ko bhi mauzoo banaya jo hukam ko aik aankh na bhata tha. Cheeniyon ne bohot sare mauseeqi ke aalat ijaad kiye jaisa ke Zheng, Qin, Sheng, Xiao aur Erhu, Pipa shamil hain. In mein se bohot sare baad azan mashriqi Asia aur junub mashriqi Asia khusoosan Japan, Korea aur Vietnam tak phail.
Khel aur Tafreeh. Shahadat milti hai ke aik hazaar AD mein Cheen mein football ki tarah ka aik khel khela jata tha. Kayi tareekh daan yeh samajhte hain ke football ki ibteda Cheen se hui. Cheen mein professional football abhi tak apni taraqqi ke marhalay tai kar raha hai. Is ke alawa martial arts, table tennis, badminton aur haal hi mein golf bhi mashhoor ho rahe hain. Basketball ko bhi jahan jagah ki kami hai, shehri naujawanon mein maqbooliyat hasil ho rahi hai. Is ke alawa bhi bohot si riwayati khelen hain. Cheeni Dragon Boat ki race Duanwu ke mele mein hoti hai. Androoni Mangolia mein Mangoli andaaz ki kushti aur ghur daud maqbool hain. Tibet mein melon thelon mein teer andazi aur ghud sawari se mutalliq khelon ko tarjeeh di jati hai. Cheen is waqt Asia aur duniya mein aik sports ki taqat mana jata hai. 1982 se ab tak Cheen har Asian khel mein tamghon ki daud mein sab se aage raha hai. Aur 1992 se ab tak har garmai Olympics mein pehli char numberon mein raha hai. 2008 ki garmai Olympics Beijing mein hon gi. Jismaani taur par chaq o chauband hone ko bohot ahmiyat di jati hai. Subah ki warzishon ko baqaida shughal mana jata hai aur parkon mein log warzish karte dekhe ja sakte hain. Board games jaisa ke bain ul aqwami shatranj, Go aur Xiangqi yaani Cheeni shatranj bhi aam hain aur unke baqaida muqabale munaqqid kiye jate hain.
Science aur Technology. Saqafati aetibar se taraqqi ke alawa science aur technology ki field mein Cheeni taraqqi kuch aise hai
Ithopia sarkari taur par Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia, aik landlocked mulk hai. Mashriqi Africa ke Qarn Africa ke ilaqay mein waqe hai. Iski sarhadein shumal mein Eritrea, shumal mashriq mein Djibouti, mashriq aur junub mashriq mein Somalia, junub mein Kenya, maghrib mein Junubi Sudan aur shumal maghrib mein Sudan se milti hain. Ethiopia ka raqba 1,112,000 murabba kilometer hai aur iski abadi taqreeban gyarah crore painsath lakh hai, jo use duniya ka 13wan sabse ziyada abadi wala mulk banata hai. Nigeria ke baad Africa mein doosra sabse ziyada abadi wala mulk aur zameen par sabse ziyada abadi wala landlocked mulk hai. Qaumi dar ul hukoomat aur sabse bada shehr, Addis Ababa, mashriqi Afreeqi daraz se kayi kilometer maghrib mein waqe hai jo mulk ko Afreeqi aur Somali tectonic plateon mein taqseem karta hai. Ithopia, jise baaz auqat Habash bhi kaha jata hai, bar-e-aazam Africa ka aik mulk hai. Taqreeban aik hazaar saal qabl Maseeh junubi Arab ke do qabeele Jashat aur Aqghran, bahr-e-ahmar uboor karke maujooda Ethiopia ke sobe Eritrea mein jakar abad ho gaye. Muqami bashindon ke sath unke ikhtilat se aik nayi qaum wujood mein aayi jise Habashan ke naam se mausoom kiya gaya. Baad azan Arab is tamaam ilaqay ko jo ab Ethiopia mein shamil hai, Habsha kehne lage.
Dominica bazabta taur par Commonwealth of Dominica, Caribbean mein aik jazire ka mulk hai, jo bahr-e-Caribbean mein Lesser Antilles jazira numa mein Windward Jazair ki zanjeer ke hissay ke taur par hai. Dominica ke qareeb tareen padosi European Union ke do halqa jaat, France ke samandar paar mahakmay, shumal maghrib mein Guadeloupe aur junub mein Martinique ka aik khitta hai. 750 murabba kilometer aur sabse ooncha maqam Morne Diablotins hai, jis ki bulandi 1,447 meter hai. 2021 ki mardum shumari mein iski abadi 72,412 thi. Iska dar ul hukoomat Roseau aur sarkari zuban Angrezi hai. Currency Mashriqi Caribbean Dollar hai. Is jazire ko paanchwein sadi mein Junubi America se aanay wale Arawak ne abad kiya tha. Kalinago ne 15wein sadi tak Arawak ko beghar kar diya. Christopher Columbus ke bare mein kaha jata hai ke woh itwar, 3 November 1493 ko is jazire se guzra tha. Baad mein ise Europeans ne nau-abadayat banaya, khaas taur par Francesion ne 1690 se 1763 tak. Francesion ne coffee ke baghat par kaam karne ke liye ghulam banaye hue logon ko maghribi Africa se Dominica daramad kiya. Britain ne saat sala jang ke baad 1763 mein is par qabza kar liya aur Angrezi ko apni sarkari zuban ke taur par qaim kiya. Is jazire ne 1978 mein aik jamhooria ke taur par azadi hasil ki thi. Dominica Lesser Antilles ka sab se kam umar jazira hai aur yeh ab bhi geothermal aatish fashan sargarmi se ban raha hai, jaisa ke duniya ka doosra sab se bada garam chashma hai, jise Boiling Lake kaha jata hai. Is jazire mein sarsabz pahadi barsati janglaat hain aur yeh bohot se nayab paudon, janwaron aur parindon ki anwaa ka ghar hai. Kuch maghribi sahili ilaqon mein xerix ilaqay hain, lekin andaroon-e-mulk shadeed barishen hoti hain. Sisserou totay, jise Imperial Amazon bhi kaha jata hai, intehai khatre se dochar hai aur sirf Dominica mein paya jata hai. Yeh jazire ka qaumi parinda hai aur ise qaumi parcham par numayan kiya jata hai, jis se Dominica sirf do khud mukhtar mumalik mein se aik hai jin ke sarkari parcham ka rang arghawani hai. Yeh mulk Commonwealth, Aqwaam-e-Mutahidda, American Riyasaton ki Tanzeem, The Organisation Internationale de la Francophonie, Mashriqi Caribbean Riyasaton ki Tanzeem aur Non-Aligned Movement ka rukn hai.
Rwanda wast-e-Africa mein waqe aik zameen band mulk hai. Yeh khat-e-istawa ke junub mein mashriqi Africa mein waqe hai. Iski sarhadein Uganda, Tanzania, Burundi aur Jamhoori Jamhooria Congo se milti hain. Kigali iska dar ul hukoomat hai.
Romania wast-e-aur junub mashriqi Europe ke taqato par aik mulk hai. Romania ke maghrib mein Serbia aur Hungary, shumal mashriq mein Ukraine aur Moldova aur junub mein Bulgaria waqe hai. Bilhaz raqba 238400 murabba kilometer par muheet Romania European Union ka aathwan bada mulk hai. Bilhaz abadi Romania European Union ka saatwan bada mulk hai jis ki abadi 19 million nfoos par mushtamil hai. Iska dar ul hukoomat Bucharest hai jo Romania ka sabse bada aur European Union ka daswan bada shehr hai. Romania ki currency ka naam Leu hai. Europe ka doosra sab se lamba darya, Danube, Germany ke Black Forest se uthta hota hai aur Romania ke Danube Delta mein khali hone se pehle, 2,857 kilometer tak junub mashriq mein behta hai. Carpathian pahad Romania ko shumal se junub maghrib tak phailay hue hain jis mein 2,544 meter ki bulandi par Moldoveanu choti shamil hai. Romania jin ilaqon par mushtamil hai, mein abadi ka aaghaz nichle qadeem sangi daur mein hua jis ke baad Dacia ki badshahi, jiski tasdeeq karne wale tehreeri records maujood hai, Dacia ki fateh aur is ke nateeje mein azmana qadeem ke dauran Roman Empire ki taraf se Romanization ki tareekh shamil hai. Jadeed Romania ki riyasat san 1859 mein Moldavia aur Wallachia ki Danubian riyasaton ki zaati union ke zariye tashkeel di gayi thi. Nayi riyasat, jise san 1866 se bazabta taur par Romania ka naam diya gaya, ne san 1877 mein Saltanat-e-Usmania se azadi hasil ki. Pehli Jang-e-Azeem ke dauran, san 1914 mein apni ghair janibdari ka elaan karne ke baad, Romania ne san 1916 se ittihadi taqaton ke sath mil kar jang ladi. Bessarabia, Transylvania aur Banat ke kuch hisse, Crisana aur Maramureş Romania ki saltanat ka hissa ban gaye. Jun August 1940 mein, Molotov-Ribbentrop Moahide aur doosre Vienna Award ke nateeje mein, Romania ko Bessarabia aur Shumali Bukovina ko Soviet Union aur Shumali Transylvania ko Hungary ke hawalay karne par majboor kiya gaya. November 1940 mein, Romania ne Sehfariqi Moahide par dastakhat kiye aur, nateeja tan, June 1941 mein Mehvari Ittihad ki janib se doosri Jang-e-Azeem mein dakhil hua, August 1944 tak Soviet Union ke khilaf ladta raha, yahan tak ke usne ittihadion mein shomooliyat ikhtiyar ki aur Shumali Transylvania ko bahal karwa liya. Red Army ki jang aur qabze ke baad, Romania aik Socialist Jamhooria aur Warsaw Pact ka rukn ban gaya. San 1989 ke inqilab ke baad, Romania ne Jamhooriyat aur Mandi ki muashiyat ki taraf muntaqili ka aaghaz kiya. Romania aik taraqqi yafta mulk hai aur bain ul aqwami muaamlaat mein aik ubharti hui darmiyani taqat hai. Iski muashiyat ka shumar European Union mein sabse tezi se taraqqi karne wali muashiyaton mein hota hai, jo umumi ke lehaaz se duniya ki 44wein sabse badi aur ke lehaaz se 36wein badi muashiyat hai. Romania ne san 2000 ki dahai ke awal mein tez raftar iqtisadi taraqqi ka tajurba kiya. Iski muashiyat ab bunyadi taur par khidmaat par mabni hai. Yeh automobil Dacia aur Petrom jaisi companio ke zariye cars aur electricity ka producer aur exporter hai. Romania ki abadi ki aksariyat nasli Romanian hai aur mazhabi taur par apni shanakht Mashriqi Orthodox Christians ke taur par karti hai, jo Romance bolti hai, aik Romanwi zuban. Romania Aqwaam-e-Mutahidda, European Union, Council of Europe, aur ka rukn hai.
Zimbabwe, bazabta taur par Jamhooria Zimbabwe, Africa ke junub mein waqe aik zameen band mulk hai, jo daryaye Zambezi aur daryaye Limpopo ke darmiyan hai. Jis ke shumal ki taraf Zambia, mashriq mein Mozambique, maghrib mein Botswana aur junub mein Junubi Africa waqe hai. Zimbabwe mein 16 sarkari zabanen hain, jin mein Angrezi, Shona aur Ndebele sabse ziyada aam hain. Sarkari zuban Angrezi hai. 2023 ki mardum shumari ke mutabiq iski abadi 16,775,307 aur kul raqba 390,757 murabba kilometer hai. Zimbabwe Dollar currency hai, halanke Junubi Afreeqi Rand aur American Dollar ko bhi istemal karne ki ijazat hai. Dar ul hukoomat aur sabse bada shehr Harare hai aur doosra bada Bulawayo hai. 16 million se ziyada abadi ka mulk, Zimbabwe ka sabse bada nasli giroh Shona hain, jo abadi ka 80% hain, iske baad Shumali Ndebele aur deegar choti aqliyatein hain. Zimbabwe Aqwaam-e-Mutahidda, Junubi Afreeqi Taraqqiyati Community, Afreeqi Union aur Mashriqi aur Junubi Africa ke liye Mushtarka Market ka rukn hai. 9wein sadi ke aaghaz mein, apne aahani daur ke ikhtitam mein, Bantu logon ne Shona ne Azeem Zimbabwe ki shehri riyasat banayi. Shehri riyasat 11wein sadi tak Afreeqi tijarti marakiz mein se aik ban gaya lekin 15wein sadi ke wast tak use tark kar diya gaya. Wahan se, Saltanat-e-Zimbabwe ka qayam amal mein aaya, iske baad Rozvi aur Mutapa sultanatein qaim huiin. Cecil Rhodes ki British South Africa Company ne 1890 mein Rhodesia ke ilaqay ki had bandi ki jab unhon ne Mashonaland aur baad mein 1893 mein Matabeleland ko pehli Matabele jang ke baad fateh kiya. Company ki hukmarani ka ikhtitam 1923 mein aik khud mukhtar British colony ke taur par Junubi Rhodesia ke qayam ke sath hua. 1965 mein, safed faam aqliyati hukoomat ne yak tarfa taur par Rhodesia ki azadi ka elaan kiya. Riyasat ne bain ul aqwami tanhai aur siyah faam qaum parast quwaton ke sath 15 sala guerrilla jang ka samna kiya. Iska ikhtitam aik aman moahide par hua jis ne April 1980 mein Zimbabwe ke taur par qanooni khud mukhtari qaim ki. Robert Mugabe 1980 mein Zimbabwe ke Wazir-e-Azam bane, jab unki party ne safed faam aqliyaton ki hukmarani ke ikhtitam ke baad aam intikhabat mein kamyabi hasil ki aur tab se woh mulk ki ghalib party bani hui hai. Woh 1987 se Zimbabwe ke sadar the, mulk ke ibtedai parliamentary nizam ko sadarti nizam mein tabdeel karne ke baad, 2017 mein unke istifa tak. 1997 se 2008 tak muashiyat ne musalsal girawat ka samna kiya, halanke usne Zimbabwe Dollar ke alawa deegar currencies ke istemal ki ijazat ke baad tezi se taraqqi dekhi hai. 2017 mein, unki hukoomat ke sath sath Zimbabwe ki tezi se girti hui muashiyat ke khilaf aik saal se ziyada ke muzahiron ke tanazur mein, aik baghawat ka nateeja Mugabe ke istifa ki surat mein nikla. Emmerson Mnangagwa uske baad se Zimbabwe ke sadar ke taur par khidmat anjaam de rahe hain.
Zambia, bazabta taur par Jamhooria Zambia Africa ke junub mein waqe aik zameen band mulk hai. Iski sarhad shumal mein Jamhooria Congo, shumal mashriq mein Tanzania, mashriq mein Malawi, junub mashriq mein Mozambique, junub mein Zimbabwe aur Botswana, junub maghrib mein Namibia aur maghrib mein Angola se milti hai. Zambia ka dar ul hukoomat Lusaka hai, jo Zambia ke junubi wast-e-hissay mein waqe hai. Zambia ka raqba 752,617 murabba kilometer hai aur abadi 20,216,029 hai, jo bunyadi taur par junub mein Lusaka aur shumal mein soba Copperbelt ke ird gird markooz hai, jo mulk ka bunyadi iqtisadi markaz hai. Yahan bunyadi taur par Khoisan ke log abad the, yeh khitta terahwein sadi ke Bantu ki tausi se mutassir hua tha. 18wein sadi mein European mutalaashiyon ki pairawi karte hue, Angrezon ne 19wein sadi ke ikhtitam tak is ilaqay ko Barotseland – Shumali Maghribi Rhodesia aur Shumali Mashriqi Rhodesia ke British muhafzat mein nau-abadayat banaya. Yeh san 1911 mein Shumali Rhodesia mein mudgham ho gaye the. Ziyada tar nau-abadiati daur mein, Zambia par British South Africa Company ke mashware se London se muqarrar kardah intezamia ki hukoomat thi. 24 October 1964 ko Zambia Britain se azad hua aur Wazir-e-Azam Kenneth Kaunda iftitahi sadar ban gaye. Kaunda ki socialist United National Independence Party ne san 1964 se 1991 tak iqtidaar barqarar rakha. Kaunda ne Junubi Rhodesia Zimbabwe, Angola aur Namibia mein tanaziaat ke hal ki talash mein America ke sath qareebi taawun karte hue ilaqai safarat kari mein kaleedi kirdar ada kiya. San 1972 se 1991 tak Zambia yak jamaati riyasat thi aur wahid qanooni siyasi jamat thi jiska naara aik Zambia, aik qaum Kaunda ne waza kiya tha. Kaunda ki jagah san 1991 mein Samaj Jamhoori Tehreek baraye Kaseer Jamaati Jamhooriyat ke Frederick Chiluba ne li, jis ne samaji o iqtisadi taraqqi aur hukoomat ki ghair markaziyat ke daur ka aaghaz kiya. Zambia iske baad se aik kaseer jamaati riyasat ban gaya hai aur usne iqtidaar ki kayi pur aman muntaqili ka tajurba kiya hai. Zambia bohot se qadarati wasail par mushtamil hai, bashamool maadaniyat, jungli hayat, janglaat, meetha pani aur qabil-e-kasht zameen. San 2010 mein, World Bank ne Zambia ko duniya ke tez tareen muashi taur par islah shuda mumalik mein se aik qarar diya. Mashriqi aur Junubi Africa ke liye Mushtarka Market ka sadar daftar Lusaka mein hai.
Wajah Tasmiya. Zambia ka ilaqa san 1911 se 1964 tak Shumali Rhodesia ke naam se jana jata tha. British Raj se azadi ke baad October 1964 mein iska naam tabdeel karke Zambia rakha gaya. Zambia ka naam daryaye Zambezi se makhooz hai.
Tareekh. Ma qabl tareekh daur. Zambezi wadi aur Kalambo Aabshar par aasar-e-qadeema ki khudai ka kaam insani saqafaton ke tasalsul ko zahir karta hai. Kalambo Aabshar ke qareeb camp site ke qadeem auzaar 36,000 saal se ziyada purane radio carbon hain. 300,000 aur 125,000 saal qabl Maseeh ke darmiyan tute hue pahadi insan ki jivasham khopdi ki baqiyat mazeed batati hain ke is ilaqay mein ibtedai insan abad the. Tuta hua pahadi aadmi Kabwe, Zambia mein daryaft hua. Khoisan aur Batwa. Jadeed Zambia aik zamanay mein Khoisan aur Batwa ke logon se 300 AD tak abad tha, jab hijrat karne wale Bantu ne ilaqon ko abad karna shuru kiya. Yeh khayal kiya jata hai ke Khoisan logon ki ibteda Mashriqi Africa se hui aur taqreeban 150,000 saal qabl junub ki taraf phail gaye. Twa logon ko do girohon mein taqseem kiya gaya tha Kafue Twa Kafue ke hamwar ilaqay ke ird gird rehte the aur Lukanga Twa jo Lukanga dal dal ke aas paas rehte the. Zambia mein qadeem chatani art ki bohot si misalen, jaise Mwela rock paintings, Mumbwa cave aur Nachikufu cave, in ibtedai shikarion se mansoob hain. Khoisan aur khaas taur par Twa ne wast-e-aur junubi Africa mein kaashtkari karne wale Bantu logon ke sath taalluq qaim kiya lekin akhir kar woh ya to beghar ho gaye ya Bantu girohon mein shamil ho gaye. Bantu Abantu. Bantu log ya Abantu jis ka matlab hai log aik bohot bada aur tanawwa nasli lisani giroh hai jo Mashriqi, Junubi aur Wast-e-Africa ke ziyada tar logon par mushtamil hai. Wast-e-Africa, Junubi Africa aur Afreeqi Azeem Jheelon ke sangam par Zambia ke mahal-e-waqoo ki wajah se, jadeed Zambion ke logon ki tareekh in teen khitton ki tareekh hai. In teenon khitton mein bohot se tareekhi waqiyat aik sath waqo pazeer hue aur is tarah Zambia ki tareekh, bohot si Afreeqi aqwaam ki tarah, tareekh ke lehaaz se bilkul durust taur par pesh nahin ki ja sakti. Jadeed Zambion ke logon ki ibtedai tareekh zubani records, archaeology aur tehreeri records se akhaz ki gayi hai. Bantu ki asal. Bantu ke log asal mein maghribi aur wast-e-Africa mein rehte the jo aaj Cameroon aur Nigeria hai. Lagbhag 5000 saal pehle unhon ne bar-e-aazam ke bishter hisse mein aik hazaar sala taweel tausi ka aaghaz kiya. Is waqay ko Bantu Expansion kaha gaya hai. Yeh tareekh ki sab se badi insani hijrat thi. Bantu ki tausi bunyadi taur par do raston ke zariye hui aik maghribi Congo ke taas ke zariye aur aik Mashriqi Afreeqi Azeem Jheelon ke zariye. Pehli Bantu Abadkari. Zambia pahonchne wale pehle Bantu log mashriqi rastay se hote hue Afreeqi Azeem Jheelon ke zariye aaye the. Woh pehli sadi AD ke aas paas pahonche aur un mein Tonga ke log the jise Batonga, yaani mard bhi kaha jata hai aur Ba-ila aur Namanwanga aur deegar mutalliqah giroh, jo Zimbabwe ke qareeb junubi Zambia ke ird gird abad hue. BaTonga zubani records batate hain ke woh mashriq se bade samandar ke qareeb se aaye the. Baad mein unke sath BaTumbuka shamil ho gaye jo mashriqi Zambia aur Malawi ke ird gird abad hue. Yeh pehle Bantu log bade gaon mein rehte the. Unke paas aik sarbarah ya sarbarah ke mathat aik munazzam unit ki kami thi aur woh aik community ke taur par kaam karte the aur apni faslon ki tayyari ke waqt aik doosre ki madad karte the. Faslon ko lagane ki kaato aur jalao technique ke nateeje mein mitti khatam hone ki wajah se dehaat aksar badalte rehte the. In logon ne maweshion ke bade rewadh bhi rakhe the, jo unke muasharon ka aik ahem hissa the. Zambia mein Bantu ki pehli communities intehai khud kafeel thin. Junubi Zambia mein abad hone wale ibtedai European missionaries ne in Bantu muasharon ki azadi ko note kiya. In mein se aik missionary ne note kiya agar jang, shikar aur gharelu maqasid ke liye hathiyaron ki zaroorat ho to, Tonga aadmi pahadiyon par jata hai aur khudai karta hai yahan tak ke use loha mil jata hai. Woh use pighlata hai aur is tarah hasil kiye gaye lohe se kulhadi, kodal aur doosre karamad aalaat banata hai, woh lakdiyan jalata hai aur apne jaalsazi ke liye charcoal banata hai, uski ghanti janwaron ki khalon se banti hai aur pipes mitti ke tailon ke hain aur hathauday bhi us lohe ke tukde ke hain jo usne hasil kiye hain. Woh aam lohar ke tamaam kamon ko, pighlana, weld karna, shaklen banana, khud anjam deta hai. Bantu ke in ibtedai abad karon ne bhi junubi Zambia mein Ingombe Illede ki tijarat mein bhi hissa liya. Is tijarti site par unhon ne Azeem Zimbabwe ke mutaddid Kalanga/Shona tajiron aur Mashriqi Afreeqi Swahili sahil ke Swahili tajiron se mulaqat ki. Ingombe Illede Azeem Zimbabwe ke hukmaranon ke liye sabse ahem tijarti ashya mein se aik tha. Doosra Swahili jaise Swahili bandargahi shehr mein tijarat ki jane wali ashya mein kapde, motiyon ki mala, sona aur chudiyan shamil thin. In mein se kuch items aaj ke junubi Democratic Republic of Congo aur Kilwa Kisiwani se aate the jabke deegar Hindustan, Cheen aur Arab duniya aur bohot dur se aate the. Afreeqi tajiron ko baad mein 16wein sadi mein Portuguesion ke sath milaya gaya. Azeem Zimbabwe ke zawaal ne, deegar Kalanga Shona saltanaton jaise Khami aur Mutapa se badhte hue tijarti muqablat ki wajah se, Ingombe Illede ke ikhtitam ko zahir kiya. Doosri Bantu Abadkari. Zambia mein Bantu logon ki doosri bade paimanay par abad kari un logon ke girohon ki thi jin ke bare mein khayal kiya jata hai ke unhon ne Congo Basin ke zariye Bantu ki naqal makani ka maghribi rasta ikhtiyar kiya tha. In Bantu logon ne apna ziyada tar hissa us jagah guzara jo aaj Democratic Republic of Congo hai aur jadeed Zambion ki aksariyat ke aba o ajdad hain. Agarche is baat ke kuch shahad maujood hain ke Bemba ke logon ya Ababemba ka Congo badshahat, Bakongo ke hukmaran, Mwene Kongo VIII Mweemba ke zariye mazboot qadeem taalluq hai, lekin yeh achhi tarah se dastawizi nahin hai. Lunda Luba Riyasaten. Bemba ke deegar mutalliqah girohon jaise ke Lamba, Bisa, Senga, Kaonde, Nkoya, Swaka (Ali Sovo) ke sath, Democratic Republic of Congo ke Upemba hisse mein Luba badshahat (Luba Kingdom) ke atoot hisse banaye Baluba aur Luba ke logon se mazboot taalluq rakhte hain. Woh ilaqa jis par Luba Kingdom ne qabza kiya tha woh 300 AD se ibtedai kisanon aur lohe ke mazooron ke zariye abad tha. Waqt guzarte hue in communities ne jaal aur harpoon ka istemal karna, dug-out canoes banana, dal dalon se nahre saaf karna aur 2.5 meter tak ooncha dam banana seekh liya. Nateeje ke taur par, unhon ne machliyon, tanbe aur lohe ki ashya aur Africa ke deegar hisson, jaise Swahili sahil aur baad mein Portuguesion ke saman ke liye namak ki tijarat karne wali tanawwa muashiyat ko farogh diya. In baradriyon se 14wein sadi mein Luba badshahi ka janam hua. Luba badshahi markazi hukoomat aur chote azad sarbarahan ke sath aik badi mamlakat thi. Is mein bade tijarti networks the jinhon ne Congo Basin mein janglaat aur maadaniyat se malamal satah murtafa ko jo aaj Copperbelt soba hai aur bahr-e-oqyanus ke sahil se bahr-e-hind ke sahil tak phaila hua tha. Mamlakat mein funoon latifa ki bhi izzat ki jati thi aur karigaroon ko bohot ziyada izzat di jati thi. Junubi Congo ke isi ilaqay mein Lunda ke logon ko Luba saltanat ka aik satellite banaya gaya tha aur unhon ne Luba saqafat aur hukmarani ki shaklen ikhtiyar keen, is tarah junub mein Lunda saltanat ban gayi. Lunda ki paidaish ke afsanon ke mutabiq, aik Luba shikari jis ka naam Chibinda Ilunga, Ilunga Mbidi Kiluwe ka beta tha, ne 1600 ke lagbhag kisi waqt Lunda ko statecraft ka Luba model mutaarif karaya jab usne Lueji nami aik muqami Lunda shehzadi se shadi ki aur use uski badshahi ka control diya. Ziyada tar hukmaran jinhon ne Luba ke aba o ajdad se nasl ka dawa kiya tha woh Luba saltanat mein mudgham ho gaye the. Lunda badshah, taham, alag rahe aur ilaqay par apne siyasi aur iqtisadi tasallut ko faal taur par badhate rahe. Lunda, apni abaai riyasat Luba ki tarah, donon sahilon, bahr-e-oqyanus aur bahr-e-hind ke sath bhi tijarat karta tha. Jab ke hukmaran Mwata Yamvo Naweej ne bahr-e-oqyanus ke sahil tak tijarti raste qaim kiye the aur ghulamon aur janglati masnooat ke shauqeen European tajiron ke sath barah-e-raast rabita shuru kiya tha aur ilaqai tanbe ki tijarat ko control kiya tha aur jheel Mweru ke ird gird abad bastiyon ne Mashriqi Africa ke sahil ke sath tijarat ko munazzam kiya tha. Maghrib mein bahr-e-oqyanus ke ghulamon ki tijarat aur mashriq mein bahr-e-hind ghulamon ki tijarat aur saltanaton ke alag hone wale dhadoon ke sath jangon ke nateeje mein bil akhir Luba Lunda riyasaton mein ka zawaal hua. Chokwe, aik giroh jis ka Luvale se gehra taalluq tha aur usne aik Lunda satellite riyasat tashkeel di thi, shuru mein ghulamon ki European mang ka shikar hue, lekin aik bar jab woh Lunda riyasat se alag ho gaye, to woh khud hi badnaam zamana ghulam tajir ban gaye, ghulamon ko donon sahilon par baramad kar rahe the. Chokwe ko bil akhir doosre nasli girohon aur Portuguesion ke hathon shikast hui. Yeh adam istehkam Luba Lunda riyasaton ke khatme aur Democratic Republic of Congo se Zambia ke mukhtalif hisson mein logon ke muntashir hone ka sabab bana. Zambiai bashindon ki aksariyat apne aba o ajdad ka taalluq Luba Lunda aur aas paas ki wast-e-Afreeqi riyasaton se karti hai. Maravi Confederacy. 1200 ki dahai mein, Luba Lunda riyasaton ke qayam se pehle, Bantu logon ke aik group ne Congo taas se jheel Mweru ki taraf hijrat shuru ki aur akhir kar jheel Malawi ke aas paas abad ho gaye. Khayal kiya jata hai ke yeh tarikeen Democratic Republic of Congo mein Upemba ke ilaqay ke aas paas ke bashindon mein se the. 1400 ki dahai tak muhajireen ke in girohon ko ijtamayi taur par Maravi kaha jata tha aur in mein sabse numayan taur par Chewa log Achewa the, jinhon ne Tumbuka jaise doosre Bantu girohon ko mudgham karna shuru kiya. 1480 mein Maravi saltanat ki bunyad Kalonga Maravi ke sabse bade sardar ne Phiri qabile se rakhi thi, jo aik ahem qabila tha, jis mein doosre Banda, Mule aur Nhkoma the. Maravi saltanat bahr-e-hind se le kar aaj Mozambique tak Zambia aur Malawi ke bade hisson tak phaili hui thi. Maravi ki siyasi tanzeem Luba se mushabihat rakhti hai aur khayal kiya jata hai ke uski ibteda wahan se hui hai. Maravi ki bunyadi baramad hathi dant thi, jise Swahili dallaalon tak pahonchaya jata tha. Loha bhi tayyar aur baramad kiya jata tha. 1590 ki dahai mein Portuguesion ne Maravi ki baramadi tijarat par ijarah dari hasil karne ki koshish ki. Is koshish ko Lundu ke Maravi ne ghusse se dochar kiya, jinhon ne apni Wazimba musallah quwwat ko utara. Wazimba ne Portuguesi tijarti shehron Tete, Sena aur deegar mukhtalif shehron ko khatam kar diya. Maravi ke bare mein yeh bhi khayal kiya jata hai ke woh Upemba se riwayatain le kar aaye ke woh Nyau khufiya muashara banenge. Nyau Cosmology ya Maravi ke logon ka muqami mazhab. Nyau Society rasmi raqs performances aur raqs ke liye istemal kiye jane wale masks par mushtamil hai. Aeteqad ka yeh nizam poore ilaqay mein phail gaya. Maravi ne Confederacy ke andar janashini ke tanaziaat, Ngoni ke hamle aur Yao ke ghulamon ke chhapon ke nateeje mein decline kar diya. Mutapa Saltanat aur Mfecane. Jaisa ke Azeem Zimbabwe zawaal ka shikar tha, uske shehzadon mein se aik, Nyatsimba Mutota, Mutapa nami aik nayi saltanat bana kar riyasat se alag ho gaya. Ise aur iske baad ke hukmaranon ko Mwene Mutapa ka laqab ata kiya gaya, jis ka matlab hai zameenon ko tabah karne wala. Mutapa saltanat ne 14wein se 17wein sadi tak Zambezi aur Limpopo daryaaon ke darmiyan ke ilaqay par hukmarani ki, jo ab Zambia, Zimbabwe aur Mozambique hai. Apne daur-e-kamal mein, Mutapa ne Tonga aur Tawara ke Dande nami ilaqay ko fateh kar liya tha. Mutapa saltanat bunyadi taur par Waswahili ke sath aur iske zariye bahr-e-hind ki bain ul baraazmi tijarat mein masroof thi. Bunyadi taur par Asia se sone aur hathi dant ke badle resham aur Cheeni bartan hasil kiye jate the. Maravi mein apne hum asron ki tarah, Mutapa ko aanay wale Portuguesi tajiron ke sath masail ka samna tha. Is nakhushgawar taalluqat ki intiha is waqt hui jab Portuguesion ne mamlakat mein bazaar qaim karke aur abadi ko Isaiyat mein tabdeel karke mamlakat ke androoni muaamlaat par asar andaz hone ki koshish ki. Is karwai se dar ul hukoomat mein rehne wale Musalman Waswahili mein gham o gussa paida hua aur is afra tafri ne Portuguesion ko woh bahana faraham kiya jo woh saltanat par hamla karne aur uski sone ki kanoon aur hathi dant ke raston ko control karne ki koshish kar rahe the. Yeh hamla is waqt nakam ho gaya jab Portuguesi daryaye Zambezi ke kinaray beemariyon ka shikar ho gaye. 1600 ki dahai mein androoni tanaziaat aur khana janggi ne Mutapa ke zawaal ka aaghaz kiya. Kamzor padi hui saltanat ko akhir kar Portuguesion ne fateh kar liya aur akhirkar hareem Shona riyasaton ne us par qabza kar liya. Portuguesion ke paas bhi wasee jaagiren thin, jinhein Prazoz kaha jata tha aur woh ghulamon aur sabiq ghulamon ko hifazati muhafizon aur shikariyon ke taur par istemal karte the. Unhon ne mardon ko fauji hikmat amli ki tarbiyat di aur unhein banduqen deen. Yeh log mahir hathion ke shikari ban gaye aur Chikunda ke naam se mashhoor hue. Portuguesion ke zawaal ke baad Chikunda ne Zambia ke ki riyasat ke liye rasta hamwar kiya. Julian Cobbing ne yeh qiyas kiya hai ke ibtedai European ghulamon ki tijarat ki maujoodgi aur Bantu bolne wale Africa ke mukhtalif hisson mein wasail ko control karne ki koshishen khitte mein logon ki batadreej askariyat pasandi ka sabab bani hain. Iska mushahida Maravi ki Wazimba jangjoo zaat ke sath kiya ja sakta hai, jo aik bar Portuguesion ko shikast de kar baad mein kafi askariyat pasand rahi. Is khitte mein Portuguesion ki maujoodgi bhi Rozvi saltanat ke qayam ki aik badi wajah thi, jo Mutapa ki aik alag riyasat thi. Rozvi ke hukmaran, Changamire Dombo, junubi wast-e-Africa ki tareekh ke sabse taqatwar rehnumaon mein se aik ban gaye. Uski qayadat mein, Rozvi ne Portuguesion ko shikast di aur unhein daryaye Zambezi ke kinaray tijarti chowkion se nikal diya. Lekin shayad is badhti hui askari kari ki sabse qabil-e-zikr misaal Shaka ki qayadat mein Zulu ka urooj tha. Cape mein Angrezi istehmar ke dabao aur Zulu ki askariyat pasandi mein izafa ke nateeje mein Mfecane ka aaghaz hua. Zulu ne jin qabail ko shikast di unki aurton aur bachon ko apne sath mila kar tausi ki, agar un Ngoni qabail ke mard zabh hone se bach gaye, to unhon ne doosre girohon par hamla karne ke liye Zulu ki fauji hikmat amli ka istemal kiya. Iski wajah se poore junubi, wast-e-aur mashriqi Africa mein bade paimanay par naqal makani, jangein aur chhapay pade kyunke Ngoni qabail ne poore khitte mein apna rasta banaya aur use Mfecane kaha jata hai. Zwagendaba ki qayadat mein pahonchne wale Ngoni ne shumal ki taraf badhte hue daryaye Zambezi ko uboor kiya. Ngoni pehle se kamzor Maravi saltanat ke liye aakhri dhachka tha. Bohot se Ngoni bil akhir Zambia, Malawi, Mozambique aur Tanzania ke aas paas abad hue aur humsaya qabail mein mudgham ho gaye. Lozi ne Katanga se apni amad par Zambezi ke sailabi maidanon par Barotse badshahat qaim ki. Zambia ke maghribi hissay mein, Sotho-Tswana ka aik aur junubi Afreeqi group Kololo, ne un muqami bashindon ko mahkoom banaya jo Luba aur Lunda ki riyasaton ke khatme ke baad yahan hijrat karke aaye the jinhein Lozi ya Aluyi kaha jata hai. Kololo ke under, Kololo zuban ko Lozi par musallat kiya gaya yahan tak ke Lozi ne baghawat karke Kololo ko khatam kar diya lekin us waqt tak Lozi zuban badi had tak khatam ho gayi thi aur aik nayi hybrid Lozi zuban ubhri, jo Silozi aur Lozi ke milaap se wajood mein aayi. 18wein sadi ke akhir mein, baaz Mbunda doosre Shinyingele ke sath hijrat karke Barotseland, Mongu chale gaye. Aluyi aur unke rehnuma, Litunga Mulambwa, khaas taur par Mbunda ko unki ladai ki salahiyat ke liye qadar ki nigah se dekhte the. 19wein sadi ke akhir tak, Zambia ke ziyada tar mukhtalif log apne maujooda ilaqon mein qaim ho chuke the. Nau-abadiati Daur. 18wein sadi ke awakhir mein Portuguesi explorer Francisco de Lacerda ne is ilaqay ka daura karne wale ibtedai record shuda Europeans mein se aik tha. Lacerda ne Mozambique se Zambia ke Kazembe ke ilaqay tak aik muhim ki qayadat ki aur 1798 mein is muhim ke dauran hi uski maut ho gayi. Uske dost Francisco Pinto jo is muhim ki qayadat us waqt se kar raha tha aur uski khoj ki thi, ne Portuguesi Mozambique aur Portuguesi Angola ke darmiyan waqe is ilaqay par Portugal ki hakimiyat ka dawa kiya. Doosre European zaireen ne 19wein sadi mein iski pairawi ki. In mein sabse numayan David Livingstone, woh pehla European tha jis ne 1855 mein daryaye Zambezi par shandar aabshar ko dekha aur use Britain ki Malika Victoria ke naam par Victoria Falls ka naam diya. Usne use is tarah bayan kiya itne dilkash manazir farishton ne apni parwaz mein dekhe honge. Muqami taur par aabsharon ko Lozi ya Kololo boli mein Mosi-oa-Tunya ya garajta hua dhuwan ke naam se jana jata hai. Aabshar ke qareeb Livingstone ka qasba uske naam par rakha gaya. 1873 mein uski maut ke baad uske safar ke bohot ziyada tashheer shuda ahwal ne European zaireen, missionaries aur tajiron ki aik lehar ko tehreek di.
British South Africa Company. 1888 mein, British South Africa Company ne, jiski qayadat Cecil Rhodes ne ki, ne maghribi Rhodesia mein Lozi ke Paramount Chief Ba-rots se is ilaqay ke liye, jo baad mein Shumali Barotseland ban gaya, Litunga ke maadani haqooq hasil kiye. Mashriq mein, December 1897 mein Ngoni asal mein Zululand se taalluq rakhne wale ke aik group ne King Mpezeni ke bete Suku ke under baghawat ki, lekin is baghawat ko daba diya gaya aur Mpezeni ne Pax Britannica ko qubool kar liya. Tab se mulk ka woh hissa Shumali Mashriqi Rhodesia ke naam se jana jane laga. 1895 mein, Rhodes ne apne American scout Frederick Russell Burnham se kaha ke woh maadaniyat aur khitte mein darya ki navigation ko behtar banane ke tareeqay talash kare. Is talash ke dauran hi Burnham ne daryaye Kafue ke kinaray tanbe ke bade zakhair daryaft kiye. North-Eastern Rhodesia aur Barotseland North-Western Rhodesia ko 1911 tak alag alag ikaiyon ke taur par zer-e-intezam rakha gaya yahan tak ke unhein mudgham karke Shumali Rhodesia bana diya gaya, jo aik British protectorate tha. 1923 mein, ne Shumali Rhodesia ka control British hukoomat ke hawalay kar diya aur hukoomat ne company ke charter ki tajdeed na karne ka faisla kiya.
British Nau Abadiyat. 1923 mein, Junubi Rhodesia ab Zimbabwe, aik maftooha ilaqa jo ke zer-e-intezam tha, aik khud mukhtar British colony ban gaya. Jabke 1924 mein, Shumali Rhodesia ki intezamia ne guft o shunood ke baad ilaqay ka intezam British nau-abadiati daftar ko muntaqil kar diya.
Rhodesia aur Nyasaland ki Federation. 1953 mein, Federation of Rhodesia aur Nyasaland ki tashkeel ne Shumali Rhodesia, Junubi Rhodesia aur Nyasaland ab Malawi ko aik wahid neem khud mukhtar ilaqay ke taur par ikattha kiya. Yeh kaam abadi ki aik badi aqliyat ki mukhalifat ke bawajood kiya gaya, jinhon ne 1960 se 61 mein iske khilaf muzahira kiya. Shumali Rhodesia iske aakhri saalon mein khusoosi taur par Federation ke ziyada tar hungamon aur bohranat ka markaz tha. Ibtedai taur par, Harry Nkumbula ki African National Congress ne is muhim ki qayadat ki, jise Kenneth Kaunda ki United National Independence Party ne baad mein apne hathon mein le liya.
Azadi. October aur December 1962 mein hone wale do marhalon ke intikhabat ke nateeje mein qanoon saz council mein Afreeqi aksariyat aur do Afreeqi qaum parast jamaton ke darmiyan aik ittihad paida hua. Council ne qaraardaden manzoor keen jin mein wafaq se Shumali Rhodesia ki alahdgi ka mutaliba kiya gaya aur aik naye aeen ke under mukammal dakhili khud mukhtari ka mutaliba kiya gaya aur aik wasee tar, ziyada jamhoori haq-e-raye dahee par mabni aik nayi qaumi assembly ka mutaliba kiya gaya. 31 December 1963 ko Federation ko tahleel kar diya gaya aur January 1964 mein, Kaunda ne Shumali Rhodesia ke Wazir-e-Azam ke liye wahid intikhab jeeta. Iske fauran baad, mulk ke shumal mein aik baghawat hui jise Alice Lenshina ki qayadat mein Lumpa baghawat ke naam se jana jata hai, jo qaum ke rehnuma ke taur par Kaunda ka pehla androoni tanazia tha. Shumali Rhodesia 24 October 1964 ko Jamhooria Zambia ban gaya, jis ke pehle sadar Kenneth Kaunda the. Azadi ke waqt, apni kafi maadani daulat ke bawajood, Zambia ko bade challenges ka samna tha. Muqami taur par, bohot kam tarbiyat yafta aur taleem yafta Zambian hukoomat chalane ke qabil the aur muashiyat ka ziyada tar inhasar ghair mulki maharat par tha. Yeh maharat juzwi taur par John Wilson ne faraham ki thi. 1964 mein Zambia mein 70,000 se ziyada European bashinde the aur woh ghair mutanasib iqtisadi ahmiyat ke hamil the.
1970 ki dahai ke akhir tak, Mozambique aur Angola ne Portugal se azadi hasil kar li. Rhodesia ki buniyadi taur par safed faam hukoomat, jisne 1965 mein azadi ka yak tarfa elaan jari kiya, ne 1979 mein Lancaster House Agreement ke under aksariyati hukmarani ko qubool kiya. Donon Portuguesi colonies mein khana janggi aur badhti hui Namibia ki jang azadi ke nateeje mein muhajireen ki amad aur naqal o hamal ke masail mein izafa hua. Benguela Railway, jo Angola se maghrib tak phaili hui thi, buniyadi taur par 1970 ki dahai ke akhir tak Zambia ki traffic ke liye band kar di gayi thi. African National Congress jaisi nasal parasti ki mukhalif tehreekon ke liye Zambia ki himayat ne bhi security ke masail paida kiye kyunke South African ki defense force ne berooni chhapoon ke dauran ikhtilafi ahdaf par hamla kiya.
June 1990 mein Sadar Kaunda ke khilaf fasaadaat mein tezi aayi. June 1990 ke ehtajaj mein hukoomat ke hathon bohot se muzahireen mare gaye. 1990 mein Sadar Kaunda aik baghawat ki koshish mein bach gaye aur 1991 mein unhon ne kaseer jamaati jamhooriyat ki bahali par razamandi zahir ki, 1972 ke Choma Commission ke under aik jamaati hukoomat qaim ki. Kaseer jamaati intikhabat ke baad, Sadar Kaunda ko ohde se hata diya gaya. Zambia ke maujooda sadar Hakainde Hichilema aur deputy sadar Mutale Nalumango hain.
2000 ki dahai mein, 2006-2007 mein single hindsa ki aflation, haqeeqi GDP numo, sharah sood mein kami aur tijarat ki badhti hui satah se muashiyat mustahkam hui, iski ziyada tar taraqqi kan kuni mein ghair mulki sarmaya kari aur aalmi tanbe ki buland qeematon ki wajah se hai. Is sab ki wajah se Zambia ko imdadi atiya dehindgan ne josh o kharosh se nawaza aur mulk mein sarmaya karon ke aetimad mein izafa dekha.
Zambia Junubi Africa ka aik khushki se ghira mulk hai, jiski aab o hawa istoai hai aur ziyada tar buland satah murtafa par mushtamil hai jis mein kuch pahadiyan aur pahad hain, jo darya ki wadiyon se juda hain. 752,614 murabba kilometer (290,586 murabba meel) par yeh duniya ka 39wan sabse bada mulk hai. Mulk ziyada tar arz balad °8 aur °18 junub aur tool balad °22 aur °34 mashriq ke darmiyan waqe hai. Zambia mein do bade daryaaon ke taas hain markaz, maghrib aur junub mein waqe daryaye Zambezi/Kafue taas mulk ke taqriban teen chauthai hisse par muheet hai. Aur shumal mein daryaye Congo ka taas mulk ke taqriban aik chauthai hisse par muheet hai. Shumali mashriq mein aik bohot chota ilaqa Tanzania mein jheel Rukwa ke androoni nikasi aab ka hissa banata hai. Zambezi taas, Zambia mein mukammal ya juzwi taur par behte bade darya yeh hain Kabompo, Luangwebeungu, Kafue, Luangwa aur khud Zambezi, jo mulk ke maghrib mein behta hai aur phir Namibia, Botswana aur Zimbabwe ke sath apni junubi sarhad banata hai, iska manba Zambia mein hai lekin yeh Angola ki taraf modta hai aur isse mutaddid muawin nadiyan Angola ke wast-e-pahadi ilaqon mein nikalti hain. Daryaye Cuando ka sailabi maidan (iska markazi rasta nahin) ka kinara Zambia ki junubi maghribi sarhad banata hai aur daryaye Chobe ke zariye yeh darya Zambezi ko bohot kam pani faraham karta hai kyunke ziyada tar pani bukharat ban kar zaya ho jata hai.
Zambezi ki do taweel aur sabse badi muawin nadiyaan, Kafu aur Luangwa, buniyadi taur par Zambia mein behti hain. Zambezi ke saath unke sangam bil-tarteeb Chirundu aur Luangwa Town mein Zimbabwe ki sarhad par hain. Iske sangam se pehle, Darya-e-Luangwa Mozambique ke saath Zambia ki sarhad ka hissa banta hai. Luangwa shahar se, Zambezi Zambia se nikalta hai aur Mozambique ka rukh karta hai aur aakhir kar Mozambique Channel mein jata hai. Zambezi mulk ke junoob maghribi kone mein waqay 1.6 kilometer chauRre (1 meel) Victoria Abshar par taqriban 100 meter (328 foot) bulandi se girta hai, jo baad mein Kariba Jheel mein behta hai. Zambezi Wadi, jo junoobi sarhad ke saath chalti hai, gahri aur chauRri hai. Zambia ka shimal waseeh maidano ke saath bahut hamwaar hai. Maghrib mein sabse zyada qabil-e-zikr Zambezi par Barotse sailabi satah hai, jahan December se June tak sailab aata hai. Yeh sailab qudrati mahol aur bashindon ki zindagiyon, muashre aur saqafat par haawi hai. Mashriqi Zambia mein satah murtafa jo Zambezi aur Jheel Tanganyika ki wadiyon ke darmiyan phaila hua hai shimal ki taraf upar ki taraf jhuka hua hai aur is tarah junoob mein taqriban 900 meter (2,953 foot) se 1,200 meter (3,937 foot) tak aur shimal mein Mbala ke qareeb 1800 meter (5,906 foot) tak pahunch jata hai. Shumali Zambia ke in satah murtafa ilaqon ko World Wildlife Fund ne Central Zambezian Miombo Woodlands Ecoregion ke ek bade hisse ke taur par darja bandi kiya hai.
Mashriqi Zambia azeem tanavvu ko zahir karta hai. Chiluwangwa Wadi satah murtafa ko shimal mashriq se junoob maghrib mein ek munhani khutoot mein taqseem karti hai aur maghrib ki taraf Darya-e-Lonsimfuwa ki gahri wadi se satah murtafa ke qalb mein phaili hui hai. Pahadiyan aur pahad wadi ke kuch hisson ke saath milte hain, khaas taur par iske shimal mashriq mein Malawi ki sarhad par satah murtafa Nyika (2,200 meter ya 7,218 foot), jo Zambia tak Mafinga Pahadiyon ke taur par phaila hua hai, jismein mulk ka sabse ooncha maqam Mafinga Central (2,339 meter ya 7,674 foot) hai. Muchinga Pahad, Zambezi aur Congo ke nikasi aab ke darmiyan ka aabi ilaqah aur Darya-e-Luangwa ki gahri wadi mutawazi chalte hain aur iske shumali kinare par ek tez pas manzar banate hain, halanke yeh taqriban har jagah 1,700 meter (5,577 foot) se neeche hain. Iski akhri choti Mumpu maghribi sire par hai aur 1,892 meter (6,207 foot) par mashriqi sarhadi ilaqe se door Zambia ka sabse ooncha maqam hai. Congo Pedicle ki sarhad is pahad ke gird khenchi gayi thi. Darya-e-Congo ka sabse junoobi headstream Zambia mein uthta hai aur iske shumali ilaqe se maghrib mein sabse pehle Chambeshi ke taur par aur phir Bangweulu daldal ke baad Luapula ke taur par behta hai, jo Jamhuria Congo ke saath sarhad ka hissa banta hai. Mweru Darya Luapula Jheel mein dakhil hone tak shimal ka rukh karne se pehle junoob aur phir maghrib mein behta hai. Jheel ka doosra bada muawin Darya-e-Kalungwishi hai, jo mashriq se usmein behta hai. Darya-e-Mweru Luvua Jheel banata hai, jo shumali sire se Darya-e-Lualaba (upper Congo Darya) tak behta hai.
Jheel Tanganyika ek doosri badi hydrographic khasusiyat hai jo Congo ke taas se taalluq rakhti hai. Iske junoob mashriqi sire ko Darya-e-Kalambo se pani milta hai, jo Tanzania ke saath Zambia ki sarhad ka hissa banta hai. Is darya mein Africa ki doosri buland tareen bila taattul abshar, Kalambo Abshar hai.
Zambia mein siyasat sadarti numainda jamhoori framework mein hoti hai, jiske tehat Zambia ka sadr ek kaseer-ul-jamaati nizam mein riyasat ka sarbarah aur hukumat ka sarbarah dono hota hai. Hukumat intizami taqat ka istemal karti hai, jabke qanoon sazi ka ikhtiyar hukumat aur parliament dono ke paas hota hai. October 1964 mein azadi hasil karne ke fauran baad Zambia ek jamhuria ban gaya. 2021 ke aam intikhabat mein, jiski khasusiyat 70 feesad voter turnout hai, Hakainde Hichilema ne 59 feesad vote hasil kiye. 24 August 2021 ko, Hakainde Hichilema ne Zambia ke naye sadr ke taur par halaf uthaya.
Sanah 1964 mein azadi ke baad, Zambia ke kharija taalluqat zyada tar junoobi Africa ke deegar mumalik mein azadi ki tehreekon jaise African National Congress aur SWAPO ki himayat par markooz the. Sard jung ke dauran, Zambia ghair wabasta tehreek ka rukun tha.
Zambia Defense Force Zambia Army, Zambia Air Force aur Zambian National Service par mushtamil hai. ZDF bunyadi taur par bairuni khatrat ke khilaf design kiya gaya hai. 2019 mein, Zambia ne johri hathiyaron ki mumaniat se mutalliq Aqwaam-e-Muttahida ke moahide par dastakhat kiye.
Zambia ko intizami taur par das sobon mein taqseem kiya gaya hai jinhen 117 azla mein taqseem kiya gaya hai aur intikhabi taur par 156 halqon aur 1,281 wardon mein taqseem kiya gaya hai.
Hukumat kisi bhi mukhalifat aur tanqeed ke liye hassas hai aur naqideen ke khilaf qanooni bahana bana kar muqadma chalane mein tezi se kaam karti hai ke unhon ne awami inteshar ko hawa di thi. Azadi izhar aur press ko dabane ke liye tauheen ke qawaneen ka istemal kiya jata hai.
Serbia ya Sarwiya wastii Europe ka ek mulk hai. Ek waqt yeh mulk Azeem Saltanat Usmania ka hissa tha.
Sri Lanka jo pehle Ceylon ke naam se jana jata tha, sarkari taur par, Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka, junoobi Asia mein ek jazire par mushtamil mulk hai. Yeh Bahar-e-Hind aur Khaleej-e-Bengal ke junoob maghrib mein aur Bahar-e-Arab ke junoob mashriq mein waqay hai. Use barresagheer se Khaleej-e-Mannar aur Aabnaye Palk se alag kiya gaya hai. Sri Lanka ki samandari hudood Bharat aur Maldives ke saath mushtarik hain. Sri Jayawardenepura Kotte iska qanoon saz dar-ul-hukumat hai aur Colombo sabse bada shahar aur mali markaz hai.
Aaj Sri Lanka ek kaseer-ul-qaumi riyasat hai, jo mutanawwi saqafaton, zubanon aur naslon ka ghar hai. Sinhali mulk ki aksariyat aabadi hain. Tamil log, jo ek bade aqliyati giroh hain, ne bhi jazire ki tareekh mein ek bada kirdar ada kiya hai.
Sri Lanka ki dastavezi tareekh 3,000 saal purani hai jismein ma-qabl tareekh insani bastiyon ke shawahid maujood hain jo kam az kam 125,000 saal pehle ki hain. Sri Lanka ke geographical mahal-e-wuqu aur gahri bandargahon ne use qadeem Shahra-e-resham ke ibtadai dinon se lekar aaj ke nam nehad Maritime Silk Road tak badi strategic ahmiyat ka hamil bana diya hai.
Sri Lanka junoobi Asia ka ek jazira jiski shakal aansu ke qatre ya nashpati ki shakal mein hai, Indian Plate par waqay, ek badi tectonic plate hai jo pehle Hind-Australian Plate ka hissa thi. Yeh Bahar-e-Hind mein Khaleej-e-Bengal ke junoob maghrib mein, arz-ul-balad °5 aur °10 shimal aur tul-ul-balad °79 aur °82 mashriq ke darmiyan hai. Sri Lanka ko barresagheer Pak-o-Hind ke zameen wale hisse se Khaleej-e-Mannar aur Aabnaye Palk ke zariye alag kiya gaya hai. Hindu deomala ke mutabiq Hindustani zameen aur Sri Lanka ke darmiyan ek zameeni pul maujood tha jo 1480 tak paidal guzarnay ke qabil tha ab yeh sirf chuna ke patthar ke ubhar ki ek zanjeer hai jo satah samandar se upar baqi hai. Yeh hisse ab bhi ek meter (teen foot) uthale hain aur kashti rani mein rukawat hain. Yeh jazira zyada tar hamwaar se lekar ghoomte hue sahili maidano par mushtamil hai, jismein pahad sirf junoobi wasti hisse mein uthte hain. Sabse ooncha maqam Pidurutalagala hai, jo satah samandar se 2,524 meter (8,281 foot) tak bulandi par pahunchta hai.
Sri Lanka mein 103 darya hain. Inmein sabse lamba Darya-e-Mahaweli hai, jo 335 kilometer (208 meel) tak phaila hua hai. Yeh aabi guzargahain das meter (33 foot) ya isse zyada ki 51 qudrati absharon ko janam deti hain. Sabse ooncha Bambarakanda Abshar hai, jiski oonchai 263 meter (863 foot) hai. Sri Lanka ki sahili patti 1,585 kilometer (985 meel) lambi hai. Sri Lanka 200 nautical meel tak phailay hue ek ikhsoosi iqtisadi zone ka dawa karta hai, jo Sri Lanka ke zameeni raqbe ka taqriban 6.7 guna hai. Sahili patti aur mulhiq pani intehai paidawari samandari maholiyati nizam ki himayat karte hain jaise marjan ki chattanen aur sahili aur sahili samandari ghaas ke uthale bistar. Sri Lanka mein 45 khaadiyan aur 40 jheelen hain. Sri Lanka ka mangrove maholiyati nizam 7,000 hectare se zyada par phaila hua hai aur usne sanah 2004 mein Bahar-e-Hind ke tsunami mein lehron ki taqat ko moattadil karne mein ahem kirdar ada kiya. Yeh jazira madniyat se malamal hai jaise ke feldspar, graphite, silica, kaolin, abrak aur thorium. Khaleej-e-Mannar mein petroleum aur gas ki maujoodgi ki bhi tasdeeq ho chuki hai aur iski bazyabi ki jane wali miqdar ko nikalne ka kaam jari hai.
Slovakia, sarkari taur par Slovak Jamhuria wasti Europe ka ek zameen band mulk hai. Iske shimal mein Poland, mashriq mein Ukraine, junoob mein Hungary, maghrib mein Austria aur shimal maghrib mein Czech Jamhuria ki sarhad hai. Slovakia ka zyada tar pahadi ilaqah taqriban 49,000 murabba kilometer (19,000 murabba meel) par phaila hua hai, jiski aabadi 5.4 million se zyada hai. Dar-ul-hukumat aur sabse bada shahar Bratislava hai aur doosra sabse bada shahar Košice hai.
Slovakia tul-ul-balad 47° aur 50°N aur lambai 16° aur 23°E ke darmiyan hai. Slovakia ka zyada tar hissa pahadon par mushtamil hai. In pahadi silsilon mein Fatra, Tatra Area ki aali chotiyan (bashamool Tatra Pahadon, Greater Fatra aur Lesser Fatra), Slovak Ore Mountains, Slovak Central Mountains ya Beskids shamil hain. Sabse bada nichla ilaqah junoob maghrib mein zar-khez Danubian Lowland hai, iske baad junoob mashriq mein Eastern Slovak Lowland hai. Janglaat Slovakia ki zameen ki satah ka 41% par muheet hai.
Jamhuria Slovenia, wasti Europe ka ek mulk hai. Iski sarhad maghrib mein Italy, shimal mein Austria, Hungary se shimal mashriq mein, Croatia se junoob mashriq mein aur junoob maghrib mein Adriatic Samandar se milti hai. Slovenia ka zyada tar pahadi aur jangli wala ilaqah, 20,271 murabba kilometer (7,827 murabba meel) par muheet hai aur iski majmooi aabadi 2.1 million hai.
Slovenia tareekhi taur par Slavic, German aur Roman languages aur cultures ke sangam raha hai. Tareekhi taur par, jadeed daur Slovenia ka ilaqah mutaddid mukhtalif riyasaton ka hissa raha hai. Roman Saltanat, Byzantine Saltanat, Carolingian Saltanat, Muqaddas Roman Saltanat, Hungary ki Badshahat, Jamhuria Venice, Illyrian Provinces, Austria ki Saltanat aur Austria-Hungary. October 1918 mein, Slovenians ne Riyasat Slovenians, Croats aur Serbs ki mushtarika bunyad rakhi. December 1918 mein, woh Serbia ki Badshahat ke saath Yugoslavia ki Badshahat mein zam ho gaye. Doosri Jang-e-Azeem ke dauran, Germany, Italy aur Hungary ne Slovenia par qabza kar liya aur iska qabza kar liya, iska ek chota sa ilaqah us waqt Nazi kathputli riyasat Croatia mein muntaqil ho gaya tha. 1945 mein, yeh Yugoslavia ka baani rukun ban gaya. Jang ke baad, Yugoslavia ka aaghaz ibtedai taur par Eastern Block se tha, lekin 1948 ke Tito-Stalin ki taqseem ke baad, usne kabhi Warsaw Pact ki rukniyat ikhtiyar nahi ki aur 1961 mein, yeh ghair janibdar tehreek ke baaniyon mein shamil ho gaya. June 1991 mein, Slovenia pehli jamhuria ban gayi jo Yugoslavia se alag ho gayi aur ek khud mukhtar khud mukhtar riyasat ban gayi.
Slovenia ek taraqqi yafta mulk hai, jiski aali aamdani maeeshat hai. Human Development Index mein bahut aali darja bandi hai. Yeh European Union, Eurozone, Schengen Area, OSCE, Council of Europe aur NATO samet mukhtalif bain-ul-aqwami tanzeemon ka rukun hai.
Slovenia wasti aur junoob mashriqi Europe mein waqay hai Alps ko choote hue aur Bahar-e-Rum ke saath mulhiq hai. Yeh arz-ul-balad 45° aur 47° N aur arz-ul-balad 13° aur 17° E ke darmiyan hai. 15th Meridian East taqriban isi simt mein maghrib – mashriq ki simt mein mulk ki darmiyane lakeer ke musawi hai. Jamhuria Slovenia ka geometric center coordinates 46°07'11.8N aur 14°48'55.2E par waqay hai.
Yeh Litija ki Municipality mein Slivna mein waqay hai. Slovenia ki buland tareen choti Triglav (2,864 meter ya 9,396 foot) hai; mulk ki satah samandar se bulandi ki ausat oonchai 557 meter (1,827 foot) hai.
Somalia, sarkari taur par (Federal Jamhuria Somalia), Qarn-e-Africa ka ek mulk hai. Somalia ek Muslim aksariyat wala mulk hai. Naam ka matlab doodh se bhara hua piyala hai. Somalia ke shimal maghrib mein Djibouti, junoob maghrib mein Kenya, shimal mein Khaleej-e-Aden aur Yemen, mashriq mein Bahar-e-Hind aur maghrib mein Ethiopia waqay hain. Somalia ke paas Africa ki zameen par sabse lambi sahili patti hai. Yeh khatta bunyadi taur par satah murtafa, maidani ilaqon aur pahadi ilaqon par mushtamil hai. Garam halat, saal bhar waqfe waqfe se monsoon hawaon aur be qaidah barishon ke saath ghalib rehte hain. Somalia ki aabadi takhmina lag ek crore ikhattar lakh hai. Dar-ul-hukumat Mogadishu hai. Hargeisa doosra bada shahar hai. Use Africa ka sabse zyada saqafati taur par yaksaan mulk qarar diya gaya hai. Iske taqriban 85 feesad bashinde nasli Somali hain, jo tareekhi taur par mulk ke shimal mein aabad hain. Nasli aqliyat zyada tar junoob mein markooz hain. Somalia ki sarkari zabanen Somali aur Arabi hain. Mulk mein zyada tar log Musalman hain aur baqi aqliyat Isaion wagaira par mushtamil hai.
Somalia mumkinah taur par apne maqam ki wajah se ibtedai insano ke zariye aabad hone wali pehli zameenon mein se ek tha. Shikar jama karne wale jo baad mein Africa hijrat kar gaye the mumkinah taur par apni hijrat se pehle yahan aabad the. Patthar ke zamane mein yahan Doian aur Hargeisan saqafaten parwan chadhin. Qarn-e-Africa mein tadfeen ke riwaj ka sabse purana saboot Somalia ke qabrastanon se milta hai jo char hazar saal qabl maseeh ka hai. Shimal mein Jalilo site se milne wale patthar ke auzaron ko bhi sanah 1909 mein mashriq aur maghrib ke darmiyan Paleolithic ke daur ke asaar-e-qadeema ki aalameyat ka muzahira karne wale ahem namune ke taur par numayan kiya gaya.
Somalia ki sarhad maghrib mein Ethiopia, shimal mein Khaleej-e-Aden, mashriq mein Bahar-e-Somali aur Guardafui Channel aur junoob maghrib mein Kenya se milti hai. 637,657 murabba kilometer ke raqbe ke saath, Somalia ka khatta bunyadi taur par satah murtafa, maidani aur pahadi ilaqon par mushtamil hai. Iski sahili patti ki lambai 3,333 kilometer se zyada hai, jo Mainland Africa ki sabse lambi sahili patti hai. Use jhuke hue number 7 ke taur par bayan kiya gaya hai. Shimal mein, Ogo Pahadon ke nahamwar mashriq-maghribi silsile Khaleej-e-Aden ke sahil se mukhtalif fasle par waqay hain. Waqfe waqfe se monsoon hawaon aur be qaidah barishon ke saath garam mausam halat saal bhar ghalib rehte hain.
Arziyat qeemti madni zakhair ki maujoodgi ka pata deti hai. Somalia Seychelles se Somali samandar ke zariye alag hai aur Guardafui Channel ke zariye Socotra se alag hai.
Somalia ek parliamentary numainda jamhoori jamhuria hai. Somalia ka sadr, mamlakat ka sarbarah aur Somali armed forces ka commander-in-chief hota hai aur hukumat ke sarbarah ke taur par kaam karne ke liye ek wazeer-e-azam ka intikhab karta hai. Somalia ki Federal Parliament Somalia ki Qaumi Parliament hai. Do ewanon wali qaumi muqannina House of the People (Ewan-e-Zereen) aur Senate (Ewan-e-Bala) par mushtamil hoti hai, jin ke arkan char saal ki muddat ke liye muntakhab hote hain. Parliament sadr, parliament ke speaker aur deputy speaker ka intikhab karti hai. Use qawanin ko paas karne aur veto karne ka ikhtiyar bhi hasil hai. Somalia ki adliya ki tareef Federal Jamhuria Somalia ke aarzi aain ke zariye ki gayi hai jo 1 August 2012 ko Mogadishu mein ek qaumi aaini assembly ki taraf se apnaya gaya, yeh dastavez mahireen ki ek committee ne tayyar ki thi jiski sarbarahi attorney aur Federal Parliament ke speaker Mohammad Usman Jawari kar rahe the. Yeh Federal Jamhuria ke wajood ki qanooni bunyad aur qanooni ikhtiyar ka zaraiya faraham karta hai.
Qaumi adalat ka dhancha teen darjon mein munazzam hai Aaini Adalat, Federal Hukumat ki satah ki adalaten aur Riyasati satah ki adalaten. Ek nau rukni Judicial Service Commission adliya ke kisi bhi Federal darje ke rukun ka taqarrur karta hai. Yeh Aaini Adalat ke mumkinah judges ka intikhab bhi karta hai aur manzoori ke liye Federal Parliament ke ewan mein pesh karta hai. Agar taufeeq ho jaye to sadr ummeedwar ko Aaini Adalat ka judge muqarrar karta hai. Paanch rukni Aaini Adalat mukhtalif Federal aur ziil-qaumi muamlaat ke ilawa aain se mutalliq umoor ka faisla karti hai. Somali qanoon teen mukhtalif nizam ke murakkab se akhaz kiya gaya hai Civil Law, Islami Law aur Rawaji Law. Sanah 1991 mein Somalia ki tabahi ke baad, Somaliland ki hukumat, jisne khud ko Somalia ka ek mulk aur hukumat qarar diya hai, ke darmiyan koi taalluqat ya koi rabta nahi hai.
CIA aur Somalia ke Central Bank ke mutabiq, shahri be-amni ka samna karne ke bawajood, Somalia ne ek sehatmand ghair rasmi maeeshat ko barqarar rakha hai, jiski bunyad bunyadi taur par maweshiyon, tarsilaat zar ki companies aur telecommunication par hai. Rasmi sarkari adad-o-shumar ki kami aur haaliya khana janggi ki wajah se, maeeshat ke hajam ya numoo ka andaza lagana mushkil hai. Sanah 1994 ke liye, CIA ne GDP ka takhmina 3.3 billion US dollar lagaya tha. Sanah 2001 mein uska takhmina 4.1 billion US dollar tha. Sanah 2009 tak, CIA ne takhmina lagaya ke GDP badh kar 5.731 billion US dollar ho gayi hai jiski mutawaqqe haqeeqi sharah numoo 2.6 feesad hai. Sanah 2007 ki British Chambers of Commerce ki report ke mutabiq, private sector mein bhi izafa hua, khaas taur par service sector mein. Khana janggi se pehle ke daur ke bar-aks jab zyada tar services aur sanati shobe hukumat ke zer-e-intizam the, tijarati sargarmiyon mein kafi, ghair pemaish ke bawajood, niji sarmayakari hui hai. Iski mali imdad bade paimane par Somali bashindon ne ki hai aur ismein tijarat aur marketing, raqam ki muntaqili ki services, naql-o-hamal, muwasilaat, mahigiri ka saman, airlines, telecommunication, taleem, sehat, tameeraat aur hotel shamil hain. Azad khayal mahir-e-maeeshat Peter Leeson is badhti hui iqtisadi sargarmi ka daro madar Somali riwayati qanoon jise Xeer kaha jata hai se mansoob karte hain, jiske bare mein woh kehte hain ke karobar chalane ke liye ek mustahkam mahol faraham karta hai.
Singapore junoob mashriqi Asia mein ek chota sa mulk hai. Iska raqba 683 murabba kilometer hai aur iski aabadi taqriban 5,703,600 hai. Singapore ke shimal mein Malaysia waqay hai jo iska wahid padosi hai. Singapore ke muqami log teen qismon ke hain, Cheeni, Malay aur Tamil Indian. Iske ilawa Singapore ki 36% aabadi tarkeen-e-watan ki hai, jo ke duniya bhar se aaye hue hain. Singapore mein mukhtalif zabanen boli jati hain jin mein English, Cheeni, Malay aur English shamil hain, taham English taqriban har koi samajh leta hai. Singapore ek taraqqi yafta mulk hai aur yehi wajah hai ke log duniya bhar se iska rukh karte hain.
Eswatini jise Swaziland bhi kaha jata hai junoobi Africa mein waqay ek mulk hai. Is mulk sarhaden junoobi Africa aur Mozambique se milti hain isse koi samandar nahi lagta isliye yeh ek zameen band mulk hai.
Swaziland kabhi Bartania ke zer-e-iqtidar tha. Yahan ki maeeshat cheeni par tiki hai. Iske baad khatte phal, kapas, chawal aur makka paida hoti hai. Yahan ke maqam par maweshi parwari ahem kaam hai. Madniyat ke zakhair bhi hain. Asbestos, koyla aur loha nikalta hai.
Azadi 6 September 1968
Barr-e-Azam Australia ke mashriq mein Bahar-e-Kahil mein waqay hain.
Sudan ya Al-Sudan Bar-e-Azam Africa ka ek Islami mulk hai. Sudan, bazabta taur par Jamhuria Sudan shimal mashriqi Africa mein ek mulk hai. Iski sarhaden junoob maghrib mein Wastii Africi Jamhuria, maghrib mein Chad, shimal mein Misr, shimal mashriq mein Eritrea, junoob mashriq mein Ethiopia, shimal maghrib mein Libya, junoob mein junoobi Sudan aur Bahar-e-Ahmar se milti hain. Iski aabadi 2022 tak char crore satawan lakh afraad par mushtamil hai aur iska raqba 1,886,068 murabba kilometer (728,215 murabba meel) hai. Sanah 2011 mein junoobi Sudan ki alayhdagi tak yeh Africa aur Arab League mein raqbe ke lihaaz se sabse bada mulk tha. Iska dar-ul-hukumat Khartoum hai aur iska sabse zyada aabadi wala shahar Omdurman (Khartoum ke metropolitan ilaqe ka hissa) hai.
1851 ke baad se European aur Usmani saudagaron ne hathi dant ki talash mein balai Nile ke daryai ilaqon mein aamad-o-raft shuru ki unki be lagaam mudakhilat ke, qabaili muashre ki nafarmaani aur ghulamon ki tijarat ki naye ilaqon tak tausee ki surat mein do manfi nataij the. Khedive Ismail (1863-79) hukmaran tha. Bartanwi Governor General, General Gordon 1877 mein tainat hua. 1879 mein Khedive Ismail ko takht se utar diya gaya aur General Gordon ne isteefa de diya. Muhammad Ahmad al-Mahdi naya hukmaran bana. Sir Herbert Kitchener ne jo us waqt Misri fauj ka sarbarah tha Sudan ko phir se fateh karne ka mansooba banaya aur is mansoobe ki qayadat ki usne 1898 mein Dongola sooba par phir se qabza kar liya.
Dobara fateh kiye gaye ilaqon ki haisiyat ka taiyun ek convention ke tehat January 1899 mein kiya gaya jismein Misr aur Bartania shamil the. Iska draft ek Bartanwi agent Lord Cromer ne Bartanwi hukumat ki policy ke ain mutabiq tayyar kiya aur iska bunyadi maqsad Sudan se bain-ul-aqwami idare aur Misri hukumat ke ikhtiyarat ka ikhraj tha. Sudan ko baqaida taur par Misr aur Bartania ki mushtarika hukumat ka matehat ilaqah bana diya gaya. 1910 mein Governor General Council qaim ki gayi. Doosri Jang-e-Azeem ke dauran nayi siyasi pesh raft aur qaum parast ehsasat ke aghaz ka mushahida kiya gaya Ismail al-Azhari Sudani siyast danon mein sabse zyada maqbool aur mazboot ho gaye the. Sudan hukumat ne April 1952 mein ek khud hukoomati aain ka elan kiya January 1954 mein nayi parliament ka ijlas hua jismein National Party ke leader Ismail al-Azhari ko wazeer-e-azam muntakhab kar liya gaya. Fauj, police aur civil service se Bartanwiyon ki wapsi aur Sudani logon ki bharti ka amal tezi se shuru hua. Parliament ne mazeed iqdamaat karke al-Azhari ko is qabil kar diya ke unhon ne 1 January 1956 ko Sudan ko ek azad jamhuria banane ka elan kar diya.
2023 mein, pure mulk bhar mein ladaai aaghaz ho gayi jin mein Sudani Armed Forces aur Tezgām Himayat Afwaj lad rahe hain. Is tanazua ka naam hai Sudan Tanazua 2023.
Sudan shumali Africa mein waqay hai, jiski 853 kilometer (530 meel) sahili patti Bahar-e-Ahmar se milti hai. Iski zameeni sarhaden Misr, Eritrea, Ethiopia, junoobi Sudan, wastii Africi Jamhuria, Chad aur Libya ke saath hain. 1,886,068 murabba kilometer (728,215 murabba meel) ke raqbe ke saath, yeh Bar-e-Azam ka teesra sabse bada mulk hai (Algeria aur Jamhuria Congo ke baad) aur duniya ka pandarhwan sabse bada mulk hai.
Sudan arz-ul-balad °8 aur °23 shimal ke darmiyan waqay hai. Yeh khatta aam taur par hamwaar maidani hai, jo kayi pahadi silsilon se toota hua hai. Maghrib mein, Deriba Caldera (3,042 meter ya 9,980 foot), jo Marrah Pahadon mein waqay hai, Sudan ka sabse ooncha maqam hai. Mashriq mein Bahar-e-Ahmar ki pahadiyan hain.
Neela Nile aur Safed Nile Khartoum mein mil kar Darya-e-Nile banate hain, jo shimal ki taraf Misr se hote hue Bahar-e-Rum mein behta hai. Neele Nile ka rasta Sudan se hota hua taqriban 800 kilometer (497 meel) lamba hai aur use Sennar aur Khartoum ke darmiyan Darya-e-Dinder aur Rahad se milaya jata hai. Sudan ke andar Safed Nile ki koi ahem muawin nadiyaan nahi hain.
Neele aur Safed Nile par kayi dam hain. In mein Neele Nile par Sennar aur Roseries Dam aur Safed Nile par Jebel Aulia Dam hain. Sudani-Misr ki sarhad par Nubia Jheel bhi hai.
Sudan mein bharpoor madni wasail dastiyab hain jin mein asbestos, chromite, cobalt, tanba, sona, granite, gypsum, iron, kaolin, lead, manganese, mica, qudrati gas, nickel, petroleum, chandi, tin, uranium aur zinc shamil hain.
Saint Lucia Caribbean jazair mein ek mulk hai iska dar-ul-hukumat Castries hai.
Sierra Leone Maghribi Africa mein waqay ek mulk hai. Shimal mein Guinea, shimal junoob mein Liberia aur junoob mein Bahar-e-Oqiyanus se ghira hua hai. Sierra Leone ka raqba 71,740 murabba kilometer hai aur aabadi taqriban 6,296,803 hai. Iski sarkari zaban English aur aksariyat mazhab Islam hai.
Syria, ba-zabta taur par Arab Jamhuria Syria maghribi Asia ka ek mulk hai jo mashriqi Bahar-e-Mutawassit aur Sarzamin-e-Sham mein waqay hai. Yeh maghrib mein Bahar-e-Mutawassit, shimal mein Turkiye, mashriq aur junoob mashriq mein Iraq, junoob mein Urdun, aur junoob maghrib mein Israel aur Lubnan se ghira hua hai. Fi al-hal yeh ek uboori hukumat ke tehat hai aur is mein 14 muhafzaat (soobajaat) shamil hain. Damascus dar-ul-hukumat aur sabse bada shahar hai. Iski aabadi 25 million hai aur raqba 185,180 murabba kilometer (71,500 murabba meel) hai, jo use 57wan sabse zyada aabadi wala aur 87wan sabse bada mulk banata hai.
Syria ka naam tareekh mein ek waseeh tar ilaqe ki taraf ishara karta hai, jo aam taur par Sarzamin-e-Sham mein waqay hai aur Arabi zaban mein Al-Sham se maroof hai. Jadeed riyasat qadeem saltanaton aur badshahaton ki mutaddid tareekhi jagahon ko shamil karti hai, jin mein teen hazar qabl maseeh ki Eblai tehzeeb bhi shamil hai. Damascus aur Aleppo saqafati ahmiyat rakhne wale shahar hain. Damascus Umawi Khilafat ka paye takht tha aur Misr ki Mamluk Saltanat ke tehat ek soobai dar-ul-hukumat tha. Jadeed Shami riyasat beesween sadi ke wast mein qaim hui, jis par Usmani raj kayi sadiyon tak raha aur phir baad mein Faransi taahhud ke tehat rahi. Usmani ahad mein Syria mukhtalif sobon mein taqseem tha, aur jab saltanat khatam hui, to in sobon se jadeed Arab riyasaten ban kar ubhreen, in mein sabse badi riyasat Syria thi. Riyasat ne sanah 1945 mein qanooni azadi hasil ki aur pehli Suri Jamhuria ne Aqwaam-e-Muttahida ke baani rukun ke taur par shamilat ikhtiyar ki, jis se Faransi raj qanooni taur par khatam hogaya. France ke fouji April 1946 mein mulk se bahar nikal gaye, jis se qaum ko haqeeqi taur par azadi hasil hui.
Azadi ke baad ka daur ek pur-ashob tha, jis mein sanah 1949 se sanah 1971 tak mutaddid fouji baghawaten huien. Sanah 1958 mein Syria ne Misr ke saath ek mukhtasar ittihad qaim kiya, jo sanah 1961 ki fouji baghawat ke zariye khatam ho gaya. Sanah 1963 ki fouji baghawat mein Ba'ath Party ki askari committee ne yak-jamaat riyasat qaim ki, jis ne Syria ko sanah 1963 se sanah 2011 tak martial law ke tehat chalaya aur shahriyon ke aaini huqooq ko muattal kar diya. Ba'ath Party ke andaruni tanazuaat ke baais sanah 1966 aur sanah 1970 mein mazeed baghawaten huien, jin mein se akhri mein Hafez al-Assad iqtidaar mein aaye. Hafez ke tehat, Syria ek moroosi amirana riyasat ban gayi, jis mein iqtidaar unke khandan ke hathon mein markooz tha. Hafez sanah 2000 mein intiqal kar gaye, aur unke baad unke bete Bashar al-Assad ne iqtidaar sambhala.
Arab Bahaar ke baad sanah 2011 se Syria ek kaseer-ul-jahati khana janggi ka shikar hai, jis mein mukhtalif mumalik ki mudakhilat hui, jis ke natije mein 6 million se zaaid panah guzeen mulk se naql-e-makani kar gaye. Khana janggi mein sanah 2014 aur sanah 2015 mein ISIS ke tezi ke saath ilaqon par qabza ke jawab mein kayi mumalik ne mukhtalif girohon par mushtamil ittihad ki himayat ki, jis se sanah 2017 mein ISIS ki wastii aur mashriqi Syria mein shikast hui. Is ke baad teen siyasi idare – Syria ki uboori hukumat, Syria ki Nijat hukumat, aur Shimal o Mashriqi Syria ki khud mukhtar intizamiya – ne Bashar al-Assad ke iqtidaar ko challenge kiya. Sanah 2024 ke akhir mein muzahmatkaron ke ittihad ki janib se ek silsilawar hamlon ke natije mein Damascus par qabza aur Bashar al-Assad ki hukumat ka khatma hogaya.
Syria zarkhez maidano, buland pahadon aur sehraon ka hamil mulk hai aur yahan mukhtalif nasli aur mazhabi giroh baste hain. Arab sabse bada nasli giroh aur Ahl-e-Sunnat sabse bada mazhabi giroh hain. Damascus ki muzahmatkaron ke hathon fateh hone se qabl Syria wahid mulk tha jo Baathiyon ke zer-e-intizam tha. Yeh Baathi hukumat hama geer amirana riyasat thi jiski tawajjuh Assad khandan ki shakhsiyat parasti par mahsoor thi, aur ise shadeed dakhili jabr-o-tashaddud aur janggi jaraim ki wajah se wasee paimane par mazammat ka samna tha. Bashar al-Assad ki hukumat ka takhta ulatne se qabl Syria 2024 ke Fragile States Index mein chauthe badtareen mulk ke taur par darj tha, aur yeh duniya ke sabse khatarnak maqamat mein se ek tha jahan sahnafiyon ki azadi shadeed mahdood thi. Sanah 2024 ke World Press Freedom Index mein iski doosre bad tareen mulk ke taur par darja bandi ki gayi thi. Yeh Mashriq-e-Wasta aur Shumali Africa ka sabse bad unwan mulk tha aur sanah 2023 ke Corruption Perception Index mein aalmi satah par iski doosre bad tareen mulk ke taur par darja bandi ki gayi thi. Syria ne Bashar al-Assad ki kafalat mein Captagon san’at ka markaz ban kar aalmi satah par arbaon dollar maliyat ki ghair qanooni manshiyat ki baramad ki, jis se yeh duniya ki sabse badi necro riyasat ban gayi.
2025 ke awail mein, khana janggi ne Syria ki maeeshat ko ek abtar halat mein la kar chhod diya hai, jo ke bahut si bain-ul-aqwami pabandiyon ki wajah se mazeed badh gayi hai.
Zarkhez maidanon, buland pahadon aur sehraon ka mulk, Syria mutanawwi nasli aur mazhabi girohon ka ghar hai. Arab sabse bada nasli giroh hain, aur Sunni Musalman sabse bada mazhabi giroh hain.
