Kayi zaray se pata chalta hai ke Syria ka naam aathvin sadi qabl maseeh ki Luwian istilah Surai aur mushtaq qadeem yunani (Greek) naam se maakhuz hai, yeh dono hi asal mein shumali Bain-ul-Nahrain (maujooda Iraq) mein Assur (Assyria) se maakhuz hain. Taham Seleucid Saltanat (323–150 qabl maseeh) se, is istilah ka itlaq Sarzamin-e-Sham par bhi kiya gaya, aur is maqam se yunani (Greeks) ne Bain-ul-Nahrain ke Ashuriyon aur Sarzamin-e-Sham ke Aramiyon ke darmiyan farq kiye baghair is istilah ka itlaq kiya. Markazi dhare mein shamil jadeed ilmi ray is daleel ki sakhti se himayat karti hai ke yunani (Greek) lafz ka taalluq Assyria se hai, jo bil-akhir Akkadi zaban Assur se maakhuz hai. Aisa lagta hai ke yunani (Greek) naam Phoenician zaban se milta hai, jo aathvin sadi qabl maseeh ke Çineköy inscription mein darj hai.
Lafz ke zariye naamzad kardah ilaqah waqt ke saath badal gaya hai. Classical taur par, Syria Bahar-e-Rum ke mashriqi sire par waqay hai, junoob mein Arab aur shimal mein Asia-e-Kuchak ke darmiyan, Iraq ke kuch hisson ko shamil karne ke liye andarun mulk phaila hua hai, aur shimal mashriq tak ek ghair yaqeeni sarhad hai jise Pliny bayan karta hai, bashamool maghrib se. Mashriq mein, Commagene, Sophene, aur Adiabene waqay hain.
Plinyos ke waqt tak, yeh bada Syria Roman Saltanat ke tehat mutaddid sobon mein taqseem ho chuka tha (lekin siyasi taur par ek doosre se azad) Judaea, baad mein 135 Esawi mein Palaestina ke naam par tabdeel kar diya gaya (jadeed daur ke Israel se mutamaasil khatta, Falastini ilaqe, aur Urdun) intehai junoob maghrib mein; jadeed Lubnan, Damascus aur Homs ke ilaqon se mutamaasil Phoenice (194 Esawi mein qaim kiya gaya); Coele Syria (ya khokhli Syria) aur Nahr al-Kabir ke junoob mein hai.
Sarzamin-e-Sham ya Sham Mashriq-e-Wasta ke ek bade ilaqe ke liye istemal hone wali ek ghair wazeh tareekhi istilah hai. Yeh ilaqah maghrib mein Bahar-e-Rum, mashriq mein Sehra-e-Arab ke shumali hisson aur balai Bain-ul-Nahrain aur shimal mein Koh-e-Taurus ke darmiyan waqay hai. Sham mein Koh-e-Qafqaz, Jazira Numa Arab ya Anatolia ka koi hissa shamil nahi samjha jata.
Syria (ilaqa) jadeed adab mein ise Syria-Palestine ya Sarzamin-e-Sham bhi kaha jata Bahar-e-Rum ke mashriq mein waqay ek ilaqah hai. Naam Syria ki sabse purani taufeeq aathvin sadi qabl maseeh ki Phoenician naqsh kariyoon se hoti hai.
Syria ilaqah jis mein maujooda daur mein Israel, Urdun, Lubnan, Syria, Falastini ilaqajat, wastii Darya-e-Furat ke junoob maghrib mein Turkiye ka zyada tar hissa shamil hai.
Bilad al-Sham Sarzamin-e-Sham mein Khilafat Rashida, Khilafat Umayyad aur Khilafat Abbasiya ke tehat ek soobah tha. Use Byzantine Saltanat se Jang-e-Yarmouk ke faisla kun marike ke baad hasil kiya gaya tha.
Khilafat Umayyad ke daur mein Bilad al-Sham mein Jund Qinnasrin, Jund Hims, Jund Dimashq, Jund Urdun aur Jund Filistin ke ilaqajat shamil the.
Maujooda mulk Arab Jamhuria Syria go ke Sarzamin-e-Sham ke ilaqe mein waqay hai lekin use Sham kehna bilkul ghalat hai kyunki yeh naam kabhi mulk ka rasmi naam nahi raha. Yeh isi tarah hai ke tareekhi Hindustan ki sarzamin par ab mukhtalif mumalik wajood mein aa chuke hain jaise Pakistan, Bharat aur Bangladesh jo unke rasmi naam hain. Jis tarah Pakistan ko Hindustan nahi kaha ja sakta isi tarah Syria ko Sham nahi kaha ja sakta.
Taqriban 10,000 qabl maseeh ke baad se, Syria ilaqah naye sangi daur ki saqafat ke markazon mein se ek tha (jise qabl mitti ke bartan naya sangi daur A kaha jata hai), jahan zara'at aur maweshiyon ki afzaish sabse pehle zahir hona shuru hui.
Naye sangi daur ki numaindagi Mureybet saqafat ke mustateel makanat se hoti hai.
Mitti ke bartanon se pehle ke naye sangi daur ke zamane mein, log patthar, gypsum aur jale hue chune (vaisselle blanche) se bane bartan istemal karte the.
Anatolia se obsidian auzaar ki daryaft ibtedai tijarat ka saboot hai.
Hamoukar aur Ebla ke qadeem shahron ne Neo-lithic aur Bronze ke daur mein ek ahem kirdar ada kiya. Mahireen asaar-e-qadeema ne sabit kiya hai ke Syria ki tehzeeb zameen par qadeem tareen tehzeebon mein se ek thi, shayad isse pehle sirf Bain-ul-Nahrain ki tehzeeb thi.
Is khatte mein qadeem tareen muqami tehzeeb maujooda daur ke Idlib, shumali Syria ke qareeb Ebla ki mamlakat thi. Aisa lagta hai ke Ebla ki bunyad taqriban 3500 qabl maseeh mein rakhi gayi thi, aur aahista aahista Bain-ul-Nahrain riyasaton Sumeri ke saath tijarat ke zariye apni khush qismati banayi. Assyria, aur Akkadi ke saath saath Anatolia mein shimal maghrib mein Hurrian aur Hittite log is mein shamil rahe.
Firaun ke tohfe, khudai ke dauran mile, qadeem Misr ke saath Ebla ke raabte ki tasdeeq karte hain.
Syria ki ibtedai tehreeron 2300 qabl maseeh mein se ek Ebla ke wazeer Ibrium aur Ebarsal C nami ek mubham saltanat ke darmiyan tijarati moahida hai. Scholars ka khayal hai ke Eblai zaban ki Akkadi zaban ke baad sabse qadeem maroof tehreeri Sami zabanon mein se hai.
Eblai zaban ki haaliya darja bandi se pata chalta hai ke yeh ek mashriqi Sami zaban thi, jiska Akkadi zaban se gahra taalluq tha.
Ebla Mari ke saath ek taweel jang se kamzor ho gaya tha, aur sara Syria Akkad ke Sargon aur uske pote Naram-Sin ke baad Bain-ul-Nahrain Saltanat Akkad ka hissa ban gaya tha, Syria ki futuhat ne teesvin sadi qabl maseeh ke pehle nisf mein Syria par Eblaian ke tasallut ka khatma kiya.
Ikisvi sadi qabl maseeh tak Hurrians ne Syria ke shumali mashriqi hisson ko aabad kiya jabke baqi ilaqe par Amorites ka ghalba tha.
Syria ko unke Ashuri-Babli padosiyon ki taraf se Amorites ki sarzamin kaha jata tha.
Amorites ki shimal maghribi Sami zabanen Canaanite zabanon mein sabse qadeem tasdeeq shudah zaban hain. Mari is arse ke dauran dobara numayan hui, aur Babylon ke Hammurabi ke fateh hone tak usne nayi khushhali dekhi. Ugarit bhi us waqt ke dauran paida hua, taqriban 1800 qabl maseeh, jadeed Latakia ke qareeb. Ugariti zaban ek Sami zaban thi jo Canaanite zabanon se dheele taur par mutalliq thi, aur usne Ugariti huroof-e-tehaji tayyar kiye, jise duniya ka qadeem tareen huroof-e-tehaji samjha jata hai.
Ugarit mamlakat barahween sadi qabl maseeh mein Indo-European samandari logon ke hathon apni tabahi tak us waqt tak zinda rahi jis ko Late Bronze Age ke khatme ke naam se jana jata tha jisne isi tarah ke samandari logon ke hathon shahron aur riyasaton ko isi tabahi ka mushahida karte dekha.
Aleppo aur dar-ul-hukumat Damascus duniya ke sabse qadeem musalsal aabad shahron mein se hain.
Yamhad (jadeed Aleppo) ne do sadiyon tak shumali Syria par ghalba hasil kiya, halanke mashriqi Syria par unnisvin sadi qabl maseeh aur atharhvin sadi qabl maseeh mein purani Ashuri Saltanat ne qabza kar liya tha jis par Shamshi-Adad I ke Amori khandan ki hukumat thi. Saltanat Babylon jiski bunyad Amoriyon ne rakhi thi.
Mari ki takhtiyon mein Yamhad ko Mashriq-e-Wasta ki sabse taqatwar riyasat ke taur par bayan kiya gaya hai aur uske paas Babylon ke Hammurabi se zyada jageer hai.
Yamhad ne Alalakh, Qatna, Hurrian riyasaton aur Wadi Furat par Babylon ki sarhadon tak apna ikhtiyar musallat kiya.
Yamhad ki fauj ne Elam (jadeed Iran) ki sarhad par der tak muhim chalai.
1600 qabl maseeh ke qareeb Asia-e-Kuchak (Anatolia) se Indo-European Hittite Saltanat ne Yamhad ko Ebla ke saath fateh kiya aur tabah kar diya. Is waqt se, Syria mukhtalif ghair mulki saltanaton ke liye maidan-e-jang ban gaya, yeh Hittite Saltanat, Mitanni Saltanat, Jadeed Mamlakat Misr, Mashriq-e-Ashuri Saltanat, aur kuch had tak Saltanat Babylon. Misriyon ne ibtedaan junoob ke zyada tar hisse par qabza kar liya tha, jab ke Hittites aur Mitanni ne shimal ke zyada hisse par qabza kar liya tha.
Taham, Ashur ne bil-akhir baladasti hasil kar li, jisne Mitanni Saltanat ko tabah kar diya aur isse pehle Hittites aur Babylon ke zer-e-qabza ilaqe ke bahut bade hisse par qabza kar liya.
Chaudahvin sadi qabl maseeh ke aas paas, is ilaqe mein mukhtalif Sami log numayan hue, jaise neem khanabadosh Suhitian jo mashriq mein Saltanat Babylon ke saath ek nakam tanazua mein aaye, aur maghribi Sami zabanen bolne wale Arami jinnhon ne pehle Amoriyon ko apnaya.
Woh bhi sadiyon tak Ashur aur Hittites ke zer-e-tasallut rahe.
Misriyon ne maghribi Syria par control ke liye Hittiyon se jang ki. Yeh ladaai 1274 qabl maseeh mein Marika Qadesh ke saath apne urooj par pahunchi.
Maghrib iski tabahi tak Hittite Saltanat ka hissa raha. 1200 qabl maseeh, jabke mashriqi Syria badi had tak mashriqi Ashuri Saltanat ka hissa ban gaya, jisne Tiglath-Pileser I (1114-1076 qabl maseeh) ke daur mein maghrib ke zyada tar hisse par bhi qabza kar liya.
Gyaraheen sadi qabl maseeh ke akhri mein Hittiyon ki tabahi aur Ashur ke zawal ke saath, Arami qabail ne andarun ke beshtar hisse par control hasil kar liya, baani riyasaten jaise ke Mamlakat Bit-Bakhiani, Aram-Damascus, Hamath, Aram-Rehob, Aram-Nahrain aur Luhuti theen. Is maqam se yeh khatta Aram ya Aramia ke naam se jana jane laga.
Sami Aramiyon aur Indo-European Hittite Saltanat ki baqiyat ke darmiyan ek tarkib bhi thi, jis mein shumali wastii Aram (Syria) aur junoobi wastii Asia-e-Kuchak (jadeed Turkiye) mein mutaddid Syro-Hittite riyasaton ki bunyad rakhi gayi, bashamool Palistin, Carchemish aur Sam'al.
Canaanite zabanon giroh jise Phoenician zaban ke naam se jana jata hai, terahvin sadi qabl maseeh se Syria ke sahilon (Lubnan aur shumali Palestine) par ghalba hasil karne ke liye aaya, jisne Ugarit, Kizil, Arwad, Paltus, Ramytha aur Sukas jaisi shahar riyasaten qaim keen.
In sahili ilaqon se, unhon ne bil-akhir Bahar-e-Rum mein apna asar-o-rasookh phaila diya, bashamool Malta, Sicily, Jazira Numa Iberia (jadeed Spain aur Portugal) mein coloniyan banana, aur shumali Africa ke sahilon aur sabse numayan taur par, nauvin sadi qabl maseeh mein Carthage (jadeed Tunisia mein) ki badi shahar riyasat ki bunyad rakhi, jo bahut baad mein ek badi saltanat ka markaz ban gayi, aur phir Roman Jamhuria ka muqabla karna.
Syria aur Mashriq-e-Qareeb ka maghribi nisf hissa phir wasee jadeed Ashuri Saltanat (911 qabl maseeh - 605 qabl maseeh) ke tehat aa gaya.
Ashuriyon ne apni saltanat mein zaban-e-rabta-e-aamma ke taur par Shahi Arami zaban ko mutaarif karaya.
Satveen aur aathvin sadi Esawi mein Arab Islami fateh ke baad tak yeh zaban Syria aur pure Mashriq-e-Qareeb mein ghalib rahi aur Masihiyat ke phailne ka ek zaraiya bani thi.
Ashuriyon ne Syria aur Lubnan ki apni coloniyon ka naam Eber-Nari rakha.
Ashuri tasallut ka khatma us waqt hua jab Ashuriyon ne wahshiana dakhili khana jangiyon ke ek silsile mein khud ko bahut kamzor kiya, jis ke baad Medes, Babylon ke bashinde, Chaldea, Farsi, Scythian aur Cimmerian ka ghalba hona shuru hua.
Ashur ke zawal ke dauran, Scythianon ne Syria ke zyada tar hisse ko tabah aur loot liya.
Ashuri fauj ka akhri markaz 605 qabl maseeh mein shumali Syria mein Carchemish mein tha. Ashuri Saltanat ke baad jadeed Babli Saltanat (605 qabl maseeh - 539 qabl maseeh) ke baad aayi.
Is arse ke dauran, Syria Babylon aur ek aur sabiqah Ashuri colony, Misr ke darmiyan maidan-e-jang ban gaya. Babyloniyon ne, apne Ashuri taalluqat ki tarah, Misr par fateh hasil ki thi.
Woh sarzamin jo jadeed daur ke Syria ki tashkeel karti hai, nau jadeed Babli Saltanat ka hissa thi aur 539 qabl maseeh mein Achaemenid Saltanat ne unka ilhaq kar liya tha.
Cyrus-e-Azam ki qayadat mein, Achaemenid Farsi ne apni saltanat ki ek diplomati zaban ke taur par Shahi Arami zaban ko barqarar rakha (539 qabl maseeh - 330 qabl maseeh), aur saath hi nayi hukumat ke liye Eber-Nari Ashuri naam diya.
Syria ko baad mein Maqdoni Saltanat ne fateh kiya jis par Sikandar-e-Azam 330 qabl maseeh se hukmaran tha,
aur iske natije mein Seleucid Saltanat (323 qabl maseeh - 64 qabl maseeh) ka Khokhli Syria soobah ban gaya, jis mein Seleucid badshahon ne khud ko Syria ka badshah kaha aur 240 Esawi mein shahar Antioch iska dar-ul-hukumat ban gaya. Isi tarah yunani (Greeks) ne hi is khatte ko Syria ka naam diya tha.
Asal mein shumali Bain-ul-Nahrain (Iraq) mein Assyria ki ek Indo-European bad-unwani thi, yunani (Greeks) ne is istilah ko na sirf khud Assyria balkay maghrib ki zameeno ko bhi bayan karne ke liye istemal kiya jo sadiyon se Ashuri tasallut mein theen. Is tarah یونان-romi (Greco-Roman) duniya mein Syria ke Arami aur mashriq mein Bain-ul-Nahrain (jadeed Iraq) ke Ashuriyon ko Suri ya Suriai kaha jata tha. Yeh apne aap mein alag alag log hone ke bawajood ek uljhan jo jadeed duniya mein jari rahe.
Aakhirkar junoobi Seleucid Saltanat Syria ke kuch hisson ko Yahudi Hasmonean Saltanat ne asr Hellenistic tak saltanat ke aahista aahista tootne par le liya.
Syria mukhtasar taur par 83 qabl maseeh se Armeni control mein aaya, Armeni badshah Tigranes the Great ki futuhat ke saath, jise Suri awam ne Seleucid Saltanat aur Romiyon se nijat dahinda ke taur par khush amad kaha.
Taham Roman Saltanat ke ek general Pompey the Great ne Syria ka safar kiya aur uske dar-ul-hukumat Antioch par qabza kar liya aur 64 qabl maseeh mein Syria ko Roman soobe mein tabdeel kar diya, is tarah Armeni ilaqe ka control khatam ho gaya jo kayi dahaiyon se jari tha.
Syria Roman hukmarani ke tehat khush hal hua, jo hikmat amali ke lihaaz se Shahrah Resham par waqay hai, jisne use bahut zyada daulat aur ahmiyat di, aur use hareif Romiyon aur Farsiyon ke liye maidan-e-jang bana diya.
Palmyra (Palmyra), ek ameer aur baaz auqat taqatwar muqami Arami zaban bolne wali mamlakat doosri sadi mein shumali Syria mein paida hui. Palmyra ne ek tijarati network qaim kiya jisne is shahar ko Roman Saltanat mein sabse ameer tareen bana diya. Bil-akhir, teesri sadi Esawi ke akhir mein, Palmyrene badshah Odaenathus ne Persia ke Shehanshah Shapur I ko shikast di aur pure Roman Mashriq ko apne control mein le liya jabke uske janasheen aur bewah Zenobia ne Palmyrene Saltanat (Saltanat Tadmur) qaim ki, jisne mukhtasar taur par Misr, Syria, Palestine, Asia-e-Kuchak ke zyada tar hisse, Judaea aur Lubnan ko fateh kiya, isse pehle ke akhir kar 273 Esawi mein Roman control mein laya gaya.
Shumali Bain-ul-Nahrain mein Adiabene mein jadeed Ashuri Saltanat ne 10 Esawi aur 117 Esawi ke darmiyan shimal mashriqi Syria ke ilaqon ko Rome ke fateh karne se pehle apne control mein rakha tha.
Arami zaban qadeem Bartania mein Hadrian ki deewar tak bahut door paayi gayi hai, jis mein qila Arabia ke maqam par ek Palmyrene hijrat karne wale ne likha tha.
Syria ka control Roman Saltanat mein taqseem ke saath, bil-akhir Romiyon se Byzantines ke paas chala gaya.
Byzantine Saltanat ke urooj ke zamane mein Syria ki zyada tar Arami zaban bolne wali aabadi ghaliban unnisvin sadi tak dobara nahi badhi thi. Satveen sadi Esawi mein Arab Islami fateh se pehle, aabadi ka bada hissa Arami tha, lekin Syria yunani (Greek) qaum aur qadeem Roman hukmaran tabqon, Ashuri qaum ka ghar bhi tha. Ab bhi shimal mashriq mein aabad the, Phoenician sahilon ke saath, aur Yahudi aur Armeni baradariyan bhi bade shahron mein maujood theen, jin mein Nabataeans qabl az Islam Arab qaum theen. Jaise ke junoobi Syria ke sehraon mein muqeem Lakhmidon (Banu Lakhm) aur Ghassanids aabad the.
Syriani Masihiyat ne bade mazhab ke taur par apni giraft mein le liya tha, halanke doosre log ab bhi Yahudiyat, Mithraism, Manichaeism, یونان-romi (Greco-Roman) mazhab, Canaanite mazhab aur qadeem Bain-ul-Nahraini mazhab ki pairwi karte the.
Syria ki badi aur khush hal aabadi ne Syria ko Roman aur Byzantine sobon mein se ek ahem tareen bana diya, khaas taur par doosri aur teesri sadi (Esawi) ke dauran.
Severan shahi silsila ke dauran Suriyon ke paas kafi taqat thi.
Khandan ki maa aur Rome ki malika ba-taur Shehanshah Septimius Severus ki biwi Julia Domna thi, jo Emesa (maujooda daur ke Homs) shahar se taalluq rakhne wali Suri khatoon thi. Jin ke khandan ko devta Elagabal ke pujari ke moroosi huqooq hasil the. Uske bade bhatije, Syria se taalluq rakhne wale Arab bhi, Roman Shehanshah bane, jin mein pehla Elagabalus aur doosra uska cousin Severus Alexander tha.
Roman Shehanshah Philip the Arab jo ek Suri tha, woh Roman Arabia mein paida hua tha. Woh 244 Esawi se 249 Esawi tak Shehanshah tha, aur teesri sadi ke bohran ke dauran mukhtasar taur par hukumat ki.
Apne daur hukumat ke dauran, usne apne aabai shahar Philippopolis (jadeed daur ka Shahba) par tawajjuh markooz ki aur shahar ko behtar banane ke liye bahut se tameerati mansoobe shuru kiye, jin mein se zyada tar uski maut ke baad rok diye gaye.
Syria tareekh Masihiyat mein ahem hai; Tarsus ka Saul, jise Hawari Paul ke naam se jana jata hai, Damascus ki sadak par tabdeel hua aur qadeem Syria mein Antioch mein Masihi kalisiya mein ek ahem shakhsiyat ke taur par ubhra, jahan se woh apne bahut se missionary safaron par gaya.
Muhammad bin Abdullah ka Syria ke logon aur qabail ke saath pehla ta'amul July 626 Esawi mein Ghazwa Dumat al-Jandal par hamle ke dauran tha jahan usne apne pairukaron ko Dumat al-Jandal par hamla karne ka hukum diya, kyunki Muhammad ko khufiya ittila mili ke wahan ke kuch qabail shahrah par daketi mein mulawwis hain aur Madina Munawwarah hi par hamla karne ki tayyari kar rahe hain.
William Montgomery Watt ka dawa hai ke yeh sabse ahem muhim thi jiska Muhammad ne us waqt hukum diya tha, halanke uske ibtedai zaray mein bahut kam notice mosool hue the. Dumat al-Jandal Madina se 800 kilometer (500 meel) ke fasle par tha, aur Watt ka kehna hai ke Muhammad ke liye fauri taur par koi khatra nahi tha, is imkan ke ilawa ke unke Syria se rabte aur Madina ko rasad mein khalal padhe.
Watt ka kehna hai ke yeh qiyas karna purkashish hai ke Muhammad pehle hi kisi aisi tausee ka tasawwur kar rahe the jo unki maut ke baad hua, aur yeh ke unki faujon ke tez raftar march ne un sab logon ko mutasir kiya hoga jinhon ne iske bare mein suna. William Muir ka yeh bhi khayal hai ke yeh muhim ahem thi kyunki Muhammad ke baad 1000 aadmi Syria ki hudood mein pahunch gaye, jahan door daraz ke qabail ne ab uska naam seekh liya tha, jabke Muhammad ka siyasi ufaq phaila hua tha.
640 Esawi tak, Sarzamin-e-Sham ko Arab Khilafat-e-Rashida ki fauj ne Khalid ibn al-Walid ki qayadat mein fateh kiya.
Satveen sadi ke wast mein, Umayyad khandan, us waqt riyasat ke hukmaranon ne dar-ul-khilafa Damascus mein rakha.
Baad mein Umayyad daur hukumat mein mulk ki taqat mein kami aayi. Iski buniyadi wajah mutlaq-ul-ananiyat, bad-unwani aur iske natije mein aane wale inqilabat the.
Iske baad 750 Esawi mein Banu Abbas ne Umayyad khandan ka takhta ulat diya, jisne riyasat ka dar-ul-hukumat Baghdad muntaqil kiya, Arabi zaban – Umayyad daur hukumat mein sarkari zaban banaya gaya. Aur woh Byzantine daur ki yunani (Greek) zaban aur Arami zaban ki jagah lekar ghalib zaban ban gayi.
887 Esawi mein Misr mein muqeem Tulun Shahi Silsila ne Syria ko Abbasidon se jod liya, aur baad mein iski jagah Misr mein muqeem Ikhshid Shahi Silsila aur phir bhi baad mein Hamdani Shahi Silsila ne le li. Aleppo mein Saif al-Dawlah Hamdani ke zariye hukumat qaim ki gayi.
Salibi Jangon ke dauran 1098 Esawi aur 1189 Esawi ke darmiyan Syria ilaqah ke hisson par Faransi, Angrez, Itali aur German hukmaranon ke qabze mein the aur woh ijtemai taur par Salibi Riyasaton ke naam se jaane jate the jin mein sabse badi Syria mein Imarat Antioch ki riyasat thi.
Sahili pahadi ilaqe par juzwi taur par Nizari Ismailion, nam nehad Hashashin ne bhi qabza kar liya tha, jinki Salibi Riyasaton ke saath waqfe waqfe se tasadum aur jang bandi hoti thi. Baad mein tareekh mein jab Nizarion ko naye sire se Frankish dushmaniyon ka samna karna pada, to unhen Ayyubiyon se barwaqt madad mili. Seljuq ki ek sadi ki hukmarani ke baad, Syria ko badi had tak Kurd azad karne wale Salahuddin Ayyubi ne fateh kiya, jo Misr ke Ayyubi khandan ke baani the. Aleppo January 1260 mein Mongol Hulagu Khan ke qabze mein gaya, aur March mein Damascus, lekin phir Hulagu Khan ko janasheen ke tanazua se nipatne ke liye China wapas jane ke liye apna hamla khatam karne par majboor kiya gaya.
Chand mahine baad, Saltanat Mamluk Misr se ek fauj ke saath pahunche aur Galilee mein Marika Ain Jalut ki jang mein Mongolon ko shikast di.
Mamluk hukmaran, Baybars ne Damascus ko soobai dar-ul-hukumat banaya.
Jab unki wafat hui to iqtidaar Saif ad-Din Qalawun ne le liya.
Is dauran Sunqur al-Ashqar nami ek ameer ne apne aap ko Damascus ka hukmaran qarar dene ki koshish ki, lekin woh 21 June 1280 ko Saif ad-Din Qalawun ke hathon shikast kha kar shumali Syria ki taraf bhag gaya.
Sunqur al-Ashqar jis ne ek Mongol khatoon se shadi ki thi, ne Mongolon se madad ki appeal ki.
Ilkhanate ke Mongolon ne October 1280 mein Aleppo par qabza kar liya, lekin Saif ad-Din Qalawun ne Sunqur al-Ashqar ko apne saath shamil hone par amadah kiya, aur unhon ne Marika Homs II mein 29 October 1281 ko Mongolon ke khilaf jang ki, jise Mamlukon ne jeeta tha.
1400 Esawi mein, Muslim Turk-Mongol fateh Amir Timur ne Syria par hamla kiya, jis mein usne Aleppo par qabza kar liya, aur Mamluk fauj ko shikast dene ke baad Damascus par qabza kar liya.
Shahar ke bashindon ka qatl-e-aam kiya gaya, siwaye karigaron ke, jinhen Samarkand bhej diya gaya tha.
Amir Timur ne Arami aur Ashuri Masihi abadiyon ka makhsoos qatl-e-aam bhi kiya, jis se unki taadad mein bahut kami aayi.
Pandrahvin sadi ke akhir tak, Europe se Mashriq-e-Ba'eed tak ek samandari raste ki daryaft ne Syria ke raste samandari tijarati raste Shahrah Resham ki zarurat ko khatam kar diya.
1516 Esawi mein, Saltanat Usmania ne Misr ki Saltanat Mamluk par hamla kiya, Syria ko fateh kiya, aur use apni saltanat mein shamil kiya.
Usmani nizam Suriyon ke liye bojhul nahi tha kyunki Turk Arabi zaban ko Quran ki zaban ke taur par izzat dete the aur aqeede ke muhafizon ka uhda qabool karte the. Damascus ko Makkah ke liye sabse bada markaz banaya gaya tha, aur is tarah usne Musalmanon ke liye ek muqaddas kirdar hasil kiya, kyunki an-ginat aazmeen jo Hajj par guzre the, Makkah ki ziyarat ke liye uske faida mand nataij the.
Usmani intizamiya ne ek aise nizam ki pairwi ki jo pur-aman baqa-e-ba-hami ka baais bani. Har nasli mazhabi aqliyat Arab Ahl-e-Tashayyu, Arab Ahl-e-Sunnat, Arami-Syriac, yunani (Greek), Maronite Masihi, Ashuri, Armeni, Kurd aur Yahood — mil kar millat tashkeel diya har community ke mazhabi sarbarahan tamam personal status ke qawanin ka intizam karte the aur kuch shahri kaam bhi anjam dete the.
1831 Esawi mein, Misr ke Ibrahim Pasha ne saltanat se apni wafadari tark kar di aur Damascus par qabza karte hue Usmani Syria par qabza kar liya.
Domain par uski qaleel muddat hukmarani ne khatte ki aabadi aur samaji dhache ko tabdeel karne ki koshish ki usne hazaron Misri dehati'on ko junoobi Syria ke maidani ilaqon ko aabad karne ke liye laya, Jaffa ko dobara tameer kiya aur use tajurbekaroon ke saath aabad kiya. Misri faujiyon ka maqsad use ilaqai dar-ul-hukumat mein tabdeel karna tha, aur usne kisanon aur Druze ki baghawaton ko kuchal diya aur ghair wafadar qabailiyon ko mulk badar kar diya.
Taham 1840 Esawi tak use yeh ilaqah wapas Usmaniyon ke hawale karna pada.
1864 Esawi se, Tanzimat islahat ka itlaq Usmani Syria par kiya gaya, jis mein Vilayet Aleppo, Sanjak Zor, Vilayet Beirut aur Vilayet Damascus ke sobon (Vilayet) ko tashkeel diya gaya. Mutesarrifiyyet of Mount Lebanon ko bhi banaya gaya tha, aur Jerusalem ki Mutesarrifiyyet ke fauran baad Mutesarrifiyyet Quds ko ek alag darja diya gaya.
Pehli Jang-e-Azeem ke dauran, Saltanat Usmania Germany aur Austria-Hungary Saltanat ki taraf se tanazua mein dakhil hui.
Use bil-akhir shikast ka samna karna pada aur pure Mashriq-e-Qareeb par Saltanat Bartania aur Faransi Istemari Saltanat ke control se mahroom ho gaye.
Tanazua ke dauran, muqami Masihi logon ke khilaf nasl kushi Usmaniyon aur unke ittihadiyon ne Armeni qatl-e-aam aur Ashuri nasl kushi ki shakal mein ki, jin mein se Deir ez-Zor, Usmani Syria mein un maut marchon ki akhri manzil thi.
Pehli Jang-e-Azeem ke darmiyan, do ittihadi safaratkaron (Faransi François Georges-Picot aur Bartanwi Mark Sykes) ne khufiya taur par Saltanat Usmania ki jang ke baad ki taqseem par ittefaq kiya. Sykes-Picot Moahida 1916 mein asar-o-rasookh ke numayan hone par zahir hua.
Ibtedai taur par, dono ilaqon ko ek sarhad ke zariye alag kiya gaya tha jo Urdun se Iran tak taqriban seedhi line mein chalti thi.
Taham jang ke khatme se ain qabl Mosul ke ilaqe mein tel ki daryaft ne 1918 mein France ke saath is khatte ko Bartanwi asar-o-rasookh ke hawale karne ke liye ek aur baat cheet ka baais bana, jo Iraq banna tha.
Wasti soobe Zor ki qismat ghair wazeh reh gayi thi. Arab qaum paraston ke uske qabze ke natije mein uska Syria se lagao tha.
Is sarhad ko bain-ul-aqwami satah par us waqt tasleem kiya gaya jab Syria 1920 mein League of Nations ka Mandate bana aur aaj tak tabdeel nahi hua hai.
1920 mein Hashmi khandan ke Faisal bin Hussein ke tehat Syria ki ek mukhtasar muddat ke liye azad Mamlakat Syria qaim ki gayi.
Taham, Syria par uski hukmarani sirf chand mahinon ke baad khatam ho gayi, Marika Maysalun Faransi Jamhuria Soum ne unhen shikast di.
Faransi faujiyon ne isi saal ke akhir mein Syria par qabza kar liya jab San Remo Conference ne yeh tajweez pesh ki ke League of Nations ne Syria ko Faransi taahhud ke tehat rakha.
General Gouraud ke paas apne secretary De Caix ke mutabiq do option the ya to ek aisi Suri qaum ki tameer karen jiska koi wajood na ho... un dararon ko hamwaar kar ke jo use abhi tak taqseem kar rahi hain ya tamam mazahiron ko parwan chadha'en aur barqarar rakhen, jis ke liye hamari salahiyat ki zarurat hai ke un taqsimon ko khatam kiya jaye. De Caix ne mazeed kaha mujhe yeh kehna chahiye ke sirf doosra option meri dilchaspi hai. Gouraud ne yehi kiya.
1925 mein Sultan al-Atrash ne ek baghawat ki qayadat ki jo Druze pahad mein phoot padi aur pure Syria aur Lubnan ke kuch hisson ko apni lapet mein le liya.
Sultan al-Atrash ne Faransiyon ke khilaf kayi jangen jeeten, khaas taur par 21 July 1925 ko Marika al-Kafr, 2-3 August 1925 ko Marika al-Mazraa, aur Salkhad, al-Musayfirah aur as-Suwayda ke marike qabil-e-zikr hain.
France ne Maghrib aur Senegal se hazaron fouji bheje, jiski wajah se Faransiyon ne bahut se shahron par qabza kar liya, halanke muzahamat 1927 ke mausam-e-bahar tak jari rahi.
Faransiyon ne Sultan al-Atrash ko maut ki saza sunai, lekin woh baghiyon ke saath Sharq-e-Urdun farar ho gaya tha aur bil-akhir use maaf kar diya gaya. Woh 1937 mein Suri Faransi moahide par dastakhat ke baad Syria wapas aaya.
Syria aur France ne September 1936 mein France-Syria azadi ke moahide par baat cheet ki, aur Hashim al-Atassi pehle sadr the jo jadeed Jamhuria Syria ke pehle avtaar ke tehat muntakhab hue.
Taham yeh moahida kabhi naafiz nahi hua kyunki Faransi muqannina ne uski taufeeq karne se inkar kar diya tha.
Doosri Jang-e-Azeem ke dauran 1940 mein France ke shikast ke saath, Syria Vichy France ke control mein aa gaya hatta ke July 1941 mein Syria-Lubnan muhim mein Bartanwi aur Azad Faransiyon ne mulk par qabza kar liya.
Suri qaum paraston aur Bartanwiyon ke musalsal dabao ne April 1946 mein Faransiyon ko apni faujen nikalne par majboor kar diya aur mulk ko ek jamhoori hukumat ke hath mein chhod diya jo taahhud ke dauran qaim hui thi.
1960 ki dahai ke akhir tak azadi ke bare mein Syria ki siyasat par halchal ka ghalba raha.
May 1948 mein, Suri afwaj ne deegar Arab riyasaton ke saath mil kar Intidab Palestine par hamla kiya aur fauri taur par Yahudi bastiyon par hamla kiya. Unke sadr Shukri al-Quwatli ne mahaz par maujood apne faujiyon ko hidayat ki ke Zioniyon ko tabah kar den. Is hamle ka maqsad Riyasat Israel ke qiyam ko rokna tha. Is maqsad ke liye, Suri hukumat apni musallah afwaj aur fouji intelligence ki salahiyaton ko badhane ke liye sabiq Naziyon ko bharti karne ke ek fa'al amal mein masroof rahe, jis mein Schutzstaffel ke kayi sabiq arkan bhi shamil the. Is jang mein shikast March 1949 mein Colonel Husni al-Za'im ki taraf se Syria ki baghawat ke kayi muharrak awamil mein se ek thi, doosri Jang-e-Azeem ke aaghaz ke baad se Arab duniya ka pehla fouji takhta ulat diya gaya tha. Iske baad jald hi Colonel Sami al-Hinnawi ka ek aur takhta ulat diya gaya, jise khud Colonel Adib Shishakli ne isi saal ke andar fauri taur par ma'zool kar diya tha. Adib Shishakli ne bil-akhir kaseer-ul-jamaat ko mukammal taur par khatam kar diya, lekin 1954 ki baghawat mein khud ko khatam kar diya gaya aur parliamentary nizam ko bahal kar diya gaya. Taham is waqt tak, taqat tezi se fauj aur security establishment mein markooz ho chuki thi. Parliamentary idaron ki kamzori aur maeeshat ki bad-intizami ne be-amni aur Nasserism aur deegar nazariyat ke asarat ko janam diya. Mukhtalif Arab qaum paraston, Suri qaum paraston, aur Socialist tehreekon ke liye zarkhez zameen thi, jo muashre ke munharif anasir ki numaindagi karti theen. Khaas taur par mazhabi aqliyat shamil theen, jinhon ne bunyad parast islahat ka mutalaba kiya tha.
Misr ki janib se 26 July 1956 ko Nehar Suez ko qaumi milkiyat mein lene ke faisle se maghribi mulkon aur Israel mein tehelka macha diya kyunki Nehar Suez us waqt Mamlakat Muttahida aur France ki milkiyat mein thi. Mamlakat Muttahida aur France ki pusht panahi par Misr ke khilaf Israeli jarhiyat ko Suez Bohran kaha jata hai. Is waqye ke baad Aqwaam-e-Muttahida ne tamam mumalik ke darmiyan jang bandi karadi. November 1956 mein Suez Bohran ke barah-e-rast natije ke taur par, Syria ne Soviet Union ke saath ek moahide par dastakhat kiye. Isne fouji saaz-o-samaan ke badle hukumat ke andar Communist asar-o-rasookh ko qadam jamaya. Turkiye phir Syria ki fouji technology ki taqat mein is izafe se pareshan ho gaya, kyunki aisa lagta tha ke Syria Alexandretta par dobara qabza karne ki koshish kar sakta hai. Aqwaam-e-Muttahida mein sirf garma garam bahson ne jang ka khatra kam kiya. 1 February 1958 ko Syria ke sadr Shukri al-Quwatli aur Misr ke Gamal Abdel Nasser ne Misr aur Syria ke indimaj ka elan karte hue Muttahida Arab Jamhuria aur Syria ki tamam siyasi jamaaton ke saath saath Communists ki tashkeel ka elan kiya. Is mein khuli sargarmian band ho gaeen. Darain asna Suri Ba'athi afsaran ke ek group ne, party ki kharab position aur union ki badhti hui kamzori se ghabra kar ek khufiya fouji committee banane ka faisla kiya. Iske ibtedai arkan Lieutenant Colonel Muhammad Umran, Major Salah Jadid aur Captain Hafez al-Assad the. Syria ne ek baghawat ke baad 28 September 1961 ko Misr ke saath ittihad se alayhdagi ikhtiyar kar li aur siyasi ittihad ko khatam kar diya.
Zar'ati islahat ke iqdamaat mutaarif karaye gaye jin mein teen ba-ham marboot program shamil the zar'ati mazdooron aur zameendaron ke darmiyan taalluqat ko munazzam karne wali qanoon sazi; niji aur riyasati domain arazi ki milkiyat aur istemal ko control karne wali qanoon sazi aur kisanon ki muashrati tanzeem ki rahnumayi; aur riyasati control mein zar'ati paidawar ki tanzeem-e-nau ke iqdamaat. Zameen ki milkiyat mein adam masawat ki aali satah ke bawajood in islahat ne azadi ke baad Syria ki tareekh mein kisi bhi doosri islahat ke muqable mein 1958 se 1961 tak zameen ki dobara taqseem mein zyada pesh raft ki ijazat di. Pehla qanoon kisanon ko mutaharrik karne aur unke huqooq ko badhane ke bare mein tashweesh ke jawab mein manzoor kiya gaya tha. Yeh zameen ke malikan ke silsile mein hissedaron aur zar'ati mazdooron ki position ko mazboot karne ke liye design kiya gaya tha. Is qanoon ki wajah se Wizarat-e-Mehnat aur Samaji Umoor ki tashkeel hui, jisne naye qawanin ke nafiz ka elan kiya jo khaas taur par khawateen aur naujawano ke liye kaam karne ki halat ko munazzam karne, kaam ke auqat muqarrar karne, aur ujrat dene wale mazdooron ke liye kam az kam ujrat ke usool aur hisse kasht karne walon ke liye fasal ki masawi taqseem ke usool ko mutaarif karane ki ijazat de. Mazeed bar-aan, usne zameendaron ko tehreeri aur zabani dono moahidon ka ehtram karne ka paband kiya, ijtemai saudebazi ka intizam kiya, jis mein karkunon ke muawze, sehat, rihaish, aur rozgar ki services ke intizamaat shamil the. Qanoon 134 karkunon ke tahaffuz ke liye sakhti se tayyar nahi kiya gaya tha. Usne zameendaron ke apne syndicate banane ke huqooq ko bhi tasleem kiya.
Ba'athi Syria. 1961 ki baghawat ke baad paida hone wala adam istehkam 8 March 1963 ki Ba'athi baghawat par muntaj hua. Iqtidaar ke husool ko Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party - Syria Ilaqah ke arkan ne mumkin banaya tha, jis ki qayadat Michel Aflaq aur Salah al-Din al-Bitar kar rahe the. Syria ki nayi cabinet mein Ba'ath ke arkan ka ghalba tha. 1963 mein uski fouji committee ke iqtidaar par qabze ke baad se, Ba'ath Party ne Syria par ek mutlaq-ul-anan riyasat ke taur par hukumat ki hai. Ba'athiyon ne mulk ki siyasat, taleem, saqafat, mazhab par control hasil kiya aur apni taqatwar Mukhabarat (khufiya police) ke zariye civil society ke tamam pehluon ki nigrani ki. Suri musallah afwaj aur khufiya police ko Ba'ath Party ke aalāt ke saath marboot kiya gaya tha. Nayi hukumat ke zariye riwayati civilian aur fouji ashrāfiyah ke khatme ke baad mustahkam kiya. 1963 ki Ba'athi baghawat ne Syria ki jadeed tareekh mein ek buniyadi waqfe ka nishan lagaya, jis ke baad Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party - Syria Ilaqah ne ek yak-jamaat riyasat ke qiyam ke liye mulk mein iqtidaar par ijarah dari qaim ki, aur apne riyasati nazariye ko nafiz karke ek naye samaji o siyasi tarteeb ko tashkeel diya. 23 February 1966 ko, Neo-Ba'athi Military Committee ne Ba'athi Old Guard Michel Aflaq aur Salah al-Din al-Bitar ke khilaf ek intra-party baghawat ki, sadr Amin al-Hafiz ko qaid kar diya, aur 1 March ko ek ilaqai, civilian Ba'ath hukumat ko namzad kiya. Agarchay Nur al-Din al-Atassi riyasat ke bazabta sarbarah ban gaye, Salah Jadid 1966 se November 1970 tak Syria ka moasar hukmaran tha, jab use Hafez al-Assad ne ma'zool kar diya, jisne us waqt Wazir-e-Difa'a the. Is baghawat ne asal Pan-Arab Ba'ath siyasi jamaat ke andar ikhtilafat ko janam diya ek Iraqi qayadat wali Ba'ath tehreek (1968 se 2003 tak Iraq par hukumat ki) aur ek Suri qayadat wali Ba'ath tehreek qaim kiya gaya tha. 1967 ke pehle nisf mein, Syria aur Israel ke darmiyan jang ki ek kam ahem riyasat maujood thi. Ghair fouji zone mein zameen par Israeli kasht par tanazua 7 April ko Israel aur Syria ke darmiyan jang se pehle ki fizai jhadapon ka baais bana. Jab Misr aur Israel ke darmiyan Chhe Roza Jang shuru hui to Syria bhi is jang mein shamil hua aur Israel par bhi hamla kiya. Jang ke akhri dinon mein, Israel ne apni tawajjuh Syria ki taraf mod di, aur Golan ki pahadiyon ke do tehai hisse par 48 ghanton se kam arse mein qabza kar liya. Is shikast ne Salah Jadid aur Hafez al-Assad ke darmiyan is baat par ikhtilaf paida kiya ke aage kya iqdamaat karne hain. Party ke nizam ko control karne wale Salah Jadid aur fauj ko control karne wale Hafez al-Assad ke darmiyan ikhtilaf paida hua. 1970 mein Yasser Arafat ki qayadat mein Tanzeem Azadi Falastin ki madad ke liye bheji gayi Suri afwaj ki paspai Siyah September (jise 1970 ki Urdun Khana Janggi bhi kaha jata hai) ke saath dushmani ke dauran, Urdun ne is ikhtilaf ki akasi ki. Iqtidaar ki kashmakash November 1970 ki Syria ki Islahai Tehreek mein ikhtitam pazeer hui, ek khoon khwaar fouji baghawat jisne Hafez al-Assad ko hukumat ka mazboot aadmi bana diya. General Hafez al-Assad ne ek Ba'ath Party ki riyasat ko ek mutlaq-ul-anan amriyat mein tabdeel kar diya jis ki party, musallah afwaj, khufiya police, media, taleem ke shobē, mazhabi aur saqafati shobon aur civil society ke tamam pehluon par uski wasee giraft thi. Usne Nusayriyah firqe ke wafadaron ko Suri musallah afwaj, bureaucracy, intelligence aur hukmaran ashrāfiyah mein ahem ohdon par tafweez kiya. Hafez al-Assad aur uske khandan ke gird ghumne wali shakhsiyat ka ek firqa Ba'athat ke nazariye ka ek buniyadi usool ban gaya, jisne is baat ki ta'eed ki ke Assad khandan ko hamesha ke liye hukumat karna maqsood. 6 October 1973 ko Syria aur Misr ne Israel ke khilaf Jang-e-Yom Kippur shuru ki. Israel ki difai afwaj ne Syria ki ibtedai kamyabiyon ko palat diya aur Syria ke ilaqe mein mazeed gehrai tak dhakel diya. Al-Quneitra gaon ko Israeli fauj ne badi had tak tabah kar diya tha. 1970 ki dahai ke akhri mein Ikhwan al-Muslimin ki janib se hukumat ke khilaf ek Islam pasand baghawat ka maqsad tha. Islam pasandon ne shahriyon aur off-duty fouji ahal-karon par hamla kiya, jis ke natije mein security forces ne jawabi hamlon mein shahriyon ko bhi halak kiya. 1982 mein Hama ke qatl-e-aam mein baghawat apne urooj ko pahunch gayi thi, jab Suri fauj ke baqaida dastoon ke zariye taqriban 10,000 - 40,000 afraad mare gaye the. Use jadeed Arab tareekh mein kisi bhi riyasat ki taraf se apni hi aabadi par kiye jaane wale tashaddud ka ek hi muhlik tareen fa'al qarar diya gaya hai. Dono deegar Arab mumalik aur maghribi duniya ke saath taalluqat mein ek badi tabdeeli mein, Syria ne Saddam Hussein ke khilaf Riyasat-e-Muttahida ki zer-e-qayadat Jang-e-Khaleej mein hissa liya. Is mulk ne 1991 ki kaseer-ul-jahati Madrid Conference mein shirkat ki, aur 1990 ki dahai ke dauran Daulat-e-Falastin aur Urdun ke saath Israel ke saath muzakerat mein masroof raha. Yeh muzakerat nakam rahe, aur March 2000 mein sadr Hafez al-Assad ki us waqt ke sadr Bill Clinton ke saath Geneva mein mulaqat ke baad se ab tak koi barah-e-rast Suri Israel muzakerat nahi hue hain.
Assad khandan Syria ka ek siyasi khandan hai jisne Ba'ath Party ke tehat 1971 mein Hafez al-Assad sadr Syria banne ke baad se Syria par hukumat ki hai. Uski maut ke baad, June 2000 mein iqtidaar us janasheen bete Bashar al-Assad ne sambhala. Assad khandan ka taalluq Hafez al-Assad ke walid Ali Suleiman al-Wahsh se hai, jo 1875 mein paida hue aur Syria ke sahili pahadon mein Qardaha gaon mein rehte the. Muqami logon ne mabina taur par use Wahsh, Arabi mein jangli janwar ka laqab diya, kyunki woh jismānī taur par mazboot aur ek achha ladaka tha. 1920 ki dahai tak al-Wahsh khandan ka naam hi raha, jab use Assad (babr sher) ke liye Arabi mein tabdeel kar ke al-Assad kar diya gaya. Suleiman ki mabina taqat aur nishana bazi ki wajah se, woh apne gaon mein izzat ki nigah se dekha jata tha. Pehli Jang-e-Azeem ke shuru hone par, Vilayet Aleppo ke Usmani Governor ne tax wasool karne aur bharti karne walon ko pakadne ke liye is ilaqe mein fauj bheji. Mabina taur par faujiyon ka muqabla Suleiman aur uske doston ne kiya tha jo sirf kirpanon aur purane tamanchon se lais the.
Lubnani jang mein shamilat. Hafez al-Assad ka intiqal 10 June 2000 ko hua. Unka beta Bashar al-Assad ek aise intikhabat mein sadr muntakhab hua jis mein woh bila muqabla hissa liya. Uske intikhab ne Damascus ki Bahar ki paidaish aur islahat ki ummeedon ko dekha, lekin 2001 ke mausam-e-khizan tak ahal-karon ne is tehreek ko daba diya, uske kuch sar-karda danishwaron ko qaid kar diya. Iske bajaye, islahat market ki kuch islahat tak mahdood rahin. 5 October 2003 ko Israel ne Damascus ke qareeb ek jagah par bambari ki, yeh dawa kiya ke yeh Islamic Jihad ke arkan ke liye dehshatgardi ki tarbiyat ki sahulat hai. March 2004 mein, Suri Kurdon aur Arabon ke darmiyan Qamishli mein jhadap hui. Qamishli aur al-Hasakah mein hangama arai ke asaar nazar aaye. 2005 mein Syria ne Lubnan mein apni fouji maujoodgi khatam kar di. 2005 mein Rafik Hariri ka qatl bain-ul-aqwami mazammat ka baais bana aur usne Lubnan mein ek maqbool Intifada ko janam diya, jise Cedar Revolution kaha jata hai, jisne Assad hukumat ko Lubnan mein apna 29 saala fouji qabza khatam karne par majboor kiya. 6 September 2007 ko, ghair mulki jet ladaka taiyaron ne, jin par Israeli hone ka shubah hai, mabina taur par North Korea ke takneeki mahireen ke zer-e-tameer ek mushtabah johri reactor ke khilaf Operation Orchard kiya.
19 September 2002ء ki ali al-subah sadar ka takhta ultane ki ek fauji baghawat ki koshish ki gayi. Is dauran sadar Italy ke daure par tha. Daston ne kayi shehron par hamla kiya. Dopehar tak France ki taraf se hukumat ke haq mein mudakhilat ki gayi taham yeh abhi tak nahin kaha ja sakta ke is mudakhilat ke sabab surat haal behtar hui ke badtar. Taham din ke ikhtitam tak mulk ke shimal par un ka control khatam ho chuka tha jo aaj tak junub se kata hua hai. Junub ke liye hone wali ladai bohat sakht thi. Main Jendarmari Barrack ke liye Abidjan mein hone wali ladai agle din subah tak jari rahi. Is raat kya hua, yeh abhi tak maloom nahin ho saka. Hukumat ne dawa kiya ke sabiqah sadar Robert Gueï ne fauji baghawat ki sarbarahi ki aur riyasati TV ne us ki aur pandrah digar afraad ki lashain sadkon par padi dikhayin. Mukhalifeen ka kehna hai ke in logon ko gharon par qatal karke sadkon par dala gaya taake inhen mujrim gardana ja sake. Alassane Ouattara ne French safarat khane mein panah li aur us ka ghar jala diya gaya. Sadar Gbagbo ne apna Italy ka daura mukhtasar kar diya aur mulk wapsi par yeh elaan kiya ke kuch baghi un qasbon mein chhipe hue hain jahan ghair mulki muhajireen worker rehte hain. Gendarmes ne hazaron gharon ko bulldozer kiya aur jala diya jabke makeenon par bhi hamle kiye gaye. Baghiyon se hone wala fire bandi ka muahida arzi sabit hua aur Cocoa ki kasht ke ilaqon mein ladai dobara shuru ho gayi. France ne apne faujiyon ko bheja taake fire bandi, sarhadon aur militia ko roka ja sake jisse Liberia aur Sierra Leone se aane wale jangi sardar aur jangjuyon ne faida uthate hue maghribi hisson par apna tasallut qaim kar liya.
2003 ki muttahida hukumat. January 2003ء mein sadar Gbagbo aur baghi rehnumaon ne ek muahide par dastakhat kiye jis ki ro se mulki ittihad ke liye hukumat banane ka kaha gaya tha. Curfew utha liya gaya aur French daston ne maghribi laqanuniyat ka shikar ilaqah saaf kar diya. Tab se muttahida hukumat intehai ghair mustahkam sabit hui hai aur markazi masail waise ke waise hain aur koi bhi apne maqasid mein kamyab nahin ho raha. March 2004ء mein 120 log opposition ki rally mein mare gaye aur is ke baad mushta'il hujoom se paida hone wale halaat mein ghair mulkiyon ka inkhila kiya gaya. Baad azan ek report ke mutabiq yeh qatal pehle se tay shuda the. Agarche aqwam muttahida ke aman safarat kar tayinat kiye gaye taake Zone of Confidence qaim reh sake lekin Gbagbo aur opposition ke taluqat bad se badtar hote chale gaye.
2004-2007 ke nataij. November 2004ء ke awail mein aman muahide ki nakami ke baad baghiyon ne ghair musallah hone se inkar kar diya aur Gbagbo ne baghiyon ke khilaf hawai hamle ka hukm de diya. Bouaké mein hone wale in hamlon mein French fauji bhi shikar hue aur nau fauji mare gaye. Ivory hukumat ke mutabiq yeh ghalti thi lekin Frenchiyon ne dawa kiya ke yeh jaan boojh kar hamla kiya gaya tha. Is ke jawab mein unhon ne Ivory ke tayyaron ko tabah kiya jin mein do Sukhoi MiG-25 aur paanch helicopter shamil hain jis ke baad France ke khilaf mutashaddid baghawatein Abidjan mein shuru ho gayin. Gbagbo ki asli sadarti muddat 30 October 2005 mein khatam ho rahi thi lekin mulki halaat ke pesh nazar intikhabat ka hona ghair yaqeeni tha aur is ke natije mein sadarti muddat mein ziyada se ziyada ek saal ka izafa kiya gaya. Is ka mansooba African Union ne banaya tha aur usay aqwam muttahida ki salamti council ne bhi manzoor kiya. October 2006 ki deadline pahunchne ke baad yeh zahir ho raha tha ke ab bhi intikhabat ka ineqad mashkook hai lekin opposition ne Gbagbo ko mazeed mohlat dene se inkar kar diya. Salamti council ne sadarti muddat mein ek saal ka mazeed izafa karte hue yeh bhi manzoor kiya ke wazir e azam ke ikhtiyarat ko badha diya jaye. Agle hi din Gbagbo ne kaha ke is qarardad ke nuqat mulki ain se mutasadam hain is liye un par amaldaramad nahin kiya ja sakta. Hukumat aur baghiyon mein tay paane wale aman muahide ke tehat, jise New Forces ka naam diya gaya, 4 March 2007 ko is par dastakhat hue aur natijatan New Forces ke leader Guillaume Soro wazir e azam ban gaye. Kuch mubassiron ne in waqiyat ko Gbagbo ki mazbooti mein izafe ki nazar se dekha.
Qabl az Columbian daur. Tareekh danon ne Costa Rica ke muqami bashindon ko darmiyani American aur Andes ka darmiyani ilaqah qarar diya hai jahan in donon muqami saqafaton mein ham aahangi milti hai. Costa Rica mein insani aamad ke asarat 7000 se 10000 qabl Maseeh mein bane patthar ke auzaron se Turrialba ki wadi mein milte hain jab shikar aur ikattha karne walon ne yahan basera karna shuru kiya. Is ke ilawa nezun aur teeron ki daryaft se Clovis tehzeeb ka is khitta mein barabari se maujood hone ka pata chalta hai. Ziraat 5000 saal qabl shuru hui aur paidawar mein ziyada shumar zameeni jaron ka tha jaise gajar aur digar sabziyan. Is ilaqah mein 2000 aur 3000 qabl Maseeh mein mitti ke bartanon ke istemal shuru hone ki nishaniyan mili hain aur mukhtalif qism ke bartan jis mein matke, surahi, platein mili hain jin par rang-o-roghan se janwaron ki tasveeren banayi gayi hain. Costa Rica mein muqami bashindon ki saqafat ka yahan ki maujooda abadi par bohat kam asarat hain, is ke muqable mein digar American riyasaton mein yeh asarat qadre ziyada hain. Is ki ek wajah muqami abadiyon ka Hispanviyon mein shadiyan karke zam ho jana bani. Sirf Cordillera de Talamanca ki pahadiyon mein kuch hi qabile jaise Bribri aur Boruca hain jinhon ne apni saqafat bacha kar rakhi hai.
Saltanat Hispania. Hispanvi zuban mein La Costa Rica ke lughwi maani daulat mand kinare ke hain, is baat par ittifaq nahin ke aaya yeh naam Christopher Columbus ne 1502 mein Costa Rica ke mashriqi kinaron pe apne aakhri safar par diya jab use muqami abadi ke paas besh qeemat sone ke zewarat dekhe, yeh conquistador Gil González Dávila ne diya jo 1522 mein maghribi kinare par pahuncha aur muqamiyon se sona hasil kiya. Nawabadiyati nizam ke dauran Costa Rica Captaincy General Guatemala ka balai soobah tha jo beshtar dauraniya naye Hispanvi Viceroy nizam ka hissa hone ke bawajood Hispanvi saltanat ka khud mukhtar ilaqah raha. Costa Rica ka Guatemala ke darul hukumat se fasla, Panama se tijarat par pabandi aur sone aur chandi ki kami ki wajah se Costa Rica ko Hispanvi saltanat ke dauraniya mein ek ghurbat zada, alag thalag aur kam abadi wala ilaqah tasawwur kiya jata tha. Costa Rica ki is daur mein ghurbat ki ek aur wajah jabri mushaqqat karane ke liye muqami abadi ki kami bani aur beshtar muqami log apne hi kheton par kaam karte the jis ke baraks digar abadiyon ke jahan bade baghaat par jabri mushaqqat karai jati thi.
Ministry baraye mansooba bandi ke adaad o shumar ke mutabiq 2008 ke awakhir tak Kuwait ki kul abadi 3,441,813 thi. In mein se 1,087,552 Kuwaiti the aur baqi ghair mulki aur tarkeen e watan the jin ki taidad taqriban 2,354,261 thi. Ghair mulki abadi ko Arabi aur ghair Arabi mein taqseem kiya ja sakta hai. Arab community mein sab se ziyada Misri hain doosre aur teesre darje mein bal tarteeb Suri aur Urduni aate hain. Ghair Arabon mein Hindustaniyon ki taidad sab se ziyada hai. Dastoor ki roo se yahan ki sarkari zuban sirf Arabi hai. Albattah sarkari dastawezaat, aam hidayat aur is tarah ki cheezon mein Angrezi zuban ko bhi doosri zuban ke taur par istemal karne ka riwaj paya jata hai. Islam, yahan ka dastoori mazhab hai jo yahan ki aksariyat ka deen hai. Yahan ki abadi ka taqriban 85% Islam ko manne wale hain. Ain ki roo se doosre mazahib ko bhi yahan par azadi hasil hai. Kuwaitiyon ki apni khas tehzeeb hai. Tarz e zindagi mein aur adaat o atwar mein Arabi aur Islami saqafat ki chhap numayan hai. Cultural globalization ke bawajood in mein aaj bhi qadeem shakhsi o samaji riwayaten zinda hain. Daulat ki farawani ke bawajood aksariyat ki tabiyat mein wohi purani saadgi dekhne ko milti hai. Mitti ke chhote chhote makan alishaan falak bos imaraton ke roop pa chuke hain. Magar mitti ki tabiyat aaj bhi in mein zinda hai. Chhutiyon mein shehr se door reegistani ilaqon mein khaime laga kar apni purani tehzeeb se lagao ki numash karte hain. Diwaniya Kuwait ki qadeem riwayati saqafat ka ek namoona hai jis ka aaj bhi itna hi ahtemam hota hai jitna tel ki daryaft se pehle hota tha. Qadeem zamane mein Kuwaitiyon ka ghar ek hall wala hota tha magar sahib e haisiyat Kuwaiti apne gharon ki ek janib ek aur hall ya ek alag kamra bhi banate the aur isi ka naam Diwaniya hota tha. Isi jagah mehmanon ko istiqbaliya diya jata tha. Neez dost o ahbab aur padosiyon ke saath mil baithne, khandani aur ilaqai masail ko suljhane aur gup shup ki mahfil munaqqid karne ke liye bhi Diwaniya ka istemal aam tha. Farigh auqat mein qissa goi aur tabadala khayalat ki majlisen bhi yahin par qaim hoti thin. In mein qaleen bichhi hoti thi aur rahat ki gharaz se gau takiye bhi lage rehte. Khushbudar aur elaichi dar qahwa is Diwaniya ke imtiazat mein shamil tha. Sahib e Diwaniya khud is qahwe ka intezam karta tha. Peetal ke khoonti dar aur dhakkan wale khas qism ke bartan mein use dala jata aur mitti ke chhote chhote piyalon mein dal kar pesh kiya jata tha. Ab Kuwaitiyon ki samaji, siyasi aur iqtisadi zindagi mein kafi tabdiliyan aa chuki hain magar Diwaniya aaj bhi un ki saqafat ka hissa bana hua hai. Balkay un ki taidad mein bhi kafi izafa ho chuka hai. Zamane ke aitbar se saz o saman mein bhi farq aa chuka hai. Mitti ki piyaliyon ki jagah kanch ke chhote cup aa chuke hain. In mein bohat sare to television, computer aur in jaise digar jadeed iblaghi o muwasalati aalat wasail se aarasta kar diye gaye hain. Har ghar mein ya kam o besh har gali mein aap ko Diwaniya nazar aayega. In mein se kuch siyasi, samaji aur iqtisadi aitbar se bhi badi ahmiyat pa chuke hain. Kuwaitiyon ke libas se bhi un ki saqafati pehchan hoti hai. Qadeem qabaili libas jise yeh log disdasha aur ghutra kehte hain aaj bhi yahan ke ziyada tar mardon ka libas hai. Bade boodhe aur muammar log isi ko tarjeeh dete hain. Aurten umuman siyah burqa pehenti hain jo badan ke ziyada tar hisson ko band rakhta hai, taham andaroon burqa aurton ka umumi libas darraa, zabun aur thob hai. Maghribi tehzeeb ke asar se agarche nayi nasl mein libas mein tabdili ki aam lehar chali hai is ke bawajood qaumi libas aur Islami iqdar ki pasdari aaj bhi in mein dekhne ko milti hai. Qadeem zamane se samandari ghizain Kuwaitiyon ke ghizai nizam ki buniyad rahi hai. Is ke saath bakri aur oonth ka gosht bhi inhen bohat marghoob hai jis se mukhtalif qism ki dishes tayyar ki jati hain. Baad ke zamane mein Europe aur Hindustan ke saath tijarati taluqat se baaz masala dar ghizain bhi in ki dishes mein shamil ho gayin. Majboos, Jareesh, Harees, Tashreeba, Qabot waghera yahan ki marghoob o maroof dishes hain.
Cameroon ya Jamhuriya Cameroon, Wastani Africa Maghribi Wastani Africa ka ek mulk hai. Is ki sarhaden maghrib aur shimal mein Nigeria, shimal mashriq mein Chad, mashriq mein Wastani African Jamhuriya aur junub mein Estiwai Guinea, Gabon aur Jamhuriya Congo ke saath milti hain. Is ka sahil Bight of Biafra par waqe hai, jo Khaleej e Guinea aur Bahr e Oqyanus ka hissa hai. Is ka raqba 475,442 murabba kilometer hai. Maghribi aur Wastani Africa ke darmiyan sangam par is ki strategic position ki wajah se, use donon campon mein hone ke taur par darja bandi kiya jata hai. Is ka darul hukumat Yaoundé hai. Is ke taqriban 27 million log 250 madari zubanen bolte hain. Sarkari zabanen French aur Angrezi hain. Wastani African CFA Franc currency ke taur par istemal kiya jata hai. Cameroon ke bashindon ki badi taidad kaashtkari se munsalik hai. Arzii, lisani aur saqafati tanawwu ki wajah se is mulk ko aksar Chhota Africa kaha jata hai. Is ki qudrati khususiyaat mein sahil, sehra, pahad, barish ke janglat aur savana shamil hain. Is ka sab se ooncha maqam, taqriban 4,100 meter, junub maghribi ilaqe mein Mount Cameroon hai. Is ka sab se ziyada abadi wala shehr Darya e Wouri par waqe, Douala is ka iqtisadi darul hukumat aur aham bandargah hai. Aur Garoua, junub maghrib mein ek qudrati bandargah hai. Cameroon apni muqami mauseeqi ke andaz, khas taur par Makossa, Njohang aur Bikutsi aur apni kamyab qaumi football team ke liye mashhoor hai. Yeh African Union, Aqwam Muttahida, Organisation Internationale de la Francophonie, Commonwealth, Ghair Munsalik Tehreek aur Islami Taawun ki Tanzeem ki rukn riyasat hai.
Cape Verde ya Raas Akhdar; Maghribi Africa mein waqe ek mulk hai. Is ke darul hukumat ka naam Praia hai.
Kenya ka sarkari naam Jamhuriya Kenya hai. Yeh Mashriqi Africa mein khatt e istiwa par waqe hai. Is ke junub mashriq mein Bahr e Hind junub mein Tanzania, maghrib mein Uganda, shimal maghrib mein Junubi Sudan, shimal mein Ethiopia aur shimal mashriq mein Somalia hai. Mulk ka naam Kenya pahad ke naam par rakha gaya hai jo Kenya ka sab se bada aur Africa ka doosra bada pahad hai. Nairobi mulk ka darul hukumat aur sab se bada shehr hai. Mombasa, Nakuru, Kisumu aur Meru doosre bade shehr hain. Kenya mein cricket, football, boxing mashhoor hain magar khelon mein is mulk ki wajah e shohrat athletics hai. 1960 aur 1970 ki dahai mein Kenya ki field hockey team ka shumar duniya ki achhi teamon mein hota tha. Roshan Saleem 1960 ki dahai mein Kenya ki hockey team ke goalkeeper rahe hain.
Canada Shumali America ka ek mulk hai. Is ke das soobe aur teen ilaqe Bahr e Oqyanus se Bahr al-Kahil aur shimal ki taraf Bahr e Munjamid Shumali tak phele hue hain, jis se yeh duniya ke sab se taweel sahil ke saath kul raqba ke lehaaz se duniya ka doosra sab se bada mulk banta hai. Is ka kul raqba 9,984,670 murabba kilometer hai. Canada ki zameeni sarhaden Riyasat Haye Muttahida America ke saath junub aur shimal maghrib ki taraf se milti hain. Riyasat Haye Muttahida ke saath is ki sarhad duniya ki sab se taweel bain ul aqwami zameeni sarhad hai. Mulk mausamiyati aur arzii donon khitton ki ek wasi range se mutassif hai. Yeh chaar crore logon ka ek kam abad mulk hai, jis ki aksariyat shehri ilaqon mein 55 mutawazi ke junub mein rehti hai. Canada ka darul hukumat Ottawa hai aur is ke teen bade metropolitan ilaqe Toronto, Montreal aur Vancouver hain. Canada wafaqi aaiini shahanshahiyat aur parlimani jamhooriyat ka majmooa hai aur das soobajat aur teen riyasaton par mushtamil hai. Canada ko sarkari taur par do zubanon wala yani kaseer lisani aur kaseer saqafati qaum kehte hain. Angrezi aur French zubanon ko sarkari zubanon ka darja hasil hai. Canada technology ke lehaaz se taraqqi yafta aur san'ati qaum hai. Is ki maishat ka ziyada tar inhasar is ke qudrati wasail aur tijarat bil khusoos Riyasat Haye Muttahida America ke saath tijarat par hai jis ke saath Canada ki taweel al muddat sharikat hai. Canada ke naam ka matlab gaon ya tasfiya shuda jagah ka hai. 1535 mein is ilaqe ke logon, jo aaj kal Quebec City kehlata hai, ne Jacques Cartier ko is jagah se Stadacona ka gaon keh kar mutaarif karaya. Cartier ne is lafz Canada ka istemal sirf is jagah tak mahdood na rakha balkay Donnacona yani jo Stadacona ka hakim tha, ke zer e intezam pure ilaqe ko yehi naam de diya. 1547 tak naqshon waghera mein is jagah aur is ke mulhaqa ilaqon ko Canada ka naam pad gaya tha. Canada ki French Colony, New France Darya e Saint Lawrence ke saath basai gayi. Baad azan is ko taqseem karke do British Colonies bana diya gaya jin ke naam Upper Canada aur Lower Canada the. Baad mein inhen mila kar Canada ka British sooba kaha gaya. 1867 ilhaq ke baad Canada ko ek nayi Dominion ka darja de diya gaya. 1950 tak is ka naam Dominion of Canada raha. Joon joon Canada ko Britain se marhala war siyasi ikhtiyarat aur azadi milti gayi, wafaqi hukumat ne apne sarkari kaghzat mein aur muahida jaat mein sirf Canada ka naam istemal karna shuru kar diya. Baad azan Canada Act ke mutabiq sirf Canada ka naam istemal kiya jane laga aur ab tak yehi wahid naam qanooni taur par istemal ho raha hai. Isi tarah 1982 mein qaumi din ke naam ko Youm e Dominion se badal kar Youm e Canada rakh diya gaya. Muqami taur par awaleen bashindon ki riwayat yeh kehti hain ke woh yahan ke awaleen bashinde the. Aasaar e qadeema ki tehqeeqat ke mutabiq Shumali ilaqe Yukon mein insani maujoodgi 26,000 saal pehle thi aur Junubi ilaqe Ontario mein 9,500 saal pehle insani abadi ke aasaar mile hain. Jab Viking yani bahri qazzaq yahan L'Anse aux Meadows ke maqam par 1000 Eesvi mein baqaida abad hue to European aqwam yahan pehli bar aain. Is ke baad aane wale European yahan Canada ke sahil jo Bahr e Oqyanus ke kinare waqe the, ki muhim joii ki gharaz se aaye. In mein John Cabot jo 1497 mein aur Martin Frobisher 1576 mein Britain ki taraf se aaye. France ki taraf se Jacques Cartier 1534 mein aur Samuel de Champlain 1603 mein aaye. Pehli baqaida European abadkari ka aaghaz Frenchiyon ne Port Royal mein 1605 mein aur Quebec City mein 1608 mein kiya. British abadkari ka aaghaz Newfoundland mein 1610 mein hua. Satrahween sadi ka beshtar hissa British aur French colonies ne ek doosre se alag thalag reh kar guzara. French colony mukammal taur par Darya e Saint Lawrence ki wadi mein mahdood rahe aur British terah colonies se le kar junub tak abad rahe. Taham joon joon ilaqe, samandari hudood, samoor aur machhliyon ki kami hoti gayi, Frenchiyon, Britishiyon aur sahili qabail ke darmiyan mein jangen chhidti gayin. 1689 se 1763 ke dauran mein chaar jangen ladin gayin. Yeh jangen Frenchiyon aur muqami Indians ke mabin thin. 1763 ke muahida France ki sharaait ke tehat France ke woh sare ilaqe jo Shumali America mein Darya e Mississippi ke mashriqi ilaqe Britain ke qabze mein aa gaye, maswaaye door aftada jazair jo Saint Pierre aur Miquelon kehlata the. Jang ke baad Britishiyon ne mehsoos kiya ke ab woh ziyada tar French bolne wale Roman Catholic ilaqe mein ghir gaye hain jahan ke bashinde haal hi mein British Raj ke khilaf hathyar utha chuke hain. Surat e haal se namatne ke liye Britain ne 1774 mein ek naya Act manzoor kiya jise Quebec Act ka naam diya gaya. Is naye Act ke tehat Quebec ke maqbooza ilaqe mein French zuban, Catholic aqaid aur French shehri qawaneen ko nafiz kiya gaya. Is Act ke Britain ke liye bohat se ghair mutawaqqe aur na pasandida nataij samne aaye. Sab se pehle to terah colonies ke abadkar bohat naraz hue, jis se American inqilab ko madad pahunchi. Doosra Riyasat Haye Muttahida ki azadi ke baad British saltanat ke taqreeban pachas hazar wafadar Quebec, Nova Scotia, Prince Edward Island aur Newfoundland mein muntaqil ho gaye. In ki aamad ko Nova Scotia mein achhi nazar se na dekha gaya aur New Brunswick ko is colony se 1784 mein bahar nikal diya gaya. Ab aaiini Act ke tehat Angrezi bolne wale wafadaron ko Quebec mein basane ke liye soobe ko do hisson yani Francophone yani French bolne wale Zereen Canada aur Anglophone yani Angrezi bolne wale Balaai Canada mein 1791 mein taqseem kar diya gaya. Canada America aur British Raj ke darmiyan mein hone wali jang mein shamil tha aur is ke kamyabi ne Canada par taweel al muddat asarat murattab kiye jin mein qaumi ittihad o yaganagat aur British nasl Shumali Americanon ka jazba qaumiyat parasti shamil hai. Britain aur Ireland se 1815 mein Canada mein bade paimane par immigration hui. Kayi muahidon ke natije mein America aur Canada ke darmiyan mein taweel al muddat aman qaim hua. Jang e baghawat ki nakami ke baad colonies ke afsaron ne siyasi surat e haal ka jaiza liya aur 1839 mein Durham Report jari ki. Ek wajah, jo Anglophone yani Angrezi bolne walon aur Francophone yani French bolne wale logon ke liye 1837 mein baghawat ka sabab bani, French Canadians ka British culture mein inzimam tha. Donon Canada ko mila kar ek wafaqi colony bana di gayi aur use Muttahida Sooba Haye Canada ka naam diya gaya. Britain aur America ke darmiyan mein 1846 mein tay paane wali Oregon Treaty ka anjam Oregon sarhadi tanaza ki surat mein hua. Is ki wajah se maghribi sarhad ko 49th parallel tak phela diya gaya aur Oregon Country/Columbia District par mushtaraka qabza khatam ho gaya. Isi ki wajah se Vancouver Island ki Colony 1849 mein wajood mein aayi aur Fraser Canyon mein sone ki talash ke liye daud lag gayi. British Columbia ki Colony mein yeh kaam 1858 mein shuru hua, agarche yeh donon Canada ke Muttahida Soobe se bilkul alag thalag the. 1850 ke awakhir tak Canada ke rehnumaon ne bohat si tehqeeqi muhimmat is niyat se banayen ke is se Rupert's Land aur Arctic ke ilaqe ka qabza liya ja sake. Buland sharah paidaish ki wajah se Canada ki abadi mein bohat tezi se izafa hua, European immigration isi dauran mein America muntaqil hona shuru ho gayi, khususan French Canadians New England ki taraf muntaqil hue. Azeem ittihad ke foran baad Charlottetown Conference aur phir Quebec Conference 1864 mein aur phir 1866 ki London Conference ke baad teen colonies Canada, Nova Scotia aur New Brunswick ne is Confederation ka intezam sanbhala liya. British North America Act ne Canada ke naam se ek Dominion bana di jis mein chaar soobe Ontario, Quebec, Nova Scotia aur New Brunswick shamil the. Jab Canada ne Rupert's Land aur Shumali Maghribi ilaqe ka intezam sanbhala jo 1870 mein mila kar Shumali Maghribi ilaqah bante the to un ki tawajjuh Métis se hat gayi aur is ke natije mein Surkh Daryai Baghawat ne janam liya aur bil akhir Manitoba ka sooba tashkeel paya aur July 1870 mein Confederation mein shamil hua. British Columbia aur Jazair Vancouver (jo 1866 mein mutahid ho gaye) aur Jazair Prince Edward ki Colony Confederation ko bal tarteeb 1871 aur 1873 mein shamil hue. Union ko aapas mein milane aur maghribi soobon par apna intezam barqarar rakhne ke liye Canada ne pure baraazam ko milane wali train ki teen patariyan bichhayin jin mein sab se aham Canadian Pacific Railway thi. Is ki madad se Dominion Lands Act ke tehat immigrants ki charagahon ki taraf muntaqil hone ki hausla afzai hui. Is ki wajah se North-West Mounted Police ko qaim kiya gaya. In ilaqon mein abad asal bashindon ko ilaqah Makhsoosa muntaqil kiya gaya. Joon joon abadkar charagahon ki taraf trainon ki madad se muntaqil hue to abadi badhti chali gayi, Shumali Maghribi ilaqon ko soobe ka darja de diya gaya jis se Alberta aur Saskatchewan 1905 mein bane. 1914 mein jab Britain ne pehli jang e azeem mein shumooliyat ka elaan kiya to Canada khud ba khud jang mein shareek ho gaya. Is ne razakaron par mabni divisions bhejen taake maghribi mahaz par qaumi zimmedari ka difa kiya ja sake. Halakaten itni badh gayin ke Wazir e Azam Robert Borden ko 1917 mein aam lam bandi yani jabri fauji bharti ka hukm dena pada jis ki Quebec mein shiddat se ghair maqbooliyat paida hui aur is ki Conservative Party ne apni himayat kho di. Agarche azadi pasand jabri bharti ki wajah se bohat munqasim the lekin phir bhi woh ek numayan siyasi party ban kar zahir hue. 1919 mein Canada ne League of Nations mein apni marzi se shumooliyat ikhtiyar ki aur 1931 mein Westminster ke daftar ne tasdeeq ki ke is ki marzi ke baghair British parliament Canada par koi baat nahin kar sakti. Isi dauran mein Azeem Maashi Buhran jo 1929 mein hua, ne Canada ko har tarah se mutassir kiya. Alberta aur Saskatchewan mein janam lene wali bahami daulat e mushtaraka Federation ne Tommy Douglas ki falahi riyasat wali baat ka ishara diya jis ki 1940 se 1950 mein daagh bel padi. 1930 ke awakhir mein Germany se tasalli bakhsh jawab milne ke baad Liberal Wazir e Azam William Lyon Mackenzie King ne parliament ke faisle ki tausheeq kar di ke Canada 1939 mein doosri jang e azeem mein shamil ho aur unhon ne apne fauji dastoon ko Germany ke Poland par hamle se qabl mutaharrik kiya. Jang ke dauran mein Canada ki maishat ne bohat tezi se taraqqi ki jis ki badi wajah Canada, Britain, China aur Russia ke liye jangi hathiyaron ki tayari thi. Jang ke ikhtitam par Canada ki fauji taqat ka shumar duniya ki badi fauji taqaton mein hua. 1949 mein Newfoundland ki Dominion ne Confederation mein shumooliyat ikhtiyar ki aur Canada ka daswaan sooba bana. Canada ke sau saal mukammal hone par 1967 mein jang ke baad mukhtalif European mumalik se immigration ka taanta bandh gaya. Is se Canada ki jamhoori shakal tabdeel hui. Is ke saath saath Vietnam ki jang ke dauran mein America se jang ke baghi bhi Canada ke mukhtalif hisson mein aa kar abad hue. Badhti hui immigration, sharah paidaish mein izafa aur mazboot maishat ki wajah se 1960 ke ashré ke dauran mein Canada ka shumar America ke barabar hone laga. Is ke rad e amal ke taur par Quebec mein khamosh inqilab barpa hua aur ek naye qaum parast jazbe ki ibtida hui. November 1981 ke dauran mein hone wali wuzara ki meeting mein soobai aur wafaqi hukumat ne yeh tay kiya ke aain se rujoo kiya jaye taake is mein tarmeem ka tareeqa car tay kiya jaye. Agarche Quebec ki hukumat ne is ki mukhalifat ki, phir bhi 17 April 1982 ko Canada ne Malika Elizabeth II ki manzoori se apne aain ko British aain se alaihda kar liya aur apne aap ko ek azad mamlakat ka darja de diya agarche donon mumalik ab bhi mushtaraka alamati badshahat ke matehat the. Azadi ke baad 1960 ke khamosh inqilab ke dauran mein Quebec bohat si samaji aur maashi tabdiliyon se guzara. Kuch Quebec ke rehaishi ziyada soobai khud mukhtari ya Canada se juzwi ya mukammal azadi par zor dene lage. Angrezi aur French bolne walon ka ikhtilaf bohat badh gaya. 1980 ke dauran mein hone wale referendum mein kasrat se aur 1995 mein hone wale doosre referendum mein logon ne 50.6% ki nisbat 49.4% ke mamooli se farq se Canada se azadi ko mustarad kar diya. Isi dauran mein 1997 mein Supreme Court ne is baat ko agarche mustarad kar diya lekin darain khana azadi ki tehreek chalti rahi. America ke saath maashi ittihad doosri jang e azeem ke baad se badhne laga. 1987 ke America-Canada azadana tijarat ke muahide se yeh baat mazeed wazeh hui. Maujooda dahaiyon mein Canada ke log apni saqafati khud mukhtari ke liye bohat pareshan hain kyunke TV shows, filmen aur companies bohat ziyada aam ho gayi hain. Taham Canada ko apne alamgeeri nizam e sehat par aur kaseer al saqafati mulk hone par fakhr hai. Canada mein Malika Elizabeth ke saath aaiini badshahat ka nizam qaim hai jo Canada ke sarbarah e mamlakat ka kaam sar anjam deti hain aur wafaqi tarz ki parlimani jamhooriyat ka nizam bhi hai aur is ki siyasi riwayaat bohat mazboot hain. Canada ka aain mulk ke qanooni dhanchay ki rooh hai aur yeh tahareer aur ghair tehreeri riwayaat aur rusumon par mushtamil hai. Aain mein Canada ka Azadi aur Huqooq ka Charter shamil hai jo Canada ke bashindon ko buniyadi insani huqooq aur azadi deta hai aur is ko koi bhi hukumat kisi bhi qanoon ke tehat khatam nahin kar sakti. Taham is mein ek aisi naqabil e qabool shiq shamil hai jis se wafaqi parliman aur soobai qanoon saaz assemblyon ko ijazat di gayi hai ke woh is Charter ke kuch hisson ko arzi taur par ziyada se ziyada paanch saal tak ke liye khatam kar sakte hain. Wazir e Azam ki haisiyat Canada ke hukumat sarbarah ki hai aur yeh umuman hukmaran siyasi party ka rehnuma hota hai jo aitmaad ka vote lene mein kamyab ho. Wazir e Azam aur us ki kabina ko Governor General, jo Malika ka numainda hota hai, ki taraf se baqaida muqarrar kiya jata hai. Taham Wazir e Azam kabina ko khud se muntakhab karta hai aur riwayaat ke mutabiq Governor General ko Wazir e Azam ke intikhab ko qabool karna hota hai. Umuman kabina Wazir e Azam ki apni jamaat hoti hai jo donon aiwanon se muntakhab hoti hai. Yeh log hukumat ke sab se ba ikhtiyar arkan hote hain aur un ka baqaida Privy Council ke samne halaf liya jata hai aur woh Taj ke matehat wuzara kehlata hain. Wazir e Azam apne ikhtiyarat ko siyasi aur hukoomati mamlaat mein istemal karta hai aur hukoomati o shehri ahalkaron ki tayinati ka faisla karta hai. Michaëlle Jean ne 25 September 2005 ko Governor General ka ohda sanbhala aur Stephen Harper jo Qadamat Parast Jamaat ke rehnuma hain, 6 February 2006 se Wazir e Azam chale aa rahe hain. Wafaqi parliman ek Malika aur do aiwanon par mushtamil hai ek Aiwan e Numaindagan jo barah e rast muntakhab ho kar aate hain aur doosre namzad karda arkan Senate. Har member baraye Aiwan e Numaindagan ka intikhab har halqe se saada aksariyat se hota hai aur aam intikhabat ka elaan Governor General Wazir e Azam ke mashware se karta hai. Parliment ki koi kam az kam muddat muqarrar nahin hai, lekin agle intikhabat pehle wale intikhabat se paanch saal ke andar andar hone lazmi hain. Senate ki nishasten jo ilaqai hawale se munqasim nishaston par hoti hai, par arkan ka intikhab Wazir e Azam karta hai aur is ki rasmi manzoori Governor General deta hai. Senate ke kul 75 arkan hote hain. Canada ki chaar badi siyasi jamaten hain. In ke naam yeh hain Qadamat Parast Party, Liberal Party, Nayi Jamhoori Party yani NDP, Bloc Québécois. Maujooda hukumat Qadamat Parast Party ki hai. Jabke Green Party aur digar chhoti jamaton ki is waqt parliman mein koi numaindagi nahin hai, tareekhi aitbar se siyasi partyon ki taweel fehrist maujood hai. Canada ki adliya qanoon ki taujeeh aur wazahat mein aham kirdar ada karti hai aur aain se mutasadam qawaneen ko khatam karne ki taqat bhi rakhti hai. Supreme Court of Canada yahan ki sab se badi adalat aur aakhri faisla kun authority hai. Is ki sarbarahi Janaba Madam Chief Justice Beverley McLachlin, PC hain. Is adalat ke kul nau arkan hote hain jin ka taqarrur Governor General Wazir e Azam ke mashware se karta hai. Isi tarah tamam aala aur appeal ki adalaton ke jajj'on ka taqarrur Wazir e Azam aur Wazir e Insaf aur digar ghair hukoomati qanoon se mutalliq idaron ke mashware se hota hai. Wafaqi kabina soobai aur riyasati level par aala adalaton mein jajj'on ki taqarruri karti hai. Matehat adalaton ki taqarruri soobai aur riyasati hukumaten khud se karti hain. Common Law ma siwaye Quebec, har jagah lagu hota hai. Quebec mein Civil Law ki hukmarani hai. Criminal Law mukammal taur par wafaqi zimmedari hai aur pure Canada mein yaksaan lagu hota hai. Qanoon nafiz karne wale idare bashumool Criminal Courts soobai zimmedari hote hain lekin aksar soobon mein yeh wafaqi Shahi Canada ki police se musta'aar liye jate hain. Canada ke America se bohat gehre taluqat hain. Donon ke beech duniya ki sab se badi mushtaraka sarhad hai jis ki nigrani nahin ki jati, baaz auqat fauji mashqon aur muhimmon mein taawun kiya jata hai aur donon ek doosre ke sab se bade tijarati haleef hain. Isi tarah Canada Britain aur France se purane aur tareekhi taluqat rakhta hai aur yehi do mumalik is ki buniyad ka sabab bane hain. Isi tarah Britain aur France ke doosre sabiq maqbooza ilaqon se bhi Canada ke taluqat hain. Yeh taluqat Commonwealth aur La Francophonie ki membership se bane hain. Saath saal ke dauran mein Canada ne apni pehchan batore kaseer al jehat ke hami ke taur par karai hai aur is silsile mein aalami tanaza jaat ke hal mein apna hissa dala hai. Suez buhran ke dauran yeh kirdar bohat numayan raha jab Lester B. Pearson ne bahali aman ke kaam ko aasaan banaya aur Aqwam Muttahida ke fauji dasta baraye aman ki tayinati ko mumkin banaya. Is hawale se Canada ne Aqwam Muttahida ke fauji karrawai baraye aman ki rehnumayi ki aur Aqwam Muttahida ki aman koshishon ko taqwiyat di. Canada ab tak 50 aman missions mein hissa le chuka hai jis mein 1989 se ab tak ke tamam bahali aman ke mission shamil hain. Hum keh sakte hain ke Canada ne aman ki bahali ke liye ikkisween sadi mein sab se aham kirdar ada kiya hai. NATO ke baani rukn ki haisiyat se Canada aaj kal taqriban 62,000 baqaida aur 26,000 reserve fauji bharti kar chuka hai. Canada ki afwaj barri, bahri aur fazai faujon se mil kar bani hai. Is fauj ke paas kul 1,400 jangi gadiyan hain aur 34 bahri jangi jahaz hain aur kul 861 ladaka hawai jahaz hain. Doosri Boer Jang, Pehli Jang e Azeem, Doosri Jang e Azeem aur Korean Jang mein shumooliyat ke ilawa Canada ne bain ul aqwami missions mein Aqwam Muttahida aur NATO ke liye bhi apni fauji quwwat ko 1950 se barqarar rakha hua hai jin mein aman mission, Yugoslavia mein hone wale mukhtalif missions aur pehli Khaleeji Jang mein ittehadi afwaj mein shirkat shamil hai. 2001 se ab tak Canada ke fauji daste Afghanistan mein American afwaj baraye istehkam aur Aqwam Muttahida ki zer e nigrani, NATO ki zer e nigrani International Security Assistance Force mein bhi kam kar rahe hain. Canada ki Disaster Assistance Response Team ne guzashta do saal mein teen bade operation kiye hain jin mein September 2005 ke Katrina Hurricane toofan, October 2005 mein Kashmir ke zalzale aur December 2004 mein Junubi Asia ke Tsunami shamil hain. Canada das soobon aur teen riyasaton ka majmooa hai. Soobajat ke naam Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland aur Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec aur Saskatchewan hain. Riyasaton mein Northwest Territories, Nunavut aur Yukon Territory shamil hain. Soobon ko wafaq ki janib se bohat ziyada khud mukhtari hasil hai aur riyasaton ko kuch kam azadi hasil hai. Isi tarah har ek ki apne soobai aur riyasati alamat hain. Soobajat ki zimmedariyon mein Canada ke samaji program shamil hain maslan healthcare, taleem aur falah o behbood waghera aur yeh sab soobe mil kar wafaq ke liye raqam jama karte hain. Canada ka yeh dhancha duniya mein wahid aur apni tarz ka anokha nizam hai. Wafaqi hukumat soobon mein qaumi policies bana sakti hai maslan Canada ka Health Act, jin mein se soobajat apni marzi ki policy muntakhab kar sakte hain agarche yeh bohat kam hi aisa hota hai. Barabari ke program yani Equalization Payments ke nizam ke tehat wafaq har soobe ko barabar raqam deta hai taake ghareeb aur ameer, har soobe ko har program ke liye yaksaan raqam mile. Tamam soobajat ki apni sirf ek assembly ya muqannina hota hai. Tamam arkan mil kar apne Premier ka intikhab karte hain aur phir yehi tareeqa car Wazir e Azam ke liye apnaya jata hai. Isi tarah har soobe mein Governor ka naib Lieutenant Governor bhi hota hai jo Malika ki numaindagi karta hai jis ka intikhab soobon ki mashawarat se Wazir e Azam khud karta hai. Aaj kal naib Governor ke intikhab mein soobon ka bohat amal dakhal ho gaya hai. Canada baraazam Shumali America ke Shumali bade hisse par mushtamil hai. Junub mein is ki sarhad America se milti hai aur shimal maghrib mein American riyasat Alaska waqe hai. Mashriq mein Bahr e Munjamid Shumali se le kar maghrib mein Bahr al-Kahil tak Canada phela hua hai. Is ke shimal mein Bahr e Munjamid Shumali maujood hai. 1925 se le kar ab tak Qutb e Shumali ka 60 degree se le kar 141 degree tool balad ki milkiyat ka yak tarfa dawa Canada karta hai agarche use aalami taur par mana nahin jata. Russia ke baad Canada duniya ka raqbe ke lehaaz se doosra bada mulk hai.
Siyasi soorat-e-haal Suriya ki khana janggi. Hafiz al-Assad ka inteqal 10 June 2000 ko hua. Un ke bete Bashar al-Assad ek aise intekhabat mein sadar Suriya muntakhab hue jis mein unhon ne bila muqabla hissa liya. Un ke intekhab ne Damascus ki bahar ki paidaish aur islahat ki ummeedon ko dekha, lekin 2001 ke mausam-e-khizan tak hukam ne is tehreek ko daba diya, is ke kuch sarkarda danishwaron ko qaid kar diya. Is ke bajaye, islahat market ki kuch islahat tak mehdood rahi hain. 5 October 2003 ko Israel ne Damascus ke qareeb ek jagah par bambari ki, yeh daawa kiya ke yeh Tehreek Jihad Islami dar Palestine ke arkan ke liye dehshatgardi ki tarbiyat ki sahulet hai. March 2004 mein Suri kurdon aur Arabon ke darmiyan shimal mashriqi shahar Qamishli mein jhadap hui. Qamishli aur al-Hasakah ke shaharon mein fasad ke aasar dekhe gaye. 2005 mein Suriya ne Lebanon mein apni fouji maujoodgi khatam kar di. 2005 mein Rafiq Hariri ka qatl bain ul aqwami mazammat ka baais bana aur Lebanon mein ek maqbool intifada ko mutaharik kiya, jise Dewdar Inqilab kaha jata hai jis ne Assad hukoomat ko apni 29 sala purani muddat ko Lebanon mein fouji qabze ko khatam karne par majboor kiya. 6 September 2007 ko, ghair mulki jet ladaka tayyaron ne, jin par Israeli hone ka shuba hai, mabina taur par Shumali Korea ke takneeki mahireen ke zer-e-ta'ameer ek mushtaba jauhari reactor ke khilaf Operation Orchard kiya. Suri khana janggi Suriya mein jari andaruni pur-tashaddud tanaza hai. Yeh wasee Arab Bahar ka ek hissa hai, jo poori Arab mumalik mein halchal ki lehar hai. Suriya bhar mein awami muzahire 26 January 2011 ko shuru hue aur mulk geer baghawat ki shakal ikhtiyar kar gaye. Muzahireen ne Sadar Bashar al-Assad ke istifa, un ki hukoomat ka takhta ultaane aur Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party - Suriya Ilaqa ki taqreeban paanch dahaiyon ki hukmarani ke ikhtitam ka mutalaba kiya. Mausam-e-bahar 2011 se, Suri hukoomat ne baghawat ko rokne ke liye Suri fouj ko ta'inat kiya, aur kai shaharon ka muhasara kar liya gaya, agarche be-amni jari rahi. Kuch aini shahideen ke mutabiq, foujiyon ne, jinhon ne shehrion par goli chalaane se inkar kar diya, Suri fouj ki taraf se sar-e-aam phansi de di gayi. Suri hukoomat ne inharaf ki khabron ki tardeed ki, aur musallah grohon par museebat paida karne ka ilzam lagaya. 2011 ke mausam-e-khizan ke awail se, aam shehrion aur fouj ke munharif afraad ne ladne wale units banana shuru kiye, jinhon ne Suri fouj ke khilaf shorish ki muhim shuru ki. Baaghi Azad Suri Fouj ke banner tale mutahid hue aur munazzam andaz mein lade. Taham, musallah opposition ke civilian hisse mein munazzam qiyadat ka fuqdan tha. Is baghawat mein firqawari rang hai, halankeh tanaza mein kisi bhi groh ne firqawariat ko aham kirdar ada karne ke taur par bayan nahin kiya hai. Hizb-e-ikhtilaf par Ahle Sunnat Musalmanon ka ghalba hai, jabkeh sarkarda hukoomati shakhsiyat Nusayriyah hain, Ahle Tashayyu se wabasta hain. Is ke nateeje mein, hizb-e-ikhtilaf ko Ahle Sunnat riyaston ki himayat hasil ho rahi hai, jabkeh hukoomat ko awami taur par Ahle Tashayyu aksariyat Iran aur Lubnani Hezbollah ki himayat hasil hai. Aqwam-e-Mutahidda samet mukhtalif zaraaye ke mutabiq, 13,470–19,220 tak log maare gaye hain, jin mein se taqreeban nisf aam shehri the, lekin dono taraf se 6,035–6,570 musallah jangju bhi shamil hain aur 1,400 opposition muzahireen bhi is mein shamil hain. Bohat se log zakhmi hue hain, aur dasiyon hazar muzahireen ko qaid kiya gaya hai. Suri hukoomat ke mutabiq, 9,815–10,146 afraad, jin mein security forces ke 3,430 arkan, 2,805–3,140 baaghi aur 3,600 aam shehri shamil hain, un ke sath ladai mein maare gaye hain jinhen woh musallah dehshatgard grohon ke taur par bayan karte hain. Tashaddud se bachne ke liye, dasiyon hazar Suri panah guzeen mulk chhod kar padosi mulk Urdun, Iraq aur Lebanon ke sath sath Turkiyah bhi chale gaye hain. Suri panah guzeenon ki Aqwam-e-Mutahidda ki kul sarkari ta'adad is waqt 42,000 tak pahunch gayi, jabkeh ghair sarkari ta'adad 130,000 tak pahunch gayi. UNICEF ne ittila di hai ke 500 se zyada bacche maare gaye hain, mazeed 400 bachon ko mabina taur par giraftar kar ke Suriya ki jailon mein tashaddud ka nishana banaya gaya hai. Dono daawon ka Suri hukoomat ne muqabla kiya hai. Mazeed bar'aan, 600 se za'id qaidi aur siyasi qaidi tashaddud se halak ho chuke hain. Human Rights Watch ne hukoomat aur Shabeeha par ilzam lagaya ke jab woh opposition ke zer-e-qabza ilaqon mein pesh qadmi karte hain toh woh shehrion ko insani dhaal ke taur par istemal karte hain. Hukoomat mukhalif baghion par insani huqooq ki khilaf warzion ke sath sath tashaddud, aghwa, ghair qanooni hirasat aur shehrion, Shabeeha aur foujiyon ko phansi dene ke ilzamat bhi a'id kiye gaye hain. Human Rights Watch ne Irani shehrion ke aghwa par bhi tashweesh ka izhar kiya. Aqwam-e-Mutahidda ke Commission of Inquiry ne apni February 2012 ki report mein bhi is nau'iyat ki ziyadation ko dastavezi shakal di hai, jis mein aisi dastavezaat bhi shamil hain jo is baat ki nishan dehi karti hain ke baaghi quwwatein shehrion ki naqal makani ki zimmedar hain. Arab League, Riyasat Haye Mutahidda, European Union ki riyastain, Khaleej Ta'awun Council ki riyastain, aur deegar mumalik ne muzahireen ke khilaf tashaddud ka istemal mazammat ki hai. Cheen aur Roos ne hukoomat ki mazammat ya pabandiyan lagane se gurez karte hue kaha hai ke is tarah ke tareeqe ghair mulki mudakhlat mein izafa kar sakte hain. Taham zyada tar mumalik ne fouji mudakhlat ko mustarad kar diya hai. Arab League ne bohraan par hukoomat ke rad-e-amal par Suriya ki rukniyat mo'attal kar di, lekin December 2011 mein bohraan ke pur aman hal ke liye apni tajweez ke hisse ke taur par ek mubassir mission bhi bheja. Bohraan ke hal ki taza tareen koshishen Mashriq-e-Wusta mein Suriya ke bohraan ke hal ke liye Kofi Annan ki ba-taur khaas elchi ki taqaruri ke zariye ki gayi hain. Taham kuch tajzia karon ne is ilaqa ki taqseem ko ek Ahle Sunnat Mashriq, Kurd Shumali aur Ahle Tashayyu/Alawi Maghrib mein taqseem kiya hai. Suriya ki tabah kun khana janggi ke barah saal baad, aisa lagta hai ke yeh tanaza ek munjamid halat mein tabdeel ho gaya hai.
