Agarche mulk ke taqriban 30 feesad hisse par mukhalif quwwaton ka control hai, lekin bhari ladai badi had tak khatam ho chuki hai aur Bashar al-Assad ki hukoomat ke sath ta'alluqat ko ma'amool par laane ki taraf ilaqai rujhan badh raha hai. December 2024 mein ek bar phir tashaddud ki lehar bhadak uthi. Islam pasand group Hayat Tahrir al-Sham ke zer-e-qiyadat baaghi dhadoon ne ek tez karwai mein Aleppo ka control sambhal liya, jis se Suri hukoomat ki afwaj ki taraf se jawabi fidai hamle ki muhim chalai gayi, Roosi Aerospace Forces ki taraf se himayat ki gayi. Baghion ke zer-e-qabza shahar Idlib mein abadi ke marakiz aur mutadid aspataalon ko nishana banane wale hamlon ke nateeje mein White Helmets Rescue Group ke mutabiq kam az kam 25 afraad halak hue. NATO ne ek mushtarka bayan jari kiya jis mein shehrion aur aham infrastructure ke tahaffuz par zor diya gaya taake mazeed naqal makani ko roka ja sake aur insani hamdardi ki bunyad par rasai ko yaqeeni banaya ja sake. Unhon ne Aqwam-e-Mutahidda ki Salamati Council ki Qaraardad 2254 ke mutabiq Suriya ki qiyadat mein siyasi hal ki fori zarurat par zor diya, jo Suri hukoomat aur opposition forces ke darmiyan baat cheet ki wakalat karta hai. Baghion ki jarhiyat, jo 27 November ko shuru hui thi, Aleppo par qabze ke baad sooba Hama ki jang mein apni pesh qadmi jari rakhi. 4 December ko Hama soobe mein shadeed jhapen shuru huien jab Suri fouj ne baghion ki foujon ko Hama ke aham shahar par apni pesh qadmi rokne ki koshish ki. Sarkari forces ne daawa kiya ke unhon ne fidai madad se jawabi karwai shuru ki hai, jis mein HTS samet baaghi dhadoon ko shahar se taqriban chhah meel door peechhe dhakel diya gaya hai. Taham, kumak ke bawajood baghion ne 5 December ko shahar par qabza kar liya. Ladai ke nateeje mein bade paimane par naqal makani hui, taqriban 50,000 log ilaqa se bhag gaye aur 600 se zyada halakatein huien, jin mein 104 shehri bhi shamil the. Baaghi afwaj 5 December ko Homs ke muzabaat mein pahunch gayin, shahar ke liye teen roza jang ka aaghaz kiya. Is ke sath hi, Southern Operations Room ki qiyadat mein ek awami baghawat ne 6 December tak junubi shaharon al-Suwayda aur Daraa par qabza kar liya, aur agle din tezi se Damascus ko ghere mein le liya. Homs par baghion ki afwaj ne 8 December ki subah qabza kar liya tha, jis se baghion ki pesh qadmi aur Damascus ke darmiyan hukoomat ka koi bada garh nahin bacha tha. Muhafaza Tartus aur Muhafaza Latakia ke Alawi garh se munqata', shimal aur junub dono taraf se baaghi pincer ka samna karna pada, aur hukoomat ke Roosi aur Irani madadgaron, Assad pasandon ki taraf se ghair mulki mudakhlat ki koi ummeed ke baghair hukoomat ke zer-e-qabza baqi mandah ilaqon par tezi se toot phoot hui; Suri Arab Fouj pighal gayi jab us ke sipahion ne apne hathyar aur wardiyan chhod dein, bohat se log sarhad par Iraq aur Lebanon ki taraf bhag gaye. Opposition forces ne 8 December ko dar-ul-hukoomat Damascus par qabza kar liya, Bashar al-Assad ki hukoomat ka takhta ulta diya aur mulk par Assad khandan ki 53 sala taweel hukmarani ka ikhtitam kiya. Bashar al-Assad apne khandan ke sath Moscow bhag gaya, jahan use panah di gayi.
Uboori Hukoomat Suriya Uboori Daur. Assad hukoomat ke ikhtitam ke baad, Assad ke naveen wazir-e-a'zam Muhammad Ghazi al-Jalali, hizb-e-ikhtilaf ki himayat aur Abu Muhammad al-Jolani, nigran ki haisiyat se apne ohde par faiz rahe. Muhammad al-Bashir ki qiyadat mein ek uboori hukoomat agle din tashkeel di gayi. Muhammad Ghazi al-Jalali ne naye intekhabat ka mutalaba kiya taake Suri awam apne naye qa'ideen ka intekhab kar saken. Assad hukoomat ke ikhtitam ke fauran baad, Israel ne Golan ki pahadiyon ke qareeb Khat Banafsji ke buffer zone par zamini hamla shuru kar diya, aur sath hi Suriya ke fouji depo aur bahri addo par fidai hamlon ka silsila shuru kar diya. Assad hukoomat ke ikhtitam se pehle, Muhammad al-Bashir ne Hukoomat Inqaz Suriya ki sarbarahi ki thi jise Idlib mein Hayat Tahrir al-Sham ne tashkeel diya tha, jo keh Islami askariyat pasand tanzeem hai jis ne December 2024 mein Assad ka takhta ultaane ki qiyadat ki thi. Nayi hukoomat taqriban wohi thi jo keh SSG ki thi. Syrian Network for Human Rights ki ek report ke mutabiq HTS ke naqideen aur mukhalifeen ko jabri gumshudgiyon aur tashaddud ki shaklon mein jabr ka nishana banaya gaya. Israeli Defense Forces ka daawa hai ke woh Ba'athi ke fouji dhanchaon ko tabah kar rahi hai, bashumool keemiyai hathiyaron ke plant, taake baaghi unhen istemal na kar saken. Assad hukoomat ke ikhtitam ke bawajood Shumali Suriya mein Turkiyah ki himayat yafta Syrian National Army ke jangjuon ne Amreeki himayat yafta Syrian Democratic Forces ke khilaf 11 December ko jang bandi hone tak apni jarhiyat jari rakhi. Uboori hukoomat ne Masihion aur deegar aqalliyaton ko baghair kisi mudakhlat ke apne mazhab par amal karne ki ijazat dene ka wa'ada kiya hai. Taham, is par shukook-o-shubhaat ka samna raha hai kyunke kuch baaghi quwwaton ke Al-Qaeda aur ISIS se rabte the. Nayi hukoomat ki taraf se hizb-e-ikhtilaf ke jhande ke sath Islami parcham ke istemal ne bhi tashweesh mein izafa kiya. 12 December 2024 ko, uboori hukoomat ke tarjuman ne Agence France-Presse se baat karte hue kaha ke hukoomat ki teen mah ki muddat ke dauran, aa'in aur parliament ko mo'attal kar diya jayega aur yeh keh aa'in mein tarmeem karne se pehle ek 'adalti aur insani huqooq committee' qa'im ki jayegi jo is mamle ka jaiza legi. 29 January 2025 ko Sadarati Mahal mein Suri Inqilab Fatah Conference ke dauran Suri General Command ne Ahmed al-Sharaa ko uboori daur ke liye sadar muqarrar kiya jab woh Assad hukoomat ke ikhtitam ke baad de facto leader ke taur par khidmat anjam de chuke the. March 2025 ko, Mamlakat-e-Mutahidda mein muqeem SOHR ne report kiya ke Suri security forces aur hukoomat ke haami jangjuon ne Maghribi Suriya mein jhapen ke dauran 1500 se zyada Alawi shehrion ka qatl-e-aam kiya hai. 10 March 2025 ko, SDF ne Suriya ki Musallah Afwaj ke sath mundamaj hone par ittefaq kiya jab SDF ke rehnuma Mazloum Abdi ne Ahmed al-Sharaa se mulaqat ki. 29 March 2025 ko Suriya ki doosri uboori hukoomat ka a'elan Suri Sadar Ahmed al-Sharaa ne Damascus ke Sadarati Mahal mein ek taqreeb mein kiya, jis mein naye wuzra ne halaf liya aur apne agenda ka khaka pesh karte hue taqreerein kin. Hukoomat ne Suriya ki pehli uboori hukoomat ki jagah le li, jo 8 December 2024 ko Assad hukoomat ke ikhtitam ke baad qa'im hui thi.
Geographia. Suriya arz-ul-balad 32° aur 38° shumal, aur tul-ul-balad 35° aur 43° mashriq ke darmiyan waqe' hai. Aab-o-hawa martub bahira-e-Rum ke sahil se lekar, neem khushk maidani ilaqa se, mashriq mein khushk sehra tak mukhtalif hoti hai. Mulk zyada tar banjar satah murtafa par mushtamil hai, halankeh Bahira-e-Rum se muttasil shimal maghribi hissa kaafi sabz hai. Shimal mashriq mein Jazeera Furat aur junub mein Hawran aham zarai ilaqe hain. Darya-e-Furat, Suriya ka sab se aham darya, mashriq mein mulk se guzarta hai. Suriya un pandrah mumalik mein se ek hai jo nam-nahad Tahzeeb ka Gahwara par mushtamil hai. Is ki zameen Arab Takhti ke shimal maghrib mein phaili hui hai. Is ilaqa mein taqriban 185,180 murabba kilometer sehra, maidani ilaqe aur pahad shamil hain. Ise sahili ilaqa mein taqseem kiya gaya hai — ek tang, double pahadi patti ke sath jo maghrib mein afsurdagi ko ghere hue hai — aur ek bohat bada mashriqi satah murtafa. Aab-o-hawa bunyadi taur par khushk hai; mulk ke taqriban teen paanchwein hisse mein saalana 250 millimeter (9.84 inch) se kam barish hoti hai. Zarkhez zameen riyasat ka sab se aham qudrati waseela hai, aur aabpashi ke mansoobon ke zariye qabil-e-kasht zameen ki miqdar ko badhane ki koshishen ki gayi hain. Mulk ki aabi guzargahen is ki zarai taraqqi ke liye intehai ahmiyat ki hamil hain. Sab se taweel aur aham tareen darya Furat hai jo Suriya ke 80 feesad se zyada aabi wasail ki numaindagi karta hai. Is ke bayein kinare ki aham mu'awin nadiyan, Balikh aur Khabur, chhote barhamasi darya hain jo dono Turkiyah ke sarhadi ilaqa mein nikalte hain. Furat ke dayein kinare ki mu'awin nadiyan zyada tar chhoti mausami nadiyan hain jinhen wadis kehte hain. 1973 mein Suriya ne al-Raqqa shahar se oopar ki taraf darya-e-Furat par Tabqa Dam ki tameer mukammal ki. Dam ne Lake Assad ke naam se ek zakheera banaya, jo taqriban 80 kilometer lamba aur ausatan aath kilometer chaudai hai.
Hayatiyati Tanavvu. Suriya mein char zamini maholiati khitton par mushtamil hai Suriya ke zerak ghaas ke maidan aur jhaadi wale maidan, Mashriqi Bahira-e-Rum ke makhrooti-sclerophyllous-broadleaf janglat, Janubi Anatolia ke Montane Conifer aur parnpati janglat, aur Mesopotamia ke jhaadi wale sehra. Mulk ka 2019 Forest Landscape Integrity Index yani 3.64/10 ka score tha, jo use 172 mumalik mein aalami satah par 144wen number par rakhta hai. Suriya ki jungli hayat Bahira-e-Rum ke Mashriqi sire par waqe' Suriya ke nabatat aur haywanat hain. Is ki sahili patti ke ilawa, mulk ka ek sahili maidan, maghrib mein pahadi silsile, markaz mein neem banjar maidani ilaqa hai jo mulk ke bishter hisse par qabiz hai, aur mashriq mein sehrai ilaqa. In zones mein se har ek ki apni khasusiyat wale janwar aur paude hain. Mulk ko mukhtalif nabatati ilaqon ke darmiyan ek sangam par samjha ja sakta hai aur nabatat teen bar-e-a'zam, Europe, Asia aur Africa ke asraat ko zahir karti hain. Maujooda maghribi hawain sahil ke qareeb zyada barish laati hain aur sahili pahadi silsilon ke maghribi janib ki nabatat mashriqi janib se mukhtalif hoti hain, jo ek bar phir andaruni mulk pahadi silsilon se aur ek bar phir khushk sali se bachne wale paudon se mukhtalif hoti hain.
March 2025 ko, Mamlakat-e-Mutahidda mein muqeem SOHR ne report kiya ke Suri security forces aur hukoomat ke haami jangjuon ne Maghribi Suriya mein jhapen ke dauran 1500 se zyada Alawi shehrion ka qatl-e-aam kiya hai. 10 March 2025 ko, SDF ne Suriya ki Musallah Afwaj ke sath mundamaj hone par ittefaq kiya jab SDF ke rehnuma Mazloum Abdi ne Ahmed al-Sharaa se mulaqat ki. 29 March 2025 ko Suriya ki doosri uboori hukoomat ka a'elan Suri Sadar Ahmed al-Sharaa ne Damascus ke Sadarati Mahal mein ek taqreeb mein kiya, jis mein naye wuzra ne halaf liya aur apne agenda ka khaka pesh karte hue taqreerein kin. Hukoomat ne Suriya ki pehli uboori hukoomat ki jagah le li, jo 8 December 2024 ko Assad hukoomat ke ikhtitam ke baad qa'im hui thi.
Geographia. Suriya arz-ul-balad 32° aur 38° shumal, aur tul-ul-balad 35° aur 43° mashriq ke darmiyan waqe' hai. Aab-o-hawa martub bahira-e-Rum ke sahil se lekar, neem khushk maidani ilaqa se, mashriq mein khushk sehra tak mukhtalif hoti hai. Mulk zyada tar banjar satah murtafa par mushtamil hai, halankeh Bahira-e-Rum se muttasil shimal maghribi hissa kaafi sabz hai. Shimal mashriq mein Jazeera Furat aur junub mein Hawran aham zarai ilaqe hain. Darya-e-Furat, Suriya ka sab se aham darya, mashriq mein mulk se guzarta hai. Suriya un pandrah mumalik mein se ek hai jo nam-nahad Tahzeeb ka Gahwara par mushtamil hai. Is ki zameen Arab Takhti ke shimal maghrib mein phaili hui hai. Is ilaqa mein taqriban 185,180 murabba kilometer sehra, maidani ilaqe aur pahad shamil hain. Ise sahili ilaqa mein taqseem kiya gaya hai — ek tang, double pahadi patti ke sath jo maghrib mein afsurdagi ko ghere hue hai — aur ek bohat bada mashriqi satah murtafa. Aab-o-hawa bunyadi taur par khushk hai; mulk ke taqriban teen paanchwein hisse mein saalana 250 millimeter (9.84 inch) se kam barish hoti hai. Zarkhez zameen riyasat ka sab se aham qudrati waseela hai, aur aabpashi ke mansoobon ke zariye qabil-e-kasht zameen ki miqdar ko badhane ki koshishen ki gayi hain. Mulk ki aabi guzargahen is ki zarai taraqqi ke liye intehai ahmiyat ki hamil hain. Sab se taweel aur aham tareen darya Furat hai jo Suriya ke 80 feesad se zyada aabi wasail ki numaindagi karta hai. Is ke bayein kinare ki aham mu'awin nadiyan, Balikh aur Khabur, chhote barhamasi darya hain jo dono Turkiyah ke sarhadi ilaqa mein nikalte hain. Furat ke dayein kinare ki mu'awin nadiyan zyada tar chhoti mausami nadiyan hain jinhen wadis kehte hain. 1973 mein Suriya ne al-Raqqa shahar se oopar ki taraf darya-e-Furat par Tabqa Dam ki tameer mukammal ki. Dam ne Lake Assad ke naam se ek zakheera banaya, jo taqriban 80 kilometer lamba aur ausatan aath kilometer chaudai hai.
Hayatiyati Tanavvu. Suriya mein char zamini maholiati khitton par mushtamil hai Suriya ke zerak ghaas ke maidan aur jhaadi wale maidan, Mashriqi Bahira-e-Rum ke makhrooti-sclerophyllous-broadleaf janglat, Janubi Anatolia ke Montane Conifer aur parnpati janglat, aur Mesopotamia ke jhaadi wale sehra. Mulk ka 2019 Forest Landscape Integrity Index yani 3.64/10 ka score tha, jo use 172 mumalik mein aalami satah par 144wen number par rakhta hai. Suriya ki jungli hayat Bahira-e-Rum ke Mashriqi sire par waqe' Suriya ke nabatat aur haywanat hain. Is ki sahili patti ke ilawa, mulk ka ek sahili maidan, maghrib mein pahadi silsile, markaz mein neem banjar maidani ilaqa hai jo mulk ke bishter hisse par qabiz hai, aur mashriq mein sehrai ilaqa. In zones mein se har ek ki apni khasusiyat wale janwar aur paude hain. Mulk ko mukhtalif nabatati ilaqon ke darmiyan ek sangam par samjha ja sakta hai aur nabatat teen bar-e-a'zam, Europe, Asia aur Africa ke asraat ko zahir karti hain. Maujooda maghribi hawain sahil ke qareeb zyada barish laati hain aur sahili pahadi silsilon ke maghribi janib ki nabatat mashriqi janib se mukhtalif hoti hain, jo ek bar phir andaruni mulk pahadi silsilon se aur ek bar phir khushk sali se bachne wale paudon se mukhtalif hoti hain.
Hukoomat aur Siyasat. Ba'd Ba'athi Suriya. Suriya is waqt 8 December 2024 ko suqoot nizam al-Assad ke baad ek siyasi muntaqili se guzar raha hai. Muhammad al-Bashir ki sarbarahi mein Suriya ki uboori hukoomat ne 1 March 2025 tak mulk par hukoomat karne ke liye tashkeel diya gaya hai. Suriya ke aa'in aur parliament ko 12 December 2024 ko uboori muddat ke liye mo'attal kar diya gaya tha. 29 January 2025 ko Sadarati Mahal mein Suri Inqilab Fatah Conference ke dauran, Suriya ki General Command ne Ahmed al-Sharaa ko uboori muddat ke liye sadar muqarrar kiya jab woh Assad hukoomat ke ikhtitam ke baad darhaqeeqat rehnuma ke taur par khidmat anjam de chuke the. 13 March 2025 ko Ahmed al-Sharaa ne uboori aa'in ki tauseeq ki, jo paanch saal ke liye kaaramad hoga. Aa'in wazir-e-a'zam ke ohde ke baghair sadarati nizam ka ta'ayyun karta hai. Awami Assembly ka qayam paanch sala inteqal ke dauran ek uboori parliament ke taur par kaam karne ke liye kiya gaya hai, jo ek naye mustaqil aa'in ke masawwade ki nigrani karti hai. 29 March 2025 ko Ahmed al-Sharaa ki janib se Damascus ke Sadarati Mahal mein ek taqreeb mein doosri Suri uboori hukoomat ka a'elan kiya gaya, jis mein naye wuzra ne halaf uthaya aur apne agenda ka khaka pesh karte hue taqareer kin. Hukoomat ne Suriya ki pehli uboori hukoomat ki jagah le li, jo 8 December 2024 ko Assad hukoomat ke ikhtitam ke baad tashkeel di gayi thi.
Ba'athi Suriya (1963–2024). Suriya ek sadarati nizam ki riyasat hai jo namzad taur par aise afraad ki ummidwari ki ijazat deti hai jo Ba'ath ke zer-e-control National Progressive Front ka hissa nahin bante. Is ke bawajood Suriya ek jama'ati riyasat hai jis mein ek wasee' gupt police ka nizam maujood hai jo kisi bhi azad siyasi sargarmi ko rokta hai. Suri hizb-e-ikhtilaf ki shirkat ke baghair Assad hukoomat ki taraf se yake baad deegare muta'arif karaye gaye naye aa'in ne aiwan-e-saddar ko ghair ma'amooli ikhtiyarat de kar apne aamirana kirdar ko taqwiyat di hai aur ek siyasi jama'aton ki ijazat ke zimmedar Ba'athi Siyasi Committee badastoor qa'im hai. Hukmaran Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party - Suriya Ilaqa ki ek mutlaq al-inan police riyasat ke taur par hukoomat karti hai, Suri Musallah Afwaj aur Security aalaat ke zariye is ka control kiya jata hai. Freedom House ki taraf se 2023 mein shaya hone wali saalana report ka Edition of Freedom in World, Suriya ko Azad Nahin mumalik mein Badtareen mein se Badtareen qarar deta hai aur use sab se kam score (1/100) Janubi Sudan ke sath deta hai. Sadar Suriya sarbarah riyasat hai, aur Wazir-e-A'zam Suriya baraye naam taur par sarbarah hukoomat hai, halankeh nizam mein asal taqat aiwan-e-saddar ke paas hai. Muqanninah, Peoples Council, qawaneen ki manzuri, hukoomati mukhtasate ki manzuri aur policy par bahas karne ka zimmedar idara hai. Sada majority se tehreek adam e'timad ki soorat mein, Wazir-e-A'zam ko apni hukoomat ka istifa sadar ko pesh karna hota hai. Hafiz al-Assad ki hukmarani ke baad se, Suriya ka Ba'athi siyasi nizam shakhsiyat ke ek jame' firqe ke gird markooz raha hai jo Assad khandan par markooz hai; fouji aalaat, gupt police aur siyasi establishment mein kaleedi ohdon par Ba'ath Party ke Alawi wufadaron ka ghalba hai. Executive branch Sadar Suriya, do Naib Sadar Suriya, Wazir-e-A'zam, aur Wuzra ki Council (Cabinet) par mushtamil hoti hai. Aa'in mein sadar ka Musalman hona zaruri hai lekin Islam ko riyasati mazhab nahin banata. 31 January 1973 ko Hafiz al-Assad ne ek naya aa'in nafiz kiya jis ki wajah se qaumi bohraan paida ho gaya. Pichle aa'in ke baraks, is mein Suriya ke sadar ke Musalman hone ki zarurat nahin thi, jis ke nateeje mein Hama, Homs aur Aleppo mein Ikhwan al-Muslimeen ke riwayati ulama zer-e-ihtimam shadeed muzahire hue. Unhon ne Assad ko Allah ka Dushman qarar diya aur us ki hukmarani ke khilaf jihad ki appeal ki. Hukoomat 1976 aur 1982 ke darmiyan, jabr aur qatl-e-aam ke ek silsile ke zariye, zyada tar Ikhwan al-Muslimeen ke Islam pasandon ki qiyadat mein musallah baghawaton ke ek silsile se bach gayi. Aa'in sadar ko yeh haq deta hai ke woh wuzra ki taqaruri kare, jang aur hungami halat ka a'elan kare, qawaneen jari kare (jis mein hungami soorat-e-hal ke ilawa Awami Council se tauseeq ki zarurat hoti hai), aam ma'afi ka a'elan karne, aa'in mein tarmeem karne, aur sarkari mulazimeen aur fouji ahalakaron ki taqaruri kare. 2012 ke aa'in ke mutabiq Sadar Suriya ka intekhab Suri shehri barah-e-rast intekhabat mein karte hain. Suriya ki qanoon saaz shakh (muqanninah) yak aiwani Awami Council hai. Pichle aa'in ke tehat, Suriya ne muqanninah ke liye kasir al-jama'ati intekhabat nahin karwaye the, jis mein do tihai nishisten khud ba khud hukmaran ittehad ke liye mukhtas ho jati thin. 7 May 2012 ko Suriya ne apne pehle intekhabat munaqqid kiye jin mein hukmaran ittehad se bahar ki jama'atein hissa le sakti thin. Intekhabat mein saat nayi siyasi jama'aton ne hissa liya, jin mein Popular Front for Change and Liberation sab se badi opposition jama'at thi. Taham hukoomat mukhalif Suri Hizb-e-Ikhtilaf Ittehad ne ummedwar khade na karne ka intekhab kiya aur apne haamion se intekhabat ka boycott karne ki appeal ki. Awami Council bunyadi taur par Suriya ke yak jama'ati nizam ki tauseeq karne aur Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party - Suriya Ilaqa ki qanoon sazi ki karwai ki dobara tasdeeq karne ke liye ek idare ke taur par kaam karti hai. 2008 tak Sadar Suriya mein Ba'ath Party ke ilaqai secretary aur National Progressive Front hukoomati ittehad ke rehnuma hain. Kurdon jaisi nasli aqalliyaton ko koi saqafati ya lisani huqooq hasil nahin hain aur Kurd siyasi jama'aton ki sargarmion par pabandi hai. Suriya mein koi azad adliyah nahin hai, kyunke tamam jajj aur prosecutors ka Ba'athi taqarur hona zaruri hai. Suriya ki adalti shakhon mein Supreme Aaini Adalat, High Judicial Council, Adalat ki Adalat, aur Riyasati Salamati ki Adalatein shamil hain. Islami fiqh qanoon sazi ka ek aham zariya hai aur Suriya ke adalti nizam mein Usmani, French aur Islami Shari'at qawaneen ke anasir hain. Suriya mein adalatton ke teen darje hain pehli misal ki adalatein, appeal ki adalatein, aur Aaini Adalat, a'ala tareen tribunal. Mazhabi adalatein zaati aur a'ili qawaneen ke sawalat ko nimtati hain. Supreme State Security Court ko Sadar Bashar al-Assad ne 21 April 2011 ko qanoon sazi ke hukum number 53 ke zariye khatam kar diya tha. 1953 ka Zaati Haisiyat ka Qanoon 59 (1975 ke Qanoon 34 ke zariye tarmeem shuda) bunyadi taur par ek codified Shari'at hai. 1973 ke aa'in ka Article 3 (2) Islami fiqh ko qanoon sazi ka ek aham zariya qarar deta hai. Zaati Haisiyat ka Zabita Shar'i Adalatton ke zariye Musalmanon par laagoo hota hai. Jari khana janggi ke nateeje mein, mukhtalif mutabadil hukoomatein tashkeel di gayin, jin mein Suriya ki Uboori Hukoomat, Democratic Union Party aur Shar'i Qanoon ke tehat chalne wale muqami ilaqe shamil hain. Suriya ki Uboori Hukoomat ke numaindon ko 28 March 2013 ko Arab League mein Suriya ki nishast lene ke liye mad'u kiya gaya tha aur ko Riyasat Haye Mutahidda, Mamlakat-e-Mutahidda aur France samet kai mumalik ne Suriya ke awam ka wahid numainda tasleem kiya tha. Suriya ke intekhabat ek fareb amal ke zariye karaye jate hain; wasee' paimane par intekhabi dhulee, bar bar voting aur voter registration ki adam maujoodgi aur tasdeeqi nizam ki khasusiyat shamil hain. 13 April 2016 ko Suriya ke hukoomati control wale ilaqon mein Suriya ki yak aiwani muqanninah, Majlis al-Sha'ab, ya Suriya ki Awami Council ki tamam 250 nishaston ke liye parliamani intekhabat hue. Nata'ij ke a'elan se pehle hi, Germany, Riyasat Haye Mutahidda aur Mamlakat-e-Mutahidda samet kai mumalik ne nata'ij ko qabool karne se inkar ka a'elan kiya hai, aur zyada tar yeh kaha hai ke yeh Suri awam ki marzi ki numaindagi nahin kar raha hai. Taham Roosi Federation ke numaindon ne is intekhabat ke nata'ij ki himayat ka izhar kiya hai. Mukhtalif azad mubassireen aur bain ul aqwami tanzeemon ne Assad hukoomat ke intekhabi tarz-e-amal ko ek dhoka dehi qarar diya hai. Aqwam-e-Mutahidda ne baghair mandate ke ghair qanooni intekhabat ke taur par is ki mazammat ki. Electoral Integrity Project ki 2022 ki aalami report mein Suriya ke intekhabat ko duniya mein badtareen intekhabi salimiyat ke sath Comoros aur Wast African Republic ke sath ek pichhwade ke taur par namzad kiya gaya hai. Suri Khana Janggi ke dauran tashkeel paane wali teen mutabadil hukoomatein, Suriya ki Uboori Hukoomat (2013 mein tashkeel di gayi), Shumali aur Mashriqi Suriya ki Khud Mukhtar Intizamiyah (Rojava) (2016 mein tashkeel di gayi) aur Suri Salvation Government (tashkeel di gayi. 2017 mein), mulk ke shumali hisse ko control karta hai aur Suri Arab Jamhuriya se azadana taur par kaam karta hai.
Intizami Taqseem. Suriya ko 14 muhafazaat mein taqseem kiya gaya hai, jo 61 azla' mein zubdi taqseem hain, jinhen mazeed zubdi azla' mein taqseem kiya gaya hai. Shumali aur Mashriqi Suriya ki Khud Mukhtar Intizamiyah jabkeh darhaqeeqat khud mukhtar ikai ko mulk ki taraf se is tarah tasleem nahin kiya jata hai.
Shumali aur Mashriqi Suriya ki Khud Mukhtar Intizamiyah jise Rojava ke naam se bhi jana jata hai, shumal mashriqi Suriya mein ek haqeeqi khud mukhtar ilaqa hai. Yeh Afrin ilaqa, Jazeera ilaqa, Furat ilaqa, al-Raqqa, al-Thawra, Manbij aur Muhafaza Deir ez-Zor ke ilaqon mein khud mukhtar zubdi ilaqon par mushtamil hai. Is khitte ne 2012 mein jari Rojava tanaza aur wasee' tar Suri khana janggi ke tanazur mein apni asal khud mukhtari hasil ki, jis mein is ki sarkari fouji quwwat, Syrian Democratic Forces ne hissa liya. Kuch ghair mulki ta'alluqat ko mad-e-nazar rakhte hue, is khitte ko sarkari taur par Suriya ki hukoomat ya kisi bhi riyasat ne khud mukhtar tasleem nahin kiya hai halankeh use ilaqai Catalan Parliament ne tasleem kiya hai. Shumali aur Mashriqi Suriya ki Khud Mukhtar Intizamiyah ko deegar siyasi jama'aton aur tanzeemon ke sath mukalme mein apni aafaqi jamhoori, payedar, khud mukhtar taksiri, masawi, aur huqooq-e-niswan ki policies ke liye wasee' himayat hasil hai. Shimal mashriqi Suriya kasir al-nasl hai aur bade paimane par nasli Kurd, Arab aur Ashuri abadiyon ka ghar hai, jin mein Suri Turkoman, Armenian, Adyghe ki chhoti baradarian aur Yazidi. Khitte ki intizamiyah ke haamion ka kehna hai ke yeh sarkari taur par ek secular siyasat hai jis mein bila wasita jamhoori intekhabi azai'm ek naraj, huqooq-e-niswan, aur azadi pasand socialist nazariya jo wikendrit, jinsi masawat, maholiati payedari, samaji maholiyat aur mazhab ke liye taksiri rawadari, saqafati aur siyasi tanavvu, aur yeh ke yeh is ke aa'in, ma'ashre aur siyasat mein aqdar ki akasi ki gayi hai, jis mein kaha gaya hai ke yeh mukammal taur par azadi ki bajaye ek wafaqi Suriya ke liye ek namuna hai. Khitte ki intizamiyah par aamiryat, Suri hukoomat ki himayat, kurdiyat, aur naqal makani ke ba'az muta'assib aur ghair muta'assib zaraaye ne bhi ilzam lagaya hai. Taham, is ke bawajood Shumali aur Mashriqi Suriya ki Khud Mukhtar Intizamiyah Suriya mein sab se zyada jamhoori nizam raha hai, jis mein barah-e-rast khule intekhabat, khitte ke andar aalamgeer masawat, neez Sham ke andar aqalliyaton aur mazhabi huqooq ke difa ke sath hai. 13 October 2019 ko, Syrian Democratic Forces ne a'elan kiya ke us ne Suri fouj ke sath ek mu'ahida kiya hai jis ke tehat mo'akhar-ul-zikr ko Syrian Democratic Forces ke zer-e-qabza shaharon Manbij aur Kobani mein dakhil hone ki ijazat di gayi hai taake un par Turkiyah ke hamle ko roka ja sake. Turkiyah aur Turkiyah ke himayat yafta Suri baghion ki sarhad par karwai ke hisse ke taur par shahar ko mehfooz kiya ja sake. Suri fouj ne bhi Suriya ke shumal mein Syrian Democratic Forces ke sath mil kar Suriya aur Turkiyah ki sarhad par ta'inat kiya aur Syrian Democratic Forces ke zer-e-qabza kai shaharon jaise Ain Issa aur Tel Tamer mein dakhil hue. Doosre Shumali Suri buffer zone ke qayam ke baad Syrian Democratic Forces ne kaha ke agar Suri hukoomat aur Syrian Democratic Forces ke darmiyan siyasi samajhauta ho jata hai toh woh Suri fouj ke sath ta'awun ke sath kaam karne ke liye tayyar hai.
Kharija Ta'alluqat. Qaumi salamati ko yaqeeni banana, is ke Arab padosion ke darmiyan asar-o-rasookh mein izafa, aur Golan ki pahadiyon ki wapsi ko yaqeeni banana, Suriya ki kharija policy ke bunyadi maqasid rahe hain. Apni tareekh ke kai mo'add par, Suriya ne apne Jughrafiyai taur par saqafati padosion, jaise Turkiyah, Israel, Iraq aur Lebanon ke sath shadeed tanaw dekha hai. Arab Bahar aur Suri khana janggi se pehle Suriya ne ikkiswein sadi mein apne khitte ki kai riyaston ke sath ta'alluqat mein behtari ka lutf uthaya. 2011 ki jari khana janggi, aur is se munsalik halakaton aur insani huqooq ki khilaf warzion ke baad se, Suriya khitte ke mumalik aur wasee' tar aalami baradari se tezi se alag thalag hota ja raha hai. Mamlakat-e-Mutahidda, Canada, France, Italy, Germany, Tunis, Egypt, Libya, Riyasat Haye Mutahidda, Belgium, Spain aur Khaleej-e-Faris ki Arab Riyaston samet kai mumalik ke sath safarti ta'alluqat munqata' ho chuke hain. Arab League se Suriya Algeria, Egypt, Iraq, Lebanon, Sudan aur Yemen ke sath safarti ta'alluqat barqarar rakhe hue hai. 2011 ke Suri Inqilab ke Arab Bahar ke muzahiron ke pur tashaddud dabao ke baad, Suriya ki hukoomat ko November 2011 mein Arab League se 2023 mein us ki bahali tak 11 saal se za'id arse ke liye mo'attal kar diya gaya tha. Suriya ne Bahira-e-Rum ki Union ko bhi chhod diya. 11 saal baad Arab League ne Suriya ko dobara tasleem kiya. Tanzeem Ta'awun Islami ne August 2012 mein Bashar al-Assad ki wafadar afwaj ki taraf se qatl-e-aam aur ghair insani karwaiyon par gehri tashweesh ka hawala dete hue Suriya ko mo'attal kar diya.
Bain ul Aqwami Tanaza'at. 1939 mein jab Suriya abhi tak French Ta'ahhud Baraye Suriya aur Lebanon tha, Frenchion ne Doosri Jang-e-Azeem mein dosti ke mu'ahide ke ek hisse ke taur par Sanjak Iskenderun ko Turkiyah mein shamil hone ke bare mein rai shumari ki ijazat di. Is ko aasan banane ke liye, ek naqis election karaya gaya jis mein nasli Turk jo asal mein Sanjak se the lekin Adana aur Turkiyah mein sarhad ke qareeb deegar ilaqon mein rehte the, intekhabat mein vote daalne ke liye shift ho gaye aur alahdagi ke haq mein vote dala. Is ke zariye Turkiyah ka sooba Hatay qa'im hua. France ka yeh iqdaam Suriya mein bohat mutanaza tha aur sirf paanch saal baad Suriya azad hua. Sanjak Iskenderun ke Turkiyah ke ilhaq ke bawajood Suriya ki hukoomat ne azadi ke baad se is ilaqa par Turkiyah ki khudmukhtari ko tasleem karne se inkar kar diya hai, siwaye 1949 ke ek mukhtasar arse ke. Suriya ke Golan Pahadiyan ka maghribi do tihai ilaqa 1967 se Israel ke qabze mein hai aur 1981 mein Israel ne mo'assar tareeqe se un par qabza kar liya tha. Jabkeh mashriqi teesra hissa Suriya ke zer-e-control hai, UNDOF ne Khat Banafsji ki jang bandi ko nafiz karne ke liye darmiyan mein ek buffer zone barqarar rakha hua hai. Israel ka 1981 ka Golan Pahadiyan par qabze ka qanoon bain ul aqwami qanoon mein tasleem nahin kiya gaya hai. Aqwam-e-Mutahidda ki Salamati Council ne Qaraardad 497 (1981) mein is ki mazammat ki hai ke use batil aur bain ul aqwami qanooni asar ke baghair qarar diya gaya hai. Is ke baad se, Maqbooza Suri Golan ke bare mein General Assembly ki qaraardadein Israeli qabze aur ilhaq ke ghair qanooni hone ki tasdeeq karti hain. Suri hukoomat is ilaqa ki wapsi ka mutalaba karti rehti hai. Golan mein Suriya ke paas wahid baqi mandah zameen hai jis mein ek tark kar diya gaya shahar Quneitra, muhafaza ka asal dar-ul-hukoomat Madinat al-Ba'ath aur bohat se chhote dehaat hain, jaise Beer Ajam aur Hader jin ki zyada tar abadi Adyghe qaum ki hai. March 2019 mein, Amreeki Sadar Donald Trump ne a'elan kiya ke Riyasat Haye Mutahidda Golan ki Pahadiyon par Israel ke ilhaq ko tasleem karegi. 1976 ke awail mein, Suriya ne Lebanon mein dakhil ho kar apni unntis sala fouji maujoodgi ka aaghaz kiya. Suriya ne us waqt ke Maronite Masihi Sadar Suleiman Frangieh ki da'wat par Lubnani Masihi milishiaon ki Filistini milishiaon ke khilaf madad karne ke liye dakhil kiya tha. Agle 15 saal ki Lubnani khana janggi ke dauran, Suriya ne Lebanon par control ke liye jang ladi. Lebanon ke sabiq Wazir-e-A'zam Rafiq Hariri ke qatl ke baad mulki aur bain ul aqwami dabao ke jawab mein Suri fouj 26 April 2005 tak Lebanon mein maujood rahi. 2014 mein apni pehli do reporton mein, Aqwam-e-Mutahidda ke bain ul aqwami azad tahqeeqi commission ne ishara kiya tha ke Suri hukoomat is qatl se munsalik ho sakti hai. 2005 ke bomb dhamakon ke zimmedaron ke khilaf qanooni karwai karne wale wukala ka kehna tha ke unhen is case se Bashar al-Assad ke phone ke munsalik ke shahadat mile hain. Apni daswein report mein, Aqwam-e-Mutahidda ka bain ul aqwami azad tahqeeqi commission ne yeh nateeja akhaz kiya ke afraad ke ek network ne Rafiq Hariri ke qatl ko anjam dene ke liye ijtemai taur par kaam kiya. Ek aur mutanaza ilaqa Shebaa Farms hai jo Lebanon aur Suriya ki sarhad aur Israel ke zer-e-qabza Golan ki Pahadiyon ke darmiyan waqe' hai. 11 kilometer taweel aur taqriban 3 kilometer chaude farmon par Israel ne Golan ki Pahadiyon ke baqi hisson ke sath 1981 mein qabza kar liya tha. Is ke bawajood Suri Musallah Afwaj ki pesh qadmi ke baad Israeli qabze ka ikhtitam hua aur Suri farmon par haqeeqi hukmarani ki taqat ban gaya. Is ke bawajood 2000 mein Lebanon se Israeli inkhila ke baad, Hezbollah ne daawa kiya ke inkhila mukammal nahin hua kyunke Shebaa Lubnani zameen thi - Suri zameen par nahin. 81 mukhtalif naqshon ka mutala'a karne ke baad, Aqwam-e-Mutahidda ne yeh nateeja akhaz kiya ke tark shuda khetton ke Lubnani hone ka koi suboot nahin hai. Is ke bawajood Lebanon ne is ilaqa ki milkiyat ka daawa jari rakha hua hai.
Fouj. Sadar Suriya Suri Musallah Afwaj ke Commander-in-Chief hain, jo mutaharik hone par taqriban 400,000 foujiyon par mushtamil hain. Fouj ek bharti hui force hai. Mard 18 saal ki umar ko pahunchne par fouj mein khidmat anjam dete hain. Lazmi military service ki muddat ko waqt ke sath kam kiya ja raha hai, 2005 mein dhaai saal se do saal, 2008 mein 21 mah aur 2011 mein dedh saal. Taqriban 20,000 Suri fouji 27 April 2005 tak Lebanon mein ta'inat the, jab Suriya ke akhri foujiyon ne teen dahaiyon ke baad mulk chhod diya tha. Soviet Union ke tootne se - jo Suri Musallah Afwaj ke liye tarbiyat, mawad aur credit ka bunyadi zariya hai - ne Suriya ki jadeed fouji saz-o-saman hasil karne ki salahiyat ko sust kar diya hai. Is ke paas satah se satah par mar karne wale missiles ka zakheera hai. 1990 ki dahai ke awail mein, 500 kilometer (310 meel) range ke sath Scud-C missiles Shumali Korea se mangwaye gaye, aur Scud-D, jis ki range 700 kilometer (430 meel) hai. Zisar ke mutabiq, mabina taur par Shumali Korea aur Iran ki madad se Suriya ki taraf se tayyar kiya ja raha hai. Suriya ko Khaleej-e-Faris ki Arab Riyaston ki Khaleej-e-Faris jang mein shirkat ke nateeje mein aham mali imdad mili, in funds ka ek bada hissa fouji ikhrajat ke liye mukhtas kiya gaya. Iran aur Roos Bashar al-Assad ki qiyadat wali Suri hukoomat ko fouji imdad faraham karne wale sab se bade suppliers hain.
Insani Huqooq. Assad hukoomat ke ikhtitam se pehle, Suriya mein insani huqooq ki soorat-e-hal ek taweel arse se Human Rights Watch jaisi azad tanzeemon ke darmiyan ek aham tashweesh rahi hai, jinhon ne 2010 mein mulk ke record ko duniya ke badtareen mumalik mein se qarar diya hai. 2011 ki Freedom House ki report ne apne saalana Freedom in the World survey mein Sham ko azad nahin ka darja diya hai. Ba'ath hukoomat ek mutlaq al-inan aamiryat thi jis ki mulki aur siyasi jabr ke liye bain ul aqwami satah par mazammat ki gayi hai, jis mein summary phansiyan, bade paimane par censorship, jabri gumshudgiyan, wagaira shamil hain, neez Suri khana janggi ke dauran Suri shehrion ke khilaf mutadid juraim, keemiyai hamle wagaira bhi shamil hain. Hukama par jamhooriyat aur insani huqooq ke karkunon ko giraftar karne, websites ko censor karne, bloggers ko hirasat mein lene aur safri pabandiyan lagane ka ilzam hai. Man mani hirasat, tashaddud aur gumshudgiyan bade paimane par hain. Agarche Suriya ka aa'in jinsi masawat ki zamanat deta hai, lekin naqideen ka kehna hai ke zaati qawaneen ke qawaneen aur ta'zeerati zabita khawateen aur ladkion ke sath imtiyazi salook karte hain. Mazeed yeh ke yeh nam-nahad ghairat ke naam par qatl ke liye ri'ayat bhi deta hai. 9 November 2011 tak Sadar Bashar al-Assad ke khilaf baghawat ke dauran, Aqwam-e-Mutahidda ne report kiya ke 3,500 se zyada amwat mein se 250 se zyada amwat do saal se kam umar ke bachon ki thin, aur yeh ke 11 saal se kam umar ke ladkon ke sath security services ke afsaron ne ijtemai ismat-dari ki thi. Sadar Assad ki hukoomat ki mukhalifat karne wale logon ka daawa hai ke 12 July 2012 ko Hama mein sarkari forces ki gola bari mein 200 se zyada, jin mein zyada tar aam shehri the, qatl-e-aam aur 300 ke qareeb zakhmi hue the. August 2013 mein hukoomat ko apne shehrion ke khilaf keemiyai hathiyaron ke istemal ka shuba tha. Amreeki Wazir-e-Kharija John Kerry ne kaha ke yeh na qabil-e-tardeed hai ke mulk mein keemiyai hathiyaron ka istemal kiya gaya hai aur al-Assad ki afwaj ne apne hi logon ke khilaf akhlaqi fahsahi ka irtikab kiya hai. Koi ghalti na karen, Kerry ne kaha. Sadar Barack Obama ka khayal hai ke in logon ka ehtesab hona chahiye jo duniya ke sab se zyada kamzor logon ke khilaf duniya ke sab se ghinaune hathyar ka istemal karen. Aaj koi bhi cheez is se zyada sanjeeda nahin hai, aur is se zyada sangeen janch padtal ki koi cheez nahin hai. Hungami qanoon, jo keh zyada tar aaini tahaffuzat ko mo'assar tareeqe se mo'attal karta hai, 1963 se 21 April 2011 tak nafiz al-amal tha. Golan ki pahadiyon par Israel ke sath jari jang ki roshni mein hukoomat ki taraf se is ka jawaz pesh kiya gaya. August 2014 mein, Aqwam-e-Mutahidda ke insani huqooq ki sarbarah Navi Pillay ne mulk mein khana janggi se nimatne mein is ke maflooj par bain ul aqwami baradari ko tanqeed ka nishana banaya, jis ke nateeje mein 2014 tak jangi juraim ke sath 191,369 amwat huien, Pillay ke mutabiq, tanaza ke tamam fareeqon se mukammal istisna ke sath murtakib hue. Aqalliyati Alawion aur Isaiyon ko Islam pasandon aur deegar grohon ne nishana banaya. Teen saal baad April 2017 mein, Amreeki Bahriya ne ek Suri fidai adde ke khilaf ek missile hamla kiya jo mabina taur par Amreeki hukoomat ke mutabiq November 2021 mein, Suri shehrion par keemiyai hathiyaron ke hamle ke liye istemal kiya gaya tha. Amreeki Central Command ne 2019 ke ek fidai hamle ko Suriya mein aam shehrion ki halakat ko ja'iz qarar diya. Yeh e'tiraf New York Times ki tahqeeqat ke baad samne aaya hai jis mein kaha gaya tha ke fouj ne darjanon ghair jangjuon ki maut ko chhupaya tha.
Ma'eeshat. 2015 tak, Suriya ki ma'eeshat mawroosi taur par na qabil-e-e'tibar amadni ke zara'e par inhesar karti hai jaise ghatte hue custom aur income tax jo Iran ki taraf se credit lines se bohat zyada taqwiyat paate hain. Khayal kiya jata hai ke Iran ne Suri khana janggi ke dauran Suriya par saalana 6 billion se 20 billion dollar kharch kiye hain. Ma'eeshat 60% sikud chuki hai, aur Suri Lira apni qadar ka 80% kho chuka hai, ma'eeshat juzwi riyasati milkiyat aur juzwi jangi ma'eeshat ban gayi hai. Khana janggi ke aaghaz mein, Suriya ko World Bank ne kam darmiyani amadni wale mulk ke taur par darja bandi kiya tha. 2010 mein Suriya ka inhesar tel aur zira'at ke shobon par raha. Tel ke shobe ne baramadi amadni ka taqriban 40 feesad faraham kiya. Sabit shuda offshore muhimmat ne ishara kiya hai ke Suriya aur Cyprus ke darmiyan Bahira-e-Rum ke farsh par tel ki badi miqdar maujood hai. Zira'at ka shoba GDP mein taqriban 20 feesad aur rozgar mein 20 feesad hissa dalta hai. Aane wale salon mein tel ke zakha'ir mein kami mutawaqqe' hai aur Suriya tel ka khalis dar'amad kuninda ban gaya hai. Hukoomat tezi se Iran, Roos aur Cheen ke credit par inhesar karti hai. Hukoomat ki taraf se ma'eeshat ko bohat zyada munazzam kiya jata hai, jis ne subsidy mein izafa kiya hai aur muzahireen ko manane aur ghair mulki currency ke zakha'ir ki hifazat ke liye tijarti control ko sakht kar diya hai. Taweel mudati iqtisadi rukawaton mein ghair mulki tijarat ki rukawaten, tel ki kam hoti hui pedawar, zyada be-rozgari, badhta hua budget khasara, aur zira'at mein bhari istemal ki wajah se pani ki supply par badhta hua dabao, abadi mein tezi se izafa, san'ati tausee', aur aabi aloodgi shamil hain. UNDP ne 2005 mein a'elan kiya ke 30% abadi ghurbat ki zindagi guzar rahi hai, aur 11.4% zindagi guzarne ki satah se niche. Aalami baramadat mein Suriya ka hissa 2001 se batadreej kam ho raha hai. 2000-2008 ki muddat mein haqeeqi fi kas GDP ki sharah namu sirf 2.5 feesad saalana thi. Be-rozgari 10 feesad se zyada hai. Ghurbat ki sharah 2004 mein 11 feesad se badh kar 2007 mein 12.3 feesad ho gayi hai. 2007 mein aham baramadat mein kham tel, saaf shuda masnoo'aat, kham kapas, kapde, phal aur anaaj shamil the. Dar'amadate ka bada hissa san'at, gadiyan, zarai aalaat aur bhari machinery ke liye zaruri kham mal hain. Tel ki baramadat se hasil hone wali amadni aur Suri karkunon ki tarseelat-e-zar hukoomat ke zar-e-mubadala ke aham tareen zara'e hain. Siyasi adam istehkam mustaqbil ki ma'eeshi taraqqi ke liye ek aham khatra hai. Ghair mulki sarmaya kari tashaddud, hukoomati pabandiyon, iqtisadi pabandiyon aur bain ul aqwami tanhai ki wajah se mehdood hai. Suriya ki ma'eeshat bhi riyasati bureaucracy, girti hui tel ki pedawar, badhte hue budget ke khasare aur inflation ki wajah se mutassir hai. Suri khana janggi se pehle hukoomat ko ummeed thi ke woh sayahat, qudrati gas aur khidmaat ke shobon mein nayi sarmaya kari ko raaghib karegi taake is ki ma'eeshat ko tanavvu diya ja sake aur tel aur zira'at par inhesar kam kiya ja sake. Hukoomat ne ma'eeshi islahat ka aaghaz kiya jis ka maqsad zyada tar marketon ko azad karna tha, lekin woh islahat sust aur ad hoc thin, aur tanaza shuru hone ke baad se mukammal taur par ulat gayi hain. 2012 tak majmooi baramadat ki qadar mein do tihai kami waqe' hui hai, jo 2010 mein 12 billion Amreeki dollar ke a'dad-o-shumar se 2012 mein sirf 4 billion Amreeki dollar reh gayi. 2012 se tel aur sayahat ki san'atein khas taur par tabah ho chuki hain, jis mein 5 billion Amreeki dollar ka nuqsan hua hai. Ta'ameer-e-nau par 10 billion Amreeki dollar lagat aayegi. Pabandiyon ne hukoomat ke maliyat ko nuqsan pahunchaya hai. Riyasat Haye Mutahidda aur European Union ki janib se tel ki dar'amad par pabandiyan, jo 2012 mein nafiz huien, ek andazay ke mutabiq Suriya ko har mah taqriban 400 million dollar ka nuqsan uthana padta hai. Jang ke aaghaz se lekar ab tak sayahat ke shobe ke tamam mulazimeen mein se taqriban 40 feesad ne apni rozgariyan kho dein. May 2015 mein ISIS ne Suriya ki phosphate ki kaanon par qabza kar liya, jo Suri hukoomat ki amadni ke akhri aham zara'e mein se ek tha. Agle mah ISIS ne Damascus ke liye gas pipeline ko dhamake se uda diya jo Damascus aur Homs mein hararat aur bijli paida karne ke liye istemal hoti thi. Ek tajzia kar ne kaha ke abhi ke liye is ke khel ka naam hukoomat ko kaleedi wasail se inkar hai. Is ke ilawa ISIS is ilaqa mein Shair Gas Field aur teen deegar tanseebat — Hayyan, Jahar aur Ebla — par band ho raha tha, in maghribi gas fields ke nuqsan se Iran Suri hukoomat ko mazeed subsidy dene ka sabab ban sakta tha. Aleppo sabun Suriya ki ek maqbool masnoo'aat mein se ek hai. Zarai islahat ke iqdamaat muta'arif karwaye gaye jin mein teen ba ham marboot program shamil the qanoon sazi zarai mazdooron aur zameendaron ke darmiyan ta'alluqat ko munazzam karna nizji aur riyasati domain ki zameen ki milkiyat aur istemal ko control karne wali qanoon sazi aur kisanon ki ma'eeshi tanzeem ki hidayat; aur riyasati control ke tehat zarai pedawar ki tanzeem-e-nau ke iqdamaat kiye gaye. Zameen ki milkiyat mein adam masawat ki a'ala satah ke bawajood in islahat ne azadi ke baad Suriya ki tareekh mein kisi bhi doosri islahat ke muqabale mein 1958 se 1961 tak zameen ki dobara taqseem mein pesh raft ki ijazat di. Pehla qanoon manzoor kiya gaya (Qanoon 134; manzoor shuda 4 September 1958) kisanon ko mutaharik karne aur kisanon ke huqooq ko badhane ke bare mein tashweesh ke jawab mein tha. Yeh zameen ke malikano ke silsile mein hisse daron aur zarai mazdooron ki position ko mazboot karne ke liye design kiya gaya tha. Is qanoon ke nateeje mein Wizarat-e-Mehnat aur Samaji Umur ki tashkeel hui, jis ne naye qawaneen ke nifaz ka a'elan kiya jo khas taur par khawateen aur naujawano ke liye kaam karne ki halat ko control karne, kaam ke auqaat muqarrar karne aur kam az kam ujrat ke usool ko muta'arif karane ki ijazat de. Mazdoor aur bantne walon ke liye fasal ki masawi taqseem thi. Mazeed bar'aan is ne zameendaron ko tehreeri aur zabani dono mu'ahidon ka ehtiram karne ka paband kiya, ijtemai saudebazi qa'im ki, jis mein karkunon ke mu'awaze, sehat, rihaish, aur rozgar ki khidmaat ke intizamaat shamil the. Qanoon 134 karkunon ke tahaffuz ke liye sakhti se tayyar nahin kiya gaya tha. Is ne zameendaron ke apne syndicate banane ke huqooq ko bhi tasleem kiya.
Tawanai. Suriya mein tawanai zyada tar petroleum aur qudrati gas par mabni hai. Suri khana janggi se tawanai ke kuch bunyadi dhanchaon ko nuqsan pahuncha. Suriya mein tawanai ke liye fossil eendhan par bohat zyada inhesar hai, aur bijli ki talab mein 2030 tak izafa mutawaqqe' hai, khas taur par san'ati sargarmion jaise khud kaar sazi ke liye. Taham Suriya mein tanaza'at ki wajah se haaliya salon mein plant ki tabahi aur eendhan ki qillat ki wajah se bijli ki pedawar mein taqriban 40 feesad kami waqe' hui hai. Suriyon ke liye rozmarra ki zindagi mein bijli ki rasai bhi tanaza'at ki wajah se tabdeel ho gayi hai. Suriya ke rehaishion ko bijli zyada tar nizji diesel generators ke zariye faraham ki jati hai, jo mehengi aur istemal ke auqaat mein mehdood hai. Tanaza'at ne gharelu bijli ke ikhrajat mein izafa kiya hai jabkeh gharelu amadni mein bhi kami hui hai. Is ke baad se kuch gharanon ne tawanai ke ek izafi zariye ke taur par shamshi tawanai ka rukh kiya hai, halankeh zyada lagat bade paimane par apnane ko mehdood karti hai. Suriya ki petroleum industry shadeed zawal ka shikar hai. September 2014 mein, ISIS hukoomat ke 17,000 bbl/d (2,700 m3/yom) ke muqabale mein 80,000 bbl/yom (13,000 m3/yom) ke hisab se hukoomat se zyada tel paida kar raha tha aur Suriya ki Wizarat-e-Tel ne kaha ke 2014 ke akhir tak, tel ki pedawar mazeed gir kar 9,329 bbl/yom tak pahunch gayi. (1,483.2 m3/yom); is ke baad ISIS ne ek aur oil field par qabza kar liya hai, jis ke nateeje mein tel ki pedawar 6,829 bbl/yom (1,085.7 m3/yom) ho gayi. Suri khana janggi ke teesre saal mein Naib Wazir-e-Iqtisadiyat Salman Hiyan ne kaha ke Suriya ki do aham oil refineries 10 feesad se bhi kam salahiyat par kaam kar rahi hain. Baghawat se pehle, Suriya ke tel ki 90% se zyada baramadat European Union ke mumalik ko hoti thin, baqi Turkiyah ko jati thin. 2012 mein tel aur gas ki amadni kul GDP ka 20% aur kul hukoomati mahsool ka 25% bani.
Zira'at. Suriya ke bohraan ke bawajood, zira'at ma'eeshat ka ek aham hissa bani hui hai. Is shobe ka ab bhi majmooi gharelu pedawar ka takhmina 26 feesad hai aur yeh 6.7 million Suriyon ke liye ek aham hifazati jaal ki numaindagi karta hai - bashumool andaruni taur par be ghar afraad - jo ab bhi dehi ilaqon mein rehte hain. Taham, zira'at aur is par munhasir ma'aash ko bade paimane par nuqsanat ka samna karna pada hai. Aaj khurak ki pedawar record kam hai aur Suriya mein baqi reh jane wali taqriban nisf abadi apni rozmarra ki ghizai zaruriyat poori karne se qasir hai. 1970 ki dahai ke madh tak, Suriya mein zira'at hi Suriya mein bunyadi iqtisadi sargarmi thi. 1946 mein azadi ke waqt, zira'at (bashumool mamooli janglat aur mahi giri) Aleppo jaise shahri marakiz ke maldar tajiron ne zameen ki taraqqi aur aabpashi mein sarmaya kari ki. Kasht shuda raqba ki tezi se tausee' aur pedawar mein izafa ne baqi ma'eeshat ko mutaharik kiya. Taham, 1950 ki dahai ke akhir tak, bohat kam zameen reh gayi thi jise aasani se zer-e-kasht laya ja sakta tha. 1960 ki dahai ke dauran, siyasi adam istehkam aur zamini islahat ki wajah se zarai pedawar ruk gayi. 1953 aur 1976 ke darmiyan, kham mulki pedawar mein zira'at ki shirkat mein sirf 3.2 feesad izafa hua (mustaqil qeematon mein), abadi mein izafe ki taqriban sharah ke mutabiq. 1976 se 1984 tak zira'at ki sharah namu kam ho kar 2 feesad saalana reh gayi, aur deegar shobon mein tezi se taraqqi hone ke sath hi ma'eeshat mein is ki ahmiyat kam ho gayi. 1981 mein, jaisa ke 1970 ki dahai mein, 53% abadi ko ab bhi dehi ilaqa ke taur par darja bandi kiya gaya tha, halankeh shaharon ki taraf naqal-o-harakat mein tezi aati rahi. Taham 1970 ki dahai ke baraks, jab 50% afraadi quwwat zira'at mein kaam karti thi, 1983 tak zira'at mein sirf 30% afraadi quwwat kaam karti thi. Mazeed bar'aan, 1980 ki dahai ke madh tak, ghair processed farm masnoo'aat baramadat mein sirf 4 feesad thin, jo keh ghair petroleum baramadat ke 7 feesad ke barabar thin. San'at, tijarat aur naql-o-hamal ka inhesar ab bhi zarai pedawar aur mutalliq zarai karobar par tha, lekin zira'at ki numayan position wazeh taur par khatam ho chuki thi. 1985 tak zira'at (bashumool thoda sa janglat aur mahi giri) ne GDP mein sirf 16.5 feesad hissa dala, jo 1976 mein 22.1 feesad se kam tha. 1980 ki dahai ke madh tak, hukoomat Suriya ne zira'at ke ahya ke liye iqdamaat kiye the. 1985 ke sarmaya kari ke budget mein zira'at ke liye mukhtas mein tezi se izafa dekha gaya, bashumool zameen ki bahali aur aabpashi. 1980 ki dahai mein zarai taraqqi ke liye hukoomat ki tajdeed wabastagi, kasht ko wasee' de kar aur aabpashi ko badha kar, 1990 ki dahai mein Shaami zira'at ke liye roshan imkanat ka wa'ada kiya. Suri khana janggi ke dauran zarai shobe mein har qisam ki ajnaas ki pedawar mein kami dekhi gayi hai jaise keh gandum, kapas aur zaitoon, security ki kami aur zarai afraadi quwwat ki immigration, khas taur par Muhafaza al-Hasakah aur Muhafaza Aleppo mein.
Naql-o-Hamal. Suriya mein aamd-o-raft rail, sadak, hawai ya daryaon ke zariye mumkin hai, sarkari aur nizji dono. Suriya ek Asian mulk hai jis mein ek achhi tarah se taraqqi yafta rail network (2,052 kilometer) aur highway system (782 kilometer) hai.
Railways. 1956 mein, Suriya mein tamam railways ko qaumiya diya gaya, aur 1 January 1965 se CFS ke taur par dobara munazzam kiya gaya. Soviet Union ki maliyati aur san'ati imdad ke sath tausee', is mu'ahide mein mulk ki mushtarka san'ati taraqqi ka ahata kiya gaya. Ek nisbatan pasmanda mulk ke liye, Suri railway infrastructure bohat si express services aur jadeed trainon ke sath achhi tarah se barqarar hai. Suri Railway Riyasat Suriya ki qaumi railway operator hai, jo Wizarat-e-Naql-o-Hamal ke mat'ehat hai. Yeh 1956 mein qa'im kiya gaya tha aur is ka sadar daftar Aleppo mein tha. Mulk mein jari tanaza ke nateeje mein Suri Railway ka infrastructure buri tarah mutassir hua hai. Hijaz Railway ek narrow gauge ki railway line thi, jo Damascus se Madina tak jati thi. Asal mansooba mein line ko Mecca tak jana tha lekin Pehli Jang-e-Azeem ke shuru hone ki wajah se yeh Madina Munawwara se aage na ja saki. Yeh Usmani railway network ka ek hissa thi jis ka maqsad Istanbul se Damascus ki line ko aage tak phailana tha. Mansooba ka maqsad Saltanat-e-Usmaniyah se Hajjaj Karam ko safri sahulet faraham karna tha. Ek aur aham wajah yeh thi ke door daraz Arab soobon ki iqtisadi aur siyasi inzimam ko Usmani riyasat mein behtar banana aur fouji afwaj ki naql-o-hamal ko sahulet faraham karna tha.
Sharai. 1923 mein Damascus ki Nairn Transport Company ne Beirut, Haifa, Damascus aur Baghdad ke darmiyan ek overland trans-desert bus service qa'im ki thi. Suriya mein mulk ke maghribi nisf hisse mein motorway ka ek achhi tarah se taraqqi yafta nizam maujood hai. Is ke bawajood abadi ki kasrat ki wajah se mashriqi hissa ka sirf do lane wali sadkon se rabta hai. Suriya mein aham motorways darj zeel hain
Bahri. Baniyas, Jableh aur Tartus mein izafi bandargahon ke sath al-Ladhiqiyah mein bandargah al-Ladhiqiyah markazi bain ul aqwami bandargah hai.
Hawai. Suriya mein char bain ul aqwami hawai adde hain, Damascus International Airport, Aleppo International Airport, Bassel al-Assad International Airport (al-Ladhiqiyah) aur Qamishli Airport hai. Yeh hawai adde Syrian Air ke markaz ke taur par kaam karte hain aur mukhtalif qisam ke ghair mulki carriers ke zariye bhi khidmaat anjam di jati hain. Internet censorship qawaneen ki wajah se March 2011 se August 2012 ke darmiyan 13,000 internet fa'aliyat pasandon ko giraftar kiya gaya.
Internet aur Telecommunication. Suriya mein ba'eed muwasilat ki nigrani Wizarat-e-Muwasilat aur Information Technology karti hai. Is ke ilawa Syrian Telecom sarkari internet tak rasai ki taqseem mein ek atoot kirdar ada karta hai. Suri Electronic Army cyberspace mein hukoomat ke haami fouji dhade ke taur par kaam karti hai aur use taweel arse se hacking fa'aliyat group Anonymous ka dushman samjha jata hai.
Pani ki Farahami aur Hifzan-e-Sehat. Suriya ek neem khushk mulk hai jahan pani ke wasail ki kami hai. Suriya mein sab se zyada pani istemal karne wala shoba zira'at hai. Gharelu pani ka istemal kul pani ke istemal ka sirf 9 feesad hai. Suri khana janggi se pehle Suriya ke liye ek bada challenge is ki abadi mein izafa tha (2006 mein sharah namu 2.7% thi), jis ki wajah se shahri aur san'ati pani ki talab mein tezi se izafa hua. Tamam bade shahar - Aleppo ke ilawa - aur dehi ilaqon mein tamam dehi taqseemi networks ko chashmon aur zer-e-zameen pani se pani faraham kiya jata hai. Pani ki safai ki badi sahulet sirf Aleppo ke liye gharelu pani ki farahami ke nizam ke liye maujood hain, jise Assad jheel se pani faraham kiya jata hai. Suriya mein zyada tar gharelu pani zamini pani, kuon aur chashmon se faraham kiya jata hai. Ek istisna Aleppo shahar hai, jo Assad ke zakha'ir se pipelines ke zariye gharelu istemal ke liye pani hasil karta hai. Taham, Homs ko Homs jheel se pipeline ke zariye darya-e-Orontes se satahi pani faraham kiya jata hai.
Abadiyat. Zyada tar log darya-e-Furat ki wadi aur sahili maidan ke sath sath, sahili pahadon aur sehra ke darmiyan ek zarkhez patti mein rehte hain. Khana janggi se pehle Suriya mein majmooi abadi ki kasafat taqriban 99 fi murabba kilometer (258 fi murabba meel) thi. Aalami Panah Guzeen Survey 2008 ke mutabiq, jo Amreeki Committee Baraye Muhajireen aur Tarikeen Watan ki taraf se shaya kiya gaya hai, Suriya ne panah guzeenon aur panah guzeenon ki ek abadi ki mezbani ki jin ki ta'adad taqriban 1,852,300. Is abadi ki aksariyat ka ta'alluq Iraq (1,300,000) se tha, lekin Palestine (543,400) aur Somalia (5,200) ki badi abadi bhi is mulk mein muqeem thi. Jis mein Aqwam-e-Mutahidda ne hamare daur ki sab se badi insani hungami soorat-e-hal ke taur par bayan kiya hai, 2014 tak taqriban 9.5 million Suri, nisf abadi, March 2011 mein Suri khana janggi shuru hone ke baad se be ghar ho chuke hain. 4 million muhajireen ke taur par mulk se bahar the. 2020 tak Aqwam-e-Mutahidda ka takhmina hai ke 5.5 million se zyada Suri is khitte mein panah guzeenon ke taur par reh rahe the, aur 6.1 million deegar andaruni taur par be ghar ho gaye the.
Nasli Groh. Suri ek majmooi taur par muqami sarzameen Sham ke log hain, jo apne qareebi padosion, jaise Lubnani, Filistini, Urduni aur Yahood se qareebi ta'alluq rakhte hain. Suriya ki abadi taqriban 18,500,000 (2019 ka takhmina) hai. Suri qaum taqriban 600,000 Filistiniyon ke sath mulk se bahar maujood 60 lakh panah guzeenon mein shamil nahin, Arab abadi ka taqriban 74 feesad hain. Muqami Ashuri aur Maghribi Jadeed Arami bolne walon ki ta'adad 400,000 ke lag bhag hai, Maghribi Arami bolne wale bunyadi taur par Ma'loula, Jabadin, Bakh'a aur qareebi dehaaton mein rehte hain, jabkeh Ashuri bunyadi taur par shumal aur shumal mashriq (Homs, Aleppo, Qamishli, Hasakah) mein rehte hain. Bohat se (khas taur par Ashuri group) ab bhi kai Neo-Arami boliyon ko boli aur tehreeri zubanon ke taur par barqarar rakhte hain. Suriya mein doosra sab se bada nasli groh Kurd hai. Woh abadi ka taqriban 9% se 10%, ya taqriban 2 million afraad (bashumool 40,000 Yazidi). Zyada tar Kurd Suriya ke shumal mashriqi kone mein rehte hain aur zyada tar Kurmanji Kurd zaban bolte hain. Teesra sab se bada nasli groh Turki zaban bolne wale Suri Turkoman/Turkmen hain. In ki kul abadi ka koi qabil-e-e'tibar takhmina nahin hai, jis ka takhmina kai lakh se 3.5 million tak hai. Chautha sab se bada nasli groh Ashuri (3–4%) hain, is ke baad Circassians (1.5%) aur Armenians (1%), jin mein se zyada tar panah guzeenon ki aulaadein hain jo Armenian qatl-e-aam ke dauran Suriya mein pahunche. Suriya duniya mein Armenian abadi ka saatwan bada mulk hai. Woh bunyadi taur par Aleppo, Qamishli, Damascus aur Kessab mein markooz hain. Yahan chhote nasli aqalliyati groh bhi hain, jaise ke Albanians, Bosnians, Georgians, Greeks, Persians, Pashtuns aur Russians. Taham, in mein se zyada tar nasli aqalliyatein kisi had tak Arab ban chuki hain, khas taur par woh jo Muslim aqiide par amal pazeera hain. Arab duniya se bahar Suri bashindon ka sab se bada irtikaz Brazil mein hai, jis mein Arab aur deegar qareebi Mashriqi aaba-o-ajdad ke lakhon log abad hain. Brazil Americas ka pehla mulk hai jis ne Suri panah guzeenon ko insani bunyad par visa ki peshkash ki hai. Arab Argentine ki aksariyat ka ta'alluq Lubnani ya Suri pas manzar se hai.
Zubanein. Jadeed Me'yari Arabi mulk ki daftari zaban hai. Kai jadeed Arabi ke lahajat rozmarra ki zindagi mein istemal hote hain, jin mein qabil-e-zikr Shami Arabi aur shumal mashriq mein Bain ul Nahrini Arabi. Arabi Zaban aur Lisaniyat ke Encyclopedia ke mutabiq, Arabi ke ilawa, mulk mein darj zeel zubanein boli jati hain, muqarrireen ki ta'adad ke lihaaz se Kurd zubanein, Turki zaban, Jadeed Arami zaban (char lahje), Circassian zaban, Chechen zaban, Armenian zaban aur Greek zaban. Taham, in aqalliyati zubanon mein se kisi ko bhi sarkari haisiyat hasil nahin hai. Arami zaban Fasah Arabi ki aamad se pehle is khitte ki zaban-e-rabita-e-aammat hi, aur ab bhi Ashuri qaum, aur Classical Syriac zaban bhi zaban-e-rabita-e-aammat mein boli jati hai. Ab bhi mukhtalif Syriac Masihi firqon ki mazhabi zaban ke taur par istemal hoti hai. Sab se zyada qabil-e-zikr baat yeh hai ke Maghribi Jadeed Arami ab bhi Damascus ke shumal mashriq mein 56 kilometer (35 meel) ke fasle par waqe' gaon Ma'loula ke sath sath do padosi gaon mein boli jati hai. Angrezi aur French doosri zubanon ke taur par bade paimane par boli jati hain, lekin Angrezi zyada istemal hoti hai.
Sunni Musalman Suriya ki abadi ka taqriban 74% hain aur Sunni Arab abadi ka 59-60% hain. Zyada tar Kurd (8.5%) aur zyada tar Turkman (3%) Sunni hain aur Sunni aur Sunni Arabon ke darmiyan farq ka sabab bante hain, jab keh 3% Suri Shia Musalman hain, (khas taur par Isma'ili), aur Shia Ithna Ashari mein Arab, Kurd aur Turkman bhi hain, 10% Nusayri, 10% Masihi aksariyat Anatolian Greek Orthodox hain, baqi Syriac Orthodox, Greek Catholic aur deegar Catholic rusumat, Armenian Orthodox, Assyrian Church of the East, Protestant aur deegar firqe, aur 3% Druze bhi hain. Druze ki ta'adad taqriban 500,000 hai, aur bunyadi taur par Jabal al-Druze ke junubi ilaqa mein markooz hain.
Canada ki abadi ki ausat teen ashariya paanch afraad fi murabba kilometer hai jo duniya bhar mein sab se kam gunjaan abad ilaqon mein shumar hota hai. Quebec se le kar Windsor ki patti tak (jo Great Lake ke kinare aur darya-e-Saint Lawrence tak hai) Canada ke gunjaan abad ilaqay shumar hote hain. Isi tarah Canada mein jitni jheelein aur darya hain, woh duniya bhar ke kisi aur mulk ke paas nahin hain. Isi tarah Canada ke paas meethe paani ke zakhaair duniya bhar mein sab se zyada hain. Shumali Canada ki nabataat coniferous janglaat par mushtamil hain jo qutb shumali ke banjar maidanon tak phaile hain. Canada mein zyada se zyada aur kam se kam ausat darja hararat jagah ke lehaaz se bohut farq hain. Mulk ke baaz ilaqon jaisay Prince Edward Island soobe mein rozana ka ausat darja hararat manfi paanch degree centigrade rehta hai aur kam se kam darja hararat sakht tez hawa aur shadeed barfani thand ke baais manfi chalis degree centigrade bhi ho sakta hai. Magar sahili British Columbia aik istisna hai. Yahan halki sardi aur barishein mausam ko khushgawar banati hain. Isi tarah garmiyon ke buland darja hararat bhi jagah ke lehaaz se bohut farq ho sakte hain. Mashriq aur maghrib ke sawahil mein darja hararat bees degree centigrade ho sakta hai jabkay darmiyani ilaqah umooman pachchees se tees aur kabhi kabhar chalis degree centigrade bhi ho sakta hai. Is jadwal mein Canada ke shehron ke ausat darja hararat diye gaye hain. Tamam darja hararat degree centigrade mein hain. Kisi bhi column par click kar ke aap us ki tarteeb ko badal sakte hain
Canada is waqt duniya ki amir tareen qaumon mein se ek hai. Canada Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development aur Group of Eight ka rukun hai. Canada free market economy hai aur is ki hukoomat ka America ki nisbat thoda sa zyada amal dakhal hai lekin European Union ki nisbat bohut kam dakhal deti hai. Canada ki fi kas GDP America se nisbatan kam hai lekin aksar maghribi European mumalik se zyada hai. Guzishta dehai mein buhran ke baad Canada ki maeeshat tezi se taraqqi kar rahi hai aur be-rozgari ki sharah kam hoti ja rahi hai aur hukoomat ka surplus wafaqi satah par badhta ja raha hai. Aaj ka Canada maashi hawalay se America se bohut milta julta hai. July 2006 mein Canada ki sharah be-rozgari chhe ashariya char percent thi jo sabiqah tees saalon mein kam tareen hai, subayi be-rozgari ki sharah Alberta mein teen ashariya chhe percent se New Found Land aur Labrador mein chaudah ashariya chhe percent tak farq hai. Guzishta sadi mein tezi se hone wali manufacturing, kaan kuni aur khidmat ke shobay mein taraqqi ne is qaum ko shehri aur sanati qaum bana diya hai. Duniya ki doosri taraqqi yafta aqwaam ki manind, Canada ki maeeshat ka bada hissa khidmat se mutalliq hai aur Canada ke teen chauthai bashinday is se mutalliq hain. Taham Canada is lehaaz se farq hai ke Canada ki maeeshat mein lakdi aur tel ki sanatein bunyadi ahmiyat rakhti hain. Canada un chand taraqqi yafta mumalik se ek hai jo tawanai baramad karte hain. Canada mein qudrati gas ke wasee zakhaair mashriqi sahil par maujood hain aur tel aur mazeed gas Alberta, British Columbia aur Saskatchewan mein maujood hain. Isi tarah Athabasca Tar Sands Canada ko tel ke zakhaair ke aitbaar se duniya ka doosra bada mulk banate hain. Quebec, British Columbia, New Found Land aur Labrador, Ontario aur Manitoba mein pan bijli saste aur mahol dost tareeqe se paida hoti hai. Canada zarayi paidawar ke hawalay se bhi duniya ka ek aham mulk hai. Canada ki charagahien gandum aur deegar ghalla jaat paida karne ke liye mashhoor hain. Canada zist aur uranium ke ilawa deegar maadniyaat jaisa ke sona, kaansi, aluminum aur seesa ke liye bhi bohut mashhoor hai. Ontario ke junoob mein waqay sanati ilaqah khaas tor par gadiyon ki paidawar ke liye mashhoor hai. Canada ki tijarat ka bunyadi daromadar bain al-aqwami tijarat bilkhusoos America ke saath hai. 1989 mein aur 1994 mein Canada ne America ke saath azadana tijarat ka muahida kiya jis se donon ki tijarat mein dramayi izafa hua. 2001 se ab tak Canada ne kamyabi se maashi buhranoun ka samna kiya hai aur G8 mein apni maashi halat barqarar rakhi hai.
2001 ki mardum shumari se pata chala hai ke is waqt Canada mein koi teen karod saat hazaar aur chauraanwe log abad hain. Maujoodah andazah battis ashariya paanch million nufoos hai. Abadi mein izafay ki bunyadi wajah immigration hai aur kisi had tak qudrati sharah paidaish bhi is ka sabab hai. Is waqt Canada ki teen chauthai abadi America ke saath sarhad ke ek sau saath kilometer ke andar andar reh rahi hai. Isi tarah abadi ka bada hissa shehri ilaqon mein bilkhusoos Quebec shehar Windsor ki patti, British Columbia ke Lower Mainland aur Calgary-Edmonton ki patti mein reh raha hai.
Nasli ya qaumiyat ke aitbaar se Canada bohut mili juli qaum hai. 2001 ki mardum shumari se pata chala hai ke Canada mein kul 34 qaumiyatain aisi hain jin ki abadi ek lakh se zaaid hai. Canada ke apne bashinday sab se zyada yani 39.4% hain. Is ke baad Angrezon ki tadaad 20.2% hai. Is ke baad Faransi, Scottish, Irish, German, Italevi, Cheeni, Ukrainian aur junoobi America ke Red Indian aate hain. Canada ke asli bashindon ki tadaad mein deegar abadi ki nisbat dugna izafa ho raha hai. 2001 mein abadi ka 13.4% hissa qabil-e-zikr aqaliyatoun ka tha.
Canada ki abadi ka 77.1% hissa Masihi hai jis mein se kul abadi ka 43.6% hissa Catholic hain aur baqi Protestant hain. 17% ne kisi mazhab se talluq zahir nahin kiya. Baqi 6.3% mein se aksariyat Muslim hain.
Canada ke soobe aur riyasatain taleem ke zimmedaar hain yani qaumi satah par koi idara is ka zimmedaar nahin hai. Is tarah yahan terah taaleemi nizam paye jate hain. Har nizam apni ilaqayi tareekh, geography aur muqami saqafat ke ilawa yaksaa taleem deta hai. Lazmi tor par school jane ki umar ilaqay par munhasar hai aur paanch saal se le kar saat saal tak dakhla aur solah se atharah saal tak ki umar mein faraghat ho sakti hai. Is waqt Canada ki 99% abadi khwanda hai. Sanavi taleem bhi subayi aur riyasati hukoomat ki zimmedari aur un ki raqum se hi hoti hai. Is ke ilawa wafaq izafi raqum bhi muhayya karta hai. 2002 mein 25 se 64 tak ki umar ke 43% Canadians sanavi darjay tak taleem yafta the.
Angrezi aur Faransi Canada ki do sarkari zubanain hain. Angrezi 59.7% abadi ki madari zuban hai jabkay Faransi 23.2% ki madari zuban hai. 7 July 1969 ko Official Language ke tehat wafaqi hukoomat mein Faransi ko Angrezi ke barabar darja de diya gaya. Is se Canada ke do zabani mulk hone ka amal shuru hua. Angrezi aur Faransi ko wafaqi adalaton, parliman aur tamam wafaqi idaron mein yaksaa ahmiyat hasil hai. Awam ko haq hasil hai ke jahan aksariyati ilaqah ho, woh Angrezi ya Faransi mein khidmat hasil kar sakte hain. Isi tarah Canada ka bashindah hone ke liye Angrezi ya Faransi mein se kam az kam ek zuban ka jaanna lazmi hai. 98.5% abadi kam az kam Angrezi ya Faransi ya donon bolne ke qabil hai. Faransi bolne walon ki aksariyat Quebec mein rehti hai lekin qabil-e-zikr tadaad New Brunswick ke shumal, mashriqi aur shumali Ontario aur junoobi Manitoba mein bhi maujood hai. Quebec ki sarkari zuban Faransi hai. 85% afraad ki zuban Faransi hai. Is ke ilawa bohut si aur bhi qadeem zubanain ilaqayi tor par sarkari darja rakhti hain. Ghair sarkari zubanain bhi ahmiyat rakhti hain aur un ke bolne wale paanch million se zaaid hain. In mein Cheeni, Italevi, German aur Punjabi zubanain shamil hain.
Canada ki saqafat tareekhi aitbaar se Angrezi, Faransi, Irish, Scottish aur muqami saqafaton se bohut mutasir hai aur waqt ke saath saath American saqafat bhi apna rang jama rahi hai. Bohut se American saqafati ashya mukhtalif andaaz se apne qadam jama rahe hain aur isi tarah Canada ki saqafat apne qadam America aur deegar mumalik mein jama rahi hai. Canada ki alag thalag aur mahfooz rehne wali saqafat ab wafaqi idaron ki mudakhlat se mutasir ho rahi hai jin mein Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, National Film Board of Canada aur Canadian Radio-Television and Telecommunication Commission shamil hain. Canada geographyائی aitbaar se wasee aur nasli aitbaar se makhloot mulk hai aur subon aur riyasaton mein yeh bohut farq paya jata hai. Canada ki apni saqafat naye immigrant logon ki wajah se bohut mutasir hui hai.
Qaumi nishanaat qudrat, tareekh aur pehle aane wali qaumon se mutasir hain. Maple ka patta jo ab Canada ki shinakht ban chuka hai, atharahwein sadi ke awail se jhande, penny aur sarkari alamat ka darja rakhta hai. Doosre aham nishanaat mein ood bilao, Canada Goose yani batakh, murghabi, taj aur RCMP shamil hain.
Canada ka sarkari khel ice hockey hai. Hockey qaumi mashghala hai aur is waqt koi dedh million se zaaid afraad is ke baqaida rukun hain. Canada ke chhe metropolitan ilaqay yani Toronto, Montreal, Vancouver, Ottawa, Calgary aur Edmonton ne apni apni qaumi hockey leaguein banai hui hain aur is mein Canada ke muqami khiladiyon ki tadaad duniya mein deegar tamam ice hockey ke khiladiyon se zyada hai. Hockey ke baad doosri mashhoor khel Canadian football aur curling hai. Canada ki football ki league mulk ki doosri sab se zyada mashhoor hai aur Canada ki shinakht ka baais bhi hai. Golf, baseball, skiing, soccer, volleyball aur basketball bhi bade paimane par kheli jati hain. Canada 2007 ke FIFA Under 20 World Cup ka mezbaan hai aur 2010 ke sarmai Olympic bhi Vancouver aur Whistler mein hue hain.
Cuba, sarkari tor par Jamhuriya Cuba ek jazire par mushtamil hai. Neez Isla de la Juventud aur kai chote majma ul-jazair, 4,195 jazire aur markazi jazire ke ird gird maujood keys ka talluq Cuba se hai. Cuba is jagah waqay hai jahan shumali Caribbean samundar, khalij Mexico aur bahr-e-Oqyanus milte hain. Cuba Yucatan jazira numa ke mashriq mein, Amreeki riyasat Florida aur Bahamas donon ke junoob mein, Hispaniola ke maghrib mein aur Jamaica aur Jazair Cayman donon ke shumal mein waqay hai. Havana sab se bada shehar aur darul hukoomat hai. Doosre bade shehron mein Santiago de Cuba aur Camaguey shamil hain. Jamhuriya Cuba ka zamini raqba 109,884 murabba kilometre hai, lekin kul raqba bashamool aabi ilaqay aur maqsoos iqtisadi zone, 350,730 murabba kilometre hai. Cuba Haiti ke baad Caribbean mein doosra sab se zyada abadi wala mulk hai, jis mein 11 million se zyada log rehte hain. Cuba aqwaam muttahidah, ghair munassalik tehreek, African, Caribbean aur Pacific riyasaton ki tanzeem, aur Amreeki riyasaton ki tanzeem ka baani rukun hai. Is ki maeeshat is waqt duniya ki chand mansooba band maeeshaton mein se ek hai aur is ki maeeshat par sayahat ki sanat aur hunarmand mazdoor, cheeni, tambaako aur coffee ki baramadaat ka ghalba hai. Cuba ne tareekhi tor par, communist hukmarani se pehle aur us ke dauran, kai samaaji iqtisadi ashariyon, jaise khwandgi, bachchon ki amwaat aur mutawaqqa umar ke lehaaz se khette ke deegar mumalik se behtar karkardagi ka muzahira kiya hai. Cuba mein ek universal health care system hai jo Cuba ke tamam shahriyon ko muft tibbi ilaaj faraham karta hai, haalanke challenges mein doctors ki kam tankhwah, naqis sahuliyaat, alaat ki naqis farahami aur zaruri adwiyaat ki baar baar adam maujoodgi shamil hain. 2023 mein, Cuba Observatory of Human Rights ki ek haaliya tehqeeq ke mutabiq, Cuba ki 88 percent abadi intehai ghurbat mein zindagi guzaar rahi hai. Cuba ke gharanon mein riwayati khorak, khurd ghizaiyat ki kami aur tanawwuh ki kami ki wajah se bain al-aqwami tashveesh ka baais hai, jaisa ke aqwaam muttahidah ke World Food Program ki taraf se roshni dali gayi hai, hukoomat ki taraf se faraham karda khorak, Cuba ke bohut se logon ke liye rozana ki ghizai zaruriyaat ka sirf ek hissa poora karta hai, jis ke natije mein sehat ke masail paida ho rahe hain.
Muwarrikheen ka khayal hai ke Cuba ka naam Taino zuban se aaya hai. Taham, is ka sahih makhaz na maloom hai. Naam ka sahih maani wazeh nahin hai, lekin is ka tarjuma ya to 'jahan zar-khez zameen waafar hai' ya 'azeem jagah' ke tor par kiya ja sakta hai. Frank theory ke musannifeen ka kehna hai ke Christopher Columbus Portugali riyasat se tha aur Cuba ka naam Columbus ne Portugal ke Beja zila mein Cuba ke qasbe ke naam par rakha tha. Caribbean ground sloths, jo Pleistocene megafauna ke aakhri zinda bach jane walon mein se ek hain, mumkinah tor par 2660 qabl maseeh tak Cuba mein rehte the. Hispaniyon ki amad se pehle, Cuba mein America ke muqami logon ke do alag alag qabail abad the Taino bashamool Ciboney log aur Guanahatabey. Taino ke aaba o ajdaad ne junoobi America ki zameen se hijrat ki thi, jis ki ibtedai jagahain 5,000 qabl maseeh tak thi. Jo ilaqah ab Cuba hai woh chauthi sadi qabl maseeh ke awail mein abad tha, 15th sadi mein Hispani noabadiaat ke waqt is ilaqay mein Guanahatabey aur Taino ke log abad the. 15th sadi se, yeh Spain ki colony thi aur ghulami ko san 1886 mein khatam kar diya gaya tha, jabkay san 1898 ki Hispani-Amreeki jang tak yeh Hispani colony bana raha, yahan tak ke Cuba par Riyasataye Muttaheda ne qabza kar liya. Aur san 1902 mein Cuba ne Riyasataye Muttaheda se azadi hasil kar li aur ek naya aain naafiz kiya, lekin badhti hui siyasi be-chaini san 1952 mein baghawat aur us ke natije mein Fulgencio Batista ki amiriyat par muntaj hui. Baad mein Cuba ke inquilab ke dauran 26 July ki tehreek ke zariye January 1959 mein Batista hukoomat ka takhta ult diya gaya. Is inquilab ne Fidel Castro ki qayadat mein communist hukoomat qaim ki. Yeh mulk Soviet Union aur Riyasataye Muttaheda ke darmiyan sard jang ke dauran tanazaat ka ek nuqta tha aur san 1962 ke Cuba missile buhran ke dauran qareeb qareeb ek jauhari jang chhid gayi thi. 1990 ki dehai, jise khususi daur ke naam se jana jata hai, Soviet Union ke khatme ke baad, Cuba ko shadeed iqtisadi bad-haali ka samna karna pada. San 2008 mein, Fidel Castro Cuba ki 49 saal ki qayadat ke baad ba-taur sadar retire hue. Raul Castro ko un ka jaan-nasheen muntakhab kiya gaya. Raul Castro 19 April 2018 ko sadar ke ohde se retire hue aur Miguel Diaz-Canel ko parliamentary intikhabat ke baad qaumi assembly ne sadar muntakhab kiya. Raul Castro April 2021 mein Communist Party ke First Secretary ke tor par retire hue aur Miguel Diaz-Canel un ke jaan-nasheen ke tor par muntakhab hue.
Grenada ek jazira mulk hai jo West Indies mein bahr-e-Caribbean mein Grenadines jazire ke silsile ke junoobi sire par waqay hai. Grenada khud Grenada ke jazire, do chote jazair, Carriacou aur Petite Martinique aur kai chote jaziron par mushtamil hai jo markazi jazire ke shumal mein waqay hain aur Grenadines ka hissa hain. Yeh Trinidad aur Tobago ke shumal maghrib mein, Venezuela ke shumal mashriq aur Saint Vincent aur Grenadines ke junoob maghrib mein waqay hai. Is ka raqba 348.5 murabba kilometer hai aur July 2021 mein is ki takhmini abadi 124,523 thi. Is ki sarkari zuban Angrezi hai. Darul hukoomat aur bada shehar Saint George's hai. Grenada ko jaiphal aur gaddi ki fasalon ki paidawar ki wajah se masala ka jazira bhi kaha jata hai.
Grenada ek jazira mulk hai jo West Indies mein bahr-e-Caribbean mein Grenadines jazire ke silsile ke junoobi sire par waqay hai. Grenada khud Grenada ke jazire, do chote jazair, Carriacou aur Petite Martinique aur kai chote jaziron par mushtamil hai jo markazi jazire ke shumal mein waqay hain aur Grenadines ka hissa hain. Yeh Trinidad aur Tobago ke shumal maghrib mein, Venezuela ke shumal mashriq aur Saint Vincent aur Grenadines ke junoob maghrib mein waqay hai. Is ka raqba 348.5 murabba kilometer hai aur July 2021 mein is ki takhmini abadi 124,523 thi. Is ki sarkari zuban Angrezi hai. Darul hukoomat aur bada shehar Saint George's hai. Grenada ko jaiphal aur gaddi ki fasalon ki paidawar ki wajah se masala ka jazira bhi kaha jata hai. America mein Europeans ki amad se pehle, Grenada mein junoobi America se aane wale muqami log abad the. Christopher Columbus ne 1498 mein America ke teesre safar ke dauran Grenada ko dekha. Rehaishi jazire Caribs ki muzahamat ki wajah se jazire ko noabadiaati banane ki Europeans ki kai nakaam koshishon ke baad, Faransiyon ki abad kari aur noabadiaat 1649 mein shuru hui aur agli sadi tak jari rahi. 10 February 1763 ko Grenada ko muahida Paris ke tehat Britanion ke hawalay kar diya gaya. British hukoomat 1974 tak jari rahi siwaye 1779 aur 1783 ke darmiyan ek mukhtasar Faransi qabze ke. Taham, 3 March 1967 ko, ise ek Associated State ke tor par us ke andaruni mamlaat par mukammal khudmukhtari di gayi thi aur 1958 se 1962 tak Grenada Federation of the West Indies ka hissa tha, jo British West Indian colonies ki ek mukhtasar muddat ke liye federation thi. Azadi 7 February 1974 ko Eric Gairy ki qayadat mein di gayi, jo ek khudmukhtar riyasat ke tor par Grenada ke pehle wazir-e-azam bane. Naya mulk Commonwealth of Nations ka rukun ban gaya, Malika Elizabeth II sarbarah mumlakat ke tor par. March 1979 mein, Marxist-Leninist New Jewel Movement ne ek be-khoon baghawat mein Gairy ki hukoomat ka takhta ult diya aur awami inquilabi hukoomat qaim ki, jis ki sarbarahi Maurice Bishop wazir-e-azam ke tor par kar rahe the. Bishop ko baad mein People's Revolutionary Army ke arkaan ne giraftar kar ke phansi de di, jise October 1983 mein Amreeki qayadat mein hamle ka jawaz faraham karne ke liye istemal kiya gaya tha. Tab se, yeh jazira parliamentary numainda jamhooriyat ki taraf laut aaya hai aur siyasi tor par mustahkam hai. Is waqt mulk ki sarbarahi King Charles III ke paas hai.
Guinea ya Jamhuriya Guinea maghribi Africa ka ek chota sa mulk hai jise French Guinea ke naam se bhi jana jata tha. Is ki maghribi sarhad bahr-e-Oqyanus se milti hai. Bahr-e-Oqyanus ke ilawa Guinea-Bissau bhi mulk ke maghrib mein waqay hai. Andaruni hisson mein shumali sarhad par Senegal aur shumal aur shumal mashriq mein Mali waqay hai. Junoob mashriqi ki janib Côte d'Ivoire hai, junoob mein Liberia aur junoob maghribi mein Sierra Leone mein waqay hai. Mulk ke wast mein behne wala darya-e-Niger ke paani ke saath saath naql o hamal ke liye bhi istemal hota hai. Darul hukoomat aur sab se bada shehar Conakry hai.
Guinea Bissau maghribi Africa mein waqay ek mulk hai jo 36,125 murabba kilometer par muheet hai aur is ki abadi 2,026,778 hai. Is ki sarhad shumal mein Senegal aur junoob mashriq mein Guinea se milti hai. Western African CFA franc ko ba-taur currency istemal kiya jata hai. Bissau darul hukoomat aur sab se bada shehar hai. Portuguezi mulk ki sarkari zuban hai. Guinea Bissau kisi zamanay mein Kabu ki saltanat ka hissa tha, saath hi saath Mali saltanat ka bhi hissa tha. Is saltanat ke kuch hisse atharahvin sadi tak qaim rahe, jabkay kuch deegar par solahvin sadi se Portugali saltanat ke zer-e-intizam the. Unnisvin sadi mein, ise Portugali Guinea ke tor par noabadiaat banaya gaya tha. Portugali control beesvin sadi ke awail tak amn ki mohimmat ke saath mehdood aur kamzor tha. In mohimmat ne ilaqay mein Portugali khudmukhtari ko mustahkam kiya. Sarzamin ki muzahamat ke aakhri baqiya garh par aakhri Portugali fath san 1915 mein Portugali fauji afsar Pinto ke zariye Bissau ki Papel hukmarani wali badshahat ki fath ke saath hasil hui. Bissagos, Guinea Bissau ke sahil par waqay jaziron ko san 1936 mein ba-zabtah tor par fath kiya gaya, jis se Portugali sarzamin aur khette ke jazair donon par control ko yaqeeni banaya gaya. San 1973 mein azadi ka elaan kiya aur san 1974 mein is ki azadi ko tasleem kar liya gaya, is ke darul hukoomat, Bissau ka naam Guinea Faransi Guinea ke saath uljhan ko rokne ke liye mulk ke naam mein shamil kar diya gaya. Guinea Bissau azadi ke baad se siyasi adam istehkam ki tareekh hai. Maujooda sadar Umaro Sissoco Embaló hain, jo 29 December 2019 ko muntakhab hue the. Sirf 2 percent abadi Portugali bolti hai, sarkari zuban, pehli zuban ke tor par aur 33 percent ise doosri zuban ke tor par bolte hain. Taham, Guinea-Bissau ki Kriol, ek qaumi zuban hai aur ise ittihad ki zuban bhi samjha jata hai. San 2012 ke ek mutala ke mutabiq, 54 percent abadi Creole ko pehli zuban ke tor par bolti hai aur taqriban 40 percent ise doosri zuban ke tor par bolte hain. Baqi mukhtalif muqami African zubanain bolte hain. Yeh qaum Islam, Isaiyat aur riwayati aqaid ke mutaddad pairukaron ka ghar hai, haalanke koi ek mazhabi giroh abadi ki aksariyat ki numaindagi nahin karta. Mulk ki fi kas majmui gharelu paidawar duniya mein sab se kam hai. Guinea-Bissau aqwaam muttahidah, African Union, maghribi African riyasaton ki iqtisadi biraadari, Islami Taawun ki Tanzeem, Portugali zuban ke mumalik ki community, Faransi zuban bolne wale mumalik ki bain al-aqwami tanzeem aur junoobi bahr-e-Oqyanus aman aur taawun ka rukun hai. Mulk hai.
Guatemala sarkari tor par Jamhooriya Guatemala, wast-e-America ka ek mulk hai. Is ki sarhad shumal aur maghrib mein Mexico, shumal mashriq mein Belize, mashriq mein Honduras aur junoob mashriq mein El Salvador se milti hai. Ise junoob mein bahr-e-Pacific aur shumal mashriq mein khalij Honduras se chhoota hai. Taqreeban 17.6 million ki takhmeena shuda abadi ke saath, Guatemala wast-e-America ka sab se zyada abadi wala mulk hai, shumali America ka chautha sab se zyada abadi wala mulk aur America ka gyarahwan sab se zyada abadi wala mulk hai. Yeh ek numainda jamhooriyat hai jis ka darul hukoomat aur sab se bada shehar Guatemala City hai, jo wast-e-America ka sab se zyada abadi wala shehar hai. Currency ka naam Quetzal hai. Jadeed Guatemala ka ilaqah Maya tehzeeb ke markaz ki mezbani karta tha, jo Mesoamerica tak phaila hua tha. Solahvin sadi mein, is ilaqay ka zyada tar hissa Hispaniyon ne fath kar liya tha aur is ka dawa naye Spain ki Viceregalilty ka hissa tha. Guatemala ne san 1821 mein Spain aur Mexico se azadi hasil ki. San 1823 mein, yeh wast-e-America ki wafaqi jamhooriya ka hissa ban gaya, jo san 1841 tak tahlil ho gayi. Unnisvin sadi ke wast se aakhir tak, Guatemala daaimi adam istehkam aur khana jangi ka shikar raha. Beesvin sadi ke awail mein, is par United Fruit Company aur Riyasataye Muttaheda ki hukoomat ki himayat yafta amiron ke ek silsile ne hukoomat ki. San 1944 mein, amir rehnuma Jorge Ubico ko ek jamhooriyat Nawaz fauji baghawat ke zariye maʼzool kar diya gaya, jis ne ek dehai taweel inquilab ka aaghaz kiya jis ki wajah se samaaji aur iqtisadi islahat samne aayeen. San 1954 mein Amreeki himayat yafta fauji baghawat ne inquilab ko khatam kiya aur ek amiriyat qaim ki. San 1960 se 1996 tak, Guatemala ne Amreeki himayat yafta hukoomat aur baen bazu ke baghiyon ke darmiyan ladi jane wali ek khoonrezi khana jangi ka samna kiya, jis mein fauj ke zariye Maya abadi ki nasli kashi aur qatl-e-aam bhi shamil tha. Aqwaam muttahidah ke zariye taiy pane wale aman muahiday ke natije mein musalsal iqtisadi taraqqi aur kamyab jamhoori intikhabat hue hain, haalanke ghurbat, juraim, manshiyat ki smuggling aur shehri adam istehkam bade masail hain. Agarche baramadi samaan se mala mal hai, lekin taqreeban ek chauthai abadi 4.6 million ko ghizai adam insdad ka samna hai, jo Ukraine par Russia ke hamle ke natije mein jari ghizai buhran ke baais mazeed kharab ho gaya hai. Guatemala ke hayatiyati lehaaz se aham aur munfarid maholi nizamon ki kasrat mein bohut si muqami anwaa shamil hain aur Mesoamerica ko hayatiyati tanawwuh ke hot spot ke tor par namzad karne mein aham kirdar ada karti hai.
Ghana ya Ghanna, sarkari tor par Jamhuriya Ghana, maghribi Africa mein waqay ek mulk hai. Yeh khalij Guinea aur junoob mein bahr-e-Oqyanus ke qareeb hai, maghrib mein Ivory Coast, shumal mein Burkina Faso aur mashriq mein Togo ke saath sarhadein baantta hai.
