Ghana 239,567 murabba kilometer ke raqbe par muheet hai, jis mein mutanawwe hayatiyat phaile hue hain jo sahili savannah se le kar ushnkatbandi barishi janglaat tak hain. 32 million se zyada bashindon ke saath, Ghana maghribi Africa ka doosra sab se zyada abadi wala mulk hai. Darul hukoomat aur sab se bada shehar Accra hai, doosre bade shehar Kumasi aur Tamale hain. Currency ka naam Cedi hai. Ghana ek wahdani sadarti jamhooriya hai, Nana Akufo-Addo sadar aur Mahamudu Bawumia Ghana ke deputy sadar hain. Ghana mein ubharne wali ibtedai saltanatain shumal mein Dagbon ki badshahat aur Bono riyasat theen, gyarahvin sadi ke dauran is ilaqay mein Bono riyasat maujood thi. Ashanti saltanat aur junoob mein deegar Akan saltanatain sadiyon mein ubhre. Pandrahvin sadi ke aaghaz se, Portugali saltanat ne, us ke baad deegar European taqaton ne, tijarti huqooq ke liye is ilaqay mein muqabla kiya, yahan tak ke Britanion ne bil akhir unnisvin sadi tak us ke sahil par apna control qaim kar liya. Noabadiaati muzahamat ki ek sadi se zyada ke baad, mulk ki maujooda sarhadon ne shakal ikhtiyar kar li, jis mein char alahida British noabadiaati ilaqay shamil the Gold Coast, Ashanti, Shumali Ilaqajaat aur British Togoland. Yeh Commonwealth ke andar ek Dominion ke tor par muttahid the. 6 March 1957 ko, Ghana sub-Saharan Africa mein khudmukhtari hasil karne wala pehla mulk ban gaya. Ghana baad mein noabadiaat nizam ko khatam karne ki koshishon aur Pan-African tehreek mein ba-asar ban gaya. Ghana ek kasir al-nasli mulk hai jis mein kai lisani aur mazhabi giroh hain; jis mein Akan sab se bada nasli giroh hain, jo kasriyat ki tashkeel karte hain. Zyada tar Ghana ke bashinday Isai hain 71.3 percent; 20 percent Musalman hain aur 10 percent rawaji riwayati aqaid se munsalik hain. Ghana ek wahdani aaini jamhooriyat hai jis ki qayadat ek sadar karta hai jo riyasat ka sarbarah aur hukoomat ka sarbarah hota hai. Africa mein siyasi istehkam ke liye, Ghana san 2012 ke Ibrahim Index of African Governance mein saatven aur 2012 ke Nazuk Riyasaton ke Index mein paanchven number par tha. Is ne san 1993 se bar-e-azam ki sab se azad aur sab se zyada mustahkam hukoomaton mein se ek ko barqarar rakha hai aur yeh sehat ki dekh bhaal, iqtisadi taraqqi aur insani taraqqi mein nisbatan achhi karkardagi ka muzahira kar raha hai, taake maghribi Africa aur majmui tor par Africa mein is ka numayan asar ho. Ghana ghair wabasta tehreek, African Union ka baani rukun aur maghribi African riyasaton ki iqtisadi biraadari, Group 24 aur Commonwealth ka rukun hone ki wajah se bain al-aqwami mamlaat mein intehai marboot hai.
Guyana sarkari tor par Cooperative Jamhuriya Guyana, junoobi America ki shumali sarzamin par ek mulk hai. Guyana ek muqami lafz hai jis ka matlab hai bohut se paaniyon ki sarzamin. Sahil par ek khudmukhtar riyasat hai. Guyana ki sarhad shumal mein bahr-e-Oqyanus junoob aur junoob maghrib mein Brazil, maghrib mein Venezuela aur mashriq mein Suriname se milti hai. 215,000 murabba kilometer ke zamini raqbe ke saath, Guyana Uruguay aur Suriname ke baad sarzamin junoobi America mein raqbe ke lehaaz se teesri sab se choti khudmukhtar riyasat hai aur Suriname ke baad junoobi America mein doosri sab se kam abadi wali khudmukhtar riyasat hai. Darul hukoomat Georgetown hai. Yeh zameen par sab se kam gunjaan abad mumalik mein se ek hai. Is mein qudrati rehaish gahon ki wasee aqsaam aur bohut zyada jayo tanawwuh hai. Guyanas ke naam se jana jane wala khetah darya-e-Amazon ke shumal mein aur darya-e-Orinoco ke mashriq mein bade shield landmass par mushtamil hai jise bohut se paaniyon ki sarzamin kaha jata hai. Guyana mein nau muqami qabail rehte hain Wai Wai, Macushi, Patamona, Lokono, Kalina, Wapishana, Pemon, Akawaio aur Warau. Tareekhi tor par Lokono aur Kalina qabail ke zer-e-tasallut, Guyana ko 18th sadi ke aakhir mein British control mein aane se pehle Dutch ne noabad kiya tha. Is par 1950 ki dehai tak zyada tar plantation ki tarz ki maeeshat ke saath British Guiana ki hukoomat thi. Is ne 1966 mein azadi hasil ki aur 1970 mein Commonwealth ke andar ba-zabtah tor par ek jamhooriya ban gaya. British hukmarani ki miras mulk ki siyasi intizamia aur mutanawwe abadi mein jhalakti hai, jis mein mukhtalif kasir al-nasli giroh, Hindustani, African, muqami, Cheeni, Portugali aur European bashinde shamil hain. Guyana wahid junoobi Amreeki mulk hai jis mein Angrezi sarkari zuban hai. Taham, abadi ki aksariyat Angrezi par mabni Creole zuban, Guyanese Creole bolti hai, ba-taur pehli zuban. Guyana Anglophone Caribbean ka hissa hai. Yeh sarzamin Caribbean khette ka hissa hai jo deegar Caribbean mumalik ke saath mazboot saqafati, tareekhi aur siyasi talluqat ko barqarar rakhne ke saath saath Caribbean Community ke headquarter ke tor par kaam karta hai. 2008 mein, mulk ne Union of South American Nations mein baani member ke tor par shomooliyat ikhtiyar ki. 2017 mein Guyana ki 41% abadi ghurbat ki lakeer se neeche zindagi guzaar rahi thi. Guyana ki maeeshat 2015 mein kham tel ki daryaft aur 2019 mein tijarti drilling ke baad se tabdeeli se guzar rahi hai, is ki maeeshat 2020 mein 49% ki sharah se badh rahi hai, jis se ise, kuch accounts ke mutabiq, is waqt duniya ki sab se tezi se taraqqi karne wali maeeshat bana diya gaya hai. Jaisa ke kaha jata hai ke is ke paas 11 billion barrel tel ke zakhaair hain, yeh mulk 2020 tak duniya ke sab se bade fi kas tel paida karne wale mumalik mein se ek banne ja raha hai. Guyana ke sahil se 11 billion barrel tel ke zakhaair ki daryaft ke baad se 1970 ki dehai ke baad tel ke aalmi zakhaair mein 2017 sab se bada izafa hai. Guyana ab Riyasataye Muttaheda America, Canada aur Bahamas ke baad America mein chauthe sab se zyada GDP ke saath darja bandi mein hai aur 2015 se Human Development Index ranking mein sab se zyada behtari wale mumalik mein se ek hai. Ghurbat ab bhi maujood hai aur mulk ko saakhti tor par apni taraqqi ko munazzam karne mein aham khatraat ka samna hai.
Gabon ya Gaboon maghribi Africa ke bahr-e-Oqyanus ke sahil par waqay ek mulk hai, jo khatt-e-istiwa ki sarhad par waqay hai. Gabon ke maghrib mein Guinea, shumal mein Cameroon, mashriq aur junoob mein Jamhuriya Congo aur maghrib mein khalij Guinea hai. Gabon ka raqba 267,667 murabba kilometer hai, jabkay abadi 23 lakh afraad par mushtamil hai. Gabon ki sarkari zuban Faransi hai aur is ka darul hukoomat aur sab se bada shehar Libreville hai. Wast-e-African CFA franc ko ba-taur currency istemal kiya jata hai. Gabon ke asal bashinday Pygmy log the. 14th sadi ke aaghaz se, Bantu muhajreen ne bhi is ilaqay mein abad hona shuru kiya. 1960 mein France se azadi ke baad se, Gabon ke teen sadar reh chuke hain. 1990 ki dehai mein, is ne ek kasir al-jamaati nizam aur ek jamhoori aain mutaarif karaya jis ka maqsad zyada shaffaf intikhabi amal tha aur kuch sarkari idaron mein islahat ki gayeen. Is ke bawajood, Gabonese Democratic Party ghalib party bani hui hai. Gabon ek taraqqi pazeer mulk hai, jo insani taraqqi ke ashariya mein 112th number par hai. Yeh fi kas amadni ke lehaaz se Africa ke amir tareen mumalik mein se ek hai. Taham abadi ka bada hissa bohut ghareeb hai. Bantu nasli giroh mulk ki taqreeban 95 percent abadi par mushtamil hai. Petroleum aur ghair mulki niji sarmaya kari ke saath, is ke paas khette mein chautha sab se zyada HDI hai aur poore Africa mein fi kas paanchwan sab se zyada GDP hai Seychelles, Mauritius, Equatorial Guinea aur Botswana ke baad. Bantu qabail ne hijrat karte hue, ilaqay mein Pygmy logon ki jagah le li ya unhein jazb kar liya. Atharahvin sadi tak, ek Myene bolne wali badshahat jise Kingdom of Orungu ke naam se jana jata hai, ghulamon ki khareed o farokht karne ki salahiyat ke saath tijarti markaz ke tor par tashkeel paya aur 1870 ki dehai mein ghulamon ki tijarat ke khatme ke saath hi is ka khatma hua. Explorer Pierre Savorgnan de Brazza ne 1875 mein Gabon Congo ke ilaqay mein apne pehle mission ki qayadat ki. Is ne Franceville ke qasbe ki bunyad rakhi aur baad mein noabadiaati governor rahe. Jab France ne 1885 mein sarkari tor par is par qabza kiya, us waqt kuch Bantu group is ilaqay mein rehte the. 1910 mein, Gabon Faransi Estuwai Africa ka ek ilaqah ban gaya, ek federation jo 1958 tak qaim rahi. Doosri jang-e-azeem mein, ittihadiyon ne Vichy France ki noabadiaati intizamia ka takhta ultne ke liye Gabon par hamla kiya. 28 November 1958 ko, Gabon Faransi Community ke andar ek khudmukhtar jamhooriya ban gaya aur 17 August 1960 ko, yeh mukammal tor par azad ho gaya. Gabon ke saath bahr-e-Oqyanus lagta hai. Gabon khatt-e-istiwa mein hai aur us ka mausam bhi khatt-e-istiwa ka hai. Janglaat ne 85% mulk ko gheer liya hai.
Gambia ba-zabtah tor par Jamhuriya Gambia aur baaz auqaat mukhtasar kar ke sirf Gambia, maghribi Africa mein waqay ek mulk hai. Gambia apne raqbah ke lehaaz se sarzamin Africa par sab se chota mulk hai. Is ke gird Senegal waqay hai jab ke yeh khud darya-e-Gambia ke gird waqay hai. Is mulk ko 11 December, 2015 ko Gambia ke sadar Yahya Jammeh ne Islami Jamhuriya qarar diya tha. Is ka raqba 11,300 murabba kilometer hai. Is ki abadi April 2013 ki mardum shumari ke mutabiq 1,857,181 hai. Banjul Gambia ka darul hukoomat aur mulk ka sab se bada metropolitan ilaqah hai, jabkay doosre bade shehar Serrekunda aur Brikama hain. Adama Barrow maujooda sadar hain aur Muhammad B.S. Jallow Gambia ke deputy sadar hain. Jab ke Fabakary Jatta Speaker qaumi assembly aur Hassan Bubacar Jallow Chief Justice hain. Gambian Dalasi ba-taur currency istemal hota hai. Arab Muslim taajiron ne nauvin aur dasvin sadi mein is ilaqay ke muqami maghribi Africans ke saath tijarat ki jo ab Gambia hai. San 1455 mein Portugali is khette mein dakhil hue, lekin woh wahan koi aham tijarti mandi qaim na kar sake. San 1765 mein, ek colony ke qiyam ke zariye is ilaqay ko British Saltanat ka hissa bana diya gaya. San 1965 mein, Gambia ne Dawda Jawara ki qayadat mein azadi hasil ki, jis ne san 1994 ki ek khoonrezi baghawat mein Yahya Jammeh ke iqtidar par qabza karne tak hukoomat ki. Adama Barrow December san 2016 ke intikhabat mein Jammeh ko shikast dene ke baad January san 2017 mein Gambia ki teesre sadar ban gaye. Jammeh ne ibteda mein nataij ko qabool kiya, lekin phir ohda chhodne se inkar kar diya, jis se ek aaini buhran aur maghribi African riyasaton ki iqtisadi biraadari ki janib se fauji mudakhlat shuru ho gayi jis ke natije mein un ki muddat mulazmat khatam hone ke do din baad unhein hata diya gaya. Gambia aqwaam muttahidah, Islami Taawun Tanzeem, maghribi African riyasaton ki iqtisadi biraadari aur Commonwealth ka rukun hai, is ke saath Angrezi is mulk ki wahid sarkari zuban hai, yeh donon is ke British noabadiaati maazi ki miras hain. Gambia ki maeeshat par kaashtkari, maahigiri aur khaas tor par sayahat ka ghalba hai. San 2015 mein, 48.6 percent abadi ghurbat mein rehti thi. Dehi ilaqon mein, ghurbat aur bhi taqreeban 70 percent zyada phaili hui hai. Gambia ka naam Mandinka ki istilah Kambra/Kumba se makhuz hai, jis ka matlab hai darya-e-Gambia. San 1965 mein azadi ke baad, mulk ne Gambia ka naam istemal kiya. San 1970 mein jamhooriya ke elaan ke baad, mulk ka taweel shakal ka naam Republic of the Gambia ban gaya. Yahya Jammeh ki intizamia ne December 2015 mein taweel shakal ka naam tabdeel kar ke Islami Jamhuriya Gambia rakh diya. 29 January 2017 ko sadar Adama Barrow ne is naam ko dobara Jamhuriya Gambia mein tabdeel kar diya. Senegambia ke patthar ke daaire jo Senegal se Gambia ke raaste chalte hain aur unhein UNESCO ne duniya mein kahin bhi nazar aane wale patthar ke daeron ka sab se bada irtikaaz qarar diya hai. Gyarahvin ya barahvin sadi tak, saltanaton ke hukmaranon Takrur, qadeem Ghana aur Gao ne Islam qabool kar liya tha aur apne darbaron mein aise Musalmanon ko muqarrar kiya tha jo Arabi zuban mein padhe likhe the. Chaudahvin sadi ke aaghaz mein, zyada tar jise aaj Gambia kaha jata hai, Mali saltanat ka hissa tha. Portugali pandrahvin sadi ke wast mein samundar ke raaste is ilaqay mein pohnche aur berun-e-mulk tijarat par ghalba hasil karna shuru kiya. Gambia ek bohut hi chota aur tang mulk hai jis ki sarhadein darya-e-Gambia ke ird gird hain. Yeh arz-e-balad 13 aur 14° shumal aur tool-e-balad 13 aur 17° maghrib ke darmiyan hai. Gambia apne wasee tareen maqam par 50 kilometer se kam chauda hai, jis ka kul raqba 11,295 murabba kilometer hai. Gambia ka taqreeban 1,300 murabba kilometer 11.5 percent ilaqah paani se dhaka hua hai. Yeh African sarzamin par sab se chota mulk hai. Taqabuli lehaaz se, Gambia ka kul raqba Jamaica ke jazire se thoda kam hai. Senegal ne Gambia ko teen itraf se gheer rakha hai, bahr-e-Oqyanus par 80 kilometer sahili patti is ki maghribi intiha ko nishan zad karti hai. Maujooda hudood ka taiyyun san 1889 mein Britain aur France ke darmiyan ek muahiday ke baad kiya gaya tha. Paris mein Faransiyon aur Britanion ke darmiyan muzakaraat ke dauran, Faransiyon ne ibtedai tor par darya-e-Gambia ka taqreeban 320 kilometer hissa Britanion ko de diya tha. San 1891 mein sarhadon nishandahi ki jagah ka aaghaz karte hue, Paris ijlasoon ke baad Gambia ki hatmi sarhadon ka taiyyun karne mein taqreeban 15 saal lage. Seedhi aur munhani lakeeron ke natije mein aane wale silsile ne darya-e-Gambia ke shumal aur junoob mein taqreeban 16 kilometer ke ilaqon par British control hasil kiya. Gambia teen zamini maholi khetton par mushtamil hai Guinea ka janglat savannah mosaic, maghribi Sudanese savannah aur Guinea ka samundari janglat. Is ka 2018 janglaat ki tazeen ki mutaraddadit ka ashariya ka score 4.56/10 tha, jo ise 172 mumalik mein aalmi satah par 120th number par rakhta hai. Gambia ne 18 February 1965 ko Britain se azadi hasil ki. San 1965 se 1994 tak, yeh mulk zahiri tor par ek kasir al-jamaati liberal jamhooriyat tha aur is par Dawda Jawara aur un ki People's Progressive Party ki hukoomat thi. Taham, is arsay ke dauran mulk ne kabhi siyasi tabdeeli ka tajurba nahin kiya aur ballot box ke zariye is ki jaan-nasheeni ke azm ka kabhi imtihan nahin liya gaya. San 1994 mein, ek fauji baghawat ke zariye fauji afsaron ka ek commission ko iqtidar mein aaya, jise Armed Forces Provisional Ruling Council ke naam se jana jata hai. Do saal ki baraah-e-raast hukmarani ke baad, ek naya aain likha gaya aur san 1996 mein, AFPRC ke rehnuma, Yahya Jammeh ko sadar muntakhab kiya gaya. Unhon ne san 2016 ke intikhabat tak amiranah andaaz mein hukoomat ki. Intikhabat mein Adama Barrow ne jeet hasil ki, jise opposition jamaton ke ittihad ki himayat hasil thi. Gambia ki ek liberal, market par mabni maeeshat hai jis ki khususiyaat riwayati ghizai zaraat, baramadi amadni ke liye moongphali ki baramad par tareekhi inhisaar, is ki samundari bandargah ke ird gird dobara baramadi tijarat, kam amadni mahsoolaat, kam se kam intizami tareeqakar, ek utar chadao sharah mabaila baghair kisi tabadlay ke control ke aur ek aham sayahat ki sanat hai. World Bank ne san 2018 ke liye Gambia ki GDP ka takhmeena 1,624 million Amreeki dollar lagaya hai. Bain al-aqwami maliyati fund ne ise san 2011 ke liye 977 million Amreeki dollar rakha. San 2006 se 2012 tak, Gambia ki maeeshat ne GDP mein salana 5-6 percent ki sharah se izafa kiya. Majmui muqami paidawar mein zaraat ka hissa taqreeban 30 percent hai aur is mein taqreeban 70 percent afraadi quwwat kaam karti hai. Zaraat ke andar, moongphali ki paidawar GDP ka 6.9 percent aur deegar faslon ka hissa 8.3 percent hai. Maweshi bani 5.3 percent, maahigiri 1.8 percent aur janglaat ki amadni ka hissa 0.5 percent hai. Sanat ka hissa GDP ke taqreeban 8 percent aur khidmat ka hissa taqreeban 58 percent hai. Manufacturing ki mehdood miqdar bunyadi tor par zaraat par mabni hai (misal ke tor par, moongphali ki processing, bakeries, ek brewery aur ek tannery). Deegar manufacturing sargarmiyon mein sabun, soft drinks aur kapde ki sanatein shamil hain. Is se qabl, Britain aur European Union Gambia ki badi baramadi mandiyon ka qiyam amal mein laye the. Taham, haaliya saalon mein Senegal, America aur Japan Gambia ke aham tijarti sharik-e-kaar ban gaye hain. Africa mein, Senegal ne san 2007 mein Gambia ka sab se bada tijarti hissa dar raha, jo pichle saalon ke muqablay mein wazeh bar-akas hai jis mein Guinea Bissau aur Ghana yaksaa tor par aham tijarti sharik-e-kaar the. Aalmi satah par, Denmark, America aur China Gambia ki baramadaat ke liye aham zaraya ban gaye hain. Britain, Germany, Ivory Coast aur Holland bhi Gambia ki baramadaat ka kafi hissa faraham karte hain. San 2007 mein Gambia ka tijarti khasarah 331 million Amreeki dollar tha. May 2009 mein Gambia mein barah commercial bank maujood the jin mein ek Islami bank bhi shamil tha. In mein se sab se purana, Standard Chartered Bank hai. San 2005 mein Switzerland mein qaim banking group International Commercial Bank ne ek zeli idarah qaim kiya aur ab mulk mein is ki char shakhein hain. San 2007 mein Nigeria ke Access Bank ne ek zeli idarah qaim kiya jis ki ab us ke head office ke ilawa mulk mein char shakhein hain. Bank ne char mazeed shakhein kholne ka waada kiya hai. San 2008 mein mulk mein Zenith Bank Limited, Nigeria ke behemoth Zenith Bank Plc ka ek zeli idarah shamil hua. May 2009 mein Lebanese Canadian Bank ne Prime Bank ke naam se ek zeli idarah khola. San 2017 se, China ne apne Belt and Road Initiative ke hisse ke tor par Gambia mein sarmaya kari ki hai. Gambia mein Cheeni sargarmiyon ka ek bada markaz muqami tor par pakdi jane wali machhliyon ko baramad karne ke liye machhli ke charay ki tayyari hai. Gambia mein machhli ke charay ki paidawar ke maashi aur maholi asraat mutanazia hain. 2011 ke mutabiq shehri kari ki sharah 57.3 thi. 2003 ke adad o shumar ke mutabiq shehri aur dehi abadi ke darmiyan farq mehdood ho raha hai kyunki kai ilaqon ko shehri qarar de diya gaya hai. Jabkay shehron mein naql-e-makani, taraqqiyati mansoobon aur jadeediyat ne Gambians ko maghribi aadaton aur iqdar se roshnas karwaya hai, lekin riwayati libaas aur iqdar ab bhi roz marrah zindagi ka atoot hissa hain. Angrezi Gambia ki sarkari zuban hai. Deegar zubanon mein Mandinka, Wolof, Fula, Serer, Krio aur deegar muqami zubanain shamil hain. Aain ka article 25 shahriyon ke huqooq ka tahaffuz karta hai aur kisi bhi mazhab par amal karne ki ijazat deta hai. December 2015 mein Gambia ke sadar Yahya Jammeh ne mulk ko Islami riyasat qarar diya. Mulk ki 90% abadi ka mazhab Islam hai.
Liberia maghribi Africa mein waqay ek mulk hai. Liberia Africa ke maghribi sahil par waqay ek mulk hai, jis ki sarhadein Sierra Leone, Guinea, Cote d'Ivoire se milti hain jabkay junoob mein bahr-e-Oqyanus hai. Is ki abadi taqreeban 5 million hai aur is ka raqba 43,000 murabba meel hai. Mulk ki sarkari zuban Angrezi hai; taham, 20 se zyada muqami zubanain boli jati hain, jo mulk ke nasli aur saqafati tanawwuh ki akasi karti hain. Darul hukoomat aur sab se bada shehar Monrovia hai. Currency Liberian Dollar hai. Liberia ka aaghaz 19th sadi ke awail mein American Colonization Society ke ek project ke tor par hua, jis ka khayal tha ke siyah faam logon ko America ki nisbat Africa mein azadi aur khush-haali ke behtar mawaqe ka samna karna padega. 1822 aur 1861 mein Amreeki khana jangi ke shuru hone ke darmiyan, 15,000 se zyada azad aur azad paida hone wale African Americans, 3,198 African-Caribbean ke saath, Liberia muntakil ho gaye. Raftah raftah ek American-Liberian shinakht tayyar karte hue, abadkar apni saqafat aur riwayat ko apne saath le gaye. Liberia ne 26 July 1847 ko azadi ka elaan kiya jise America ne 5 February 1862 tak tasleem nahin kiya. Liberia pehli African jamhooriya thi jis ne apni azadi ka elaan kiya aur Africa ki pehli aur qadeem tareen jadeed jamhooriya hai. Ethiopia ke saath saath, yeh un do African mumalik mein se ek tha jinhon ne European noabadiaati Scramble for Africa ke dauran apni khudmukhtari aur azadi ko barqarar rakha. Doosri jang-e-azeem ke dauran, Liberia ne Germany ke khilaf Riyasataye Muttaheda ki jangi koshishon ki himayat ki aur is ke natije mein bunyadi dhanchay mein kafi Amreeki sarmaya kari hasil ki, jis se mulk ki daulat aur taraqqi mein madad mili. Sadar William Tubman ne iqtisadi aur siyasi tabdeeliyon ki hausla afzai ki jinhon ne mulk ki khush-haali aur bain al-aqwami profile ko buland kiya. Liberia League of Nations, United Nations aur Organization of African Unity ka baani rukun tha. American-Liberian ke abad karon ka un muqami logon se achha talluq nahin tha jin ka unhon ne samna kiya. Noabadiaati bastiyon par Kru aur Grebo ne un ke andaruni sardariyon se chhape mare. American-Liberians ek choti ashrafiya mein tashkeel paye jo ghair mutanasib siyasi taqat rakhte the. Muqami Africans ko 1904 tak un ki apni sarzamin mein paidaishi haq-e-shehriyat se kharij kar diya gaya tha. 1980 mein, William R. Tolbert ki hukmarani se siyasi tanaw ka natija ek fauji baghawat ki soorat mein nikla jis ke dauran Tolbert mara gaya, jis se mulk mein American-Liberian hukmarani ka khatma hua aur do dehaiyon se zyada siyasi adam istehkam ka aaghaz hua. People's Redemption Council ki taraf se fauji hukmarani ke paanch saal aur Liberia ki National Democratic Party ki taraf se paanch saal ki civilian hukmarani ke baad pehli aur doosri Liberian khana jangiyan hueen. In ke natije mein 250,000 logon ki maut hui (taqreeban 8 percent abadi) aur bohut se log be-ghar hue, Liberia ki maeeshat 90 percent sukad gayi. 2003 mein ek aman muahida 2005 mein jamhoori intikhabat ka baais bana.
Lebanon ya Jamhooriya Lebanon, sarkari naam Lebanese Jamhuriya maghribi Asia mein mashriqi bahr-e-room ka ek aham Arab mulk hai. Yeh bahr-e-room ke mashriqi kinare par ek chota sa mulk hai jo zyada tar pahadi ilaqay par mushtamil hai. Is ke shumal aur mashriq mein Suriya, junoob mein Israel aur maghrib mein bahr-e-room waqay hai. Yeh khubsoorat mulk apne khushboodar seboun, deodar ke qadeem darakhton aur zaitoon ke baghaat ke liye mashhoor hai. Is ke jhande par bhi deodar ka darakht bana hua hai jo Lebanon ka qaumi nishan bhi hai. Lebanon ek Muslim aksariyati mulk hai magar Masihi daulat aur iqtidar par qabiz hain jo Lebanon ki khana jangi ki ek bunyadi wajah hai. 1932 ke baad mardum shumari bhi nahin hone di gayi jis ke baad mumkinah tor par Musalmanon ko iqtidar mein zyada hissa mil sakta hai. 1975 ki khana jangi se pehle Lebanon ko mashriq-e-wast ka Paris aur mashriq-e-wast ka Switzerland kaha jata tha. Is waqt Lebanon ki banking aur sayahat apne urooj par thi. Lebanon ka taqriban tamam ilaqah sahil-e-samundar se bohut qareeb hai aur qabl-az-tareekh se abad raha hai. Is ki tareekh baja tor par insani tareekh kehlayi ja sakti hai. Insaan ke likhne ka aaghaz yahin se hua. Pehle pehal jahaz rani bhi inhon ne shuru ki. Lebanon ke pehle daur ke log Funeqi kehlate hain aur yehi Funeqi the jinhon ne huroof ijaad kiye jo Saami bhi kehlate hain. Yahan beshumar ambiya mab'oos hue. Kai tehzeebon ne janam liya. Pichle kuch saalon mein Beirut ki tameer-e-nau ke dauran mein jahan bhi khudai ki jati thi, kisi qadeem tehzeeb ke asaar baramad ho jate the. Qadeem tehzeebon ke asaar Beirut, Sidon, Baalbek, Tyre aur Tripoli se milte hain. 3000 saal qabl Funeqi apne urooj par the jo aala darje ke jahaz raan aur tajir the. Inhon ne huroof ka istemal shuru kiya jis ke huroof-e-tahajji the. In ki tijarat Assyria aur Babylon ke saath thi. Magar talluqat achhe na the aur kai dafa jang ki naubat bhi aati thi. Is ilaqay ko Fars walon ne kai martaba fath kiya. Sikandar-e-Azam ki faujon ne ise taaraj kiya. Pehli sadi isawi mein Roman afwaj un par chadh daurin. Musalmanon ne bhi unhein fath kiya. Jadeed daur mein France ne is par qabza kiya magar yeh mukammal tor par kisi ke qaboo nahin aaye lekin inhon ne in tamam tehzeebon se bohut kuch hasil kiya. Isi liye aaj Lebanon ek aisa mulk hai jis mein aap mukhtalif naslon aur mazahib ke log dekh sakte hain. Yeh mulk Asia ke aakhri sire par Europe ke qareeb waqay hai is liye ise hum mukhtalif tehzeebon ka murraqqa keh sakte hain. Ek baat jo in mein barqarar hai woh un ki azadi se mohabbat aur jangju hona hai. Chunke yeh ek dushwar pahadi ilaqah tha is liye har daur mein is mein hukoomat-e-waqt ke mukhalifeen panah lete the. Kabhi Marouni Masihi yahan panah lete the to kabhi Druze log ise apna ghar qarar dete the aur kabhi Musalman Shia is mein hukoomat-e-waqt se jaan bachane ke liye panah lete the. Usmani saltanat ke daur mein European aqwaam ne ek muahida ke tehat yahan tablig ki ijazat le li thi jo Turki khilafat ne di thi. Is ka nuqsan yeh hua ke Turki khilafat ke zamanay hi mein yahan ek azad Marouni Masihi ilaqah qaim ho gaya tha. 1120-1697 ke dauran Maan khandan ki hukoomat rahi jis ne ise Saleebiyon se bachaye rakha. 1697-1842 ke dauran mein Shahab khandan ki hukoomat thi. Is dauran mein is ilaqay ki tijarat mein bohut izafa hua. Khaas tor par resham ki tijarat Europe se hoti thi. Chunke ashiyaye tijarat France ki bandargah Marseilles ke raaste hoti thi is liye aahista aahista is ilaqay mein Faransi asar-o-rasookh badhna shuru ho gaya. France aur Britain ne Lebanon ke hukmaran Shehab khandan ke khilaf ek taraf to Turkey ko ubhara aur doosri taraf Lebanon ke Marouni Masihion, Druze aur Musalmanon mein phoot dalwane ke liye Lebanon mein daulat kharch ki hatta ke Lebanon mein baghawat aur khana jangi phoot padi. Jis ka faida Usmaniyon ne uthaya aur Lebanon par apna iqtidar mukammal tor par qaim kar liya magar France ke asar ke saath saath. Usmaniyon ne Lebanon ko Masihi aur Druze zilon mein taqseem kar diya. Magar khana jangi ko khatam nahin kiya ja saka jis ki buniyadi wajah France ki Marouni Masihion ki musalsal imdad thi. Pehli jang-e-azeem ke baad Usmani khilafat khatam ho gayi aur Lebanon ke paanchon azlaa ko Jammiyat-ul-Aqwaam ya League of Nations ne France ko sonp diya. France ne hasb-e-sabiq Marouni Masihion ko har mamle mein aage rakha. Is waqt Lebanon mein Musalman sattavan percent, Masihi chalis percent aur Druze teen percent the. Iqtidar Masihion ko sonpne ke liye France ne Masihion ko to chalis percent shumar kiya magar Musalmanon ko alag alag qaum (Shia aur Sunni) ki haisiyat se shumar kiya. Yun Masihi chalis percent, Shia Musalman tees percent aur Sunni Musalman sattaees percent thaire. Yeh adad-o-shumar 1932 ki mardum shumari ke mutabiq hain jis ke baad aaj tak Lebanon mein koi mardum shumari nahin hone di gayi kyunke ab Musalman badi wazeh aksariyat mein hain. In adad-o-shumar ki bunyad par faisla hua ke chunke Masihi aksariyat mein hain is liye sadar Masihi hoga. Yaad rahe ke Lebanon ke qawanin ke mutabiq sadar ke paas hi asal taqat hoti hai. Wazir-e-azam aur Speaker Sunni aur Shia Musalman honge. Lebanon ne 1943 mein France se azadi hasil ki jis waqt France par Germany ne qabza kar liya tha. Lebanon bahr-e-room ke kinare waqay mashriq-e-wast ka ek mulk hai jis ka zyada hissa samundar ke kinare ke qareeb hai. Sardiyon mein darjah hararat sifar darjah centigrade tak hota hai aur baaz auqaat shadeed barf bari hoti hai aur pahad aur darakht barf se dhak jate hain. Garmiyan aam tor par garam aur khushk hoti hain. Lebanon ka zyada ilaqah pahadi hai. Sirf wadi Beqaa ka ilaqah maidani hai jahan zaraat hoti hai. Apne ird gird ke mumalik ki nisbat Lebanon mein barish ki salana ausat zyada hai jis ki wajah se woh ek sar sabz o shadaab mulk hai. Kisi zamanay mein wahan deodar ke ghane jungle the jo kisi had tak ab bhi paye jate hain. Lebanon mein baaz darakht paanch hazaar saal purane hain jin ko ek qaumi wirsa qarar diya gaya hai. Lebanon ke junoob mein Israel hai jis ke saath Lebnani sarhad 79 kilometer hai aur mashriq aur shumal mein Shaam waqay hai jis ke saath Lebnani sarhad 375 kilometer hai. Lebanon ki sarzamin zaraat ke liye mauzoun hai magar zaraat par inhisaar nahin karti. Afraadi quwwat ka sirf 12 zaraat se mutalliq hai jo kham mulki paidawar ka sirf 11.7 percent paida karte hain. Sanat bhi Lebanon ke liye kabhi munasib nahin raha kyunke is ke paas kham mal ki kami hai aur tel ke liye bhi doosre Arab mumalik par inhisaar karna padta hai. Sanat ka kham mulki paidawar mein hissa 21 percent hai jabki woh 26 percent afraad ko rozgar faraham karta hai. Natijatan Lebanon ne ashya ki jagah khidmat ki paidawar mein bohut taraqqi ki jaise banking, sayahat, taleem wagaira. Kham mulki paidawar ka 67 percent paida kar ke yeh shobah 65 percent afraadi quwwat ko rozgar faraham karta hai. Yeh shobah bada hassas hai aur kharab mulki aur bain al-aqwami soorat-e-haal se foran asar qabool karta hai. Is liye 1975 tak to Lebanon ne badi taraqqi ki. Saath ki dehai mein Lebanon ke darul hukoomat Beirut ko Asia ka Paris kaha jata tha. Magar 1975 ki khana jangi ne is shobah ko barbad kar diya. Khana jangi khatam hone ke baad kuch arsa mein phir Lebanon ne zabardast taraqqi ki magar haaliya Lebanon-Israeli jang ne phir Lebanon ki taraqqi ke amal ko shadeed nuqsan pohanchaya hai. Lebanon ek chota sa mulk hai. Chand ghante mein aap mulk ke ek sire se doosre tak ja sakte hain magar haqeeqatan Lebanon mukhtalif qaumiyaton aur naslon par mushtamil hai aur aksar un ke ilaqay bhi alag alag hain. Masalan junoob ke ilaqay mein nabbe percent Shia rehte hain, Jabal Lebanon mein Sunni aur kuch Masihi hain aur Beirut ek mushtarka ilaqah hai. Lebanon ke chhe hisse hain jin ko muhafizaat kaha jata hai. Har muhafiza ko aqzia mein taqseem kiya jata hai. Har qaza ko mukhtalif baldiya mein taqseem kiya gaya hai. In ki tafseel kuch is tarah hai. Lebanon ke mashhoor shehron mein Beirut, Tyre, Sidon, Tripoli aur Baalbek shamil hain. Beirut sab se bada shehar hai. Yeh tamam shehar intehai qadeem zamanay se qaim hain. Chunke Lebanon ek bada mulk nahin is liye yeh shehar ek doosre se zyada fasile par nahin hain. Lebnani saqafat bohut si tehzeebon ka murrakqa hai. In mein Funeqi, Ashuri, Farsi, Yonani, Romi, Arab, Turk, Faransi aur khud purani Lebnani saqafat shamil hai. Masihyat aur Islam donon ke rasmo riwaj nazar aate hain. Zubanon mein numayan Arabi magar saath saath Armeni, Faransi aur Angrezi ka asar hai. Nabbe percent se zyada log padhe likhe hain. Lebanon ke khane bhi bohut mashhoor hain. Masihi abadi mein naach gane ka bhi riwaj hai jo Musalmanon mein bhi phail raha tha magar Hezbollah ki tablig se ab yeh phailao ruk chuka hai. Lebanon ki mauseeqi Arab duniya mein bohut maqbool thi magar ab is ki jagah Misri mauseeqi aur film le chuki hai. Art ke ilawa Lebnani shayri aur adab bhi achha maqam rakhti hai. Mashhoor falsafi aur shair Gibran Khalil Gibran ka talluq Lebanon hi se tha. Is ke ilawa Lebanon kitabon ki tibaat mein bhi shohrat rakhta hai. Arab duniya mein chhupne wali beshtar kitaben Lebnani naashireen chhaptay the aur ab Misr bhi is maqam mein Lebanon ke saath shamil ho gaya hai. Lebanon mein 1932 ke baad koi mardum shumari nahin hui. Yeh mardum shumari France ne shinakhti card ki bunyad par karwayi thi. Bohut se Musalmanon aur Druze ne shinakhti card nahin banwaye the kyun ke un ke khayal mein shinakhti card banwane ka matlab France ke qabze ko tasleem karna tha. Is bunyad par faisla hua ke sadar jis ke paas asal taqat hoti hai woh Marouni Masihi, naib wazir-e-azam Orthodox Masihi, wazir-e-azam Sunni Musalman aur Speaker Shia Musalman hoga. Ab Musalmanon ki tadaad Masihion ki nisbat bohut zyada ho chuki hai is liye sahib-e-iqtidar Masihi mardum shumari nahin hone dete. Parliament ki seatain hatta ke mukhtalif jamiaat mein dakhle bhi isi mardum shumari ke tehat hote hain. Lebanon mein Shaam ka asar bhi is mein koi tabdeeli nahin la saka. Shaam ki fauj kafi arsa tak Lebanon mein rahi hai. Kuch arsa qabl Israel, America, Britain aur aqwaam muttahidah ne shor machana shuru kar diya ke Shaam apni fauj Lebanon se nikale. Jon hi Shaam ne apni fauj Lebanon se nikali, Israel ne do fauji riha karwane ka bahana kar ke 2006 mein Lebanon par hamla kar diya. Haalanke is se pehle bhi Israel aur Lebanon ki tanzeem Hezbollah ek doosre ke fauji qaid karte rahe hain. Israel aur America ka Lebanon ya Lebanon ke junoobi hisse par qabza karne ka mansooba Hezbollah ne nakaam bana diya. Lebanon ke Shia aur Sunni donon ne ittihad qaim rakha aur maghribi taqaton ki sazishon ka shikar nahin hue. Junoobi Lebanon par qabza karne ya Hezbollah ko ghair musallah karne ka ek maqsad yeh bhi ho sakta hai ke Iran par mumkinah hamle ke baad Hezbollah radde amal ke tor par Israel ko koi nuqsan na pohanchaye. Yaad rahe ke Iran aur Hezbollah ke bade gehre talluqat hain aur doosri baat yeh ke Lebanon ki apni fauj na hone ke barabar hai. 2006 ki Lebanon-Israel jang ke baad fi al-haal Hezbollah ko ghair musallah nahin kiya ja saka. Aur woh khette mein ek badi aur maqbool taqat ke tor par maani jati hai. Lebanon ka nizam-e-hukoomat insaf par mabni nahin hai is liye yeh ek qudrati amr hai ke khana jangi hogi. 1975 mein Lebanon mein Masihion aur Musalmanon, jo nisbatan ghareeb the, ke darmiyan khana jangi phoot padi. Yeh khana jangi taqreeban pandrah saal jari rahi jis mein taqreeban do lakh afraad maut ke ghaat utar gaye. Is dauran mein Israel ne mauqa ka faida uthate hue do dafa Lebanon par hamla kiya aur san 2000 tak junoobi Lebanon par qabiz raha. 2000 mein Hezbollah ke guerilla hamlon ki wajah se Israel ko junoobi Lebanon chhodna pada magar woh ta-haal Mazari Shabaa par qabiz hai. Lebanon ki is khana jangi ne Lebanon ki taraqqi ko bohut mutasir kiya magar aalmi quwwaton ne khana jangi ka mamla aise hal karwaya ke Musalmanon ka koi mutalba na mana gaya aur woh soorat-e-haal ab bhi maujood hai jo kisi bhi waqt khana jangi ko hawa de sakti hai. Zarurat is amr ki hai ke mardum shumari karwayi jaye aur is bunyad par ek naya nizam-e-hukoomat tashkeel diya jaye jis mein tamam shahriyon ko un ke jaiz huqooq hasil hon. Israel aur Lebanon ke talluqat hamesha se nazuk chale aa rahe hain. Is ki ek wajah to yeh hai ke Israel ne un ke Arab Falastini bhaiyon ki sarzamin par najaaiz qabza kar rakha hai. Doosre Israel ki mazhabi kitabon aur mustaqbil ke mansoobon mein Lebanon ki sarzamin ko Azeem Tar Israel ka hissa samjha jata hai. Israel ne maazi mein Lebanon par kai hamle kiye hain aur bees saal tak junoobi Lebanon par qabza bhi rakha hai. Jang na hone ki soorat mein Israeli jahaz aksar Lebanon par ghair qanooni parwaz karte rehte hain aur bambari bhi karte hain. 16 September 1982 ko Israeli commandos, jin ki sarbarahi Ariel Sharon kar raha tha, ne Lebanon ke Marouni Masihi milishia ke saath mil kar Beirut mein waqay Sabra o Shatila ke Falastini campon par hamla kar ke 5000 ke qareeb Falastiniyon ko shaheed kar diya. Jis dauran yeh qatl-e-aam jari tha, Israeli fauj ne Sabra o Shatila ko ghere mein rakha taake koi bachcha ya aurat bhi bach na sake. Kisi mulk mein azadana ghus kar us ke shahriyon ya mehmanon ko nishana banane par duniya ki maghribi insani tanzeemon ne koi wavil nahi machaya. Is ki wajah yeh hai ke Lebanon ki fauj na hone ke barabar hai. July 2006 mein Israel ne is bahanay Lebanon par hamla kar diya ke Hezbollah ne us ke do fauji qaid kar liye hain. Haalanke is se pehle bhi Israel aur Lebanon ki tanzeem Hezbollah ek doosre ke fauji qaid karte rahe hain. Israel aur America ka Lebanon ya Lebanon ke junoobi hisse par qabza karne ka mansooba Hezbollah ne nakaam bana diya. Yeh jang October 2006 tak jari rahi.
Libya, sarkari tor par Libya ki riyasat shumali Africa ke maghrib ke ilaqay mein waqay hai. Libya ki sarhadein shumal mein bahr-e-room, mashriq mein Misr, junoob mashriq mein Sudan, junoob mein Chad, junoob maghrib mein Niger, maghrib mein Algeria aur shumal maghrib mein Tunisia se milti hain. Libya teen tareekhi ilaqon par mushtamil hai Tripoli, Cyrenaica aur Fezzan. Taqreeban atharah lakh murabba kilometer ke raqbe ke saath, yeh Africa aur Arab duniya ka chautha sab se bada mulk hai aur duniya ka solahwan bada mulk hai. Mulk ka sarkari mazhab Islam hai, jis mein Libya ki 96.6% abadi Sunni Musalman hai. Libya ki sarkari zuban Arabi hai, jis mein muqami zuban Libyai Arabi sab se zyada boli jati hai. Abadi san 2023 ke takhmeene ke mutabiq 7,252,573 hai. Libya ki abadi ki aksariyat Arabon par mushtamil hai. Sab se bada shehar aur darul hukoomat, Tripoli, shumal maghribi Libya mein waqay hai. Currency ka naam Libyai Dinar hai. Libya ko Bronze ke zamanay ke awakhire se Berbers ne abad kiya tha, jo Iberomaurusian aur Capsian cultures ki aulaad hain. Classical qadeem zamanay mein, Phoenicians ne maghribi Libya mein shehar ki riyasatain aur tijarti postain qaim keen, jabkay kai Yunani shehar mashriq mein qaim hue. Poora khetah Romi saltanat ka hissa banne se pehle Libya ke kuch hisson par Carthage, Farsi aur Yunanion ki hukoomat thi. Libya Isaiyat ka ibtedai markaz tha. Maghribi Romi saltanat ke zawal ke baad, Libya ka ilaqah saatvin sadi tak zyada tar Vandals ke qabze mein raha yahan tak ke Islam ki roshni is ilaqay mein pohanchi. Is ke baad se maghrib ki taraf Arabon ki sadiyon ki hijrat ne Libya ki abadi ka dairah Arabon ke haq mein badal diya. Solahvin sadi mein, Hispani saltanat aur Saint John ke shuron ke nayon ne Tripoli par qabza kar liya yahan tak ke san 1551 mein Usmani faujon ne un ko shikast di. Libya atharahvin aur unnisvin sadi ki Barbary jungon mein shamil tha. Italevi Turk jang tak Usmani hukmarani jari rahi, baad mein Libya par Italevi qabza ho gaya aur do colonies, Italevi Tripoli aur Italevi Cyrenaica mein taqseem kar diya gaya. Baad mein san 1934 mein donon Italevi colonies ko Libya ke naam se ek kar diya gaya. Doosri jang-e-azeem ke dauran, Libya shumali African mohim mein jang ka ek ilaqah tha. Is ke baad Italevi abadi mein kami waqay hui. Libya san 1951 mein ek mamlakat ke tor par azad hua. San 1969 mein ek fauji baghawat, jis ka aaghaz Colonel Gaddafi ki qayadat mein ek ittihad ne kiya, Badshah Idris I ka takhta ult kar Colonel Muammar Gaddafi ki qayadat mein ek jamhooriya tashkeel di. Gaddafi ko aksar naqideen ek amir ke tor par bayan karte the aur woh duniya ke sab se taweel arsay tak khidmat anjam dene wale ghair shahi rehnumaon mein se ek the, jinhon ne 42 saal tak hukoomat ki. Unhon ne san 2011 ki Libya ki khana jangi ke dauran ma'zool aur mare jaane tak hukoomat ki, jo wasee Arab Bahaar ka hissa tha. Ikhtiyar qaumi ubhuri council ko aur phir muntakhab General National Congress ko muntakil kar diya gaya. San 2014 tak do rakeeb hukamranon ne Libya par hukoomat karne ka dawa kiya, jis ki wajah se doosri khana jangi shuru ho gayi, Libya ke kuch hisse Tobruk aur Tripoli mein qaim hukoomaton ke saath saath mukhtalif qabaili aur Islam pasand milishaon ke darmiyan taqseem ho gaye. Do aham mutakharib fareeqon ne san 2020 mein ek mustaqil jang bandi ka muahida kiya aur ek muttahid hukoomat ne jamhoori intikhabat ke liye mansoobah bandi karne ka ikhtiyar apne haath mein liya, haalanke siyasi dushmani is mein taakheer karti rehti hai. Libya ek aarzi ittihadi hukoomat ke tehat muttahid jamhooriya hai. Mohamed al-Menfi sadarti council ke chairman aur Moussa al-Koni sadarti council ke vice chairman hain. Abdul Hamid Dbeibah Libya ke wazir-e-azam aur Aguila Saleh Issa Ewan-e-numaindagaan ke Speaker hain. Libya ek taraqqi pazeer mulk hai jo HDI ke lehaaz se 104th number par hai aur is ke paas duniya mein dasvin sab se bade sabit shuda tel ke zakhaair hain. Libya aqwaam muttahidah, ghair wabasta tehreek, African Union, Arab League, tanzeem taawun Islami aur tel paida karne wale mumalik ki tanzeem OPEC ka rukun hai. Libya duniya ka 17 bada mulk hai, zameen ke hawalay se aur taqreeban 95 percent sehra hai. Bronze ke aakhri daur se hi Iberomaurusian aur Capsian cultures ki nasal ke tor par abad tha. Romi saltanat ka hissa banne se qabl Libya par Carthage, Farsiyon, Misriyon aur Yunanion ne mukhtalif tarah se hukmarani ki. Libya Isaiyat ka ibtedai markaz tha. Maghribi Roman saltanat ke khatme ke baad, Libya ka ilaqah zyada tar 7th sadi tak Vandals ke qabze mein tha, jab is khette mein Islam ne Islam ko pohanchaya. Solahvin sadi mein, Hispani saltanat aur Saint John ke shoron ke nayon ne Tripoli par qabza kiya, yahan tak ke 1551 mein Usmani hukoomat ka aaghaz hua. Libya 18th aur 19th sadi ki Barbary jungon mein shamil tha. Italevi Turk jang tak Usmani hukmarani jari rahi, jis ke natije mein Libya par Italevi qabza hua aur is ke natije mein do colonies, Italevi Tripolitania aur Italevi Cyrenaica ka qiyam amal mein aaya, baad azan 1934 se 1947 tak Italevi Libya colony mein ittihad hua. Doosri jang-e-azeem, Libya shumali African mohim mein jang ka ek aham ilaqah tha. Is ke baad Italevi abadi zawal pazeer ho gayi. Libya 1951 mein ek mamlakat ki haisiyat se azad hua. 1969 mein ek fauji baghawat ne Badshah Idris I ka takhta palat diya. Khoonkhwar baghawat ke rehnuma Muammar Gaddafi ne 1969 se Libya ke saqafati inquilab aur 1973 mein Libya ke saqafati inquilab tak is mulk par hukmarani ki jab tak ke un ka takhta ult na kiya gaya aur is mein mara. 2011 Libya khana jangi. Do hukamranon ne ibtedai tor par Libya par hukoomat karne ka dawa kiya tha Tobruk mein Ewan-e-numaindagaan aur Tripoli mein 2014 ki General National Congress, jo khud ko 2012 mein muntakhab hone wali General National Congress ka tasalsul samajhti thi. Tobruk aur Tripoli hukoomaton ke mabain aqwaam muttahidah ki zer-e-qayadat aman muzakaraat ke baad, muttahidah Majlis-e-Amal ke tehat muttafiqa hukoomat baraye qaumi muahida san 2015 mein qaim kiya gaya tha, aur GNC ne is ki himayat karne ke liye tod diya tha. Tab se, doosri khana jangi shuru ho chuki hai, Libya ke kuch hisse Tobruk aur Tripoli mein qaim hukoomaton ke saath saath mukhtalif qabaili aur Islam pasand milishaon ke mabain taqseem ho gaye hain. July 2017 tak, Libya ki National Army aur Libya ke markazi bank samet riyasat ke taqseem shuda idaron ko muttahid karne ke liye GNA aur Tobruk par mabni hukamranon ke mabain ab bhi baat cheet jari hai. Libya aqwaam muttahidah, ghair yalghaar movement, Arab League, OIC aur OPEC ka rukun hai. Is mulk ka sarkari mazhab Islam hai aur Libya ki 96.6% abadi Sunni Musalman hai.
Lithuania ba-zabtah tor par Jamhuriya Lithuania shumal-mashriqi Europe ke khet-e-Baltic ka ek mulk hai. Yeh teen Baltic riyasaton mein se ek hai aur bahr-e-Baltic ke mashriqi sahil par waqay hai. Is ki sarhad shumal mein Latvia, mashriq aur junoob mein Belarus, junoob mein Poland aur junoob maghrib mein Russia aur maghrib mein Sweden ke saath samundari sarhad ke saath milti hai. Lithuania 65,300 murabba kilometer ke raqbe par muheet hai, jis ki abadi atthais lakh se kuch zyada hai. Is ka darul hukoomat aur sab se bada shehar Vilnius hai. Doosre bade shehar Kaunas, Klaipėda, Šiauliai aur Panevėžys hain. Lithuaniai bashindon ka talluq Balt ke nasli lisani group se hai aur woh Lithuaniai bolte hain, jo sirf chand zinda Baltic zubanon mein se ek hai aur sab se zyada boli jati hai. Sadiyon se, bahr-e-Baltic ke junoob mashriqi sahilon par mukhtalif Baltic qabail abad the. San 1230 ki dehai mein, Lithuania ki zameenon ko pehli baar Mindaugas ne muttahid kiya, jis ne 6 July 1253 ko Lithuania ki badshahat tashkeel di. Mazeed futuhat ke natije mein Grand Duchy of Lithuania ne janam liya jo chaudahvin sadi tak Europe ki sab se badi riyasat thi. San 1386 mein, Grand Duchy of Lithuania saltanat Poland ke saath ek haqiqi shakhsi ittihad mein dakhil hua aur donon saltanaton ko san 1569 mein confederal Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth mein muttahid kiya, jis ne Europe ki sab se badi aur khushhaal riyasaton mein se ek tashkeel di thi, jo do sadiyon se zyada arsa tak qaim rahi, yahan tak ke padosi mumalik ne ise san 1772 aur 1795 ke darmiyan aahista aahista khatam kar diya, jis mein Roosi saltanat ne Lithuania ke beshtar ilaqay ko apne saath mila liya. Pehli jang-e-azeem ke ikhtitam par, Lithuania ne san 1918 mein azadi ka elaan kiya aur jadeed Jamhuriya Lithuania ki bunyad rakhi. Doosri jang-e-azeem mein, Lithuania par Soviet Union ne qabza kar liya. Soviet qabze ke khilaf Lithuania ki musallah muzahamat 1950 ke awail tak jari rahi. 11 March 1990 ko, Soviet Union ki ba-zabtah tahlil se ek saal pehle, Lithuania pehli Soviet Jamhuriya bani jis ne apni azadi ka elaan kiya. Lithuania ek taraqqi yafta mulk hai jis ki aala amadni aur taraqqi yafta maeeshat hai, jo insani taraqqi ke ashariya mein paintisven number par hai. Lithuania European Union, Council of Europe, Eurozone, Nordic Investment Bank, Schengen muahida, NATO aur OECD ka rukun hai. Yeh Nordic-Baltic Eight ilaqayi taawun ki shakal mein bhi hissa leta hai. Lithuania bahr-e-Baltic ki teen riyasaton mein se ek hai. Is ke mashriqi kinare par waqay hai. Lithuania ki zamini sarhadein shumal mein Latvia, mashriq aur junoob mein Belarus, junoob mein Poland aur maghrib junoob mein Russia se milti hain. Is mulk ki abadi 3,053,800 hai. Yeh 65,200 murabba kilometer par phaila hua hai. Yahan ki zuban Lithuaniai hai. 2015 se yahan Euro currency lagu hai. Lithuania ka darul hukoomat aur sab se bada shehar Vilnius hai. Lithuaniai bashindon ka talluq Baltic nasli lisani group se hai aur woh Lithuaniai bolte hain, jo sirf chand zinda Baltic zubanon mein se ek hai.
Lesotho ek zameen band aur junoobi Africa se charon taraf se ghira hua mulk hai. Mehaz 30,355 murabba kilometer raqba wale is mulk ki mutawaqqa abadi 2,000,000 hai. Mulk ke darul hukoomat aur sab se bada shehar Maseru hai. Yeh Commonwealth ka rukun hai. Mulk ki 40% abadi bain al-aqwami khatt-e-iflas se neeche guzar rahi hai yani 1.25 Amreeki dollar rozana se kam amadni mein guzara karti hai.
Luxembourg, maghribi Europe ka ek chota sa mulk hai. Is ke shumal aur maghrib mein Belgium, mashriq mein Germany aur junoob mein France waqay hai. Luxembourg ke darul hukoomat ka naam Luxembourg City hai jis ka shumar European Union ke char daftari darul hukoomat shehron mein hota hai.
Latvia, ba-zabtah tor par Jamhuriya Latvia, shumali Europe ke khet-e-Baltic mein waqay ek mulk hai. Azadi se le kar aaj tak Latvia ka Baltic mumalik mein shumar kiya jata hai. Lithuania, Russia, Belarus aur Sweden is ke padosi mumalik hain. Latvia ke 1,957,200 bashinde aur ka ilaqah hai. Mulk mein ek motadil mausami aab o hawa hai. Is ka darul hukoomat aur sab se bada shehar Riga hai. Latvian ka talluq Balton ke nasli lisani group se hai aur Latvian bolte hain, jo sirf do bach jane wali Baltic zubanon mein se ek hai. Roosi mulk mein sab se numayan aqaliyat hain, abadi ka taqreeban ek chauthai hissa. Euro ab muqami currency ke tor par istemal hota hai. Latvia ek taraqqi yafta mulk hai jis ki aala amadni, taraqqi yafta maeeshat insani taraqqi ke ashariya mein 39ven number par hai. Yeh European Union, Eurozone, NATO, Council of Europe, aqwaam muttahidah, Baltic samundari riyasaton ki council, bain al-aqwami maliyati fund, Nordic Baltic Eight, Nordic Investment Bank, tanzeem taawun aur taraqqi baraye iqtisadiyat, Europe mein salamti aur taawun ki tanzeem aur World Trade Organization ka rukun hai.
Jazair Marshall bahr-e-Pacific mein jazair par mushtamil mulk hai.
Malta ya Malta bahr-e-room mein jazair par mushtamil mulk hai. Yeh European Ittihad ka rukun mulk hai. Yehi woh jagah hai jahan Sheikh ul Hind ko qaid kiya gaya.
Moldova mashriqi Europe ka ek mulk hai. Jis ka zikr Muslim tareekh mein Baghdan Ili ya Wilayat-e-Baghdan ke naam se kiya jata hai. Baghdan ka naam ise Usmani Turkon ne diya tha jinhon ne arsa daraz tak Moldova par hukoomat ki. Turk ise 1359 mein Jabal Carpathians aur Darya-e-Dniester ke mashriqi janib qaim ek riyasat ke baani Baghdan ke naam par Baghdan Ili kaha karte hain. Baghdan par qabze ki ibtedai do nakaam koshishon ke baad Usmaniyon ne Khanan Crimea ke saath mil kar lashkar kashi ki aur ise Usmani saltanat mein shamil kar liya. 1775 mein Austria ne Moldova ke shumal maghribi hisse Bukovina par qabza kar liya aur 1812 mein Russia ne Bessarabia ka ilhaq kar diya. 1859 mein Walachia aur Moldova ko mila kar Romania tashkeel diya gaya jise 1878 mein Turkon se azadi mil gayi. Maujooda Moldova charon taraf se khushki mein mahsoor hai aur Romania aur Ukraine ke darmiyan waqay hai. Is ka darul hukoomat Chisinau hai. Yeh ilaqah Soviet Ittihad ke qabze mein raha hai aur 1991 mein saqoot-e-Soviet Ittihad ke baad ek azad riyasat ki haisiyat se duniya ke naqshe par ubhra.
Muttahida Arab Amarat, jise sirf Amarat bhi kaha jata hai, Jazeera Numa-e-Arab ke junoob mashriqi sahilon par waqe ek mulk hai jo 7 Amaraton Abu Dhabi, Ajman, Dubai, Fujairah, Ras Al Khaimah, Sharjah aur Umm Al Quwain par mushtamil hai. 1971 se pehle, yeh riyastein Riyastaha-e-Sahil Mutasalih kehlaati thin. Muttahida Arab Amarat ki sarhadein Sultanat Oman aur Saudi Arabia se milti hain. Yeh mulk tel aur qudrati gas ki daulat se malamal hai aur is ka inkishaf 1970 mein hone wali barah-e-rast berooni sarmaya kari ke nateeja mein hone wali daryaafton mein hua. Jis ki badolat Muttahida Arab Amarat ka shumar jald hi nihayat ameer riyasaton mein hone laga. Muttahida Arab Amarat insani falah o behbood ke jadwal mein Asia ke behtar mulkon mein se ek aur duniya ka 39th mulk hai.
Madagascar, sarkari taur par Madagascar ki Jamhuriya, ek jazeera mulk hai jo Behr-e-Hind mein Africa ke junoob mashriqi taraf waqe jazair par mushtamil mulk hai. Yeh duniya ka chautha sab se bada jazeera hai aur doosra sab se bada jazeera mulk hai. Is ka kul raqba 587,041 square kilometer isay duniya ka 44th bada mulk banata hai. Aur is ke abadi 28,812,195 hai. Is ka darul hukoomat aur sab se bada shahar Antananarivo hai aur is ki currency Ariary hai. Madagascar, Madagascar ke jazeere aur mutaddid chhote chhote jazair par mushtamil hai. Khushki ke tukde, Gondwana ke ma qabl tareekh mein tootne ke baad, taqreeban 180 million saal qabl ibtedai Jurassic ke dauran Madagascar Africa se alag ho gaya aur taqreeban 90 million saal pehle Bar-e-Sagheer Pak o Hind se alag ho gaya, jis se muqami paudon aur janwaron ko nisbatan tanhai mein tayyar hone ka mauqa mila. Nateejaatan, yeh hayatiyati tanawwu ka ahem muqaam hai aur duniya ke 17 mega diverse walay mulkon mein se ek hai, jis mein 90% se zyada jungli hayat muqami hai. Jazeere ki aab o hawa zaili ushankatbandi se ushankatbandi samandari aab o hawa hai. Madagascar pehli sadi ke wast mein ya us se pehle Austronesian logon ne abad kiya tha, ghaliban maujooda daur ke Indonesia se bhatakne walay chhoti kashtiyon par pahunche the. Yeh nawwin sadi iswi ke aas paas mashriqi Africa se Mozambique Channel ko aboor karne walay Bantu mahajireen ke saath shamil hue. Doosre giroh waqt ke saath saath Madagascar par abad hote rahe, har ek ne Malagasy saqafati zindagi mein derpa hissa dala. Is ke baad, Malagasy nasli giroh ko aksar 18 ya us se zyada zaili groupon mein taqseem kiya jata hai, jin mein se sab se bada markazi highlands ka Merina hai. 18th sadi ke akhir tak, jazeere Madagascar par samaji siyasi ittehadon ki muntaqili ki ek bikhri hui darja bandi ka raaj tha. 19th sadi ke awail mein, is ka zyada tar hissa Madagascar ki Badshahat ke taur par Merina ke raeeson ke ek silsile ke zariye muttahid aur hukmaran tha. Badshahat ka khatma 1897 mein France ke ilhaq ke baad hua, jis se Madagascar ne 1960 mein azadi hasil ki thi. Is ke baad se yeh mulk char bade aayini adwaar se guzar chuka hai, jinhein Republic kaha jata hai aur 1992 se ek aayini jamhuriat ke taur par hukoomat kar raha hai. Ek siyasi buhran aur fauji buhran ke baad 2009 mein baghawat, Madagascar ne apni chauthi aur maujooda Jamhuriya ki taraf, January 2014 mein aayini hukmarani ki bahali ke saath, ek taweel muntaqili ki. Madagascar United Nations, African Union, Junoobi Africayi Taraqqiyati Baradri aur French zuban bolne wale mumalik ki aalmi tanzeem ka rukun hai. Malagasy aur French dono riyasat ki sarkari zubanein hain. Isaiyat mulk ka sab se bada mazhab hai, jis mein ek ahem aqaliyat ab bhi riwayati aqaaid par amal paira hai. Madagascar ko United Nations ne ek kam taraqqi yafta mulk ke taur par darja bandi kiya hai. Taleem, sehat aur niji enterprise mein zyada sarmaya kari ke saath maholiati tourism aur zaraat is ki taraqqiyati hikmat-e-amali ke kaleedi anasir hain. 2000s ke awail se khatir khwah maashi taraqqi ke bawajood, aamdani mein tafawut badh gaya hai aur abadi ki aksariyat ke liye miyar-e-zindagi ab bhi kam hai. Madagascar ek jari qehat ka samna kar raha hai, jis ke bare mein mahireen ka kehna hai ki yeh sab mukammal taur par mausamiyati tabdeeli ki wajah se hua hai. Malagasy zuban mein, Madagascar ke jazeere ko Madagasikara kaha jata hai aur is ke logon ko Malagasy kaha jata hai. Naam ki asliyat ghair yaqeeni hai aur mumkinah taur par ghair mulki hai, jis ki tashheer medieval mein Europeans ne ki thi. Agar yeh mamla hai, to yeh maloom nahin hai ki yeh naam jazeere ke bashindon ne kab apnaya tha. Aisa lagta hai ki Madagasikara se pehle ka koi ek Malagasy zuban ka naam muqami abadi ne jazeere ka hawala dene ke liye istemal nahin kiya hai, halaanke kuch baradriyon ke apne naam the jis mein woh abad the. Ek muqam Madagasikara ka ta'alluq Arabi lafz Madinat Asghar se hai aur baad mein ise Madagascar bana diya gaya. Muhammad al-Idrisi ke ek naqshe mein jo saal 1154 se milta hai, is jazeere ka naam Gesira Malay ya Arabi mein Malé Jazeera hai. Malagasikara ya Malagasy ka naam bhi tareekhi taur par tasdeeq shuda hai. 1699 mein ek British riyasti muqale mein Malagasy se assi se nabbe musafiron ki aamad ko nai duniya ke ilaqe, jo baad mein New York City bana, mein record kiya gaya hai. British akhbar The Graphic ke 1882 ke edition ne jazeere ke naam ke taur par Malagasy ka hawala diya, yeh batate hue ki yeh sauthi taur par Malay nasl ka lafz hai aur is ka ta'alluq Malacca ke naam se ho sakta hai. 1891 mein, Saleh bin Osman, Zanzibar ka ek sayyah, Emin Pasha Relief Expedition ke ek hisse ke taur par, apne safar ka zikr karte hue jazeere ko Malagasy ke naam se ta'beer karta hai. 1905 mein, Charles Bassett ne apne doctorate ke muqale mein likha ki Malagasikara is jazeere ko is ke abai bashinde kehte hain, jinhon ne is baat par zor diya ki woh Malagasy the, na ke Madagasy.
Malagasikara ya Malagasy ka naam bhi tareekhi taur par tasdeeq shuda hai. 1699 mein ek British riyasti muqale mein Malagasy se assi se nabbe musafiron ki aamad ko nai duniya ke ilaqe, jo baad mein New York City bana, mein record kiya gaya hai. British akhbar The Graphic ke 1882 ke edition ne jazeere ke naam ke taur par Malagasy ka hawala diya, yeh batate hue ki yeh sauthi taur par Malay nasl ka lafz hai aur is ka ta'alluq Malacca ke naam se ho sakta hai. 1891 mein, Saleh bin Osman, Zanzibar ka ek sayyah, Emin Pasha Relief Expedition ke ek hisse ke taur par, apne safar ka zikr karte hue jazeere ko Malagasy ke naam se ta'beer karta hai. 1905 mein, Charles Bassett ne apne doctorate ke muqale mein likha ki Malagasikara is jazeere ko is ke abai bashinde kehte hain, jinhon ne is baat par zor diya ki woh Malagasy the, na ke Madagasy.
Riwayati taur par, mahireen-e-asar-e-qadima ne andaza lagaya hai ki sab se qadeem abadkar junoobi Borneo se mumkinah taur par 350 BCE aur 550 CE ke darmiyanee arse mein yeke baad deegar pahunche, jabke deegar 250 CE se pehle ki tareekhon ke bare mein mohtat hain. Dono suraton mein, yeh tareekhein Madagascar ko kurra-e-arz par insano ke zariye abad kiye jaane wale taza tareen bade zameen ke tukdon mein se ek banati hain, jo Iceland aur New Zealand ke abad hone ki peshingoi karti hain. Yeh khayal kiya jata hai ki Manayan logon ko mazdoor aur ghulam ke taur par Javanese aur Sumatra ke Malay log apne tijarati beede mein Madagascar laye the. Magar pehli sadi iswi ke wast se pehle ki tareekhon mein koi aisa mazboot hawala nahin hai.
Pahunchne par, ibtedai abadkaron ne kasht ke liye sahili barsaati janglaat ko saaf karne ke liye kaato aur jalao wali zara'at ki mashq ki. Pehle abadkaron ko Madagascar mein megafauna ki kasrat ka samna karna pada, jis mein deohaikal lemur ki 17 aqsam, bade uran bhare haathi parinde, deohaikal fossa aur uske baad Hippopotamus ki mutaddid anwaa shamil hain, jo shikar aur rihaishgah ki tabahi ki wajah se naapaid ho gaye. 600 CE tak, in ibtedai abadkaron ke girohon ne wasati pahadi ilaqon ke janglaat ko saaf karna shuru kar diya tha. Arab tajir pehli baar saatvin aur nawvin sadi ke darmiyan jazeere par pahunche. Junoobi mashriqi Africa se Bantu bolne wale mahajireen ki ek lehar 1000 CE ke qareeb pahunchi. Junoobi Hindustani Tamil tajir gyarhivin sadi ke aas paas pahunche. Unhon ne zebu, ek qism ke lambe seeng wale kohan wale maweshi, muta'arif karaye, jinhein woh bade rewadh mein rakhte the. Wasati buland ilaqe, Betsileo saltanat mein serab shuda dhan ke kheton ko tayyar kiya gaya tha aur ek sadi baad unki humsaya riyasat Imerina mein dhalanon par manzil ba manzil chawal ke kheton ke saath tausee ki gayi thi. Zameen ki kasht ki badhti hui shiddat aur zebu charagah ki musalsal badhti hui mang ne 17th sadi tak markazi buland ilaqe ko jangalati maholiati nizam se ghaas ke maidan mein tabdeel kar diya tha.
Merina ke logon ki zubani tareekhein, jo 600 aur 1,000 saal pehle ke darmiyan wasati pahadi ilaqon mein pahunchi hongi, ek aisi abadi ka samna karne ki wazahat karti hai jise woh Vazimba kehte hain. Ghaliban ek qadeem aur kam takneeki taur par taraqqi yafta Austronesian abadi ki lehar ki aulaad, Vazimba ko 16th aur 17th sadi ke awail mein Merina badshahon Andrianampoinimerina, Ralambo aur Andrianjaka ne upari ilaqon se bedakhal kar diya tha. Aaj, Vazimba ki roohon ki Malagasy ki bahut si riwayati baradriyan Tompontany ke taur par ta'azeem karti hain.
Madagascar ki tehreeri tareekh ka aaghaz Arabs se hua, jinhon ne kam az kam dasvin sadi tak shimal maghribi sahil ke saath tijarati chowkiyan qaim keen aur Islam, Arabi rasm-ul-khat muta'arif karaya.
European contact saal 1500 mein shuru hua, jab Portuguese samandari captain Diogo Dias ne Portuguese Hindi bahri muhim ke doosre daur mein shirkat karte hue is jazeere ko dekha.
Matatana, Fort Dauphin se 10 km maghrib mein, junoobi sahil par pehli Portuguese basti thi. Saal 1508 mein, wahan ke abadkaron ne ek minaar, ek chhota sa gaon aur ek patthar ka sutoon banaya. Yeh basti saal 1513 mein Portuguese Hindustan ke viceroy Jerónimo de Azevedo ke hukum par qaim ki gayi thi. Saal 1550s se contacts jari rahe. Kai nauabadiyat aur tabdeeli ke missions, bashamool ek saal 1553 mein Balthazar Lobo de Sousa ke mission ke, ka hukum badshah João III aur viceroy Hind ne diya tha, is mission mein, mukharikhin Diogo do Couto aur João de Barros ki tafseeli wazahat ke mutabiq, safeer dariyaon aur khaarijon ke zariye androoni mulk pahunche, saaman ka tabadla kiya aur yahan tak ke muqami badshahon mein se ek ko tabdeel kiya. French ne 17th sadi ke akhir mein mashriqi sahil ke saath tijarati chowkiyan qaim keen. Taqriban saal 1774 se 1824 tak, Madagascar ne qazaqon aur European tajiron, khaas taur par woh log jo Atlantic ki ghulamon ki tijarat mein mulawwis the, ko bhugta. Madagascar ke shimal mashriqi sahil par Nosy Boraha ke chhote jazeere ko kuch mukharikhin ne Libertalia ke afsanvi samandari daku utopia ki jagah ke taur par tajweez kiya hai. Bahut se European mallahon ke jazeere ke sahilon par bahri jahaz tabah hue, in mein se Robert Drury, jin ka jareeda 18th sadi ke dauran junoobi Madagascar mein zindagi ki chand tehreeri akaasion mein se ek hai.
Samandari tijarat se paida hone wali daulat ne jazeere par munazzam saltanat ke urooj ko farogh diya, jin mein se kuch 17th sadi tak kafi taqatwar ho chuki thin. In mein mashriqi sahil ka Betsimisaraka ittehad aur maghribi sahil par Menabe aur Boina ke Sakalava sarbarahaan shamil the. Imerina ki badshahat, jis ka darul hukoomat Antananarivo ke shahi mahal mein markazi pahadi ilaqon mein waqe tha, taqriban usi waqt badshah Andrianampoinimerina ki qiyadat mein ubhri.
17th sadi ke awail mein apne zahoor ke baad, Imerina ki pahadi badshahat ibtedai taur par badi sahili riyasaton ke muqable mein ek mamooli taqat thi aur 18th sadi ke awail mein us waqt aur bhi kamzor hoti gayi jab badshah Andriamasinavalona ne use apne char beton mein taqseem kar diya. Taqriban ek sadi ki jang aur qehat ke baad, Imerina ko saal 1793 mein badshah Andrianampoinimerina ne dobara milaya. Apne ibtedai darul hukoomat Ambohimanga se aur baad mein Antananarivo ke Rova se, is Merina badshah ne padosi riyasaton par apni hukmarani ko tezi se badhaya. Poore jazeere ko apne control mein laane ki uski khwahish badi had tak uske bete aur jaanasheen, badshah Radama I ne hasil ki, jise British hukoomat ne Madagascar ke badshah ke taur par tasleem kiya tha. Radama ne saal 1817 mein Mauritius ke British governor ke saath British fauji aur mali imdad ke badle ghulamon ki munafa bakhsh tijarat ko khatam karne ke liye ek muahida kiya. London Missionary Society ke karigar missionary elchi saal 1818 mein pahunchna shuru hue aur un mein James Cameron, David Jones aur David Griffiths jaisi ahem shakshiyat shamil thin, jinhon ne school qaim kiye, Roman haroof-e-tehaji ka istemal karte hue Malagasy zuban ko naqal kiya aur Bible ka ek naya tarjuma muta'arif karaya.
Radama ki jaanasheen, malika Ranavalona I ne Britain aur France ki janib se badhte hue siyasi aur saqafati tajawwuzat ka jawab Madagascar mein Isaiyat ke riwaj par pabandi lagane aur zyada tar ghair mulkiyon par ilaqa chhodne ke liye dabao dal kar shahi farman jari kiye. London Missionary Society ke William Ellis ne apni kitab Three Visits to Madagascar mein 1853, 1854 aur 1856 mein apne daur-e-hukumat ke dauran kiye gaye apne dauron ko bayan kiya hai. Awami kamo ke mansobon ko mukammal karein aur 20,000 aur 30,000 Merina sipahiyon ki ek khadi fauj tayyar karein, jinhein usne jazeere ke bahari ilaqon ko pur sukoon karne aur zyada tar Madagascar ko gherne ke liye riyasat Merina ko mazeed wus'at dene ke liye tainat kiya. Madagascar ke rihaishi ek doosre par chori, Isaiyat aur khaas taur par jadu tonay samet mukhtalif jarayim ka ilzam laga sakte the, jin ke liye Tangena ki aazmaish mamool ke mutabiq wajib thi. 1828 aur 1861 ke darmiyan, Tangena ki aazmaish se saalana taqriban 3,000 amwat huin. 1838 mein, yeh andaza lagaya gaya tha ki Imerina mein taqriban 100,000 log Tangena aazmaish ke nateeje mein halak hue, jo abadi ka taqriban 20%. Baqaida jung, beemari, mushkil jabri mehnat aur insaf ke sakht iqdamat ke imtizaj ke nateeje mein uske 33 saala daur-e-hukumat mein faujiyon aur shehriyon mein yaksan sharah-e-amwat hui. Madagascar ki abadi ka takhmina 1833 aur 1839 ke darmiyan taqriban 5 million se ghat kar 2.5 million tak pahunch gaya hai.
Madagascar ek jazeera mulk hai, jo Africa ke mashriqi hisse mein waqe hai. Is ka raqba 587,000 square kilometer hai.
Madagascar mein pahad bhi maujood hain aur maidan bhi, ise paanch bade jughrafiyai khaton mein taqseem kiya ja sakta hai.
Madagascar mein zyada tar do mausam paye jaate hain khushki aur barsaat. Darasal garmi ka mausam barsaat ka hota hai aur khushki ka mausam sardi kehlata hai.
Madagascar mein paye jaane wale Baobab naam ke darakht ko khaas ahmiyat hasil hai. Is deohaikal darakht ko pani zakhira karne ki quwwat ki wajah se jazeera Madagascar ka khazana bhi kaha jata hai. Baobab darakhton ki yahan aath aqsaam payi jati hain. Mazedar baat yeh hai ki pani zakhira karne wala yeh darakht Madagascar ki banjar zameenon par namu pata hai. Is ka tana bottle numa hota hai, jis mein badi miqdar mein pani jama rehta hai. Ek andaze ke mutabiq is darakht ke tane mein ek lakh bees hazar liter pani jama karne ki gunjaish hoti hai, jo is banjar ilaqe mein insano aur jungli hayat ke liye zindagi ki alamat samjha jata hai. Is darakht ki ek aur baat jo hairat angez hai, woh yeh ki is ki jarein zameen se bahar hawa mein hoti hain.
Is mulk ki do tihai abadi international khat-e-iflas se neeche zindagi basar kar rahi hai. Iska darul hukoomat Antananarivo hai. Iski sarkari zuban French aur Malagasy hai.
Mashriqi Timor Indonesia ke saath chhota sa mulk hai jiska darul hukoomat Dili hai.
1975 mein Saltanat-e-Portugal ne Timor ko azad kiya to Indonesia ne foran jazeera Timor par qabza kar liya aur azadi pasand firqon ko jabran apne mat'ahat karne ki koshish ki, maghribi taqaton ne Indonesia ki himayat ki is dar se ke Mashriqi Timor China ki madad hasil karte hue communist ban jaye.
1999 mein Indonesia referendum par razamand ho gaya jis mein Mashriqi Timor ke bashinde muqami khud mukhtari aur azadi ke darmiyan faisla karein ge. Jab nateeja azadi ke haq mein aaya to woh Timori jo Indonesia ke haq mein the sadkon mein tashaddud aur qatl-e-aam karne lage. Sainkdon halak hue.
Aqwam-e-Mutahidda ke aane se jang bandi hui aur is idare ki koshishon se aman o aman raha hai.
Maqduniya rasmi taur par Jamhuriya Maqduniya Balkan, junoob mashriqi Europe mein ek mulk hai. Yeh Ishtiraki Jamhuriya Yugoslavia ka hissa tha jis se is ne 1991 mein azadi hasil ki. Riyasat ke naam ka Yunan ke saath tanaza chal raha tha jise ab hal kar liya gaya hai. January 2019 mein is ka naam Jamhuriya Shumali Maqduniya hona tay paya hai.
Riyasat ka naam Yunani lafz Maqduniya se hai jo ek qadeem riyasat Mamlakat Maqduniya thi.
Malawi Africa mein waqe ek zameen band mulk hai. Is ki sarhadein Tanzania, Mozambique se milti hain. Tanzania aur Mozambique se mulk ki sarhadon ka ta'ayyun jheel Malawi karti hai. Mulk ka kul raqba 118,000 square kilometer hai, jahan taqriban 13,900,000 se zayed log baste hain. Iska darul hukoomat Lilongwe aur sabse bada shehar Blantyre hai.
Malaysia ya Maleziya junoob mashriqi Asia mein ek Muslim mulk hai. Constitutional monarchy terah riyasaton aur teen ilaqon par mushtamil hai, jinhein Behra-e-Junoobi China ne do ilaqon mein alag kiya hai Jazeera Numa Malaysia aur Jazeera Borneo par Mashriqi Malaysia ka ilaqa. Jazeera Numa Malaysia ki zameen aur samandari sarhad Thailand ke saath aur samandari sarhadein Singapore, Vietnam aur Indonesia ke saath milti hain. Mashriqi Malaysia Brunei aur Indonesia ke saath zameen aur samandari sarhadon ke saath saath Philippines aur Vietnam ke saath samandari sarhadon ka ishtirak karta hai. Kuala Lumpur qaumi darul hukoomat, mulk ka sabse bada shehar aur wifaqi hukoomat ki qanoon saaz shakh ki nashist hai. Putrajaya intizami markaz hai, jo dono intizami shakhen aur wifaqi hukoomat ki adalti shakh ki numaindagi karta hai. Kul raqba 330,803 square kilometer hai. Teen crore bees lakh se zyada abadi ke saath, yeh mulk duniya ka 43rd sabse zyada abadi wala mulk hai. Yeh mulk 17 mega diverse mulkon mein se ek hai aur mutaddid muqami anwa'a ka ghar hai. Tanjung Piai bar-e-azam Eurasia ka sabse junoobi nuqta hai. Yeh mulk istoyai khetay mein waqe hai. Is mulk ki ibtida Malay saltanat se hui hai, jo atharvin sadi se, British strait settlements ke muhafzat ke saath British saltanat ke tabe'a ho thin. Doosri jang-e-azeem ke dauran, British Malaya, deegar qareebi British aur American colonies ke saath, saltanat Japan ke qabze mein chala gaya. Teen saal ke qabze ke baad, Jazeera Numa Malaysia ko saal 1946 mein Malay Union ke taur par muttahid kiya gaya aur phir saal 1948 mein Malaysia ki Federation ke taur par uski tashkeel-e-nau ki gayi. Mulk ne 31 August 1957 ko azadi hasil ki. 16 September 1963 ko, azad Malaya ne Shumali Borneo, Sarawak aur Singapore ko apne saath mila kar Federation Malaysia ki tashkeel ki. August, 1965 mein, Singapore ne Federation se alaihdagi ikhtiyar karli aur ek khud mukhtar mulk ban gaya.
Yeh mulk kaseer-ul-nasli aur kaseer-ul-saqafati hai, jis ka is ki siyasat par numayan asar padta hai. Taqriban aadhi abadi nasli taur par Malay hai aur deegar Chinese, Indians aur muqami logon ki aqliyatain hain. Sarkari zuban Malaysian Malay hai, jo Malay zuban ki ek miyari shakal hai. English ek active doosri zuban bani hui hai. Islam ko sarkari mazhab ke taur par tasleem karte hue, aain ghair Muslimon ko mazhab ki azadi deta hai. Malaysia ek wifaqi parliamentary constitutional elective monarchy hai. Hukoomat Westminster parliamentary system par mabni hai aur qanooni nizam common law par mabni hai. Riyasat ka sarbarah ek muntakhab badshah hota hai, jise har paanch saal baad nau riyasti sultanon mein se muntakhab kiya jata hai. Hukoomat ka sarbarah wazeer-e-azam hota hai. Malaysia ke maujooda badshah Yang di-Pertuan Agong Abdullah aur wazeer-e-azam Anwar Ibrahim hain. Wan Junaidi Tuanku Jaafar Aiwan-e-Bala ke sadar hain aur Johari Abdul Aiwan-e-Zaireen ke speaker hain. Tengku Maimun Tuan Mat Malaysia ke chief justice hain. Malaysian ringgit as currency istemal hota hai.
Azadi ke baad, kul ghareloo paidawar taqriban 50 saalon mein average 6.5% saalana ki sharah se badhi. Mulk ki economy traditionals uske natural resources se chalti rahi hai, lekin yeh trade, tourism aur medical tourism mein phail rahi hai. Mulk ki ek nai industrial market economy hai, jo junoob mashriqi Asia mein paanchvin aur duniya mein 36th sabse badi hai. Yeh mulk Islamic Cooperation Organization, United Nations, East Asia Summit aur Association of Southeast Asian Nations ka rukun hai aur Non-Aligned Movement, Commonwealth aur Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation ka rukun hai. Iske muslehatee muqaam ne isko ghair mulki asrat se mutasir kiya.
Malaysia mein modern insani rihaish ke saboot 40,000 saal purane hain. Jazeera Numa Malaya mein, sabse pehle bashindon ko Negrito samjha jata hai. Malaysia ke ilaqon ne 2000 BCE se 1000 CE ke darmiyan pattharon ki samandari tijarat mein hissa liya. Hindustan aur China se tajir aur abadkar pehli sadi CE ke awail mein pahunche, doosri aur teesri sadi mein tijarati bandargahin aur sahili shehar qaim kiye. Unki maujoodgi ke nateejay mein muqami saqafaton par mazboot Hindustani aur Chinese asarat murattab hue aur Jazeera Numa Malaysia ke logon ne Hindu mat aur Budh mat ke mazhabon ko apna liya. Sanskrit ke naweshtaat chauthi ya paanchvi sadi ke awail mein zahir hote hain. Langkasuka ki badshahat doosri sadi ke aas paas Jazeera Numa Malay ke shumali ilaqay mein paida hui, jo taqriban pandrahvi sadi tak qaim rahi. Saatvin aur terahvin sadi ke darmiyan, Jazeera Numa Junoobi Malaya ka zyada tar hissa samandari Srivijayan saltanat ka hissa tha. Terahvin aur chaudahvin sadi tak, Majapahit saltanat ne Srivijaya se jazeera numa ke behtar hisse aur Jazeera Numa Malaya par kamyabi se control hasil kar liya tha. Hindu mat aur Budh mat ki saqafaton ne jo Bharat se aayi thin yahan apna ghalba qaim kiya. Agarche Muslimon ne Malaysia mein ibtedai taur par dasvin sadi mein qadam rakha tha magar chaudahvin aur pandrahvin sadi mein Islam sabse pehle Jazeera Numa Malaya par qaim hua. Pandrahvin sadi ke awail mein, Parameswara, purane Srivijayan darbar se munsalik saabiq badshahat ke Singapore mein jilawatan badshah, ne Malacca saltanat ki buniyad rakhi. Raja Parameswara ne Islam qabool kar liya aur Iskandar Shah naam ikhtiyar kar liya. Unke Islam qabool karne ke baad Islam ke phailao mein izafa hua. Malacca us waqt ke dauran ek ahem tijarati markaz tha, jo ard gird ke ilaqe se tijarat ko raaghib karta tha.
Malaysia ek kaseer-ul-nasl, kaseer-ul-saqafati samaaj hai. Sab se pehle is ilaqe mein rehne wale desi qabail ke log the jo ab bhi maujood hain. Chinese aur Bharati saqafati asarat yahan wazeh nazar aate hain, deegar saqafati asarat mein Farsi, Arabi aur British saqafatain shamil hain.
Saal 1971 mein hukoomat ne ek qaumi saqafati policy banayi jis ke mutabiq Malaysia ki saqafat ki bunyad muqami ho jis mein Islami saqafat ki jhalak nazar aati ho.
Junoob Mashriqi Asia mein wahid Federal mulk hai. British daur ki virasat, nizam-e-hukoomat Westminster parliamentary system ka qareebi namuna hai.
Malaysia ek Federal Constitutional Elective Monarchy hai.
Yang di-Pertuan Agong riyasat ka sarbarah jabke wazeer-e-azam hukoomat ka sarbarah hai. Shah-e-Malaysia Malay riyaston ke nau mawroosi badshahon ke zariye ba’hami taur par paanch saal ke liye muntakhab kiya jata hai. Deegar char riyastein, jin ke hakim governor hain, is intikhab mein shirkat nahin karte. Ghair rasmi mu’ahede ke mutabiq yeh nashist in nau salateen ko baari baari di jati hai. 31 January, 2019 se yeh takht riyasat Pahang ke Sultan Abdullah ke paas hai. 1994 ko dastoor mein ki jane wali badi tabdeeliyon ke ba’is wuzara aur aiwan-e-bala ke arakeen ke intikhab mein badshah ka kirdar sirf rasmi reh gaya hai.
Qanoon saaz quwwat Federal aur riyasti maqannina mein munqasim hai. Do aywani Federal maqannina Aiwan-e-Zairin aur Aiwan-e-Bala par mushtamil hai. 222 rukni Aiwan-e-Numaindagaan yak-rukni halqa-jaat se zyada se zyada paanch saal ke liye muntakhab hoti hai. Jabke Aiwan-e-Bala ke tamam 70 arakeen 3 saala muddat ki nashist rakhte hain. Jin mein 26 arakeen 13 riyasti maqannina se aur 44 arakeen Wazeer-e-Azam Malaysia ki tajweez par badshah namzad karta hai. Parliament kaseer jamati nizam ki pairwi karti hai. Hukoomat First Past the Post system ke tehat chuni jati hai.
Intizami quwwat Wazeer-e-Azam Malaysia ki sarbarahi mein Cabinet ke paas hoti hai. Aiwan-e-Numaindagaan ka rukun hona zaroori hai. Aiwan-e-Numaindagaan ki aksariyat arakan ki himayat ke mutabiq badshah hi Wazeer-e-Azam banata hai. Cabinet Parliament ke dono aiwanon mein se chuni jati hai. Wazeer-e-Azam Cabinet aur hukoomat dono ka sarbarah hota hai. Jo Aiwan-e-Numaindagaan ke e’timad tak barqarar rehta hai.
Adliya nizam mein sabse badi adalat Federal Court hai, jiski pairwi Appellate Court aur Mashriqi Malaysia aur Maghrib mein Jazeera Numa Malaya mein waqe ek-ek High Court karti hain. Mazhabi zimmedariyon aur khandani mamlaat mein Musalmanon ke liye Shari’a courts bhi kaam karti hain. Aghwa, qatl, dehshatgardi aur munshiyat ki tarseel par maut ki saza di jati hai. Humjins parasti Malaysia mein qaabil-e-ta’zeer ghair qanooni fa’al hai. Lekin Malaysia ko insani aur jinsi smuggling ke gambhir masail ka samna hai.
Malaysia 13 riyaston aur 3 wifaqi ilaqon ka وفاق hai. Jo 2 ilaqon mein munqasim hai. Maghrib mein Jazeera Numa Malaya hai jahan 11 riyastein aur 2 wifaqi ilaqe hain. Jabke Mashriqi Malaysia jazeera Borneo mein hai jahan 2 riyastein aur 1 wifaqi ilaqa hai. Har riyasat zilon mein munqasim hai jo mazeed muqeem mein munqasim hain. Riyasat Sabah aur Sarawak mein zilon ko division mein mujamma kiya gaya hai. Malacca ke ilawa har riyasat apna e’zazi naam rakhti hai.
Malaysia ki economy tezi se badhti hui aur nisbatan khuli riyasti policy par mabni hai.
2011 takhmine ke mutabiq GDP growth 5.2% hai.
Malaysia kul zameen ke ilaqe ke lihaz se 67th sab se bada mulk hai. Maghrib mein uski zameen sarhad Thailand ke saath milti hai jabke Indonesia aur Brunei Darussalam uske Mashriq mein waqe hain. Junoob mein barah-e-raah pul Singapore se affiliated hai. Vietnam ke saath uski samandari hadood hain.
Malaysia ke do juda hisse hain jinke darmiyan Junoobi China samundar hai.
Malaysia ka aain mazhab ki azadi ki zamanat deta hai jabke Islam sarkari mazhab hai.
Mangolia ya Mogolistan Asia mein waqe ek mulk hai. Mangolia China aur Russia ke darmiyan ek landlocked mulk hai. Is ke shimal ki janib Russia aur junoob ki janib China waqe hai. Darul hukoomat aur sabse bada shehar Ulaanbaatar hai, maazi mein is shehar ko Ulan Bator kehte the. Mulk ki abadi ka 38% isi shehar mein rehti hai. Mangolia ka siyasi nizam parliamentary Republic hai. Mulk ke zyada tar log Budh mat ke pairukar hain. In mein se bahut se log ab bhi khana badosh hain, lekin yeh log ab tabdeel ho rahe hain. Mulk ke shumali aur mashriqi hisson mein bahut se pahad hain. Junoobi hisse mein desert Gobi hai. Raqbe ke lihaz se duniya ka 18th sabse bada mulk hai. Juraim ki sharah aur night life bahut kam hain. Inki zuban Mongol hai, lekin kuch English, Chinese aur Russian bhi jaante hain. Mangolia ki abadi ki kasafat duniya mein sabse kam hai.
Mongolia par bahut se namwar badshahon ne hukoomat ki hai. 1206 mein Genghis Khan ne Mongolia par hukoomat ki 16th sadi ke akhir mein Budh mat mazhab yahan par phail gaya. 17th sadi ke akhir mein Mongolia Rajvansh khandan ki hukmarani mein chala gaya jab 1911 mein Mongolia ne azadi ka elaan kiya to unhein azadi ke liye badshahon se ladna pada jis mein Soviet Union ne unki madad ki. 1921 mein duniya ne Mongolia ko azad mulk tasleem kar liya. Mongolia ab bhi buniyadi taur par dehati hai. Mongolia mein Red Cross Society 1939 mein qaim kiya gaya. Iske headquarters Ulaanbaatar mein qaim hain. 1939 Soviet Union ke khatme par Russia ki Mongolia mein dilchaspi khatam ho gayi jo is se qabl Mongolia mein dilchaspi dikha raha tha. Ab China aur South Korea Mongolia ke saath trade ko shobay mein dilchaspi dikha rahe hain.
Mongolia ki aab-o-hawa shadeed qism ki hai. Mausam-e-sarma bahut sard aur mausam-e-garma mo'tadil hota hai. Haal hi mein sardiyon mein bahut sardi ho gayi thi jisne bahut se logon aur janwaron ko maut ke munh mein dhakel diya. 2008 ke barfani toofan mein 52 afraad mare gaye mutaddid zakhmi hue iske saath 2 lakh maweshi bhi sardi ki wajah se mar gaye. Ek bhari mitti ka toofan ko shumal mashriqi China aur Mongolia ke mukhtalif hisson mein 1 March ko shuru hua jo 4 March ko shumali aur junoobi Korea ke hisson mein ja kar khatam hua. 8 May 2008 ko ek barfani toofan mein 21 log mare gaye is toofan mein androoni Mongolia ke bhi kuch hisson ko nuqsan pahuncha. April 2010 mein Mongolia mein darja hararat -50 degree centigrade tak pahunch gaya. Mongolia mein sardiyon ka mausam bahut sakht aur taweel hota hai har saal sardiyon mein bahut sa jaani o mali nuqsan hota hai.
Mauritania ya Islami Jamhuriya Mauritania jise Urdu mein Mauritania bhi likhte hain. Shumal maghribi Africa ka ek Islami mulk hai jahan Arabi aur French boli jati hai. France se 1960 mein azad hone wale is mulk ki abadi 2005 ke takhmine ke mutabiq 3,069,000 aur raqba 1030700 square kilometer hai. Yeh ek Islami mulk hai.
Mozambique (sarkari taur par Jamhuriya Mozambique) Africa ke junoob-mashriq mein waqe ek mulk hai. Iski sarhadein mashriq mein Behra-e-Hind, shimal mein Tanzania, shimal maghrib mein Malawi aur Zambia, maghrib mein Zimbabwe aur junoob maghrib mein South Africa aur Eswatini se milti hain. Mozambique ka darul hukoomat Maputo hai. Pehli aur 5th sadi ke darmiyan Bantu zuban bolne wale shimal ba'eed aur maghrib se hijrat karke yahan aaye. Swahili aur baad mein Arab bhi, neez tijarati bandargahin ahal-e-Europe ki aamad tak sahilon par maujood thin. 1498 mein Vasco da Gama ne is ilaqe ki siyahat ki aur 1505 se Portuguese ne is par apna ist'amaar qaim kiya. 1975 mein Mozambique is ist'amaar se azad hua aur uske baad jald hi Awami Jamhuriya Mozambique ki shakal ikhtiyar karli. Yahi woh daur tha jab Mozambique mein zabardast khana jangi barpa thi, is khana jangi ka aaghaz 1972 ko hua aur 1992 mein yeh khana jangi khatam hui.
Duniya ka azeem Safari Park Kruger Park Swaziland ke saath Namaacha border ke qareeb maujood hai. Yeh 'Five Big' ke liye mashoor hai, is se murad paanch bade janwar hain. In paanch bade janwaron mein sher, gainda, African bank haathi aur cheeta shamil hain. Mashoor TV channel National Geographic ki bahut sari dastavezi filmein Kruger Park mein filmband hui hain.
Mozambique qudrati wasail se malamal hai. Mulk ki aksar economy ki buniyad zaraat hai, taham industry, bilkhusoos makoolat o mashroobat, kimiyaavi masnooaat, aluminium aur petrol ki industry aage badh rahi hai. Mulk ka tourist sector bhi taraqqi pazeer hai. South Africa Mozambique ka ahem tijarati rafeeq aur raast berooni sarmaya kari ka zariya hai. Neez Portugal, Spain aur Belgium bhi ahem tijarati sharika hain. 2001 se Mozambique apne saalana khaam mulki paidawar (GDP) ke afzaishi average ki bina par duniya ke das bade mulkon ki fehrist mein shamil ho gaya hai.
Mozambique ki daftari zuban Portuguese hai, jabke mulk ki aadhi abadi ise secondary zuban ki haisiyat se istemal karti hai aur bahut kam aise afraad hain jo ise pehli zuban ki haisiyat se istemal karte hain. Muqami taur par Swahili, Makhuwa aur Sena zubanein bade paimane par boli jati hain.
Mozambique ka sabse bada mazhab Masihiyat hai, Muslim aur African riwayati mazahib ki aqliyatain bhi kafi ta'adad mein maujood hain. Mozambique African Union aur Commonwealth countries ka rukun hai. Mulk ka naam Mozambique Portuguese ne jazeera Mozambique ke baad rakha tha, Mozambique naam Musa al-Bique ya Musa bin Mbiki se mushtaq hai. Yeh ek Arab tajir ka naam hai jo sabse pehle jazeera par pahuncha aur baad mein wahin sukunat ikhtiyar karli.
Nigeria (ya mukammal taur par Federal Jamhuriya-e-Nigeria) maghribi Africa mein waqe ek Islami mulk hai aur iska darul hukoomat Abuja hai aur bada shehar Lagos hai. Sahara ke aar paar, qaafilon ke liye maujood raston ne Nigeria ko shimal ki tareekhi tehzeebon se munsalik rakha tijarat ke alawa yeh raste shimal mein maujood Muslim tehzeeb se nazriyat, mazhab aur saqafat bhi lekar aaye.
