Is tarah Islam 8th sadi mein shumali Nigeria mein dakhil hua. 486 mein Portuguese ke ek daure ke baad Benin, Europe aur Yorubaland ke mabin tijarat ke liye zakhira gaah ban gaya. 1804 mein ek Fulani Muslim mufakkir aur wali-Allah, mashhoor kitab Ihya' al-Sunnah ke musannif Usman dan Fodio sultan bane aur unka alam uthane wale Fulani riyaston ke sarbarah ban gaye jinki naslein aaj bhi maujood hain.
British ne 1553 mein Benin ka daura kiya aur woh bhi ghulamon ki tijarat mein mulawwis ho gaye yahan tak ke 1807 mein use ghair qanooni qarar de diya gaya. 1861 tak Britain ne Lagos ke jazeere ko apni saltanat mein shamil kar liya tha aur tableeghi o tijarati sargarmian Lagos se Nigeria ke saath saath androoni ilaqon tak phail gayi thin. Britain ne Fulani umra ko apni sarparasti mein aa jane ka lalalch diya jinhein mashriq mein Germany aur maghrib mein France ki dhamkiyon ka samna tha. 1 January 1900 ko Britain ne shumali Nigeria ki sarparast hukoomat hone ka elaan kar diya aur wahan ek High Commissioner ko mutaiyan kiya. Kano aur Sokoto par 1903 mein qabza kar liya gaya magar Borno par 1906 tak control hasil na kiya ja saka. Awam mein siyasi sha'oor bedar hone ke nateeje mein 1922 mein mushawarti council khatam karke qanoon saaz council qaim ki gayi. 1951 mein ek aain pesh kiya gaya jisne ek neem zimmedar hukoomat aur ilaqai khud mukhtari faraham ki magar yeh tajurba 1953 mein nakam ho gaya. Isi saal fareeqain ke mabin ek aur muahida tay paya jisne zaid ilaqai khud mukhtari ke mutalbe ko janam diya. Nigeria ki azadi aur British afsaran ke ikhraj ka mutalba 1959 mein kiya gaya jis ke nateeje mein Al-Haji Abubakar Tafawa Balewa ko ek qaumi cabinet ke saath prime minister muqarrar kiya gaya. Nigeria Commonwealth mein rehte hue 1 October 1960 ko ek azad riyasat aur 1 October 1963 ko Federal Jamhuriya ban gaya.
Namibia ek African mulk hai jo Africa ke junoobi hisse mein Behra-e-Oqyanus ke kinare waqe hai. Iska darul hukoomat Windhoek hai. Namibia sarkari taur par Jamhuriya Namibia, Africa ka ek mulk hai. Iski maghribi sarhad Behra-e-Oqyanus, jiski zameen sarhadein shimal mein Zambia aur Angola, mashriq mein Botswana aur junoob aur mashriq mein South Africa se milti hain. Agarche iski sarhad Zimbabwe se nahin milti, taham darya-e-Zambezi ke Botswanan ke daain kinare se 200 meter se kam dono mulkon ko alag karta hai. Namibia ki jang-e-azadi ke baad 21 March 1990 ko Namibia ne South Africa se azadi hasil ki. Iska darul hukoomat aur sabse bada shehar Windhoek hai. Namibia United Nations, Southern African Development Community, African Union aur Commonwealth ki rukun riyasat hai.
Sub-Saharan Africa ka sab se khushk mulk, Namibia qabl az tareekh ke zamane se San, Damara aur Nama ke logon ke zariye abad hai. 14th sadi ke aas paas, hijrat karne wale Bantu log Bantu ki tausee ke hisse ke taur par pahunche. Tab se, Bantu groups, jin mein sab se bada Ovambo hai, ne mulk ki abadi par ghalba hasil kiya hai. 19th sadi ke akhir se, unhon ne aksariyat hasil kar li hai.
1878 mein, Cape of Good Hope, jo us waqt ek British colony thi, ne Walvis Bay aur offshore Penguin Islands ki bandargah ko apne saath mila liya. Yeh saal 1910 mein uski tashkeel ke waqt South Africa ki nai Union ka ek lazmi hissa ban gaye. Saal 1884 mein German saltanat ne zyada tar ilaqe par hukmarani qaim ki aur ek colony banai jise German South West Africa kaha jata hai. Isne farming aur infrastructure develop kiya. Saal 1904 aur 1908 ke darmiyan isne Herero aur Nama ke logon ke khilaf genocide ka irtikab kiya. German hukmarani saal 1915 mein South African faujon ke haathon shikast ke saath khatam hui. Saal 1920 mein, pehli jang-e-azeem ke khatme ke baad, League of Nations ne colony ka intizam South Africa ko sonpa. Lazmi taqat ke taur par, South Africa ne apne qanoon naafiz kiye, bashamool nasli darja bandi aur qawaid. Saal 1948 se, National Party ke iktidar mein muntakhab hone ke saath, is mein South Africa ne apartheid ko lagu karna bhi shamil tha jo us waqt South West Africa ke naam se jana jata tha.
20th sadi ke akhir mein, azadi ke khwahan muqami African siyasi karkunon ki taraf se baghawat aur siyasi numaindagi ke mutalbat ke nateejay mein United Nations ne saal 1966 mein is ilaqe ki direct zimmedari sambhali, lekin South Africa ne asli hukmarani barqarar rakhi. Saal 1973 mein United Nations ne South West Africa People's Organization (SWAPO) ko Namibia ke logon ki sarkari numainda tanzeem tasleem kiya. Party par Ovambo ka ghalba hai, jo ilaqe mein ek badi aksariyat hain. Musalsal guerrilla jang ke baad, South Africa ne saal 1985 mein Namibia mein ek intekhabi intizamiya qaim ki. Namibia ne saal 1990 mein South Africa se mukammal azadi hasil ki. Taham, Walvis Bay aur Penguin Islands saal 1994 tak South Africa ke control mein rahe.
Namibia ki abadi pachis lakh afraad par mushtamil hai aur ek mustahkam kaseer-ul-jamati parliamentary democracy hai. Zara'at, tourism aur mining industry, jis mein jawaharat, uranium, sona, chandi aur buniyadi dhaaton ki mining shamil hai, iski economy ki buniyad hain, jabke manufacturing sector nisbatan chhota hai. Bade, khushk Namib desert jahan se is mulk ka naam liya gaya hai iske nateeje mein Namibia majmooi taur par duniya ke sabse kam gunjan abad mulkon mein se ek hai.
Nepal (Nepali) sarkari naam Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal junoobi Asia ka ek landlocked mulk hai. Iska zyada tar hissa Silsila Koh Himalaya ke daaman mein waqe hai magar Sindh o Gang ka maidan ka bhi kuch hissa Nepal mein aata hai. Iski kul abadi 26.4 million hai aur bilhawaz abadi yeh duniya ka 48th bada mulk hai aur bilhawaz raqba yeh duniya ka 93rd bada mulk hai. Iski sarhadein shimal mein China, junoob, mashriq aur maghrib mein Bharat hai. Bangladesh yahan se mehez 27 kilometer ki doori par hai. Bhutan aur Nepal ke beech mein Bharat ki riyasat Sikkim hai. Nepal ka jughrafiya intehai mutanawwa hai. Yahan zer-e-kheez maidani zameen, janglati pahad aur duniya ki aath buland tareen pahadi chotiyan bhi Nepal mein hi hain bashamool sabse zyada buland pahadi choti jise duniya Mount Everest ke naam se jaanti hai. Nepal ka darul hukoomat Kathmandu hai aur yahi mulk ka bada shehar bhi hai. Nepal mein kai nasal ke log rehte hain jabke Nepali zuban yahan ki sarkari zuban hai.
Nepal ka naam sab se pehle bar-e-sagheer Pak o Hind ke Vedic daur ke matnon mein darj kiya gaya hai, qadeem Nepal mein woh daur jab Hinduism ki buniyad rakhi gayi thi, jo mulk ka sab se bada mazhab hai. Pehli sadi qabl Maseeh ke wast mein, Budh mat ke bani Gautam Budh junoobi Nepal ke Lumbini mein paida hue. Shumali Nepal ke kuch hisse Tibet ki saqafat se jude hue the. Markazi taur par waqe Wadi Kathmandu Hind Aryiyon ki saqafat se judi hui hai aur Nepal Mandala ke naam se mashhoor Newar Confederacy ka markaz tha. Qadeem Shahrah-e-Resham ki Himalai shakh par wadi ke tajiron ka ghalba tha. Cosmopolitan khetay ne alag riwayati fan aur fan-e-tameer ko develop kiya. Atharvin sadi tak, Gorkha badshahat ne Nepal ko muttahid kar diya. Shah khandan ne Nepal ki badshahat qaim ki aur baad mein usne apne waziron ke Rana khandan ke tehat British saltanat ke saath ittehad qaim kiya. Yeh mulk kabhi nauabadiyati nahin tha lekin shahi China aur British Hindustan ke darmiyan buffer state ke taur par kaam karta tha. Parliamentary democracy ko saal 1951 mein muta'arif karaya gaya tha lekin use Nepali badshahon ne saal 1960 aur 2005 mein do baar mo'attal kar diya. Saal 1990 aur 2000s ke awail mein Nepali khana jangi ke nateeje mein saal 2008 mein ek secular republic ka qiyam amal mein aaya aur aakhri Hindu saltanat ka ikhtitam hua.
Nepal ka aain, saal 2015 mein apnaya gaya, jo mulk ko ek secular wifaqi parliamentary Republic ke taur par saat sobon mein taqseem karta hai. Nepal ko saal 1955 mein United Nations mein dakhil kiya gaya aur saal 1950 mein Bharat aur saal 1960 mein China ke saath dosti ke mu'ahidon par dastakhat kiye gaye. Nepal South Asian Regional Cooperation Organization (SAARC) ke mustaqil secretariat ki mezbani karta hai, jis ka woh bani rukun bhi hai. Nepal Non-Aligned Movement aur Bay of Bengal Initiative ka rukun bhi hai. Nepali armed forces South Asia mein paanchvin badi afwaj hain aur apni Gorkha ki tareekh ke liye qabil-e-zikr hain, khaas taur par world wars ke dauran aur United Nations peace keeping operations mein ahem sharik-e-kaara rahe hain.
Kaha jata hai ki Nepal ka lafz Newar qaum ke ma'ani rakhta hai, jo unki zuban Newari ke lafz Nepa se nikla hai. Newar qaum Wadi Kathmandu mein paayi jati hai aur Nepa is qaum ka laqab hai. Nepal mein sirf 3% abadi Newari bataur madari zuban bolti hai. Nepal ka shumar ghareeb mulkon mein hota hai iska sabab Bharat ki siyasi mudakhlat hai. Iski yeh mudakhlat do wujuhaat ki bina par hai awwal yeh ki Nepal mein Hinduan ki ta'adad bakasrat hai aur doosra sabab isko China se khatra hai.
Mulk Nepal mein Islam taqriban 600 saal pehle dakhil ho chuka tha. Nepal mein Islam teen raste se dakhil hua. Shayad isi wajah se is mulk mein teen mukhtalif saqafaton ke Musalman milte hain. Sab Nepali Musalman hokar bhi alag alag zuban, khane, pehenne ka tareeqa sab alag hai, sab ka mashghala alag paya jata hai bosa auqat yeh farq talkhi ka sabab banta hai. Nepal ki tareekh ka mutala'a kar ke Islam ke bare mein janna to mumkin nahin par takhmina zaroor kiya ja sakta hai 14th sadi mein Islam Nepal mein dakhil hua is mein to koi shak nahin aur is mein bhi shak nahin ki sufia karam ke haathon pahuncha is baat par dalalat karti hai Shah Ghiyasuddin ka mazar shahi mahal ke bilkul saamne kuch 100 meter ke fasle par paya jana hai aur wahin unhi ki ta'sees karda Kashmiri Masjid ka hona hai. Islam aur Hindustan ka tijarati rishta bahut purana hai aur Nepal uska padosi mulk hone ke sabab Nepal mein aqaliyat-e-Muslima hai 4.2% bataya jata hai is mein se 90% junoobi ilaqe mein paye jate hain aur 5% rajdhani Kathmandu mein aur baqi pahadi ilaqe mein rehte hain in ilaqon mein Muslimon ki ta'adad bahut kam hai jo kuch hi zilon mein paye jate hain jaise Gorkha, Kaski, Tanahu, Palpa aur Syangja. Nepal mein Musalman zara'at ya chhoti chhoti dukanon se apni rozi roti hasil karte hain inke iqtisadi halaat kamzor hain. Iska ek sabab Muslimon par aali taleem par androoni pabandi aur hukoomati daftar mein wazaif na hona hai.
Mamlakat Holland (Kingdom of the Netherlands) ek khud mukhtar riyasat aur constitutional monarchy hai jo ki maghribi Europe ke saath Caribbean mein phaili hui hai. Mamlakat Netherlands is waqt char juzv mumalik par mushtamil hai.
New Zealand junoob maghribi Behra-e-Kaahil ki ek khud mukhtar riyasat hai. Yeh ek jazeera mulk hai. Jughrafiyai hisab se yeh mulk do bade zameeni tukdon par mushtamil hai; Shumali Jazeera aur Junoobi Jazeera. In do markazi jaziron ke alawa 600 deegar chhote jazair hain. New Zealand Behra-e-Tasman mein Australia se 2000 kilometer mashriq mein waqe hai. Isi tarah Tonga, Fiji aur New Caledonia ke Behra-e-Kaahil ke jazairi ilaqon se 1000 kilometer junoob mein hai. Insanon ke zariye abad kiye jaane wale jazair mein New Zealand ka muqaam aakhri hai. Yani yeh un jazair mein se hai jise insanon ne sab se aakhri mein abad kiya hai. Insanon ki abadi se qabl New Zealand ek na maloom tanha jazeera tha jo mukhtalif janwar, ped paudon aur fungi fungus ka ek khushnuma ilaqa tha. Mulk ki mukhtalif-ul-nau topography aur pahad ki nokeli chotiyon ki zimmedar wahan maujood tectonic uplift aur mutaddid jawalamukhiyan hain. New Zealand ka darul hukoomat Wellington hai jabke sabse zyada abadi wala shehar Auckland hai.
1250 aur 1200 ke darmiyan is jazeere mein Polynesian log abad hue aur iska naam New Zealand rakha. Unhon ne yahan Maori tehzeeb ko farogh diya. 1642 mein Dutch sayyah Abel Tasman woh pehla European bashinda tha jisne New Zealand ki zameen par qadam rakha. 1840 mein Mamlakat Mutahidda ke numaindon ne Maori sarbarahon ke saath Waitangi Muahida par dastakhat kiye jiski roo se New Zealand Britain ke zer-e-ikhtiyar aa gaya. 1841 mein New Zealand Saltanat-e-Britain ki ek colony ban gaya aur 1907 mein ise Dominion New Zealand bana diya gaya; 1947 mein ise khud mukhtar riyasat ko darja mil gaya aur azadi mili magar sarbarah riyasat British log hi bane rahe. Filhaal New Zealand ki abadi ka sabse bada hissa European nasl par mushtamil hai. Inki kul ta'adad 4.9 million hai. Mulk ki sabse badi aqaliyat Maori qaum hai jo ab khatam hone ke kagaar par hai. Maori ke baad deegar aqaliyaton mein Asian qaum aur Behra-e-Kaahil ke jaziron ke log hain. New Zealand ki saqafat qadeem Maori aur modern British abadiyat ki den hai. Baad mein deegar ilaqon ke panah guzeenon ne bhi yahan ki saqafat par apna asar dala hai.
Yahan ki sarkari zubanon mein English zuban, Maori zuban aur New Zealand ki isharati zuban shamil hain. Albatta English zuban ka ghalba hai. New Zealand ek taraqqi yafta mulk hai. Duniya bhar ki mukhtalif qaumi karkardagiyon ke muqablon mein New Zealand ka darja kafi buland hai maslan miyar-e-zindagi, sehat, taleem, shehri azadiyon ka tehfuz aur iqtisadi azadi waghera. 1980s mein New Zealand mein badi iqtisadi tabdeeli aayi jis se New Zealand ki economy tehfuz pasand se tabdeel hokar azad tijarati economy ban gayi. New Zealand ki economy ka bada hissa service sector hai. Iske baad industry New Zealand mein kheti badi ka number aata hai. International tourism New Zealand ki aamdani ka ek ahem zariya hai. New Zealand ki muqannina wahan ka muntakhab yak aiwaniyat Parliament hai jabke Cabinet siyasi aur ikhtiyarat ki hamil hai. Cabinet ki sarbarah prime minister New Zealand hai. Sarbarah mulk Elizabeth II hai. Inki numaindagi Governor General karta hai. Hukoomati taur par New Zealand ilaqai council par mushtamil hai. Ilaqai council par mushtamil hai. Phir in mein 67 chhoti chhoti ilaqai authorities hain. New Zealand Realm mein Tokelau (ek munhasir ilaqa); Cook Islands, Niue, Ross Dependency bhi shamil hain. Niue ek khud mukhtar riyasat hai jiska ilhaaq New Zealand ke saath hai jabke Ross Dependency New Zealand Antarctica ka woh ilaqa hai jis par New Zealand apna dawa karta hai. New Zealand Commonwealth countries ka rukun hai, isi ke saath Association for Economic Cooperation and Development, Southeast Asian Nations Organization, Asian Pacific Economic Cooperation aur Pacific Islands Forum ka bhi rukun hai.
Netherlands ke sayyah Abel Tasman ne 1642 mein New Zealand ki daryaft ki aur use Staten Land naam diya. Chunke Netherlands ki Parliament ko States General kehte hain isi liye Tasman ne jazeera ko Staten Land ka naam diya aur kaha Yeh mumkin hai ki is jazeera ko Staten Land mein shamil kar liya jaye magar yeh yaqeeni nahin hai. Unka ishara North America aur South America ke hum naam hone ki taraf tha. Wazeh ho ki South Africa ki daryaft Jacob Le Maire ne 1616 mein ki thi. 1645 mein Dutch naqsha nigaron ne jazeera ka naam badal kar Netherlands ke suba Zeeland ke naam par Nova Zeelandia kar diya. Baad azan British sayyah James Cook ne is naam par English rang chadhakar New Zealand kar diya.
New Zealand ka maujooda Maori zubani naam Aotearoa hai iske ma'ani Taweel safed badlon ki zameen hai yeh maloom nahin ho saka hai ki aaya Maori zuban ka yeh naam poore New Zealand ke liye istemal hota tha ya mehez Shumali Jazeera ke liye. Ibtedai Europeans ne naqsha mein Shumali Jazeera, Wasati Jazeera aur Junoobi Jazeera naam rakha tha. 1830 se naqshon mein do bade jaziron ko Shumali aur Junoobi Jazeera kaha jaane laga aur 1907 mein is riwayat ko qabool kar liya gaya. 2009 mein New Zealand Geographic Board ne daryaft kiya ki Shumali aur Junoobi Jaziron ke naam kabhi mutaiyan nahin kiye gaye hain albatta 2013 mein baqaida naam diya gaya. Shumali Jazeera ka naam Te Ika-a-Māui aur Junoobi Jazeera ka naam Te Waipounamu rakha gaya. Dono jaziron ke aaya English ya Maori ya dono ek saath istemal kiya jata hai.
Insanon ne jin zameen ke jin khatton ko sabse akhir mein basaya hai New Zealand un mein se ek hai. Deforestation ki radiocarbon tareekh nigari ke saboot aur Maori abadi ke mitochondrial DNA ke mutala'a se pata chalta hai ki New Zealand mein pehli abadi 1250 ta 1300 ke dauran mein Polynesian ke logon ne basayi thi. Iske liye unhon ne Behra-e-Kaahil ke jazair ka ek taweel safar kiya tha aur safar dar safar ke baad unka nuzool New Zealand mein hua. Sadiyon woh wahan rahe aur unki ek saqafat bani jise Maori saqafat kaha jata hai. Maori ki kul abadi do giroh iwi aur hapu mein munqasim thi jo kabhi ek doosre ka ta'awun karte the, kabhi ek doosre se muqabale karte aur zaroorat pade par ek doosre ke khilaf nard aazma bhi rehte the. Phir in mein se ek giroh Moriori maujooda Chatham Islands ki taraf hijrat kar gaya jahan unhon ne apni alag pehchan banayi aur unki saqafat Moriori tehzeeb kehlayi. 1835 ya 1862 ke dauran Moriori ki abadi taqriban khatam ho gayi kyunki Taranaki Maori qaum ne un par hamla kar diya aur 1830s mein sabko ghulam bana liya. Baqi rahi sahi kasar Europe ki beemariyon ne poori kar di. Hatta ke 1862 mein mehez 101 Moriori qaum ke log bache the. 1933 mein yeh dawa kiya gaya ki ab koi khalis Moriori nasl ka fard nahin bacha hai.
French logon kay Akaroa mein zameen khareedne aur New Zealand Company Wellington mein azaad basti basane ki koshishon ke jawab mein Hobson ne 21 May 1840 ko mukammal New Zealand par British hukmarani ka elaan kar diya halaanke abhi Maori logon ko mu'ahida par dastakhat karna baqi tha. British tasallut ke elaan aur mu'ahida ke baad New Zealand mein khusoosan Mamlakat Mutahidda aur umoomi deegar mumalik se aane wale mahajireen ki ta'dad mein izafa hone laga.
1 July 1841 tak New South Wales ka hissa rehne wala New Zealand ek Crown Colony wala mulk ban gaya. 1852 mein New Zealand ko pehli numainda hukoomat mili aur 1854 mein Parliament ka pehla ijlaas hua. 1856 mein New Zealand mein khud mukhtar hukoomat ban gayi aur qabaili policy ke alawa deegar tamam ilaqai policy aur mamlaat ko New Zealand ki nai hukoomat khud hal karne lagi. 1860s mein qabaili policy par bhi ikhtiyar mil gaya. Yeh khadsha zahir ho raha tha ki Junoobi Jazeera kahin ek alag colony na ho jaye lehaza prime minister Alfred Domett ne darul hukoomat ko Auckland se qareeb ke ilaqa Cook Strait mein muntaqil karne ek resolution muta'arif karaya. Wellington ko darul hukoomat banaya gaya kyunki woh dono jaziron ke beech mein hai. 1865 mein wahan Parliament ka pehla ijlaas hua. Chunke mahajireen ki ta'dad din ba din badhti ja rahi thi lehaza 1860s aur 1870s ki dahai jangon ka aaghaz hua jiska sabab zameen ki milkiyat tha. Ngāti Māori logon ki bahut si zameenein qabza karli gayin. 1891 mein Liberal Party ba-haisiyat pehli munazzam party ki shakal mein hukoomat mein aayi. Liberal hukoomat mein Richard Seddon ko wazarat-e-uzma ki kursi bahut dinon tak mili aur unhon ne mu'ashrati aur samaji islah ke liye kai sare qawanin banaye. 1893 mein New Zealand duniya ka pehla aisa mulk bana jahan khawateen ko haq-e-raye dehi istemal karne ki azadi mili. 1894 mein Industrial Conciliation and Arbitration Act, 1894 pass kiya gaya jiski roo se mazdoori ki union aur ajir ke darmiyan mein ek salisi ka hona zaroori qarar diya gaya.
1907 mein New Zealand Parliament ki darkhwast par badshah Edward VII ne New Zealand ko Dominion New Zealand ka darja diya, magar ab bhi yeh British Saltanat ka hissa tha albatta hukoomat ab apni ho gayi thi. 1947 mein New Zealand ko Britain se mukammal azad kar diya gaya aur ab British Parliament ko New Zealand ke liye usse mashwara kiye bagair qanoon banane ka ikhtiyar khatam ho gaya.
20th sadi ke awail mein New Zealand aalmi mamlaat mein hissa lene laga tha aur pehli aur doosri jang-e-azeem mein bhi hissa liya jiski wajah se usay Great Depression ka samna karna pada. Is depression ki wajah se New Zealand mein pehli Labor hukoomat bani aur welfare state aur tehfuzi economy ka in'iqad hua. Doosri jang-e-azeem ke baad New Zealand mein khushhali ka daur shuru hua aur Maori apni jungli qabaili zindagi ko chhod kar shehar ki taraf kaam kaaj ki talash mein jane lage. Isi dauran mein Maori movement ka aaghaz hua jiska maqsad Europe ke badhte rujhan ki tanqeed karna, Maori saqafat ka tehfuz aur Waitangi muahida ki yaad dilana tha. 1975 mein muahida ki sharton par ghaur karne ke liye Waitangi Tribunal banaya gaya jiske baad 1985 mein tareekhi shikayaton ki tehqeeq ka rasta khul gaya. Hukoomat ne kai iwi logon ke saath un shikayaton ke azale ke liye baat cheet ki Maori ke foreshore aur seabed ke dawaon ko 2000 mein May controversies ke baad qabool kar liya gaya.
New Zealand mein constitutional monarchy hai aur wahan parliamentary democratic nizam raij hai. Albatta New Zealand ka constitution tehreeri shakal mein maujood nahin hai. New Zealand ki rani hone ki haisiyat se Elizabeth II sarbarah riyasat hai. Maharani ki numaindagi Governor-General New Zealand karta hai jise rani prime minister New Zealand ki sifarish par muqarrar karti hai. Rani ki taraf se Governor-General shahi ikhtiyarat ka istemal karta hai jaise na insafi wale faisle par nazar sani karna, wuzara, safeeron aur deegar ahem public afsaran ki taqarruri waghera. Shaz o nadir hi sahi magar use Parliament ko tahlil karne ka ikhtiyar bhi hai. Rani aur Governor-General ke ikhtiyarat dasturi taur mehdood hain aur wuzara ke mashwaron ke bagair woh apne ikhtiyarat ko istemal karne se qasir hain.
Parliament New Zealand maqannina ka kirdar ada karti hai. Parliament rani aur arkaan Parliament par mushtamil hai. 1950 tak is mein upper house, Legislative Council bhi shamil the magar ab unhein qalam-e-adam kar diya gaya hai. Bill of Rights, 1689 ke tehat Parliament ko taaj par fauqiyat hasil hai aur New Zealand mein use ab qanoon bana diya gaya hai. Intikhabat ke zariye arkaan Parliament ko chuna jata hai aur kisi party ya partyon ke ittehad ko hukoomat banane ki dawat di jati hai. Agar kisi ko aksariyat na mili ho to aqliyati party bhi hukoomat bana sakti hai agar use e'timad aur rasad ka vote mil jaye. Prime minister hukmaran party ya ittehad ki taraf se Parliament ka rehnuma hota hai aur uske mashware par Governor-General ka taqarrur hota hai. Cabinet mutaddid wuzara par mushtamil hai aur uska rehnuma khud prime minister hai. Cabinet sabse badi qanoon saaz ikai hai aur hukoomat ke ahem faisle aur umoor ki zimmedar hai. Cabinet ke arkaan majmooi taur par kisi faisla par muttafiq hote hain pas woh majmooi taur par hi zimmedari bhi qabool karte hain. Har teen saal ke waqfe se New Zealand ke aam intikhabat hote hain. 1853 ta 1993 tak taqriban tamam intikhabat First Past the Post voting se hue hain. 1996 ke intikhabat mein mutanasib numaindagi ki ek qism Mixed Member Proportional Representation System ka istemal kiya gaya. Is nizam ke tehat har voter ko do vote dalne ka haq hai; ek vote ummeedwar ko aur doosra party ko. 2004 ke intikhabat mein kul 71 intikhabi halqe the jin mein 7 sirf Maori ke liye makhsoos the. Baqi 49 seatein tafweez kar di gayi thin taki Parliament mein party vote ki numaindagi ho aur party har halqa mein kam az kam 5% vote zaroor hasil kare.
1930 mein intikhabat ke aaghaz se hi sirf do partyon New Zealand National Party aur New Zealand Labor Party ka ghalba raha hai. March 2005 ta August 2006 ke darmiyan mein New Zealand duniya ka wahid mulk tha jahan tamam aala ohdon -sarbarah riyasat, Governor-General, prime minister, speaker aur chief justice- par khawateen faiz thin. Maujooda prime minister (March 2019) Jacinda Ardern hain. Woh 26 October 2017 se New Zealand ki prime minister hain. Woh mulk ki teesri khatoon prime minister hain. Adliya New Zealand ke sarbarahi Chief Justice karte hain. Adliya ke dhancha mein Supreme Court, Court of Appeal, High Court aur Subordinate Courts shamil hain. Adliya ki azadi barqarar rahe iske liye tamam judges aur adliya ke afsaran ka taqarrur ghair siyasi hota hai aur unki miyadon ke qawanin bahut sakht hain. Isse judges ko Parliament ke banaye qanoon ke mutabiq faisla dene mein aasani hoti hai aur unke faisle kisi kharji umoor se mutasir nahin hote hain.
New Zealand ko duniya bhar mein sabse mustahkam aur achi hukoomat ke liye jana jata hai. 2017 mein democratic institutions ki taqat ki fehrist mein New Zealand ka muqaam chautha tha wahin bad unwan ki kami mein yeh mulk sar fehrist tha. 2017 mein United States of America ki Riyasat of State ne ek report Human Rights Report mein kaha ki New Zealand ki hukoomat umooman afraad ki samaji halat ki fikr karti hai lekin Maori abadi ki halat ab bhi qadre tashweesh nak hai. Duniya bhar mein awam ki siyasat mein dilchaspi aur musharakat ke muamle mein New Zealand ka muqaam awwal tha guzishta intikhabat mein vote ka feesad 77 tha jabke aalmi feesad 69 tha.
Ibtedai Colonial New Zealand mein British hukoomat ko international trade karne ki azadi di gayi thi aur yeh ki kharji ta'alluqat ki zimmedar bhi hukoomat hi hogi. 1923 aur 1926 ke Imperial Conference mein tay hua ki ab New Zealand ko khud apne siyasi mamlaat tay karne chahiye aur pehla siyasi mu'ahida 1928 mein Japan ke saath hua. 1928 mein New Zealand ne Britain ke saath ittehad kar liya aur Germany se jang ka elaan kar diya. Waqt ke prime minister Michael Joseph Savage ne kaha Jahan woh jayegi, hum bhi jayenge, jahan woh rukegi hum bhi rukenge.
1951 mein Mamlakat Mutahidda ki tawajjo Europe par markooz ho gayi aur idhar New Zealand ne Australia aur America ke saath mil kar ANZUS mu'ahida par dastakhat kar diye. Vietnam jang ke baad New Zealand par America ki pakad dheeli pad gayi, America ne ANZUS ko mansookh kar diya lekin iske bawajood New Zealand aur Australia ne ANZUS ke mu'ahide ke paband rahe aur tareekhi riwayat par amal paira rahe. Dono mulkon ke mabin qareebi siyasi ta'alluqat barqarar rahe aur tijarat o siyahat ki raahein hamwar ki gayin. Aur dono mulkon ke bashindon ke ek doosre ke mulk mein jane, ghoomne aur tijarat karne ki bina kisi pabandi mukammal azadi di gayi. 2013 mein 650,000 New Zealand kul abadi ka 15% ke bashinde Australia mein muqeem the.
Behra-e-Kaahil ke jazair par New Zealand ki mazboot pakad hai aur woh un mumalik mein imdad bhejta rehta hai. In mulkon se log aksar New Zealand ka safar karte rehte hain aur panah hasil karte hain. In mulkon se wahan naukri karne bhi log khoob jate hain. Samoan Quota Scheme 1970 aur Pacific Access Category 2002 ke tehat bil tarteeb 11,000 Samoan aur 750 deegar afraad ne hijrat kar ke New Zealand ki mustaqil shehriyat hasil ki. 2007 aur 2009 mein waqti naukri scheme launch ki gayi jiske tehat taqriban 8,000 Behra-e-Kaahil ke jazair ke bashindon ko naukri di gayi. New Zealand Pacific Islands Forum, Pacific Economic Cooperation aur Southeast Asian Nations Organization aur regional forum jaise East Asia Summit ka rukun hai. New Zealand United Nations, Commonwealth Countries, OECD aur Five Power Defence Arrangements ka bhi rukun hai.
New Zealand ki armed forces New Zealand Army, Royal New Zealand Air Force aur Royal New Zealand Navy par mushtamil hain. Chunke New Zealand par direct hamle ke imkanat bahut hi kam hain lehaza New Zealand ki qaumi salamati fauj average darje ki hi hai. Albatta New Zealand ki fauj ko duniya bhar mein ek muqaam hasil hai. Mulk ne dono world wars mein hissa liya aur jang Gallipoli, Crete doosri jang-e-Alamein aur jang Monte Cassino mein bhi badh chadh kar hissa liya. Khusoosan jang Gallipoli se New Zealand ko ahem pehchan mili. Aur Australia ke saath ta'alluqat hamwar karne aur use mazboot karne mein madad mili.
Vietnam aur do world wars ke alawa New Zealand ne doosri Boer War, Korean War, Malayan Emergency, doosri Gulf War aur Afghanistan ki jangon mein bhi shirkat ki. Jang mein direct shirkat karne ke alawa New Zealand ne Cyprus, Somalia, Bosnia, Suez Crisis, Angola, Cambodia, Iran-Iraq border, Bougainville Campaign, East Timor aur Solomon Islands ko fauji ta'awun diya.
Ibtedai European ne New Zealand ko sobon mein taqseem kiya tha aur jinhein ek had tak khud mukhtari hasil thi. Lekin 1876 mein mulk ko mazboot karne ke liye chand islahat ka faisla kiya gaya jin ke nafiz ke liye sobon ko muttahid karna aur markazi nizam se jodna zaroori tha. Lehaza railway, taleem, zameen ki khareed o farokht aur deegar policyon ko behtar banane ki khatir tamam sobajat markazi nizam se jod diye gaye. Taham ab in sobon ko ilaqai chhutiyon aur khel ke liye yaad rakha jata hai. Markazi hukoomat ne kai ilaqon ko shanakht kiya aur council ke zariye wahan hukoomat ka nizam chalaya. Hukoomati dhancha mein tabdeeli ki gayi aur do satahi dhancha banaya gaya. 1975 mein 249 municipalities thin jinhein mukhtasar kar ke 67 khaton aur 11 ilaqai councilon mein munqasim kar diya gaya.
New Zealand 16 Commonwealth Realms aur OECD mein se ek hai aur iski saltanat un tamam ilaqon par New Zealand ki maharani ka raaj chalta hai. In mein Niue aur Cook Islands khud mukhtar sobay hain jinka New Zealand ke saath azad ilhaaq hai. New Zealand ka Parliament un sobon ke liye koi qanoon manzoor nahin kar sakta hai lekin kharji umoor mein unki janib se faisla le sakta hai.
New Zealand abi nisf kurra ke markaz ke qareeb waqe hai aur do bade jaziron aur kai chhote jazair par mushtamil hai. Do bade jazeere Shumali Jazeera ya Te Ika-a-Māui, aur Junoobi Jazeera ya Te Waipounamu hain. Dono ke darmiyan mein Abna-e-Cook waqe hai jiski sabse kam chauraai 22 kilometer hai in do jazair ke alawa paanch aur bade jazeere hain. New Zealand jughrafiyai taur par taweel aur sukda hai. Iski lambai (over kilometer aur chauraai) hai. Kul sahil hai aur khushki ka raqba hai. Chunke iske jazair baqi mulkon ki pahunch se door hain aur iske paas bade samundar sahil bhi hain lehaza New Zealand abi wasail se malamal hai. Iska zaati ma'ashi khatta duniya mein sabse bada hai jo iske khushki raqba se taqriban 15 guna bada hai. Shumali Jazeera New Zealand ka sabse bada khushki ka raqba hai aur duniya ka barahwan bada jazeera hai. Junoobi Jazeera duniya ka chaudahwan bada jazeera hai. Is jazeera mein pahad garche kam hain magar yahan aatish fishanon ki kasrat hai. Taupo aatish fishani khatta sabse bada aatish fishani ilaqa hai aur jazeera ka sabse uncha pahad bhi yahin waqe hai. Yahin mulk ki sabse badi jheel, Lake Taupo bhi waqe hai.
New Zealand Australasia naam ke ilaqe ka hissa hai. Is mein Australia bhi shamil hai. Yeh Polynesia naam ke ilaqe mein bhi aata hai. Jughrafiyai etibar se zameen ko kai hisson mein taqseem kiya gaya hai jin mein yeh ilaqe munqasim hain. Bar-e-azam Australia aur aas paas ke ilaqon ko shamil kar ke ek aur bada ilaqa ya khattah banta hai jise Oceania kaha jata hai. New Zealand iska bhi hissa hai. Wazeh ho ki New Zealand aur Behr-e-Kaahil ke deegar jazeere saat bar-e-azamon ka hissa nahin hain. Inhein Oceania ka hissa mana jata hai.
New Zealand ki aab o hawa buniyadi taur par Köppen climate classification mein aata hai. Average saalana darja hararat shimal mein aur junoob mein rehta hai. Tareekhi taur par average hararat Canterbury, New Zealand mein aur Otago mein darj kiya gaya hai. Ilaqe ke etibar se maholiati haale bhi badi tezi se tabdeel hoti hai. Junoobi Jazeera ka maghribi sahil hamesha bahut tar rehta hai jabke markazi Otago, Mackenzie Basin aur Northland ke ilaqe semi-arid rehte hain. New Zealand ke saat bade shehron mein Christchurch sabse khushk shehar hai. Yahan saalana average 640 millimeter hi barish hoti hai. Wellington sabse tar shehar hai jahan Christchurch ke muqabale doguni miqdar mein barish hoti hai. Auckland, Wellington aur Christchurch mein saalana average 2000 ghante suraj ki roshni pahunchti hai. Junoobi Jazeera ka junoobi aur junoob maghribi khattah nisbatan thanda aur badal wala hai jahan suraj ki roshni average 1400–1600 ghante pahunchti hai. Junoobi Jazeera ka junoobi aur junoob mashriqi khattah sabse zyada roshan hai jahan 2400–2500 ghanta suraj ki roshni pahunchti hai. Barf bari ka umooman June ta October ke mahinon mein hoti hai. Albatta be mausam thandi hawaien bhi chalti hain. Barf bari junoobi jazeera ke junoobi aur mashriqi khattah mein bahut aam hai, isi tarah mulk ke unche pahadon par bhi khoob barf bari hoti hai.
Zail mein New Zealand ke 6 bade shehron ke darja hararat diye ja rahe hain. Shumali Jazeera ke shehar umooman February mein bahut garam rehte hain. Junoobi Jazeera ke shehar January mein bahut garam rehte hain.
New Zealand ki 80 million saal ki geographical isolation aur jazeera ki biological geography ne mulk ke janwaron, phaphund aur paudon ko mutasir kiya hai. Zahiri tanhai ki wajah se biological diversity paida hui. Aur nateejaatan wahan ki ecology mein badi mutaharrak tabdeeli waqe hui aur kuch ajeeb o ghareeb aur munfarid qism ke paude, janwar aur mukhtalif qism ki bahut sari prajatiyan paida ho gayin. New Zealand ke 82% vascular plants wahin ki paidawar hain. In mein kul 65 genus aur 1944 prajatiyan hain. New Zealand mein maujood phaphundon ki ta'adad ka andaza nahin lagaya ja saka hai. Yahan tak ke wahan ki asli phaphundon ki ta'adad bhi pata nahin hai. Aur na hi koi tanasub maloom ho saka hai. Albatta ek andaza kehta hai ki New Zealand mein 2300 tarah ki phaphund payi jati hain. In mein taqriban 40% wahin ki paidawar hain. Do ahem qism ke janglaat mein bade aur chaure darakht wale janglaat hain aur doosre janglaat thande ilaqe ke junoobi sahil ke khatay ke hain. Deegar nabatati ashya mein ghaas ke maidan badi ta'adad mein hain.
New Zealand ke jangalon mein parindon ka ghalba tha aur chaupayon ki kami thi lehaza kiwi, kakapo, weka aur takahē jaise parinde azadi se rehte the. Insanon ki aamad ki wajah yahan makanat banna shuru hue, chuohon ki kasrat hui aur deegar janwar bhi yahan aa maujood hue jin ki wajah se parindon ki kai prajatiyan ghaib ho gayin jaise bade parinde, moa aur Haast's eagle waghera. Deegar jandaron mein keede makode, mendhak, makdiyan, keede waghera paye jate hain. Kuch jandar jaise tuatara itne kamyaab hain ki unhein living fossil kaha jaane laga. New Zealand ke is hayati khazane ko bachane ke liye kai iqdamat ki gaye hain jaise jazeera panahgah, keede maar adwiyat, jungli zindagi ki bahali, jungli paudon aur janwaron ki naql makani, jaziron aur deegar muqamat ki marammat waghera ke kaam kiye ja rahe hain.
New Zealand ke paas ek bahut zyada taraqqi yafta baazari economy hai.
Wasti Africi Jamhuriya Wasti Africa mein waqe ek landlocked mulk hai. Iski sarhadein shimal mein Chad, shimal mashriq mein Sudan, mashriq mein South Sudan, junoob mein Republic of the Congo, junoob maghrib mein Democratic Republic of the Congo aur maghrib mein Cameroon se lagti hain. Wasti Africi Jamhuriya taqreeban 620,000 square kilometer ke raqbe par muheet hai. 2021 tak, iski abadi lagbhag 5.5 million thi. 2023 tak, Wasti Africi Jamhuriya civil war ka manzar hai, jo 2012 se jari hai. Bangui darul hukoomat aur sabse bada shehar hai. Sarkari zubanein French aur Sango hain. CFA Wasti Africi Franc ke saath Bitcoins ko bhi as currency istemal karne ki ijazat hai. Wasti Africi Jamhuriya ka zyada tar hissa Sudan-Guinea savanna par mushtamil hai, lekin is mulk mein shimal mein ek Sahel-Sudanian zone aur junoob mein ek equatorial forest ilaqa bhi shamil hai. Mulk ka do tihai hissa Darya-e-Oubangui ke basin (jo Congo mein behta hai) ke andar hai, jabke baqiya teesra Chari ke basin mein hai, jo Lake Chad mein behta hai. Wasti Africi Jamhuriya kam az kam 8,000 BCE se abad hai. Mulk ki sarhadein France ne qaim ki thin, jisne 19th sadi ke akhir mein shuru hone wali colony ke taur par mulk par hukmarani ki. 1960 mein France se azadi hasil karne ke baad, Central African Republic par kai absolutist leaders ki hukoomat thi, jis mein badshahat ki nakam koshish bhi shamil thi. 1990s tak, democracy ke mutalbat ke nateeje mein 1993 mein pehle multiparty democratic intikhabat hue. Ange-Félix Patassé sadar ban gaye, lekin baad mein 2003 ki baghawat mein General François Bozizé ne unhein hata diya. Wasti Africi Jamhuriya Bush War 2004 mein shuru hui thi aur, 2007 mein ek aman muahide aur 2011 mein ek doosre aman muahide ke bawajood, 2012 mein civil war dobara shuru hui. Civil war ne mulk ke human rights ke naqis record ko barqarar rakha iski khususiyaat mukhtalif afraad ki taraf se wasee paimane par ziyadtiyon se thi jaise man marzi qaid, tashaddud aur azadi-e-sahafat aur tehreek ki azadi par pabandiyan. Maadni zakhair aur deegar wasail jaise uranium ke zakhair, khaam tel, sona, heere, cobalt, lakri aur hydropower ke saath qabil-e-kasht zameen ki qabil-e-qadr miqdar ke bawajood, Wastii Afriqi Jamhuriya duniya ke das ghareeb tareen mumalik mein se ek hai. 2017 tak duniya mein sab se kam GDP fi kas quwat-e-kharid ke saath. 2021 tak, Human Development Index ke mutabiq, mulk insani taraqqi ki chauthi sab se nichli satah par tha, jiski darja bandi 191 mumalik mein se 188 thi. Mulk mein sab se kam adam masawaat ke saath adjust shuda Human Development Index tha, jo 156 mumalik mein 156veen number par tha. Wastii Afriqi Jamhuriya Aqwaam-e-Mutahidda, African Union, Wastii Afriqi Riyaston ki Iqtisadi Baradri, Tanzeem Bainul-Aqwami de la Francophonie aur Gher Munaslik Tehreek ka rukun hai.
Vatican City Italy ke shahar Rome mein waqea ek khud mukhtar riyasat hai. Riyasat taqreeban charon taraf se deewaron se ghiri hui hai jiska kul raqba 44 hectare hai aur yeh duniya ki abadi aur raqbe ke lihaz se sab se choti khud mukhtar riyasat kehlati hai. Riyasat ko 1929 mein qayim kiya gaya aur riyasat ka sarbarah Papaye Rome hota hai aur yahan hi Papaye Rome ki rehaishgah Apostolic Mahal aur Roman Curia waqea hain. Vatican City ko bilashuba Catholic Esaaiyon ka mazhabi darul-khilafa kaha ja sakta hai. Roman Curia ki buniyad Pope Sixtus Pancham ne solahveen sadi Eesvi mein rakhi jis ke ibtedai maqasid mazhabi aur samaji the. Unnisveen sadi Eesvi mein Pidmontese Italian hukumat ke phelao se is ke ikhtiyarat kam hone lage. 1860 tak Italian hukumat Italian jazeera numa ka zyada tar hissa jo Papaye Rome ki riyasat mein shamil tha zer-e-iqtidar la chuki thi. 1870 mein Rome bhi Italian hukumat ke zer-e-iqtidar tha jis ke saath hi Papaye Rome ki taqat ka khatma ho gaya. 1919 tak Italian hukumat poore jazeera numa bashamool Sicily aur Sardinia par qayim ho chuki thi. 1929 mein Papaye Rome aur Italian hukumat Lateran Moaheda par muttafiq hue. Jis ki roo se Roman Curia sabqa Papai riyasat se dastbardar ho gaya aur ab Roman Curia zyada tar Papaye Rome aur Catholic Esaai mazhabi khidmat sar anjam deta hai.
Pakistan ke Vatican City ke saath khaas taluqat hain. Vatican City ke liye Pakistan ka ek makhsus safeer hai. Inke tabadla-e-khayal mein umooman sab se ahem mauzu Pakistan mein Esaaiyon ke saath bartao hota hai.
Venezuela (English Venezuela), (Latin American Spanish) ba-zabdagi taur par Bolivarian Jamhuriya Venezuela (Spanish República Bolivariana de Venezuela) bar-e-azam Junubi America ke shumal mein waqia ek mulk hai, Behira Caribbean mein ek bar-e-azmi zamini tukde ke ilawa bahut se jazair aur jazeechiyon par mushtamil hai. Is ke darul-hakumat ka naam Caracas hai. Venezuela ki currency ka naam Bolivar hai. Aqwaam-e-Mutahidda ke shoba-e-shumariyaat ke mutabiq 2012 mein Venezuela ki abadi 29,954,782 thi. Venezuela ka raqba 916,445 murabba kilometer hai. Venezuela ek markazi aamirana riyasati hukmurani ke under ek wafaqi sadarti jamhuriya hai. Is ke maujuda sadr Nicolas Maduro hain aur nayab sadr Delcy Rodriguez hain. Bar-e-azmi khitta shumal mein Behira Caribbean aur Baher-e-Oqyanus, maghrib mein Colombia, junub mein Brazil, shumal mashriq mein Trinidad aur Tobago aur mashriq mein Guyana se muttasil hai. Venezuela ek sadarti jamhuriya hai jo 23 riyaston, Capital District aur wafaqi ilaqa par mushtamil hai jis mein Venezuela ke samandari jazair bhi shamil hain. Venezuela Latin America ke sab se zyada shahri abadi wale mumalik mein shamil hai. Venezuela ki aksariyat shumal ke shehron aur darul-hakumat mein rehti hai. Muqami logon ki muzahmat ke darmiyan san 1522 mein Venezuela ke ilaqe ko Spain ne apni no-abadiyat banaya tha. San 1811 mein, Hispania se azadi ka elaan karne aur pehle wafaqi jamhuriya Colombia (Gran Colombia) ka hissa banne wale pehle Hispani-American ilaqon mein se ek ban gaya. Yeh san 1830 mein ek mukammal khud mukhtar mulk ke taur par alag ho gaya. Unnisvin sadi ke dauran, Venezuela ko siyasi inteshar aur khud mukhtari ka samna karna pada, beesvin sadi ke wast tak ilaqai fouji aamiron ka ghalba raha. San 1958 ke baad se, mulk mein jamhoori hukoomaton ka ek silsila raha hai. Ek aisa istisna, jahan khitte ke zyada tar mumalik par fouji aamariyati hukumat thi aur is daur ki khasusiyat iqtisadi khush-hali thi. San 1980 aur 1990 ki dahaiyon mein iqtisadi jhatkon ne bade siyasi bohran aur bade paimane par samaji be-amnii ko janam diya, jin mein san 1989 ke mohlik Caracaso fasadat, san 1992 mein baghawat ki do koshishen aur awami funds ke ghban ke ilzam mein sadr ka muakheza shamil hain. Maujuda parties ne san 1998 sadarti intikhabat mein Venezuela mein Bolivarian Revolution ka inhedam dekha, jiska aaghaz san 1999 ki ain saz assembly se hua, jahan Venezuela ka naya ain naafiz kiya gaya. Hukumat ki awami samaji behbood ki policies ko hukumat ke ibtedai saalon mein tel ki qeematon mein izafe, samaji ikhrajaat mein aarzi taur par izafa aur maashi adam masawaat aur ghurbat ko kam karne se taqwiyat mili. Taham, san 2010 mein ghurbat mein tezi se izafa hona shuru hua. Venezuela ke san 2013 ke sadarti intikhabat ko bade paimane par mutanaza bana diya gaya jis ke nateejay mein wasi paimane par ehtejaj hua, jis ne ek aur mulk geer bohran ko janam diya jo aaj tak jari hai. Venezuela ne ek aamirana riyasat mein badalte hue jamhoori paspai ka tajurba kiya hai. Azadi sahafhat aur shehri azadiyon ki bainul-aqwami pemaishon mein iska darja kam hai aur is mein bad-unwani ki aala satah hai. Venezuela ek taraqqi pazeer mulk hai jiske paas duniya ke sab se bade maloom tel ke zakhair hain aur yeh duniya ke sab se bade tel baramad kunindon mein se ek raha hai. Pehle, mulk coffee aur cocoa jaisi zarai ajnas ka ek chota baramad kuninda tha, lekin tel tezi se baramadat aur hukoomati mahsul par haawi ho gaya. Maujuda hukumat ki ziyadatiyon aur naqis policies ne Venezuela ki poori economy ko tabah kar diya. Mulk record ifrat-e-zar, buniyadi ashya ki qillat, be-rozgari, ghurbat, beemari, bachchon ki sharah-e-amwaat, ghizai malnourishment, sangeen jarayam aur bad-unwani ke saath jad-o-jahad kar raha hai. In awamil ne Venezuela ke panah guzeenon ke bohran ko janam diya hai jahan sattar lakh se zyada log mulk chhod kar bhaag gaye hain. San 2017 tak, Venezuela ko credit rating agencies ke zariye qarz ki adaiyigiyon ke silsile mein default qarar diya gaya tha. Venezuela ke bohran ne insani haqooq ki tezi se bigadti hui surat-e-haal ko badawa diya hai. Venezuela Aqwaam-e-Mutahidda, Organization of American States, Junubi America ki Qoumon ki Union, Mercosur, Bolivarian Ittihad, Latin American Association aur Ibero American Riyaston ki Tanzeem ka charter member hai.
Sab se zyada maqbool aur qabool shuda version ke mutabiq, 1499 mein, Alonso de Ojeda ki qayadat mein ek muhim ne Venezuela ke sahil ka daura kiya. Italian jahaz ran Amerigo Vespucci ko jheel Maracaibo ke ilaqe mein lakdi ki pile par khade gharon ne Italy ke shahar Venice ki yaad diladi aur usne is ilaqe ka naam Veneziola ya Chota Venice rakha. Hispani mein yeh lafz Veneziola, Venezuela se tabdeel ho gaya. Vespucci aur Ojeda ke amle ke ek rukun Martin Fernandez de Enciso ne ek mukhtalif bayan diya hai. Apne kaam Suma de Geografía mein, woh batata hai ke amle ko muqami log mile jo apne aap ko Veneciuela kehte hain. Is tarah, Venezuela naam muqami lafz se tayyar ho sakta hai. Taqriban 15,000 saal pehle se ab Venezuela ke naam se jaane wale ilaqe mein insani rehaish ke shawahid maujood hain. Is daur ke auzaar maghribi Venezuela mein Rio Pedregal dariya ke buland kinaron par paye gaye hain. Dair se Pleistocene shikar ke namoone, bashamool neze ke ishaare, shumal maghribi Venezuela mein El Jobo ke naam se mashoor sites ki ek aisi hi series se mile hain. Radiocarbon dating ke mutabiq, yeh tareekhein 13,000 se 7,000 qabl Maseeh tak hain. Yeh maloom nahi hai ke Hispani fatah se pehle Venezuela mein kitne log rehte the. Iska takhmina das lakh tak lagaya gaya hai. Muqami logon ke ilawa jin ko aaj jana jata hai, is abadi mein tareekhi groups jaise Kalina, Arawak, Caquetío, Mariche aur Timoto-Cuica shamil the. Timoto-Cuica culture Pre-Columbian Venezuela ka sab se peechida muashara tha, jis mein pehle se mansuba band mustaqil gaon the, jin ke charon taraf sirab, chhat wale khet the. Inke ghar buniyadi taur par patthar aur lakdi ke bane hue the jin ki chhaten bhose ki thin. Woh zyada tar pur-aman the aur faslon ko ugane par inhesar karte the. Ilaqai faslon mein aaloo aur ulluco (ek muqami sabzi) shamil the. Inhon ne art ke bahut se namoone chhode, khaas taur par cheeni ke bartan, lekin koi badi yaadgar building nahi banai. Woh textile aur rehaish ke liye chattiyon mein bunne ke liye sabziyon ke reshe katte the. Inhen arepa ijad karne ka sehra jata hai, jo Venezuela ke khanon ka ek ahem hissa hai. Fatah ke baad, abadi mein numaya kami waqia hui, khaas taur par Europe se nayi mutaaddi beemariyon ke phelao ke zariye. Colombia se pehle ki abadi ke do ahem shumal-junub mahwar maujood the, jinhon ne maghrib mein makai aur mashriq mein manioc ki kaasht ki. Llanos ke bade hisson ko kaato aur jalao aur mustaqil abad ziraat ke imtezaaj ke zariye kaasht kiya gaya tha. Venezuela ka bishter raqba jungle, charagah, ghaas ka maidan aur pahar par mabni hai. Hazaron iqsaam ke charind parind jangalon mein paye jate hain. Hispani qaum jab is khitte ki khoobsurati se aagah hui to inhon ne use Arzi Jannat ka naam diya tha. Venezuela tel-o-gas ki daulat se mala maal hai. Mulki kuwon mein 300,878 million barrel tel mehfooz hai.
Haiti Behira Caribbean ke Azeemtar Antilles Jazira Numa mein, Cuba aur Jamaica ke mashriq mein aur Bahamas aur Turk Caicos Jazair ke junub mein Caribbean jazair mein ek chota sa mulk hai. Yeh buniyadi taur par Hispaniola jazeera par mushtamil hai is jazeera par dusra mulk Dominican Jamhuriya hai. Iske junub maghrib mein chota Navassa jazeera hai, jis par Haiti ka dawa hai lekin wafaqi intizamia ke under Riyasat-e-Mutahidda ke ilaqe ke taur par mutanaza hai. Haiti ka raqba 27,750 murabba kilometer hai, jo Caribbean mein raqbe ke lihaz se teesra sab se bada mulk hai aur iski takhmina abadi 11.4 million hai, ise Caribbean ka sab se zyada abadi wala mulk aur Shumali America mein 5waan sab se zyada abadi wala mulk banata hai. French aur Creole Haiti ki sarkari zubanein hain. Iski darul-hakumat Port-au-Prince hai.
Jamhuriya Yemen ya Yemen Maghribi Asia mein waqia Middle East ka ek Muslim mulk hai. Yeh Jazira Numa Arab ke junubi sire par waqia hai aur iske shumal mein Saudi Arabia, mashriq mein Oman, junub mein Behira Arab aur maghrib mein Behira Ahmar waqia hain. Iski samandari haddein Eritrea, Djibouti aur Somalia ke saath milti hain. 555,000 murabba kilometer raqbe par muheet hai aur taqreeban 2,000 kilometer ki sahili patti par mushtamil Yemen Jazira Numa Arab par dusri sab se badi Arab khud mukhtar riyasat hai. Yemen ka darul-hakumat Sana'a hai aur Arabi iski qaumi zaban hai. Yemen ki abadi 2 crore se zaid hai, jin mein se zyada tar Arabi bolte hain. San 2023 tak mulk ki abadi ka takhmina 34.4 million hai. Yemen Arab League, Aqwaam-e-Mutahidda, Na-wabasta Tehreek aur Islami Ta'awun Tanzeem ka rukun hai. Qadeem zamaney mein, Yemen Saba'iyon ka ghar tha, ek tijarti riyasat jis mein jadeed daur ke Ethiopia aur Eritrea ke hisse shamil the. Baad mein san 275 Eesvi mein, Himyarai badshahat Yahudiyat se mutasir hui. Eesaiyat chauthi sadi mein pahunchi aur saatvin sadi mein Islam tezi se phail gaya, ibtedai Islami futoohaat mein Yemeni faujon ne ahem kirdar ada kiya. Naueen aur solahveen sadi ke darmiyan mukhtalif khandan ubhre. Atharvin sadi ke dauran, mulk ko Osmani aur British saltanaton ke darmiyan taqseem kar diya gaya tha. Pehli Jang-e-Azeem ke baad, Yemen ki Mutawakkali Saltanat qayim hui, jis ke baad san 1962 mein Yemen Arab Jamhuriya ka qayam amal mein aaya. Junubi Yemen san 1967 mein azad hua. San 1990 mein, do Yemeni riyasaton ne mutahid hokar jadeed Jamhuriya Yemen tashkeel di. Sadr Ali Abdullah Saleh nayi jamhuriya ke pehle sadr the aur woh san 2012 mein Arab Spring ke nateejay mein mustafi ho gaye. San 2011 se, Yemen ko siyasi bohran ka samna hai, jiski nishan dehi ghurbat, be-rozgari, bad-unwani aur sadr Saleh ke Yemen ke Ain mein tarmeem karne aur sadarti muddat ki hadd ko khatam karne ke khilaf sarkon par hone wale muzahiron se hai. Iske baad, mulk ek khana jangii ki lapet mein aagaya hai jis mein mutaddid idare hukmrani ke liye koshan hain, bashamool sadr Hadi ki hukumat (baad mein Sadarti Qayadat Council), Houthi Tehreek ki Supreme Political Council aur alahidgi pasand Junubi Tehreek ki Junubi Muntaqili Council. Yeh jari tanaza ek shadeed insani bohran ka baais bana hai aur Yemen ke logon par iske tabah kun asraat ke liye bade paimane par tanqeed ki gayi hai. Yemen ki insani surat-e-haal par dramatically bigadte hue asraat ke liye jari insani bohran aur tanazuaat ko wasi paimane par tanqeed ka samna karna pada hai, jiske bare mein kuch logon ka kehna hai ke yeh ek insani tabahi ki satah tak pahunch gaya hai aur kuch ne ise nasl kushi ka naam bhi diya hai. Yemen duniya ke sab se kam taraqqi yafta mumalik mein se ek hai, paidaar taraqqi ki rah mein numaya rukawaton ka samna hai. Aqwaam-e-Mutahidda ne 2019 mein report kiya ke Yemen mein insani imdad ki zaroorat mein sab se zyada log hain, jin ki taadad taqreeban 24 million hai, jo iski abadi ka taqreeban 75 percent hai. 2020 tak, Yemen nazuk halat ke ishariye par sab se unche maqam par hai aur Aalami Bhook ke ishariye par dusre number par hai, jise sirf Wastii Afriqi Jamhuriya ne peeche chhod diya hai. Mazeed baran, iska insani taraqqi ka index tamam gair Afriqi mumalik mein sab se kam hai. Middle East mein Yemen Arabon ki asal sarzameen hai. Yemen qadeem daur mein tijarat ka ek ahem markaz tha, jo masalon ki tijarat ke liye mashoor tha. Yeh woh qadeem sarzameen hai jis mein se Wiladat-e-Nabawi (SAW) se pachas yaum qabl Abraha naamii Esaai badshah Khana Kaaba par hamla avar hua. Yamnaat ki istilah ka tazkira purane Junubi Arabi nawishtajaat mein dusri Himyari badshahat ke badshahon mein se ek ke unwan par kiya gaya tha jise Shammar Yuhar'ish II kaha jata hai. Yeh istilah ghaliban Jazeera Numa Arab ki junub maghribi sahili patti aur Aden aur Hadramaut ke darmiyan junubi sahil ki taraf ishara karti hai. Tareekhi Yemen mein maujuda Yemen ke muqable mein bahut bada ilaqa shamil tha, jo junub maghribi Saudi Arabia mein shumali Asir se lekar junubi Oman mein Dhofar tak phaila hua tha. Ek tashbeeh Yemen ko ymnt se makhoz hai, jiska lafzi matlab hai Junubi Arab Jazeera Numa aur numaya taur par daein taraf zameen ke tasawwur par ada karta hai. Deegar zariye dawa karte hain ke Yemen ka taluq Yaman ya Yumun se hai, jiska matlab hai khush-hali ya barkat, kyunke mulk ka zyada tar hissa zar-khez hai. Romanon ne ise Sehrai Arabia ke bar-aks zar-khez Arabia (khush ya khush qismat Arabia) kaha. Latini aur Yunani musannifeen ne qadeem Yemen ko Hindustan kaha, jo Farsiyon ke naam se nikla tha. Yemen 7000 saal se zyada arse se apni tehzeebon ke sangam par maujood hai. Mulk Saba ki malika Sheba jaisi shakshiyat ka ghar tha jo badshah Sulaiman ke liye tohfon ka ek karwan lekar aayi thi. Sadiyon se, yeh Mocha ki bandargah mein baramad ki jaane wali coffee ka buniyadi paidawar ban gaya tha. Qadeem Roami is ilaqe ko Arabia Felix ya zar-khez ya khush-haal Arab kehte the. Saatvin sadi mein Islam qabool karne ke baad, Yemen Islami taleem ka markaz ban gaya aur iska zyada tar fun-e-ta'ameer jadeed daur tak zinda raha. Mashriqi aur Maghribi tehzeebon ke darmiyan apni taweel samandari sarhad ke saath, Yemen Jazeera Numa Arab ke maghrib mein tijarat ke lihaz se ek strategic maqam ke saath cultures ke sangam par taweel arse se maujood hai. 5000 Qabl Maseeh mein shumali Yemen ke paharon mein unke daur ke liye badi bastiyan maujood thin. Saba'i badshahat kam az kam barahvin sadi Qabl Maseeh mein wajood mein aayi. Junubi Arab mein char badi saltanatein ya qabaili confederations Saba, Hadramaut, Qataban aur Ma'in thin. Rasool Allah (SAW) ne apne chachazad bhai Hazrat Ali (AS) ko san 630 ke qareeb Sana'a aur uske gird-o-nawahi mein bheja. Us waqt Yemen Arab ka sab se taraqqi yafta khitta tha. Banu Hamdan Confederation sab se pehle Islam qabool karne walon mein shamil thi. Phir Rasool Allah (SAW) ne Hazrat Muaz bin Jabal (RA) ko Yemen ka wali bana kar bheja aur saath hi maujuda daur ke Ta'izz mein Hazrat Junadah (RA) ko bheja aur mukhtalif qabaili rehnamaon ko khat bheje. Iski wajah qabilon mein taqseem aur Paighamabr-e-Akram (SAW) ke daur mein Yemen mein mazboot markazi authority ka na hona tha. Himyar samet bade qabail ne 630-631 ke aas paas Wafud ke saal ke dauran wafud Madina bheje. San 630 se pehle kayi Yemeniyon ne Islam qabool kiya. Is dauran Ablah bin Kaab al-Ansi (Aswad Ansi) ne baqi mandah Farsiyon ko nikal diya aur nabuwat ka jhoota dawa kiya ke woh Rahman ka nabi hai. Use Farsi nasl ke Yemeni Hazrat Firuz al-Daylami (RA) ne qatal kiya. Esaai, jo buniyadi taur par Yahudiyon ke saath Najran mein muqeem the, jizya ada karne par raazi ho gaye, halaanke kuch Yahudiyon ne Islam bhi qabool kiya, jaise Hazrat Wahb bin Munabbih aur Kaab al-Ahbar (RA). Khilafat-e-Rashida ke dauran Yemen mustahkam tha. Yemeni qabail ne Misr, Iraq, Fars, Levant, Anatolia, Shumali Africa, Sicily aur Andalus mein Islami phailao mein ahem kirdar ada kiya. Shaam mein abad hone wale Yemeni qabail ne Umayyad hukumat ko mustahkam karne mein ahem kirdar ada kiya, khaas taur par Marwan I ke daur mein, Kindah jaise taqatwar Yemeni qabail Marj Rahat ki jang ke dauran uske saath the. Yemen taqriban mukammal taur par Maghribi Asia mein hai, Jazeera Numa Arab ke junubi hisse mein jo jazeera numa ko Mashriqi Africa se mila raha hai, iski sarhad shumal mein Saudi Arabia, junub aur mashriq mein Oman, maghrib mein Behira Ahmar, Khaleej Aden aur Guardafui Channel se milti hai. Arzul-balad 12 aur 19° N aur tulul-balad 42 aur 55° E ke darmiyan, Yemen 15°N 48°E par hai aur iska size 555,000 murabba kilometer hai. Behira Ahmar ke mutaddid jazair, bashamool Hanish Jazair, Kamaran aur Perim, nez Behira Arab mein Socotra, ka taluq Yemen se hai. In mein sab se bada Socotra hai. Bahut se jazaire aatish fishan hain. Misaal ke taur par, Jabal al-Tair mein san 2007 mein aur is se pehle san 1883 mein aatish fishan phata tha. Agarche Mainland Yemen Jazeera Numa Arab ke junubi hisse mein hai aur is tarah Asia ka hissa hai aur iske jazair Hanish aur Behira Ahmar mein Perim ka taluq Asia se hai, magar Socotra ka jazeera numa, jo Somalia ke horn ke mashriq mein waqia hai aur Asia ke muqable Africa se bahut qareeb hai, geographiaai aur bio-geographiaai taur par Africa se munsalik hai. Socotra ka samna Guardafui Channel aur Somali Samandar se hai. Yemen ek jamhuriya hai jis mein do aeewan wali muqannina hai. San 1991 ke ain ke under, ek muntakhib sadr, ek muntakhib 301 nishiston wali assembly aur ek muqarrar karda 111 rukni Shura Council taqat mein hissa leti hai. Sadr-e-mumlikat riyasat ka sarbarah hai aur wazeer-e-azam hukumat ka sarbarah hai. Sana'a mein, ek Supreme Political Council (bainul-aqwami satah par tasleem shuda nahi) hukumat banati hai. San 1991 ka ain yeh faraham karta hai ke sadr ka intikhab kam az kam do ummeedwaron mein se maqbool vote ke zariye kiya jaye jiski Parliament ke kam az kam 15 arkaan ne tauseeq ki ho. Wazeer-e-azam, badle mein, sadr ki taraf se muqarrar kiya jata hai aur Parliament ke do tihai se manzoor hona zaroori hai. Sadarti ohde ki muddat saat saal hai aur muntakhib daftar ki parliamentary muddat chhah saal hai. Haq-e-rae-dahi 18 saal aur is se zyada umar ke logon ke liye alamgir hai, lekin sirf Musalman hi muntakhib ohde par faiz ho sakte hain. Sadr Ali Abdullah Saleh san 1999 mein dobara mutahid Yemen ke pehle muntakhib sadr bane (halaanke woh san 1990 se mutahid Yemen ke sadr aur san 1978 se Shumali Yemen ke sadr the). Woh September 2006 mein dobara ohde ke liye muntakhib hue the. Saleh ki fatah ko ek aise intikhab se nishan zad kiya gaya tha jiske bare mein bainul-aqwami mubahsareen ne faisla kiya tha ke juzvi taur par azad tha, halaanke intikhabat ke saath tashaddud, press ki azadiyon ki khilaf warzi aur dhoka dhadi ke ilzamat the. Parliamentary intikhabat April 2003 mein hue aur General People's Congress ne qatai aksariyat barqarar rakhi. Saleh san 2011 tak apni iqtadar ki nishist par taqriban bila muqabla rahe, hatta ke san 2011 ke Arab Spring ke asraat ke saath mil kar intikhabat ke dusre daur ke ineqad se inkar par muqami mayusi ke nateejay mein bade paimane par muzahire hue. San 2012 mein, unhen iqtadar se istifa dene par majboor kar diya gaya, halaanke woh Yemeni siyasat mein ek ahem ansar rahe hain, san 2010 ki dahai ke wast mein Houthis ke qabze ke dauran unke saath ittihad. Ain azad adliya ka mutalba karta hai. Sabqa Shumali aur Junubi qanuni zabiton ko yakja kar diya gaya hai. Qanuni nizam mein alahada adalaten aur Sana'a mein qayim Supreme Court shamil hain. Shariat qawaneen ka buniyadi makaz hai, jis mein bahut se adalti muqaddamat qanoon ki mazhabi buniyad ke mutabiq zer-e-behas aate hain aur bahut se judge mazhabi scholars ke saath saath qanuni ikhtiyarat bhi hote hain. Jail Authority Organization Act, Republican Farman Number 48 (1981) aur Jail Act ke zawabit, mulk ke jail ke nizam ke intizam ke liye qanuni framework faraham karte hain.
Uruguay Junubi America ke junub mashriqi hisse mein waqia ek mulk hai. Mulk mein rehne wali taqreeban 35 lakh ki abadi mein se 11 lakh afraad darul-hakumat Montevideo aur is metropolitan ilaqe mein rehaishgah karte hain. Mulk ki 88-94% abadi European ya makhlut log hain. Uruguay ki zamini sarhad mashriq aur shumal mein Brazil se aur maghrib mein Argentina, shumal mein Rio Grande do Sul se milti hai. Iske maghrib mein Uruguay Dariya, dakshin pashcham mein Rio de la Plata ka muhana aur junub mein Junubi Andh Oqyanus waqia hai. Uruguay Junubi America mein Suriname ke baad dusra sab se chota mulk hai. Uruguay mein sab se purani European colony Colonia del Sacramento qayim Portugal ki taraf se 1680 mein ki gayi thi. Montevideo qayim Spainiyon ne 18vin sadi ke ibtedai daur mein fouji gadh ke taur par ki thi. Uruguay ne 1825–1928 ke darmiyan Spain, Argentina aur Brazil ke darmiyan teen tarfah jang ke baad azadi hasil ki. Yahan ainni jamhuriat hai, jahan sadr riyasat ke saath saath hukumat ke bhi sarbarah hain. Uruguay ki economy buniyadi taur par ziraat par aur riyasat service par mabni hai. Transparency International ke mutabiq, Uruguay Latin America mein (Chile ke saath) sab se kam bad-unwan mulk hai, jahan ki siyasi aur kaam halat bar-e-azam mein sab se zyada khuli hain. Uruguay aala insani taraqqi index aur fi kas amadni ke lihaz se Latin America ke sab se taraqqi yafta economy wala mulk hai.
Yunan ya Jamhuriya Hellenic (English Hellenic Republic, Greek Ellīnikī́ Dīmokratía) junub mashriqi Europe mein jazira numa Balkan ke nisheb mein waqia mulk hai. Iski sarhadain shumal mein Albania, Macedonia, aur Bulgaria aur mashriq mein Turkey se milti hain. Maghrib mein Behira Ioni aur junub mein Behira Aegean waqia hai. Yunan ko Fanoon Latifa ki maa bhi kaha gaya hai. Yahan sang-e-marmar ifrat se milta tha , is liye fun-e-ta’ameer mein zabardast taraqqi hui. Jamhuriat ka tasawwur sab se pehle Yunan mein qayim hua aur wahan se yeh tarz-e-hukumat duniya ke dusre mulkon tak pahuncha. Yunan mein har naujawan ko atharah saal ki umar mein Athens ki Devi ke huzoor mein halaf-e-wafa-dari uthana padta tha.
Ibrahim Gardi Musalmanon ka ek sardar aur Marhatta fauj ka topchi tha. October 1760 se January 1761 tak Marhaton ki ittihadi afwaaj mukhtalif maqamat par Abdali lashkar se takrati rahi, Marhaton ki ittihadi afwaaj mein Ibrahim Khan Gardi bhi tha jo apne saath do hazar sawar aur 9 hazar paidal fauj laya tha. Aakhri ladai mein Marhaton ki ittihadi afwaaj ka sepahsalar Basawan Rao maara gaya, Abdali ke lashkar ne ittihadi lashkar ka qatal-e-aam shuru kar diya, Marhaton ki kamar tod di gayi to Ahmad Shah Abdali ne talwar niyam dal di, shikast khurda ittihadi afwaaj ke giraftar hone wale sardaron aur faujiyon mein gyarah hazar fauji muhaiya karne wala Musalman sardar Ibrahim Khan Gardi bhi shamil tha. Jab use fateh badshah ke samne pesh kiya gaya to Ahmad Shah Abdali ne nafrat amez lehje mein us se poocha, kaho Khan Sahab kya haal hai? Kis tarah tashreef aawari hui? Ibrahim Gardi ne kaha, mein ek jaan-farosh sipahi hun, huzoor jaan bakhshi karenge to isi tarah haq-e-namak ada karunga, nafrat aur ghusse se Ahmad Shah Abdali ka chehra surkh ho gaya, Gardi! jaan-faroshon ki jaan bakhshi to ho sakti hai lekin iman-farosh duniya mein rehne ke qabil nahi hote yeh tareekhi jumla kehne ke baad Ahmad Shah Abdali ne hukum diya is iman-farosh ko meri aankhon se door kar ke safha-e-hasti se mita diya jaye poori zimmedari se hukum ki taameel kar di gayi.
Hafiz Nabeel Sabir Baloch Jamia Wastii Punjab ke muallim hain. Aap Janab Liaqat Baloch ke bhatije bhi hain. Maazi mein aap Jamia mein computer science se taaruf ka mazmoon padhate rahe hain, is waqt aap compiler construction padha rahe hain. Aapko apni yaadashat par bada fakhar hai. In jaise qabil ustad kam kam hi mayassar aate hain.
Behira Arab ya Baher-e-Makran, Baher-e-Hind ka hissa hai jo mashriq mein Bharat, shumal mein Pakistan aur Junubi Iran, maghrib mein Jazeera Numa Arab, aur junub mein Raas Gardafui Somalia, Socotra Yemen aur Kanyakumari (Cape Comorin) Bharat ke darmiyan ghira hua hai. Pracheen daur ki tareekh mein Vedic daur mein ise Sindhu Sagar ke naam se pukara gaya hai. Kyunki Himalaya se nikalne wale 5 dariya Panjnad Punjab Pakistan ke shehar Multan ke maqam par Darya-e-Sindh mein shamil ho jate hain aur yehi Sindhu Darya Sagar mein girta tha. Behira Arab mein do ahem shakhein hain ek junub maghrib mein Khaleej Aden jahan Bab al-Mandeb ke zariye Behira Ahmar Behira Arab se milta hai aur dusra shumal maghrib mein Khaleej Oman jo Khaleej Fars ko is se milati hai. Inke alawa Bhartiya sahilon par Khambhat aur Kutch ki Khaleej bhi waqia hai. Behira Arab mein jazair ki kami hai jin mein sab se bada jazeera Africa aur Arab ke sahilon ke saath Socotra ka jazeera aur Bhartiya sahilon ke saath Jazair Lakshadweep shamil hain. Zamana-e-qadeem mein hi Behira Arab samandari tijarati raaste ki haisiyat rakhta tha, jis se Mashriqi Africa, Bharat, Junub Maghribi Asia aur China ke darmiyan samandari tijarat hua karti thi. Behira Arab Europe aur Bharat ke darmiyan ahem tareen samandari raasta hai, jo Behira Ahmar aur Behira Room ko milane wali Nehar Suez se guzarta hai. Behira Arab ki zyada se zyada chauraai do hazar 400 kilometer hai aur zyada se zyada gehraai 4 hazar 652 meter hai. Darya-e-Sindh Behira Arab mein girne wala sab se bada dariya hai iske alawa Narmada, Tapti, Mahi aur Bharat ki riyasat Kerala ke mukhtalif dariya bhi isi samandar mein girte hain. Behira Arab se munsalik Wastii Bharat ka sahil Konkan jabke Junubi Bharat ka sahil Malabar kehlata hai. Behira Arab mein sahili ilaqe ke hamil mumalik mein Bharat, Iran, Oman, Pakistan, Sri Lanka, Yemen, Somalia aur Maldives shamil hain. Behira Arab ke kinare waqia bade shehron mein Mumbai, Surat, Mangalore aur Kochi (Bharat), Karachi aur Gwadar (Pakistan) aur Aden (Yemen) shamil hain.
Sher Shah Suri, ka asal naam Farid Khan tha. Woh 1486 mein paida hue jo Pashtun ki mashoor shakh Ishaq yani Sahak ka bada beta tha. Suri ne Jaunpur mein taleem paayi. 21 saal walid ki jageer ka intizam chalaya phir Wali-e-Bihar ki mulaazmat ki aur phir Junubi Bihar ke Governor bane. Kuch arsa Shehenshah Babar ki mulaazmat ki aur Bengal, Bihar aur Qannauj par qabza kiya. Mughal Shehenshah Humayun ko shikast dekar Hindustan par apni hukmrani qayim ki. Apni mumlikat mein bahut si islahat naafiz keen. Suri apne taameeri kamon ki wajah se Hindustan ke Napoleon kehlaye. Sunargaon se Darya-e-Sindh tak ek hazar paanch sau kos lambi Jarneeli Sadak ta'ameer karwai jo aaj tak GT Road ke naam se maujood hai. Shehenshah Akbar mumlikat ka intizam chalane mein Sher Shah se bada mutasir tha. 22 May 1545 mein barood khana ke achaanak phat jaane se wafat paayi. Tareekh dan Sher Shah Suri ko Bar-e-Sagheer ki Islami tareekh ka azeem rehnama, fateh aur musleh mante hain. Urdu adab mein Sher Shah Suri se mutaliq kayi misali qisse milte hain. Sher Shah Suri (1476 ta 1545) aisa farmanrava tha jiski sataish namwar muwarrikheen aur aalmi mubasireen karte rahe hain. Woh Hindustan ka pehla hukmaran tha jisne awami falah ki janib apni bharpur tawajjuh di aur aise aise karnamen anjam diye jo tareekh ki kutub mein sunahray haroof mein to likhe hi gaye, unke nuqoosh aaj tak maujood hain. Saadhe paanch sau saal qabl usne zarai islahat ka kaam shuru karwa diya tha, jiski pairvi baad ke hukmaranon ne ki. Sher Shah ne Sahasram se Peshawar tak Grand Trunk Road yani Jarneeli Sadak ki ta'ameer karwai thi aur uske kinare kinare sayedar aur phaldar ashjar lagwaye, saraein ta'ameer karwain aur sab se pehla daak ka nizam naafiz kiya tha. Agarche Farid Khan Sur al-maroof Sher Shah ek mamooli jageerdar ka beta tha. Uske walid Hasan Khan Sur ka khandan Afghanistan se hijrat karke Hindustan aaye the aur woh Babar ke mamooli jageerdar the lekin daleer purjosh aur jawanmard aur ulul-azam Sher Shah ne Mughal saltanat ke bunyad guzar Babar ke sahibzade Humayun ko ek baar nahi do do baar shikast di. Pehli baar Chausa ke maidan mein aur dusri baar Kannauj ke maidan mein. Uske baad Humayun ko barson dar badari ki zindagi guzarni padi is dar badari ke daur mein hi Akbar ki paidaish hui thi jo baad mein tareekh ka Akbar-e-Azam bana. Apni jad-o-jahad se Sher Shah ne azeem saltanat qayim ki thi. Lekin usne apni aakhri aaramgah ke taur par Sahasram ko hi pasand kiya jahan uski qaum Suri ki aksariyat thi isliye apni zindagi mein hi Kaimur ki pahadi par maqbara ta'ameer karwaya tha jis ke charon janib jheel phaili hui hai.
Karobar (English Business) ka matlab woh tamam sargarmian hain jin se koi bhi shakhs kuch bana kar, kuch masnooaat khareed kar ya kuch masnooaat ya khidmaat bech kar apni rozi roti kamata hai.
Australia (English Australia) junubi nisf kurre ka ek mulk hai jo duniya ke sab se chhote bar-e-azam par mushtamil hai. Is mein Tasmania ka bada jazeera aur Baher-e-Junubi, Baher-e-Hind aur Baher-e-Al-Kahil ke kayi chhote bade jazair shamil hain. Iske hamsaya mumalik mein Indonesia, Mashriqi Timor aur Papua New Guinea shumal ki taraf, Solomon Jazair, Vanuatu aur New Caledonia shumal mashriq ki taraf aur New Zealand junub mashriq ki taraf maujood hain. Australia ka markazi hissa 42000 saal se qadeemi Australian logon se abad raha hai. Shumala se aane wale ikka dukka maheegiron aur European muhim-jo’on aur tajiron ne 17th century mein idhar aana shuru kar diya tha. 1770 mein, Australia ke mashriqi nisf hissa par Britain ne dawa kiya. Ise phir 26 January 1788 mein, New South Wales ki colony ka hissa bana diya gaya. Jonhi abadi badhti gayi aur naye ilaqe daryaft hote gaye, 19th century tak idhar mazeed paanch colonies bhi bana di gayin. 1 January 1901 ko, in 6 colonies ne mil kar ek Federation banayi aur is tarah Commonwealth of Australia wajood mein aayi. Federation se lekar ab tak, Australia mein motadil jamhoori siyasi nizam maujood hai aur yeh abhi tak Commonwealth hai. Iska darul-hakumat Canberra hai. Iski abadi 2 crore 10 lakh hai aur yeh mainland ke darul-hakumaton Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane, Perth aur Adelaide mein phaila hua hai. Latini mein Australis ka matlab jo junub mein ho hai. Junub ki naamaloom zameen ke bare mein kahaniyan qadeem Roman daur mein milti hain lekin in mein asal bar-e-azam ke bare mein koi haqeeqi maloomat nahi thin. Australia ka lafz English mein pehli baar 1625 mein istemal kiya gaya. 1793 mein George Shaw aur Sir James Smith ne Zoology aur Botany baraye New Holland ke naam se tehreer shaya ki jis mein unhon ne wasi-o-areez jazeera ka zikr kiya tha na ke ba-taur bar-e-azam ke. 1814 mein Australia ka naam mashoor hua jo ek British navigator ne apne safar ke baad kitab ki shakal mein likha. Uska naam Matthew Flinders tha aur usne pehli baar Australia ke gird chakkar lagaya. Is kitab ki nauiyat agarche fouji thi, lekin lafz Australia ko aam maqbooliyat hasil hui kyunki yeh kitab wasi paimane par padhi gayi. Baad azan New South Wales ke Governor ne apne sarkari muraslaat mein lafz Australia ko istemal kiya aur 1817 mein is naam ko sarkari darja dene ki sifarish ki gayi jo manzoor hui. Ibtedaai insani abadkari ka andaza 42,000 se 48,000 saal qabl ka lagaya gaya hai. Yeh log maujuda daur ke qadeemi Australian bashindon ke ajdad the jo junub mashriqi Asia se zamini raaste se idhar pahunche the. Inki aksariyat shikari aur gallah banon ki thi. Australia ka mushahida karne wala pehla gair mutanaza European Holland ka jahaz ran Willem Janszoon tha jisne Cape York ke jazira numa ke sahil ka manzar, 1606 mein dekha. 17vin sadi ke dauran Holland ke bashindon ne mukammal maghribi aur shumali sahili ilaqon ke naqshe banaye aur ise New Holland ka naam diya lekin abadkari ki koi koshish nahi ki. 1770 mein, James Cook idhar pahuncha aur mashriqi sahil ka naqsha banaya aur ise New South Wales ka naam diya aur ise Britain ka hissa banaya. Australia ki muqami abadi jiska andaza European logon ki amad ke waqt 350,000 ke qareeb lagaya jata hai, 150 saal ke baad dramatic had tak kam ho gayi. Iski wajuhat mein beemariyan, European logon ki zabardasti amad aur saqafati tafreeq thin. Iske alawa muqami logon se unke bachche chheenna bhi unki nasl kushi ke mutradif samjha jata hai. Iske alawa in qadeemi bashindon ki tareekh mein siyasi aur nazariyati maqasid ke liye taharreef bhi ki gayi thin. Australians ise tareekhi jung ka naam dete hain. 1967 ke referendum ke baad, hukumat ne muqami logon ko unke huqooq dene shuru kiye jin mein zameen ka haq milkiyat, abai eazazat wagaira ko 1992 mein ja kar tasleem kiya gaya. Ab bhi jo arazi muqami logon ke paas hai use Australia ki hukumat hathiayane ki koshish mein rehti hai. Australia in saat mumalik mein shamil hai, jo bees saal se Aqwaam-e-Mutahidda ki us qarardad ki mukhalifat karte rahe hain jis mein asli muqami abadiyon ke huqooq ka elaan kiya gaya hai. Sone ki talash ke liye Australia mein 1850 ke awail mein daud shuru hui. Iske nateejay mein chhote paimane par baghawatein bhi hueen. Westminster ke 1931 ke qanoon ne Australia aur Britain ke ainni taluqat ko zyada tar khatam kar diya jab Australia ne usko 1942 mein qabool kiya. 1942 mein Asia mein Britain ki shikast aur phir Japan ke hamle ke andeshe ke baais Australia ne America ko apna naya hami-o-madadgar banaya. 1951 se ab tak Australia America ka baqaida fouji haleef shumar hota hai. Dusri Jang-e-Azeem ke baad Australia ne Europe se tarkeen-e-watan ki hausla afzai ki. 1970 mein White Australia ki policy ke ikhtitam par Asia aur deegar gair European ilaqon se afraad ne Australia ki taraf jana shuru kar diya. Is se Australia ki apni abadi, saqafat aur tashakhus par bahut gehra asar pada. Baher-e-Hind aur Baher-e-Al-Kahil se ghira hua, Australia ko Arafura aur Timor samandaron ke zariye Asia se alag kiya gaya hai, Coral Samandar Queensland ke sahil par waqia hai aur Behira Tasman Australia aur New Zealand ke darmiyan waqia hai. Duniya ka sab se chota bar-e-azam aur kul raqba ke lihaz se chhata sab se bada mulk, Australia apne size aur tanhai ki wajah se aksar Jazira Bar-e-Azam kaha jata hai aur kabhi kabhi use duniya ka sab se bada jazeera bhi samjha jata hai. Australia ke paas 34,218 kilometer (21,262 mile) sahili patti hai (tamam off-shore jazair ko chhod kar) aur 8,148,250 murabba kilometer (3,146,060 murabba mile) ke wasi khususy iqtisadi zone ka dawa karta hai. Is khususy iqtisadi zone mein Australia ka Antarctic ilaqa shamil nahi hai. Mainland Australia arzul-balad 9° aur 44° junub aur tulul-balad 112° aur 154° mashriq ke darmiyan waqia hai. Australia ka size use mukhtalif qism ke manazir deta hai, shumal mashriq mein estawai barshi janglat, junub mashriq, junub maghrib aur mashriq mein pahadi silsile aur markaz mein sehra. Sehrai ya neem banjar zameen jise aam taur par Outback ke naam se jana jata hai woh zameen ka sab se bada hissa banati hai. Australia sab se khushk abad bar-e-azam hai; bar-e-azmi ilaqe mein iski salana barish ausatan 500 millimeter se kam hai. Abadi ki kasafat 3.4 bashinde fi murabba kilometer hai, halaanke abadi ki badi aksariyat motadil junub mashriqi sahili patti ke saath rehti hai. Wastii Melbourne mein abadi ki kasafat 19,500 makeen fi murabba kilometer se zyada hai. Great Barrier Reef, duniya ki sab se badi marjan ki chattan, shumal mashriqi sahil se thode fasle par waqia hai aur 2,000 kilometer (1,200 mile) tak phaili hui hai. Mount Augustus, duniya ka sab se bada ek sangi (monolith) hai, Maghribi Australia mein waqia hai. Mount Kosciuszko 2,227 meter (7,310 feet) par, Australia ki sarzameen par sab se uncha pahar hai. Is se bhi unchi Mawson Peak (2,745 meter ya 9,006 feet), Heard Island ke door daraz Australian bairuni ilaqe aur Australia ke Antarctic ilaqe mein, Mount McClintock aur Mount Menzies, 3,492 meter aur 3,492 meter par bil tarteeb. Mashriqi Australia ko Azeem Taqseem ki Had se nishan zad kiya gaya hai, jo Queensland, New South Wales aur Victoria ke bishter sahil ke mutawazi chalti hai. Yeh naam qatai taur par durust nahi hai, kyunki range ke kuch hisse nichli pahadiyon par mushtamil hain aur unchai wale ilaqon ki unchai aam taur par 1,600 meter (5,200 feet) se zyada nahi hoti hai. Sahili unche ilaqe aur Brigalow ghaas ke maidanon ki patti sahil aur paharon ke darmiyan waqia hai, jabke taqseem karne wale range ke andar ghaas ke maidan aur jhaadiyon ke bade ilaqe hain. In mein New South Wales ke Maghribi maidaani ilaqe aur andaroon-e-mulk Queensland ke Mitchell Grass Downs aur Mulga Lands shamil hain. Sarzameen ka shumali tareen nuqta estawai Cape York Jazeera Numa hai. Commonwealth of Australia ek ainni badshahat hai jis mein Parliamentary nizam-e-hukumat hai. Shah Charles Australia ke badshah hain aur unka yeh kirdar Commonwealth ke deegar mumalik ki nisbat mukhtalif hai. Wafaqi satah par badshah ki numaindagi karne ke liye Governor General hota hai. Agarche ainni taur par Governor General ko wasi ikhtiyarat mile hote hain umooman inka istemal Wazeer-e-Azam ke mashware se kiya jata hai. Do aeewanon par mushtamil Commonwealth ki Parliament Badshah, Senate jis mein 76 arkaan hote hain aur ek Aeewan Numaindgan jis ke 150 arkaan hote hain, par mushtamil hai. Yahan teen badi siyasi jamaten hain Australian Labor Party, Liberal Party aur National Party. Azad arkaan aur kayi choti parties bhi maujood hoti hain. Australia mein chhah riyasaten aur do badi aur kayi choti mumlikaten hain. Riyasaton mein New South Wales, Queensland, South Australia, Tasmania, Victoria aur Western Australia shamil hain. Badi mumlikaten Northern Territory aur Australian Capital Territory hain. Umooman riyasaten aur mumlikaten ek hi kaam karti hain lekin unke qawaneen kuch farq hote hain. Maujuda dahaiyon mein Australia ke kharija taluqat America se gehre taluqat ke mazhar hain. Australia ki khwahish hai ke Asia aur Baher-e-Oqyanus ke mumalik ke saath gehre taluqat qayim kiye jayen. Australia ki musallah afwaaj jinhen Australian Defence Forces kaha jata hai, Shahi Australian Bahri Fauj, Australian Barri Fauj aur Shahi Australian Hawai Fauj par mushtamil hain. Inki taadad 51000 hai. Yeh tamam afwaaj Aqwaam-e-Mutahidda aur ilaqai aman missionon, qudrati afaat ka muqabla karne, fouji ladaiyon mein bhi shamil hoti hain. Hukumat kisi bhi fauj se sarbarah ka taqarrur karti hai. Saal 2006-2007 ke liye Australia ka defai budget 22 arab US Dollar hai. Australia ka kul raqba 7617930 murabba kilometer hai. Yeh saare ka sara Indo-Australian Plate par waqia hai. Iske gird Indian, Junubi aur Oqyanus ke samandar hain. Australia aur Asia ke darmiyan Timor aur Arafura ke samandar waqia hain. Australia ke paas kul 34218 kilometer ka sahil maujood hai. Great Barrier Reef jise duniya ki sab se badi monge ki chattan hone ka darja mila hua hai, Australia ke shumal mashriqi sahil ke bilkul saath hai aur 2000 kilometer par phaili hui hai. Mount Augustus ko duniya ki sab se badi chattan mana jata hai. Australia mein Mount Kosciuszko ko sab se buland pahar hone ka darja mila hua hai jo 2228 meter buland hai. Agarche mainland se hat kar sab se buland pahar Mawson Peak hai jo 2745 meter buland hai. Ab tak Australia ka bada hissa banjar aur sehra par mushtamil hai. Australia ko chipta tareen bar-e-azam kehte hain. Iski mitti sab se purani aur sab se kam zarkhez hai. Iske alawa yeh khushk tareen bar-e-azam hai jahan insan rehte hain. Sirf junub mashriq aur junub maghrib ki taraf ke hisse motadil darja hararat rakhte hain. Abadi ki aksariyat junub mashriqi sahil par rehti hai. Mulk ke shumali ilaqe estawai mausam rakhte hain aur yahan rainforest, aam janglat, ghaas ke maidan, mangrove daldalain aur sehra hain. Mausam par samandari rauo'on ka gehra asar hai. Isi tarah shumali Australia mein mausami estawai hawa ka kam dabao cyclone paida karta hai. Agarche zyada tar Australia neem banjar ya sehrai hai, is mein bahut si iqsaam ke mahol paye jate hain. In mein Alpine se lekar estawai rainforest shamil hain. Isliye ise Mega Diversity mulk kaha jata hai. Apni taweel umar aur zarkhezi mein kami ki wajah se poore bar-e-azam ka mausam kafi mukhtalif hai aur geographiaai aitbar se baqiya duniya se bahut arsa kate hone ki wajah se yahan ki hayatiati zindagi bahut mukhtalif aur bahut mutanawwa nauiyat ki hai. Tamam phooldar paudon ka 85 percent, mamaliyah ka 84 percent, parindon ka 45 percent, sahil samandar ki machhliyon ka 89 percent hissa aam nauiyat ka hai aur har jagah paya jata hai. In qudrati maholon ki aksariyat ko insani mudakhlat aur bahar se layi gayi mukhtalif naslon ki wajah se mit jane ka andesha lahaq hai. Wafaqi mahol ke bachao aur Bio-diversity ke tehfuz ke ekat ko 1999 mein manzoor kiya gaya jo madumiyat ke khatre se dochaar anwaa ke bachao ka kaam karta hai. Australian lakdi dar darakhton ki aksariyat sada bahar hai aur yeh aag aur khushk saali ke aadi hain. In mein safeda aur Acacia shamil hain. Australia ek khush-haal aur Maghribi andaaz ki economy rakhne wala mulk hai. Iski fi kas GDP amadni Britain, Germany aur France se zara sa zyada hai. Insani taraqqi ke index mein ise teesra number diya gaya hai. Economist ne 2005 mein insani miyar-e-zindagi ke hawale se chhata number diya hai. Australia ki economy mein baramadi nauiyat ki ashya ki tayyari na hona ek bahut badi kamzori samjhi jati hai. Hal hi mein badhti hui siyahat aur Australia ki baramadaat ki qeematon mein izafe ne is par kuch surat-e-haal tabdeel ki hai. Taham current account ke khasare ke hawale se Australia duniya mein chauthe number par aata hai. Hawke ki hukumat ke dauran maashi islahat ka amal shuru kiya gaya jis mein Australia ke dollar ko 1983 mein azad kar diya gaya aur juzvi taur par financial system ko deregulate kiya gaya. Howard ki hukumat ne micro-economic islahat ke is amal ko jari rakha jis mein labour market ki juzvi deregulation aur sarkari idaron ki niji kari, jis mein telecommunication bahut ahem hai, shamil hain. July 2000 mein taxon ke bilawasta nizam ki islah ki gayi aur ashya aur khidmat par 10 percent tax ayid kiya gaya. Is se zati aur companies ke income tax par inhesar mein kuch kami hui. January 2007 mein kul 10033480 afraad barsar-e-rozgar hain aur is waqt sharah be-rozgari 4.6 percent hai. Guzashta dahai se ifrat-e-zar ki sharah 2 se 3 percent tak rahi hai. Khidmat ka shoba bashamool siyahat, taleem aur maashi khidmat kul GDP ka 69 percent hissa hain. Ziraat aur qudrati zarye kul 3 se 5 percent hain. Australia ki baramadi mandi mein Japan, China, America, Junubi Korea aur New Zealand shamil hain. Do crore das lakh Australians 19th aur 20th century ke abadkaron ki aulad hain jin ki aksariyat Britain aur Ireland se aayi thi. Pehli Jang-e-Azeem ke ikhtitam se ab tak Australia ki abadi chaar guna badh chuki hai. Iski ek wajah pur-kashish program baraye tarkeen-e-watan bhi shamil hai. Dusri Jang-e-Azeem se lekar 2000 tak taqreeban 69 lakh afraad ba-taur naye tarkeen-e-watan ke taur par aaye.
