Iska matlab yeh hua ke Australian abadi ke har saat mein se do afraad Australia se bahar paida hue hain. Zyada tar tarkeen-e-watan hunarmand hain lekin kuch taadad panah guzeen muhajireen ki bhi hai. Australia ke qadeemi bashindon ki taadad ab 410003 hai jo 1976 mein 115953 ki taadad se bahut zyada hai. In logon ki jail jaane ki aur be-rozgari ki sharah bahut zyada aur taleem ki kami aur ausat umar deegar Australians se sattrah saal kam hona bhi shamil hai. Deegar taraqqi yafta mumalik ki tarah Australia mein bhi abadi mein boodhe logon ki taadad badh rahi hai. Is se murad kam logon ka kaam par jana aur zyada logon ka retire hona hai. Iske alawa badi taadad mein Australians mulk se bahar hain. Sarkari zaban English hai aur iska lehja makhsus Australian hota hai. 2001 ke survey mein yeh samne aaya ke 80 percent gharon mein English boli jati hai. Iske baad Chinese, Italian aur Greek boli jati hain. Naye tarkeen-e-watan ki aksariyat umooman do zubanen bolti hai. Khayal kiya jata hai ke Australia mein 200 se 300 tak qadeem zubanen thin jab Europeans yahan aaye. Ab in mein se kul 70 baqi bachi hain aur in mein se 20 ab mit jaane ke khatre se dochaar hain. Sarkari taur par Australia ka koi mazhab nahi hai. 2006 ke survey se zahir hota hai ke kul abadi ka 60 percent hissa Masihi hai. 19 percent la-deen hain. 12 percent ki taraf se diya jane wala jawab gair ikhlaqi hone ki wajah se nahi likha ja raha. 6 se 15 saal tak ke bachchon ke liye school jana lazmi hai, kuch hisson mein yeh umar 16 aur kuch mein 17 saal bhi hai. Is waqt Australia ki sharah-e-khwandgi 99 percent hai. Hukoomati sarmaye se ta'ameer hone wali universities ki taadad 38 hai aur iske alawa bahut sari private universities bhi maujood hain. Aksar universities hukoomati imdad se chalti hain. Yahan hukumat ki taraf se vocational training ke school bhi qayim hain jo TAFE idare kehlte hain. Yahan naye hunarmand tayyar kiye jate hain. Andazan Australia ki 25 se 64 saal tak ki 58 percent abadi ke paas vocational ya is tarah ki dusri taleem maujood hai. 1788 se lekar 20th century tak Anglo-Celtic andaaz ki saqafat Australia mein maujood rahi. Guzashta pachas saalon mein Australian saqafat par American saqafat aur English zaban na bolne wale mumalik ke tarkeen-e-watan logon aur Australia ke Asian hamsayon ka gehra asar pada hai. Australia ke apne adab, cinema, opera, music, painting, theatre, dance wagaira ne bainul-aqwami taur par apni shanakht banayi hai. Australia mein basri funoon ki purani tareekh maujood hai jo ghraon mein aur darakhton ki chhaal par qadeem logon ki taraf se banayi gayi tasveeron par mushtamil hai. Australian adab par bhi manazar ka gehra asar hua hai. Banjo Paterson aur Henry Lawson jaise likhariyon ne Australian jhaadiyon se asar qabool kiya hai. 1973 mein Patrick White ko adab ka Nobel Prize diya gaya. Australian English ki asal British English se hui hai. Australia mein do nashri idare, teen karobari television network, kayi pay TV aur bahut sare awami, gair munafa-baksh television aur radio station maujood hain. Australian film industry ne bahut zyada kamyabi hasil ki hai. Har bade shehar ka apna akhbar hai aur do qaumi akhbarat bhi hain. Press freedom ke hawale se Australia ko 2006 mein 35waan number diya gaya tha jo New Zealand se peeche aur America se aage tha. Khel ka Australian saqafat par bahut gehra asar hai. Iske alawa mausam bhi aisa hai jo bairuni khelon wagaira ke liye bahut munasib hai. Bainul-aqwami satah par Australia mein bahut se khelon ke muqable munaqid kiye jate hain. Australia ki cricket, hockey, netball, rugby league, rugby union, cycling, kashti rani aur tairaki mein bahut umdah teams hain. Qaumi satah par Australian football, ghud daud, football aur motor racing ahem hain. Maujuda daur mein hone wale har Summer Olympic aur har Commonwealth Games mein Australia ne shirkat ki hai. 1956 ke Olympic Melbourne, Australia mein munaqid hue the. 2000 se lekar ab tak Australia pehle paanch sab se zyada tamgha lene wale mumalik mein shamil raha hai. Iske alawa Australian Open jo char Grand Slam tennis muqablon mein se ek hai, bhi hota hai. Khelon ke liye aur mashoor khiladiyon ke liye hukoomati aur idarati madad aam si baat hai. TV par football aur Olympic ko dekhna bhi kafi maqbool hai.
Australia ke ek muhalliq Stevens (Christine Stevens) ne 1989 mein ek kitab badi arq-rezi se murattab ki hai. Kitab ka naam Tin Mosques and Afghan Towns yani Tin ki Masjidain aur Afghan Bastiyan. 372 safhaat ki is zakhim kitab mein usne in oont walon ki tareekh badi mehnat se jama ki hai. Kitab ke muqaddame mein unhon ne likha hai. Yeh Afghan aur unke janwaron ne Australia ke qalb tak rasai is zamane mein mumkin banayi jab dusre log is kaam mein aksar nakam rahe. Iske bawajood unke khilaf khauf aur nafrat ka muzahira kiya gaya aur unke munfarid muashare ko alag thalag kar diya gaya. Unke mizaj aur tabiyat aur unki saqafat ko bahut kam samajhne ki koshish ki gayi, balki unke khilaf ghalat fahmiyan payi jati hain.
Javed Chaudhry (1 January 1968) Pakistani column nawis aur adeeb hain. 2008 se woh Express News mein Kal Tak show ki mezbani kar rahe hain. Javed ne Zero Point series mein mukhtalif unwanon par Urdu zaban ke columns likhte hain. Javed Chaudhry ka taluq Lalamusa (Zila Gujrat) se hai, jahan 1 January 1968 ko paida hue. Woh baad mein Lahore muntaqil ho gaye, Bahawalpur ke Islamia University (1991), ke alawa Columbia University, Johns Hopkins University mein taleem mukammal ki. Javed Chaudhry ne sahafat ka aaghaz 1990 ki dahai se kiya. Tareekh, tehqeeq aur siyahat mein gehri dilchaspi rakhte hain. Unhon ne column nigari ka aaghaz Roznama Jang se kiya. Woh Zero Point ke unwan se columns likhte hain. Woh 2008 se Roznama Express mein columns likh rahe hain aur Kal Tak ke naam se Express News TV program ki mezbani kar rahe hain. Woh ab tak 50 se zaid mumalik ka safar kar chuke hain aur bahut se intehai ahmiyat ke hamil tareekhi aur mazhabi maqamat ka daura kar chuke hain. Javed Chaudhry columns par mushtamil kitab Zero Point ki 6 jildain shaya ho chuki hain. Mukhtalif shakshiyat ke interviews par mushtamil ek kitab Gaye Dinon Ke Suraj aur siyasi tabsaron par mushtamil kitab Aaj Kal bhi shaya ho chuki hai.
Jung do fareeqon, qabail, qaumon ya mulkon ke darmiyan tanazaa ke nateejay mein hone wale tasadum ko kaha jata hai. Jung ki bhi kayi iqsaam hain. Jung musallah bhi ho sakti hai aur sard jung bhi. Musallah jungon ke dauran fareeqon, qabail, qaumon ya mulkon ki musallah afwaaj apni mulk-o-qaum ke difa ke liye aage aate hain aur apni qaum ko aane wale khatrat se bachate hain lekin yeh bhi ek haqeeqat hai ke jungon ke nateejay mein be-duregh insani janon ka zayan hota hai, lakhon afraad mare jate hain, aurtein bewah aur bachche yateem ho jate hain. Jung mein fatah jis kisi ki bhi ho, nuqsan insaniyat ka hi hota hai. Jung sirf do qaum ke beech nahi balki poori duniya ke darmiyan hoti hai. Jung ki nauiyat se murad siyasi husool aur diplomatic maqasid ko hasil karna hai.
Topchi woh shakhs hota hai jo top chalata hai.
Junubi Waziristan Pakistan ke subah Khyber Pakhtunkhwa ka ek zila hai. Iska sadr-e-maqam Wana hai. Wazir qabila yahan ka sab se bada qabila hai. Iske alawa Mehsud aur Suleiman bhi ahem hain. 1893 mein jab ek moahede ke under Afghanistan ka ameer is ilaqe se dastbardar hua to 1895 tak yeh ilaqa Dera Ismail Khan aur Bannu ke Deputy Commissioners ke zer-e-control hua karta tha. Junubi Waziristan ek khoobsurat ilaqa hai chilghoze ki kafi paidawar hai.
Jadeed lehje ke Urdu shayar. Ahmed Faraz (Youm-e-Paidaish 12 January, 1931 - Youm-e-Wafat 25 August, 2008) mein Kohat Pakistan mein paida hue. Unka asal naam Syed Ahmed Shah tha. Ahmed Faraz ne jab shayari shuru ki to us waqt unka naam Ahmed Shah Kohaati hota tha jo baad mein Faiz Ahmed Faiz ke mashware se Ahmed Faraz ho gaya. Urdu aur Farsi mein MA kiya. Edward College (Peshawar) mein taleem ke dauran Radio Pakistan ke liye feature likhne shuru kiye. Jab unka pehla shairi majmooa Tanha Tanha shaya hua to woh BA mein the. Taleem ki takmeel ke baad Radio se alahada ho gaye aur university mein lectureship ikhtiyar kar li. Isi mulaazmat ke dauran unka dusra majmooa Dard-e-Ashoob chhapa jisko Pakistan Writers Guild ki janib se Adamjee Adabi Award ata kiya gaya. University ki mulaazmat ke baad Pakistan National Center (Peshawar) ke Director muqarrar hue. Unhein 1976 mein Akadami Adabiyat Pakistan ka pehla sarbarah banaya gaya. Baad azan General Zia ke daur mein unhein majbooran jila watani ikhtiyar karni padi. 1989 se 1990 Chairman Akadami Pakistan, 1991 se 1993 tak Lok Virsa aur 1993 se 2006 tak National Book Foundation ke sarbarah rahe. Unka kehna tha ke TV interview ki padash mein unhein National Book Foundation ki mulaazmat se farigh kar diya gaya. Ahmed Faraz jinhon ne ek zamane mein fauj mein mulaazmat ki koshish ki thi, apni shayari ke zamana-e-urooj mein fauj mein aamirana rawish aur uske siyasi kirdar ke khilaf shair kehne ke sabab kafi shohrat payi. Unhon ne Ziaul Haq ke martial law ke daur ke khilaf nazmein likhin jinhein bahut shohrat mili. Mushairon mein kalam padhne par unhein military hukumat ne hirasat mein liya jis ke baad Ahmed Faraz ko khud sakhta jila watani bhi bardasht karni padi. 2004 mein General (R) Pervez Musharraf ke daur-e-sadarat mein unhein Hilal-e-Imtiaz se nawaza gaya lekin do baras baad unhon ne yeh tamgha sarkari policies par ehtejaj karte hue wapas kar diya. Ahmed Faraz ne kayi nazmein likhin jinhein aalmi satah par saraha gaya. Unki ghazliyat ko bhi bahut shohrat mili. Ahmed Faraz ne 1966 mein Adamjee Adabi Award aur 1990 mein Abasin Award hasil kiya. 1988 mein unhein Bharat mein Firaq Gorakhpuri Award se nawaza gaya. Academy of Urdu Literature (Canada) ne bhi unhein 1991 mein Award diya, jab ke Bharat mein unhein 1992 mein Tata Award mila. 2004 mein General (R) Pervez Musharraf ke daur-e-sadarat mein unhein Hilal-e-Imtiaz se nawaza gaya lekin do baras baad unhon ne yeh tamgha sarkari policies par ehtejaj karte hue wapas kar diya. Unhon ne mutaddid mumalik ke daure kiye. Unka kalam Aligarh University aur Peshawar University ke nisab mein shamil hai. Jamia Millia (Bharat) mein un par PhD ka maqala likha gaya jiska mauzu Ahmed Faraz ki ghazal hai. Bahawalpur mein bhi Ahmed Faraz - Fun Aur Shakshiyat ke unwan se PhD ka maqala tehreer kiya gaya. Unki shayari ke English, French, Hindi, Yugoslav, Russian, German aur Punjabi mein tarajum ho chuke hain. 25 August 2008 ko Ahmed Faraz Islamabad mein wafat pa gaye. Ahmed Faraz Islamabad ke markazi qabristan mein aasooda-e-khak hain.
Ab ke hum bichhre to shayad kabhi khwabon mein milein Jis tarah sookhe hue phool kitabon mein milein Dhoondh ujde hue logon mein wafa ke moti Yeh khazine tujhe mumkin hai kharabon mein milein Gham-e-duniya bhi gham-e-yar mein shamil kar lo Nasha badhta hai sharabein jo sharabon mein milein Tu Khuda hai na mera ishq farishton jaisa Donon insan hain to kyun itne hijaboon mein milein Aaj hum dar pe kheenchiye gaye jin baton par Kya ajab kal woh zamane ko nisabon mein milein Ab na woh main hoon, na woh tu hai na woh maazi hai Faraz Jaise do saye tamanna ke sarabon mein milein Aankh se door na ho dil se utar jaye ga Waqt ka kya hai guzarta hai guzar jaye ga Itna manoos na ho khalwat-e-gham se apni Tu kabhi khud ko bhi dekhega to dar jaye ga Doobte doobte kashti ko uchhala de doon Main nahi koi to sahil pe utar jaye ga Zindagi teri ata hai to yeh jaane wala Teri bakhshish teri dehleez pe dhar jaye ga Zabt lazim hai magar dukh hai qayamat ka Faraz Zaalim ab ke bhi na roye ga to mar jaye ga Yeh meri ghazlein yeh meri nazmein Tamaam teri hikayatein hain Yeh tazkire tere lutf ke hain Yeh shair teri shikayatein hain Main sab teri nazar kar raha hoon, Yeh un zamanon ki sa'atein hain
Jab Muslim rehnumaon ke wafad ne Governor se milne ki koshish ki toh Governor ne milne se inkar kar diya. Lucknow mein ek shandaar ehtejaji jalsa Nawab Mohsin-ul-Mulk ki sadarat mein hua. Jab iski ittila Governor ko mili toh woh Aligarh aaya aur college ke trustees ko jama karke un jalson par apni sakht narazgi ka izhaar kiya. Usne yeh bhi ilzaam lagaya ki college se talaba agitation ke liye bheje gaye hain. Usne dhamki di agar yahi tareeqa jaari raha toh college ko hakoomati imdad band kar di jayegi. Iski wajah se Nawab Mohsin-ul-Mulk ne apne ko college ki trustee se alag kar liya.
Waqt ke saath zabaan ki talkhi itni badhti gayi aur Urdu se muraad Musalmanon ki zabaan aur Hindi se muraad Hinduon ki zabaan li jaane lagi aur Hindu o Muslim jo alag alag mazhab ke bawajood ek saqafat rakhte the unke darmiyaan dararein pad gayin. Jo bilakhir taqseem ka bais bani. Aaj Bharat ki sarkari zabaan Pakistan ki tarah English hai. Magar wahan ki qaumi zabaan Hindi hai, jabke Pakistan ki qaumi zabaan Urdu hai. Yahan sawal paida hota hai ki kya Bharat mein aam bolne wali zabaan Hindi hai? Is sawal ke jawab ke liye ek tafseeli bahas ki zaroorat hai. Doosri ahem baat yeh hai hamare yahan Urdu medium aala taleem hasil karne walon ki aksariyat un logon ki jin ki maadri zabaan Urdu nahi hai. Lekin Bharat mein Hindi mein aala taleem hasil karne walon mein doosri zabaan bolne walon ki tadad aate mein namak ke barabar hai. Yeh zabaan Shumali Hind mein hi adabi, siyasi aur mazhab mein istemal ki jaati hai aur doosre ilaqon mein rehne wale apni apni zabaanain istemal karte hain. Yeh Hindi na filmon, TV dramas aur geeton mein istemal ki jaati hai. Is zabaan ka talluq Hindi se kam aur Urdu se zyada qareebi rishta hai. Iska ek saboot yeh bhi hai Hindi zabaan mein 'fe', 'khe', 'qaaf', 'ze' wagaira istemal hote hain. Jabke aam log phir bhi Farsi Arabi alfaazon ko bolte hain aur yeh filmon, TV dramas aur geeton mein unka istemal aam hai. Hinduon ki shayari se dilchaspi kam rahi hai. Muqami zabaanon mein kuch shu'ara ke naam milte hain maslan Braj Bhasha ya Bangla ya Punjabi mein. Vedic aur doosre granth bhi manzoom likhe gaye magar iske bawajood Hindu shayari mein dilchaspi nahi rakhte hain. Magar Urdu ke Hindu shu'ara mein bade nami girami shu'ara guzre hain. Shayad Urdu ka mizaaj aisa raha ki woh logon ko shayari mein dilchaspi lene par majboor kar deti hai. Is tarah muqami zabaanon mein Muslim shu'ara ki tadad Hinduon se kam nahi hogi. Hinduon mein classical hamesha mausiqui maqbool rahi hai. Kyunki use mazhabi taqaddus raha hai. Unke mazhab mein raqs aur geet ko ibadat ka darja hasil hai. Is liye ghar ghar mein iska charcha raha hai. Iske bawajood unke geet bhajan ya lok geeton tak mehdood rahe hain. Ghazal jo Urdu ki maqbool tareen asnaf hai woh Hinduon mein nihayat pasand ki jaati hai. Bharat mein har daur mein aise guluqaar milte hain jo Urdu bol nahi sakte hain. Magar Urdu ghazal aur geet nihayat khoobsurat gaate hain aur geeton ki tarah ghazlon ko nihayat pasand kiya jaata raha hai. Bahut se Hindu guluqaaron ne shohrat mehaz ghazal ki gaaygi se hasil ki. Tareekhi taur par, Bar-e-Sagheer ke Shumali Hind mein boli jaane wali zabaan ko Hindi kaha jaata tha. Mughal daur ke dauran, Hindi zabaan Farsi aur Arabi alfaaz ke saath ghul mil gayi. Ghair mulki is zabaan ko Urdu kehte hain jiska matlab lashkar hai kyunki Hindi bolne wale log muqami Hindustani the. Urdu Arabi rasm-ul-khat mein likhi jaane wali Hindi zabaan ke siwa kuch nahi hai. Pakistan mein filmein dekhi jaati hain magar us shauq ya zauq se nahi jaisa ki Bharat mein. Wahan par filmein flop bhi ho jaati hain magar apni laagat nikal leti hain. Is liye wahan tajurbaat bhi hote rahe hain aur har zabaan mein filmein kaseer tadad mein banayi jaati rahi hain.
Kasur shehar, sooba Punjab, Pakistan ka aik qadeem zila Kasur ka markazi shehar aur zilai darul-hukumat hai. Zila ka darja hasil karnay se pehle yeh Lahore ki aik tehsil thi. Angrez hukumat ne Kasur ko 1867 mein municipality ka darja diya. First July 1976 ko zila Lahore se tehsil Kasur ko alag kar k zila ka darja de diya gaya, jo Lahore se janoob ki taraf 55 kilometers door waqai hai. Samundari satah se iski average bulandi 218 meter hai. Kasur ka maazi shandaar hai, yeh mazhabi, saqafati aur rohani riwayat ka ameen hai. Yeh sheher hamari milli tareekh ka aik aisa kirdar hai jis ne Islami tehzeeb-o-tamaddun aur Muslim culture ki taraqqi aur uske tahaffuz mein aham kirdar ada kiya hai. Kasur ki history Lahore ke muqablay mein itni purani nahi hai magar yeh sadiyon se Lahore shehar se attached hai, isliye Lahore se boht mushabihat rakhta hai. Lahore Pakistan ka dil hai toh Kasur uski ankh hai.
Kasur city apni mazaydar mithaiyon aur masaledaar machhli ki wajah se mashoor hai. Khanay peenay ke hawalay se Kasooriyon ki hiss-e-zayqa nihayat qabil-e-rashk hai. Mulk bhar mein Kasuri falooda ki aik judagana pehchan honay ke saath saath Kasuri andarsa, bhalle pakoriyan, ojri aur nashtay mein dahi kulcha bohot pasand kiye jaate hain. Milansaari, zinda dili aur mehnat yahan ke logon ke khaas qualities hain.
Hindustan mein Mughal saltanat ke baani Zaheeruddin Babar ne 1526 mein Hindustan par qabza karnay ke baad Afghans ki services ke badlay mein Kasur ka area unko de diya. Yahan par mostly organized government Afghanistan ke Pathanon ki rahi hai jinhein Delhi ya Lahore hukumat ki taraf se appoint kiya jata tha but wo locally khud mukhtar status rakhte the. Kaha jata hai ke 7th century AD mein China ka aik famous tourist Huen Tsang yahan pahuncha aur yahan ke halaat bhi likhe. Uski tehreer se humein aasar-e-qadeema ke baray mein boht information milti hai. Is se pehle Kasur ka historical reference se zikr missing hai.
Kasur ki Ganda Singh Wala border famous hai, yeh India aur Pakistan ko jorti hai. Iska partition se pehle Kasur ke suburban towns mein shumaar hota tha. Yahan pe Pakistan aur India ki joint flag hoisting ceremonies hoti hain, jabke is border ke doosri taraf India ka Ferozepur shehar hai. Issi tarah 1965 ki Pak-Bharat jung mein fateh honay wala Indian city Khem Karan bhi hai. Yahan par aik bari tanks ki war ke place ki waja se isey tanks ka qabristan bhi kaha jata hai.
Kasur Junction Railway Station shehar ke north-west mein situated hai. Partition se pehle Kasur rail ke through Amritsar, Ferozepur se connect tha, magar ab ye railway line end kar di gai hai aur iska zyada connection by road aur rail Lahore city se hai. Yahan ki mostly transport aur trade Lahore se hi linked hai. Lahore se Karachi jane walay railway track par Raiwind Junction Railway Station se Kasur ke liye aik railway line alag hoti hai jo Kasur city se guzarti hui via Khudian Khas aur Kanganpur zila Kasur se nikal kar Lodhran ja pohnchti hai, jabke 1910 mein Kasur se Lodhran tak railway track complete hua. Iske ilawa 1883 mein Raiwind se Ganda Singh Wala tak railway line bichayi gayi. Kasur shehar ke eastern side se Ferozepur Road guzarti hai jo Lahore se start ho kar via Ganda Singh Wala Ferozepur tak jati hai. Partition ke baad yeh highway international Pak-Bharat border tak limited ho kar reh gayi hai. Yeh road Kasur shehar se Lahore tak approx 55 km aur Indian city Ferozepur tak 25 km hai.
Kasur ka Museum Ferozepur Road par zilai complex ke saamne hai, jo 1999 mein bana. Kasur Museum mein history ke different eras aur culture ki jhalakiyan dekhi ja sakti hain. Is mein archaeological findings se related Chakwal se discover kiye gaye purane trees aur bones ke samples rakhe gaye hain, jin ki age ka estimate 88 lakh se aik crore saal tak kiya jata hai. Iske ilawa Harappa aur Chakwal ke dosre historical sites ki excavations se milne walay pakki mitti ke bartan, theekrian, insani o haiwani mooratiyan, wazan ke pemane aur baatt ke ilawa Gandhara era se related Buddha aur Hindu devi-devtaon ke statues bhi rakhe gaye hain.
Sadiyon purani tradition parcha bafi ke yahan ke julahay Ansari waris hain. Is industry mein kapre ki qism bafta ko khaas importance hasil hai jis mein aik resham ke taar ke saath soot ke aik taar ko buna jata hai. Garam odhniyon mein yahan ke julahay khes bananay mein khas kamal rakhte hain.
Kasur chamre ki industry ke aitbaar se aik important city hai. Janwaron ki khal se chamra bananey ki qadeem industry bhi Kasur city ki special identity hai. Leather industry ki vastness aur age ka अंदाजा is baat se lagaya ja sakta hai ke centuries se fresh geeli khal se mass aur khoon ki smell nikalne, baalon ki safayi waghera se le kar usable sookhe chamre ki tayyari tak ke stages mein jo special chemical material use hota hai, uss se Kasur ki zameen ke neeche maujood pani boht polluted ho chuka hai. Is pani ko peenay aur other zaruriyat mein use karnay ki waja se Kasur mein cancer ke patients ki rate poore country mein sabse zyada hai. Yahan pani ka aik bara treatment plant install kiya gaya hai jo shehar bhar ko peenay ka saaf pani provide karta hai. Is step ki waja se situation ki seriousness mein boht kami aayi.
Kasur ka word Arabic language ke word Qasr ki plural hai jiska meaning mahal hota hai. Kasur city ko Emperor Akbar ke time mein Kandahar ke Pathan amra ne abaad kiya aur yahan apne families ki rehaish ke liye alag alag qila-numa mahalat taameer karwaye. Inhi mahalaat ki waja se Kasur ka naam existence mein aya. Pehle zamane mein inke bare bare darwaze construct kiye gaye the, ab unke sirf remains baqi hain. Yeh palaces baad mein Kot ke naam se famous hue. Boht se Kots ab bhi unhi old names ke saath maujood hain. Jaise Kot Haleem Khan, Kot Fateh Din Khan, Kot Usman Khan, Kot Ghulam Muhammad Khan, Kot Ruknuddin Khan, Kot Murad Khan, Kot Azam Khan, Kot Badaruddin Khan, Kot Peeran, Kot Budha, Kot Mirbaz Khan, Kot Sherbaz Khan, Dhoorkot, Road Kot aur Kot Aligarh etc.
Kasur Lahore Motorway ka inauguration General Pervez Musharraf ne kiya. Yeh 6-lane hai aur Shehbaz Sharif ki leadership mein complete hui. Dar-haqeeqat, yeh Pakistan ki khubsurat tareen roads mein se aik hai. Iske bananey ka main goal India ke saath trade ko promote karna tha. Kasur sheher ko barah koton mein divide kiya gaya tha. Ab yeh city kaafi spread ho chuka hai, ta hum yeh Kot ab bhi available hain. Pehle zamane mein inke bare bare gates banaye gaye the, ab unke sirf nishan hi baqi hain.
Khushab, Darya-e-Jhelum ke western side pe basa hua Punjab province ka aik historical ancient land piece hai. Sarguzar Khushab river, green fields, mountains aur desert se decorated hai. Sadiyon purane historical city Khushab ki tareekh Mohenjo-Daro aur Harappa se bhi purani hai. Khushab Farsi ke do words 'Khush' aur 'Aab' ka mix hai jiske meanings Khush yani 'sukun' ya 'khushi' (local word) aur Aab ka matlab 'pani' hai. Seenah ba seenah chalti traditions ke mutabiq yahan 5000 saal purani Indus Valley Civilization, Gandhara, Taxila jaisi tehzeeb-o-tamaddun ki abad shuda villages mein se aik village tha jahan Vedic Sanskrit aur Hind-Aryai language ke lehje bolay jaate the. Maqdooni hamlawar Sikandar-e-Azam, Arab Hoon, Tatari hamlawar aur kai badshah aaye aur jis ne bhi yahan ka paani piya uske meethay pan ki tareef ki. Yeh traditions Amir Timur, Mehmood Ghaznavi, Babar aur Sher Shah Suri se specially related hain. However, Sher Shah Suri ke reference se related tradition kaafi authentic aur strong maani jati hai ke jab is famous Muslim conqueror ka is area se guzra hua aur stay ke doran jab usne Darya-e-Jhelum ka paani piya toh be-ikhtiyar keh utha 'Khush Aab' aur yun yeh words aam ho kar is area ko aik beautiful name de gaye.
Aik historical city honay ke hawalay se sahi meanings mein iski history bayan karna mushkil hai. Mughal Emperor Babar ne apni autobiography Tuzk-e-Babri mein 15th century AD mein iska zikr kiya hai. Sher Shah Suri ne iss shehr ko sanwarne aur uski construction aur development mein important role play kiya. Markazi Eidgah, Jamia Masjid, Main Bazaar, Shehar Panah ke darwaze aur faseel us zamanay ki important constructions mein se hain. Ek riwayat ke mutabiq shehr Khushab 1503 AD mein abaad hua jabke uske gird faseel 1593 mein mukammal hui. 1809 mein Raja Ranjit Singh ne Khushab par qabza kar liya. Muhammad Shah ke zamanay mein Khushab ka governor Nawab Ahmed Yar tha jiska maqbara Khushab mein maujood hai. Darya-e-Jhelum ke kinare basa yeh shehr la tadaad martaba floods ki zad mein aakar tabah hua. Especially 1849 aur 1893 mein Darya-e-Jhelum mein aanay wali toofani lahron mein Sardar Jafar Khan ka qila, Tara Chand aur Nawab Ahmed Khan ke baghat, faseel aur darwazon ka naam o nishan tak mit gaya. Shehar panah ki faseel ko three times rebuild kiya gaya. First time Sher Shah Suri ne, second time Sardar Lal Khan Baloch ne 1761 mein kachi faseel ko pakka banaya jabke third time 1866 mein Angrez Deputy Commissioner Captain Davies ne naye sire se kuch changes ke saath shehr ka naksha banwa kar faseel ko complete kiya. Iss bar shehr ki deewar mein char bare darwaze, mashriq ki janib Kabli Gate, maghrib ki janib Lahori Gate, shimal ki janib Jhelmi Gate aur janoob ki janib Multani Gate taameer kiye gaye. 1865 mein Deputy Commissioner Captain Davies ne 30 feet wide aur takreeban dedh kilometer lamba bazaar banwaya. Issi bazaar Khushab ke start mein maujood Kabli Gate apni qadeemi shaan o shaukat ka pur-shikoh manzar kuch iss tarah se pesh karta hai ke jaise aap sadiyon purane shehr Khushab mein enter ho rahe hon. Hakoomat-e-Englishia ne iss shehr ka naksha cross style par banaya. 1866 mein Kabli Gate mukammal hua jismein daakh khana aur police chowki qaim ki gai. Aur yeh shehr ki aakhri hadd thi, jabke doosre sire par Lahori Gate tha jahan par ek bara pattan bhi tha. 1945 tak Darya-e-Jhelum shehr ki deewaron ke saath saath behta tha lekin fi zamana darya shehr se door hota chala gaya aur ab takreeban dedh mile door mashriq ki janib beh raha hai. 1700 mein Khushab Jhelum Commisionery ke under tha aur iska headquarter Shahpur tha.
Tuzk-e-Babri mein Babar ne Khushab ka zikr kuch is tarah kiya hai ke: Jumay ka din tha aur Khushab ke basiyon ne meri khidmat mein aik delegation bheja jis ke jawab mein maine Shah Hussain bin Shah Shuja Arghun ka selection kiya ke woh Khushab ja kar wahan ke logon se baat cheet karein. Tuzk-e-Jahangiri mein bhi Khushab ka zikr kuch is tarah se hai: Yeh green aur fertile land hai jis ki income 30 lakh Dam hai.
1857 ki Jang-e-Azadi se only four years pehle, 1853 mein British Crown ke under isey Town Committee ka status mila. Baad mein isey Municipal Committee bana diya gaya. 1867 mein Khushab ko Tehsil ka status mila. 1947 mein Pakistan ke banney ke time Khushab zila Sargodha ki Tehsil tha aur 1982 mein Khushab ko alag zila ka status de diya gaya. Jab isey zila ka status mila toh yeh two Tehsils (Khushab aur Noorpur Thal) par based tha. Ab ismein Tehsil Quaidabad ka izafa ho chuka hai, so zila Khushab four Tehsils (Khushab, Noorpur Thal, Quaidabad aur aik Tehsil Naushehra) par mushtamil hai.
Iski uniqueness is baat mein hai ke yahan green fields, pahar aur sehrai areas hain. Zila Khushab ke log mehnati aur farmers hain. Yahan ki mostly population Awan, Joia aur Baloch qabail se related hai. Yahan ke aksar log army join karne ko dosre professions pe prefer karte hain.
Wadi Soon, Uchhali Jheel, Khabeki Jheel, Kunti Garden, Mela Mandi Khushab, Mela Noorpur Thal, Mela Syed Al Maroof, Mela Baba Choora Faqeer R.A. Okhli Mohalla, Urs Baani Okhli Mohalla Baba Sheikh Mehar Ali R.A., Urs Baba Mian Naanga R.A. Okhli Mohalla, Qabar Ashabi Rasool Okhli Mohalla, Okhli Mohalla ka historical qabristan, Urs Baba Faqeer Ashab Okhli Mohalla, Jamia Masjid Gulzar Madina Kakranwali Okhli Mohalla, Markazi Jamia Masjid Bilal Okhli Mohalla. Sakesar Base, Pakistan Atomic Energy Commission Plant Grot. Khushab buzurgon ki zameen hai. Sab se zyada famous mazarat mein Darbar Badshahon aur Darbar Syed Al Maroof shamil hain. Darbar Baani Okhli Mohalla Baba Sheikh Mehar Ali R.A., Darbar Baba Mian Naanga R.A. Okhli Mohalla, Qabar Ashabi Rasool Okhli Mohalla shamil hain.
Hama-jihat geographical features: Tehsil Khushab aur Quaidabad plains hain, Tehsil Naushehra hilly hai aur Tehsil Noorpur Thal desert area hai. Tehsil Quaidabad ka aik hi village Okhli Mohalla hai jo mountain ke alawa almost sab zameenon se ghira hua hai. Is mein retili, maidani, chikni, pathreeli aur ratti waghera shamil hain.
Khushab ki sab se important saughaat Dhoda mithayi hai. Yeh aik mithayi hai jo yahan generation after generation banayi jati hai aur apne taste mein be-misaal hai.
Zila Khushab ke bare mauza jaat mein Okhli Mohalla, Hadali, Rhoda, Mitha Tiwana, Atra aur Ahmadal Goliwali shamil hain. Padhraar, Peel, Kath Sakhral Mangwal Dewal Jaswal Nali, Naari Khaliqabad, Khabeki, Anga Kufri, Kora Sundral, Name Wali, Hadali, Botalla, Lakko, Kaati Maar yeh bhi important mauza jaat hain. In mauza jaat ki nishandahi Shakeel Ahmed Awan ne ki hai.
Muridke, Lahore ke paas GT Road par aik chota sheher hai. Jo Sheikhupura district mein hai. Muridke se connected village Nangal Sahdan mein Jamaat-ud-Dawa ka educational project Markaz Tayyaba located hai jis ki waja se yeh sheher global media ki attention ka center bana rehta hai. Markaz Tayyaba ko military organization Lashkar-e-Taiba ka HQ bhi kaha jata hai.
Bright Future College Muridke ka famous institution hai jo pichle 15 saal se commerce ki education de raha hai aur Muridke mein commerce ki education denay wala pehla idara hai.
Ab Muridke bhi bare shehron ki tarah develop kar raha hai. Recreational parks ban chukey hain. Best quality ke restaurants, parks aur bazaars ban chuke hain. Literacy rate mein bhi kafi increase hua hai. International standard ke schools, colleges aur academies ban gayi hain.
Haji Muhammad Rice & Processing Mills, Malik Rais Mills, Millat Bone Crushing Factory, Ghulam Mustafa Rice & Processing Mills, Hanan Rice Mills, Umair Rice Processors, Umair Livestock.
Multan Pakistan ke sooba Punjab ka aik important city hai aur junubi Punjab ka political aur cultural hub hai. Yeh sheher Darya-e-Chenab ke kinare basa hai. Abadi ke lihaaz se yeh Pakistan ka 5th largest city hai. Yahan Saraiki majority mein hain. Yeh Divisional Headquarter, zila Multan aur tehsil Multan ka sadar maqam bhi hai. Baqi tehsilon mein Sadar Multan, Tehsil Shujabad aur Tehsil Jalalpur Pirwala shamil hain.
Ek qaum jiska naam Mali tha yahan aakar abad hui aur Sanskrit mein abad hone ko Asthan kehte hain, yun iska naam Mali Asthan parh gaya jo rafta rafta Mali Tan ban gaya phir waqt ke saath saath Mali Tan, Multan aur ab Multan ban gaya hai. Alexander bin Faiqulus ke zamanay mein yeh Mali qaum ka darul-khilafa tha. Issi Mali qaum ki nisbat se iska naam Mali Tan parha. General Cunningham ki raye mein Multan ki wajah-e-tasmiya Mol Devta yani Suraj ka mandir hai. 714 AD mein jab Muhammad Qasim Saqafi ne is sheher ko fateh kiya toh woh mandir maujood tha. Balazari ne 875 AD mein bhi Suraj ke but ka zikr kiya. Ibn Hauqal ne 976 AD mein kehta hai ke but aadmi ki shakal ka tha. Iske baad jab Qaramta ka amal dakhal hua toh mandir ki jagah masjid banayi gayi lekin uss mandir ke aasaar aaj bhi maujood hain.
Multan ki history ki baat karein toh 327 BC mein Jhelum aur Gujarat ki conquest ke baad Alexander ki army thakawat ki wajah se mazeed aage nahi barhna chahti thi, lekin Alexander ne apni army ko aage barhne ka order diya. Unhein wealth ka lalaj diya, fertile lands par qabze ki umeed dilayi. Yeh army Multan ki taraf barhi. Yahan Maloi qaum abad thi jin ki bravery aur shujaat ki stories pheeli hui thin. Jab Alexandrian forces Multan par attack kiya toh is qaum ne dat kar muqabla kiya. Iss campaign ke doran Alexander ki kamar mein teer laga jo reerh ki haddi mein pierce ho gaya. Hukama ki koshishon ke bawajood yeh teer nahi nikal saka, is par unhon ne teer ka kuch hissa cut kar diya taake Alexander jang continue rakh sake. However, kuch days baad Multan conquer ho gaya. Yahan Greek army ne apne king ke injured honay ka bhayanak revenge liya ke shehar mein kisi ko zinda nahi chora.
Islami history ki baat ki jae toh Multan ko sabse pehle 712 AD mein Muhammad bin Qasim ne conquer kiya aur Islamic empire ki foundation rakhi. Muhammad bin Qasim ke baad 997 AD mein Mehmood Ghaznavi ne Hindustan ko conquer karne ke saath Multan ko bhi fateh kiya aur ussey apni government mein shamil kiya. 571 Hijri, means 1175 AD mein Sultan Shahabuddin Muhammad Ghori ne Khusro Malik ko defeat de kar Multan par qabza kar liya. Sultan Ghori ke baad bohot saare families ne isko apna capital banaye rakha, jin mein Slave Dynasty, Khalji Dynasty, Tughlaq Dynasty, Sayyid Dynasty, Lodhi Dynasty aur phir Mughal Empire ke rulers tak Multan Muslim empire ka part raha. 1857 ki Jang-e-Azadi ke baad Britishers ne Multan par complete control kar liya, aur 1947 tak British Empire ke control mein raha. Azadi ke baad yeh Pakistan ka hissa bana.
Multan ki history mein Qila Multan ki bohot importance hai. Multan ki tareekh bohot purani hai. Iska shumar dunya ke qadeem tareen shehron mein hota hai. Bohat se sheher abaad hue magar waqt ki gardish ka shikar ho kar khatam ho gaye, lekin sheher Multan hazaron saal pehle bhi alive tha aur aaj bhi alive hai. Multan ko duniya se khatam karne ki koshish karne wale sainkaron hamlawar khud nest-o-nabood ho gaye. Aaj unka naam lenay wala koi nahi magar Multan aaj bhi apne poore respect ke saath zinda hai.
Multan ke bare mein jis hasti ne yeh lafani shair kaha, woh hasti khud kya thi? Uska apna maqam aur martaba kya tha? Aur usne insaniyat ke liye kya kya services provide keen? Is baat ki tafseel ke liye aik article nahi balkay kai books ki zaroorat hai. Hazrat Bahauddin Zakariya ki shakhsiyat aur services baray kuch books market se toh mil jaati hain magar un mein mentioned articles ki value superficial hai. Zakariya Saeen ko naye sire se janne aur naye sire se discover karne ki zaroorat hai. Ghous-ul-Alameen, Sheikh-ul-Islam Hazrat Bahauddin Zakariya Multani 27 Ramadan 566 Hijri ko Hazrat Makhdoom Wajihuddin Muhammad Ghous ke ghar paida hue. Choti umar mein walid majid ka inteqal ho gaya. Yateemi ki haalat mein education aur training ke stages complete hue aur ain jawani mein safar-e-sulook par nikal pare. Baghdad pahunch kar Hazrat Shahabuddin Suhrawardi R.A. se rohani faiz hasil kiya. Suhrawardi Saeen ne khirqa-e-khilafat ata farmaya aur apko Multan pahunch kar deen ke liye kaam karne ki targheeb di. Multan mein un dino Hindus ka ghalba tha aur Prahlad Ji khud toh muwahid the aur Khuda ka inkar karne wale apne badshah baap se jung bhi ki, magar Prahlad Ji ki wafat ke sainkaron saal baad unke mandir par but-parast ghalib aa gaye aur Prahlad Ji ka mandir Hindu mazhab ka markaz bana hua tha. Multan pahunch kar aapne preaching start kar di. Prahlad mandir ke mutwalliyon ke ghair-insani ravayyon se nalan log jhund ke jhund Hazrat ki khidmat mein pahunch kar daaira-e-Islam mein daakhil hone lage. Aapne shuru mein Madrasat-ul-Islam qaim kiya aur baad mein ussey dunya ki sabse bari pehli residential university ki status di. Aapne education ke saath preaching ka silsila shuru kiya. Jo baat mein kehna chahta hun woh yeh hai ke aaj deen sikhane ke liye kisi ne bistar aur kisi ne Kalashnikov utha li hai, iske muqablay mein Hazrat Bahauddin Zakariya Multani R.A. ne kya tareeqa-e-kaar ikhtiyar kiya? Yeh ghaur talab hai.
Usi zamane mein Darya-e-Ravi Multan ke ancient qile ke saath behta tha aur usse bandargah ki status hasil thi. Kashtiyon ke zariye sirf Sukkur, Bhakkar hi nahi Mansoorah, Iraq, Iran, Egypt, Kabul, Delhi aur Deccan tak ki trade hoti thi. Is tarah Multan ko dunya ka aik bohot bara educational, commercial aur religious center ka status mila aur sirf Hindustan hi nahi balkay poori dunya mein Hazrat Bahauddin Zakariya Multani R.A. ka naam aur message pahuncha. Aapke message se lakhs of people converted to Islam aur aapne logon ke dilon mein is tarah ghar bana liya ke 8 sadiyan guzarne ke bawajood aaj bhi lakhon log nangay paon aur sir ke bal chal kar aapke shrine par haazri dete hain aur aqeedat ke phool nichhawar karte hain.
Mere saamne Multan ke famous artist Saeen Zameer Hashmi ke kuch artworks maujood hain. In artworks mein Qila Multan ki qadeemat ko pencil work ke through highlight karnay ki koshish ki gayi hai. Qile ki deewarain dikhayi gayi hain. Prahlad mandir ka naksha demolition se pehle ki shape mein hai aur Shah Rukn-e-Alam ka darbar bhi decorated hai. Qila Multan kitna old hai? Is bare mein kehte hain ke yeh 5000 saal purana hai lekin ho sakta hai ke yeh is se bhi ancient ho. Is baat par sab historians agree karte hain ke Multan aur Qila Multan ka existence pre-historic mythological era se bhi pehle ka hai. Afsosnaak baat yeh hai ke hamlawaron ne hamesha is qile ko target kiya aur isey fateh karnay ke baad khoob loot-maar hoti rahi magar isey restore karnay ki situation nahi ban saki. 1200 BC mein Dara ne isey destroy kiya. 325 BC mein Sikandar-e-Azam ne is par attack kiya phir Arab, Afghan, Sikh aur Angrez hamlawaron ne ancient Qila Multan ko barbad karnay mein koi kasar nahi chori. Ab Multan ke residents aur Saraiki waseeb ke sab logon ka farz hai ke woh apni previous mistakes par ghaur karein aur apne waseeb ke saath hone wali 5000 saal ki injustices ka compensation karein aur apni azmat-e-rafta ko regain karein. History humein batati hai ke Multan aik sheher hi nahi aik civilization aur aik empire ka naam bhi hai. 372 Hijri ki book Hudood-ul-Alam bin al-Mashriq ila al-Maghrib mein Multan ki boundaries baray likha hai ke Qannauj ke Raja aur Amir Multan ki borders Jalandhar par khatam hoti thin. Sair-ul-Mutakhireen mein Iqleem Multan ki boundaries is tarah bayan ki gayi hain ke Multan first, second aur third Iqleem se zyada bara hai kyunki Thatta is sooba par zyada hua hai. Ferozepur se Sewistan tak 430 Kos lamba aur Chittor se Jaisalmer tak 108 Kos chora hai. Dosri taraf Kech aur Makran tak 660 Kos hai. Iska east side Sirhind Sarkar se mila hua hai, north mein Darya-e-Shor mein aur south mein Ajmer province mein hai aur west mein Kech aur Makran hain.
Abul Fazal ne apni famous book Ain-e-Akbari mein Multan ki boundaries yeh bayan ki hain: Sooba Multan ke saath Thatta ke attachment se pehle yeh sooba Firozpur se Sewistan tak 624 karoh tha. Width mein Khatpur se Jaisalmer tak 621 karoh tha. Thatta ke attachment ke baad yeh sooba Kech aur Makran tak expand ho gaya, iska yeh distance 660 karoh tha. East mein iski borders Sirhind Sarkar se, north mein Peshawar se, south mein Ajmer ke soobay aur west mein Kech Makran se milti thin. Kech aur Makran pehle sooba Sindh mein shamil the. Multan ke soobay mein teen sarkarein Multan Khas, Dipalpur aur Bhakkar thin aur total 88 paragnay (districts) the. Multan ki vastness aur greatness par history aaj bhi envy karti hai. Multan ki ancientness ke barabar dunya mein shayad hi koi sheher ho. Pakistan mein jin shehron ko artificial tarike se Multan se kai guna bare sheher banaya gaya hai, aaj se kuch 100 saal pehle yeh Multan ki suburban bastiyan thin.
Gard ka matlab hai ke yahan andhiyan boht aati hain. Garma ka matlab hai ke garmi boht hoti hai. Gada ka matlab hai ke yahan Allah wale boht log hain aur Goristan ka matlab hai ke yahan qabristan boht hain. Garmi ke hawalay se Garma ki baat ko chor kar researchers ko is baat par ghaur karna chahiye ke dunya ke rich city, dunya ki boht bari tehzeeb, 2nd oldest ancient city aur dunya ki big empire ko Goristan mein kis ne convert kiya?
Aik time tha jab yeh saltanat samandar tak pheeli hui thi aur Aroos-ul-Balad Lahore uska aik suburban area hota tha. Sahiwal, Pakpattan, Okara, Mian Channu, Khanewal, Lodhran, Muzaffargarh aur Bhakkar sab uske ilaqay the. Magar yeh historical sheher rafta rafta divide hota gaya. Historical empire sooba Multan aur aaj teen tehsilon tak limited ho gaya hai.
Is sheher ko Auliya-e-Karam ka sheher kehte hain because yahan kafi tadaad mein Auliya aur Sufis ke mazarat hain. Famous mazarat mein Huzoor Syedna Yusuf Shah Gardezi R.A. ka mazar sharif top par hai. Aap ke baray mein famous scholar-e-Ahle Sunnat Hazrat Abdul Haq Muhaddis Dehlvi R.A. ne apni book Akhbar-ul-Akhyar mein testify kiya hai ke aap wafat ke baad bhi qabar sharif se haath bahar nikal kar bay'at lete the aur abhi tak woh nishan baaqi hai jahan se mubarak haath qabar sharif se bahar aata tha. Aur bohot se Auliya-e-Karam ke mazarat yahan par hain. Suburbs mein Hazrat Makhdoom Abdul Rasheed Haqqani R.A. Shah Sahab Vihari Road, Hazrat Pir Syed Sakhi Sultan Ali Akbar R.A. ka mazar bhi hai jo Suraj Miani Road par hai. Iska naam Pak Gate is waja se hai ke is se 300 feet andar ki taraf aik buzurg Sheikh Syed Abul Hisab Musa Pak Shaheed ka mazar hai, jo Syed Hamid Bakhsh Gilani ke son the.
Multan se National Assembly ki 6 seats hain jiski list below hai.
Mandi Bahauddin, Punjab province mein aik old aur historical city hai aur zilai sadar maqam bhi hai. Mandi Bahauddin ka naam jo qadeem zamane mein Chak Number 51 ke naam se jana jata tha, do sources se derived hua: Mandi aik prefix tha kyunki yeh ghalla mandi tha aur Bahauddin aik Sufi buzurg the jinka maqbara Pindi Bahauddin ke old village mein ya uske qareeb hai. Yeh North Punjab, Pakistan ka aik city hai. Yeh zila Mandi Bahauddin ka capital bhi hai. Mandi Bahauddin 2017 census ke according population ke hisaab se Pakistan ka 41st largest city hai. Yeh city sea level se approx 220 meters high hai aur Central Punjab mein Darya-e-Jhelum (north 12 km) aur Chenab (south 39 km) ke beech mein located hai.
Written records ke mutabiq Mandi Bahauddin ki history 326 BC ki hai jab Hydaspes River (Darya-e-Jhelum) ki jang historical personality Alexander the Great aur Puruva empire ke local ruler Raja Porus ke darmiyan Jhelum ke southern bank par waqai gaon Mong mein lari gayi thi. Darya Youani Hydaspes, shehar Mandi Bahauddin se takreeban 8 km north-west mein. Although iss jang ke natije mein Greeks ki victory phir bhi severe resistance ki wajah se hui, lekin yeh Alexander ke daur ki last bari larai sabit hui. Is jang ke natije mein Alexander ne modern-day Mong ke place par do shehron Nicaea (victory) ki bunyad rakhi aur modern-day Phalia ke place par Bucephala. Bucephalus Alexander ke pyare ghoray ka naam tha jo ya toh jang ke doran ya thakawat aur burhapay ke foran baad mar gaya. Yeh jang Subcontinent ko ancient Greek political (Seleucid, Greco-Bactrian, Indo-Greek) aur cultural influences (Graeco-Buddhist art) ke liye open karnay ke liye historically important hai, jiska effect kai sadiyon tak jari raha.
Aik aur important war 1849 mein Sikhs aur British army ke beech Chillianwala mein lari gayi. Jo present-day Mandi Bahauddin district ka aik town aur Union Council hai. Isey history mein Second Anglo-Sikh War ke naam se jana jata hai. Is jung ke baad poora Punjab British Raj ki zad mein aa gaya. War memorial ab bhi wahan hai jise Gora Qabristan (British graveyard) ke naam se jana jata hai. Chillianwala ke paas Rakh Minar mein is jung mein kaam aanay wale kai British officers aur sipahi buried hain.
1506 mein Sufi Sahab Bahauddin, Pindi Shah Jahanian se is area mein aaye toh unhon ne aik basti ki bunyad rakhi jiska naam Pindi Bahauddin rakha gaya jise ab Purani Pindi ke naam se jana jata hai. 19th century mein yeh area British government ke under aya. Is area mein kuch land barren aur khali pari thi. Hindustan mein Muslims ke rule ke time mein is area mein koi khaas progress nahi hui. British colonial rule ki taraf tezi se barhte hue, Angrezon ne World War I ke baad Subcontinent mein new settlements di aur introduce karwayi. Unhon ne railway ka aik bara network bichhaya aur revenue aur defense purposes ke liye canal colonies ki bunyad rakhi. Is region ke kuch areas jinhein Gondal Bar bhi kehte hain dry aur barren pare the. Isliye is cultivable land ki fertility aur wealth ko restore karnay aur revenues ko increase karnay ke liye aik great irrigation project ka survey kiya gaya aur manual work ke through uspe amal kiya gaya. Lower Jhelum Canal ka main channel 1902 mein khoda gaya aur us mein pani chora gaya aur uss se area ko irrigate kiya gaya. Area ki chakbandi ki gayi. 51 chaks banaye gaye aur land un logon mein divide ki gayi jinhon ne British Empire ke liye kaam kiya tha. Area ko Gondal Bar ka naam diya gaya. Chak Number 51 central chak qaraar paya jo aaj Mandi Bahauddin ke naam se famous hai. Plan ke mutabiq iski construction ki gayi aur yahan par grain mandi establish ki gayi. 20th century ke start mein Muslim, Hindu aur Sikh traders aur landlords yahan aakar settle hone lage. Iske ilawa Angrezon ne 1916 mein modern-day Mandi Bahauddin city ke center mein Pindi Bahauddin Railway Station establish kiya. The mentioned railway system north se unki British Empire ke defense ke liye banaya gaya tha. Isliye isey North Western Railway ke naam se bhi jana jata tha.
1916 mein British Government ne apne defensive aur commercial interest mein Pindi Bahauddin Railway Station qaim kiya. 1920 mein Chak Number 51 ko Mandi Bahauddin (Market Bahauddin) ka naam denay ka announce kiya gaya. 1923 mein town ko master plan ke according rebuild karte hue streets aur roads ko straight aur wide kiya gaya. 1924 mein Pindi Bahauddin Railway Station ka naam Mandi Bahauddin rakha gaya. 1937 mein Town Committee ka darja diya gaya aur 1941 mein Municipal Committee bana diya gaya. 1946 mein 9 gates aur four-walled boundary construct ki gayi.
Partition ke baad jab Sikh aur Hindu India migrate kar gaye toh Muslims ki bari population migrate kar k yahan aakar settle hui. 1960 mein is sheher ko sub-division ka status diya gaya. 1963 mein Sindh Taas Irrigation project ke under Rasul Barrage aur Rasul Qadirabad Link Canal project start hua. Is project ka management WAPDA ne kiya aur Mandi Bahauddin se kuch kilometers ke faasle par sarkari mulazmeen aur foreign contractors ke liye aik bari colony construct ki gayi. Yeh project 1968 mein Engineer Riaz-ur-Rehman Sharif ne as director yeh project complete kiya. Is project ne Mandi Bahauddin ko roshni di aur sheher ko commercially grow hone mein help di. Eventually, us waqt ke Chief Minister Punjab Mian Manzoor Ahmed Khan Wattoo ke tenure mein 1st July 1993 ko isey alag zila ka status diya gaya.
Partition ke baad Hindustan ke thousands of migrants Sikh aur Hindu landlords ki empty properties par re-settle hue. Recently, Rasul Barrage ki construction ke baad, Salt Range ke southern edge ke saath patti se Pind Dadan Khan tak aur Darya-e-Jhelum ke us paar ke dosre areas ke log town mein aakar settle hue. Migration aur business activities mein increase ki wajah se yeh qasba har taraf fail gaya hai. The result is that more than half of the population is living outside municipal limits without any urban facility. Daily mazeed unplanned areas aur kachi abadiyan saamne aa rahi hain. Rural areas se urban centers ki taraf janay ka trend barh raha hai.
Attached villages ke log apni needs ki shopping ke liye city ka rukh karte hain aur is dusty city mein bright lights dekhte hain. Gadha gaarion se le kar heavy vehicles kisi bhi road par andha-dhund daurti nazar aati hain. Encroachments aur tezi se barhti hui traffic ki wajah se rasta narrow ho gaya hai. Mostly cross junctions jaise Hospital Chowk, Garha Chowk, Sat Sra Chowk, College Chowk aur do railway crossings always busy rehte hain aur traffic signals nahi hain.
Sugar mills ne farm-to-mill road banayi jise city se taluq na rakhne wali traffic ke liye bypass ke tor par use kiya ja sakta hai. Lekin is se benefit nahi liya ja raha hai kyunki heavy traffic ko 20 feet wide metallic road ki taraf divert karne ka koi intizam nahi hai. Is agricultural mandi walay qasbay mein slow aur fast chalne wali traffic ka mix, footpaths ki kami, parking facilities, bus aur wagon terminals ki maujoodgi aur kai rickshaw stands ne situation ko mazeed kharab kar diya hai. Yeh Grand Trunk Road se door located hai lekin Pind Dadan Khan, Jhelum, Kharian, Lala Musa, Gujarat, Gujranwala aur Sargodha ke saath railway aur achhay road network se connected hai.
Lala Musa-Sargodha-Khanewal Railway aik profitable route hai. Is waqt is route par sirf aik Peshawar-Karachi train (Chenab Express) chalti hai. Passengers ke liye atleast aik aur Peshawar-Karachi Express train introduce karwana useful ho sakta hai, area mein produce hone wali agricultural products aur Salt Range se hasil hone wali kuch minerals. Yeh track Khewra Salt Mines se bhi connected hai. Furthermore, Peshawar-Lahore-Karachi main railway track ko kisi bhi danger ki situation mein yeh track strategically important hai. Is situation mein Lala Musa-Sargodha-Khanewal rail route saari rail traffic ko handle kar sakta hai.
Yeh zila Chaj Doab ka aik central part banata hai jo Darya-e-Jhelum aur Chenab ke darmiyan hai. Yeh 30° 8' se 32° 40' N aur 73° 36' se 73° 37' E tak located hai. Tehsil Headquarters Phalia aur Malakwal ke sheher Mandi Bahauddin se respectively 22.5 aur 28.5 kilometers ke faasle par hain. Iski border north mein Darya-e-Jhelum se hai, jo isey zila Jhelum se alag karti hai. West mein zila Sargodha; south mein Darya-e-Chenab ke kinare jo isey Gujranwala aur Hafizabad zilon se alag karta hai; aur east mein zila Gujarat. Zila ka total area 2673 square kilometers hai. Yeh zila Mandi Bahauddin, Tehsil Phalia aur Tehsil Malakwal par mushtamil hai.
Pakistan ke 1998 census ke mutabiq, city ki population 1,160,552 record ki gayi jabke 2017 ke Pakistan census ke mutabiq, city ki population 19 saalon mein 99.62% se zyada ke izafay ke saath 198,609 ho gayi. Mandi Bahauddin zila ki population 2017 census ke mutabiq 1,593,292 record ki gayi thi. Mandi Bahauddin mein male voters ki total count 370,528 aur female voters ki tadaad 278,521 hai. Zila ki annual population growth rate 1.87% aur urban ratio 15.2% hai. Mandi Bahauddin ki total population ka approx 99.1% Muslim, 0.6% Christian aur 0.2% Ahmadi hain. Yahan par Gondal, Ranjha aur Gujjar community ki majority hai, inke saath sath Arain, Mughal, Rana, Sheikh aur Jat community bhi settled hain.
Is zila ka climate moderate hai, garmiyon mein garam aur sardiyon mein sard. Garmiyon mein din ke waqt temperature 48°C tak barh sakta hai, lekin sardiyon ke mahinon mein minimum temperature 3°C se neeche drop kar sakta hai. Zila mein average rainfall 388 mm hai aur basically yahan ka weather Islamabad jaisa hai.
Zila ka sadar maqam Mandi Bahauddin tehsil headquarter bhi hai. Mandi Bahauddin ko 1941 mein Municipal Committee level tak upgrade kiya gaya. Punjab Local Government Ordinance 2001 ke nifaz ke baad isey Municipal Committee ka darja diya gaya. Tehsil Mandi Bahauddin ki Municipal Committee ko teen tehsilon aur 80 Union Councils mein divide kiya gaya hai.
Zila ki main languages hain: Punjabi, 97% population ki first language; Urdu - 2.5%, Pashto 0.5% aur Saraiki 0.5%. Zila ke main professions mein 40.7% agricultural workers shamil hain. Primary occupations 40%; service workers 6.5%, handicrafts aur related trade 4.2%; professionals 3.1% aur machine operators 2.4%.
Yahan ki zameen boht fertile hai. Aur canal system bhi behtar hai. Yahan ke zyada tar log farming se related hain. Important crops wheat, rice, sugarcane, potato, tobacco hain jabke charay ke liye Jowar, Bajra, Maize aur Berseem waghera ki cultivation bhi hoti hai.
Shah Taj Sugar Mills Pakistan ke bare sugar plants mein se aik hai. Yeh city se approx 2 km west mein located hai. Iske sub-offices Lahore aur Karachi mein hain. Company ko Pakistan Stock Exchange ne 1982, 1984 aur 1988 mein three times Top Company ka award diya tha. Iske ilawa zila bhar mein hundreds of flour mills aur rice mills hain jahan se poore Pakistan mein chawal aur gehun ka atta bheja jata hai.
Is city ko lawyers aur judges ka sheher bhi kehte hain coz yahan zyada tar students law ki taraf interested hote hain aur is city ke lawyers apko almost har jagah milenge. Is city mein waise toh boht se private aur govt educational institutions hain, lekin Government College of Technology jo is city ke paas hi Rasul mein hai, woh place ke hisaab se bhi sabse bara aur old college hai jo Pakistan banne se bhi pehle exist karta tha. Shehar ke kuch notable educational institutions below hain jin mein sarkari schools, semi-sarkari schools, charity schools aur private schools shamil hain.
Mianwali, sooba Punjab ka aik important city aur zila hai. 1902 mein Mianwali ko zila bana kar Punjab mein shamil kar diya gaya jo pehle Bannu ki tehsil hua karta tha. Yahan ke zyada tar log Saraiki aur Pashto language bolte hain. Mianwali district ki borders Attock, Kohat, Karak, Lakki Marwat, Dera Ismail Khan, Bhakkar, Khushab aur Talagang se milti hain. Mianwali district ki teen tehsils hain jin mein Tehsil Mianwali, Tehsil Isa Khel aur Tehsil Piplan shamil hain. Mianwali mein Pathan zyada tadaad mein abad hain. Pathanon mein Niazi aur Khattak tribes settled hain. Awan, Baloch bhi kaseer tadaad mein settled hain. Yahan ke bahadur logon ki kaseer tadaad Pakistan Army mein shamil hoti hai. Mianwali district 5840 square kilometers area par phela hua hai.
Socially, Mianwali district kyunki Bannu ka hissa raha hai, toh yahan ke log tribes mein divide sadiyon se chalay aa rahe hain. Yahan ki sabse qadeem language Saraiki hai jo yahan ke ancient residents ki language chali aa rahi hai. 17th aur 18th century mein yahan Pashto language ke log settle hue toh un par local language ne chaap laga di, however, ab bhi kuch areas Pashto language par mushtamil hain.
Dr. Liaquat Ali Khan Niazi ki book Tareekh Mianwali mein Muhammad Saleem Ahsan likhte hain, Mianwali ke kai names hain. Historically, iska naam Dhunwan tha jo Arabicized ho kar Shabwan bana. Isey Ramnagar aur Satnam ka naam bhi mila hai. Author of Tareekh Niazi Qabail, Muhammad Iqbal Khan Tajakhel ne apni book mein likha hai ke Mianwali ka aik naam Greek era mein Saingoon bhi tha. Unka kehna tha ke Mianwali kisi period mein Greek occupation mein raha aur Alexander the Great ki realm mein capital tha. Darya-e-Sindh ke kinare abad honay ki wajah se Kachhi bhi kehlayya. 1861 mein jab Bannu district bana toh Kachhi ka office Bilokhel mein tha. Sardar Muhammad Hayat Khan Khattar apni book Hayat-e-Afghan 1865 mein likhte hain ke yeh area river bank par honay ki wajah se Kachhi bhi kehlayya aur abhi tak isi yani Kachhi ke naam se famous hai. Grier Sun daryai mitti se bani hui zameen ko bhi likhte hain. Darasal Lachhi darya ki dast-burd ka area hai. Darya-e-Sindh ka eastern kinara historically floods ka target raha. Is regard se Kachhi ka area Darya-e-Sindh ki fertile mitti ki wajah se bohot green aur populated tha. Aik tradition ke according Mughal Emperor Akbar ke time mein 1584 mein Sheikh Jalaluddin apne bete Mian Ali ke saath Baghdad se Hindustan aaye for tabligh aur ishaat-e-deen ki khatir.
Tareekh Mianwali mein Professor Dr. Muhammad Aslam Malik apne article mein likhte hain ke Sindh 91/90 Hijri (712/711 AD) mein fateh ho kar Islamic empire mein shamil hua. Kayi sadiyon tak Islamic empire ka part raha. Yahin se Hindustan ke dosre areas ko conquer karnay ki efforts ki gayin. Although koi notable area fateh ho kar Islamic Sindh mein enter nahi hua.
Mianwali Pakistan ke un unique areas mein shamil hai jahan do civilizations ka milaap hota hai. Aik taraf Pashto speaking log aur doosri taraf Saraiki bolne wale qabail. Lekin yahan ke customs, lifestyle Pathanon ke jang-ju aur Rajputs ke jang-ju qabail (jo past ki aik boht wide history rakhne wali qaum hain) ke beech aik best friendly environment mein parwaan charhi hain. Auraton ki parda-dari aur wafa. Mardon mein mehnati, sakht jaan aur apne watan se mohabbat karne wale jazbe ke logon ki dharti hai. Ghoron ke shauqeen aur unique dance unka junoon raha hai lekin last kuch time se yahan par original culture se hat kar different trends bhi nazar aa rahe hain.
Niazi qabile ka taluq Lodhi (wohi Lodhi Shahukhel family jinhon ne Hindustan par rule kiya) se tha. Inhi Lodhi family se Sher Shah Suri ka bhi connection tha. Suri, Niazi, Marwat, Daulat Khel Nawabin Tank aur Mian Khel yeh sab Pashtuns ke Lodhi qabile ki sub-branches hain. Niazi qabail ke log Hindustan mein Amir Timur ke saath enter hue. Baad mein 15th century mein yahan settle hue. Yeh pehle Pashtun qabile the jo is area mein aaye aur Jats aur Hindus ko nikal bahar kiya. Is qabile ke ruins aur remains aaj bhi Delhi ke surrounding areas mein hain jin mein especially Isa Khan Niazi ka maqbara hai jo aaj bhi Humayun ke maqbare ke saath hai. Is qaum ki first settlement Delhi mein thi aur Pashtuns ki first aur early rule ke time mein wahan settle the, magar Mughals ke hathon defeat khane ke baad yeh is area mein dosri Afghan qaumon ke saath Darya-e-Sindh ke kinare settle ho gaye aur time to time aur Niazi qabail Afghanistan se aakar abad hote gaye.
Afghanistan mein aaj bhi Niazi qabail ki achhi khaasi population hai. Iske ilawa Lakki Marwat, Kohat, Hangu, Dera Ismail Khan, Zhob, Loralai aur Quetta mein bhi Niazi abad hain jo abhi tak Pashto bolte hain, jabke Mianwali mein bhi kuch Niazi qabile Pashto bolte hain jin mein Baahi, Sultan Khel aur Buri Khel top par hain.
Niazi qabile ke famous people mein se kuch yeh hain: Isa Khan Niazi (advisor Sher Shah Suri), Haibat Khan Niazi (Governor Punjab aur General). Imran Khan Niazi (Prime Minister Pakistan), Munir Niazi (famous Urdu poet), Admiral Karamat Rahman Niazi (former Chief of Pakistan Navy) etc.
1336 mein Sindh ke Sama hukmarano ke zawaal ke baad Sama family ki hukmarani shuru hui to unho ne Koh-e-Makli ke daaman mein ek shehr basaaya jiska naam Samooi rakha. Yeh Sama saltanat ke rulers ka pehla capital tha. Baad azan unho ne Koh-e-Makli se 6 mile junoob ki simt mein Koh-e-Makli ke pushte par Qila Tughlaqabad banaya jise ab Kalla Kot kehte hain. Usi qile ko unho ne paya-e-takht bana liya. Taqriban 900 Hijri, matlab 1495 ke around, Sama saltanat ke hukmaran Nizamuddin alias Jaam Nando ne Samooi aur Kalla Kot ke beech ke ilaqa mein Thatta ke naam se dobara aabaad kiya aur capital idhar shift kar liya. Saahib-e-Tohfatul Karam ki statement ke mutabiq, Thatta ki nayi taameer aur foundation mein Nizamuddin Jaam Nando ne najumiyo (astrologers) se help li thi aur kaha tha k: Ek new shehr as a capital bananay k liye aisi zameen select ki jaye jo khushgawar ho, jiske rehne wale kam ya ziyada aaraam pasand hon, hamesha sair-o-tafreeh mein zindagi guzaarein aur unki nature mein perfection aur ability ki quality shamil ho. Isi liye, in qualities aur characteristics ko dekhte hue Thatta ki zameen choose ki gayi. Jiske east mein kuch gardens thay aur shehr ke center mein Mir Bahar rehte thay. Present Thatta city Koh-e-Makli ke daaman mein old city ke khandaron pe basa hai.
Sindh ki political history mein Thatta ka zikr kai baar aaya hai. Thatta aur uske aas paas ke ilaakon mein Arab conquerors pehli baar Umavi Khalifa Abdul Malik bin Marwan ke daur mein aaye aur Muhammad bin Qasim ne Aroor ki campaign ke liye Thatta ke paas hi Darya-e-Sindh cross kiya. Yeh area pehle Umavi Khilafat aur baad mein Abbasi Khilafat ke amilon ke under raha.
Ghaznavi Empire ke famous ruler Sultan Mehmood Ghaznavi ne 1026 mein Abbasi Khalifa Al-Qadir Billah Al-Abbasi ke amilon ko Multan aur Uch se nikaal bahar kiya. 1026 mein Ghaznavi wazeer Abdul Razzaq ne Sultan Mehmood Ghaznavi ke order ke according Thatta aur Sevistan ke neighboring areas aur nations ko conquer kar liya aur Arabs ko Sindh se bhaga diya. Thatta par Ghaznavi family ka kabza 1183 tak raha jo total 157 saal ka period banta hai.
1183 mein Thatta par se Ghaznavi rule khatam hua to Thatta mein law-and-order ka problem start ho gaya. Yeh time bohot hi mushkil tha. Is daur ki be-amni ki bari wajah shayad ye thi ke Thatta ke officials aur awaam dono ne hi politics mein hissa lena shuru kar diya tha, for example, Tughlaq khandaan ke daur-e-hukumat mein Hindu public apne rights ka demand karne lagi. 1320 mein jab Sultan Ghiyasuddin Tughlaq Multan se Delhi gaya to usi waqt Soomra qaum ne revolt kar di aur Thatta par kabza kar liya. Uske baad March 1351 ko jab Sultan Muhammad Shah Tughlaq ne Thatta ke qareeb wafaat payi to Gujarat ke haakim Taghi ne Soomra qaum aur Jaraija se mil kar Sultan Feroz Shah Tughlaq ke against revolt kar di aur Sultan Feroz Shah Tughlaq se Thatta ke paas war ki. 1370 mein Thatta ke ruler Jaam Khairuddin ne bhi baghawat kar di. So, constantly hone wali revolts ke result mein Sultan Feroz Shah Tughlaq ko Thatta aana hi pada. Jaam Khairuddin qila band ho gaya, kyunki weather attack ke liye theek nahi tha. Isliye Sultan Gujarat ki taraf badh gaya. Return par jab Thatta aaya to Jaam Khairuddin ne maafi maang li. Sultan Feroz Shah Tughlaq ne uske bete Jaam Joona ko Thatta ka ruler appoint kar diya. Ye incident 1375 ka hai.
Tughlaq family ki rule ke dauran hi Sindh mein Sama saltanat establish hui. 1336 mein Jaam Anar ne Sama saltanat ki foundation rakhi to Thatta ke political aur moral conditions ab bhi bohot kharaab the. Isi tarah 1406 mein Jaam Ali Sher, jo ke wise aur brave ruler mana jaata tha, ko uske brothers ne dhokay se qatal karwa diya. Us zamane mein Sultan Ali Shah Miran Khan bin Sultan Sikandar But Shikan (813 Hijri – 813 Hijri) ne Thatta win kar liya aur Jaam Karan bin Tamachi ko Thatta ka ruler bana diya. But public ne next day hi Jaam Karan ko kill kar diya. 1508 mein Jaam Feroz bin Jaam Nizamuddin ki hukoomat shuru hui to awaam ne Jaam Salahuddin ko letter likha ke Jaam Feroz rule ke capable nahi, hum tumhe Thatta ki hukoomat offer karte hain. 1512 mein Jaam Salahuddin ne Gujarat kingdom ke king Sultan Muzaffar Shah II ki help se Thatta par kabza kar liya. Lekin Jaam Salahuddin ki government kuch hi din chali aur 8 months ki rule ke baad 1513 mein Jaam Feroz, Shah Beg Arghun ki help se use Thatta mein defeat karne mein successful ho gaya. Jaam Feroz again Thatta ka ruler ban gaya aur 1527 tak Thatta ka haakim raha.
Tughlaq family ke baad Thatta ke independent rulers ka time start hua. Ye rulers 'Jaam' kehlata the. Jaam Nindo yani Jaam Nizamuddin bin Bana Bina ka time golden era tha. Jaam Nizamuddin II yani Jaam Nindo ek good aur educated ruler tha. Shiraz se Mulla Jalaluddin Dawani ne apne do qabil students Mir Shamsuddin aur Mir Moin ko Thatta bheja but khud Mulla Jalaluddin Dawani raste mein hi guzar gaye aur ye dono students Thatta mein hi settle ho gaye. Jaam Nindo ne Thatta se choron aur dakaiton ko khatam karwaya.
1509 mein Jaam Nizamuddin II yani Jaam Nindo ki death hui to Shah Beg Arghun, jo Bhakkar ka ruler tha, ne Thatta par attack start kar diya. Shah Beg Arghun ne 1508 mein Thatta par pehla attack aur 1521 mein doosra attack kiya. Second attack ke time woh totally Thatta par qaabiz ho gaya. In attacks se Sama family ke Jaam rulers ki government end ho gayi aur Shah Beg Arghun ruler ban gaya. Wo chahta tha ke Sindh ke alawa Gujarat ka area bhi uske paas aa jaye because woh jaanta tha ke Kabul ka Mughal ruler Babar Hindustan par attack karne ke liye ready hai aur usay woh Bhakkar se nikaal bahar karega. Isi wajah se Shah Beg Arghun apne liye koi aur area suggest kar raha tha but isi beech 1524 mein woh guzar gaya aur ye dream bas dream hi reh gaya. Uski death ke baad uske son Mirza Shah Hussain (930 Hijri – 961 Hijri) ne apni political insight, wisdom aur stability ki wajah se Mughal badshahon ka Sindh mein rule set nahi hone diya. Lekin Babarnama ke excerpts se pata chalta hai ke Mirza Shah Hussain aur Mughal Emperor Babar ke beech relations ban gaye the because Mirza Shah Hussain ki request par Emperor Babar ne 1527 mein Agra se Ganjifa send kiya tha. Thatta (Sindh) par Shah Beg Arghun aur uski family ki hukoomat 1520 se 1554 tak rahi. Is time mein Arabic aur Sindhi ko official language ka status mila.
1554 mein Arghun family ka Thatta aur uske aas paas ke ilaqon mein power weak hona shuru hua to Tarkhan family power mein aa gayi. Jinhon ne 38 saal tak Sindh par rule kiya. Nawab Mirza Isa Khan Tarkhan ki rule ke dauran, Rabi-us-Sani 963 Hijri, yani March 1556 mein Portuguese ne Friday ko Thatta par attack kar diya. Log Friday prayer kar rahe the ke Portuguese ne shehr ko loot kar gharon ko aag laga di. Mirza Isa Khan us time Bhakkar mein tha. Usay news mili to woh immediately Thatta pohncha. Usne city ki ek boundary Darya-e-Sindh ke saath saath banwai aur ek canal khudwa kar shehr ke andar le aaya. Naya Qila Shah Bandar bhi banwaya.
1526 mein jab Kabul ke Mughal ruler Zahiruddin Muhammad Babar ne Hindustan par attack kiya, tab tak Sindh par local rulers ki hukoomat thi. Starting mein Mughals ka focus Sindh ki taraf nahi gaya, but is dauran Sama rulers, Arghun rulers aur Tarkhan rulers ne hukoomat ki. 1540s ke decade mein jab Mughal Emperor Humayun, Sher Shah Suri se defeat hone ke baad shelter dhoondne nikla, to woh Lahore se Bhakkar aaya aur Bhakkar se disappointment mein Thatta pohncha but Hussain Mirza Arghun, jo Thatta ka ruler tha, Humayun ke against fight karne laga aur war ki aur Humayun ki army tak ration supply band karwa di. Majbooran Mughal Emperor yahan se nikal gaya aur Jodhpur ki taraf chal diya. 1590 aur 1591 ke beech Mughal Emperor Jalaluddin Akbar ke order par Wazeer Khan-e-Khanaan ne Sindh par attack kiya. Is attack mein Tarkhan family ko buri tarah defeat hui aur Thatta Tarkhanon ke control se nikal gaya. Mughal Empire ke appointed Nawabs ne yahan rule kiya, jinhe unki ability ke hisaab se Char Hazari, Panj Hazari ya Haft Hazari ka post diya jaata tha. Mirza Ghazi Beg Tarkhan ko Mughal Emperor Jalaluddin Akbar aur phir Nooruddin Jahangir ke darbaar se bhi Sindh ka ruler appoint kiya gaya. Mughal Emperor Jahangir ke rule ke time 1614 mein Sindh ko ek alag province declare kar diya gaya aur Thatta uska capital ban gaya. 1591 se 1701 tak Sindh Mughal Empire ke province ke roop mein raha aur Thatta uska headquarters tha. Nawab Sardar Khan ke rule mein Thatta mein drought aur plague phaila. Kehte hain ke is wajah se almost half city deserted ho gaya. Nawab Hafeezullah Khan ne naya fort banwana shuru kiya but woh incomplete hi reh gaya. Safar 1069 Hijri, means November 1658 mein jab Mughal Emperor Aurangzeb Alamgir Dara Shikoh ka peecha kar raha tha aur Mughal army Dara Shikoh ko dhoondh rahi thi, to Dara Shikoh Thatta mein aa gaya but Mughal army uske peeche thi, isliye majboori ki wajah se Dara Shikoh Gujarat ki taraf bhaag gaya.
1701 mein Sindh mein Kalhora family ki government establish hui to Sindh tab tak independent Kalhora rulers ke control mein tha, jinhon ne Mughals ke weak hote hue power se jaldi hi apni independence announce kar di thi. 1150 Hijri, matlab 1737 mein Kalhora ruler Mian Noor Muhammad Kalhoro ne Mughal Emperor Muhammad Shah ke rule mein Mughal government se Sindh le liya aur apni independence announce karte hue Sindh par ruler ban gaya. 1738 mein jab Nader Shah ne Hindustan par attack ka plan banaya to Mian Noor Muhammad Kalhoro Thatta se bhaag kar Umerkot chala gaya but Nader Shah ke soldiers ne usay arrest kar liya. Jab Nader Shah Delhi mein enter hua to Mian Noor Muhammad Kalhoro ne uske murder ke liye kuch log set kiye but ye secret khul gaya aur Nader Shah ke Hindustan se jane ke baad Sindh par se foreign invaders ka threat khatam ho gaya.
Thatta boht long time se business ka important center raha hai. Mughal Empire ke time mein Thatta ka business level India ka koi shehr match nahi kar sakta tha. Us time mein Multan aur Bhakkar se goods aur heavy items direct Darya-e-Sindh ke through boats mein Thatta late the aur travelers, even armies bhi, land routes par jahan jungle aur pani ki availability mushkil thi, wahan Darya-e-Sindh ke route ko prefer karte the. 1758 tak Thatta business hub ban chuka tha. Thatta se Bhakkar tak boats ki movement constantly chalti rehti thi. 1591 mein jab Khan-e-Khanaan ne Thatta par attack kiya, to army ko baar baar ration boats ke zariye Lahore se wahan tak pohnchaya gaya. Around 1614, Portuguese Lahore se boats mein passengers aur goods load kar ke Thatta late the aur wahan se goods Iran bhejte the. Tourist Foster ne likha hai ke Lahore se direct Darya-e-Sindh tak ek month ka journey tha aur wapas do months ka; but according to tourist Finch ne likha hai ke Lahore se Thatta direct Darya-e-Sindh ke through 40 din ki raah par hai, bohot sari boats 60 ton aur us se zyada weight ki barish ke baad Multan, Seetpur (District Muzaffargarh) aur Bhakkar aur Rohri ke routes se chalti thin. Kohistan-e-Chamba se wood Darya-e-Sindh ke through Wazirabad aur wahan se wooden boats mein usay Bhakkar aur Thatta pohnchate the.
Thatta ke bazaaron mein Mirzai Bazaar, Gudri Bazaar, Goa Bazaar, Ghalla Bazaar, Bazaar Amir Beg aur Bazaar Qasaban famous hain.
Famous traveler Ibn Battuta, although is area se Darya-e-Sindh ke raste guzra hai, but woh shayad Thatta mein nahi utra aur isi liye usne Thatta ka haal nahi likha. 1615 mein Sir Thomas Roe ke paadri Chaplin Terry ne isay fertile aur pleasant spot bataya hai. 1665 aur 1666 ke beech mein Italian traveler Travernier ne bhi Thatta ko dekha aur yahan se guzarte hue observe kiya hai. Uski opinion thi ke: Yahan ka business ab decline par hai because river (Darya-e-Sindh) ka estuary zyada dangerous ho chuka hai aur jagah jagah johad (ponds) ban rahe hain. 1699 mein Alexander Hamilton Thatta se guzra, uske estimate ke mutabiq city 3 mile long aur half mile wide tha aur us waqt population 80 thousand logon par thi.
Thatta ke historical places mein Jamia Masjid (jise Shahjahani Masjid aur Badshahi Masjid bhi kehte hain) jo Mughal Badshah Shahjahan ne 1647-49 ke beech banwai thi. Is mosque mein 93 domes hain aur isay is tareeqe se banaya gaya hai ke is mein Imam ki voice bina kisi mic ke poori mosque mein ghoojti hai. Tombs mein yahan sabse bada aur dekhne wala tomb Isa Khan Tarkhan ka hai jo 1644 mein death ho gayi thi. Isa Khan Tarkhan ne ye tomb apni life mein hi banwa liya tha. Tomb ki construction complete hote hi, Isa Khan ne tomb bananewale craftsman ke haath katwa diye the taake koi doosra king is tarah ka tomb na banwa sake. Isa Khan ke tomb ke alawa yahan Mirza Jani Beg, Mirza Tughril Beg aur Diwan Sharfa Khan ke tombs bhi bohot famous hain.
Iske ilawa world ka sab se bada aur purana graveyard Makli bhi Thatta ke paas hai. Ye graveyard jismein lakhs of graves hain, almost 8 kilometer ke area par spread out hai. Yahan kai kings, queens, ulema, philosophers aur generals eternal sleep so rahe hain. Yahan ki graves ki special baat unke beautiful designs aur carvings hain jo sirf un logo ke time ko hi nahi batate balkay us time ki civilization, culture aur craftsmanship ka bhi living proof hai. Yahan jo graves hain, woh historical view se 2 periods mein divide ki jati hain. Pehla Sama kings ka time jo (1352-1520) tak raha aur doosra Tarkhan kings ka time jo (1556-1592) tak raha. In buildings ke structures bohot strong, construction style bohot achha aur building material top quality ka hai. In graves par jo carving aur embroidery ka kaam hai, woh unique hai. Yeh graveyard history ka woh heritage hai jo nations ke khatam hone ke baad bhi unki greatness aur skill ka sign deta hai. Isko dekhne ke liye har saal thousands of people is graveyard mein aate hain.
Tando Adam Pakistan ke Sindh province ka ek city hai jo Sanghar District mein located hai. Ye Tando Adam Tehsil ka headquarters bhi hai.
Is shehr ki local population mein Urdu, Sindhi, Punjabi, aur doosri languages bolne walon ki ek bari tadaad hai, iske alawa Pakistan banne ke baad migrate karne wale Urdu speakers bhi kafi tadaad mein aabad hain. Shehr ke rural areas mein rehte hue Punjabi aur Saraiki bhi boli jaati hai. Hindus ki lower caste se belong karne wale Kolhi aur Bheel bhi Tando Adam ki different tehsils mein rehte hain.
City mein 4 high schools aur 1 college hai jahan Masters level tak education provide ki jaati hai. Tando Adam ek railway junction bhi hai jo main railway track par located hai. Ye shehr Pakistan bannen se pehle hi ek business-oriented aur knowledge-loving city raha hai. Yahan ka Shahi Bazaar har waqt city aur aas paas ke villages ke buyers ka hub bana rehta hai. Pakistan bannen se pehle yahan Sindhi Hindus rehte the jo baad mein migrate kar ke India chale gaye but ab bhi kuch families hain jo rehte hain aur yahan ke business community mein apna influence rakhte hain. 1955 tak Tando Adam Nawabshah District ka part tha, baad mein usay Sanghar District ka ek Taluka bana diya gaya. Is city ki foundation 18th century mein Mir Adam Khan ne rakhi thi. Suleman Khan Medical College Hyderabad Road par Suleman Roshan Hospital ke qareeb hai. Ye district ka industrial zone hai jiska center Jinnah Road par hai.
Govt ke colleges, high, middle aur primary schools for boys and girls bhi hain. Private famous educational. Hyderabad se 55 km door hai. Shehar ki population 3 lakh se zyada hai jabke tehsil ki population 2017 ke according 5 lakh se kahin zyada. City mein population ke hisaab se poore Sindh mein sab se zyada Hafiz-e-Quran hain.
Islamkot, Sindh, Pakistan mein Tharparkar District ka ek town hai. Town mein almost equal Muslim aur Hindu population hai. Town bade cities jaise Karachi aur Hyderabad se connected hai. City ke naam ka translation 'Islam Qila' kiya jaata hai.
Civil Aviation Authority Pakistan, Islamkot mein ek international airport bana rahi hai.
Yahan coal ke bade deposits find hue hain, isi wajah se Thar Coal Power Plant bhi laga hua hai.
Sukkur Pakistan ke Sindh province ka third largest city hai jo Sukkur District mein Darya-e-Sindh ke western side par located hai. Sukkur Arabic word 'Saqar' se nikla hai jiska meaning 'sakht' ya 'shadeed' hai. 10th century AD mein Arabs yani Muhammad bin Qasim ki army ne Sindh fateh kiya to Sukkur mein unhone bohot garmi aur sardi (extreme weather) face ki, jis par isay Saqar ka naam diya gaya because Saqar ka matlab Arabic mein Jahannam hota hai aur yehi word local language mein bigad kar Sukkur ban gaya. Sukkur ko Darya Dino (River Given) ya river ka gift bhi kehte hain. Sukkur Sindh province ka central city hai. Aur Sukkur mein sabse bara bridge mojood hai.
Sukkur ki population roughly 10 lakh se zyada hai. Sukkur ki 4 Tehsils hain: Sukkur, Rohri, Salehpat aur Pano Aqil, jinka area aur population neeche mention hai. Sukkur city ka total area 5165 square kilometer hai. Sukkur District ke North mein Ghotki aur Shikarpur, West mein Shikarpur aur Khairpur, South mein Khairpur aur East mein Ghotki hain.
1998 ke census ke according Sukkur District ki population 9 lakh 8 thousand thi. 1981 se 1998 tak population growth rate 2.88 annually rahi.
Sukkur ki population ka majority Muslims hain aur district ki population ka 96.13% Muslims par base karti hai, jabke rural areas mein Muslim population ka ratio 97.30% aur urban areas mein 95.01% hai. Sabse badi minority Hindu community hai jo total district population ka 3.18% hain. Rural areas mein Hindus 2.29% aur urban areas mein 4.04% hain. Christians ka rate 0.51% hai. Inke alawa Qadiani aur doosri minorities bhi hain.
1998 ke census ke mutabiq, district ki majority ki mother tongue Sindhi hai, jabke second largest language Urdu hai. District ki total population ke 74.07% log Sindhi bolte hain, jabke rural areas mein 92.01% aur urban areas mein 56.74% logon ki mother tongue Sindhi hai. District ki total population ka 13.82% Urdu bolta hai, jabke rural areas mein ye ratio sirf 1.71% hai. Urban areas ki 25.53% population Urdu bolti hai. Inke alawa 6.63% log Punjabi, 1.53% Pashto, 1.47% Balochi, 0.99% Saraiki aur 1.49% doosri languages bolte hain.
Sukkur ka literacy rate 46.62% hai. Jismein males ka ratio 59.83% aur females ka 31.22% hai.
Darya-e-Sindh Sukkur ke north-western part mein flow karta hai. Ye Sukkur aur Rohri cities ke beech se guzarta hai jahan Sukkur Barrage bana hua hai. River ke center mein Bhakkar ka island bhi hai.
Sukkur ka weather dry aur hot but kafi windy hai. Hot season April se start ho kar October tak rehta hai. Summer mein temperature 44 degree Celsius tak chala jaata hai jabke winter mein temperature 9 se 23 degree Celsius ke beech rehta hai. 0.59 se 25.62 mm annual rainfall hoti hai. Poore district mein total 88 mm rainfall hoti hai.
District ki vegetation ka zyada tar part herbs par based hai jo poore province mein bhi common hain. District ke plants mein kuch signs hain jo yahan ke dry climate aur water logging aur salinity se polluted soil ko show karte hain. Yahan grass aur trees ke alawa doosre plants ki kami hai. In plants mein 'Saar' important hai jo river ke saath aur canals se nikalne wali branches ke aas paas bohot zyada milta hai. Trees mein Neem aur Baid Mushk bhi milte hain. 'Akk' bhi aisa plant hai jo comparatively less fertile soil mein ugta hai.
Kuch time pehle tak Sukkur wildlife se bhara hua tha. Especially old tombs aur hilly caves bats ka habitat the. Population increase aur expansion ke saath saath wildlife bilkul extinct ho gayi hai. Jackals bhi yahan kafi tadaad mein hain jabke hyenas rarely dikhte hain. Inke alawa foxes, mongooses, small deer aur rabbits bhi milte hain. Birds mein Partridge wild areas mein common milta hai jabke storks aur cranes wheat fields mein aam dikhte hain.
Sukkur ki economy ka complete dependence agriculture par hai aur agriculture ka complete dependence Darya-e-Sindh aur us se nikalne wali canals par hai. Darya-e-Sindh Sukkur se guzarne wala only river hai. District mein cultivate hone wali Kharif ki main crops mein rice, bajra, cotton aur moong shamil hain. Rabi season mein wheat, gram, peas etc. grow kiye jaate hain.
Good breed buffaloes, cows poore district mein milte hain. Pano Aqil horses ki wajah se famous hai. 1996 ke according, district mein 1 lakh 70 thousand 517 buffaloes, 56 thousand 218 sheep, 2 lakh 72 thousand 172 goats, 6 thousand 781 camels, 4 thousand 541 horses, 690 donkeys, 15 thousand 482 mules aur 4 lakh 17 thousand 662 pets hain.
Sukkur ki big industries mein cotton industry, cement, leather, tobacco, cigarettes, dyes, medicines, agricultural tools, tap and lock industry, sugar, biscuits etc. significant hain. Doosri small industries mein thread utensils aur other industries shamil hain. Industries ki zyada tadaad Sukkur Tehsil mein hai jabke cement factory Pano Aqil mein hai. Inke alawa small industries district ke different areas mein hain jin mein printing, boat making, fishing line aur plastic etc. shamil hain.
Sukkur District minerals ki wealth se rich nahi hai. Salt aur stone yahan paye jane wale do minerals hain. Sukkur aur Rohri mein stone kilns hain, inse milne wala stone roads ki construction mein use hota hai.
Pakistan ke 1998 census ke mutabiq, city ki population 1,160,552 record ki gayi jabke 2017 ke Pakistan census ke mutabiq, city ki population 19 saalon mein 99.62% se zyada ke izafay ke saath 198,609 ho gayi. Mandi Bahauddin zila ki population 2017 census ke mutabiq 1,593,292 record ki gayi thi. Mandi Bahauddin mein male voters ki total count 370,528 aur female voters ki tadaad 278,521 hai. Zila ki annual population growth rate 1.87% aur urban ratio 15.2% hai. Mandi Bahauddin ki total population ka approx 99.1% Muslim, 0.6% Christian aur 0.2% Ahmadi hain. Yahan par Gondal, Ranjha aur Gujjar community ki majority hai, inke saath sath Arain, Mughal, Rana, Sheikh aur Jat community bhi settled hain. Is zila ka climate moderate hai, garmiyon mein garam aur sardiyon mein sard. Garmiyon mein din ke waqt temperature 48°C tak barh sakta hai, lekin sardiyon ke mahinon mein minimum temperature 3°C se neeche drop kar sakta hai. Zila mein average rainfall 388 mm hai aur basically yahan ka weather Islamabad jaisa hai. Zila ka sadar maqam Mandi Bahauddin tehsil headquarter bhi hai. Mandi Bahauddin ko 1941 mein Municipal Committee level tak upgrade kiya gaya. Punjab Local Government Ordinance 2001 ke nifaz ke baad isey Municipal Committee ka darja diya gaya. Tehsil Mandi Bahauddin ki Municipal Committee ko teen tehsilon aur 80 Union Councils mein divide kiya gaya hai. Zila ki main languages hain: Punjabi, 97% population ki first language; Urdu - 2.5%, Pashto 0.5% aur Saraiki 0.5%. Zila ke main professions mein 40.7% agricultural workers shamil hain. Primary occupations 40%; service workers 6.5%, handicrafts aur related trade 4.2%; professionals 3.1% aur machine operators 2.4%. Yahan ki zameen boht fertile hai. Aur canal system bhi behtar hai. Yahan ke zyada tar log farming se related hain. Important crops wheat, rice, sugarcane, potato, tobacco hain jabke charay ke liye Jowar, Bajra, Maize aur Berseem waghera ki cultivation bhi hoti hai. Shah Taj Sugar Mills Pakistan ke bare sugar plants mein se aik hai. Yeh city se approx 2 km west mein located hai. Iske sub-offices Lahore aur Karachi mein hain.
