Company ko Pakistan Stock Exchange ne 1982, 1984 aur 1988 mein three times Top Company ka award diya tha. Iske ilawa zila bhar mein hundreds of flour mills aur rice mills hain jahan se poore Pakistan mein chawal aur gehun ka atta bheja jata hai. Is city ko lawyers aur judges ka sheher bhi kehte hain coz yahan zyada tar students law ki taraf interested hote hain aur is city ke lawyers apko almost har jagah milenge. Is city mein waise toh boht se private aur govt educational institutions hain, lekin Government College of Technology jo is city ke paas hi Rasul mein hai, woh place ke hisaab se bhi sabse bara aur old college hai jo Pakistan banne se bhi pehle exist karta tha. Shehar ke kuch notable educational institutions below hain jin mein sarkari schools, semi-sarkari schools, charity schools aur private schools shamil hain.
Mianwali, sooba Punjab ka aik important city aur zila hai. 1902 mein Mianwali ko zila bana kar Punjab mein shamil kar diya gaya jo pehle Bannu ki tehsil hua karta tha. Yahan ke zyada tar log Saraiki aur Pashto language bolte hain. Mianwali district ki borders Attock, Kohat, Karak, Lakki Marwat, Dera Ismail Khan, Bhakkar, Khushab aur Talagang se milti hain. Mianwali district ki teen tehsils hain jin mein Tehsil Mianwali, Tehsil Isa Khel aur Tehsil Piplan shamil hain. Mianwali mein Pathan zyada tadaad mein abad hain. Pathanon mein Niazi aur Khattak tribes settled hain. Awan, Baloch bhi kaseer tadaad mein settled hain. Yahan ke bahadur logon ki kaseer tadaad Pakistan Army mein shamil hoti hai. Mianwali district 5840 square kilometers area par phela hua hai. Socially, Mianwali district kyunki Bannu ka hissa raha hai, toh yahan ke log tribes mein divide sadiyon se chalay aa rahe hain. Yahan ki sabse qadeem language Saraiki hai jo yahan ke ancient residents ki language chali aa rahi hai. 17th aur 18th century mein yahan Pashto language ke log settle hue toh un par local language ne chaap laga di, however, ab bhi kuch areas Pashto language par mushtamil hain. Dr. Liaquat Ali Khan Niazi ki book Tareekh Mianwali mein Muhammad Saleem Ahsan likhte hain, Mianwali ke kai names hain. Historically, iska naam Dhunwan tha jo Arabicized ho kar Shabwan bana. Isey Ramnagar aur Satnam ka naam bhi mila hai. Author of Tareekh Niazi Qabail, Muhammad Iqbal Khan Tajakhel ne apni book mein likha hai ke Mianwali ka aik naam Greek era mein Saingoon bhi tha. Unka kehna tha ke Mianwali kisi period mein Greek occupation mein raha aur Alexander the Great ki realm mein capital tha. Darya-e-Sindh ke kinare abad honay ki wajah se Kachhi bhi kehlayya. 1861 mein jab Bannu district bana toh Kachhi ka office Bilokhel mein tha. Sardar Muhammad Hayat Khan Khattar apni book Hayat-e-Afghan 1865 mein likhte hain ke yeh area river bank par honay ki wajah se Kachhi bhi kehlayya aur abhi tak isi yani Kachhi ke naam se famous hai. Grier Sun daryai mitti se bani hui zameen ko bhi likhte hain. Darasal Lachhi darya ki dast-burd ka area hai. Darya-e-Sindh ka eastern kinara historically floods ka target raha. Is regard se Kachhi ka area Darya-e-Sindh ki fertile mitti ki wajah se bohot green aur populated tha. Aik tradition ke according Mughal Emperor Akbar ke time mein 1584 mein Sheikh Jalaluddin apne bete Mian Ali ke saath Baghdad se Hindustan aaye for tabligh aur ishaat-e-deen ki khatir. Tareekh Mianwali mein Professor Dr. Muhammad Aslam Malik apne article mein likhte hain ke Sindh 91/90 Hijri (712/711 AD) mein fateh ho kar Islamic empire mein shamil hua. Kayi sadiyon tak Islamic empire ka part raha. Yahin se Hindustan ke dosre areas ko conquer karnay ki efforts ki gayin. Although koi notable area fateh ho kar Islamic Sindh mein enter nahi hua. Mianwali Pakistan ke un unique areas mein shamil hai jahan do civilizations ka milaap hota hai. Aik taraf Pashto speaking log aur doosri taraf Saraiki bolne wale qabail. Lekin yahan ke customs, lifestyle Pathanon ke jang-ju aur Rajputs ke jang-ju qabail (jo past ki aik boht wide history rakhne wali qaum hain) ke beech aik best friendly environment mein parwaan charhi hain. Auraton ki parda-dari aur wafa. Mardon mein mehnati, sakht jaan aur apne watan se mohabbat karne wale jazbe ke logon ki dharti hai. Ghoron ke shauqeen aur unique dance unka junoon raha hai lekin last kuch time se yahan par original culture se hat kar different trends bhi nazar aa rahe hain. Niazi qabile ka taluq Lodhi (wohi Lodhi Shahukhel family jinhon ne Hindustan par rule kiya) se tha. Inhi Lodhi family se Sher Shah Suri ka bhi connection tha. Suri, Niazi, Marwat, Daulat Khel Nawabin Tank aur Mian Khel yeh sab Pashtuns ke Lodhi qabile ki sub-branches hain. Niazi qabail ke log Hindustan mein Amir Timur ke saath enter hue. Baad mein 15th century mein yahan settle hue. Yeh pehle Pashtun qabile the jo is area mein aaye aur Jats aur Hindus ko nikal bahar kiya. Is qabile ke ruins aur remains aaj bhi Delhi ke surrounding areas mein hain jin mein especially Isa Khan Niazi ka maqbara hai jo aaj bhi Humayun ke maqbare ke saath hai. Is qaum ki first settlement Delhi mein thi aur Pashtuns ki first aur early rule ke time mein wahan settle the, magar Mughals ke hathon defeat khane ke baad yeh is area mein dosri Afghan qaumon ke saath Darya-e-Sindh ke kinare settle ho gaye aur time to time aur Niazi qabail Afghanistan se aakar abad hote gaye. Afghanistan mein aaj bhi Niazi qabail ki achhi khaasi population hai. Iske ilawa Lakki Marwat, Kohat, Hangu, Dera Ismail Khan, Zhob, Loralai aur Quetta mein bhi Niazi abad hain jo abhi tak Pashto bolte hain, jabke Mianwali mein bhi kuch Niazi qabile Pashto bolte hain jin mein Baahi, Sultan Khel aur Buri Khel top par hain. Niazi qabile ke famous people mein se kuch yeh hain: Isa Khan Niazi (advisor Sher Shah Suri), Haibat Khan Niazi (Governor Punjab aur General). Imran Khan Niazi (Prime Minister Pakistan), Munir Niazi (famous Urdu poet), Admiral Karamat Rahman Niazi (former Chief of Pakistan Navy) etc.
1336 mein Sindh ke Sama hukmarano ke zawaal ke baad Sama family ki hukmarani shuru hui to unho ne Koh-e-Makli ke daaman mein ek shehr basaaya jiska naam Samooi rakha. Yeh Sama saltanat ke rulers ka pehla capital tha. Baad azan unho ne Koh-e-Makli se 6 mile junoob ki simt mein Koh-e-Makli ke pushte par Qila Tughlaqabad banaya jise ab Kalla Kot kehte hain. Usi qile ko unho ne paya-e-takht bana liya. Taqriban 900 Hijri, matlab 1495 ke around, Sama saltanat ke hukmaran Nizamuddin alias Jaam Nando ne Samooi aur Kalla Kot ke beech ke ilaqa mein Thatta ke naam se dobara aabaad kiya aur capital idhar shift kar liya. Saahib-e-Tohfatul Karam ki statement ke mutabiq, Thatta ki nayi taameer aur foundation mein Nizamuddin Jaam Nando ne najumiyo (astrologers) se help li thi aur kaha tha k: Ek new shehr as a capital bananay k liye aisi zameen select ki jaye jo khushgawar ho, jiske rehne wale kam ya ziyada aaraam pasand hon, hamesha sair-o-tafreeh mein zindagi guzaarein aur unki nature mein perfection aur ability ki quality shamil ho. Isi liye, in qualities aur characteristics ko dekhte hue Thatta ki zameen choose ki gayi. Jiske east mein kuch gardens thay aur shehr ke center mein Mir Bahar rehte thay. Present Thatta city Koh-e-Makli ke daaman mein old city ke khandaron pe basa hai. Sindh ki political history mein Thatta ka zikr kai baar aaya hai. Thatta aur uske aas paas ke ilaakon mein Arab conquerors pehli baar Umavi Khalifa Abdul Malik bin Marwan ke daur mein aaye aur Muhammad bin Qasim ne Aroor ki campaign ke liye Thatta ke paas hi Darya-e-Sindh cross kiya. Yeh area pehle Umavi Khilafat aur baad mein Abbasi Khilafat ke amilon ke under raha. Ghaznavi Empire ke famous ruler Sultan Mehmood Ghaznavi ne 1026 mein Abbasi Khalifa Al-Qadir Billah Al-Abbasi ke amilon ko Multan aur Uch se nikaal bahar kiya. 1026 mein Ghaznavi wazeer Abdul Razzaq ne Sultan Mehmood Ghaznavi ke order ke according Thatta aur Sevistan ke neighboring areas aur nations ko conquer kar liya aur Arabs ko Sindh se bhaga diya. Thatta par Ghaznavi family ka kabza 1183 tak raha jo total 157 saal ka period banta hai. 1183 mein Thatta par se Ghaznavi rule khatam hua to Thatta mein law-and-order ka problem start ho gaya. Yeh time bohot hi mushkil tha. Is daur ki be-amni ki bari wajah shayad ye thi ke Thatta ke officials aur awaam dono ne hi politics mein hissa lena shuru kar diya tha, for example, Tughlaq khandaan ke daur-e-hukumat mein Hindu public apne rights ka demand karne lagi. 1320 mein jab Sultan Ghiyasuddin Tughlaq Multan se Delhi gaya to usi waqt Soomra qaum ne revolt kar di aur Thatta par kabza kar liya. Uske baad March 1351 ko jab Sultan Muhammad Shah Tughlaq ne Thatta ke qareeb wafaat payi to Gujarat ke haakim Taghi ne Soomra qaum aur Jaraija se mil kar Sultan Feroz Shah Tughlaq ke against revolt kar di aur Sultan Feroz Shah Tughlaq se Thatta ke paas war ki. 1370 mein Thatta ke ruler Jaam Khairuddin ne bhi baghawat kar di. So, constantly hone wali revolts ke result mein Sultan Feroz Shah Tughlaq ko Thatta aana hi pada. Jaam Khairuddin qila band ho gaya, kyunki weather attack ke liye theek nahi tha. Isliye Sultan Gujarat ki taraf badh gaya. Return par jab Thatta aaya to Jaam Khairuddin ne maafi maang li. Sultan Feroz Shah Tughlaq ne uske bete Jaam Joona ko Thatta ka ruler appoint kar diya. Ye incident 1375 ka hai. Tughlaq family ki rule ke dauran hi Sindh mein Sama saltanat establish hui. 1336 mein Jaam Anar ne Sama saltanat ki foundation rakhi to Thatta ke political aur moral conditions ab bhi bohot kharaab the. Isi tarah 1406 mein Jaam Ali Sher, jo ke wise aur brave ruler mana jaata tha, ko uske brothers ne dhokay se qatal karwa diya. Us zamane mein Sultan Ali Shah Miran Khan bin Sultan Sikandar But Shikan (813 Hijri – 813 Hijri) ne Thatta win kar liya aur Jaam Karan bin Tamachi ko Thatta ka ruler bana diya. But public ne next day hi Jaam Karan ko kill kar diya. 1508 mein Jaam Feroz bin Jaam Nizamuddin ki hukoomat shuru hui to awaam ne Jaam Salahuddin ko letter likha ke Jaam Feroz rule ke capable nahi, hum tumhe Thatta ki hukoomat offer karte hain. 1512 mein Jaam Salahuddin ne Gujarat kingdom ke king Sultan Muzaffar Shah II ki help se Thatta par kabza kar liya. Lekin Jaam Salahuddin ki government kuch hi din chali aur 8 months ki rule ke baad 1513 mein Jaam Feroz, Shah Beg Arghun ki help se use Thatta mein defeat karne mein successful ho gaya. Jaam Feroz again Thatta ka ruler ban gaya aur 1527 tak Thatta ka haakim raha. Tughlaq family ke baad Thatta ke independent rulers ka time start hua. Ye rulers 'Jaam' kehlata the. Jaam Nindo yani Jaam Nizamuddin bin Bana Bina ka time golden era tha. Jaam Nizamuddin II yani Jaam Nindo ek good aur educated ruler tha. Shiraz se Mulla Jalaluddin Dawani ne apne do qabil students Mir Shamsuddin aur Mir Moin ko Thatta bheja but khud Mulla Jalaluddin Dawani raste mein hi guzar gaye aur ye dono students Thatta mein hi settle ho gaye. Jaam Nindo ne Thatta se choron aur dakaiton ko khatam karwaya. 1509 mein Jaam Nizamuddin II yani Jaam Nindo ki death hui to Shah Beg Arghun, jo Bhakkar ka ruler tha, ne Thatta par attack start kar diya. Shah Beg Arghun ne 1508 mein Thatta par pehla attack aur 1521 mein doosra attack kiya. Second attack ke time woh totally Thatta par qaabiz ho gaya. In attacks se Sama family ke Jaam rulers ki government end ho gayi aur Shah Beg Arghun ruler ban gaya. Wo chahta tha ke Sindh ke alawa Gujarat ka area bhi uske paas aa jaye because woh jaanta tha ke Kabul ka Mughal ruler Babar Hindustan par attack karne ke liye ready hai aur usay woh Bhakkar se nikaal bahar karega. Isi wajah se Shah Beg Arghun apne liye koi aur area suggest kar raha tha but isi beech 1524 mein woh guzar gaya aur ye dream bas dream hi reh gaya. Uski death ke baad uske son Mirza Shah Hussain (930 Hijri – 961 Hijri) ne apni political insight, wisdom aur stability ki wajah se Mughal badshahon ka Sindh mein rule set nahi hone diya. Lekin Babarnama ke excerpts se pata chalta hai ke Mirza Shah Hussain aur Mughal Emperor Babar ke beech relations ban gaye the because Mirza Shah Hussain ki request par Emperor Babar ne 1527 mein Agra se Ganjifa send kiya tha. Thatta (Sindh) par Shah Beg Arghun aur uski family ki hukoomat 1520 se 1554 tak rahi. Is time mein Arabic aur Sindhi ko official language ka status mila. 1554 mein Arghun family ka Thatta aur uske aas paas ke ilaqon mein power weak hona shuru hua to Tarkhan family power mein aa gayi. Jinhon ne 38 saal tak Sindh par rule kiya. Nawab Mirza Isa Khan Tarkhan ki rule ke dauran, Rabi-us-Sani 963 Hijri, yani March 1556 mein Portuguese ne Friday ko Thatta par attack kar diya. Log Friday prayer kar rahe the ke Portuguese ne shehr ko loot kar gharon ko aag laga di. Mirza Isa Khan us time Bhakkar mein tha. Usay news mili to woh immediately Thatta pohncha. Usne city ki ek boundary Darya-e-Sindh ke saath saath banwai aur ek canal khudwa kar shehr ke andar le aaya. Naya Qila Shah Bandar bhi banwaya. 1526 mein jab Kabul ke Mughal ruler Zahiruddin Muhammad Babar ne Hindustan par attack kiya, tab tak Sindh par local rulers ki hukoomat thi. Starting mein Mughals ka focus Sindh ki taraf nahi gaya, but is dauran Sama rulers, Arghun rulers aur Tarkhan rulers ne hukoomat ki. 1540s ke decade mein jab Mughal Emperor Humayun, Sher Shah Suri se defeat hone ke baad shelter dhoondne nikla, to woh Lahore se Bhakkar aaya aur Bhakkar se disappointment mein Thatta pohncha but Hussain Mirza Arghun, jo Thatta ka ruler tha, Humayun ke against fight karne laga aur war ki aur Humayun ki army tak ration supply band karwa di. Majbooran Mughal Emperor yahan se nikal gaya aur Jodhpur ki taraf chal diya. 1590 aur 1591 ke beech Mughal Emperor Jalaluddin Akbar ke order par Wazeer Khan-e-Khanaan ne Sindh par attack kiya. Is attack mein Tarkhan family ko बुरी तरह defeat hui aur Thatta Tarkhanon ke control se nikal gaya. Mughal Empire ke appointed Nawabs ne yahan rule kiya, jinhe unki ability ke hisaab se Char Hazari, Panj Hazari ya Haft Hazari ka post diya jaata tha. Mirza Ghazi Beg Tarkhan ko Mughal Emperor Jalaluddin Akbar aur phir Nooruddin Jahangir ke darbaar se bhi Sindh ka ruler appoint kiya gaya. Mughal Emperor Jahangir ke rule ke time 1614 mein Sindh ko ek alag province declare kar diya gaya aur Thatta uska capital ban gaya. 1591 se 1701 tak Sindh Mughal Empire ke province ke roop mein raha aur Thatta uska headquarters tha. Nawab Sardar Khan ke rule mein Thatta mein drought aur plague phaila. Kehte hain ke is wajah se almost half city deserted ho gaya. Nawab Hafeezullah Khan ne naya fort banwana shuru kiya but woh incomplete hi reh gaya. Safar 1069 Hijri, means November 1658 mein jab Mughal Emperor Aurangzeb Alamgir Dara Shikoh ka peecha kar raha tha aur Mughal army Dara Shikoh ko dhoondh rahi thi, to Dara Shikoh Thatta mein aa gaya but Mughal army uske peeche thi, isliye majboori ki wajah se Dara Shikoh Gujarat ki taraf bhaag gaya. 1701 mein Sindh mein Kalhora family ki government establish hui to Sindh tab tak independent Kalhora rulers ke control mein tha, jinhon ne Mughals ke weak hote hue power se jaldi hi apni independence announce kar di thi. 1150 Hijri, matlab 1737 mein Kalhora ruler Mian Noor Muhammad Kalhoro ne Mughal Emperor Muhammad Shah ke rule mein Mughal government se Sindh le liya aur apni independence announce karte hue Sindh par ruler ban gaya. 1738 mein jab Nader Shah ne Hindustan par attack ka plan banaya to Mian Noor Muhammad Kalhoro Thatta se bhaag kar Umerkot chala gaya but Nader Shah ke soldiers ne usay arrest kar liya. Jab Nader Shah Delhi mein enter hua to Mian Noor Muhammad Kalhoro ne uske murder ke liye kuch log set kiye but ye secret khul gaya aur Nader Shah ke Hindustan se jane ke baad Sindh par se foreign invaders ka threat khatam ho gaya. Thatta boht long time se business ka important center raha hai. Mughal Empire ke time mein Thatta ka business level India ka koi shehr match nahi kar sakta tha. Us time mein Multan aur Bhakkar se goods aur heavy items direct Darya-e-Sindh ke through boats mein Thatta late the aur travelers, even armies bhi, land routes par jahan jungle aur pani ki availability mushkil thi, wahan Darya-e-Sindh ke route ko prefer karte the. 1758 tak Thatta business hub ban chuka tha. Thatta se Bhakkar tak boats ki movement constantly chalti rehti thi. 1591 mein jab Khan-e-Khanaan ne Thatta par attack kiya, to army ko baar baar ration boats ke zariye Lahore se wahan tak pohnchaya gaya. Around 1614, Portuguese Lahore se boats mein passengers aur goods load kar ke Thatta late the aur wahan se goods Iran bhejte the. Tourist Foster ne likha hai ke Lahore se direct Darya-e-Sindh tak ek month ka journey tha aur wapas do months ka; but according to tourist Finch ne likha hai ke Lahore se Thatta direct Darya-e-Sindh ke through 40 din ki raah par hai, bohot sari boats 60 ton aur us se zyada weight ki barish ke baad Multan, Seetpur (District Muzaffargarh) aur Bhakkar aur Rohri ke routes se chalti thin. Kohistan-e-Chamba se wood Darya-e-Sindh ke through Wazirabad aur wahan se wooden boats mein usay Bhakkar aur Thatta pohnchate the. Thatta ke bazaaron mein Mirzai Bazaar, Gudri Bazaar, Goa Bazaar, Ghalla Bazaar, Bazaar Amir Beg aur Bazaar Qasaban famous hain. Famous traveler Ibn Battuta, although is area se Darya-e-Sindh ke raste guzra hai, but woh shayad Thatta mein nahi utra aur isi liye usne Thatta ka haal nahi likha. 1615 mein Sir Thomas Roe ke paadri Chaplin Terry ne isay fertile aur pleasant spot bataya hai. 1665 aur 1666 ke beech mein Italian traveler Travernier ne bhi Thatta ko dekha aur yahan se guzarte hue observe kiya hai. Uski opinion thi ke: Yahan ka business ab decline par hai because river (Darya-e-Sindh) ka estuary zyada dangerous ho chuka hai aur jagah jagah johad (ponds) ban rahe hain. 1699 mein Alexander Hamilton Thatta se guzra, uske estimate ke mutabiq city 3 mile long aur half mile wide tha aur us waqt population 80 thousand logon par thi. Thatta ke historical places mein Jamia Masjid (jise Shahjahani Masjid aur Badshahi Masjid bhi kehte hain) jo Mughal Badshah Shahjahan ne 1647-49 ke beech banwai thi. Is mosque mein 93 domes hain aur isay is tareeqe se banaya gaya hai ke is mein Imam ki voice bina kisi mic ke poori mosque mein ghoojti hai. Tombs mein yahan sabse bada aur dekhne wala tomb Isa Khan Tarkhan ka hai jo 1644 mein death ho gayi thi. Isa Khan Tarkhan ne ye tomb apni life mein hi banwa liya tha. Tomb ki construction complete hote hi, Isa Khan ne tomb bananewale craftsman ke haath katwa diye the taake koi doosra king is tarah ka tomb na banwa sake. Isa Khan ke tomb ke alawa yahan Mirza Jani Beg, Mirza Tughril Beg aur Diwan Sharfa Khan ke tombs bhi bohot famous hain. Iske ilawa world ka sab se bada aur purana graveyard Makli bhi Thatta ke paas hai. Ye graveyard jismein lakhs of graves hain, almost 8 kilometer ke area par spread out hai. Yahan kai kings, queens, ulema, philosophers aur generals eternal sleep so rahe hain. Yahan ki graves ki special baat unke beautiful designs aur carvings hain jo sirf un logo ke time ko hi nahi batate balkay us time ki civilization, culture aur craftsmanship ka bhi living proof hain. Yahan jo graves hain, woh historical view se 2 periods mein divide ki jati hain. Pehla Sama kings ka time jo (1352-1520) tak raha aur doosra Tarkhan kings ka time jo (1556-1592) tak raha. In buildings ke structures bohot strong, construction style bohot achha aur building material top quality ka hai. In graves par jo carving aur embroidery ka kaam hai, woh unique hai. Yeh graveyard history ka woh heritage hai jo nations ke khatam hone ke baad bhi unki greatness aur skill ka sign deta hai. Isko dekhne ke liye har saal thousands of people is graveyard mein aate hain.
Tando Adam Pakistan ke Sindh province ka ek city hai jo Sanghar District mein located hai. Ye Tando Adam Tehsil ka headquarters bhi hai. Is shehr ki local population mein Urdu, Sindhi, Punjabi, aur doosri languages bolne walon ki ek bari tadaad hai, iske alawa Pakistan banne ke baad migrate karne wale Urdu speakers bhi kafi tadaad mein aabad hain. Shehr ke rural areas mein rehte hue Punjabi aur Saraiki bhi boli jaati hai. Hindus ki lower caste se belong karne wale Kolhi aur Bheel bhi Tando Adam ki different tehsils mein rehte hain. City mein 4 high schools aur 1 college hai jahan Masters level tak education provide ki jaati hai. Tando Adam ek railway junction bhi hai jo main railway track par located hai. Ye shehr Pakistan bannen se pehle hi ek business-oriented aur knowledge-loving city raha hai. Yahan ka Shahi Bazaar har waqt city aur aas paas ke villages ke buyers ka hub bana rehta hai. Pakistan bannen se pehle yahan Sindhi Hindus rehte the jo baad mein migrate kar ke India chale gaye but ab bhi kuch families hain jo rehte hain aur yahan ke business community mein apna influence rakhte hain. 1955 tak Tando Adam Nawabshah District ka part tha, baad mein usay Sanghar District ka ek Taluka bana diya gaya. Is city ki foundation 18th century mein Mir Adam Khan ne rakhi thi. Suleman Khan Medical College Hyderabad Road par Suleman Roshan Hospital ke qareeb hai. Ye district ka industrial zone hai jiska center Jinnah Road par hai. Govt ke colleges, high, middle aur primary schools for boys and girls bhi hain. Private famous educational Hyderabad se 55 km door hai. Shehar ki population 3 lakh se zyada hai jabke tehsil ki population 2017 ke according 5 lakh se kahin zyada. City mein population ke hisaab se poore Sindh mein sab se zyada Hafiz-e-Quran hain.
Islamkot, Sindh, Pakistan mein Tharparkar District ka ek town hai. Town mein almost equal Muslim aur Hindu population hai. Town bade cities jaise Karachi aur Hyderabad se connected hai. City ke naam ka translation 'Islam Qila' kiya jaata hai. Civil Aviation Authority Pakistan, Islamkot mein ek international airport bana rahi hai. Yahan coal ke bade deposits find hue hain, isi wajah se Thar Coal Power Plant bhi laga hua hai.
Sukkur Pakistan ke Sindh province ka third largest city hai jo Sukkur District mein Darya-e-Sindh ke western side par located hai. Sukkur Arabic word 'Saqar' se nikla hai jiska meaning 'sakht' ya 'shadeed' hai. 10th century AD mein Arabs yani Muhammad bin Qasim ki army ne Sindh fateh kiya to Sukkur mein unhone bohot garmi aur sardi (extreme weather) face ki, jis par isay Saqar ka naam diya gaya because Saqar ka matlab Arabic mein Jahannam hota hai aur yehi word local language mein bigad kar Sukkur ban gaya. Sukkur ko Darya Dino (River Given) ya river ka gift bhi kehte hain. Sukkur Sindh province ka central city hai. Aur Sukkur mein sabse bara bridge mojood hai. Sukkur ki population roughly 10 lakh se zyada hai. Sukkur ki 4 Tehsils hain: Sukkur, Rohri, Salehpat aur Pano Aqil, jinka area aur population neeche mention hai. Sukkur city ka total area 5165 square kilometer hai. Sukkur District ke North mein Ghotki aur Shikarpur, West mein Shikarpur aur Khairpur, South mein Khairpur aur East mein Ghotki hain. 1998 ke census ke according Sukkur District ki population 9 lakh 8 thousand thi. 1981 se 1998 tak population growth rate 2.88 annually rahi. Sukkur ki population ka majority Muslims hain aur district ki population ka 96.13% Muslims par base karti hai, jabke rural areas mein Muslim population ka ratio 97.30% aur urban areas mein 95.01% hai. Sabse badi minority Hindu community hai jo total district population ka 3.18% hain. Rural areas mein Hindus 2.29% aur urban areas mein 4.04% hain. Christians ka rate 0.51% hai. Inke alawa Qadiani aur doosri minorities bhi hain. 1998 ke census ke mutabiq, district ki majority ki mother tongue Sindhi hai, jabke second largest language Urdu hai. District ki total population ke 74.07% log Sindhi bolte hain, jabke rural areas mein 92.01% aur urban areas mein 56.74% logon ki mother tongue Sindhi hai. District ki total population ka 13.82% Urdu bolta hai, jabke rural areas mein ye ratio sirf 1.71% hai. Urban areas ki 25.53% population Urdu bolti hai. Inke ilawa 6.63% log Punjabi, 1.53% Pashto, 1.47% Balochi, 0.99% Saraiki aur 1.49% doosri languages bolte hain. Sukkur ka literacy rate 46.62% hai. Jismein males ka ratio 59.83% aur females ka 31.22% hai. Darya-e-Sindh Sukkur ke north-western part mein flow karta hai. Ye Sukkur aur Rohri cities ke beech se guzarta hai jahan Sukkur Barrage bana hua hai. River ke center mein Bhakkar ka island bhi hai. Sukkur ka weather dry aur hot but kafi windy hai. Hot season April se start ho kar October tak rehta hai. Summer mein temperature 44 degree Celsius tak chala jaata hai jabke winter mein temperature 9 se 23 degree Celsius ke beech rehta hai. 0.59 se 25.62 mm annual rainfall hoti hai. Poore district mein total 88 mm rainfall hoti hai. District ki vegetation ka zyada tar part herbs par based hai jo poore province mein bhi common hain. District ke plants mein kuch signs hain jo yahan ke dry climate aur water logging aur salinity se polluted soil ko show karte hain. Yahan grass aur trees ke alawa doosre plants ki kami hai. In plants mein 'Saar' important hai jo river ke saath aur canals se nikalne wali branches ke aas paas bohot zyada milta hai. Trees mein Neem aur Baid Mushk bhi milte hain. 'Akk' bhi aisa plant hai jo comparatively less fertile soil mein ugta hai. Kuch time pehle tak Sukkur wildlife se bhara hua tha. Especially old tombs aur hilly caves bats ka habitat the. Population increase aur expansion ke saath saath wildlife bilkul extinct ho gayi hai. Jackals bhi yahan kafi tadaad mein hain jabke hyenas rarely dikhte hain. Inke alawa foxes, mongooses, small deer aur rabbits bhi milte hain. Birds mein Partridge wild areas mein common milta hai jabke storks aur cranes wheat fields mein aam dikhte hain. Sukkur ki economy ka complete dependence agriculture par hai aur agriculture ka complete dependence Darya-e-Sindh aur us se nikalne wali canals par hai. Darya-e-Sindh Sukkur se guzarne wala only river hai. District mein cultivate hone wali Kharif ki main crops mein rice, bajra, cotton aur moong shamil hain. Rabi season mein wheat, gram, peas etc. grow kiye jaate hain. Good breed buffaloes, cows poore district mein milte hain. Pano Aqil horses ki wajah se famous hai. 1996 ke according, district mein 1 lakh 70 thousand 517 buffaloes, 56 thousand 218 sheep, 2 lakh 72 thousand 172 goats, 6 thousand 781 camels, 4 thousand 541 horses, 690 donkeys, 15 thousand 482 mules aur 4 lakh 17 thousand 662 pets hain. Sukkur ki big industries mein cotton industry, cement, leather, tobacco, cigarettes, dyes, medicines, agricultural tools, tap and lock industry, sugar, biscuits etc. significant hain. Doosri small industries mein thread utensils aur other industries shamil hain. Industries ki zyada tadaad Sukkur Tehsil mein hai jabke cement factory Pano Aqil mein hai. Inke alawa small industries district ke different areas mein hain jin mein printing, boat making, fishing line aur plastic etc. shamil hain. Sukkur District minerals ki wealth se rich nahi hai. Salt aur stone yahan paye jane wale do minerals hain. Sukkur aur Rohri mein stone kilns hain, inse milne wala stone roads ki construction mein use hota hai. Sukkur city Sindh province ke important trade centers mein se ek hai. Yahan ki main trading items mein flour, cement, tobacco, cigarettes, medicines, agricultural tools, leather goods, cloth etc. shamil hain. Sukkur Balochistan aur Afghanistan ke dry fruits ke liye trade center mana jaata hai. Sukkur city biscuits aur pickle ke liye bhi famous hai. Transportation mein roads aur railway important role play karte hain. Sukkur city Karachi to Peshawar National Highway ke route par hai aur isi ke through ye country ke doosre cities se connected hai. Sukkur se Quetta jane ke liye Jacobabad ka route lena padta hai. District ki famous highways mein Sukkur Airport District ki roads ki total length 523.71 kilometer hai. Jabke kachhi roads ki length 630.07 kilometer hai. Rohri railway junction hai jo Karachi-Peshawar main railway line par bana hai. Sukkur air link ke through bhi Karachi aur doosre cities se connected hai. Sukkur mein naya airport terminal bhi banaya gaya hai. Sukkur aur Rohri ke beech Darya-e-Sindh mein boats aur small ships ke through bhi travel kiya jaata hai.
Jacobabad Pakistan ke Sindh province ka ek city hai jo Jacobabad District aur Jacobabad Tehsil ka headquarters bhi hai. Jacobabad Sindh aur Balochistan ke border ke paas Sukkur se Quetta jane wali highway par located hai. Jacobabad Pakistan ke hottest area mein located hai jahan summer mein temperature 52 degree Celsius se bhi cross kar jaata hai. Is district ka naam British Raj ke time ke regional English ruler General John Jacob ke naam par hai. Isse pehle ye area Khan Garh kehlata tha, but area ke liye English General ki services ke badle is area ko Jacobabad naam diya gaya. Jacobabad Sindh aur Balochistan ke junction par located hai aur Balochistan ko Sindh se join karne wala ek important route yahin se guzarta hai. Isliye Jacobabad ka railway station ek important stopover hai jahan se Sukkur aur Larkana se aane wali trains Quetta aur Balochistan ke doosre areas ko jaati hain. Also, Jacobabad District National Highway ke through country ke doosre areas se connected hai. Yahan se daily basis par Karachi, Lahore, Islamabad aur Quetta ke liye trains aur buses etc. chalti hain. Jacobabad ka Shahbaz Air Base Pakistan Air Force ke under hai but yahan se passenger flights bhi operate ki jaati hain. War on terror mein America ke ally ke taur par Pakistan ne ye air base US forces ke hawalay kiya hai, jinhon ne Afghan War mein opponents ke targets ko hit karne aur apne soldiers ko supply deliver karne ke liye is air base ka poora use kiya. Aaj bhi American military personnel aur airplanes ki big quantity is base par available hai.
Rohri Pakistan ke Sindh province ka town hai jo Sukkur District mein Darya-e-Sindh ke bank par located hai. Sukkur city is town se only 5 km distance par hai, beech mein sirf Darya-e-Sindh hai. Ye town apne railway station ki wajah se famous hai jo Pakistan Railways ka important railway station aur Rohri-Quetta via Jacobabad, Sibi Branch railway line ka junction hai. Is city ke baare mein ek kahawat famous hai ke yahan ki mitti mein almost 1.25 lakh Auliya-e-Karam aur Buzurgan-e-Deen dafan hain, jiski wajah se is city ko Rohri Sharif bhi kehte hain. Rohri city ko Aroor Rajkumar Dhaj Ror Kumar ne 5th century BC mein banwaya tha jo uske naam par hi Aroor kehlaya. 8th century AD mein Aroor family ke baad Rai family aur Brahmins ne rule kiya. 711 mein Aroor par Muslim General Muhammad bin Qasim ki army ne kabza kar liya. 962 mein ek huge earthquake ne city ko tabah kar diya jiski wajah se Darya-e-Sindh ka course bhi change ho gaya. Historians ke according bhi is city ke aabaad hone ki reason Darya-e-Sindh ka apne pehle spot Alor, jise ab Aroor kehte hain, se flow karna band hokar apna course change karte hue current Bhakkar island se flow karna bataya jaata hai. 335 Hijri mein Darya-e-Sindh ka direction change hone ki wajah se Aroor ke residents ne migrate kar ke Bhakkar island ke around rehna shuru kiya, jiski wajah se ye city aabaad hua. Historical references ke according Rohri ko pehle Lohri ya Loharkot kehte the, Rohri ka current name actually 'Rori' se bana hai, jiska matlab 'chhota pathar' ya 'pahadi' hai. 1200 AD mein Rohri Darya-e-Sindh ke bank par ek busy port ka status rakhta tha. Weather-wise, Rohri city mein garmi bohot hoti hai jabke sardi bhi kafi hoti hai. Ye city roughly 10 square kilometer area par phaila hua hai. Rohri city ke aabaad hone ke baare mein Sindh Gazetteer ke according, Rohri city ko Syed Ruknuddin ne 996 Hijri (1297 AD) mein banwaya tha but later research ke mutabiq ye pre-Christ era ka ek city hai aur Sehwan aur Thatta ka contemporary hai. Ye teeno cities apne time mein knowledge, literature aur civilization ke important centers the. Rohri city Thatta, Shikarpur aur Sehwan cities se kafi similar hai. Geographically bhi Rohri apni unique identity rakhta hai. Iske West mein gardens, South mein hills, North mein Darya-e-Sindh jabke East mein desert hai. River ke bank par hone ki wajah se is city ki nights bohot thandi aur pleasant hoti hain. Iska architecture old buildings par based hai. City ki streets upar aur neeche ki taraf bani hui hain.
Jamshoro Pakistan ke Sindh province ka ek city hai jo Jamshoro District mein Darya-e-Sindh ke side par located hai. Ye Jamshoro District ka headquarters hai. Is city mein Sindh University, Mehran University of Science and Technology aur Liaquat Medical University hain. Education ke hisaab se Jamshoro ek best city hai.
Kotri, Sindh province, Pakistan ka ek city hai jo Jamshoro District mein Darya-e-Sindh ke paas basa Hazrat Riaz Ahmed Gohar Shahi ka city hai, isliye isay Kotri Sharif bhi kehte hain. Ye Kotri Tehsil ka headquarters bhi hai. National Highway is city ke beech se aur Super Highway iske close se guzarti hain aur isko Hyderabad, Karachi, Sukkur, Lahore, Islamabad, Peshawar aur Pakistan ke doosre bade cities se connect karti hain. Kotri Railway Station Pakistan Railways ki Karachi-Peshawar main railway line par Kotri ke beech mein located hai. Yahan kuch express trains stop karti hain. Ye Kotri-Habib Kot via Larkana Branch railway line ka junction bhi hai.
Larkana ek city hai Sindh province, Pakistan mein, jo Larkana District mein hai aur Darya-e-Sindh ke west side par hai. Larkana city ke trade centers mein Resham Gali, Shahi Bazaar, Sabzi Mandi, Gelus Bazaar, Siddiqui Bazaar, Khataar Bazaar, Sarrafa Bazaar, Bandar Road, Pakistan Chowk, Lahori Mohalla aur Ghalla Mandi etc. shamil hain. City mein jo important mohalle hain, woh neeche diye gaye hain. Ye Larkana District aur Larkana Tehsil ka headquarters bhi hai. Iske 4 tehsils hain. Larkana Railway Station Pakistan Railways ki Kotri-Habib Kot Branch railway line par Larkana ke beech located hai. Yahan sabhi express trains stop karti hain. Larkana Pakistan ke hottest areas mein count hota hai jahan 31 May 1998 ko temperature 52.2 degree record kiya gaya tha but Larkana mein 6 Jan 2006 ko logon ne ek aisa din dekha jab itni sardi thi ke temperature minus 1 degree ho gaya.
Kashmore Pakistan ke Sindh province ka town hai jo Kashmore District mein located hai. Ye town Punjab aur Balochistan ke border par located ek important business city hai.
Tando Allahyar Pakistan ke Sindh province ke Tando Allahyar District, Hyderabad Division mein located ek town hai.
Sindh ke Tando Muhammad Khan District aur Tando Muhammad Khan Taluka ka headquarters, ek city Badin Hyderabad Branch line par ek railway station hai. Sea level se 36 feet high ye city Hyderabad se 35 km, Karachi se 168 km aur Badin se 50 km distance par hai. Mir Muhammad Khan Talpur Shahwani ne ye area 1856 mein aabaad kiya. 1856 mein Municipality ka status mila. April 2005 mein District status mila, isse pehle Hyderabad District mein shamil tha. 4 big sugar mills hain. Ye city Phuleli Canal ke right side par located hai. District mein 8 police stations hain, 2012 mein Sessions Court bana.
Mangla Dam Pakistan ka second largest dam hai. World mein iska 7th number hai. Ye Mirpur District aur Jhelum District ke gaon Sultanpur mein located hai. River Jhelum Koh-e-Himalaya Pir Panjal ke daaman mein Spring Verinag se nikal kar Srinagar ki Dal Lake se water leta hua River Jhelum Srinagar ke paas se guzarta hua Wular Lake mein gir jaata hai. Hilly area hone ki wajah se iska path narrow hota jaata hai. Isko Chakothi mein Line of Control se Muzaffarabad aur Kohala tak observe kiya ja sakta hai. River Jhelum Muzaffarabad mein River Neelum se Domel ki jagah par milta hai jiski wajah se is place ko hi Domel bolte hain aur Muzaffarabad ke hi ek spot Rara Mustafaabad se Naran Kaghan Valley ke Kunhar River se mil kar River Poonch mein shamil ho jaata hai. River Jhelum AJK Mirpur District aur Jhelum District ke gaon Sultanpur pohnch kar plains se flow karta hua south-west ko flow karta hua Trimmu Barrage ki jagah par River Chenab se mil jaata hai. Ye Western Punjab ke rivers mein se important river hai. Ye sab rivers Panjnad ke paas Darya-e-Sindh mein mil jaate hain. Jhelum ke gaon Sultanpur ki jagah par ek dam banaya gaya hai aur River Jhelum ka pani is dam mein aata hai. Isko Mangla Dam kehte hain. Iska pani irrigation aur electricity generate karne ke liye use hota hai. River Jhelum Pakistan mein Jhelum, Malakwal aur Khushab ke plain areas se flow karta hua Jhang District mein Trimmu ki jagah par River Chenab mein shamil ho jaata hai. River Jhelum par 1967 mein Sultanpur gaon ki jagah par Mangla Dam banaya gaya aur ismein 5.9 million acre water store kiya ja sakta hai. Usi river par 1967 mein Rasul Barrage banaya gaya. River Jhelum se do canals nikaali gayi hain. Lower Jhelum Canal 1901 mein Gujarat District ke Rasul spot se nikaali gayi. Iski mazeed do branches Kharadar Machine se Jhang District ka northern part irrigate hota hai. Upper Jhelum 1915 mein banayi gayi, iska pani Mangla se River Chenab tak jaata hai. Is dam ko 2007 mein 30 feet aur high kiya gaya hai.
Tarbela Dam ek multi-purpose dam hai jo Mangla Dam se double, Aswan Dam Egypt se triple aur world mein earth-fill ka sabse bada dam hai. Ye dam Tarbela, Swabi District, Pakistan mein located hai. Partition ke time Lower Sindh aur uske tributary rivers par Britishers ka banaya hua irrigation system do parts mein divide ho chuka tha. Pakistan ko water ke silsile mein India ki superiority face karni pad rahi thi. Pakistan samajh chuka tha ke agar usne water ki proper quantity ko control nahi kiya to jaldi woh drought ka shikar hokar tabah o barbaad ho jayega. Kyunki uske sabhi rivers India ke control wale area se guzar kar Pakistan aate the. Lekin Darya-e-Sindh jo water ke hisaab se ek bada river hai aur Ladakh ke area mein India ke under control area se guzarta hai. Jahan uska rukh modna India ke liye impossible tha. Agar Sindh river par dam bana kar uska pani store kar liya jaye to water problem bohot had tak solve ho jayega. Sab se bada problem location ka tha aur uske liye Skardu Valley aur Bhasha par bhi socha gaya, but unke selection mein kai problems thi. Unmein heavy machinery wahan pohnchana, thousands of laborers ki transport aur zaruri maintenance bhi bohot bade problems the. Us time tak yahan road ki construction nahi hui thi. Phir ye jagah aisi thi jo earthquakes ki zone mein rehti thi aur remote thi. In problems ki wajah se unhein reject kar diya gaya. Although yahan dam bananeka sabse bada benefit ye tha ke pani silt aur sediment se thoda clean rehta. Dam ki construction ke liye doosri locations bhi discuss ki gayi. Lower part mein at least do aisi jagah thin jahan dam ki construction ho sakti thi. Lekin uske liye ek bade cultivable area ki sacrifice deni padti. Finally, 14 saal tak is problem ko carefully examine karne ke baad geologists, hydrologists aur economists is conclusion par pohnche ke downstream direction mein last high mountains ke immediately baad Tarbela suitable location hai. Jahan pohnchna doosri jaghon ke muqable mein easy hai. Kyunki ye jagah Islamabad se only 40 miles ke distance par hai. Downstream side par lower areas ke compare mein upar ki valleys ko bhar kar lake banan zyada better ho sakta hai. Kyunki is tarah kam se kam agricultural land submerge hogi. Tarbela ke selection mein ek bada disadvantage bhi tha. Jab yahan Sindh River pohnchta hai to uske pani mein bohot zyada silt aur sediment shamil ho chuki hoti hai. Ye silt aur sediment jo rivers ko bhar dete hain. Sun ki garmi, frost, moisture aur hawa jo mountains se takraati rehti hai. Jiske result mein rocky aur hard rocks ke bade bade pieces apni jagah se alag hokar phisalte hue river mein girte hain. Ye pieces river ke water ki friction ke process se fine particles mein convert ho jaate hain. Jab river ko roka jaata hai to us se pani ki speed kam ho jaati hai aur pani mein shamil silt aur sediment neeche baithna shuru ho jaati hai aur lake is silt se bhar kar pani store karne ke capable nahi rehti. Independence ke baad Eastern rivers se water ki India ki stoppage ki wajah se Pakistan mein agriculture water shortage ka shikar thi aur usay bohot bada threat ho gaya tha. Is threat se deal karne ke liye Government of Pakistan ne country mein dam bananeka plan banaya. Inmein se ek Darya-e-Sindh par dam banane ka plan tha. Jiske liye Attock, Kalabagh aur Tarbela ke areas ko survey kiya gaya. Finally, 1952 mein Tarbela ki location ko dam construction ke liye suitable declare kiya gaya. Is dam ki construction ka matlab tha earth ke is part ke structure ko change karna. Dam ka embankment ready karne ke liye Panama Canal ke liye Isthmus of Panama se excavate ki gayi soil ki quantity ka two-third soil chahiye thi. Ye embankment roughly 2 miles long aur river ke passage se 500 feet high karna tha. Iske liye 186 million soil aur rocks chahiye the. Jismein se almost half soil tunnels aur water flow routes ki excavation se milni thi aur baki ki doosri jaghon se dig kar laani thi. 3 million cubic yards concrete ki zarurat thi. Dam ke upar Darya-e-Sindh ne 50 miles peechay tak, jahan uski valley ki width 100 yards se kam hai, lake form karte hue 11 million water store karna tha. Flood season mein ya jab monsoon rain ki wajah se lake ka level high ho jaye ya upper area mein kisi glacier ke tootne se water mein sudden increase ho jaye, to supplementary spillways ke extra pani ko dam ke neeche traditional passage mein throw kar denge. Iske liye international organizations aur friendly countries se technical aur financial support ki appeal ki gayi. 1967 mein World Bank ne is dam ki construction approve kar di. 1968 mein Tarbela Development Fund establish kiya gaya. Jiske liye donations ke alawa France, Italy, UK, Canada aur World Bank ne loans bhi approve kiye. Usi saal teen Italian aur teen French companies par based ek consortium, Tarbela Joint Venture ko dam construction ka contract diya gaya. 1969 mein consortium mein Germany aur Switzerland ki 7 companies ka group bhi join ho gaya. November 1971 mein ye dam complete ho gaya aur 1977 mein isne kaam start kar diya tha. However, iski full completion 1984 mein hui aur iski cost 149 billion dollar thi. Tarbela Dam ka main purpose irrigation ke liye pani store karna tha. Iske alawa doosre purposes jaise electricity generation aur flood control bhi the. Iske zariye glacier melting aur Sindh River floods se protection provide ki gayi thi. Iske 7 gates mein 650,000 cusecs ki discharge capacity hai. Iske alawa iske 9 special gates ke through 850,000 cusecs flood water discharge kar sakta hai. Is dam mein pani store karne ki capacity ke hisaab se world mein second largest dam hai. Iski lake ki depth 1,550 feet se zyada aur iska usable water 11.62 million acre feet hai aur ismein electricity generation ki capacity 968 megawatts hai. Iske dam ki length 9 thousand feet, maximum height 485 feet (147 meters) aur capacity 18,60,00,000 acre feet (229 cubic kilometers) hai. Darya-e-Sindh aur uske tributary rivers ka average total flow almost 208 cubic kilometers hai. Ismein lakhs of acres land irrigate ho sakti hai. River ke left bank par 45 feet diameter ki 4 tunnels hain. Pehli aur doosri tunnel electricity generating units se connected hain. Teesri tunnel ka purpose bhi electricity generation hai. Chauthi tunnel irrigation ke liye hai. Is project par 10,44,00,00,000 rupees kharch hue. Dam se irrigation aur electricity ke alawa fish industry aur tourism etc. ko bhi promotion mili hai. Baad mein isi dam se ek canal nikal kar Ghazi Barotha ki jagah par further turbines laga kar electricity generate ki jaati hai. Hydro power plant ke turbines right par hain aur ye 14 hain. Ye plant 3,478 megawatts electricity generate karne ki capacity rakhte hain. Har tunnel par 175 megawatts ke 4 generators 1977 mein install kiye gaye the. In tunnels mein 175 megawatts ke generators, 2, 4 (means 2 aur 4) 1982 mein aur baaki ke 2 1985 mein install kiye gaye. 432 megawatts ke 4-4 generators 1992 mein in tunnels mein install kiye gaye the. Dayein bank ki valley wall par 4 tunnels construct ki gayi hain. Inmein se teen tunnels hydro power ke purpose ke liye banayi gayi hain. Jabke chauthi tunnel ka water irrigation ke liye hai. Jabke river ke left bank par paanchvi tunnel banayi ja rahi hai. Ye 1976 mein operational ho gaya aur basically irrigation purposes ke liye use hota hai. Is dam ki construction se river ke lower part par water aur electricity generation ki wajah se Pakistan par positive effects hue. However, pani ki wajah se Sindh aur Punjab mein waterlogging aur salinity jaise issues bhi paida hue. But sabse zyada scary effects is dam ki lands par hue. Unhein apne native areas se homeless hokar doosri jaghon par naye siray se apni lives start karni padi. Most affected people ko government ki taraf se complete compensation nahi mil saka, although 3 colonies ko facilities aur dam ki royalty ke through developmental fund mil raha hai, lekin 1974 ke baad new villages bananewale affected people ki koi care nahi karta. Khallabatt, Kangra aur Ghazi ki new colonies ke alawa Tarbela ke affected people ke groups different districts mein pohnche. Affected people ke basaye gaye new villages mein se kuch famous gaon ke names ye hain: Inke alawa Tarbela ke affected people country ke different cities mein aabaad hain.
Adilabad India ki Andhra Pradesh state ke Adilabad district ka city hai. 2001 ke census ke according, iski population 108,233 hai. Ye Adilabad district ka headquarters hai.
Ahmedabad, Gujarat ka sabse bada city aur India ka 7th largest city hai. World mein sabse fast develop hone wala third city hai. Ye city Sabarmati River ke bank par basa hai. Ahmed naam ke 4 buzurgon ne Sultan Ahmed Shah ke kehne par iski foundation rakhi. Ye city cotton mills ki wajah se India ka Manchester kehlata tha. Lekin ab cotton ki saari mills band ho chuki hain. Yahan Municipal Corporation ke under Urdu medium schools ke 76 primary schools hain. Iski population roughly 52 lakh hai. Ahmedabad city Ahmedabad district ka headquarters bhi hai. Is city mein Sufi saints ke mazaaraat itni zyada tadaad mein hain ke Multan ki tarah isay bhi Madinat-ul-Auliya ke naam se jaana jaata hai. Is city mein hawaon ke saath bohot dust udti hai, ye dekh kar Mughal Emperor Akbar-e-Azam ne isay Girdabad naam diya tha. Ye Gujarat state ka 1970 tak capital bhi raha jise baad mein Gandhinagar shift kar diya gaya. Gandhinagar, Ahmedabad city se 32 km distance par hai. Gujarat ki State Assembly Gandhinagar mein hi hai.
Ahmednagar, India ke Maharashtra state ka ek city hai. Ahmednagar, Ahmednagar district ka headquarters hai. 2011 ke census ke according, iski population 350,905 hai.
Ajmer, jise respect se Ajmer Sharif bolte hain, Rajasthan state ka city aur Ajmer district ka headquarters hai. 2001 ke estimate ke mutabiq, iski population 500,000 logon par thi. India ki Independence se 1st Nov 1956 tak ye Ajmer state ka part tha but baad mein Rajasthan province mein shamil kar diya gaya. Ajmer ek important railway junction hai aur cloth industry ka ek main center hai. Aur is city ki sabse badi reason for fame Hazrat Khawaja Moinuddin Chishti Ajmeri hain. Jinki khanqah public ke liye important place hai.
Mianwali ki tehseel Piplan ki aksariyati aabadi Talokar Jatt qabail ka mojooda maskan Union Council Khola, Bhakra aur Khitta Atlas, Kacha Gujrat hai. Jiska taalluq maazi ki wa'si jungju tareekh rakhne wali qaum Rajput qabile se hai. Is ke alawa zille ke mukhtalif jagahoun par rehaish pazeer yeh qabila sadiyoun se maujooda Mianwali mein aabad chalay aa rahe hain. Zille mein 3 mukhtalif Talokar Horse Riding Club ab bhi maazi ki tareekh se juray huay hain. Khawaja Khan Muhammad Naqshbandi, Aalmi Tehreek Khatm-e-Nabuwat ka ta'aluq Muslim Talokar qabile se tha. Is qabiley ne mulk Pakistan ke do baray mansoobon ke liye do baar apni jageeron aur abadiyon ki qurbani di. Iske alawa Talokar qabail Khushab, Haripur, Bhakkar, Noorpur Thal, Layyah, D.G. Khan, waghaira mein kafi tadad mein aabaad hain. Iski darja zail 6 barri jageerdar khailiyan hain. Darj zail zaili khailiyan hain. Jamale Khel ki zaili khailiyan: Jamale Khel, Masti Khel, Aalu Khel, Lattu Khel, Hussain Khel, Hassan Khel, Bakshay Khel, Keemay Khel, Niazi Khel, Rehmaty Khel, Baqir Khel, Buggey. Dr. Liaqat Ali Khan Niazi ki kitaab Tareekh Mianwali mein Professor Raees Ahmed Arshi likhte hain k, Niaziyon, Khilji, Lodhi ki aamad ka silsila Hindustan par Mahmud Ghaznavi tak ke aaghaz se hota hai.
Is maashre aur mahoul mein jahan koi fard basta hai, us shakhs ki raza ya adam raza aur uska mutma'in ya gair mutma'in hona Quality of Life ke zumre mein aa jata hai. Isko English mein Quality of Life kaha jata hai, ye mayar-e-zindagi se alag magar usi ke zumre se ta'alluq rakhne wali cheez hai aur Quality of Life ka ek bada hissa, mayar-e-zindagi se ta'alluq rakhta hai. Quality of Life ki baat ki jaye toh maashi-o-maali haalat ka khayal zehan mein aata hai magar maali halaat Quality of Life se directly connected nahi ya kam az kam itna kaha ja sakta hai k ye Quality of Life par asar andaz hone wala waahid factor nahi. Gou English mein 'kaifiyat-e-hayaat' ke liye 'Quality of Life' ka word use hota hai magar ghaur se dekhne par ye baat samne aati hai k yahan par 'quality' ka matlab 'mayari' aur 'qeemati' ki nisbat 'kaifiyat' se zyada kareeb hai. Kyun k is shobay mein present life ki baat ki jati hai khwah woh high standard ki ho ya low. Kaifiyat-e-hayaat ko simple words mein yun kaha ja sakta hai k ye un factors ki study hoti hai jo life par asar andaz hote hain aur uske sath hi sath is mein rahat-ul-wajood aur mayar-e-zindagi jaise topics bhi shaamil ho jaate hain. Quality of Life ek multi-factor phenomenon hai jismein, standard of living, financial situation, zaroorat-e-zindagi tak logon ki access, mental sukoon ki haalat, mahol ki sehat aur aazadi ka hona etc. shaamil hote hain. Jaisa k upar ki short definition se andaza kiya ja sakta hai k Quality of Life ek aisa field hai jismein sirf paisa nahi balke insaan ki un basic zarooriyat-e-zindagi se waasta hota hai jo insaan ko haiwaan se alag kar ke usko social animal ke darje mein laane ke liye zaroori hoti hain. Iss article mein baray baray global idaron ke jaari karda mayaron aur developed countries ke scales ka zikr toh majbooran karna hi hoga magar sath hi sath Quality of Life ki un countries ke context ke hawalay se tashreeh bhi shaamil hogi jinke liye, Quality of Life aur mayar-e-zindagi ki baatain karna aiyashi ke zumre mein aati hain, jahan insaan aj bhi is halat mein hain ya rakhay ja rahe hain jis din faqa na guzray toh us raat ka chand, Eid ke hilal ki tarah muskurata nazar aata hai. Kaifiyat-e-Hayat ki study ki importance life ke har shobay mein authenticated hai magar khas taur par medicine and health aur aise fields hain jismein is ilm ke direct implementation se na sirf ye k hospitals ki haalat aur medical facilities ki farahmi ki situation behtar banai ja sakti hai balke ye andaza bhi lagaya ja sakta hai k jo raqam un idaron ko provide ki ja rahi hai kafi hai k nahi? Iska use kin kin places par kiya jaye k patients ki Quality of Life ko behtar banaya ja sakay?
Democritus, ek Greek philosopher jise Father of Physics kaha jata tha, Thrace ke city Abdera mein paida hua. Usne Greek philosopher Leucippus se inspired ho kar universal atomic theory pesh ki jismein bodies aur objects ki movements ki explanation di. Uska nazariya tha ke cheezon ke zaaiqay maslan sheereen, tursh, karwa, sard aur garam as a riwaaj kehte hain aur riwajun colors ko tasleem kiya jata hai. Asal mein sirf ek hi atom aur ek hi space hai. Usne maloom kiya k sirf five senses hi cheezon ki haqeeqat tak guide nahi kar sakte. Uska nazariya tha k particles ya matter azal se maujood hai aur immortal hai. Size aur shape mein difference ho sakta hai lekin nature ke lihaz se ye ek hi hain. Cheezon ki properties mein difference ek hi type ke particles ke size, shape aur movement mein difference ka result hai. Lohe ya pathar mein atoms vibrate karte hain. Hawa mein woh lambe distances cover karte hain. Unlimited space mein atoms har direction mein move karte hain. Ek doosre ke sath takratay hain. Aur similar atoms ya particles ek doosre se mil kar elements banate hain aur in elements se countless worlds bante bigarte hain aur finish ho jaate hain. Philosophical point of view se Democritus ke nazariye ki agarche koi reality na ho, magar ye atomic theory ajkal ke nazariye ke kafi close hai. Woh mushkil masail se unconsciously guzar jata hai. Wohi masail 24 centuries guzar jane ke baad bhi unsolvable hain. Uska nazariya tha k koi cheez bagair reason ke occur nahi hoti. Uski fame ka andaza isi se ho sakta hai k aj tak atom ko Democritean particles kehte hain.
Deemak teen hissay wala keera hai jo cheentiyon se kafi had tak milta julta hai. Yeh insects bhi mil jul kar colonies mein rehte hain. Inki groups mein workers zyada hote hain. Inke ilawa kuch males aur ek ya ek se zyada queens hoti hain. Worker deemak sabse choti aur smart hoti hai aur queens sabse bari. Worker deemak'on ke wings nahi hote. Deemak roshni se nafrat karti hai. Wings wale males ya winged queens sirf barsaat ke mausam mein gharon se bahar aati hain aur hawa mein udti dikhai deti hain. Baaz ke wings khud ba khud gir jaate hain. Parinde unke gird mandlate aur unko pakar pakar kar khaate hain. Jo queen marne se bach jaye woh zameen par gir jaati hai. Uske wings jhar jaate hain ye queen phir se new colony banati hai. Barsaat mein males aur queens hawa mein udti hain worker deemakein in dinon mein apni underground homes se bahar nikalti hain. Magar bohat kam dikhai deti hain. Agar unhein kabhi food jama karne ke liye hole se bahar aana pade toh woh plants aur fibers ko chaba kar aur phir unhein mitti mein mila kar choti choti tunnels bana leti hain taake andar hi andar woh apna kaam kar saken. Kyun k unko roshni se bohot nafrat hai. Deemak ki diet zinda aur murda plants ke fibers hain. Sukhi lakri uska favourite food hai. Yehi wajah hai k gharon ke saman aur books ko ye buri tarah destroy kar deti hai. Anaaj ko chat kar jaati hai. Trees ko bhi bohot damage pohanchati hain. Ganne ke chote plants aur gehun par attack karti hai. Aam ka tree bhi isko bohot pasand hai. Ye ajeeb baat hai k jab tak ye keere zyada nuksaan na kar len, inka pata nahi chalta. Pehle zameen ke neeche holes banate hain phir wahan se tunnels khod kar hamle karte hain. Jab inki banai hui chhatay daar tunnel nazar aa jaye toh us waqt inka pata chalta hai. Ye keere sirf ek hi cheez se darte hain. Aur woh cheez mitti ka tel hai. Jahan jahan ye appear hon wahan mitti ke tel mein neela thotha daal kar pump kar dena chahiye. Lekin fasal par mitti ka tel hargiz na dala jaye. Khet'on mein inke holes search kar ke khode jaen aur unke holes jala diye jaen.
Dinar word Greek-Latin word ki Arabicization hai. Khilafat ke daur mein gold coin ka unit tha. Hazrat Umar (R.A) ke daur-e-khilafat mein dinar ki value 10 dirham thi jo baad mein 12 dirham tak barh gayi. Weight ke hisab se 7 dinar ka weight 10 dirham ke barabar hota hai. Dinar gold ka sikka tha jabke dirham silver ka sikka tha. Dinar ka weight 4.25 grams hota hai aur ye 22 carat ya'ani 91.7 sone ka hota hai. Hazrat Muhammad (S.A.W) ke time mein silver ke Sasani (Irani) aur Greek coins use hua karte thay, jinka weight 3 grams se le kar 3.5 grams hota tha. Arab log iska exchange weight ke hisab se kiya karte thay lekin Hazrat Muhammad (S.A.W) ne ek dinar ka weight ek misqal decide kiya, jo 72 jau ke daanon ke weight ke equal hota hai. Aur modern standard weight ke according iska weight approx 4.25 grams hota hai. Hazrat Umar Farooq (R.A) ke daur mein in sikkon ko standardized kiya gaya aur iske weight ko ek misqal tak laya gaya. Aur aap (R.A) ne ek standard set kiya k 7 dinar ka weight 10 dirham ke equal ho. Lehaza ek dirham ka weight taqreeban 2.975 grams (approx 3 grams) hota hai. Usman Ghani (R.A) ke time mein is par Bismillah likha gaya. Ali al-Murtaza (R.A) aur Abdullah ibn al-Zubair (R.A) aur Ameer Muawiyah (R.A) ne first time apne coins issue kiye. Baad mein Umayyad Khalifa Abdul Malik ibn Marwan ne Muslims mein properly apne coins mint karna shuru kiye. Jinka weight bohot care ke sath 2.975 grams (approx 3 grams) rakha gaya. Dinar ka weight ek misqal hota hai. Jiska weight 72 jau ke danon ke weight ke barabar hota hai, jo 25.4 gram ke equal hota hai. Hazrat Umar ke set kiye gaye standard ke mutabiq 7 dinar ka weight 10 dirham ke barabar ho, toh ek dirham ka weight approx 2.975 gram (approx 3 gram) hota hai. Aur iski purity minimum 22 carat (ya'ani 7.91 percent) honi chahiye. Dinar ke bohat se uses hain. Jin mein se kuch neeche likhe hain: Gold dinar ke bohat se benefits hain, jin mein se chand ek darj zail hain: Ya'ani us time mein jab koi government ya king country ka khazana loot lete hain toh phir unke paas sarkari employees wagaira ko salary dene ke liye paise (paper currency) kam pad jate hain toh woh zyada paper currency print kar dete hain taake employees ko salaries di ja saken toh paper currency ki value mein kami ho jati hai, lehaza agar kisi worker ne last 10 saalon mein 1 lakh rupay jama kiye hain. Tou government ki paper currency ki zyada printing se ab uske 1 lakh rupay ki value 50, 60 hazaar rupay hogi. Lehaza us worker ki aadhi wealth government ne grab kar li aur us bichare ko pata hi nahi k asal mein kya hua uske sath. Lehaza paper currency ki zyada printing ke through duniya ki har government apni public ki wealth ko lootne ke liye use karti hain. Isi liye agar currency gold ki ho toh government ke liye possible nahi k zyada currency ko print kar sake kyun k ab currency paper ki nahi balke gold ki hai. Lehaza gold aur silver se bani currency se public ki wealth, government aur International Monetary Fund (IMF) ke fraud se safe rehti hai. Ya'ani is era mein currency ko enemy country ki economy destroy karne ke liye use kiya jata hai. Enemy country apki currency ko print kar ke apke country ki market mein lata hai, toh apke mulk mein currency zyada ho jati hai, jiski wajah se uski value mein kami ho jati hai aur country ka paisa destroy ho jata hai, jiski wajah se economy kharab ho jati hai. But is system mein ye possible nahi jahan currency gold aur silver se bani ho. Chunancha duniya ka sabse sustainable economic system ek aisa system ho sakta hai jismein currency ki value mein kami na ho, ya'ani currency ki real value uske andar ho.
Hazrat Essa (A.S) ki paidaish se taqreeban 200 saal pehle China ke king Qin Shi Huang ne apne country ko enemies ke attacks se safe karne ke liye North border par ek wall banane ki desire ki. Is wall ki starting China aur Manchukuo ke border ke paas se ki gayi. Us zamanay mein Huns aur Tatars China ke bare dushman thay, jo Central Asia mein kafi powerful samjhe jaate thay. Ye wall Gulf of Liaodong se Mongolia aur Tibet ke border area tak phaili hui hai. Iski length approximately 13,170 miles hai aur ye different areas mein 20 se le kar 30 feet tak high hai. Foundation ke kareeb iski width 25 feet aur upar se 12 feet ke kareeb hai. Har 200 yards ke distance par security guards ke liye strong shelters bane huay hain.
Jab individuals ya companies ye dekhte hain k woh apne loans ki payment se unable hain toh law beech mein aa jata hai aur khud debtor ya uske creditors mein se koi ek court mein bankruptcy ki application de deta hai aur Civil Judge recovery ka order issue kar deta hai. Iske mutabiq ek officer debtor ki property apne control mein le leta hai. Debtor apne haalat ke mutalliq affidavit deta hai aur uske cases ki proper investigation shuru ho jati hai. Creditors meeting organize kar ke debtor ko us mein bulate hain. Is mein compromise ka bhi chance hota hai. Loan payment ka agreement accept kar liya jata hai. Agreement ki soorat mein debtor agree kar leta hai k woh for example rupay mein 15 aane ya 12 aane apne creditors ko pay kar dega. Jise ye log accept kar lete hain. Lekin agreement na hone ki soorat mein court debtor ko law ke mutabiq bankrupt declare kar deti hai. Aur creditors uski property ke liye kisi shakhs ko trustee appoint karte hain. Bankrupt trustee ko sari property se inform karta hai. Trustee accounts ka review karta hai. Accounts mein fraud se aur property ko sell kar ke creditors ke demands jis had tak poore kiye ja sakte hon, poore karta hai. Aise debtor ko bankrupt kaha jata hai. Ancient Hindus mein koi businessman agar kangal ho jata aur apne debts pay na kar sakta toh woh apne shop ke aage ek din subha sawere do diye jala kar rakh deta jisse doosre businessmen aur log samajh jate k ye shakhs kangal ho chuka hai. Sympathy mein doosre businessmen chand din apni shops band kar lete taake customers unki taraf attract hon aur unki cash help bhi kar dete thay.
Jacobabad Pakistan ke Sindh province ka ek city hai jo Jacobabad District aur Jacobabad Tehsil ka headquarters bhi hai. Jacobabad Sindh aur Balochistan ke border ke paas Sukkur se Quetta jane wali highway par located hai. Jacobabad Pakistan ke hottest area mein located hai jahan summer mein temperature 52 degree Celsius se bhi cross kar jaata hai. Is district ka naam British Raj ke time ke regional English ruler General John Jacob ke naam par hai. Isse pehle ye area Khan Garh kehlata tha, but area ke liye English General ki services ke badle is area ko Jacobabad naam diya gaya. Jacobabad Sindh aur Balochistan ke junction par located hai aur Balochistan ko Sindh se join karne wala ek important route yahin se guzarta hai. Isliye Jacobabad ka railway station ek important stopover hai jahan se Sukkur aur Larkana se aane wali trains Quetta aur Balochistan ke doosre areas ko jaati hain. Also, Jacobabad District National Highway ke through country ke doosre areas se connected hai. Yahan se daily basis par Karachi, Lahore, Islamabad aur Quetta ke liye trains aur buses etc. chalti hain. Jacobabad ka Shahbaz Air Base Pakistan Air Force ke under hai but yahan se passenger flights bhi operate ki jaati hain. War on terror mein America ke ally ke taur par Pakistan ne ye air base US forces ke hawalay kiya hai, jinhon ne Afghan War mein opponents ke targets ko hit karne aur apne soldiers ko supply deliver karne ke liye is air base ka poora use kiya. Aaj bhi American military personnel aur airplanes ki big quantity is base par available hai.
Rohri Pakistan ke Sindh province ka town hai jo Sukkur District mein Darya-e-Sindh ke bank par located hai. Sukkur city is town se only 5 km distance par hai, beech mein sirf Darya-e-Sindh hai. Ye town apne railway station ki wajah se famous hai jo Pakistan Railways ka important railway station aur Rohri-Quetta via Jacobabad, Sibi Branch railway line ka junction hai. Is city ke baare mein ek kahawat famous hai ke yahan ki mitti mein almost 1.25 lakh Auliya-e-Karam aur Buzurgan-e-Deen dafan hain, jiski wajah se is city ko Rohri Sharif bhi kehte hain. Rohri city ko Aroor Rajkumar Dhaj Ror Kumar ne 5th century BC mein banwaya tha jo uske naam par hi Aroor kehlaya. 8th century AD mein Aroor family ke baad Rai family aur Brahmins ne rule kiya. 711 mein Aroor par Muslim General Muhammad bin Qasim ki army ne kabza kar liya. 962 mein ek huge earthquake ne city ko tabah kar diya jiski wajah se Darya-e-Sindh ka course bhi change ho gaya. Historians ke according bhi is city ke aabaad hone ki reason Darya-e-Sindh ka apne pehle spot Alor, jise ab Aroor kehte hain, se flow karna band hokar apna course change karte hue current Bhakkar island se flow karna bataya jaata hai. 335 Hijri mein Darya-e-Sindh ka direction change hone ki wajah se Aroor ke residents ne migrate kar ke Bhakkar island ke around rehna shuru kiya, jiski wajah se ye city aabaad hua. Historical references ke according Rohri ko pehle Lohri ya Loharkot kehte the, Rohri ka current name actually 'Rori' se bana hai, jiska matlab 'chhota pathar' ya 'pahadi' hai. 1200 AD mein Rohri Darya-e-Sindh ke bank par ek busy port ka status rakhta tha. Weather-wise, Rohri city mein garmi bohot hoti hai jabke sardi bhi kafi hoti hai. Ye city roughly 10 square kilometer area par phaila hua hai. Rohri city ke aabaad hone ke baare mein Sindh Gazetteer ke according, Rohri city ko Syed Ruknuddin ne 996 Hijri (1297 AD) mein banwaya tha but later research ke mutabiq ye pre-Christ era ka ek city hai aur Sehwan aur Thatta ka contemporary hai. Ye teeno cities apne time mein knowledge, literature aur civilization ke important centers the. Rohri city Thatta, Shikarpur aur Sehwan cities se kafi similar hai. Geographically bhi Rohri apni unique identity rakhta hai. Iske West mein gardens, South mein hills, North mein Darya-e-Sindh jabke East mein desert hai. River ke bank par hone ki wajah se is city ki nights bohot thandi aur pleasant hoti hain. Iska architecture old buildings par based hai. City ki streets upar aur neeche ki taraf bani hui hain.
Jamshoro Pakistan ke Sindh province ka ek city hai jo Jamshoro District mein Darya-e-Sindh ke side par located hai. Ye Jamshoro District ka headquarters hai. Is city mein Sindh University, Mehran University of Science and Technology aur Liaquat Medical University hain. Education ke hisaab se Jamshoro ek best city hai.
Kotri, Sindh province, Pakistan ka ek city hai jo Jamshoro District mein Darya-e-Sindh ke paas basa Hazrat Riaz Ahmed Gohar Shahi ka city hai, isliye isay Kotri Sharif bhi kehte hain. Ye Kotri Tehsil ka headquarters bhi hai. National Highway is city ke beech se aur Super Highway iske close se guzarti hain aur isko Hyderabad, Karachi, Sukkur, Lahore, Islamabad, Peshawar aur Pakistan ke doosre bade cities se connect karti hain. Kotri Railway Station Pakistan Railways ki Karachi-Peshawar main railway line par Kotri ke beech mein located hai. Yahan kuch express trains stop karti hain. Ye Kotri-Habib Kot via Larkana Branch railway line ka junction bhi hai.
Larkana ek city hai Sindh province, Pakistan mein, jo Larkana District mein hai aur Darya-e-Sindh ke west side par hai. Larkana city ke trade centers mein Resham Gali, Shahi Bazaar, Sabzi Mandi, Gelus Bazaar, Siddiqui Bazaar, Khataar Bazaar, Sarrafa Bazaar, Bandar Road, Pakistan Chowk, Lahori Mohalla aur Ghalla Mandi etc. shamil hain. City mein jo important mohalle hain, woh neeche diye gaye hain. Ye Larkana District aur Larkana Tehsil ka headquarters bhi hai. Iske 4 tehsils hain. Larkana Railway Station Pakistan Railways ki Kotri-Habib Kot Branch railway line par Larkana ke beech located hai. Yahan sabhi express trains stop karti hain. Larkana Pakistan ke hottest areas mein count hota hai jahan 31 May 1998 ko temperature 52.2 degree record kiya gaya tha but Larkana mein 6 Jan 2006 ko logon ne ek aisa din dekha jab itni sardi thi ke temperature minus 1 degree ho gaya.
Kashmore Pakistan ke Sindh province ka town hai jo Kashmore District mein located hai. Ye town Punjab aur Balochistan ke border par located ek important business city hai.
Tando Allahyar Pakistan ke Sindh province ke Tando Allahyar District, Hyderabad Division mein located ek town hai.
Sindh ke Tando Muhammad Khan District aur Tando Muhammad Khan Taluka ka headquarters, ek city Badin Hyderabad Branch line par ek railway station hai. Sea level se 36 feet high ye city Hyderabad se 35 km, Karachi se 168 km aur Badin se 50 km distance par hai. Mir Muhammad Khan Talpur Shahwani ne ye area 1856 mein aabaad kiya. 1856 mein Municipality ka status mila. April 2005 mein District status mila, isse pehle Hyderabad District mein shamil tha. 4 big sugar mills hain. Ye city Phuleli Canal ke right side par located hai. District mein 8 police stations hain, 2012 mein Sessions Court bana.
Mangla Dam Pakistan ka second largest dam hai. World mein iska 7th number hai. Ye Mirpur District aur Jhelum District ke gaon Sultanpur mein located hai. River Jhelum Koh-e-Himalaya Pir Panjal ke daaman mein Spring Verinag se nikal kar Srinagar ki Dal Lake se water leta hua River Jhelum Srinagar ke paas se guzarta hua Wular Lake mein gir jaata hai. Hilly area hone ki wajah se iska path narrow hota jaata hai. Isko Chakothi mein Line of Control se Muzaffarabad aur Kohala tak observe kiya ja sakta hai. River Jhelum Muzaffarabad mein River Neelum se Domel ki jagah par milta hai jiski wajah se is place ko hi Domel bolte hain aur Muzaffarabad ke hi ek spot Rara Mustafaabad se Naran Kaghan Valley ke Kunhar River se mil kar River Poonch mein shamil ho jaata hai. River Jhelum AJK Mirpur District aur Jhelum District ke gaon Sultanpur pohnch kar plains se flow karta hua south-west ko flow karta hua Trimmu Barrage ki jagah par River Chenab se mil jaata hai. Ye Western Punjab ke rivers mein se important river hai. Ye sab rivers Panjnad ke paas Darya-e-Sindh mein mil jaate hain. Jhelum ke gaon Sultanpur ki jagah par ek dam banaya gaya hai aur River Jhelum ka pani is dam mein aata hai. Isko Mangla Dam kehte hain. Iska pani irrigation aur electricity generate karne ke liye use hota hai. River Jhelum Pakistan mein Jhelum, Malakwal aur Khushab ke plain areas se flow karta hua Jhang District mein Trimmu ki jagah par River Chenab mein shamil ho jaata hai. River Jhelum par 1967 mein Sultanpur gaon ki jagah par Mangla Dam banaya gaya aur ismein 5.9 million acre water store kiya ja sakta hai. Usi river par 1967 mein Rasul Barrage banaya gaya. River Jhelum se do canals nikaali gayi hain. Lower Jhelum Canal 1901 mein Gujarat District ke Rasul spot se nikaali gayi. Iski mazeed do branches Kharadar Machine se Jhang District ka northern part irrigate hota hai. Upper Jhelum 1915 mein banayi gayi, iska pani Mangla se River Chenab tak jaata hai. Is dam ko 2007 mein 30 feet aur high kiya gaya hai.
Tarbela Dam ek multi-purpose dam hai jo Mangla Dam se double, Aswan Dam Egypt se triple aur world mein earth-fill ka sabse bada dam hai. Ye dam Tarbela, Swabi District, Pakistan mein located hai. Partition ke time Lower Sindh aur uske tributary rivers par Britishers ka banaya hua irrigation system do parts mein divide ho chuka tha. Pakistan ko water ke silsile mein India ki superiority face karni pad rahi thi. Pakistan samajh chuka tha ke agar usne water ki proper quantity ko control nahi kiya to jaldi woh drought ka shikar hokar tabah o barbaad ho jayega. Kyunki uske sabhi rivers India ke control wale area se guzar kar Pakistan aate the. Lekin Darya-e-Sindh jo water ke hisaab se ek bada river hai aur Ladakh ke area mein India ke under control area se guzarta hai. Jahan uska rukh modna India ke liye impossible tha. Agar Sindh river par dam bana kar uska pani store kar liya jaye to water problem bohot had tak solve ho jayega. Sab se bada problem location ka tha aur uske liye Skardu Valley aur Bhasha par bhi socha gaya, but unke selection mein kai problems thi. Unmein heavy machinery wahan pohnchana, thousands of laborers ki transport aur zaruri maintenance bhi bohot bade problems the. Us time tak yahan road ki construction nahi hui thi. Phir ye jagah aisi thi jo earthquakes ki zone mein rehti thi aur remote thi. In problems ki wajah se unhein reject kar diya gaya. Although yahan dam bananeka sabse bada benefit ye tha ke pani silt aur sediment se thoda clean rehta. Dam ki construction ke liye doosri locations bhi discuss ki gayi. Lower part mein at least do aisi jagah thin jahan dam ki construction ho sakti thi. Lekin uske liye ek bade cultivable area ki sacrifice deni padti. Finally, 14 saal tak is problem ko carefully examine karne ke baad geologists, hydrologists aur economists is conclusion par pohnche ke downstream direction mein last high mountains ke immediately baad Tarbela suitable location hai. Jahan pohnchna doosri jaghon ke muqable mein easy hai. Kyunki ye jagah Islamabad se only 40 miles ke distance par hai. Downstream side par lower areas ke compare mein upar ki valleys ko bhar kar lake banan zyada better ho sakta hai. Kyunki is tarah kam se kam agricultural land submerge hogi. Tarbela ke selection mein ek bada disadvantage bhi tha. Jab yahan Sindh River pohnchta hai to uske pani mein bohot zyada silt aur sediment shamil ho chuki hoti hai. Ye silt aur sediment jo rivers ko bhar dete hain. Sun ki garmi, frost, moisture aur hawa jo mountains se takraati rehti hai. Jiske result mein rocky aur hard rocks ke bade bade pieces apni jagah se alag hokar phisalte hue river mein girte hain. Ye pieces river ke water ki friction ke process se fine particles mein convert ho jaate hain. Jab river ko roka jaata hai to us se pani ki speed kam ho jaati hai aur pani mein shamil silt aur sediment neeche baithna shuru ho jaati hai aur lake is silt se bhar kar pani store karne ke capable nahi rehti. Independence ke baad Eastern rivers se water ki India ki stoppage ki wajah se Pakistan mein agriculture water shortage ka shikar thi aur usay bohot bada threat ho gaya tha. Is threat se deal karne ke liye Government of Pakistan ne country mein dam bananeka plan banaya. Inmein se ek Darya-e-Sindh par dam banane ka plan tha. Jiske liye Attock, Kalabagh aur Tarbela ke areas ko survey kiya gaya. Finally, 1952 mein Tarbela ki location ko dam construction ke liye suitable declare kiya gaya. Is dam ki construction ka matlab tha earth ke is part ke structure ko change karna. Dam ka embankment ready karne ke liye Panama Canal ke liye Isthmus of Panama se excavate ki gayi soil ki quantity ka two-third soil chahiye thi. Ye embankment roughly 2 miles long aur river ke passage se 500 feet high karna tha. Iske liye 186 million soil aur rocks chahiye the. Jismein se almost half soil tunnels aur water flow routes ki excavation se milni thi aur baki ki doosri jaghon se dig kar laani thi. 3 million cubic yards concrete ki zarurat thi. Dam ke upar Darya-e-Sindh ne 50 miles peechay tak, jahan uski valley ki width 100 yards se kam hai, lake form karte hue 11 million water store karna tha. Flood season mein ya jab monsoon rain ki wajah se lake ka level high ho jaye ya upper area mein kisi glacier ke tootne se water mein sudden increase ho jaye, to supplementary spillways ke extra pani ko dam ke neeche traditional passage mein throw kar denge. Iske liye international organizations aur friendly countries se technical aur financial support ki appeal ki gayi. 1967 mein World Bank ne is dam ki construction approve kar di. 1968 mein Tarbela Development Fund establish kiya gaya. Jiske liye donations ke alawa France, Italy, UK, Canada aur World Bank ne loans bhi approve kiye. Usi saal teen Italian aur teen French companies par based ek consortium, Tarbela Joint Venture ko dam construction ka contract diya gaya. 1969 mein consortium mein Germany aur Switzerland ki 7 companies ka group bhi join ho gaya. November 1971 mein ye dam complete ho gaya aur 1977 mein isne kaam start kar diya tha. However, iski full completion 1984 mein hui aur iski cost 149 billion dollar thi. Tarbela Dam ka main purpose irrigation ke liye pani store karna tha. Iske alawa doosre purposes jaise electricity generation aur flood control bhi the. Iske zariye glacier melting aur Sindh River floods se protection provide ki gayi thi. Iske 7 gates mein 650,000 cusecs ki discharge capacity hai. Iske alawa iske 9 special gates ke through 850,000 cusecs flood water discharge kar sakta hai. Is dam mein pani store karne ki capacity ke hisaab se world mein second largest dam hai. Iski lake ki depth 1,550 feet se zyada aur iska usable water 11.62 million acre feet hai aur ismein electricity generation ki capacity 968 megawatts hai. Iske dam ki length 9 thousand feet, maximum height 485 feet (147 meters) aur capacity 18,60,00,000 acre feet (229 cubic kilometers) hai. Darya-e-Sindh aur uske tributary rivers ka average total flow almost 208 cubic kilometers hai. Ismein lakhs of acres land irrigate ho sakti hai. River ke left bank par 45 feet diameter ki 4 tunnels hain. Pehli aur doosri tunnel electricity generating units se connected hain. Teesri tunnel ka purpose bhi electricity generation hai. Chauthi tunnel irrigation ke liye hai. Is project par 10,44,00,00,000 rupees kharch hue. Dam se irrigation aur electricity ke alawa fish industry aur tourism etc. ko bhi promotion mili hai. Baad mein isi dam se ek canal nikal kar Ghazi Barotha ki jagah par further turbines laga kar electricity generate ki jaati hai. Hydro power plant ke turbines right par hain aur ye 14 hain. Ye plant 3,478 megawatts electricity generate karne ki capacity rakhte hain. Har tunnel par 175 megawatts ke 4 generators 1977 mein install kiye gaye the. In tunnels mein 175 megawatts ke generators, 2, 4 (means 2 aur 4) 1982 mein aur baaki ke 2 1985 mein install kiye gaye. 432 megawatts ke 4-4 generators 1992 mein in tunnels mein install kiye gaye the. Dayein bank ki valley wall par 4 tunnels construct ki gayi hain. Inmein se teen tunnels hydro power ke purpose ke liye banayi gayi hain. Jabke chauthi tunnel ka water irrigation ke liye hai. Jabke river ke left bank par paanchvi tunnel banayi ja rahi hai. Ye 1976 mein operational ho gaya aur basically irrigation purposes ke liye use hota hai. Is dam ki construction se river ke lower part par water aur electricity generation ki wajah se Pakistan par positive effects hue. However, pani ki wajah se Sindh aur Punjab mein waterlogging aur salinity jaise issues bhi paida hue. But sabse zyada scary effects is dam ki lands par hue. Unhein apne native areas se homeless hokar doosri jaghon par naye siray se apni lives start karni padi. Most affected people ko government ki taraf se complete compensation nahi mil saka, although 3 colonies ko facilities aur dam ki royalty ke through developmental fund mil raha hai, lekin 1974 ke baad new villages bananewale affected people ki koi care nahi karta. Khallabatt, Kangra aur Ghazi ki new colonies ke alawa Tarbela ke affected people ke groups different districts mein pohnche. Affected people ke basaye gaye new villages mein se kuch famous gaon ke names ye hain: Inke alawa Tarbela ke affected people country ke different cities mein aabaad hain.
Adilabad India ki Andhra Pradesh state ke Adilabad district ka city hai. 2001 ke census ke according, iski population 108,233 hai. Ye Adilabad district ka headquarters hai.
Ahmedabad, Gujarat ka sabse bada city aur India ka 7th largest city hai. World mein sabse fast develop hone wala third city hai. Ye city Sabarmati River ke bank par basa hai. Ahmed naam ke 4 buzurgon ne Sultan Ahmed Shah ke kehne par iski foundation rakhi. Ye city cotton mills ki wajah se India ka Manchester kehlata tha. Lekin ab cotton ki saari mills band ho chuki hain. Yahan Municipal Corporation ke under Urdu medium schools ke 76 primary schools hain. Iski population roughly 52 lakh hai. Ahmedabad city Ahmedabad district ka headquarters bhi hai. Is city mein Sufi saints ke mazaaraat itni zyada tadaad mein hain ke Multan ki tarah isay bhi Madinat-ul-Auliya ke naam se jaana jaata hai. Is city mein hawaon ke saath bohot dust udti hai, ye dekh kar Mughal Emperor Akbar-e-Azam ne isay Girdabad naam diya tha. Ye Gujarat state ka 1970 tak capital bhi raha jise baad mein Gandhinagar shift kar diya gaya. Gandhinagar, Ahmedabad city se 32 km distance par hai. Gujarat ki State Assembly Gandhinagar mein hi hai.
Ahmednagar, India ke Maharashtra state ka ek city hai. Ahmednagar, Ahmednagar district ka headquarters hai. 2011 ke census ke according, iski population 350,905 hai.
Ajmer, jise respect se Ajmer Sharif bolte hain, Rajasthan state ka city aur Ajmer district ka headquarters hai. 2001 ke estimate ke mutabiq, iski population 500,000 logon par thi. India ki Independence se 1st Nov 1956 tak ye Ajmer state ka part tha but baad mein Rajasthan province mein shamil kar diya gaya. Ajmer ek important railway junction hai aur cloth industry ka ek main center hai. Aur is city ki sabse badi reason for fame Hazrat Khawaja Moinuddin Chishti Ajmeri hain. Jinki khanqah public ke liye important place hai.
Mianwali ki tehseel Piplan ki aksariyati aabadi Talokar Jatt qabail ka mojooda maskan Union Council Khola, Bhakra aur Khitta Atlas, Kacha Gujrat hai. Jiska taalluq maazi ki wa'si jungju tareekh rakhne wali qaum Rajput qabile se hai. Is ke alawa zille ke mukhtalif jagahoun par rehaish pazeer yeh qabila sadiyoun se maujooda Mianwali mein aabad chalay aa rahe hain.
