Zille mein 3 mukhtalif Talokar Horse Riding Club ab bhi maazi ki tareekh se juray huay hain. Khawaja Khan Muhammad Naqshbandi, Aalmi Tehreek Khatm-e-Nabuwat ka ta'aluq Muslim Talokar qabile se tha. Is qabiley ne mulk Pakistan ke do baray mansoobon ke liye do baar apni jageeron aur abadiyon ki qurbani di. Iske alawa Talokar qabail Khushab, Haripur, Bhakkar, Noorpur Thal, Layyah, D.G. Khan, waghaira mein kafi tadad mein aabaad hain. Iski darja zail 6 barri jageerdar khailiyan hain. Darj zail zaili khailiyan hain. Jamale Khel ki zaili khailiyan: Jamale Khel, Masti Khel, Aalu Khel, Lattu Khel, Hussain Khel, Hassan Khel, Bakshay Khel, Keemay Khel, Niazi Khel, Rehmaty Khel, Baqir Khel, Buggey. Dr. Liaqat Ali Khan Niazi ki kitaab Tareekh Mianwali mein Professor Raees Ahmed Arshi likhte hain k, Niaziyon, Khilji, Lodhi ki aamad ka silsila Hindustan par Mahmud Ghaznavi tak ke aaghaz se hota hai.
Is maashre aur mahoul mein jahan koi fard basta hai, us shakhs ki raza ya adam raza aur uska mutma'in ya gair mutma'in hona Quality of Life ke zumre mein aa jata hai. Isko English mein Quality of Life kaha jata hai, ye mayar-e-zindagi se alag magar usi ke zumre se ta'alluq rakhne wali cheez hai aur Quality of Life ka ek bada hissa, mayar-e-zindagi se ta'alluq rakhta hai. Quality of Life ki baat ki jaye toh maashi-o-maali haalat ka khayal zehan mein aata hai magar maali halaat Quality of Life se directly connected nahi ya kam az kam itna kaha ja sakta hai k ye Quality of Life par asar andaz hone wala waahid factor nahi. Gou English mein 'kaifiyat-e-hayaat' ke liye 'Quality of Life' ka word use hota hai magar ghaur se dekhne par ye baat samne aati hai k yahan par 'quality' ka matlab 'mayari' aur 'qeemati' ki nisbat 'kaifiyat' se zyada kareeb hai. Kyun k is shobay mein present life ki baat ki jati hai khwah woh high standard ki ho ya low. Kaifiyat-e-hayaat ko simple words mein yun kaha ja sakta hai k ye un factors ki study hoti hai jo life par asar andaz hote hain aur uske sath hi sath is mein rahat-ul-wajood aur mayar-e-zindagi jaise topics bhi shaamil ho jaate hain. Quality of Life ek multi-factor phenomenon hai jismein, standard of living, financial situation, zaroorat-e-zindagi tak logon ki access, mental sukoon ki haalat, mahol ki sehat aur aazadi ka hona etc. shaamil hote hain. Jaisa k upar ki short definition se andaza kiya ja sakta hai k Quality of Life ek aisa field hai jismein sirf paisa nahi balke insaan ki un basic zarooriyat-e-zindagi se waasta hota hai jo insaan ko haiwaan se alag kar ke usko social animal ke darje mein laane ke liye zaroori hoti hain. Iss article mein baray baray global idaron ke jaari karda mayaron aur developed countries ke scales ka zikr toh majbooran karna hi hoga magar sath hi sath Quality of Life ki un countries ke context ke hawalay se tashreeh bhi shaamil hogi jinke liye, Quality of Life aur mayar-e-zindagi ki baatain karna aiyashi ke zumre mein aati hain, jahan insaan aj bhi is halat mein hain ya rakhay ja rahe hain jis din faqa na guzray toh us raat ka chand, Eid ke hilal ki tarah muskurata nazar aata hai. Kaifiyat-e-Hayat ki study ki importance life ke har shobay mein authenticated hai magar khas taur par medicine and health aur aise fields hain jismein is ilm ke direct implementation se na sirf ye k hospitals ki haalat aur medical facilities ki farahmi ki situation behtar banai ja sakti hai balke ye andaza bhi lagaya ja sakta hai k jo raqam un idaron ko provide ki ja rahi hai kafi hai k nahi? Iska use kin kin places par kiya jaye k patients ki Quality of Life ko behtar banaya ja sakay?
Democritus, ek Greek philosopher jise Father of Physics kaha jata tha, Thrace ke city Abdera mein paida hua. Usne Greek philosopher Leucippus se inspired ho kar universal atomic theory pesh ki jismein bodies aur objects ki movements ki explanation di. Uska nazariya tha ke cheezon ke zaaiqay maslan sheereen, tursh, karwa, sard aur garam as a riwaaj kehte hain aur riwajun colors ko tasleem kiya jata hai. Asal mein sirf ek hi atom aur ek hi space hai. Usne maloom kiya k sirf five senses hi cheezon ki haqeeqat tak guide nahi kar sakte. Uska nazariya tha k particles ya matter azal se maujood hai aur immortal hai. Size aur shape mein difference ho sakta hai lekin nature ke lihaz se ye ek hi hain. Cheezon ki properties mein difference ek hi type ke particles ke size, shape aur movement mein difference ka result hai. Lohe ya pathar mein atoms vibrate karte hain. Hawa mein woh lambe distances cover karte hain. Unlimited space mein atoms har direction mein move karte hain. Ek doosre ke sath takratay hain. Aur similar atoms ya particles ek doosre se mil kar elements banate hain aur in elements se countless worlds bante bigarte hain aur finish ho jaate hain. Philosophical point of view se Democritus ke nazariye ki agarche koi reality na ho, magar ye atomic theory ajkal ke nazariye ke kafi close hai. Woh mushkil masail se unconsciously guzar jata hai. Wohi masail 24 centuries guzar jane ke baad bhi unsolvable hain. Uska nazariya tha k koi cheez bagair reason ke occur nahi hoti. Uski fame ka andaza isi se ho sakta hai k aj tak atom ko Democritean particles kehte hain.
Deemak teen hissay wala keera hai jo cheentiyon se kafi had tak milta julta hai. Yeh insects bhi mil jul kar colonies mein rehte hain. Inki groups mein workers zyada hote hain. Inke ilawa kuch males aur ek ya ek se zyada queens hoti hain. Worker deemak sabse choti aur smart hoti hai aur queens sabse bari. Worker deemak'on ke wings nahi hote. Deemak roshni se nafrat karti hai. Wings wale males ya winged queens sirf barsaat ke mausam mein gharon se bahar aati hain aur hawa mein udti dikhai deti hain. Baaz ke wings khud ba khud gir jaate hain. Parinde unke gird mandlate aur unko pakar pakar kar khaate hain. Jo queen marne se bach jaye woh zameen par gir jaati hai. Uske wings jhar jaate hain ye queen phir se new colony banati hai. Barsaat mein males aur queens hawa mein udti hain worker deemakein in dinon mein apni underground homes se bahar nikalti hain. Magar bohat kam dikhai deti hain. Agar unhein kabhi food jama karne ke liye hole se bahar aana pade toh woh plants aur fibers ko chaba kar aur phir unhein mitti mein mila kar choti choti tunnels bana leti hain taake andar hi andar woh apna kaam kar saken. Kyun k unko roshni se bohot nafrat hai. Deemak ki diet zinda aur murda plants ke fibers hain. Sukhi lakri uska favourite food hai. Yehi wajah hai k gharon ke saman aur books ko ye buri tarah destroy kar deti hai. Anaaj ko chat kar jaati hai. Trees ko bhi bohot damage pohanchati hain. Ganne ke chote plants aur gehun par attack karti hai. Aam ka tree bhi isko bohot pasand hai. Ye ajeeb baat hai k jab tak ye keere zyada nuksaan na kar len, inka pata nahi chalta. Pehle zameen ke neeche holes banate hain phir wahan se tunnels khod kar hamle karte hain. Jab inki banai hui chhatay daar tunnel nazar aa jaye toh us waqt inka pata chalta hai. Ye keere sirf ek hi cheez se darte hain. Aur woh cheez mitti ka tel hai. Jahan jahan ye appear hon wahan mitti ke tel mein neela thotha daal kar pump kar dena chahiye. Lekin fasal par mitti ka tel hargiz na dala jaye. Khet'on mein inke holes search kar ke khode jaen aur unke holes jala diye jaen.
Dinar word Greek-Latin word ki Arabicization hai. Khilafat ke daur mein gold coin ka unit tha. Hazrat Umar (R.A) ke daur-e-khilafat mein dinar ki value 10 dirham thi jo baad mein 12 dirham tak barh gayi. Weight ke hisab se 7 dinar ka weight 10 dirham ke barabar hota hai. Dinar gold ka sikka tha jabke dirham silver ka sikka tha. Dinar ka weight 4.25 grams hota hai aur ye 22 carat ya'ani 91.7 sone ka hota hai. Hazrat Muhammad (S.A.W) ke time mein silver ke Sasani (Irani) aur Greek coins use hua karte thay, jinka weight 3 grams se le kar 3.5 grams hota tha. Arab log iska exchange weight ke hisab se kiya karte thay lekin Hazrat Muhammad (S.A.W) ne ek dinar ka weight ek misqal decide kiya, jo 72 jau ke daanon ke weight ke equal hota hai. Aur modern standard weight ke according iska weight approx 4.25 grams hota hai. Hazrat Umar Farooq (R.A) ke daur mein in sikkon ko standardized kiya gaya aur iske weight ko ek misqal tak laya gaya. Aur aap (R.A) ne ek standard set kiya k 7 dinar ka weight 10 dirham ke equal ho. Lehaza ek dirham ka weight taqreeban 2.975 grams (approx 3 grams) hota hai. Usman Ghani (R.A) ke time mein is par Bismillah likha gaya. Ali al-Murtaza (R.A) aur Abdullah ibn al-Zubair (R.A) aur Ameer Muawiyah (R.A) ne first time apne coins issue kiye. Baad mein Umayyad Khalifa Abdul Malik ibn Marwan ne Muslims mein properly apne coins mint karna shuru kiye. Jinka weight bohot care ke sath 2.975 grams (approx 3 grams) rakha gaya. Dinar ka weight ek misqal hota hai. Jiska weight 72 jau ke danon ke weight ke barabar hota hai, jo 25.4 gram ke equal hota hai. Hazrat Umar ke set kiye gaye standard ke mutabiq 7 dinar ka weight 10 dirham ke barabar ho, toh ek dirham ka weight approx 2.975 gram (approx 3 gram) hota hai. Aur iski purity minimum 22 carat (ya'ani 7.91 percent) honi chahiye. Dinar ke bohat se uses hain. Jin mein se kuch neeche likhe hain: Gold dinar ke bohat se benefits hain, jin mein se chand ek darj zail hain: Ya'ani us time mein jab koi government ya king country ka khazana loot lete hain toh phir unke paas sarkari employees wagaira ko salary dene ke liye paise (paper currency) kam pad jate hain toh woh zyada paper currency print kar dete hain taake employees ko salaries di ja saken toh paper currency ki value mein kami ho jati hai, lehaza agar kisi worker ne last 10 saalon mein 1 lakh rupay jama kiye hain. Tou government ki paper currency ki zyada printing se ab uske 1 lakh rupay ki value 50, 60 hazaar rupay hogi. Lehaza us worker ki aadhi wealth government ne grab kar li aur us bichare ko pata hi nahi k asal mein kya hua uske sath. Lehaza paper currency ki zyada printing ke through duniya ki har government apni public ki wealth ko lootne ke liye use karti hain. Isi liye agar currency gold ki ho toh government ke liye possible nahi k zyada currency ko print kar sake kyun k ab currency paper ki nahi balke gold ki hai. Lehaza gold aur silver se bani currency se public ki wealth, government aur International Monetary Fund (IMF) ke fraud se safe rehti hai. Ya'ani is era mein currency ko enemy country ki economy destroy karne ke liye use kiya jata hai. Enemy country apki currency ko print kar ke apke country ki market mein lata hai, toh apke mulk mein currency zyada ho jati hai, jiski wajah se uski value mein kami ho jati hai aur country ka paisa destroy ho jata hai, jiski wajah se economy kharab ho jati hai. But is system mein ye possible nahi jahan currency gold aur silver se bani ho. Chunancha duniya ka sabse sustainable economic system ek aisa system ho sakta hai jismein currency ki value mein kami na ho, ya'ani currency ki real value uske andar ho.
Hazrat Essa (A.S) ki paidaish se taqreeban 200 saal pehle China ke king Qin Shi Huang ne apne country ko enemies ke attacks se safe karne ke liye North border par ek wall banane ki desire ki. Is wall ki starting China aur Manchukuo ke border ke paas se ki gayi. Us zamanay mein Huns aur Tatars China ke bare dushman thay, jo Central Asia mein kafi powerful samjhe jaate thay. Ye wall Gulf of Liaodong se Mongolia aur Tibet ke border area tak phaili hui hai. Iski length approximately 13,170 miles hai aur ye different areas mein 20 se le kar 30 feet tak high hai. Foundation ke kareeb iski width 25 feet aur upar se 12 feet ke kareeb hai. Har 200 yards ke distance par security guards ke liye strong shelters bane huay hain.
Jab individuals ya companies ye dekhte hain k woh apne loans ki payment se unable hain toh law beech mein aa jata hai aur khud debtor ya uske creditors mein se koi ek court mein bankruptcy ki application de deta hai aur Civil Judge recovery ka order issue kar deta hai. Iske mutabiq ek officer debtor ki property apne control mein le leta hai. Debtor apne haalat ke mutalliq affidavit deta hai aur uske cases ki proper investigation shuru ho jati hai. Creditors meeting organize kar ke debtor ko us mein bulate hain. Is mein compromise ka bhi chance hota hai. Loan payment ka agreement accept kar liya jata hai. Agreement ki soorat mein debtor agree kar leta hai k woh for example rupay mein 15 aane ya 12 aane apne creditors ko pay kar dega. Jise ye log accept kar lete hain. Lekin agreement na hone ki soorat mein court debtor ko law ke mutabiq bankrupt declare kar deti hai. Aur creditors uski property ke liye kisi shakhs ko trustee appoint karte hain. Bankrupt trustee ko sari property se inform karta hai. Trustee accounts ka review karta hai. Accounts mein fraud se aur property ko sell kar ke creditors ke demands jis had tak poore kiye ja sakte hon, poore karta hai. Aise debtor ko bankrupt kaha jata hai. Ancient Hindus mein koi businessman agar kangal ho jata aur apne debts pay na kar sakta toh woh apne shop ke aage ek din subha sawere do diye jala kar rakh deta jisse doosre businessmen aur log samajh jate k ye shakhs kangal ho chuka hai. Sympathy mein doosre businessmen chand din apni shops band kar lete taake customers unki taraf attract hon aur unki cash help bhi kar dete thay. Word 'Dewalia' do diye se hi nikla hai (do diyon wala). Chiniot Sarafa Bazaar mein diye rakhne ke marks aj bhi purane dukaanon mein maujood hain.
Darul Uloom Deoband Bharat ka ek Islamic madrasa hai, jahan Sunni Deobandi school of thought ka start hua. Ye institute Uttar Pradesh ke district Saharanpur ke ek town Deoband mein located hai. Ye madrasa 1866 mein Muhammad Qasim Nanautavi, Fazlur Rahman Usmani, Syed Muhammad Abid Deobandi aur baaki logon ne establish kiya tha. Mahmood Deobandi is institute ke first teacher aur Mahmood Hassan Deobandi iske first student thay. Majlis-e-Shura Darul Uloom Deoband ne 14 October 2020 mein Syed Arshad Madani ko Sadar-ul-Mudarriseen aur Abul Qasim Nomani ko Sheikh-ul-Hadith appoint kiya. Darul Uloom Deoband 30 May 1866 ko Fazlur Rahman Usmani, Syed Muhammad Abid Deobandi, Muhammad Qasim Nanautavi, Mahtab Ali, Nihal Ahmed aur Zulfiqar Ali Deobandi ke through establish kiya gaya tha. Mahmood Deobandi ko first teacher ke taur par appoint kiya gaya tha aur Mahmood Hassan Deobandi pehle student thay, jinhon ne madrasa mein admission liya tha. 1982 mein Muhammad Tayyab Qasmi ke supervision mein madrasa mein administrative disputes paida ho gaye, jiske result mein Darul Uloom Waqf Deoband ki establishment hui. Feb 2008 mein madrasa ke under All India Anti-Terrorism Conference mein har tarah ki terrorism ki condemnation ki gayi thi. Syed Muhammad Abid Deobandi madrasa ke first Mohtamim (manager) thay. Abul Qasim Nomani 24 July 2011 ko Ghulam Muhammad Vastanvi ke baad madrasa ke 13th Mohtamim select hue.
Devadasi woh girls thi jo ancient Hindu society mein temples ki khidmat mein di jati thin. Ye girls wahan dance-singing ka kaam bhi karti thin. In girls ki marriage nahi hoti thi. Geeta, Ramayan aur Puran kisi mein bhi Devadasis ka koi zikr nahi hai. Lekin South ki kuch religious books mein iska bayan milta hai. Isliye isey dharma ka part samajh liya gaya hai. In books mein khas tor par pujariyon (mujawar'on) aur purohit'on ka status Bhagwan jaisa bayan kiya gaya hai. Isi ki wajah se sadiyon se Devadasi system common raha hai aur women ka sexual exploitation jaari raha hai. India ke Supreme Court ne 13 Feb 2014 ko Karnataka ke Sachiv (State Secretary) ko diye gaye ek order mein kaha tha k woh make sure karen k kisi bhi religious place mein kisi bhi girl ko Devadasi ke taur par use na kiya jaye. Literal meaning: Honorable woman, Devta ki feminine form. Especially Durga, Bhawani, Savitri aur Brahma ki wife. Also, char Buddhist goddesses: Rojini, Maiki, Pandara aur Tara. As a noun, ek fairy jisse Surya ko mohabbat thi. Also, ek apsara. Devi ek Sanskrit word hai aur Hinduism mein iska masculine form Dev hai.
Cheeta (Sanskrit ke word Chitrakaya se bana hai) cat family se ta'alluq rakhta hai. Hunt karte waqt iska zyada tar depend speed par hota hai jo 120 km/h ya'ani 70 miles per hour tak pahunch sakti hai. Ye speed Earth par aur koi animal achieve nahi kar sakta. Cheeta 0 se 100 km ki speed sirf 3.5 seconds mein gain kar leta hai. Cheete ke body ka color pinkish aur black spots hote hain. Head chota aur tail lambi hoti hai. Tail ko bhagte waqt balance maintain karne ke liye use karta hai. Ek adult cheete ka weight approx 65 kg tak hota hai. Agar isko captivity mein rakha jaye toh iski breeding mein kuch problems face karni padti hain. Iski skin ki beauty aur valuable hone ki wajah se iska illegally hunt kiya jata hai. Current restrictions aur strictness ki wajah se iske hunting mein kafi had tak kami aayi hai. Lekin Africa mein poverty ki wajah se phir bhi kuch hunters pakde jane ka risk lete huay in beautiful animals ka hunt karte hain.
District Abbottabad zille ka headquarters aur Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan ka ek important city hai. Jo British era mein ek cantonment ki shakal mein develop kiya gaya city hai. Ye sea level se iski height 4120 feet hai. Rawalpindi se 101 km away ye Pakistan ka ek pleasant spot hai. 1998 ki census ke according is city ki population 881,000 logon par based hai aur 94 percent logon ki mother tongue Hindko hai. Iske ilawa Gujjar biradari Gojri language bolti hai aur Pashto bhi boli jati hai. District Abbottabad do tehsilon (Abbottabad aur Havelian) par based hai. Abbottabad ke mostly log hilly area mein rehte hain. Yahan ke zyada tar log abroad kaam karte hain aur transport se related hain aur drivers hain. British government ki taraf se 1849 mein Murree ki foundation rakhne ke baad ise bhi Major James Abbott ne settle kiya aur yahan unhi ke naam se mansoob kiya gaya. Jan 1853 mein British Raj ke dauran district Hazara ke headquarters ke taur par is city ko settle kiya gaya. Punjab ke annexation ke baad Major Abbott 1849 se April 1853 tak district Hazara ke first Deputy Commissioner rahe. Major Abbott ki UK wapsi se pehle Abbottabad ke naam se ek poem likhne ke liye famous hai, jismein unhone is city se love aur uske gham ki baat likhi hai aur ise chorna hai jo noteworthy hai. 16th century ke middle mein Mughal Emperor Akbar ne apne Nau Ratan general Maharaja Man Singh ko order diya k Mansehra city aabaad karen. 1901 mein, town aur cantonment ki population 7,764 thi, jiski average income 5000 rupay thi. 14,900. Ye barh kar 1903 mein 22,300, basically octroi se derived hai. Is dauran chief public institutions banaye gaye jaise Albert Victor Unaided Anglo Vernacular High School, Municipal Anglo Vernacular High School aur Government Dispensary wagaira. 1911 mein, population barh kar 11,506 ho gayi thi aur is city mein Gorkhon ki 4 battalions maujood thi. June 1948 mein, British Red Cross ne Abbottabad mein ek hospital khola jisse hazaron injured logon ko Kashmir se laya ja raha tha. October 2005 mein Abbottabad Kashmir ke earthquake se tabah hua tha. Although Abbottabad ka most part survived kar gaya, lekin bohot si old buildings destroy ya severely damaged hui hain. Abbottabad educational institutions ke reference se bohat ancient mana jata hai. 1855 se ye school maujood hai aur city mein kai famous schools aur educational institutions hain. British rule ke daur mein establish Army Burn Hall College aur Pakistan Military Academy Kakul inmein important educational institutions hain jo military aur civil education ke liye Pakistan mein famous hain. Pakistan ke city Karachi ko jis tarah 'City of Lights' kaha jata hai isi tarah Abbottabad ko bhi 'City of Schools' kaha jata hai. Educational activities mein hamesha front foot par raha. Khyber Pakhtunkhwa ke har area se har saal hundreds of kids parhne aate hain. Abbottabad apne pleasant places ki wajah se famous hai. Famous Karakoram Highway Abbottabad district ke Haripur se start hoti hai. Green places se ghire hone ki wajah se summers mein bhi weather pleasant hota hai. Muzaffarabad, Khunjerab, Hunza, Gilgit, Skardu jaane ke liye Abbottabad ek junction ka kaam karta hai. Important recreational places mein Ayubia, Runno, Azizabad, Bagh Bandi, Bignotar, Nurmang, Nambli, Miragiah, Kalabagh, Nathiagali, Mansehra, Qalandarabad, Havelian, Abshar Muslim Abad Theme Park, Naran, Kaghan jaise spots bhi Hazara ko aur bhi attractive bana dete hain, shamil hain. Ye area 4 choti pahadiyon par based hai aur former President of Pakistan, Muhammad Ayub Khan ke naam par is area ka naam rakha gaya. Ye area 26 km par based hai aur area ki visit ke liye Chairlift hai, jisse area ka view kiya ja sakta hai. Thandiani, jiska matlab local language mein 'sard' (cold) hai ek important recreational spot hai. Pine trees ke forests mein ye ek plateau par based pleasant spot hai. Sea level se iski height 2700 meters hai. Abbottabad city se iska distance 31 km hai aur Abbottabad se easily wahan pahuncha ja sakta hai. Evening mein Abbottabad city ki lights wahan se clear dikhai deti hain. East side par River Kunhar ke us paar Kashmir ke Pir Panjal mountain range ki snowy hills nazar aati hain. Abbottabad city ke ilawa uske villages bhi neat aur pleasant hain. Abbottabad ke famous villages mein Malsa, jo ek valley-like region hai bohot beautiful hai. Satora village, Abbottabad se 15 km ke distance par, charon taraf se beautiful pahadiyon ke beech mein located, ek bowl-shaped valley hai, jo district Abbottabad ka sabse bada village hai. Satora valley mein Qom Karal ke log rehte hain. Miranjani district ka highest point hai.
Khyber Pakhtunkhwa ka ek hilly district. Swat ek former state thi jise 1970 mein district ka status mila. Malakand Division ka headquarters Saidu Sharif isi district mein located hai. Swat ko Khyber Pakhtunkhwa ke North region mein special status haasil hai. Ye district Central Asia ki history mein anthropology aur archaeology ke liye famous hai. Buddhist civilization ke time mein Swat ko bohot fame haasil thi aur ise Udyana ya'ani Bagh (Garden) ke naam se bulate thay. Tourism ki bohot zyada opportunities ki wajah se ise Pakistan ka Switzerland kaha jata hai. Northern Areas ki development mein Swat ka ek important role raha hai. Lush green wide plains ke ilawa ye trade ka center bhi hai. Yahan beautiful meadows aur clear water springs aur rivers maujood hain. Kalam, Madyan aur Bahrain mein life ki sari facilities, including high educational institutions, available hain. Yahan ke log bohot hardworking aur mentally kafi developed hain. World ke most beautiful regions mein shaamil ye area, Pakistan ke capital Islamabad se North-East ki taraf 254 km ke distance par located hai, jab k provincial capital Peshawar se iska distance 170 km hai. 1998 ki census ke according district Swat ki total population 1,257,602 hai aur iska total area 5337 square km par phaila hua hai. Iske North mein district Chitral, South mein district Buner, East mein district Shangla, West mein district Dir aur Malakand Agency ke areas aur South-East mein former Amb State (Darband) ka beautiful area located hai. Swat ko teen natural parts mein divide kiya ja sakta hai: Upper Swat, Lower Swat, Kohistan Swat. Swat mein sightseeing ke liye khas kar Gabin Jabba, Jarogo Waterfall, Shangro Dand, Salatain, Murade Gut Pewchar, Malam Jabba, Kabal, Saidu Sharif, Sharifabad, Khawajakhela, Bahrain, Madyan, Kalam, Matta, Barikot, Charbagh, Seegram, Malook Sar, Mingora, Bahrain aur Khazana zyada tar famous hain. Jashn-e-Swat ka colorful festival har saal organize kiya jata hai. Motorcycle jumps, Chaugan competitions, horse riding, horses ka dance, parachute jumps, paragliding ke amazing displays aur night mein fireworks se sky par colors aur light ki barish jaisa scene dekha jata hai. Is se tourists bhi enjoy karte hain. Bridges ki construction aur roads ki repair ke sath sath law and order situation se is area mein tourism ke promotion ke kafi possibilities ban chuke hain.
Khyber Pakhtunkhwa ka ek district. Nowshera Peshawar ki old tehsil thi. Jisne 1 July 1988 ko district ka status gain kiya. Ab ye Peshawar Division ka 3rd district hai jo Peshawar district se alag kiya gaya hai. Ye district National Highway Peshawar to Punjab ke kinaare par located hai. Location wise ye district historical importance rakhta hai. Ye district Central Asia aur India ko connect karne wala gate bhi kehlata hai. Aur Indus River ke bank par located hone ki wajah se baaki areas par superiority bhi rakhta hai. Ye area teen contemporary scholars Khushal Khan Khattak, Kaka Sahib aur unke ustaad Sheikh Akhund Adheen Saljooqi ke ilawa Pir Manki Sharif, Pir Syed Noor Ali Shah Al-Jailani Tarujabba, Maulana Abdus Salam Pir Sabaq Babaji aur Sheikh Abdul Manan alias Sheikh Ji Mubarak Wazirgarhi, Qazi Hussain Ahmed, Maulvi Inayat Ullah Harooni Tarujabba jaise religious leaders ki wajah se pehchana jata hai. Ye fact hai k purana district Peshawar Nowshera tehsil ki vast industrial base ki wajah se famous tha. Start se yahan bade bade industrial factories established hain. Is district mein ab Risalpur aur Cherat bhi industrial point of view se develop ho rahe hain. Jabke Peshawar Motorway M1 bhi Rashakai mein isi district se guzar raha hai. Wazirgarhi mein Sheikh Abdul Manan alias Sheikh Ji Mubarak Wazirgarhi Babaji ke followers aj bhi na sirf area Pabi balke Darra Adam Khel, Landi Kotal, Akbarpura, Khush Maqam tak maujood hain. Aap 1800s mein Wazirgarhi aaye aur 1920 ko is temporary world se guzar gaye. Sheikh Ji Mubarak ka mazar unke banai mosque, Jamia Masjid Muhallah Sheikhan Wazirgarhi ke close graveyard mein located hai aur is area mein knowledge ki lit candle aj Madrasa Qaryatul Huda ki shakal mein maujood hai. Yehi wajah hai k Wazirgarhi religious education mein apni importance rakhta hai aur men aur women Quran Pak ki taleem se waqif hain. Wazirgarhi Babaji ke mutalliq famous hai k woh 18th century ke last mein apne family ke sath Peshawar ke area Masho Khel se migrate kar ke yahan aa kar settle hue thay aur unki scholarly aur spiritual personality hone ki wajah se is area ke residents ne is family ko bohot love diya aur wohi silsila aj bhi jaari hai. Tehsil Pabi Nowshera ke bade tehsilon mein count hoti hai jo approx 47 villages par based hai. Areas Jalozai Gaon Shah Bara, Wazirgarhi, Banda Nabi, Aman Kot, Tarujabba, Azakhel, Dag Ba Sood, Cherat, Dag Ismail Khel important spots mein se hain. Agriculture ke hawale se famous hai jabke transport bhi is area ke residents ka main source of livelihood hai.
Saidu Sharif, Swat, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan ka ek tourist spot hai aur ye valley 3081 feet ki height par located hai. Saidu Sharif Swat ka most modern city hai jo Mingora se just 2 km ke distance par located hai. Saidu Sharif Mingora ke sath kuch is tarah se connected hai k donon ko identify karna bohot mushkil hai balke Mingora aur Saidu Sharif bilkul do twin cities lagte hain. However Mingora ka beautiful aur spacious grassy ground donon cities ke beech connecting center mana ja sakta hai. 1957 mein jab first time Swat valley mein municipality establish hui toh Mingora aur Saidu Sharif donon ko ek hi municipality ki limits mein rakha gaya. Jiske baad donon cities ka administration, beautification aur cleaning ka sara arrangement municipality hi karti aa rahi hai. Swat State ke Pakistan mein merger ke baad Saidu Sharif ko Malakand Division ke headquarters ka status bhi mila jismein Swat, Buner, Shangla, Dir aur Chitral ke districts ke ilawa Malakand Agency ke areas bhi shamil hain. Jiski wajah se Saidu Sharif ki hustle-bustle aur liveliness mein considerable increase hui hai. Isi central status ki wajah se district Swat ke tamam departments ke offices bhi Saidu Sharif mein hi establish kiye gaye hain. Mingora aur Saidu Sharif mein transport ka popular source Suzuki aur rickshaws hain. Suzuki 2 rupay aur rickshaw 3 rupay ke fare per passenger one-way ke badle apko le ja aur la sakte hain. Rickshaw mein usually 5 passengers bithaye jaate hain, however 15 rupay mein rickshaw book karwa kar aap specially separately bhi Mingora se Saidu Sharif tak 2-3 km par phailay beautiful views se enjoy kar sakte hain. Saidu Sharif ek bohot old aur historical city hai jisne zamane ke bohot se ups and downs dekhe hain. Jis tarah Saidu Sharif aj Malakand Division ka headquarters hai, isi tarah purane zamanay mein bhi ise central status haasil tha. Aur us zamanay mein bhi ye city cultural aur modern development ke lihaz se bohot aage tha. Swat State ke last ruler ka palace bhi yahin hai. Buddhism ke daur mein Saidu Sharif ka old name Baligram (is naam ka ek chota sa pass aj bhi Saidu Sharif ke close located hai) tha jiske baad ye Sadogan ke naam se famous hua. Pashto language mein word 'Sadogan' Sadhu ki plural form hai. Ancient time mein yahan Buddhism ke followers badi tadad mein aabad thay jo yahan caves mein worship karte thay. Is wajah se iska naam Sadogan pad gaya jo baad mein Saidu mein change ho gaya. 1845 mein famous spiritual personality Akhund Sahib-e-Swat (Abdul Ghafoor alias Saidubaba) jab Swat ke Sapal Bandai naam ke village ko bye bol kar hamesha ke liye Saidu chale aaye toh us waqt Saidu ki past glory ke nishan pheeke pad chuke thay aur ye ek chota sa ordinary village tha. Lekin jab Abdul Ghafoor Akhund Sahib-e-Swat ne isko apni permanent residence ke liye choose kiya aur is mein ek mosque ki foundation rakhi toh iski previous glory wapas aa gayi aur iski fame Akhund Sahib-e-Swat (Saidubaba) ki wajah se dur dur tak phail gayi. Unki wajah se Saidu, Saidu Sharif ban gaya aur log is jagah ko holy samajhne lage. Unke stay ke daur mein Saidu Sharif ko bara religious respect haasil tha. Unka mazar ab Saidu Sharif mein hi hai jo public ke liye ziyarat gaah hai. Abdul Ghafoor (Saidubaba) ke younger son Mian Gul Abdul Khaliq ke time mein is city ko religious aur political dono status haasil ho gaye. In donon ki death ke baad Saidu Sharif ki glory aur majesty bhi end ho gayi lekin baad mein 1915 mein Saidu Ghous Abdul Ghafoor ke grandson aur Mian Gul Abdul Khaliq ke son Ala Hazrat Mian Gul, Gul Shehzada Abdul Wadood ne Swat ki rule sambhali toh Saidu Sharif ki wohi purani glory aur majesty phir wapas aa gayi. Unhone Saidu Sharif ko Swat State ke capital ka status de diya aur is tarah uski old fame aur glory restore ho gayi. Saidu Sharif Gira mountain ke eastern foothills mein located hai. Iske West side par ek river beh rahi hai jiska source Murghazar valley ke mountains aur springs hain. Saidu Sharif ke teenon taraf hills aur North side par plain area hai. Ye spot sea level se 3500 feet ki height par located hai aur yahan se Swat ki sari directions ko roads jaati hain. Is se ek link road river ke sath sath Murghazar ki beautiful valley tak le jati hai. Road ke right side par mountains ki peaks hain jo Saidu Sharif valley ko Odigram (Swat ka ek famous historical village) se alag karti hain. Is se aage Raja Gira ke fort ke ancient ruins nazar aate hain jo Gira mountain ke western side par ruins ki shakal mein Odigram ke exactly opposite located hain. Yahan se Odigram tak hiking bhi ki ja sakti hai.
Charsadda Pakistan ke Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province mein ek city aur district Charsadda ka district headquarters hai. 29 km ke distance par located hai. District HQ hone ke saath ye Charsadda tehsil ka bhi HQ hai. Charsadda city 4 Union Councils par based hai. District Charsadda teen tehsilon par based hai, Tehsil Charsadda, Tehsil Shabqadar aur Tehsil Tangi. Charsadda city 6th century BC se 2nd century AD tak Gandhara ka headquarters raha. Iska ancient name Pushkalavati hai jo Sanskrit ka word hai jiska matlab hai 'City of Lotuses'. Ye Gandhara kingdom ka administrative center tha. History ke kai periods mein different invaders ne is area par rule kiya hai. In invaders mein Irani, Alexander the Great, Mauryan, Turk, Kushan aur Huns waghera shamil hain. Tobacco, sugarcane, wheat, maize aur beetroot yahan ki main crops hain. Vegetables mein potato, tomato, brinjal, okra, spinach aur other vegetables grow ki jati hain. Jabke, yahan ke fruits mein apricot, lemon, plum, strawberry aur peach bohot famous hain. Yahan par Amlook aur Abazai ke area mein mango orchards bhi hain aur wahan ke mangoes bhi famous hain. Charsadda ki famous cheezon mein top par Rajar ki mithai aur Charsadda ki famous chappal hain. Jabke yahan ka jaggery bhi country aur abroad mein equally famous hai. Khaddi ka cloth especially winters ka gift hai. Charsadda ki zameen bohot fertile hai aur beauty mein Damascus city se resemble karti hai. Yahan par teen rivers flow karte hain: River Jindi, River Kabul (Charsadda mein ise Sardaryab kehte hain) aur River Swat (Charsadda mein ise Khayali kehte hain). Ye teenon rivers yahan irrigation ke sabse bade sources hain. Jamia Bacha Khan (Bacha Khan University Charsadda) Charsadda mein higher education ka ek great institution hai. Iski establishment 3 July 2012 mein hui. Aur iske establishment ka basic purpose education, research aur learning-teaching process ko aage barhana tha. Ye educational institution Professor Dr. Ehsan Ali ki supervision mein establish hua aur Professor Dr. Fazal Rahim Marwat iske first Vice Chancellor bane. Munda Headworks Charsadda mein Abazai mein ek dam hai. Ek estimate ke according sea level se iski height 368 meters hai.
Mansehra ki naam ki wajah: Humayun ki India wapsi ke baad jaldi hi crown prince Emperor of India Jalaluddin Muhammad Akbar ko throne par baithaya gaya. Internal aur external conspiracies ko khatam karne ke liye ek long time tak Mughal Emperor Akbar struggle karta raha. Lekin Kandahar mein apne bhai ki rebellion ke against apne commander Raja Man Singh ko expedition par bheja. Punjab conquer karne ke baad Attock mein Mughal Emperor Akbar aur Man Singh ki meeting hui. Akbar ke order par Attock mein fort ki construction start ki gayi jiska detailed description Ain-e-Akbari mein maujood hai. Raja Man Singh ek long period tak Jhelum ke Rohtas Fort aur Attock Fort mein stay kiya. Hazara ke surroundings se king ke liye boats banwane ke maqsad se forests ki cutting hui aur ek city ko settle kiya gaya. Raja Bal Singh ke naam par Mansehra settled hua. Tuzuk-e-Jahangiri mein bhi Hasan Abdal, Wah Garden, Attock Fort aur Mansehra city ke reference se Noor-ud-din Jahangir Shaheen ne apni autobiography mein iska zikr kiya hai. Mansehra do words ka abbreviation hai: 'Man' Raja Man, 'Sehra' se murad sir ka taaj. Aaj ka Mansehra Pakistan ke Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province ka ek city hai. Green fields, lakes aur pastures ki ye land Hazara se alag ho kar 1976 mein existence mein aayi. Current district 5 tehsilon (Mansehra, Balakot, Baffa Pakhal, Darband, Tehsil Tanawal Phulra, Oghi) par based hai. District ki borders Kashmir, Northern Areas aur Malakand Division se mili hui hain aur Silk Road bhi is district se guzarti hai. Historically district Mansehra Syed Ahmed Shaheed ki Battle of Balakot ki wajah se famous hai. Life ke har field mein overall development hone ke bawajood aj bhi logon ka bada source of livelihood forests hain jo logon ki economic aur social life improve karne mein important role play kar rahe hain. Yahan ke log apni moral values ke baare mein bohot sensitive hain. Tourism is area ki rapidly growing profitable industry hai. Yahan par spoken languages mein Gojri, Hindko aur Pashto shamil hain. Yahan different tribes ke log settled hain jin mein Tanoli, Swati, Gujjar, Awan aur Syed shamil hain. District ka total area 4579 square km hai. Yahan per square km 392.48 people rehte hain jabke district ki population 2023 ki census ke mutabiq 1,797,177 tak hai. Rural population ka main livelihood agriculture hai. Total cultivable area 80740 hectares hai. Alexander the Great ne Punjab ke areas ko conquer karne ke baad, district Mansehra ke area par apna control establish kiya. 327 BC mein Alexander the Great ne is area ka management Abisares ke حوالے kar diya, jo Poonch state ka king tha. Mansehra long time tak Taxila state ka bhi part raha hai. Ashoka apni crown princeship mein is area ka governor appoint tha, jabke apne father Bindusara ki death ke baad woh empire ka heir bana aur Mansehra ke ilawa Gandhara ka ruler hua. Aj bhi kuch rocks jis par uske edicts carved hain, Mansehra city mein Koh Breri ke foothills mein uske rule ki memorial ke taur par maujood hain jin se ye bhi clear hota hai k ye area kabhi religious center bhi raha hai. Mansehra ka naam Man Singh ke naam se derive hua hai, jo ek zamanay mein is area ka ruler tha. Famous Amb State, jo Pashtun tribe Tanoli ke under influence thi, bhi Mansehra ka part hai, jiski state status 1969 mein Government of Pakistan ne end kar di thi. Previous Amb State aur Hazara ke surroundings ki history kafi old hai. Aryan jo Alexander the Great ka appointed historian tha, ne kahin bhi Amb State ke center ki identification nahi ki hai, lekin history mein ye zaroor likha hai k Indus River ya jise yahan locally Abasin ke naam se jana jata hai, ke right bank par settled center tha, jise Alexander the Great ne resources ki supply ke liye center ka status de rakha tha. Yehi center Amb State ka source kehlata hai. 1854 mein General Abbott, jo British government ke appointed officer thay aur unhi ke naam par Abbottabad ka naam hai, ne Amb State aur uske center ki identification Buner ke southern area mein ki hai. Unke according Ranjit Singh ke time se Amb ka current village jo Indus River ya Abasin ke right bank par located hai ko hi uska center tha. Ye center Mahaban ke area se approx 8 km East mein located area tha, jahan se Amb State ke Nawabs ne apna naam select kiya. 2nd century AD mein ek Hindu Raja, Raja Rasalu jo Raja Salbahan ka beta tha aur uska ta'aluq Sialkot se tha ne is area par kabza kiya. Yahan ki local population mein Raja Rasalu ab bhi legendary stories mein alive milta hai. Chinese traveler Hiuan Tsang ke recorded statement ke according k jab usne us time mein yahan visit kiya tha toh ye area Durlabha Vardhana, jo Kashmir state ka ruler tha ke control mein tha. Turk rule aur Hindu rule continuously is area par attack karte rahe hain jabke rule bhi isi tarah transfer hota raha hai. Hindu Shahi mein Raja Jayapala ne zyada fame haasil ki jise Mahmud Ghaznavi ne apni first Indian campaign ke dauran defeat kiya. Yahan ye baat noteworthy hai k history mein kahin bhi Mahmud Ghaznavi ke Mansehra mein stay ya yahan se guzarne ke proof available nahi hain. 11th century mein Hindu Shahi ke end hone ke baad Kashmiriyon ne is area par kabza kar liya, jab wahan ka ruler Kalashan tha. 1112 se 1120 tak Raja Susala ne yahan rule kiya. 12th century mein Aslat Khan ne is area ko apni military campaign mein conquer kiya, jabke uske successor Ghor Muhammad ke baad ek bar phir ye area Kashmiriyon ke under influence aa gaya. British Raj k dauran Hazara district ko teen administrative tehsiloN mein divide kiya gaya jo Mansehra, Abbottabad aur Haripur par based thiN aur unheN Punjab se attached rakha gaya. Baad mein 1901 mein jab North-Western Frontier Province banaya gaya to Hazara dist ko us mein shamil kar liya gaya. British Raj k dauran PushtoonoN ne kabhi govt ki authority accept nahi ki aur apni struggle continue rakhi, jaise British government ne Riyasat Amb ki autonomy ko maana, jabke sub-state Phulra ki semi-autonomy bhi (jo Amb k Nawab Painda Khan Tanoli ki taraf se apne bhai Madad Khan Tanoli k under thi) maintain rakhi gai. Is connection mein ek agreement jo Riyasat Amb aur British Raj k beech hua, kafi famous hai. Tehreek-e-Pakistan k dauran local level par Pushtoon aur doosre tribes ne ek saath struggle ki. Riyasat Amb k Nawab Sir Muhammad Farid Khan Tanoli ka Quaid-e-Azam aur Nawabzada Liaquat Ali Khan k sath contact qaim raha, jis ki example different periods mein hui correspondence se di ja sakti hai. 1947 mein jab partition of India ka stage chal raha tha, to sab tribes aur Riyasat Amb ne unanimously Pakistan mein shamil honay ka decision liya. 1969 mein Riyasat Amb ki autonomy finish kar k use Pakistan ka part bana diya gaya, jabke 1971 mein Shahi Riyasat Amb ko completely khatam kar diya gaya. Bhutto k zamanay mein Mansehra ko district ka status mila jismein Mansehra aur Battagram do tehsilein thiN. Baad mein Balakot ko bhi tehsil ka darja de diya gaya. Battagram baad mein district ban gaya. Jabke ab Mansehra mein teen tehsilein, Mansehra, Oghi aur Balakot ki form mein hain. Mansehra, North Western Frontier Province ki eastern border pe hai, jiska Peshawar se distance approx 217 km jabke Islamabad se ye 195 km hai. Dist Mansehra ki borders north mein Diamer aur Kohistan districts se, south mein Abbottabad se, east mein Azaad Kashmir k Neelum district se, west mein Torghar aur Swat districts se, aur North West mein Battagram aur Buner districts se milti hain. Mansehra district mein kai chhoti aur bari lakes haiN, lekin tourism aur geographical point of view se teen lakes famous hain. InmeN Lake Lulusar, Lake Dudipatsar aur Lake Saif-ul-Malook shamil hain. Yeh teenoN lakes Kaghan Valley mein hain, jo Balakot tehsil ka part hai. Lake Lulusar Naran se around 48 km door hai jabke yeh sea level se approx 3325 meters high hai. Ye lake charoN taraf se jungle se ghiri hui hai, jabke is k ird gird ke medicinal plant forests national fame rakhte hain. Ye lake River Kunhar ka source bhi kehla sakti hai. Lake Dudipatsar closed shape mein khubsurat snow-covered peaks mein ghiri hui lake hai. Yahan tak access bohot difficult aur tough hai. Is lake tak pohachne k liye minimum 7 se 12 hours tak bohot mushkil aur tough ravines mein walk kar k hi possible hai. Lake k surroundings mein pastures aur green water dekhne layak hai. Mansehra district ki sab se famous aur pretty lake Saif-ul-Malook hai, jiska naam yahan ki ek famous legendary story, Qissa Saif-ul-Malook ki waja se mashhoor hai. Ye qissa ek Persian prince aur ek fairy ki love story hai. Lake Saif-ul-Malook Kaghan Valley k northern part mein located hai. Ye sea level se approx 3244 meters height pe situated hai.
Chitral KP ki ek valley hai. Chitral Pakistan k extreme northern corner par located hai. Ye district Tirich Mir k daman mein hai jo Hindu Kush mountain range ki highest peak hai. Iska border Afghanistan ki Wakhan strip se milta hai jo ise Central Asian countries se alag karti hai. Riyasat k is part ko baad mein district ka status mila. Aur KP k Malakand Division se attach kiya gaya. Apni unique geographic location ki waja se is district ka connection country k doosre areas se approx 5 months tak cut rehta hai. Apni special attractive culture aur mysterious past k hawale se Chitral ki distinct identity ne tourism k point of view se bhi kafi importance gain kar li. Afghanistan war k dauran apni specific geographic position ki waja se Chitral ki importance mein further izafa hua. Present time mein Central Asian Muslim countries ki independence ne iski importance ko kafi highlight kiya. Area k lihaaz se ye province ka sab se bara district hai. Chitral Pakistan ka old folk aur historic heritage rakhta hai, Badshah Munir Bukhari k according Chitral mein 17 languages boli jaati hain aur iski total population 4 lakh logon par base karti hai, Lekin Chitral se belong karnay wale Urdu aur Chitrali language k prominent writer, poet, researcher aur journalist Rehmat Aziz Chitrali ne Chitral mein boli jaanay wali languages ki tadaad 14 likhi hai. Yahan k log Chitrali language bolte haiN. Majority Muslims ki hai lekin Kafiristan k area mein non-Muslims bhi rehte hain. Chitrali Academy k recent survey k according Chitrali language k poets ki count 1000 se upar chali gai hai. Aur poets k collections bhi publish ho rahay haiN. Chitral k kuch prominent poets neeche diye gaye hain.
Devi ek Sanskrit word hai aur Hinduism mein iska masculine form Dev hai.
Cheeta (Sanskrit ke word Chitrakaya se bana hai) cat family se ta'aluq rakhta hai. Hunt karte waqt iska zyada tar depend speed par hota hai jo 120 km/h ya'ani 70 miles per hour tak pahunch sakti hai. Ye speed Earth par aur koi animal achieve nahi kar sakta. Cheeta 0 se 100 km ki speed sirf 3.5 seconds mein gain kar leta hai. Cheete ke body ka color pinkish aur black spots hote hain. Head chota aur tail lambi hoti hai. Tail ko bhagte waqt balance maintain karne ke liye use karta hai. Ek adult cheete ka weight approx 65 kg tak hota hai. Agar isko captivity mein rakha jaye toh iski breeding mein kuch problems face karni padti hain. Iski skin ki beauty aur valuable hone ki wajah se iska illegally hunt kiya jata hai. Current restrictions aur strictness ki wajah se iske hunting mein kafi had tak kami aayi hai. Lekin Africa mein poverty ki wajah se phir bhi kuch hunters pakde jane ka risk lete huay in beautiful animals ka hunt karte hain.
District Abbottabad zille ka headquarters aur Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan ka ek important city hai. Jo British era mein ek cantonment ki shakal mein develop kiya gaya city hai. Ye sea level se iski height 4120 feet hai. Rawalpindi se 101 km away ye Pakistan ka ek pleasant spot hai. 1998 ki census ke according is city ki population 881,000 logon par based hai aur 94 percent logon ki mother tongue Hindko hai. Iske ilawa Gujjar biradari Gojri language bolti hai aur Pashto bhi boli jati hai. District Abbottabad do tehsilon (Abbottabad aur Havelian) par based hai. Abbottabad ke mostly log hilly area mein rehte hain. Yahan ke zyada tar log abroad kaam karte hain aur transport se related hain aur drivers hain. British government ki taraf se 1849 mein Murree ki foundation rakhne ke baad ise bhi Major James Abbott ne settle kiya aur yahan unhi ke naam se mansoob kiya gaya. Jan 1853 mein British Raj ke dauran district Hazara ke headquarters ke taur par is city ko settle kiya gaya. Punjab ke annexation ke baad Major Abbott 1849 se April 1853 tak district Hazara ke first Deputy Commissioner rahe. Major Abbott ki UK wapsi se pehle Abbottabad ke naam se ek poem likhne ke liye famous hai, jismein unhone is city se love aur uske gham ki baat likhi hai aur ise chorna hai jo noteworthy hai. 16th century ke middle mein Mughal Emperor Akbar ne apne Nau Ratan general Maharaja Man Singh ko order diya k Mansehra city aabaad karen. 1901 mein, town aur cantonment ki population 7,764 thi, jiski average income 5000 rupay thi. 14,900. Ye barh kar 1903 mein 22,300, basically octroi se derived hai. Is dauran chief public institutions banaye gaye jaise Albert Victor Unaided Anglo Vernacular High School, Municipal Anglo Vernacular High School aur Government Dispensary wagaira. 1911 mein, population barh kar 11,506 ho gayi thi aur is city mein Gorkhon ki 4 battalions maujood thi. June 1948 mein, British Red Cross ne Abbottabad mein ek hospital khola jisse hazaron injured logon ko Kashmir se laya ja raha tha. October 2005 mein Abbottabad Kashmir ke earthquake se tabah hua tha. Although Abbottabad ka most part survived kar gaya, lekin bohot si old buildings destroy ya severely damaged hui hain. Abbottabad educational institutions ke reference se bohat ancient mana jata hai. 1855 se ye school maujood hai aur city mein kai famous schools aur educational institutions hain. British rule ke daur mein establish Army Burn Hall College aur Pakistan Military Academy Kakul inmein important educational institutions hain jo military aur civil education ke liye Pakistan mein famous hain. Pakistan ke city Karachi ko jis tarah 'City of Lights' kaha jata hai isi tarah Abbottabad ko bhi 'City of Schools' kaha jata hai. Educational activities mein hamesha front foot par raha. Khyber Pakhtunkhwa ke har area se har saal hundreds of kids parhne aate hain. Abbottabad apne pleasant places ki wajah se famous hai. Famous Karakoram Highway Abbottabad district ke Haripur se start hoti hai. Green places se ghire hone ki wajah se summers mein bhi weather pleasant hota hai. Muzaffarabad, Khunjerab, Hunza, Gilgit, Skardu jaane ke liye Abbottabad ek junction ka kaam karta hai. Important recreational places mein Ayubia, Runno, Azizabad, Bagh Bandi, Bignotar, Nurmang, Nambli, Miragiah, Kalabagh, Nathiagali, Mansehra, Qalandarabad, Havelian, Abshar Muslim Abad Theme Park, Naran, Kaghan jaise spots bhi Hazara ko aur bhi attractive bana dete hain, shamil hain. Ye area 4 choti pahadiyon par based hai aur former President of Pakistan, Muhammad Ayub Khan ke naam par is area ka naam rakha gaya. Ye area 26 km par based hai aur area ki visit ke liye Chairlift hai, jisse area ka view kiya ja sakta hai. Thandiani, jiska matlab local language mein 'sard' (cold) hai ek important recreational spot hai. Pine trees ke forests mein ye ek plateau par based pleasant spot hai. Sea level se iski height 2700 meters hai. Abbottabad city se iska distance 31 km hai aur Abbottabad se easily wahan pahuncha ja sakta hai. Evening mein Abbottabad city ki lights wahan se clear dikhai deti hain. East side par River Kunhar ke us paar Kashmir ke Pir Panjal mountain range ki snowy hills nazar aati hain. Abbottabad city ke ilawa uske villages bhi neat aur pleasant hain. Abbottabad ke famous villages mein Malsa, jo ek valley-like region hai bohot beautiful hai. Satora village, Abbottabad se 15 km ke distance par, charon taraf se beautiful pahadiyon ke beech mein located, ek bowl-shaped valley hai, jo district Abbottabad ka sabse bada village hai. Satora valley mein Qom Karal ke log rehte hain. Miranjani district ka highest point hai.
Khyber Pakhtunkhwa ka ek hilly district. Swat ek former state thi jise 1970 mein district ka status mila. Malakand Division ka headquarters Saidu Sharif isi district mein located hai. Swat ko Khyber Pakhtunkhwa ke North region mein special status haasil hai. Ye district Central Asia ki history mein anthropology aur archaeology ke liye famous hai. Buddhist civilization ke time mein Swat ko bohot fame haasil thi aur ise Udyana ya'ani Bagh (Garden) ke naam se bulate thay. Tourism ki bohot zyada opportunities ki wajah se ise Pakistan ka Switzerland kaha jata hai. Northern Areas ki development mein Swat ka ek important role raha hai. Lush green wide plains ke ilawa ye trade ka center bhi hai. Yahan beautiful meadows aur clear water springs aur rivers maujood hain. Kalam, Madyan aur Bahrain mein life ki sari facilities, including high educational institutions, available hain. Yahan ke log bohot hardworking aur mentally kafi developed hain. World ke most beautiful regions mein shaamil ye area, Pakistan ke capital Islamabad se North-East ki taraf 254 km ke distance par located hai, jab k provincial capital Peshawar se iska distance 170 km hai. 1998 ki census ke according district Swat ki total population 1,257,602 hai aur iska total area 5337 square km par phaila hua hai. Iske North mein district Chitral, South mein district Buner, East mein district Shangla, West mein district Dir aur Malakand Agency ke areas aur South-East mein former Amb State (Darband) ka beautiful area located hai. Swat ko teen natural parts mein divide kiya ja sakta hai: Upper Swat, Lower Swat, Kohistan Swat. Swat mein sightseeing ke liye khas kar Gabin Jabba, Jarogo Waterfall, Shangro Dand, Salatain, Murade Gut Pewchar, Malam Jabba, Kabal, Saidu Sharif, Sharifabad, Khawajakhela, Bahrain, Madyan, Kalam, Matta, Barikot, Charbagh, Seegram, Malook Sar, Mingora, Bahrain aur Khazana zyada tar famous hain. Jashn-e-Swat ka colorful festival har saal organize kiya jata hai. Motorcycle jumps, Chaugan competitions, horse riding, horses ka dance, parachute jumps, paragliding ke amazing displays aur night mein fireworks se sky par colors aur light ki barish jaisa scene dekha jata hai. Is se tourists bhi enjoy karte hain. Bridges ki construction aur roads ki repair ke sath sath law and order situation se is area mein tourism ke promotion ke kafi possibilities ban chuke hain.
Khyber Pakhtunkhwa ka ek district. Nowshera Peshawar ki old tehsil thi. Jisne 1 July 1988 ko district ka status gain kiya. Ab ye Peshawar Division ka 3rd district hai jo Peshawar district se alag kiya gaya hai. Ye district National Highway Peshawar to Punjab ke kinaare par located hai. Location wise ye district historical importance rakhta hai. Ye district Central Asia aur India ko connect karne wala gate bhi kehlata hai. Aur Indus River ke bank par located hone ki wajah se baaki areas par superiority bhi rakhta hai. Ye area teen contemporary scholars Khushal Khan Khattak, Kaka Sahib aur unke ustaad Sheikh Akhund Adheen Saljooqi ke ilawa Pir Manki Sharif, Pir Syed Noor Ali Shah Al-Jailani Tarujabba, Maulana Abdus Salam Pir Sabaq Babaji aur Sheikh Abdul Manan alias Sheikh Ji Mubarak Wazirgarhi, Qazi Hussain Ahmed, Maulvi Inayat Ullah Harooni Tarujabba jaise religious leaders ki wajah se pehchana jata hai. Ye fact hai k purana district Peshawar Nowshera tehsil ki vast industrial base ki wajah se famous tha. Start se yahan bade bade industrial factories established hain. Is district mein ab Risalpur aur Cherat bhi industrial point of view se develop ho rahe hain. Jabke Peshawar Motorway M1 bhi Rashakai mein isi district se guzar raha hai. Wazirgarhi mein Sheikh Abdul Manan alias Sheikh Ji Mubarak Wazirgarhi Babaji ke followers aj bhi na sirf area Pabi balke Darra Adam Khel, Landi Kotal, Akbarpura, Khush Maqam tak maujood hain. Aap 1800s mein Wazirgarhi aaye aur 1920 ko is temporary world se guzar gaye. Sheikh Ji Mubarak ka mazar unke banai mosque, Jamia Masjid Muhallah Sheikhan Wazirgarhi ke close graveyard mein located hai aur is area mein knowledge ki lit candle aj Madrasa Qaryatul Huda ki shakal mein maujood hai. Yehi wajah hai k Wazirgarhi religious education mein apni importance rakhta hai aur men aur women Quran Pak ki taleem se waqif hain. Wazirgarhi Babaji ke mutalliq famous hai k woh 18th century ke last mein apne family ke sath Peshawar ke area Masho Khel se migrate kar ke yahan aa kar settle hue thay aur unki scholarly aur spiritual personality hone ki wajah se is area ke residents ne is family ko bohot love diya aur wohi silsila aj bhi jaari hai. Tehsil Pabi Nowshera ke bade tehsilon mein count hoti hai jo approx 47 villages par based hai. Areas Jalozai Gaon Shah Bara, Wazirgarhi, Banda Nabi, Aman Kot, Tarujabba, Azakhel, Dag Ba Sood, Cherat, Dag Ismail Khel important spots mein se hain. Agriculture ke hawale se famous hai jabke transport bhi is area ke residents ka main source of livelihood hai.
Saidu Sharif, Swat, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan ka ek tourist spot hai aur ye valley 3081 feet ki height par located hai. Saidu Sharif Swat ka most modern city hai jo Mingora se just 2 km ke distance par located hai. Saidu Sharif Mingora ke sath kuch is tarah se connected hai k donon ko identify karna bohot mushkil hai balke Mingora aur Saidu Sharif bilkul do twin cities lagte hain. However Mingora ka beautiful aur spacious grassy ground donon cities ke beech connecting center mana ja sakta hai. 1957 mein jab first time Swat valley mein municipality establish hui toh Mingora aur Saidu Sharif donon ko ek hi municipality ki limits mein rakha gaya. Jiske baad donon cities ka administration, beautification aur cleaning ka sara arrangement municipality hi karti aa rahi hai. Swat State ke Pakistan mein merger ke baad Saidu Sharif ko Malakand Division ke headquarters ka status bhi mila jismein Swat, Buner, Shangla, Dir aur Chitral ke districts ke ilawa Malakand Agency ke areas bhi shamil hain. Jiski wajah se Saidu Sharif ki hustle-bustle aur liveliness mein considerable increase hui hai. Isi central status ki wajah se district Swat ke tamam departments ke offices bhi Saidu Sharif mein hi establish kiye gaye hain. Mingora aur Saidu Sharif mein transport ka popular source Suzuki aur rickshaws hain. Suzuki 2 rupay aur rickshaw 3 rupay ke fare per passenger one-way ke badle apko le ja aur la sakte hain. Rickshaw mein usually 5 passengers bithaye jaate hain, however 15 rupay mein rickshaw book karwa kar aap specially separately bhi Mingora se Saidu Sharif tak 2-3 km par phailay beautiful views se enjoy kar sakte hain. Saidu Sharif ek bohot old aur historical city hai jisne zamane ke bohot se ups and downs dekhe hain. Jis tarah Saidu Sharif aj Malakand Division ka headquarters hai, isi tarah purane zamane mein bhi ise central status haasil tha. Aur us zamanay mein bhi ye city cultural aur modern development ke lihaz se bohot aage tha. Swat State ke last ruler ka palace bhi yahin hai. Buddhism ke daur mein Saidu Sharif ka old name Baligram (is naam ka ek chota sa pass aj bhi Saidu Sharif ke close located hai) tha jiske baad ye Sadogan ke naam se famous hua. Pashto language mein word 'Sadogan' Sadhu ki plural form hai. Ancient time mein yahan Buddhism ke followers badi tadad mein aabad thay jo yahan caves mein worship karte thay. Is wajah se iska naam Sadogan pad gaya jo baad mein Saidu mein change ho gaya. 1845 mein famous spiritual personality Akhund Sahib-e-Swat (Abdul Ghafoor alias Saidubaba) jab Swat ke Sapal Bandai naam ke village ko bye bol kar hamesha ke liye Saidu chale aaye toh us waqt Saidu ki past glory ke nishan pheeke pad chuke thay aur ye ek chota sa ordinary village tha. Lekin jab Abdul Ghafoor Akhund Sahib-e-Swat ne isko apni permanent residence ke liye choose kiya aur is mein ek mosque ki foundation rakhi toh iski previous glory wapas aa gayi aur iski fame Akhund Sahib-e-Swat (Saidubaba) ki wajah se dur dur tak phail gayi. Unki wajah se Saidu, Saidu Sharif ban gaya aur log is jagah ko holy samajhne lage. Unke stay ke daur mein Saidu Sharif ko bara religious respect haasil tha. Unka mazar ab Saidu Sharif mein hi hai jo public ke liye ziyarat gaah hai. Abdul Ghafoor (Saidubaba) ke younger son Mian Gul Abdul Khaliq ke time mein is city ko religious aur political dono status haasil ho gaye. In donon ki death ke baad Saidu Sharif ki glory aur majesty bhi end ho gayi lekin baad mein 1915 mein Saidu Ghous Abdul Ghafoor ke grandson aur Mian Gul Abdul Khaliq ke son Ala Hazrat Mian Gul, Gul Shehzada Abdul Wadood ne Swat ki rule sambhali toh Saidu Sharif ki wohi purani glory aur majesty phir wapas aa gayi. Unhone Saidu Sharif ko Swat State ke capital ka status de diya aur is tarah uski old fame aur glory restore ho gayi. Saidu Sharif Gira mountain ke eastern foothills mein located hai. Iske West side par ek river beh rahi hai jiska source Murghazar valley ke mountains aur springs hain. Saidu Sharif ke teenon taraf hills aur North side par plain area hai. Ye spot sea level se 3500 feet ki height par located hai aur yahan se Swat ki sari directions ko roads jaati hain. Is se ek link road river ke sath sath Murghazar ki beautiful valley tak le jati hai. Road ke right side par mountains ki peaks hain jo Saidu Sharif valley ko Odigram (Swat ka ek famous historical village) se alag karti hain. Is se aage Raja Gira ke fort ke ancient ruins nazar aate hain jo Gira mountain ke western side par ruins ki shakal mein Odigram ke exactly opposite located hain. Yahan se Odigram tak hiking bhi ki ja sakti hai.
Charsadda Pakistan ke Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province mein ek city aur district Charsadda ka district headquarters hai. 29 km ke distance par located hai. District HQ hone ke saath ye Charsadda tehsil ka bhi HQ hai. Charsadda city 4 Union Councils par based hai. District Charsadda teen tehsilon par based hai, Tehsil Charsadda, Tehsil Shabqadar aur Tehsil Tangi. Charsadda city 6th century BC se 2nd century AD tak Gandhara ka headquarters raha. Iska ancient name Pushkalavati hai jo Sanskrit ka word hai jiska matlab hai 'City of Lotuses'. Ye Gandhara kingdom ka administrative center tha. History ke kai periods mein different invaders ne is area par rule kiya hai. In invaders mein Irani, Alexander the Great, Mauryan, Turk, Kushan aur Huns waghera shamil hain. Tobacco, sugarcane, wheat, maize aur beetroot yahan ki main crops hain. Vegetables mein potato, tomato, brinjal, okra, spinach aur other vegetables grow ki jati hain. Jabke, yahan ke fruits mein apricot, lemon, plum, strawberry aur peach bohot famous hain. Yahan par Amlook aur Abazai ke area mein mango orchards bhi hain aur wahan ke mangoes bhi famous hain. Charsadda ki famous cheezon mein top par Rajar ki mithai aur Charsadda ki famous chappal hain. Jabke yahan ka jaggery bhi country aur abroad mein equally famous hai. Khaddi ka cloth especially winters ka gift hai. Charsadda ki zameen bohot fertile hai aur beauty mein Damascus city se resemble karti hai. Yahan par teen rivers flow karte hain: River Jindi, River Kabul (Charsadda mein ise Sardaryab kehte hain) aur River Swat (Charsadda mein ise Khayali kehte hain). Ye teenon rivers yahan irrigation ke sabse bade sources hain. Jamia Bacha Khan (Bacha Khan University Charsadda) Charsadda mein higher education ka ek great institution hai. Iski establishment 3 July 2012 mein hui. Aur iske establishment ka basic purpose education, research aur learning-teaching process ko aage barhana tha. Ye educational institution Professor Dr. Ehsan Ali ki supervision mein establish hua aur Professor Dr. Fazal Rahim Marwat iske first Vice Chancellor bane. Munda Headworks Charsadda mein Abazai mein ek dam hai. Ek estimate ke according sea level se iski height 368 meters hai.
Mansehra ki naam ki wajah: Humayun ki India wapsi ke baad jaldi hi crown prince Emperor of India Jalaluddin Muhammad Akbar ko throne par baithaya gaya. Internal aur external conspiracies ko khatam karne ke liye ek long time tak Mughal Emperor Akbar struggle karta raha. Lekin Kandahar mein apne bhai ki rebellion ke against apne commander Raja Man Singh ko expedition par bheja. Punjab conquer karne ke baad Attock mein Mughal Emperor Akbar aur Man Singh ki meeting hui. Akbar ke order par Attock mein fort ki construction start ki gayi jiska detailed description Ain-e-Akbari mein maujood hai. Raja Man Singh ek long period tak Jhelum ke Rohtas Fort aur Attock Fort mein stay kiya. Hazara ke surroundings se king ke liye boats banwane ke maqsad se forests ki cutting hui aur ek city ko settle kiya gaya. Raja Bal Singh ke naam par Mansehra settled hua. Tuzuk-e-Jahangiri mein bhi Hasan Abdal, Wah Garden, Attock Fort aur Mansehra city ke reference se Noor-ud-din Jahangir Shaheen ne apni autobiography mein iska zikr kiya hai. Mansehra do words ka abbreviation hai: 'Man' Raja Man, 'Sehra' se murad sir ka taaj. Aaj ka Mansehra Pakistan ke Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province ka ek city hai. Green fields, lakes aur pastures ki ye land Hazara se alag ho kar 1976 mein existence mein aayi. Current district 5 tehsilon (Mansehra, Balakot, Baffa Pakhal, Darband, Tehsil Tanawal Phulra, Oghi) par based hai. District ki borders Kashmir, Northern Areas aur Malakand Division se mili hui hain aur Silk Road bhi is district se guzarti hai. Historically district Mansehra Syed Ahmed Shaheed ki Battle of Balakot ki wajah se famous hai. Life ke har field mein overall development hone ke bawajood aj bhi logon ka bada source of livelihood forests hain jo logon ki economic aur social life improve karne mein important role play kar rahe hain. Yahan ke log apni moral values ke baare mein bohot sensitive hain. Tourism is area ki rapidly growing profitable industry hai. Yahan par spoken languages mein Gojri, Hindko aur Pashto shamil hain. Yahan different tribes ke log settled hain jin mein Tanoli, Swati, Gujjar, Awan aur Syed shamil hain. District ka total area 4579 square km hai. Yahan per square km 392.48 people rehte hain jabke district ki population 2023 ki census ke mutabiq 1,797,177 tak hai. Rural population ka main livelihood agriculture hai. Total cultivable area 80740 hectares hai. Alexander the Great ne Punjab ke areas ko conquer karne ke baad, district Mansehra ke area par apna control establish kiya. 327 BC mein Alexander the Great ne is area ka management Abisares ke حوالے kar diya, jo Poonch state ka king tha. Mansehra long time tak Taxila state ka bhi part raha hai. Ashoka apni crown princeship mein is area ka governor appoint tha, jabke apne father Bindusara ki death ke baad woh empire ka heir bana aur Mansehra ke ilawa Gandhara ka ruler hua. Aj bhi kuch rocks jis par uske edicts carved hain, Mansehra city mein Koh Breri ke foothills mein uske rule ki memorial ke taur par maujood hain jin se ye bhi clear hota hai k ye area kabhi religious center bhi raha hai. Mansehra ka naam Man Singh ke naam se derive hua hai, jo ek zamanay mein is area ka ruler tha. Famous Amb State, jo Pashtun tribe Tanoli ke under influence thi, bhi Mansehra ka part hai, jiski state status 1969 mein Government of Pakistan ne end kar di thi. Previous Amb State aur Hazara ke surroundings ki history kafi old hai. Aryan jo Alexander the Great ka appointed historian tha, ne kahin bhi Amb State ke center ki identification nahi ki hai, lekin history mein ye zaroor likha hai k Indus River ya jise yahan locally Abasin ke naam se jana jata hai, ke right bank par settled center tha, jise Alexander the Great ne resources ki supply ke liye center ka status de rakha tha. Yehi center Amb State ka source kehlata hai. 1854 mein General Abbott, jo British government ke appointed officer thay aur unhi ke naam par Abbottabad ka naam hai, ne Amb State aur uske center ki identification Buner ke southern area mein ki hai. Unke according Ranjit Singh ke time se Amb ka current village jo Indus River ya Abasin ke right bank par located hai ko hi uska center tha. Ye center Mahaban ke area se approx 8 km East mein located area tha, jahan se Amb State ke Nawabs ne apna naam select kiya. 2nd century AD mein ek Hindu Raja, Raja Rasalu jo Raja Salbahan ka beta tha aur uska ta'alluq Sialkot se tha ne is area par kabza kiya. Yahan ki local population mein Raja Rasalu ab bhi legendary stories mein alive milta hai. Chinese traveler Hiuan Tsang ke recorded statement ke according k jab usne us time mein yahan visit kiya tha toh ye area Durlabha Vardhana, jo Kashmir state ka ruler tha ke control mein tha. Turk rule aur Hindu rule continuously is area par attack karte rahe hain jabke rule bhi isi tarah transfer hota raha hai. Hindu Shahi mein Raja Jayapala ne zyada fame haasil ki jise Mahmud Ghaznavi ne apni first Indian campaign ke dauran defeat kiya. Yahan ye baat noteworthy hai k history mein kahin bhi Mahmud Ghaznavi ke Mansehra mein stay ya yahan se guzarne ke proof available nahi hain. 11th century mein Hindu Shahi ke end hone ke baad Kashmiriyon ne is area par kabza kar liya, jab wahan ka ruler Kalashan tha. 1112 se 1120 tak Raja Susala ne yahan rule kiya. 12th century mein Aslat Khan ne is area ko apni military campaign mein conquer kiya, jabke uske successor Ghor Muhammad ke baad ek bar phir ye area Kashmiriyon ke under influence aa gaya. British Raj k dauran Hazara district ko teen administrative tehsiloN mein divide kiya gaya jo Mansehra, Abbottabad aur Haripur par based thiN aur unheN Punjab se attached rakha gaya. Baad mein 1901 mein jab North-Western Frontier Province banaya gaya to Hazara dist ko us mein shamil kar liya gaya. British Raj k dauran PushtoonoN ne kabhi govt ki authority accept nahi ki aur apni struggle continue rakhi, jaise British government ne Riyasat Amb ki autonomy ko maana, jabke sub-state Phulra ki semi-autonomy bhi (jo Amb k Nawab Painda Khan Tanoli ki taraf se apne bhai Madad Khan Tanoli k under thi) maintain rakhi gai. Is connection mein ek agreement jo Riyasat Amb aur British Raj k beech hua, kafi famous hai. Tehreek-e-Pakistan k dauran local level par Pushtoon aur doosre tribes ne ek saath struggle ki. Riyasat Amb k Nawab Sir Muhammad Farid Khan Tanoli ka Quaid-e-Azam aur Nawabzada Liaquat Ali Khan k sath contact qaim raha, jis ki example different periods mein hui correspondence se di ja sakti hai. 1947 mein jab partition of India ka stage chal raha tha, to sab tribes aur Riyasat Amb ne unanimously Pakistan mein shamil honay ka decision liya. 1969 mein Riyasat Amb ki autonomy finish kar k use Pakistan ka part bana diya gaya, jabke 1971 mein Shahi Riyasat Amb ko completely khatam kar diya gaya. Bhutto k zamanay mein Mansehra ko district ka status mila jismein Mansehra aur Battagram do tehsilein thiN. Baad mein Balakot ko bhi tehsil ka darja de diya gaya. Battagram baad mein district ban gaya. Jabke ab Mansehra mein teen tehsilein, Mansehra, Oghi aur Balakot ki form mein hain. Mansehra, North Western Frontier Province ki eastern border pe hai, jiska Peshawar se distance approx 217 km jabke Islamabad se ye 195 km hai. Dist Mansehra ki borders north mein Diamer aur Kohistan districts se, south mein Abbottabad se, east mein Azaad Kashmir k Neelum district se, west mein Torghar aur Swat districts se, aur North West mein Battagram aur Buner districts se milti hain. Mansehra district mein kai chhoti aur bari lakes haiN, lekin tourism aur geographical point of view se teen lakes famous hain. InmeN Lake Lulusar, Lake Dudipatsar aur Lake Saif-ul-Malook shamil hain. Yeh teenoN lakes Kaghan Valley mein hain, jo Balakot tehsil ka part hai. Lake Lulusar Naran se around 48 km door hai jabke yeh sea level se approx 3325 meters high hai. Ye lake charoN taraf se jungle se ghiri hui hai, jabke is k ird gird ke medicinal plant forests national fame rakhte hain. Ye lake River Kunhar ka source bhi keh sakti hai. Lake Dudipatsar closed shape mein khubsurat snow-covered peaks mein ghiri hui lake hai. Yahan tak access bohot difficult aur tough hai. Is lake tak pohachne k liye minimum 7 se 12 hours tak bohot mushkil aur tough ravines mein walk kar k hi possible hai. Lake k surroundings mein pastures aur green water dekhne layak hai. Mansehra district ki sab se famous aur pretty lake Saif-ul-Malook hai, jiska naam yahan ki ek famous legendary story, Qissa Saif-ul-Malook ki waja se mashhoor hai. Ye qissa ek Persian prince aur ek fairy ki love story hai. Lake Saif-ul-Malook Kaghan Valley k northern part mein located hai. Ye sea level se approx 3244 meters height pe situated hai.
Chitral KP ki ek valley hai. Chitral Pakistan k extreme northern corner par located hai. Ye district Tirich Mir k daman mein hai jo Hindu Kush mountain range ki highest peak hai. Iska border Afghanistan ki Wakhan strip se milta hai jo ise Central Asian countries se alag karti hai. Riyasat k is part ko baad mein district ka status mila. Aur KP k Malakand Division se attach kiya gaya. Apni unique geographic location ki waja se is district ka connection country k doosre areas se approx 5 months tak cut rehta hai. Apni special attractive culture aur mysterious past k hawale se Chitral ki distinct identity ne tourism k point of view se bhi kafi importance gain kar li. Afghanistan war k dauran apni specific geographic position ki waja se Chitral ki importance mein further izafa hua. Present time mein Central Asian Muslim countries ki independence ne iski importance ko kafi highlight kiya. Area k lihaaz se ye province ka sab se bara district hai. Chitral Pakistan ka old folk aur historic heritage rakhta hai, Badshah Munir Bukhari k according Chitral mein 17 languages boli jaati hain aur iski total population 4 lakh logon par base karti hai, Lekin Chitral se belong karnay wale Urdu aur Chitrali language k prominent writer, poet, researcher aur journalist Rehmat Aziz Chitrali ne Chitral mein boli jaanay wali languages ki tadaad 14 likhi hai. Yahan k log Chitrali language bolte haiN. Majority Muslims ki hai lekin Kafiristan k area mein non-Muslims bhi rehte hain. Chitrali Academy k recent survey k according Chitrali language k poets ki count 1000 se upar chali gai hai. Aur poets k collections bhi publish ho rahay haiN. Chitral k kuch prominent poets neeche diye gaye hain. Chitral district ka total area 14850 square kilometers hai. Yahan per square km 25 log rehte hain. Year 2004-05 mein district ki population 378000 thi. Rural population ka main source of income farming hai. Total cultivable area 22550 hectares hai.
KP ka ek district. Malakand Agency 1970 mein FATA k result mein banai gai. Is se pehle Malakand Agency ka management Federal Govt k supervision mein tha. 1970 mein Dir, Chitral aur Swat ki states k merger mein ye tribal area provincial govt k under aaya. Northern areas k route mein hone ki waja se Malakand Agency ko historicaly special importance mili hai. Yahan Pashto language boli jaati hai. Dargai Fort aur militia army se bhi Dargai ki importance clear hai. Provincial control mein aanay k baad is district ki trade mein kafi changes aaye. Malakand tribal aur rural status rakhta hai.
Darra Adam Khel Peshawar aur Kohat k beech Federal Administered Tribal Area hai. Ye Kohat k border area mein shamil hai. Is liye isko FR Kohat bhi kehte hain. Darra Adam Khel kisi tribal agency mein shamil nahi, balkay yeh 6 qabail par based ek separate halqa hai. Darra Adam Khel weapons ki waja se poori duniya mein famous hai. Darra Adam Khel Asia ki biggest arms market hai. Ajab Khan Afridi ka relation bhi Darra Adam Khel se tha. Year 2005 mein Taliban k against military operation ki waja se Darra Adam Khel ki arms industry ko kafi loss hua hai. However, almost 2003 mein Darra Adam Khel mein coal mines ki discovery ki waja se kai logoN ko employment opportunities mili hain. Darra Adam Khel mein coal ki kai mines discover hui hain. KP k Governor ne Darra Adam Khel ki coal mines ka visit bhi kia hai. Lekin Governor Darra Adam Khel k residents k liye koi kaam nahi kar sake. Darra Adam Khel five qabilon par based hai: Akhurwal, Zarghun Khel, Shiraki, Tor Chappar aur Bosti Khel. Ghazi Ajab Khan Afridi ka ta'alluq Bosti Khel qabile se tha aur Maulana Muhammad Aamir urf Bijli Ghar Sahab Akhurwal qabile se thay. Afridi tribe Darra Adam Khel ka Govt of Pakistan aur Govt of Afghanistan par ek historical ehsaan hai. 1979 mein jab Russia ne Afghanistan pe attack kiya to Russia ka Afghanistan k baad real target Pakistan k garam samandar par qabza karna tha. Jab war start hui to ek saal tak UN aur foreign weapons ki aid Afghanistan k logon ko milna shuru nahi hui thi. Ye pehla saal bohot mushkil fight thi kyunki Afghan public ki armed power bilkul nahi thi. Sirf paharon se Russian tanks par bare bare stones girate thay. Usi time mein Afghan logon ko Pakistan govt ne Darra Adam Khel se weapons purchase karne k liye financial help dena shuru ki. Aur Darra Adam Khel k logon ne din raat mehnat kar k daily thousands of guns bana k Afghan public ko dena start ki. Isi tarah poora ek saal Russia jaise superpower country ko Darra Adam Khel k local weapons par brave Afghan aur tribal logon ne ek saal Afghanistan k andar rok kar amaze kar diya. Agar God forbid, Darra Adam Khel na hota to Russia bohot kam time mein Afghanistan par qabza kar k Pakistani borders par ghalat harkatain shuru kar deta. Agar us waqt Pakistan Russia se fight karta shayad aaj Pakistan bhi Afghanistan ki tarah tabah ho chuka hota. Lekin Allah ne hum sab par bara ehsaan kiya. Afghan public ko phir ek saal baad international aid milna start ho gai. Aur 8 saal tak tough fighting k baad Russia ne defeat accept kar li. Darra Adam Khel community ki is help ko us time international media ne bare golden aur historical words mein yaad kiya tha. Magar Pakistan Govt ne Darra Adam Khel nation ko koi award nahi dia. Kyunke Darra Adam Khel k ek saal weapons ki help se Pakistan safe hua, Pakistan Govt ko chahiye k Darra Adam Khel ko value ki nazar se dekhta. Kyunke aisi skilled aur loyal nations duniya mein bohot kam milti hain. Darra Adam Khel kyunke Afridi qom ka area hai aur Adam Baba ki descendants chaar barray parts mein divided hain. Jin k naam neeche diye gaye hain. Qoum Jawaki, Qoum Hasan Khel, Qoum Hashu Khel, Qoum Gulay ya Gulli. Qoum Hasho Khel aur Qoum Jawaki FR Peshawar mein rehte hain, jabke Darra Adam Khel mein Qoum Gullai (yani Shiraki), Qoum Bosti Khel, Qoum Tor Chappar, Qoum Zarghun Khel aur Qoum Hasan Khel Akhurwal bhi rehtay hain. Darra Adam Khel k sath Qoum Jawaki ka kuch part attached hai. Is poore area ko FR Kohat k naam se jaana jaata hai. FR Kohat ka Political Agent Deputy Commissioner Kohat hota hai. Jiske under ek Assistant Political Agent saare judicial aur administrative tasks perform karta hai. FR Kohat k teen Tehsildar Sahiban Assistant Political Agent sahab FR Kohat k under FCR law apply karte hain. Senior Tehsildar Qoum Zarghun Khel aur Qoum Akhurwal ka supervisor hota hai jabke Tehsildar Qoum Jawaki sirf Qoum Jawaki ka aur Political Naib Tehsildar Qoum Bosti Khel, Qoum Tor Chappar aur Qoum Shiraki ka in-charge hota hai. Administrative-ly Qoum Zarghun Khel ko six sub-sections mein divide kiya gaya hai. Jo 'Kanday/Kandi' k naam se hain. Kandi Muhammad Khel, Kandi Mulla Khel, Kandi Meri Khel, Kandi Shpulki Wal, Kandi Sunni Khel, Kandi Talam Khel. Qoum Akhurwal ko bhi administratively teen Kandiyat mein baanta gaya hai. Kandi Gadiyakhel, Kandi Balaqi Khel, aur Kandi Peerwal Khel.
KP ka ek district. Mardan district KP mein Swat Road par hai. Ye KP ka bohot old distt hai jo 1937 mein bana tha. Peshawar aur Malakand Division k beech mein located hai. Old times se ye district ek agricultural area raha hai. Jo sugarcane, tobacco aur fruits k liye bohot famous hai. Yahan per acre production better hai. Doosre districts k comparison mein ye district ek strong industrial status rakhta hai. Geographical location k hisab se Mardan ko doosre ilaqoN par naturally superiority mili hui hai. Swabi tehsil k alag hone k baad Mardan district sirf do tehsiloN Mardan aur Takht Bhai par contain karta hai. Political, social aur cultural values ki waja se ye area bohot sensitive hai. Ye district agriculture based industrial foundation rakhta hai. Province ki industrial development mein Mardan ko ek important position mili hai. Yehi reason hai k yahan se bohot si items backward areas ko export ki jaati hain. Geographical location, good economic potential aur extensive govt investment ki waja se ye district kafi important hai. Yahan par ek bari sugar mill bhi hai. Takht Bhai aur Shahbaz Garhi mein archaeological sites ki presence is district mein tourism ko scientific bases par develop karne ki need highlight karti hai. Military cantonment is area ki development mein important role play kar rahi hai. Abdul Wali Khan University Mardan.
KP k south mein Pakistan ka ek city aur isi naam k ek division ka ek district River Sindh k western bank par rehta hai. Logon ka source of livelihood farming aur animal rearing hai. Is area mein Urdu, Saraiki, Pashto aur Balochi languages boli jaati hain. Yahan k old inhabitants Baloch qom k Kalachi tribe se belong karte hain. Jo Makran se aaye thay. Is tribe ne centuries tak Koh-e-Suleman k foothills (yaani Damaan) mein rule kiya. Ye baat proven nahi hai kyunke yahan shuru se hi Pushtoon tribes (Dolat Khel, Lohani aur Gandapur) rehte thay. Unhone Baloch ko refuge di. Kalachi ki jagah par farming k liye land di. Wo (yani Baloch) kabhi Damaan k owners nahi thay, unki hukumat sirf River Sindh ki strip k sath thi. Kalachi k naam se city ki foundation rakhi gai jo aaj Dera Ismail Khan ki tehsil hai, balkay is tehsil ko Pakistan ki oldest tehsil hone ka honor mila hai. Dera Ismail Khan starting mein mostly area uninhabited tha lekin baad mein is area mein farming ko kafi develop kiya gaya aur bare bare farm houses banaye gaye. Tube wells laga kar irrigation k naye methods adopt kiye gaye. Dera Ismail Khan mein ek university Gomal University k naam se hai.
Lakki Marwat, KP ka ek district hai. District Lakki Marwat Bannu Division k ek naye district k tor par 1st July 1992 ko bana. Iski borders ek side pe Bannu aur doosri side pe Punjab se milti hain. Apni geographical boundaries, increasing population aur Southern plains mein ek central location ki waja se Bannu district ki ye old tehsil bohot pehle district banne deserve karti thi. Ye piece of land dry, barren plain hone ki waja se abhi tak development limits ko touch nahi kar saka, jiski waja kai obstacles hain jaise water unavailability aur facilities ki kami. Yahan ki land kafi had tak barren aur uninhabited hai. In sab shortages k bawajood, nature ne is district ko hardworking aur skilled workforce di hai. Jiski waja se ye area ek business hub ban raha hai. Transport sources aur mineral resources ka logon ki financial condition improve karne mein bara role hai. District ki majority Marwat qoum par based hai aur saath hi Sadat qoum bhi yahan rehti hai. Sadat qoumeN teen different areas mein spread hain for example Dalukhel, Abakhel aur Mattori village par based hain. Yahan Pashto language boli jati hai.
