Year 2020 mein yahan University of Lakki Marwat formally start ho chuki hai. Jo Dalukhel area mein located hai. Yahan par cement ka ek factory Lucky Cement k naam se hai. Senate k first chairman Habibullah Khan Marhoom ka relation Lakki Marwat se tha, political point of view se yahan Saifullah Brothers kafi famous hain. Jinhain Pakistan mein king-makers k naam se jaana jaata hai. District ki tehsil Naurang ki land kafi fertile hai. Ye area ek important trade center mana jata hai. Is district se Maulana Muhammad Anwar Khan abhi National Assembly k member hain. Aur inka ta'alluq Jamiat Ulema-e-Islam Pakistan se hai. District ka total area 3164 sq km hai. Yahan per sq km 192 log rehte hain. 2023 k census k according district ki population 1041000 logon par based hai. Rural population ka main source of income farming hai. Total cultivable area 116910 hectares hai. 1836 mein Sikh rule k dauran Sardar Ranjit Singh ne is area ko Hindu tax collector Diwan Lakhi Mal ko 40 hazar rupees rent par diya tha, Lucky uski waja se hai, jabke Marwat Pathan qom hai jo is ilaqay mein abundantly rehti hai.
KP ka distt. Starting mein Hangu district Kohat ki ek tehsil thi. Jo sub-continent ki history mein ek unique tehsil maani jaati thi. 1903 mein Hangu ko Kohat district mein as a tehsil shamil kiya gaya, aur 30th June 1996 ko is tehsil ne Kohat se separate district ka status gain kiya. Ye newly created district beautiful scenes, mineral wealth aur forests se rich hai. Iski workforce skilled aur hardworking hai aur defense matters mein services provide kar rahi hai. Is district k log country k andar aur Gulf countries mein services de kar country k liye bohot foreign exchange earn kar rahay haiN. Geographical location ki waja se is district ko ek high status mila hai. Kyunke ek taraf ye distt Kohat se aur doosri taraf Orakzai aur Kurram Agency se connected hai. British rule k daur mein Afghanistan k sath war mein Hangu ka zikr commonly milta hai. Tribal aur settled traditions k mix se ye log educated aur civilized hain. Yahan par mostly Bangash tribes rehte hain. Aur yahan Pashto language boli jaati hai. Hangu district mein kai saal se sectarian clashes ho rahi hain. Jismein bohot si valuable lives waste ho chuki hain. 1935 mein Hangu mein Police Training School establish hua. Hangu district ka total area 1097 sq km hai. Yahan per sq km 356 people rehte hain. 2004-05 mein district ki population 391000 thi. Rural population ka main source of income farming hai. Total cultivable area 27430 hectares hai.
KP ka ek district. Kohistan dry aur barren pahariyon ki land hai jo tough life, insufficient development aur scattered population ki waja se jaana jata hai. Lekin is k bawajood Kohistan distt ajeeb geographical importance aur strategic significance rakhta hai. Iski borders Northern Areas, Malakand Division aur Hazara Division se milti hain. Karakoram Highway k passage hone ki waja se is district mein tourism sector ki betterment k liye kafi potential hai. Hazara Division k form hone k baad 1976 mein Kohistan as a district bana. Ye chaar sub-divisions Dasu, Kandia, Palas aur Pattan k amalgamations par based hai. 1976 k destructive earthquake k baad is backward district ki construction aur development ki responsibility Kohistan Development Board ko de di gai. Although baad mein board end ho gaya, lekin developmental activities ne apni pace maintain rakhi. Geographical distance, economic aur social weakness yahan k main issues hain. Poverty peak par hai. Ab yahan government Dasu Dam k naam se ek dam bhi bana rahi hai jo area ki prosperity ka reason hoga. 2014 mein Kohistan district ko Upper Kohistan district aur Lower Kohistan district mein divide kar diya gaya jiske baad province mein districts ki number 26 ho gai hai. Distt ka total area 7492 sq km hai. Yahan per sq km 99 log rehte hain. 2004-05 mein distt ki population 675000 thi. Rural population ka main source of income farming hai. Total cultivable area 36750 hectares hai.
Haripur city ki foundation 1821 mein Sikh General Hari Singh Nalwa ne military point of view se rakhi. Haripur city mein ek fort banaya gaya jiski walls 4 meter wide aur 16 meter high thiN. Fort mein enter honay k liye four gates thay. Haripur ka naam Ranjit Singh k ek Sikh general Hari Singh Nalwa k naam par rakha gaya. Haripur tehsil ko 1st July 1992 mein district ka status de kar Abbottabad district se separate kar diya gaya. Haripur ki original aur old qoum Gujjar hai jinke baad Turk yahan aaye aur phir doosri qoumoN ne as an invader ya kisi qoum ki invitation par yahan permanent residence adopt ki. Haripur ki mostly qoumaiN Sindh Paar k region se yahan migrate kar k aayiN, in qoumoN mein Tareen, Tanoli, Mashwani, Sulaimani, Dalzak, Panni, Utmanzai aur Jadun etc. shamil hain. Past aur present mein bhi in Afghan qoumoN ka Haripur mein important role raha hai, Sikhs k against Muhammad Khan Tareen, Sarbuland Khan Tanoli aur Saleh Muhammad Mashwani ki leadership mein battles worth mentioning hain jinmein in qoumoN ki sacrifices unique hain. Haripur mein Syed, Awan, Gakhkar, Rajput, Abbasi aur Karral bhi large numbers mein rehte hain. Haripur mein bhi bohot se Sufi hain. Yahan kuch old names hain. Haripur mein Iraq se aanay walay Sufi buzurg Qutub Shah (yani Aun bin Ya'ala Al-Alvi) ki aulad bhi rehti hai. Khanqah Sadr-e-Rabbaniyah Sadriyah Mohalla Eidgah Haripur. Hazrat Moazzam Qazi Muhammad Sadruddin Naqshbandiya silsilay k buzurg thay. Unka mazar yahan hai. Abhi Presidential Award winning book Syedul Wara k author Sahibzada Abdul Daim gaddi nasheen hain. Haripur mein Hasni o Husaini Sadat k bohot se families rehte hain jinmeN Kazmi, Mashhadi, Tirmizi, Naqvi Bukhari, Naqvi Bhakri aur Gillani Sadat shamil hain. Ye city Islamabad se 65 km aur Abbottabad se 35 km door located hai. Is district ko geographical location k hisab se key position mili hui hai. Kyunke ye distt Hazara Division aur KP k beech ek gate ka status rakhta hai. Apne unique location ki waja se Haripur ki boundaries eight different districts se milti hain, jinki details kuch yun hain. Haripur ki eastern aur north-eastern border Abbottabad district se milti hai. North mein ye district Mansehra aur North-West mein Haripur ka Nara Amazai aur Bait Gali ka area Torghar aur Buner se milta hai. Hari ki western border mein Swabi district located hai. West aur South-West mein Punjab k do districts Attock aur Rawalpindi, jabke South-East mein Federal Capital Islamabad located hai. Haripur weather k hisab se hot rainy moderate region mein count kiya ja sakta hai. Yahan sabse ziada hot month June ka hota hai, jismein temperature 40 degree Celsius se bhi increase ho jaata hai. Is k baad July, August mein monsoon ki waja se bohot heavy rains hoti hain jisse garmi ka effect to kam ho jaata hai magar humidity bohot barh jaati hai. November k month mein sabse kam barish hoti hai aur poora month usually dry cold mein guzar jata hai. Winter season mein January sabse cold hota hai, jab kuch dinon mein temperature freezing point se bhi gir jaata hai. March, April aur September, October k months mein weather moderate rehta hai. Haripur district ko Ghazi aur Haripur do tehsiloN mein divide kiya gaya tha lekin 2018 mein ek third tehsil Khanpur ko ismein shamil kiya gaya. Provincial Assembly k liye district teen provincial constituencies mein divided hai. Jo respectively PK-40, PK-41, PK-42 k naam se hain. National Assembly k liye poora district sirf ek constituency tak limited hai jo NA-17 kehlata hai jise 2018 k local body elections mein Haripur district ko 45 Union Councils mein divide kiya gaya. Jinmein se 37 Haripur jabke sirf 8 Ghazi tehsil mein shamil hain. Industrial point of view se Haripur KP mein ek bara distt hai. Barray barray industrial units jaise Telephone Factory, Hazara Fertilizer, Pak China Fertilizer, Tarbela Cotton Mills aur kai woolen factories established hain. Besides this, Hattar Industrial Estate mein kai chote barray factories lagaye gaye hain. In industries ki waja se ye district national level par economic development mein ek important role play kar raha hai aur is se kai poor logon ko employment milti hai. Haripur geographically bohot diverse district hai. Yahan fertile plains k sath high mountains bhi hain. Ek side pe plains fields aur orchards se equipped hain to doosri taraf yahan k mountains forests, streams aur waterfalls se populated hain. Isliye yahan animals aur plants ki bohot sari species exist karti hain. Haripur ka mostly agricultural area barani (rain-fed) hai, jahan saal mein do baar Rabi aur Kharif crops boyi aur kaati jaati hain. In crops mein wheat, maize, millet aur mustard shamil hain. In k ilawa Sarai Saleh ki jagah par Dour Nadi se aur Khanpur Dam se nikali gai canals par based areas mein vegetables bhi cultivate ki jaati hain. Yahan par commonly cultivate ki jaane wali vegetables mein peas, tomatoes, potatoes, onions, cucumbers, eggplants, pumpkins, garlic, ginger, bitter gourd, tinda, pumpkin aur spinach shamil hain. Ye district especially vegetables na sirf Peshawar balkay Islamabad aur Punjab province ko bhi supply karta hai. Haripur mein fruits k orchards abundantly hain. Jinmein loquat, guava, orange aur lychee jaise fruits grow hote hain. Especially loquat production k hawale se Haripur bohot famous hai. Is k ilawa Khanpur mein grow hone wale oranges apne taste mein be-misaal hain. In orchards mein blood orange aur shukri orange produce kiya jaata hai. Peshawar se Islamabad Motorway aur Ghazi Barotha Dam Project k establishment se district ki social aur economic development aur ziada sure hone k chances hain. Haripur ki tehsilein Haripur, Ghazi aur Khanpur hain. Haripur district ka total area 1725 sq km hai. Yahan per sq km 466 log rehte hain. 2004-05 mein district ki population 803000 thi. Rural population ka main source of income farming hai. Total cultivable area 77370 hectares hai. Govt hospitals aur private hospitals bhi available hain. World-wide mud se bana hua sabse bara dam Tarbela Dam isi district mein River Sindh par construct kiya gaya hai. Ye dam 2200 MW electricity generate karta hai. Is k ilawa bhi Haripur mein chotay barray dams ka network spread hua hai.
KP ka ek district. Kohat district apne HQ Kohat k naam se jaana jaata hai. Ye sub-continent ka ek old district hai. Kohat ka zikar Buddhism ki ancient history mein bhi milta hai. Present time mein bhi is district ko geographical, general aur defense point of view se special importance mili hai. Yahan Pakistan ki oldest cantonment available hai. Is district ki borders Orakzai Agency, Peshawar district, Punjab province, Hangu district aur Karak district se milti hain. Ajab Khan Afridi aur military cantonment ne Kohat ko ek unforgettable story bana diya hai. Kohat agricultural point of view se aur especially fruits ki waja se kafi fertile hai. Guava fruit yahan ki special produce mein shamil hai. Traditionally ye ek trade hub hai. Tribal areas aur Punjab k liye ek important market ka status rakhta hai. Yahan k log bohot intelligent aur hardworking hain. Transport aur services mein ye log key position rakhte hain. Saath hi yahan k log defense matters mein bhi kafi expert hain. Dam, important military installations, Indus Highway aur Kohat Tunnel ki construction ki waja se ye district kafi important hai. Kohat mein majority Bangash tribes ki hai. Urdu k internationally renowned poet Ahmed Faraz ka relation bhi isi district se hai. Kohat mein Hindko aur Pashto languages boli jaati hain. District ka total area 2545 sq km hai. Yahan per sq km 275 log rehte hain. 2004-05 mein district ki population 700000 thi. Rural population ka main source of income farming hai. Total cultivable area 71210 hectares hai. Kohat district ka almost 70% area agriculture par based hai jismein Bahader Kot, Khurmatto, Dhoda, Kot, Sayab, Ghandiyali, Bali Tang, Tog, Kaluchana, Sheikhan, Shahpur, Mohammadzai aur Sherkot k ilawa Sur Gul, Chambai, Buddh, tak ka area bohot fertile hai. Mostly area ko Tanda aur Ghandiyali dams se irrigate kiya jaata hai. Is k ilawa wells k pani ko bhi agriculture k liye use kiya jaata hai.
Karak KP ka ek barani (rain-fed) aur dry district. Karak district Kohat se 1st July 1982 ko alag ho kar district bana. Is district ki poori population ek hi qom Khattak par based hai. Ye teen tehsiloN Karak, Banda Daud Shah aur Takht Nusrati par include karta hai. District ki borders Bannu, Kohat, aur Punjab province se milti hain. Karak district Jatta Ali Khan Khel aur Bahadur Khel mein salt mines hain. Kyunke ye reserves barray area par spread hain, isliye iske harmful effects ne district ki weak agriculture ko weak kar diya hai. Is district ka biggest problem water hai. Jo na sirf irrigation balkay drinking k liye bhi insufficient hai. Pehle Peshawar se DI Khan jaane wali highway Karak city aur abadiyoN se faasle par thi. Ab Indus Highway Karak se hi guzarti hai. Jo logon ki economic aur social life mein revolutionary changes la rahi hai. Geographical features k lihaaz se yahan hard barren plains aur broken long mountain ranges hain. Yahan ki workforce intelligence aur hard work k qualities se bhari hui hai. Jo hamari defense power ka ek valuable asset hai. Yahan k logon ka main source of income mostly army jobs hain. Is area ne barray barray famous personalities paida ki hain. Jinmein Aslam Khattak (Ex-Communication Minister), Zafar Azam (Provincial Law Minister), Nawabzada Mohsin Ali Khan (Ex-Provincial Finance Minister), Ali Quli Khan shamil hain. In logon ne apni intelligence ki waja se technical, educational aur commercial fields mein kafi progress ki hai. Recently Gargari ki jagah par gas ki discovery bhi hui hai. District ka total area 3372 sq km hai. Yahan per sq km 159 log rehte hain. 2004-05 mein district ki population 536000 thi. Rural population ka main source of income farming hai. Total cultivable area 75430 hectares hai.
Kalam Swat Valley ka ek beautiful gaon hai jo River Swat k bank par Swat district, KP, Pakistan mein located hai. Sea level se iski height 6,800 feet hai. Ye Islamabad se 270 km door hai. Kalam ek famous tourist spot hai, magar achi road na hone ki waja se tourists ko yahan pohnchne mein difficulties aati hain. Yahan tourists k liye kafi guest houses aur hotels available hain. Yahan summers mein weather bohot pleasant rehta hai aur winters mein bohot ziada sardi aur snowfall hoti hai. Ye Mingora se almost 99 km k fasle par hai. Glacier Lake aur Mahodand Lake yahan ki famous lakes hain.
Goth Badardeen Pakistan k Sindh province ka gaon hai jo Badin district k tehsil Tando Bago Union Council Pangrio mein situated hai. Badin uska headquarter hai. Is gaon k residents ka Kamboh biradari se ta'alluq hai, Arain bhi rehte hain.
Umerkot bohot purana shehar hai. Ye city ab bhi archeology mein bohot importance rakhta hai. Umerkot Pakistan k Sindh province mein located hai. Umerkot ko ab Sindh Govt ki taraf se district ka status mila hua hai. Umerkot fort ki waja se is city ka naam hi Umerkot par gaya jiska matlab hai Umar (us king ka naam jisne ye fort banwaya tha) aur Kot (fort). Umerkot ka matlab hai Umar ka fort. Ye fort King Umar Soomro ne banwaya tha. Ye wohi King Umar hai jisne Marui ko forcefully kidnap kar liya tha. Kaha jaata hai k Umar Soomro ne Marui ko isi fort mein qaid kar k rakha tha. Umar Marui ka qissa aaj bhi Sindh mein, specially gharoN mein, bohot shauq se suna aur sunaya jaata hai. Aur Sindh k Sufi poet Hazrat Shah Abdul Latif ne apni poetry ka ek bara part Umar Marui par likha hai. Umar Marvi ki timeless story bhi is region se related hai. Ye usi time ka qissa hai. Marvi ka relation Maliri se tha. Bhalwa ko kidnap kar k apne mahal mein laa kar qaid kar diya tha. Marvi Thar ki love mein qaid thi, use open air se pyaar tha, isliye usne palace k luxuries, costly clothes aur tasty food reject kar diye. Din raat wo sad rehti thi. Finally Umar ne use free kar diya tha. Shah Abdul Latif Bhittai k risalay k suron mein freedom-loving aur high-mindedness ka demonstration hai.
Dadu Pakistan k Sindh province ka city hai jo Dadu district mein located hai. Ye Dadu district ka headquarter hai. Dadu city Kalhora Dynasty k time (1783-1701 AD) mein exist nahi karta tha. Kalhora era mein is city k Mohalla Markhpur ka historical mention hai. Dadu city ki antiquity k liye do traditions milti hain. Ek tradition ye hai k Dadu Shah k naam se Dadu ka naam pada magar Dadu Shah ka na mazar hai na koi thikana ya takiya. Doosri tradition k according yahan Dadu Wansi Hindu caste rehti thi jo famous Sufi poet Dadu Dayal ki follower thi. Dadu Dayal ka Sehwan mein aana aur Sindh k Sufi poet Qazi Qazan se milne ki history bhi available hai aur Dadu Wansi community ka historical books mein mention bhi milta hai jo British India k time Dadu mein rehti thi. Anyways, Dadu city British India k records mein maujood hai. River Sindh k right bank par Dadu city ki taraf ek canal behti thi jo River Sindh se nikal kar Dadu k paas se guzarti thi aur phir flow karte hue dobara river se ja kar milti thi. Dadu pehle Karachi district mein shamil tha. 1931 mein Dadu ko district banaya gaya to is city ne develop hona start kiya. 1980 k baad Dadu city ne bohot progress ki hai. Trade aur agriculture ka center hai. Dadu mein 3 Boys High Schools, ek Girls High School, ek Girls Degree College, ek Ustad Bukhari Boys Degree College hai. Law College k ilawa Sindh University Campus bhi hai. Dadu mein Civil Hospital bhi hai. Yahan weather bohot hot hai. Dadu, Johi, Mehar aur Khairpur Nathan Shah Dadu district ki tehsilein hain. Cleanliness k lihaaz se Dadu bohot peeche hai magar Dadu k log bohot friendly aur hospitable hote hain. Allama I.I. Kazi Dadu city mein paida hue.
Thatta city Pakistan k Sindh province mein River Sindh k bank par basa hua ek old aur historical city hai. Middle Ages k time mein Thatta Sindh ka capital raha hai. 326 BC mein Alexander the Great ki India aamad aur India par invasion k remains yahan ek island par milte hain. Thatta kyunke historical city hai, isliye United Nations body UNESCO ne Thatta k kai historical sites aur tombs ko apni World Heritage list mein shamil kar rakha hai. Thatta city k ird gird kai jagahon par ancient historical artifacts discover hue hain jin se guess kiya jaata hai k Thatta city Pre-Christian era se basa hua hai. India mein Muslim rule k establishment k baad Thatta city knowledge aur art ka hub ban gaya. 14th century AD mein Sindh mein Samma Dynasty k rulers ne officially Thatta ko dobara abad kiya aur city k status se naye style par basaya aur capital declare kiya. Mughal Empire k time tak Thatta developed aur dynamic city tha, magar British Raj k dauran Karachi ki rising status ne is city ko severe loss pohanchaya aur finally Karachi mein ports k establishment k baad is city ka status sirf history k pages ki zeenat banti chali gai. Thatta ka glorious past yahan ki historical aur ancient buildings, tombs aur mosques hain jinmein se Shahjahani Mosque aur Makli ka greatest old graveyard prominent hain. Known history aur evidence k according Thatta ki history 2000 BC se bhi purani hai. Persian aur Arabic books mein is city ka naam Thatha ya Tatta likha hua milta hai jo Albatta ka hum-qafiya (rhyme) hai. Author of Bustan-us-Siyahat ne ise Albatta ka rhyme hi intend kiya hai. Lekin is rhyme-less meaningless word se Thatta k naam ki origin understand karna mushkil hai, balkay Tuhfat-ul-Kiram k author ki opinion upar wali opinion se kahin behtar hai. Sindh k renowned researcher aur multi-faceted personality Meer Ali Sher Qane Thatwi ne apni book Tuhfat-ul-Kiram (written in: 1767 AD) mein Thatta k naam ki waja ye batayi hai k: Us waqt (1181 Hijri, corresponds to 1767 AD) Thatta k naam ki origin k baray mein do baatein famous hain: kuch kehte hain k ye Teh Teh (yani low-lying) ki property se related hai aur kuch ka kehna hai k ye Thatt k word se named hai jo SindhiyoN ki term mein logon k gather hone ki jagah k meaning rakhta hai. Ye baat hidden na rahay k ye land, jaise history se pata chalta hai, old times mein bhi Thatta k naam se pukari jati thi aur kyunke Sindh k upper part ko common log Siro kehte hain aur is lower part ko Laar (yani low-land ya slope) kaha jaata hai, isliye yahi reason Thatta k naam ki origin ka ek clear proof hai. Author of Tuhfat-ul-Kiram k upar diye gaye statement se yahi pata chalta hai k 1181 Hijri (1767 AD) tak is city ko Thatta k naam se hi pukaara jaata tha. Remember, ye Mughal Empire k decline ka period tha jab East India Company Bengal mein apne roots set kar chuki thi. Archaeologist Ahmad Hasan Dani (died 2009 AD) k according Thatta Sindhi language k do words Thatto ya Thatt se derive hua hai jinke meanings hain: river k bank par basna. Sindh ki public is city ko mostly Thatta Nagar ya sirf Nagar k naam se bhi call karti hai. Present Thatta city Koh-e-Makli k foothills mein ancient city k ruins par basa hua hai. Current city Samma Dynasty k time mein 900 Hijri (1495 AD) mein dobara abad kiya gaya tha. Thatta city Pakistan k Sindh province mein Thatta district mein located hai. Thatta city ka longitude 67 degrees 55 minutes 28 seconds aur latitude 24 degrees 44 minutes 46 seconds hai. Urdu Daira-e-Maarif-e-Islamia k article writer ne Thatta city ka longitude 68 degrees aur latitude 24 degrees 44 minutes likha hai. Nowadays River Sindh Thatta se approx 6 miles east direction mein flow karta hai aur 4-5 miles neeche jaa kar do branches mein divide ho jaata hai, magar 1758 tak River Sindh Thatta k south mein flow karta tha aur uski ek branch Thatta k west mein behti thi. Thatta Karachi se 102 km east, Badin se 110 km west, Sujawal se 27 km west, Hyderabad se 101 km south-west mein located hai. India ki history mein first time Thatta ka mention Shams Siraj Afif ne apni book Tarikh-e-Firoz Shahi mein kiya hai. Is se pehle Thatta ka mention kisi historical book mein nahi milta. Tarikh-e-Firoz Shahi mein is city ka reference 747 Hijri aur 748 Hijri (corresponds to 1347 AD) k incidents mein aaya hai. Is historical evidence ko dekhte hue Major General Malcolm Robert Haig ne assume kiya hai k around 1340 AD mein ye city dobara abad hua hoga. Thatta ki written history 1347 AD se pehle ki books mein available nahi, albattah old ruins se estimate kiya jaa sakta hai k ye city 2000 BC se bhi pehle basa hua tha kyunke Alexander the Great k yahan aane se related historical testimony se definitely kaha ja sakta hai k 326 BC mein bhi ye city آباد tha, lekin definitively ye kehna mushkil hai k kya present Thatta city wohi jagah thi ya woh old ruins thay jin par dobara city abad hua. Alexander the Great k rule k daur mein present Sindh ka poora area Pataleen k naam se jaana jaata tha jiska Egyptian geographer Ptolemy ne apni Geography naam ki book aur Greek historian Strabo ne apni book Geography mein discuss kiya hai. Lekin dono historians k Sindh k reference mein Thatta naam ka koi city nahi milta. Is se assume kiya jaa sakta hai k un dinon Thatta k present location par itni population nahi hogi jo ek city ki definition k liye ho. Ptolemy aur Strabo ka Sindh se related Thatta ka mention na karna is baat ka proof hai k Alexander the Great Thatta kabhi nahi aaya. Upar diye gaye historical evidence se Alexander the Great ka Thatta mein aana doubtful ho jaata hai kyunke Ptolemy ka period 100 AD se 170 AD tak aur Strabo ka period 64 BC se 24 AD tak ka hai jo Alexander the Great k roughly 300 years baad ka time hai. Ancient times mein yahan Thatta ki land sea water se hidden thi. Ek long time guzarne par sea water wapas chala gaya aur dry plain nikal aaya. Is k baad Arore city k destroy hone aur River Sindh k Sehwan ki taraf route change karnay ki waja se ye land phir submerged ho gai. Phir jab city Muhammad Tur Sumra sardaron samet deserted ho gaya to Samma Dynasty k ruler Nizamuddin Jam Nindo ne dobara Thatta city ko rebuild karwaya.
Ajmer ki bunyad 10th sadi Eeswi mein Raja Ajay Pal Chauhan ne rakhi. 1193 mein Mohammad Ghori ne Ajmer ko fateh kiya aur Delhi Saltanat ki bunyad rakhi. Mohammad Ghori ne tawan ki adayegi pr uski internal government dobara Chauhan rulers ke supurd kar di. 1365 tak ye Delhi Saltanat ka hissa raha jab usay Mewar hukmuranon ne fatah kar liya. 1509 mein yeh area Mewar ke Marhatton aur Mewar rulers ke darmiyan tension ka baais raha jo finally Mewar rulers ne 1532 mein dobara complete control hasil kar liya. 1559 mein Shehanshah Akbar ne ilaqe ko fatah kar liya aur 1770 mein Marhatton ne dobara usko control kar liya. 1818 mein Marhatton ne 50 hazaar rupay mein Ajmer ko British hukumat ko bech diya aur yeh British hukumat ka part ban gaya.
Bharat ki riyasat Maharashtra ke Vidarbh ilaqay mein waqay ek industrial city hai. Yeh shahar historical aur cultural center hai. City Mumbai se 600 kilometer east mein aur shahar Nagpur se 250 kilometer west ki jaanib waqay hai.
Fatehpur Sikri Bharat ke soobe Uttar Pradesh mein waqe ek shahar hai. Yeh shahr district Agra ka hissa hai. Iski construction Mughal Shehanshah Akbar ne 1570 mein start ki aur shahar 1571 se 1585 tak Mughal Empire ka darul hukumat raha. Shehar ki baqiyat mein se masjid aur mahal World Cultural Heritage declare ho chuke hain aur tourism ke liye famous hain. Fatehpur Sikri ka purana name Vijaypur tha, jab Mughal Shehanshah Akbar ne fatah kiya toh is city ka Vijaypur se badal kar Fatehpur rakh diya. City ka naam Sikri name ke gaon se liya gaya hai. 1999 se 2000 ke dauran Archaeological Survey of India ki khudai se pata chalta hai ke Akbar ne apna capital bananey se pehlay yahan makan, mandir aur commercial centers mojood thay. Yeh ilaqa Sungon ne apni expansion ke baad abad kiya tha. 7th se 16th century Eeswi tak Khanwa ki larai (1527) tak is par Sakarwar Rajpooton ka qabza tha.
Abdul Wali Khan University Mardan. KP ke south mein Pakistan ka ek city aur isi naam ke ek division ka ek district River Sindh ke western bank par rehta hai. Logon ka source of livelihood farming aur animal rearing hai. Is area mein Urdu, Saraiki, Pashto aur Balochi languages boli jaati hain. Yahan ke old inhabitants Baloch qom ke Kalachi tribe se belong karte hain, jo Makran se aaye thay. Is tribe ne centuries tak Koh-e-Suleman ke foothills (yaani Damaan) mein rule kiya. Ye baat proven nahi hai kyunke yahan shuru se hi Pushtoon tribes (Dolat Khel, Lohani aur Gandapur) rehte thay. Unhone Baloch ko refuge di. Kalachi ki jagah par farming ke liye land di. Wo (yani Baloch) kabhi Damaan ke owners nahi thay, unki hukumat sirf River Sindh ki strip ke sath thi. Kalachi ke naam se city ki foundation rakhi gai jo aaj Dera Ismail Khan ki tehsil hai, balkay is tehsil ko Pakistan ki oldest tehsil hone ka honor mila hai. Dera Ismail Khan starting mein mostly area uninhabited tha lekin baad mein is area mein farming ko kafi develop kiya gaya aur bare bare farm houses banaye gaye. Tube wells laga kar irrigation ke naye methods adopt kiye gaye. Dera Ismail Khan mein ek university Gomal University ke naam se hai.
Lakki Marwat, KP ka ek district hai. District Lakki Marwat Bannu Division ke ek naye district ke tor par 1st July 1992 ko bana. Iski borders ek side pe Bannu aur doosri side pe Punjab se milti hain. Apni geographical boundaries, increasing population aur Southern plains mein ek central location ki waja se Bannu district ki ye old tehsil bohot pehle district banne deserve karti thi. Ye piece of land dry, barren plain hone ki waja se abhi tak development limits ko touch nahi kar saka, jiski waja kai obstacles hain jaise water unavailability aur facilities ki kami. Yahan ki land kafi had tak barren aur uninhabited hai. In sab shortages ke bawajood, nature ne is district ko hardworking aur skilled workforce di hai. Jiski waja se ye area ek business hub ban raha hai. Transport sources aur mineral resources ka logon ki financial condition improve karne mein bara role hai. District ki majority Marwat qoum par based hai aur saath hi Sadat qoum bhi yahan rehti hai. Sadat qoumeN teen different areas mein spread hain for example Dalukhel, Abakhel aur Mattori village par based hain. Yahan Pashto language boli jati hai. Year 2020 mein yahan University of Lakki Marwat formally start ho chuki hai, jo Dalukhel area mein located hai. Yahan par cement ka ek factory Lucky Cement ke naam se hai. Senate ke first chairman Habibullah Khan Marhoom ka relation Lakki Marwat se tha, political point of view se yahan Saifullah Brothers kafi famous hain, jinhain Pakistan mein king-makers ke naam se jaana jaata hai. District ki tehsil Naurang ki land kafi fertile hai. Ye area ek important trade center mana jata hai. Is district se Maulana Muhammad Anwar Khan abhi National Assembly ke member hain aur inka ta'alluq Jamiat Ulema-e-Islam Pakistan se hai. District ka total area 3164 sq km hai. Yahan per sq km 192 log rehte hain. 2023 ke census ke according district ki population 1041000 logon par based hai. Rural population ka main source of income farming hai. Total cultivable area 116910 hectares hai. 1836 mein Sikh rule ke dauran Sardar Ranjit Singh ne is area ko Hindu tax collector Diwan Lakhi Mal ko 40 hazar rupees rent par diya tha, Lucky uski waja se hai, jabke Marwat Pathan qom hai jo is ilaqay mein abundantly rehti hai.
KP ka distt. Starting mein Hangu district Kohat ki ek tehsil thi, jo sub-continent ki history mein ek unique tehsil maani jaati thi. 1903 mein Hangu ko Kohat district mein as a tehsil shamil kiya gaya, aur 30th June 1996 ko is tehsil ne Kohat se separate district ka status gain kiya. Ye newly created district beautiful scenes, mineral wealth aur forests se rich hai. Iski workforce skilled aur hardworking hai aur defense matters mein services provide kar rahi hai. Is district ke log country ke andar aur Gulf countries mein services de kar country ke liye bohot foreign exchange earn kar rahay haiN. Geographical location ki waja se is district ko ek high status mila hai, kyunke ek taraf ye distt Kohat se aur doosri taraf Orakzai aur Kurram Agency se connected hai. British rule ke daur mein Afghanistan ke sath war mein Hangu ka zikr commonly milta hai. Tribal aur settled traditions ke mix se ye log educated aur civilized hain. Yahan par mostly Bangash tribes rehte hain aur yahan Pashto language boli jaati hai. Hangu district mein kai saal se sectarian clashes ho rahi hain, jismein bohot si valuable lives waste ho chuki hain. 1935 mein Hangu mein Police Training School establish hua. Hangu district ka total area 1097 sq km hai. Yahan per sq km 356 people rehte hain. 2004-05 mein district ki population 391000 thi. Rural population ka main source of income farming hai. Total cultivable area 27430 hectares hai.
KP ka ek district. Kohistan dry aur barren pahariyon ki land hai jo tough life, insufficient development aur scattered population ki waja se jaana jata hai. Lekin is ke bawajood Kohistan distt ajeeb geographical importance aur strategic significance rakhta hai. Iski borders Northern Areas, Malakand Division aur Hazara Division se milti hain. Karakoram Highway ke passage hone ki waja se is district mein tourism sector ki betterment ke liye kafi potential hai. Hazara Division ke form hone ke baad 1976 mein Kohistan as a district bana. Ye chaar sub-divisions Dasu, Kandia, Palas aur Pattan ke amalgamations par based hai. 1976 ke destructive earthquake ke baad is backward district ki construction aur development ki responsibility Kohistan Development Board ko de di gai. Although baad mein board end ho gaya, lekin developmental activities ne apni pace maintain rakhi. Geographical distance, economic aur social weakness yahan ke main issues hain. Poverty peak par hai. Ab yahan government Dasu Dam ke naam se ek dam bhi bana rahi hai jo area ki prosperity ka reason hoga. 2014 mein Kohistan district ko Upper Kohistan district aur Lower Kohistan district mein divide kar diya gaya jiske baad province mein districts ki number 26 ho gai hai. Distt ka total area 7492 sq km hai. Yahan per sq km 99 log rehte hain. 2004-05 mein distt ki population 675000 thi. Rural population ka main source of income farming hai. Total cultivable area 36750 hectares hai.
Haripur city ki foundation 1821 mein Sikh General Hari Singh Nalwa ne military point of view se rakhi. Haripur city mein ek fort banaya gaya jiski walls 4 meter wide aur 16 meter high thiN. Fort mein enter honay ke liye four gates thay. Haripur ka naam Ranjit Singh ke ek Sikh general Hari Singh Nalwa ke naam par rakha gaya. Haripur tehsil ko 1st July 1992 mein district ka status de kar Abbottabad district se separate kar diya gaya. Haripur ki original aur old qoum Gujjar hai jinke baad Turk yahan aaye aur phir doosri qoumoN ne as an invader ya kisi qoum ki invitation par yahan permanent residence adopt ki. Haripur ki mostly qoumaiN Sindh Paar ke region se yahan migrate kar ke aayiN, in qoumoN mein Tareen, Tanoli, Mashwani, Sulaimani, Dalzak, Panni, Utmanzai aur Jadun etc. shamil hain. Past aur present mein bhi in Afghan qoumoN ka Haripur mein important role raha hai, Sikhs ke against Muhammad Khan Tareen, Sarbuland Khan Tanoli aur Saleh Muhammad Mashwani ki leadership mein battles worth mentioning hain jinmein in qoumoN ki sacrifices unique hain. Haripur mein Syed, Awan, Gakhkar, Rajput, Abbasi aur Karral bhi large numbers mein rehte hain. Haripur mein bhi bohot se Sufi hain. Yahan kuch old names hain. Haripur mein Iraq se aanay walay Sufi buzurg Qutub Shah (yani Aun bin Ya'ala Al-Alvi) ki aulad bhi rehti hai. Khanqah Sadr-e-Rabbaniyah Sadriyah Mohalla Eidgah Haripur. Hazrat Moazzam Qazi Muhammad Sadruddin Naqshbandiya silsilay ke buzurg thay. Unka mazar yahan hai. Abhi Presidential Award winning book Syedul Wara ke author Sahibzada Abdul Daim gaddi nasheen hain. Haripur mein Hasni o Husaini Sadat ke bohot se families rehte hain jinmeN Kazmi, Mashhadi, Tirmizi, Naqvi Bukhari, Naqvi Bhakri aur Gillani Sadat shamil hain. Ye city Islamabad se 65 km aur Abbottabad se 35 km door located hai. Is district ko geographical location ke hisab se key position mili hui hai, kyunke ye distt Hazara Division aur KP ke beech ek gate ka status rakhta hai. Apne unique location ki waja se Haripur ki boundaries eight different districts se milti hain, jinki details kuch yun hain. Haripur ki eastern aur north-eastern border Abbottabad district se milti hai. North mein ye district Mansehra aur North-West mein Haripur ka Nara Amazai aur Bait Gali ka area Torghar aur Buner se milta hai. Hari ki western border mein Swabi district located hai. West aur South-West mein Punjab ke do districts Attock aur Rawalpindi, jabke South-East mein Federal Capital Islamabad located hai. Haripur weather ke hisab se hot rainy moderate region mein count kiya ja sakta hai. Yahan sabse ziada hot month June ka hota hai, jismein temperature 40 degree Celsius se bhi increase ho jaata hai. Is ke baad July, August mein monsoon ki waja se bohot heavy rains hoti hain jisse garmi ka effect to kam ho jaata hai magar humidity bohot barh jaati hai. November ke month mein sabse kam barish hoti hai aur poora month usually dry cold mein guzar jata hai. Winter season mein January sabse cold hota hai, jab kuch dinon mein temperature freezing point se bhi gir jaata hai. March, April aur September, October ke months mein weather moderate rehta hai. Haripur district ko Ghazi aur Haripur do tehsiloN mein divide kiya gaya tha lekin 2018 mein ek third tehsil Khanpur ko ismein shamil kiya gaya. Provincial Assembly ke liye district teen provincial constituencies mein divided hai, jo respectively PK-40, PK-41, PK-42 ke naam se hain. National Assembly ke liye poora district sirf ek constituency tak limited hai jo NA-17 kehlata hai jise 2018 ke local body elections mein Haripur district ko 45 Union Councils mein divide kiya gaya. Jinmein se 37 Haripur jabke sirf 8 Ghazi tehsil mein shamil hain. Industrial point of view se Haripur KP mein ek bara distt hai. Barray barray industrial units jaise Telephone Factory, Hazara Fertilizer, Pak China Fertilizer, Tarbela Cotton Mills aur kai woolen factories established hain. Besides this, Hattar Industrial Estate mein kai chote barray factories lagaye gaye hain. In industries ki waja se ye district national level par economic development mein ek important role play kar raha hai aur is se kai poor logon ko employment milti hai. Haripur geographically bohot diverse district hai. Yahan fertile plains ke sath high mountains bhi hain. Ek side pe plains fields aur orchards se equipped hain to doosri taraf yahan ke mountains forests, streams aur waterfalls se populated hain. Isliye yahan animals aur plants ki bohot sari species exist karti hain. Haripur ka mostly agricultural area barani (rain-fed) hai, jahan saal mein do baar Rabi aur Kharif crops boyi aur kaati jaati hain. In crops mein wheat, maize, millet aur mustard shamil hain. In ke ilawa Sarai Saleh ki jagah par Dour Nadi se aur Khanpur Dam se nikali gai canals par based areas mein vegetables bhi cultivate ki jaati hain. Yahan par commonly cultivate ki jaane wali vegetables mein peas, tomatoes, potatoes, onions, cucumbers, eggplants, pumpkins, garlic, ginger, bitter gourd, tinda, pumpkin aur spinach shamil hain. Ye district especially vegetables na sirf Peshawar balkay Islamabad aur Punjab province ko bhi supply karta hai. Haripur mein fruits ke orchards abundantly hain. Jinmein loquat, guava, orange aur lychee jaise fruits grow hote hain. Especially loquat production ke hawale se Haripur bohot famous hai. Is ke ilawa Khanpur mein grow hone wale oranges apne taste mein be-misaal hain. In orchards mein blood orange aur shukri orange produce kiya jaata hai. Peshawar se Islamabad Motorway aur Ghazi Barotha Dam Project ke establishment se district ki social aur economic development aur ziada sure hone ke chances hain. Haripur ki tehsilein Haripur, Ghazi aur Khanpur hain. Haripur district ka total area 1725 sq km hai. Yahan per sq km 466 log rehte hain. 2004-05 mein district ki population 803000 thi. Rural population ka main source of income farming hai. Total cultivable area 77370 hectares hai. Govt hospitals aur private hospitals bhi available hain. World-wide mud se bana hua sabse bara dam Tarbela Dam isi district mein River Sindh par construct kiya gaya hai. Ye dam 2200 MW electricity generate karta hai. Is ke ilawa bhi Haripur mein chotay barray dams ka network spread hua hai.
KP ka ek district. Kohat district apne HQ Kohat ke naam se jaana jaata hai. Ye sub-continent ka ek old district hai. Kohat ka zikar Buddhism ki ancient history mein bhi milta hai. Present time mein bhi is district ko geographical, general aur defense point of view se special importance mili hai. Yahan Pakistan ki oldest cantonment available hai. Is district ki borders Orakzai Agency, Peshawar district, Punjab province, Hangu district aur Karak district se milti hain. Ajab Khan Afridi aur military cantonment ne Kohat ko ek unforgettable story bana diya hai. Kohat agricultural point of view se aur especially fruits ki waja se kafi fertile hai. Guava fruit yahan ki special produce mein shamil hai. Traditionally ye ek trade hub hai. Tribal areas aur Punjab ke liye ek important market ka status rakhta hai. Yahan ke log bohot intelligent aur hardworking hain. Transport aur services mein ye log key position rakhte hain. Saath hi yahan ke log defense matters mein bhi kafi expert hain. Dam, important military installations, Indus Highway aur Kohat Tunnel ki construction ki waja se ye district kafi important hai. Kohat mein majority Bangash tribes ki hai. Urdu ke internationally renowned poet Ahmed Faraz ka relation bhi isi district se hai. Kohat mein Hindko aur Pashto languages boli jaati hain. District ka total area 2545 sq km hai. Yahan per sq km 275 log rehte hain. 2004-05 mein district ki population 700000 thi. Rural population ka main source of income farming hai. Total cultivable area 71210 hectares hai. Kohat district ka almost 70% area agriculture par based hai jismein Bahader Kot, Khurmatto, Dhoda, Kot, Sayab, Ghandiyali, Bali Tang, Tog, Kaluchana, Sheikhan, Shahpur, Mohammadzai aur Sherkot ke ilawa Sur Gul, Chambai, Buddh, tak ka area bohot fertile hai. Mostly area ko Tanda aur Ghandiyali dams se irrigate kiya jaata hai. Is ke ilawa wells ke pani ko bhi agriculture ke liye use kiya jaata hai.
Karak KP ka ek barani (rain-fed) aur dry district. Karak district Kohat se 1st July 1982 ko alag ho kar district bana. Is district ki poori population ek hi qom Khattak par based hai. Ye teen tehsiloN Karak, Banda Daud Shah aur Takht Nusrati par include karta hai. District ki borders Bannu, Kohat, aur Punjab province se milti hain. Karak district Jatta Ali Khan Khel aur Bahadur Khel mein salt mines hain. Kyunke ye reserves barray area par spread hain, isliye iske harmful effects ne district ki weak agriculture ko weak kar diya hai. Is district ka biggest problem water hai, jo na sirf irrigation balkay drinking ke liye bhi insufficient hai. Pehle Peshawar se DI Khan jaane wali highway Karak city aur abadiyoN se faasle par thi. Ab Indus Highway Karak se hi guzarti hai, jo logon ki economic aur social life mein revolutionary changes la rahi hai. Geographical features ke lihaaz se yahan hard barren plains aur broken long mountain ranges hain. Yahan ki workforce intelligence aur hard work ke qualities se bhari hui hai, jo hamari defense power ka ek valuable asset hai. Yahan ke logon ka main source of income mostly army jobs hain. Is area ne barray barray famous personalities paida ki hain. Jinmein Aslam Khattak (Ex-Communication Minister), Zafar Azam (Provincial Law Minister), Nawabzada Mohsin Ali Khan (Ex-Provincial Finance Minister), Ali Quli Khan shamil hain. In logon ne apni intelligence ki waja se technical, educational aur commercial fields mein kafi progress ki hai. Recently Gargari ki jagah par gas ki discovery bhi hui hai. District ka total area 3372 sq km hai. Yahan per sq km 159 log rehte hain. 2004-05 mein district ki population 536000 thi. Rural population ka main source of income farming hai. Total cultivable area 75430 hectares hai.
Kalam Swat Valley ka ek beautiful gaon hai jo River Swat ke bank par Swat district, KP, Pakistan mein located hai. Sea level se iski height 6,800 feet hai. Ye Islamabad se 270 km door hai. Kalam ek famous tourist spot hai, magar achi road na hone ki waja se tourists ko yahan pohnchne mein difficulties aati hain. Yahan tourists ke liye kafi guest houses aur hotels available hain. Yahan summers mein weather bohot pleasant rehta hai aur winters mein bohot ziada sardi aur snowfall hoti hai. Ye Mingora se almost 99 km ke fasle par hai. Glacier Lake aur Mahodand Lake yahan ki famous lakes hain.
Goth Badardeen Pakistan ke Sindh province ka gaon hai jo Badin district ke tehsil Tando Bago Union Council Pangrio mein situated hai. Badin uska headquarter hai. Is gaon ke residents ka Kamboh biradari se ta'alluq hai, Arain bhi rehte hain.
Umerkot bohot purana shehar hai. Ye city ab bhi archeology mein bohot importance rakhta hai. Umerkot Pakistan ke Sindh province mein located hai. Umerkot ko ab Sindh Govt ki taraf se district ka status mila hua hai. Umerkot fort ki waja se is city ka naam hi Umerkot par gaya jiska matlab hai Umar (us king ka naam jisne ye fort banwaya tha) aur Kot (fort). Umerkot ka matlab hai Umar ka fort. Ye fort King Umar Soomro ne banwaya tha. Ye wohi King Umar hai jisne Marui ko forcefully kidnap kar liya tha. Kaha jaata hai ke Umar Soomro ne Marui ko isi fort mein qaid kar ke rakha tha. Umar Marui ka qissa aaj bhi Sindh mein, specially gharoN mein, bohot shauq se suna aur sunaya jaata hai. Aur Sindh ke Sufi poet Hazrat Shah Abdul Latif ne apni poetry ka ek bara part Umar Marui par likha hai. Umar Marvi ki timeless story bhi is region se related hai. Ye usi time ka qissa hai. Marvi ka relation Maliri se tha. Bhalwa ko kidnap kar ke apne mahal mein laa kar qaid kar diya tha. Marvi Thar ki love mein qaid thi, use open air se pyaar tha, isliye usne palace ke luxuries, costly clothes aur tasty food reject kar diye. Din raat wo sad rehti thi. Finally Umar ne use free kar diya tha. Shah Abdul Latif Bhittai ke risalay ke suron mein freedom-loving aur high-mindedness ka demonstration hai.
Dadu Pakistan ke Sindh province ka city hai jo Dadu district mein located hai. Ye Dadu district ka headquarter hai. Dadu city Kalhora Dynasty ke time (1783-1701 AD) mein exist nahi karta tha. Kalhora era mein is city ke Mohalla Markhpur ka historical mention hai. Dadu city ki antiquity ke liye do traditions milti hain. Ek tradition ye hai ke Dadu Shah ke naam se Dadu ka naam pada magar Dadu Shah ka na mazar hai na koi thikana ya takiya. Doosri tradition ke according yahan Dadu Wansi Hindu caste rehti thi jo famous Sufi poet Dadu Dayal ki follower thi. Dadu Dayal ka Sehwan mein aana aur Sindh ke Sufi poet Qazi Qazan se milne ki history bhi available hai aur Dadu Wansi community ka historical books mein mention bhi milta hai jo British India ke time Dadu mein rehti thi. Anyways, Dadu city British India ke records mein maujood hai. River Sindh ke right bank par Dadu city ki taraf ek canal behti thi jo River Sindh se nikal kar Dadu ke paas se guzarti thi aur phir flow karte hue dobara river se ja kar milti thi. Dadu pehle Karachi district mein shamil tha. 1931 mein Dadu ko district banaya gaya to is city ne develop hona start kiya. 1980 ke baad Dadu city ne bohot progress ki hai. Trade aur agriculture ka center hai. Dadu mein 3 Boys High Schools, ek Girls High School, ek Girls Degree College, ek Ustad Bukhari Boys Degree College hai. Law College ke ilawa Sindh University Campus bhi hai. Dadu mein Civil Hospital bhi hai. Yahan weather bohot hot hai. Dadu, Johi, Mehar aur Khairpur Nathan Shah Dadu district ki tehsilein hain. Cleanliness ke lihaaz se Dadu bohot peeche hai magar Dadu ke log bohot friendly aur hospitable hote hain. Allama I.I. Kazi Dadu city mein paida hue.
Thatta city Pakistan ke Sindh province mein River Sindh ke bank par basa hua ek old aur historical city hai. Middle Ages ke time mein Thatta Sindh ka capital raha hai. 326 BC mein Alexander the Great ki India aamad aur India par invasion ke remains yahan ek island par milte hain. Thatta kyunke historical city hai, isliye United Nations body UNESCO ne Thatta ke kai historical sites aur tombs ko apni World Heritage list mein shamil kar rakha hai. Thatta city ke ird gird kai jagahon par ancient historical artifacts discover hue hain jin se guess kiya jaata hai ke Thatta city Pre-Christian era se basa hua hai. India mein Muslim rule ke establishment ke baad Thatta city knowledge aur art ka hub ban gaya. 14th century AD mein Sindh mein Samma Dynasty ke rulers ne officially Thatta ko dobara abad kiya aur city ke status se naye style par basaya aur capital declare kiya. Mughal Empire ke time tak Thatta developed aur dynamic city tha, magar British Raj ke dauran Karachi ki rising status ne is city ko severe loss pohanchaya aur finally Karachi mein ports ke establishment ke baad is city ka status sirf history ke pages ki zeenat banti chali gai. Thatta ka glorious past yahan ki historical aur ancient buildings, tombs aur mosques hain jinmein se Shahjahani Mosque aur Makli ka greatest old graveyard prominent hain. Known history aur evidence ke according Thatta ki history 2000 BC se bhi purani hai. Persian aur Arabic books mein is city ka naam Thatha ya Tatta likha hua milta hai jo Albatta ka hum-qafiya (rhyme) hai. Author of Bustan-us-Siyahat ne ise Albatta ka rhyme hi intend kiya hai. Lekin is rhyme-less meaningless word se Thatta ke naam ki origin understand karna mushkil hai, balkay Tuhfat-ul-Kiram ke author ki opinion upar wali opinion se kahin behtar hai. Sindh ke renowned researcher aur multi-faceted personality Meer Ali Sher Qane Thatwi ne apni book Tuhfat-ul-Kiram (written in: 1767 AD) mein Thatta ke naam ki waja ye batayi hai ke: Us waqt (1181 Hijri, corresponds to 1767 AD) Thatta ke naam ki origin ke baray mein do baatein famous hain: kuch kehte hain ke ye Teh Teh (yani low-lying) ki property se related hai aur kuch ka kehna hai ke ye Thatt ke word se named hai jo SindhiyoN ki term mein logon ke gather hone ki jagah ke meaning rakhta hai. Ye baat hidden na rahay ke ye land, jaise history se pata chalta hai, old times mein bhi Thatta ke naam se pukari jati thi aur kyunke Sindh ke upper part ko common log Siro kehte hain aur is lower part ko Laar (yani low-land ya slope) kaha jaata hai, isliye yahi reason Thatta ke naam ki origin ka ek clear proof hai. Author of Tuhfat-ul-Kiram ke upar diye gaye statement se yahi pata chalta hai ke 1181 Hijri (1767 AD) tak is city ko Thatta ke naam se hi pukaara jaata tha. Remember, ye Mughal Empire ke decline ka period tha jab East India Company Bengal mein apne roots set kar chuki thi. Archaeologist Ahmad Hasan Dani (died 2009 AD) ke according Thatta Sindhi language ke do words Thatto ya Thatt se derive hua hai jinke meanings hain: river ke bank par basna. Sindh ki public is city ko mostly Thatta Nagar ya sirf Nagar ke naam se bhi call karti hai. Present Thatta city Koh-e-Makli ke foothills mein ancient city ke ruins par basa hua hai. Current city Samma Dynasty ke time mein 900 Hijri (1495 AD) mein dobara abad kiya gaya tha. Thatta city Pakistan ke Sindh province mein Thatta district mein located hai. Thatta city ka longitude 67 degrees 55 minutes 28 seconds aur latitude 24 degrees 44 minutes 46 seconds hai. Urdu Daira-e-Maarif-e-Islamia ke article writer ne Thatta city ka longitude 68 degrees aur latitude 24 degrees 44 minutes likha hai. Nowadays River Sindh Thatta se approx 6 miles east direction mein flow karta hai aur 4-5 miles neeche jaa kar do branches mein divide ho jaata hai, magar 1758 tak River Sindh Thatta ke south mein flow karta tha aur uski ek branch Thatta ke west mein behti thi. Thatta Karachi se 102 km east, Badin se 110 km west, Sujawal se 27 km west, Hyderabad se 101 km south-west mein located hai. India ki history mein first time Thatta ka mention Shams Siraj Afif ne apni book Tarikh-e-Firoz Shahi mein kiya hai. Is se pehle Thatta ka mention kisi historical book mein nahi milta. Tarikh-e-Firoz Shahi mein is city ka reference 747 Hijri aur 748 Hijri (corresponds to 1347 AD) ke incidents mein aaya hai. Is historical evidence ko dekhte hue Major General Malcolm Robert Haig ne assume kiya hai ke around 1340 AD mein ye city dobara abad hua hoga. Thatta ki written history 1347 AD se pehle ki books mein available nahi, albattah old ruins se estimate kiya jaa sakta hai ke ye city 2000 BC se bhi pehle basa hua tha kyunke Alexander the Great ke yahan aane se related historical testimony se definitely kaha ja sakta hai ke 326 BC mein bhi ye city abad tha, lekin definitively ye kehna mushkil hai ke kya present Thatta city wohi jagah thi ya woh old ruins thay jin par dobara city abad hua. Alexander the Great ke rule ke daur mein present Sindh ka poora area Pataleen ke naam se jaana jaata tha jiska Egyptian geographer Ptolemy ne apni Geography naam ki book aur Greek historian Strabo ne apni book Geography mein discuss kiya hai. Lekin dono historians ke Sindh ke reference mein Thatta naam ka koi city nahi milta. Is se assume kiya jaa sakta hai ke un dinon Thatta ke present location par itni population nahi hogi jo ek city ki definition ke liye ho. Ptolemy aur Strabo ka Sindh se related Thatta ka mention na karna is baat ka proof hai ke Alexander the Great Thatta kabhi nahi aaya. Upar diye gaye historical evidence se Alexander the Great ka Thatta mein aana doubtful ho jaata hai kyunke Ptolemy ka period 100 AD se 170 AD tak aur Strabo ka period 64 BC se 24 AD tak ka hai jo Alexander the Great ke roughly 300 years baad ka time hai. Ancient times mein yahan Thatta ki land sea water se hidden thi. Ek long time guzarne par sea water wapas chala gaya aur dry plain nikal aaya. Is ke baad Arore city ke destroy hone aur River Sindh ke Sehwan ki taraf route change karnay ki waja se ye land phir submerged ho gai. Phir jab city Muhammad Tur Sumra sardaron samet deserted ho gaya to Samma Dynasty ke ruler Nizamuddin Jam Nindo ne dobara Thatta city ko rebuild karwaya.
Ajmer ki bunyad 10th sadi Eeswi mein Raja Ajay Pal Chauhan ne rakhi. 1193 mein Mohammad Ghori ne Ajmer ko fateh kiya aur Delhi Saltanat ki bunyad rakhi. Mohammad Ghori ne tawan ki adayegi pr uski internal government dobara Chauhan rulers ke supurd kar di. 1365 tak ye Delhi Saltanat ka hissa raha jab usay Mewar hukmuranon ne fatah kar liya. 1509 mein yeh area Mewar ke Marhatton aur Mewar rulers ke darmiyan tension ka baais raha jo finally Mewar rulers ne 1532 mein dobara complete control hasil kar liya. 1559 mein Shehanshah Akbar ne ilaqe ko fatah kar liya aur 1770 mein Marhatton ne dobara usko control kar liya. 1818 mein Marhatton ne 50 hazaar rupay mein Ajmer ko British hukumat ko bech diya aur yeh British hukumat ka part ban gaya.
Bharat ki riyasat Maharashtra ke Vidarbh ilaqay mein waqay ek industrial city hai. Yeh shahar historical aur cultural center hai. City Mumbai se 600 kilometer east mein aur shahar Nagpur se 250 kilometer west ki jaanib waqay hai.
Fatehpur Sikri Bharat ke soobe Uttar Pradesh mein waqe ek shahar hai. Yeh shahr district Agra ka hissa hai. Iski construction Mughal Shehanshah Akbar ne 1570 mein start ki aur shahar 1571 se 1585 tak Mughal Empire ka darul hukumat raha. Shehar ki baqiyat mein se masjid aur mahal World Cultural Heritage declare ho chuke hain aur tourism ke liye famous hain. Fatehpur Sikri ka purana name Vijaypur tha, jab Mughal Shehanshah Akbar ne fatah kiya toh is city ka Vijaypur se badal kar Fatehpur rakh diya. City ka naam Sikri name ke gaon se liya gaya hai. 1999 se 2000 ke dauran Archaeological Survey of India ki khudai se pata chalta hai ke Akbar ne apna capital bananey se pehlay yahan makan, mandir aur commercial centers mojood thay. Yeh ilaqa Sungon ne apni expansion ke baad abad kiya tha. 7th se 16th century Eeswi tak Khanwa ki larai (1527) tak is par Sakarwar Rajpooton ka qabza tha. Sheikh Salim Chishti ki Khanqah is jagah pehle se hi mojood thi. Akbar ka beta, Jahangir, 1569 mein apni pasandida biwi Mariam-uz-Zamani ke yahan Sikri ke gaon mein paida hua tha. Aur isi saal Akbar ne Sheikh ki yaad mein Khanqah ki construction start ki jinhon ne birth ki prediction ki thi. Jahangir ki 2nd birthday ke baad, usne yahan ek fasil dar shahar aur shahi mahal ki taameer shuru ki. Yeh shahr Fatehpur Sikri ke naam se jaana jata hai, Akbar ki 1573 mein Gujarat ki victorious campaign ke baad isay City of Victory bhi kaha jata tha. 1803 mein Agra par qabza karne ke baad East India Company ne yahan ek administrative center qayam kiya aur jo 1850 tak qayam raha. 1815 mein Francis Rawdon-Hastings ne Sikri mein monuments ki repair ka order diya. Mughal Saltanat ke capital ke tor par iski historical importance aur iske shandar architecture ki waja se, Fatehpur Sikri ko 1986 mein UNESCO World Cultural Heritage ka status diya gaya tha. Archaeological evidence Painted Grey Ware ke daur se is region ki abadi ki taraf ishara karte hain. Historian Syed Ali Nadeem Rizvi ke mutabiq, yeh khitta Sunga ke rule period mein aur phir Sakarwar Rajputs ke daur mein develop hua, jinhon ne 7th se 16th sadi tak Khanwa ki jang (1527) tak is area par qabza karte hue ek qila banaya. Yeh ilaqa baad mein Delhi Saltanat ke under aaya aur is jagah par bahut si masjiden banayi gayin jo Khilji dynasty ke daur mein barhi.
Fatehgarh, Bharat ki riyasat Uttar Pradesh, Farrukhabad district mein waqay yeh shahr, apne qile ke liye famous hai. Mujaddid-e-Islam Sheikh Ahmed Sirhindi ka ta'alluq isi area se hai.
Farrukhabad North India ki riyasat Uttar Pradesh ka ek city hai.
Ambala ek shahar hai aur Haryana Bharat ki riyasat mein Ambala district waqe hai. Is mein ek municipal corporation hai, Punjab ki riyasat ke saath aur state capital Chandigarh ki qurbat mein border pr waqay hai. Ambala do sub-areas mein hai: Ambala Cantt (Ambala Chhawni) aur Ambala City, taqreeban 3 kilometer ke ilawa, is wajah se yeh Twin City ke tor par bhi jana jata hai. Iske andar ek bari Indian Army aur Indian Air Force mojood hai iski chhawni ke ilaqe mein. Ambala Darya-e-Sindh ke network ko Ganga Darya ke network se alag karta hai aur do daryaon se ghira hua hai north aur south mein. Apne geographical location ki wajah se, Ambala 47 kilometer Chandigarh, state capital ke south mein waqay hai, 148 kilometer Shimla ke south-west mein, 198 kilometer north mein. Local tourism mein New Delhi ka important role hai aur 260 kilometer south-east mein bhi Ambala mein hi located hai.
Faridkot Bharat ki riyasat Punjab ke district Faridkot mein ek chota shahar aur municipal council hai. Ye Indian Punjab ki former state hai. Pehle iska name Raja Mokal ke name par Mokal Nagar tha. Raja Mokal ne iska name Sheikh-ul-Islam wal-Muslimeen Baba Farid Masood Ganj Shakar se aqeedat ki bina par Faridkot rakha. Ab bhi wahan par Baba Farid ki Chilla Gahen awam ke liye ziyarat gahen hain.
Amritsar Indian Punjab ka ek city hai aur Hindustan ki north-western state (Punjab) ke capital, Chandigarh se 217 kilometer (135 mile) aur Pakistan ke Lahore se 28 kilometer (17.4 mile) east ki taraf waqe hai. 2001 ki census ke according is city ki population 1.5 million (pandrah lakh) batayi jati hai jabke pure district Amritsar ki population almost 3.6 million (chhatis lakh) bayan hoti hai. Amritsar city mein Sikhism ka spiritual place Harmandir Sahib waqay hai. Amritsar shahar ki origin ke baray mein yeh zikr bhi history mein milta hai ke Mughal Saltanat ke Shehanshah Akbar ne Amritsar ka area Sikhs ke 4th spiritual leader Guru Ram Das ko de diya tha aur Ram Das ne yahan Ramdaspur ki bunyad daali jiska name baad mein Amritsar hua. Yeh bhi kaha jata hai ke Shehanshah Akbar ne 1565 mein Guru Amar Das aur phir 1579 mein Guru Ram Das aur 1606 mein Guru Arjan Dev ko area offers kiye thay jinhain in teeno persons ne accept nahi kiya tha; Guru Amardas ke baray mein yeh bhi history mein hai ke jagir accept karne se inkar ke baad Akbar ne woh jagir jis par Amritsar established hua, Amardas ki daughter Bibi Bhani ko marriage gift ke tor par de di thi jis se Amardas inkar na kar sakay. Further, Akbar ne Sikhs ke poore area ko tax pay karne se free kar diya tha. Amritsar ke liye old names Ramdaspur ke ilawa Guru Chak aur Ram Das Chak bhi use hotay rahay hain. Kartarpur mein 1539 mein apni death se pehle Guru Nanak ne Guru Angad Dev ko naya Guru nominate kar diya tha. Phir 3rd Guru Amar Das (1479 to 1574) ke baad aanay walay 4th Guru Ram Das (1534 to 1581) ne Amritsar ke old pond ki repair work shuru ki aur uske center mein ek mandir ya gurdwara, Darbar Sahib, construct kiya jisko Harmandir Sahib bhi kaha jata hai. Shehanshah Akbar aur uske baad bhi general relations Ramdaspur (Amritsar) ki taraf ache rahte aur Mughal Saltanat mein Ramdaspur ki status semi-autonomous area jaisi thi lekin phir 16th century se is ilaqay mein complete independence ya autonomy ke feelings appear hona shuru hue. Tasawwuf ke karishmaat ko Sikhs aur Muslims ke darmiyan ignore nahi kiya ja sakta aur kafi arse tak Tasawwuf ke afkar se ek unclear situation qayam rahi yahan tak ke Guru Nanak ko Muslim bhi kaha jata hai. Shehanshah Jahangir ke zamanay mein bhi Sikh Mat itna clear aur alag mazhab nahi bana tha lekin signs prominent hone lage the ke ab Sikhs Mughal Saltanat ke center for Punjab yani Lahore ki bajaye Amritsar ki taraf dekhne lage the. Sikh sources ke mutabiq Shehanshah Jahangir ke kehne par Adi Granth mein amendments se Guru Arjan ke inkar par, usne Khusrau ko aid provide karne ka bahana bana kar unko kill karwa diya tha aur is baat ne unke betay aur 6th Guru Hargobind (1595 to 1644) ko military power ki taraf attract kar diya tha jis ke reaction ke tor par Jahangir ne ek baar Amritsar se Hargobind ko arrest bhi kiya lekin phir free kar diya. Hargobind ne Mughal Saltanat ko illegitimate declare kar ke apne followers ko usay accept karne se mana kar diya tha aur Guru ko Allah ki taraf se di jaane wali Saltanat ko legitimate qarar diya; Shahjahan ke period (1628 to 1658) mein Ramdaspur (Amritsar) par attack kiya gaya aur Hargobind ne Amritsar se bhaag kar Kartarpur mein settlement choose ki. Aurangzeb ke badalte hue role ne different incidents ko birth diya jin mein ek Sikhs se معاملات ka incident bhi hai jis mein tax (mahsul) ya jizya par hone wali economic conflict ko religion aur autonomy se jod diya gaya. Tegh Bahadur ke murder ko numerous historical documents mein Sikh-Muslim conflict ya hatred ka start kaha jata hai. 16th century ke end ke Amritsar (Ramdaspur) mein Guru Gobind Singh ki Khalsa directly Mughal Saltanat se takranay par tayyar ho rahi thi; although Akbar se le kar Shah Jahan tak Mughals ka attitude Gurus ki taraf suitable hi nahi respectable bhi raha lekin Amritsar ki taraf se Jahangir aur Shah Jahan dono ki government ke dauran Mughal Saltanat ke affairs mein interference hoti rahi. British Qanoon Azadi-e-Hind 1947 ke tehat British India August 1947 ko Pakistan aur India mein divide hua jis se Amritsar par demographics, economy, culture, political aur social structure par gehra impact para. Province Punjab (British India) ki India aur Pakistan mein division par Amritsar ek border city ban gaya. Partition se pehle Muslim League Amritsar ko Lahore se closeness (30 mile ka fasla) aur approximately 50 percent Muslim population ki wajah se Pakistan mein shamil karna chahti thi, lekin city India ka hissa ban gaya. Amritsar ko India ki partition ke dauran worst communal riots ka samna karna para. Amritsar ke Muslim residents anti-Muslim riots ki wajah se homes aur properties chor kar Amritsar se migrate karne par majboor ho gaye. Amritsar district mein important Muslim majority villages partition se pehle Sultanpur, Kala Afghana, Abdul Kalan, Rashid Bal, Lahoriye, Shahpur, Shahkot, Alipur, Aliwal, Allahabad, Fatehabad, Chak, Gozah Chak, Jattan, aur Cheema thay. 1984 mein Indian Army ka apnay hi country mein Amritsar city mein located Harmandir Sahib par kiya janay wala operation. Yeh operation us time ki Indian PM Indira Gandhi ke order se 3 se 8 June tak hua. Golden Temple Amritsar ka sabse important spot hai jo Sikh religion ki ek holy place of worship hai. Iska real name Harmandir Sahib hai lekin yeh Golden Temple ke naam se famous hai. Amritsar city Golden Temple ke charon taraf basa hua hai. Golden Temple mein daily thousands of tourists aate hain. Amritsar ka name us pond ke name par rakha gaya hai jiski construction Guru Ram Das ne apnay haathon se karwai thi. Sikh Golden Temple mein enter hone se pehle mandir ke samne sir jhukate hain, phir paon dhone ke baad stairs se mandir tak jaate hain. Stairs ke saath saath iski complete history likhi hui hai. Golden Temple extremely beautiful hai aur is mein light ka beautiful arrangement kiya gaya hai. Sikhs ke ilawa bhi bohot se tourists yahan aate hain. 13 April, 1919 ko is place par ek gathering organize ki gayi thi jis mein British Army ke Gen. Dyer ke orders par hundreds of freedom fighters ko goli maar kar kill kar diya gaya tha. Gathering ke dauran General Dyer ne garden ke single path ko apnay soldiers ke saath gher liya aur crowd par blind firing start kar di. Is incident ko history ke most tragic events mein se ek samjha jata hai. Jallianwala Bagh ka massacre itna zyada tha ke is garden mein located well (kunwan) dead bodies se completely bhar gaya. Ab isay ek beautiful park mein convert kar diya gaya hai aur ek memorial bhi build ki gayi hai. Iski maintenance aur security ki responsibility Jallianwala Bagh Trust ke supurd hai. Yahan beautiful trees lagaye gaye hain. Bagh mein aane ka time summer mein morning 9 baje se evening 6 baje tak aur winter mein morning 10 baje se evening 5 tak rakha gaya hai. Amritsar ke south mein Satokhsar Sahib aur Babaysar Sahib gurdware hain. In mein se Satokhsar Gurdwara Golden Temple se bhi big hai. Maharaja Ranjit Singh ne Ram Bagh Park mein summer ke liye ek mahal banwaya tha. Iski achi maintenance ki gayi hai jiski wajah se yeh aaj bhi good condition mein mojood hai. Is mahal ki outer walls par red stones lage hue hain. Is mahal ko ab Maharaja Ranjit Singh Museum mein convert kar diya gaya hai. Is museum mein many pictures aur furniture display kiye gaye hain. Yeh ek park ke center mein bana hua hai jo ek beautiful park hai. Is park ko Lahore ke Shalimar Bagh jaisa banaya gaya hai. Museum mein entry time morning 10 baje se evening 5 baje tak rakha gaya hai. Museum Monday ko closed rehta hai. Durgiana Mandir ek old Hindu temple hai jo Hathi Gate area mein located hai. Is mandir ko Harmandir ki tarah banaya gaya hai. Durgiana Mandir ke bilkul back side par Hanuman Mandir waqe hai. Yeh masjid Gandhi Gate ke paas Hall Market mein waqay hai. Namaz ke time yahan bohot rush hota hai. Proper maintenance ki wajah se crowd ke bawajood iski beauty mein koi kami nahi aayi. Yeh masjid Islamic architecture ki ek living picture hai, iski walls par Ayatein likhi hui hain. Yeh baat remarkable hai ke Jallianwala Bagh ki gathering ke liye Saifuddin Kitchlew aur Satya Pal isi masjid se hi gathering ko address kar rahe thay. Yeh Guru Hargobind ke 9 saala betay ki shahadat ka place hai. Yeh Bhagwan Ram ke beto Lav aur Kush ki birthplace consider ki jati hai. Wagah Border Pakistan aur India ke beech ek border crossing hai jo Lahore ko Amritsar se connect karta hai. Every evening yahan Indian Border Security Force aur Pakistan Rangers ke soldiers apnay flags utarne ki ceremony organize karte hain. Special occasions par, for example, basically 14 August Pakistan ke Independence Day ki evening aur India ke Independence Day ki morning hoti hai. Is evening wahan peace ke liye raat jagga kiya jata hai. Amritsar se approx. 22 kilometer door is place par ek pond hai. Aisa mana jata hai ke iske water mein diseases ko remove karne ki power hai. Amritsar ke pakwaan poori dunya mein famous hain. Yahan ka Butter Chicken (Bani Murghi), Makki ki Roti, Sarson ka Saag aur Lassi bohot famous hain. Yahan ki Special Thali bhi bohot famous hai. Iske ilawa Lawrence Road ki Tikki Aloo aur Aloo Parathay bohot famous hain. Amritsar ke Amritsari Kulchay bohot famous hain. Amritsari Kulche ke liye best jagah Maqbool Road ke dhabe hain. Yahan sirf 2 baje tak hi kulche milte hain. Papdi Chaat aur Tikki ke liye Brajwasi ki shop famous hai. Yeh shop Cooper Road par waqay hai. Lawrence Road par BBK DAV Girls College ke paas city ke best Aam Papad milte hain. Veg dishes ke saath saath Amritsar non-veg/meat dishes ke liye bhi famous hai. Non-veg recipes mein Amritsari Machli bohot famous hai. Is dish ko 40 saal pehle Chaman Lal ne prepare kiya tha. Ab yeh dish Amritsar ke non-veg pakwano ki identity hai. Lawrence Road par Surjit Chicken House roasted chicken ke liye aur Katra Sher Singh apni Amritsari Machli ke liye pure Amritsar mein famous hain. Amritsar ka bazaar bohot acha hai. Yahan har tarah ke local aur imported kapde available hain. Iska bazaar kuch Lajpat Nagar jaisa hai. Amritsar ke old city ke Hall Market ke aas paas ke area basically Kotwali area ke paas traditional bazaars hain. Yahan par jewellery se le kar kitchen items tak ka all stuff milta hai. Yeh apnay Papad ke liye bohot famous hai. Punjabi dress (pehrawa) bhi poori dunya mein bohot famous hai. Specially girls mein Punjabi Suit ka kafi shauq hai. Suits ke ilawa yahan par Pagri, Shalwar Qameez, Rumaal, aur Punjabi Jootiyon ki bohot demand hai. Darbar Sahib ke baher jo bazaar lagta hai us mein high-quality steel ke utensils aur Kirpan milte hain. Kirpan ko Sikhs mein bohot holy consider kiya jata hai jo Five Ks mein se ek hai. Iske ilawa yahan Sikh religion se related books bhi milti hain. Amritsar India ke bilkul western end par waqe hai. Yahan se Pakistan sirf 25 kilometer ke distance par hai. National Highway 1 ke through Karnal, Ambala, Khanna, Jalandhar, aur Ludhiana se hotay huay Amritsar pohancha ja sakta hai. Amritsar Delhi ke north-east mein 447 kilometer ke faslay par waqe hai. Delhi se travel mein by railway aur road approx. 9 hours aur by airplane 1 hour lagta hai. Sri Guru Ram Das Ji International Airport Amritsar se approx. 11 kilometer ke distance par waqe hai, jise cover karne mein approx. 15 minutes ka time lagta hai. Delhi se trains ke through easily Amritsar Railway Station pohancha ja sakta hai. Private car se bhi Grand Trunk Road ke through easily Amritsar pohancha ja sakta hai. Raaste mein rest karne ke liye kai achay dhabe aur restaurants available hain. Yahan par ruk kar thori der rest kiya ja sakta hai aur food enjoy bhi kiya ja sakta hai. Iske ilawa Delhi ke Kashmiri Gate Bus Adda se bhi Amritsar ke liye buses jati hain. 2011 ki census ke according Amritsar Municipality ki population 1,132,761 aur urban agglomeration ki population 1,183,705 thi. Municipality ka gender ratio 1,000 males par 879 females tha, jabke population ka 9.7 percent 6 saal ki age ka tha. Effective literacy rate 85.27 percent tha; male literacy 88.09 percent jabke female literacy 82.09 percent thi. India ki 2011 ki census ke hisab se Amritsar city ke major religions mein Hinduism aur Sikhism top par thay. Hindus ka ratio 49.36% aur Sikhs 49.00% thay. Although pure Amritsar district mein rural areas samet Sikhs 70 percent hain. Amritsar city mein Muslims 0.51%, Christians 0.23% aur approx. 0.23% kisi specific mazhab ko follow karne wale nahi hain.
Faizabad India ki state Uttar Pradesh ke Faizabad district mein located ek city hai, jo Ayodhya city ke saath Municipal Corporation banata hai. Yeh 6 November 2018 tak Faizabad district aur Faizabad division ka Headquarter tha. Iske baad Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath ki leadership mein Uttar Pradesh ki cabinet ne Faizabad district ka name Ayodhya rakhne aur district ke administrative HQ ko Ayodhya city mein shift karne ki approval de di. Faizabad state capital Lucknow se approx. 130 kilometer east mein Saryu River ke bank par located hai. Yeh Awadh ke Nawabon ka first capital tha, aur is mein Nawabon ke banaye hue monuments hain, jaise Bahu Begum ka Maqbara, Gulab Bari wagaira.
Ashok Nagar district, Madhya Pradesh, India mein ek city hai.
Dabra India ki state Madhya Pradesh ke Gwalior district ki ek Municipality hai.
Ayodhya India ke soobay Uttar Pradesh ke Faizabad district ka ek city hai. Hindus ke according yeh city Ram ki birthplace hai. Mughal Badshah Babar ki banayi hui famous Babri Masjid bhi isi city mein thi, jise 1992 mein Hindus ne attack kar ke demolish kar diya tha.
Dadra music ki ek genre hai jo shuru mein Dadra Taal mein gaya jata tha isliye iska name bhi Dadra par gaya, lekin ajkal Taal ki koi restriction nahi hai. Generally Kaharwa aur auray mein gaate hain. Is mein Taal se hat kar iraaday nahi kahay jatey, balkay mendhon aur mokiyon ki help se bolon ko different styles se decorate kar k repeat kiya jata hai. Generally 4 misron ke geet ka ek ya do band aur complete bol hotey hain. Gaane ka focus saron ki bajaye bolon par rakha jata hai, is liye is genre ko pure classical music mein count nahi kiya jata. Dadra kisi ek Raag mein gaya jana zaroori nahi; usually many Raagon ke iraaday use kiye jate hain.
Azamgarh: Yeh city, India ki state Uttar Pradesh mein situated hai. Is shahar se many personalities famous huin. Uttar Pradesh ke eastern part mein located hai jo Ganga aur Ghaghra ke center mein basa hua hai. Jungle hi jungle tha. Population bohot less aur distance par thi. Is zameen ka relation do riyasaton ke under tha, west mein Koshalraj Ayodhya se aur east mein Kashi Raj Banaras se. Beech mein Tons Nadi border thi. Yahan Raja Harbans Singh ki chhawni thi. Azamgarh city se attached, east side par, unke name se ek mauza Harbanspur abad hai. Woh Harbanspur ab bhi present hai. Unke son Raja Vikramajit Singh ne apna qila Tons River bank par banwaya tha aur unho ne apnay real brother Rudra Singh ko murder kar diya tha jiski punishment mein Mughal Shahi Army ne Raja Vikramajit Singh ko arrest kar ke capital Delhi le gayi. Wahan ja kar unho ne Islam accept kar liya. Delhi se release hone ke baad Azamgarh wapas aye aur unho ne ek Muslim lady se marriage kar li. Unke batan se 2 sons paida hue. Elder son ka name Azam Khan aur younger son ka name Azmat Khan rakha. Since is district ko Shehanshah Aurangzeb (R.A.) ke time mein Raja Azam Khan (jo baad mein Azam Shah ke name se famous hua), unho ne basaya tha, isi reason se iska name Azamgarh rakha gaya. Kaha jata hai ke 1665 mein Azam Shah ne Tons Nadi ke kinare ek qila banaya aur uske charon taraf 7-8 mile ke square mein boundary wall banwayi thi. Dheere dheere iske aas paas population increase hoti gayi aur Azam Shah ke name par iska name Azamgarh par gaya. Tons Nadi ke kinare par located yeh district Azamgarh countless features ka carrier raha hai. Is district mein ancient times se Sufi saints, Ulema-e-Karam, aur freedom fighters ki birthplace rahi hai. Is district mein kai big scholars paida hue. Maulana Abdul Salam Sahab Seerat-ul-Bukhari, Sheikh Abdul Rahman Muhaddis Mubarakpuri, Maulana Allama Hameeduddin Farahi, Allama Shibli Nomani, Sheikh-ul-Hadith Ubaidullah Rahmani Mubarakpuri, Maulana Ameen Ahsan Islahi, Akhtar Ahsan Islahi, Abdul Salam Islahi Farahi, Abul Hasan Ali Farahi, Altaf Ahmad Azmi, Waheeduddin Khan, Ubaidullah Farahi, Abdullah Muhyiddin, Rahul Sankrityayan. Yahan bade bade institutions jo 100 saal pehle ke bane huay hain: Madrasa-tul-Islah, Shibli National College, Maulana Habib-ur-Rahman Azmi.
Chandrapur India ki state Maharashtra ka ek city hai.
Chandigarh India ke soobay Punjab ka ek city hai. Yeh shahar North India ki 2 states, Punjab aur Haryana ke capital ke tor par jana jata hai. Chandigarh ka matlab hai Chandi ka Qila. Chandigarh ka name ek old Chandi Mandir se link kiya jata hai. Chandigarh ka matlab beautiful city bhi liya jata hai. 2001 ki census ke according Chandigarh mein included Mohali, Panchkula aur Zirakpur samet, iski population 1,165,111 hai. City mein Haryana, Ambala, Panchkula, Mohali, Patiala aur Ropar ke districts shamil hain. Yeh shahar Hindustan ka first planned way se abad kiya gaya city hai. Chandigarh sirf ek city, capital nahi balkay isay India ki Union Territory ki status bhi hasil hai. Is lihaaz se yeh shehr directly India ki central government ke under aata hai. Chandigarh ka name local devi Chandi ke name aur uske mandir par para tha. Yeh devi Parvati ka warrior avatar hai. Chandi Devi Shivalik hills ki local devi thi aur uski power mani jati thi. Shivalik hills Himalaya ki southernmost hills hain. East Punjab mein is shahar ka name Chandigarh bulaya jata. 1947 mein Subcontinent ki partition mein jab India aur Pakistan existance mein aaye toh Punjab ko do parts mein divide kar diya gaya. So, Lahore Pakistani Punjab ka capital banne ke baad Indian Punjab ko ek new capital ki need thi. So, is purpose ke liye ek new city banaya gaya. Jawaharlal Nehru ke new city commission aur isay Le Corbusier ki taraf se banaya gaya tha.
Champawat India ki state Uttarakhand ke district Champawat ka ek town aur Nagar Palika Parishad hai. Yeh Champawat district ka administrative headquarters hai. Yeh town Kumaon Saltanat ka former capital tha.
Greece ka philosopher jo Cynicism (falsafa-e-kalbiyat) ka follower tha. Sinope mein paida hua. Athens mein settle hua. Kaha jata hai ke Mata Devi ke mandir mein ek tub mein baitha rehta tha. Ek baar pirates ke qabze mein aa gaya. Unho ne usay Corinth ke ek wealthy man ke haath sale kar diya. Finally, usne uske bacho ko education di aur freedom gain ki. Honest insaan ki search mein daily city mein lighted lamp le kar, city mein ghooma karta tha.
Republic of Senegal ka capital aur port.
English scientist. Matter ki Atomic Theory ke liye famous hai. Yeh theory usne 1803 mein publish ki. Phir uski further explanation apni book Kimiyaawi Uzwiyaat ka Naya System mein ki jo 2 volumes mein publish hui. Aur jise usne 1808 se 1827 tak continuous research ke baad likha. Usne kuch elements ke atomic weights ki first list compile kar ke print karwai. Apni theory ka apply gases ke absorption process par kar ke dekha aur yahin se usne Partial Pressure ka law derive kiya jo baad mein Dalton's Law ke name se famous hua. Weather conditions se usay bohot interest tha. Usne daily weather changes ka record rakhna start kar diya aur baad mein is record ki base par apne observations aur results ko ek book Mausami Mushahidat mein describe kiya. Usne colour blindness (marz-e-rangonda) ki bhi research ki jis ka woh patient tha, aur us condition ko discover kiya jise Daltonism kehte hain. 1793 mein New College Manchester mein Maths aur Physics ki education di. 1822 mein Royal Society ka member bana jiski taraf se usay 1825 mein award medal mila.
American Dollar USA ke ilawa bohot se countries ki currency hai. Generally numeric amount se pehle likhi jane wali symbol $ American Dollar ke liye use ki jati hai. Symbol 18th century ke scribes ke abbreviation 'ps' ke evolution ka result hai jo Peso ke liye use hoti thi. P aur S finally ek dusre ke upar likhe jane se $ ko birth diya. Past mein 100,000 (ek lakh) Dollar ka bank note America mein use ho chuka hai. 21 April 2010 ko 100 Dollar ke new US currency note ki pic release kar di gayi hai. Yeh note fake print karna bohot hi difficult hai aur yeh note February 2011 se use hona start hue hain.
Directory, Maalumaat Nama, Hidayat Nama, Telephone Book, Dastoor ul Amal, Deeni Masail ki Kitaab, Kitaab Maalumaat. Ek book jis mein kisi country ya kai countries ke specific professionals, officials ya firms aur factories ke addresses with specific professions mentioned hon. Is type ki book se jis firm ka complete aur correct address chahain, mil sakta hai. Kisi specific industry ya profession ki firms ki search ho toh unke addresses bhi mil sakte hain. Is type ki directory commercial directory kehlati hai. Telephone directory mein aise persons ke addresses aur telephone numbers mentioned hote hain. Jinho ne apnay paas telephone lagwaya hua hai. Computer ki terminology mein folder ya directory ki term aisi jagah ke liye use hoti hai jis mein files ko rakha jata hai.
Roman mythology mein purity, hunting aur moon ki goddess. Greek mythology mein iska equivalent Artemis hai.
London city ki ek street ka name jahan House Number 10 par British PM ki official residence hai. Iske opposite British Foreign Office hai. Colonial Office aur Foreign Ministry bhi yahin hai.
Dublin Republic of Ireland ka capital aur largest city hai. Dublin Ireland ke eastern coast par province Leinster mein River Liffey ke mouth par located hai. Iske south mein Wicklow mountain range hai. City ke urban area ki population 1,173,179 hai. County Dublin ki population according to 2016 is 1,347,359, jabke Greater Dublin area ki population 1,904,806 logon par based hai. Archaeologists mein yeh baat ab bhi under discussion hai ke 7th century mein Celtic language bolnay walon ne exact kis place par Dublin ko abad kiya tha. Baad mein iski expansion as a Viking settlement hui, Norman attack ke baad Kingdom of Dublin Ireland island ka main city bana. City ne 17th century ke baad bohot rapidly progress ki. 1800 mein Act of Union se pehle yeh kuch time ke liye British Empire ka 2nd largest city tha. 1922 mein Ireland ki partition ke baad Dublin Irish Free State (baad mein name change kar ke Republic of Ireland rakha gaya) ka capital bana. 2010 mein Globalization and World Cities Research Network ne isay Global City ka Alpha status diya jis se yeh world ke 30 best cities mein count hota hai. Yeh education, arts, administration, economy aur industry ka ek historical aur contemporary center hai. Dublin ka name Irish word Dubhlinn se hai jo khud early classical Irish Dubhlind/Duibhlind se derived hai. Yeh 2 words ka mixture hai, first word dubh jiske meaning black ya dark hain aur 2nd word lind jiske meaning pond hain. Dublin Castle ke back side par located gardens ke paas Poddle River ke Liffey River mein milne ke point par ek tidal pool tha. City ke names ka original pronunciation other languages mein safe hai jaise Old English mein Dyflin, Old Norse mein, Modern Icelandic mein, Modern Manx mein aur Welsh mein.
