Dublin Bay ka area pre-historic era se abad raha hai. Ptolemy ke writings se 140 AD mein possibly oldest written reference milta hai. Usne is settlement ka name Eblana Polis likha hai. Dublin ne 1988 mein apna official millennium celebration manaya, jis ka matlab hai ke Irish government 988 AD ko city abad hone ki date accept karti hai jo baad mein Dublin city bana. Ab socha jata hai ke Viking settlement ke baad yahan ek Christian ecclesiastical settlement established hui jiska name Dubhlinn tha jis se name Dyflin nikla. 9th aur 10th century ke start mein yahan 2 settlements thi jo modern Dublin ka starting point hai. Post-Scandinavian settlement River Liffey ki tributary Poddle River ke near centered hui, is area ko Wood Quay ke name se jana jata hai. Dubh Linn ek small lake thi jis mein ships anchor kiye jate thay. Poddle River lake ko River Liffey se join karti thi. 18th century ke start mein city ki development ke saath yeh lake khatam ho gayi. Dubh Linn lake Dublin Castle ke garden ke place par located thi, present time mein uske front mein Chester Beatty Library mojood hai. Dublin ko 10th century mein Vikings ne abad kiya. Local Irish rebellions ki large number ke bawajood yeh Viking ke under hi raha. 1169 mein Wales se hone wale Norman attack ke baad yeh Vikings se free ho gaya. Kuch historians ke according city ki initial economic development mein slave trade ka bara role tha. Ireland aur Dublin mein slave trade 9th aur 10th century mein apnay peak par pohnchi. Men, women aur children ko slave bananay ke liye attacks Celtic Irish sea-raiders aur Vikings (jinho ne iska start kiya) kafi income ka source hote thay. Iska target bannay wale Wales, England, Normandy aur beyond areas se hote thay. King of Leinster, Dermot MacMurrough ke Rory O'Connor ki taraf se exile kiye jane ke baad woh Earl of Pembroke, Strongbow ki help se Dublin fatah karnay mein successful hua. MacMurrough ki death ke baad Strongbow ne Dublin city ka control gain karnay ke baad khud ko King of Leinster announce kar diya tha. Strongbow ke successful attack ke response mein Henry II, King of England ne 1171 mein ek bare attack se apni sovereignty confirm ki aur khud ko Lord of Ireland announce kiya. Isi period mein County of Dublin city ka establishment hua aur city ke surrounding areas bhi city mein include ho gaye. Yeh process 1840 tak continue raha jab Dublin city ki outer ko Dublin County se separate kiya gaya. 2001 se yeh dono mil kar Dublin city form karte hain. Dublin Castle, jo Ireland mein Norman power ka center bana, 1204 mein King John of England ke order par important defensive fortification ke tor par build kiya gaya. 1229 mein first Lord Mayor of Dublin ki appointment ke baad city ko expansion mili aur 13th century ke end tak iski population 8,000 ho chuki thi. 1317 mein Robert the Bruce, King of Scotland, ke city par qabza karnay ki koshish ke bawajood Dublin ek commercial center ke tor par emerge hua. 14th century tak yeh ek relatively small walled medieval city raha aur isay aas paas ki local settlements se constantly threat tha. 1348 mein Black Death, ek deadly plague jisne Europe ko apnay grip mein le liya tha, Dublin mein isne kai decades tak thousands of people ko kill kiya. Dublin Crown of England mein as The Pale include ho gaya, jo eastern coastline ke saath ek English area tha. 16th century mein Tudor conquest of Ireland ne Dublin ke liye ek new era create kiya, jab yeh city Ireland ke administrative center ke tor par special importance ka holder bana. Dublin ko ek Protestant city bananay ke determination se Queen Elizabeth I ne 1592 mein city mein Trinity College establish kiya jo ek pure Protestant college tha, aur iske saath hi St. Patrick's Cathedral aur Christ Church Cathedral ko Protestant churches mein convert karne ka order diya. 1640 mein is city ki population 21,000 thi, 1649–51 tak ek baar phir plague ne city ko apnay control mein le liya aur almost city ki half population is se affected hui. However, England se hone wali trade ke result mein city ne rapidly progress ki aur 1700 mein iski population 50,000 tak pohnch gayi. 18th century mein city ki development ka journey rapidly continue raha, aur short time ke liye Georgian Dublin 130,000 se zyada population ke saath British Empire ka 2nd largest city aur Europe ka 5th largest bhi raha. Dublin ki most notable architecture isi period se relate karti hai jaise Four Courts aur Custom House. Temple Bar aur Grafton Street medieval areas hain jin par Georgian era ka impact nahi hua aur woh apni original condition mein hain. 18th century ke dauran Dublin ne dramatically progress ki, bohot se new neighborhoods aur buildings ki construction hui jaise Merrion Square, Parliament House aur Royal Exchange wagaira. Wide Street Commission 1757 mein Dublin Corporation ki request par establish kiya gaya jiska aim roads, bridges aur buildings ki layout par architectural standards ko control karna tha. Wide Street Commission ko 1757 mein Dublin Corporation ki requests par establish kiya gaya tha jis mein roads, bridges, buildings ki layout par architecture standards ko control karna tha. 1759 mein Guinness Brewery ka establishment hua jo finally biggest brewery aur Dublin mein largest employer ban gayi. Dublin ko 19th century mein Acts of Union 1800 ke baad political aur economic decline ke period ka samna karna para, jis ke under government seat London mein Westminster Parliament mein shift kar di gayi thi. City ne Industrial Revolution mein koi important role play nahi kiya, however, yeh island ki administration aur transport ka center raha. Ireland mein coal ke koi important reserves nahi thay jo us time ka fuel tha, aur Dublin maritime industry ka center bhi nahi tha, aur na hi UK aur Ireland mein industrial development ke other important factors mein se tha. Is period mein Belfast ne international trade ke mix se rapidly progress ki jis mein linen cloth manufacturing factories aur shipbuilding shamil hain. 1916 mein Easter Rising, Irish War of Independence aur uske result mein Irish Civil War ne central Dublin mein city ko bohot damage pohnchaya. Irish Free State ki government ne city ke center ko dobara build kiya aur new parliament, Oireachtas, Leinster House mein establish ki. 12th century mein Norman rule ke start se hi city different geopolitical entities ke capital ke tor par kaam karta raha hai: Lordship of Ireland (1171–1541), Kingdom of Ireland (1541–1800), as part of United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland (1801–1922) aur Irish Republic (1919–1922). 1922 mein Partition of Ireland ke baad Dublin Irish Free State (1922–1937) ka capital bana aur ab yeh Republic of Ireland ka capital hai. Is time ki monuments mein se ek Garden of Remembrance hai. Dublin North Irish problems ka target bhi bana. Is 30 saala conflict ke dauran violence ke basic incidents North Ireland mein hue. However, Provisional Irish Republican Army ko Republic of Ireland including Dublin se kuch backing hasil thi. Ek loyalist paramilitary group, Ulster Volunteer Force ne bhi is period mein Dublin mein bombings kiye jis mein most deadly Dublin and Monaghan bombings thay jiske result mein basically khud Dublin mein hi 34 people kill hue. 1997 se Dublin mein significant changes aaye hain. City Celtic Tiger ke period ke dauran Ireland ki economic growth mein top par tha jis mein private sector aur housing, transport aur businesses prominent hain. Great Recession ke dauran economic downturn ke baad Dublin dobara growth ki path par hai aur 2017 tak yahan par unemployment almost finish ho chuki hai. 1842 se city ki boundaries ko Dublin city ki outer limits aur Dublin county ki outer limits samjha jata tha. 1930 mein Local Government (Dublin) Act ke under limits ko extend kiya gaya. Baad mein 1953 mein local government ke temporary administrative order se borders ko ek baar phir expand kar diya gaya. Dublin City Council 63 members par based ek unicameral assembly hai jise local electoral areas se har 5 saal ke liye elect kiya jata hai. Iski presidency Lord Mayor karta hai jo ek saal ki tenure ke liye elect hota hai aur woh Mansion House, Dublin mein rehta hai. Council ki meetings Dublin City Hall mein hoti hain, jabke iski majority administrative activities Wood Quay Civic Office mein perform hoti hain. Political party ya parties ka alliance, seats ki majority se policies introduce karta hai aur Lord Mayor appoint karta hai. Council housing, traffic management, waste, drainage aur planning par spend karne ke liye ek annual budget approve karti hai. Dublin City Manager civic council ke decisions ko implement karne ka responsible hai.

Kaha jata hai ke 1665 mein Azam Shah ne Tons Nadi ke kinare ek qila banaya aur uske charon taraf 7-8 mile ke square mein boundary wall banwayi thi. Dheere dheere iske aas paas population increase hoti gayi aur Azam Shah ke name par iska name Azamgarh par gaya. Tons Nadi ke kinare par located yeh district Azamgarh countless features ka carrier raha hai. Is district mein ancient times se Sufi saints, Ulema-e-Karam, aur freedom fighters ki birthplace rahi hai. Is district mein kai big scholars paida hue. Maulana Abdul Salam Sahab Seerat-ul-Bukhari, Sheikh Abdul Rahman Muhaddis Mubarakpuri, Maulana Allama Hameeduddin Farahi, Allama Shibli Nomani, Sheikh-ul-Hadith Ubaidullah Rahmani Mubarakpuri, Maulana Ameen Ahsan Islahi, Akhtar Ahsan Islahi, Abdul Salam Islahi Farahi, Abul Hasan Ali Farahi, Altaf Ahmad Azmi, Waheeduddin Khan, Ubaidullah Farahi, Abdullah Muhyiddin, Rahul Sankrityayan. Yahan bade bade institutions jo 100 saal pehle ke bane huay hain: Madrasa-tul-Islah, Shibli National College, Maulana Habib-ur-Rahman Azmi.
Chandrapur India ki state Maharashtra ka ek city hai.
Chandigarh India ke soobay Punjab ka ek city hai. Yeh shahar North India ki 2 states, Punjab aur Haryana ke capital ke tor par jana jata hai. Chandigarh ka matlab hai Chandi ka Qila. Chandigarh ka name ek old Chandi Mandir se link kiya jata hai. Chandigarh ka matlab beautiful city bhi liya jata hai. 2001 ki census ke according Chandigarh mein included Mohali, Panchkula aur Zirakpur samet, iski population 1,165,111 hai. City mein Haryana, Ambala, Panchkula, Mohali, Patiala aur Ropar ke districts shamil hain. Yeh shahar Hindustan ka first planned way se abad kiya gaya city hai. Chandigarh sirf ek city, capital nahi balkay isay India ki Union Territory ki status bhi hasil hai. Is lihaaz se yeh shehr directly India ki central government ke under aata hai. Chandigarh ka name local devi Chandi ke name aur uske mandir par para tha. Yeh devi Parvati ka warrior avatar hai. Chandi Devi Shivalik hills ki local devi thi aur uski power mani jati thi. Shivalik hills Himalaya ki southernmost hills hain. East Punjab mein is shahar ka name Chandigarh bulaya jata. 1947 mein Subcontinent ki partition mein jab India aur Pakistan existance mein aaye toh Punjab ko do parts mein divide kar diya gaya. So, Lahore Pakistani Punjab ka capital banne ke baad Indian Punjab ko ek new capital ki need thi. So, is purpose ke liye ek new city banaya gaya. Jawaharlal Nehru ke new city commission aur isay Le Corbusier ki taraf se banaya gaya tha.
Champawat India ki state Uttarakhand ke district Champawat ka ek town aur Nagar Palika Parishad hai. Yeh Champawat district ka administrative headquarters hai. Yeh town Kumaon Saltanat ka former capital tha.
Greece ka philosopher jo Cynicism (falsafa-e-kalbiyat) ka follower tha. Sinope mein paida hua. Athens mein settle hua. Kaha jata hai ke Mata Devi ke mandir mein ek tub mein baitha rehta tha. Ek baar pirates ke qabze mein aa gaya. Unho ne usay Corinth ke ek wealthy man ke haath sale kar diya. Finally, usne uske bacho ko education di aur freedom gain ki. Honest insaan ki search mein daily city mein lighted lamp le kar, city mein ghooma karta tha.
Republic of Senegal ka capital aur port.
English scientist. Matter ki Atomic Theory ke liye famous hai. Yeh theory usne 1803 mein publish ki. Phir uski further explanation apni book Kimiyaawi Uzwiyaat ka Naya System mein ki jo 2 volumes mein publish hui. Aur jise usne 1808 se 1827 tak continuous research ke baad likha. Usne kuch elements ke atomic weights ki first list compile kar ke print karwai. Apni theory ka apply gases ke absorption process par kar ke dekha aur yahin se usne Partial Pressure ka law derive kiya jo baad mein Dalton's Law ke name se famous hua. Weather conditions se usay bohot interest tha. Usne daily weather changes ka record rakhna start kar diya aur baad mein is record ki base par apne observations aur results ko ek book Mausami Mushahidat mein describe kiya. Usne colour blindness (marz-e-rangonda) ki bhi research ki jis ka woh patient tha, aur us condition ko discover kiya jise Daltonism kehte hain. 1793 mein New College Manchester mein Maths aur Physics ki education di. 1822 mein Royal Society ka member bana jiski taraf se usay 1825 mein award medal mila.
American Dollar USA ke ilawa bohot se countries ki currency hai. Generally numeric amount se pehle likhi jane wali symbol $ American Dollar ke liye use ki jati hai. Symbol 18th century ke scribes ke abbreviation 'ps' ke evolution ka result hai jo Peso ke liye use hoti thi. P aur S finally ek dusre ke upar likhe jane se $ ko birth diya. Past mein 100,000 (ek lakh) Dollar ka bank note America mein use ho chuka hai. 21 April 2010 ko 100 Dollar ke new US currency note ki pic release kar di gayi hai. Yeh note fake print karna bohot hi difficult hai aur yeh note February 2011 se use hona start hue hain.
Directory, Maalumaat Nama, Hidayat Nama, Telephone Book, Dastoor ul Amal, Deeni Masail ki Kitaab, Kitaab Maalumaat. Ek book jis mein kisi country ya kai countries ke specific professionals, officials ya firms aur factories ke addresses with specific professions mentioned hon. Is type ki book se jis firm ka complete aur correct address chahain, mil sakta hai. Kisi specific industry ya profession ki firms ki search ho toh unke addresses bhi mil sakte hain. Is type ki directory commercial directory kehlati hai. Telephone directory mein aise persons ke addresses aur telephone numbers mentioned hote hain. Jinho ne apnay paas telephone lagwaya hua hai. Computer ki terminology mein folder ya directory ki term aisi jagah ke liye use hoti hai jis mein files ko rakha jata hai.
Roman mythology mein purity, hunting aur moon ki goddess. Greek mythology mein iska equivalent Artemis hai.
London city ki ek street ka name jahan House Number 10 par British PM ki official residence hai. Iske opposite British Foreign Office hai. Colonial Office aur Foreign Ministry bhi yahin hai.
Dublin Republic of Ireland ka capital aur largest city hai. Dublin Ireland ke eastern coast par province Leinster mein River Liffey ke mouth par located hai. Iske south mein Wicklow mountain range hai. City ke urban area ki population 1,173,179 hai. County Dublin ki population according to 2016 is 1,347,359, jabke Greater Dublin area ki population 1,904,806 logon par based hai. Archaeologists mein yeh baat ab bhi under discussion hai ke 7th century mein Celtic language bolnay walon ne exact kis place par Dublin ko abad kiya tha. Baad mein iski expansion as a Viking settlement hui, Norman attack ke baad Kingdom of Dublin Ireland island ka main city bana. City ne 17th century ke baad bohot rapidly progress ki. 1800 mein Act of Union se pehle yeh kuch time ke liye British Empire ka 2nd largest city tha. 1922 mein Ireland ki partition ke baad Dublin Irish Free State (baad mein name change kar ke Republic of Ireland rakha gaya) ka capital bana. 2010 mein Globalization and World Cities Research Network ne isay Global City ka Alpha status diya jis se yeh world ke 30 best cities mein count hota hai. Yeh education, arts, administration, economy aur industry ka ek historical aur contemporary center hai. Dublin ka name Irish word Dubhlinn se hai jo khud early classical Irish Dubhlind/Duibhlind se derived hai. Yeh 2 words ka mixture hai, first word dubh jiske meaning black ya dark hain aur 2nd word lind jiske meaning pond hain. Dublin Castle ke back side par located gardens ke paas Poddle River ke Liffey River mein milne ke point par ek tidal pool tha. City ke names ka original pronunciation other languages mein safe hai jaise Old English mein Dyflin, Old Norse mein, Modern Icelandic mein, Modern Manx mein aur Welsh mein. Dublin Bay ka area pre-historic era se abad raha hai. Ptolemy ke writings se 140 AD mein possibly oldest written reference milta hai. Usne is settlement ka name Eblana Polis likha hai. Dublin ne 1988 mein apna official millennium celebration manaya, jis ka matlab hai ke Irish government 988 AD ko city abad hone ki date accept karti hai jo baad mein Dublin city bana. Ab socha jata hai ke Viking settlement ke baad yahan ek Christian ecclesiastical settlement established hui jiska name Dubhlinn tha jis se name Dyflin nikla. 9th aur 10th century ke start mein yahan 2 settlements thi jo modern Dublin ka starting point hai. Post-Scandinavian settlement River Liffey ki tributary Poddle River ke near centered hui, is area ko Wood Quay ke name se jana jata hai. Dubh Linn ek small lake thi jis mein ships anchor kiye jate thay. Poddle River lake ko River Liffey se join karti thi. 18th century ke start mein city ki development ke saath yeh lake khatam ho gayi. Dubh Linn lake Dublin Castle ke garden ke place par located thi, present time mein uske front mein Chester Beatty Library mojood hai. Dublin ko 10th century mein Vikings ne abad kiya. Local Irish rebellions ki large number ke bawajood yeh Viking ke under hi raha. 1169 mein Wales se hone wale Norman attack ke baad yeh Vikings se free ho gaya. Kuch historians ke according city ki initial economic development mein slave trade ka bara role tha. Ireland aur Dublin mein slave trade 9th aur 10th century mein apnay peak par pohnchi. Men, women aur children ko slave bananay ke liye attacks Celtic Irish sea-raiders aur Vikings (jinho ne iska start kiya) kafi income ka source hote thay. Iska target bannay wale Wales, England, Normandy aur beyond areas se hote thay. King of Leinster, Dermot MacMurrough ke Rory O'Connor ki taraf se exile kiye jane ke baad woh Earl of Pembroke, Strongbow ki help se Dublin fatah karnay mein successful hua. MacMurrough ki death ke baad Strongbow ne Dublin city ka control gain karnay ke baad khud ko King of Leinster announce kar diya tha. Strongbow ke successful attack ke response mein Henry II, King of England ne 1171 mein ek bare attack se apni sovereignty confirm ki aur khud ko Lord of Ireland announce kiya. Isi period mein County of Dublin city ka establishment hua aur city ke surrounding areas bhi city mein include ho gaye. Yeh process 1840 tak continue raha jab Dublin city ki outer ko Dublin County se separate kiya gaya. 2001 se yeh dono mil kar Dublin city form karte hain. Dublin Castle, jo Ireland mein Norman power ka center bana, 1204 mein King John of England ke order par important defensive fortification ke tor par build kiya gaya. 1229 mein first Lord Mayor of Dublin ki appointment ke baad city ko expansion mili aur 13th century ke end tak iski population 8,000 ho chuki thi. 1317 mein Robert the Bruce, King of Scotland, ke city par qabza karnay ki koshish ke bawajood Dublin ek commercial center ke tor par emerge hua. 14th century tak yeh ek relatively small walled medieval city raha aur isay aas paas ki local settlements se constantly threat tha. 1348 mein Black Death, ek deadly plague jisne Europe ko apnay grip mein le liya tha, Dublin mein isne kai decades tak thousands of people ko kill kiya. Dublin Crown of England mein as The Pale include ho gaya, jo eastern coastline ke saath ek English area tha. 16th century mein Tudor conquest of Ireland ne Dublin ke liye ek new era create kiya, jab yeh city Ireland ke administrative center ke tor par special importance ka holder bana. Dublin ko ek Protestant city bananay ke determination se Queen Elizabeth I ne 1592 mein city mein Trinity College establish kiya jo ek pure Protestant college tha, aur iske saath hi St. Patrick's Cathedral aur Christ Church Cathedral ko Protestant churches mein convert karne ka order diya. 1640 mein is city ki population 21,000 thi, 1649–51 tak ek baar phir plague ne city ko apnay control mein le liya aur almost city ki half population is se affected hui. However, England se hone wali trade ke result mein city ne rapidly progress ki aur 1700 mein iski population 50,000 tak pohnch gayi. 18th century mein city ki development ka journey rapidly continue raha, aur short time ke liye Georgian Dublin 130,000 se zyada population ke saath British Empire ka 2nd largest city aur Europe ka 5th largest bhi raha. Dublin ki most notable architecture isi period se relate karti hai jaise Four Courts aur Custom House. Temple Bar aur Grafton Street medieval areas hain jin par Georgian era ka impact nahi hua aur woh apni original condition mein hain. 18th century ke dauran Dublin ne dramatically progress ki, bohot se new neighborhoods aur buildings ki construction hui jaise Merrion Square, Parliament House aur Royal Exchange wagaira. Wide Street Commission 1757 mein Dublin Corporation ki request par establish kiya gaya jiska aim roads, bridges aur buildings ki layout par architectural standards ko control karna tha. Wide Street Commission ko 1757 mein Dublin Corporation ki requests par establish kiya gaya tha jis mein roads, bridges, buildings ki layout par architecture standards ko control karna tha. 1759 mein Guinness Brewery ka establishment hua jo finally biggest brewery aur Dublin mein largest employer ban gayi. Dublin ko 19th century mein Acts of Union 1800 ke baad political aur economic decline ke period ka samna karna para, jis ke under government seat London mein Westminster Parliament mein shift kar di gayi thi. City ne Industrial Revolution mein koi important role play nahi kiya, however, yeh island ki administration aur transport ka center raha. Ireland mein coal ke koi important reserves nahi thay jo us time ka fuel tha, aur Dublin maritime industry ka center bhi nahi tha, aur na hi UK aur Ireland mein industrial development ke other important factors mein se tha. Is period mein Belfast ne international trade ke mix se rapidly progress ki jis mein linen cloth manufacturing factories aur shipbuilding shamil hain. 1916 mein Easter Rising, Irish War of Independence aur uske result mein Irish Civil War ne central Dublin mein city ko bohot damage pohnchaya. Irish Free State ki government ne city ke center ko dobara build kiya aur new parliament, Oireachtas, Leinster House mein establish ki. 12th century mein Norman rule ke start se hi city different geopolitical entities ke capital ke tor par kaam karta raha hai: Lordship of Ireland (1171–1541), Kingdom of Ireland (1541–1800), as part of United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland (1801–1922) aur Irish Republic (1919–1922). 1922 mein Partition of Ireland ke baad Dublin Irish Free State (1922–1937) ka capital bana aur ab yeh Republic of Ireland ka capital hai. Is time ki monuments mein se ek Garden of Remembrance hai. Dublin North Irish problems ka target bhi bana. Is 30 saala conflict ke dauran violence ke basic incidents North Ireland mein hue. However, Provisional Irish Republican Army ko Republic of Ireland including Dublin se kuch backing hasil thi. Ek loyalist paramilitary group, Ulster Volunteer Force ne bhi is period mein Dublin mein bombings kiye jis mein most deadly Dublin and Monaghan bombings thay jiske result mein basically khud Dublin mein hi 34 people kill hue. 1997 se Dublin mein significant changes aaye hain. City Celtic Tiger ke period ke dauran Ireland ki economic growth mein top par tha jis mein private sector aur housing, transport aur businesses prominent hain. Great Recession ke dauran economic downturn ke baad Dublin dobara growth ki path par hai aur 2017 tak yahan par unemployment almost finish ho chuki hai.
1842 se city ki boundaries ko Dublin city ki outer limits aur Dublin county ki outer limits samjha jata tha. 1930 mein Local Government (Dublin) Act ke under limits ko extend kiya gaya. Baad mein 1953 mein local government ke temporary administrative order se borders ko ek baar phir expand kar diya gaya. Dublin City Council 63 members par based ek unicameral assembly hai jise local electoral areas se har 5 saal ke liye elect kiya jata hai. Iski presidency Lord Mayor karta hai jo ek saal ki tenure ke liye elect hota hai aur woh Mansion House, Dublin mein rehta hai. Council ki meetings Dublin City Hall mein hoti hain, jabke iski majority administrative activities Wood Quay Civic Office mein perform hoti hain. Political party ya parties ka alliance, seats ki majority se policies introduce karta hai aur Lord Mayor appoint karta hai. Council housing, traffic management, waste, drainage aur planning par spend karne ke liye ek annual budget approve karti hai. Dublin City Manager civic council ke decisions ko implement karne ka responsible hai.
Capital city hone ki waja se Dublin Irish national parliament Oireachtas ki seat hai. Yeh President of Ireland, Upper House of Ireland aur Lower House of Ireland par based hai. President Phoenix Park mein Áras an Uachtaráin mein rehta hai, jabke Oireachtas ke dono houses Kildare Street par located ek former Duke's mansion, Leinster House mein meetings organize karte hain. Yeh 1922 mein Irish Free State ke baad Irish Parliament ka ghar raha hai. Kingdom of Ireland ka old Irish Parliament House College Green mein located hai. Government buildings mein Department of the Taoiseach, Council Chamber, Department of Finance aur Attorney General ka office located hai. Yeh ek central building (1911 mein complete) aur 2 side buildings (1921 mein complete) par based hai. Isay Royal College of Science for Ireland ke Dean Thomas Manley Deane aur Sir Aston Webb ne design kiya tha. Pehle Lower House ki meeting 1919 mein Mansion House mein hui thi. Irish Free State ki government ne building ki 2 side buildings ko kuch ministries ke liye temporarily assign kiya jabke central building 1989 tak College of Technology thi. Although yeh aur Leinster House temporarily iske liye use hone thay, however, yeh baad mein Parliament ka permanent home ban gaye. Lower House of Ireland ke elections ke liye city ko 5 constituencies mein divide kiya gaya hai:
2016 ke general elections mein Dublin region se elected representatives ki numbers by political party following hain.
Dublin eastern central Ireland mein River Liffey ke mouth par situated hai aur iska area approx. 115 sq km (44 sq miles) hai. Iske south direction mein low-height mountain range hai aur north aur west mein flat agricultural land hai. River Liffey city ko 2 parts mein divide karta hai jo North Side aur South Side hain. Yeh dono parts 2 rivers se further divide hote hain. Tolka River south-east mein flow karte hue Dublin Bay mein gir jati hai aur Dodder River north-east mein flow karte hue River Liffey ke mouth mein gir jati hai. 2 more water bodies, Grand Canal South Side mein aur Royal Canal North Side mein, River Shannon mein milne se pehle inner city ke around ek circle banate hain. River Liffey Leixlip ke place par north-eastern route se apna direction basically east ki taraf change karta hai, aur yahi point urban development ko zyada agricultural land ke use se promote karta hai.
North-western Europe ke baqi areas ki tarah, Dublin ka climate oceanic hai, jis mein cool summers, mild winters aur extreme temperatures ka lack hai. January mein average max temperature 8.8 °C (48 °F) hota hai, jabke July mein average max temperature 20.2 °C (68 °F) rehta hai. Sun sabse zyada May aur June ke months mein chamakta hai. Jabke October ke month mein sabse zyada rain hoti hai jo 76 mm (3 inches) hai, aur driest month February hai jis mein only 46 mm (2 inches) rain hoti hai. Generally, rain saal bhar hoti hai. Eastern coast par hone ki waja se Dublin Ireland ka driest area hai jahan western coast ke comparison mein almost half rain hoti hai. City ke south mein located Ringsend 683 mm (27 inches) ki average annual rainfall ke saath country mein sabse kam rain record karta hai, jabke city ke center mein 714 mm (28 inches) rain hoti hai. Winters mein precipitation generally rain hoti hai, however, November aur March ke darmiyan snowfall bhi hoti hai. Hailstorm, snowfall se zyada hoti hai. City mein summers mein days long aur nights short hoti hain. Autumn mein fast oceanic winds chalti hain. Yeh winds Dublin par effect kar sakti hain lekin iske eastern location ki waja se country ke other parts ke comparison mein is par unka bohot kam impact hota hai. However, winters mein eastern winds ki waja se city mein sardi aur snowfall hoti hai. 20th century mein city ko smog aur air pollution face karna para, jis ki waja se Dublin mein peat-like fuel par ban laga diya gaya hai. Ban black smoke ke concentration se deal karne ke liye 1990 mein lagaya gaya, jo residents mein cardiovascular aur respiratory diseases ki waja se deaths ka reason ban rahi thi. Ban ke baad se respiratory aur cardiovascular diseases se deaths ki rate mein kami aayi hai jo approx. 350 deaths annually hai.
Dublin mein saikron saal puranay kai places aur landmarks hain. In mein se aik sab se old qila Dublin hai, jisko pehli dafa 1169 mein Ireland per Norman attack k baad England k Shah John k order pe 1204 mein build kia gaya. Is hukum k bad qile aur shehar ki protection k liye strong walls aur khandaqein banayi gaen taa k justice ki administration aur king k treasury ki hifazat ho sakay. 1230 mein considerably complete honay wala qila Norman courtyard style ka tha, central open area livestock enclosure k baghair, saari directions mein high strong walls jiss mein round guard towers thay. Norman Dublin k south-eastern area mein honay ki wajah se Poodle river isay natural defense deti hai. Dublin city mein bohot se monuments aur art pieces install kiye gaye hain. In mein Spire of Dublin, jiska official name 'Light ki Yaadgar' hai, aik modern monument hai. Yeh stainless steel se bana hai aur iski height 121.2 meters (398 feet) conical style mein bani hai. Ye Dublin ki famous O'Connell Street par hai. Isay Nelson Pillar ka replacement kaha jata hai jo ab destroy ho chuka hai. Monument ki base lit rehti hai jisse uska upper part bhi bright hota hai. Yeh city k liye aik lighthouse ka kaam karta hai. Trinity College, Dublin ki library mein located Book of Kells city k sab se ziada interesting places mein se aik hai. Ha'penny Bridge, Liffey river per aik iron pedestrian bridge hai, jo Dublin mein most photographed spots mein se aik hai aur isay Dublin k top famous landmarks mein se aik mana jata hai. Doosre important places aur monuments mein Molly Malone ka statue jo Grafton Street par hai, ussay 1988 mein Dublin k millenium celebration par install kiya gaya tha. Molly Malone Dublin, Ireland ka aik popular song hai, jo Dublin ka unofficial anthem ban gaya hai. Dawson Street pe jo Mansion House hai, wo 1715 se Dublin k Lord Mayor ki official residence hai. Anna Livia Monument Heuston Railway Station k paas Croppies Memorial Park mein located hai. Is se pehle yeh O'Connell Street par tha. Christ Church Cathedral mediaeval Dublin k purane center Wood Quay k qareeb hai. St. Patrick's Cathedral Wood Quay mein located hai. St. Francis Xavier Church Mountjoy Square k pas Upper Gardiner Street per hai. Custom House Liffey river bank par aur Áras an Uachtaráin Phoenix Park mein hai. Poolbeg Generating Station Republic of Ireland ka aik power station hai jise Dublin ka historic status mila hua hai. General Post Office, jise normally GPO k abbreviation se jaana jata hai, Dublin mein Ireland k Department of Posts ka headquarter hai. O'Connell Street par jo building hai, uski historical importance hai. 1916 mein Easter Rising k dauran rebels ne isay apna center banaya tha.
Sheher k aas paas bohot se green areas hain aur Dublin City Council 1,500 hectares (3,700 acres) parks manage karti hai. Public parks jaise Phoenix Park, city centre se 2-4 kms west mein Liffey river k north mein hai; Herbert Park, Ballsbridge mein aur St. Stephen's Green Grafton Street k saath hain. Phoenix Park shehr ke center se approx 3 km (2 miles) west mein, Liffey River k north side par hai. Isko 16 km (10 miles) long old wall enclose karti hai, jabke iska area 707 hectares (1,750 acres) se ziada hai. Yeh Europe k sab se bade walled urban parks mein se aik hai. Ismein bare grassy fields aur tree-lined avenues bhi shamil hain, aur 17th century k baad se yahan fallow deer bhi rakhe gaye hain. President of Ireland ki residence Áras an Uachtaráin 1751 mein isi park mein banayi gayi thi. Is park mein Dublin Zoo, Ashtown Castle aur US Ambassador ki official residence bhi hai. Kabhi kabhi park mein music concerts bhi hotay hain. St. Stephen's Green Dublin k famous shopping center Grafton Street k saath located hai. Iske aas paas ki roads per bohot se govt departments k offices hain. St. Anne's Park aik public park aur recreation area hai jo Northside k suburban area mein hai. Yeh park Dublin ka second largest municipal park hai. Sab se bara municipal park Bull Island mein close hi hai.
Dublin area Ireland ka economic hub hai aur Celtic Tiger era k dauran country ki economic growth mein sab se upar tha. 2009 mein Dublin ko worldwide 4th richest city by purchasing power aur 10th richest by personal income consider kiya gaya tha. Mercer k 2011 cost of living global survey k mutabiq Dublin European Union ka 13th most expensive city hai (2010 mein 10th rank se down ho k) aur worldwide rehne k liye 58th (2010 mein 42nd rank se down ho k) most expensive city hai. 2005 k according Greater Dublin area mein almost 800,000 log employed hain jin mein se roughly 600,000 service sector mein aur 200,000 industrial sector mein jobs kar rahe hain. Dublin ki traditional industries jaise food processing, textile industry, fermented drinks, distillation mein slowly kami aayi hai, however, Guinness St. James's Gate Brewery mein 1759 se banayi ja rahi hai. 1990s mein economic reforms ne kai international pharmaceutical, information aur communication technology companies ko city aur Greater Dublin area mein attract kiya hai. Bohot si famous global companies jese Microsoft, Google, Amazon, eBay, PayPal, Yahoo!, Facebook, Twitter, Accenture, Pfizer k European headquarters aur ya operational bases city mein mojood hain jin mein se kafi enterprise clusters jese Digital Hub aur Silicon Docks mein hain. In companies ki presence ne city mein economic growth ko boost kiya hai aur sometimes Dublin ko Europe ka tech capital bhi kehte hain. Kai international institutions ne city mein important headquarters establish kiye hain for example Citibank aur Commerzbank. Brexit k baad Eurozone tak access maintain rakhne ki hope se Dublin ko financial services companies host karne k liye main cities mein se aik position di gayi hai. Celtic Tiger ne construction mein aik temporary boom bhi create kiya hai especially Dublin Docklands aur Spencer Dock mein. Complete projects mein Convention Centre, 3Arena aur Grand Canal Theatre shamil hain.
Irish Stock Exchange Ireland ki main stock exchange hai aur yeh 1793 mein established hui thi. Yeh Dublin, Republic of Ireland mein hai. Iske ilawa Internet Neutral Exchange aur Irish Enterprise Exchange bhi Dublin mein hi hain.
Central Bank of Ireland Republic of Ireland ka central bank hai jiska HQ Dublin mein hai. Euro currency introduce karne tak yeh Irish Pound bank notes aur coins issue karta tha aur ab yeh service European Central Bank k liye provide karta hai. Bank of Ireland, Ireland mein aik commercial bank hai. Yeh traditional char bare Irish banks mein se aik hai. Iska Head Office Dublin mein located hai. Ulster Bank aik bara commercial bank hai aur traditional bare char Irish banks mein se aik hai. Iske ilawa world k best banks k offices bhi yahan hain.
1987 mein Dublin k International Financial Services Centre (IFSC) ki formation se city k liye financial services bhi important ban chuki hain. IFSC program k under business mein 500 se ziada operations approve kiye ja chuke hain. Yeh center world k top 50 banks aur top 20 insurance companies mein se half ko host karta hai.
Ireland mein roads ka network primarily Dublin par focused hai. 2016 TomTom Traffic Index k mutabiq Dublin world ka 15th most congested city aur Europe ka 7th most congested city hai. Dublin mein almost 200 bus routes hain jo city aur suburbs ko cover karte hain. In mein se majority Dublin Bus k under operate karti hain, however, kai small companies bhi yahan work kar rahi hain. Fare usually distance k basis par liya jata hai. City k liye proposed Eastern Bypass ka pehla phase Dublin Port Tunnel hai jiska official opening 2006 mein hua tha. Yeh usually heavy vehicles k liye use hota hai. Yeh tunnel Dublin Port ko M1 Motorway se Dublin Airport k qareeb connect karti hai. City aik inner aur outer orbital route se ghira hua hai. Inner orbital route Georgian Dublin k heart k aas paas chalta hai aur outer orbital route basically Dublin ki do canals, Grand Canal aur Royal Canal k around banay natural circle k saath saath chalta hai.
M50 Motorway Dublin mein aik semi-circular motorway hai jo Ireland ki busiest motorway hai. Current route 1983 se 2010 k dauran 27 saalon mein different sections mein build kia gaya. Ye Dublin Port se start ho k north mein Dublin Port Tunnel se hotay huay airport motorway k aik part k saath chalta hai. Us k baad yeh west mein turn karta hai aur M1 Motorway se junction banata hai aur Dublin k northern, western aur southern suburbs k gird ghoomta hai. Yeh south-east Dilyn Shankill, Dublin k point par end hota hai.
M1 Motorway Republic of Ireland mein aik motorway hai. Yeh N1 ka major part form karta hai aur Island of Ireland k east mein Dublin ko Belfast se connect karta hai.
National Transport Authority Greater Dublin area k liye Transport Authority aur Ireland k liye Licensing Agency hai. NTA Dublin mein travelers k liye Leap Card bhi issue karti hai jo Dublin k public transport services mein sab k liye use ho sakti hai.
Dublin Bus Republic of Ireland k capital Dublin mein bus services provide karti hai. Yeh Córas Iompair Éireann ki subsidiary company hai. 2017 mein 139.4 million passengers ne Dublin Bus se travel kia.
Iarnród Éireann, jise Irish Rail bhi kehte hain, Republic of Ireland ki national railway network operator hai. Yeh Córas Iompair Éireann ki subsidiary company hai aur isko 2 February 1987 ko establish kia gaya tha. Dublin mein Iarnród Éireann k under do main railway stations hain: Heuston Railway Station aur Dublin Connolly Railway Station.
Heuston Railway Station Republic of Ireland k main railway stations mein se aik hai jo capital Dublin ko south, south-west aur west se connect karta hai.
Dublin Connolly Railway Station Republic of Ireland k main railway stations mein se aik hai jo Dublin mein located hai. Yeh Dublin ko country k north, north-west, south-east aur south-west se connect karta hai.
Dublin Area Rapid Transit (DART), jise commonly iske abbreviation DART se jaana jaata hai, aik electric transport railway network hai jo Republic of Ireland k capital Dublin k coast aur city centre ko services deta hai. 2013 mein DART aur Dublin Suburban Lines k liye passengers 16 million aur 11.7 million thay jo Irish Rail k passengers ka almost 75% hai.
Luas Republic of Ireland k capital Dublin mein tram/light rail system hai. Iski do main lines hain: Green Line, jisne 30 June 2004 ko operations start kiye aur Red Line jiska inauguration 26 September 2004 ko hua. Us time se dono lines ki different branches mein extension aur division ki gai hai. Is system mein ab 67 stations hain aur iski length 36.5 km (22.7 miles) hai. 2017 mein ispar 37.6 million passengers ne travel kiya jo 2016 k comparison mein 10% increase tha.
Dublin Suburban Rail aik railway network hai jo Dublin, Republic of Ireland, mostly Greater Dublin area aur outer towns jaise Drogheda, Dundalk aur County Louth ko services deta hai.
TFI Leap Card Dublin mein 12 December 2011 ko introduce kiya gaya aik integrated ticketing system hai. Yeh aik prepaid card hai jo Dublin Bus, Dublin Area Rapid Transit, Bus Éireann, Iarnród Éireann, Swords Express, Ashbourne Connect, Collins Coaches, Matthews.ie, City Direct, Wexford Bus aur Luas k liye use ho sakta hai. Cash k comparison mein Leap Card k saath fare payment relatively kam hoti hai. Dublin Bus k liye Leap Card ka use cash prices k comparison mein 20-27% kam hota hai. For example, 1 December 2017 se Dublin Bus use karte hue 4-13 stage ka cash fare 2.85 Euros banta hai jabke Leap Card se yeh 2.15 Euros hoga. Is tarah Luas aur DART mein bhi Leap Card use karne se savings hoti hain. Agar aap apne TFI Leap Card se 1 din ya 1 week (Monday - Sunday) mein bohot se journeys karte hain toh Dublin Bus, Luas, DART aur Commuter Rail mein aik specific price cap tak pohnchnay k baad aapse further fare charge nahi kiya jayega. Cap tak pohnchnay k baad us din ya week free travel kar sakte hain.
Dublin Port Dublin, Republic of Ireland mein aik port hai. Ireland k port transport ka almost two-thirds part isi port se hota hai. Yeh Island of Ireland ki busiest port hai. Dublin Connolly Railway Station bus k through Dublin Port se connected hai jahan se yeh Irish Ferries se UK k Holyhead Railway Station se connected hai, wahan se North Wales Coast Line k through Chester Railway Station aur Euston Railway Station tak jaya ja sakta hai. Dublin Port aik ferry terminus bhi hai.
Irish Ferries aik marine transport company hai jo Ireland, UK aur Continental Europe k beech passenger aur cargo services deti hai. Yeh Irish Continental Group ka part hai aur iski trading Irish Stock Exchange aur London Stock Exchange par hoti hai.
Dublin Airport Republic of Ireland ka aik international airport hai jo capital Dublin ko air services provide karta hai. Airport Dublin k north mein 10 km (6.2 miles) k distance par Collinstown, Fingal mein situated hai.
Aer Lingus Ireland ki airline hai. Aer Lingus ka main office Ireland k airport Dublin Airport per hai.
Ryanair Republic of Ireland ki airline hai. Ryanair ka head office Ireland k Dublin Airport par hai.
Stobart Air Republic of Ireland ki aik regional airline hai jo Aer Arann k naam se operate karti hai aur iska Head Office Dublin mein situated hai.
Casement Aerodrome Dublin, Republic of Ireland k south-west mein aik military airport hai.
Dublin City Council ne 1990s mein pooray city mein cycle lanes aur tracks banana start kiye aur 2012 tak city mein dedicated cycle paths aur off-road trails ki total length 200 km (120 miles) thi. 2011 mein city world k cycle-friendly cities ki list mein 9th number per tha, but 2015 mein yeh kam ho kar 15th number par aa gaya.
Dublin Bikes aik public rental bicycle scheme hai jo 2009 se Dublin city mein operate kar rahi hai. Initially is scheme ko 450 French bicycles aur 40 stations k saath launch kiya gaya tha. 2011 tak isko 550 bicycles aur 44 stations tak extend kiya gaya, 2013 mein iski further expansion hui aur isay 950 bicycles aur 58 rental stations tak increase kar diya gaya.
Dublin Ireland mein education k main centers mein se aik hai, jahan teen universities hain, Dublin Institute of Technology aur baaki high education institutions bhi yahan hain. City aur suburbs mein 20 third-level educational institutions hain. Dublin 2012 mein Science ka European Capital tha. University of Dublin 16th century mein establish hone wali Ireland ki oldest university hai, yeh city k centre mein located hai. Trinity College 1592 mein Elizabeth I k royal order se founded kiya gaya. Yeh city k middle mein College Green mein hai, ismein 15,000 students parhte hain. National University of Ireland ka main campus Dublin mein hai jo related constituent university University College Dublin ka location hai jismein 30,000 se ziada students hain. 1854 mein founded honay wali university ab Ireland ki biggest university hai. Dublin Institute of Technology 1887 mein established hone wala Dublin ka primary aur Ireland ka largest research aur technology education institute hai jahan 23,000 se ziada students study karte hain. Dublin Institute of Technology engineering, architecture, science, health, journalism, digital media, hospitality aur business mein specialise karta hai, iske ilawa art, design, music aur humanities k programs bhi offer karta hai. Grangegorman mein aik naye campus ka launch bhi hua hai. Dublin City University, jiska pehla naam National Institute for Higher Education tha, business, engineering, science, communications, linguistics aur basic education mein courses offer karti hai. Ismein almost 16,000 students study karte hain. Royal College of Surgeons in Ireland National University of Ireland ka approved medical college hai jo city k center mein St. Stephen's Green mein hai. Dublin Business School Ireland ka largest private third-level institution hai jismein 9,000 se ziada students hain. National College of Art and Design art, design aur media mein training aur research services provide karta hai. National College of Ireland bhi Dublin mein located hai. Economic and Social Research Institute aik social science research institution hai. Irish Public Administration aur Management Training Centre Dublin mein hai, Public Administration Institute University of Ireland k through graduate aur postgraduate awards offer kar raha hai. Iske ilawa kuch small specialist colleges bhi hain jese Griffith College Dublin, Gaiety School of Acting aur New Media Technology College. City k suburban areas South Dublin mein Tallaght aur Dún Laoghaire–Rathdown mein regional colleges hain: Institute of Technology, Tallaght mein full-time aur part-time technical subjects ki aik wide range mein courses hain aur Dún Laoghaire Institute of Art, Design and Technology art, design, business, psychology aur media technology mein training aur research education provide karta hai. Western suburban area Blanchardstown mein Institute of Technology, Blanchardstown mein languages aur technical subjects k saath saath childcare aur sport management courses bhi offer kiye jaate hain.
Dublin city Dublin City Council k under manage hota hai, but term Dublin mein adjoining local authority areas Dún Laoghaire–Rathdown, Fingal aur South Dublin bhi include hain. Yeh charon areas mil k traditional County Dublin banate hain. Sometimes yeh area Dublin Region k naam se bhi jaana jata hai. 2016 k census k according City Council k under managed area ki population 553,165 thi, jabke urban area ki population 1,173,179 thi. County Dublin ki population 1,273,069 aur Greater Dublin area ki population 1,904,806 persons par based thi. Area ki population rapidly increase ho rahi hai aur Central Statistics Office k estimate k mutabiq yeh 2020 tak 2.1 million tak reach kar jayegi. 1990s k end se Dublin mein large scale migration hui hai specially European Union countries se jin mein UK, Poland aur Lithuania shamil hain. Europe k bahar se bhi migration ho rahi hai jin mein Brazil, India, Philippines, China aur Nigeria notable hain. Country k doosre parts k comparison mein Dublin mein migration ka aik bara proportion hai. Ireland ki Asian population ka 60% Dublin mein reside karta hai. 2006 k mutabiq Dublin ki population ka 15% foreign-born tha. Great Recession k dauran unemployment ki wajah se foreign-born migrants ki count mein decrease aaya. Capital doosre countries se non-Catholic immigrants ko sab se bare proportion mein attract karta hai. Ireland mein secularization increase honay ki wajah se Dublin mein regular Catholic Church attendance jo 1970s k according 90% se ziada thi, woh 2011 k survey k mutabiq kam ho kar 14% ho gai hai. 2011 k census k mutabiq Dublin ki 90% population white thi (jismein 400,749 white Irish [78%], 57,748 other white [11%] aur 1,923 white Irish Travellers shamil thay), 1% black aur 4% Asian. Religion k hisaab se 75% Catholic, 10% other religions jabke 14% non-religious ya religion specify nahi kiya. Republic of Ireland ka main religion Christianity hai jismein Catholic Church dominant hai. 2016 k census k according 78% (3.7 million) people ki identification Catholic k tor par ki gayi hai. Doosra sab se bara religious group Church of Ireland (Anglicanism) hai. 20th century mein iski popularity mein kami aayi but recently ismein increase hua hai. Teesra sab se bara religious group Islam hai. 2016 mein Ireland mein 63,400 (1.33%) Muslims thay. Republic of Ireland ka dominant religion Christianity hai. Neeche Dublin mein located kuch important Cathedrals aur churches hain. Republic of Ireland mein state-owned postal services provider company hai. Postal Department ka head office General Post Office, Dublin mein hai. Mail delivery k liye Dublin ko districts mein divide kiya gaya hai. Dublin postal districts Republic of Ireland k postal system An Post mein use hotay hain. Yeh naye national postcode system mein include kiye gaye jo 2015 mein fully implement ho gaya tha. Naye system k under Dublin area ko original D01 se D24 tak areas mein include kiya gaya hai. Present time mein postal districts marketing system mein city k kisi part ko identify karne k liye bhi use ho rahe hain.
RTÉ Radio k host hone k ilawa Dublin mein kai national radio networks bhi hain jin mein Today FM aur Newstalk aur local stations shamil hain. City mein commercial radio stations mein 4FM (94.9 MHz), Dublin 98FM (98.1 MHz), Radio Nova 100FM (100.3 MHz), Q102 (102.2 MHz), Spin 1038 (103.8 MHz), FM104 (104.4 MHz), Sunshine 106.8 (106.8 MHz) shamil hain. Bohot se community aur special interest stations bhi available hain jin mein Dublin City FM (103.2 MHz), Dublin South FM (93.9 MHz), Liffey Sound FM (96.4 MHz), Near FM (90.3 MHz) aur Raidió na Life (106.4 MHz) mentionable hain. Dublin mein active telecom companies mein Eir, Meteor, Vodafone shamil hain. Irish Times aur Irish Independent national newspapers hain jinka head office Dublin mein hai jabke kai local newspapers jese The Evening Herald bhi yahan se publish hotay hain.
Croke Park Republic of Ireland ka largest stadium hai. Yeh Gaelic Athletic Association ka headquarter bhi hai. Ismein 82,300 logon ki seating capacity hai. Yeh Barcelona k Camp Nou aur London k Wembley Stadium k baad Europe ka third largest stadium hai. 1972 mein Muhammad Ali ka fight yahin hua tha. Yeh 2003 k Special Olympics ki opening aur closing ceremonies ka host bhi tha. Ismein conference aur banquet facilities bhi available hain. Lansdowne Road ki reconstruction k time Croke Park Irish Rugby Union team aur Ireland national football team ka host bhi raha. Gaelic Athletic Association aik Irish international amateur sports aur cultural organization hai, jiski focus local Gaelic sports ko promote karne par hai, jismein traditional Irish games, camogie, Gaelic football, Gaelic handball aur rounders etc. shamil hain. Organization Irish music aur dance aur Irish language ko bhi promote karti hai. Lansdowne Road Stadium 1874 mein build hua. Lansdowne Road Dublin mein aik stadium tha jo Irish Rugby Football Union ki ownership mein tha. Yeh mainly Rugby Union aur Association Football k matches k liye use hota tha. 2007 mein isay demolish kar k naya Aviva Stadium banaya gaya jiska inauguration 2010 mein hua. Stadium ka name iske adjoining road se liya gaya hai. Aviva Stadium 2011 UEFA Europa League Final ka host tha. Rugby Union team Leinster Rugby apne matches Aviva Stadium mein khelti hai. Iske ilawa doosre sports competitions bhi yahan hotay hain. County Dublin Ireland League ki six teams ka home hai. Tallaght Stadium Tallaght, South Dublin, Republic of Ireland mein aik Association Football stadium hai jahan football k mostly matches hotay hain. Iske ilawa Tolka Park aur Carlisle Grounds bhi football k matches k liye use hotay hain. Dublin mein do One-Day International cricket grounds hain: aik Clontarf Cricket Club Ground aur doosra Malahide Cricket Club. Clontarf Cricket Club Ground mein pehla ODI cricket match 21 May 1999 ko hua jo Cricket World Cup 1999 ka part tha. Yeh Bangladesh national cricket team aur West Indies cricket team k beech khela gaya. College Park Trinity College, Dublin, Republic of Ireland mein aik cricket ground hai. 2000 mein yahan Ireland Women's cricket team aur Pakistan Women's cricket team k beech aik Test cricket match khela gaya. 2009 mein The Vineyard Cricket Ground mein Ireland Women's cricket team aur Pakistan National Women's cricket team k beech Women's Twenty20 International hua, jismein Ireland ki ladies ne 9 wickets se jeet hasil ki. 1980 se Dublin Marathon marathon ka aik annual 26.2 miles (42.2 km) long competition hai jo Dublin, Republic of Ireland mein har saal October k last Sunday ko hota hai. 1983 se Dublin Women's Mini Marathon bhi June k first Monday ko hoti hai. Shelbourne Park Dublin k suburban area Ringsend mein aik greyhound racing stadium hai. Leopardstown Racecourse Leopardstown, Dún Laoghaire–Rathdown mein Dublin city se 8 km south mein located aik Irish horse racing venue hai. National Stadium specifically boxing k liye banaya gaya national stadium hai. Basketball k liye National Basketball Arena Tallaght, South Dublin mein available hai. National Aquatic Centre Blanchardstown, Dublin, Republic of Ireland mein aik indoor aquatic centre hai.
Republic of Ireland ki official languages Irish aur English hain, jabke national language Irish hai. Dublin area mein 34 Irish-language primary schools aur 10 Irish-language secondary schools mein 12,950 students parhte hain. Dublin mein Irish-medium schools ki count country mein sab se ziada hai. Do Irish-language radio stations k studios city mein available hain. City mein bohot se doosre radio stations per week aik ghanta Irish-language programs broadcast karte hain. Capital mein Irish language institutions ki aik bari tadad bhi maujood hai.
Woh document jo koi company paise borrow karte waqt deti hai, debenture kehlata hai. Yeh loan aur interest pay karne ka written agreement hota hai. Is document ki registration 21 days k andar registrar k office mein honi essential hai. Company k bankrupt hone ki situation mein bhi in documents k amounts ki payment priority par rakhi jaati hai jabke share (stock) holder k funds ki payment secondary consider ki jaati hai. Debenture aur Bond almost aik hi meaning rakhte hain.
District ka chief officer Deputy Commissioner kehlata hai. Pakistan mein is post ki multiple positions hain. Deputy Commissioner Commissioner ka subordinate hota hai aur uske saamne answerable hota hai. Uske under Assistant Commissioner, Revenue Officer, Tehsildar, Magistrate wagaira hotay hain. District officers ki promotion aur demotion k baare mein report karne ka right bhi usay hasil hota hai. Generally ASPs is post par appoint kiye jaate hain. Musharraf hukoomat k local government system k baad iska naam DCO rakh diya gaya hai aur iske powers mein bhi significant reduction ki gai hai. Deputy Commissioner aik powerful officer hai, district ka head hota hai. Uske under district k sab departments hotay hain jese Health Department, Police Department, Agriculture Department, Land Department, Education Department, Sanitation Department (Municipal Committee), Met Department, Judicial Department, WAPDA Department, Industry Department, aur Deputy Commissioner khud Commissioner Division k subordinate hota hai.
Sher mammalian class aur cat family Felidae se belong karte hain. Hindi mein inhein Baagh aur English mein Tiger kehte hain. Apne strong, powerful aur splendid body ki wajah se tigers excellent hunters hotay hain. Tiger ko as a symbol of powerful, brave, cruel aur stone-hearted use kia jata hai. Planet earth per yeh heaviest cat hai. Tiger ka body broad aur powerful hota hai. Adult male ka weight approximately 200 se 320 kg tak aur female ka approximately 120 se 180 kg tak hota hai. Body ki length 140 se 280 cm tak hoti hai. Inka colour yellowish hota hai aur ismein brown ya black stripes hotay hain. Jabke white tiger ka colour white aur black stripes hotay hain. Inmein stripes ki count almost 100 k around hoti hai. Tigers Bangladesh, Bhutan, Cambodia, India, Indonesia, Myanmar, Malaysia, Nepal, North Korea, Thailand, Vietnam aur Russia k eastern areas mein paye jaate hain. Tigers bohot achhe swimmers hotay hain. Inka hunting method bilkul cat ki tarah hai. Yeh hide kar k hunt karte hain. Inko 50 kg tak weight utha kar 2 meter high obstacle ko jump karte hue dekha gaya hai. Ziadatar tigers humans ka hunt nahi karte. Aisa bohot hi kam hota hai k tiger apni hunger satisfy karne k liye humans ka hunt karein. Koi restriction na hone ki wajah se tiger skin (ya hide) obtain karne k liye uska 1990 tak bohot hunt kia gaya. Yahan tak k yeh threat develop ho gaya k kahin yeh species hamesha k liye khatam na ho jaye. Ab inke hunting per ban hai. Chunke inki skin kafi valuable hoti hai isliye kuch log inki skin get karne k liye inka hunt karte hain. Maharajas aur aksar nobles in skins ko heavy payment kar k purchase karte hain. Inki backing ki wajah se ab tak in animals ka hunting continue hai. World mein total 6,000 k around hi tiger cubs hain. Agar inke hunting ka process yoon hi chalta raha toh woh din door nahi jab yeh species world se totally disappear ho jayegi.
Spin Boldak, Afghanistan ka border city hai jo Pakistan k city Chaman k border k saath hai. Spin Boldak Pashto word hai jo Spin yaani white aur Boldak yaani desert ka mixture hai, matlab literal meaning white desert k hain. Spin Boldak us road par located hai jo Afghanistan ko Balochistan province k capital Quetta se connect karti hai. Is city mein large numbers mein Noorzai aur Achakzai tribes exist karte hain. Boldak-Wesh border aur Chaman city k across Noorzai aur Achakzai tribes centuries se settled hain, aik tarah se dono tribes ki birthplace hai. Yahan se Noorzai tribe k log Afghanistan, Pakistan aur Iran k doosre areas mein migrate kar gaye.
Panjgur, Balochistan province ka aik district headquarters hai. 1971 mein yeh us time district bana jab Makran Division ko three districts mein divide kiya gaya. Yeh district Iran k border se attached hai. Panjgur mein total 16 Union Councils hain aur iska centre Chitkan hai. Balochistan province ka famous river Rakhshan isi district se guzarta hai. 2005 k estimate k according Panjgur district ki population 350,000 hai. Pakistan ki National Assembly mein Panjgur ko General Abdul Qadir Baloch represent kar rahe hain. Balochistan Assembly mein Panjgur ki two seats hain. 2013 k general elections k baad Panjgur district se National Party k candidates Rehmat Saleh Baloch aur Haji Islam Baloch elect hue. Later on Rehmat Saleh provincial Health Minister bhi appoint hue. Pakistan Peoples Party k Senate member Sabir Baloch ka relation bhi Panjgur se hai. Is area mein paai jane wali dates Pakistan ki sab se tasty aur best dates mani jaati hain.
Mirani Dam Balochistan k Kech district mein Turbat se west ki side 43 km door hai. Yeh dam Pervez Musharraf k govt tenure mein banaya gaya. Dam construction work June 2001 mein start hua aur October 2006 mein complete hua. Iska inauguration November 2006 mein Pervez Musharraf ne kiya. 5.8 billion rupees ka Mirani Dam project 33 thousand acres land ko irrigate karne k liye build kia gaya. Yeh dam Dasht River per Mirani Gorm k location par banaya gaya hai. Dasht River Nahang River aur Kech River se mil kar banti hai. Nahang River Iranian Makran se nikal k Nasirabad k Core Hwaran point par aa kar Kech River se mil jati hai. Kech River 4604 sq miles par hai aur Nahang River 3360 sq miles par hain. In dono rivers ka total catchment area almost 17200 km hai. Dono rivers rain-fed rivers hain aur in mein sirf rain k case mein water aata hai. Mirani Dam ka concept sab se pehle British rulers ne introduce kiya. Britishers Second World War mein Mirani Gorm par aik dam build kar k apni food requirements poora karna chahte thay, but area ka survey karne k baad British rulers ne apna idea postpone kar diya kyunke unke according Mirani Gorm par dam build karne se uske benefits se losses ziada thay. So, Britishers ne Mirani Gorm se le kar coastal city Jiwani tak different distances par char dams build karne ka plan banaya. Britishers k leave karne k baad Pakistan Government ne 1956 mein British survey ko consider karte huay dubara area ko survey kar k 80 feet high dam build karne ka project banaya jo baad mein government change honay ki wajah se postpone ho gaya. Phir 80s mein former Soviet Union ne Mirani Dam build karne mein interest show kiya jis par Government of Pakistan ne consent diya. Later, Russian government ne Pakistan ko yeh advice dete huay project withdraw kar liya k is dam k benefits k comparison mein losses ziada hain. Pervez Musharraf govt ne 2001 mein NESPAK company k survey k baad 80 feet k bajaye 127 feet high dam build karne ka contract DESCON company ko de diya. Local people se consultation na karne par area k log completely protest mein aa gaye. Is dauran Union Council Noudz Nasirabad aur Balicha k ilawa Tehsil Dasht k sab Union Councils ki public ne Federal Government k is decision ko area ki destruction samjha jabke government aur company ki taraf se logon k protest ko ignore karte hue yeh stand liya gaya k yeh sab 'siyasi dukandari' chamkane ki koshishain hain. Doosri taraf government aur company ne public ko yeh assurances di k dam ka water 244 feet se upar nahi jayega, jabke British, Russian aur Government of Pakistan k 1956 k survey k according 80 feet height se area ka northern part doobne ka risk tha, but company ne 127 feet high dam build karne k baad yeh stand liya k backflow water 244 level se aage nahi barhega, lekin 26 June 2007 mein heavy rains k baad dam mein water level 270 feet tak pohnch gaya jiski wajah se dam k backside area mein thousands of acres land underwater aa gayi jisse several people dead aur thousands homeless ho gaye.
Iblees ka name Hebrew word hai but Arabs usay balasa se derived kehte hain jiske meaning 'na-umeed honay k' hain. Chunke Iblees ko Allah se koi hope nahi rahi isliye Iblees kehlaya. Usay Shaitan aur Adoo-Allah God ka enemy bhi kehte hain. Quran uska appearance universe k start se batata hai. Usne Adam aur Hawwa ko mislead kiya aur forbidden tree ka fruit khane ki isliye encouragement di k woh kahin hamesha Jannat mein hi na rahain. Jab Allah ne Adam mein rooh phoonki toh order diya k sab angels usay sajda karein. Sabne sajda kiya but Iblees ne refuse kar diya. Usne kaha k main fire se bana hun aur Adam dust se. Is par usay outcast kar diya gaya. Usne Allah se Judgment Day tak ki respite maangi jo de di gayi aur logon ko mislead karne ki power bhi de di gayi. Bible mein bhi yeh story almost isi tarah mention hai. Allama Zamakhshari usay Jinn maante hain. Kyunke Quran mein hai: Kaan min al-Jinn (Woh Jinn tha), but bohot se ulema usay angel maante hain. Aur kuch ulema ne yeh bhi kaha k Jinn bhi angels mein shamil thay jo Jannat k guards thay. Magar Jinn Nari-Samoom se create kiye gaye. Aur angels light se created hue. Starting mein Jinn zameen par rehte thay. Woh aapas mein fight karne lage toh Allah ne Iblees ko unke paas bheja. Kuch traditions se yeh bhi prove hota hai k Iblees terrestrial Jinns se tha. Eventually, Shaitan aur uske companions ko Jahannam mein phenk diya jayega. Woh apne friends se kahega k tum par curse ho. Ab tum hamesha Jahannam mein raho. Shaitan sons of Adam ko mislead karne mein busy rehta hai. Magar good people par uska control nahi chal sakta. Quran mein sab se pehle uska mention Surah Baqarah k third Ruku mein aata hai. Jahan beginning of creation aur Sajda-e-Adam ka zikr hai. Beginning of creation k statement mein usay Iblees aur doosri places par Shaitan k word se yaad kiya gaya hai. Lekin Holy Quran mein Shaitan ki plural form bhi aayi hai. Isse pata chalta hai k uska poora group hai. Quran mein Taghoot meaning Shaitan bhi jagah jagah aaya hai. Iblees ko Abid k naam se bulaya jata tha. Syed Sajjad Al-Hussaini of Qaboola likhte hain k jab Iblees ne Adam (A.S.) ko sajda nahi kiya toh Allah Ta'ala ne Abid ko Darbar-e-Akbari se nikal diya aur keh diya k tum Iblees ho, phir woh Iblees k naam se famous hua. Aur jab Iblees ne Hazrat Adam (A.S.) aur Hawwa (A.S.) ko mislead kiya toh Allah Ta'ala ne Iblees ko cursed tehraya, toh Iblees ko Shaitan kaha La'natullah ala shayatihim (Allah ki la'nat ho Shaitanon per). Toh tab Iblees jahannami tehraya aur Shaitan k supporters bhi jahannami hi hain.
Holidays aur Festivals
Qatar ki UK se 1971 mein independence.
Ottoman Empire (ya Ottoman Caliphate 1517 se 1924 tak) 1299 se 1922 tak rehne wali aik Muslim empire thi jiske rulers Turks thay. Apne peak time mein (16th – 17th century) yeh empire teen continents per spread thi aur South-Eastern Europe, Middle East aur North Africa ka ziadatar hissa uske control mein tha. Is great empire k borders west mein Strait of Gibraltar, east mein Caspian Sea aur Persian Gulf aur north mein Austria k borders, Slovakia aur Crimea (current Ukraine) se south mein Sudan, Somalia aur Yemen tak phele hue thay. Moldova, Transylvania aur Wallachia k vassal regions k ilawa iske 29 provinces thay. Sultanate of Rum k end k baad Anatolia mein anarchy phail gai aur different chieftains apni apni independent states bana kar baith gaye jinhein Ghazi Emirate kaha jata tha. 1300 tak decline ki taraf ja rahi Byzantine Empire Anatolia mein mojood apne ziadatar provinces in Ghazi Emirate k haathon se kho baithi. Inhi emirates mein se aik Western Anatolia mein Söğüt city k area mein thi jiske chieftain Usman I thay. Kaha jaata hai k jab Ertuğrul migrate kar k Anatolia pohnche toh unhone do armies ko aapas mein fight karte dekha jin mein se aik number mein ziada aur doosri kam thi aur apni natural sympathetic nature ki wajah se Ertuğrul ne chhoti army ka saath diya aur 400 horsemen k saath battlefield mein jump kar gaye. Aur defeat k qareeb pohnchnay wali army is sudden help se war ka tide turn karne mein successful ho gayi. Ertuğrul ne jis army ki help ki woh actually Sultanate of Rum ki army thi jo Christians se fight kar rahi thi aur is victory k liye Ertuğrul ki services ko dekhte huay unhein Söğüt city k paas aik fiefdom diya gaya. 1281 mein Ertuğrul ki death k baad is fiefdom ki leadership Usman I k haath mein aayi jinhone 1299 mein Seljuk Sultanate se independence declare kar k Ottoman Empire ki foundation rakhi.
1987 mein Dublin k International Financial Services Centre (IFSC) ki formation se city k liye financial services bhi important ban chuki hain. IFSC program k under business mein 500 se ziada operations approve kiye ja chuke hain. Yeh center world k top 50 banks aur top 20 insurance companies mein se half ko host karta hai.
Ireland mein roads ka network primarily Dublin par focused hai. 2016 TomTom Traffic Index k mutabiq Dublin world ka 15th most congested city aur Europe ka 7th most congested city hai. Dublin mein almost 200 bus routes hain jo city aur suburbs ko cover karte hain. In mein se majority Dublin Bus k under operate karti hain, however, kai small companies bhi yahan work kar rahi hain. Fare usually distance k basis par liya jata hai. City k liye proposed Eastern Bypass ka pehla phase Dublin Port Tunnel hai jiska official opening 2006 mein hua tha. Yeh usually heavy vehicles k liye use hota hai. Yeh tunnel Dublin Port ko M1 Motorway se Dublin Airport k qareeb connect karti hai. City aik inner aur outer orbital route se ghira hua hai. Inner orbital route Georgian Dublin k heart k aas paas chalta hai aur outer orbital route basically Dublin ki do canals, Grand Canal aur Royal Canal k around banay natural circle k saath saath chalta hai. M50 Motorway Dublin mein aik semi-circular motorway hai jo Ireland ki busiest motorway hai. Current route 1983 se 2010 k dauran 27 saalon mein different sections mein build kia gaya. Ye Dublin Port se start ho k north mein Dublin Port Tunnel se hotay huay airport motorway k aik part k saath chalta hai. Us k baad yeh west mein turn karta hai aur M1 Motorway se junction banata hai aur Dublin k northern, western aur southern suburbs k gird ghoomta hai. Yeh south-east Dilyn Shankill, Dublin k point par end hota hai. M1 Motorway Republic of Ireland mein aik motorway hai. Yeh N1 ka major part form karta hai aur Island of Ireland k east mein Dublin ko Belfast se connect karta hai. National Transport Authority Greater Dublin area k liye Transport Authority aur Ireland k liye Licensing Agency hai. NTA Dublin mein travelers k liye Leap Card bhi issue karti hai jo Dublin k public transport services mein sab k liye use ho sakti hai. Dublin Bus Republic of Ireland k capital Dublin mein bus services provide karti hai. Yeh Córas Iompair Éireann ki subsidiary company hai. 2017 mein 139.4 million passengers ne Dublin Bus se travel kia. Iarnród Éireann, jise Irish Rail bhi kehte hain, Republic of Ireland ki national railway network operator hai. Yeh Córas Iompair Éireann ki subsidiary company hai aur isko 2 February 1987 ko establish kia gaya tha. Dublin mein Iarnród Éireann k under do main railway stations hain: Heuston Railway Station aur Dublin Connolly Railway Station. Heuston Railway Station Republic of Ireland k main railway stations mein se aik hai jo capital Dublin ko south, south-west aur west se connect karta hai. Dublin Connolly Railway Station Republic of Ireland k main railway stations mein se aik hai jo Dublin mein located hai. Yeh Dublin ko country k north, north-west, south-east aur south-west se connect karta hai. Dublin Area Rapid Transit (DART), jise commonly iske abbreviation DART se jaana jaata hai, aik electric transport railway network hai jo Republic of Ireland k capital Dublin k coast aur city centre ko services deta hai. 2013 mein DART aur Dublin Suburban Lines k liye passengers 16 million aur 11.7 million thay jo Irish Rail k passengers ka almost 75% hai. Luas Republic of Ireland k capital Dublin mein tram/light rail system hai. Iski do main lines hain: Green Line, jisne 30 June 2004 ko operations start kiye aur Red Line jiska inauguration 26 September 2004 ko hua. Us time se dono lines ki different branches mein extension aur division ki gai hai. Is system mein ab 67 stations hain aur iski length 36.5 km (22.7 miles) hai. 2017 mein ispar 37.6 million passengers ne travel kiya jo 2016 k comparison mein 10% increase tha. Dublin Suburban Rail aik railway network hai jo Dublin, Republic of Ireland, mostly Greater Dublin area aur outer towns jaise Drogheda, Dundalk aur County Louth ko services deta hai. TFI Leap Card Dublin mein 12 December 2011 ko introduce kiya gaya aik integrated ticketing system hai. Yeh aik prepaid card hai jo Dublin Bus, Dublin Area Rapid Transit, Bus Éireann, Iarnród Éireann, Swords Express, Ashbourne Connect, Collins Coaches, Matthews.ie, City Direct, Wexford Bus aur Luas k liye use ho sakta hai. Cash k comparison mein Leap Card k saath fare payment relatively kam hoti hai. Dublin Bus k liye Leap Card ka use cash prices k comparison mein 20-27% kam hota hai. For example, 1 December 2017 se Dublin Bus use karte hue 4-13 stage ka cash fare 2.85 Euros banta hai jabke Leap Card se yeh 2.15 Euros hoga. Is tarah Luas aur DART mein bhi Leap Card use karne se savings hoti hain. Agar aap apne TFI Leap Card se 1 din ya 1 week (Monday - Sunday) mein bohot se journeys karte hain toh Dublin Bus, Luas, DART aur Commuter Rail mein aik specific price cap tak pohnchnay k baad aapse further fare charge nahi kiya jayega. Cap tak pohnchnay k baad us din ya week free travel kar sakte hain. Dublin Port Dublin, Republic of Ireland mein aik port hai. Ireland k port transport ka almost two-thirds part isi port se hota hai. Yeh Island of Ireland ki busiest port hai. Dublin Connolly Railway Station bus k through Dublin Port se connected hai jahan se yeh Irish Ferries se UK k Holyhead Railway Station se connected hai, wahan se North Wales Coast Line k through Chester Railway Station aur Euston Railway Station tak jaya ja sakta hai. Dublin Port aik ferry terminus bhi hai. Irish Ferries aik marine transport company hai jo Ireland, UK aur Continental Europe k beech passenger aur cargo services deti hai. Yeh Irish Continental Group ka part hai aur iski trading Irish Stock Exchange aur London Stock Exchange par hoti hai. Dublin Airport Republic of Ireland ka aik international airport hai jo capital Dublin ko air services provide karta hai. Airport Dublin k north mein 10 km (6.2 miles) k distance par Collinstown, Fingal mein situated hai. Aer Lingus Ireland ki airline hai. Aer Lingus ka main office Ireland k airport Dublin Airport per hai. Ryanair Republic of Ireland ki airline hai. Ryanair ka head office Ireland k Dublin Airport par hai. Stobart Air Republic of Ireland ki aik regional airline hai jo Aer Arann k naam se operate karti hai aur iska Head Office Dublin mein situated hai. Casement Aerodrome Dublin, Republic of Ireland k south-west mein aik military airport hai. Dublin City Council ne 1990s mein pooray city mein cycle lanes aur tracks banana start kiye aur 2012 tak city mein dedicated cycle paths aur off-road trails ki total length 200 km (120 miles) thi. 2011 mein city world k cycle-friendly cities ki list mein 9th number per tha, but 2015 mein yeh kam ho kar 15th number par aa gaya. Dublin Bikes aik public rental bicycle scheme hai jo 2009 se Dublin city mein operate kar rahi hai. Initially is scheme ko 450 French bicycles aur 40 stations k saath launch kiya gaya tha. 2011 tak isko 550 bicycles aur 44 stations tak extend kiya gaya, 2013 mein iski further expansion hui aur isay 950 bicycles aur 58 rental stations tak increase kar diya gaya.
Dublin Ireland mein education k main centers mein se aik hai, jahan teen universities hain, Dublin Institute of Technology aur baaki high education institutions bhi yahan hain. City aur suburbs mein 20 third-level educational institutions hain. Dublin 2012 mein Science ka European Capital tha. University of Dublin 16th century mein establish hone wali Ireland ki oldest university hai, yeh city k centre mein located hai. Trinity College 1592 mein Elizabeth I k royal order se founded kiya gaya. Yeh city k middle mein College Green mein hai, ismein 15,000 students parhte hain. National University of Ireland ka main campus Dublin mein hai jo related constituent university University College Dublin ka location hai jismein 30,000 se ziada students hain. 1854 mein founded honay wali university ab Ireland ki biggest university hai. Dublin Institute of Technology 1887 mein established hone wala Dublin ka primary aur Ireland ka largest research aur technology education institute hai jahan 23,000 se ziada students study karte hain. Dublin Institute of Technology engineering, architecture, science, health, journalism, digital media, hospitality aur business mein specialise karta hai, iske ilawa art, design, music aur humanities k programs bhi offer karta hai. Grangegorman mein aik naye campus ka launch bhi hua hai. Dublin City University, jiska pehla naam National Institute for Higher Education tha, business, engineering, science, communications, linguistics aur basic education mein courses offer karti hai. Ismein almost 16,000 students study karte hain. Royal College of Surgeons in Ireland National University of Ireland ka approved medical college hai jo city k center mein St. Stephen's Green mein hai. Dublin Business School Ireland ka largest private third-level institution hai jismein 9,000 se ziada students hain. National College of Art and Design art, design aur media mein training aur research services provide karta hai. National College of Ireland bhi Dublin mein located hai. Economic and Social Research Institute aik social science research institution hai. Irish Public Administration aur Management Training Centre Dublin mein hai, Public Administration Institute University of Ireland k through graduate aur postgraduate awards offer kar raha hai. Iske ilawa kuch small specialist colleges bhi hain jese Griffith College Dublin, Gaiety School of Acting aur New Media Technology College. City k suburban areas South Dublin mein Tallaght aur Dún Laoghaire–Rathdown mein regional colleges hain: Institute of Technology, Tallaght mein full-time aur part-time technical subjects ki aik wide range mein courses hain aur Dún Laoghaire Institute of Art, Design and Technology art, design, business, psychology aur media technology mein training aur research education provide karta hai. Western suburban area Blanchardstown mein Institute of Technology, Blanchardstown mein languages aur technical subjects k saath saath childcare aur sport management courses bhi offer kiye jaate hain.
Dublin city Dublin City Council k under manage hota hai, but term Dublin mein adjoining local authority areas Dún Laoghaire–Rathdown, Fingal aur South Dublin bhi include hain. Yeh charon areas mil k traditional County Dublin banate hain. Sometimes yeh area Dublin Region k naam se bhi jaana jata hai. 2016 k census k according City Council k under managed area ki population 553,165 thi, jabke urban area ki population 1,173,179 thi. County Dublin ki population 1,273,069 aur Greater Dublin area ki population 1,904,806 persons par based thi. Area ki population rapidly increase ho rahi hai aur Central Statistics Office k estimate k mutabiq yeh 2020 tak 2.1 million tak reach kar jayegi. 1990s k end se Dublin mein large scale migration hui hai specially European Union countries se jin mein UK, Poland aur Lithuania shamil hain. Europe k bahar se bhi migration ho rahi hai jin mein Brazil, India, Philippines, China aur Nigeria notable hain. Country k doosre parts k comparison mein Dublin mein migration ka aik bara proportion hai. Ireland ki Asian population ka 60% Dublin mein reside karta hai. 2006 k mutabiq Dublin ki population ka 15% foreign-born tha. Great Recession k dauran unemployment ki wajah se foreign-born migrants ki count mein decrease aaya. Capital doosre countries se non-Catholic immigrants ko sab se bare proportion mein attract karta hai. Ireland mein secularization increase honay ki wajah se Dublin mein regular Catholic Church attendance jo 1970s k according 90% se ziada thi, woh 2011 k survey k mutabiq kam ho kar 14% ho gai hai. 2011 k census k mutabiq Dublin ki 90% population white thi (jismein 400,749 white Irish [78%], 57,748 other white [11%] aur 1,923 white Irish Travellers shamil thay), 1% black aur 4% Asian. Religion k hisaab se 75% Catholic, 10% other religions jabke 14% non-religious ya religion specify nahi kiya. Republic of Ireland ka main religion Christianity hai jismein Catholic Church dominant hai. 2016 k census k according 78% (3.7 million) people ki identification Catholic k tor par ki gayi hai. Doosra sab se bara religious group Church of Ireland (Anglicanism) hai. 20th century mein iski popularity mein kami aayi but recently ismein increase hua hai. Teesra sab se bara religious group Islam hai. 2016 mein Ireland mein 63,400 (1.33%) Muslims thay. Republic of Ireland ka dominant religion Christianity hai. Neeche Dublin mein located kuch important Cathedrals aur churches hain. Republic of Ireland mein state-owned postal services provider company hai. Postal Department ka head office General Post Office, Dublin mein hai. Mail delivery k liye Dublin ko districts mein divide kiya gaya hai. Dublin postal districts Republic of Ireland k postal system An Post mein use hotay hain. Yeh naye national postcode system mein include kiye gaye jo 2015 mein fully implement ho gaya tha. Naye system k under Dublin area ko original D01 se D24 tak areas mein include kiya gaya hai. Present time mein postal districts marketing system mein city k kisi part ko identify karne k liye bhi use ho rahe hain.
RTÉ Radio k host hone k ilawa Dublin mein kai national radio networks bhi hain jin mein Today FM aur Newstalk aur local stations shamil hain. City mein commercial radio stations mein 4FM (94.9 MHz), Dublin 98FM (98.1 MHz), Radio Nova 100FM (100.3 MHz), Q102 (102.2 MHz), Spin 1038 (103.8 MHz), FM104 (104.4 MHz), Sunshine 106.8 (106.8 MHz) shamil hain.
