Bohot se community aur special interest stations bhi available hain jin mein Dublin City FM (103.2 MHz), Dublin South FM (93.9 MHz), Liffey Sound FM (96.4 MHz), Near FM (90.3 MHz) aur Raidió na Life (106.4 MHz) mentionable hain. Dublin mein active telecom companies mein Eir, Meteor, Vodafone shamil hain. Irish Times aur Irish Independent national newspapers hain jinka head office Dublin mein hai jabke kai local newspapers jese The Evening Herald bhi yahan se publish hotay hain.
Croke Park Republic of Ireland ka largest stadium hai. Yeh Gaelic Athletic Association ka headquarter bhi hai. Ismein 82,300 logon ki seating capacity hai. Yeh Barcelona k Camp Nou aur London k Wembley Stadium k baad Europe ka third largest stadium hai. 1972 mein Muhammad Ali ka fight yahin hua tha. Yeh 2003 k Special Olympics ki opening aur closing ceremonies ka host bhi tha. Ismein conference aur banquet facilities bhi available hain. Lansdowne Road ki reconstruction k time Croke Park Irish Rugby Union team aur Ireland national football team ka host bhi raha. Gaelic Athletic Association aik Irish international amateur sports aur cultural organization hai, jiski focus local Gaelic sports ko promote karne par hai, jismein traditional Irish games, camogie, Gaelic football, Gaelic handball aur rounders etc. shamil hain. Organization Irish music aur dance aur Irish language ko bhi promote karti hai. Lansdowne Road Stadium 1874 mein build hua. Lansdowne Road Dublin mein aik stadium tha jo Irish Rugby Football Union ki ownership mein tha. Yeh mainly Rugby Union aur Association Football k matches k liye use hota tha. 2007 mein isay demolish kar k naya Aviva Stadium banaya gaya jiska inauguration 2010 mein hua. Stadium ka name iske adjoining road se liya gaya hai. Aviva Stadium 2011 UEFA Europa League Final ka host tha. Rugby Union team Leinster Rugby apne matches Aviva Stadium mein khelti hai. Iske ilawa doosre sports competitions bhi yahan hotay hain. County Dublin Ireland League ki six teams ka home hai. Tallaght Stadium Tallaght, South Dublin, Republic of Ireland mein aik Association Football stadium hai jahan football k mostly matches hotay hain. Iske ilawa Tolka Park aur Carlisle Grounds bhi football k matches k liye use hotay hain. Dublin mein do One-Day International cricket grounds hain: aik Clontarf Cricket Club Ground aur doosra Malahide Cricket Club. Clontarf Cricket Club Ground mein pehla ODI cricket match 21 May 1999 ko hua jo Cricket World Cup 1999 ka part tha. Yeh Bangladesh national cricket team aur West Indies cricket team k beech khela gaya. College Park Trinity College, Dublin, Republic of Ireland mein aik cricket ground hai. 2000 mein yahan Ireland Women's cricket team aur Pakistan Women's cricket team k beech aik Test cricket match khela gaya. 2009 mein The Vineyard Cricket Ground mein Ireland Women's cricket team aur Pakistan National Women's cricket team k beech Women's Twenty20 International hua, jismein Ireland ki ladies ne 9 wickets se jeet hasil ki. 1980 se Dublin Marathon marathon ka aik annual 26.2 miles (42.2 km) long competition hai jo Dublin, Republic of Ireland mein har saal October k last Sunday ko hota hai. 1983 se Dublin Women's Mini Marathon bhi June k first Monday ko hoti hai. Shelbourne Park Dublin k suburban area Ringsend mein aik greyhound racing stadium hai. Leopardstown Racecourse Leopardstown, Dún Laoghaire–Rathdown mein Dublin city se 8 km south mein located aik Irish horse racing venue hai. National Stadium specifically boxing k liye banaya gaya national stadium hai. Basketball k liye National Basketball Arena Tallaght, South Dublin mein available hai. National Aquatic Centre Blanchardstown, Dublin, Republic of Ireland mein aik indoor aquatic centre hai.
Republic of Ireland ki official languages Irish aur English hain, jabke national language Irish hai. Dublin area mein 34 Irish-language primary schools aur 10 Irish-language secondary schools mein 12,950 students parhte hain. Dublin mein Irish-medium schools ki count country mein sab se ziada hai. Do Irish-language radio stations k studios city mein available hain. City mein bohot se doosre radio stations per week aik ghanta Irish-language programs broadcast karte hain. Capital mein Irish language institutions ki aik bari tadad bhi maujood hai.
Woh document jo koi company paise borrow karte waqt deti hai, debenture kehlata hai. Yeh loan aur interest pay karne ka written agreement hota hai. Is document ki registration 21 days k andar registrar k office mein honi essential hai. Company k bankrupt hone ki situation mein bhi in documents k amounts ki payment priority par rakhi jaati hai jabke share (stock) holder k funds ki payment secondary consider ki jaati hai. Debenture aur Bond almost aik hi meaning rakhte hain.
District ka chief officer Deputy Commissioner kehlata hai. Pakistan mein is post ki multiple positions hain. Deputy Commissioner Commissioner ka subordinate hota hai aur uske saamne answerable hota hai. Uske under Assistant Commissioner, Revenue Officer, Tehsildar, Magistrate wagaira hotay hain. District officers ki promotion aur demotion k baare mein report karne ka right bhi usay hasil hota hai. Generally ASPs is post par appoint kiye jaate hain. Musharraf hukoomat k local government system k baad iska naam DCO rakh diya gaya hai aur iske powers mein bhi significant reduction ki gai hai. Deputy Commissioner aik powerful officer hai, district ka head hota hai. Uske under district k sab departments hotay hain jese Health Department, Police Department, Agriculture Department, Land Department, Education Department, Sanitation Department (Municipal Committee), Met Department, Judicial Department, WAPDA Department, Industry Department, aur Deputy Commissioner khud Commissioner Division k subordinate hota hai.
Sher mammalian class aur cat family Felidae se belong karte hain. Hindi mein inhein Baagh aur English mein Tiger kehte hain. Apne strong, powerful aur splendid body ki wajah se tigers excellent hunters hotay hain. Tiger ko as a symbol of powerful, brave, cruel aur stone-hearted use kia jata hai. Planet earth per yeh heaviest cat hai. Tiger ka body broad aur powerful hota hai. Adult male ka weight approximately 200 se 320 kg tak aur female ka approximately 120 se 180 kg tak hota hai. Body ki length 140 se 280 cm tak hoti hai. Inka colour yellowish hota hai aur ismein brown ya black stripes hotay hain. Jabke white tiger ka colour white aur black stripes hotay hain. Inmein stripes ki count almost 100 k around hoti hai. Tigers Bangladesh, Bhutan, Cambodia, India, Indonesia, Myanmar, Malaysia, Nepal, North Korea, Thailand, Vietnam aur Russia k eastern areas mein paye jaate hain. Tigers bohot achhe swimmers hotay hain. Inka hunting method bilkul cat ki tarah hai. Yeh hide kar k hunt karte hain. Inko 50 kg tak weight utha kar 2 meter high obstacle ko jump karte hue dekha gaya hai. Ziadatar tigers humans ka hunt nahi karte. Aisa bohot hi kam hota hai k tiger apni hunger satisfy karne k liye humans ka hunt karein. Koi restriction na hone ki wajah se tiger skin (ya hide) obtain karne k liye uska 1990 tak bohot hunt kia gaya. Yahan tak k yeh threat develop ho gaya k kahin yeh species hamesha k liye khatam na ho jaye. Ab inke hunting per ban hai. Chunke inki skin kafi valuable hoti hai isliye kuch log inki skin get karne k liye inka hunt karte hain. Maharajas aur aksar nobles in skins ko heavy payment kar k purchase karte hain. Inki backing ki wajah se ab tak in animals ka hunting continue hai. World mein total 6,000 k around hi tiger cubs hain. Agar inke hunting ka process yoon hi chalta raha toh woh din door nahi jab yeh species world se totally disappear ho jayegi.
Spin Boldak, Afghanistan ka border city hai jo Pakistan k city Chaman k border k saath hai. Spin Boldak Pashto word hai jo Spin yaani white aur Boldak yaani desert ka mixture hai, matlab literal meaning white desert k hain. Spin Boldak us road par located hai jo Afghanistan ko Balochistan province k capital Quetta se connect karti hai. Is city mein large numbers mein Noorzai aur Achakzai tribes exist karte hain. Boldak-Wesh border aur Chaman city k across Noorzai aur Achakzai tribes centuries se settled hain, aik tarah se dono tribes ki birthplace hai. Yahan se Noorzai tribe k log Afghanistan, Pakistan aur Iran k doosre areas mein migrate kar gaye.
Panjgur, Balochistan province ka aik district headquarters hai. 1971 mein yeh us time district bana jab Makran Division ko three districts mein divide kiya gaya. Yeh district Iran k border se attached hai. Panjgur mein total 16 Union Councils hain aur iska centre Chitkan hai. Balochistan province ka famous river Rakhshan isi district se guzarta hai. 2005 k estimate k according Panjgur district ki population 350,000 hai. Pakistan ki National Assembly mein Panjgur ko General Abdul Qadir Baloch represent kar rahe hain. Balochistan Assembly mein Panjgur ki two seats hain. 2013 k general elections k baad Panjgur district se National Party k candidates Rehmat Saleh Baloch aur Haji Islam Baloch elect hue. Later on Rehmat Saleh provincial Health Minister bhi appoint hue. Pakistan Peoples Party k Senate member Sabir Baloch ka relation bhi Panjgur se hai. Is area mein paai jane wali dates Pakistan ki sab se tasty aur best dates mani jaati hain.
Mirani Dam Balochistan k Kech district mein Turbat se west ki side 43 km door hai. Yeh dam Pervez Musharraf k govt tenure mein banaya gaya. Dam construction work June 2001 mein start hua aur October 2006 mein complete hua. Iska inauguration November 2006 mein Pervez Musharraf ne kiya. 5.8 billion rupees ka Mirani Dam project 33 thousand acres land ko irrigate karne k liye build kia gaya. Yeh dam Dasht River per Mirani Gorm k location par banaya gaya hai. Dasht River Nahang River aur Kech River se mil kar banti hai. Nahang River Iranian Makran se nikal k Nasirabad k Core Hwaran point par aa kar Kech River se mil jati hai. Kech River 4604 sq miles par hai aur Nahang River 3360 sq miles par hain. In dono rivers ka total catchment area almost 17200 km hai. Dono rivers rain-fed rivers hain aur in mein sirf rain k case mein water aata hai. Mirani Dam ka concept sab se pehle British rulers ne introduce kiya. Britishers Second World War mein Mirani Gorm par aik dam build kar k apni food requirements poora karna chahte thay, but area ka survey karne k baad British rulers ne apna idea postpone kar diya kyunke unke according Mirani Gorm par dam build karne se uske benefits se losses ziada thay. So, Britishers ne Mirani Gorm se le kar coastal city Jiwani tak different distances par char dams build karne ka plan banaya. Britishers k leave karne k baad Pakistan Government ne 1956 mein British survey ko consider karte huay dubara area ko survey kar k 80 feet high dam build karne ka project banaya jo baad mein government change honay ki wajah se postpone ho gaya. Phir 80s mein former Soviet Union ne Mirani Dam build karne mein interest show kiya jis par Government of Pakistan ne consent diya. Later, Russian government ne Pakistan ko yeh advice dete huay project withdraw kar liya k is dam k benefits k comparison mein losses ziada hain. Pervez Musharraf govt ne 2001 mein NESPAK company k survey k baad 80 feet k bajaye 127 feet high dam build karne ka contract DESCON company ko de diya. Local people se consultation na karne par area k log completely protest mein aa gaye. Is dauran Union Council Noudz Nasirabad aur Balicha k ilawa Tehsil Dasht k sab Union Councils ki public ne Federal Government k is decision ko area ki destruction samjha jabke government aur company ki taraf se logon k protest ko ignore karte hue yeh stand liya gaya k yeh sab 'siyasi dukandari' chamkane ki koshishain hain. Doosri taraf government aur company ne public ko yeh assurances di k dam ka water 244 feet se upar nahi jayega, jabke British, Russian aur Government of Pakistan k 1956 k survey k according 80 feet height se area ka northern part doobne ka risk tha, but company ne 127 feet high dam build karne k baad yeh stand liya k backflow water 244 level se aage nahi barhega, lekin 26 June 2007 mein heavy rains k baad dam mein water level 270 feet tak pohnch gaya jiski wajah se dam k backside area mein thousands of acres land underwater aa gayi jisse several people dead aur thousands homeless ho gaye.
Iblees ka name Hebrew word hai but Arabs usay balasa se derived kehte hain jiske meaning 'na-umeed honay k' hain. Chunke Iblees ko Allah se koi hope nahi rahi isliye Iblees kehlaya. Usay Shaitan aur Adoo-Allah God ka enemy bhi kehte hain. Quran uska appearance universe k start se batata hai. Usne Adam aur Hawwa ko mislead kiya aur forbidden tree ka fruit khane ki isliye encouragement di k woh kahin hamesha Jannat mein hi na rahain. Jab Allah ne Adam mein rooh phoonki toh order diya k sab angels usay sajda karein. Sabne sajda kiya but Iblees ne refuse kar diya. Usne kaha k main fire se bana hun aur Adam dust se. Is par usay outcast kar diya gaya. Usne Allah se Judgment Day tak ki respite maangi jo de di gayi aur logon ko mislead karne ki power bhi de di gayi. Bible mein bhi yeh story almost isi tarah mention hai. Allama Zamakhshari usay Jinn maante hain. Kyunke Quran mein hai: Kaan min al-Jinn (Woh Jinn tha), but bohot se ulema usay angel maante hain. Aur kuch ulema ne yeh bhi kaha k Jinn bhi angels mein shamil thay jo Jannat k guards thay. Magar Jinn Nari-Samoom se create kiye gaye. Aur angels light se created hue. Starting mein Jinn zameen par rehte thay. Woh aapas mein fight karne lage toh Allah ne Iblees ko unke paas bheja. Kuch traditions se yeh bhi prove hota hai k Iblees terrestrial Jinns se tha. Eventually, Shaitan aur uske companions ko Jahannam mein phenk diya jayega. Woh apne friends se kahega k tum par curse ho. Ab tum hamesha Jahannam mein raho. Shaitan sons of Adam ko mislead karne mein busy rehta hai. Magar good people par uska control nahi chal sakta. Quran mein sab se pehle uska mention Surah Baqarah k third Ruku mein aata hai. Jahan beginning of creation aur Sajda-e-Adam ka zikr hai. Beginning of creation k statement mein usay Iblees aur doosri places par Shaitan k word se yaad kiya gaya hai. Lekin Holy Quran mein Shaitan ki plural form bhi aayi hai. Isse pata chalta hai k uska poora group hai. Quran mein Taghoot meaning Shaitan bhi jagah jagah aaya hai. Iblees ko Abid k naam se bulaya jata tha. Syed Sajjad Al-Hussaini of Qaboola likhte hain k jab Iblees ne Adam (A.S.) ko sajda nahi kiya toh Allah Ta'ala ne Abid ko Darbar-e-Akbari se nikal diya aur keh diya k tum Iblees ho, phir woh Iblees k naam se famous hua. Aur jab Iblees ne Hazrat Adam (A.S.) aur Hawwa (A.S.) ko mislead kiya toh Allah Ta'ala ne Iblees ko cursed tehraya, toh Iblees ko Shaitan kaha La'natullah ala shayatihim (Allah ki la'nat ho Shaitanon per). Toh tab Iblees jahannami tehraya aur Shaitan k supporters bhi jahannami hi hain.
Holidays aur Festivals
Qatar ki UK se 1971 mein independence.
Ottoman Empire (ya Ottoman Caliphate 1517 se 1924 tak) 1299 se 1922 tak rehne wali aik Muslim empire thi jiske rulers Turks thay. Apne peak time mein (16th – 17th century) yeh empire teen continents per spread thi aur South-Eastern Europe, Middle East aur North Africa ka ziadatar hissa uske control mein tha. Is great empire k borders west mein Strait of Gibraltar, east mein Caspian Sea aur Persian Gulf aur north mein Austria k borders, Slovakia aur Crimea (current Ukraine) se south mein Sudan, Somalia aur Yemen tak phele hue thay. Moldova, Transylvania aur Wallachia k vassal regions k ilawa iske 29 provinces thay. Sultanate of Rum k end k baad Anatolia mein anarchy phail gai aur different chieftains apni apni independent states bana kar baith gaye jinhein Ghazi Emirate kaha jata tha. 1300 tak decline ki taraf ja rahi Byzantine Empire Anatolia mein mojood apne ziadatar provinces in Ghazi Emirate k haathon se kho baithi. Inhi emirates mein se aik Western Anatolia mein Söğüt city k area mein thi jiske chieftain Usman I thay. Kaha jaata hai k jab Ertuğrul migrate kar k Anatolia pohnche toh unhone do armies ko aapas mein fight karte dekha jin mein se aik number mein ziada aur doosri kam thi aur apni natural sympathetic nature ki wajah se Ertuğrul ne chhoti army ka saath diya aur 400 horsemen k saath battlefield mein jump kar gaye. Aur defeat k qareeb pohnchnay wali army is sudden help se war ka tide turn karne mein successful ho gayi. Ertuğrul ne jis army ki help ki woh actually Sultanate of Rum ki army thi jo Christians se fight kar rahi thi aur is victory k liye Ertuğrul ki services ko dekhte huay unhein Söğüt city k paas aik fiefdom diya gaya. 1281 mein Ertuğrul ki death k baad is fiefdom ki leadership Usman I k haath mein aayi jinhone 1299 mein Seljuk Sultanate se independence declare kar k Ottoman Empire ki foundation rakhi. Usman I ne is chhoti si empire k borders Byzantine Empire ki borders tak spread kar diye aur victory k baad capital Bursa shift kar diya. Usman I Turks mein bohot respect se dekhe jaate hain. Indeed, woh bohot high qualities wale thay. Din k warrior aur raat k worshipper k saath saath bohot noble, simple, hospitable, generous aur kind-hearted person bhi thay. Unka reign Ottoman Empire ki foundations ko strong karne ka reason bana. Yeh Usman I ki rakhi hui strong foundations hi theen k unki demise k baad aik century k andar Ottoman Empire Eastern Mediterranean aur Balkans tak spread ho gayi. Empire ki conquests ka yeh great sequence Usman k successors ne continue rakha, but 1402 mein Timur ne Anatolia par attack kar diya aur Ottoman Sultan Bayezid I defeat hone k baad arrest ho gaye, but yeh Ottomans ka determination tha k unhone apni khatam hoti hui empire ko na sirf restore kiya balkay chand hi decades mein Conquest of Constantinople jaisi history ki greatest victory achieve ki. Isse Ottomans ka prestige worldwide increase hua. Ottoman Empire ki re-establishment ka credit Bayezid I k son Mehmet I ko jaata hai jo apni high moral character aur qualities ki wajah se Turks mein Mehmet Çelebi k naam se jaane jaate hain. Conquest of Constantinople Turks, especially Ottomans, ki history ka golden chapter hai. 29 May 1453 mein 21 saal k young Sultan Mehmed II (Sultan Mehmed the Conqueror) ki leadership mein is army ne incredible achievements karte huay is great city ko conquer kiya aur usay apna capital banaya. Is tarah Mehmed Caesar of Rome ban gaya aur yeh title uske un intentions ko show karta tha k Ottomans jald Rome par bhi kabza kar lenge aur inhi objectives ko achieve karne k liye 1480 mein Ottoman forces Italian Peninsula per utrein aur Otranto aur Apulia k cities par kabza kar liya, but 1481 mein Mehmed the Conqueror ki death k saath hi Conquest of Italy ki campaign end ho gayi. Ottoman history ka yeh period do different eras mein divide kiya ja sakta hai: aik 1566 tak regional, economic aur cultural growth ka era jiske baad military aur political stagnation ka period. 1453 mein Conquest of Constantinople ne South-Eastern Europe aur Eastern Mediterranean regions mein Ottoman Empire k aik great power k tor par emerge hone ki foundation rakhi aur phir 1566 tak Europe, Middle East aur North Africa mein conquests k aik long period ka start hua. In conquests ki wajah army ka standard discipline aur modern military might thi jismein gunpowder k use aur strong navy ka role bohot important tha. State ki economy mein most important role trade ka tha kyunke Europe aur Asia k darmiyan trade k saare land aur sea routes Ottoman Empire se pass hotay thay. Aik k baad aik great Sultans ne empire k borders spread karne mein important role play kiya jin mein Selim I ka name prominent hai jinhone Eastern aur Southern side par attention di aur Safavid Empire k Shah Ismail I ko Battle of Chaldiran mein defeat kiya aur Egypt mein Ottoman rule establish kiya. Selim k successor Suleiman the Magnificent (1520 se 1566) ne west mein empire ko expand kiya aur 1521 mein Belgrade ki conquest k baad 1526 mein Battle of Mohács k through Hungary aur doosre Central European regions mein Ottomans ka dominance establish kar diya. Uske baad unhone 1529 mein Vienna ka siege kiya, but cold weather aur city k residents ki strong resistance ki wajah se yeh siege fail ho gaya. Is tarah Ottoman storm ki waves Vienna ki walls se takra kar wapis aa gain aur Ottoman Empire k borders Central Europe k is city se aage kabhi nahi barh sake. Suleiman k periods mein Transylvania, Wallachia aur Moldova Ottoman Empire k vassals banay. East mein Ottomans ne Iran se Baghdad dobara recover kar liya aur Mesopotamia par kabza kar k Persian Gulf tak naval access gain kar liya.
Waqar Younis Pakistan cricket team ke former captain hain. Aur iss waqt Pakistan cricket team ke Head Coach hain. Waqar Younis ko tez bowling ki waja say Burewala Express kehte hain jinho ne 87 Test matches mein Pakistan ki numaindagi ki jabkay 262 One-Day International matches bhi khele. Aik right-hand fast bowler, Waqar Younis ko ye game khelne wale azeem bowlers mein shumar kiya jaata hai. Woh Pakistani cricket team ke former Head Coach hain. Woh Pakistan ki national cricket team ke former bowling coach bhi hain. 2021 tak, Younis ke paas sab se kam umar Pakistani Test captain aur tareekh ke fourth Test captain (22 saal 15 din) ka record hai. Usne 87 Test aur 262 One-Day matches khele. 1989 se 2003 tak apne international cricket career ke dauran Pakistan ke liye international matches mein Waqar Younis ka trademark unki cricket ball ko tez raftari se reverse swing karne ki ability thi. Usne apne career ke dauran 373 Test aur 416 One-Day International wickets hasil keen. Apne bowling partner Wasim Akram ke saath mil kar, usne duniya ka sabse khofnak bowling attack banaya. Waqar Younis ke paas Dale Steyn ke baad 350 se ziyada Test wickets lene wale kisi bhi bowler ke liye best strike rate hai. Woh One-Day cricket mein 400 wickets lene wale sab se kam umar bowler hain. Unhein ICC ki ranking ki buniyad par ab tak ke top ten mein bhi rakha gaya hai. Unhone 2006 se 2007 tak national team ke saath bowling coach ke tor par kaam kiya. Waqar ko 3 March 2010 ko Pakistan cricket team ka coach appoint kiya gaya. Unhone personal reasons ka hawala dete hue 19 August 2011 ko Pakistan ke cricket coach ke ohday se resignation de di. Unhone Indian Premier League 2013 ke season ke liye Sunrisers Hyderabad mein as a Bowling Coach join kiya. 4 September 2019 ko, Younis ko PCB ne 3 saal ke contract par Pakistan ka naya Bowling Coach appoint kiya, unhone Azhar Mahmood ki jagah li, jinhein ICC World Cup 2019 tournament mein Pakistan ki disappointing performance ke baad dismiss kar diya gaya tha. Waqar Younis aik Punjabi gharane mein paida huye. Unhon ne Sadiq Public School, Bahawalpur, Pakistan, Sharjah ke Pakistan Islamia School aur Burewala, Pakistan mein Government College mein education hasil ki. Unki upbringing UAE ke shehar Sharjah mein hui, jahan unke father aik contract worker thay. Woh Pakistan wapas aaye aur apni teenage mein wahan cricket khelna start kar diya. Woh cricket khelne ke liye Burewala jaya karte thay jiski waja se unhein Burewala Express ka naam mila tha. Apne school aur college days mein woh wahi tha jise woh khud aik all-round athlete kehta hai, aik runner, javelin phenkne wala, aik high jumper aur different competitions mein pole vaulter, initially pace bowling ka option choose karne se pehle leg spinner hone ki haisiyat se usne har tarah se apni abilities ka izhar kiya. Unki shadi aik Pakistani-Australian doctor Faryal se hui hai. Couple ke teen kids Azaan, Maryam aur Maira bhi dono countries ki dual citizenship rakhte hain. 2005 se, Younis Sydney, New South Wales, Australia mein located hain. Younis ne Australia mein Nine Network aur UAE mein Ten Sports ke liye television sports commentator ke taur par bhi kaam kiya hai. Waqar Younis ne apne cricket career ki shuruaat 1987/88 Pakistan mein ki, kai first-class cricket clubs ke liye khele. However, use us waqt injury hui jab usne nahar mein jump karne ke baad apne left hand ki choti ungli ko kaat kar remove kar diya tha. Woh iss accident se theek ho gaye aur apne playing career ko jari rakha. Eventually unhein Pakistan ke former captain Imran Khan ne discover karke national team ka part banne ke liye choose kiya. Unhon ne sirf 6 first-class games khele the jab unhein Pakistani camp ke liye blue-out se select kiya gaya. Waqar ka kehna hai ke mujhe yaad hai ke Imran Khan ki tabiyat theek nahin thi, fortunately Super Wills Cup mein United Bank aur Delhi XI ke beech match ho raha tha aur usmein Saleem Jaffar injured ho gaye aur mujhe woh match khelne ka chance mila. Imran Khan ne mujhe TV par dekha aur match ka end dekhne ground mein aaye. Agle hi din woh mujhse mile aur mujhe bataya ke mein next month Sharjah jaunga. Uss waqt Imran se mulaqat mere liye ek khushgawar experience ke mutradif tha. English audience Waqar ke talent se 1990s ke start mein waqif hue, jab woh Surrey ke liye khel rahe thay. 1991 mein Surrey ke liye 582 overs mein 113 wickets le kar, just 14.65 ki average par aur otherwise average county attack ko apne kandhon par utha kar, usne khud ko uss daur ke best bowlers mein se ek prove kiya. Sports public se. Usne 1997 mein Glamorgan ke saath English County Championship jeeti. Usne 21 June 1997 ko Liverpool mein Lancashire ke against 25 runs ke badle 7 wickets hasil keen, jismein aik hat-trick bhi shamil jo aik hat-trick se reh jaane ke baad hasil ki gayi thi aur season mein 68 wickets hasil keen. Waqar Younis ne 16 November 1989 ko India ke against Pakistan ke liye international cricket mein debut kiya, usi match mein Indian batsman Sachin Tendulkar ne bhi debut kiya. Waqar Younis ne draw match mein 4 wickets li jismein Tendulkar aur Kapil Dev ki wickets bhi shamil hain, unhon ne apni tez raftari se cricket media mein Vicky ya Burewala Express ke naam se famous hue. Waqar ne Wasim Akram ke saath mil kar opening bowling attack banaya jo ek khofnak aur powerful attack ban gaya. Phir woh apne peak par pahunch kar ek fast bowler ban gaya aur 1994 mein New Zealand ke against One-Day International match mein hat-trick achieve ki. 2000 ke early periods mein, woh reportedly suspension aur bowling partner aur captain Akram ke saath conflicts ki waja se short time ke liye Pakistani team se bahir bhi raha. Cricket mein unki wapsi unke Pakistan ke captain appoint hone ke saath hui however unhein ball tampering ke allegations aur multiple controversies ka saamna karna pada. July 2000 mein Waqar par ball tampering ke allegation mein ek international match khelne par ban laga di gayi thi aur un par match fees ka 50% fine bhi lagaya gaya tha. Woh pehle cricketer the jin par is tarah ke incident ki waja se match khelne par ban lagayi gayi thi. Woh 2003 ke dauran further controversies ka shikar hue World Cup ke matches mein. Australia ke against opening match mein Waqar ko Andrew Symonds par beamer ball karne par attack se hata diya gaya, woh kisi international match ke dauran is tarah discipline ka shikar hone wale pehle bowler ban gaye. Matches, dono associate member teams ke against. Tournament ke baad unhein captaincy se remove kiya gaya aur international selection se bahar kar diya gaya. Around 15 saal ke career ke baad, Waqar ne April 2004 mein cricket se completely retirement announce ki. Apne career ke end par woh Pakistan ke liye sab se ziyada 373 wickets lene wale second bowler ke taur par Test cricket mein ek position par faa'iz hue. Waqar Younis Pakistan ke 2010 ke tour of England ke dauran County Ground, Taunton mein Somerset ke against 50-over warm-up match se pehle nets ke dauran bowling karne ki preparation kar rahe the ke March 2006 mein unhein Pakistan ka bowling coach appoint kiya gaya. Yeh position 6 January 2007 ko Pakistan Cricket Board ke decision ke against protest mein thi ke woh unhein sirf South Africa ke against Test series ke liye retain karega na ke uske baad 5 One-Day International matches ki series ke liye. Phir bowling coach ke ohday ke liye unki jagah Mushtaq Ahmed ko dobara Pakistan ka bowling aur fielding coach appoint kiya gaya. December 2009 mein Australia ke tour ke liye unhein Pakistan ka Head Coach appoint kiya gaya, February 2010 mein Intikhab Alam ko coach ke ohday se hatane ke baad Waqar Younis ko Pakistan ka Head Coach appoint kiya gaya. Iss saal ke shuru mein tour of Australia ke dauran national team ki weak performance ki waja se Waqar ka as a coach pehla kaam ek inexperienced Pakistani team ki leadership karna tha jismein Younis Khan, Mohammad Yousuf aur 2010 ke ICC World T20 mein Shoaib Malik ko as a consolation, although Waqar ke paas Mohammad Amir aur Mohammad Asif ke taur par do high-class bowlers the, unhon ne defending champions ko tournament ke semi-final tak pahunchaya lekin woh Australia ke haathon defeat ka saamna karna pada kyunki Mike Hussey ne last over mein teen sixes mare. World T20 ke baad 2010 ke Asia Cup mein Pakistan Sri Lanka ke haathon kam difference se haara kyunki Pakistan ka top order failed aur Shahid Afridi ke 109 runs Pakistan ko victory ki taraf le jaane mein unsuccessful rahe. Next match mein Pakistan ko final over ki third ball par Harbhajan Singh ke six ki waja se India ke against defeat hui, following match Pakistan aur Bangladesh ke beech dead rubber tha aur Afridi ki ek aur century ka matlab hai ke Pakistan ne 385 runs score kiye aur woh comfortably match jeet gaya 139 runs se. Iske baad England ka tour Australia ke against do T20s aur do Test matches ke saath hua. Pakistan ne dono T20s comfortably jeete aur pehle Test mein Pakistan ko 154 runs se defeat hui. Pakistan ne second Test mein comeback kiya aur 15 saal mein pehli baar Pakistan ne Australia ko Test match mein defeat kiya. 1995 mein previous victory mein Waqar Younis ke brilliant bowling spell se bhi help mili thi. Yeh tour England ke ek controversial tour ke baad hua jab Pakistan ko series 2-2 se draw karne ke liye last Test match mein victory achieve karne ki need thi. The News of the World ne news break ki ke Mohammad Amir, Mohammad Asif aur captain Salman Butt spot-fixing mein involved the. Isse teen players ko temporarily suspend kiya gaya aur Pakistan ko ek innings aur 225 runs se defeat hui jo history ki sab se badi defeat thi. Team ke morale down hone ka effect yeh hua ke next two T20 matches England ne comfortably jeet liye aur iske baad ki ODI series bhi England ne 3-2 se jeet li. Iske baad Abu Dhabi ka tour South Africa ke against hua. Pakistan ne pehla T20 match six wickets se haara jiske baad batting collapse hua. Pakistan five-match ODI series bhi 3-2 se haar gaya. Pakistan ne second ODI Abdur Razzaq ki 72 balls par 109* ki brilliant performance ki waja se jeeta. South Africa ke saath two-match Test series draw ho gayi. Unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke ab Pakistan ke liye World Cup ki preparation ka time aa gaya hai. Pakistan ne quarter-final mein West Indies ko 10 wickets se defeat kiya tha lekin semi-final mein India ke haathon 29 runs se haar gaya. Waqar ne eventually personal reasons ka hawala dete hue August 2011 mein Pakistan ke coach ke ohday se resignation de di. March 2013 main announce kiya gaya ke woh Indian Premier League 2013 ke season ke liye Sunrisers Hyderabad ke bowling coach ke taur par join karenge. May 2014 main, Waqar ko June 2014 se start hone wali two-year term ke liye Pakistan cricket team ke Head Coach ke taur par phir se appoint kiya gaya, Waqar Younis ne 4 April 2016 ko Pakistani cricket team ke Head Coach ke ohde se resign de diya. Waqar ne kaha ke unke resignation ki reasons cricket board ki taraf se unki recommendations par work na karna aur World T20 ke baad ek confidential report ka leak hona thi. Woh Pakistan Super League ke third season ke dauran Multan Sultans ke Head Coach bane. 16 November 2017 ko Waqar ko Bangladesh Premier League ki team Sylhet Sixers ke liye as a mentor appoint kiya gaya. 15 March 2018 tak Waqar ko Bangladesh Premier League ke next two editions ke liye Head Coach appoint kiya gaya. Cricket World Cup 2019 ke baad Waqar ko fourth time Pakistan cricket team ka bowling coach appoint kiya gaya. Waqar Younis ko Pakistan ke 2016 ke ICC World T20 ke semi-final mein jagah na banane ke baad severe criticism face karni padi, is baat par kam pressure tha ke mulk ne kai saalon se international cricket nahin dekhi, initially Younis ko blame kiya gaya. T-20 2016 mein Bangladesh ke against jeetne ke baad, team New Zealand, India aur Australia ke against bhi haar gayi, jiski waja se woh out ho gaye. Waqar ne qaum se maafi ki appeal ki aur kaha ke agar zaroorat padi to woh retirement ke liye ready lekin saath hi yeh bhi kaha ke yeh apne mulk mein cricket ki kami ki waja ka bhi sabab ho sakta hai. However, baad mein unhon ne apni report mein likha ke unhon ne matches mein Pakistan ki poor performance ka blame player Shahid Afridi ko thehraya. Younis ne report PCB ko submit karayi jahan se usse kisi tarah media par leak kar diya gaya. Unhon ne apne gusse ka izhar karte hue kaha ke report confidential thi is waja se social media sites par fans ne un par disappointment show ki ke woh Afridi par blame karte dekh rahe hain. Younis Khan ne report mein Afridi par matches ke dauran non-serious hone ka blame lagate hue kaha ke Mohammad Hafeez ne knee injury ko bhi chupaya jis se unki performance bhi affected hui. Unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke Afridi ne ya to khud bad performance di ya doosre players ne as a captain unki baat nahin suni. Report ke baare mein, unhon ne kaha ke PCB unhein bad guy ke taur par paint kar raha hai aur baad mein iss mamle ke hawale se unse meeting ko skip kar diya kyunke zyada chances hain ke unhon ne report ko leak kiya tha. Iske baad unhon ne retirement ke plans ko bhi drop kar diya aur kaha ke woh June 2016 mein coach ki haisiyat se contract end hone ke bawajood leak par focus karna chahte hain. Waqar Younis ne kaha ke woh individually blame nahin karna chahte the lekin large scale par players, specially Afridi ko blame karte hain. Unhon ne kaha ke Akmal ko select nahin karna chahiye tha, iski bajaye aise players hone chahiye jinhein apne mulk ki numaindagi karne par pride ho. Unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke team February 2016 mein Asia Cup haar gayi kyunke woh unfit the kyunke unhon ne PSL season ke dauran training nahin ki thi aur kaha ke yeh unke liye vacation jaisa tha. Overall, unhon ne Afridi ki poor captaincy par iska blame lagaya. Unhon ne kaha ke Asia Cup 2016 mein ek naye player Mohammad Nawaz ko as a bowler pehle use karna unke liye injustice hai kyunke isne unka confidence destroy kar diya jab woh 3 overs mein 38 runs dene ke baad confuse ho gaye. Waqar Younis ne baad mein apne Twitter par post kiya Koi bhi sach sunna nahin chahta. 4 April 2016 ko Waqar Younis ne team ke head coach ke ohday se istifa de diya, uske turant baad Shahid Afridi ne T20 captaincy se istifa de diya. Iske peeche iski wajah PCB thi jisne unka kehna tha ke use 'qurbani ka bakra' ke taur par use kiya aur Twenty20 report ko leak kar ke use villain ke taur par dikhaya. Unhon ne apna contract end hone se 3 maheene pehle coach ke ohday se istifa de diya aur kaha ke unki terminate ki gayi salary ko definitely domestic cricket mein lagana chahiye. Unhon ne mazeed kaha ke unhon ne team ko revive karne ki puri koshish ki lekin woh phir bhi apni performance ko improve karne mein fail rahe aur report mein unki recommendations ko PCB ne badly handle kiya, jisne leak hone ke baare mein baat karne se bhi refuse kar diya. Waqar Younis ne kaha ke Pakistan cricket ke liye unki services ko bhulaya nahin jana chahiye aur kaha ke woh heavy heart ke saath ohda chor rahe hain. Waqar Younis kai Pakistani fast bowlers mein se ek hain, jiski shuruaat Sarfraz Nawaz se hui, jo reverse swing karne mein successful rahe, kyunke Imran Khan ke retire hone tak woh apne career ke start mein old ball bowler ke taur par use hote thay. Wasim Akram ke saath partnership mein, Younis ne 1990s mein Pakistan ke bowling attack ko lead kiya. Cricket critics aur scholars Younis aur Akram ko tez raftari se ball ko swing karne ki ability ki waja se cricket ki history ki sabse effective fast bowling pair kehte hain. Reverse swing ki ability aur uski pace ne use modern cricket ke sabse talented bowlers mein se ek banaya. Waqar Younis ne ek old ball ki manipulation se reverse swing karne ki apni ability ko explain kiya. Ek side shiny, ek side rough ke saath, ball traditional swing ke liye effective ban jaati hai. Iski waja se Waqar ko cricket pitch mein inswingers aur outswingers ko bowl karne ki ability mili aur in fact Waqar aur Akram dono swing bowling ke is variation se wickets lene mein successful ho gaye. Cricket mein unki fastest delivery 153 km/h ya 95.1 mph thi, ek delivery jo unhon ne 1993 mein South Africa ke against ki thi lekin yeh uske baad hui jab woh severe back injury ka shikar ho gaye the jiski waja se unki bowling speed really kam ho gayi thi. Woh bouncers ya short-pitch deliveries ke use mein bhi effective the. Sheikhupura ke spot par South Africa ke against Waqar ki bowling, short-pitch delivery ke effective use ke liye yaad ki jaati hai. 1992 mein England ke against Test match series ke dauran Pakistan ki victory ke baad English media ko reverse swing delivery par doubt hua. Iss period ke dauran cricket ki duniya ke liye yeh relatively unknown tha aur iski wajah se critics ki taraf se foul play ke allegations lagaye gaye, however cricket officials ko foul play ke koi proof nahin mile aur unhon ne cricket mein reverse swing delivery ki skill ko accept kar liya. World Cup ki history mein do hat-trick karne wale pehle bowler banne wale Sri Lankan fast bowler Lasith Malinga ne kaha hai ke maine Pakistan ki legendary jodi Wasim Akram aur Waqar Younis ko dekh kar apna jaan lewa yorker phenkna seekha. Barson se kai bowlers ne reverse swing ka hunar seekha aur usmein expertise hasil ki lekin ab bhi kuch aisi techniques hain jinki exploration nahin ki gayi hai. Fast bowler ki haisiyat se apni qualities ke bawajood, woh sometimes expensive the aur sometimes unmein West Indian fast bowler Curtly Ambrose aur Australian fast bowler Glenn McGrath jaise bowlers ki consistency ki kami thi. Iski ek wajah unke former captain Imran Khan ki mindset ho sakti hai jin hon ne aggression aur pace ko priority di. Duniya ke fast-est sprinter aur runner Usain Bolt, jinka taluk Jamaica, West Indies se hai, ek baar jab unse pucha gaya ke jab woh bachpan mein the to unke heroes kon the, answer diya ke jab main realy chota tha to mujhe Pakistan cricket team se boht payar tha. Waqar Younis ab tak ke sab se great bowlers mein se aik the aur main aik bowler tha so mujhe unhein dekh kar boht acha laga. Main bari umer tak Pakistan ka aik big fan tha, jab main ne realise kiya ke mujhe apni home team ko support karna chahiye. Jab unse pucha gaya ke agar Pakistan aur West Indies ke beech koi match hota to Bolt ne remarks diye ke main tab bhi Pakistan ki support karta, main yehi keh raha hun - jab main chota tha to yeh sab Pakistan ke baare mein tha. Waqar Test match cricket mein second best strike rate holder hain jinho ne at least 10,000 balls karwai hain. Unka 16224 balls karne ke baad bhi strike rate 43.4 hai jiski waja se woh Dale Steyn ke baad second number par hain jinka bowling ke baad strike rate 42.0 hai aur unhon ne Test match cricket mein 17707 deliveries ki hain. Waqar ko unki sports achievements ke liye 1992 mein Wisden Cricketers of the Year mein shamil kiya gaya. Woh wahid bowler hain jinho ne continuously 3 One-Day International matches mein ek innings mein 5 wickets hasil ki hain. Bowled balls ke lehaz se, unhon ne One-Day International matches mein fastest 300, 350 aur 400 wickets hasil keen. Although basically fast bowler hain, Waqar ne apne career ke dauran 1010 Test match runs score kiye. September 2005 tak, woh wahid non-batsman the jinho ne half-century banaye baghair hazar runs score kiye. Waqar ke paas 350 se zyada Test wickets ke saath kisi bhi bowler ke liye best strike rate ka record bhi hai. Waqar Younis ke paas ek ODI (7/36) mein as a captain best bowling ka record hai aur woh ODI innings mein 7 wickets lene wale pehle captain bhi the. Uske paas number 10 (478) par batting karte hue career ke sabse zyada ODI runs banane ka record bhi hai. Woh ODI innings mein 5 wickets lene wale ab tak ke sabse kam umar bowler hain (18 saal aur 164 din ki age mein). ODI cricket mein sabse zyada 4 wickets lene ka record unke paas hai. Unke paas innings ke lehaz se continuous five wickets lene ka record hai aur woh continuous 3 baar yeh milestone achieve karne wale wahid player hain. Wo wahid bowler hain jinho ne apne career mein teen baar ek One-Day innings mein continuously 3 baar 4 goal kiye. Waqar Younis ne Test cricket mein 22 times par ek innings mein five ya us se zyada wickets hasil keen. One-Day International matches mein, unhon ne sabse zyada five wickets hasil keen (13 occasions par). Waqar Younis ko 9 December 2013 ko ICC Hall of Fame mein shamil kiya gaya tha. Woh hamwatan Hanif Mohammad aur Zaheer Abbas ke saath-saath apne former team-mates Imran Khan, Javed Miandad aur Wasim Akram ke saath join hokar Hall of Fame mein shamil hone wale 70th player bane. Iss shamilat par unhon ne kaha: Yeh mere liye boht bada honor hai, main truly un logon ka shukarguzar hun jinho ne mujhe iss honor ke layak samjha. ICC tournament 2021 ke T20 World Cup mein first time Pakistan ki taraf se India ko defeat karne ke baad Waqar ne kaha ke Rizwan ko Hindus ke saamne namaz padhte dekhna boht special tha. Isne ek hungama create kar diya aur baad mein usne is comment ke liye sorry feel ki.
Imaduddin Zangi Seljuk hakoomat ki taraf se shehr Mosul ka haakim tha. Jab Seljuk hakoomat kamzor hogayi toh usne Zangi saltanat qayam kar li aur Esaiyon ko defeats par defeats de kar unki char mein se aik crusader state Edessa ka khatma kar diya jo Crusaders ne First Crusade ke baad establish ki thi. Khatam hone wali pehli Crusader state ka capital Al-Ruha tha jise aajkal Urfa kaha jata hai aur yeh Asia-e-Kuchak mein located hai. Pehli Salibi Jang ke baad Bait-ul-Muqaddas aur Palestine ke kai areas par Esaiyon ka qabza ho gaya tha aur Bait-ul-Muqaddas Esaiyon aur Yahudiyon ki tarah Musalmanon ke liye bhi bara muqaddas maqam hai kyunke yeh Musalmanon ka qibla awwal hai. Hazrat Suleman (AS), Dawood (AS), Musa (AS) aur Essa (AS) isi region mein huye aur jis tarah woh Esaiyon aur Yahudiyon ke prophets the usi tarah Musalmanon ke bhi prophets hain. Phir khud Hazrat Mohammad Mustafa (PBUH) ko jab Miraj hui to woh Masjid-e-Aqsa hi mein thehre the aur yaheen se aasman par tashreef le gaye the. In halaat mein Musalmanon ke liye possible na tha woh Palestine par Esaiyon ka qabza khamoshi ke saath allow kar lete. Unhon ne Esaiyon ka muqabla karne ki koshish ki aur jin logon ne Esaiyon se muqable mein naam kamaya un mein pehla famous shakhs Imaduddin Zangi tha. Imaduddin 1085 mein Qasim ud-Dawla Abu Sa'id ke ghar paida hue jo Seljuk Sultan Malik Shah I ki hukumat mein Aleppo ke Governor the. 1094 mein baghawat ke ilzam mein unke father ka sir qalam kar diya gaya jiske baad Imaduddin Zangi Mosul ke Governor ke paas palay barhay. Imad 1127 mein Mosul aur 1128 mein Aleppo ke Atabeg bane aur dono cities ko apne control mein le aaye. Imaduddin Zangi ka sabse bara car-nama 1144 mein aik Salibi riyasat Edessa ka khatma tha. Zangi ne 24 December 1144 ko us par qabza kar liya. Edessa ka end Second Crusade ki wajah bana. Damascus ke acquisition ki continuous efforts ke dauraan 1146 mein ek French slave ne Imaduddin ko shaheed kar diya. Imaduddin Zangi Saltanat ka founder tha. Uske intiqal ke baad bara beta Saifuddin Ghazi Mosul mein jabkay dusra beta Nooruddin Aleppo mein uska successor bana.
Khudadad Khan 20 October 1888 mein Chakwal ke gaon Dhab mein paida hue, pehle Hindustani the jinhein Victoria Cross se nawaza gaya. Victoria Cross Britain ka sabse bara military honour hai. Yeh honour 1857 mein establish hua tha. Yeh sabse bara honour hai jo British army ko dushman ke against bravery show karne par mil sakta hai. Sipahi Khudadad Khan the jo mauza Dhab, tehsil Chakwal, zila Jhelum ke rehne wale the. Unka taluq Baloch Regiment se tha, us waqt Number 129 Duke of Connaught's Own Baluchis kehlati thi aur Karachi mein deploy thi. First World War ke dauran Sipahi Khudadad Khan ko France jaane ka order mila. Woh 24 August 1914 ko samandar ke raste Karachi se rawana hue aur 29 September ko France ki bandargah Marseilles par pahuche jahan unhein Hollybek ke war front par deploy kiya gaya. Yeh 13 October 1914 ka واقعہ hai jab Sipahi Khudadad Khan ke daste ka Commanding Officer dushman ki firing se badly injured ho gaya aur machine gun chalane wale panch sipahi bhi one-by-one mare gaye. Aise mein Sipahi Khudadad Khan injured hone ke bawajood boht determination se apni machine gun chalate rahe. Is conflict mein 7 British aur 5 Hindi officers aur 124 soldiers mare gaye. 64 missing hue jo dead assume kiye gaye. Sipahi Khudadad Khan ke is brave act ke recognition ke taur par British government ne 31 October 1914 ko unhein Britain ka sabse bara military honour Victoria Cross dene ka announce kiya. Victoria Cross milne ke baad Sipahi Khudadad Khan ko Subedar Khudadad Khan bana diya gaya. Aapka taluq mojuda Pakistan ke zila Chakwal se tha. Aap Minhas Rajput qabile se belong karte the. 8 March 1971 ko CMH Rawalpindi mein demise hua aur aapko Mandi Bahauddin ke Chak No. 25 mein dafnaya gaya.
Mohammad Akbar Khan MBE, (pedaysh: 19 April 1897 - wafat: 1993) British Indian Army aur baad mein Pakistani Army se related military officer the. Unhon ne army mein employment ka start 17 July 1920 ko as a Second Lieutenant ke post se kiya. World War I aur II mein military abilities ke jauhar dikhaye. Unhon ne World War II ke dauran aapko apni battalion ko German army ke attack se bacha le jaane par June 1930 mein Order of British Empire (MBE) se nawaza gaya. Partition of India ke baad unhein Pakistan Army ka sabse senior most officer declare kiya gaya. Unhein Quaid-e-Azam Mohammad Ali Jinnah ka pehla ADC banne ka honor bhi hasil hai. Aapka taluq zila Chakwal se tha.
Nooruddin Abu Al-Qasim Mahmud ibn Imaduddin Zangi (Feb 1118 – 15 May 1174), generally Nooruddin Zangi ke naam se jaana jaata hai, aik Turkman the jinka taluq Zangi dynasty se tha. Unhon ne Seljuk Empire ke Syrian province (Syria) par rule kiya. Nooruddin Zangi ne 1146 se 1174 tak rule kiya. Unka shumar Second Crusade ki aik important personality mein kiya jaata hai. Zangi saltanat ke bani Imaduddin Zangi ke bete the jinho ne history mein boht naam kamaya. Nooruddin February 1118 mein paida hue. Usne Isaiyon se Bait-ul-Muqaddas wapas lene ke liye pehle ek strong government establish karne ki try ki aur is goal ko achieve karne ke liye as pas ki choti choti Muslim governments ko end karke unko apni territory mein add kar liya. Starting mein Nooruddin ka capital Aleppo tha. 549 Hijri mein usne Damascus par qabza karke use capital declare kiya. Usne Crusader state Antioch par attacks karke kai forts par qabza kar liya aur baad mein state Edessa par Musalmanon ka qabza end karne ki Isaiyon ki koshish ko bhi fail kar diya. Second Crusade ke dauran Damascus par qabza karne ki koshishon ko bhi Saifuddin Ghazi aur Mu'inuddin ki help se fail kar diya aur Bait-ul-Muqaddas se Isaiyon ko nikalne ka raasta clear kar diya. Doosri Salibi Jang mein victory ki wajah se hi Musalman teesri Salibi Jang mein victorious hokar Bait-ul-Muqaddas wapas lene mein successful hue. Us zamane mein Egypt mein Fatimid hukoomat qayam thi lekin ab woh bilkul weak ho gayi thi aur Egypt kyunke Palestine se mila hua tha isliye Isai us par qabza karna chahte the. Yeh dekh kar Nooruddin ne ek army bhej kar 564 mein Egypt par bhi qabza kar liya aur Fatimid hukoomat ka khatma kar diya.
Yeh incident Madina ki history ki almost all books mein available hai. Iska zikr Shaikh Mohammad Abdul Haq Muhaddith Dehlvi (rehmatullah alaih) ne bhi apni book Tarikh-e-Madina mein teen bari conspiracies ke saath kiya hai jismein se yeh incident sabse famous hai.
Sultanate of Rum ke end ke baad Anatolia mein anarchy phail gai aur different chieftains apni apni independent states bana kar baith gaye jinhein Ghazi Emirate kaha jata tha. 1300 tak decline ki taraf ja rahi Byzantine Empire Anatolia mein mojood apne ziadatar provinces in Ghazi Emirate ke haathon se kho baithi. Inhi emirates mein se aik Western Anatolia mein Söğüt city ke area mein thi jiske chieftain Usman I thay. Kaha jaata hai ke jab Ertuğrul migrate kar ke Anatolia pohnche toh unhone do armies ko aapas mein fight karte dekha jin mein se aik number mein ziada aur doosri kam thi aur apni natural sympathetic nature ki wajah se Ertuğrul ne chhoti army ka saath diya aur 400 horsemen ke saath battlefield mein jump kar gaye. Aur defeat ke qareeb pohnchnay wali army is sudden help se war ka tide turn karne mein successful ho gayi. Ertuğrul ne jis army ki help ki woh actually Sultanate of Rum ki army thi jo Christians se fight kar rahi thi aur is victory ke liye Ertuğrul ki services ko dekhte huay unhein Söğüt city ke paas aik fiefdom diya gaya. 1281 mein Ertuğrul ki death ke baad is fiefdom ki leadership Usman I ke haath mein aayi jinhone 1299 mein Seljuk Sultanate se independence declare kar ke Ottoman Empire ki foundation rakhi. Usman I ne is chhoti si empire ke borders Byzantine Empire ki borders tak spread kar diye aur victory ke baad capital Bursa shift kar diya. Usman I Turks mein bohot respect se dekhe jaate hain. Indeed, woh bohot high qualities wale thay. Din ke warrior aur raat ke worshipper ke saath saath bohot noble, simple, hospitable, generous aur kind-hearted person bhi thay. Unka reign Ottoman Empire ki foundations ko strong karne ka reason bana. Yeh Usman I ki rakhi hui strong foundations hi theen ke unki demise ke baad aik century ke andar Ottoman Empire Eastern Mediterranean aur Balkans tak spread ho gayi. Empire ki conquests ka yeh great sequence Usman ke successors ne continue rakha, but 1402 mein Timur ne Anatolia par attack kar diya aur Ottoman Sultan Bayezid I defeat hone ke baad arrest ho gaye, but yeh Ottomans ka determination tha ke unhone apni khatam hoti hui empire ko na sirf restore kiya balkay chand hi decades mein Conquest of Constantinople jaisi history ki greatest victory achieve ki. Isse Ottomans ka prestige worldwide increase hua. Ottoman Empire ki re-establishment ka credit Bayezid I ke son Mehmet I ko jaata hai jo apni high moral character aur qualities ki wajah se Turks mein Mehmet Çelebi ke naam se jaane jaate hain.
Conquest of Constantinople Turks, especially Ottomans, ki history ka golden chapter hai. 29 May 1453 mein 21 saal ke young Sultan Mehmed II (Sultan Mehmed the Conqueror) ki leadership mein is army ne incredible achievements karte huay is great city ko conquer kiya aur usay apna capital banaya. Is tarah Mehmed Caesar of Rome ban gaya aur yeh title uske un intentions ko show karta tha ke Ottomans jald Rome par bhi kabza kar lenge aur inhi objectives ko achieve karne ke liye 1480 mein Ottoman forces Italian Peninsula per utrein aur Otranto aur Apulia ke cities par kabza kar liya, but 1481 mein Mehmed the Conqueror ki death ke saath hi Conquest of Italy ki campaign end ho gayi.
Ottoman history ka yeh period do different eras mein divide kiya ja sakta hai: aik 1566 tak regional, economic aur cultural growth ka era jiske baad military aur political stagnation ka period. 1453 mein Conquest of Constantinople ne South-Eastern Europe aur Eastern Mediterranean regions mein Ottoman Empire ke aik great power ke tor par emerge hone ki foundation rakhi aur phir 1566 tak Europe, Middle East aur North Africa mein conquests ke aik long period ka start hua. In conquests ki wajah army ka standard discipline aur modern military might thi jismein gunpowder ke use aur strong navy ka role bohot important tha. State ki economy mein most important role trade ka tha kyunke Europe aur Asia ke darmiyan trade ke saare land aur sea routes Ottoman Empire se pass hotay thay. Aik ke baad aik great Sultans ne empire ke borders spread karne mein important role play kiya jin mein Selim I ka name prominent hai jinhone Eastern aur Southern side par attention di aur Safavid Empire ke Shah Ismail I ko Battle of Chaldiran mein defeat kiya aur Egypt mein Ottoman rule establish kiya. Selim ke successor Suleiman the Magnificent (1520 se 1566) ne west mein empire ko expand kiya aur 1521 mein Belgrade ki conquest ke baad 1526 mein Battle of Mohács ke through Hungary aur doosre Central European regions mein Ottomans ka dominance establish kar diya. Uske baad unhone 1529 mein Vienna ka siege kiya, but cold weather aur city ke residents ki strong resistance ki wajah se yeh siege fail ho gaya. Is tarah Ottoman storm ki waves Vienna ki walls se takra kar wapis aa gain aur Ottoman Empire ke borders Central Europe ke is city se aage kabhi nahi barh sake. Suleiman ke periods mein Transylvania, Wallachia aur Moldova Ottoman Empire ke vassals banay. East mein Ottomans ne Iran se Baghdad dobara recover kar liya aur Mesopotamia par kabza kar ke Persian Gulf tak naval access gain kar liya.
Waqar Younis Pakistan cricket team ke former captain hain. Aur iss waqt Pakistan cricket team ke Head Coach hain. Waqar Younis ko tez bowling ki waja say Burewala Express kehte hain jinho ne 87 Test matches mein Pakistan ki numaindagi ki jabkay 262 One-Day International matches bhi khele. Aik right-hand fast bowler, Waqar Younis ko ye game khelne wale azeem bowlers mein shumar kiya jaata hai. Woh Pakistani cricket team ke former Head Coach hain. Woh Pakistan ki national cricket team ke former bowling coach bhi hain. 2021 tak, Younis ke paas sab se kam umar Pakistani Test captain aur tareekh ke fourth Test captain (22 saal 15 din) ka record hai. Usne 87 Test aur 262 One-Day matches khele. 1989 se 2003 tak apne international cricket career ke dauran Pakistan ke liye international matches mein Waqar Younis ka trademark unki cricket ball ko tez raftari se reverse swing karne ki ability thi. Usne apne career ke dauran 373 Test aur 416 One-Day International wickets hasil keen. Apne bowling partner Wasim Akram ke saath mil kar, usne duniya ka sabse khofnak bowling attack banaya. Waqar Younis ke paas Dale Steyn ke baad 350 se ziyada Test wickets lene wale kisi bhi bowler ke liye best strike rate hai. Woh One-Day cricket mein 400 wickets lene wale sab se kam umar bowler hain. Unhein ICC ki ranking ki buniyad par ab tak ke top ten mein bhi rakha gaya hai. Unhone 2006 se 2007 tak national team ke saath bowling coach ke tor par kaam kiya. Waqar ko 3 March 2010 ko Pakistan cricket team ka coach appoint kiya gaya. Unhone personal reasons ka hawala dete hue 19 August 2011 ko Pakistan ke cricket coach ke ohday se resignation de di. Unhone Indian Premier League 2013 ke season ke liye Sunrisers Hyderabad mein as a Bowling Coach join kiya. 4 September 2019 ko, Younis ko PCB ne 3 saal ke contract par Pakistan ka naya Bowling Coach appoint kiya, unhone Azhar Mahmood ki jagah li, jinhein ICC World Cup 2019 tournament mein Pakistan ki disappointing performance ke baad dismiss kar diya gaya tha. Waqar Younis aik Punjabi gharane mein paida huye. Unhon ne Sadiq Public School, Bahawalpur, Pakistan, Sharjah ke Pakistan Islamia School aur Burewala, Pakistan mein Government College mein education hasil ki. Unki upbringing UAE ke shehar Sharjah mein hui, jahan unke father aik contract worker thay. Woh Pakistan wapas aaye aur apni teenage mein wahan cricket khelna start kar diya. Woh cricket khelne ke liye Burewala jaya karte thay jiski waja se unhein Burewala Express ka naam mila tha. Apne school aur college days mein woh wahi tha jise woh khud aik all-round athlete kehta hai, aik runner, javelin phenkne wala, aik high jumper aur different competitions mein pole vaulter, initially pace bowling ka option choose karne se pehle leg spinner hone ki haisiyat se usne har tarah se apni abilities ka izhar kiya. Unki shadi aik Pakistani-Australian doctor Faryal se hui hai. Couple ke teen kids Azaan, Maryam aur Maira bhi dono countries ki dual citizenship rakhte hain. 2005 se, Younis Sydney, New South Wales, Australia mein located hain. Younis ne Australia mein Nine Network aur UAE mein Ten Sports ke liye television sports commentator ke taur par bhi kaam kiya hai. Waqar Younis ne apne cricket career ki shuruaat 1987/88 Pakistan mein ki, kai first-class cricket clubs ke liye khele. However, use us waqt injury hui jab usne nahar mein jump karne ke baad apne left hand ki choti ungli ko kaat kar remove kar diya tha. Woh iss accident se theek ho gaye aur apne playing career ko jari rakha. Eventually unhein Pakistan ke former captain Imran Khan ne discover karke national team ka part banne ke liye choose kiya. Unhon ne sirf 6 first-class games khele the jab unhein Pakistani camp ke liye blue-out se select kiya gaya. Waqar ka kehna hai ke mujhe yaad hai ke Imran Khan ki tabiyat theek nahin thi, fortunately Super Wills Cup mein United Bank aur Delhi XI ke beech match ho raha tha aur usmein Saleem Jaffar injured ho gaye aur mujhe woh match khelne ka chance mila. Imran Khan ne mujhe TV par dekha aur match ka end dekhne ground mein aaye. Agle hi din woh mujhse mile aur mujhe bataya ke mein next month Sharjah jaunga. Uss waqt Imran se mulaqat mere liye ek khushgawar experience ke mutradif tha. English audience Waqar ke talent se 1990s ke start mein waqif hue, jab woh Surrey ke liye khel rahe thay. 1991 mein Surrey ke liye 582 overs mein 113 wickets le kar, just 14.65 ki average par aur otherwise average county attack ko apne kandhon par utha kar, usne khud ko uss daur ke best bowlers mein se ek prove kiya. Sports public se. Usne 1997 mein Glamorgan ke saath English County Championship jeeti. Usne 21 June 1997 ko Liverpool mein Lancashire ke against 25 runs ke badle 7 wickets hasil keen, jismein aik hat-trick bhi shamil thi jo aik hat-trick se reh jaane ke baad hasil ki gayi thi aur season mein 68 wickets hasil keen. Waqar Younis ne 16 November 1989 ko India ke against Pakistan ke liye international cricket mein debut kiya, usi match mein Indian batsman Sachin Tendulkar ne bhi debut kiya. Waqar Younis ne draw match mein 4 wickets li jismein Tendulkar aur Kapil Dev ki wickets bhi shamil hain, unhon ne apni tez raftari se cricket media mein Vicky ya Burewala Express ke naam se famous hue. Waqar ne Wasim Akram ke saath mil kar opening bowling attack banaya jo ek khofnak aur powerful attack ban gaya. Phir woh apne peak par pahunch kar ek fast bowler ban gaya aur 1994 mein New Zealand ke against One-Day International match mein hat-trick achieve ki. 2000 ke early periods mein, woh reportedly suspension aur bowling partner aur captain Akram ke saath conflicts ki waja se short time ke liye Pakistani team se bahir bhi raha. Cricket mein unki wapsi unke Pakistan ke captain appoint hone ke saath hui however unhein ball tampering ke allegations aur multiple controversies ka saamna karna pada. July 2000 mein Waqar par ball tampering ke allegation mein ek international match khelne par ban laga di gayi thi aur un par match fees ka 50% fine bhi lagaya gaya tha. Woh pehle cricketer the jin par is tarah ke incident ki waja se match khelne par ban lagayi gayi thi. Woh 2003 ke dauran further controversies ka shikar hue World Cup ke matches mein. Australia ke against opening match mein Waqar ko Andrew Symonds par beamer ball karne par attack se hata diya gaya, woh kisi international match ke dauran is tarah discipline ka shikar hone wale pehle bowler ban gaye. Matches, dono associate member teams ke against. Tournament ke baad unhein captaincy se remove kiya gaya aur international selection se bahar kar diya gaya. Around 15 saal ke career ke baad, Waqar ne April 2004 mein cricket se completely retirement announce ki. Apne career ke end par woh Pakistan ke liye sab se ziyada 373 wickets lene wale second bowler ke taur par Test cricket mein ek position par faa'iz hue. Waqar Younis Pakistan ke 2010 ke tour of England ke dauran County Ground, Taunton mein Somerset ke against 50-over warm-up match se pehle nets ke dauran bowling karne ki preparation kar rahe the ke March 2006 mein unhein Pakistan ka bowling coach appoint kiya gaya. Yeh position 6 January 2007 ko Pakistan Cricket Board ke decision ke against protest mein thi ke woh unhein sirf South Africa ke against Test series ke liye retain karega na ke uske baad 5 One-Day International matches ki series ke liye. Phir bowling coach ke ohday ke liye unki jagah Mushtaq Ahmed ko dobara Pakistan ka bowling aur fielding coach appoint kiya gaya. December 2009 mein Australia ke tour ke liye unhein Pakistan ka Head Coach appoint kiya gaya, February 2010 mein Intikhab Alam ko coach ke ohday se hatane ke baad Waqar Younis ko Pakistan ka Head Coach appoint kiya gaya. Iss saal ke shuru mein tour of Australia ke dauran national team ki weak performance ki waja se Waqar ka as a coach pehla kaam ek inexperienced Pakistani team ki leadership karna tha jismein Younis Khan, Mohammad Yousuf aur 2010 ke ICC World T20 mein Shoaib Malik ko as a consolation, although Waqar ke paas Mohammad Amir aur Mohammad Asif ke taur par do high-class bowlers the, unhon ne defending champions ko tournament ke semi-final tak pahunchaya lekin woh Australia ke haathon defeat ka saamna karna pada kyunki Mike Hussey ne last over mein teen sixes mare. World T20 ke baad 2010 ke Asia Cup mein Pakistan Sri Lanka ke haathon kam difference se haara kyunki Pakistan ka top order failed aur Shahid Afridi ke 109 runs Pakistan ko victory ki taraf le jaane mein unsuccessful rahe. Next match mein Pakistan ko final over ki third ball par Harbhajan Singh ke six ki waja se India ke against defeat hui, following match Pakistan aur Bangladesh ke beech dead rubber tha aur Afridi ki ek aur century ka matlab hai ke Pakistan ne 385 runs score kiye aur woh comfortably match jeet gaya 139 runs se. Iske baad England ka tour Australia ke against do T20s aur do Test matches ke saath hua. Pakistan ne dono T20s comfortably jeete aur pehle Test mein Pakistan ko 154 runs se defeat hui. Pakistan ne second Test mein comeback kiya aur 15 saal mein pehli baar Pakistan ne Australia ko Test match mein defeat kiya. 1995 mein previous victory mein Waqar Younis ke brilliant bowling spell se bhi help mili thi. Yeh tour England ke ek controversial tour ke baad hua jab Pakistan ko series 2-2 se draw karne ke liye last Test match mein victory achieve karne ki need thi. The News of the World ne news break ki ke Mohammad Amir, Mohammad Asif aur captain Salman Butt spot-fixing mein involved the. Isse teen players ko temporarily suspend kiya gaya aur Pakistan ko ek innings aur 225 runs se defeat hui jo history ki sab se badi defeat thi. Team ke morale down hone ka effect yeh hua ke next two T20 matches England ne comfortably jeet liye aur iske baad ki ODI series bhi England ne 3-2 se jeet li. Iske baad Abu Dhabi ka tour South Africa ke against hua. Pakistan ne pehla T20 match six wickets se haara jiske baad batting collapse hua. Pakistan five-match ODI series bhi 3-2 se haar gaya. Pakistan ne second ODI Abdur Razzaq ki 72 balls par 109* ki brilliant performance ki waja se jeeta. South Africa ke saath two-match Test series draw ho gayi. Unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke ab Pakistan ke liye World Cup ki preparation ka time aa gaya hai. Pakistan ne quarter-final mein West Indies ko 10 wickets se defeat kiya tha lekin semi-final mein India ke haathon 29 runs se haar gaya. Waqar ne eventually personal reasons ka hawala dete hue August 2011 mein Pakistan ke coach ke ohday se resignation de di. March 2013 main announce kiya gaya ke woh Indian Premier League 2013 ke season ke liye Sunrisers Hyderabad ke bowling coach ke taur par join karenge. May 2014 main, Waqar ko June 2014 se start hone wali two-year term ke liye Pakistan cricket team ke Head Coach ke taur par phir se appoint kiya gaya, Waqar Younis ne 4 April 2016 ko Pakistani cricket team ke Head Coach ke ohde se resign de diya. Waqar ne kaha ke unke resignation ki reasons cricket board ki taraf se unki recommendations par work na karna aur World T20 ke baad ek confidential report ka leak hona thi. Woh Pakistan Super League ke third season ke dauran Multan Sultans ke Head Coach bane. 16 November 2017 ko Waqar ko Bangladesh Premier League ki team Sylhet Sixers ke liye as a mentor appoint kiya gaya. 15 March 2018 tak Waqar ko Bangladesh Premier League ke next two editions ke liye Head Coach appoint kiya gaya. Cricket World Cup 2019 ke baad Waqar ko fourth time Pakistan cricket team ka bowling coach appoint kiya gaya. Waqar Younis ko Pakistan ke 2016 ke ICC World T20 ke semi-final mein jagah na banane ke baad severe criticism face karni padi, is baat par kam pressure tha ke mulk ne kai saalon se international cricket nahin dekhi, initially Younis ko blame kiya gaya. T-20 2016 mein Bangladesh ke against jeetne ke baad, team New Zealand, India aur Australia ke against bhi haar gayi, jiski waja se woh out ho gaye. Waqar ne qaum se maafi ki appeal ki aur kaha ke agar zaroorat padi to woh retirement ke liye ready hain lekin saath hi yeh bhi kaha ke yeh apne mulk mein cricket ki kami ki waja ka bhi sabab ho sakta hai. However, baad mein unhon ne apni report mein likha ke unhon ne matches mein Pakistan ki poor performance ka blame player Shahid Afridi ko thehraya. Younis ne report PCB ko submit karayi jahan se usse kisi tarah media par leak kar diya gaya. Unhon ne apne gusse ka izhar karte hue kaha ke report confidential thi is waja se social media sites par fans ne un par disappointment show ki ke woh Afridi par blame karte dekh rahe hain. Younis Khan ne report mein Afridi par matches ke dauran non-serious hone ka blame lagate hue kaha ke Mohammad Hafeez ne knee injury ko bhi chupaya jis se unki performance bhi affected hui. Unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke Afridi ne ya to khud bad performance di ya doosre players ne as a captain unki baat nahin suni. Report ke baare mein, unhon ne kaha ke PCB unhein bad guy ke taur par paint kar raha hai aur baad mein iss mamle ke hawale se unse meeting ko skip kar diya kyunke zyada chances hain ke unhon ne report ko leak kiya tha. Iske baad unhon ne retirement ke plans ko bhi drop kar diya aur kaha ke woh June 2016 mein coach ki haisiyat se contract end hone ke bawajood leak par focus karna chahte hain. Waqar Younis ne kaha ke woh individually blame nahin karna chahte the lekin large scale par players, specially Afridi ko blame karte hain. Unhon ne kaha ke Akmal ko select nahin karna chahiye tha, iski bajaye aise players hone chahiye jinhein apne mulk ki numaindagi karne par pride ho. Unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke team February 2016 mein Asia Cup haar gayi kyunke woh unfit the kyunke unhon ne PSL season ke dauran training nahin ki thi aur kaha ke yeh unke liye vacation jaisa tha. Overall, unhon ne Afridi ki poor captaincy par iska blame lagaya. Unhon ne kaha ke Asia Cup 2016 mein ek naye player Mohammad Nawaz ko as a bowler pehle use karna unke liye injustice hai kyunke isne unka confidence destroy kar diya jab woh 3 overs mein 38 runs dene ke baad confuse ho gaye. Waqar Younis ne baad mein apne Twitter par post kiya Koi bhi sach sunna nahin chahta. 4 April 2016 ko Waqar Younis ne team ke head coach ke ohday se istifa de diya, uske turant baad Shahid Afridi ne T20 captaincy se istifa de diya. Iske peeche iski wajah PCB thi jisne unka kehna tha ke use 'qurbani ka bakra' ke taur par use kiya aur Twenty20 report ko leak kar ke use villain ke taur par dikhaya. Unhon ne apna contract end hone se 3 maheene pehle coach ke ohday se istifa de diya aur kaha ke unki terminate ki gayi salary ko definitely domestic cricket mein lagana chahiye. Unhon ne mazeed kaha ke unhon ne team ko revive karne ki puri koshish ki lekin woh phir bhi apni performance ko improve karne mein fail rahe aur report mein unki recommendations ko PCB ne badly handle kiya, jisne leak hone ke baare mein baat karne se bhi refuse kar diya. Waqar Younis ne kaha ke Pakistan cricket ke liye unki services ko bhulaya nahin jana chahiye aur kaha ke woh heavy heart ke saath ohda chor rahe hain. Waqar Younis kai Pakistani fast bowlers mein se ek hain, jiski shuruaat Sarfraz Nawaz se hui, jo reverse swing karne mein successful rahe, kyunke Imran Khan ke retire hone tak woh apne career ke start mein old ball bowler ke taur par use hote thay. Wasim Akram ke saath partnership mein, Younis ne 1990s mein Pakistan ke bowling attack ko lead kiya. Cricket critics aur scholars Younis aur Akram ko tez raftari se ball ko swing karne ki ability ki waja se cricket ki history ki sabse effective fast bowling pair kehte hain. Reverse swing ki ability aur uski pace ne use modern cricket ke sabse talented bowlers mein se ek banaya. Waqar Younis ne ek old ball ki manipulation se reverse swing karne ki apni ability ko explain kiya. Ek side shiny, ek side rough ke saath, ball traditional swing ke liye effective ban jaati hai. Iski waja se Waqar ko cricket pitch mein inswingers aur outswingers ko bowl karne ki ability mili aur in fact Waqar aur Akram dono swing bowling ke is variation se wickets lene mein successful ho gaye. Cricket mein unki fastest delivery 153 km/h ya 95.1 mph thi, ek delivery jo unhon ne 1993 mein South Africa ke against ki thi lekin yeh uske baad hui jab woh severe back injury ka shikar ho gaye the jiski waja se unki bowling speed really kam ho gayi thi. Woh bouncers ya short-pitch deliveries ke use mein bhi effective the. Sheikhupura ke spot par South Africa ke against Waqar ki bowling, short-pitch delivery ke effective use ke liye yaad ki jaati hai. 1992 mein England ke against Test match series ke dauran Pakistan ki victory ke baad English media ko reverse swing delivery par doubt hua. Iss period ke dauran cricket ki duniya ke liye yeh relatively unknown tha aur iski wajah se critics ki taraf se foul play ke allegations lagaye gaye, however cricket officials ko foul play ke koi proof nahin mile aur unhon ne cricket mein reverse swing delivery ki skill ko accept kar liya. World Cup ki history mein do hat-trick karne wale pehle bowler banne wale Sri Lankan fast bowler Lasith Malinga ne kaha hai ke maine Pakistan ki legendary jodi Wasim Akram aur Waqar Younis ko dekh kar apna jaan lewa yorker phenkna seekha. Barson se kai bowlers ne reverse swing ka hunar seekha aur usmein expertise hasil ki lekin ab bhi kuch aisi techniques hain jinki exploration nahin ki gayi hai. Fast bowler ki haisiyat se apni qualities ke bawajood, woh sometimes expensive the aur sometimes unmein West Indian fast bowler Curtly Ambrose aur Australian fast bowler Glenn McGrath jaise bowlers ki consistency ki kami thi. Iski ek wajah unke former captain Imran Khan ki mindset ho sakti hai jin hon ne aggression aur pace ko priority di. Duniya ke fast-est sprinter aur runner Usain Bolt, jinka taluk Jamaica, West Indies se hai, ek baar jab unse pucha gaya ke jab woh bachpan mein the to unke heroes kon the, answer diya ke jab main realy chota tha to mujhe Pakistan cricket team se boht payar tha. Waqar Younis ab tak ke sab se great bowlers mein se aik the aur main aik bowler tha so mujhe unhein dekh kar boht acha laga. Main bari umer tak Pakistan ka aik big fan tha, jab main ne realise kiya ke mujhe apni home team ko support karna chahiye. Jab unse pucha gaya ke agar Pakistan aur West Indies ke beech koi match hota to Bolt ne remarks diye ke main tab bhi Pakistan ki support karta, main yehi keh raha hun - jab main chota tha to yeh sab Pakistan ke baare mein tha. Waqar Test match cricket mein second best strike rate holder hain jinho ne at least 10,000 balls karwai hain. Unka 16224 balls karne ke baad bhi strike rate 43.4 hai jiski waja se woh Dale Steyn ke baad second number par hain jinka bowling ke baad strike rate 42.0 hai aur unhon ne Test match cricket mein 17707 deliveries ki hain. Waqar ko unki sports achievements ke liye 1992 mein Wisden Cricketers of the Year mein shamil kiya gaya. Woh wahid bowler hain jinho ne continuously 3 One-Day International matches mein ek innings mein 5 wickets hasil ki hain. Bowled balls ke lehaz se, unhon ne One-Day International matches mein fastest 300, 350 aur 400 wickets hasil keen. Although basically fast bowler hain, Waqar ne apne career ke dauran 1010 Test match runs score kiye. September 2005 tak, woh wahid non-batsman the jinho ne half-century banaye baghair hazar runs score kiye. Waqar ke paas 350 se zyada Test wickets ke saath kisi bhi bowler ke liye best strike rate ka record bhi hai. Waqar Younis ke paas ek ODI (7/36) mein as a captain best bowling ka record hai aur woh ODI innings mein 7 wickets lene wale pehle captain bhi the. Uske paas number 10 (478) par batting karte hue career ke sabse zyada ODI runs banane ka record bhi hai. Woh ODI innings mein 5 wickets lene wale ab tak ke sabse kam umar bowler hain (18 saal aur 164 din ki age mein). ODI cricket mein sabse zyada 4 wickets lene ka record unke paas hai. Unke paas innings ke lehaz se continuous five wickets lene ka record hai aur woh continuous 3 baar yeh milestone achieve karne wale wahid player hain. Wo wahid bowler hain jinho ne apne career mein teen baar ek One-Day innings mein continuously 3 baar 4 goal kiye. Waqar Younis ne Test cricket mein 22 times par ek innings mein five ya us se zyada wickets hasil keen. One-Day International matches mein, unhon ne sabse zyada five wickets hasil keen (13 occasions par). Waqar Younis ko 9 December 2013 ko ICC Hall of Fame mein shamil kiya gaya tha. Woh hamwatan Hanif Mohammad aur Zaheer Abbas ke saath-saath apne former team-mates Imran Khan, Javed Miandad aur Wasim Akram ke saath join hokar Hall of Fame mein shamil hone wale 70th player bane. Iss shamilat par unhon ne kaha: Yeh mere liye boht bada honor hai, main truly un logon ka shukarguzar hun jinho ne mujhe iss honor ke layak samjha. ICC tournament 2021 ke T20 World Cup mein first time Pakistan ki taraf se India ko defeat karne ke baad Waqar ne kaha ke Rizwan ko Hindus ke saamne namaz padhte dekhna boht special tha. Isne ek hungama create kar diya aur baad mein usne is comment ke liye sorry feel ki.
Imaduddin Zangi Seljuk hakoomat ki taraf se shehr Mosul ka haakim tha. Jab Seljuk hakoomat kamzor hogayi toh usne Zangi saltanat qayam kar li aur Esaiyon ko defeats par defeats de kar unki char mein se aik crusader state Edessa ka khatma kar diya jo Crusaders ne First Crusade ke baad establish ki thi. Khatam hone wali pehli Crusader state ka capital Al-Ruha tha jise aajkal Urfa kaha jata hai aur yeh Asia-e-Kuchak mein located hai. Pehli Salibi Jang ke baad Bait-ul-Muqaddas aur Palestine ke kai areas par Esaiyon ka qabza ho gaya tha aur Bait-ul-Muqaddas Esaiyon aur Yahudiyon ki tarah Musalmanon ke liye bhi bara muqaddas maqam hai kyunke yeh Musalmanon ka qibla awwal hai. Hazrat Suleman (AS), Dawood (AS), Musa (AS) aur Essa (AS) isi region mein huye aur jis tarah woh Esaiyon aur Yahudiyon ke prophets the usi tarah Musalmanon ke bhi prophets hain. Phir khud Hazrat Mohammad Mustafa (PBUH) ko jab Miraj hui to woh Masjid-e-Aqsa hi mein thehre the aur yaheen se aasman par tashreef le gaye the. In halaat mein Musalmanon ke liye possible na tha woh Palestine par Esaiyon ka qabza khamoshi ke saath allow kar lete. Unhon ne Esaiyon ka muqabla karne ki koshish ki aur jin logon ne Esaiyon se muqable mein naam kamaya un mein pehla famous shakhs Imaduddin Zangi tha. Imaduddin 1085 mein Qasim ud-Dawla Abu Sa'id ke ghar paida hue jo Seljuk Sultan Malik Shah I ki hukumat mein Aleppo ke Governor the. 1094 mein baghawat ke ilzam mein unke father ka sir qalam kar diya gaya jiske baad Imaduddin Zangi Mosul ke Governor ke paas palay barhay. Imad 1127 mein Mosul aur 1128 mein Aleppo ke Atabeg bane aur dono cities ko apne control mein le aaye. Imaduddin Zangi ka sabse bara car-nama 1144 mein aik Salibi riyasat Edessa ka khatma tha. Zangi ne 24 December 1144 ko us par qabza kar liya. Edessa ka end Second Crusade ki wajah bana. Damascus ke acquisition ki continuous efforts ke dauraan 1146 mein ek French slave ne Imaduddin ko shaheed kar diya. Imaduddin Zangi Saltanat ka founder tha. Uske intiqal ke baad bara beta Saifuddin Ghazi Mosul mein jabkay dusra beta Nooruddin Aleppo mein uska successor bana.
Khudadad Khan 20 October 1888 mein Chakwal ke gaon Dhab mein paida hue, pehle Hindustani the jinhein Victoria Cross se nawaza gaya. Victoria Cross Britain ka sabse bara military honour hai. Yeh honour 1857 mein establish hua tha. Yeh sabse bara honour hai jo British army ko dushman ke against bravery show karne par mil sakta hai. Sipahi Khudadad Khan the jo mauza Dhab, tehsil Chakwal, zila Jhelum ke rehne wale the. Unka taluq Baloch Regiment se tha, us waqt Number 129 Duke of Connaught's Own Baluchis kehlati thi aur Karachi mein deploy thi. First World War ke dauran Sipahi Khudadad Khan ko France jaane ka order mila. Woh 24 August 1914 ko samandar ke raste Karachi se rawana hue aur 29 September ko France ki bandargah Marseilles par pahuche jahan unhein Hollybek ke war front par deploy kiya gaya. Yeh 13 October 1914 ka waqia hai jab Sipahi Khudadad Khan ke daste ka Commanding Officer dushman ki firing se badly injured ho gaya aur machine gun chalane wale panch sipahi bhi one-by-one mare gaye. Aise mein Sipahi Khudadad Khan injured hone ke bawajood boht determination se apni machine gun chalate rahe. Is conflict mein 7 British aur 5 Hindi officers aur 124 soldiers mare gaye. 64 missing hue jo dead assume kiye gaye. Sipahi Khudadad Khan ke is brave act ke recognition ke taur par British government ne 31 October 1914 ko unhein Britain ka sabse bara military honour Victoria Cross dene ka announce kiya. Victoria Cross milne ke baad Sipahi Khudadad Khan ko Subedar Khudadad Khan bana diya gaya. Aapka taluq mojuda Pakistan ke zila Chakwal se tha. Aap Minhas Rajput qabile se belong karte the. 8 March 1971 ko CMH Rawalpindi mein demise hua aur aapko Mandi Bahauddin ke Chak No. 25 mein dafnaya gaya.
Mohammad Akbar Khan MBE, (pedaysh: 19 April 1897 - wafat: 1993) British Indian Army aur baad mein Pakistani Army se related military officer the. Unhon ne army mein employment ka start 17 July 1920 ko as a Second Lieutenant ke post se kiya. World War I aur II mein military abilities ke jauhar dikhaye. Unhon ne World War II ke dauran aapko apni battalion ko German army ke attack se bacha le jaane par June 1930 mein Order of British Empire (MBE) se nawaza gaya. Partition of India ke baad unhein Pakistan Army ka sabse senior most officer declare kiya gaya. Unhein Quaid-e-Azam Mohammad Ali Jinnah ka pehla ADC banne ka honor bhi hasil hai. Aapka taluq zila Chakwal se tha.
Nooruddin Abu Al-Qasim Mahmud ibn Imaduddin Zangi (Feb 1118 – 15 May 1174), generally Nooruddin Zangi ke naam se jaana jaata hai, aik Turkman the jinka taluq Zangi dynasty se tha. Unhon ne Seljuk Empire ke Syrian province (Syria) par rule kiya. Nooruddin Zangi ne 1146 se 1174 tak rule kiya. Unka shumar Second Crusade ki aik important personality mein kiya jaata hai. Zangi saltanat ke bani Imaduddin Zangi ke bete the jinho ne history mein boht naam kamaya. Nooruddin February 1118 mein paida hue. Usne Isaiyon se Bait-ul-Muqaddas wapas lene ke liye pehle ek strong government establish karne ki try ki aur is goal ko achieve karne ke liye as pas ki choti choti Muslim governments ko end karke unko apni territory mein add kar liya. Starting mein Nooruddin ka capital Aleppo tha. 549 Hijri mein usne Damascus par qabza karke use capital declare kiya. Usne Crusader state Antioch par attacks karke kai forts par qabza kar liya aur baad mein state Edessa par Musalmanon ka qabza end karne ki Isaiyon ki koshish ko bhi fail kar diya. Second Crusade ke dauran Damascus par qabza karne ki koshishon ko bhi Saifuddin Ghazi aur Mu'inuddin ki help se fail kar diya aur Bait-ul-Muqaddas se Isaiyon ko nikalne ka raasta clear kar diya. Doosri Salibi Jang mein victory ki wajah se hi Musalman teesri Salibi Jang mein victorious hokar Bait-ul-Muqaddas wapas lene mein successful hue.
