Us zamane mein Egypt mein Fatimid hukoomat qayam thi lekin ab woh bilkul weak ho gayi thi aur Egypt kyunke Palestine se mila hua tha isliye Isai us par qabza karna chahte the. Yeh dekh kar Nooruddin ne ek army bhej kar 564 mein Egypt par bhi qabza kar liya aur Fatimid hukoomat ka khatma kar diya. Yeh incident Madina ki history ki almost all books mein available hai. Iska zikr Shaikh Mohammad Abdul Haq Muhaddith Dehlvi (rehmatullah alaih) ne bhi apni book Tarikh-e-Madina mein teen bari conspiracies ke saath kiya hai jismein se yeh incident sabse famous hai. Samhudi ke qaul ke according Isaiyon ne yeh conspiracy 557 Hijri mein banayi. Uss waqt Syria ke king ka naam Sultan Nooruddin Zangi tha aur uske advisor ka naam Jamaluddin Isfahani tha. Ek night Tahajjud ki prayer ke baad Sultan Nooruddin Zangi ne dream mein dekha ke Prophet Karim (PBUH) do red-ish complexion ke logon ki taraf point karke Sultan se keh rahe hain ke mujhe inke shar se bachao. Sultan hadbada kar utha. Wazu kiya, nafal ada kiye aur phir uski aankh lag gayi. Dream dekhne ke baad aap yahan kyun bethe hain? Iska ab kisi se mention na karein aur immediately Madina ke liye depart ho jayein. Next day Sultan ne 20 selected individuals aur boht se gifts ke saath Madina ke liye journey start ki aur 16th day evening time wahan pahunch gaya. Sultan ne Roza-e-Rasool par haazri di aur Masjid-e-Nabwi mein beth gaya. Announce kiya ke Ahl-e-Madina Masjid-e-Nabwi mein pahunch jayein jahan Sultan unmein gifts distribute karega. Log aate gaye aur Sultan har aane wale ko one-by-one gift deta raha. Iss dauran woh har shakhs ko ghaur se dekhta raha lekin woh do faces nazar na aaye jo use ek raat mein teen baar dream mein dikhaye gaye the. Sultan ne hazireen se poocha, Kya Madina ka har citizen mujhse mil chuka hai? Jawab affirmative mein tha. Sultan ne phir poocha, Kya tumhein yaqeen hai ke har citizen mujhse mil chuka hai? Is baar hazireen ne kaha, Except do logon ke. Raaz almost reveal ho chuka tha. Sultan ne poocha, Woh kon hain aur apna gift lene kyun nahin aaye? Bataya gaya ke yeh Morocco ke fast aur prayers ke paband do pious residents hain. Din raat Prophet Karim (PBUH) par durood-o-salaam bhejte hain aur har week Masjid-e-Quba jaate hain. Generous aur hospitable hain. Kisi ka diya nahin lete. Sultan ne kaha, Subhanallah! aur order diya ke un dono ko bhi apne gifts receive karne ke liye immediately bulaya jaye. Jab unhein yeh special message mila toh unhon ne kaha, Alhamdulillah! hamare paas Allah ka diya sab kuch hai aur hamein kisi gift ya charity ki need nahin. Jab yeh reply Sultan tak pahunchaya gaya toh usne order diya ke un dono ko immediately present kiya jaye. Order ki prompt compliance hui. Ek glimpse unki identification ke liye enough thi however Sultan ne apna anger control mein rakha aur poocha, Tum kon ho? Yahan kyun aaye ho? Unhon ne kaha hum Morocco ke rehne wale hain. Hajj ke liye aaye the aur ab Roza-e-Rasool ke saaye mein life spend karna chahte hain. Sultan ne strongly kaha, Kya tumne jhoot bolne ki qasam kha rakhi hai? Ab woh chup rahe. Sultan ne hazireen se poocha, Yeh kahan reh rahe hain? Bataya gaya ke Roza-e-Nabwi ke bilkul close ek house mein jo Masjid-e-Nabwi ke south-west mein wall ke saath tha. Sultan immediately utha aur unhein saath le kar us house mein enter ho gaya. Sultan house mein ghoomta phirta raha. Suddenly new aur expensive stuff se bhare huye iss house mein uski nazar floor par padi hui ek chatai par padi. Nazar padni thi ke dono Moroccan residents ki hawaiyan ud gayin. Sultan ne chatai uthayi. Uske neeche ek recently excavated tunnel thi. Sultan ne garaj kar kaha, Kya ab bhi sach na bologe? Unke paas sach ke ilawa koi option na tha. Unhon ne confess kiya ke woh Christians hain aur unke ruler ne unhein boht sa wealth aur resources de kar Hajjis ke disguise mein Morocco se iss project par Hijaz bheja tha ke woh kisi na kisi tarah Prophet Karim (PBUH) ka sacred body Roza-e-Mubarak se nikal kar le aayein. Is impure plan ki completion ke liye unhon ne Hajj ka excuse banaya aur uske baad Roza-e-Rasool se nearest jo house rent par mil sakta tha woh le kar apna evil work start kar diya. Har night woh tunnel dig karte jiska direction Roza-e-Mubarak ki taraf tha aur har morning excavated soil leather bags mein bhar kar Jannat-ul-Baqi le jaate aur usse graves par spread kar dete. Unhon ne bataya ke unki impure mission bilkul final stages mein thi ke ek night heavy rain ke saath aisi thunder-storm hui jaise earthquake aa gaya ho aur ab jabke unka kaam completion tak pahunchne wala tha toh Sultan na jaane kaise Madina pahunch gaye. Sultan unki conversation sunte jaate aur rote jaate aur saath hi farmate jaate ke Mera naseeb! Ke puri duniya mein se iss service ke liye iss ghulam ko chuna gaya. Sultan Nooruddin Zangi ne order diya ke un dono ko execute kar diya jaye aur Roza-e-Mubarak ke around ek trench dig ki jaye aur usse melted lead se cover kar diya jaye taaki future mein koi badbakht aisi evil act ke baare mein soch bhi na sake. Mentioned incident 558 Hijri (corresponding to 1142 AD) ka hai. Sultan ne Roza-e-Mubarak ke close ek chabutra bhi banwaya taaki us par un graves ki protection ke liye hamesha guards rahein. Yeh chabutra ab bhi available hai aur Bab-e-Jibrael se enter hote hi right side par hai. Kuch visitors use Maqam-e-Suffa samajhte hain halanke Maqam-e-Ashab-e-Suffa Masjid-e-Nabwi ke andar tha jabke chabutra us waqt ki Masjid ki boundary wall se bahar tha. Maqam-e-Ashab-e-Suffa ke determination ke liye Ustwanah-e-Aisha se north ki taraf chalein (yani qibla ki direction ke against) fifth pillar ke close Maqam-e-Ashab-e-Suffa hai. Egypt par qabza karne ke baad Nooruddin ne Bait-ul-Muqaddas par attack karne ki preparations start kar di. Bait-ul-Muqaddas ki Masjid Umar mein rakhne ke liye usne high-quality minbar prepare karwaya. Uski khwahish thi ke Fatah Bait-ul-Muqaddas ke baad woh is minbar ko apne haathon se rakhega lekin Allah ko yeh manzoor na tha. Nooruddin abhi attack ki preparations hi kar raha tha ke Zangi ko Hashashin ne poison diya jis se unke throat mein inflammation ho gayi jo ke unki death ka cause bani. 15 May 1174 ko unka demise ho gaya. Demise ke waqt Nooruddin ki age 58 years thi. Nooruddin bahaduri mein apne baap ki tarah tha. Ek baar jang mein use dushmanon ki line mein baar baar ghuste dekh kar uske ek advisor Qutbuddin ne kaha: Aye hamare badshah! Apne aap ko test mein na daaliye agar aap mare gaye toh dushman iss country ko conquer kar lenge aur Muslims ki condition destroy ho jayegi. Nooruddin ne yeh baat suni toh us par boht naraz hua aur kaha: Qutbuddin! Zaban ko roko, tum Allah ke huzoor gustakhi kar rahe ho. Mujhse pehle iss deen aur mulk ka protector Allah ke siwa kon tha? Nooruddin ne Shariat ki khud pabandi ki aur apne companions ko bhi paband banaya. Unhein dekh kar doosron ne follow kiya jiski waja se public mein Islam par amal karne ka jazba paida ho gaya aur log khilaf-e-Shara kaam-o-kary ka zikr se bhi sharmany lagay. Nooruddin sirf ek conqueror nahin tha balkay ek kind ruler aur education-loving king tha. Usne saltanat mein madarson aur hospitals ka network faila diya. Uske justice ke stories boht door door tak famous the. Woh boht simple life spend karta tha, Bait-ul-Maal ka paisa kabhi personal expenses mein nahin laya. War booty se usne kuch shops buy kar li thi jinke rent se woh apna kharch pura karta tha. Usne apne liye bade bade palaces construct nahin kiye balkay Bait-ul-Maal ka paisa madarson, shafakhanon aur musafir khanon ke establish karne aur public welfare ke other works mein spend karta. Damascus mein usne ek splendid hospital establish kiya tha jiski duniya mein example na thi. Us mein patients ko medicine bhi free di jaati thi aur khane aur rehne ka kharch bhi government ki taraf se pay kiya jata tha. Nooruddin ne all illegal taxes abolish kar diye the. Woh oppressed logon ki complaints khud sunta aur uski investigation karta tha. Nooruddin ki in qualities aur achievements ki wajah se us zamane ke ek historian Ibn al-Athir ne likha hai ke: Maine Islamic era ke rulers se le kar uss waqt tak ke sabhi kings ki history study ki lekin Khulafa-e-Rashideen aur Umar ibn Abd al-Aziz ke siwa Nooruddin se better ruler meri nazar se na guzra.
Iftikhar Khan un high Pakistani faujiyon mein shamil the jo Pakistan ko British India se inherit mein mile. General Douglas David ke baad Pakistan ka pehla Chief of Army Staff appoint kiya gaya tha. Lekin 1949 mein aik hawai crash mein aapki death naye Pakistan ke liye aik sadma thi. General Nawabzada Sher Ali Khan Pataudi ke according agar General Iftikhar is tarah na marte toh Pakistan ki current situation different hoti. Na koi Ayub Khan hota aur na Pakistan Army politics mein shamil hoti.
Victoria Cross British army ka sabse top military honour hai jo British Armed Forces ya Commonwealth Countries ki taraf se aise soldier ko diya jata hai jo dushman ke against bravery aur courage se fight karte hue battlefield mein apni jaan de de. Aise soldier ko Victoria Cross posthumously uski bravery aur gallantry ke acknowledgement mein diya jata hai. Initially yeh honour Commonwealth Countries ke sabhi countries ke liye tha, jaise hi in countries ne apne national military honours announce kiye toh Victoria Cross sirf United Kingdom tak limited ho gaya. Victoria Cross British army ke har us institution mein apni services perform karne wale soldiers ke liye hai jo British military system ke under aata ho. 1879 ke baad kisi normal citizen ko yeh honour nahin diya gaya. Victoria Cross ki ceremony Buckingham Palace mein hoti hai. Victoria Cross ka issue 29 January 1856 ko Queen Victoria ne kiya aur yeh first time 1857 mein diya gaya. Crimean War ke baad Queen Victoria ke reign mein Victoria Cross jari kiya gaya. Ab tak Victoria Cross receive karne wale soldiers ki total number 1,358 hai jin mein 1,355 soldiers ko individually yeh honour diya gaya. 15 medals mein se 11 medals British Army ko aur 4 medals Australian Army ko diye gaye jinki services World War II ke liye dedicated thi. 1967 mein Canada, 1975 mein Australia aur New Zealand mein Victoria Cross suspend ho gaya. Iski bari wajah yeh thi ke in countries ne khud apne national honours adopt kar liye. 5 October 1853 ko 39 saal ke aman ke daur ke baad United Kingdom aur Russia ke beech jang chid gayi. History mein yeh jang Crimean War ke naam se famous hai aur yeh jang nineteenth century ki jango mein top par hai ke isse modern information ka silsila start hua. William Howard Russell jo Ireland ka resident tha, is jang mein soldiers ki bravery aur gallantry ke kisse newspaper The Times ke through British public tak pahunchata raha. Jang-e-Crimea tak United Kingdom mein British Armed Forces ki bravery aur gallantry ki services ke liye koi official award muqarrar nahin tha. Fauji sirf apne related department ya field mein promotion paate the aur yeh promotion paane wala group bhi just chand afraad ke siwa nahin hota tha. Doosre European countries mein faujiyon ki services ke badle mein unhein promotion di jaati aur unse preferential treatment kiya jata tha. France mein 1802 mein Legion of Honour ke naam se award diya jaane laga. Netherlands mein 1815 mein military medal William ka issue hua. In awards aur medals ke issue ka basic purpose yeh tha ke public circles mein un faujiyon ki services ka official acknowledgement kiya jaye jinho ne mulk-o-qaum ki khatir jaan di ya outstanding achievements perform keen. Doosre countries ke taur tareeqe awards ko adopt karte hue Queen of United Kingdom Queen Victoria ne 29 January 1856 ko ek royal resolution, royal code, signature ko approve kar liya jis ke according aise British soldier ko Victoria Cross diya jayega jisne jang mein bravery aur gallantry ka car-nama perform kiya ho ya military services mein top par ho. British constitution mein isse VC ke naam se adopt kiya gaya. Pehla Victoria Cross 1854 ki Crimean War ke soldiers ko bravery ke reward mein diya gaya.
Kish Irani ke qareeb ek island hai.
Saleem aur Suleman ke time mein Usmani Bahriya dunya ki azeem tareen bahri quwwat bani jis ne Bahira-e-Rum ke beshtar ilaqon ko fateh kia. In futuhat mein aham tareen kirdar Usmani Ameer ul Bahar Khairuddin Pasha Barbarossa ka raha jis ne Suleman ke daur mein kai shandar askari futuhat hasil kin. Jis mein Spain ke khilaf Tunis aur Algeria ki futuhat aur Suqoot-e-Gharnata ke baad wahan ke Musalmano aur Yahudion ki bahifazat Usmani sarzameen tak muntaqili aur 1543 mein Muqaddas Romi Saltanat ke khilaf Nice ki fateh qabil-e-zikr hain. 16th century mein Maghribi European quwaton, khasusan Portuguese ki Khaleej-e-Fars aur Bahr-e-Hind mein barhti hui quwwat ne Usmani Bahriya ke liye shadeed mushkilat paida kin. Usmanion ki janib se Mashriq aur Junub ke raaste band kar dene ke ba'is European quwaten Asia ke liye naye raston ki talash mein nikal parin. Aur Hind-o-Cheen ke liye naye raaste daryaft kiye. 1566 mein Suleman ka intiqal ilaqai futuhat ke khatme ka nuqta-e-aghaz sabit hua. Maghribi Europe ki saltanaton ka ba-tor bahri quwwat ubharna aur Europe se Asia ke liye mutabadil raston aur Nai Duniya (America) ki daryaft ne Usmani economy ko zabardast nuqsan pohanchaya. Aise nazuk waqt mein jab Saltanat-e-Usmania ko bedar maghz hukmarano ki zaroorat thi badqismati se use nalaik hukmarano ke taweel daur ko sehna para jis ne dakhli wa askari mahaz par mamlakat ko shadeed nuqsan pohanchaya. In tamam mushkilat ke bawajood 1683 mein Jang-e-Vienna tak saltanat ki futuhat ka silsila jari raha taham is jung ke baad Europe mein saltanat ki tauosee ka mukammal khatma ho gaya. Maghribi Europe ki janib se naye tijarati raston ki talash o daryaft ke ilawa Nai Duniya se Spain mein bari miqdar mein chandi ki amad Usmani sikkay ki qadar mein tezi se be-qadri ka ba'is bani. Saleem Sani ke daur mein Sadr-e-Azam Muhammad Pasha Soqolli ne economy ko istehkam bakhshne ke liye Suez Canal aur Don-Volga Canal ki taameer ke mansooba jaat pesh kiye lekin un par amal daramad na ho saka. Isi daur mein Junubi Europe mein Spain ke Philip Sani ki zer-e-qiyadat Catholic quwaton ne Bahira-e-Rum mein Usmani Bahriya ki quwwat ko nuqsan pohanchane ke liye gath jor kar liya. 1571 mein Jang-e-Lepanto mein shikast Bahira-e-Rum mein saltanat ki bartari ke fori khatme ka ba'is bani. Is liye mutaddid morakhon ne Jang-e-Lepanto mein shikast ko Usmani Saltanat ke zawaal ka ishara qarar diya hai. Is tarah 16th century ke ikhtitam tak futuhat o kamyabion ke sunhere daur ka khatma ho gaya. Usmanion ki aik makhsus maqam par ja kar futuhat ke ruk jane ki kai wujuhat hain aik to daur-e-qadeem mein jughrafiyai khususiyaat ke ba'is mahdoodiyat jin ki wajah se bahar ke ibtedai daur se khazan ke akhri ayyam tak ke jangi mausam mein Usmani fauj Vienna se aage nahi ja sakti thi. Deegar wujuhat mein sarhadon ke dono janib do mukhtalif harifon (Europe mein Austria aur Asia mein Iran ke Safawi hukmaran) ke khilaf aik waqt jung karna shamil hai. Alawa azeen fikri, zehni o askari jamood ne Usmanion ke zawaal par mohar sabt kar di kyon ke askari tor par jadeed hathiyaron ka istemal hi wasee paimanay aur tezi se futuhat ka sabab tha aur mazhabi o danishwar tabqay ke barhtay hue daqyanusi khayalat ne Europeans ki jadeed askari technology ke muqablay mein Usmanion ko kafi peechay chor diya. Yeni Chari, jin se Europe ki tamam afwaj kanpti thin, aaram pasand ho gain aur mulk ke siyasi mamlaat mein mudakhlat ke ba'is riyasat ki tabahi ka sabab bani. Safawion se Yerevan (1635) aur Baghdad (1639) cheenne wale Murad Chaharum (1612 ta 1640) is daur ke wahid hukmaran jinhon ne siyasi o askari tor par saltanat ko mazboot banaya. Murad Chaharum hi wo akhri Sultan thay jinhon bazat-e-khud afwaj ki qayadat ki. 16th century ke akhir aur 17th century ke awail mein Jalali baghawat (1519-1610) aur Yeni Chari baghawat (1622) ne Anatolia mein bade paimanay par laqanooniyat aur fasadat ko farogh diya aur mutaddid hukumaton ke khatme ka sabab bana. Is tarah 17th century Usmanion ke liye jamood aur zawaal ki century rahi. 1530 se 1660 tak ke daur mein harem ki mulki mamlaat mein mudakhlat aur asraat se bhi qata nazar nahi kia ja sakta jis mein sab se aham kirdar naujawan Sultan ki maon ka raha. Is daur ki numaya khawateen mein Khurram Sultan, Kosam Sultan aur Turhan Khatoon aur deegar shamil hain. Jamood ke daur mein Balkan ke kai ilaqay Austria ke qabze mein aa gaye. Riyasat ke mutaddid ilaqay, jaise Egypt aur Algeria, mukammal tor par khud mukhtar ho gaye aur bilakhir Saltanat-e-Bartaniya aur France ke qabze mein chalay gaye. 17th se 19th century ke dauran mein Russia aur Saltanat-e-Usmania ke darmiyan mein kai jangen bhi lari gayin jinhen Turk-Rus jangen kaha jata hai. Usmanion ke jamood ke is taweel daur ko morakheen nakam islahat ka daur bhi qarar diya hai. Is daur ke awakhir mein riyasat mein taleemi o takneeki islahat bhi ki gayin aur Istanbul Technical University jaise aala taleem ke idare qaim hue. Lekin qadeem soch ke hamil mazhabi o askari tabqe se islahat ki shadeed tareen mukhalifat ki hatta ke chhapa khano tak ko shaitani ijad qarar diya gaya jis ke ba'is 1450 mein Europe mein chhapa khane ki ijad ke baad 43 saal tak Saltanat-e-Usmania chhapa khano se mahroom rahi lekin 1493 mein Spain se be-dakhal kiye gaye Yahudion ne Istanbul mein pehla chhapa khana qaim kiya. Daur-e-Lala Sultan Ahmed Salis ke puraman daur aur gul-e-lala se muhabbat ke ba'is Daur-e-Lala kahlata hai. 1712 mein Russia ke khilaf Pruth muhim mein kamyabi aur is ke baad Mu'ahida-e-Pasarovich ke ba'is 1718 se 1730 tak ka daur puraman raha. Is daur mein saltanat ne Europe ki pesh qadmi ke khilaf mazboot defence ke pesh-e-nazar Balkan ke mukhtalif shehron mein qila bandiyan kin. Deegar islahat mein mahsulat mein kami; Usmani Saltanat ke beron-e-mumalik mein tasawwur ko behtar banana aur niji milkiiyat o sarmayakari ki ijazat shamil hain. Usmanion mein askari islahat ka aghaz Saleem Salis (1789-1807) ke daur mein hua jinhon ne European khatut par afwaj ko jadeed tar banane ke liye aham iqdamat uthaye. Halanke in iqdamat ki mazhabi qayadat aur Yeni Chari dastoon ne khul kar mukhalifat ki aur is ke nateejay mein Yeni Chari ne baghawat bhi ki. Aur Saleem ko apni islahat ka khamiyaza hukoomat aur jaan dono se haath dhone ki surat mein uthana para lekin us ke janasheen Mehmood Sani ne in tamam islahat ko nafaz kar ke dam liya aur 1826 mein Yeni Chari ka mukammal khatma kar diya gaya. Usmanion ka daur-e-zawaal ko morakheen jadeed daur bhi qarar dete hain. Is daur mein saltanat ne har mahaz par shikast khai aur us ki sarhaden sikurti chali gayin Tanzimat (islahat) ke bawajood markazi hakoomat ki nakami ke ba'is intizami adam istehkam paida hua. 19th century ke dauran mein Saltanat-e-Usmania samait kai mumalik mein qaum parasti ko urooj naseeb hua. Nasli qaum parasti ki la'nat in Maghribi nazriyat mein sab se aham thi jo is duran mein Saltanat-e-Usmania mein warid huin. Is duran mein kai inqilabi siyasi jamatein bhi wujood mein aa gayin. Mamlakat mein aaye din barhta hua bigaar ke jahan deegar kai asbab thay wahin zawaal ki aham tareen wajuhat mein qaum parasti ka phailao bhi shamil hai. Is arsay mein 1892 mein Greece ne azadi hasil ki aur islahat bhi Danube ki imarton mein qaum parasti ko na rok sakien aur 6 ashron se neem khud mukhtar in ilaqon Serbia, Montenegro, Bosnia, Wallachia aur Moldova ne bhi 1875 mein saltanat se azadi ka elan kar diya aur 1877 ki Rus-Turk jang ke baad Serbia, Romania aur Montenegro ko baqaida azadi mil gain aur Bulgaria ko khud mukhtari ata kar di gai albata Balkan ki deegar riyasatein badastoor Usmani qabze mein rahin. Zawaal ke isi daur mein Serbia ke ek Yahudi Yehuda Solomon Alkalai ne Zion ki taraf wapsi aur Israel ki azadi ka nazariya pesh kiya. Daur-e-Tanzimat (1839 ta 1876) mein aaieni islahat ka ek silsila mutaarif karaya gaya jis ke nateejay mein ek nisbatan jadeed army, banking system ki islahat nafaz huin aur modern factories qaim huin. 1856 mein Khat-e-Humayun ke zariye nasal o mazhab se balatar ho kar tamam Usmani shehrion ko barabari ka darja dene ka elan kia gaya. Maseehi aqalliyaton ko bhi khususi huqooq ata kiye gaye jaise 1863 mein Armenian danishwaron ki murattab karda 150 shuqoon ke zabta qanoon ke तहत manzoor shuda Deewan-e-Nizam Nama-e-Millat-e-Armenian. Islahat ke is daur ki sab se aham baat woh Dastoor tha jo Qanoon-e-Asasi kahlata tha jise Naujawanan-e-Usman ne tehreer kia aur 23 Nov 1876 ko nafaz kia gaya. Is ke zariye tamam shehrion ke liye izhar-e-ra'ay ki azadi aur qanoon ki nazar mein barabari ata ki gayin. Saltanat ka pehla aaieni daur mukhtasar raha lekin is ke nateeje mein jo nazariya farogh paya woh Maghribi universities mein taleem pane wale Naujawanan-e-Usmania nami islah pasand giroh ke mutabiq yeh tha ke ek aaieni badshahat mamlakat ke barhtay hue masail ka khatma kar sakti hai. 1876 mein fouji takht ke zariye Sultan Abdulaziz (1861 ta 1876) Murad Panjum ke haq mein dastbardar ho gaye. Murad Panjum zehni mazoor tha aur chand mah mein hi ohday se hata diya gaya. Un ke mumkinah janasheen Abdul Hamid Sani (1876 ta 1909) ko is shart par badshahat sambhalne ki dawat di gai ke woh aaieni badshahat ko tasleem karenge jis par unhon ne 23 Nov 1876 ko amal bhi kiya. Lekin Parliament sirf do saal qaim rahi aur Sultan ne use moattal kar diya aur baad azan Parliament ko talab karne ke liye un par dabao dala gaya. Taham Qanoon-e-Asasi ke asraat kafi had tak kam ho gaye. Is arsay mein saltanat ko berooni jarhiyat aur qabza geeri ke khilaf apne defence ke hawalay se shadeed khatrat ka samna raha. 1798 mein France ne Egypt par qabza kar liya. 1877 ki Rus-Turk jang mein shikast ke baad Berlin Congress mein himayat ke silay mein 1878 mein Eyalet-e-Cyprus patte par Britain ke hawalay karna para. Saltanat apne masail ko khud hal karne ke qabil na rahi aur mukhtalif European mumalik ki mudakhlat o ittihad ke zariye us ke masail hal hone pare misal ke tor par Jang-e-Crimea jis mein Usmanion ne Russia ke khilaf Britain aur France se ittihad kiya. Halanke is arsay mein use Europe ka mard-e-bimar kaha gaya lekin ma'ashi tor par saltanat ki bad-hali ka sabab us ki taraqqi pazir economy mein nahi tha balkay woh saqafti khala tha jo use European quwaton se alag kiye deta tha. Eqtisadi masail darasal berooni samrajiyat aur ubharti hui dakhli qaum parasti jaise masail se na nimat paane ki wajah se thay. Doosra aaieni daur Saltanat-e-Usmania ki hatmi tehleel par muntij hua. Is daur mein Ittihad o Taraqqi Jamiyati ki politics aur Naujawanan-e-Turk ka sabab banne wali tehreek numaya tareen hain. Naujawanan-e-Turk ke inqilab ka aghaz 3 July 1908 ko hua aur jald hi tehreek saltanat bhar mein phail gai aur natijatan Sultan ko 1876 ke constitution ki bahali ka elan aur Parliament ko talab karna para. Aaieni daur mein 1909 ke jawabi takht aur Waqiya 31 March ke jawabi inqilab ke dauran mein rukhnah aaya jis ke saath hi Sultan Abdul Hamid Sani ke daur ka khatma kar diya gaya aur unhen jilawatan kar diya gaya aur un ki jagah un ke bhai Mohammad Panjum ko takht par bithaya gaya. Naujawanan-e-Turk ke inqilab ke dauran mein Saltanat-e-Usmania ki dakhli soorat-e-haal ka faida uthate hue 1908 mein Austria-Hungary ne maqbooza Bosnia-Herzegovina ka bazabta ilhaq kar liya. Austria-Hungary ne 1877 ki Rus-Turk jang aur Berlin Congress (1878) ke baad is par qabza kiya tha. Italia-Turk jangon ke dauran mein Serbia, Montenegro, Greece aur Bulgaria par mushtamil Balkan League ne Saltanat-e-Usmania ke khilaf elan-e-jang kar diya jis ke nateeje mein Saltanat-e-Usmania ko Balkan War (1912-1913) ka samna karna para aur use Jazeera Numa Balkan ke kai ilaqon se haath dhona para. Libya aur Jazeera Numa Balkan mein jangen Ittihad o Taraqqi Jamiyati ka pehla bara imtihan thin. Italia-Turk jangon mein saltanat ko Libya se bhi haath dhona para. Yeh pehli jang thi jis mein dunya mein pehli baar medan-e-jang mein hawai jahazon ka istemal bhi kiya gaya. 19th century ke akhir mein qaim hone wali Balkan riyasatein nasli o qaumi bunyadon par Albania, Macedonia aur Thrace (Traqiya) ke Usmani sobhonn se bhi izafi ilaqon ke husool ki khwahish mand thin. Ibtedai tor par March 1912 mein Serbia aur Bulgaria aur May 1912 mein Greece aur Bulgaria ke darmiyan mu'ahiday tay paye jis mein Russia ne salis ka kirdar ada kiya. Serb-Bulgari mu'ahiday mein Macedonia ki taqseem ka mutalba kiya gaya tha jo pehli Balkan War ka sab se aham sabab bana. Doosri Balkan War ke aghaz ka aham sabab sabiq Balkan ittihadiyon mein naye hasil karda ilaqon ki taqseem par paida hone wale tanaza'at thay jis se Saltanat-e-Usmania ne bharpoor faida uthaya aur Thrace mein kai ilaqay dobara fateh kar liye. Balkan War ke siyasi nata'ij 1913 ke takht aur Teen Pashaaon ki hukoomat ka sabab bane. Pehli Jang-e-Azeem mein Baghdad Railway par German ikhtiyar international tor par kashidgi ka ek masla aham tha. Saltanat-e-Usmania ne Pehli Jang-e-Azeem ke Middle East medan mein hissa liya jis ka sabab Turk-German ittihad tha. Usmanion ne jang ke ibtedai daur mein do aham futuhat, Jang-e-Gallipoli aur Muhasira-e-Kut, hasil kin lekin use kai dhachke bhi pohanche jaise Russia ke khilaf tabah kun Caucasus muhim. 1917 ke Russian Revolution ne Usmanion ko shikast ke daagh dhone aur khoye hue ilaqay hasil karne ka mauqa faraham kiya aur Usmani afwaj jang ke ikhtitami marhalay mein Azerbaijan ke husool mein kamyab ho gayin lekin Jang-e-Azeem ke ikhtitam par use in futuhat se haath dhona para. Is tanazay mein pesh aane wala ek mutanazia aur aham waqiya sobha Van mein Turk hukam, Usmani afwaj aur Kurd jangjuon ke hathon lakhon Armeian bashindon ka mabaiyan qatl-e-aam aur mulk badri aur is ke khilaf Armenian bashindon ki muzahamat thi. Ek markazi Armenian muzahmati giroh ne May 1915 mein Azad Ubtareemi Hukoomat ke qiyam ka elan kar diya aur Usmanion ne use Eastern Anatolia par jarhiyat karne wali Russian afwaj ka saath dene ki koshish samjha. 1917 ke ikhtitam tak Armenian Inqilabi Wifaq ne Jamhooriya-e-Armenia qaim kar di jo Armenian qatl-e-aam se bach jane wale bashindon par mushtamil thi. Wazeh rahe ke Turk hukoomat Armenian bashindon ke qatl-e-aam par yaqeen nahi rakhti. Pehli Jang-e-Azeem mein Usmanion ke shikast ke do aham asbab Edmund Allenby ki zer-e-kaman British afwaj ki aham ahdaaf par hamle aur Arab baghawat thay. In mein Arab baghawat Saltanat-e-Usmania ki shikast ka sab se bara sabab samjhi jati hai. Arab baghawat ki in muhimmat ka aghaz Sharif-e-Makkah Hussain ki janib se Britain ki madad se June 1916 mein Jang-e-Makkah se aur is ka ikhtitam Damascus mein Usmanion ke asleha phenk dene ke saath hota hai. Madina ke Usmani kamandar Fakhri Pasha ne Muhasira-e-Madina mein dhai saal se zyada arsay tak zabardast muzahamat ki. Jang-e-Azeem ke nateeje mein Saltanat-e-Usmania mein taqseem ka amal Constantinople par qabza ke 13 din baad 30 October 1918 ko Mu'ahida-e-Mudros ke zariye shuru hua. Aur baad azan Mu'ahida-e-Sèvres ke zariye Middle East mein Usmani maqboozat ko Britain aur France ke hawalay kar diya gaya jabke Bahira-e-Rum ke sahili ilaqon ko Italy, Turk Aegean sahilon ko Greece aur Abnae-e-Bosphorus aur Bahira-e-Marmara ko international ilaqay ke tor par ittihadi quwaton ke hawalay kar diya gaya. Is ke saath saath Eastern Anatolia mein Jamhooriya-e-Armenia ko tauosee dete hue Wilsonian Armenia ki tashkeel di gai jo Armenian bashindon ka qadeem watan tha taham baad azan in ilaqon mein Turk aur Kurd bhi bas gaye. Britain ne Middle East ki taqseem ke liye intehai chalaki o ayyari ke saath France ke saath Sykes-Picot nami khufia mu'ahida kiya. Istanbul aur Izmir par qabza Turk Qaumi Tehreek ke qiyam ka sabab bani aur Mustafa Kamal Pasha ki zer-e-qayadat Jang-e-Azadi ke aghaz aur Jamhooriya-e-Turkey ke qiyam ka elan kiya gaya. Mustafa Kamal ki zer-e-qayadat Turk Qaumi Tehreek ne 23 April 1920 ko Ankara mein Qaumi Majlis-e-Aala ke qiyam ka elan kiya, jis ne Istanbul mein Usmani hakoomat aur Turkey mein berooni qabze ko tasleem karne se inkar kar diya. Turk inqilabion ne Awami Fauj ke zariye Greece, Italy aur France ki afwaj ko Anatolia se nikal bahar kiya. Mu'ahida-e-Sèvres ke nateeje mein jo ilaqay Jamhooriya-e-Armenia ko mil gaye thay unhen bhi dobara hasil kiya aur Abnae par qabiz British afwaj ke liye khatra ban gai. Bilakhir Turk inqilabion ne Abnae aur Istanbul par qabza kar liya aur 1 November 1922 ko Saltanat-e-Usmania ke khatme ka elan kar diya. Akhri Sultan Muhammad Chahum Waheeduddin (1861 ta 1926) 17 November 1922 ko mulk chhor gaye aur Mu'ahida-e-Lausanne ke तहत 24 July 1923 ko bazabta tor par Turk Jamhooriya ko tasleem kar liya gaya. Chand mah baad 3 March 1924 ko Khilafat ke khatme ka elan kar diya gaya aur Sultan aur un ke ahl-e-khana ko na pasandida shakhsiyat qarar de kar jilawatan kar diya gaya. 50 saal baad 1974 mein Turk Qaumi Majlis-e-Aala ne sabiq shahi khandan ko Turk shehriyat ata karte hue watan wapsi ki ijazat de di. Saltanat-e-Usmania ke khatme ke nateeje mein jo naye mumalik qaim hue un ki ta'adad is waqt (ba shamil mutanazia Shumali Turk Jamhooriya Cyprus) 40 banti hai.
Usmani Turkon ne Asia-e-Kuchak mein dakhil hone ke baad ek aisi saltanat ki bunyad rakhi jis ne teen sau saal mein dunya ki wasee tareen aur sab se zyada taqatwar saltanat ka roop ikhtiyar kar liya aur is mein bunyadi kirdar Turk qaum ki shuja'at aur tanzeemi salahiyat thi jis ke nateeje mein Saltanat-e-Usmania jaisi wasee aur payedar saltanat qaim hui. Choonke Usmani Salateen ne Saljuqion ke nizam ko apnaya tha is liye farmarawa ka intikhab ahl-e-khandan karte thay aur khandan ka sarbarah hi badshah hota tha. Amali politics ke talluq tak badshah mutlaq ul inan aur tamam quwaton ka sarchashma hota tha taham us ke tamam iqdamat o af'aal us ki khwahish ke mutabiq nahi hote thay. Woh qanoon, nizam aur rasm o riwaj ka paband tha aur shari'at ke samne sar-e-tasleem kham kar deta tha. Islami qawaneen ko taqreeban tamam mamlaat mein bartari hasil thi aur badshah shari'at ki hudood mein reh kar apne haq o taqat ka istemal kar sakta tha. Choonke badshah ki haisiyat mutlaq ul inan farmarawa ki thi is liye jab kamzor Sultan aaye to saltanat ke umoor wuzara anjam dene lage lekin phir bhi ahkamat Sultan ki janib se sadir hote thay. Ibteda mein Usmani hukmaran khud ko Beg aur Ghazi kahlwate thay. Bayezid Awwal pehla Usmani hukmaran tha jis ne Sultan ka laqab ikhtiyar kiya aur Saleem Awwal Fatah-e-Egypt ke baad pehla Usmani Khalifa bana. Sultan Suleiman Qanooni ke zamanay tak fauj ki aala kaman Sultan ke haath mein hoti thi aur woh khud jang mein shirkat karta tha lekin baad ke hukmaranon mein yeh tareeqa na raha jis se Sultan ke waqar ko thees pohanchi.
Daur-e-Lala Sultan Ahmed Salis ke puraman daur aur gul-e-lala se muhabbat ke ba'is Daur-e-Lala kahlata hai. 1712 mein Russia ke khilaf Pruth muhim mein kamyabi aur is ke baad Mu'ahida-e-Pasarovich ke ba'is 1718 se 1730 tak ka daur puraman raha. Is daur mein saltanat ne Europe ki pesh qadmi ke khilaf mazboot defence ke pesh-e-nazar Balkan ke mukhtalif shehron mein qila bandiyan kin. Deegar islahat mein mahsulat mein kami; Usmani Saltanat ke beron-e-mumalik mein tasawwur ko behtar banana aur niji milkiiyat o sarmayakari ki ijazat shamil hain. Usmanion mein askari islahat ka aghaz Saleem Salis (1789-1807) ke daur mein hua jinhon ne European khatut par afwaj ko jadeed tar banane ke liye aham iqdamat uthaye. Halanke in iqdamat ki mazhabi qayadat aur Yeni Chari dastoon ne khul kar mukhalifat ki aur is ke nateejay mein Yeni Chari ne baghawat bhi ki. Aur Saleem ko apni islahat ka khamiyaza hukoomat aur jaan dono se haath dhone ki surat mein uthana para lekin us ke janasheen Mehmood Sani ne in tamam islahat ko nafaz kar ke dam liya aur 1826 mein Yeni Chari ka mukammal khatma kar diya gaya.
Usmanion ka daur-e-zawaal ko morakheen jadeed daur bhi qarar dete hain. Is daur mein saltanat ne har mahaz par shikast khai aur us ki sarhaden sikurti chali gayin Tanzimat (islahat) ke bawajood markazi hakoomat ki nakami ke ba'is intizami adam istehkam paida hua. 19th century ke dauran mein Saltanat-e-Usmania samait kai mumalik mein qaum parasti ko urooj naseeb hua. Nasli qaum parasti ki la'nat in Maghribi nazriyat mein sab se aham thi jo is dauran mein Saltanat-e-Usmania mein warid huin. Is dauran mein kai inqilabi siyasi jamatein bhi wujood mein aa gayin. Mamlakat mein aaye din barhta hua bigaar ke jahan deegar kai asbab thay wahin zawaal ki aham tareen wajuhat mein qaum parasti ka phailao bhi shamil hai. Is arsay mein 1892 mein Greece ne azadi hasil ki aur islahat bhi Danube ki imarton mein qaum parasti ko na rok sakien aur 6 ashron se neem khud mukhtar in ilaqon Serbia, Montenegro, Bosnia, Wallachia aur Moldova ne bhi 1875 mein saltanat se azadi ka elan kar diya aur 1877 ki Rus-Turk jang ke baad Serbia, Romania aur Montenegro ko baqaida azadi mil gain aur Bulgaria ko khud mukhtari ata kar di gai albata Balkan ki deegar riyasatein badastoor Usmani qabze mein rahin.
