Islahat ke is daur ki sab se aham baat woh Dastoor tha jo Qanoon-e-Asasi kahlata tha jise Naujawanan-e-Usman ne tehreer kia aur 23 Nov 1876 ko nafaz kia gaya. Is ke zariye tamam shehrion ke liye izhar-e-ra'ay ki azadi aur qanoon ki nazar mein barabari ata ki gayin.
Saltanat ka pehla aaieni daur mukhtasar raha lekin is ke nateeje mein jo nazariya farogh paya woh Maghribi universities mein taleem pane wale Naujawanan-e-Usmania nami islah pasand giroh ke mutabiq yeh tha ke ek aaieni badshahat mamlakat ke barhtay hue masail ka khatma kar sakti hai. 1876 mein fouji takht ke zariye Sultan Abdulaziz (1861 ta 1876) Murad Panjum ke haq mein dastbardar ho gaye. Murad Panjum zehni mazoor tha aur chand mah mein hi ohday se hata diya gaya. Un ke mumkinah janasheen Abdul Hamid Sani (1876 ta 1909) ko is shart par badshahat sambhalne ki dawat di gai ke woh aaieni badshahat ko tasleem karenge jis par unhon ne 23 Nov 1876 ko amal bhi kiya. Lekin Parliament sirf do saal qaim rahi aur Sultan ne use moattal kar diya aur baad azan Parliament ko talab karne ke liye un par dabao dala gaya. Taham Qanoon-e-Asasi ke asraat kafi had tak kam ho gaye.
Is arsay mein saltanat ko berooni jarhiyat aur qabza geeri ke khilaf apne defence ke hawalay se shadeed khatrat ka samna raha. 1798 mein France ne Egypt par qabza kar liya. 1877 ki Rus-Turk jang mein shikast ke baad Berlin Congress mein himayat ke silay mein 1878 mein Eyalet-e-Cyprus patte par Britain ke hawalay karna para. Saltanat apne masail ko khud hal karne ke qabil na rahi aur mukhtalif European mumalik ki mudakhlat o ittihad ke zariye us ke masail hal hone pare misal ke tor par Jang-e-Crimea jis mein Usmanion ne Russia ke khilaf Britain aur France se ittihad kiya. Halanke is arsay mein use Europe ka mard-e-bimar kaha gaya lekin ma'ashi tor par saltanat ki bad-hali ka sabab us ki taraqqi pazir economy mein nahi tha balkay woh saqafti khala tha jo use European quwaton se alag kiye deta tha. Eqtisadi masail darasal berooni samrajiyat aur ubharti hui dakhli qaum parasti jaise masail se na nimat paane ki wajah se thay.
Doosra aaieni daur Saltanat-e-Usmania ki hatmi tehleel par muntij hua. Is daur mein Ittihad o Taraqqi Jamiyati ki politics aur Naujawanan-e-Turk ka sabab banne wali tehreek numaya tareen hain. Naujawanan-e-Turk ke inqilab ka aghaz 3 July 1908 ko hua aur jald hi tehreek saltanat bhar mein phail gai aur natijatan Sultan ko 1876 ke constitution ki bahali ka elan aur Parliament ko talab karna para. Aaieni daur mein 1909 ke jawabi takht aur Waqiya 31 March ke jawabi inqilab ke dauran mein rukhnah aaya jis ke saath hi Sultan Abdul Hamid Sani ke daur ka khatma kar diya gaya aur unhen jilawatan kar diya gaya aur un ki jagah un ke bhai Mohammad Panjum ko takht par bithaya gaya.
Naujawanan-e-Turk ke inqilab ke dauran mein Saltanat-e-Usmania ki dakhli soorat-e-haal ka faida uthate hue 1908 mein Austria-Hungary ne maqbooza Bosnia-Herzegovina ka bazabta ilhaq kar liya. Austria-Hungary ne 1877 ki Rus-Turk jang aur Berlin Congress (1878) ke baad is par qabza kiya tha. Italia-Turk jangon ke dauran mein Serbia, Montenegro, Greece aur Bulgaria par mushtamil Balkan League ne Saltanat-e-Usmania ke khilaf elan-e-jang kar diya jis ke nateeje mein Saltanat-e-Usmania ko Balkan War (1912-1913) ka samna karna para aur use Jazeera Numa Balkan ke kai ilaqon se haath dhona para. Libya aur Jazeera Numa Balkan mein jangen Ittihad o Taraqqi Jamiyati ka pehla bara imtihan thin. Italia-Turk jangon mein saltanat ko Libya se bhi haath dhona para. Yeh pehli jang thi jis mein dunya mein pehli baar medan-e-jang mein hawai jahazon ka istemal bhi kiya gaya. 19th century ke akhir mein qaim hone wali Balkan riyasatein nasli o qaumi bunyadon par Albania, Macedonia aur Thrace (Traqiya) ke Usmani sobhonn se bhi izafi ilaqon ke husool ki khwahish mand thin. Ibtedai tor par March 1912 mein Serbia aur Bulgaria aur May 1912 mein Greece aur Bulgaria ke darmiyan mu'ahiday tay paye jis mein Russia ne salis ka kirdar ada kiya. Serb-Bulgari mu'ahiday mein Macedonia ki taqseem ka mutalba kiya gaya tha jo pehli Balkan War ka sab se aham sabab bana. Doosri Balkan War ke aghaz ka aham sabab sabiq Balkan ittihadiyon mein naye hasil karda ilaqon ki taqseem par paida hone wale tanaza'at thay jis se Saltanat-e-Usmania ne bharpoor faida uthaya aur Thrace mein kai ilaqay dobara fateh kar liye. Balkan War ke siyasi nata'ij 1913 ke takht aur Teen Pashaaon ki hukoomat ka sabab bane.
Pehli Jang-e-Azeem mein Baghdad Railway par German ikhtiyar international tor par kashidgi ka ek masla aham tha. Saltanat-e-Usmania ne Pehli Jang-e-Azeem ke Middle East medan mein hissa liya jis ka sabab Turk-German ittihad tha. Usmanion ne jang ke ibtedai daur mein do aham futuhat, Jang-e-Gallipoli aur Muhasira-e-Kut, hasil kin lekin use kai dhachke bhi pohanche jaise Russia ke khilaf tabah kun Caucasus muhim. 1917 ke Russian Revolution ne Usmanion ko shikast ke daagh dhone aur khoye hue ilaqay hasil karne ka mauqa faraham kiya aur Usmani afwaj jang ke ikhtitami marhalay mein Azerbaijan ke husool mein kamyab ho gayin lekin Jang-e-Azeem ke ikhtitam par use in futuhat se haath dhona para. Is tanazay mein pesh aane wala ek mutanazia aur aham waqiya sobha Van mein Turk hukam, Usmani afwaj aur Kurd jangjuon ke hathon lakhon Armeian bashindon ka mabaiyan qatl-e-aam aur mulk badri aur is ke khilaf Armenian bashindon ki muzahamat thi. Ek markazi Armenian muzahmati giroh ne May 1915 mein Azad Ubtareemi Hukoomat ke qiyam ka elan kar diya aur Usmanion ne use Eastern Anatolia par jarhiyat karne wali Russian afwaj ka saath dene ki koshish samjha. 1917 ke ikhtitam tak Armenian Inqilabi Wifaq ne Jamhooriya-e-Armenia qaim kar di jo Armenian qatl-e-aam se bach jane wale bashindon par mushtamil thi. Wazeh rahe ke Turk hukoomat Armenian bashindon ke qatl-e-aam par yaqeen nahi rakhti.
Pehli Jang-e-Azeem mein Usmanion ke shikast ke do aham asbab Edmund Allenby ki zer-e-kaman British afwaj ki aham ahdaaf par hamle aur Arab baghawat thay. In mein Arab baghawat Saltanat-e-Usmania ki shikast ka sab se bara sabab samjhi jati hai. Arab baghawat ki in muhimmat ka aghaz Sharif-e-Makkah Hussain ki janib se Britain ki madad se June 1916 mein Jang-e-Makkah se aur is ka ikhtitam Damascus mein Usmanion ke asleha phenk dene ke saath hota hai. Madina ke Usmani kamandar Fakhri Pasha ne Muhasira-e-Madina mein dhai saal se zyada arsay tak zabardast muzahamat ki.
Jang-e-Azeem ke nateeje mein Saltanat-e-Usmania mein taqseem ka amal Constantinople par qabza ke 13 din baad 30 October 1918 ko Mu'ahida-e-Mudros ke zariye shuru hua. Aur baad azan Mu'ahida-e-Sèvres ke zariye Middle East mein Usmani maqboozat ko Britain aur France ke hawalay kar diya gaya jabke Bahira-e-Rum ke sahili ilaqon ko Italy, Turk Aegean sahilon ko Greece aur Abnae-e-Bosphorus aur Bahira-e-Marmara ko international ilaqay ke tor par ittihadi quwaton ke hawalay kar diya gaya. Is ke saath saath Eastern Anatolia mein Jamhooriya-e-Armenia ko tauosee dete hue Wilsonian Armenia ki tashkeel di gai jo Armenian bashindon ka qadeem watan tha taham baad azan in ilaqon mein Turk aur Kurd bhi bas gaye. Britain ne Middle East ki taqseem ke liye intehai chalaki o ayyari ke saath France ke saath Sykes-Picot nami khufia mu'ahida kiya. Istanbul aur Izmir par qabza Turk Qaumi Tehreek ke qiyam ka sabab bani aur Mustafa Kamal Pasha ki zer-e-qayadat Jang-e-Azadi ke aghaz aur Jamhooriya-e-Turkey ke qiyam ka elan kiya gaya.
Mustafa Kamal ki zer-e-qayadat Turk Qaumi Tehreek ne 23 April 1920 ko Ankara mein Qaumi Majlis-e-Aala ke qiyam ka elan kiya, jis ne Istanbul mein Usmani hakoomat aur Turkey mein berooni qabze ko tasleem karne se inkar kar diya. Turk inqilabion ne Awami Fauj ke zariye Greece, Italy aur France ki afwaj ko Anatolia se nikal bahar kiya. Mu'ahida-e-Sèvres ke nateeje mein jo ilaqay Jamhooriya-e-Armenia ko mil gaye thay unhen bhi dobara hasil kiya aur Abnae par qabiz British afwaj ke liye khatra ban gai. Bilakhir Turk inqilabion ne Abnae aur Istanbul par qabza kar liya aur 1 November 1922 ko Saltanat-e-Usmania ke khatme ka elan kar diya. Akhri Sultan Muhammad Chahum Waheeduddin (1861 ta 1926) 17 November 1922 ko mulk chhor gaye aur Mu'ahida-e-Lausanne ke तहत 24 July 1923 ko bazabta tor par Turk Jamhooriya ko tasleem kar liya gaya. Chand mah baad 3 March 1924 ko Khilafat ke khatme ka elan kar diya gaya aur Sultan aur un ke ahl-e-khana ko na pasandida shakhsiyat qarar de kar jilawatan kar diya gaya. 50 saal baad 1974 mein Turk Qaumi Majlis-e-Aala ne sabiq shahi khandan ko Turk shehriyat ata karte hue watan wapsi ki ijazat de di. Saltanat-e-Usmania ke khatme ke nateeje mein jo naye mumalik qaim hue un ki ta'adad is waqt (ba shamil mutanazia Shumali Turk Jamhooriya Cyprus) 40 banti hai.
Usmani Turkon ne Asia-e-Kuchak mein dakhil hone ke baad ek aisi saltanat ki bunyad rakhi jis ne teen sau saal mein dunya ki wasee tareen aur sab se zyada taqatwar saltanat ka roop ikhtiyar kar liya aur is mein bunyadi kirdar Turk qaum ki shuja'at aur tanzeemi salahiyat thi jis ke nateeje mein Saltanat-e-Usmania jaisi wasee aur payedar saltanat qaim hui. Choonke Usmani Salateen ne Saljuqion ke nizam ko apnaya tha is liye farmarawa ka intikhab ahl-e-khandan karte thay aur khandan ka sarbarah hi badshah hota tha. Amali politics ke talluq tak badshah mutlaq ul inan aur tamam quwaton ka sarchashma hota tha taham us ke tamam iqdamat o af'aal us ki khwahish ke mutabiq nahi hote thay. Woh qanoon, nizam aur rasm o riwaj ka paband tha aur shari'at ke samne sar-e-tasleem kham kar deta tha. Islami qawaneen ko taqreeban tamam mamlaat mein bartari hasil thi aur badshah shari'at ki hudood mein reh kar apne haq o taqat ka istemal kar sakta tha. Choonke badshah ki haisiyat mutlaq ul inan farmarawa ki thi is liye jab kamzor Sultan aaye to saltanat ke umoor wuzara anjam dene lage lekin phir bhi ahkamat Sultan ki janib se sadir hote thay. Ibteda mein Usmani hukmaran khud ko Beg aur Ghazi kahlwate thay. Bayezid Awwal pehla Usmani hukmaran tha jis ne Sultan ka laqab ikhtiyar kiya aur Saleem Awwal Fatah-e-Egypt ke baad pehla Usmani Khalifa bana. Sultan Suleiman Qanooni ke zamanay tak fauj ki aala kaman Sultan ke haath mein hoti thi aur woh khud jang mein shirkat karta tha lekin baad ke hukmaranon mein yeh tareeqa na raha jis se Sultan ke waqar ko thees pohanchi.
Sultan ki aala majlis-e-shoora ka naam Dewan-e-Humayun tha aur markazi nizam mein use bahut importance hasil thi. Ibteda mein Sultan Dewan ki sadarat khud karta tha lekin baad ke Salateen ne Dewan mein aana chhod diya aur Sultan ke ahl-e-ra'ay se talluq na hone se nizam mein kamzori paida ho gai. Dewan ke mustaqil arakeen yeh thay: markazi nizam ke yeh char aala ohdedar saltanat ke bunyadi sutoon thay. Muhammad Fateh ne apne constitution mein in sutoonon ko wazeh kiya aur saltanat ko ek khaimay se tashbeeh di jis ka sadr darwaza Bab-e-Aali kahlata aur Dewan goya us ki akhri adalat thi. Sadr darwazay ka yeh naam itna maroof hua ke dunya bhar mein Usmani darbar Bab-e-Aali ke naam se hi maroof ho gaya. Markazi nizam-e-hukoomat mein Sultan ke baad doosri aham haisiyat Sadr-e-Azam ko hasil thi jo Dewan ka ek aham rukun kahlata tha. Ibtedai daur mein sirf Wazir hota tha lekin un ki barhti hui ta'adad ke baad un mein se ek Wazir-e-Azam kahlane laga jo phir Sadr-e-Azam ban gaya. Taqatwar Salateen ke ahd mein Sadr-e-Azam Sultan ke adviser ki haisiyat se kaam karta tha. Sadr-e-Azam ke matehat wuzara mein Wazir-e-Jang o Dakhla, Sadr-e-Azam ki ghair mojoodgi mein us ka qaim maqam hota tha, Wazir-e-Kharija, jo Raees Afandi kahlata aur Meer Darbar shamil hote thay. Sadr-e-Azam ke ohday par kai naam aise shamil hain jin ki services Usmani nizam ke liye naqabil-e-faramosh hain jin mein Koprili khandan qabil-e-zikr hai. Yeh ohda 1368 se 1922 tak yani 554 saalon tak yeh ohda Saltanat-e-Usmania mein maujood raha jis mein 211 (ya 215) Sadr-e-Azam hue jin ki aksariyat ghair Turk thi aur un mein Arab, Albani, Roosi, Charkasi, یونانی, Armeni aur Salafi qaumon ke afraad shamil thay taham kabhi kisi ghair Muslim ko Sadr-e-Azam nahi banaya gaya. Sadr-e-Azam ka taqarrur khud Sultan karta tha.
Is ki asal haisiyat fouji munsif ki thi aur Sheikh ul Islam ke baad us ka darja aata tha. Qazi Askar ko Sultan khud muqarrar karta tha. Qazi Askar do thay ek European aur doosra Asian maqboozat ke liye jo bil tarteeb Qazi Askar Romelia aur Qazi Askar Anatolia kahlate thay. Daftar Dar darasal Wazir-e-Maliyat tha jo tamam mali umoor ka jawab deh tha. Nishanchi bhi maliyat ka zimmedar tha lekin us ke zimme deegar bahut saare umoor thay jin mein shahi mohar lagana, zameen ke mamlaat ka indraj, ghaltion ki tasheeh aur un ki tarteeb, hukmaranon aur neem khud mukhtar hakimoon ko farameen bhejna waghera. Nishanchi tamam sarkari kaghzat ki tayyari ka kaam bhi karta tha aur us ke baad kaghzat par Sultan ka Tughra sabt karta tha. Saltanat-e-Usmania ki quwwat hi us ke Idara-e-Hukoomat ke zabardast nizam par qaim thi aur us ke khas usoolon mein ummeedwaron ka umda intikhab, taleem o tarbiyat ki sakht nigrani, mukammal nazm o zabt aur purjosh muqabla aham tareen thay aur inhi ki bunyad par koi bhi ummeedwar apni salahiyaton ki bunyad par taraqqi kar ke aala tareen ohday par pahunch sakta tha. Is tarah goya shahi khandan hi aisa tha jis mein nasli imtiyaz tasleem kiya jata tha deegar tamam ohdon ke liye salahiyat ko bunyad banaya jata tha.
Saltanat-e-Usmania teen bar-e-azam par phaili hui thi aur intizami umoor ke liye saltanat ko bade bade hisson mein taqseem kiya gaya tha jo Eyalet kahlate thay. Eyaletin Sanjaq mein, Sanjaq Qaza mein aur Qaza ko Kooye mein taqseem kiya gaya tha. Sobhe pehle Eyalet kahlate thay jinhen baad azan Vilayet kar diya gaya jabke Sanjaq ki haisiyat zillon ki si thi. Vilayaton ke hakim Beylerbey ya Pasha aur zillon ke hakim Sanjaq Bey kahlate. Sanjaq ke hakim ki do aqsam hoti thin ek shehzada aur aur ghair shehzada. Suleiman-e-Azam ke ahd mein saltanat 21 vilayaton aur 250 sanjaqon mein taqseem thi. Har sobhay ki ek majlis-e-shoora hoti thi jis ka sadr wahan ka Wali hota tha. Qaza kisi bade shehar ya us se mulhiq chand qasbat par mushtamil hoti thi aur us ka hakim-e-aala Subaashi yani fouj ka afsar hota tha. Kooye mein gaon aur qasbe sab shamil kiye gaye thay. Ghair fouji mamlaat khasusan sharai o qanooni umoor ki dekh bhaal Qazi ke hi sipurd thi.
Saltanat ka iqtisadi nizam us ke geography par qaim tha kyonke Mashriq aur Maghrib ke darmiyan mein tamam tijarati shahrahen teen bar-e-azam par phaili is saltanat se guzarti thin. In tijarati shahrahon ke zariye hi use mahsool ke zariye itni adayegi hoti ke woh apne waqt dunya ki bari iqtisadi quwaton mein se ek ban gai. Saltanat-e-Usmania ka muqabla karne ke liye hi European quwaton ne mutabadil raah dhoondhne ke liye bahri muhimmat shuru kin aur jab 1492 mein Christopher Columbus ne America daryaft kiya to us waqt Saltanat-e-Usmania apne urooj par thi. Wast-e-Europe aur Usmanion ke darmiyan mein talluqat mein tabdeeli ki bunyad bhi naye bahri raston ki daryaft tha aur mumkinah tor par Saltanat-e-Usmania ki zawaal ki wajah bhi kyonke European quwaton ne Middle East aur Bahira-e-Rum ki bajaye deegar raaste ikhtiyar karna shuru kar diye jo saltanat ki mali halat ki kharabi ka ba'is bana. Saltanat mundarja zel aqsam ke mumalik mein taqseem thi: jo ilaqay barah-e-raast zer-e-hukoomat thay woh sanjaqon mein taqseem thay aur in mein se har zilla ke mahasil ka ek alag qanoon tha jis ki bunyad un mu'ahadon par thi jo fateh ke waqt kiye gaye thay. Mahsulat ke liye Saltanat-e-Usmania mein zameen ko is tarah taqseem kiya gaya tha: tamam mahasil ka aam naam khiraj tha is mein jizya, mal guzari aur mahsool-e-paida war waghera shamil thay. Ra'aya ki falah o behbood aur khush hali Salateen ka nasb ul ain tha aur ghair Muslim ra'aya se jizya ke ilawa koi najayez mahsool na liya jata tha.
Usmani fauj apne zamanay ki dunya ki modern tareen fauj thi aur woh pehli fauj thi jis ne baroodi aslehe ka istemal shuru kiya. Is ke ilawa woh talwaren, naizay, teer aur deegar riwayati aslehe bhi istemal karte. 1389 mein Jang-e-Kosovo aur 1396 mein Jang-e-Nicopolis mein futuhat ke baad Usmani afwaj tezi se Wast-e-Europe ko apne pairon talay rondte chali gayin aur 1526 mein Jang-e-Mohacs mein fateh ke zariye Hungary par bhi qabiz ho gayin aur do martaba 1529 aur 1683 mein Vienna ka muhasira bhi kiya. Alawa azeen yeh pehli fauj thin jo ghair mulki mahireen ki services hasil kartin aur un ke afsaran ko tarbiyat ke liye Western Europe ke mumalik mein bheja jata.
Saltanat ki taqat ka dar o madar us ke fouji nizam par tha. Usmanion ke doosre Sultan Orhan Awwal ke daur mein pehli baar fauj ko munazzam shakl di gai jo Yeni Chari kahlai. Yeni Chari mustaqil paidal fauj thi jis ki hairat angez shuja'at, nazm o zabt aur wafadari ne teen sadiyon tak European quwaton par apni dhaak bithaye rakhi aur Saltanat-e-Usmania ki ibtedai tamam futuhat bilashubah isi ke zor-e-bazu ka nateeja thin. Yeni Chari ke teen mukhtalif dastay thay jin mein Yaya, Sekban aur Agha Bölükleri shamil thay. Yeni Chari ka sab se bara ohdedar Yeni Chari Aghasi kahlata. Ek ohda Yeni Chari Afandi si hota tha jo darasal katib tha aur tanakhwah dena us ke zimme tha. Zamana-e-amn mein Dewan ke ijlas mein pehra dena, aag bujhane, aala ohdedaron ki hifazat, amn o aman qaim karne mein madad o deegar zimmedariyan Yeni Chari ke sipurd hoti thin. Yeni Chari ke liye apne afsaron ki itaat pehli shart aur ittihad o musawat, zahiri namood o numayish se parhez aur deen dari bhi zaruri thin. Jang ke dauran Yeni Chari qalb mein Sultan ke gird hote. Ibteda mein sirf nau Muslim Maseehi hi is mein bharti kiye jate baad azan Musalman bhi bharti kiye jane lage. Jab tak Salateen mazboot thay Yeni Chari qabu mein rahe lekin inan-e-hukoomat kamzor hathon mein aate hi Yeni Chari sarkash ho gaye aur bad anwani had se zyada barh gai aur yeh fauj saltanat ke liye mustaqil khatra ban gai aur 1826 mein Mehmood Sani ne bilakhir is ko khatam kar dala. Yeni Chari ke khatme ko Waqia-e-Khairiya kaha jata hai.
Mustaqil paidal fauj ke alawa ek mustaqil sawar fauj bhi thi jo Sipahi kahlati. In ki tarbiyat bhi aala andaaz mein ki jati aur zehni qabliyat ke lihaz se behtar sipahion ko hukoomat ke intizami shobay ke liye muntakhab kar liya jata tha. Suleiman-e-Azam ke baad Yeni Chari ki tarah in mein bhi bad anwaniyan hone lagin. Usmani Army ka band jo fouji muhimmat ke dauran mein dhunain baja kar jawanon mein josh o jazba paida karta. Mehteran aam tor par Yeni Chari ka hissa hote. 19th century ke awail mein afwaj ki jadeed khatut par tarbiyat ki koshishain shuru kar di gayin aur 1826 mein Sultan Mehmood Sani ne Yeni Chari ka khatma kar ke ek jadeed Usmani fauj ki bunyad rakhi jise Nizam-e-Jadeed ka naam diya gaya. Nizam-e-Jadeed afwaj masroof aur radeef mein taqseem ki gai thin aur us ki khususiyaat yeh thin:
1308 mein Bahira-e-Marmara mein Jazeera-e-Imrali ki fateh Usmanion ki pehli bahri fateh thi aur 1321 mein us ke jahaz pehli baar junoob mashriqi Europe ke ilaqay Thrace mein langar andaaz hue aur baad azan Bar-e-Azam Europe mein futuhat mein aham tareen kirdar ada kiya. Usmani Bahriya dunya ki pehli bahriya thi jis ne bahri jahazon par topen nasb kin aur 1499 mein lari gai Jang-e-Zonchio tareekh ki pehli bahri jang thi jis ke dauran mein bahri jahazon par lagi topen istemal ki gayin. Usmani Bahriya ne hi Shumali Africa mein futuhat ka aghaz kiya aur 1517 mein Algeria aur Egypt ko saltanat mein shamil kiya. 1538 mein Jang-e-Preveza aur 1560 mein Jang-e-Djerba Bahira-e-Rum mein Usmani Bahriya ke urooj ka saboot hain. Alawa azeen Usmani bahri jahazon ne 1538 se 1566 ke darmiyan mein Bahr-e-Hind mein Goa ke qareeb Portuguese jahazon ka muqabla bhi kiya. 1553 mein Usmani Ameer-ul-Bahar Salih Reis ne Morocco aur Abnae-e-Jabal-ut-Tariq se aage ke Shumali Afriqi ilaqay fateh kiye aur Usmani Saltanat ki sarhaden Bahr-e-Oqyanus tak pohancha din. 1566 mein Aceh (maujooda Indonesia ka ek sobha) ke Sultan ne Portuguese ke khilaf Usmanion ki madad talab ki aur Hizir Reis ki qayadat mein ek bahri bera Sumatra bheja gaya tha. Yeh bera 1569 mein Aceh mein langar andaaz hua aur is tarah yeh saltanat ka mashriqi tareen ilaqah qarar paya jo Usmanion ki zer-e-siyadat tha. 1585 mein Usmani Ameer-ul-Bahar Murad Reis ne Jazair-e-Canary mein Lanzarote ko fateh kiya. 1617 mein Usmani afwaj ne Madeira par bhi qabza kiya aur baad azan August 1625 mein Western England ke ilaqon Sussex, Plymouth, Devon, Hartland Point aur Cornwall par chhapay mare. 1627 mein Usmani Bahriya ke jahazon ne Jazair-e-Shetland, Jazair-e-Faroe, Denmark, Norway aur Iceland tak aur 1627 se 1631 ke dauran mein Ireland aur Sweden tak bhi chhapay marne mein kamyab hue.
1827 mein Jang-e-Navarino mein Britain, France aur Russia ke mushtaraka bahri bere ke hathon shikast aur Algeria aur Greece ke kho jane ke baad Usmani Bahriya ka zawaal shuru ho gaya aur is tarah saltanat samundar paar maqboozat par girift kamzor parti chali gai. Sultan Abdul Aziz Awwal (daur-e-hakoomat: 1861 ta 1876) ne mazboot bahriya ki tashkeel ke liye az sar-e-nau koshishain kin aur kaseer sarmaya kharch karne ke baad Britain aur France ke dunya ka teesra sab se bara bahri bera tashkeel diya jo 194 bahri jahazon par mushtamil tha lekin zawaal pazir economy in bahri jahazon ke bere ko zyada arsay barqarar na rakh saki. Islah pasand Midhat Pasha aur 1876 mein pehli Usmani Parliament ki himayat ke baad Sultan Abdul Hamid Sani (daur-e-hakoomat: 1876 ta 1908) ka eitibar bahriya par se uth gaya. Aur Russia ke khilaf jangon mein koi istemal na hone ka bahana bana kar aksar bahri jahaz Shakh-e-Zareen mein band kar diye gaye jahan woh agle 30 saalon tak sarte rahe. 1908 mein Naujawanan-e-Turk inqilab ke baad Ittihad o Taraqqi Jamiyati ne mulk ka nazm o zabt sambhalne ke baad bahriya ko dobara munazzam karne ki koshish ki aur awami chanday se Usmani Bahriya Foundation tashkeel di gai aur awami raqam se hi bade bahri jahazon ki kharidari shuru ki gai.
Usmani Ameer-ul-Bahar Kaptaan Pasha (ya Qapudan Pasha) kahlata tha. Saltanat ke maroof Ameer-ul-Baharoon mein Khairuddin Barbarossa, Piri Reis, Hasan Pasha, Piyale Pasha, Turgut Pasha aur Seydi Ali Usmani tareekh ke saath Europe ki bahri tareekh mein bhi hamesha yaad rakhe jayenge. Bahri futuhat ke alawa un ke ilmi karnamay bhi numaya hain. Usmani Turkon ki bahri taqat mein izafay ke saath saath Ameer-ul-Bahar ki importance bhi do chand ho gai aur Barbarossa ke zamanay mein Kaptaan Pasha Dewan ka baqaida rukun ban gaya. Ohday ke aitabar se woh Ameer-ul-Asakir ke masawi aur Sheikh-ul-Islam ke matehat samjha jata tha.
Usmania Fazaiya ki bunyad June 1909 mein rakhi gai is tarah yeh dunya ki qadeem tareen jangi hawabazi ke idaron mein se ek hai. Is ka qiyam us waqt amal mein aaya jab Saltanat-e-Usmania ne apne do Turk hawabazon ko Paris mein mun'aqida international hawabazi conference mein shirkat ke liye bheja. Fazai jang ki barhti hui importance ke pesh-e-nazar Usmani hukoomat ne apne askari hawabazi ke mansoobay ko munazzam karne ka faisla kiya. Is maqsad ke liye 1910 ke akhir mein mutaddid afsaran ko tarbiyat ke liye Europe bheja gaya jinhon ne wahan jangi hawabazi ki tarbiyat hasil ki. Rahish ki naqis sahooliyat ke ba'is taleem ka yeh mansooba khatam ho gaya aur zer-e-tarbiyat ahlkar 1911 ke awail mein Turkey wapas aa gaye. Fazaiya ke qiyam ke liye hukoomati rahnumai ke khatme ke bawajood us waqt ke Usmani Wazir-e-Difa Muhammad Shawkat Pasha ne askari fazai mansoobay ke khayal ko amali jama pehnane ki koshishain jari rakhin aur do afsaran ko France tarbiyat ke liye bheja. In hawabazon ki tarbiyat February 1921 mein mukammal hui aur isi saal mazeed Turk afsaran ko France bheja gaya. Saltanat-e-Usmania ne 3 July 1912 ko Istanbul mein Fazai Academy ke qiyam ke zariye apne hawabazon aur tayyaron ki tayyari aur apne afsaran ki tarbiyat ka aghaz kiya. Turk hawabazon ki na tajurbakari ke ba'is Balkan jangon ke pehle marhalay (1912) mein mutaddid jahazon ka nuqsan uthana para taham doosre marhalay (1913) mein unhen kai kamyabiyan milin. Balkan jangon ke khatme ke baad fazaiya ko jadeed khatut par ustawar karne ke amal ka aghaz kiya gaya aur naye tayyare khareede gaye. June 1914 mein Istanbul mein hi nai askari academy Bahri Hawabazi Academy ka qiyam amal mein aaya. Lekin Pehli Jang-e-Azeem ke aghaz ke saath hi yeh amal ruk gaya albata 1915 mein chand German afsaran saltanat mein aaye aur chand Turk afsaran tarbiyat ke liye Germany gaye thay. Pehli Jang-e-Azeem ke dauran mein Usmani Fazaiya kai mahazon par lari jin mein Maghrib mein Galicia, Mashriq mein Caucasus aur Junub mein Yemen ke ilaqay tak shamil hain. Usmani Fazaiya ko az sar-e-nau munazzam karne ki koshishain jari thin ke 1918 mein Pehli Jang-e-Azeem ke khatme aur Istanbul par ittihadiyon ke qabze ke saath hi in ka khatma ho gaya.
Constantinople ke Mufti ka darja tamam Qazion se barh kar tha aur use Mufti-e-Azam kaha jata tha. Muhammad Fateh ne use Sheikh-ul-Islam ka laqab bhi ata kiya. Tamam qawaneen ka talluq Sheikh-ul-Islam se tha aur us ki haisiyat Abbasi daur ke Qazi-ul-Qazat ki si thi. Us ka faisla hatmi hota tha. Sheikh-ul-Islam ka ohda Wizarat-e-Uzma ke baad sab se bara tha. Sheikh-ul-Islam ka taqarrur aam tor par tamam umar ke liye hota tha. Sobai afsaran Sadr-e-Azam aur Sadr-e-Azam Sultan ke samne jawab deh tha lekin Sheikh-ul-Islam sirf Khuda ko jawab deh tha aur woh har kaam shari'at ke mutabiq karta tha. Sheikh-ul-Islam ke ikhtiyarat intehai wasee thay aur is ka andaza is baat se lagaya ja sakta hai ke Sultan ki ma'azooli ke mutalliq us ka fatwa bahut zaruri tha aur us ke baghair Sultan ki ma'azooli mumkin na thi. Sultan ki namaz-e-janaza bhi wohi parhata tha. Daur-e-Inhitat mein is mansab mein bhi kai khamiyan paida ho gai thin. Usmanion ke pure daur mein 131 Shuyukh-ul-Islam hue. 19 ne istefa diya aur teen ko phansi di gai. Aksariyat Turki ul Nasl thi. 1442 mein is mansab ki ibteda hui aur Murad Doom ke ahd ke Hazrat Mulla Shamsuddin Fanari pehle Sheikh-ul-Islam thay. Akhri Sheikh-ul-Islam Madani Muhammad Nuri Afandi thay jinhon ne saltanat ke khatme par 1922 mein istefa de diya. Is tarah yeh ohda 498 saal barqarar raha.
Tamam Qazi shehar ke munsif hua thay aur un ka halqa-e-ikhtiyar qareebi ilaqon par bhi tha. Qazion ka halqa-e-ikhtiyar Idara-e-Hukoomat se zyada wasee tha. Masalan Crimea aur Shumali Africa ki riyasatein agarche intizami haisiyat se markazi hukoomat ke tabe na thin balkay wabasta hukoomatein thin lekin yeh bhi Usmani nizam-e-adalat ke matehat thin. Muhammad Fateh ne Qanoon Nama mein Mehakma-e-Qaza ko ek sutoon qarar diya tha aur mamlakat ke qawaneen ki bunyad shari'at-e-Islamia par rakhi thi.
Kyonke Saltanat-e-Usmania teen bar-e-azam par phaili ek wasee saltanat thi is liye use kisi wahid culture ke tor par bayan karna mushkil hai albata mukhtalif marakiz mein us ke mukhtalif roop thay. Constantinople ki shehri waz'a ne Damascus, Baghdad, Makkah, Madina, Cairo aur Tunis o Algeria par asar andaaz hui. Fankaron ka ijtema Constantinople mein tha lekin dastkari aur san'at ki ghair mamooli taraqqi Anatolia mein hui jis mein Bursa aur Iznik ko aham maqam hasil tha. Kai aham shehron mein karkhane poori saltanat ko kapra aur zuroof faraham karne ke alawa ghair mumalik ko bhi ashya baramad karte thay. Parchabafi ke alawa qaleen sazi bhi saltanat ki aham tareen san'at thi.
Saltanat-e-Usmania ka ibtedai fan-e-ta'ameer Saljuqi tarz-e-ta'ameer se mutasir tha lekin Constantinople ki fateh ke baad yeh Romi tarz-e-ta'ameer ke zer-e-asar aa gaya lekin baad azan is mein mazeed behtari lai gai aur bilakhir jadeed Usmani tarz-e-ta'ameer dunya bhar mein maroof hua. Usmani Salateen ne fan-e-ta'ameer par khas tawajjo di. Yenişehir, Bursa, Edirne aur Constantinople mein masajid, madaris aur mahalaat ki ta'ameer aur Fateh-e-Constantinople ke baad saltanat bhar mein Usmani ta'ameerat is azeem saltanat ki shaukat o azmat ki aaina dar hain aur aaj bhi is shandar mazi ki yadgar ke tor par maujood hain. Chaudhween century ki Usmani daur ki masajid mein Saljuqi tarz har jagah numaya hai jis ki aham tareen misalen Bursa ki shandar masajid hain jin mein Bayezid Jameh aur Ulu Jameh numaya hain. Pandhween century mein Istanbul ki masajid mein Bursa ki tarz ki taqleed ki gai lekin bari masajid mein Ayasofya Jameh ke tarz-e-ta'ameer ki taqleed ki gai jo Byzantine girja thi jise Fateh-e-Constantinople ke baad masjid mein tabdeel kar diya gaya tha. Turk ma'amaron ne jadeed Usmani tarz-e-ta'ameer ki kai shandar aur buland imaratain banain jin mein Fateh Jameh, Selimiye Jameh, Suleimaniye Jameh aur Ortaköy Jameh numaya hain. Usmani tarz-e-ta'ameer in imarton ke zariye aaj bhi apni poori aab o taab ke saath maujood hai hatta ke dunya bhar mein jahan bhi Turk tareekeen-e-watan ne masajid ta'ameer kin woh isi tarz-e-ta'ameer ka shahkar hain. Pakistan ke dar-ul-hukoomat Islamabad mein waqi Faisal Masjid ke minar bhi Turk tarz-e-ta'ameer ke hamil hain. Usmani tarz-e-ta'ameer ka tazkira Sinan Pasha ke baghair adhoora hai jis ne apne tarz aur hunar se is ahd ke tarz-e-ta'ameer ko char chand laga diye. Solhween century ki Usmani ta'ameerat mein Sinani tarz har jagah numaya hai aur aaj bhi shandar shakl mein maujood hai. Shehzada Masjid aur Selimiye Masjid is azeem ma'amar ke fan paray hain. Sinan ne Constantinople, Edirne aur deegar shehron mein kai azeem masajid ta'ameer kin. Usmanion ke tayyar karda Topkapi aur Dolmabahçe mahalaat apne waqt ke ta'ameerat ke azeem tareen shahkar thay jin mein awwal-uz-zikr Usmani aur sani-uz-zikr European tarz-e-ta'ameer ke zer-e-asar hain.
Usmani Turki zaban mamlakat ki aham tareen zaban thi jo Arabi aur Farsi ke zer-e-asar thi. Usmanion ke adalti o daftari mamlaat mein yehi zaban istemal ki jati thi. Lekin ek wasee saltanat ke ba'is is mein mukhtalif maqamat par mukhtalif zabanain boli jati thin aur akhri ayyam mein French aur English bhi ghair Muslimon ke aala tabqay mein bade paimanay par boli jatin. Yeh bhi kaha ja sakta hai ke Farsi adabi aur Arabi mazhabi zaban ke tor par istemal ki jati thi.
Usmani Saltanat ka sarkari mazhab Islam tha lekin ghair Muslimon khasusan Ahl-e-Kitab (Maseehion aur Yahudion) se un ka aala rawaiya Musalmanon ki wasee ul qalbi ka munh bolta saboot hai. Muhammad Fateh ne Constantinople ko fateh karne ke baad muqami Maseehion ko shehar mein rehne ki ijazat di aur un ke chand girjon ko bhi bahal rakha. 1492 mein Suqoot-e-Gharnata ke baad Spain se nikale gaye Musalmanon ko bakheiryat Muslim sarzameen par pohanchane ki jo azeem muhim chalai gai us mein kai Yahudion ko bhi Maseehion ke mazalim se bacha kar Turk sarzameen par laya gaya aur unhen Saltanat-e-Usmania mein azadi ke saath rehne ki ijazat di gai. Islami shari'at mamlakat ka bunyadi qanoon tha aur is ka maakhaz Quran o Hadees thay aur in donon se rahnumai na milne ki soorat ijma ya qiyas se kaam liya jata.
Salateen-e-Usmania ilm o adab se gehra lagao rakhte thay ulema o fuzala ki be had ta'azeem o takreem ki jati aur un ke liye ba izzat rozgar faraham kiya jata tha. Muhammad Awwal ke daur mein ilm o adab ki bharpoor sarparasti ki gai balkay yeh kehna be ja na hoga ke darasal inhi ke daur mein saltanat mein adab khasusan شاعری ko tarweej di gai. Sultan Muhammad Fateh Turki zaban ke ek sahib-e-Dewan shair thay. Mutali'a ka be had shauq rakhte thay aur unhon ne apne daur-e-hakoomat mein deegar uloom o funoon ki tarweej ka kaam bhi kiya. Bayezid ko tasawwuf, mazhab aur shayari se dilchaspi thi jabke Saleem Awwal ko tareekh o Farsi shayari ke alawa mutali'ay ka bhi shauq tha. Farsi zaban mein Saleem Awwal ki kuch nazmen bhi maujood hain. Murad Sani tasawwuf ki ek kitab ke ba'is shohrat rakhte thay. Usmani hukmaranon mein 21 ke bayaz milte hain. Darasal Usmani adab aur Farsi adab ek doosre se mumasilat rakhte hain. Saltanat-e-Usmania mein taleem ke do daur numaya nazar aate hain: Muhammad Fateh ke daur mein taleem ke silsile ka baqaida aghaz hua, woh khud bhi ulema ka bara qadar dan tha. Muhammad ke janasheenon ne taleem ko khoob phailaya aur har Sultan ek masjid zarur ta'ameer karta jis ke saath madrasa qaim karna bhi lazmi tha. Yun masjidon ke saath saath madaris ki ta'adad bhi barhti gai. Mustafa Salis ke ahd mein sirf Constantinople mein taqreeban teen sau madaris thay. Daur-e-Tanzimat mein Jamea-e-Usmania ka qiyam amal mein aaya. Taleem ki taraqqi ka andaza is baat se lagaya ja sakta hai ke 1892 mein har sirf Constantinople mein har qisam ke madaris ki ta'adad 500 thi jin mein 13 bade colleges thay.
Saltanat-e-Usmania ki hukoomat July 1299 mein qaim hui aur 1 November 1922 tak barqarar rahi. In 623 barsun tak 36 Usmani Salateen ne farmanrawai ki. Aal-e-Usman ke akhri Sultan Abdul Majeed Sani thay jinhen rasan Khalifa muqarrar kiya gaya tha aur 3 March 1924 ko bilakhir unhen ma'azool kar diya gaya. Un ki ma'azooli par Saltanat-e-Usmania ka ahd khatam ho gaya. Apne daur-e-urooj mein Saltanat-e-Usmania ne Shumali Hungary se le kar Junubi Yemen tak aur Maghribi Algeria se le kar Mashriqi Iraq tak hukoomat ki. Saltanat-e-Usmania ka sab se pehla dar-ul-hukoomat 1280 mein Söğüt aur phir 1323 ya 1324 tak Bursa raha. 1363 mein saltanat ke dar-ul-hukoomat ko Edirne (Adrianople) ki fateh ke baad Murad Awwal ne Edirne muntaqil kar diya tha. Aur 1453 mein Muhammad Sani ki Fateh-e-Constantinople ke baad Constantinople (maujooda Istanbul) mein muntaqil kar diya gaya. Saltanat-e-Usmania 13th century ke akhir mein wujood mein aai aur us ka pehla hukmaran Usman Awwal tha. Usman ka talluq Oghuz Turkon ke Kayı qabile se tha. Usman ne Usmani khandan ki bunyad rakhi woh 36 Sultanon ke adwar mein chh-e-sadiyon tak qaim rahi. Saltanat-e-Usmania markazi taqaton ki shikast ke nateeje mein khatam ho gai, jin ke saath us ne Pehli Jang-e-Azeem ke dauran ittihad kiya tha. Fateh ittihadiyon ke zariya saltanat ki taqseem aur us ke nateeje mein Turkey ki azadi ki jang aur 1922 mein saltanat ke khatme aur jadeed Jamhooriya-e-Turkey ki paidaish ka ba'is bani.
Sultan ko badshah bhi kaha jata tha. Usmani use mein word Padishah usually use hota tha, siwaye iske k Sultan ka direct naam liya jaye. Nasli aqaliyat ki zubanon mein Sultan ke naam: Saltanat Usmania aik absolute monarchy thi. 15th century tak Sultan ke under political, military, judicial, social aur religious capacities mein kaam kiya jata tha. Woh theoretically sirf Allah aur Allah ke law (Islamic ke liye zimedar tha) jis ke woh Chief Executive the. Badshah ki taraf se har law ki soorat mein jari kiya jata tha. Tamam badshah Supreme Military Commander the. Usman (wafat 1323-4) Ertugrul ke bete, Usmani riyasat ka pehla ruler tha, jisne apne dor-e-hakumat mein Byzantine Empire ki border pe waqay Bithynia ke area mein ek chhoti saltanat qaim ki. 1453 AD mein Muhammad Fateh ki conquest of Constantinople ke baad, Usmani Sultans ne khud ko Roman Empire ka successor manna shuru kiya aur woh kabhi kabhar Qaisar-e-Rome ka title use karte the. Usmani salateen apne liye Shahenshah aur Khalifa ka title bhi use karte the. Naye takht nasheen Usmani rulers ko Usman ki talwar di jati thi, yeh ek important ceremony thi jo European kings ki coronation ke equivalent thi. Agarchay nazariya theoretically absolute tha, lekin practically sultan ke ikhtiyarat limited the. Political decisions mein family ke important members, bureaucracy aur military institutions ke saath saath religious leaders ki opinions aur attitudes ko bhi consider karna parta tha. 16th century ke last decades ke start se, empire mein Usmani sultans ka role kam hona shuru hua, is dor ko Usmani Saltanat ki transition ka dor kaha jata hai. Virasat mein takht hasil karne se roke jane ke bawajood, royal harem ki ladies, specially governing sultan ki mother, jo Walida Sultan ke naam se jani jati theen, unhon ne parde ke peechhe reh kar ek important political role play kiya aur apne dor mein saltanat par effectively rule kiya. Is dor ko Saltanat Usmania ki women's sultanate bhi kaha gaya. Constitutional monarchy Abdul Hamid II ke dor mein establish ki gayi thi, jo is tarah empire ka last absolute ruler aur pehla constitutional monarch ban gaya. Agarchay Abdul Hamid II ne 1878 AD mein personal rule mein wapas aane ke liye Parliament aur Constitution ko abolish kar diya tha, lekin unhein 1908 AD mein dobara constitution ko restore karne par force kiya gaya aur unhein dethrone kar diya gaya. 2021 mein Usmani family ke head Harun Osman hain, jo Abdul Hamid Sani ke great-grandson hain.
Neeche di gayi table mein Usmani sultans ke saath saath last Usmani Khalifa ki bhi order mein list di gayi hai. Tughra woh calligraphy ki seals ya signatures the jo Usmani sultans use karte the, jo woh tamam official documents ke saath saath coins par bhi display karte the aur Sultan ki identity mein uski picture se kahin zyada important the. Overview aur short events column mein har sultan ki parentage aur reign ke bare mein brief information maujood hai. Historian Quartet ke mutabiq: Jab ek sultan wafat pa jata tha, to uske beto'n ko takht ke liye ek doosre se fight karna parta tha jab tak koi winner saamne na aaye. Larayee jhagron aur numerous fratricides ki waja se aksar sultans ki wafat ki date aur succession ki date ke darmiyan time difference hota tha. 1617 mein succession ka law badal kar ek aise system mein convert kar diya gaya jise seniority kehte the. Jis ke under takht family ke sabse purane male ke paas chala jata tha. 17th century ke baad se ek deceased sultan ka successor uska beta hota tha jaisa ke normally uncle ya bhai ya bhatija hote the. Is list mein Usmani interventions ke dauran claimants aur co-claimants bhi listed hain, lekin woh sultans ki formal counting mein shamil nahin hain.
Usmani ruler ka complete style complicated tha, kyunki yeh kayi titles par mushtamil (based) tha aur centuries mein develop hua. Sultan ka title almost start se hi sab rulers ne continuously use kiya. However, kyunki yeh Muslim world mein widely spread tha, isliye Osmanis ne khud ko lesser status ke doosre Muslim rulers se differentiate karne ke liye iski variations adopt ki. Murad I, teesra Usmani badshah, ne khud ko Sultan-e-Azam (Great Sultan, sabse high Sultan) aur Hudavendigâr (Lord, Emperor) ke titles se nawaza, jo respectively Anatolian Seljuks aur Mongol Ilkhanids use karte the. Uske bete Bayezid I ne 'Sultan of Rum' style adopt kiya, Rum Roman Empire ka purana Islamic name tha. Usmaniyon ke Islamic aur Central Asian heritage ke combination ne is title ko adopt kiya jo Usmani ruler ka standard designation ban gaya: Sultan Khan. Ironically, agarchay Western world mein Sultan ka title aksar Osmanis se attach hota hai, Turkey mein log generally Usmani family ke rulers ko refer karte hue Padishah ka title zyada commonly use karte hain.
Saltanat Usmania ke ruler ka mukammal honorary title history ke sabse complex honorary titles mein se aik tha, kyunki yeh kai other titles par mushtamil (consisted) tha aur waqt ke sath evolve hota raha. Sultan ka title Saltanat Usmania ki Seljuk Sultanate of Rum se independence ke baad se Usmani rulers mein sabse zyada use hone wala aur sabse common title tha aur in mein se multiple ko Cairo mein based Abbasid Caliph ne Islamic nation ke liye unki great services ke recognition mein officially dethrone kar diya tha aur Abbasid Caliph se yeh title obtain karne wale sultans mein Murad I aur Muhammad Fateh shamil hain. However, kyunki yeh title Islamic world mein widely spread tha, Osmanis ne khud ko other Islamic states aur dynasties se distinguish karne ke liye Sultan ke title ke alawa other titles shamil kiye, specially us waqt jab unki Emirate fragmented Abbasid State ki succession ke liye sabse strong Emirate candidate ban gayi aur eventually Caliphate ka title hasil kiya.
Usmani family ke teesre ruler Murad I ne khud ko Great Sultan aur Hudavendigâr ke title se nawaza, aur yeh honorary titles pehle respectively Seljuk Turks aur Mongol Ilkhanids use karte the. Bayezid I bin Murad ne 'Sultan of the Romans' ka title copy kiya hai aur Romans se murad Romans ka country hai, yani Anatolia, jo centuries tak Byzantine Romans ka country tha, lehaza yeh Muslim historians ko bhi pata tha aur memory aur folk tales mein preserved raha. Osmaniyon ki ancient Islamic aur Turk cultural heritage ke combination ki wajah se Usmani family ke sab sultans ka unique title emerge hua jo state ke downfall tak unke saath tha: Sultan Khan. Baat worth mentioning hai k agarchay Sultan ka title Western aur yahan tak k Arab world mein people mein common tha aur state ke rulers ko refer karta tha, Usmani Turks ne ruler ko Padishah kaha, jis ka matlab King ya Emperor hai. Sultans ka poora title wohi ban gaya jo upar mention kiya gaya tha aur yeh state ki borders ke stabilization ke baad wohi bana. Is title ke kuch parts ki Arabization ka zikr book 'Usmani Attack State ki Tarikh' mein kiya gaya tha, jo Saltanat Usmania par Arabic mein likhi gayi sabse important historical references mein se aik hai. Iske author, lawyer Professor Muhammad Fareed Bey aur Sultan Suleiman ke Francois I ko likhe gaye letter mein maujood title ki Arabization. France ke King ko mandraja zail hain: Main sultano'n ka Sultan hun, Khawakeen ka saboot hun, Badshahon ka Crown hun, donon countries mein Allah ka saaya hai, Black Sea ka Sultan, Black Sea, Anatolia, Rumelia, Karaman-e-Rum, Zulqadriya ki Wilayat, Diyarbakir, Kurdistan, Azerbaijan, Ajam, Levant, Aleppo, Egypt, Makkah, Madina, Jerusalem aur all Arab countries. Yemen aur bohot si Sultanatein jinhein mere ancestors ne conquer kiya tha, Allah Ta'ala ne unki quwat se unki nishaniyon ko roshan kiya. Aur bohot se other countries ka inauguration mere haath se keel ki talwar se kiya gaya, main Sultan Suleiman Khan bin Sultan Selim Khan hun, Sultan Bayezid Khan ke bete.
Khilafat Usmania unki spiritual power ki symbol thi, jabke Saltanat unki worldly power ko represent karti thi. Usmani historiography ke according, Murad I ne apne reign ke dauran Khalifa ka title adopt kiya aur Selim I ne baad mein Egypt ki conquest ke dauran Khalifa ki authority ko strengthen kiya. However, modern scholars ke beech general consensus hai k Usmani rulers ne Egypt ki conquest se pehle Khalifa ka title use kiya tha, jaisa k Murad I ke reign mein tha, jisne Balkans ke zyada tar areas ko Usmani rule ke under laya aur 1383 mein Sultan ka title establish kiya. Currently is baat par agreement hai k Khilafat dahi sadiyon ke liye disappear ho gayi thi, is se pehle k 1774 mein Saltanat Usmania aur Russia ki Catherine II ke beech Treaty of Küçük Kaynarca ke saath dobara revive ho gaya tha. Yeh agreement extremely symbolic tha, kyunki isne Khilafat ke Osmaniyon ke claim ko first international level par recognize kiya tha. Agarchay is treaty ne Saltanat Usmania ke Crimean Khanate ke loss ko formalize kar diya, lekin isne Russia mein Muslims par Usmani Khalifa ke continuous religious authority ko acknowledge kiya. 18th century ke baad se, Usmani Sultans ne European imperialism ko counter karne ke silsile mein empire ke Muslims mein Pan-Islamist sentiments ko awaken karne ke liye Khalifa ke tor par apni position pe rapidly emphasis diya. Jab First World War shuru hui to Sultan/Khalifa ne 1914 mein Saltanat Usmania ke Allies ke against Jihad ki call issue ki, jisme French, British aur Russian Empires ki subjects ko revolt pe incite karne ki unsuccessful attempt ki gayi. Abdul Hamid Sani woh Usmani Sultan the jinhon ne apne Khalifa ke office ka sabse zyada use kiya aur bohot se Muslim heads of state ne use Khalifa ke tor par recognize kiya, even Sumatra tak bhi. Usne 1876 ke Constitution mein included title par apna claim kiya tha.
City Chishtian, District Bahawalnagar, Province Punjab ki aik tehsil hai. Aur Tehsil Chishtian ka sadar muqam bhi hai, is mein 29 Union Councils hain. Chishtian city ki foundation Sufi buzurg Baba Fariduddin Ganj Shakar ke pote Taj Sarwar Chishti ne rakhi. Spiritual leader Khwaja Noor Muhammad Maharvi ka mazar bhi Taj Sarwar Chishti ke mazar se 700 meter ke distance par west side mein hai. Spiritual leader Taj Sarwar Chishti aur Khwaja Noor Muhammad Maharvi ke mazars jahan hain, usko Purani Chishtian ke naam se pukara jata hai. Purani Chishtian se aik kilometer door Chishtian ka city baad mein abad hua. Chishtian city ke north mein 3 km ke fasle pe Adam Sugar Mills hai. Chishtian city ka qabristan Pakistan ka doosra bara cemetery hai.
Chishtian city ki population detail yeh hai, 1981 ke census ke according 61,959, 1998 ke hisab se 102,287 thi jab k 2017 ke census ke mutabik city ki population 149,424 individuals par mushtamil (based) thi. Industrial institutions mein Adam Sugar Mills Ltd Chishtian aur Chishtian Flour Mills Chishtian shamil hain. Educational institutions mein Govt Post Graduate College Chishtian, Govt Girls College Chishtian, Govt Elementary College Chishtian, Danish School for Boys and Girls Chishtian, Commerce College Chishtian, School for Handicapped individuals, Asian College for Technology Chishtian aur Punjab Group of Colleges included hain.
Mazarat mein Hazrat Baba Taj Sarwar Sarkar, Hazrat Khwaja Noor Muhammad Maharvi, Hazrat Baba Kalaiye Shah Bukhari, Hazrat Baba Yar Muhammad Maharvi, aur Hazrat Sakhi Shauq Ilahi Sarkar ke mazars hain. Political personalities mein Malik Muzaffar Khan Awan, Lala Shah Behram Joia, Sikandar Fayyaz Khan Bhadera, Haji Muhammad, Ali Akbar Vaince, Ehsan-ul-Haq Bajwa, aur Atif Bilal Bhatta shamil hain.
Chishtian city ke south mein 14 Gajiani ka Chak hai, jise ab Gulberg Town kaha jata hai aur ab Chishtian ka part hi ban chuka hai. City ke east mein 13 Gajiani ka Chak hai. City ke north mein Noor Pura basti hai, uske baad Satellite Town hai. Nearby areas mein Mahar Sharif, Chak 174 Murad, Chak 169 Murad, Chak 167 Murad, Chak 206 Murad, Chak 131 Murad, Chak 134 Murad, Chak 10 Fordwah, Chak 4 Fordwah, 3 Fordwah aur Dahranwala hain.
Haroonabad, Distt Bahawalnagar, Province Punjab ki aik tehsil hai. Bahawalnagar city se iska distance 50 kilometers hai. Haroonabad ki population 60,000 hai aur mostly log farmers hain. Is mein do Degree Colleges (boys and girls) ke alawa cheh high madrasahs hain. Govt madrasahs ke alawa private madrasahs bhi hain. Haroonabad ka old name Badru Wala hai. City ke actual residents to bohot kam hain, zyada tar log Pakistan ke different areas se aa ke settle huye hain. 1947 mein bhi log yahan aa kar kafi settle huye hain.
Fort Abbas Distt Bahawalnagar, Province Punjab, Pakistan ka aik city aur Tehsil Fort Abbas ka headquarter hai. Yeh Haroonabad se 55 km aur Bahawalpur se 140 km distance pe located hai.
Abadan South-Western Iran ke Khuzestan Province ka aik city hai. Yeh Iran-Iraq border par Persian Gulf ke paas Abadan Island par located hai jis ke west mein Arvand River aur east mein Karun River ki aik branch flow karti hai. Yeh Abadan District ka headquarter hai. 2005 ke according city ki population 4 lakh 15 hazar se zyada hai. Iran aur Iraq ke beech eight-year war ki wajah se city ki population zero ho gayi thi. 1992 mein sirf 84,774 people is city mein dobara settle hone ke liye aaye. 2001 mein city ki population 2 lakh se bhi increase ho gayi aur uske baad is mein continuously increase hota ja raha hai.
Abadeh, Fars Province, Iran ka aik city hai. Isfahan se iska distance 190 km hai. 2004 ke census ke according is city ki population 58,200 people hai. Iran ke famous carpet type Abadeh carpet jo k city ke naam se jana jata hai, Abadeh mein banta hai.
Amol Iran ka aik city aur Amol County, Mazandaran Province ka capital hai.
Ardabil, Ardabil Province, Iran ka aik historical city hai. Pehle yeh East Azerbaijan Province ka part tha. 1993 mein ise separate province bana diya gaya. Iski population 340,386 individuals par mushtamil (consisted) hai. Yeh area silk aur carpet business ke liye famous hai.
Imran Ahmed Khan Niazi Pakistani politician, ex-cricketer aur Pakistan ke ex-PM hain aur Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf ke founder bhi hain. Is se pehle woh 2002 se 2007 tak aur 2013 se 2018 tak Pakistan National Assembly ke member bhi reh chuke hain. Politics mein step rakhne se pehle Imran Khan ek cricketer aur philanthropist the. Unhone two decades tak international cricket kheli aur baad mein public service projects banaye jaise k Shaukat Khanum Memorial Cancer Hospital and Research Centre aur Namal College waghera.
Imran Khan ki birth Lahore mein upper middle class Niazi Pashtun family mein hui, un ke father Engineer Ikramullah Khan Niazi the. Imran Khan ne initial education Aitchison College Lahore, phir Royal Grammar School Worcester England aur baad mein Keble College Oxford se get ki. Unhone 13 saal ki age mein cricket play karna start kar diya tha.
Initially apne college ke liye khela aur baad mein Warwickshire ke liye, Imran Khan ne 18 saal ki age mein Pakistan ki National Cricket Team join ki aur usi saal international cricket ka start Birmingham mein England ke against 1971 series se kiya. Oxford se graduation ke baad, unhone 1976 mein Pakistan mein cricket play karna start kiya aur 1992 tak khela. Unhone 1982 aur 1992 ke beech team ke captain ke duties bhi perform ki. Specially unki leadership mein 1992 mein Pakistan Cricket Team 1992 World Cup mein victorious rahi.
Imran ki birth 25 November, 1952 ko Lahore, Pakistan mein hui. Woh Pashtuns ke famous tribe Niazi se belong karte hain, but unki mother Shaukat Khanum Sahiba mostly Mianwali mein resided. Woh Ikramullah Khan Niazi ke only son hain. 16th century mein unke ancestors mein Haibat Khan Niazi, Sher Shah Suri ke honoured General aur Punjab ke Governor the. Unki mother Pashtun tribe Burki se belong karti hain, is tribe ne Pakistan ki history mein Javed Burki aur Majid Khan jaise successful cricketers ko produce kiye.
Young age mein Imran Khan aik quiet nature aur shy person the, initial education Lahore mein Cathedral School aur Aitchison College, Lahore se li, uske baad higher education ke liye UK chale gaye. Wahan Royal Grammar School mein studies ki aur phir Oxford University se Politics, Philosophy aur Economics subjects ke saath graduation ki. Woh 1974 mein Oxford University Cricket Team ke captain bhi rahe.
Imran Khan ne cricket ki world mein bhi apna aik high position banaya hai aur international level pe past mein woh politics ki bajaye cricket ki wajah se zyada famous rahe hain. Unhi ki leadership mein Pakistan ne 1992 Cricket World Cup jeeta tha. First-class cricket ka start 1969-1970 mein Lahore ki taraf se Sargodha ke against khelte hue kiya. 1971 mein England ke against pehla Test match khela.
Unhone 88 Test matches khel kar 362 wickets 22.81 ki average se li. 1981-1982 mein Lahore mein Sri Lanka ke 8 players sirf 58 runs de kar out kiye. Aur 23 times aik innings mein 5 wickets li. Unhone 36.69 ki average se 3807 runs banaye jin mein se 5 centuries bhi shamil hain. Unka maximum score Adelaide mein 1991 mein Australia ke against khelte hue 132 runs raha. Unka count Pakistan cricket ke most successful captains mein hota hai. Is point of view se woh Pakistan ke pehle captain the jin ki leadership mein Pakistani team ne India ko India aur England ko English soil pe haraaya. As a captain unhone 48 Test matches khele jin mein se 14 jeete aur 8 haare aur 26 draw ya without any result end huye.
Pakistani Cricket Team ne 1992 mein unki leadership mein khelte hue fifth Cricket World Cup jeeta. Yeh honor abhi tak Pakistan sirf aik time hi achieve kar saka hai. Unhone 175 One Day matches mein participate kiya. Aur 182 wickets li. 3709 runs 33.41 ki average se banaye. Unka maximum score 102 Not Out tha jo unhone Sri Lanka ke against 1983 mein khelte hue banaya. Unki leadership mein 139 One Day matches khele gaye jin mein se 77 jeete, 57 haare, four no result rahe jab k 1 match draw raha.
Cricket se retirement ke baad Imran Khan different British aur Asian newspapers mein specially Pakistan ki national team ke baray mein articles likhte rahe hain. BBC Urdu aur Star TV Network samait Asian aur British sports networks par cricket commentator ke tor par bhi services perform karte rahe hain. 2004 mein jab Indian Cricket Team ne 14 saal ke baad Pakistan ka visit kiya to, woh Ten Sports Channel ke special live program mein commentator the. 1992 ke baad har Cricket World Cup ke dauran woh different channels par team performance aur matches ke hawaley se apna analysis dete rahe hain. Unko as a captain sabse zyada wickets lene ka record, Test match mein best bowling average aur best bowler record banane ka honour bhi mila hai.
Nov 2005 ko Imran Khan ko Baroness Lockwood ke baad Bradford University ka Chancellor appoint kiya gaya tha. 26 Feb ko University Union ne har graduation ceremony se unki non-attendance ki waja se unhein post se remove karne ke liye resolution pesh ki thi, however, Khan Sahab ne announce kiya k due to political engagements, is post ki responsibilities perform karne se unable hain, lehaza woh 30 Nov 2014 ko yeh post chhor denge. University ke Vice-Chancellor Brian Cantor ne Imran Khan ko students ke liye aik outstanding role model declare kiya.
1990s ke dauran Imran Khan ne sports ke liye UNICEF ke special representative ke tor par Bangladesh, Pakistan, Sri Lanka aur Thailand mein health aur immigration programs ko promote kiya. London mein cricket ke charity organization Lord's Taverners ke liye bhi work kar chuke hain. World Cup 1992 ke baad cricket se retirement le li, uske baad social work mein participate karna start kiya. Apni mother ke naam pe Shaukat Khanum Memorial Trust ki foundation rakhi. Trust ki first effort ke tor pe Pakistan ke pehle aur only Cancer Hospital ki foundation rakhi. Uski construction ke liye poori world se 25 million dollars se zyada donation aur funds use kiye, jab k hospital ki land us time ke Chief Minister Mian Nawaz Sharif ne donate ki thi.
27 April 2008 ko Imran Khan ne District Mianwali mein Namal College naam ka technical college establish kiya. Yeh college Mianwali Development Trust ki taraf se kiya gaya aur Dec 2005 se ise Bradford University ke Associate College ka status mila hai. Unki aik aur welfare organization Imran Khan Foundation hai jis ka purpose Pakistan bhar mein needy logon ki help karna hai. Is organization ne Pakistan mein flood victims ko help provide ki hai. Bakhsh Foundation ne Imran Khan Foundation ke saath mil kar Dera Ghazi Khan, Mianwali aur Dera Ismail Khan mein 'Roshan Gaon' campaign run ki hai. Is campaign ke through selected villages mein solar energy ke kai stations establish kiye jayenge aur villagers ko solar powered lanterns provide ki jayengi.
Unhein Govt of Pakistan ki taraf se Presidential Award bhi mila. Besides, 1992 mein Human Rights ka Asia Award aur Hilal-e-Imtiaz (1992) se nawaza gaya. Aap Bradford University, UK ke Chancellor ke tor par services provide kar chuke hain.
1995 mein Imran Khan ne late British billionaire businessman Sir James Goldsmith ki daughter, Jemima Goldsmith se marriage ki. Jemima Goldsmith ne marriage se pehle Islam accept kar liya aur unka Islamic name Jemima Khan hai. Is marriage ka shor poori world mein hua aur global media ne isko special importance di. 22 June, 2004 ko unhone divorce announce kiya. Imran Khan ka kehna tha k woh apni busy life ki waja se unhein time nahi de paate the.
8 Jan, 2015 ko Imran Khan British aur Pakistani journalist Reham Khan ke saath marriage bond mein bandh gaye. 30 Oct, 2015 ko donon ne divorce proceedings start karne ki confirmation di. Aur Imran Khan ki yeh marriage bhi fail ho gayi.
2017 ke end aur 2018 ke start mein kai news aayin k Imran Khan ne apni spiritual guide Bushra Bibi se shadi kar li hai. However, Imran Khan, Tehreek-e-Insaf ke other members aur Maneka family ne is rumour ko deny kiya.
7 Jan 2018 ko PTI ke central secretariat ne aik statement issue kiya k Imran Khan ne Bushra Bibi ko shadi ke liye proposal diya hai however abhi ise accept nahi kiya gaya.
18 Feb 2018 ko, PTI ne confirm kiya k Imran Khan ne Bushra Bibi se shadi kar li hai.
Cricket career ke dauran Imran Khan ko kai baar political positions offer ki gain. 1987 mein President Pakistan Muhammad Zia-ul-Haq ne unhein Muslim League mein political position offer ki jise unhone deny kar diya. Nawaz Sharif ne bhi apni political party mein join hone ke liye invite kiya tha. Zia-ul-Haq ke saath Imran Khan ke good relations the, unhone cricket chhor di thi but Gen Zia unko dobara cricket mein wapis le kar aaye. 1992 ka World Cup bhi Gen Zia ke kehne par khela.
1994 ke end mein unhone Intelligence Agency (ISI) ke ex-chief Hamid Gul aur Muhammad Ali Durrani ki leadership mein Pasban naam ke group mein join kar liya tha aur usi time unhone politics mein formal involvement mein interest show kiya.
25 April 1996 ko Tehreek-e-Insaf establish kar k political arena mein step rakha. Initially unhein success nahi mil saki. Lekin recently woh apni struggle aur principled stance ki wajah se Pakistani public, especially youth mein rapidly popularity gain kar rahe hain. Is time unki political party ko Pakistan Parliament ke Lower House mein 32, Upper House mein 7, Provincial Assembly Sindh mein 4, Provincial Assembly Punjab mein 30 aur Provincial Assembly Khyber Pakhtunkhwa mein 59 seats حاصل hain (have).
1999 mein General Pervez Musharraf ke slogan 'Corruption aur Political Mafia ka Khatma' ki waja se Musharraf ki military dictatorship ko support kiya. Imran Khan ke according Musharraf ne unhein 2002 mein PM banne ki offer di lekin unhone deny kar diya. 2002 ke referendum mein Imran Khan ne military dictator ke referendum ki support announce ki jab k sab major parties ne is referendum ko illegal declare karte hue iski strong opposition ki. 2002 mein general elections mein woh Mianwali ki seat se National Assembly ke members elect huye. Unhone National Assembly ki Kashmir aur Public Accounts Committees mein bhi services provide ki hain.
2 Oct, 2007 ko General Musharraf ne Army Chief ke post se resignation diye baghair presidential elections fight karne ka decision kiya. Is decision ke against All Parties Democratic Movement ke platform se other 85 Assembly members ke saath milkar Imran Khan ne movement run ki. 3 Nov, 2007 ko military dictator Pervez Musharraf ke emergency declaration ke baad apko house arrest karne ki koshish ki gai. However, woh escape karne mein successful rahe. 14 Nov ko Punjab University mein emergency ke against students protest ke dauran Imran Khan public circles mein nazar aaye. Is rally ke dauran Islami Jamiat Talaba ne Imran Khan ko assault kiya. Is protest ke baad unko arrest kar ke Dera Ghazi Khan ki jail mein bhej diya gaya jahan yeh kuch days imprisoned rahe. Administration ke according un par terrorism law ke under case banaya jayega. World wide ki newspapers ne Imran ki military dictator Pervez Musharraf ke against struggle ko appreciate kiya hai. Lekin yeh bhi kaha jata hai k woh Pervez Musharraf se premiership ka post demand kar rahe the aur jab unhein deny kar diya gaya to woh Pervez Musharraf ke against ho gaye.
18 Nov ko Imran Khan ne Dera Ghazi Khan jail mein hunger strike start ki.
22 Nov ko suddenly release kar diya gaya.
Imran ne kaha hai k unki life aur Karachi mein Tehreek-e-Insaf ke workers ki life ko danger hai kyun k British Govt ne MQM ke London based head Altaf Hussain ke against koi step nahi uthaya jis se yeh log more bold ho kar violence ki actions kar sakte hain. Imran Khan MQM aur uske leader Altaf Hussain ke against allegations to lagate rahe aur yeh claim karte rahe k woh Altaf Hussain ke against proofs le kar London jayenge. Woh gaye bhi lekin apne allegations ko kisi court mein kabhi prove na kar sake.

Jemima Goldsmith ne marriage se pehle Islam accept kar liya aur unka Islamic name Jemima Khan hai. Is marriage ka shor poori world mein hua aur global media ne isko special importance di. 22 June, 2004 ko unhone divorce announce kiya. Imran Khan ka kehna tha k woh apni busy life ki waja se unhein time nahi de paate the. 8 Jan, 2015 ko Imran Khan British aur Pakistani journalist Reham Khan ke saath marriage bond mein bandh gaye. 30 Oct, 2015 ko donon ne divorce proceedings start karne ki confirmation di. Aur Imran Khan ki yeh marriage bhi fail ho gayi. 2017 ke end aur 2018 ke start mein kai news aayin k Imran Khan ne apni spiritual guide Bushra Bibi se shadi kar li hai. However, Imran Khan, Tehreek-e-Insaf ke other members aur Maneka family ne is rumour ko deny kiya. 7 Jan 2018 ko PTI ke central secretariat ne aik statement issue kiya k Imran Khan ne Bushra Bibi ko shadi ke liye proposal diya hai however abhi ise accept nahi kiya gaya. 18 Feb 2018 ko, PTI ne confirm kiya k Imran Khan ne Bushra Bibi se shadi kar li hai. Cricket career ke dauran Imran Khan ko kai baar political positions offer ki gain. 1987 mein President Pakistan Muhammad Zia-ul-Haq ne unhein Muslim League mein political position offer ki jise unhone deny kar diya. Nawaz Sharif ne bhi apni political party mein join hone ke liye invite kiya tha. Zia-ul-Haq ke saath Imran Khan ke good relations the, unhone cricket chhor di thi but Gen Zia unko dobara cricket mein wapis le kar aaye. 1992 ka World Cup bhi Gen Zia ke kehne par khela. 1994 ke end mein unhone Intelligence Agency (ISI) ke ex-chief Hamid Gul aur Muhammad Ali Durrani ki leadership mein Pasban naam ke group mein join kar liya tha aur usi time unhone politics mein formal involvement mein interest show kiya. 25 April 1996 ko Tehreek-e-Insaf establish kar k political arena mein step rakha. Initially unhein success nahi mil saki. Lekin recently woh apni struggle aur principled stance ki wajah se Pakistani public, especially youth mein rapidly popularity gain kar rahe hain. Is time unki political party ko Pakistan Parliament ke Lower House mein 32, Upper House mein 7, Provincial Assembly Sindh mein 4, Provincial Assembly Punjab mein 30 aur Provincial Assembly Khyber Pakhtunkhwa mein 59 seats hasil hain (have). 1999 mein General Pervez Musharraf ke slogan 'Corruption aur Political Mafia ka Khatma' ki waja se Musharraf ki military dictatorship ko support kiya. Imran Khan ke according Musharraf ne unhein 2002 mein PM banne ki offer di lekin unhone deny kar diya. 2002 ke referendum mein Imran Khan ne military dictator ke referendum ki support announce ki jab k sab major parties ne is referendum ko illegal declare karte hue iski strong opposition ki. 2002 mein general elections mein woh Mianwali ki seat se National Assembly ke members elect huye. Unhone National Assembly ki Kashmir aur Public Accounts Committees mein bhi services provide ki hain. 2 Oct, 2007 ko General Musharraf ne Army Chief ke post se resignation diye baghair presidential elections fight karne ka decision kiya. Is decision ke against All Parties Democratic Movement ke platform se other 85 Assembly members ke saath milkar Imran Khan ne movement run ki. 3 Nov, 2007 ko military dictator Pervez Musharraf ke emergency declaration ke baad apko house arrest karne ki koshish ki gai. However, woh escape karne mein successful rahe. 14 Nov ko Punjab University mein emergency ke against students protest ke dauran Imran Khan public circles mein nazar aaye. Is rally ke dauran Islami Jamiat Talaba ne Imran Khan ko assault kiya. Is protest ke baad unko arrest kar ke Dera Ghazi Khan ki jail mein bhej diya gaya jahan yeh kuch days imprisoned rahe. Administration ke according un par terrorism law ke under case banaya jayega. World wide ki newspapers ne Imran ki military dictator Pervez Musharraf ke against struggle ko appreciate kiya hai. Lekin yeh bhi kaha jata hai k woh Pervez Musharraf se premiership ka post demand kar rahe the aur jab unhein deny kar diya gaya to woh Pervez Musharraf ke against ho gaye. 18 Nov ko Imran Khan ne Dera Ghazi Khan jail mein hunger strike start ki. 22 Nov ko suddenly release kar diya gaya. Imran ne kaha hai k unki life aur Karachi mein Tehreek-e-Insaf ke workers ki life ko danger hai kyun k British Govt ne MQM ke London based head Altaf Hussain ke against koi step nahi uthaya jis se yeh log more bold ho kar violence ki actions kar sakte hain. Imran Khan MQM aur uske leader Altaf Hussain ke against allegations to lagate rahe aur yeh claim karte rahe k woh Altaf Hussain ke against proofs le kar London jayenge. Woh gaye bhi lekin apne allegations ko kisi court mein kabhi prove na kar sake. 30 Oct 2011 ko Imran Khan ne Lahore mein 100,000+ supporters ko address kiya, Govt ki policies ko challenge karte hue kaha tha k nayi changes ruling parties ke against tsunami hain. 25 Dec 2011 ko Karachi mein thousands of supporters par mushtamil successful public event organize kiya gaya. Us time se Imran Khan ruling parties aur Pakistan mein future ke political possibilities ka real threat ban gaya hai. International Republican Institute ke survey ke according, Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf donon national aur provincial level par Pakistan mein popular parties ki list mein sabse upar hai. 6 Oct 2012 ko Imran Khan ne Pakistan ke South Waziristan ke area mein Kotai ke village par drone attack ke against protesters ke aik caravan mein join kiya. 23 March 2013 ko, Khan ne apni election campaign ke start par 'Naya Pakistan Resolution' introduce ki. 29 April ko Observer journal ne Imran Khan aur unki party ko ruling Muslim League ke liye important opposition declare kiya. 2011 aur 2013 ke beech, Imran Khan aur Nawaz Sharif ke darmiyan bitter statements aur allegations ki barish ka silsila raha. April 2013 se election campaign mein PML-N aur PTI ne aik doosre par criticize kiya. Is election campaign ke dauran Imran Khan ne announce kiya k woh Pakistan ko US ki war se bahar nikalte hue tribal areas mein peace layenge. Unhone Khyber Pakhtunkhwa ke different cities aur country ke other parts mein different public meetings ko address kiya jahan unhone announce kiya k Tehreek-e-Insaf uniform education system introduce karegi jisme rich aur poor bachon ko equality milegi. Elections se sirf four days pehle 7 May, 2013 ko aik forklift se girne ke baad Imran Khan ko Lahore mein Shaukat Khanum Hospital le jaya gaya. Medical checkup ke baad bataya gaya k Imran Khan safe hain, koi serious baat nahi. Is incident ki waja se Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf ke jalsay cancel kar diye gaye. Imran Khan ne Lahore ke hospital mein let kar video link ke through Islamabad mein supporters ki aik rally se address kar ke campaign end ki. 2018 ke general elections mein unki party PTI ne success hasil ki. 17 Aug 2018 ko Imran Khan 176 votes get kar ke 22nd PM of Pakistan ban gaye jab k unke opponent aur Leader of Opposition Shehbaz Sharif ne 96 votes hasil kiye. Unhone 18 Aug 2018 ko oath liya. 18 Aug ko unhone 20-member cabinet announce kiya aur Interior Minister aur Power Minister ka portfolio khud ke liye select kiya. Baad mein cabinet mein expansion ki gayi aur unhone Power Minister ka portfolio Omar Ayub Khan ko hand over kar diya. Imran Khan ne oath lene ke baad apni cabinet announce kar di thi. Unke mostly appointed ministers pehle bhi Musharraf ke time mein aur Pakistan Peoples Party ki govt ke time mein services perform kar chuke hain. Islamabad ki District and Session Court ki taraf se issued arrest warrants ke result mein, Islamabad Police aur Lahore Police ne 14 March 2023 ko Khan ki arrest ke liye operation start kiya. 9 May ko, Imran Khan ko Islamabad High Court se paramilitary forces ne arrest kiya tha. Yeh Al-Qadir Trust case mein unke alleged role par tha, jis ke baad PTI party ke members ne countrywide protest ki call di thi. Unki arrest se demonstrations huye aur 9 May ke riots huye. Baad mein Supreme Court ne is arrest ko illegal declare kar diya. 9 May ke riots ke baad, PTI ke bohot se members ne Khan ka saath chhor diya aur Jahangir Tareen ki leadership mein Istehkam-e-Pakistan Party ki foundation rakhi. 12 May ko Islamabad High Court ne arrest ko illegal declare karte hue Khan ki immediate release ka order diya. Imran Khan ko protective bail de di gayi aur usi din release kar diya gaya. 5 Aug 2023 ko, Imran Khan ko second time arrest kiya gaya aur 2018 se 2022 tak apni premiership ka misuse karte hue state custody mein aise gifts ki buying-selling karne ka allegation prove hone par three years jail ki punishment sunai gai jo foreign visits ke dauran receive kiye gaye the aur unki value 140 million rupees se zyada thi. 29 Aug 2023 ko, aik appeal court ne Khan ki corruption conviction aur three years jail ki sentence suspend kar di aur bail grant kar li. Corruption case mein suspended sentence ke bawajood, Islamabad ki aik special court ne order diya k woh cipher case ke silsile mein jail mein hi rahenge. Khan ne repeatedly allege kiya hai k unhein aik cipher ya diplomatic cable receive hua hai, jisme is baat ka proof maujood hai k wahan aik US citizen ne Pakistan ki military establishment ke saath mil kar use post se remove karne ki conspiracy ki. Federal Investigation Agency ne Khan ke against alleged cipher par information share karne aur state secrets leak karne aur is tarah Official Secrets Act ki violation karne par case register kiya. 30 Jan 2024 ko, Khan ko is case mein guilty declare kiya gaya aur 10 saal jail ki punishment sunai gai. Imran Khan ne 8 Feb ko hone wale 2024 ke Pakistani general elections mein voters se apne vote se har injustice ka badla lene par emphasize karte hue react kiya. Unke lawyer ne is decision ko illegal declare kiya aur unki legal team ne decision ke against appeal karne ka plan banaya. Bohot se observers ne allege kiya k yeh punishment 2024 ke elections se pehle Khan aur PTI ko sideline karne ki campaign ka part thi. Khan ne khud apne against sab allegations ko politically motivated declare kiya. Unke us waqt ke Foreign Minister aur PTI ke Vice-Chairman Shah Mahmood Qureshi ko bhi is case mein 10 saal jail ki punishment sunai gai thi. Khan ki sister Aleema ne kaha k prosecution ne unke brother ke liye death penalty demand ki thi. Next day, Khan ko Toshakhana case ke liye guilty declare kiya gaya aur use 14 saal jail ki punishment sunai gai. Jisme use aur uski wife Bushra Bibi ko diye gaye official gifts ki illegal sale shamil thi, jab woh PM the. Aug mein apni arrest ke baad se, Khan ko Rawalpindi ki Adiala Jail mein rakha gaya hai, jahan unka trial bhi hua. Imran Khan ki struggle par 2013 mein aik film 'Kaptaan' release hui, jisme Imran Khan ke 1992 se le kar 2013 tak ke public change tak ke periods ko show kiya gaya. Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf ki taraf se clear kiya gaya k mentioned film ki investment aur production ka Imran Khan aur uski organization se koi relation nahi aur yeh aik totally independent project hai jo film aur media se related logon ki taraf se banaya gaya hai.
Ramiz Hassan Raja (birth: 14 Aug 1962, Lyallpur (now Faisalabad), Punjab) aik Rajput family mein hui. Unke according unhone apni initial education apne ghar mein hi unique style mein hasil ki. Unke father Raja Saleem Akhtar aik senior bureaucrat the aur unhone kuch first-class matches play kiye the. Rameez Raja cricket ke Wasim Raja, jinhein kisi series mein 14 sixes lagane ki fame hasil thi, ke younger brother hain. Woh cricket commentator, YouTuber aur ex-cricketer hain jo 1980s aur 1990s ke dauran Pakistan ki captain ki capacity mein represent karte the. Cricket se retirement ke baad se, woh international cricket matches mein commentator rahe hain. Woh apne YouTube channel Ramiz Speaks par bhi cricket ke baray mein baat karte rahe aur current time mein Pakistan Cricket Board ke Chairman ki capacity mein apni duties perform kar rahe hain. Ramiz Hassan Raja ne Pakistan ke alawa Allied Bank, Islamabad Cricket Association, Lahore, Pakistan National Shipping Corporation, Punjab, Service Industries ki taraf se cricket kheli. Ramiz Raja ne 1978 mein first-class cricket mein step rakha, usne List A mein 9000+ runs banaye aur first-class matches mein 10,000 runs banaye. Woh Pakistan mein 10,000 first-class runs tak reach karne mein only few people mein se aik hain. England ke against use national call mili. Unka count Pakistan ke domestic circuit mein play karne wale top batsmen mein hota hai. Ramiz Raja ne 13 saal tak international cricket kheli, 57 Test matches mein apne skills show kiye. Unke career average 31.83 hai aur usne 2 centuries score ki. One Day International format mein, unhone 198 matches khele aur 9 centuries banayeen. Woh us national team ke member the jo 1987 World Cup ke semi-finals mein pohunchi thi. Unhone 1992 World Cup mein 2 centuries score ki, jo Australia mein held hua tha, is mein New Zealand ke against aik century bhi shamil thi, jo is period mein unbeaten raha tha. Unhein match winning performance par Man of the Match se nawaza gaya jisne Pakistan ko tournament ke semi-finals mein space dilai. England ke against final mein, Ramiz ko final catch lene ka honor mila jisne Pakistan ko World Cup jeetwaya. Yeh unke cricketing career ka peak ban gaya, jaisa k is win ke aik saal ke andar hi woh form lose kar gaya tha aur use national team se drop kar diya gaya tha. Ramiz Hassan Raja is waqt Pakistan Cricket Board ke 36th Chairman ke tor par services provide kar rahe hain. As a player, Raja ne 1980s se 1990s ke dauran Pakistan ko represent kiya. Cricket se retirement ke baad se woh international cricket matches ke commentator rahe hain. Woh apne YouTube channel Ramiz Speaks par bhi cricket ke baray mein baat karte hain. Ramiz Raja aik Rajput family mein born huye, jinki roots unki wife ki side se Indian state Rajasthan ke Jaipur city se hain jab k unki mother-in-law Delhi aur father-in-law Karnal se hain. Ramiz Raja Sadiq Public School Bahawalpur, Aitchison College Lahore aur Govt College University Lahore ke student rahe hain. Ramiz ne apne first-class cricket ka start 1978 mein kiya, List A mein 9,000 se zyada runs aur first-class matches mein 10,000 runs banaye. Woh Pakistan mein 10,000 first-class runs tak pohnchne wale few people mein se aik hain. Unhein England ke against national call mili. Unka count Pakistan ki domestic cricket mein play karne wale prominent batsmen mein hota tha. Unhein England ke against Test match play karne ka chance mila. Unki performance unimpressive thi, kyun k woh har innings mein 1 run bana kar out huye. However, Pakistani squad mein kai players ki retirement aur first-class cricket mein apne years of experience ki help se, Raja national team mein space obtain karne mein successful huye. Ramiz ne 13 saal tak international cricket kheli, 57 Test matches mein unka career average 31.83 hai aur unhone do centuries score ki. One Day International format mein unhone 198 matches khele aur 9 centuries score ki. Woh 1987 World Cup ke semi-finals tak pohnchne wali national team ke member tha. Unhone 1992 World Cup mein 2 centuries score ki jo Australia mein held hua jisme New Zealand ke against century bhi shamil thi jo is period mein unbeaten rahi thi. Unhein unki match winning performance par Man of the Match se award kiya gaya jisne Pakistan ko tournament ke semi-finals mein place dilai. England ke against final mein Ramiz ko final catch lene ka honor mila jisne Pakistan ko World Cup jeetwaya. Yeh unke cricket career ka peak ban gaya, kyun k is win ke aik saal ke andar hi woh form lose kar chuke the aur national team se bahar ho gaye the. Ramiz One Day International ki history ke first player ban gaye jinhein 1987 mein Karachi mein khele gaye match mein England ke against obstructing the field diya gaya tha. England ne apni 44-over ki innings mein 6 wickets par 263 runs banaye the. Pakistan ki side se Raja ne batting start ki aur match ki last ball par 98 runs tak reach kar chuke the. Pakistan ko last over mein win ke liye 25 runs needed the. Is last over ke dauran, usne ball ko target kiya aur do runs tak run kiye jis se use uski century mil sakti thi, but woh crease se kafi door the jab fielder ki return uski taraf aai aur Raja ne ball ko apne bat se drop kar diya aur use out kar diya. Use 'obstructing the field' declare kiya gaya. Unhein Pakistan team mein wapis bulaya gaya aur woh 1996 Cricket World Cup mein khele. 1995-1996 ke season ke dauran, Pakistan ki Sri Lanka se first home series lose karne ke baad, unhein captaincy se remove kar diya gaya. Pakistan ke liye aik Test match mein unka last game as a captain 1996-1997 Sri Lanka tour mein tha, however team series ke dauran koi match win karne mein fail rahi. Unhone 1997 mein all forms of cricket se retirement le li aur uske baad se woh aik TV commentator aur Pakistan aur international cricket donon ke administrator ke tor par active hain. Ramiz Raja ne 2006 mein Pakistan ke against England ki Test series ke dauran Test Match Special aur Sky Sports par commentator ke tor par work kiya hai. Woh Pakistan Cricket Board ke Chief Executive ke tor par bhi work kar chuke hain, but growing media commitments ka reference dete hue Aug 2004 mein apni job se resign kar diya tha. Woh Pakistan Cricket Team ke tours ke saath saath bohot se domestic tournaments aur ICC ke international tournaments mein commentary provide karte rehte hain. Raja ki mother-in-law aur father-in-law ka relation Karnal, Haryana se hai. Unke father Raja Saleem Akhtar British colonial era mein cricketer the aur Multan ke liye play karte the jab k unke donon brothers Wasim Raja aur Zaheer Raja bhi cricket players the. Ramiz Raja ne Pakistan ke alawa Allied Bank, Islamabad Cricket Association, Lahore, Pakistan National Shipping Corporation, Punjab aur Service Industries ki taraf se cricket matches mein participate kiya. Ramiz Hassan Raja ne 57 Tests ki 94 innings mein 5 times Not Out reh kar 2833 runs score kiye. 31.84 ki average se banne wale in runs mein 122 uska highest score tha. 2 centuries aur 22 half-centuries is total mein helpful prove hui theen. Ramiz Raja ne 198 One Day matches ki 197 innings mein 15 times Not Out reh kar 5841 runs banaye jisme 119 Not Out uska highest individual score tha jis ke liye unhein 32.09 ki average mili. 9 centuries aur 31 half-centuries bhi unke record mein included hain jab k 183 first-class matches ki 304 innings mein 20 times Not Out reh kar unhone 10392 runs score kiye. 36.59 ki average se set hone wale is total mein 300 unka kisi aik innings ka sabse bara individual score tha. 17 centuries aur 63 half-centuries bhi uske record mein shamil theen. Ramiz Raja aik good fielder bhi the, unhone Test mein 34, One Day mein 33 aur first-class mein 103 catches pakre. Ramiz Raja ne 1987 mein England ke against Karachi ke venue par nervous nineties ka shikar huye jo aik common si baat thi but unka out hona aik historic incident tha. Woh 'obstructing the field' ke reference se out declare kiye gaye, woh is incident ka victim hone wale world ke sabse pehle cricketer the. Baad mein more 7 players usi method se out diye gaye.
