Woh cricket commentator, YouTuber aur ex-cricketer hain jo 1980s aur 1990s ke dauran Pakistan ki captain ki capacity mein represent karte the. Cricket se retirement ke baad se, woh international cricket matches mein commentator rahe hain. Woh apne YouTube channel Ramiz Speaks par bhi cricket ke baray mein baat karte rahe aur current time mein Pakistan Cricket Board ke Chairman ki capacity mein apni duties perform kar rahe hain. Ramiz Hassan Raja ne Pakistan ke alawa Allied Bank, Islamabad Cricket Association, Lahore, Pakistan National Shipping Corporation, Punjab, Service Industries ki taraf se cricket kheli. Ramiz Raja ne 1978 mein first-class cricket mein step rakha, usne List A mein 9000+ runs banaye aur first-class matches mein 10,000 runs banaye. Woh Pakistan mein 10,000 first-class runs tak reach karne mein only few people mein se aik hain. England ke against use national call mili. Unka count Pakistan ke domestic circuit mein play karne wale top batsmen mein hota hai. Ramiz Raja ne 13 saal tak international cricket kheli, 57 Test matches mein apne skills show kiye. Unke career average 31.83 hai aur usne 2 centuries score ki. One Day International format mein, unhone 198 matches khele aur 9 centuries banayeen. Woh us national team ke member the jo 1987 World Cup ke semi-finals mein pohunchi thi. Unhone 1992 World Cup mein 2 centuries score ki, jo Australia mein held hua tha, is mein New Zealand ke against aik century bhi shamil thi, jo is period mein unbeaten raha tha. Unhein match winning performance par Man of the Match se nawaza gaya jisne Pakistan ko tournament ke semi-finals mein space dilai. England ke against final mein, Ramiz ko final catch lene ka honor mila jisne Pakistan ko World Cup jeetwaya. Yeh unke cricketing career ka peak ban gaya, jaisa k is win ke aik saal ke andar hi woh form lose kar gaya tha aur use national team se drop kar diya gaya tha. Ramiz Hassan Raja is waqt Pakistan Cricket Board ke 36th Chairman ke tor par services provide kar rahe hain. As a player, Raja ne 1980s se 1990s ke dauran Pakistan ko represent kiya. Cricket se retirement ke baad se woh international cricket matches ke commentator rahe hain. Woh apne YouTube channel Ramiz Speaks par bhi cricket ke baray mein baat karte hain. Ramiz Raja aik Rajput family mein born huye, jinki roots unki wife ki side se Indian state Rajasthan ke Jaipur city se hain jab k unki mother-in-law Delhi aur father-in-law Karnal se hain. Ramiz Raja Sadiq Public School Bahawalpur, Aitchison College Lahore aur Govt College University Lahore ke student rahe hain. Ramiz ne apne first-class cricket ka start 1978 mein kiya, List A mein 9,000 se zyada runs aur first-class matches mein 10,000 runs banaye. Woh Pakistan mein 10,000 first-class runs tak pohnchne wale few people mein se aik hain. Unhein England ke against national call mili. Unka count Pakistan ki domestic cricket mein play karne wale prominent batsmen mein hota tha. Unhein England ke against Test match play karne ka chance mila. Unki performance unimpressive thi, kyun k woh har innings mein 1 run bana kar out huye. However, Pakistani squad mein kai players ki retirement aur first-class cricket mein apne years of experience ki help se, Raja national team mein space obtain karne mein successful huye. Ramiz ne 13 saal tak international cricket kheli, 57 Test matches mein unka career average 31.83 hai aur unhone do centuries score ki. One Day International format mein unhone 198 matches khele aur 9 centuries score ki. Woh 1987 World Cup ke semi-finals tak pohnchne wali national team ke member tha. Unhone 1992 World Cup mein 2 centuries score ki jo Australia mein held hua jisme New Zealand ke against century bhi shamil thi jo is period mein unbeaten rahi thi. Unhein unki match winning performance par Man of the Match se award kiya gaya jisne Pakistan ko tournament ke semi-finals mein place dilai. England ke against final mein Ramiz ko final catch lene ka honor mila jisne Pakistan ko World Cup jeetwaya. Yeh unke cricket career ka peak ban gaya, kyun k is win ke aik saal ke andar hi woh form lose kar chuke the aur national team se bahar ho gaye the. Ramiz One Day International ki history ke first player ban gaye jinhein 1987 mein Karachi mein khele gaye match mein England ke against obstructing the field diya gaya tha. England ne apni 44-over ki innings mein 6 wickets par 263 runs banaye the. Pakistan ki side se Raja ne batting start ki aur match ki last ball par 98 runs tak reach kar chuke the. Pakistan ko last over mein win ke liye 25 runs needed the. Is last over ke dauran, usne ball ko target kiya aur do runs tak run kiye jis se use uski century mil sakti thi, but woh crease se kafi door the jab fielder ki return uski taraf aai aur Raja ne ball ko apne bat se drop kar diya aur use out kar diya. Use 'obstructing the field' declare kiya gaya. Unhein Pakistan team mein wapis bulaya gaya aur woh 1996 Cricket World Cup mein khele. 1995-1996 ke season ke dauran, Pakistan ki Sri Lanka se first home series lose karne ke baad, unhein captaincy se remove kar diya gaya. Pakistan ke liye aik Test match mein unka last game as a captain 1996-1997 Sri Lanka tour mein tha, however team series ke dauran koi match win karne mein fail rahi. Unhone 1997 mein all forms of cricket se retirement le li aur uske baad se woh aik TV commentator aur Pakistan aur international cricket donon ke administrator ke tor par active hain. Ramiz Raja ne 2006 mein Pakistan ke against England ki Test series ke dauran Test Match Special aur Sky Sports par commentator ke tor par work kiya hai. Woh Pakistan Cricket Board ke Chief Executive ke tor par bhi work kar chuke hain, but growing media commitments ka reference dete hue Aug 2004 mein apni job se resign kar diya tha. Woh Pakistan Cricket Team ke tours ke saath saath bohot se domestic tournaments aur ICC ke international tournaments mein commentary provide karte rehte hain. Raja ki mother-in-law aur father-in-law ka relation Karnal, Haryana se hai. Unke father Raja Saleem Akhtar British colonial era mein cricketer the aur Multan ke liye play karte the jab k unke donon brothers Wasim Raja aur Zaheer Raja bhi cricket players the. Ramiz Raja ne Pakistan ke alawa Allied Bank, Islamabad Cricket Association, Lahore, Pakistan National Shipping Corporation, Punjab aur Service Industries ki taraf se cricket matches mein participate kiya. Ramiz Hassan Raja ne 57 Tests ki 94 innings mein 5 times Not Out reh kar 2833 runs score kiye. 31.84 ki average se banne wale in runs mein 122 uska highest score tha. 2 centuries aur 22 half-centuries is total mein helpful prove hui theen. Ramiz Raja ne 198 One Day matches ki 197 innings mein 15 times Not Out reh kar 5841 runs banaye jisme 119 Not Out uska highest individual score tha jis ke liye unhein 32.09 ki average mili. 9 centuries aur 31 half-centuries bhi unke record mein included hain jab k 183 first-class matches ki 304 innings mein 20 times Not Out reh kar unhone 10392 runs score kiye. 36.59 ki average se set hone wale is total mein 300 unka kisi aik innings ka sabse bara individual score tha. 17 centuries aur 63 half-centuries bhi uske record mein shamil theen. Ramiz Raja aik good fielder bhi the, unhone Test mein 34, One Day mein 33 aur first-class mein 103 catches pakre. Ramiz Raja ne 1987 mein England ke against Karachi ke venue par nervous nineties ka shikar huye jo aik common si baat thi but unka out hona aik historic incident tha. Woh 'obstructing the field' ke reference se out declare kiye gaye, woh is incident ka victim hone wale world ke sabse pehle cricketer the. Baad mein more 7 players usi method se out diye gaye.
30 Jan 2024 ko, Khan ko is case mein guilty declare kiya gaya aur 10 saal jail ki punishment sunai gai. Imran Khan ne 8 Feb ko hone wale 2024 ke Pakistani general elections mein voters se apne vote se har injustice ka badla lene par emphasize karte hue react kiya. Unke lawyer ne is decision ko illegal declare kiya aur unki legal team ne decision ke against appeal karne ka plan banaya. Bohot se observers ne allege kiya k yeh punishment 2024 ke elections se pehle Khan aur PTI ko sideline karne ki campaign ka part thi. Khan ne khud apne against sab allegations ko politically motivated declare kiya. Unke us waqt ke Foreign Minister aur PTI ke Vice-Chairman Shah Mahmood Qureshi ko bhi is case mein 10 saal jail ki punishment sunai gai thi. Khan ki sister Aleema ne kaha k prosecution ne unke brother ke liye death penalty demand ki thi. Next day, Khan ko Toshakhana case ke liye guilty declare kiya gaya aur use 14 saal jail ki punishment sunai gai. Jisme use aur uski wife Bushra Bibi ko diye gaye official gifts ki illegal sale shamil thi, jab woh PM the. Aug mein apni arrest ke baad se, Khan ko Rawalpindi ki Adiala Jail mein rakha gaya hai, jahan unka trial bhi hua.
Imran Khan ki struggle par 2013 mein aik film 'Kaptaan' release hui, jisme Imran Khan ke 1992 se le kar 2013 tak ke public change tak ke periods ko show kiya gaya. Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf ki taraf se clear kiya gaya k mentioned film ki investment aur production ka Imran Khan aur uski organization se koi relation nahi aur yeh aik totally independent project hai jo film aur media se related logon ki taraf se banaya gaya hai.
Ramiz Hassan Raja (birth: 14 Aug 1962, Lyallpur (now Faisalabad), Punjab) aik Rajput family mein hui. Unke according unhone apni initial education apne ghar mein hi unique style mein hasil ki. Unke father Raja Saleem Akhtar aik senior bureaucrat the aur unhone kuch first-class matches play kiye the. Raja Saleem Akhtar British colonial era mein cricketer the aur Multan ke liye play karte the. Unke donon brothers Wasim Raja aur Zaheer Raja bhi cricket players the. Ramiz Raja cricket ke Wasim Raja, jinhein kisi series mein 14 sixes lagane ki fame hasil thi, ke younger brother hain. Ramiz Raja aik Rajput family mein born huye, jinki roots unki wife ki side se Indian state Rajasthan ke Jaipur city se hain jab k unki mother-in-law Delhi aur father-in-law Karnal se hain. Ramiz Raja Sadiq Public School Bahawalpur, Aitchison College Lahore aur Govt College University Lahore ke student rahe hain.
Ramiz Raja ne 1978 mein first-class cricket mein step rakha, List A mein 9000+ runs aur first-class matches mein 10,000 runs banaye. Woh Pakistan mein 10,000 first-class runs tak pohnchne wale few people mein se aik hain aur unka count Pakistan ki domestic cricket mein play karne wale prominent batsmen mein hota tha. Unhein England ke against national call mili, jahan unki Test debut performance unimpressive thi, kyun k woh har innings mein 1 run bana kar out huye. However, Pakistani squad mein kai players ki retirement aur first-class cricket mein apne years of experience ki help se, Raja national team mein space obtain karne mein successful huye. Ramiz ne 13 saal tak international cricket kheli, 57 Test matches mein 31.83 ki average se 2833 runs score kiye, jisme 2 centuries aur 22 half-centuries shamil theen. Unka highest Test score 122 tha. One Day International format mein, unhone 198 matches khele aur 32.09 ki average se 5841 runs banaye, jisme 9 centuries aur 31 half-centuries shamil theen aur 119 Not Out unka highest individual score tha. Woh us national team ke member the jo 1987 World Cup ke semi-finals mein pohunchi thi. Unhone 1992 World Cup mein 2 centuries score ki, jo Australia mein held hua tha, is mein New Zealand ke against aik century bhi shamil thi, jo is period mein unbeaten raha tha. Yeh unke cricketing career ka peak ban gaya, kyun k is win ke aik saal ke andar hi woh form lose kar chuke the aur national team se drop kar diye gaye the. Ramiz Raja aik good fielder bhi the, unhone Test mein 34, One Day mein 33 aur first-class mein 103 catches pakre. Ramiz Hassan Raja ne Pakistan ke alawa Allied Bank, Islamabad Cricket Association, Lahore, Pakistan National Shipping Corporation, Punjab aur Service Industries ki taraf se cricket kheli.
